[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]{D4306}]@/_/sbyor ba brgya ba bzhugs/[#]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_yo ga sha ta ka_/bod skad du/_sbyor ba brgya pa/_sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa klu sgrub la
[\[1b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/ring du grags pa'i gso dpyad [#]nas/_/mtha' yas rgyud kyi gces pa blangs/_/sman pa mkhas par rab mchod pa'i/_/sbyor ba brgya yis bcing bar [#]bya/_/bdud
[\[1b.3\]]rtsi lta bu'i sman sbyor gyis/_/lus ni nad med 'gyur ba yin/_/gso dpyad shes pa'i sman pa yis/_/nad rgyu mtshan nyid yongs su brtag_/sle tres gla [#]sgang byi tsher bca' sga dang /_/byi
[\[1b.4\]]tsher gla sgang tig ta par+pa ta/_/ba shaka [#]byi tsher bca' sga gla sgang rnams/_/bskol thang rlung mkhris bad kan rims la btung /_/k+Shu tra sle tres bca' sga puSh+ka rau[#]/_/bskol ba'i thang
[\[1b.5\]]byas bad kan rlung mchog la/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde bcas dang ga [#]med/_/gzhogs gzer nyes gsum las byung rims [#]la'ang bsngags/_/dong ga drod sman nar rtsa gla sgang dang /_/hong len
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]a ru ra rnams bskol ba'i thang /_/gzer bcas tshad 'khru bad rlung ldan rims la/_/phan no drod skyed bzhu ba byas pas kyang /_/rgun 'brum gla sgang hong len a ru ra/_/dong ga par+pa ta ka'i
[\[2a.2\]]thang byas la/_/mkhris byung rims dang bla 'chol [#]brgyal ba dang /_/mgo 'khor tsha skam skom dad ldan rnams phan[#]/_/kaN+Da ka [#]ri bca' sga sle tres bskol/_/drod [#]sman nar mo bsres pa'i thang 'thungs pas/_/
[\[2a.3\]]gsus gzer lud pa tshad rnying dang ga med/_/pho ba'i nad cham [#]dbugs mi bde rnams 'joms/_/byi tsher parba ta [#]ka a ru ra/_/ba sha hong len tig ta [#]pri yang+ku/_/ka ra cher btab bskol ba'i thang 'thungs
[\[2a.4\]]pas/_/skom dang khrag mkhris rims dang tshad ldan 'joms/_/rims [#]nad gso ba'i dpyad do/_/[#]skyer rtsa 'bras bu gsum dang bI shA la[#]/_/skyer rtsa phye mar byas la nges par bskol/_/thang la sbrang rtsi
[\[2a.5\]]ldan pa 'thungs pa yis/_/gcin kha snyi ba'i nad skyes ma lus 'joms/_/u di [#]ts+ya dang ka ped [#]bong nga dkar/_/gla sgang dug mo nyung bcas thang byas pa/_/tshad pa gzer [#]bcas khrag 'khru dang bcas pa[#]/
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]yun rings [#]zhugs pa'i 'khru ba rnams la phan/_/gla sgang bca' sga bong nga dkar por bcas/_/sle tres cha snyoms [#]chu la bskol 'thungs pas/_/me drod zhan pa'i rgyun [#]gyi nad rnams dang /_/tshad zin 'khru ba'i nad kyang sel bar 'gyur/_/lpags [#]nad lto ba na dang
[\[2b.2\]]skya rbab nad[#]/_/sbos dang cham pa bad kan mgul [#]'gags la/_/pur+Na rna ba [#]thang shing a ru ra/_/sle tres ba gcin gu gul ldan pa btung /_/gla [#]sgang shi kru [#]thang shing dan+tI [#]'bras/_/byi dang drod [#]sman nar phye bcas thang gis/_/rgyun du kha rkub nas 'byung
[\[2b.3\]]srin [#]bu dang /_/srin las skyes pa'i nad kyang 'joms par 'gyur/_/suk+Sh+me drod [#]sman shing mngar na le sham/_/asma b+he dang e raN ba sha [#]gze/_/brag zhun gtso cher bskol ba'i thang 'thungs na/_/rde'u gseg ma dang bcas gcin sri sel/_/brag zhun asma
[\[2b.4\]]b+he dang suk+She dang /_/drod [#]sman phye ma 'bras bkrus chu btab btung /_/yang na bu ram dang bcas 'thungs gyur [#]na/_/gcin sri 'chi la thug pa'ang 'cho bar 'gyur/_/dong ga dang ni gze ma a ru ra/_/byi tsher asma b+he da [#]ba sha ka_/bskol ba'i thang la sbrang
[\[2b.5\]]rtsi ldan 'thungs na/_/tsha zhing gzer bcas gcin sri grol bar 'gyur/_/dong ga dang ni sle tres ba [#]sha rnams/_/e raN mar khu la bskol thang 'thungs na/_/rlung byung rnam 'gyur ma lus khrag gi nad/_/steng 'og lus kun nas 'dzag rim pas
[\[2b.6\]]'joms/_/taN+Du li [#]ka'i rtsa ba lig bu mig_/'bras kyi chu [#]la sbrang rtsi ldan 'thungs na/_/kun gyis bskyed pa'i khrag nad nges par 'joms/_/dbugs mi bde la b+hArgI [#]bca' sgas so/_/bri [#]ha ti gnyis e raN [#]ka ped dang /_/ma tu asma k+Sha[#]ra shing kun
[\[2b.7\]]gze/_/san d+he [#]e raN mar khur bsres byas thang /_/rked pa snying nu pho mtshan gzer bas gdung [#]/_/shing kun shu dag kha ru bca' sga dang /_/go snyod a ru puSh+kar ru rta rnams/_/phyi ma'i cha 'phel phye mar byas rnams kyis/_/lto skran rims rnying gsud
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]nad rnams la'o/_/bca' sga shing kun ru tsha cha snyoms phye[#]/_/sga chu la bskol bad kan rlung byung dang /_/rtsib logs snying rgyab gsus gzer gsud rnams la/_/btung ngo de bzhin nas khus [#]rtug 'gags la'o/_/'jam 'bras lo ma'i bI shA lA tsa bya/_/tsi
[\[3a.2\]]tra tsha gsum lan tshwa gtso cher brtsegs[#]/_/bsregs pa'i thal ba zho la sbyar 'thungs pas/_/dmu skran skya rbab rkub kyi nad rnams sel/_/shing kun shu dag bca' sga sardzi[#]ka_/kha ru phyi ma nyis 'gyur phye mar byas/_/chu dron btab 'thungs sna tshogs gsud gzer dang /_/
[\[3a.3\]]snying nad skran dang stod du rlung 'tshangs 'joms/_/shring gi [#]tsha gsum 'bras gsum kaN+Da ka_/b+hArgI puSh+kar dza TA tsha [#]sna lnga/_/phye ma chu dron btab 'thungs skyigs bu lud/_/dang ga med cham [#]stod rlung mi bde 'joms/_/dzam bu dug nyung arka shikru [#]snu ha bse shing bya
[\[3a.4\]]kri bri ha ti/_/pa [#]ri ka ped tshos shing dza Da a pa [#]marga nim+ba [#]tse tra ka_/ba sha [#]puSh+kar pa Ta [#]la dang sen+d+he [#]ldan pa bsregs thal bskol ba la/_/sngar bshad shing kun la sogs btab [#]pa'i khu ba lto skran bad kan nad la btung /_/tsa bya [#]star bu tsha gsum bse yab bcas/_/
[\[3a.5\]]ba lu dzI ra cu [#]gang tsi tra ka_/phye ma cha mnyam bur bsres dri gsum ldan/_/gre mdzer cham bad dang ga med la bsngags/_/ba lu tsa byan sham mtshungs gnyis pa/_/mU la cu [#]gang dro tsa'o sga sum [#]'gyur/_/bu ram sum 'gyur dri bzangs ri lu byas[#]/_/
[\[3a.6\]]grang gzhi glo rims [#]gzer ba'i gzhang 'brum sel/_/sga dros [#]nal sham nA ga [#]'dab shing tsha[#]/_/suk+Sh+me mtha' rims gang 'phel phye mar byas/_/'di dag cha 'dra'i kar 'gam gzhang me [#]zhan/_/dbugs dang mi bde skran 'gul [#]snying nad la'o/_/sen+d+he shing kun
[\[3a.7\]]'bras gsum la la phud/_/tsha gsum bu ram cha rnams ril bur [#]byas/_/de rnams mur zhing myangs pas tshim thob cing /_/me drod zhan las rab tu byung ba'ang sel/_/lcags phye tsha gsum rgya shug [#]cha thams cad/_/mAk+Shi phye ma dang mnyam de rnams bza'/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]rgun 'brum ldan pa'i rjes su dar 'thungs pas/_/skya rbab nad la phan zhing ring du 'gro/_/bu ram ldan pa'i bca' sga'i dro [#]sman nar/_/gsum pa a ru ra'am bal po'i se'u/_/bad kan tshad rnying [#]gzhang 'brum nad rnams dang /_/rtug pa 'gags pa rnams la'ang
[\[3b.2\]]rtag tu bya/_/bca' sga gla sgang a ru ra phye la/_/bu ram ldan pa la ni ri lu bya/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde dang tsho ches rnams/_/kha ru ri lu mur bas bzlog par 'gyur/_/n+ya gro ut+pal ru rtamA k+Shi [#]ka_/phye ma 'bras phye [#]bcas pa ril bu bya/_/sra ba [#]kha ru mur
[\[3b.3\]]pas skom dad dang /_/rab tu 'phel ba myur du 'joms par 'gyur/_/ldong ros drod sman nar mo na le sham/_/phye ma ka ping+tha skyur khu bar ldan/_/'bras phye cha mnyam mAk+Shi [#]ka bsres pa'i/_/nus [#]pas lan cig ma yin skyug pa 'joms/_/sna khrag 'dzag
[\[3b.4\]]la dUrba'i [#]khu ba'am/_/bal se'u me tog khu sbyar nges par bsten[#]/_/bud med nu zho rgya skyegs khu ba'am/_/bi ra mAk+Shi [#]kas kyang i ku 'joms/_/skyu ru spos dkar khu ba kha ru cha/_/de rnams bsres pa sau [#]bi ri la btags/_/des 'dir myur bar gzhi nas med
[\[3b.5\]]byad cing /_/ji lta'i skyigs bu slar mi 'byung ba yin/_/dUrba [#]sen+d+he thal ka a ru ra/_/ku the ra kA kany+dzi ka dar btags/_/gsum pos byugs [#]pa'am nu ma'i 'og btags pas/_/shu ba dang ni g.yan pa rnam par 'joms/_/snu ha tsi tra bri [#]ga arka dang /_/mya ngan
[\[3b.6\]]med shun ru rta tsha ba gcin/_/bcos pa'i mar khus shu ba mdze glang shu/_/gdug pa'i rma dang za 'brum ser [#]kha 'phrog_/gu gul mig sman spra [#]tshil sin+d+hu ra/_/spangs [#]ma cha mnyam tsha ba'i mar khus btso/_/khyi rdo za tsag gis ni lus skams la/_/lan cig
[\[3b.7\]]byugs pa'i nus pa gzhi nas 'don/_/pu rtsi [#]kA ru rta murba sga/_/rgya skyegs dang ni btsod [#]dang yung ba rnams/_/drug 'gyur dar ba la bskol grub pa na/_/byugs pas grang dang tsha ba'i rims 'joms so/_/kaN+Da ka [#]ri sle tres ba [#]sha ka_/phye ma [#]zhun mar la bskol grub pa
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]de/_/'thungs pas tshad rnying lud gzer dbugs mi bde/_/me drod zhan pa'i pho ba'i nad la phan/_/ba [#]sha seng ldeng pa Ta [#]la pa tra/_/nim+ba shing tsha sle tres ta ma la/_/ki phye mar sar la bskol myur grub na/_/me dbal mkhris skran [#]
[\[4a.2\]]mdze las rgyal [#]bar 'gyur/_/drug pas khrag dang bcas pa brgya yi skyon/_/rab 'khrugs las skyes yan lag lus kun gzer/_/bye brag me dbal chang gis ra ro ba/_/rmongs pa chang 'thungs las skyes rnam 'gyur la/_/kaN+Da ka ri nim+pa pa Ta [#]la/_/sle tres
[\[4a.3\]]'bras gsum 'jam 'bras ba sha ka_/phye chu mar [#]rnying la ni cho gas btso[#]/_/myur du grub 'dis mdze las myur du rgyal/_/kar ku sh+maN+Da [#]cho ga bzhin du btsos skams nas/_/mar bskol kar btab tsha gsum dri gsum [#]zir ldan par [#]btso/_/'di bsten byis rgan
[\[4a.4\]]khrag 'dzag rlung 'joms bud med la phod cing /_/zas skom lud [#]khrag mkhris skyugs dbugs mi bde dang gzhang 'brum 'joms/_/ba gcin skyu ru mA k+Shi [#]ka drod [#]sman/_/kha ru po son du ba dan+tI [#]dang /_/ru rta rnams btso reng bu mthe bong 'dra/_/mar bskus rkub bcug de
[\[4a.5\]]yi nad 'phrog byed/_/lus gso ba'i dpyad rdzogs so//_//kar bcas gur gum cha mnyam mar la btsos/_/cho ga bzhin blugs [#]rlung khrag las byung ba'i/_/smin ma mur [#]'gram rna mig mgo bo yi/_/phyed gzer nyi 'khor las byung nad 'joms
[\[4a.6\]]so/_/a ru ba ru skyu ru nang sa bon/_/sum [#]gnyis gcig gam [#]cha rnams zho la btags/_/mig sman de yis mchi ma mang 'byung zhing /_/mig tsha rab tu 'khrugs [#]pa'ang 'joms par 'gyur/_/a ru sen+d+he ba dang lig bu mig_/btsag yug dang bcas chu la
[\[4a.7\]]bses btags te/_/mig gi phyi rol rab tu byugs byas pas/_/'di yis mig gi [#]nad kun zhi bar 'gyur/_/sau b+hi la sen+d+he seng phrom btags/_/de nas mar btsos ras dkar po la btsags/_/de yis mig la byugs [#]byas mkhris skyed [#]nad/_/dmar tshag
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dang ni sha mdzer nges par 'joms/_/khrag skyed [#]ka ra rgya mtsho'i lbu [#]bas 'joms/_/ba byung drod [#]sman nar mo brod long la'o/_/lig [#]mig tsha ba gsum gyis mig 'grib [#]la/_/ling tog dkar la mA k+Shi [#]sbrang rtsis so/_/nag tshur lig mig dkar bcas rgya
[\[4b.2\]]mtsho'i [#]lbu/_/nal sham sam kha sain+d+ha bcag yug dang /_/ldong ros cha mnyam mAk+Shi ka bsres btags/_/rab rib khus bskyed rdzi nad tshag po 'joms/_/sle tres pu shel lcags phye dug nyung nal sham sen+d+he kang+pa [#]la/_/lig mig rdo dreg spang spos
[\[4b.3\]]yung ba spangs ma sam [#]kha rgya mtsho'i lpu/_/mtshungs pa phye ma lcags snod du bzhag sbrang rtsi ldan pas sha mdzer dang /_/rab rib ling tog khrag 'bur mig sha'i nad la nye bar byugs [#]pa'ang bsngags/_/shing mngar ut+pal rgya mtsho'i lpu ba shing tsha pu shel gi wang [#]
[\[4b.4\]]btsod/_/spang spos [#]tsan+dan sam kha btsag yug ba lu lig mig nag chur 'dab[#]/_/de ltar thams cad cha mnyam mig sman 'di yis mig 'brum mig nag tsha/_/mchi khrag skya rib mig sha gzer nas 'phrogs [#]la bsngags pas rtag tu byug_/mig gi sman
[\[4b.5\]]dpyad do/_/[# ]thang shing bong nga dkar po sle tres bcas/_/dug nyung hong len ma nu pa tha'i thang [#]/_/ba gcin las [#]grub sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa/_/mgrin pa'i nad dang kun la btung bar bya/_/k+Shar te dza ba ti pa tha [#]dang /_/lig mig skyer rtsa yung ba drod [#]sman nar/_/ril bu sbrang
[\[4b.6\]]rtsi las [#]byas kha nang du/_/mur bar bya yi [#]mgrin pa'i nad kun la/_/skyer rtsa gla sgang dzA ti'i me tog dang [#]/_/lo gsar rgun 'brum dug nyung 'bras gsum bskol/_/sbrang rtsi ldan pas lus kyi kha sgo'i nad/_/lce yi nad rnams dus su zhi bar byed/_/ru rta dang ni skyer pa'i
[\[4b.7\]]rtsa ba seng phrom bcod/_/yung hong gla sgang pa tha [#]te dza ni/_/zhib btags so rnams ldeg par byed pa dang /_/gzer zhing 'khyugs [#]la nang khrag 'byin par byed/_/sau bi [#]ra cu kra sge'u gsher ma tu/_/khu ba sha rnams gu gul sen+d+he rnams/_/gang zhig tsha ba'i mar
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]khu la bskol te/_/rna bar blugs [#]pas rna ba'i zug rngu sel/_/ba sha nim+ba pa To la dang [#]parba ta ka pe dz+tha [#]tsa bya skyer rtsa dang /_/gla sgang tig ta pu shel byi tsher tsha gsum tra yan+ti ka [#]tsan+dan rnams/_/zhun mar las [#]grub steng 'og nas skyes rnam 'gyur sna
[\[5a.2\]]dang mig gi gzer la sogs/_/lpags [#]nad rims dang khong 'bras rma yi zug rngu mig nad skya rib rnams la bsngags/_/skyer rtsa [#]dug nyung nim+ba par+pa ta dang drod [#]sman byi tsher shing mngar dang /_/tra yan+tI hong 'bras gsum tig+ta bri sha pa To [#]la dang gla sgang dmar[#]/_/de
[\[5a.3\]]rnams phye mar bskol ba zhun mar las [#]grub 'di ni mig la phan pa yin/_/mkhris pa khrag las byung dang skya rib rab rib rnams dang stod kyi nad rnams la'o/_/e raN+Da dkar po yi [#]rtsa ba dang ni shu dag dang /_/sha ta puSh+pa bri ha ti'i 'bras bu gzhan yang /_/star ga'i
[\[5a.4\]]'bras bu [#]'o mar bcas pa [#]las grub pa[#]/_/rab rib stod dang gtso che'i nad dang gzhan pa'ang 'joms/_/zug rngu zad par byed pa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//dung dang mush+ka ka dag me lces bsregs pa'i thal ba snod du blugs [#]byas te/_/de nyid du [#]slar
[\[5a.5\]]chu la btso zhing bskol ba'i thal ba mar khu'i cho ga rnams/_/sbyor ba de yis bdugs pas [#]rma dang rma tsha skrangs 'bur rtsa [#]yi nad rnams dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan bar rdol ba'i lpags [#]nad yun ring mgul pa'i nad rnams la/_/shing mngar dang bcas skyer rtsa
[\[5a.6\]]shug pa ut+pal dang /_/pre yang+ku dang seng phrom dkar po tsan+dan rnams/_/mar khu dang ni 'o mar btso [#]zhing sbyar bar bya/_/rma rnams dang ni gzer dang tsha ba 'joms par 'gyur/_/dzA ti nim+pa pa To la dang [#]pa Ta hong len skyer rtsa yung ba dang /_/btsod dang thal tres a ru pu shel spra
[\[5a.7\]]tshil spangs [#]ma shing mngar 'jam 'bras rnams/_/mar las [#]grub pa 'di yis kha nad phra mo dang ni gnad gzer [#]rtsa yi nad/_/nad dam gzer bcas 'pho zhing 'byung ba'i rma yi nad rnams dang ni 'byang ba 'byin/_/zug rngu zad byed gsum pa rdzogs so//_//nal
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sham dkar por shi ri Sha'i[#]/_/me tog khu bas brgya phrag bsgo bar bya/_/sbrul gyi [#]sos btab brgyal bar gyur pa la/_/rab tu sbyar bya btung dang mig sman la/_/rma bya'i mkhris pa tan+du lI ya [#]ka_/kA kaN+Da [#]bcas mi nyung 'thung byas pas/_/'gro ba'i dug
[\[5b.2\]]dang brtan mchog dug gi ni/_/'tshe ba dang bcas myur du 'byin par byed/_/til btags mar khu la ni bu ram dang /_/de bzhin arka'i lo ma cha mnyam btung /_/sprin gyi tshogs la 'phral du rlung byung ltar/_/khyi smyo'i dug mchog myur du 'byin par 'gyur/_/
[\[5b.3\]]khang pa'i du ba gu gul dang ldan pa/_/bA dzi gan+d+ha tan+du lI [#]ya bcas/_/ba yi gcin la btags byas snying nad dang /_/brtan mchog 'gro ba'i dug rnams 'phrog par 'gyur/_/spang spos pu shel ba bla kaun+ti dza la sle tres ldong ros gi wang parma [#]ke shi dang /_/
[\[5b.4\]]sprik+kA tsan+dan [#]yung ba ru rta ka ra la rta rdo dreg suk+Sh+me gur gum [#]shing shug pa/_/cha mnyam nyungs [#]kar brgyad tsha [#]nA ga ge sar me tog cha bzhi'i [#]lde gus kun tu longs spyod cing /_/phun sum tshogs bya sha za rims [#]dang dug gi nad rnams 'joms 'gyur zla ba shar ba lta bur
[\[5b.5\]]grags/_/dug nad sel ba'i rgyud bzhi pa [#]rdzogs so//_//nyungs kar [#]'bras gsum shiR+Sha ka Ta [#]b+hI shwe 'jam 'bras sle tres dang /_/btsod dang ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum dang spang spos shu dag shing kun rnams/_/ra yi gcin la btags
[\[5b.6\]]byas 'thungs [#]sogs brten [#]pas sbrul gyi [#]sos btab gdon kun dang /_/gshed byed smyo byed sha za dang ni srin po 'joms shing rlag [#]par byed par 'gyur/_/kar+pa pa yi [#]rus pa dang ni rma bya'i 'dab ma bri ha ti [#]rnams dang /_/nirma l+ya po son cha shing tsha cu gang byi la'i rtug
[\[5b.7\]]pa ba sha ka [#]dang ke sha sbrul lpags dang /_/glang po'i so dang shring ga shing kun nal sham dkar po cha mnyam bdug byas pas/_/gshed byed smyo byed sha za srin po lha rnams zhugs pa'i rims ni 'joms par dran/_/tsha ba gsum dang da la gur gum drod [#]sman nar mo'i rtsa ba k+ShA [#]ra sing hi yung ba [#]
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ru rta nyungs kar gnyis dang am+bu dug nyung kar [#]sgog skya 'bras bu gsum dang pu shel tse dang hong len shu dag [#]spangs ma shing mngar bA la dmar po ldong ros shug pa zhes grags pa/_/da d+hi [#]rgya spos ma d+hU [#]ka sA pri yang+ku dang bong nga dkar po lig bu mig dang tsa bya
[\[6a.2\]]thang shing bcas pa phye mar byas pa mar dang srog chags brgyad kyi gcin gyi chu [#]la bskol [#]bshad 'thungs pas 'byung po 'bros shing de yis [#]gdon rnams mchog tu 'joms par 'gyur/_/rgya spos shing mngar 'jam 'bras rgya skyegs pa To la yi lo ma rak+ta pa trika [#]shu dag pa
[\[6a.3\]]tra la dang shing kun nyungs [#]kar siM hi ser gnyis la tA hong len dang /_/po son tsha gsum kA kaN+Da [#]thang shing pi dang [#]a nga gan+d+ha [#]ma rA/_/arko Ta dang ko Sha ta [#]kI na sham nim+ba sle tres dug mo nyung /_/ru rta shu ka ta ru puSh+pabA la shing mngar a pa ra dzi ta/_/dan+dI [#]tsi tra ka ped cha mnyam
[\[6a.4\]]phye ma [#]gcin gyi sde dang mar la bskol/_/yun ring du gzhag kun gyis [#]rim par sbyor bas myur du 'joms par 'gyur ba yin/_/'byung po chen po'i gdon kun dang ni smyo byed des byas mdze rims zhi bar bshad/_/'byung po zhi bar byed pa'i rgyud lnga pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[6a.5\]]skyer yungs dug mo nyung gi sa bon dang /_/sing [#]hi dang ni shing mngar cha mnyam po/_/de rnams thang byas bu chung ma yi ni/_/bu nad dang ni 'khru ba kun la phan/_/ka ped puSh+pa da ta ki [#]dza la/_/seng phrom dang bcas ga dza pip+pa [#]lI/_/thang la mAk+Shi ka bsres byugs [#]pa dang /_/
[\[6a.6\]]'khru ba rnams la byis pa la sbyar bya/_/shring ga drod [#]nar bong nga dkar po phyi mar byas/_/glo rims [#]skyug pa'i nad rnams 'joms pa la/_/mAk+Shi ka bcas bong dkar de bzhin gcig_/byis pa'i nad sel ba'i rgyud drug pa rdzogs so//_//skyu ru ra phye drug cu rtsa
[\[6a.7\]]bzhi'i srang la rang gi khu bsgos sbrang rtsi mar dang cha mnyam zhing /_/drod sman nar mo srang brgyad ka ra nyis 'gyur cha ldan thal ba'i phung po'i nang du gzhag par bya/_/dbyar gyi mtha' ru de bsten [#]skra dkar dang bral gzugs dang kha dog dang ni spobs pa dang ldan zhing /_/nad med blo dang yid
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]gzhungs dran pa tshig gsal [#]stobs dang ldan zhing sems stobs ldan par 'gyur ba yin/_/shing mngar dang ni sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/'o ma dang sbyar rjes su bsten pa yis/_/lus po rgyags [#]pa rab tu thob gyur nas/_/dga' zhing 'khrigs [#]pa yang yang nus par 'gyur/_/
[\[6b.2\]]shing mngar cu [#]gang sen+d+he drod [#]sman nar/_/ka ra dang ni 'bras bu gsum rab ldan/_/tshe sbyin ro tsa shin tu yid gzhungs [#]shing /_/rgas dang nad rnams rnam par 'joms par 'gyur/_/gze ma skyu ru sle tres phye mar bya[#]/_/sbrang rtsi'i [#]mar dang ldan pa bsten pa yis/_/ro tsa
[\[6b.3\]]bsten [#]zhing sdug bsngal rnam 'gyur zhing /_/skra gnag tshe lo brgyar ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/nim+ba'i mar khu rang bzhin gnas byas pa/_/cho ga ji lta ba [#]bzhin btung ba dang /_/'o ma mar dang rab sbyar de zla bas/_/skra dkar dang ni rgas pa rnam par 'byin/_/gze ma
[\[6b.4\]]k+Shu ra dang ni [#]rtsa ba brgyad[#]/_/bA na rI nA ga ba lA ba lA[#]/_/phye ma 'o thug [#]byas 'di btung bar bya/_/de yis 'khrig pa lan brgyar nus pa yin/_/rta ltar byed pa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//shing mngar thang bskol [#]sen+d+he ba ldan zhing /_/dug nyung drod [#]nar po son
[\[6b.5\]]phye mar bsre/_/sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'di dag slon la sbyar/_/mgrin nad kha dang gre 'gags nad rnams la'o[#]/_/sau bI ra la a ru ra thang bskol/_/drod nar kha [#]ru dan+ti phyed [#]phye ldan/_/e raN [#]mar khu dang bcas 'khru la de/_/bshal gyi sbyor bas nad rnams 'joms
[\[6b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/ra sna po son cha dang 'bras gsum sle tres rtsa ba bcu dang bA lA dang /_/mar khu sen+d+he ba bcas pa la mam si btsos ldan sbrang rtsi bur ma bcas/_/sha ta puSh+pa sle tres ru rta ka bed pri [#]yang+ku dang drod [#]sman nar/_/shu dag phye ma kany+dzi ba 'o gcin bcas mas gtong [#]rlung
[\[6b.7\]]nad rnams la phan/_/ba la phye ma mar khu la bskol dri bzangs [#]dang /_/bcud grub pa dang 'o ma zho dang skyur [#]chu rnams/_/de bzhin sa hA ra dza ra sna [#]sle tres dang /_/ba ri re rer bskol bas rlung 'joms so/_/sbyar bar bya'o bca' sga'am bu ram la/_/yang na sen+d+he ba bcas drod [#]
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]nar la'o/_/sna kha mjing [#]pa 'gram pa dpung pa dang /_/rgyab dang mgo mig mgul 'gags nad rnams la/_/las lnga'i le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//rims la gtso cher par+pa pa Ta [#]sbyar bya skom dad che la skyu ru ra dang skyugs [#]pa la/_/tsha
[\[7a.2\]]ba lnga skyes gzer la 'jam rtsi rengs la gi ri dza dang gcin snyi skyu ru'i [#]khu bas so/_/rlung gi nad la ra sna [#]dmu rdzing mcher pa'i nad la ba gcin cham pa la/_/drod [#]nar 'phyo la bi dang [#]dug la shu ka rta ru skrangs la gug+gul [#]lo/_/ba sha ka yis khrag mkhris dug nyung
[\[7a.3\]]gis/_/'khru la 'o bse [#]shing he mam [#]lci gzer la/_/sbos la thang shing srin nad byi dang gas[#]/_/skya rbab a ru ra dang 'bru gzhan gyis/_/zad byed nad la 'bras bu gsum bshad gzer ba kun la de ltar khu bas so/_/mdze la rtag tu seng ldeng khu ba glo la kaN+Da ka ri dang /_/
[\[7a.4\]]tshigs bcad [#]gze ma mu ra gshed byed na [#]ga bA lA ba las so/_/bcud len kun la skyu ru lha bcas gdon gyi [#]nad la brag zhun bshad/_/rgyud phyi ma'o//_//rab tu grub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs par byas/_/grub pa'i don rnams rtogs pa'i sman pa mkhas rnams
[\[7a.5\]]kyis/_/rtogs [#]pa'i sman pa med par su yis sbyor ba mthong /_/'di don slar yang 'dir ni cung zad bshad par bya/_/shugs bkag ma zos gnyid chags [#]skad ches rtsol ba drags/_/bzhon [#]pa la zhon tshab kha bska [#]rtsub pa rnams/_/sems gzung [#]'khrig dang 'jigs
[\[7a.6\]]dang smyung [#]gnas mya ngan drangs/_/dbyar gyi dus su rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs [#]par 'gyur/_/tsha skyur chang dang lan tshwa rno dro til mar khu/_/khro dang gdung ba lo ma skam pa [#]'jigs ngal rnams/_/thal sman la sogs ma zhu ma 'phrod zas zos pa/_/ston gyi dus su mkhris
[\[7a.7\]]pa rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur/_/nyin gnyid mngar dang grang [#]ches nya sha lci ba dang /_/shing tog 'o ma bu ram shing gi rnam 'gyur rnams/_/snum bag 'grangs ches zos dang lan tshwa bur chu rnams/_/dpyid kyi dus su bad kan rab tu 'khrugs par 'gyur/_/de ltar
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]'di rnams rim pas bye brag skyon/_/gdug [#]pa kun ni ldan pa brgyad du shes/_/sna tshogs nad ni lus kyi grangs bzhin du/_/ming rnams ma lus rjes su rtogs par bya/_/rtsub 'khums 'pho zhing gzer dang sngo bsangs mdog_/yan lag zug che yan lag
[\[7b.2\]]brkyang bskum byed/_/shes rmongs drang [#]zhing gyong la skom pa rnams/_/rlung gi las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan/_/'dzag cing rdul 'byung tsha zhing 'dod chags skye/_/dri nga rnag [#]dang 'ju dang khro ba dang /_/bla 'chol [#]brgyal dang mgo 'khor lus mdog ser/_/
[\[7b.3\]]mkhris pa'i las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan/_/kha mig sna chu grang lci lus g.ya' rdul/_/shes pa rmongs shing sna tshogs 'gags pa dang /_/tsho ches mchil snabs yun rings [#]'byung byed rnams/_/bad kan las su mkhas pas rab tu bstan/_/de rnams
[\[7b.4\]]kyis byas 'di dag rtogs rnams ni/_/nad kun ming ni du ma'i rnam pa yang /_/bye brag kha cig skye ba'i dbang gis 'gyur/_/gang gis [#]'di rnams ming gzhan kun du 'gro/_/rgyud ni le lo yid ni rnam ma dag_/skyon ni rab 'jug bkres dang gcin yang 'byung /_/
[\[7b.5\]]gsus lci shes pa rmongs shing dang ga med/_/de rnams nad ldan de la nad 'byung 'gyur/_/bcud dang drod dang brtan dang ro tsa stobs skyed lan tshwa [#]mngar skyur mar khu dang /_/khrus dang drod bsten mas gtong sha dang stan [#]bsten yan lag kun la dril phyis dang /_/snum gyi
[\[7b.6\]]dugs dang 'jam rtsis zhi byas bsku byug nye bar bsten pa la sogs pa/_/bza' dang btung ba gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis rlung ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/kha mngar bska ba grang dang rlung yab mtshan mo zla ba'i zer [#]la gnas pa dang /_/sa yi khang pa chu yi 'khrul
[\[7b.7\]]'khor chu la rtse [#]zhing bud med lus la reg_/mar sar k+Shi ra dang por lus la bkru sman dang ni khrag gi gtar dpyad [#]bya/_/bza' dang btung ba gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis mkhris pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/rtsub dang k+ShA [#]ra bska kha tsha ba dang ni 'bad rtsol drag dang
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]ngar snabs sbyong [#]/_/bud med bsten zhing ngal [#]dub gnyid bcag chu la rtse zhing rkang pa 'chag par bya/_/reng bu'i dud bsten mgo bsro khrus dang skyug sman dugs [#]dang mas gtong [#]la sogs pa/_/bza' dang btung ba gnas dang sman 'di rnams kyis
[\[8a.2\]]bad kan nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/_/'phrod zas smyung [#]dang tsha ba'i chu btung zhing /_/zas dang bya na yang zhing kha ba'i bcud/_/rtsub bral dugs dang 'ju ba bsten pa dang /_/de bzhin lus kyi steng 'og sbyang bar bya/_/dgun [#]stod dbyar dang dgun [#]smad rlung gi dus/_/mkhris
[\[8a.3\]]pa ston dang so ga [#]tsha ba'i dus/_/bad kan dpyid ka me tog 'ong dus 'khrugs[#]/_/de la de bzhin phan pa'i sman bsten [#]bya/_/bad kan 'khrugs la skyug sman sbyar bar bya/_/mkhris pa'i rnam 'gyur byung la bkru sman gtang [#]/_/rlung gi bdag nyid 'jam rtsis 'joms
[\[8a.4\]]par 'gyur/_/'du 'phrod skyes la'ang 'dres ma de dag go/_/rlung la [#]skyur dang mar khu lan tshwa dang /_/mngar ba'i bza' dang btung ba rnams kyis so/_/mkhris pa la ni de bzhin mngar ba dang /_/kha dang bska ba grang ba rnams kyis so/_/bad kan la yang kha dang tsha ba
[\[8a.5\]]dang /_/rtsub dang bska ba rno ba'i ro rnams kyis/_/de rnams bza' bas nye bar 'gro 'gyur ba/_/nad ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur pa yin/_/blo gzhan nyid kyis gang de ma bstan gang zhig bstan/_/nad rnams rang gis yang dag rtogs [#]nas ji lta'i tshul/_/sman rnams rjes su
[\[8a.6\]]blo gros chung ba rnams la byas/_/bstan bcos su ni cung zad gtan [#]phab 'bras bur byas/_/yon tan lhag can sbyor ba brgya pa brjod pa yis/_/bsod nams bla na med pa bdag gis gang thob pa/_/de yis rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyis gzir gyur pa/_/mtha' yas
[\[8a.7\]]'gro ba rnams kyi nad ni med gyur cig_/sbyor ba brgya pa zhes bya ba'i sman gyi gzhung 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//bal po'i paN+Di ta chen po bram ze dze ta kar+Na'i [#]zhal snga nas dang po rtsa 'grel lan cig gsungs shing /_/dus phyis rgya gar
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shri [#]dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas stod cung zad gsungs nas/_grub pa'i zhing skyi rong 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang po'i gtsug lag khang la cung zad las mi ring ba/_chen po'i chen po rnams kyi gdan sa dpal shel [#]gyi gtsug lag khang du
[\[8b.2\]]sdom brtson dam pa sde snod gsum dang /_rgyud dang rgyud kyi yan lag rnams la [#]legs par 'dris shing /_khyad par du tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa'i gzhung don legs par rtogs pa dge slong a mo g+ha'i gsung gis bskul nas/_mang du
[\[8b.3\]]thos pa'i lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos 'grel pa gsum dang bstun te bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa//_//[#]gso dpyad gzhung lugs brgya phrag du ma'i gnas[#]/_/sna tshogs mngon brjod tha dad sdeb sbyor can/_/
[\[8b.4\]]ya mtshan brgyan [#]la legs sbyar [#]tshig gis spel/_/gang 'di bsgyur dges nad rnams zhi bar shog/[# {D4307}]@/_/sman 'tsho ba'i mdo bzhugs/[ #]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_dzI ba sU tra/_bod skad du/_sman 'tsho ba'i mdo/_/
[\[8b.5\]]bam po gcig pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sman pa'i mchog ste nyon mongs nad sel de la phyag 'tshal [#]nas/_/'phags pa'i brtul zhugs drang srong ma gtogs skyes bu blo ldan pas/_/rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod spyad bag bya spyod
[\[8b.6\]]lam gyis/_/mi lus 'di thob don yod 'tsho ba'i don tsam bstan par bya/_/'dod khro gti mug gsum las rlung mkhris bad kan gsum srid de/_/lus yul dus la sogs pa kun dang bde bcas dbang bsgyur [#]zhes/_/drang srong chen pos gsungs phyir de yi khyad par
[\[8b.7\]]mdor bstun [#]nas/_/tshul rtags [#]zas dang gnas dpyad [#]dgongs pa nyi tshe 'dir brjod pa/_/lus rtsub skems sems rgod tshig mang grang rlung gi mi/_/dmar ser blo rno khro la drod che dri can mkhris pa'i mi/_/dkar snum tshig g.yung lci la drod chung gnyid chung bad kan mi/_/
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]gnyis dang gsum du 'dres pa yang ni de las shes par bya/_/rgan dang dar dang byis pa rim gyis lta [#]zhing shes par bya/_/ngad can grang ba rlung gi yul te tsha gdung mkhris pa'i sa/_/rlan can snum bag bad kan yul te 'dres pa de las brtag_/
[\[9a.2\]]nang par srod ni bad kan tho rangs phyi dro rlung gi dus/_/nyi ma phyed dang nam phyed mkhris pa'i dus yin shes par bya/_/dpyid na bad kan ldang ste [#]dbyar stod rlung sogs [#]ston mkhris ldang /_/dbyar smad rlung ldang mkhris sogs [#]dgun stod dgun smad bad kan sogs[#]/_/
[\[9a.3\]]ston ni rlung zhi dgun stod mkhris zhi dbyar smad bad kan zhi/_/lus yul dus dag brjod nas bro [#]drug khyad par mdor bstan pa/_/mngar kun bsil te bad kan skyed [#]de rlung mkhris sel byed na/_/zhun mar bu ram snying gzer gze ma gro dang starka dro/_/mu ka sbrang rtsi skam
[\[9a.4\]]sa'i sha dang nas dang bu ram rnying [#]/_/bad kan sel te nye shing ram nye bad kan mi skyed snyoms/_/tsha ba dro ste mkhris skye [#]rlung dang bad kan sel byed na/_/srog chags mkhris pa mkhris sel na le sham ni rlung yang skyed[#]/_/skyur kun dro ste mkhris pa skyed [#]cing bad kan rlung
[\[9a.5\]]sel na/_/skyu ru ra dang bal po se'u ni mkhris pa sel bar byed/_/ku shu mngar ni bsil la dar ba chus bslad mkhris mi skyed/_/kha ba bsil te rlung skyed [#]bad kan mkhris pa sel byed na/_/shu dag sle tres dro ste 'phrod dang sbyar na rlung yang sel/_/bska ba kun ni
[\[9a.6\]]bsil te rlung skyed [#]bad kan mkhris sel na/_/a ru ra ni nyes pa gsum pa [#]gnod mi byed de snyoms/_/chang ran bad kan rlung sel mang [#]na mkhris pa skyed par byed/_/lan tshwa dro ste rlung sel bad kan mkhris pa skye [#]byed na/_/rgyam tsha lce myang tsha [#]ni mkhris pa las [#]yang
[\[9a.7\]]gnod mi byed/_/mngar dang bska dang lan tshwa gsum yang rim [#]bzhin mas lci ste/_/skyur dang tsha [#]dang kha ba gsum ni de bzhin mar zhing [#]yang /_/kha ba bska dang lan tshwa gsum yang rim bzhin mas rtsub ste/_/mngar dang skyur dang tsha [#]ba gsum yang de bzhin mar [#]zhing 'jam/_/
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ka 'dra ste nyid kyis nyid skyes [#]pas/_/lus dang yul dus zas spyod tshul gcig 'dom na nad ldang ste/_/ji ltar mthun par 'phrod sbyar rlung mkhris bad kan mi ldang phan/_/de phyir 'phrod dang mi 'phrod la sogs tshul bzhin 'dir bstan pa/_/rlung ni mngar
[\[9b.2\]]snum lci dro 'phrod [#]de rtsub yang bsil mi 'phrod/_/mkhris pa kha mngar bsil dang 'phrod [#]de tsha skyur dro mi 'phrod/_/bad kan snum lci bsil dang mi 'phrod rtsub tsha spyod [#]dang 'phrod/_/de bas rang gi lus dang dus gnas zas dang 'phrod spyad phyir/_/dpyid zla gnyis ni bad kan
[\[9b.3\]]bskyed dus yin te nad ldang bas[#]/_/bad kan drang zhing bkru sman skyug sman btang zhing chu tshan btung /_/gro nas bsreg sha sbrang [#]rtsi la sogs rtsub bska yang ba bza'/_/sbrang chang rgun chang sga chu sbrang [#]chu bu ram chang nyid [#]btung /_/mar tshil la sogs snum lci kha ra skyur po tsha phrom
[\[9b.4\]]dag/_/mngar 'jam skyur na bsil bag yang zhing nyin par log mi bya/_/chu [#]tshas lus bkru mnye zhing las bskyod bcag bya ci ran bya/_/gnas kyang ha cang mi tsha mi grang ran dro grib mar 'dug_/dbyar stod zla gnyis ma [#]'bri dus yin nyal po drag shul spang /_/ngal dub mi bya
[\[9b.5\]]bag 'bras 'o ma mar sar sha dag bza'/_/bu ram tshil ni cung zad bza' ste chang nyung yang ba btung /_/'o ma bskol grang [#]kha ras btab dang dar ba 'thungs na phan/_/lan tsha [#]skyur zhing na le sham la sogs pa tsha skyur spang /_/chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru sgra snyan mnyan zhing
[\[9b.6\]]gdags/_/char par reg bya nyin par tsog bur gnyid kyis log na phan/_/gnas kyang ser [#]bu drag po'i ngad med dro min bsil bar 'dug_/dbyar smad zla ba gnyis na mkhris pa sogs shing [#]rlung ldang ste/_/phyi rol tsha la lus kyi nang grang nad gsum g.yos pas [#]na/_/
[\[9b.7\]]rlung nad bsal phyir lus mnye snum bsku sman chu bskol bas bkru/_/rlung nad sel des til mar mas gtong [#]dugs dang lums kyang bya/_/zas kyang ha cang tsha min mngar skyur med par ran par sbyar/_/pho ba drod skyed [#]bag dang mar tshil sbrang rtsi bar 'ga' bza'/_/yos dang
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'bras chan mar khus blugs [#]dang zan dron sha dag bza'/_/chang yang cung zad btung ste chu dang chu grog [#]spang bar bya/_/rlan la mi 'dug mi 'gro lus la char pas gsher mi bya/_/stobs dang drag shul ngal zhing dub par gyur pa'i bag dang yang /_/
[\[10a.2\]]nyin mtshan mi bde nyin par mi log nyal po brtun byed spang /_/gnas kyang rlan med rlung mi ldang la bsil bar stan bting [#]'dug_/ston zla gnyis ni mkhris pa skye ba'i dus yin nad ldang bas/_/bsil mngar bkru sman gtang zhing gtar kas khrag kyang ci ran dbyung /_/
[\[10a.3\]]kha zhing mngar la bsil ba'i sman yang rtag tu bza' bar bya/_/dus 'di'i chu ni dug med gtsang dang bkrus shing 'thungs na phan/_/zas kyang 'bras nas sran ma sbrang rtsi kha ra sha la sogs/_/mngar zhing kha la yang ba mar sar 'o ma bza' zhing btung /_/chang lci drag
[\[10a.4\]]po'i ro yod mi btung ra ror mi bya ste/_tshil dang til mar mi bza' zil par mi 'gro 'dug mi bya/_/tsha ba'i zas dang yul yang zla grogs yid du 'ong ba bsten/_/chu 'jam tsam gyis lus bkru gos kyang dri ma med pa bgo/_/rgyan dang dri zhim lus la gdags shing
[\[10a.5\]]nyin mtshan mi bde [#]ste/_/gnas kyang dro min ser [#]bus mi phog bsil bag can la 'dug_/dgun stod dgun smad zla bzhi phyi grang nang tsha bad kan sogs[#]/_/gos dror bgo zhing rlan dang lhags pa [#]bag bya nyi ma'ang 'de[#]/_/zas kyang sha tshon rus khu mar tshil [#]snum bag
[\[10a.6\]]'grangs par bza'/_/mngar skyur lan tshwa drod bag cher bza' gsar tog 'bru dag bza'/_/ran par sna tshogs chang btung ngal ba'i las dag byas kyang sla/_/rtsel [#]bcag lus sbyang skabs skabs mgo lus til mar bsku zhing mnye/_/de rjes skyu ru ra la sogs pa sman
[\[10a.7\]]bskol chus kyang bkru/_/gnas kyang bsro khang dron por me dang stan stug ldan par 'dug_/dbyar stod tsha dus dbyar smad rlung dus bkru sman mi gtang [#]ste/_/dgun stod dgun smad grang dang rgas la skyug sman gtar ga spang /_/dgun gnyis dbyar stod lums dugs mi bya
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]nad kyis gzir kyang sla/_/de ltar yin yang lus dang nad du gar mthun brtsam [#]par bya/_/rlung mkhris bad kan gsum dang 'phrod pas 'tsho ba'i mdo brjod nas/_/bag byed spyod lam can dag ring du 'tsho phyir yang bstan pa/_/med smra cir yang chos dang rigs pa gzhan
[\[10b.2\]]dag gsum la 'dzem/_/sngar byas nang nub bsam zhing skyor [#]dor phyin chag [#]bag cher bya/_/byed pa gang la rdul med rang nyam med cing 'dod chen spang /_/nga rgyal lang tshos [#]spyi brtol che min shes dman khum [#]mi bya/_/sdig grogs spang zhing dge bshes [#]bsten te gtong
[\[10b.3\]]smos dge bcu spyad/_/gsong des tshul chags gzhan la gnod min mi la byams par bya/_/lha dang rgyal por nyer bsam lung mnyan [#]yid dang mthun par sgrub[#]/_/rgyal po'i sras dang rma ni chung yang mi brnyas [#]bag cher bya/_/spyod lam sgyu mas mi bslu bka' khrims
[\[10b.4\]]yul chos bsrung /_/gzhan gyi dpyas [#]skyon mi brjod rtog [#]'dod gtum chos 'gran mi bya/_/dge slong slob dpon pha ma'i gong du mi 'gro sri zhu skyed/_/dge sbyong drang srong srog chags ya mtshan mnyan [#]gtod sbrul mi rtse[#]/_/ma rtogs shing chen mchod rten drung dang lam
[\[10b.5\]]mdo phug stong dang /_/sems can mang du bsad pa'i [#]slo sa dur khrod nyal mi bya/_/gnyan pa'i mtsho dang chu mig bzang por mi bkru mi bshal te/_/rdo shing dgon pa'i shing chen mi bcad pha bong gzhom mi bya/_/mchod rten rgyal mtshan arga'i [#]grib ma maN+Dal mi 'gong [#]
[\[10b.6\]]zhing /_/mi ro gtor ma yas stags [#]hom khung thal khung bcag mi bya/_/nam mkha' ban bun nyi ma phyed dang dmar thag chad pa'i tshe/_/mi bza' mi btung yi ge klog min nyal po las dang yang [#]/_/nyi ma la sogs 'od zer phra sngags mi ring ring mi blta/_/lha
[\[10b.7\]]khang sgor mi nyal te ri sna grog snar gnas mi bca'/_/ya mtshan shes drag mi bsten bud med ngag mi mnyan/_/bud med rgan la mi rgyo rtsal rgyos [#]smra 'gros dub mi bya/_/gad mo che zhing ring du dgod [#]dang ngud mo drag po spang /_/rtag tu mi 'dug ring du mi 'greng
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]ci nus ran par bcag_/sbrid pa lud pa khu [#]chu mchi ma snabs 'phyen [#]bshang gci dbyal[#]/_/mi dgag ma bsgrus bkres skom nad gnyid gnag min myur du bsal/_/nyal po skigs pa lud pa la sogs tshe lus mjing [#]mi gcu/_/glal na kha
[\[11a.2\]]dgab sbrid pa smra tshe ha cang kha mi bgrad/_/sen mo ring du mi bzhag bregs te phan tshun brud mi bya/_/mgo lus lag pas mi brdab mgo bo [#]drag tu mi sprugs te[#]/_/don med sa mi bri zhing lag pa mi brdab mchu [#]mi bri/_/mi nus [#]bzhin du ci mi gdags [#]te mya ngan gnan [#]mi
[\[11a.3\]]bya/_/dpyid dang dbyar stod ston ni phyugs mar dus bzhin [#]til mar gyis/_/rtag tu mgo dang rkang mthil bsku zhing bar bar lus kyang bsku/_/ston dpyid ma yin dus gzhan [#]res 'ga' sna dang rna bar til mar blugs[#]/_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da stang zil dag gis bar bar mig
[\[11a.4\]]kyang bsku/_/rtag tu lus kyi byi dor bya zhing sman sngags rin chen gdags/_/ser [#]bu drag po mi ro'i dri dang dud pas phog mi bya/_/chu tshas mgo lus mi bkru bkru sman skyug sman gtang ba dang [#]/_/cham pa ma zhus btab ste mgo lus mi bkru snum mi bsku/_/skya rengs [#]shar
[\[11a.5\]]nas tsog pur [#]'dug ste de ring ci bya bsam/_/langs nas so shing bca' zhing kha yi skyon bsal lag gdong bkru/_/de nas sman mchog a ru ra ni rtag zos bdud rtsi yin/_/lug gi mar min mar sar zhun mar rgas sra tshe ring ste/_/'di la sogs pa lus dang tshe la phan pa'i
[\[11a.6\]]sman zos na/_/byug pa rgyan dang gos kyis shin du mdzes byas lha yang mchod/_/de nas sri zhu'i gnas dang 'khor la snyan brjod 'dzum bstan nas/_/rje dpon las dang bdag gzhan don la nan tan brtson 'grus skyed[#]/_/dus bzhir dro bab [#]ran par zas bza' ngoms par
[\[11a.7\]]skom 'thung [#]ste/_/thug pa khu tshan la sogs snum lci drod kun sngar bza' zhing /_/'bras la sogs pa bsil yang phyis bza' 'phrad [#]med phye ma 'gam[#]/_/bab chol ha cang 'grangs par bza' min myos par chang mi btung /_/'bras kyis 'grangs rjes phye zan mi bza'
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]drod rjes skom mi btung /_/skyo ma ran par 'thungs na lus brta [#]nang na rgan la bsod/_/bro [#]drug gang yang gcig la cher zos [#]nad ldang ran par sbyar/_/'grangs pa'i rjes la nyal po bang stobs rta rgyug la sogs spang /_/shing tog ldam ldum [#]mang na nad ldang ba
[\[11b.2\]]mos phog pa gnod/_/dbyar zla 'bring po'i [#]tshes la ldam ldum bza' drag [#]nad du 'gyur/_/nad can lums kyis drangs te mgyogs na nad ldang skran du 'ong /_/mchin pa g.yer ma spangs te zos na cung zad snying la gnod/_/zas mchog sbrang rtsi mar rnying cha mnyam zos
[\[11b.3\]]na dug bzhin gnod/_/mi mnyam che chung byas kyang zos rjes chang du [#]'thungs na gnod/_/ma langs zho dang langs ma thag gi zho dron nad kun slong [#]/_/chu bya dbyar spang ldum mchog ke'u ni [#]dbyar zla 'bring po'i sman/_/sman 'thungs sha pa'i sha gnod ga gon zho 'drer [#]rims
[\[11b.4\]]su 'gyur/_/btsong bsregs [#]sbrang rtsir mi 'phrod lhan cig zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/ke'u 'am gnag sha lhan cig zos na skran du 'gyur/_/dgun stod rgya g.yer zos na snying ni [#]drags na mig kyang mdongs[#]/_/mar tshil zos dang mi 'phrod lha ba bza' drags na so 'byung /_/
[\[11b.5\]]bra bo [#]mang du zos na rlung dang lus g.ya' ste/_/nub mo chu 'thung chang [#]gnon la phug rnyid [#]dang sha skam spang /_/nya dang kha tsha mar tshil mi 'phrod snod kyang gcig mi bya/_/nya dang 'o ma lhan cig mang zos nang na zer ma gnod/_/shing tog chang la sogs te skyur dang shang tshe la phug
[\[11b.6\]]rlon/_/nyungs rnying [#]'di rnams gang yang 'o mar 'phrod min mang zos gnod/_/'o tshan 'thungs rjes chu grog [#]'thungs dang rgya sran nag po gnod/_/zla ba spyang kis zin tshe zan zos so na shu ba 'byung /_/gnag sha rta sha [#]lhan cig zos na lus la g.yan pa 'ong /_/gnag
[\[11b.7\]]sha phag sha lhan cig zos na lto yi srin bur 'gyur/_/nya dang khyim bya'i sha gnyis lhan cig zos na skran du 'gyur/_/khyim bya'i sgo nga'i spri dang sgog skya zos na dbugs mi bde/_/khyim bya'i sha dang ri bong sha gnyis lhan cig zos na cung [#]zad 'khru/_/sha mo yungs mar
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]nang du brdos pa zos na lus la gnod/_/ma nu'i sa bon ka tsam [#]sbrang rtsir 'phrad ma yin/_/la phug bu ram mi 'phrod zho dang bya gag shar mi 'phrod/_/de ltar 'phrod zas goms dang rtag tu chags [#]pa dang /_/lang tsho 'ju slas zos dang nyung na
[\[12a.2\]]gnod pa med dang bsre/_/'phrod pa'i zas zos phyi dro'i las byas nam sros bde bar nyal/_/de ltar nan tan bag byas mi tshe tshad bzhin 'tsho nges pas/_/skyes nas lo bcu'i bar du sma mi dbab cing rang dgar gzhag[# ]/de nas nyi shu lon te lo bcur bslab dang brtsal [#]
[\[12a.3\]]bar bya/_/de nas lnga bcu lnga lon sum cu rtsa lnga khyud 'khor [#]du/_/longs spyod grags pa'i yul srid gtam byas nas/_/lnga bcu lnga lon phyin chad chos lam yum gyi ched bsgrub phyir/_/dge la brtson bskyed thos rig goms byed lus sems ci bder gnas/_/
[\[12a.4\]]de ltar sus nus mi lus thob pa'i don yod skyid cing dge_/slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub snying pos sman pa rnams la brdzangs pa/_sman 'tsho ba'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//_///[{D4308}]@#/_/slob dpon klu sgrub kyis bshad pa sman a ba'i cho ga[# ]/
[\[12a.5\]]sman a ba 'di ni lus kyi rus pa chag pa dang /_rkang lag gi rus pa chag pa dang /_'phres pa dang /_kha bye ba dang /_tshigs 'bur ba dang /_smas te rma chen po byung ba dang /_rlung dang /_bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dang /_dreg nad dang /_da sgal [#]dang /_ro smad
[\[12a.6\]]man chad 'jas pa dang /_na ste mi bde na yang nad kyi ngos ma zin te ci na gtol med pa dang /_mig nad sna tshogs pa dang /_rgas sra bar bya ba dang /_ro tsa bar bya ba la sogs pa'i dpyad/_lha chen po gu lang gis gu lang gi btsun mo zhes bshad de/_a ba yin no/_/a
[\[12a.7\]]ba gtang ba'i tshes grangs 'dam pa ni/_tshes bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_bcu gsum la bzang ngo /_/skar ma 'dam pa ni/_ba ru Na'i dus la bab pa'i chu lha ste/_bdud rtsi dang sbyor [#]ba'i skar ma la bzang ste sman gtang [#]ngo /_/sman gtang ba'i thabs ni nad ci na
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]yang rung ste/_dang por sbrang rtsi la [#]sbyar te gtang /_de'i 'og tu zhun mar la sbyar te gtang /_de'i 'og tu 'bru mar la sbyar te gtang ngo /_/sbrang rtsi la sogs pa sna re re 'dra ste/_zhag bdun bdun sbyar zhing phul [#]te 'tshal lo/_/phan pa'i sna grangs ni/_lus kyi rus pa chag pa dang /_
[\[12b.2\]]rkang lag chag grugs [#]byung ngo cog dang /_lus la rma byung ngo cog dang /_snying na ba dang /_rtsib logs na ba dang /_ro stod gzer ba dang /_glo na ba dang /_rus pa chag go cog la lhag par phan no/_/rlung las gyur pa'i nad brgyad cu snyed yod pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
[\[12b.3\]]nad kyi rnam grangs nyi shu dang /_bad kan gyi nad nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/_spyir nad brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod pa ril 'byang ngo /_/dreg nad dang /[ #]tsha grang 'dres pa las gyur pa'i nad dang /_mdor na nad ci yang rung ste/_sman a ba btang na nad do cog 'byang ngo zhes lha chen po tshangs pa dang /_
[\[12b.4\]]gu lang gis bshad pa las thos so/_/mig rab rib yod pa dang /_ling tog dang /_spris g.yogs pa dang /_mdongs [#]pa dang /_mig g.ya' ba dang /_na ba dang /_mig nad yod do cog dang /_mgul pa man chad na ba dang /_sna nad dang /_rna nad dang /[# ]rna ba mi gsang ba dang /_
[\[12b.5\]]klad pa mi bde ba dang /_mchin nad dang /_snying nad dang /_ro stod mi bde ba dang /_'di rnams la 'bras bu gsum las sna gcig kyang zho re re/_lcags phye zho gsum lcags dog gi nang du chab can rtse gsum las bskol [#]te/_gang lus pa dang btsags la [#]chu dron 'jam tsam gyi nang du
[\[12b.6\]]sman a ba zhib tu btags pa zho gsum btab ste 'jam tsam la nub mo nyal kar [#]'tshal lo/_/dgongs 'tshal ma [#]mi 'tshal na/_dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo/_/sman 'di nyin zhag nyi shu tsam btang na/_mdongs [#]pa yang mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang sbyor ba rnam gcig la/_

[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]ba lta zhig na/_dro 'tshal ba'i rjes la 'tshal lo/_/'di bzhin du zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshal na/_mig phyung ba ma gtogs pa/_dmus long dang mdongs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lo bcu drug pa gzhon nu'i tshad du 'gyur ro/_/a ba phye ma mar ldan pas[#]/_/rus pa chag la [#]nub gsum
[\[13a.2\]]du/_/'thungs na de yi rus pa ni/_/rdo rje lta bur sra bar 'gyur/_/a ba tshab [#]gsum de bzhin/_/tsha nag nye'u [#]shing rtsa ba yis/_/dug [#]skam rus pa na ba dang /_/lud pa de bzhin dbugs mi bde/_/snying na ba dang sha chod la/_/de rnams cha ni mnyam byas te/_/phye mar byas nas nub gsum du/_/chu dron lhan
[\[13a.3\]]cig myur du btung /_/'bras bu gsum ni 'o ma dang /_/mkhas pas de bzhin bskol byas nas/_/mar ni sum cha gcig dang ldan/_/de bzhin a ba bzhi [#]cha gcig_/zan [#]zos 'og tu nub gsum du/_/'thungs nas 'u sha zas dang zan[#]/_/gyen du za ba'i nad las rgyal/_/rab rib rdzi bor mig ser
[\[13a.4\]]dang /_/tshad rnying g.yan pa tshor [#]bcas dang /_/mig gi nad ni thams cad dang /_/gzhan yang de bzhin klad nad dang /_/lto nad dang ni snying nad dang /_/de bzhin yan lag chag pa dang /_/zhag gsum du ni rab sbyar na/_/long ba dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/a ba so ma ra dza dang /_/ra yi 'o mar bskol [#]te
[\[13a.5\]]btung /_/'thungs na rlung ltar mgyogs par 'gyur/_/a ba phye ma mar sar dang /_/kha ra de bzhin pi pi ling /_/gzhang gi nad ni thams cad la/_/'di las drag pa gang yang med/_/glang po ba lang khyu mchog dang /_/ra dang lug dang mi rnams la/_/a ba mar dang 'o ma dang /_/'thungs na de dag shis
[\[13a.6\]]'gyur te/_/sha chod rus [#]pa chag pa dang /_/skom [#]dang snying nad mgo 'khor dang /_/thams cad nad las rnam par grol/_/gang gi lus ni skem pa dang /_/gang zhig sha bkrar gyur pa dang /_/gang gi lus ni 'jig pa dang /_/gal te rus [#]pa nar gyur cing /_/gso dka' ba yi nad la phan/_/a ba dang ni nye'u [#]shing dang /_/
[\[13a.7\]]so ma ra dza de bzhin te/_/sbrang rtsi pi pi ling de bzhin[#]/_/mar dang 'o mar lhan cig btung /_/zhag bdun bar du sbyar [#]bar bya/_/'dod chags rnam par spang [#]byas te/_/zhag bdun bar du sbyar ba yis/_/de ni rlung dang khrag las rgyal/_/de bzhin nad rnams kun las rgyal/_/slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa sman a ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]{D4309}]@/_/sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa bzhugs/_@#/_/sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa las/_sman gyi ming gi rnam grangs zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[13b.2\]]chags la mngon par dga' ba'i bu/_/zla ba dga' ba zhes bya ba/_/thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal te/_/yan lag brgyad pa las bstan pa'i/_/sman sde po son cha la sogs/_/de las gzhan pa'i sman rnams dang /_/gzhung gzhan las bshad sman gyi ming /_/sgra sbyor nges par bshad par bya/_/
[\[13b.3\]]ma d+ha na dang /_shwa sa na dang /_rA tha dang /_piN+Di dang /_ta ka ra dang /_ga ta ga dang /_ga lA pha la dang /_ga ga la dang /_tsa la dang /_sha lArdu dang /_de dag ni po son cha'i ming gi bye brag yin no/_/ma du ya sha dang /_ya shi ma du dang /_ma du d+hu ka dang /_aSh+Ta hA dang /_ma d+hu yaSh+Ti ga dang /_gI
[\[13b.4\]]ti ka ta dang /_sta la dza ma dang /_de dag ni shing mngar gyi ming gi rnam grangs yin no/_/ka d+h+ya ka lAn bu ni dang /_lam ca dang /_tu ma byi dang /_Ish+kA ku dang /_mahA tsa lA dang /_rA dza pu ti dang /_paN+Di pha la dang /_pha tig ta lam+bu dang /_bri had pha lA dang /_de dag ni ku pa kha bo'i ming yin
[\[13b.5\]]no/_/nim+pa dang /_a ri sha dang /_sub+ha t+t+ra dang /_pi tsu marda dang /_sha kha pri ya dang /_su tig ta dang /_sarba to b+hat+t+ra dang /_pa b+hut+ta dang /_ba ri tig ta ka dang de rnams ni nim+pa'i ming yin no/_/ma hA nim+pa dang /_go ri ka dang /_shu ka ma lA ka dang /_bri had nim+pa ka dang /_nem ka ra dang /_/
[\[13b.6\]]ra mu ka dang /_bri shwa mu shwi ka dang /_de dag ni nim+pa chen po'i ming yin no/_/byim byi dang /_rak+ta pa ta pha lA dang /_go ha dang /_tuN+Di gi ri dang /_tun+di dang /_o sha pa pha lA dang /_daN+Di dang /_rak+ta pa tra la dang /_de dag ni cim pa'i ming yin no/_/ci shAlA dang /_mri ger cu ru dang /_ga bak+Sha dang /_ga
[\[13b.7\]]tsa tsar b+hi tri dang /_g+ha ba da ni dang /_stu la phA lA dang /_mri ga cag k+Shi dang /_itra ba ru ni dang /_de dag ni byi sha la'i ming yin no/_/tsitra pa la dang /_tum pa si dang /_ma d+hu sab b+ha bA dang /_in+t+re ba ru dang /_ha ti dan+ti dang /_tsi tra de bri dang /_ma hA pha la dang /_de dag kyang byi sha la gcig gi ming gi
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]bye brag yin no/_/pra pu sa dang /_ku tu ka dang /_tig ta dang /_mu tra la dang /_ha ti pa r+Ni dang /_tshar dang paNi dang /_mutrA pha la dang /_pan du pa tra dang /_mu kha phri yang dang /_de dag ni ga gon gyi ming yin no/_/ku ta dza dang /_tsad tsa ka dang /_tud tsha dang /_br-ik+Sha ka dang /_
[\[14a.2\]]ga rim la li ka dang /_ba ri tig ta dang /_shang ka br-ik+Sha dang /_ku ta tsi dang /_ni la yaSh+Ti ka dang /_de dag ni dug mo nyung gi shing gi ming ngo /_/bad tsha ka dang /_ko ta dza dang /_ka li ga ka dang /_sha ku pA hwa dang /_in+d+ra ya ba dang /_a bA hwa ya dang /_de dag ni dug mo nyung gi sa bon gyi
[\[14a.3\]]ming ngo /_/murba dang /_ma d+hu ra sa dang /_de bi dang /_pI lu par+Ni dang /_ma d+hu pra ba dang /_saSh+To na dang /_ma d+hu pa ti dang /_la ku par+Na dang /_pri thag twa tsa dang /_de dag ni mur ba'i ming du bshad do/_/dzi mu ta ka dang /_de bar li dang /_brid tra ko sha dang /_g+ha rwa ga ri dang /_ce ni dang /_lo
[\[14a.4\]]ma sha pa tra dang /_karko ti dang /_a ku bi sha pa ha dang /_de dag ni dzi mu ta ka'i ming ngo /_/byi dang ga dang /_kra ming dzid dang /_ce la ka dang /_a lam+ba dang /_tsit+ta tan du la dang /_kri mi har dang /_dzan dug na dang /_kri min sha na dang /_de dag ni byi dang ga'i ming yin no/_/be ha sa dang /_byi du
[\[14a.5\]]la dang /_tA ma mra dang /_bany+dzu la dang /_dir+g+ha pa tra ka dang /_nati ya dang /_gan+b+ha puSh+pa dang /_dza lo kA sA ma tri tA dang /_de dag ni lcang ma'i ming yin no/_/na di gu la pri ya dang /_su shi ta dang /_me g+ha puSh+pa dang /_dza le dza tu dang /_to ya ka ma dang /_ni tsu la dang /_dza le pe ta pa dang /_de dag ni
[\[14a.6\]]chu lcang gi ming gi rnam grangs so/_/tsi tra ka dang /_da ha na dang /_can ni dang /_pA ca ka dang /_a na la dang /_dzo ti dang /_bya ma dang /_dwi pa dang /_pA thin dang /_da ru na dang /_de dag rnams ni kru trug tres kyi ming yin no/_/dan+ti dang /_bu ka la ka
[\[14a.7\]]dang /_tsit+t+ra dang /_ni kum+pa dang /_u pa tsa tra ka dang /_ku la dang /_u du m+bAr pa r+Ni dang /_byi sha li dang /_g+hu na pri ya dang /_de dag ni dan+ti'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/tra ban+ti na dang /_sham+pa ri dang /_tsit+t+ra dang /_ni kun pa dang /_nya gro kro tra bad+ha na dang /_mu shI kA yA dang /_pra t+yan shri ni dang /_bre she raN+Da dang /_su ta shri ni dang /_a ku kar+Ni ka dang /_
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]de dag ni tra ban ti'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/ko sha ta ki dang /_kri ta tsit+t+ra dang /_dza la ni dang /_kri ta ba d+ha na dang /_k+sh+we daM dang /_sba tig ta dang /_ha g+haN+Do lid dang /_ming dang ga pha li ka dang de dang ni ko sha ta ki'i ming yin no/_/rA dza ko shata ki dang /_kar ki ti dang /_has ti parka dang /_dwa marka
[\[14b.2\]]dang /_ko sha ta pha lA dang /_mahA dza li ni dang /_de dag ni rA dza ko sha taki'i ming yin no/_/ka rany+dza dang /_nag ta ma la bra dang /_pra kir t+ya dang /_pus shu many+dza rI dang /_gri pa tapu ra dang /_gung tsha puSh+pa dang /_snig d+ha ka rany+dza ka dang /_de dag ni shwe ta ka rany+dza'i ming yin no/_/ud kir+ya dang /_ke ri mya
[\[14b.3\]]dang /_mi tri nan+da na dang /_tsi ri byil ba dang /_pu ti sa hA dang /_pu ti ka dang /_dan+ta d+ha ba na dang /_de dag ni pu ka rany+dza zhes bya ba srin sman me ru'i ming yin no/_/pi pi ling dang /_ma ga b+ha dang /_kr-iSh+Na dang /_bai de hI dang /_tsa pa la dang /_ka na dang /_a pa gul l+ya dang /_ma ga ti ka dang /_shen t+yi dang
[\[14b.4\]]ka lo dang /_o na dang /_ka Tu dang /_de dag ni pi pi ling gi rnam grangs so/_/ma la dang /_pi pi ling mUl dang /_ka la mu pa dang /_gran+thig dang /_tsha pha la mU la dang /_kr-iSh+Na mU la dang /_sho Di dza dang /_de dag ni pi pi ling gi rtsa ba'i ming yin no/_/sen da ba dang /_mi ni b+han dang /_na de ya
[\[14b.5\]]dang /_ba la not+ta ba ma dang /_sin+du da tha dang /_sin+du da dza dang /_shreSh+Ta la ba na dang /_ba ma la dang /_ba ra dang /_de dag ni lan tshwa'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/sau bar tshal dang /_ru ra ka dang /_su gnad byi dang /_an+d+ha ga da ka dang /_ak+Sha dang /_ka la la ba na dang /_kr-iSh+Na dang de dag ni

[\[14b.7\]]ga ra dza dang /_la ba no da d+hi sam b+ha dang /_de dag ni rgya mtsho'i tsha'i ming yin no/_/u b+hi da dang /_phar thi pa dang /_cau maM dang /_b+hu myu ca dang /_pra thi bi b+ha ma dang /_de dag ni lan tshwa khrol bu'i ming yin no/_/lan tshwa rnam pa lnga po de dag ni lan tshwa rnams kyi nang nas gtso gtsor bstan pa yin no/_/paTu dang
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]la tsa ni zhes smos pa ni lan tshwa spyi'i ming yin no/_/lan tshwa thams cad kyi gor ni rgyam tsha gtang du rung ste/_tsha gzhan med na yang de'i skyin par sbyor ba kun gyi nang du rgyam tsha gang gtang ngo /_/ya pa sa k+Sha ra dang /_ya ba shu ka dang /_ya ba dza dang /_ya ba dza shu ga dza dang /_de dag
[\[15a.2\]]ni nas tshig 'khus pa thal ba'i ming yin no/_/sardzi k+Sha ra dang /_shrog g+hI ni dang /_pA ki dang /_sardzi ka dang /_de dag ni sardzi ka'i thal ba'i ming yin no/_/ba tsa dang /_bu gra gan dang /_dza Di la dang /_shaDa gran+thi dang /_he ma tsan ti dang /_de dag ni shu dag gi ming yin no/_/shukla dang /_
[\[15a.3\]]tik+kA gan+d+ha dang /_u gra dang /_rak+Sho g+ha dang /_lo ma sha dang /_dza ya dang /_de dag ni shu dag dkar po'i ming yin no/_/tra pyi di dang /_tu tsha dang /_bA le la dang /_ba pu la dang /_tu ti da dang /_k+Shu tra'i la dang /_ni k+Shu Ti dang /_tsan+t+ra dang /_g+harba bi snga ba ni dang de dag ni sug smel gyi ming yin no/_/
[\[15a.4\]]pad tre la dang /_bri had e la dang /_s+thu le la dang /_trag su gan+d+he ka dang /_tri de ba dang /_tri de co da b+hut+ta dang /_trid tha ga dang /_kanu ka dang /_pa tra dang /_de dag ni sug smel pa tra e la zhes bya ba rnam pa gcig gi ming ngo /_/ha ra n+ya dang /_re Nu ka dang /_kon tir dang /_pan+du par+Ni dang /_bri had+du ti
[\[15a.5\]]dang /_ka pi la dang /_ra dza pu ti dang /_gan+di ni zhes kyang kha cig 'dod de de dag ni ha re Nu ka'i ming yin no/_/sa ra sha pa dang /_dum du b+ha dang /_ga 'u ra dang /_sid+d+ha r+tha dang /_b+hu ta nA sha na dang /_gra hag+nan dang /_ka T+ya ka dang /_shweta dang /_rak+Sha na dang /_byi dza ya ba ha dang /_de dag ni yungs kar gyi
[\[15a.6\]]ming gi rnam grangs so/_/a su ri dang /_rA dza ka dang /_triSh+Ti ka dang /_rak+ta sA ra sha ba dang /_kya bya ka dang /_tiSh+Na gan+d+ha dang /_su ti baSh+Na dang /_k+ka ba ka dang /_k+shu ra dang /_de dag ni skye tshe'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/tri tsid dang /_tri tsit+t+ri dang /_tri ti ta dang /_kum+b+ha dang /_ku ta ra na dang /_sarba nu
[\[15a.7\]]b+hu ti ta dang /_tri bu ta dang /_shA mA dang /_ko shapha la dang /_de dag ni shing nye rong ste ru dur byid kyi ming ngo /_/ma la byi ka dang /_pa lin+d+hi dang /_ka la me shi dang /_kA lA dang /_ma tu ra ra byi da la dang /_tam+mu puSh+pi dang /_arta tsan+t+ri ka dang /_de dag ni ba la dur byid kyi ming ngo /_/'bras bu gsum zhes bya ba
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]ni/_a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba ru ra rnams yin te/_de'i ming ni/_u d+ha ma dang /_bar ma dang /_shresh+ta dang /_pha la nri ka dang /_pha la tri ya dang /_de dag ni 'bras bu gsum gyi spyi'i ming yin no/_/ha ri ta ka dang /_a b+ha ya dang /_pad th+ya dang /_sran ma dat+ta dang /_byi tsa dang /_shi ba dang /_
[\[15b.2\]]a bya tha dang /_stu ta na dang /_a mo g+ha dang /_tse ta ki dang /_mri ta na dang /_a mr-i ta dang /_de dag ni a ru ra'i ming yin no/_/tra ti pha dang /_a ma la ka dang /_dza tir sa pha la dang /_shi ba dang /_ko rang ka ka dang /_a mr-i ta dang /_pha la dang /_shrI pha la dang /_a mr-i tong+b+ha bra dang /_de dag ni skyu ru
[\[15b.3\]]ra'i ming gi bye brag go_/bi ta sha dang /_kar sha pha la dang /_ka li b+h+r-i k+Sha dang /_ka lo tu ma dang /_ba pan+ta ka dang /_bu ta tsa sa dang /_ha r+yak+Sho dang /_ya man prir ya dang /_de dag ni ba ru ra'i ming gi dbye ba'o/_/su da dang /_n+ya Da dang /_ma br-ik+Sha dang /_gan dri ba dang /_badzra kar mu ka dang /_snu ha dang /_
[\[15b.4\]]sa man+ta dug+ta dang /_sbug dang /_badzri ri dang /_ni shri sha pat+ta ka dang /_de dag ni shi ri kha N+Da'i rnam grangs so/_/shaM khi ni dang /_tig ta la dang /_tsid tsa dang /_ya pa tig ta dang /_a k+Sha pI da ka dang /_ba yu phe phab dang /_ba yu ra sa dang /_Da da pA da dang /_ci sar pi ni dang /_de dag ni shaM khi ni'i ming yin
[\[15b.5\]]no/_/ka li ka dang /_ka la dang /_nI la dang /_ru ni bi shod ni dang /_grA mya dang /_tud tsha dang /_nI la pus sh+yi dang /_tsi ra bi ra dang /_bA hi byi dang /_de dag ni ni li'i ming yin no/_/ro tra dang /_ga ti ri ta dang /_shi be ri dang /_ti palba ka pa dang /_shA ba ra dang /_g+ha na twag ka dang /_bri ha ra d+ha da dang /_pa
[\[15b.6\]]ti dang sha bar pa dang /_de dag ni sha ba dang rig ser phrom gyi ming nga /_/sha ba ra ka dang /_shwe ta rod+dA dang /_a k+Shi be sha dza dang /_dzir na bud+d+ha na dang /_bri had pat+t+ra dang /_kra mu ka dang /_s+thu la ba ka dang /_de dag ni seng phrom dkar po'i ming gi bye brag yin no/_/a rag gwa dang /_rA dza pr-ig+Sha dang /_sha mya
[\[15b.7\]]ka dang /_tsa rus ang+ga li dang /_kar+Ni ka dang /_bya di ga ti dang /_gri ta ma la dang /_re'i ta dang /_de dag ni dang ka'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/kaM bi l+ya ka dang /_rU tsa na ka dang /_rak+ta tsUr na ka dang /_rak+ta gA dang /_rak+ta sham dang /_tsi re ki dang /_bran shod na dang /_de dag ni kaM'i l+ya ga'i ming yin
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]no/_/swa ra na k+Shi ri dang /_he ma dug d+ha dang /_he ma k+Shi ri dang /_ka tsa ni dang /_he mA ba tI dang /_sarba sba na dug d+ha dang /_ma he mA hA dang /_tig tu dug ti ga dang de dag ni rtsang sman khrol bu'i ming ngo /_/k+Shi ra dang /_dug d+ha dang /_pa ya sa dang /_de dag ni bud med kyi nu
[\[16a.2\]]zho'i ming ngo /_/'o ma zhes bya ba gang du 'byung ba der ni ba'i 'o ma yin par shes par bya'o/_/'o ma gyur pa ni zho zhes bya'o/_/brjod do/_/shar zhes bya ba ni zho'i sbris ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/da d+hi na na tA zhes bya ba ni zho ga chu la zer ro/_/zho bsdus pa las mar byung ba ni mar sar zhes
[\[16a.3\]]brjod do/_/ming rnams gcig ha yang ga byin zhes kyang bya'o/_/sar pi dang /_ad dza dang /_gri ta dang /_ha byi dang /_de dag ni mar gyi ming ngo /_/na ud shwi dang /_ma thi tha dang /_tag kra dang /_kra la sha yam dang /_bi li Di ta dang /_dan+ta ha ta dang /_go ras dang /_de dag ni dar ba'i ming
[\[16a.4\]]gi rnam grangs so/_/de bsdus pa'i dbu ba ni ka d+ha ba zhes bya'o/_/go mud+da tra dang /_go dza la dang /_gam bu dang /_bra h+ma am+bo dang /_de dag ni ba gcin gyi ming gi dbye ba'o/_/gcin lhag ma bdun po ni so so'i bye brag gis rtogs par bya'o/_/ba lang la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad kyi rtug pa'i ming ni
[\[16a.5\]]sha kri da dang /_ka ri sha dang /_tshag na dang /_ba gi sha dang /_de rnams yin no/_/ku sha dang /_mud pa la ku na dang /_pa ka la ka dang /_pa ri ba kyang s+ya ka dang /_a ma ya dang /_g+ha da dang /_rog dang /_twa ga to sha dang /_bya di dang /_de dag ni ru rta'i ming yin no/_/shAl Tu dang /_shan til+kh+yaka
[\[16a.6\]]dang /_pu ti ba ta dang /_ma hA ba la dang /_shrI pha la dang /_shri a hA dang /_gan+d+ha dang shri dang de las kyang bil ba gzhon nu ni cil pa kar ba ka ti zhes bya ste/_de dag ni bil ba'i ming gi bye brag go_/kasma ri dang /_shri bar+Ni hi ra dang /_karmi r+ya dang /_kad pa la dang /_ka h+ma ri dang /_sarba ba to batra dang /_
[\[16a.7\]]kri sna mi ti ka dang /_de dag ni tad pal gyi ming gi rnam grangs so/_/ag+ni man+tha dang /_ag+hi sa b+ha na dang /_tad ka rI dang /_bi dza ya ti ka dang /_b+ha ni man+tha dang /_ar ni dang /_ke ta dang /_dza ya dang /_pa ba ka dang /_man+tha na dang /_de dag ni ag+ni man+tha'i ming gi bye brag yin no/_/pai dza an+ti dang /_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]b+han+na nirma tha ni dang /_dza ya dang /_a ra ni ka dang /_dza yan+ti dang /_bi dza ya dang /_dza ya b+ha dang /_de dag ni tad ka ri zhes bya ba ag+ni man+tha'i ming gi rnam gcig go_/pA ta li dang /_kr-iSh+Na br-it+ta dang /_sta li dang /_a mo ga dang /_am+bu pa san dang /_tAm+m+ra pu shi dang /_kun byi ka dang /_ku su ma
[\[16b.2\]]a ga ma du ti ka dang /_de dag ni pA ta li'i ming yin no/_/shwe ta pra na dang /_kaSh+Ta pa ta la dang /_sha ta kub bi ka dang /_ku be+e da ra k+Sha dang /_pha le ru ha dang /_de dag ni pa ta li dkar po rnam gcig gi ming yin no/_/b+hu ta br-ik+Sha dang /_tun+du ka dang /_dar ga brid da ka dang /_ma yu ra dza ga dang /_
[\[16b.3\]]ba lu ka dang /_ka dwang ka dang /_ra lu ka dang /_de dag ni so na ka'i ming yin no/_/sti ra dang /_sa phu mya dang /_tri phu na d+hu b+ha ba dang /_bi da ri gan+d+ha dang /_ang shu ma ti dang /_dir+g+ha mU la dang /_pI ti ka dang /_de dag ni sA la par+Ni'i ming yin no/_/pri thag par+Ni dang /_kA la shi dang /_
[\[16b.4\]]d+ha ba na dang /_gu ha dang /_mr-i ga dang /_cin na tu dang /_gri ti li dang /_par+Ni dang /_sha ka pud tshi ga dang /_de dag ni kr-iSh+Na par+Ni'i ming yin no/_/pa ba pu pu tra dang /_kan+tha ki dang /_s+thu la kan+ta ka dang /_ma hA brta ki ni dang /_ma hA ti dang /_ho ti ka dang /_kan+tha ka ri dang /_kan+ta ki ni dang /_d+ha ba ni dang /_d+hu
[\[16b.5\]]pra bar shi ni dang /_ni dig+d+hi ka dang /_k+shu tra dang /_bArta gi dang /_k+shutra ka Na ha ki dang /_de dag ni shri ha ti'i ming du bshad do/_/go k+Shu ra dang /_go k+Shu ra ka dang /_shwo dang /_Sh+Ta dang /_kri kan+ta dang /_gokan+ta ka dang /_blag sha ta ka dang /_go kan+d+ha dang /_swA du kan+tha ka dang /_de dag ni gze
[\[16b.6\]]ma'i ming yin no/_/de ltar rtsa ba chen po lnga dang /_chung ngu lnga ste bcu po de dag ni rtsa ba bcu zhes bya'o/_/gong du bshad pa'i rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis po ni spyir bstan pa yin no/_/rtsa ba lnga pa lhag ma ni so sor bshad pa yin no/_/de ba da ru dang /_b+had tra tra ru dang /_su dang /_ru dang /_de bA
[\[16b.7\]]kASh+Ta dang /_b+ha trA shwa dang /_su ra da ru dang /_in+d+ra da ru dang /_de dag ni thang shing gi ming ngo /_/yug+ta dang /_gan ta mUl dang /_su ba ha dang /_ra sa dang /_su gan+d+ha dang /_a ti ra sa dang /_ra sa dang /_ra sa ni dang /_gan+d+ha na ku li dang /_de dag ni ra sna'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/sngo ba dang /_
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]triSh+Na shU ka dang /_ba byid tri dang /_bA dza nam pri ya dang /_a sha k+Sha ta dang /_b+ha ru dza dang de dag ni nas kyi ming ste/_de brngos pa ni yos zhes bya'o/_/sha ta puSh+pa dang /_mi si dang /_g+ho sha dang /_Sha tA hA dang /_ka ra bi dang /_sha pha dang /_a ba ma duSh+pa dang /_ma d+hu
[\[17a.2\]]ra ga dang /_chad tra dang /_sim ha ta la pa tra dang /_de dag ni me tog brgya pa ste/_shu ti'i ming du bstan pa yin no/_/ku lang+tha dang /_tam+ma bar+Na dang /_ka la br-it+ta dang /_tsa la ba ka dang /_k+Shota dang /_bra b+h+ra ma ra dang /_ma du dza ti dang /_de dag ni rgya sran gyi ming ngo /_/de las kyang ma k+Shika
[\[17a.3\]]zhes bya ba ni 'bru mar gyi mdog lta bu'o/_/b+h+ra mar zhes bya ba ni sbrang rtsi dkar po la bya'o/_/k+Sha tra zhes bya ba ni sbrang rtsi'i mdog ser skyar snang ba'o/_/po ti zhes bya ba ni zhun mar gyi mdog lta bu'o/_/de dag ni sbrang rtsi'i bye brag go/_/sid tha ka dang /_b+hi ga sa dang /_sid tha dang /_ma d+hu tshish+ta
[\[17a.4\]]dang /_mad+hu na shu ta dang /_ma d+ha she sha sa dang /_pa tsan ga na dang /_mad+hu dzA dang /_mak+Shi ka sa ya dang /_de dag ni spra tshil gyi ming ngo /_/sharka ra dang /_si ka ta dang /_shU b+h+ra dang /_shu la dang /_shwe te dang /_po to ba la dang /_de dag ni kha ra dkar po'i ming ngo /_/mar tsharnga d+hi ka dang /_
[\[17a.5\]]a pa gal ba dang /_de gnyis ni kha ra'i mdog ser po'i ming ngo /_/de las gzhan pa ni sbrang rtsi'i khar zhes bya'o/_/she khari dang /_pra tag pu na sha dang /_yu ta ka dang /_kha ra mar dza ri dang /_ad shal ba dang /_k+Shu po dang /_d+ha marga dang /_de dag ni a ba marga'i ming ngo /_/pi pi ling dang /_
[\[17a.6\]]bca' sga dang /_na le sham dang /_dra yu shan dang /_byo sha dang /_ka d+ya tra ya dang /_de dag ni tshab gsum gyi ming gi rnam grangs so/_/shing tsha dang /_sug smel dang /_gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_de gsum spyi'i ming yin no/_/ni tri ka ta dang /_tri dza ta dang /_de gnyis ni dri gsum zhes bya'o/_/
[\[17a.7\]]de'i steng du nA ga ge sar gyis bsnan na dri sna bzhi zhes bya'o/_/ho sha dang /_na gar dang /_bi shwa be+e sha dza dang /_bi shwo'u dang /_shrig be+e ra dang /_ra hud tsha tra dang /_ka ta sha dang /_de dag ni bca' sga'i ming ngo /_/ma ri tsa dang /_bal dza dang /_kr-iSh+Na dang /_u sha na dang /_kuny+dzi ta dang /_ka Tu
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]dang /_yab ni sha dang /_d+harma par ta dang /_tik+Sh+Na dang /_bi ba sha pri ya dang /_g+han dang /_de dag ni na le sham gyi ming ngo /_/de bi dang /_da ru ha ri ta dang /_sardza ni dang /_pa tsa ma pa tsa dang /_ka Ta ka ta ri dang /_ra dza ni dang /_ra tri dang /_ma ha dang /_ni sha dang /_k+Sha pa dang /_de dag ni skyer
[\[17b.2\]]pa'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/piN+Da ha ri ta dang /_ga pu ri dang /_bar+Na ba ti dang /_ni sha dang /_pi ti ka dang /_ra dza ni dang /_bi ta dang /_ha ri ti dang /_ba ra bad pha ni dang /_de dag ni yung ba ste/_rtsi ser po'i ming ngo /_/sardza ra sa dang /_de ba b+hu pa dang /_ba ru d+hu pa dang /_ag ni ba la
[\[17b.3\]]b+ha dang /_su ral dang /_sa ra ni rdza sa pa dang /_su d+hu pa dang /_yak+Sha du pa ka dang /_sra rtsi bog gi ming ngo /_/ma d+hu pu sha dang /_brid+d+ha pu sha dang /_shu ka bri ya dang /_b+han di dang /_shu ka ba pu sh+ya dang /_mri du pu shwa dang /_bi sha ba d+ha dang /_da dag ni shri sha'i ming ngo /_/shi kru dang /_
[\[17b.4\]]she ta ma ri tsa dang /_mu kha b+hany+dza dang /_a dig sh+na ka dang /_sau b+hany+dza na dang /_kr-iSh+Na gan+d+ha dang /_su ti ba shan dang /_g+han phal ba dang /_de dag ni na le sham dkar po'i ming ngo /_/shi kru dang /_ha ring kra sha ka dang /_mU la ka bat+t+ra ka dang /_g+han tsha da dang /_ti shan gan+d+ha dang /_mu rung gI dang /_
[\[17b.5\]]sa la na dang /_k+Sha ma dang /_de dag ni shi kru rnam gcig ha ri sha ka'i ming yin no/_/ma du shi kru dang /_ma d+hu ra dang /_siM ha ke sa ri dang /_shi kru dang /_shi kruka dang /_de dag ni shi kru dkar po'i ming ste/_shi kru gsum pa yin no/_/ma d+hu ka dang /_tish+na sa ra dang /_mad+hu puSh+pa dang /_ma ha da du
[\[17b.6\]]ma dang /_do la pha la dang /_ma d+huSh+Tal dang /_ma d+hu ra dang /_g+hu dang du sha ka dang /_de dag ni shing tog ma du ka'i ming yin no/_/ma du ka'i rnam gcig ni gong ma bas shing chung la me tog kyang chung zhing /_ro dang nus pa ni mnyam pa zhig yod de de yang ma du ka zhes bya'o/_/ra sany+dza na dang /_ta ra ka she
[\[17b.7\]]la dang /_darbi kwa tha su mud+d+ha ba dang /_ti ra k+Sha dang /_bal bai dang /_bal bai dang /_tir k+Sha dang /_bal bai dang /_mri ta la dang /_de dag ni skyer khaN+Da'i ming ngo /_/hi gu pat+t+ri dang /_pring th+wi ge dang /_pir thul dang /_p+wi thu la dang /_ka ba ri dang /_dir ke ka dang /_tan+ti dang /_nA dI dang /_tiM gu shi
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ba ka dang /_de dag ni sibs kyi ming gi rnam grangs so/_/ta ga ra dang /_ku ta la dang /_ba tra dang /_na tra dang /_ka la nus ri dang /_dz+nyim hri dang /_bar hi na dang /_baM kad dang /_shi tha dang /_tsa na hU na dang /_de dag ni rgya spos kyi ming yin no/_/b+hod d+hod ni dang /_krur
[\[18a.2\]]dang /_sa man sa dang /_shita k+Shur dang /_yod na ha dang /_prad ri shi dang /_be+e da la dang /_de dag ni ba la'i ming ngo /_/raM sha srog ta dang /_ba ra dwa tsa dang /_swa bar+Ni dang /_b+hal+l+ya g+ha ni dang /_b+hu rib la dang /_pa li ni dang /_pu sha ka dang /_de dag ni a ti ba la'i ming yin no/_shar
[\[18a.3\]]dwa la dang /_nI la dUr ba dang /_go lo mi dang /_sha ta bar pa dang /_ha ri ta dang /_sarba byi r+ya dang /_shi ta bal liM dang /_u sita la ta dang /_de dag ni dUr ba sngon po'i ming ngo /_/she ta dUr ba dang /_go lo mi dang /_shwe gnad dang /_so tal ta dang /_sa ha sra bid+yA dang /_a nan+ta
[\[18a.4\]]dang /_dur d+har dang /_bar g+ha bi dang /_ru ha dang /_de dag ni dUr ba dkar po'i ming ngo /_/gan da dUr ba dang /_gan da la dang /_ti b+h+ra dang /_ma tsha k+Sha dang /_bi li dra dang /_na di ka ta ya dang /_da ra ni dang /_sha ku la k+Shu dang /_de dag ni dUr ba'i sdong bu'i ming ngo /_/ya ba sha ka dang /_dirga mU
[\[18a.5\]]la dang /_sa mu t+t+ran+ta dang /_ma rud b+ha ba dang /_a nan+ta dang /_du ra chu la dang /_ba la rad tre dang /_tsi kan+ta ka dang /_de dag ni byi tsher ma'i ming gi rnam grangs so/_/du ra la b+ha ba dang /_da na ya sho d+dang /_ya sha dang /_dan n+wo ya ba sha ka dang /_kad tshur dang /_tam mra mu li dang /_dur shar sha dang /_du
[\[18a.6\]]rabi graha dang /_de dag kyang byi tsher ba rnam gcig gi ming ngo /_/ba shi dang /_bri sha dang /_siM ha mu khi dang /_b+h+ri sha ga ma ta dang /_a ta ru sha ka dang /_siM hi ga dang /_siM ha par+Ni dang /_rak+ta ping ta pra sa da ni dang /_de dag ni ba sha ka'i ming ngo /_/kapi kad tshu dang /_ad ma gub+ha dang /_swa
[\[18a.7\]]yang gub+ta dang /_mar ka ti dang /_kan d+ya ka ri dang /_ja ha dang /_gub ta dang /_ka pi rom dang /_pha la ri sha bi dang /_gun tra dang /_si ri dang /_gud tsha mU la dang /_pa ni ra pir thul kha ra dang /_de dag ni kha sral gyi ming yin no/_/shata ba ri dang /_su sma pa tra dang /_su ba ri dang /_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]an+ti ba ri dang /_ba ri dang /_sha ta mU la dang /_rbi bi shad tru dang /_ba hu mU la dang /_a hi dza hi ka dang /_cu Da ma Ni dang /_shi ta pa pa ki dang /_shi ka phardi dang /_kr-iSh+Na la dang /_a ra ta dang /_de dag ni nye'u shing gi ming yin no/_/ud dza da dang /_dam mri ga ga dang /_kun dza
[\[18b.2\]]dang /_tsa tra sra dang /_ka ka sa hwa ka dang /_mU la ka dang /_ha ri pa r+Ni dang /_su shi ka k+Shi ra me ti dang /_kr-iSh+Na kam+bu dzi ka dang /_gum dza dang /_rig ti ki dang /_ka ka nan ti ka dang /_de dag ni 'ol ma se dmar po'i ming yin no/_/shwe ta kam+bo dzi dang /_dur da sha dang /_ka la tsi lu
[\[18b.3\]]ka dang /_ka ka nga ni dang /_ka ka tsiN+Di dang /_shag kra shal+l+ya dang /_bi ri Na Di ka dang /_de dag ni 'ol ma se dkar po'i ming yin no/_/pri yang+ku dang /_pha li ni dang /_sha ma dang /_ba ni ta bal la b+ha dang /_lA ta dang /_b+hang gur dang /_bel geng ri ka dang /_pri ya ha dang /_bar na b+he
[\[18b.4\]]de ni dang /_de dag ni gan d+ha pri yang+ku'i ming yin no/_/pad+ma shwe ta dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_shata patra dang /_sa ro ru ha dang /_ta ma ra sa dang /_sa ro dza dang /_am+bu dza dang /_baM ka dza dang /_de dag ni pad+ma dkar po'i ming yin no/_/push+kar dang /_rak+ta dang /_ra brin dang /_ku she she ya
[\[18b.5\]]dang /_ka ma la dang /_ni li ni dang /_shri ni ke ta na dang /_na ror ma dang /_de dag ni pad+ma dmar po'i ming ngo /_/nI lot+pa la dang /_ku pa la ya dang /_nalba ba dza dang /_a si to pa la dang /_in+d+ri ba dang /_ka ka lo dang /_kad dza la dang /_ka ka kud mal dang /_de dag ni ut+pa la sngon po'i
[\[18b.6\]]ming ngo /_/sa du gan+di ka dang /_rak+ta ni da ka dang /_kar+Na pu ra dang /_pa rod pha la dang /_dza t+ya pa la dang /_go da na da dang /_ka lhar dang /_gan+d+ha so ma ka ka dang /_de dag ni ut+pa la dmar po'i ming ngo /_/ku mud dang /_shwe ta dza la dza dang /_tsan+d+ra kan+ta dang /_sha shi pir ya dang /_si
[\[18b.7\]]tot+pa la dang /_gan+d+ha b+ha ga dang /_sha ma br-it+ti dang /_dza le ru ha dang /_de dag ni ut+pa la dkar po ste/_ku mu ta'i ming ngo /_/pad+ma ni pud tra ki ni dang /_na li ni dang /_ku mad pa ti dang /_bal sha ni dang /_par+Na ba ti dang /_ba na sha da dang /_sa tsa ka ra dang /_de dag ni pad+ma'i thog ma'i sa bon
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]gyi ming ngo /_/ke sar da dang /_pad+ma kiny+dza la ka dang /_a pi ta dang /_pad+ma ke sar dang /_ma ga ran da dang /_par ga dang /_rung ga dang /_ga'u ra dang /_gan tshan dang /_de dag ni pad+ma ge sar gyi ming ngo /_/ka ra ni ka dang /_bi sho ko sha dang /_karka ti dang /_pad+ma kar+Ni/_
[\[19a.2\]]ka dang /_pad+ma bi tsha dang /_pad+ma k+Sha dang /_de dag ni pad+ma'i snying po'i ming yin no/_/mri na la dang /_tan t+ya la dang /_bi sa dang /_pad+ma'i di mU la dang /_sha lu ka dang /_de dag ni pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i ming ngo /_/dir ki ka dang /_de dag ni pad+ma'i skyes gnas kyi ming yin no/_/pad+ma ni kang dam
[\[19a.3\]]dang /_pad ka dang /_ra dza dang /_pad+ma di dza dang /_ma d+he dang /_de dag ni 'dam gyi ming ngo /_/ku Dan na Da dang /_sla ma dang /_dan+n+ya dang /_shu kA hA dang /_pa re be+e la la dang /_dzirna b+hUd da Na dang /_da sha pu ra dang /_bi run+na dang /_be la rtsi dang /_pu ta dang /_de dag ni sla ba'i ming ngo /_/dzi
[\[19a.4\]]ban+ti dang /_dzi ba ni dang /_dzi ba dang /_sha kha sheSh+Ta dang /_ya sha ka ri dang /_dzo ba ni pha dang /_ma ga l+ya dang /_shri ka ri ti ka dang /_de dag ni sman 'tsho byed kyi ming yin no/_/ka ko li dang /_ka pa di dang /_kan dang /_d+h+wad k+Sha di dang /_k+Shi ra shu ki ka dang /_shu kla k+Shu ra dang /_ba ya sa li dang
[\[19a.5\]]bir dang /_d+ha ra dang /_pas swi ni dang /_de dag ni ra mnye ba ser po ste/_bung tshang rdo'i ming ngo /_/k+Shi ra ka ko li dang /_ba ri dang /_shu ra dang /_bi kra ni ka dang /_pa ya swi ni dang /_k+Shi ri ni dang /_shu kla dang /_k+Shir bi ni ka dang /_de dag ni ram nye ba'o ma can gyi ming ngo /_/me da dang /_me
[\[19a.6\]]da sa mud bud ta dang /_shal l+ya brni dang /_ma ang ra dang /_ma ni tshid tra dang /_de bam na dang /_sur med sa mud b+ha ba dang /_de dag ni me da'i ming ngo /_/br-ik+Sha sha ru ha dang /_ma hA pu ru Sha da ni dang /_b+hi ba min pa dang /_de dag ni mon sran sde'u'i ming ngo /_/ma hA me da'i ming du bshad

[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]la dang /_ma sha par+Na dang /_kam+bu dzi dang /_kri shin bri ti ka dang /_de dag ni mon sran gre'u'i 'dab ma'i ming ngo /_/ri sha ba dang /_ka ku dang /_shi man dang /_ba sha ni dang /_go ba ti dang /_bri sha dang /_bri sha na dang /_dur da dang /_di ra dang /_b+han dur ba dang /_bri sha ti

[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]de ba dang /_nA ga ba la dang /_sha ha dang /_gci bu ga dang /_khar gan+da dang /_kal dang /_gan+ta dang /_gang ga ru ki dang /_de dag ni nA ga ba la'i ming ngo /_/de ba ha sa dang /_g+ha l+ya dang /_arta pas da ni dang /_b+har sha puShI dang /_ma hA gan+d+ha dang /_de ba dang /_

[\[20a.5\]]dang /_la g+hu dang /_de dag ni la mang dza'i ming yin no/_/la tsan+dan dang /_gan+d+ha sa ra dang /_go shiR+Sha dang /_shwi ta tsan dang /_li hi ta dang /_b+ha tra shwe yang dang /_ma la ya dzi dang /_ma har ram dang /_ti tam dang /_de dag ni tsan+dan dkar bo'i ming ngo /_/rak+ta tsan+dan dang /_lo hi ta dang /_

[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]dang /_de dag ni shug pa'i ming ngo /_/cak+Shu sha dang /_shi pu sha dang /_mU la sa da na dang /_pu Na da ha dang /_puN+Da rI ka dang /_nita sho ta na dang /_de dag ni pra puN+Da rI ka ste/_stag tsher ba'i ming ngo /_/tuSh+Ta dang /_su kha dang /_b+huti dang /_b+hur ti ra gi dang /_sarba dza na pri ya dang /_ri
[\[20b.2\]]shi praSh+Ta dang /_ba su dang /_lash+mi ma gal+l+ya dang /_ma du ra dang /_pri ya dang /_de dag ni brit+ti'i ming yin no/_/tuka k+Shi ri dang /_ban sha ba dang /_ban sha dza dang /_tri na ka ra ni dang /_tu bag k+Shi ri dang /_shu b+h+rad dang /_sha khya dang /_ba sha ro tsa na dang /_de dag ni smyug gang gi ming ngo /_/
[\[20b.3\]]sid+di dang /_tsi ta na dang /_sa na da dang /_dzi ba ban da ni dang /_a shwa sa dang /_g+ho da ni dang /_mu ni shriSh+Ta dang /_ya sha k+Sha ri dang /_de dag ni rid d+hi'i ming yin no/_/shriM gi dang /_karka ta shriM gi dang /_ma hA go sha dang /_shring gi ka dang /_a ti ra sa dang /_na taM gi dang /_karka

[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]tshad dang /_b+hu mi swa hwo dang /_dwa ra da tu dang /_sti raka dang /_kha ra pad tra ka dang /_de dag ni sha kha bad tra'i ming ngo /_/any+dza na dang /_ya man dang /_na d+h+ya ma dang /_shrod dzan dang /_ka pot+ta dang /_nan+da na dang /_ta r+yam dang /_ya tri tsha bi gad dang /_bar ma dang /_sho

[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]ka ya sha dang /_mi d+hu ra twag dang /_d+ha ba la dang /_pa na du ra dang /_sti ra dang /_de dag ni da pa'i ming ngo /_/kriSh+Na sa ra dang /_b+ha sa ma gar ba dang /_ba sa dan dang /_tig sh+ta du ma dang /_aM ga ra sar dang /_ka pa la dang /_a gu ru sa dang /_de dag ni shing sha pa'i ming

[\[22a.4\]]sa sa dang /_kaN+Tha dang /_gal+l+ya ni dang /_shi bar dang /_dirga bri shru dang /_kan+di br-ik+Sha dang /_ra sa nir+ya sa dang /_de dag ni sa la'i shing gi ming yin no/_/ka bu ka dang /_pu ka dang /_ka sha ya pha la dang /_dag sha ya phu sh+ya dang /_kri mi ka dang /_a ta bu sha dang /_ka sha ya du ra dang /_de
[\[22a.5\]]dag ni kra mu ka'i ming yin no/_/a dza kar+Na dang /_pasta kar+Na dang /_ka shang ya dang /_rany+dza na du ma dang /_ku sha di ra dang /_swa da ha ra dang /_lata br-ik+Sha dang /_sardza ka dang /_de dag ni ardzu kar+Na'i ming yin no/_/kar sha dang /_go shi dang /_d+hi ra gang trab+ha ba dang /_a ran mya dang /_dirga
[\[22a.6\]]br-ik+Sha dang /_sa sam+b+ha ra na dang /_de dag ni a shwa kar+Na'i ming yin no/_/ba ra na dang /_shwa ta bu sha dang /_tig ta dang /_sha kha du ma dang /_ro da br-ik+Sha dang /_ta ma la dang /_mar ta pa ha dang /_de dag ni ba ri'i ming du bshad pa yin no/_/kir na pu sha dang /_pi la pa tra dang /_ma du sramU la dang /_
[\[22a.7\]]dirga mU la dang /_pa ru shu dang /_sha k+Shi ra mo da dang /_de dag ni rom ha'i ming ngo /_/a dza shring dang /_tib ta d+hu ba ta dang /_ma hA ka pa l+ya dang /_a k+She ba sha dza dang /_kur dza par+Ni dang /_me sha shing gi dang /_sha tu se na dang /_be sha ni ka dang /_de dag ni a tsa shring ga'i ming ngo /_/tsi na sha
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ka dang /_ta ka ra dang /_ba ru kan ta ka dang /_dza ti byig k+Sha dang /_d+hu ra spra dar sha dang /_sa su tu tig ta pa la dang /_de dag ni an tar ga la'i ming yin no/_/u sha ka dang /_bri sha ka dang /_traSh+Ta ra dang /_nir sa re dang /_kha sha ka dang /_u sha ka dang /_siM ha mu tra dang /_ka ra mi ti ka
[\[22b.2\]]dang /_de dag ni u sha ka'i ming ngo /_/tud+tha dang /_kar pa ri ka tud+tha dang /_a mr-i ta sang+ga dang /_de dag ni spangs ma'i ming yin no/_/ma yU ra gr-i ba dang /_ki ti ba na dang /_b+har hi kaN+Tha dang /_de dag ni spangs ma rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra ba'i ming ngo /_/hiM gu dang /_ra ma tha dang /_a tu gra dang /_
[\[22b.3\]]dza tu gra dang /_b+hu ta na sha na dang /_a gu Da gan+d+ha dang /_rag sho na dang /_dza na no dang /_su pa du na dang /_de dag ni rtsi bo che ste shing kun gyi ming ngo /_/ka sa si dang /_da du ka si ba dang /_sho da na dang /_de dag ni nag tshur gyi ming ngo /_/puSh+pa ka si sa dang /_bai sa ka dang /_su sho ma sha dang /_

[\[22b.5\]]ru dang /_ba hu ta ka ra dang /_d+hi ga mu ga dang /_Di Di mU la dang /_a tshud tsha la dang /_de dag ni bi ra ta'i ming yin no/_/tu la dang /_tu la puSh+pe dang /_ba shu ka dang /_ka mi mU la ka dang /_paN+Tu rang gi phra ya dang /_ru rta pri ya dang /_sha sho mal+li ka dang /_de dag ni bu ga'i ming ngo /_/
[\[22b.6\]]ash+ma be da dang /_shi la bi di dang /_pra tar dang /_u pa la bred ka ka dang /_nA ga byid dang /_ash+ma ha dang /_ash+ma da na dang /_de dag ni sru sru'i rtsa ba'i ming ngo /_/sush+ma pa tra dang /_dirga lo hi ta dang /_yiSh+Ta dang /_ma du ra dang /_hwa swa mu mU la dang /_mud ta krid tsha dang /_ru dza
[\[22b.7\]]ba ha dang /_de dag ni iM ga ta'i ming ngo /_/ka sha dang /_sa du la la dang /_kan+de i k+Shu dang /_ba ye se k+Shu ka dang /_shwe ta tsa ma ra duSh+pa dang /_kan+te k+Shu dang /_i k+Shu ba li ka dang /_de dag ni ka she k+Shu ka'i ming ngo /_/i shu dang /_ma d+hu tri na dang /_b+hu hi ra sa dang /_tu la dang /_tu lo dang /_
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]a si patra ka dang /_mri t+yu puSh+pa dang /_g+had tri na dang /_tri na dza ra dang /_mahA ba sa dang /_de dag ni bu ram shing gi ming ngo /_/nal dang /_na Da dang /_mri ti puSh+pe dang /_su shi ra dang /_ni ra dza dang /_shun+ya ma ta dang /_pu ta g+ha la dang /_na li ka dang /_pa b+hi shan dang /_

[\[23b\]]

[\[25b\]]

[\[25b.5\]]ni khi dang /_bispurdza ni dang /_bi sbur ra ni dang /_nI la skan+da dang /_sud su ka dang /_de dag ni tin+tu ka'i ming ngo /_/tu ruSh+ka dang /_kri ti mo dang /_nga mru dang /_ka pi la dang /_ya tsa pa na dang /_ka pi dang /_byin+ni ka Na dang /_su gan+d+ha sta dang /_kri ta pan+di ka dang /_de dag ni mu ru sha'i
