[\[54b.6\]]stsogs las/_/mnan byas de dang 'drar shes bya/_/rdo gu la sogs bzhur ba gzhan/_/dus kyi skyur po yang zas len/_/'bras khu'i rang skyur 'khru rno tsha/_/mkhris pa skyed byed bskus na bsil/_/ngal dang rmya sel yig 'byed/_/drod skyed chu se'i nad sel yin/_/
[\[54b.7\]]mas gtong la phan yid du 'ong /_/yang zhing rlung dang bad kan 'joms/_/ba gcin ra lug ma he dang /_/glang po rta bong rnga mo'i gcin/_/mkhris skyed rtsub cing rno la tsha/_/'thungs rjes tsha bro ro tsha ste/_/srin nad 'or nad dmu rdzing sbos/_/gzer dang skya rbab bad kan rlung /_/dug skran sha bkra
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]yi ga 'chus/_/mdze dang gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms/_/de ltar chu bo bu ram shing /_/til mar chang gi sde tshogs rim/_/gsher ba'i rdzas phyogs gcig pa 'di/_/rags rim ji bzhin bstan pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/
[\[55a.2\]]mdo'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o//_//de nas kha zas kyi tshul brtag cing shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rtsa snar 'bras chan ka ma la/_/drug cu pa dang bya yis blangs/_/sgron bu'i mchu dang rtse rnon dang /_/ro 'dra'i 'bras 'dra dri bzang dang /_/pa tang ka dang gser
[\[55a.3\]]mdog can/_/gang gzhan 'bras ni bzang po rnams/_/ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing snum/_/ro tsa bshang gci ska zhing chung /_/ro rjes bska zhing phan pa dang /_/yang zhing gcin mang bsil ba yin/_/de la rtse rno nang rtsa snar/_/mchog yin skom dang nyes gsum sel/_/
[\[55a.4\]]de yi 'og tu 'bras chan smad/_/de'i 'og ka ma la de'i 'og_/nas 'dra ha yan char ma/_/ne sha da ka la sogs ni/_/ro mngar dri zhim lci la snum/_/zhu ba'i rjes skyur bad mkhris skyed/_/bshang dang gci ba thur du 'byin/_/snga ma snga ma smad pa yin/_/'bras nang drug cu ba mchog
[\[55a.5\]]ste/_/rtsa ser shun pa nag pa dag_/snum zhing 'ju sla brten zhing mngar/_/nyes pa gsum sel bsil rtug 'dril/_/de las rim bzhin thug chen dang /_/shun nag rgya skyegs tshigs ma 'dra/_/khyim bya'i sgang 'dra 'ur ba'i mig_/phug ron 'bras dang su khar/_/'ba'
[\[55a.6\]]ra kha dang ut+pal dmar/_/tsi ta ston skyes da dur/_/gan d+han dang ku ru bin/_/yon tan rim bzhin chung shes bya/_/'bras gzhan mngar zhing zhu rjes skyur/_/mkhris pa skyed cing lci ba dang /_gcin rtug mang zhing tshab yin/_/pa ta la nyid nyes gsum skyed/_/ci tshe khre dang
[\[55a.7\]]ni ba ra/_/khre rgod sne 'bras stsogs bsil yang /_/rtsa'i 'bru de dag rlung skyed cing /_/khong rtsub bad kan mkhris pa sel/_/de la khre ni rtas byed lci/_/lus kyi chag grugs 'byor bar byed/_/khre rgod mchog tu 'khru gcod cing /_/reg na bsil la dug sel yin/_/nas
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]ni rtsub bsil lci la mngar/_/cung zad khong 'khru bshang rlung 'phel/_/ro tsa brtan byed gcin dang ni/_/tshil dang mkhris pa bad kan sel/_/cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/da rgan lkog nad pags nad sel/_/nas rgod cung zad dman pa yin/_/smyig
[\[55b.2\]]skyes 'bras nas rtsub cing tsha/_/gro ni ro tsa snum bsil lci/_/'tsho byed rlung dang mkhris pa sel/_/chag grugs 'byor byed mngar ba dang /_/sha mkhregs byed cing cung zad 'khru/_/nan+ti mu ka ro bska zhing /_/bsil zhing mngar yang phan pa yin/_/gra ma can gyi 'bru sna
[\[55b.3\]]tshogs kyi sde tshan no//_//mon sran sde'u dkar sran chung stsogs/_/gang bu can 'bru rtsa sgo bkag_/ro bska mngar zhing 'khru ba gcod/_/zhu rjes tsha la bsil zhing yang /_/tshil dang khrag dang mkhris pa la/_/bskus shing blugs na phan pa yin/_/'di las mung+ga mchog
[\[55b.4\]]rlung chung /_/sran ma shin tu rlung skyed yin/_/mon sran dkar po rlung skyed cing /_/rtsub cing lci la bshang ba 'phel/_/rgya sran nag tsha zhu rjes skyur/_/khu chu'i rde'u cham lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde rlung bad gzhang 'brum/_/'joms shing khrag mkhris mchog tu skyed/_/
[\[55b.5\]]nis pa ba ni rlung khrag mkhris/_/nu zho gcin 'phel lci zhing 'khru/_/tsha byed mig gnod khu ba 'bri/_/bad kan 'or nang dug rnams sel/_/ma sha snum stobs bad kan skyed/_/bshang gci mkhris pa 'phel byed 'khru/_/lci zhing tsha la rlung 'joms dang /_/khu ba 'phel zhing
[\[55b.6\]]'byin par byed/_/ka kan du la kha sral phre'u/_/yon tan mon sran gre'u dang 'dra/_/til 'bru dro zhing pags pa 'jam/_/bsil zhing skra dang stobs skyed pa/_/lci zhing gcin nyung zhu rjes tsha/_/yid gzhungs drod skyed bad mkhris skyed/_/zar ma snun mngar kha zhing dro/_/
[\[55b.7\]]lci zhing bad kan mkhris pa skyed/_/mig gnod khu skems zhu rjes tsha/_/le brgan rtsi 'bras de dang 'dra/_/gra ma can las nas rgod dang /_/ma sha gang bu can tha chad/_/'bru yi gsar thog bad kan skyed/_/lor lon 'bru ni yang ba yin/_/myur skye de bzhin sran ma ni/_
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]spun med legs brngos tshod ma yang /_/gang bu chags pa'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi sde tshan no//_//'bras thug sla ska gar ba dang /_/'bras chan rnams ni snga ma bzhin/_/yang ngo de las sla ba ni/_/dge 'o rlung ni lugs mthun byed/_/skom rmya nyes pa
[\[56a.2\]]lhag ma 'joms/_/'ju zhing lus zungs mnyam par byed/_/rtsa sbubs mnyen byed rngul ba dang /_/me yi drod ni skyed par byed/_/thug ska bkres skom nyam chung rmya/_/lto nad rims nad sel ba yin/_/dri ma 'gags la phan pa dang /_/drod skyed nad ni 'ju bar byed/_/
[\[56a.3\]]thug gar 'khru gcod yi gar 'ong /_/skom sel drod skyed rma dang mig_/bkru sman rjes dang nyam chung dang /_/snum 'thungs rjes la phan pa yin/_/'bras chan legs bkrus khu btsags tshos/_/rlangs pa dang ni bral ba dang /_/gang yang tsha ba'i sman rnams kyis/_/bskol
[\[56a.4\]]ba'i 'bras tshos yang ba yin/_/de las bzlog pa gang zhig ni/_/sha khu 'o ma bskol stsogs lci/_/de ltar rdzas dang bya sbyor dang /_/tshad la sogs pas kun shes bya/_/khu ba nyams rtas tshim byed cing /_/ro tsa mig phan rma la gnod/_/mon san sde'u sbyong dang rma/_/lkog
[\[56a.5\]]ma mig nad dag la phan/_/ku lang+ga tha khu rlung dang skran/_/ro smad slar gzer gnod pa sel/_/til tshigs g.yos su sbyar byas nas/_/tshod ma skam dang myu gu dang /_/skyur por chang bu bcug pa ni/_/mig gnod nyes skyed rmya byed lci/_/dri 'dzin lus brta ro tsa zhing /_/snum
[\[56a.6\]]zhing stobs skyed yi ga 'bye/_/rgun chu'i btung ba ngal dub dang /_/bkres sel tshim par byed cing lci/_/rtug skam gcin mang yi gar 'ong /_/de yi yon tan sman bzhin blta/_/'bras yos skom dang skyug tshad 'khru/_/gcin mang tshil dang bad kan sel/_/lud pa
[\[56a.7\]]mkhris pa nyer zhi byed/_/drod skyed yang zhing bsil ba yin/_/srus leb lci zhing stobs skyed la/_/bad kan bshang ba sra byed cing /_/nas yos rtug mkhregs rtsub pa dang /_/skom zhing khong 'khrugs lci ba yin/_/nas phye khong yang bkres skom dang /_/ngal dub mig
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]nad rma la phan/_/skyo mar byas pa 'thungs pa yis/_/'phral du stobs ni skyed byed yin/_/chu dang phye spel mi bza' zhing /_/dus gnyis mtshan mo 'phrad med min/_/'grangs rjes mi bza' sos bcad min/_/ha cang 'grangs ches bza' mi bya/_/'ba' cha nyam
[\[56b.2\]]'bri rtsub pa dang /_/bshang mkhregs mig la gnod pa yin/_/sha g.yos spod sbyar snum zhing lci/_/stobs skyed sha 'phel rtas byed yin/_/mung+ga g.yos sbyar lci ba dang /_/sman gyi cha dang yon tan 'dra/_/khur ba mdag btsos dog le dang /_/sa slang da nur rgya sol
[\[56b.3\]]bsregs/_/khur ba 'di rnams rigs gcig kyang /_/phyi ma phyi ma yang ba yin/_/g.yos su byas pa'i zas kyi sde tshan no//_//sha ba dgo ba ku rang ga_/rkyang dang ri sha ri dwags ma/_/ri bong dang sgo tsa ru ka/_/ldang sgo la sogs ri dwags yin/_/la ba bar ti bar
[\[56b.4\]]ti ka/_/go tsa dmar dang gong mo dang /_/sreg pa u pa tsakra dang /_/ka pin tsa ra ku ru ba/_/bar da ka dang bar ti ka/_/gong ma sreg dang rma bya dang /_/khyim bya dang ni tsa kor/_/gon nad dang ri la gnas/_/sha ra ba dang in+d+ra ba/_/ri bya 'di dag zas khron rko/_/shang shang
[\[56b.5\]]te'u da du ha/_/bung 'dra ne+e tso sha ri ka_/ta la khu byug ha ri ta/_/bye'u la sogs mchus rko yin/_/sbal pa sbrul dang skyin gor dang /_/bi dur la sogs khung na gnas/_/ba lang rta bong dre'u dang /_/stag gzig seng ge dom spre'u/_/byi la byi ba spyang ki dang /_/sre
[\[56b.6\]]mo dang ni dred dag dang /_/wa dang 'phar ba khra dang ni/_/chun lag khra spyang bya rog gi/_/bya rigs khra sngon bya ku ru/_/bya rgod 'ug pa ka ling ka/_/dung can ma du ha la sogs/_/bya dang gcan gzan rtsal mthus za/_/phag rgod ru ru ma he skyin/_/ro hi ta dang glang po
[\[56b.7\]]che/_/mdzo rgod g.yag rgod bse dang ni/_/smyig glang zhes grags ri dwags che/_/chur gnas ngang pa sa ra sa/_/chu skyar ka ran da bya bla/_/rgya dang khrung khrung ngur pa dang /_/so bya ka tam+ba sogs yin/_/nya ro ha ti ba ti na/_/nya phyis rus sbal kum bir/_/kar ta
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]dung sram sham+bu ka/_/nye ldang bar mi tsan ti ka_/bu lu chu srin nag khra dang /_/nya bo che ni byis pa gsod/_/ja ri ci li tsi ma stsogs/_/de ltar sha ni brgyad du bshad/_/ra lug gzas kyi spyod yul ni/_/'dres pas rigs gcig nges ma yin/_/thog ma
[\[57a.2\]]tha ma skam gsher gnas/_/bar ma gnyis po thun mong bshad/_/de las skam sa'i sha rtug 'gags/_/bsil ba dang ni yang pa yin/_/'dus pa mkhris pa shas che zhing /_/rlung 'bring bad kan chung la phan/_/ri bong sha ni drod skyed rtsub/_/zhu rjes tsha zhing 'khru gcod
[\[57a.3\]]bsil/_/bar ta ki la sogs pa'i sha/_/cung zad snum dro lci rtas byed/_/de rnams las kyang rgya bya'i sha//_/yid gzhungs drod stobs khu ba 'phel/_/bshang skems mdog bzang rlung shas che/_/'dus pa sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/rma bya'i sha ni bzang min yang /_/rna mig
[\[57a.4\]]skad 'gags rgas srar phan/_/khyim byed 'dra'i ro tsa la/_/grang gnas lci zhing bad kan skyed/_/gong mo u pa tsa krar bcas/_/yid gzhungs drod skyed yi gar 'ong /_/thi ba zhar ba'i sha lci zhing /_/tsha bro nyes pa thams cad skyed/_/bye'u sha bad kan skyed cing snum/_/rlung 'joms
[\[57a.5\]]khu ba rab tu 'phel/_/sde tshan de las phyi ma rnams/_/rim bzhin lci dro snum zhing mngar/_/gcin mang ro tsa stobs skyed cing /_/rlung 'joms bad kan mkhris pa skyed/_/de las ri dwags chen po bsil/_/rtsal mthus sha rlon za ba'i yang /_/ro rjes lan tshwa bro zhu rjes/_/
[\[57a.6\]]tsha zhing sha ni 'phel bar byed/_/gzhang 'brum rnying pa pho ba grang /_/skem nad nyen la mchog tu phan/_/ra sha shin tu bsil min zhing /_/lci snum ma yin nyes med yin/_/lus dang khams ni mnyam pas na/_/bad kan mi skyed lus rtas byed/_/lug sha de las bzlog
[\[57a.7\]]pa ste/_/lus rtas yin par shes par bya/_/ba lang sha ni lud skam dang /_/ngal dang tsho ches ma snyoms rims/_/cham pa dang ni skem pa dang /_/rlung nad gcig pu na ba sel/_/ma he'i sha ni lci zhing tsha/_/gnyid che brtan byed shas cher skyed/_/phag rgod sha ni de 'dra zhing /_/
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]ngal sel zas len khu stobs skyed/_/nya ni mchog tu bad kan skyed/_/tsi li tsi ma nyes gsum skyed/_/la ba ro ha ti skyin gor/_/sha ba rang rang sde tshan mchog_/sha ni 'phral bsad pa dag dang /_/dar la bab pa bsten par bya/_/rang shi rid dang shin tu tsho/_/nad chu dug
[\[57b.2\]]gis shi ba spang /_/pho dang mo yi stod smad phyed/_/lci ste sbrum ma thams cad lci/_/rkang bzhi mo yi yang ba yin/_/bya rnams kyi ni pho yi yang /_/mgo bo ro stod brang dang rgyab/_/rked pa dpyi yi lci ba yin/_/de bzhin pho ba rgyu ma sogs/_/go rims bzhin du
[\[57b.3\]]lci ba yin/_/khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams/_/phyi ma phyi ma lci ba yin/_/sha las rlig pa pho mtshan dang /_/mkhal ma mcher pa gzhang dag lci/_/sha'i sde tshan no//_//tshod ma pa tha sha ti dang /_/su sha su ni sha na dang /_/sa tin dza rgya sne'u stsogs/_/
[\[57b.4\]]nyes pa gsum 'joms rtug sri yang /_/de las su ni shan dro/_/ro tsa ra dzak+Sha pa ti/_/pho ba gzhang 'brum nad sel mchog_/rgya sne'u rtug skam 'joms pa yin/_/mon sne'u dme ru nyes gsum 'joms/_/mdze sel ro tsa bcud len dro/_/'khru zhing mgul pa snyan
[\[57b.5\]]par byed/_/tsang gi ri skyur me drod skyed/_/pho ba gzhang 'brum bad kan rlung /_/drod che 'khru gcod yang ba yin/_/pa to la dang sab ta la/_/nim pa shang gas+tha sle tres/_/a pal gu za rtsa'i myu gu/_/bri ha ti dang bA sha dang /_/ti la par Ni ku ta la/_/
[\[57b.6\]]man du ka 'dab kar ko ta/_/ka ra be la par ba ta/_/Na ti dang ni ka ta ya/_/go dzi ha dang bar da ka_/ba na tig ta ka ri ram/_/ku li ka dang nan ti dang /_/ku tsel shag kun da ni/_/ka til dang ke'u kam/_/sho tam ko sha ta ka dang /_/kar sha 'jam bsil kha
[\[57b.7\]]zhing tsha/_/bshang sri rlung skyed bad mkhris sel/_/pa to la zhim srin nad sel/_/zhu rjes mngar zhing yi ga 'byed/_/bri ha ti gnyis mkhris skyed 'khru/_/drod skyed rlung ni 'joms pa yin/_/bri shan rlung dang lud pa 'joms/_/khrag mkhris sel ba'i dam pa
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]yin/_/kar bel la kha ba dang /_/drod skyed bad kan sel mchog yin/_/bar ta ka ro kha zhing tsha/_/mngar dro bad kan rlung dag sel/_/lan tshwar bcas pa me drod skyed/_/yid 'ong zas len mkhris mi skyed/_/ka ri ra ni sbos byed cing /_
[\[58a.2\]]ro bska mngar zhing kha ba yin/_/ko sha ta ka bal gu za/_/'khru zhing drod ni skyed byed yin/_/tan du li bsil rtsub pa dang /_/ro mngar zhu rjes mngar zhing yang /_/chang nad mkhris nad dug khrag sal/_/mun dza las byung rlung mkhris sel/_/snum bsil lci zhing mngar ba dang /_/
[\[58a.3\]]lus rtas khu ba 'phel ba'i mchog_/pa lag kya lci 'khru bar byed/_/u po da ka chang nad 'joms/_/tsu tsu pa lag kya 'dra las/_/de ni 'khru gcod bdag nyid can/_/bi da ri ni rlung mkhris sel/_/gcin mang mngar zhing bsil ba yin/_/'tsho bar byed cing
[\[58a.4\]]lkog nad sel/_/lus brta ro tsa lci bcud len/_/dzi ban ti mngar bsil ba dang /_/mig la phan zhing nyes gsum sel/_/ku sman da bum sha ka ling /_/kar ka dang ni er ba ru/_/da na dis zhes bya ba dang /_/da na dis dang ga gon dang /_/tsin ta ka dang tsir bi ta/_/
[\[58a.5\]]bad rlung skyed cing 'khrug cin mang /_/bshang sri lci zhing zhu rjes mngar/_/'khri shing 'bras bu'i nang na mchog_/ku sman da ste rlung mkhris sel/_/gcin nad sel zhing ro tsar byed/_/ga gon shin tu gcin mang zhing /_/ku ba shin tu rtsub pa yin/_/ka ling ka dang er
[\[58a.6\]]ba ru/_/tsir bi mkhregs gzhon mkhris sel bsil/_/smin pa de las gzhan du byed/_/'bras bu rnying lung lan tshwar bcas/_/mkhris skyed bad kan rlung nad sel/_/yi ga 'bye zhing dro yid 'ong /_/hen langs lto lbos sel zhing yang /_/pad rtsa rtsa ba ut+pal rtsa/_/
[\[58a.7\]]ku mu ut+pal chu ba dang /_/chus pa sha lu ka ta dang /_/sring gdang ga sha ru ka/_/kron dza da na ka lod/_/rtsub cing bshang sri bsil zhing lci/_/ka lam pa dang na li ka/_/mar she zhes ni bya ba dang /_/ku ti na dza ra ku kha/_/seng phrom yungs ma lo ni ka_/ka ru da ka ga pe du/_/
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]'tsho byed dang ni dzun dzu dang /_/e dag dza dag dang ni/_/ya ba sha ka lcam pa dang /_/a lu ka stsogs thams cad dang /_/sran lo shing mngar lo ma dang /_/mngar zhing rtsub la lan tshwa bro/_/bad kan rlung skyed lci ba dang /_/bsil zhing bshang lci 'byung sla byed/_/phal
[\[58b.2\]]cher zhu nas bshang gci mkhregs/_/tshos shing khu ba legs btsir la/_/mar cher btab pa nyes mi skyed/_/seng phrom 'dab ma zhes bya gang /_/de ni rgya sne'u dang 'drar 'dod/_/tar ka ri bar na mngar/_/kha bcas rlung dang bad kan sel/_/pur+Na rnam gnyis ka la
[\[58b.3\]]sha/_/cung zad tsha bro kha zhing tsha/_/drod skyed khong 'khru sbyar dug dang /_/'or nad bad kan rlung nad 'joms/_/tsi bi ra yi myu gu ni/_/drod skyed rlung dang bad sel 'khru/_/nye'u shing myu gu kha ba ste/_/ro tsa nyes gsum sel ba yin/_/smyig ma'i myu gu rtsub pa dang /_/
[\[58b.4\]]khong tsha rlung dang mkhris pa skyed/_/ba ru ra ni drod skyed kha/_/mcher pa gzhang 'brum bad rlung sel/_/ka sa mar da srin lung pa/_/bad kan sel zhing zhu byed 'khru/_/le brgan rtsi tshod rtsub skyur tsha/_/lci zhing mkhris pa skyed la 'khru/_/yungs kar tshod ma lci zhing tsha/_
[\[58b.5\]]bshang dang lci 'gags nyes kun skyed/_/la phug gzhon nu ro mi gsal/_/cung zad tsha bro kha dang bcas/_/gang yin de ni nyes kun sel/_/yang zhing cung zad tsha ba dang /_/skran dang lud gcong dbugs mi bde/_/rma dang mig nad lkog nad sel/_/skad 'gags
[\[58b.6\]]drod chung rtug skam dang /_/cham pa'i nad ni 'joms pa yin/_/nar son ro dang zhu rjes tsha/_/drod skyed byed cing nyes gsum skyed/_/bad kan skyed lci btsos pa ni/_/snum zhing de yang rlung sel yin/_/skam po rlung dang bad kan sel/_/rjen pa thams cad nyes skyed
[\[58b.7\]]yin/_/yungs ma tsha zhing dro ba dang /_/bad kan rlung sel mkhris pa skyed/_/shan ta mU la mkhris sel zhing /_/bsil zhing zhu rjes mngar ba dang /_/ro mngar kha zhing bska ba ste/_/bad kan dug kyang sel bar bshad/_/ku ther bye'u rug shi kru/_/su mu kha dang ske
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]tshe dang /_/bu srin dang pha ni dza/_/zin thig le dang dzam bi ra/_/de la stsogs pa'i ldum rnams ni/_/bshang gci sra zhing me drod skyed/_/khong pa tsha byed kha rtsub tsha/_/yid 'ong lus dro yi ga 'bye/_/mig gnod khu ba srin 'joms rno/_/
[\[59a.2\]]skrang par byed dang yang ba yin/_/bye rug skyigs lud dbugs mi bde/_/rtsib logs zug dug kha mnam sel/_/su mu kha ni rab tsha min/_/sbyar dug 'or nad sel ba yin/_/'u su'i lo ma kha zhing mngar/_/gcin mang mkhris pa skyed ma yin/_/sgog skya rab tu
[\[59a.3\]]tsha zhing rno/_/zhu rjes tsha zhing 'khru ba dang /_/zhim zhing skra skyed lci ro tsha/_/snam zhing drod skyed yi ga 'bye/_/sha bkra mdze skran gzhang 'brum dang /_/gcin nad srin dang bad kan rlung /_/skyigs bu cham pa dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa sel te khrag mkhris skyed/_/kun dong de las
[\[59a.4\]]yon tan dman/_/bad kan skyed mkhris rab mi skyed/_/ke'u btsos dug sbyar zos pa yis/_/bad kan rlung dang gzhang 'brum sel/_/rno zhing rtug pa sri ba dang /_/de ni mkhris can la phan min/_/su ra drod skyed kha zas len/_/bad sel dri ma sbyong zhing yang /_/mchog tu
[\[59a.5\]]gzhang 'brum dag la phan/_/sbang phrum shin tu nyes skyed yin/_/me tog 'dab ma 'bras yal ga_/sdong bu rim bzhin lci ba yin/_/tshod ma'i rab mchog 'tsho byed yin/_/yungs kar tshod ma tha chad yin/_/tshod rngad rnams kyi sde tshan no//_//rgun 'brum
[\[59a.6\]]'bras bu'i mchog yin te/_/ro tsa mig sman bshang gci sla/_/mngar zhing zhu rjes snum pa dang /_/cung zad bska zhing bsil la lci/_/rlung dang khrag mkhris sel byed cing /_/kha nang kha bro chang nad dang /_/skom lud tshad rims dbugs mi bde/_/skad 'dzer glo rdol glo
[\[59a.7\]]gcong sel/_/bal po se'u mngar mkhris rgyas dang /_/nyes pa gsum po sel ba yin/_/skyur ba mkhris skyed min cung dro/_/rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/_/se'u kun kyang yid 'ong snum/_/yang zhing bshang sra drod zas len/_/mo tsha 'bra go pa nas/_/rgya
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]star pa ru sha ka dang /_/a mra ta la kasma 'bras/_/ra ja da na ma du'i 'bras/_/rgya shug so bi ra ang kol/_/phal ku sles ma ta'i 'bras bu/_/ta mal bi shu star ga'i 'bras/_/myu gu la dang rgya kham dang /_/a ru ma na pi yal 'bras/_/rtas byed lci zhing bsil
[\[59b.2\]]ba yin/_/lus tsha glo rdol glo gcong sel/_/khrag dang mkhris pa snyoms par byed/_/zhu rjes mngar zhing snum pa dang /_/bshang lci bad kan khu ba 'phel/_/ta la'i 'bras bu mkhris skyed 'khru/_/kasma rgya 'bras bsil ba dang /_/bshang lci 'gags pa sel byed
[\[59b.3\]]cing /_/skra byed yid gzhungs bcud len 'gyur/_/pa ta ma stsogs dro ba dang /_/bad kan mkhris pa skyed byed 'khru/_/snum zhing mchog tu rlung skyed byed/_/pi la ya'i 'bras tshab min/_/pi la ya yi tshi gu mngar/_/ro tsa mkhris pa rlung nad sel/_/rgya shug tshi gu'i yon tan ni/_/de 'dra
[\[59b.4\]]skam slon lud pa sel/_/bil 'bras smin pa 'ju dka' zhing /_/nyes skyed 'phyen ni dri ba byed/_/ma smin drod skyed bad rlung sel/_/de dag gnyis ka 'khru ba gcod/_/ma smin ka pid mgul nad dab/_/nyes pa kun skyed smin pa ni/_/nyes 'joms skyigs bu slon bro sel/_/
[\[59b.5\]]kun kyang 'khru gcod dug 'joms yin/_/'dzam bu'i shang tog bshang gci sri/_/bsil zhing shin tu rlung skyed yin/_/bshang dang lci ba gcod byed cing /_/lkog ma la gnod bad mkhris sel/_/a mra'i 'bras bu ma smin rlung /_/khrag mkhris skyed byed rus chags pa/_/
[\[59b.6\]]bad kan mkhris skyed min rlung skyed/_/lci mngar bad kan khu ba 'phel/_/br-ik+Sha am+la rtsub bshang sri/_/lci tsha bad kan rlung dag 'joms/_/sha mya tsha lci skra gnod rtsub/_/pi lu'i 'bras bu mkhris pa skyed/_/bad kan rlung nad sel zhing 'khru/_/mcher pa
[\[59b.7\]]gzhang 'brum skran srin sel/_/pi lu mngar zhing kha ba gang /_/shin tu tsha min nyes gsum 'joms/_/ba lu shun kha tsha zhing snum/_/rlung nad sel bar byed pa yin/_/ba lung 'bras shas rtas byed mngar/_/rlung dang mkhris pa sel zhing lci/_/de yis rkang yang
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]skyigs lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde dang chang nad sel/_/kha skam rlung dang bad kan dang /_/rtug sra skyugs bro yi ga 'chus/_/skran dang gzhang 'brum gzer nad dang /_/me drod chung ba nyid sel to/_/na rang ga 'bras mngar cung skyur/_/
[\[60a.2\]]yi gar 'ong zhing kha zas len/_/lci zhing rlung ni rab skyed pa'i/_/yon tan ldan par shes par bya/_/bse shing 'bras bu'i shun pa sha/_/khong rtas byed cing mngar la bsil/_/de'i rus me mnyam yid gzhungs byed/_/bad kan rlung ni sel ba'i mchog_/ku shu rnam
[\[60a.3\]]gnyis lci ba ste/_/mngar skyur bsil dang tsha ba yin/_/yi ga 'bye zhing me rab 'bri/_/kham sha yi ga 'byed cing mngar/_/smin pa myur du 'ju bar 'gyur/_/shin tu tsha min lci nyes skyed/_/rgun 'brum pa ru sha ka dang /_/ka ra mar dang btsos rlon skyur/_/mkhris pa
[\[60a.4\]]bad kan skyed cing 'khru/_/lci zhing nus tsha rlung 'joms so/_/rgya shug skyur thung li gu tshe/_/a mra ka ta de bzhin no/_/e ra ba ti tu da dang /_/mri ka lin da dzam bir bcas/_/smin dang ka ra yar ta skam/_/mkhris pa shin tu skyed byed min/_/am+li ka dang rgya
[\[60a.5\]]shug skyur/_/skam po drod skyed 'khru ba dang /_/skom dang ngal dang rmya ba sel/_/yang zhing rlung dang bad kan 'joms/_/de las 'bras bu kun tha chad/_/li gu tsi ste nad kun slong /_/kha ba me dang rlung gnod nyen/_/sbrul gyi kha chu stsogs pas phog_/srin
[\[60a.6\]]bus zos dang chu nang ltung /_/sa ngan dus min skyes pa dang /_/'bru gzhan 'dres zhing mthu nyams dang /_/shin tu rnying 'gyur 'bru spang bya/_/tshod ma'ang de bzhin rtsub par ni/_/g.yos pa dag dang mi snyi dang /_/ro ni smin par ma gyur dang /_/la phug ma gtogs
[\[60a.7\]]skam po dang /_/'bras bu'ang phal cher de bzhin te/_/bil ba ma gtogs rlon pa spang /_/'bras bu'i sde tshan no//_//lan tshwa kun kyang bad kan skyed/_/phra zhing bshang gci 'byin la 'jam/_/rlung 'joms 'ju byed tsha zhing rno/_/yi ga 'bye zhing bad mkhris skyed/_/
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]de la lce myang tsha mngar bcas/_/ro tsa yid 'ong nyes gsum sel/_/yang zhing tsha la mig la phan/_/tsha ba mi skyed me drod skyed/_/rtsal ru tsha yang yid 'ong zhing /_/sgregs pa sbyong zhing dri zhim la/_/zhu rjes tsha zhing bshang sri sel/_/drod skyed yi ga 'byed byed yin/_/
[\[60b.2\]]kha ru tsha ni stod bad kan/_/smad kyi rlung 'byin drod skyed la/_/bshang 'gags lto sbos rtug skam dang /_/gzer zug lus lci sel ba yin/_/rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa zhu rjes mngar/_/lci zhing bad kan rnam 'phel byed/_/bkod ma'i tsha ni cung zad kha/_/tsha dang ba tsha rno byed
[\[60b.3\]]gsher/_/kha ru tsha nag yon tan dri/_/ma gtogs yon tan bi dar mtshungs/_/mtsho tsha yang ste sa skam tsha/_/bad kan skyed cing 'ju dka' lci/_/lan tshwa rnams kyi sbyor ba la/_/rgya mtsho la sogs rab tu sbyar/_/nas tshig 'khus pa'i lan tshwa ni/_/skran dang
[\[60b.4\]]snying nad skya rbab dang /_/pho ba mcher pa lkog nad dang /_/lud pa gzhang 'brum dbugs mi bde/_/lto sbos bad kan sel ba yin/_/swa rdzi ka sogs thal tsha kun/_/rab rno tsha zhing srin sel yang /_/khrag mkhris skyed byed smin byed la/_/gcod cing mi zhim rnam
[\[60b.5\]]par 'byed/_/nas tshig 'khus tsha kha bas na/_/mdog mdangs khu ba skra mig gnod/_/shing kun rlung dang bad kan sel/_/gzer 'joms mkhris pa skyed byed de/_/zhu rjes ro tsha yi ga 'byed/_/drod skyed zas 'ju yang ba yin/_/a ru ra bska zhu rjes
[\[60b.6\]]mngar/_/rtsub cing lan tshwa'i ro med yang /_/drod che zas 'ju yid gzhungs byed/_/na tshod la 'jog dam pa yin/_/dro zhing 'khrul tshe la phan/_/blo dang dbang gsal stobs rab skyed/_/mdze dang bzhin lus mdog mi sdug_/skad 'gags rims rnying
[\[60b.7\]]mi bzad rims/_/glad pa mig nad skya rbab dang /_/mig ser pho ba'i nad rnams dang /_/skem bcas 'or dang gcin nad sel/_/tshad 'khru rmongs bag myos slon srin/_/mchil mang lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/gzhang 'brum mcher pa lto sbos dug/_/
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]gsum 'phel rgyun 'gags skran dang ni/_/da rgan na dang yi ga 'chus/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur nad/_/de dang de ni sel byed yin/_/skyu ru ra yang de 'dra bsil/_/ro skyur bad mkhris sel de las/_/yon tan cung dman ba ru ra/_/
[\[61a.2\]]zhu rjes tsha mngar skra mig phan/_/'bras bu gsum po 'di dag ni/_/bcud kyis len mchog mig nad sel/_/rma 'tsho pags nad rma red dang /_/tshil ches gcin snyi bad khrag sel/_/shing tsha sug smel b+ha dra gsum/_/ge sar bcas pa dri bzang bzhi/_/na
[\[61a.3\]]le sham ni mkhris skyed rno/_/rtsub cing drod skyed yi ga 'byed/_/ro dang zhu rjes dag kyang tsha/_bad kan 'joms shing yang ba yin/_/pi pi ling rlon bang skyed mngar/_/bsil zhing lci la snum pa yin/_/skam po de las bzlog pa yin/_/snum zhing ro tsa ro tsha la/_/zhu
[\[61a.4\]]rjes mngar zhing bad rlung dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde sel 'khru/_/de gnyis bcud len ma gtogs pa/_/gzhan las shas cher sbyar mi bya/_/dong gra drod skyed ro tsa dang /_/'khru gcod yid 'ong mkhregs pa sel/_/yi ga 'bye yang zhu rjes mngar/_/khong snum drod
[\[61a.5\]]che bad rlung sel/_/sge'u gsher de 'dra de dag ni/_/tsha ba gsum ste sha spom dang /_/me drod nyams dang dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa rkang bam cham pa 'joms/_/dbyi mo pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/nal sham yon tan cung zad chung /_/tsi tra ka stobs me dang mnyam/_/
[\[61a.6\]]'or nad gzhang 'brum srin mdze sel/_/'di rnams las ni na le sham/_/ma gtogs tsha ba lnga zhes bshad/_/skran chen dmu rdzing lto sbos dang /_/gzer 'joms drod ni skyed pa'i mchog_/bil ba kash+ma tar ka ri/_/ba ta la dang dun du ka_/rtsa chen lnga po
[\[61a.7\]]bska kha dro/_/rlung dang bad kan sel byed yin/_/ang shu ma ti pri ha ti/_/gnyis gnyis gze rtsa chung lngar bshad/_/zhu rjes ro mngar ha cang ni/_/bsil dang tsha min nyes kun sel/_/ba la pur+Na e raN+Da/_/su pya par+Ni rnam gnyis rtsa/_/'bring yin bad
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]kan rlung 'joms yin/_/shin tu mkhris pa mi skyed 'khru/_/nye'u shing ka ko la 'tsho byed/_/dzi ba ka dang ri shar bshad/_/'tsho byed ces bya mig la phan/_/ro tsa rlung dang mkhris pa sel/_/'jag ma ku sha 'bras bur shing /_/'dam rtsa rtsar bshad lnga
[\[61b.2\]]mkhris sel/_/gra ma gang bu g.yos sbyar zas/_/sha dang tshod ma shing tog sman/_/zas cha cung zad tshan gdus 'di/_/rtag tu dgos pa yod pa smra/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o//_//
[\[61b.3\]]de nas kha zas bsrung ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang nye 'khor du/_/srog 'tsho'i slob dpon gzhag par bya/_/de ltar byas pas thams cad du/_/thams cad las ni bsrung bar 'gyur/_/khyad par du ni sa bdag gi/_/zas skom dug las
[\[61b.4\]]bsrung bar bya/_/chos la stsogs dang gang 'brel pa'i/_/'byor ba de de la rag las so/_/'bras chan dug bcas gsher bag kyang /_/skam bag can ni 'dra bar 'gyur/_/yun ring tshos par gyur pa dang /_/tshos pa'ang zhag lon lta bur 'gyur/_/rlangs pa rma
[\[61b.5\]]bya'i mgrin 'dra zhing /_/khong myos brgyal dang lus rngul skyed/_/dri dang mdog stsogs nyams par 'gyur/_/rul zhing rma bya'i sgro ltar 'tsher/_/tshod ma myur du skams pa dang /_/bskol ba'i mdog ni gnag 'gyur zhing /_/der gzugs chung ba'am che ba'am/_/
[\[61b.6\]]mi sdug pa'am mi snang 'gyur/_/dbu ba steng 'byung ri mo mtshams/_/kha chu 'dra dang chu bur 'byung /_/btung ba mngar skyur tshod ma dang /_/sha dag mtshams bye ro dang bral/_/sha khu'i ri mo sngor snang zhing /_/'o ma zangs mdog zho dri ma/_/
[\[61b.7\]]dar ba la ni ser dang gnag_/mar khu chu dang 'dra bar snang /_/chang dang chu rnag sbrang rtsi la/_/ljang snang til mar dag la dmar/_/shing tog ma smin smin par snang /_/smin pa dag ni yongs su 'drul/_/kha zas rlon dang skam pa dag_/rnyings shing mdog
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ni nyams par 'gyur/_/snyi ba dang ni sra ba dag_/reg pa go ni bzlog par 'gyur/_/me tog phreng rtse lo ma gas/_/rnying cing dri ni mi zhim 'gyur/_/gos la nag po tal til dang /_/spu rnams 'thul zhing kha tshar 'chad/_/gser
[\[62a.2\]]dngul mu tig shing dang rdo/_/rin chen stsogs la dri ma chags/_/gzi mdangs reg pa 'od nyams 'gyur/_/sa yi snod ni mdog bcas byed/_/dug ster kha ni sngo bskams la/_/gnong bag gis ni phyogs su blta/_/rngul zhing 'dar la skrag pa dang /_/'jigs
[\[62a.3\]]shing 'gros 'khyor glal bar 'gyur/_/dug ldan zas ni mes bsregs na/_/me lce gcig 'khyil me stag rgal/_/du ba rma bya'i mgrin 'drar 'gyur/_/me lce mi 'bar 'bar yang mnan/_/sbrang mas zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/bya rog gis zos skad zhan 'gyur/_/
[\[62a.4\]]'di ni ne tso da ru ha/_/ri skegs kyis mthong ca co 'byin/_/ngang pas zos na rdeg 'chos la/_/shang shang te'u na bar 'gyur/_/sreg pa mig ni mi chags byed/_/khrung khrung dag ni 'dzur bar 'gyur/_/phug ron khu byug bya gag dang /_/ngur bas zos na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[62a.5\]]byi la skyo zhing 'dor bar 'gyur/_/spre'u mi gtsang 'dor bar byed/_/rma byas de mthong dga' bar byed/_/dug gi dbal ni nyams par 'gyur/_/de ltar zas ni dug ldan par/_/shes shing ci nas de yi ni/_/srog chags phra mo yan chad la/_/gnod par 'gyur bas
[\[62a.6\]]'bad de dor/_/reg na tsha zhing g.ya' lan/_/rims 'debs 'brum 'byung tshor ba chung /_/sen mo spu 'byung lus skrangs te/_/de la dug ni rnam 'jig pa'i/_/tsan+dan shug pa pu shel tsi/_/so ma'i shun bcas bal bu'i 'dab/_/ru rta sle tres a ka ru'i/_/
[\[62a.7\]]chus bkrus blugs shing bsku bar bya/_/khar chud na ni mchil snabs mang /_/lce mchu sbrid cing be+em por byed/_/lus tshan zhing so brtse la/_/ro mi tshor zhing 'gram so 'thams/_/de la dug kun 'joms sman dang /_/ur shi stsogs khus mkhur bkang
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dbo/_/ma zhu'i gnas 'bab rdul ba dang /_/brgyal zhing lto sbos myos mgo 'khor/_/ba spu ldang zhing skyug lus tsha/_/mig mi gsal zhing snying mi dran/_/yan lag thig les khyab par 'gyur/_/zhu ba'i gnas su phyin na yang /_/kha dog sna tshogs skyug pa
[\[62b.2\]]dang /_/gcin mngar rab tu 'khru bar 'gyur/_/rmya snyom skem zhing mdog skya la/_/gsus pa che zhing nyams stobs zad/_/de gnyis slon dang khrus byas nas/_/ser gnyis bu ram gir kar ni/_/san+du ba ri nis pa ba/_/ba shi ka dang tshigs brgya pa/_/tan du
[\[62b.3\]]li ya'i rtsa ba dang /_/bya gag sgo nga bal ku za/_/snar gtang mig sman blud bya ba/_/dug zhi'i phyir ni sbyar bar bya/_/dug 'thungs pa dag steng dang ni/_/de bzhin 'og ni sbyangs gyur nas/_/dus su zangs bzang bdar phye ma/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa snying sbyong sbyin/_/
[\[62b.4\]]snying nad sbyangs nas gser phye ni/_/zhib mo zho phyed sbyin byas na/_/pad+ma'i 'dab mar chu bzhin du/_/gser gyis yan lag la mi chags/_/tshe yang ring du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sbyar dug la yang cho ga 'di'o/_/kha zas dag kyang mi mthun zos/_/sbyar dug
[\[62b.5\]]'dra bar shes par bya/_/rlan can sha dang mon sran gre'u/_/sbrang rtsi 'o ma myu gu can/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba la phug gam/_/bu ram dang bcas mi 'phrod yin/_/khyad par du ni 'o ma nya/_/nya rnams las kyang tsi li tsim/_/'o ma lhan cig skyur kun ni/_/mi 'phrod
[\[62b.6\]]shing tog de bzhin no/_/de bzhin rgya sran khre dag dang /_/ba la ku mu ta mi 'phrod/_/la phug la stsogs sngo rngad ni/_/zos nas 'o ma spang bar bya/_/phag rgod byi dur sha mi bza'/_/khyim bya bri sha ta zhor min/_/sha rlon mkhris pa dag dang ni/_/la
[\[62b.7\]]phug ma sha'i tshod mar min/_/le brgan tsi tshod lug shar min/_/myu gu'i tshod ma pad rtsar min/_/ma sha'i sran tshod bu ram zho/_/mar 'o li gu rtse'i 'bras min/_/chu shing 'bras bu dar bar min/_/ta la'i 'bras bu zhor mi 'phrod/_/tshab gnyis
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]po bu ram dang /_/sbrang rtsi ka kam tsir min/_/de ni nya btsos pa'i snod dang /_/dong gra btsos bar g.yos pa min/_/ka ma ta ni snod gzhan du/_/btsos nas nyin mtshan lon mi bza'/_/nya brngos pa yi snum la ni/_/pi pi ling brngos
[\[63a.2\]]spang bar bya/_/mar sar khar snod zhag bcu lon/_/go bye'i 'bras bu dror mi bza'/_/ba sa bsregs shar mi 'phrod cing /_/dar bar kam pi la btsos min/_/'o thug dang ni kri sar/_/chang dang lhan cig mi 'phrod spang /_/sbrang rtsir mar sar zhag til mar/_/chu
[\[63a.3\]]rnams gnyis gnyis gsum gsum mam/_/cha mnyam lhan cig zos pa dag_/phan tshun dag ni mi mthun no/_/mar sbrang cha ni mi mnyam yang /_/char pa'i chu ni 'thungs na gnod/_/sbrang rtsi pad+ma'i sa bon dang /_/sbrang rtsi 'bru chang kha rar min/_/'o thug rjes la skyo mar min/_/
[\[63a.4\]]sha mo yungs mar brngos mi 'phrod/_/u po ta ka til tshigs la/_/btsos pa 'khru bar byed pa yin/_/bya gag sha ni chang dngas dang /_/kul ma sha yi thug mi 'phrod/_/de nyid phag rgod tshil la brngos/_/srog ni 'phral du 'joms par byed/_/de bzhin sreg pa rma bya
[\[63a.5\]]dang /_/la ba ka pin dza la sram/_/e raN+Da yi me la ni/_/e raN+Da mar brdos mi 'phrod/_/ha rid tra sha skyer pa yi/_/thur ma dag la bskyon nas ni/_/skyer pa'i me la bsregs gyur pa/_/'phral du srog ni 'joms par byed/_/de nyid thal brdul gyis gos/_/sbrang
[\[63a.6\]]rtsir bcas pa 'phrod ma yin/_/gang yang nyes pa ma sbyangs pa/_/mdor na de ni mi 'phrod yin/_/nyes 'di sbyang bar 'dod pa'am/_/yang na de dang mi mthun pa'i/_/rdzas de nyid kyis dang po ni/_/lus ni mngon par sbyang bar bya/_/rtsol can snum bsten drod che dang /_/dar
[\[63a.7\]]la bab cing nyams stobs ldan/_/goms par zos dang cung zad zos/_/mi 'phrod gyur kyang gnod mi 'gyur/_/mi 'phrod cha yis goms bya'am/_/cha yis cha yis yongs su spang /_/phan pa'ang de bzhin bsten bya ste/_/'di dag gnyis gsum gyis
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]chod bya/_/skyon ni rim gyis 'grib pa dang /_/yon tan rim gyis 'phel 'gyur na/_/slar skye bar ni mi 'gyur zhing /_/g.yo ba med pa dag tu 'gyur/_/mi 'phrod pa yang spangs gyur zhing /_/'phrod pa goms par gyur pa nyid/_/'phral du spangs dang ma bsten las/_/
[\[63b.2\]]nyes pa rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnod pa gnod bya'i bdag nyid can/_/shin tu nyes par gyur pa la/_/phan med gnod par byed pa ni/_/mkhas pas phyir zhing bya mi rigs/_/zas dang mal stan 'dod la spyod/_/ran zhing rigs par sbyar ba yis/_/khang khyim
[\[63b.3\]]'chos pa lta bur ni/_/rtag tu lus ni gzung bar bya/_/de la zas ni bshad zin zhing /_/de dang der ni bshad par bya/_/bde sdug sbom skem stobs che chung /_/bud med la phod mi phod dang /_/shes dang mi shes 'tsho dang 'chi/_/gnyid la rag ni lus pa yin/_/
[\[63b.4\]]dus min ha cang thal ches dang /_/gnyid ni kun tu 'gegs pa dag_/bde dang tshe ni nyams byed de/_/dus mtshan gnyis pa lta bu yin/_/mtshan mo gnyid ni ma log rtsub/_/nyin mo gnyid log snum lcir 'gyur/_/tsog pur 'dug ste yur bdag_/mig
[\[63b.5\]]rtsub bad kan med par 'gyur/_/so ga rlung 'phel stobs 'phrog dus/_/rtsub cing mtshan mo thung bas na/_/nyin par gnyid phan gzhan dag tu/_/de ni bad kan mkhris pa skyed/_/smra mang bzhon dang lam gyis dub/_/ra ro bud med bsten khur las/_/
[\[63b.6\]]khros dang mya ngan 'jigs pas dub/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/_/rgan dang byis pa nyams stobs zad/_/glo rdol skem dang gzer gyis gnod/_/zas ma zhu dang bcom dang smyo/_/nyin par gnyid log rigs ma gtogs/_/'di dag de bzhin
[\[63b.7\]]lus zungs snyoms/_/bad kan skyes shing lus brtas gyur/_/tshil che bad kan mang dang snum/_/rtag za nyin par gnyid ma log_/dug gis phog dang lkog nad can/_/mtshan mo nam yang gnyid ma log_/dus min gnyid log rmongs bag dang /_/rims
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]skyed rmugs shing cham pas 'debs/_/mgo na skrang zhing slon sgyid skyur/_/rtsa yi rgyun 'gags me drod nyams/_/de la bsnyung dang slon sman dang /_/rngul 'byung sna sman btang ba dang /_/gnyid ches gyur la skyug sman rno/_/mig sman rno dang sna sman
[\[64a.2\]]dang /_/smyung ba sel las bud med bsten/_/mya ngan 'jigs dang khros ba sbyar/_/'di dag nyid kyis gnyid drags pa/_/'jig cing bad kan rab zad byed/_/gnyid yar ba yis yan lag snyoms/_/klad pa lci zhing glal 'ong la/_/mi gsal na zhing mgo 'khor
[\[64a.3\]]la/_/zas mi 'ju rmya rlung skyed nad/_/de bas mtshan mo dus bzhin du/_/ci bder gnyid ni log par bya/_/ma goms gnyid kyis ma log na/_/nang par ma zos phyed gnyid log_/gnyid yar gyur na 'o ma dang /_/chang dang sha khu zho rnams btung /_/lus bsku
[\[64a.4\]]dril dang khrus bya zhing /_/mgo bsku rna ba mig dag bya/_/na chung lag ngar gyis 'khyud dang /_/sems bde bya ba zin pa dang /_/yid dang rjes mthun yul ldan pa/_/ci 'dod gnyid 'ong bde bar skyed/_/nyal po'i bde la sems ma chags/_/tshangs par spyod pa la
[\[64a.5\]]dga' ba/_/chog shes pa yis mgu ba'i gnyid/_/rang gi dus las 'da' mi byed/_/nyal po'i chos ni spang bya ba/_/bkan min zla mtshan ldan pa dang /_/yid du mi 'ong mi sdug spyod/_/mngal ni skyon gyis khyab pa dang /_/rab sbom skem dang btsas pa dang /_
[\[64a.6\]]sbrum ma gzhan gyi bud med dang /_/rigs gzhan skye gnas mi mthun dang /_/bla ma lha dang rgyal po'i gnas/_/mchod rten dur khrod gsod gnas dang /_/bsti sa lam gyi bzhi mdo chu/_/dus tshigs nyin mo yan lag min/_/snying ga mgo bor brdeg spang bya/_/
[\[64a.7\]]'grangs ches ltogs dang stan bral dang /_/yan lag mi bder gnas dang skom/_/byis pa rgan dang shugs gzhan nyen/_/nad pa yis kyang 'khrig pa spang /_/dgun dus ro tsa byas drags tshe/_/'dod pas 'dod pa bsten bar bya/_/dpyid ston zhag ni gnyis
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]gnyis nas/_/so ga dbyar tshe zla phyed cing /_/gzhan du bud med la zhugs na/_/mgo 'khor ngal dang bla mthu nyams/_/stobs dang lus zungs dbang po nyams/_/dus min 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/bud med dag la legs gdams na/_/dran dang yid gzhungs nad
[\[64b.2\]]med tshe/_/dbang po rtas shing grags stobs rnams/_/lhag par 'phel zhing rgas srar 'gyur/_/khrus dang byug pa rlung bsil khar la sogs bza'/_/chu bsil 'o ma sha khu sran tshod chang dngas 'thungs/_/nyal po dga' byas 'od da dang bral gyur rjes la bsten/_/
[\[64b.3\]]de 'dras de yi lus mdangs stobs slar skye bar 'gyur/_/sman pa thos spyod phun tshogs ldan zhing las mkhas snying rje can/_/gags dang gnod med lus srung byed pa nye bar bzhag byas nas/_/rgyal po rang gi dge ba'i 'bras bu'i longs spyod bder spyod cing /_/nad med
[\[64b.4\]]mthu dang gzi brjid grags pa yun ring 'phel bar 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o//_//de nas kha zas kyi tshod ran par bza' ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/dus kun du ni tshod zin bza'/_/de ni
[\[64b.5\]]me drod skyed byed yin/_/rdzas ni lci ba'am yang ba'ang rung /_/chad la ltos par bya ba yin/_/lci ba las ni phyed 'grangs bya/_/yang ba las ni rab 'grangs min/_/bde blag 'ju ba de tsam la/_/tshod zin zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/zas tshod ma zin chung gyur
[\[64b.6\]]na/_/stobs dang gzi mdangs 'phel mi 'gyur/_/rlung gi nad ni thams cad kyi/_/rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin/_/tshad las shin tu ches ba yang /_/nyes pa thams cad myur du skyed/_/ma zhu'i zas ni mi bzad pa/_/de yis rlung stsogs gzir gyur pas/_/
[\[64b.7\]]cig car rnam par 'khrugs 'gyur zhing /_/de nyid du ni zhugs gyur nas/_/rtsa sgo 'gags shing be snabs skyed/_/steng dang 'og gi lam dag tu/_/bskyod pas gsud cing zug byed pa/_/brkam chags can la 'phral skyed byed/_/de las rlung las gzer mgo
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'khor/_/khong sbos 'dar zhing rengs stsogs 'gyur/_/mkhris pa las ni 'khru rims 'debs/_/khong tsha skom zhing kha stsogs 'gyur/_/bad kan slon zhing yan lag lci/_/tshigs thog mchil ma mang bar 'gyur/_/khyad par du ni
[\[65a.2\]]nyam chung zhing /_/me drod zhan dang shugs bkag pa'i/_/zas ni rlung gis bkag pa dang /_/bad kan gyis ni bar bkag pa'i/_/nyes pa be'u snabs dkrugs pas na/_/zug rngu zug pa lta bur gnas/_/'khru dang slon par mi byed par/_/gzer la sogs pa
[\[65a.3\]]mi bzad pa/_/be'u snabs de yin nyes rab gdug_/be snabs mi bzad kyis sbubs bkag_/rtsib logs kun tu drang por 'gro/_/shing bzhin rengs par 'gyur na ni/_/ma zhu shing 'dra zhes bya ste/_/myur du gsod byed de spang bya/_/mi 'phrod lhag za ma zhu bar/_/
[\[65a.4\]]zad byed ma zhu dug gi ni/_/mtshan nyid can de mi bzad pa/_/dug gi ming can gang yin te/_/dug gi tshul can myur gsod byed/_/gso dpyad bya bar dka' bas spang /_/de nas ma zhu'i be'u snabs 'gyur/_/gsor rung shu dag rgyam tsha dang /_/po son cha bcug chu
[\[65a.5\]]dron ni/_/'thung bas skyugs bcug de nas na/_/dug dang mas gtong ring bu dag_/dri ma rlung dag legs rgyu sbyar/_/yan lag 'khums par gyur pa la/_/shin tu dugs bya dkri bar bya/_/gsud nad shin tu 'phel ba dang /_/rting par me btsa' gdab pa
[\[65a.6\]]bsngags/_/de ni de'i nyin ni smyung par gzhag_/khrus btang lta bur nye bar spyad/_/ma zhu mi bzad nyen gyur kyang /_/gzer 'joms sman ni btung mi bya/_/be'u snabs ma zhu me drod nyams/_/nad kyi sman ni 'ju mi nus/_/de yis nad pa 'phral du ni/_/
[\[65a.7\]]thung zhing 'chi ba dag tu 'ang 'gyur/_/kha zas zhu nas lto ba ni/_/rtsub srar gyur la sman dag kyang /_/nyes pa'i lhag ma sbyang phyir dang /_/pho ba'i me ni bskyed phyir gtang /_/ma zhu'i 'gyur ba zhi ba dag_/nyams smad par ni byas las gyur/_/de gsum nyes pa
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]rnam gsum ni/_/brtags nas rab tu sbyar bar bya/_/de la chung la smyung ba phan/_/'bring la smyung dang bzhu bya ba/_/chen po la ni sbyang ba ste/_/de yis dri ma rtsa nas 'byin/_/de bzhin nad gzhan dag la yang /_/rang nad gzhi las go bzlog pas/_/gso ba
[\[65b.2\]]de las rjes 'brel yod/_/rgyu las go bzlog rnam spang ba/_/sman pas ji lta ji lta bar/_/nad las go bzlog sbyar ba'am/_/de'i don byed pa sbyor bar bya/_/nyes smin me drod skyed 'gyur nas/_/nyams rtas snum gyis byug pa dang /_/btung dang 'jam rtsi stsogs rigs
[\[65b.3\]]sbyar/_/bad kan ma zhu'i be snabs te/_/de ni mig dang mkhur ba skrang /_/sgregs pa zos ma thag 'dra 'byung /_/mchil ma mang zhing nyes g.yo lci/_/rlung las rengs bag gzer ba dang /_/bshang gci 'gags shing sbos drod nyams/_/mkhris las khong tsha skom mgo
[\[65b.4\]]'khor/_/rmongs bag sgregs pa skyur zhing tsha/_/ma zhu be+e snabs smyung bar bya/_/rengs bag las ni dugs rab bya/_/tsha ba'i ma zhu skyug sman dag_/btang ba'am gnas skabs gang phan bya/_/ma zhu'i be snabs lci ba na/_/rtsa sbubs thim las yun rings can/_/
[\[65b.5\]]bad kan rlung ni 'dres mtshan ma/_/de dang mnyam par bsgrub par bya/_/dngas ma lus las zas dad chung /_/snying na sgregs pa mnam par 'gyur/_/'di la cung zad gnyid log bya/_/ma zhu kun gyis nyin par ni/_/zas ma zos par gnyid log la/_/bkres
[\[65b.6\]]gyur yang las ran par bza'/_/ma zhu spyi yi mtshan ma ni/_/rnam par 'gags sam shas cher 'byung /_/na zhing rlung ni mi gsal rgyu/_/mkhregs shing lus lci mgo bo 'khor/_/zas tshod lhag par gyur pa nyid/_/gcig bu ma zhum zad kyi/_/mi 'dod
[\[65b.7\]]gags byed tshig ma tshos/_/lci dang rtsub dang mi gtsang drang /_/khong tsha skom dad chu mang dang /_/bsres pa'i zas ni 'ju mi 'gyur/_/mya ngan khro dang bkres pa yis/_/nye bar gdungs shing zas mi 'ju/_/phan dang mi phan bsres pa dag/_/zos pa mnyam za
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]yin par 'dod/_/'grangs rjes slar yang za gyur pa/_/lhag par za ba yin zhes bya/_/dus min che ba'am chung zos pa/_/mi mnyam par ni zab yin/_/gsum po 'dis kyang gsod pa'am/_/mi bzad nad kyis 'debs par byed/_/dus
[\[66a.2\]]su goms shing gtsang la phan/_/snum dro yang dang ma yengs dang /_/ro drug ldan zhing mngar bag che/_/shin tu myur min dal bar min/_/khrus byas bkres shing dben par gnas/_/kha gdong lag pa rkang pa bkrus/_/lha dang yi dgas rjed cing sbyin/_/
[\[66a.3\]]bla ma byis pa mgron mchod byas/_/dud 'gro rnams kyang rab brtags shing /_/bdag nyid legs par brtags nas ni/_/ma smad smra'am yid 'ong smra/_/skye bo gtsang zhing gus pas stobs/_/yid 'ong gnyen dang lhan cig bza'/_/zas ni rtswa dang skra sbu stsogs/_/
[\[66a.4\]]'dres shing khong du slar sros dang /_/tshod ma zas ngan mang ba dang /_/tsha ches lan tshwa mang ba spang /_/phrum dang zho dang phrum skam dang /_/ba tsha tsha dang la phug rjen/_/phag rgod lug dang ba glang nya/_/ma he'i sha dang rid dang skam/_/ma sha chu ldum nis sha ba/_/
[\[66a.5\]]pad rtsa 'bras 'khur myu gur gyur/_/tshod ma skam dang nas 'dra dang /_/bu ram phra mo bza' mi bya/_/sA lu'i 'bras dang gro dang nas/_/drug cu pa dang skam sa'i sha/_/a ru skyu ru rgun 'brum dang /_/mung+ga kha ra pa to la/_/zhun mar char chu 'o ma dang /_/sbrang rtsi se'u
[\[66a.6\]]'brum rgyam tsha bza'/_/mig dang stobs phyir mtshan mo ni/_/'bras gsum sbrang rtsi mar sar bza'/_/mi nar 'jog par byed gang dang /_/nad sel byed pa gang yin bsten/_/pad rtsa bur shing tso tsa dang /_/mo tsa a mra'i 'bras bu dang /_/la du 'khur
[\[66a.7\]]ba bu ram can/_/zas ni lci zhing snum pa dang /_/mngar zhing 'ju dka' bsten pa rnams/_/dang po nyid du bza' bar bya/_/de las bzlog pa tha mar bza'/_/bar du skyur tsha lan tshwa can/_/lto yi cha gnyis zas kyis te/_/cha gcig skom gyis dgang bar bya/_/
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rlung la sogs pa'i gnas su ni/_/cha bzhi pa ni lhag mar gzhag_/zos rjes skom ni bsil ba'i chu/_/nas dang bag phye'i g.yos byas zos/_/zho chang dug 'bags sbrang rtsi la/_/chu bsil rjes su 'thungs na phan/_/mi 'ju 'gags la chu dron gtang /_/
[\[66b.2\]]chad ma mung+ga'i gnod pa la/_/zhog chu dang dar ba dang /_/rang sgyur rtsab mo btung bar bya/_/skem po rgyas phyir chang btung ste/_/sbom pos sbrang rtsi'i chu btung ngo /_/gcong chen nad la sha khu btung /_/drod chung sha zos chang btung bya/_/nad dang sman stsogs sbrum
[\[66b.3\]]bud med/_/zan bcad dka' thub las rnams kyis/_/skem dang byis pa rgan po la/_/'o ma bdud rtsi lta bur phan/_/mdor na zos rjes btung ba ni/_/gang zhig zas dang yon tan gyis/_/mi mthun mi 'phrod med gyur pa/_/de ni rnam pa kun tu bsngags/_/zas
[\[66b.4\]]rjes skom 'thungs ngoms dang khyab/_/stobs 'phel lus ni brtan byed la/_/zas sdud snyi bar 'gyur ba dang /_/'drul zhing rnam par 'ju bar 'gyur/_/de ni nam tshang yan chad nad/_/dbugs lud glo rdol cham pa dang /_/glu len smra mang la chags dang /_/skad
[\[66b.5\]]'gags pa la gnod pa yin/_/lus las rnag 'dzag gcin nad mig_/lkog nad rma yi nad kyis nyen/_/skom spang kun gyis skom 'thungs nas/_/mang smra lam zhugs nyal ba spang /_/zas zos nas ni nyi tshan me/_/rta zhon rkyal dang 'degs pa spang /_/bshang
[\[66b.6\]]dang gci gsal snying la dri med nyes pa lam min par mi 'gro/_/sgregs pa dag cing bru ba tsha gyur thur gyi rlung ni tha mal rgyu/_/de bzhin me yi drod bdo dbang po gsal zhing lus kyang rab tu yang /_/zas kyi tshod ran cho gar sbyar bzhin za ba de ni dus su 'dod/_/
[\[66b.7\]]yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o//_//de nas sman la stsogs pa'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/sman rnams nyid kyi ro la stsogs/_/de ni de la bsten pas mchog_/de yang 'byung
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]lnga'i bdag nyid can/_/sa la brten te skye ba yin/_/chu ni skye gnas me dang rlung /_/nam mkha' rnams ni tshogs pa las/_/de skyes gyur dang khyad par phyung /_/ming ni shas che las gyur yin/_/de bas 'byung ba 'dus pa las/_/byung bas sman ni
[\[67a.2\]]ro gcig min/_/de phyir nad kyang nyes gcig min/_/de la gsal ba ro zhes bshad/_/mi gsal ro rjes mtha' mar ni/_/cung zad gsal bdag tu'ang 'dod/_/sman gyi yon tan lci sogs dang /_/ro ni sa la stsogs bsten pas/_/mtshungs par spyod pa nyer gdags
[\[67a.3\]]pas/_/ro las ming du btags pa yin/_/de la sa'i sman lci dang sbom/_/sra zhing dri yi shes rab che/_/lci zhing brtan dang 'dus pa dang /_/nye bar 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/chu yi gsher dang lci bsil snum/_/rtul zhing bskal ro shas che/_/'jam zhing bad kan 'dra
[\[67a.4\]]ba la/_/'drul zhing tshim byed sdud par byed/_/me yi rtsub rno tsha zhing skam/_/phra zhing gzugs kyi yon tan che/_/tsha zhing 'bar la mdog skyed cing /_/gsal zhing smin pa'i bdag nyid can/_/rlung gi rtsub cing khyab la yang /_/reg pa'i yon tan shas che yin/_/rtsub
[\[67a.5\]]cing yang la dri ma sel/_/rnam dpyod na bar byed pa yin/_/nam mkha'i phra zhing dngas la yang /_/sgra yi yon tan shas che ste/_/khong stong yang bar byed pa yin/_/de ltar 'gro na don dang ni/_/sbyor ba sna tshogs dbang gis ni/_/sman min ci yang yod ma yin/_/de la sman
[\[67a.6\]]ni gyen du 'gro/_/phal cher me dang rlung shas che/_/thur du 'gro ba phal cher ni/_/sa chu'i yon tan shas cher yin/_/de ltar sman no ro'i bye brag_/'di yi 'og nas ston pa yin/_/sman mthu la las bshad pa ni/_/lci snum bsil dang 'jam pa dang /_/yang rtsub tsha
[\[67a.7\]]dang rno ba ste/_/de ltar rnam pa brgyad du 'dod/_/sman mthu tsar kas bshad pa/_/gang gis bya ba gang byed pa/_/mthu min cir yang mi byed kyi/_/de dag thams cad mthu yis byed/_/des na lci la stsogs pa nyid/_/nus pa'i khyad par ldan pa dang /_/yon tan ma
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]lus snying por ni/_/gyur pas mthu zhes bshad pa dag_/don dang mthun par btags pa yin/_/gcis pa mang du yod na yang /_/tha snyad gtso bo nyid kyis yin/_/de bas go ni bzlog pa'i phyir/_/de ni ro la stsogs pa la/_/srid du zin kyang ma bshad de/_/de bas lci ba
[\[67b.2\]]la sogs yin/_/gzhan dag tsha dang bsil nyid gnyis/_/stobs yin zhes kyang ston par byed/_/sman ni sna tshogs bdag nyid can/_/nyi ma zla ba'i stobs can yin/_/'gro 'di gsal dang mi gsal las/_/nam yang 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la tsha ba mgo
[\[67b.3\]]'khor skom/_/rmya rdul tsha zhing myur 'ju byed/_/rlung dang bad kan zhi bar byed/_/bsil ba dag ni tshim byed cing /_/'tsho dang rengs par byed pa dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pa rab dang byed/_/pho ba'i me dang phrad pa las/_/gang zhig ro gzhan byung gyur pa'i/_/ro rnams
[\[67b.4\]]kyi ni mthar zhu ba/_/de ni zhu ba zhes bshad do/_/mngar dang lan tshwa zhu rjes mngar/_/skyur ba'i zhu rjes skyur ba yin/_/kha dang bska dang tshab rnams/_/zhu rjes phal cher kha ba yin/_/ro dang zhu rjes 'bras bu mnyam/_/de la sman ni bzang dang ngan/_/la la ro yis las byed
[\[67b.5\]]la/_/gzhan dag 'ju bar byed pa yin/_/yon tan gzhan dang nus pa dang /_/mthu yis la la byed pa yin/_/sman gyi ro stsogs gang dang gang /_/stobs ldan nyid kyis gnas byed de/_shin tu zil mnan de dang de/_/sgrub byed rgyu ni nyid du gnas/_/yon
[\[67b.6\]]tan mi 'phrod sbyar ba ni/_/mang pos nyung ngu zil gyis gnon/_/ro dang 'ju ba'i mthu dag ni/_/de yi stobs kyi zil gyis gnon/_/ro stsogs de ltar stobs ni mnyam/_/ma bcos pa yi stobs dang ldan/_/ro stsogs mnyam pa'i las gang ni/_/khyad 'phags
[\[67b.7\]]de ni mthu las skyes/_/dan ti dang ni tsi tra ka/_/ro stsogs mtshungs kyang dan ti 'khru/_/shing mngar rgun 'brum 'dra yang 'khru/_/'o ma mar 'dra mar drod skyed/_/de ltar sman la sogs pa yi/_/spyi yi las te de yang ni/_/sna tshogs rkyen gyi dbye ba yis/_/
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]sman dbye tha dad gyur pa yin/_/gro dang nas ni mngar ba dang /_/lci las rlung 'joms skyed pa yin/_/nya gro 'o ma bsil ba dang /_/seng ge kha yis phag ma yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o//_//
[\[68a.2\]]de nas ro tha dad pa shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mngar ba la sogs ro skye ba/_/sa chu me sa chu dang me/_/mkha' rlung me rlung sa dang rlung /_/gnyis gnyis shas che las rim 'byung /_/de las ro ni mngar ba dag_/gang zhig myangs pa'i tshe na ni/_/kha la chags shing
[\[68a.3\]]lus kyang ni/_/tshim byed dbang po rab dang byed/_/grog ma la sogs dga' ba yin/_/skyur ba kha nas chu 'dzag cing /_/so brtse sbu ni ldang ba dang /_/mig dang smin ma 'dzum par byed/_/lan tshwa khar ni mchil ma 'du/_/mkhur ba gre ba tsha bar byed/_/kha ba kha yi dri ma sbyang /_/
[\[68a.4\]]lce ni 'joms par byed pa yin/_/tsha ba lce rtse skyo byed cing /_/tsag tsag byed par 'gyur ba dang /_/kha mig sna las 'dzag byed cing /_/mkhur bsreg par byed pa yin/_/bska bas lce ni bem por byed/_/gre ba rtsa sbubs 'gags par byed/_/ro yi tshul ni de dag ste/_/las ni
[\[68a.5\]]ro mngar ba dag gis/_/skyes nas 'phrod par byed pa dang /_/lus zungs mthu stobs rab skyed cing /_/byis pa rgan po glo rdol skem/_/mdog mdangs skra dang dbang po bzang /_/lus rtas skad 'gags phan zhing lci/_/nu zho skyed cing rma 'byor byed/_/tshe ring 'tsho byed snum pa dang /_/
[\[68a.6\]]rlung dang mkhris pa dug rnams sel/_/ha cang drags na tshil bcas dang /_/bad kan las byung nad skyed cing /_/lus sbom drod bri chang nad dang /_/gcin nad lba ba rmen stsogs skyed/_/skyur ba me drod skyed byed snum/_/zhim zhing 'ju byed yi ga 'bye/_/dro ba'i nus skyed reg
[\[68a.7\]]pa bsil/_/tshim byed 'drul byed yang ba ste/_/bad kan khrag mkhris rgyas par byed/_/rlung 'gags rgyu bar byed pa yin/_/de ni shin tu bsten drags na/_/lus lhod rab rib mgo 'khor dang /_/g.yan pa skya rbab me dbal dang /_/'or nad thor bu skom rims skyed/_/
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]lan tshwa sra dang 'khyil pa dang /_/'gags pa 'byin zhing drod skyed byed/_/snum dang dugs kyis rdul zhing rno/_/yi ga 'byed cing gcod 'byed byed/_/de ni drags pas rlung khrag dang /_/skra 'byi skra dkar gnyer ma dang /_/skom mdze dug dang me dbal rnams/_/skyed cing
[\[68b.2\]]stobs ni bri bar byed/_/kha ba rang nyid zhim min zhing /_/yi ga 'chus dang srin skom dug_/mdze dang rgyal dang rims slon bro/_/tsha dang mkhris pa bad kan 'joms/_/'drul dang tshil dang zhag dang rkang /_/bshang dang gci ba skems pa dang /_/yang zhing yid gzhungs bsil
[\[68b.3\]]zhing rtsub/_/nu ma'i nad dang skad 'gags sel/_/de ni shin tu drags gyur na/_/lus zungs zad cing rlung nad skyed/_/tsha bas lkog nad 'gags pa dang /_/mdze dang ma zhu 'or nad sel/_/rma 'jig byed cing snum pa dang /_/tshil dang 'drul bag skems par byed/_/drod
[\[68b.4\]]skyed 'ju byed yi ga 'byed/_/sbyong zhing zas ni 'jig par byed/_/'ching ba gcod cing rtsa sbubs dag_/rnam par 'byed cing bad kan sel/_/de ni shin tu drag 'gyur bas/_/skom skyed khu ba stobs zad cing /_/brgyal zhing lus 'khums 'dar ba dang /_/rked pa rgyab
[\[68b.5\]]stsogs na bar byed/_/bska bas mkhris pa bad kan sel/_/lci zhing khrag nad rnam par sbyong /_/skem zhing rma 'tsho bsil ba dang /_/'drul dang tshil ni rnam par skems/_/be+e'u snabs 'khyil zhing sri bar byed/_/rtsub cing lpags mdog rab dang byed/_/de ni shin tu
[\[68b.6\]]bsten drags na/_/bshang 'gags lto sbo snying nad dang /_/skom dang skem zhing skyes mthu nyams/_/rtsa sgo 'gags shing dri ma sri/_/zhun mar bu ram star ga gser/_/mo tsa tso tsa pa ru sha/_/nye'u shing ram nye pa nas/_/ra dza dan pa la gsum/_/med gnyis dang
[\[68b.7\]]par+Ni bzhi/_/'tsho byed dzi ba ri sho ba/_/shing mngar ma du ka bim+bi/_/shra ba ni gnyis bi da ri/_/cu gang k+Shi ra shu ku la/_/sa ha'o can kash+ma ri/_/'o ma bu ram shing gze ma/_/rgun 'brum sbrang stsogs mngar ba'i sde/_/skyur ba skyu ru am+li ka/_/ba lung dang ni
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]star bu dang /_/se'u 'bru rdul dang dar ba dang /_/tshwa dang ku shu a mra dang /_/am+la ta ka b+ha bya dang /_/ka ram rda ka pid ta'o/_/tsha mchog rtsal ru kha ru tsha/_/bi da rgya mtsho bkod ma'i tsha/_/mtsho tsha skam tsha ro nye dang /_/k+Sha ra lan tshwa'i sde tshan yin/_/
[\[69a.2\]]kha ba kyi lce pa to la/_/tsan+dan ur shi ba le ka/_/ci skrigs nim pa pu tse shel/_/rgya spos a kar ba tsha ka_/nag ta ma la ser po gnyis/_/gla sgang mur ba ba sha ka_/a pa marga po son cha/_/'khar lcags sle tres byi tsher ba/_/rtsa ba che lnga bya gri gnyis/_/bong nga
[\[69a.3\]]shu dag bi sha la/_/tsha ba shing kun na le sham/_/byi dang ga dang tsha ba lnga/_/ku the ra stsogs ldum rngad sngo/_/mkhris pa gcin dang go bye yin/_/bska tshan a ru ba ru ra/_/sbrang rtsi seng ldeng shi ri sha/_/ka dam u dum+b+hAr dang /_/mu tig byu ru an tsan bcag_/ka pid tha
[\[69a.4\]]gzhon kha rdzur/_/pad rtsa pad+ma ut+pa la'o/_/'bras rnying nas rnying gro rnying dang /_/mung+ga sbrang rtsi sha ka ra/_/skam sa'i sha rnams ma gtogs pa'i/_/mngar ba phal cher bad kan skyed/_/skyu ru se 'bru ma gtogs pa'i/_/skyur ba phal cher mkhris pa skyed/_/rgyam tsha lce
[\[69a.5\]]myang tsha ma gtogs/_/lan tshwa phal cher mig la gnod/_/sle tres pa to la bca' sga/_/sgog skya pi pi ling ma gtogs/_/kha dang tsha ba phal cher ni/_/ro tsa 'bri zhing rlung skyed yin/_/bska las a ru ra ma gtogs/_/phal cher bsil zhing sri bar byed/_/ro tsha
[\[69a.6\]]skyur dang lan tshwa rnams/_/go rims bzhin du dro nus ldan/_/kha dang bska dang mngar ba rnams/_/de bzhin du ni bsil ba nyid/_/kha dang tsha dang bska ba rnams/_/de bzhin rtsub cing dri ma sri/_/lan tshwa skyur mngar snum pa dang /_/bshang gci thur gyi dbugs
[\[69a.7\]]'byin byed/_/lan tshwa las bska de bas kyang /_/mngar ba mchog tu lci ba yin/_/skyur las tsha dang de bas kyang /_/kha bdag ni yang ba yin/_/ro rnams kyis ni dbye ba las/_/sbyor ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang /_/brtags pa drug cu rtsa gsum du/_/rags rim
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]ji bzhin phye ba yin/_/de lnga re re phri ba las/_/lngar gyur pa ni ro gnyis pa/_/gsum pa mngar bcu skyur drug ste/_/lan tshwa gsum ste kha ba gcig_/bzhi pa la ni mngar po bcu/_/skyur ba bzhi po lan tshwa gcig/_/lnga pa la ni skyur gcig pu/_/mngar ba lnga la brten pa yin/_/
[\[69b.2\]]sman ni ro drug gcig pu yin/_/ma 'dres pa ni ro drug 'gyur/_/lnga pa drug dang ro ni tha dad drug_/bzhi pa gnyis pa rnam pa bcwa lnga yin/_/dbye ba gsum pa nyi shu gcig nyid de/_/sman ni ro drug de ltar drug cu gsum/_/de rnams ro dang rdo rjes ro'i dbye ba/_/rab dang rab
[\[69b.3\]]mchog dag tu brtags pa las/_/rtsis las 'das par byung bar gyur pa ni/_/nad dang sman gyi dbang las nye bar sbyar/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o//_//de nas nad la stsogs pa'i tshul shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad
[\[69b.4\]]par bya'o/_/nad dang lus zungs dri ma rnams/_/rtag tu lus kyi rtsa ba yin/_/de rlung dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub dang /_/bskyod dang las spyod shugs 'byin dang /_/lus zungs legs par rgyu ba dang /_/dbang po rnams ni gsal ba dag_/mi gnod pa ni rjes 'dzin yin/_/
[\[69b.5\]]mkhris pa 'ju drod mthong byed dang /_/bkres skom zas len mdangs yid gzhungs/_/blo ldan dpa' snying lus 'jam pas/_/bad kan brtan zhing snum nyid dang /_/tshigs 'brel bzod la stsogs pas so/_/lus zungs las gtso go rims bzhin/_/tshim byed 'tsho byed g.yogs
[\[69b.6\]]pa dang /_/snum dang brtan dang 'gengs pa dang /_/mngal ni skyed byed yin par bshad/_/brtan par byed pa bshang ba yin/_/'drul dang 'byin pa gcin gyi yin/_/ba spu brtan pa rdul gyi yin/_/rlung ni 'phel bar gyur pa yis/_/skem dang mdog gnag drod bag
[\[69b.7\]]dga'/_/'dar dang lto sbos bshang ba sre/_/stobs dang gnyid dang dbang po nyams/_/smra mang mgo 'khor zhum par byed/_/mkhris pa bshang gci pags mig ser/_/bkres skom lus tsha gnyid chung byed/_/bad kan drod nyams mchil ma mang /_/khong snyom lci
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]dang sha mdog dkar/_/lus grang yan lag lhod pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid che/_/dngas ma'ang bad kan dang 'dra la/_/khrag 'phel me dbal khong 'bras mcher/_/mdze dang rlung khrag mkhris pa khrag_/skran dang rnyil nad mig ser
[\[70a.2\]]dang /_/bskyod dka' drod nyams rmongs bag can/_/mig dang gcin pags dmar bar 'gyur/_/sha 'phel wa ba rmen bu mdud/_/mkhur tshos brang lto brla sbom zhing /_/mgul stsogs lhag par sha yang che/_/tshil 'phel de 'dra de bzhin ngal/_/cung zad bskyod
[\[70a.3\]]kyang dbugs rgod cing /_/rkub tshos nu ma gsus 'phyang 'gyur/_/rus 'phel rus lhag so lhag 'gyur/_/rkang 'phel lus lci mig rtsa g.yung /_/tshigs kyi mgo bo sbom pa dang /_/tshigs la thor bu gso dka' 'byung /_/khu 'phel bud med la rab gdung /_/
[\[70a.4\]]khu ba'i rde'u dag tu 'ang 'gyur/_/bshang 'phel lto sbos rgyu 'khrug cing /_/lus lci lto ba na bar byed/_/gcin 'phel chu sor zug cing na/_/gcis kyang ma gcis snyam sems 'gyur/_/rngul 'phel rdul che dri mi zhim/_/g.yan pa nyid kyang skyed ces bya/_/mig rdul la stsogs dri
[\[70a.5\]]ma rnams/_/mang bas lci la stsogs par byed/_/rlung zad mtshan ma lus mi bde/_/smra nyung rtsol ba chung bar 'gyur/_/dran pa mi gsal bad kan 'phel/_/sngar bshad pa yi nad rnams 'byung /_/mkhris zad drod nyams grang ba dang /_/mdog nyams byed de bad kan zad/_/
[\[70a.6\]]mgo 'khor bad kan gnas stongs shing /_/snying 'dar tshigs ni lhod par 'gyur/_/cung zad rtsub ngal skam pa dang /_/na zhing sgra cher mi bzod 'gyur/_/khrag zad skyur dang bsil la dga'/_/rtsa lhod pags pa rtsub par 'gyur/_/sha zad dbang nyams mig mkhur ba'i/_/
[\[70a.7\]]rus skam lhu tshigs na bar 'gyur/_/tshil zad gnyid che dpyi rked mngon/_/mcher pa che dang lus skem 'gyur/_/rus zad rus zug so dang ni/_/sen mo skra la sogs pa 'byung /_/rkang zad rkang sbubs stong pa dang /_/mgo 'khor rab rib can du 'gyur/_/khu ba
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]zad pas ring nas 'byung /_/yang na khu ba khrag nyid 'byung /_/rlig pa shin tu na ba dang /_/pho mtshan tshig pa snyam du sems/_/bshang zad rlung ni rgyu ma'i nang /_/sgra bcas 'khyil pa lta bur byed/_/lto bar rgyu zhing gyen du 'gro/_/snying ga rtsib logs mi bzad na/_/gcin
[\[70b.2\]]zad gcin ni nyung sri dang /_/mdog 'gyur ba 'am khrag bcas nyid/_/rdul zad sbu 'byi spu 'grengs la/_/pags pa rnams ni 'gas par 'gyur/_/dri ma shin tu phra ba rnams/_/zad pas brtag dka' dri ma yi/_/rang gnas bskams dang na ba dang /_/stong dang yang ba
[\[70b.3\]]las shes bya/_/nad stsogs rang nyid ji lta ba'i/_/yon tan 'di ni bzlog pa dang /_zad pa dang ni 'phel gyur las/_/'phel 'bri sman pas shes par bya/_/dri ma thogs las 'phel ba ste/_/shin tu 'byung las zad shes bya/_/lus ni dri mas brten pas na/_/'phel
[\[70b.4\]]bas zad pa gnod pa yin/_/de la rlung ni rus par gnas/_/mkhris pa rngul dang khrag la gnas/_/bad kan lhag ma gnas des 'di/_/phan tshun rten dang brten pa yin/_/'phel dang zad par byed pa'i sman/_/gcig gi gang yin gzhan gyi'ang de/_/rus pa rlung gnyis la 'di min/_/phal cher
[\[70b.5\]]rtas pas 'phel bar 'gyur/_/bad kan rjes mthun de yi phyir/_/de las bzlog pas zad pa yin/_/rlung dang rjes mthun de ltar na/_/'phel dang zad pa 'byung 'gyur ba'i/_/smyung dang brta bar bya ba yis/_/nad ni rim gyis gso bar bya/_/rlung ma gtogs
[\[70b.6\]]te de skyes la/_/de nyid bzlog thabs sbyar bar bya/_/khyad par du ni khrag skyes nad/_gtar ga bkru sman dag gis gso/_/sha cher skyes las byung ba'i nad/_/gtar ga me btsa' thal sman sbyar/_/tshil ches sbom skem gso bar bya/_/rus pa zad pa las byung la/_/mar dang 'o
[\[70b.7\]]ma kha rang sbyar/_/de bzhin 'jam rtsi gtang bas gso/_/bshang ba 'phel la 'khru bas gso/_/bshang bzas las byung ba'i nad/_/ra lug nang grol zan dron dang /_/sbyar thug ma sha gnyis sogs sbyin/_/gcin 'phel gyur la gcin 'bri ba/_/gcin zad las byung
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]gcin snyi gso/_/rdul mi 'byung la rtsol dang bsku/_/rdul 'byung cho gas gso bar bya/_/lus kyi me drod rang gnas 'dug_/cha shas lus zungs rnams la brten/_/de rnams 'bri zhing rab 'bar ba/_/lus zungs 'phel dang zad par 'gyur/_/lus
[\[71a.2\]]zungs dang po phyi ma ni/_/rgyas byed zad pa'ang de bzhin no/_/nyes 'khrugs pas ni lus zungs nyen/_/gnyi gas dri ma la gnod byed/_/'og na gnyis te mgo bor bdun/_/bu ga dang ni rdul 'byung ba'i/_/dri ma'i gnas ni dri ma ste/_/rang rang gnas su nad skyed 'gyur/_/lus
[\[71a.3\]]zungs khu ba'i mthar thug pa'i/_/nang nas gzi can mdangs mchog yin/_/snying la gnas kyang khyab pa dang /_/lus ni brtan par gnas pa yin/_/gang zhig 'jig na nges 'jig la/_/gang zhig gnas na gnas gyur pa/_/gang la dngos rnams sna tshogs pa/_/lus
[\[71a.4\]]la brten pa 'byung ba yin/_/mdangs ni sems 'khrugs bkres sems las/_/mya ngan ngal la stsogs pas zad/_/de zad sdang zhing lus rid la/_/yang yang sems shing dbang po nyams/_/gzi nyams rtsub dang yid mi dga'/_/nyam chung bar ni 'gyur ba yin/_/'tsho
[\[71a.5\]]byed sman dang 'o ma dang /_/sha khu la sogs de'i sman yin/_/zas gang mi 'dod gang zhig slong /_/de la mi 'phrod 'phrod pa ni/_/spang dang sbyin par bya ba dag_/de dang des 'phel zad par 'gyur/_/nyes pa phyin ci log pa dang /_/mthun pas sred pa skyed byed de/_/phal
[\[71a.6\]]cher 'phel dang zad pa dag_/mi mkhas pa yis mi shes so/_/ji bzhin stobs dang rang ji bzhin/_/'phel na nyes pa rgyas par 'gyur/_/zad pas rang bzhin 'dor bar 'gyur/_/mnyam na rang gi las rnams byed/_/gang zhig mnyam pas lus ni 'phel bar
[\[71a.7\]]byed/_/nyes pa de nyid mi mnyam gsod par byed/_/de bas zad ba'ang 'phel ba lta bu ni/_/phan pa'i spyod pa nyid kyis bsrung bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas nad kyi bye brag
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zhu ba'i gnas dang rked pa dpyi/_/rna ba rus pa reg dbang po/_/rlung gnas yin te de las kyang /_/zhu ba'i gnas su khyad par gnas/_/mkhris gnas lte ba pho ba rdul/_/chu ser dngas ma khrag dang ni/_/mig dang pags pa dag yin
[\[71b.2\]]te/_/de las lte ba khyad par gnas/_/bad kan brang dang mgul pa mgo_/glo ba rus tshigs ma zhu'i gnas/_/dngas ma tshil dang sna lcer gnas/_/brang ni khyad par dag gi gnas/_/rlung ni srog stsogs dbye ba yin/_/lnga yi bdag nyid 'dir srog ni/_/spyir gnas brang dang
[\[71b.3\]]gre bar rgyu/_/blo dang dbang po sems 'dzin byed/_/mchil 'dor sbrid 'byung sgregs pa 'don/_/dbugs rngub zas ni mid par byed/_/gyen rgyu'i gnas ni brang yin te/_/sna dang lce dang lkog mar rgyu/_/tshigs 'byin 'bad rtsol mdangs dang ni/_/stobs dang kha dog dran las byed/_/
[\[71b.4\]]khyab byed snying gnas lus kun la/_/ma lus khyab cing rab tu mgyogs/_/'gro dang 'degs dang 'jog pa dang /_/mig 'byed 'dzums pa la sogs pa/_/lus can bya ba phal cher ni/_/de la rag ni lus pa yin/_/mnyam gnas me drod nye bar gnas/_/nang grol kun tu rgyu ba
[\[71b.5\]]yin/_/bya ba zas len 'ju ba dang /_/dngas snyigs 'byed cing 'dor bar byed/_/thur sel gzhang gnas 'dong mo dang /_/lgang pa pho mtshan brla nang rgyu/_/bya ba khu ba zla mtshan dang /_/bshang gci mngal gnas 'byin par byed/_/mkhris pa'i rang bzhin lnga de la/_/zhu
[\[71b.6\]]dang ma zhu'i gnas par gnas/_/'byung lnga'i bdag nyid can gyis ni/_/gang me'i yon tan shas che bas/_/gsher nyid skems byed 'ju la stsogs/_/las kyi me yi sgrar bshad do/_/zas ni 'ju dang de bzhin du/_/dngas ma tshigs ma 'byed par byed/_/der gnas
[\[71b.7\]]bzhin du mkhris pa ni/_/lhag ma rnams kyi grogs byed pas/_/stobs bskyed pa yis byed 'gyur bas/_/de ni 'ju byed ces bshad do/_/mkhris pa ma zhu'i gnas la brten/_/dngas mdog bsgyur bas dmar sgyur yin/_/mkhris pa sgrub byed snying la gnas/_/blo dang
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]yid gzhungs nga rgyal stsogs/_/mngon 'dod don ni sgrub byed pas/_/mig la gnas te gzugs mthong byed/_/mthong byed ces bshad mdog gsal ni/_/pags mdog gsal byed pags par gnas/_/bad kan rnam lnga brang gnas pa/_/
[\[72a.2\]]rang gi stobs kyis sum mdo dang /_/snying dang zas kyi mthu dang ni/_/de nyid la gnas chu las byed/_/bad kan lhag ma'i gnas gyur pa'i/_/rten ni gang phyir byed gyur pas/_/de phyir rten byed ces bshad do/_/gang zhig ma zhu'i gnas la gnas/_/de ni zas stsogs 'drul byed
[\[72a.3\]]pas/_/myags byed ces ni bya ba yin/_/myong byed lcer gnas ro tshor byed/_/rtas byed mgor gnas dbang po ni/_/tshim par byed de 'byor byed ni/_/tshigs la gnas nas 'byor par byed/_/de ltar nad ni phal mo che/_/mi 'gyur bdag nyid can khyab kyang /_/gnas
[\[72a.4\]]yin par ni shes bya ste/_/las rnams kyang ni tha dad yin/_/rtsub sogs dro bar ldan pas ni/_/rlung ni stsogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/grang bas ldang byed snum la sogs/_/yon tan dro ldan zhi byed 'gyur/_/rno stsogs bsil ba dang ldan pas/_/mkhris pa stsogs par
[\[72a.5\]]byed 'gyur la/_/dro bas ldang zhing ro rtul stsogs/_/bsil bar ldan pas zhi bar 'gyur/_/snum stsogs grang dang ldan pa yis/_/bad kan stsogs par byed 'gyur la/_/gro bas ldang 'gyur de nyid ni/_/rtsub sogs yon tan gyis zhir 'gyur/_/rang gnas nyid du 'phel
[\[72a.6\]]stsogs yin/_/dkyil 'gyur rgyu las 'khrugs pa dang /_/mi mthun pa yi yon tan 'dod/_/ldang ba log pa'i lam zhugs nyid/_/rang gi rtags ni ston pa dang /_/bde med nad ni 'byung 'gyur ba'o/_/rang gnas gnas pa mnyam nyid dang /_/nad rnams ma byung
[\[72a.7\]]zhi ba yin/_/sogs dang ldang dang rab zhi ba/_/rlung ni so ga stsogs gsum tshe/_/mkhris pa dbyar la sogs par te/_/bad kan dgun smad stsogs par ro/_/yang dang rtsub pa la sogs pa'i/_/sman dang lus kyang de mtshungs pas/_/so ga rlung ni sogs 'gyur gyi/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]dro ba'i dus kyis ldang mi 'gyur/_/chu rnams 'ju ba skyur ba dang /_/sman yang de dag 'dra ba yis/_/mkhris pa stsogs kyi dus kyis ni/_/grang ba nyid kyis ldang mi 'gyur/_/chu dang sman ni bsil ba dang /_/snum pas dus ni mtshungs 'gyur yang /_/dgun smad bad kan stsogs
[\[72b.2\]]'gyur gyi/_/bsgongs pas ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dus kyi rang bzhin 'di/_/zas la stsogs pa'i dbang gis ni/_/dus la bab par ma gyur kyang /_/'phral du stsogs pa la sogs 'gyur/_/nad ni ldang gyur 'phral du lus/_/mgo nas rkang gi bar du khyab/_/
[\[72b.3\]]ldog 'gyur chu yi rgyun bzhin du/_/cung zhig cung zhig dag gis zhi/_/nad 'khrugs sna tshogs tshul can ni/_/grangs med par ni gyur pa'i lus/_/thams cad nye bar gzir gyur pa/_/de rgyu tshul dang sgrub pa dag_/re re nas ni bstan mi nus/_/de bas spyi yi brjod pa
[\[72b.4\]]yin/_/nad rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/_/nyes pa'i rgyu ni gcig pu nyid/_/dper na bya ni lding 'gyur pa/_/nyin rangs kun tu seng gyur kyang /_/rang gi grib ma dang mi 'bral/_/'gro kun de dang 'dra ba yin/_/yang na ji ltar ma lus pa'i/_/'gro ba mi 'dra sna tshogs
[\[72b.5\]]'di/_/yon tan gsum dang mi 'bral lo/_/de bzhin rang khams ma snyoms pa'i/_/rgyu yang gnas skabs thams cad du/_/nad rigs nyes pa gsum mi 'bral/_/de rnams kyis ni ldang ba'i rgyu/_/dbang don mi 'tsham phrad pa dang /_/dus dang nyes pa'i las rnams so/_/
[\[72b.6\]]de yang dman ltag log sbyor bas/_/dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/_/dbang don rang yul chung du'am/_/mi sbyor ba ni dman pa ste/_/shas cher gtad pa lhag sbyor ba/_/rab phra'i 'od dang 'jigs pa dang /_/shin tu nye dang shin tu ring /_/yid du mi 'ong mi sdug pa'i/_/
[\[72b.7\]]gzugs la mig ni lta byed pa/_/lag sbyor de ni mi zad yin/_/de bzhin rab drags rdul la sogs/_/dbang don ji bzhin shes par bya/_/dus kyang grang dang tsha ba dang /_/char dus dbye bas gsum du 'dod/_/de dman grang stsogs chung ba dang /_/lhag sbyor shin tu che
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]mtshan nyid/_/rang gi mtshan nyid phyin ci log_/log pa'i sbyor ba yin par bshad/_/lus ngag yid kyi dbye ba yis/_/las kyang rnam pa gsum du bshad/_/lus la sogs pa'i las dman la/_/'jug pa dman pa'i ming can yin/_/
[\[73a.2\]]brtun ngas 'jug pa lhag sbyor ba'o/_/shugs bkag pa dang btsir ba dang /_/mi bzad lus kyi las rnams dang /_/gcus dang rdeg 'chos gom 'khyor stsogs/_/ldang bzhin smra bar byed pa dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang 'jig stsogs dang /_/srog gcod la sogs
[\[73a.3\]]las rnams dang /_/rnam bcu de yang smad pa yin/_/'di dang gzhan du byas pa rnams/_/de dag ma lus log sbyor yin/_/'di dag nad kyi rgyu yin no/_/ldang 'gyur de ni mtha' yas te/_/sna tshogs nad ni byed par 'gyur/_/yan lag nang khrol lhu tshigs brten/_/yan lag
[\[73a.4\]]khrag stsogs pags pa yin/_/de ni phyi rol nad gnas te/_/de brten ma zhu yan lag na/_/lba ba be'u snabs 'brum pa stsogs/_/gzhang 'brum skran dang 'or nad sogs/_/de dag phyi rol nad ces bya/_/nang nad rtsa sbubs chen po dang /_/ma zhu zhu ba'i gnas la brten/_/
[\[73a.5\]]gnas de las ni skyugs tshad 'khru/_/dmu rdzing lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/nang gi cha yi gzhang 'brum skrang /_/skran dang me dbal khong 'brum pa/_/mgo bo snying dang chu so stsogs/_/rus pa'i tshigs nad gnad yin no/_/de 'brel rtsa dang chu ba dang /_/chu ba chen stsogs bar
[\[73a.6\]]ma yin/_/de la nad lam der gnas pa/_/gcong chen gzhogs phyed mjing kha yo/_/glad nad stsogs dang tshigs rus dang /_/dpyi yi gzer dang gnod nad stsogs/_/'byin khyab zug dang snyom pa dang /_/lus tsha nad gzer bye ba dang /_/'ja' zhing chag snyam
[\[73a.7\]]rkang lag 'khums/_/bsgongs dang rtse dang skom byed dang /_/'dar dang rtsub dang khong stong dang /_/skem dang mgul dang dkris snyam dang /_/rengs dang ro bska bro ba'o/_/mdog ni gnag gam dmar ba dag_/rlung gi las yin mkhris pa'i las/_/lus tsha mdog dmar dro
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]smin byed/_/rngul dang gnag dang 'dzag rma red/_/'drul dang brgyal zhing myos pa dang /_/kha'i ro kha dang sgyur ba dang /_/mdog skya dmar rtsa ma yin pa'o/_/bad kan las ni mkhrang zhing snum/_/g.ya' zhing khong grang lci ba dang /_/tshigs dam sha rgyas rmongs bag dang /_/
[\[73b.2\]]skrang zhing gnyid che zas mi 'ju/_/mdog dkar kha ro lan tshwa mngar/_/las kyi mtha' las 'dam ring ngo /_/de ltar ji skad bshad pa yi/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni nad kun khyab/_/de ni ma yengs lta stsogs pas/_/yang dag par ni shes par bya/_/nad kyi gnas skabs dbye shes
[\[73b.3\]]pas/_/nad pa skad cig re rer blta/_/goms pas nges par thob 'gyur te/_/las rnams grub pa gsal byed yin/_/rin chen la sogs bzang ngan shes/_/bstan bcos 'ba' zhig las mi 'byung /_/nad ni 'di ltar rnam gsum ste/_/la la tshe 'di'i nyes las byung /_/la la sngon gyi nyes las byung /_/
[\[73b.4\]]gzhan dag de gnyis 'dres las byung /_/nyes 'byung nad gzhi ji bzhin par/_/las skyes rgyu ni med pa yin/_/rgyu chung ba la dkyel che'i nang /_/nyes dang las las byung ba yin/_/dang po mi mthun bza' ba yin/_/las skyes las ni zad pa
[\[73b.5\]]ste/_/gnyi ga las byung nyes dang las/_/zad pas zad par 'gyur ba yin/_/nad ni rang rgyud gzhan rgyud las/_/gnyis 'gyur mtha' 'ang gnyis yin te/_/sngar skyes snga ma'i tshul du bshad/_/phyi skyes pa ni bla brnan yin/_/rang gnas ji bzhin gnas pa ni/_/rang rgyud
[\[73b.6\]]can de mtshan nyid gsal/_/gzhan dag de las go bzlog pa/_/dri ma'ang de bzhin shes par gyis/_/de ni nad re ldang ba na/_/ma yengs pas ni shes bya ste/_/de rnams gtso bo zhi byas pas/_/zhi 'gyur zhi bar ma gyur na/_/de bzhin phyi nas gso bar bya/_/'on te
[\[73b.7\]]bla brnan stobs che na/_/myur gso de nad kyis gzir ba/_/lus la shas cher gnod byed yin/_/nad la rnam par mi mkhas shes/_/ngo tsha nam yang ma byed cig_/nad kyi 'gyur ba thams cad kyi/_/ming gi nges bstan yod pa min/_/nyes pa de nyid 'khrugs nas ni/_/khyad
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]par du ni ldang gyur nas/_/gnas gzhan dag tu song nas ni/_/nad ni mang por byed par 'gyur/_/de bas nad kyi rang bzhin ni/_/rang gnas gzhan du 'phos pa dang /_/rgyu yi khyad par shes byas la/_/sman dpyad kyis gso myur du bya/_/gnod bya yul
[\[74a.2\]]dang nyams stobs dus/_/me drod rang bzhin na tshod dang /_/snying stobs goms dang zas rnams kyis/_/gnas skabs rnam pa tha dad pa/_/'di dag phra mo yan chad brtag_/nad dang sman gyi tshul brtags pas/_/gang zhig gso ba la 'jug pa/_/de ni nam yang 'khrul mi
[\[74a.3\]]'gyur/_/nad dkyel che ba'am chung ba dag_/phog snya lus nyams che chung las/_/gnod par byed pa snang 'gyur bas/_/de la'ang ma yengs nyid du bya/_/sman pa ngan pas nad rnams ni/_/lci ba yang bar yongs rtog cing /_/nad nyung dag tu brtags pa yis/_/
[\[74a.4\]]gso ba log pa dag tu 'gyur/_/de bas chung ba'ang stobs chung ba/_/dkyel chen nad la rab tu sbyor/_/sbyor ba chung ngur sbyar ba yis/_/nad ni shin tu slong ba yin/_/sbyor ba'ang lhag par sbyor ba dang /_/log par sbyor bas phyin ci log_/dri ma 'byung bar mi zad kyi/_/
[\[74a.5\]]lus kyang shin tu ma rung 'gyur/_/de bas rtag tu brtson pa dang /_/thams cad kun tu legs brtags nas/_/ci nas nad med brtan gyur pa/_/de ltar sman dpyad sbyar bar gyis/_/de nas gzhan yang nad rnams ni/_/'phel zad dbye bas bshad bya ste/_/tha dad pa las gsum
[\[74a.6\]]shes bya/_/ldan gsum de yang de dgu yin/_/mnyam par 'phel bas gsum nyid de/_/gcig rab lhag pas drug tu 'gyur/_/ma lus pa las bcu gsum yin/_/gnyis gcig lhag pa las drug ste/_/mtshungs las gcig yin rab dang ni/_/rab mchog
[\[74a.7\]]brtags pa las drug yin/_/de ltar nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/_/'phel ba'o zad pa'ang de snyed yin/_/de dag re re 'phel mnyam zad/_/drug ste slar yang de dag ni/_/gcig zad gnyis gnyis 'phel ba ni/_/go bzlog bcas las drug tu 'gyur/_/dbye ba drug cu gnyis su
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bstan/_/drug cu gsum pa bder gnas rgyu/_/de bzhin 'di dag dngas ma khrag stsogs 'dres pa las/_/nad ni zad dang mnyam dang 'phel ba'i dbye ba yis/_/rab dang rab mchog dag las mtha' yas nyid 'gyur bar/_/rang bzhin ci 'dra ma yengs yid kyis shes
[\[74b.2\]]par gyis/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas nad gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rlung nad gso ba snum dang ni/_/dugs dang sbyang ba 'jam rtsi dang /_/mngar skyur lan tshwa bro ba yi/_/
[\[74b.3\]]zas dang bsku zhing mnye ba dang /_/dkri snun sman chu blugs pa dang /_/gro chang 'bras chang bu ram chang /_/snum dro 'jam rtsi gtang ba ni/_/'jam rtsi nges pa bde dga' dang /_/skye gnas du ma'i snum dag ni/_/drod che 'ju bar byed g.yos sbyar/_/khyad par du ni sha tshon dang /_/til
[\[74b.4\]]mar dang sbyar 'jam rtsi bya/_/mkhris pa mar sar blud pa dang /_/mngar zhing bsil ba'i bkru sman dang /_/mngar dang kha dang bska ba yi/_/zas dang sman ni sbyin pa dang /_/dri bzang bsil zhing yid 'ong ba'i/_/dri ni nye bar bsten pa dang /_/mgul du do shal se mo do/_/nor
[\[74b.5\]]bu brang du gdags par bya/_/ga bur tsan+dan ur shi ra'i/_/byug pas skad cig re re bsku/_/srod la rdo thal can zla zer/_/yid 'ong glu dang ser bsil bsten/_/bag phebs mdza' bo bde ba dang /_/bu la gzhon skad nyams rangs smra/_/chung ma yid mthun las byed cing /_/
[\[74b.6\]]sdug cig yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/_/khang pa nyi rim chu bsil blugs/_/skyed mos tshal rdzing bzang po ni/_/rgya tsha dang ni stegs bcas pa/_/chus brlan bye ma bsil ba dang /_/spyil bu lus tshad shing khebs dang /_/chu 'gram pad+mar bcas par ni/_/bde gnas
[\[74b.7\]]khyad par 'o ma dang /_/mar sar bza' dang bkru sman bya/_/bad kan cho gar ldan par ni/_/skyug sman bkru sman rnon po btang /_/zas ni rtsub chung rno zhing dro/_/tsha zhing kha dang bska ba bza'/_/chang ni yun rings lon pa btung /_/rtse dga' dang ni gnyid mi log_/rtsol
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]ba'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang /_/sems las rtsub pas mnye ba dang /_/khyad par sman khu skyug sman btang /_/sbrang rtsi tshil 'joms sman bsten bya/_/smyung bdud bdug mkhur bkang dbo/_/bde ba med nyid bde phyir bya/_/nad rnams so sor gso ba dang /_/nad las dpags
[\[75a.2\]]te bshad pa yin/_/ldan pa dang ni 'dus pa dag_/de ni so so'i tshul bzhin brtag_/rlung ni zung du 'jug pas na/_/rlung mkhris phal cher so ga'i bya/_/bad kan rlung la dpyid kyi bya/_/bad kan mkhris pa ston gyi bya/_/zung du 'jug pa rlung gi mchog_/yang dag 'dres pas gnyis bdag can/_/
[\[75a.3\]]me dang ldan pas sreg par byed/_/zla ba ldan pas bsil bar byed/_/nad ni dkyel sogs dus su bsal/_/ldang na gzhan don med par gso/_/thams cad ldan na tshabs che ba/_/nad gzhan gnod pa med par gso/_/nad ni sbyor bas zhi bya ba/_/gang gzhan ldang bar byed pa dag_/de ni dag
[\[75a.4\]]min gzhan dag ni/_/ldang bar mi 'gyur rnam dag yin/_/rtsol drag tsha ba rno ba dang /_/gnod par 'gyur ba spyad pas kyang /_/khong pa yan lag rus pa dang /_/gnad du rlung ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/de bzhin de la rtsa sgo ni/_/rnam par sbyangs pas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/smin byas rlung ni
[\[75a.5\]]tshar bcad pas/_/khong pa'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur/_/der gnas nas kyang rgyu dag la/_/sdod cing ring du thogs pa yin/_/de ni dus sogs stobs thob nas/_/gzhan la brten yang ldang bar byed/_/de la gnas gzhan gnas pa ni/_/de nyid stobs ni med nyid la/_/gso bar bya ba rang gi
[\[75a.6\]]ni/_/stobs kyis gzhan zil gnon byed na'o/_/bla brnan nad ni zhi byas na/_/rang gnas gnas pa gso mi dgos/_/phal cher rtsib logs 'gro ba'i nad/_/nad pa yun rings nyon mongs byed/_/lus me'i stobs ni shes pa yis/_/de la rings thabs dag mi bya/_/de ni sbyor bas zhi bya'am/_/
[\[75a.7\]]khong du bde bar bsdu bar bya/_/khong du 'dus par shes nas ni/_/ji ltar nye ba bzhin du bsal/_/bu ga 'byung 'gags stobs nyams shing /_/lci zhing rlung ni khung du 'khrul/_/khong snyom mi 'ju mchil ma mang /_/bshang gci sri dub zas mi len/_/nad rtse ma zhil spyi yi rtags/_/rtse
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]zhil de las bzlog pa yin/_/khong ba'i drod stobs chung nyid kyis/_/lus zungs dang po mi 'ju ba/_/nad ni pho bar zhugs pa dag_/dngas ma ma zhu yin par bshad/_/gzhan dag nad nyid rab 'khrugs pa/_/rab sdug phan tshun 'doms las byung /_/ko dra ba yi dug bzhin du/_/nad tshabs chen po
[\[75b.2\]]'byung bar bshad/_/nad tshabs de dang 'dres pa dang /_/gnod pa gnod bya gnod 'gyur dang /_/nad gzhan gang dag de las byung /_/ma zhu ba dang bcas par bshad/_/de ni lus kun zhugs gyur pa/_/nad nang zhugs te rtse ma bcil/_/ma smin dbyung bar mi bya ste/_/ma smin shing thog
[\[75b.3\]]khu bar mtshungs/_/de ni dbyung bar dka' bas na/_/rten ni 'jig par byed par 'gyur/_/de ni smin dang drod skyed snum/_/dugs bya rtse bcil de bsil ba/_/ji ltar nye dang stobs ji bzhin/_/sbyangs pa'i dus su bsal bar bya/_/kha nas rigs par sman btang bas/_/ma zhu'i gnas
[\[75b.4\]]las nad myur bsal/_/nam tshod yan chad sna sman gyis/_/zhu ba'i gnas yong mas gtong bsal/_/steng ngam 'og tu 'byung bar rtsom/_/nad ni rang nyid 'byung bas na/_/sman gyis nad ni mi dgag ste/_/bkag na de nyid nad skyed 'gyur/_/de bas dang por nad 'byung la/_/bsdad de phan
[\[75b.5\]]par bza' bar bya/_/'khyil la smin pa de dang des/_/smin byas de bzhin bsal bar bya/_/dbyar ston tha chungs dpyid zla 'bring /_/thun mong dus su rim bzhin du/_/so ga dbyar dang dgun bsags pa'i/_/rlung sogs nad ni myur du bsal/_/so ga dbyar dang dgun gyi tshe/_/rab tsha char dang
[\[75b.6\]]grang ba'i dus/_/de rnams dus mtshams thun mong ste/_/de tshe nad ni mi bzang bsal/_/tha mal bde gnas dbang byas kyi/_/nad pa nad kyi dbang du ni/_/grang tsha char gyi dus dag gi_/gnyen po ji bzhin byas nas ni/_/sbyor ba'i dus su bab pa na/_/bya ba dus la mi sdod do/_/sman ni
[\[75b.7\]]zas ma zos sngon dang /_/dbus dang mtha' dang kham gyi bar/_/zas bar tseg bu zas bcas dang /_/zas mnan mtshan mo btung ba'o/_/bad kan bdo 'das nad pa ni/_/nyams stobs ldan la ma zos btang /_/thur sel rlung la zas sngar btang /_/mnyam gnas ldang la bar du yin/_/
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]khyab byed nang par zas za'i mthar/_/gyen rgyu'i rlung la dgongs ka'o/_/srog ces bya ba'i rlung ldang la/_/kham gyi bar dang zas bar bza'/_/dugs dang skyugs lud dbugs mi bde/_/skom dad skye la tseg bu'o/_/yi ga 'chus la sna tshogs zas/_/sman dang zas
[\[76a.2\]]bcas sbyar bar bya/_/skyigs bu lus 'dar lag 'dar dang /_/zas nyung za la mnan pa gtang /_/nam tshong yan chad nad la ni/_/mtshan mo'i dus su btang ba bsngags/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o//_//de
