[\[76a.3\]]nas gso ba'i thabs rnam pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/gso ba rnam pa gnyis yin phyir/_/gso thabs rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/_/de gcig brta bar bya ba yin/_/gnyis pa nyams ni smad pa'o/_/de dag rgyas bya smyung ba zhes/_/rnam grangs dag tu bshad pa yin/_/
[\[76a.4\]]lus sha rgyas phyir rgyas bya ste/_/yang ba nyid phyir smyung bar bya/_/de ni phal cher sa chu dang /_/cig shos las ni gyur pa yin/_/las gang snum dang dgag pa dang /_/dugs dang khong rtsub bya ba ste/_/'byung ba de yang gnyis yin phyir/_/gnyis las 'da' bar mi byed do/_/de
[\[76a.5\]]la'ang sbyong dang zhi bya ba/_/rnam pa gnyis po smyung ba yin/_/gang zhig nad ni phyir 'byin pa/_/sbyong yin de ni rnam lnga ste/_/mas gtong skyugs sman lus nad bkru/_/mgo bo'i nad bkru gtar gas dbyung /_/gang zhig nad ni mi sbyong dang /_/snyoms gnas glongs pa ma yon dang /_/ma
[\[76a.6\]]snyoms snyoms par byed pa dag_/zhi ba yin te de rnams bdun/_/smin dang drod skyed bkres skom dang /_/rtsol bcag nyi tshan ser bu bsil/_/brta ba dag ni rlung dang ni/_/rlung bcas mkhris pa zhi byed yin/_/brta bya nad dang sman dang chang /_/bud med mya ngan gyis nyam chung /_/khur dang
[\[76a.7\]]lam gyis glo rdol dang /_/lus rtsub nyams dma' rlung shas che/_/sbrum ma bu btsas byis pa rgan/_/so ga'i dus dang gzhan yang brta/_/sha dang 'o ma ka ra dkar/_/mar sar mngar bag mas gtong dang /_/gnyid log nyal bde bsku byug dang /_/khrus dang bder gnas nyams dga' brta/_/
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]gcin snyi ma zhu snum rab zos/_/rims btab brla rengs mdze nad can/_/shub khong 'bras mcher pa na/_/glad nad lkog nad mig nad dang /_/sbom po dgun dang gzhan dag kyang /_/rtag tu smyung bar bya ba yin/_/de la sbyang bya shas che sbom/_/stobs ldan mkhris pa bad kan
[\[76b.2\]]rgyas/_/ma zhu'i nad dang rims dang skyug_/tshad pas 'khru dang snying nad can/_/lus lci sgregs mang bshang gci 'gags/_/yi ga 'chus sogs kyis na ba/_/'bring tsam spom sogs phal cher ni/_/dang por smin dang drod bskyed bya/_/nad ni 'di dag gis nyam thag_/sbom
[\[76b.3\]]dang stobs sogs chung ba la/_/bkres dang skom pas tshar bcad do/_/nad kyis nyam thag stobs 'bring brtan/_/ser bu tsha rtsol gyis smad na/_/nyam chung mi brta smos ci dgos/_/nyams smad bya ba brta mi bya/_/brta bya nyams smad 'jam pos bya/_/yang na yul dang stobs
[\[76b.4\]]sogs las/_/rigs pas de ni nye bar spyad/_/brta bas stobs ni 'phel ba dang /_/de yis bsgrub bya'i nad zad 'gyur/_/smyung bas dbang gsal dri ma rnams/_/mi sri khong yang yi ga 'bye/_/bkres dang skom pa lhan cig 'byung /_/dang ga snying dang sgregs pa dag_/nad kyi rtse
[\[76b.5\]]zhil spro ba che/_/snyom bag med pa dag tu 'gyur/_/de dag tshad la sogs pa dang /_/mi ldan sten par byed pa dag_/rab sbom rab tu skem sogs 'gyur/_/de yang sman bcas bshad pa yin/_/tshul ni shin tu brta ba dang /_/nyams smad de nyid las shes bya/_/shin tu tsho ches
[\[76b.6\]]'brum gcin snyi/_/rims dang dmu rdzing mtshan bar rdol/_/lus rmongs gcin sri be+e'u snabs chags/_/mdze la sogs pa mi bzad 'byung /_/de la tshil dang rlung bad kan/_/sel bar byed pa thams cad phan/_/dzur na khre rgod ku lang+tha/_/nas dang sran chung mon sran sde'u/_/dar
[\[76b.7\]]ba dar rnying zho ga chu/_/sems las bya dang mi nyal bya/_/sbrang rtsi 'bras bu gsum pa'am/_/sle tres gla sgang a ru ra/_/skyer khaN+Da dang rtsa ba ni/_/chen po lnga dang gu gul dang /_/brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang /_/ag ni man tha'i khu bcas phan/_/nas tshig 'khus thal byi dang ga_/
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]bca' sga lcags phye sbrang rtsi dang /_/nas dang skyu ru'i phye ma yi/_/sbyor bas shin tu tsho nad sel/_/tsha gsum 'bras gsum pu tse shel/_/shi kru byi dang po s+Thir/_/shing kun go snyod kha ru tsha/_/la la phud dang 'u su dang /_/kru trug tres dang ser po gnyis/_
[\[77a.2\]]bri ha gnyis dang chu rtsi mo/_/ha pu sha dang pa ta dang /_/ke pu ka yi rtsa ba ste/_/'di rnams phye ma mar sbrang rtsi/_/til mar dag ni cha snyoms pa/_/nas phye'i cha ni bcu drug bskyed/_/sbyar ba 'thungs na de 'joms so/_/shin tu shas che'i bdag nyid kun/_/gzhan yang de 'dra'i
[\[77a.3\]]nad rnams dang /_/snying nad mig ser sha bkra dang /_/lus dbugs mi bde lkog nad sel/_/blo dang yid gzhungs sems dran byed/_/zas 'ju pho ba'i drod kyang skyed/_/smyung drags rab skam mgo 'khor lud/_/skom dad che zhing yi ga 'chus/_/snum drod gnyid mig rna ba
[\[77a.4\]]nyams/_/khu ba gzi mdangs skad gsang zad/_/rgu so snying klad byin pa brla/_/dku do rtsib logs na rims 'debs/_/tshig mang stong du rlung nad 'jug_/rmya zhing skyug bro rus tshigs na/_/bshang gci sri ba la sogs pa/_/smyung ba drags pas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[77a.5\]]rab tu tsho bas skem nyid mchog_/shin tu tsho drags pa yi sman/_/shin tu tshil ches me rlung sel/_/brta dang nyams smad yod ma yin/_/gang zhig mngar dang snum bag bza'/_/bsod bde dag gis skem pa sel/_/de las shin tu bzlog pa dag_/nges par bsten pas sbom
[\[77a.6\]]nyid sel/_/de la bza' btung sman rnams ni/_/brta bar byed pa thams cad sbyar/_/sems las med dang dga' ba dang /_/nges par brta bar bya ba dang /_gnyid cher log pas skam pa yang /_/phag dang 'dra bar lus rgyas gyur/_/lus ni brtas shing tsho byed pa/_/sha
[\[77a.7\]]dang 'dra ba gang yang med/_/sha mi za la sha za'i shas/_/lus ni shin tu brtas byed yin/_/sbom la nyams smad lci bas bya/_/de las bzlog pa skem la phan/_/nas dang gro ni gnyis ka la/_/de la 'os par byed pas brtag_/nad kyi dbye ba tha dad kyi/_/gcod 'khrul
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]sogs dbye ba yis/_/nad ltar tha dad gyur kyang ni/_/gso ba gnyis las yod ma yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas sbyang ba la stsogs pa sman gyi sde tshan 'dus pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/po
[\[77b.2\]]son cha dang shing mngar dang /_/ku ba kha bo nim pa dang /_/bim pa ga gon bi sha la/_/dug mo nyung dang mur ba dang /_/de ba da li byi dang ga_/lcang ma tsi tra kru trug tres/_/ko sha pa ti ka rany+dza/_/pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang /_/shu dag sug smel yungs kar te/_/'di dag skyugs
[\[77b.3\]]ba'i sman gyi sde/_/dan ti dang ni tri bid ta/_/'bras bu gsum dang bi sha la/_/shang ki ni dang snu ha dang /_/seng phrom dong ga ni li ni/_/khron bu dang ni kam pi l+ya/_/'o ma ba gcin 'khru bar byed/_/po son cha dang dug mo nyung /_/ru rta de ba da li dang /_/shing mngar shu dag
[\[77b.4\]]rtsa ba bcu/_/thang shing ra snal la phud/_/sha ta pus pa pa ta la/_/rgya sran nag po sbrang rtsi dang /_/rgyam tsha lce tsha shing nye ro/_/'di dag mas gtong bkru sman te/_/a ba marga byi dang ga_/tsha ba gsum dang skyer pa'i rtsa/_/su ra la dang shi ri Sha/_/bri had shi kru'i sa bon
[\[77b.5\]]dang /_/seng ldeng ma du ka'i snying po/_/rgyam tsha dngul rdo pha bong dreg_/sug smel gnyis dang go snyod spom/_/mgo bo'i nad sbyong byed pa yin/_/thang shing rgya spos ru rta dang /_/rtsa ba bcu dang bal gnyis/_/bi ra ta ri'i sman sder gtogs/_/bi da ri sogs rlung nad sel/_/
[\[77b.6\]]dUr ba dang ni byi tsher ba/_/nim pa ba sha ka'i lo ma/_/kha sral phre'u 'ol ma se/_/nye'u shing pa zhes bya dang /_/shi ta ba ki pri yang ku/_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs shug pa sogs/_/s+thi ra rnam gnyis pad+ma'i ze/_/ban n+ya thal tres sogs mkhris sel/_/dong ga sogs dang arka sogs/_/
[\[77b.7\]]mung+ga sogs dang po son sogs/_/bye'u rug pa sogs gla sgang sogs/_/dug mo nyung sogs bad kan sel/_/dzi ban+ti dang ram nye ba/_/me da ma hA me da dang /_/mung+ga ma sha par+Ni dang /_/ldum bu zangs rtsi ba dang ni/_/dzi ba ka dang shing mngar te/_/sde 'di 'tsho byed ces bya
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]yin/_/bid ri dang e raN+Da/_/priSh+tsi kha li pur+Na rna/_/de ba ha sa de ba dang /_/par+Ni gnyis dang kha sral dang /_/'tsho byed lnga dang rtsa chung lnga/_/thal tres dang ni lcang ma dang /_/haM sa pa ti zhes bya rnams/_/bi da ri sogs 'di snying phan/_/nyam
[\[78a.2\]]chung rlung dang mkhris pa sel/_/lus skem skran tshigs yan lag na/_/dbugs mi bde dang lud pa lu/_/sel bar byed pa'i sde tshan yin/_/thal tres dang ni pu shel tse/_/tang pa la dang ni ma du ka/_/tsan+dan dkar dang dmar ba dang /_/shing mngar pa ru sha ka rnams/_/tshad
[\[78a.3\]]pa mkhris pa khrag rgyas dang /_/skom dang rims kyis btab pa sel/_/shug pa puN+Da rI ka dang /_/br-it+ti r-it+ti cu gang dang /_/sring gi sle tres 'tsho byed bcu/_/nu zho skyed byed rlung mkhris sel/_/nyam chung tshim byed brtas byed la/_/'tsho byed ro tsa nyid du byed/_/pa ru sha dang
[\[78a.4\]]'bras bu gsum/_/rgun 'brum dang ni kad pa la/_/ka ta ka'i 'bras ra dza dan/_/se'u 'bru ba ra da du rnams/_/skom dang che dang gcin sri dang /_/rlung gi nad rnams sel byed yin/_/any+dza na dang pha li ni/_/spang spos pad+ma ut+pa la/_/skyer khaN+Da dang sug smel dang /_/
[\[78a.5\]]shing mngar nA ga ge sar bcas/_/dug dang nang gi tsha ba dang /_/mkhris pa rgyas pa sel bar byed/_/pa tol dang pu tse shel/_/tsan+dan dkar po mur ba dang /_/sle tres skra lor bcas pa dag_/bad kan mkhris pa mdze dang rims/_/dug dang skyug bro yi ga 'chus/_/mig ser
[\[78a.6\]]gyi ni nad rnams 'joms/_/sle tres dang ni shug pa dang /_/nim pa 'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_/tsan+dan dmar po zhes bya rnams/_/mkhris pa dang ni bad kan dang /_/rims dang skyug bro lus tsha dang /_/skom dad che sel me drod skyed/_/dong ga dang ni dug mo nyung /_/ka ka tig ta
[\[78a.7\]]ba ta li/_/nim pa sle tres dUr ba dang /_/mur ba bi dang ka ta dang /_/pa tha ci skrigs she rgya ka/_/ka rany+dza gnyis pa to la/_/lo ma bdun pa kru trug tres/_/su Sha byi ta po son cha/_/sa ha ra tsa zhes bya dang /_/rgya shug gi ni 'bras bu rnams/_/de ni slon bro mdze nad dang /_/dug dang
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rims dang bad kan dang /_/g.yan pa dang ni gcin snyi dang /_/rma red pa rnams sbyong bar byed/_/a sa na dang ti ni sha/_/stag pa shwe ta ba ha dang /_/ka ta ra dang seng ldeng dang /_/ban da dang ni shing sha ba/_/a dza sring ga tsan+dan gsum/_/ta la a kar pa la sha/_/sa
[\[78b.2\]]la kha ra pa tra dang /_/d+ha ba ka ling ka spro tog_/tsha ga karna bad tsha ka/_/tha ram zhes ni bya ba ste/_/a san sogs de rnams kyis/_/sha bkra mdze nad bad kan dang /_/srin nad skya rbab gcin snyi dang /_/tsho ches nad ni sel bar byed/_/bar na she rgya ka gnyis/_/nye shing
[\[78b.3\]]tsi tra mo ra ta/_/bil ba any+dza sring gi dang /_/bri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang /_/ka rany+dza gnyis dza ya gnyis/_/shi kru ku sha ru rta'o/_/ba ra ni sogs bad kan tshil/_/me drod chung dang rlung nad 'khyims/_/klad pa la brten nad sel zhing /_/skran dang khong 'bras 'joms pa
[\[78b.4\]]yin/_/ru sha ka shing kun spangs ma/_/rgyam tsha brag zhun nag tshur gnyis/_/gcin sri rde'us 'gags pa dang /_/skran dang tshil ches bad kan sel/_/be+e lan ta ra ar ni/_/sbra tog bri sha sru sru'i rtsa/_/i ka ta dang gzem dang /_/sa ha ra dza ba na dang /_/ka sha br-ik+Sha da ni
[\[78b.5\]]dang /_/'dam bu ku sha rnam gnyis dang /_/kun+tha dang ni kha sral dang /_/ba lu ka dang mo ra ta/_/ku ru ta dang ka ram pa/_/lcam pa zhes bya'i sman sde 'di/_/be len ta ra la sogs pa/_/rlung las gyur pa'i nad 'joms shing /_/rde'u'i phre'u yod pa dang /_/gcin sri ba yi nad
[\[78b.6\]]rnams sel/_/seng phrom sha ba ra ro tra/_/pa la sha dang dz+hin dzi ni/_/thang shing kad pa la ra sna/_/ka tam pa dang chu shing dang /_/e la ba lu a shwa ka/_/pa ri pe la mo tsa ka/_/'di ni seng phrom sogs zhes bya/_/tshil ches bad kan sel ba'i sde/_/mngal nad 'joms shing
[\[78b.7\]]'khru ba gcod/_/mdog bzang dug nad sel byed yin/_/arka dang ni a ral ka/_/nA ga dan+ti bi sha l+ye/_/ga bra ra sna bri shal/_/a ba marga ka rany+dza/_/ka kad ri ka rany+dza/_/gi ri kar gnyis iM gu dang /_/arka la sogs sde tshan 'di/_/bad kan tshil ches dug
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]rnams sel/_/srin nad dang ni mdze nad 'joms/_/khyad par du ni rma la phan/_/bye'u rug rnams gnyis ku ther/_/ka la mal byi dang ga_/kha ra pa tra kad pa la/_/bri sha kar+Ni sha kun ti/_/ske tshe ka bid tha'i lo ma/_/ga bra mon sne'u ka mu ka_/
[\[79a.2\]]rkang mar bi sha muSh+Thi dang /_/bu srin dang 'bam po'o/_/bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde/_/bad kan tshil ches srin nad sel/_/cham pa yi ga 'chus lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde 'joms rma red sbyong /_/muska ka dang snu ha dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang tsi tra ka/_/pa la sha dang
[\[79a.3\]]d+ha ba dang /_/shing sha pa zhes bya ba rnams/_/skran dang gcin nad rde'u chags/_/skya rbab dang ni tshil ches nad/_/bad kan rgyas dang khu ba yi/_/nad rnams sel bar byed pa yin/_/dug mo nyung dang mur ba dang /_/bar gi dang ni bu tse shel/_/na le sham dang bong nga dkar/_/
[\[79a.4\]]chu sgog sug smel pa ta dang /_nyungs kar zir ur lu/_/a za mo dang po son cha/_/shu dag zi ra nag po dang /_/shing kun dang ni byi dang ga_/pa shu gan+d+ha tsha ba lnga/_/rlung dang bad kan tshil ches dang /_/cham pa skran dang rims dang gzer/_/gzhang 'brum gyi ni nad rnams
[\[79a.5\]]sel/_/shu dag gla sgang thang shing dang /_/dong gra bong nga a rur/_/ser po gnyis dang shing mngar dang /_/kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dug mo nyung /_/shu dag yung ba la sogs sde/_/be+e'u snabs tshad pas 'khru smin gcod/_/tshil ches bad kan rgyas rlung 'khyil/_/nu ma'i nad rnams sel bar byed/_
[\[79a.6\]]pri yang+ku dang ra gan dud/_/lig bu mig dang stang zil dang /_/lcim rtsa pad+ma ge sar dang /_/btsod dang ya ba sha ka dang /_/shal ma li dang de'i khu ba/_/sa mang ga dang bun ma/_/tsan+dan da ta ka'i me tog_/aM pa sha dang shing mngar dang /_/na ma ka ra tu ni shing /_/rgya skyegs
[\[79a.7\]]shing dang kad tshur/_/seng phrom bil rkang da ta ki/_/pad+ma'i ge sar ka tang ka_/pri yang aM pas+tha sde gnyis/_/zhu ba'i tshad pa'i 'khru ba sel/_/'byor byed mkhris pa dag la phan/_/rma yang 'tshob par byed pa yin/_/kla sgang shu dag kru trug tres/_/ser po gnyis dang kha ba
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]gnyis/_/go bye pa tha 'bras bu gsum/_/bong nga dkar nag ru rta dang /_/sug smel dang ni shu dag rnams/_/nu zho mngal nad dri ma sel/_/n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad+tha/_/u dum+bA ra seng phrom gnyis/_/'dzam bu gnyis dang ardzu na/_/ka pi ta dang kad pa la/_/blag sha a
[\[79b.2\]]mra lcang ma dang /_/bi ya la dang pa la sha/_/nan+ti rgya shug ka dam pa/_/bir shing mngar ma du ka_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan 'di/_/rma 'tsho 'khru gcod chag grugs sbyor/_/tshil ches khrag mkhris skom dad che/_/mngal gyi nad rnams sel bar byed/_/e la gnyis dang
[\[79b.3\]]du ru ka_/ru rta gan+d+ha bri yang ku/_/spang spos pa la bya ma ka_/spri ka tso ra tso tsa dang /_/shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_/rgya spos bo la s+the ne ya/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba chu srin sen/_/thang shing dang ni a ka ru/_/gur gum shi ri bas ka_/tsan+dan gu gul lce pog dkar/_/bur
[\[79b.4\]]na ma dang kun du ru/_/nA ga ge sar zhes bya'o/_/e la sogs ste rlung bad kan/_/dug rnams sel zhing mdog gsal byed/_/g.yan pa thor bu'i nad rnams dang /_/sha bkra bas ldag sel bar byed/_/sha ma dan+ti dra ban+ti/_/ku ta ra na kra mu ka_/shaM gi ni dang sa ta la/_/
[\[79b.5\]]khron bu dang ni ga bak+Shi/_/su d+ha k+Shi ra kam+bi l+ye/_/sle tres dong ga ka rany+dza/_/baSh+Ta an+t+ra shi kru dang /_a mra shing ro tsha'i 'bras bu/_/dur byid la sogs sde tshan 'di/_/skran dang dug dang yi ga 'chus/_/bad kan dang ni snying nad dang /_/gcin sri ba yi nad rnams 'joms/_/
[\[79b.6\]]de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum bshad/_/sde tshan de las ma rnyed na/_/de dang mtshungs pa gzhan dang sbyar/_/mi 'dra'i sbyor ba spang bar bya/_/sde tshan de dag gnod dang gnod bya sogs ltos te/_/cho ga bskol dang snum dang bsdams pa la sogs ldan/_/btung dang snar gtang mas gtong
[\[79b.7\]]dang ni phyi rol du/_/bsku zhing byugs pas shin tu gso dka'i nad kun 'joms/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcwa lnga pa'o//_//de nas snum gyi cho ga bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/snum byed sman rnams phal cher ni/_/
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]lci zhing bsil la khong 'khru snum/_/rdul dang bral la mnyen zhing brlan/_/de las bzlog pa rtsub byed yin/_/zhun mar rkang dang tshil til mar/_/snum rnams kyi ni mchog rab 'dod/_/de dag las kyang zhun mar ni/_/sbyor rjes su 'jug pas mchog
[\[80a.2\]]yin no/_/de dag sngon bzhin mkhris pa sel/_/phyi ma bzhin du cig shos sel/_/mar bas til mar lci de bas/_/tshil de tshil bas rkang lci'o/_/de las gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi/_/zung dang gsum pa che zhes bya/_/dugs bya sbyang bya chang bud med/_/rtsol
[\[80a.3\]]chags sems las che ba dang /_/rgan po byis pa stobs chung spegs/_/rtsub dang khrag dang khu ba zad/_/rlung nad kyis nyen rab rib dang /_/shin tu dbye dka' la snum bya/_/shin tu drod chung rab drod che/_/shin tu sbom dang rid pa dang /_/brla rengs tshad 'khru ma zhu dang /_/lkog
[\[80a.4\]]nad dbyig dug dmu rdzing dang /_/brgyal skyugs bad kan yi ga 'chus/_/skom dad chang nad kyis nyen dang /_/dus min bu skyes sna sman dang /_/mas gtong bkru sman byas la min/_/de la blo dran yid gzhungs sogs/_/'dod pa rnams la zhun mar bsngags/_/rmen bu bad
[\[80a.5\]]kan srin bu dang /_/tshil ches rlung nad yod pa dang /_/lus yang mkhrang 'dod lto srab pa'i/_/lus can rnams la til mar phan/_/rlung dang nyi tshan lam bud med/_/khur dang rtsol bas lus zungs zad/_/rtsub nyon mongs bzod me drod rno/_/rtsa sgo rlung 'gags lhag ma phan/_/
[\[80a.6\]]tshigs dang rus pa gnad rnams dang /_/lto na mes tshig rma byung ltung /_/mngal dang rna ba glad nad la/_/tshil yang mchog tu phan pa yin/_/til mar dbyar phan zhun mar ni/_/dbyar mtha' de bzhin dpyid kyang bsngags/_/thun mong dus la snum rnams ni/_/nyin mor nyi ma gsal
[\[80a.7\]]tshe bsngags/_/rings la dgun yang til mar gtang /_/tsha ba'i dus su'ang mar tshan gtang /_/mkhris pa rlung dang mkhris par bcas/_/ldan pa la yang mtshan mo nyid/_/mtshan mo las gzhan rlung bad kan/_/nyin par sbyar bas mkhris nad 'gyur/_/bza' sogs zas
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dang mas gtong dang /_/sna nas gtang bsku mkhur bkang dgo/_/mgo bsku rna mig dgang ba yi/_/snum ni rigs par dpyad par bya/_/ro yi dbye ba re re yis/_/drug cu rtsa bzhir rnam par brtags/_/snum ni gzhan gyis zil gnon zhing /_/chung ngu dgos pas rim par bshad/_/
[\[80b.2\]]ji skad bshad pa'i rgyu med pas/_/dngas ma btung la dpyad mi dgos/_/snum gyi las ni myur bsgrubs pas/_/snum de'i cho ga mchog yin no/_/gang zhig thun ni gnyis dang bzhi/_/brgyad kyis rim bzhin 'ju 'gyur ba/_/tshad chung 'bring dang che ba ste/_/de las chung ngu bza'
[\[80b.3\]]ba mchog_/nad la sogs pa brtags nas ni/_/thog mar shin tu chung ngu bza'/_/snga de'i zas de zhu nyid na/_/sbyang phyir dngas ma mang du btung /_/zhi bya ltogs byas zas med par/_/'bring tshad tsam ni bsngags pa yin/_/brta ba sha dang sha khu sogs/_/de yang 'bras
[\[80b.4\]]chan nyung bcas pa/_/byis pa rgan po skom gyis gdungs/_/snum 'gras chang dad che ba dang /_/bud med snum ni rtag bsten dang /_/drod chung bde dang dka' mi bzod/_/lto snyi nad dkyel chung tsha dus/_/nyam chung pa la bsngags pa yin/_/dang po bar dang zas rjes zos/_/lus
[\[80b.5\]]kyi smad bar stod las byung /_/nad rnams sel zhing lus kyi stobs/_/bskyed pa'i rim bzhin byed pa yin/_/de ni legs par smin phyir dang /_/khar chags pa ni phyi ba'i phyir/_/snum dag 'thungs rjes chu tshan btung /_/e raN pa la ta kar min/_/zhu'am ma zhu'i dogs
[\[80b.6\]]skyes na/_/slar yang chu tshan btung bar bya/_/des ni sgregs pa dag 'gyur zhing /_/de las khong yang yi gar 'ong /_/nang par 'thung ngam 'thungs pa dang /_/'thungs par gyur tshe kha zas ran/_/gsher dro bad kan mi skyed dang /_/shin tu snum min 'dres min bza'/_/kha
[\[80b.7\]]lag chu dron gyis bkru zhing /_/bud med mi bsten mtshan mo nyal/_/shugs dgag drag shul las rnams dang /_/khro dang mya ngan nyi tshan grang /_/ser bu'i khar 'dug rta zhon 'gro/_/mang smra rab mtho'i stan la 'dug_/sngas ni rab mtho rab dma' dang /_/nyin nyal dud rdul gnas
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]pa spang /_/gang gis nyin mo 'thungs gyur pa/_/de ltar gzhan la'ang spang bar bya/_/rim 'di las rnams thams cad dang /_/nad zad pa la spyad par bya/_/zhi ba'i snum gyi nyer spyad ni/_/bkru sman btang ba lta bur bya/_/lto snyi zhun mar zhag
[\[81a.2\]]gsum btung /_/lto sra ba yis zhag bdun btung /_/yang na ji srid snum par btung /_/de phan chad ni goms par 'gyur/_/rlung ni bder rgyu me drod 'bar/_/bshang ba snum zhing mi sri la/_/snum mi 'dod cing snyoms 'gyur pa/_/snum legs yin te rtsub go bzlog_/
[\[81a.3\]]snum drags pa yis skya ba dang /_/sna dang kha rkub las 'dzag 'gyur/_/tshad dang mi ldan dus min gnod/_/zas dang spyod lam log pa yis/_/snum chos byed skrang gzhang 'brum dang /_/khong rmya rengs shing sems myos dang /_/g.yan pa mdze dang rims skyug gzer/_/
[\[81a.4\]]lto sbos mgo 'khor la sogs 'gyur/_/de la bkres skom skyug sman dugs/_/zas skom sman ni rtsub pa dang /_dar ba chang rnying tshod ma dang /_/'bru rgod ci tse khre rgod dang /_/sbrang rtsi 'bras gsum pi pi ling /_/ba gcin gu gul a ru ra/_/nad dmigs so so ji bzhin du/_/
[\[81a.5\]]snum las nad gyur bcos thabs yin/_/rtsub pa dag ni smyung byas dang /_/shin tu byas dang 'dra ba yin/_/slon dro skams sa las byung snum/_/sha khu btung zhing dugs dpyad bya/_/khrus byed pa'am skyug sman gtong /_/snum byas zhag gsum gnas par bya/_/nyin zhag
[\[81a.6\]]gzhan pa gcig cig ni/_/de bskyed pa yis bad kan skyod/_/sha che tshil che bad kan mang /_/me yi 'ju drod mi snyoms dang /_/snum la goms pa'i snum bya rnams/_/de ni sngon du rtsub chos bya/_/de nas snum byas sbyangs gyur na/_/de la snum nad mi 'byung ngo /_/snum
[\[81a.7\]]la goms par gyur pas na/_/dri ma 'thon par nus pa yin/_/byis pa rgan phol sogs pa/_/snum spang bar ni mi nus la/_/skye bar mi byed sbyor ba 'dis/_/'phral du snum ni sbyar bar bya/_/de la mar brngos sha khu dang /_/mar dang brngos pa'i thug pa'am/_/til che snum
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]bcas bu ram chung /_/bcas dang kri sar dang ni/_/'o thug mar mang dro ba'am/_/bu ram zho dang bcas pa'am/_/thug pa snum ni bzhi pa la/_/lnga pa 'bras dang ldan par bya/_/bdun pa de dag 'phral snum bya/_/snum rnams lan tshwa cher btab pa/_/de ni bad kan skyed
[\[81b.2\]]rtsub min/_/phra zhing dro la lus khyab byed/_/mdze dang skran nad gcin snyi la/_/bu ram bcas bza' 'o ma sha/_/til dang ma sha chang dang zho/_/snum bya'i don du mi bya'o/_/'bras gsum pi pi ling gu gul/_/a ru ra la sogs bskol bas/_/de dag snum la ji bzhin du/_/
[\[81b.3\]]gnod pa med par sbyar bar bya/_/nad kyis nyam chung gyur pa las/_/lus drod stobs bskyed nus pa btang /_/skyes bu snum la brten par byed pa rnams/_/nang gi drod 'bar khong pa dag pa dang /_/lus zungs 'phral brta stobs dang mdog bzang ldan/_/dbang brtan rgas sra lo
[\[81b.4\]]brgya thub par bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas dugs kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/dugs bsro bcing dang tha mal pa/_/chu dugs dbye bas rnam pa bzhi/_/bsro ba gos dang lcags
[\[81b.5\]]dang ni/_/lag mthil la sogs mer bsros bsro/_/bcing ba shu dag sbang ma dang /_/thang shing sha ta put+pa dang /_/'bru kun dri rnams ra sna dang /_/e raN+Da'i rtsa shu dag dang /_/snum bag tsha dang dar ba dang /_/'o mas sbrus shing tsha cher btab/_/rlung lus byung ba 'ba'
[\[81b.6\]]zhig sel/_/bad kan 'dres la bye'u rug sogs/_/mkhris pa 'dres la shug sogs kyis/_/glan pa zhes bya yang dang yang /_/dkri ba snum zhing nus pa dro/_/spu 'jam lpags rul min pas dkri/_/ma rnyed rlung 'joms lo ma dang /_/dar dang snam bu ras kyis dkri/_/
[\[81b.7\]]mtshan mo dkris pa nyin par dgrol/_/nyin par dkris pa mtshan mo dgrol/_/tha mal pa ni khur ba dang /_/bong ba gyo mo rdo sa phye/_/gso ma'i lo ma 'bru rnams dang /_/lci ril phye ma phub ma rnams/_/thabs rnams du mas legs bsros pa/_/yul dang dus las dpags
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]te sbyar/_/chu dugs shi kru ba ra na/_/e raN+Da dang ka rany+dza/_/byi'u rug pa dang ardza ka_/shi ri sha dang ba sha ka/_/'od ma arka ma la ti/_/ya ba sha ka'i lo ma bkru/_/shu dag la sogs sman rnams dang /_/gsher sa chur gnas sha rnams dang /_
[\[82a.2\]]rtsa bcu nad dmigs ji bzhin du/_/so so'am lhan cig sbyar nas ni/_/snum ldan chang dang tsha dang ni/_/'o ma chu sogs kyis btsos la/_/bum pa'am sbu gu ring po ni/_/bkang la nad kyis nyam thag pa'i/_/lus ni gos kyis dkris nas su/_/ci bde bar ni snum chu blugs/_/
[\[82a.3\]]lus la rlung nad zhugs gyur pa/_/de nyid kyis 'dir bkang snod du/_/nad pa zhugs te gnas na ni/_/gcin sri gzhang 'brum sogs nad sel/_/rlung med phyi nang snum bcas shing /_/zas 'ju'i dus su dugs dpyad bya/_/nad dang nad pa yul dus kyi/_/dbang las
[\[82a.4\]]chung 'bring chen po bya/_/bad kan gyis nyin rtsub dugs bya/_/bad kan rlung la rtsub snum bya/_/rlung ni ma zhu'i gnas zhugs dang /_/bad kan zhu ba'i gnas brten la/_/gnas kyi dbang gis rtsub dugs dang /_/de bzhin snum sngar 'gro dugs bya/_/sta zur dag dang
[\[82a.5\]]mig dang snying /_/rlig par nyung ngu'am bya ba min/_/dugs kyis grang dang zug gzer bral/_/yan lag mnyen par gyur pa dang /_/dal gyis mnyes la khrus byas la/_/de nas snum gyi cho ga bsten/_/dugs drags pa yis khrag mkhris 'khrugs/_/skom brgyal skad
[\[82a.6\]]'gags yan lag 'jums/_/mgo 'khor tshigs na rims 'debs shing /_/tshi gu dmar po tal til snang /_/lums kyis skyugs bro bar 'gyur te/_/der ni zhi bya'i sman gyis gso/_/dugs dang thal sman me btsa' dang /_/tshad 'khru skyugs bro brgyal nad gso/_/dugs
[\[82a.7\]]ni phal cher lci dro rno/_/de las gzhan pa zhi byed yin/_/gsher zhing brtan 'khru snum pa dang /_/rtsub cing sra ba dugs sman yin/_/'jam dang rtsub dang zhi 'byar bag_/gsher bag de ni sel byed yin/_/mdor na phal cher kha ba dang /_bska dang mngar ba de sman yin/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]zhi zhing rtse bcil stobs thob 'gyur/_/ji skad bshad pa'i nad rnams zad/_/bcil drags pags pa rtsa 'khums shing /_/'dar snying kha 'gram nad du 'gyur/_/rkang mchu lag pa pags nag 'gyur/_/bcil drags pa yi nad du bshad/_/shin tu spom dang rtsub pa dang /_/nyam
[\[82b.2\]]chung brgyal bar gyur pa dang /_/dugs drags bcos dgos glo rdol dang /_/skem dang chang nad kyis btab dang /_/rab rib dmu rdzing shu ba mched/_/mdze nad 'or nad rlung mkhris dang /_/'o ma zho dang mar sbrang rtsi/_/'thungs dang bkru sman btang ba dang /_/lus nad tshigs
[\[82b.3\]]dang gzhang nad yod/_/khro dang mya ngan 'jigs pas nyen/_/bkres skom mig ser skya rbab dang /_/gcin nad mkhris nad zla mtshan 'dzag_/sbrum dang bu skyes dugs mi bya/_/nad tshabs che na 'jam por bya/_/lud pa cham pa dbugs mi bde/_/skyigs bu lto spos
[\[82b.4\]]bshang 'gags dang /_/skad 'gags rlung gi nad rnams dang /_/bad kan be snabs 'khyil zhing lci/_/lus rengs rked pa rtsib logs dang /_/sgur dang lto nad 'gram nad dang /_/rlig nad skrangs dang da rgan dang /_/rtsol dang rlung nad kyis zug dang /_/gcin 'gags
[\[82b.5\]]thor bu rmen bu dang /_/khu ba bkag dang rlung 'khyims la/_/de yi sman gyi dbye ba yis/_/dugs ni so so ji bzhin bya/_/dugs phan me yis bsro min pa/_/rlung nad tshil dang bad kan can/_/rlung med khang par rtsol ba dang /_/gos lci ba dang 'jigs pa dang /_/dkri dang
[\[82b.6\]]stobs 'gyed khro ba dang /_/chang mang bkres dang nyi tshan bzhag_/nad gang nad khrol gnas pa'i lus zungs gnas/_/rtsar song rkang lag rus pa'i nang song ba'i/_/nad de dugs kyis bsrung bar byas nas ni/_/khong du bsdus la sbyang bas dpyis dbyung bya/_/yan lag
[\[82b.7\]]brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas skyugs sman dang bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/bad kan nad dam 'dres pa yi/_/bad kan rgyas la skyugs sman gtang /_/de bzhin mkhris pa bkru sman bya/_/rims
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]sar tshad 'khru thur du ni/_/mkhris pa khrag 'khru glo gcong dang /_/mdze dang gcin nad 'brum thor bu/_/rkang bam mi dran lud pa can/_/dbugs mi bde snying 'phar 'bras mched/_/nu ma'i nad dang ro stod nad/_/khyad par du ni skyug sman bya/_/skyug sman
[\[83a.2\]]mi gtong sbrum khong rtsub/_/bkres dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba/_/byis pa rgan skem sbom snying na/_/glo skam smras dang nyam chung dang /_/rtag tu slon dang mcher pa na/_/rab rib lto na srin bu yod/_/rlung khrag 'dren mar gyen du 'byung /_/so nams gtong skad 'dzer dang /_/
[\[83a.3\]]gcin sri dmu rdzing skran can dang /_/slon dka' drod che gzhang 'brum can/_/rtug skam mgo 'khor rtsib logs sra/_/rtsib logs zug dang rlung can no/_/de dag dug 'thungs ma zhu dang /_/mi 'phrod zas zos ma gtogs so/_/rtag tu slon pa yan chad dang /_/phal cher
[\[83a.4\]]ma zhu'i rims dag dang /_/ma zhu ba ni thams cad la'ang /_/dud pas bdug pa'i las kun spangs/_/bkru sman gyis gso skran gzhang 'brum/_/'brum bu mig ser gzhogs phyed lci/_/rims rnying dmu rdzing dbyig dug dang /_/skyugs dang mcher nad skya rbab dang /_/long nad rab
[\[83a.5\]]rib sngon por gyur/_/mchi 'dzag zhu ba'i gnas na zug_/mngal dang khu ba'i gnas kyi nad/_/khong nad gtogs dang srin nad rma/_/dreg nad nam tshong yan chad nad/_/gcin sri bshang ba 'gags pa dang /_/slon bya mdze gcin nad sogs yin/_/khrus mi bya ba rims
[\[83a.6\]]gsar dang /_/drod chung khrag mkhris thur du 'byung /_/rmas dang gzhang nad tshad pas 'khru/_/khong du mtshon lus lto sra dang /_/snum ches pa dang skem ches pa'o/_/de nas thun mong dus su ni/_/cho ga bzhin du snum gyis nyen/_/nya dang ma sha til sogs kyis/_/nang par
[\[83a.7\]]slon bya'i bad kan skyed/_/mtshan mo gnyid log zas legs zhu/_/snga dro'i dang por bkra shis byas/_/zas ma zos pa'am cung zad snum/_/thug pa zhun mar ldan par btung /_/byis pa rgan po nyams stobs chung /_/sman stobs chung ba nad dbang las/_/chang 'o bu ram
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]shing sha khu/_/nad dmigs ji skad bshad pa bzhin/_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ldan pa/_/sman tshad lto ba las dpags te/_/sman la sngags ni mngon bzlas la/_/lkog mar phyin ba'i bar du blud/_/tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag dang tha skar bu/_/drag po dbang po nyi zla sa me rlung /_/
[\[83b.2\]]drang srong rnams kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /_/'byung po'i tshogs kyis khyed ni bsrung bar shog_/drang srong rnams kyi bcud kyis len pa dang /_/lha rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi lta bu dang /_/klu mchog rnams kyi bdud rtsi lta bur ni/_/khyod la sman 'di nye bar gnas gyur cig_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba
[\[83b.3\]]te/_b+hai Sha dz+ya gu ru bai DUr+ya pra b+ha rA dzA ya/_/ta thA ga tA ya/_arta te/_saM myag saM bud+d+hA ya/_/tad+ya thA/_/oM b+haiSha dz+ye b+hai Sha dz+ye ma hA b+hai Sha dz+ye/_rA dza sa mung+ga te swAhA/_shar du kha bstan 'thung du bzhug_/'thungs nas de la sems dmigs te/_/yud tsam bsdad la dang gar
[\[83b.4\]]'khyil/_/mchil ma de nas slon du gzhug_/ma gnod par ni sor mos sam/_/yang na chu ba 'jam po yis/_/lkog ma lce'u chung ma snang bya/_/skyug mi bro bar mi drang ngo /_/'byung bar bzlog pa slon par bya/_/pus mo dang mnyam stan la gnas/_/de ni slon tshe glo gnyis
[\[83b.5\]]dang /_/'phral ba dag nas brten par bya/_/de bzhin lte ba btsir ba dang /_/rgyab nas gyen du mnye bar bya/_/de ltar bad kan rno drod kha/_/mkhris pa mngar dang bsil bas slon/_/rlung 'dres bad kan snum pa dang /_/skyur dang lan tshwa dag gis slon/_/ji srid bad
[\[83b.6\]]kan rgyun chad pa'am/_/mkhris pa snang gi bar du skyugs/_/shugs dal pi pi ling skyu ru/_/yungs kar rgyam tsha chu dag gis/_/yang dang yang ni slon du gzhug_/de ni slon par ma gyur pa'am/_/sdod pa dang bcas slon pa'am/_/sman ni 'ba' zhig byung gyur na/_/sbyor
[\[83b.7\]]nyes de ni mchil ma mang /_/g.yan pa thor pu rims sogs 'byung /_/bder skyugs bad kan mkhris pa dang /_/rlung ni rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sbyor ba legs yin sbyor drags pas/_/dbu ba tshon can khrag 'drar snang /_/slon nas khong rmya lus tsha dang /_/lkog
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]skam mgo 'khor mig mi mthong /_/rlung nad mi bzad ldan gyur zhing /_/srog gi khrag 'byung 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sbyor ba legs pas slon na ni/_/yud tsam ngal gso dud pa gsum/_/gang yang rung bas bdugs pa dang /_de'i 'og snum gyi spyod pa
[\[84a.2\]]bstan/_/de nas dgongs ka'am nang par ni/_/bkres tshe chu dron gyis bkru la/_/sA lu rtsa snar 'bras kyi ni/_/thug pa la sogs rim bzhin bsten/_/thug pa gar g.yos ma byas pa'i/_/khu ba sha khu gsum dang gnyis dang gcig_/mchog dang bar ma tha ma'i sbyong bas
[\[84a.3\]]sbyang /_/mi yis zas kyi dus su rim bzhin spyad/_/dper na me chu rtswa dang lci sogs kyis/_rnam par sbar na rim gyis mched pa na/_/che zhing brtan la thams cad mched par nus/_/sbyangs pa'i nang me thug sogs kyis de bzhin/_/slon tshad chung dang 'bring dang chen po
[\[84a.4\]]ni/_/bzhi dang drug dang lan brgyad slon par 'dod/_/de nyid bcu dang nyis ldab sum ldab 'khru/_/bre gang de bzhin nyis ldab bzhi ldab 'gyur/_/skyug sman mthar mkhris bkru sman las byed dang /_/bad kan mthar dbyung 'khru ba mchog tu bshad/_/'khru ba gnyis gsum
[\[84a.5\]]bshang dang bcas ma gtogs/_/'khru ba gzhal te slon la 'thungs ma gtogs/_/de nas slon pa de la ni/_/slar yang snum dang dugs byas te/_/bad kan dus 'das lto shes nas/_/legs par bkru sman gtang bar bya/_/mkhris pa mang zhing lto snyi la/_/'o mas byang ni
[\[84a.6\]]bkru bar byed/_/rlung shas che shing lto sra na/_/dur byid sogs kyis kyang bkru dka'/_/bkru sman mkhris la mngar dang bska/_/bad kan la ni kha bas bya/_/rlung la snum bro lan tshwa can/_/mi 'khrun ni chu tshan blud/_/lag pa bsros pas de yi ni/_/lto ba legs par
[\[84a.7\]]dugs bya'o/_/ma 'khrus de zhag ldang zas zos/_/nyi ma gnyis par slar yang btung /_/lto ba rab sra snum dag ni/_/zhag bcu'i bar du yang btung bas/_/slar yang snum dang dugs kyis ni/_/lus sbyangs nas ni bkru sman gyis/_/sbyor ba legs par brtags pa dang /_/sngar
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]gyi nyes pa dran par bya/_/snying dang lto na yi ga 'chus/_/bad kan mkhris pa glongs pa dang /_/g.yan pa lus tsha thor bu dang /_/cham pas 'debs shing bshang rlung 'gags/_/sbyor ba nyes pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/sbyor legs ji skad bshad go bzlog_/bshang ba mkhris pa
[\[84b.2\]]bad kan rlung /_/rim gyis 'khru zhing 'byung ba na/_/bad kan mkhris pa med chu 'khru/_/skya zhing rnag dang khrag dang bcas/_/yang na sha bkrus lta bu'am/_/tshil gyi dum bu 'dra nyid dam/_/gzhang 'byung skom dad che ba dang /_/mgo 'khor mig ni phugs su bros/_/
[\[84b.3\]]bkru sman drags pas 'byung ba yin/_/de bzhin skyug sman drags nad 'byung /_/legs par 'khrus pa de la ni/_/dud pas bdug pa ma gtogs pa'i/_/cho ga skyug sman dang mtshungs pas/_/de nas slon dang 'dra bar bya/_/zas la rim gyis spyad nas ni/_/de 'og nar
[\[84b.4\]]ma'i kha zas bsten/_/sman 'thungs me drod chung ba dang /_/ma dag nad kyis rmya ba dang /_/zhu ba'i mtshan ma ma mthong na/_/de ni nyin par smyung byas la/_/snum dang dugs dang sman rnams kyis/_/glongs pa'i nad kyis nyen mi 'gyur/_/sbyangs dang khrag ni 'byung ba dang /_/snum mchog
[\[84b.5\]]la sbyar smyung ba yis/_/me drod zhan pa nyid 'gyur te/_/de bas thug sogs rim gyis spyad/_/bad kan mkhris pa bri zhing chung /_/chang 'thungs rlung dang mkhris pa che/_/de la thug pa mi blud kyi/_/brta ba la sogs rim pa phan/_/skyug sman
[\[84b.6\]]ma zhu bar nad 'byin/_/bkru sman zhu nas 'byin pa yin/_/de yi phyir na skyug sman dag_/zhu ba la ni bsdad mi dgos/_/steng dang 'og tu 'byung rigs pas/_/gang tshe phyin ci log gyur na/_/de tshe skyugs la rkang par ni/_/chu dron dag gis blugs par bya/_/lus kyi stod
[\[84b.7\]]ni chu grang blugs/_/'khru ba la ni de las bzlog_/gang zhig nyam chung nad mang dang /_/nad smin pa yis rang nyid ni/_/'khru bar byed la 'khru ba ni/_/kha zas byin la der 'khrur gzhug_/sngar sbyangs pas ni nyam chung dang /_/nad kyi dkyel chung lus zad mi/_/lto bsra
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]snyi mi shes la/_/sman ni 'jam zhing chung ngu blud/_/de mang 'thungs pa mchog yin gyi/_/gzhan du dgos pa bcas mi rung /_/nyam chung pa yi nad mang po/_/g.yos gyur cung zad cung zad cig_/sman ni 'jam pos lan mang zhig_/de ni nyung 'gyur zhi
[\[85a.2\]]bar bya/_/ma btsal de ni yun ring du/_/nyon mongs pa'am gsod par 'gyur/_/me drod chung dang lto sra la/_/thal sman rgyam tsha mar bcas pas/_/me yi drod ni bskyed nas su/_/rlung dang bad kan bsal bar bya/_/rtsub cing rlung mang lto sra dang /_/rtag tu rtsol ba'i tshul can
[\[85a.3\]]dang /_/me drod rab tu che la sman/_/mi 'khru bar ni zhu bar 'gyur/_/de la sngar ni 'jam rtsi btang /_/de nas snum pa'i bkru sman bya/_/sman ni rnon po'i reng bu yis/_/bshang ba cung zad dbyung bar bya/_/dri ma legs par 'khrus nas ni/_/snum 'khru bde bar 'byung bar
[\[85a.4\]]'gyur/_/dug gis phog na thor bu 'byung /_/mdze dang 'or nad me dpal dang /_/mig ser skya rbab za khus nyen/_/ha cang snum ches sbyang mi bya/_/kun la bkru sman snum bag gtang /_/snum gyis zhen la rtsub pa gtang /_/skyug sman la sogs las rnams la/_/slar yang bar
[\[85a.5\]]skabs bar skabs su/_/snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bya/_/snum rjes la ni stobs bskyed bya/_/lus las nad rnams bsal ba na/_/gos kyi dri ma 'khru dang mtshungs/_/snum dang dugs dag ma byas par/_/gang zhig sbyang ba'i las byed pa/_/shing skam 'gugs par byed pa ltar/_/
[\[85a.6\]]de yi lus ni ma rungs 'gyur/_/sbyang ba legs par nye bar bstan pas ni/_/blo gros gsal zhing dbang po stobs dang ldan/_/lus zungs brtan zhing khong pa'i me drod 'bar/_/na tshod dag kyang ring du 'jog par byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi
[\[85a.7\]]le'u bcwa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas mas gtong ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rlung shas che ba'i nad rnams sam/_/rlung la mas gtong bsngags pa ste/_/de ni gso ba thams cad kyi/_/mchog ste de yang rnam pa gsum/_/bkru drags 'jam rtsi mas gtong gong /_/de yis
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]gso bya skran dang ni/_/lto sbos dreg nad mcher pa dang /_/'khru ba 'ba' zhig gzer nad dang /_/rims rnying bying dang cham pa dang /_/khu ba rlung dang dri ma 'gags/_/rlig rlugs rde'u nad zla mtshan 'jig_/rlung gi nad ni mi bzad gso/_/bkru drags mi bya snum drags dang /_/glo rdol shin tu
[\[85b.2\]]skems pa dang /_/be+e snabs 'khru dang slon bro dang /_/sbyang byas sna sman btang ba dang /_/dbugs mi bde lud cham gzhang 'brum/_/skyigs bu lto sbos me drod chung /_/gzhang skrangs kha zas zos zin dang /_/lto 'gags bu ga chu yod dang /_/mdze can gcin nad sbrang mdog dang /_/sbrum ma zla
[\[85b.3\]]bdun yan chad do/_/bkru drags bya nyid 'jam rtsi bya/_/khyad par du ni me drod che/_/rtsub dang rlung nad gcig pus nyen/_/'jam rtsi mi bya'ang de nyid do/_/de bzhin skya rbab mig ser dang /_/tshil che cham btab zas ma zos/_/bshang bar 'khru bar byed pa dang /_/lto lci lto nad bad kan
[\[85b.4\]]can/_/mchil ma mang dang shin tu sbom/_/lto na srin yod rlung 'khyims dang /_/dug dag 'thungs dang 'brum bus btab/_/rkang bam lkog ma'i wa ba can/_/de gnyis sbu gu gser sogs dang /_/shing rus 'od ma las byas pa/_/ba lang mjug 'dra bug rdol med/_/'jam zhing drang la
[\[85b.5\]]kha zlum pa'o/_/lo gcig ma lon sor lnga pa/_/lo tshad lo bdun pa yi bar/_/tshad ni sor drug yin par bshad/_/lo bdun pa yi bdun nyid de/_/bcu gnyis pa la sor brgyad bya/_/bcu drug yan chad sor dgu ste/_/nyi shu yan chad sor bcu gnyis/_/lo gzhan dag la na tshod dang /_/
[\[85b.6\]]stobs dang lus tshad brtags nas ni/_/tshad ni mngon pa bskyed par bya/_/rtsa ba rang gi mthe bong mnyam/_/rtse mo mthe'u chung tshad du bya/_/lo gcig lon sor nas bzung ste/_/de yis phyed phyed kyis bskyed bya/_/gang zhig rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad/_/sor mo gsum rtse shong ba mchog_/mung+ga ma sha
[\[85b.7\]]sran ma btsos/_/rgya shug 'bras shong rim bzhin bya/_/rtsa ba'i bu ga'i tshad kyis ni/_/mthar ni bug pa 'gegs par bya/_/lce rtse rang gi sor gnyis kyis/_/chod par 'gag pa gnyis pa bya/_/der ni rkyal bu gdags bya ba/_/ra lug ma he la sogs pa'i/_/lgang pa legs mnyes sra
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ba dang /_/dmar btsos bu ga thag thug med/_/dri nga rtsa ris med srab par/_/sman ni legs par blugs byas la/_/srad bus dam par bcing bar bya/_/lgang med rkyal pa'i dpung pa'am/_/byin pa'i pags pa'am ras stug bzang /_/ni ru ha tshad dang po ni/_/lo gcig pa la
[\[86a.2\]]srang gcig mchog_/ji srid srang ni bcu gnyis par/_/lo re srang res bskyed par bya/_/bcu gnyis pa nas bcwa brgyad par/_/de yang bdun cu'i bar chad 'di/_/de phan tshad srang nyi shu nyid/_/bkru sman drag tshad ji lta ba/_/de yi bzhi cha 'jam rtsi tshad/_/bkru sman drag bya snum dugs bya/_/
[\[86a.3\]]sbyang byas nas kyang stobs thob pa/_/'jam rtsi gtang 'os par shes nas/_/thog ma nyid du 'jam rtsi gtang /_/dgun dpyid nyin par gtang de las/_/gzhan du mtshan gtang la la 'dod/_/bsku byug khrus bya sngon thang las/_/bzhi gsum phan zhing yang ba dang /_/snum dang rtsub ches ma yin
[\[86a.4\]]bza'/_/khu ba la sogs zos rjes btung /_/bcags la bshang gci bsal nas ni/_/mal du bde bar gnas byas la/_/mtho dman med par mgo smad de/_/glo g.yon gyis ni phab nas su/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bkug nas ni/_/rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bar bya/_/de nas de la gce'u kha dang /_/gzhang
[\[86a.5\]]sgo snum gyis bskus nas ni/_/gce'u lgang pa'i dbugs bton la/_/kha bcings lag pa mi 'dar bar/_/rgyab kyi logs su 'dug nas ni/_/shin tu myur dang bul min dang /_/ha cang shugs drag dal min par/_/ran par lan cig khong na btsir/_/rlung ni lhag par gnas pas na/_/
[\[86a.6\]]lhag ma cung zad lus par bya/_/btang nas lus ni gan rkyal bzhag_/rkub tshos lag pas brdab par bya/_/rting pas mjug tsos brdung bya zhing /_/rting pa bteg la lan gsum gsig_/de nas lus ni brkyangs nas su/_/sngas dang bcas pa'i rting par ni/_/khu tshur gyis brdung lus
[\[86a.7\]]kyang ni/_/snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya/_/tshor bas nyen pas snum dag ni/_/myur du phyir 'byung mi byed do/_/gal te myur du phyir byung na/_/phan mi byed pas gzhan dag gtang /_/me drod che zhing snum byung na/_/dgongs ka kha zas yang ba sbyin/_/dbyung ba'i dus kyi dam pa ni/_/thun gsum
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]yin te de phan chad/_/nyin mtshan gcig ni bsdad nas su/_/de yi 'og tu reng bu yis/_/snum dbyung phyir ni 'bad bya ba'am/_/mas gtong ba ni rnon po bya/_/shin tu rtsub pas ma byung zhing /_/snyom bag la sogs nad med na/_/btang snyoms su ni gzhag par bya/_/de nas mtshan 'das nang
[\[86b.2\]]par ni/_/bca' sga 'u su bskol chu 'am/_/yang na chu tshan 'ba' zhig btung /_/'jam rtsi btang nas nyin gsum mam/_/nyin lnga lon nas slar gtang ba'am/_/ji srid snum ni 'jug gyur pa'am/_/yang na rlung ni shas che dang /_/rtag tu rtsol byed me drod che/_/khong rtsub pa la nyin re gtang /_/
[\[86b.3\]]de ltar snum ni gsum mam bzhi/_/snum gyur rtsa sgo sbyang ba'i phyir/_/mas gtong khrus kyis sbyang ba dang /_/snum med lus ni snum gyur gtang /_/nyi ma gsum mam nyin lnga na/_/tshes grangs bzang zhing dge ba la/_/nyin phyed cung zad yol ba'i tshe/_/gtor ma bkra shis cho ga bya/_/
[\[86b.4\]]snum bskus dugs bya bshang gci ni/_/bsal zhing shing tu bkres min la/_/skyes bu'i nad dmigs sman la sogs/_/'bad de shes par byas nas ni/_/sman pa de la mkhas pa ni/_/mar dang lhan cig mas gtong sbyar/_/sman gyi srang ni nyi shu dang /_/bo son cha brgyad lhan cig
[\[86b.5\]]bskol/_/bskol ba de yi bzhi cha yis/_/sman mar rlung la rjes su sbyar/_/mkhris pa bde bar gnas drug cha/_/bad kan shas che brgyad cha gcig/_yang na kun la sman gyi ni/_/brgyad cha gcig gam ci nas kyang /_/mas gtong ska slar mi 'gyur bya/_/bu ram dag ni srang gcig
[\[86b.6\]]tsam/_/rigs pas sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha sogs/_/lhag ma de kun snod cig blugs/_/bum par chu bskol rlangs pa yis/_/bsro zhing gzar bus dkrugs nas ni/_/rkyal pa'i nang blugs mjug mar ni/_/gtong tshe shin tu tsha grang min/_/shin tu snum min rtsub pa'ang min/_/shin tu rno min
[\[86b.7\]]'jam pa'ang min/_/shin tu ska min sla ba'ang min/_/shin tu mang nyung tshad med pa'ang /_/tsha che skyur ba'ang de dang 'dra/_/de la mkhas pa gzhan smra ba/_/snum dang sbrang rtsi gnyis so sor/_/srang ni gsum gsum byas nas su/_/rgyam tsha dag ni zho gnyis dang /_/nad med la btang sman srang gnyis/_/khu ba'i
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]sman ni lhag ma kun/_/srang bcu yongs su sbyar bar bya/_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha snum rnams dang /_/sman phye khu ba'i rim pa ni/_/mas gtong rkyal bar bcug byas te/_/'di ni sbyor ba'i cho gar bshad/_/gan rkyal bzhag nas btang ma thag_/sngas kyis brten te mas gtong la/_/yid ni gzhan
[\[87a.2\]]du ma yengs pas/_/'khru ba tsog pus gtang bar bya/_/'ong dus dam pa yud tsam ste/_/de las gzhan du 'chi byed yin/_/de la bcos pa'i thabs gyur snum/_/thal sman ba gcin khu skyur sbyar/_/myur bas snum la rno dro ba'i/_/mang gtong gzhan dag gtang bar bya/_/yang na sman gyi reng bu
[\[87a.3\]]dag_/gtong zhing dugs la sogs pa bya/_/rang nyid 'ongs par gyur na ni/_/mas gtong gnyis pa gtang ba'am/_/lan gsum lan bzhi'i bar du ni/_/ji srid legs par gyur par gtang /_/de yis sbyor sogs bkru sman dang /_/'dra bar shes bya sbyor legs na/_/chu dron 'jam pos
[\[87a.4\]]bkrus nas ni/_/sha khu 'bras chan nyung zad sbyin/_/mas gtong drag pos nad rnams kyi/_/dri ma bskyod pas byung gyur pa/_/de ni chu dron gyis bkru dang /_/kha zas tshul bzhin thos bas 'byung /_/gal te rlung gis nyam thag na/_/slar yang 'phral du 'jam rtsi gtang /_/de ni legs dang ma
[\[87a.5\]]legs dang /_/grags pa snum 'thungs 'drar shes bya/_/gang zhig dus ni cung zad gnas/_/bshang dang bcas par 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/thur du dbugs dang snum lhan cig_/'byung 'gyur 'jam rtsi legs pa yin/_/bad kan la ni mas gtong ba'i/_/'jam rtsi gcig gam gsum
[\[87a.6\]]gtang bya/_/mkhris pa la ni lnga'am bdun/_/rlung la dgu'am bcu gcig gtang /_/slar yang de la zung min pa/_/mas gtong rjes la bya ba yin/_/bad mkhris rlung la rim bzhin zas/_/yu sha 'o ma sha khu gtang /_/rlung 'joms sman ni legs bskol ba/_/dur byid rgya mtshar bcas par
[\[87a.7\]]bya/_/snum mngar skyur sha khu dron sbyar/_/mas gtong gcig ni rlung la phan/_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan bskol/_/shug sogs kar dkar dang bcas/_/mngar bsil bu ram shing khu mar/_/'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas mkhris sel/_/dong ga la sogs bskol ba dang /_/dug mo nyung sogs bcas pa
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gsum/_/rtsub dang sbrang rtsi ba gcin bcas/_/rno zhing dro kha bad kan sel/_/gsum po 'dus pa'i nad la yang /_/gang phyir rim bzhin sel ba yin/_/gsum po de las gzhan pa yin/_/mas gtong gso zhes gzhan mi 'dod/_/gang phyir slar yang sbyin bya ba'i/_/nyes pa bzhi
[\[87b.2\]]po yod ma yin/_/nad bskyod dag par byed pa dang /_/zhi bar bya ba'i rim pa yis/_/mas gtong gsum po nyid brtag ces/_/de skad gzhan dag smra ba yin/_/nad dang sman sogs stobs las ni/_/'di dag thams cad tshad mas gzhal/_/bskru sman drag btang legs mtshan ma/_/ma mthong
[\[87b.3\]]bar du 'phro mi bcad/_/dang por snum gcig tha mar lnga/_/bkru sman drag po bcu gnyis te/_/'jam rtsir bcas ba mas gtong ba'i/_/las ni sum cur bshad pa yin/_/dus ni bco lnga 'dir gcig ni/_/thog ma'i snum ste tha mar gsum/_/dugs dang mas gtong lnga par bshad/_/mas
[\[87b.4\]]gtong sbyor 'dir brgyad yin te/_/ni ru ha dang snum gsum dang /_/thog ma tha ma gnyis ka'o/_/'jam rtsi'am bkru sman mas gtong drag_/gcig pu lhag par bsten mi bya/_/'jam rtsis nad slongs me drod 'joms/_/ni ru has rlung skyed 'jigs yod/_/de bas snum rjes bkrus drags gtang /_/khrus drag
[\[87b.5\]]btang nas 'jam rtsi bya/_/de ltar rim pas snum sbyang bya/_/mas gtong las ni nyes gsum sel/_/snum gyi tshad ni chung ngu yi/_/tshad dang de ni mnyam byas pa'i/_/snum tshad 'jam rtsi'i tshad du bshad/_/de ni byis rgan lam dang khur/_/bud med rtsol zhen pas du ba dang /_/rlung nad kyis gzhom me
[\[87b.6\]]drod chung /_/rgyal po phyug po la bde ba/_/yin pas rtag tu bsten par bya/_/nad 'joms yang ba med pa dang /_/stobs skyed bshang ba bde bar 'byung /_/mas gtong bud med ro smad kyi/_/mngal dang mo mtshan nad rnams la/_/bkrus drags gnyis gsum gyis dag par/_/mas gtong
[\[87b.7\]]gong mas gtang bar bya/_/de yi gce'u nad pa yi/_/sor tshad bcu gnyis tshad du bya/_/zlum zhing ba lang mjug ma 'dra/_/rtsa ba dbus su gag pa gdags/_/rtse mo yungs kar shong ba tsam/_/'jam pa gser la sogs las byas/_/kun+da sri zhing so man/_/me tog rtse mo ltar zlum phra/_/de yi rkyal bu 'jam
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]zhing yang /_/tshad srang phyed dam gang rigs bya/_/de nas khrus byas zas zos la/_/'jam rtsi gtong ba'i cho ga bya/_/khri stegs bus mnyam 'jam pa la/_/drang zhing bde bar 'dug nas ni/_/pho mtshan bteg cing drang bar bya/_/sbubs sbyang phyir ni thur ma ni/_/'jam pa rim gyis gzhug
[\[88a.2\]]par bya/_/de dag pho mtshan dang 'tsham pa/_/'bras bu'i mthar thug bar gtang ba/_/mi 'dar 'jam rtsi btang ltar bya/_/btsir te btang la snum rjes bya/_/'jam rtsi'i rim pa bzhin du bya/_/mas gtong cho ga 'di yis ni/_/gsum mam bzhi yi bar du gtang /_/lhag ma 'jam rtsi ji lta bar/_/'di la
[\[88a.3\]]thams cad sbyar bar bya/_/bud med zla mtshan dus su ni/_/mngal bye ba las chags par 'gyur/_/de phyir de tshe gtang bya la/_/rab na dus min par yang gtang /_/mo mtshan nyams dang gzer ba dang /_/mngal khrag rtag tu 'byung gtong ba/_/gce bu sor bcu rtse mo yi/_/bu ga mung+ga shong sor bzhi/_/mngal
[\[88a.4\]]gyi gnas su gtang bar bya/_/sor gnyis gcin 'bab lam du btang /_/gcin 'gags pa yi nad rnams la/_/bu mo rnams la sor gcig gtang /_/'bring tshad srang ni gcig pa ste/_/bu mo rnams la srang phyed nyid/_/mal du gan rkyal 'dug nas ni/_/brla ni legs par bskums nas su/_/
[\[88a.5\]]pus mo bstod de nyin zhag ni/_/gcig la lan gsum lan bzhi gtang /_/de ltar mas gtong zhag gsum la/_/snum gyi tshad ni bskyed par bya/_/de nas zhag gsum ngal bso nas/_/slar yang zhag gsum gtang bar bya/_/skyug sman byas zla phyed bkru sman/_/de nas zla phyed nas bkrus
[\[88a.6\]]drags/_/bkrus drags 'phral la 'jam rtsi gtang /_/khrus btang zhag bdun nas 'jam rtsi/_/dper na leb rgan sogs btsos pa'i/_/gos ni chu las tshos len ltar/_/de bzhin bangs par byas lus la/_/mas gtong bas ni nang rnams 'byin/_/lus kyi yan lag nang khrol dag tu song nad
[\[88a.7\]]dang /_/gnad dang lus stod yan lag kun khyab nad/_/gang zhig yod pa de las skye ba'i rgyu/_/rlung ma gtogs pa gzhan dag yod ma yin/_/bshang dang bad kan mkhris sogs nad sogs pa/_/gang phyir 'thor zhing sdud par byed pa yin/_/de ni rab 'phel gyur la zhi ba'i phyir/_/'jam
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rtsi ma gtogs sman gzhan gang yang med/_/de bas gso ba ma lus las ma btang /_/gso ba'i phyed yin zhes ni la la 'dod/_/de bzhin nad rnying glo bur skyed byed la/_/gtar ga khrag dbyung sman nyid 'gyur ba yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u
[\[88b.2\]]bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas sman sna nas gtong ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/nam tshong yan chad nad rnams la/_/ltag par sna nas btang ba phan/_/sna ni klad pa'i sgo yin te/_/des na de nas nad de 'joms/_/bkru sman klad pa'i nad rnams dang /_/glong bag lkog nad
[\[88b.3\]]mchi ma 'dzag_/skrang dang thor bu srin rmen bu/_/mdze snyom cham pas btab la gtang /_/brta ba rlung las byung gzer dang /_/glad pa phyed nas skad 'gags dang /_/sna dang kha skom tshig mi thon/_/mig dbye dka' dpung bskyod dka' gtang /_/zhi ba mig sngon gdong pags nad/_/skra yi
[\[88b.4\]]skyon mig dmar la gtang /_/dang po rang sbyor ji lta'i snum/_/sman gyi lde gu sogs bskol dang /_/shing mngar rgyam tsha chang rnying sogs/_/ci rigs pa ni bskol ba gtang /_/brta ba 'u su'i khu ba dang /_/sha khu khrag dang thang chu'ang sbyar/_/zhi ba snga ma 'o ma dang /_/chu dang bcas par sbyar bar bya/_/
[\[88b.5\]]tshad chen dang ni tshang phran te/_/'di yi snum tshad rnam pa gnyis/_/lde gu la sogs btsir ba yi/_/rno de spyi bo'i bkru sman yin/_/phye ma bud pa'i bkru sman te/_/sbu gu sor drug kha gnyis pa/_/nang na sman dang bcas pa dag_/kha yi dbugs kyis bus te gtang /_/des ni mgo nad mang po yang /_
[\[88b.6\]]phye ma yin pas 'byen par byed/_/mdzub mo'i tshigs ni gnyis ba'i bar/_/smyugs pa'i phyir byung gyur pa las/_/thigs pa bcu'am brgyad dam drug_/ji srid 'dzags par gyur pa dag_/sna nas gtong tshad che 'bring chung /_/rim pa de nyid kyis shes bya/_/lde gu la sogs thigs pa ni/_/
[\[88b.7\]]gnyis kyis phri ste gtang bar bya/_/chu dang chang dang sbyar dug mar/_/'thungs pa'am 'thung bar 'dod pa dag_/kha zas zos dang mgo bkrus dang /_/'khru bar 'dod dang gtar ga byas/_/cham pa shugs 'ongs kyis gzir dang /_/bu btsas lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/sbyang byas mas gtong cho ga byas/_/de bzhin
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]dus min yul rmugs la/_/sna sman gtang bar mi bya ste/_/tshabs chen nad dang sogs ma gtogs so/_/de nas sna nas sman gtang ba/_/bad kan nang par mkhris nyin phyed/_/rlung can phyi 'bred mtshan mo gtang /_/nad med pa la ston ka dang /_/dpyid kyi tshe na snga dro gtang /_/dgun ni phyed dus so
[\[89a.2\]]ga'i tshe/_/phyi 'bred dbyar ni nyi dron bcas/_/glad pa rlung nad kyis thebs dang /_/skyigs bus btab dang mgo 'dar dang /_/gnye'u rengs skad ni 'gags pa la/_/nyin re nang par dgongs ka gtang /_/gzhan la nyin res bar bcad la/_/nyi ma bdun du de spyad bya/_/rtag tu bya ba'i las byas nas/_/dang por mgo snum
[\[89a.3\]]bsku dugs byas/_/rlung med mal du gnas nas ni/_/nam tshong yan chad dugs kyang bya/_/de nas gan rkyal lus drang brkyang /_/rkang pa lag pa legs brkyangs la/_/rkang pa cung zad bstod nas su/_/mgo bo yid tsam smad par bya/_/sna khung gcig ni rab bkag la/_/rim gyis yongs su blugs bya ba/_/sman
[\[89a.4\]]ni chu dron gyis bsros la/_/sbu gu'am ras bal gyis blugs bya/_/blugs nas rkang mthil phrag pa dang /_/lag pa rna ba la sogs mnye/_/rim gyis brngubs la glo gnyis su/_/mchil ma dor ba de nas ni/_/sman ni zad par 'gyur gyi bar/_/lan gnyis lan gsum snar btang spyad/_/gal te brgyal gyur
[\[89a.5\]]bsil ba'i chus/_/mgo ma gtogs par gtor bar bya/_/bkru sman 'og tu snum dag ni/_/nad sogs tshul las dpags te gtang /_/sna sman btang mthar gan rkyal du/_/grangs brgyar de las bsdad par bya/_/dud pa brdubs la chu dron 'jam/_/gre ba mtshul pa dag phyir bya/_/snum btang legs gyur
[\[89a.6\]]dbugs bder rgyu/_/gnyid log sad bde dbang po gsal/_/nyes pas mgo rtsub mi 'gyur skam/_/sna dang kha skams klad stong snyam/_/snum drags g.yan dang lci ba nyid/_/mchil mang cham 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/legs bkrus mig gsal yang ba dang /_/kha dang skad ni dag par 'gyur/_/bkrus
[\[89a.7\]]nyen nad ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/bkrus drags khong ni rmya bar 'gyur/_/tshad phran glo rdol rid pa dang /_/byis pa rgan po skyid par gnas/_/dus min char 'bab par yang gtang /_/de ni cham pas drag btab dang /_/chang 'thungs rna ba 'on pa dang /_/klad rgyas srin bu zhugs pa dang /_/nad bsdus phyir ni ma phyung
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]la/_/tshad phra ba ni gtang mi bya/_/nyin mtshan zas zos slon gnyid nyal/_/mtha' dang bud med lam ngal dub/_/mgo bskus mkhur bkang dbo ba'i rjes/_/bshang gci mig sman btang rjes dang /_/so shing gi rjes dgod pa yin/_/rjes la thigs pa gnyis pa gtang /_/lnga yis dbang po'i bu ga dag_/
[\[89b.2\]]gsum gyis rim bzhin ngal ba sel/_/lnga yis mig ni gsal bar byed/_/so brtan rlung nad zhi bar 'gyur/_/sna sman lo bdun ma lon dang /_/brgyad cu 'das la gtang mi bya/_/bcwa brgyad ma lon dud mi bdug_/mkhur bkang lnga ma lon la min/_/lo bcu ma lon sbyang mi gtang /_/bdun cu 'das la'ang
[\[89b.3\]]mi bya'o/_/skyes nas rgas pa'i bar du ni/_/tshad phran mas gtong lta bur bsngags/_/de ni rtag tu bsten gyur/_/tshad che ba ltar yon tan skyed/_/'di la bdam pa gang yang med/_/gnod las tshad chen ltar 'jigs med/_/sna sman don du til mar nyid/_/rtag tu bsten pa bsngags pa yin/_/mgo ni bad
[\[89b.4\]]kan gnas yin phyir/_/snum gzhan bde gnas la mi bsngags/_/myur byed ring zhig byed pa dang /_yon tan che dang chung byed pa'i/_/khyad par tshad chen tshad phran la/_/gal te med par gyur na ni/_/gang zhig spang byas gnod byas pa'i/_/tshad chen ngag ni su zhig ston/_/snum dngas btung ba rtag bshad
[\[89b.5\]]du/_/spyil bu rlung dang tshad par gnas/_/'jam rtsi tshad chen mas gtong tshad/_/de dang 'dra bar rnam par bstan/_/dza la sgron shing dzi ban+ti/_/gla sgang shing tsha pu shel tse/_/go bi tsan+dan skyer pa'i rtsa/_/shing mngar gla ba a ka ru/_/nye'u shing bil ba puN+Da rI/_/ut+pal mur ba par+Ni gnyis/_/bri ha ti gnyis
[\[89b.6\]]byi dang ga_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra sug smel dang /_/ha re Nu ka pad+ma yi/_/ge sar dang ni ba la ste/_/sman ni 'di rnams cha mnyam la/_/char pa'i chus ni bskol bar bya/_/til mar las ni sman gyi khu/_/bcu 'gyur lhag byas de la ni/_/til mar chu dang bskol ba bya/_/lan bcu nyid ni bskol nas ni/_/tshos pa yi ni bcu cha
[\[89b.7\]]la/_/de mnyam ra yi 'o ma blugs/_/snar btang til mar yon tan che/_/thigs phran zhes bya 'di bsten bya/_/sna nas btang ba'i sman bsten pas/_/phrag pa mgrin pa dpung mgo ni/_/mkhregs shing mthol pa gas mdog gsal/_/dbang brtan skra dkar med par 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas sman gyi dud pa gtang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/nam tshong yan chad bang rlung las/_/byung ba'i nad rnams mi skye dang /_/skyes pa rnams ni bsal ba'i phyir/_/mkhas pas rtag tu dud pa brngub/_/de ni 'jam dang bar ma
[\[90a.2\]]rno/_/rlung dang bad rlung bad kan la/_/gtang ngo mkhris khrag gis nyen dang /_/bkrus dang dmu rdzing za khu dang /_/rab rib sbos dang stod rlung nad/_/lkog nad mas gtong byas pa dang /_/nya dang chang dang 'o ma zho/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang dug 'thungs sogs/_/mgo nad skya rbab nad can ni/_/mtshan gnyid ma
[\[90a.3\]]log la mi gtang /_/gal te dud pa cher brngubs na/_/khrag dang mkhris 'phel 'on dang long /_/skom dang brgyal dang rmongs par byed/_/der ni bsil ba'i cho ga phan/_/bkres sbrid glal dang bshang gci bsal/_/bud med bsten dang gtar ga btab/_/dgod dang so shing bcas pa yi/_/mthar ni
[\[90a.4\]]dud pa 'jam po gtang /_/dus 'di dag nas mtshan zas zos/_/sna sman rjes la bar ma brngub/_/gnyid log sna sman mig sman khrus/_/slon pa'i rjes la rnon pos bkru/_/mas gtong gce'u 'drar byas pa yi/_/dud gce'u sbubs gsum drang por bya/_/rtsa ba mtheb shong rtse mo ni/_/rgya shug shong ba'i
[\[90a.5\]]tshad du bya/_/de yi tshad ni rngub byed pa'i/_/sor ni nyi shu sum cu gnyis/_/bzhi bcu rno dang bar ma dang /_/'jam po la ni rim bzhin bya/_/drang por 'dug cing de la sems/_/kha gdangs nas ni lan gsum brngub/_/sna khung re re bkag nas ni/_/snar ni dud pa brngub par bya/_/mgo dang snar gtogs nad
[\[90a.6\]]bskyod pa/_/dang por sna nas brngub par bya/_/bskyod pa'i don du kho nas brngub/_/gre bar gtogs pa de las bzlog/_/du ba kha gnyis nad slon gyi/_/snar slon mig la gnod par byed/_/du ba rngub dang 'byin pa yis/_/lan ni gsum gsum brngub par bya/_/'jam po nyin gcig lan gcig gtang /_/bar ma lan gnyis
[\[90a.7\]]sbyor ba ni/_/lan gsum lan bzhi gtang bar bya/_/der sman gu gul a ka ru/_/gla sgang rdo dreg s+tho ni ya/_/spang spos ur shi ba la ka_/shing tsha kon ti shing mngar dang /_/bil rkang e la ba lu ka_/pog dkar shri be ta ka dang /_/gla ba sbra tshil bya ma ka_/pog nag gur gum ma sha dang /_/kun tu ru dang nas dang til/_/snum bcas
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]'bras bu snying po dang /_/tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang mar/_/zhi ba pog nag rgya skyegs dang /_/rgun 'brum pad+ma ut+pal/_/n+ya gro d+ha dang a shwad tha/_/u dum+bA ra blag sha dang /_/seng phrom shun pa kha ra dang /_/shing mngar klu shing shug pa btsod/_/dri las rgya spos ru rta bskol/_/rnon po dzo ti sma ti dang /_/skyer pa dang ni rtsa ba bcu/_/
[\[90b.2\]]ldong ros ba bla rgya skyegs dang /_/gi ri gar kar 'bras bu gsum/_/dri yi sman la ro rno ba'i/_/mgo bo'i bkru sman sde tshan no/_/de dag zhag gcig nur spangs la/_/dud pa'i sman rnams btags nas ni/_/thur ma sor ni bcu gnyis la/_/lan lnga'i bar du byug par bya/_/gdar bu mthe bong tsam sbom la/_/nas kyi
[\[90b.3\]]dbyibs dang 'dra bar bya/_/grib mar skam zhing khong stong med/_/snum gyis ji bzhin bskus byas la/_/brngub phyir me yis bsregs nas ni/_/dud pa'i gce'u sbyar bar bya/_/kham phor kha sbyar bu gar ni/_/gce'u sor bcu'am sor brgyad pa/_/bcug pa kha nas dud pa ni/_/lud pa can gyis brngub par bya/_/
[\[90b.4\]]dud pa brngubs la lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/skad 'gags rnag dang dri mi zhim gdong skya/_/skra skyon rna mig 'dzag g.ya' rmongs bag dang /_/snyom dang skyigs bu cham pa'i nad mi 'byung /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas
[\[90b.5\]]sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba dgang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mkhur bkang rnam pa bzhi yin te/_/snum dang zhi byed sbyong rma 'tshob/_/de las gsum ni rlung la sogs/_/gsum gtang tha ma rma la phan/_/'dir sman mngar skyur lan tshwa dang /_/tsha dang snum ni bskol ba yin/_/zhi byed
[\[90b.6\]]kha bska mngar sman bskol/_/sbyong ba kha dang tsha dang skyur/_/rma 'tshob byed pa kha ba dang /_/bska ba'i sman ni bskol bar bya/_/de la snum dang 'o ma dang /_/sbrang rtsi chu dang tsha dang chang /_/ba gcin 'bru yi khu ba rnams/_/sman ni ji lta ji lta dang /_/lde gur bcas pa bskol ba ni/_/ji tsam bzod pa rnam par
[\[90b.7\]]sbyar/_/so brtse so ni 'gul ba dang /_/rlung las gyur pa'i kha nad la/_/dro 'jam tsam mam bsil ba yi/_/til chus mkhur ba bkang ba phan/_/rtag tu mkhur ba bkang ste gzhag_/til mar dag gam sha khu bsngags/_/kha drod che tsha tshos pa dang /_/'phral du rma ni byung ba dang /_/dug
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]dang thal sman mes tshig la/_/zhun mar dag gom 'o mas dgang /_/sbrang rtsi mkhur bkang byas pas ni/_/kha yi dri ma sbyong byed cing /_/kha yi rma ni 'tshob byed yin/_/kha tsha skom dad rab zhi byed/_/ro mi tshor dang dri ma che/_/kha mnam 'bras rtsabs bkang bas sel/_/
[\[91a.2\]]de nyid cung zad tsha bcas bsil/_/kha skams sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/thal sman rnon khus mkhur bkang bas/_/bad kan sogs pa myur du sel/_/chu tshan dro 'jam mkhur bkang bas/_/kha ni yang zhing bde bar byed/_/rlung med nyi tshan bcas par ni/_/phrag pa mjing bar dugs
[\[91a.3\]]bya mnye/_/mkhur ba bkang nas gdong pa ni/_/cung zad bteg ste ji srid na/_/bad kan gyis ni kha gang ba'ang /_/sna mig 'dzag pa'i bar du gzhag_/kha bkang mi spo bzhag mkhur bkang /_/gzhan du khar brngub par 'gyur ro/_/khar brngubs pa yis khyad par gso ba ni/_/gnye'u
[\[91a.4\]]rengs mgo mig rna nad kha nag dang /_/mchil mang gre nad snying ga sra ba dang /_/snying 'phar snyam dang cham pa yi ga 'chus/_/mkhur bkang bshad pa'i sman rnams kyi/_/lde gu sman khu phye ma ste/_/kha mur bya ba rnam gsum yin/_/de ni bad kan nad la gtang /_/
[\[91a.5\]]gdong bskus gsum ste nad sel dang /_/dug sel kha dog bzang byed pa'o/_/de drod bad kan rlung la bsngags/_/lhag ma la ni rab bsil ba/_/de yi tshad dpangs sor bzhi cha/_/sum cha phyed de rnam pa gsum/_/ma bskams bar du de bzhag gi/_/bskams na pags
[\[91a.6\]]pa la gnod 'gyur/_/de nas spangs nas bkru bar bya/_/de yi rjes la bsku byug bya/_/nyin par gnyid log mang smra khro/_/me tshan nyi tshan mya ngan spang /_/de ni cham pa sna sman gtang /_/ma zhu 'gram 'thams yi ga 'chus/_/mtshan gnyid ma log la mi gtang /_/de ni legs par
[\[91a.7\]]spyod pa yis/_/dus min skra dkar ngo khabs dang /_/gnyer ma rab rib mig sngo sel/_/rgya shug snying po ba sha'i rtsa/_/seng phrom yungs kar dkar po rnams/_/sing hi'i rtsa ba til nag dang /_/skyer ba'i shun pa rme'u rnams/_/'jag rtsa tsan+dan ur shir/_/shiR+sha sha ta pus pa 'bras/_/ku mud ut+pal
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ka la ha/_/dUr ba shing mngar tsan+dan rnams/_/ka li ya ka ur shi ti/_/spang spos rgya spos shug pa rnams/_/da lis kun dra puN+Da rI/_/shing mngar rgya spos a ru ra/_/de ltar tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad/_/bsku ba dgun stod sogs drug sbyar/_/gdong bsku ba la goms pa rnams/_/mthong ba brtan
[\[91b.2\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_/gdong ni yongs su mi rnying la/_/'jam zhing pad+ma 'dra bar 'gyur/_/bsku dang blugs dang ras bal can/_/pags pas g.yogs dang rnam pa bzhi/_/de ni spyi bo'i til mar te/_/phyi bzhin du ni yon tan che/_/de la byugs pa rtsub pa dang /_/g.ya' dang dri ma can la sbyar/_/rlugs pa glog
[\[91b.3\]]pa glad gzer dang /_/cha dang rma smin rnags la gtang /_/ras bal snum can skra 'byi dang /_/gza' zhugs mig ni rengs la gtang /_/bags bcibs mgo bo tshor ba med/_/kha yo gnyid ni yar ba dang /_/kha dang sna skam rab rib dang /_/mi bzad mgo nad dag la sbyar/_/de yi cho ga 'dug pa la/_/khri'u pus mnyam 'jam
[\[91b.4\]]pa la/_/lus bkrus bsku zhing dugs byas la/_/dgongs ka ba'am ma he yi/_/pags pa mgo bo dang mnyam la/_/rgyar ni sor ni bcu gnyis pa/_/rna ba'i mthar thug bar bcings pa/_/'phral ba gos kyis dkris pa ni/_/gos sam lan bus bcings byas la/_/ma sha'i lde gus bsku bar bya/_/de nas nad dmigs ci
[\[91b.5\]]'dra la/_/snum bskol ba ni dro 'jam tsam/_/de ni spyi bo man chad nas/_/skra drung sor gcig nub tsam blugs/_/kha dang snam tshul phyin par gzhag_/de ni rlung sogs nad rnams la/_/stong phrag bcu dang brgyad drug gzhag_/nad mad sa la stong phrag gcig_/mar gsar phrag pa la sogs mnye/_/de ltar zhag
[\[91b.6\]]bdun blugs par bya/_/rna ba gang bar blugs te gzhag_/rna ba'i rtsa la mnye bar bya/_/nad rtse zhil gyi bar bya zhing /_/rna ba se gol brgya par gzhag_/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ni/_/lag rtses bskor ba'i bar dang ni/_/mig 'byed 'jums dang mnyam pa yi/_/yun ni grangs kyi tshad du bshad/_/spyi bo'i
[\[91b.7\]]til mar sbyar ba bskus pas ni/_/skra dkar dmar ser skra 'byi gza' zhugs dang /_/mgo bo'i rlung nad sel zhing dpang po gsal/_/skad gdangs 'gram pa mgo yi stobs skyed byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]de nas sman gyi thigs pa mig tu blugs pa dang sman gyis mig bsku ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mig nad dag ni thams cad la/_/dang por sman thigs blugs pas ni/_/zug na g.ya' drud mchi ma 'dzag_/mig tsha mig dmar rnams la phan/_/rlung
[\[92a.2\]]la dron po bad dro 'jam/_/khrag mkhris la ni de bsil bsngags/_/rlung med gnas su 'dug nas ni/_/lag pa g.yon pas mig phye la/_/nya phyis nang sbyar ras bal ni/_/bsnyad pa'i thigs ba blugs bya ba/_/sor gnyis tsam spangs las mig grwa/_/thigs pa bcu'am bcu
[\[92a.3\]]gnyis blugs/_/de nas gos 'jam dag gis phyi/_/rlung dang bad kan can dag la/_/gos 'jam gzhan ni chu dron la/_/sbangs pas dugs ni 'jam po bya/_/mig sman blugs pa rab tsha rnos/_/na zhing mig dmar rtul bar 'gyur/_/shin tu grang bas zug pa dang /_/
[\[92a.4\]]'dzums mi shes dang na bar 'gyur/_/drags pas mig mchu dmar dang drud/_/rtsub cing mig ni 'byed dkar 'gyur/_/shin tu chung bas nad dkyel skyed/_/ma pho bas ni thu bar byed/_/bskus legs nad rtsa sna sul dang /_/kha yi sbubs su sman gyis khyab/_/spyi bor gtogs
[\[92a.5\]]pa'i nad kyi ni/_/dri ma dpyis ni 'byin par byed/_/de nas lus sbyangs mig sman bsku/_/mig tsam la ni gnas gyur pa/_/cung zad skrangs dang shin tu g.ya'/_/rdu ma chags pas smin shes shing /_/cung zad drud dmar mchi ma 'dzag_/mig rdu stug la gtang bar bya/_/
[\[92a.6\]]bad kan dang ni khrag mkhris dang /_/mchog tu rlung gis gzir la bsku/_/mig sman phyi dang rmag so dang /_/gsal bar mthong ste rnam pa gsum/_/de la phyi ba'i mig sman ni/_/bska dang skyur dang tsha dang kha/_/rma gso sman ni kha ba ste/_/gsal sman mngar dang bsil ba yin/_/
[\[92a.7\]]thur ma sor bcu dbus phra la/_/rtse mo sri zhing kha 'bus 'dra/_/phyi ba'i thur ma zangs kyi bsngags/_/rma gso lcags nag byas sor tsam/_/bzang po gsal bar byed pa ni/_/gser dang dngul las byas pa bsngags/_/gdar bu khu ba phye mas te/_/mig sman rnam gsum nyid du
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]brtag_/de ni mig nad lci 'bring dang /_/yang ba la ni rim bzhin sbyar/_/mtshan mo nyal dang nyi ma'i gung /_/zos 'thungs nyi ma tsha ba yis/_/mig gi nad ni 'phel ba dang /_/dkyel ni skye dang 'khrugs par 'gyur/_/de bas de zhi phyir na dgongs/_/nyi ma sprin bral dus su bslu/_/
[\[92b.2\]]gzhan dag smra ba nyin par ni/_/mig sman rnon po gtang mi bya/_/bkrus pas nyam chung gyur pa'i mig_/nyi ma bltas na gnod par 'gyur/_/mtshan mo gnyid ni log pa dang /_/zla dus yin pas rtas 'gyur te/_/mig ni me yi rang bzhin pas/_/bsil bas gnad med bsten
[\[92b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/mig nad bad kan shas che ba'am/_/phyi zhing gsal bar bya ba las/_/rab cha min pa'i nyin par yang /_/mig sman rnon po blugs par 'dod/_/lcags ni rdo las 'byung ba yin/_/rno ba de nyid las byung yang /_/de nyid kyis ni gnod byed nus/_/mig gi rang
[\[92b.4\]]bzhin de dang 'dra/_/dgun tshe mtshan mo mig sman ni/_/rnon po phan pa ma yin te/_/'dzag mi 'gyur bas mig rengs dang /_/g.ya' dang mi gsal la sogs skyed/_/mig sman mi gtang 'jigs dang slon/_/khrus btang zan zos shugs kyis nyen/_/khros dang rims btab mig phyir byung /_/blang
[\[92b.5\]]nad mya ngan gnyid ma log_/nyi ma ma mthong mgo bkrus dang /_/chang 'thungs dud pa brngubs pa dang /_/kha zas ma zhu nyi tshan gdungs/_/nyin nyal skom pa la mi gtang /_/mig sman rab rno 'jam dang nyung /_/mang sla ska dang rtsub pa dang /_/shin tu bsil dang tsha ba yi/_/mig sman bsku bar mi
[\[92b.6\]]bya'o/_/des na mig ni ma phye bar/_/dal gyis nang du khyab par bya/_/mig sman bskus nas mig mchu ni/_/cung zad bskyod la mig sman ni/_/rnon pos myur du khyab par 'gyur/_/dbye dang 'dzums par mi bya'o/_/mig mchu gnyis ni bsdam pa dang /_/bkru ba dag ni mi bya'o/_/
[\[92b.7\]]gang tshe mig sman gyis bskus pa'i/_/sman gyi rtsom pa zhi gyur na/_/nad kyi dmigs dang mthun pa yi/_/chu yis de tshe bkru bar bya/_/de nas gos 'jam bcas pa yi/_/mthe bong dang ni mdzub mo gnyis/_/mig ni ci ran phye ste phyi/_/g.yon pas g.yas pa phyi bar bya/_/
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]gzhan du mig sman blugs pa yis/_/mig mchu khyab pas nad skyed 'gyur/_/sman gyis g.ya' ba'am rtul gyur na/_/rnon po'i dud brngub par bya/_/mig sman rnon pos tsha gyur na/_/slar 'chos mig sman bsil byed gzhug_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus
[\[93a.2\]]pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//de nas mig brta ba'i cho ga dang /_mig sman gyi phur ma bsregs shing btsos pa'i khu ba mig tu blugs pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mig 'dzums mi shes rengs bag dang /_/skam dang rtsub dang snad pa
[\[93a.3\]]dang /_/rlung mkhris nad gyur zhum bag dang /_/rdzi ma byi zhing g.yogs par mthong /_/dbye dka' rtsa ni brtse ba dang /_/mig ni rtsa 'gyur mi mthong dang /_/dmar zhing mchi 'dzag klad phyed na/_/rlung nad kun 'gro ling tog can/_/mig nad brtse zhing mchi ma 'dzag_/na zhing
[\[93a.4\]]dmar la mig rdu chags/_/thun mong dus su nang par ram/_/dgongs ka gan rkyal nyal nas ni/_/lus dang mgo sbyang rlung med pa'i/_/gnas su brta ba'i sman gtang ngo /_/nas sam ma sha'i rjen zan gyis/_/mig sbubs mtha' bskor mnyam pa ni/_/dpangs su sor gnyis
[\[93a.5\]]rten byas la/_/nad dmigs ji bzhin sman bskol la/_/zhun mar chu tshan la bsros te/_/mig ni btsums par blugs par bya/_/mtshan mo mi mthong rlung rab rig_/dbye dka' stsogs la tshil zhun blugs/_/rdzi ma'i rtse nub bar bkang la/_/de nas bskyod cing dbye ba ni/_/de
[\[93a.6\]]ni dal gyis byed du gzhug_/tshad bgrang bya ba de la ni/_/mig mchu mig 'gram dkar nag nad/_/grangs brgya sum brgya lnga brgya dang /_/brgya phrag bdun dang brgyad rim bzhin/_/dkrugs dang rlung la grangs stong ste/_/mkhris pa nad med la drug brgya/_/bad kan la ni lnga
[\[93a.7\]]brgya gzhag_/de nas mig 'gram 'dzag sgo bya/_/sman mar snod du gzags byas la/_/dud pa brngubs nas nam mkha' dang /_/gzugs 'tsher ba ni blta mi bya/_/de ltar rlung la nyin re bya/_/mkhris pa nyin re'i bar du gcod/_/bad kan bder gnas gnyis par bcad/_/tshim
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]par 'gyur gyi bar du gtang /_/tshim pas gsal bar mthong nus shing /_/bde zhing mig yang dri ma med/_/ma tshim pa las go bzlog yin/_/tshim drags bad kan nad skyed 'gyur/_/de ni lus kyis snum 'thungs ltar/_/mi gsal mthong ba nyam chung 'gyur/_/de bas lta ba'i rjes la ni/_/mthong ba'i stobs ni skyed
[\[93b.2\]]byed la/_/sngar bshad pa yi mig nad la/_/phur ma btsos pa sbyar bar bya/_/de ni rlung las snum can te/_/bad kan bcas te phyi ba ban/_/mthong nyams rlung dang mkhris bcas dang /_/khrag mkhris bde gnas la gsal byed/_khung nas mthus tshol rlan can gyi/_/tshil dang
[\[93b.3\]]rkang dang zhag sha rlon/_/'o ma dag dang btags pa dang /_/'tsho byed dag dang sbyar ba'i snum/_/ri dwags bya yi mcher pa sha//mu tig lcags zangs rgyam tsha dung /_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba lig bu mig_/ba bla zhog chur sbyar bya/_/ri dwags bya yi mcher pa rkang /_/lto tshil rgyu ma snying
[\[93b.4\]]dang sha/_/mngar bag mar bcas nu zhor bcas/_/btags pa gsal bar byed pa yin/_/sha dang sman gyi lde gu ni/_/gong bu srang gcig so sor byas/_/e raN n+ya gro pad+ma yi/_/lo ma snum pos rim bzhin du/_/dkris la 'byin pas byugs nas ni/_/da ba dgon pa'i lci
[\[93b.5\]]ba'i me/_/'bar bar yongs su bsreg par bya/_/tshos nas de yi khu ba btsir/_/mig tu brta ba'i sman ltar blugs/_/phyi dang snum dang bsal ba la/_/brgya phrag gcig gnyis gsum car bzhag_/dang por dro 'jam phyi bsil blugs/_/de nyid rjes la dud pa brngub/_/des ni
[\[93b.6\]]sbyor ba brta dang mtshungs/_/brta dang phur btsos thigs pa blugs/_/sna sman mi bya la mi gtang /_/ji srid dus ni sman gtong ba/_/de yi nyis 'gyur 'phrod pa bza'/_/me tog dzA ti ma li kas/_/mig bcings mtshan mo gnas par bya/_/sna sman mig sman brta ba la sogs
[\[93b.7\]]pas/_/mig mthu bskyed phyir kun tu 'bad par bya/_/mthong ba nyams na 'gro ba sna tshogs pa'ang /_/mun pa'i rang bzhin tshul gcig nyid du 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//de nas cha spyad kyi cho ga'i le'u
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]bshad par bya'o/_/zug rngu rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/lus ni sna tshogs gnod byed pa/_/'byin ba'i thabs su gang gyur pa/_/spyad yin de bzhin gzhang 'brum dang /_/mtshan par rdo la sogs brta ba dang /_/gtsags bu thal sman me btab pa'i/_/yan lag
[\[94a.2\]]lhag ma bsrung phyir dang /_/mas gtong la sogs spyad ma gtogs/_/bum pa ku ba rA dang ni/_/'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs spyad yin/_/gang phyir cha spyad cho ga bzhin/_/sna tshogs tshul du brdung bya ba/_/blo yis rnam dpyad bya ba ni/_/rags rim tsam zhig bstan pa yin/_/seng
[\[94a.3\]]ge kang+ka dom bya rog_/ri dgas bya sogs kha 'dra ba'i/_/mchu can cha spyad byas nas ni/_/de yi ming yang gdags par bya/_/phal cher lcags kyi rgyu las ni/_/srid du sor ni bco brgyad pa/_/skam pa 'brel pa'i mtshams su ni/_/sran chung lta bu'i gzer gdab pa/_/rtsa ba
[\[94a.4\]]lcags kyu ltar gug pa'i/_/cha spyad bde legs yin zhes bya/_/rtse mo g.yung drung lta bu'o/_/de ni brtan par rus zug pa'i/_/zug rngu 'byin la sbyar bar bya/_/gzer btab rtse mo gyes pa dang /_/skam pa yin te sor bcu drug_/de ni pags pa rtsa rgyus shar/_/zhen pa'i zug
[\[94a.5\]]rngu 'byin la sbyar/_/skam pa sor drug zug rngu phra/_/rdzi ma ma rungs 'byin la sbyar/_/so phra drang zhing rtsa ba ni/_/gdu bus brgyan pa mu tsa ti/_/des rma gting du zug pa dang /_/mig mdzer gting du lus la sbyar/_/nya mgo 'dra bar sor bcu gnyis/_/cha spyad gnyis pa gcig pa bya/_/
[\[94a.6\]]nya mgo lta bu zhes bshad de/_/rna khung zug rngu 'byin la sbyar/_/cha spyad sbu gu can khong stong /_/rtse mo gcig gam mang po bya/_/des ni bu ga'i zug rngu dang /_/nad yod blta dang dbyung ba dang /_/bya ba sla bar bya phyir dang /_/dgang bar bya ba'i don du bya/_/de yi zheng dang sbom srid tshad/_/
[\[94a.7\]]bu ga'i tshad las dpag par bya/_/srid du sor bcu sbom sor lnga/_/gre ba'i zug rngu rtog byed yin/_/rtse mo lnga pa bu ga can/_/rtse mo bzhi la spyi mdud bya/_/cha spyad thur ma gnyis pa ni/_/bu ga gsum pa de'i tshad bya/_/cha spyad bya ba rang gi dbyibs/_/sbom dang chu yi tshad
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]mnyam pa'i/_/sbu gu de 'dra gzhan dag kyang /_/cha spyad shes par byed du gzhug_/rtse mo pad+ma'i snying po 'dra/_/srid du sor ni bcu gnyis pa/_/bzhi cha khong stong byas sbu gu/_/zug rngu 'byin pa yin par bshad/_/gzhang 'brum cha spyad pa yi ni/_/nu sor 'dra ba sor bzhi pa/_/
[\[94b.2\]]skyes pa'i sor lngas 'khyud pa ste/_/bud med sor drug gis 'khyud bya/_/nad lta ba la bu ga gnyis/_/las la bu ga gcig pa bya/_/dbus kyi bu ga sor gsum pa/_/mthe bong shong ba tsam du bya/_/de steng rtse mo zlum po ni/_/dpangs su sor ni phyed par bya/_/khar dkrol de 'dra bug
[\[94b.3\]]med/_/cha spyad gzhang 'brum btsir la sbyar/_/mtshan par rdol la rnam kun tu/_/bu ga yan chad bsal bar bya/_/sna yi shu ba'i 'brum pa la/_/bu ga gcig pa sor gnyis bya/_/zheng du mdzub mo'i tshad tsam las/_/mtshan par rdol gyi spyad 'drar bya/_/sor mo bsrung phyir
[\[94b.4\]]ba so'am/_/shing gis shubs ni sor bzhi bya/_/ba yi nu 'dra bu ga gnyis/_/de yis kha ni dbye bar bya/_/mo mtshan rma brtag dbus su ni/_/khong stong sor ni bcu drug pa/_/phyogs bzhir gdu bus bcing bar bya/_/rtse mo pad+ma kha zlum 'dra/_/thur ma bzhi ni mnan pa yis/_/rtsa
[\[94b.5\]]ba bsdams na kha dbye bya/_/cha spyad 'jam rtsi'i sbubs 'dra la/_/rtsa ba mtheb shong rtse sran shong /_/rtse mo gag pa med pa la/_/rtsa bar lpags 'jam rkyal bu bcing /_/rma yi phug ni 'chas pa dang /_/rma bkru ba la sbyar bar bya/_/'od ma'i sbu gu'am sgro rtsa ni/_/'dra ba kha
[\[94b.6\]]gnyis dmu rdzing spyad/_/dud pa mas gtong la sogs spyad/_/rang rang gi ni skabs su smras/_/rdabs rwa kha zheng sor gsum pa/_/dpangs su sor brgyad pa'am bcu/_/rtse mo'i bu ga g.yungs kar shong /_/legs bkag nu sor dbyibs 'dra bya/_/ku ba srid du sor bcu gnyis/_
[\[94b.7\]]khyud skor sor ni bco brgyad pa/_/kha zlum sor ni gsum mam bzhi/_/nang 'bar bad kan khrag 'dren byed/_/de bzhin bum pa de 'dra ba/_/glan pas skran yang 'ju bar byed/_/thur ma zhes bya'i cha spyad ni/_/las dang dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa/_/ci rigs pa yi tshad ldan bya/_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]de la rma tshol las la gnyis/_/srin bu gan du pa ta'i dbyibs/_/bu ga'i nang gi zug rngu 'byin/_/kha ni sran chud phye 'dra gnyis/_/sor brgyad pa dang dgu pa'i tshad/_/thur ma drug ste de las gnyis/_/sor ni bcu drug bcu gnyis pa/_/thal sman btang ba sbrul kha 'dra/_/gnyis po bcu gnyis sor bcu pa/_/bskul spyad kha ni mda' ltong 'dra//
[\[95a.2\]]'byin pa'i cha spyad lcags kyu'i dbyibs/_/thur ma rtse mo gug pa ni/_/mngal gyi phur pa zhes bya ste/_/srid du sor brgyad byas pa des/_/bud med mngal du bu shi dbyung /_/rde'u 'byin cha spyad sprul mgo yi/_/gdengs
[\[95a.3\]]ka 'dra la rtse gug pa'o/_/mda' ltong 'dra bar sor bzhi pa/_/so dbyung ba la sbyar bar bya/_/rtse mo ras bal gyis dkris pa'i/_/phyi bsal thur ma drug bya'o/_/gzhang gi nye ring nang la gnyis/_/sor bcu ba dang bcu gnyis pa/_/sna yi sor drug bdun pa gnyis/_/rna ba'i sor brgyad
[\[95a.4\]]dgu pa gnyis/_/rna ba bsal la a shwad+tha'i/_/rtse'am blugs gzar kha 'dra bya/_/thur ma 'dzam bu'i thor to 'dra/_/thal sman me btsa' so sor gsum/_/phra sbom rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/rgyu ma'i las la thur ma ni/_/khar ba 'dra zhing dbus zlum la/_/rtsa ba zla ba phyed 'dra bya/_/rgya
[\[95a.5\]]shug tshi gu bkas 'dra ba/_/sna yi thor to 'brum sreg byed/_/sor brgyad pa la rtse mo ljon/_/gsum pa thal sman sman rim la/_/mthe'u chung gung mo srin lag gi_/sen mo lta bu'i so byas pa'o/_/pho mtshan spyad dang mig sman stsogs/_/cha spyad rang rang le'ur bshad/_/nye ba'i cha spyad
[\[95a.6\]]khab long dang /_/thag pa ras dang tho ba dang /_/'bring bu rgyu ma lce rta rda/_/yal ga sren mo kha so dang /_/dus dang smin dang lag rkang dang /_/'jigs dang dga' ba de'i bya ba'i/_/bye brag thabs ni shes pa'o/_/mkhas pas blo yis dpyad par bya/_/cha spyad gdung srub dgang dang rgyun
[\[95a.7\]]srang dag bya dang /_/thal sman gdab dang mtshon dbyung bcing dang bcer ba dang /_/gzhib dang smad dang stod dang bskyod dang bcag pa dang /_/bzlog dang drang por bya ba tsha spyad las rnams yin/_/legs par zug cing 'byin par byed pa dang /_/gzung bya blangs nas 'byin par byed phyir dang /_/yan
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]lag kun la gnod pa med pas na/_/cha spyad kun gyi mchog ni kang+ka'i mchu/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//de nas gtar spyad kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mgar ba mkhas pas cho ga bzhin/_/brdungs pa'i
[\[95b.2\]]gtar spyad nyi shu drug_/spu ni chod par nus pa dag_/phal cher sor ni drug par bya/_/gzugs legs so ni legs pa dang /_/gzung bar bde ba nyid du bya/_/ya yo med cing 'thar legs pa'i/_/shin tu rno ba'i lcags las bya/_/rtse mo shin tu legs brdungs la/_/ut+pal sngon
[\[95b.3\]]po'i mdog 'dra ba'i/_/rang ming rjes mthun gzugs can ni/_/rtag tu nye bar gzhag par bya/_/rtse mo re re dag la yang /_/rang tshod sor phyed gnyis dang bzhi/_/phal cher gnyis dang gsum du bya/_/de gnas khyad par dag la sbyar/_/de las dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i rtse/_/mdzub sen nang
[\[95b.4\]]gi dbyibs 'drar bya/_/de ni rnyil skyes lkog ma yi/_/sha lhag la sogs gzhar bcad sbyar/_/'phel gtsags spu gri'i dbyibs lta bu/_/gcod dang dral dang 'byin la sbyar/_/rtse drang skrangs nad mtho ba dang /_/zab pa la sbyar de las gzhan/_/ltag pa ring zhing rtse gug pa/_/so thung
[\[95b.5\]]nad tshul ji bzhin sbyar/_/ut+pa la dang so phyed kyis/_/dral dang de bzhin gcad par bya/_/sbrul kha rtse sor phyed rna ba/_/sna yi thor bu dpyad la sbyar/_/rma tshol 'jam po rta bla ba'i/_/mgo bo 'dra gzhal brtag par bya/_/de las gzhan pa khab rtse 'dra/_/rtse bug can ni dbug la
[\[95b.6\]]sbyar/_/ljang pa'i lo 'dra 'bigs pa la/_/sha ri'i mchu 'dra mda' bug ni/_/kha 'dra rtse gsum khrag gzags la/_/'jag rtse a ta'i mchu 'dra ba/_/'bras bu sor gnyis khrag 'byin la/_/de 'dra'i so ni nang du lta/_/gtsags 'bras zla ba kham pa 'dra/_/sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod bya/_/
[\[95b.7\]]rtse mo 'bras dang 'dra pa la/_/sor ni phyed dang gnyis yod dag_/de ni rtsa lto'i nad la sbyar/_/sta re'i spangs 'dra ba lang so/_/'dra ba'i gtsags 'bras sor phyed pa/_/de yi yu ba gyen bstan la/_/rus pa'i steng gnas rtsa la gdab/_/zangs ma'i thur ma rtse gnyis pa/_/rtse mo me
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]tog kha 'bus 'dra/_/de yis mthong nyams mig sbris dbug_/rgya 'dra'i gcags bu bya ba ni/_/sor gdub 'dra las kha 'byung ba/_/gtsags 'bras rgyar ni sor phyed pa/_/rig pas 'phel gtsags lta bu'am/_/dkyil 'khor lta bu'i rtse 'dra bya/_/de ni
[\[96a.2\]]mdzub mo'i thor tol/_/gdags su rung ba'i rgya 'dra bya/_/srad bus brtod la gre ba'i nang /_/nad rnams gcad dang dral la sbyar/_/gre ba'i sha lhag thor gtsug 'dzin/_/lcags kyu'i rtse mo legs gug bya/_/rus pa gcod pa'i sog le ni/_/srid du sor bcu zhing sor gnyis/_/so
[\[96a.3\]]rnams phra zhing rab tu rno/_/yu ba chang gzung legs par bya/_/rma yi chu rgyus skra bcad pa'i/_/chan pa chan pa 'dra bar bya/_/so yo so drang kha gnyis pa'i/_/sen mo 'dreg spyad sor dgu pa/_/zug rngu phra 'byung gcad pa dang /_/dral dang dbug dang phyi bar bya/_/zur bzhi pa la sor
