[\[96a.4\]]gcig pa/_/dbyibs ni kun tu gcig 'dra ba/_/so phyi ba yi gcags spyad de/_/so yi dreg pa phyi bar bya/_/khab ni mgo zlum mig zab che/_/mkhrang pa gsum bya de las ni/_/sha che ba yi phyogs su ni/_/zur gsum srid du sor gsum pas/_/sha chung pa dang rus tshigs na/_/
[\[96a.5\]]rma yod pa la srid sor gnyis/_/zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas nad rma'i/_/khab rtse 'bras dbyibs gzhu ltar sgu/_/srid du sor ni phyed dang gsum/_/khab ni bdun dang brgyad kun yang /_/zlum po sor ni legs sbom pa/_/khri gcig la btsugs pir 'dra ba/_/brtsan sngo gdong nad thig le
[\[96a.6\]]gnag_/skra 'byi ba la gtsags par bya/_/khab brgyad zlum po sor phyed pa/_/gcig tu sbom la gzar bu 'dra/_/lag pa gnyis kyis btsugs nas ni/_/de yis sna yi khrag dbyung ngo /_/rna shal dbug pa'i snyung bu ni/_/yu ti ka ni kha 'bus 'dra/_/snyung bu sor ni phyed par bya/_/de yi
[\[96a.7\]]tshad dbug de yan chad/_/zur bzhi par byas de yis ni/_/skrangs smin ma smin dogs la dbug_/rna drung sha ni stug po dbug_/snyung bu kha ni sbom po la/_/sum cha sbu gu yod byas la/_/sor gsum pa yis rna ba dbug_/pad+ma thal sman me btsa' dang /_/mching bu rdo dum sen mo stsogs/_/
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]lcags min gtar spyad phra mo ste/_/de yang de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/cha spyad 'khrul 'khor stsogs pas kyang /_/mkho ba nad kyi dmigs dang sbyar/_/'dren dang 'byin dang 'dral dang 'drub/_/dmigs tshol phya bsal zhal zhal gdab/_/gtsags bcad gshegs dbug btsugs pa dang /_/
[\[96b.2\]]gzung sreg de yis bya ba yin/_/gcad dang dral dang phyi ba'i phyir/_/spyad kyi gtsags 'bras rtsa ba'i bar/_/mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis/_/ma yengs pa dang legs par gzung /_/gtar ga gdab phyir rtse mo'i drung /_/mdzub mo dang ni mthe bos gzung /_'bras 'dra ba yi yu ba
[\[96b.3\]]ni/_/chang par bcug ste rtse mas gdab/_/dbyung don yu ba nas gzung bya/_/gzhan dag bya ba gang bder bya/_/gtar spyad sna tshogs dag gi snod/_/gso ras bal snam men dri'am/_/pags 'jam du gu la las byas/_/rab tu stug pa zheng sor dgu/_/srid du sar ni bcu gnyis
[\[96b.4\]]pa/_bal gyis bar bcad spyad bcug la/_/legs par gzhag ste drub pa dang /_/thur mas kha ni brgyu bar bya/_/srin bu pad pa bder gnas pa/_/khrag dbyung phyir ni sbyar bar bya/_/chu nang nya dang sbal stsogs dang /_/mi ro'i dri ma mnam las byung /_/dmar dang dkar dang shin tu
[\[96b.5\]]gnag_/mi srun sbom dang 'byil ba dang /_/'ja' tshon dang 'dra ro stod bkra/_/spu yod de rnams dug can yin/_/spang bya des ni khrag gzhibs na/_/g.ya' rnags 'dzag rims mgo 'khor skyed/_/de la dugs khrag mkhris gso bya/_/chu mdog rnam par gsal ba dang /_/dug med nya
[\[96b.6\]]lcibs med las byung /_/rtsa snar ro stong sngo khra zlum/_/rgyab ni ngur smrig 'dra lus phra/_/lto ni cung zad ser ba bzang /_/de yang legs par ma skyugs dang /_/rtag tu 'thung du bcug pa dag_/chu nang zhugs te nub pa ni/_/khrag gis myos pa yin pas spangs/_/de nas cig shos
[\[96b.7\]]skye rab brtags//_chu sbyar ba yi nang du gzhug_/kan dzi'am dar ba'i nang du gzhug_/slar yang chur ni dbugs phyung nas/_/mar ram sa zhag nu zho 'am/_/khrag gi thigs pa bskus 'thung gzhug_/'thungs tshe ro stod mthor gyur na/_/ras ma srab mos g.yogs par bya/_khrag
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ni bzang ngan 'dres pa las/_/pad pa dang por nad khrag ni/_/'thungs te ngang pas 'o ma dang /_/'dres chu'i 'o ma len dang mtshungs/_/so yis 'debs pa'am g.ya' gyur na/_/de ni slar dbyung skyug tu gzhug/_/rgyam tsha til mar gyis kha bsku/_/phye ma 'jam pos rgyab tu
[\[97a.2\]]gtor/_/slar yang zhag bdun bar du ni/_/khrag myos bsrungs la 'thung mi gzhug_/srin bu pad pa legs skyugs na/_/sngon bzhin khong grims brtan par 'gyur/_/drags na dal zhing snyom 'chi 'gyur/_/skyugs ma legs na rengs myos 'gyur/_/bum pa chu dang sa blugs pa/_/gzhan
[\[97a.3\]]dang gzhan du gzhag par bya/_/kha chu rul bag sbyang phyir bya/_/gzhan du dug dang bcas par 'gyur/_/ma dag pa'am khrag mang byung /_/skyer pa bu ram sbrang rtsis bsku/_/lan brgyar dkrugs mar ras bal gyi/_/ye'us byugs la sman bsil bsku/_/nad kyi khrag dang bral gyur
[\[97a.4\]]na/_/'phral du rtsa dmar nad med 'gyur/_/ma dag gnas nas bskyod gyur pa/_/rma yi gnas su 'dug pa'i khrag_/zhag lon na ni gnag par 'gyur/_/de bas de ni slar dbyung ngo /_/mkhris rgyas khrag gi nad la ni/_/ku ba bum pa sbyar mi bya/_/de gnyis me dang bcas pa yin/_/rlung
[\[97a.5\]]dang bad kan la sbyar bya/_/bad kan las gyur nad khrag ni/_/ska bas rngabs rus gzhib mi bya/_/rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur khrag_/rngabs rwas gzhibs te dbyung bar bya/_/lus kyi gong du srad bu'am/_/ras kyis dam du bcings nas ni/_/chu ba tshigs rus gnad rnams ni/_/dor
[\[97a.6\]]te zhal zhal gdab bar bya/_/gyen du dbyung ba'i thabs kyis ni/_/thur du babs pa gdab bar bya/_/zab dang nye dang 'phred mi gdab/_/btab ba'i gnas su'ang gdab mi bya/_/zhal zhal bya ba phyogs gcig 'dus/_/rtsa mdud srin bus khrag 'byung zhing /_/bem bem por gyur rwa stsogs
[\[97a.7\]]gdab/_/nad khrag lus khyab gtar ga gdab/_/khrag nad 'dus pa zhal zhal bya/_/gting na yod pa pad pas dbyung /_/pags gnas ku bum rngabs ras dbyung /_/lus khyab khrag la gtar gnyid/_/rlung stsogs gnas la rngabs rwa dang /_/pad pa ku bas rim bzhin dbyung /_/khrag phyung
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]bsil bskus la stsogs pas/_/rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur te/_/rma na g.ya' zhing skrangs gyur na'ang /_/de la zhun mar dron pos bsku/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i cho
[\[97b.2\]]ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/cung zad mngar zhing tsha bro la/_/grang dang tsha min ska ba min/_/pad+ma lam bu chu gsher dang /_/btsod dang ri bong khrag ltar dmar/_/dag cing dmar ba 'byung ba ni/_/de nyid kyis ni lus gnas byed/_/de ni phal cher bad mkhris kyi/_/nad
[\[97b.3\]]kyis 'khrugs pas gnod bskyad pas/_/me dbal 'bras dang mcher nad dang /_/skran dang me drod bri dang rims/_/kha dang mig dang mgo nad dang /_/myos dang skom dang tsha bro dang /_/mdze dang dreg nad mkhris khrag dang /_/sgregs pa skyur zhing mgo 'khor byed/_/bsil
[\[97b.4\]]dro snum dang rtsub stsogs kyis/_/nad gang gsos par gyur pa dag_/legs par 'chos par ma gyur pa/_/de ni khrag 'khrugs las gyur yin/_/khrag bdo gyur pa de las ni/_/gtar ga gdab pas dbyung bar bya/_/de yang bcu drug ma lon dang /_/bdun cu 'das la khrag mi dbyung /_/
[\[97b.5\]]nyam chung dugs drags dugs ma byas/_/rlung gi nad kyis nyen pa dang /_sbrum ma bu btsas zas ma zhu/_/khrag mkhris lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/tshad 'khru rims dang skyugs pa dang /_/skya rbab yan lag kun skrangs dang /_/snum 'thungs pa la sbyor ba dang /_/de bzhin las
[\[97b.6\]]lnga byas la min/_/ma bsdams gtar ga mi gdab cing /_/yon po'am mi snang la mi gdab/_/tshabs chen nad ni ma gtogs pa/_/grang la tsha char rlung dus min/_/mgo dang mig gi nad rnams la/_/'phral ba'i rtsa la gtar ba'am/_/mig 'gram sna drung rtsa la gdab/_/rna ba'i nad
[\[97b.7\]]la rna ba'i rtsa/_/sna yi nad la sna rtser ro/_/cham pa sna dang dpral rtsar gdab/_/kha nad rnams la lce dang ni/_/mchu dang rkan gyi rtsar gdab bo/_/nam tshong yan chad rtsa mdud mgul/_/rna ba mur 'gram spyir gnas gdab/_/smyo byed mig 'gram brang dpral rtsa/_/brjed byed 'gram pa'i
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]mtshams su gdab/_/yang na kun la smin mtshams gdab/_/'bras dang rtsib logs zug pa la/_/rtsib logs nu ma'i bar rtsa gdab/_/nyin gsum pa la phrag mtshams gdab/_/nyin bzhi pa la ltag pa'i 'og_/'khru ba gzer dang ldan pa la/_/mjug to'i
[\[98a.2\]]gong ma sor gnyis par/_/khu ba'i mtshan nad pho mtshan rtsa/_/lkog ma'i wa bar brla rtsa gdab/_/gzugs 'khums pus mthil 'og gam ni/_/gong gi sor bzhi pa la gdab/_/'bras kyi phreng bar byin pa'i nywa/_/'og tu sor ba gnyis gdab bo/_/rkub tshos bus mo'i lha nga'i
[\[98a.3\]]steng /_/nad la long mo'i ltag sor bzhir/_/rkang tsha 'theng dang sbrid pa dang /_/rting rdol rlung nad mdzer pa dang /_/rkang sor snags su chad pa la/_/rgya tshigs las gong sor gnyis gdab/_/'khums la rkang 'khums lta bur gdab/_/ji skad bshad pa ma mngon na/_/gnad
[\[98a.4\]]ma gtogs pa gar nye ba'i/_/phyogs gzhan dag tu gtar ga gdab/_/de nas lus snum gtar ga yi/_/yo byad kun bsags stobs dang ldan/_/bkra shis byas shing kha zas ni/_/snum zos khu ba 'thungs pa dang /_/me dang nyi tshan gyis dugs byas/_/pus mnyam mtho ba'i
[\[98a.5\]]stan la 'dug_/skra rtsa ras ni 'jam pos bcings/_/pus mo'i lha ngar gru mo btsugs/_/khu tshur nang du glod bcug pas/_/mgul pa dam du btsir bar bya/_/so bsdam lud pa lu ba dang /_/mkhur ba gnyis ni bud par bya/_/de la rgyab nas btsir ba dang /_/gos kyis
[\[98a.6\]]dkri zhing mdzub mo ni/_/g.yon pa lkog mar bcug nas su/_/nang du legs par gzhug par bya/_/'di ni nang du kha bltas rtsa/_/ma gtogs bsdam pa'i cho ga yin/_/de 'og sman pa'i mthe bo las/_/gung mo btang bar gyur ba yis/_/rtsa byung mngon la gdab byas nas/_/
[\[98a.7\]]reg pa'am mthe bos mnan byas la/_/lag pa g.yon pas bzung ba yi/_/gtsags pu sta res dbus su gdab/_/gtsags bu'i kha phyogs mi g.yo gtad/_/de bzhin gdab pa'am btsir ba yis/_/bem rtol gdab las khrag dbyung ngo /_/sna drung gi ni rtsar
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gdab pa/_/rtse mo mthe bos bteg nas ni/_/gtsags rtse 'bras 'dra gdab par bya/_/lce bteg bzlog ste sos mnan la/_/lce 'og rtsar ni gdab par bya/_/nu ma yan chad bsdams nas ni/_/mgul par gnas pa'i rtsar gdab bo/_/lag pa gnyis su rdo bcangs te/_/lag
[\[98b.2\]]pa pus mor brten te brkyang /_/mchan khung man chad mnyes nas na/_/gong du bcings la mdo rtsar gdab/_/lag ngar rtsa ni bder 'dug ste/_/gdab pa'i sor bzhi gong gi ni/_/phyogs su ras kyis dam bcings la/_/mthe bo chang par bcug nas ni/_/lag ngar brkyang la
[\[98b.3\]]gdab par bya/_/rtsib logs rtsa ni dpung pa gnyis/_/thur du dpyangs te gdab bar bya/_/pho mtshan rtsa ni bteg gdab/_/byin rtsa pus mo ma bkug par/_/rkang pa legs gzhag pus mo la/_/'og tu lag pa gnyis kyis ni/_/long mo'i bar du dam btsir la/_/rkang
[\[98b.4\]]pa de steng gnyis pa ni/_/cung zad bkug ste bzhag pa yis/_/mnan la de nas lag pa ltar/_/rtsar gdab de ltar ma smos pa'i/_/gzhan dag la yang gdab byas la/_/thabs shes gtsags spyad de dang des/_/phyogs ni de dang de ru gdab/_/sha che ba yi phyogs su 'debs/_
[\[98b.5\]]'bras 'dra 'bras kyi srid tsam gdab/_/rus pa'i steng rtsa sta re 'dras/_/nas kyi phyed tsam gdab par bya/_/legs par btab nas khrag gzags te/_/chings ma bkrol nas gzag mi bya/_/gdab ma legs pa dus cung zad/_/nyung zad 'byung ba til phye gdab/_/gdab drags
[\[98b.6\]]sgra dang bcas par ni/_/'byung zhing bcad kyang dka' bar 'gyur/_/dbang dang 'bog par 'gyur ba dang /_/chings lhod mtshon rtul 'grangs drags dang /_/nyam chung shugs nyen dugs ma byas/_/khrag mi 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no/_/khrag ni legs par ma byung na/_/byi dang tsha gsum
[\[98b.7\]]skyer pa dang /_/rgya spos rgyam tsha khyim dud bcas/_/til mar btags la rma la bsku/_/khrag ni legs byung til mar dang /_/rgyam tshar bcas pa dro 'jam bsku/_/le brgan rtsi las tshon ser ltar/_/dang po nad khrag 'byung par 'gyur/_/legs par byung na rang nyid 'chad/_/khrag bzang
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]byung na'ang dbyung mi bya/_/brgyal 'gyur na ni chings ma dgrol/_/rlung g.yab kyis g.yab slar khrag dbyung /_/slar 'bog gyur na nyi ma ni/_/gnyis pa'ang gsum pa dag la gdab/_/rlung khrag gnag cing dmar la rtsub/_/shugs drag gsal zhing lbu ba can/_/
[\[99a.2\]]mkhris khrag ser la rtsa gnag mnam/_/sbyin bag dro zhing tshon can yin/_/bad kan khrag ni 'jam la skya/_/rgyun can 'byar zhing ska ba yin/_/'dres pa'i mtshan ma 'dres ma yin/_/nyes gsum dri ma rnyog ma can/_/khrag ngan pa ni nyams che la'ang /_/tshad las lhag par
[\[99a.3\]]dbyung mi bya/_/khrag dbyung drags na'ang 'chi ba'am/_/rlung nad mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de la bsku byug 'o ma khu/_/khrag bcud blud pa sman yin no/_/khrag phyung nas ni chings ma dag_/dal gyis bkrol la chu bsil gyis/_/bkrus la til mar gyis byugs pa'i/_
[\[99a.4\]]gos 'jam gyis ni rma kha dkri/_/khrag nad yod na phyi 'bred dam/_/phyi de nyin par slar yang dbyung /_/shin tu gnod pa'i khrag zla phyed/_/snum gyis brtas pa'i lus las dbyung /_/khrag ngan cung zad lus kyang ni/_/nad ni lhag par mi skyed pas/_/de phyir lhag ma yod
[\[99a.5\]]gyur yang /_/gzhag gi shas cher mi dbyung ngo /_/lhag ma rngabs rwa stsogs gdab pa'ang /_/yang na spyod bsil khrag mkhris bsal/_/sbyang dang skam pa'i bye brag ni/_/gso bas de ni dang bar bya/_/nad khrag rab rgyas ma gyur ba'am/_/de 'dra'i thabs kyis gso bar bya/_/
[\[99a.6\]]khrag gi rgyun ni mchod na/_/gcad pa'i sbyor ba myur du bya/_/seng phrom rma shing pri yang ku/_/ma sha shing mngar yug snam btsag_/gyo dum zar ma snag tsha dang /_/'o ma can shing shun lo ma/_/btags pa'i phye ma rma khar gdab/_/shug stsogs chu grang sbyar ba blud/_/
[\[99a.7\]]yang na rtsa btab de gong gi_/rtsa de nyid la gtar ga gdab/_/yang na thur ma bsregs pa yis/_/rma kha myur du bsreg par bya/_/bcings pa nyes pas lam log la gnas te/_/nad ni rgyas pas khrag ni 'khrugs 'gyur ba/_/rang gi gnas su slar phyin ma gyur pa/_/de srid
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]zas dang spyod lam phan pa bsten/_/shin tu tsha grang ma yin yang drod skyed/_/khrag sel byed pa'i bza' dang btung ba phan/_/de tshe lus dang khrag bder mi gnas pas/_/khyad par du ni me las bsrung bar bya/_/mdog dang dbang po gsal zhing dbang po yul/_/'dod
[\[99b.2\]]cing zas 'ju shugs kyang bde bar 'ju/_/bde dang ldan zhing stobs rgyas phun sum tshogs/_/mi yi nad khrag dag pa yin par bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas zug rngu dbyung
[\[99b.3\]]ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/zug rngu'i bgrod pa rnam lnga ste/_/yo drang thad ka steng dang 'og_/kha gnag skrangs dang nad dang bcas/_/yang dang yang du khrag 'dzag la/_/rma yi nye 'khor mtho zhing glo/_/chu bur lta bu'i thor bu 'byung /_/sha ni 'jam 'gyur
[\[99b.4\]]lus mdor na/_/khong du zug rngu yod shes bya/_/khyad par du ni pags pa na/_/mtshon lus mdog nyams sra ba dang /_/skrangs par 'gyur ro shar gnas pa/_/nad dang skrang pa lhag par 'phel/_/btsir bar mi bzod smin pa dang /_/rma yi sgo ni 'drub mi shes/_/nya yi
[\[99b.5\]]nang zug shar zug dang /_/'dra las skrang bag med pa yin/_/chu ba'i dra ba'i nang lus pa'i/_/chu ba las ni 'byung dka' zhing /_/bsgul dka' bskyod tshe rengs shing na/_/rtsa la brten pa rtsa skrang 'gyur/_/bu ga'i sbubs gnas sbubs kyis ni/_/rang gi las dang yon tan
[\[99b.6\]]nyams/_/rtsa chen gnas pa'ang dbugs dang khrag_/lbu ba can du 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/sgra dang bcas par 'byung ba dang /_/snying dang yan lag na bcas 'gyur/_/rus tshigs bog rer mtshon lus pa/_/rus brtse tshabs cher na bar 'gyur/_/rus gnas nad mang skrang
[\[99b.7\]]bar byed/_/tshigs la gnas pa de dang 'dra/_/bskyod par dka' ba dag tu'ang 'gyur/_/nang grol nang yod 'khrugs pa dang /_/lbo zhing kha zas ngan skyugs gcin/_/rma yi khar ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnad kyi nang du mtshon lus pa/_/gnad zug mtshan nyid las
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]shes bya/_/pags pa la sogs rang rang gi_/ji ltar 'dzag las shes par bya/_/skyon med lus kyi rma 'tsho ba ste/_/de ni gnod pa med par gnas/_/nad 'khrugs snad pa la sogs kyis/_/bslangs nas slar yang gnod pa skyed/_/gang yang
[\[100a.2\]]rung bar pags pa nyams/_/bsku dang mnye dang dugs byas nas/_/mdog dmar na zhing tsha la 'khrugs/_/yang na gang du mar gzhag 'ju/_/lde gus byugs pa myur du bskams/_/gnas der zug rngu bcas shes bya/_/shar lus sbyang bar byas pa
[\[100a.3\]]yis/_/skem byas lhongs 'gyur bskul ba dang /_/btsan dmar sogs kyis shes par bya/_/nya dang rus tshigs nang grol gyi/_/zug rngu'ang de bzhin shes par bya/_/rus pa zug rngus ma rungs 'gyur/_/rus pa bsku dang dugs bya zhing /_/mnye dang btsir
[\[100a.4\]]las shes par bya/_/rus tshigs gnas pa rus 'dra dang /_/brkyang dang bskum las shes par bya/_/chu ba rtsa dang rtsa chen sbubs/_/zug rngu mi mnyam lam 'gro dang /_/shing rta chag pa'i rta dang ni/_/ldan par nad pa bskyon nas su/_/myur du drangs nas de nas ni/_/bskyod pas
[\[100a.5\]]zug rngu shes par bya/_/gnad zug logs shig ma bshad de/_/de rnams sha stsogs la gnas yin/_/spyir ni zug rngu bcas bskyod pa'i/_/bya bas nad bcas las shes bya/_/mdor na zlum dang gyes pa dang /_/zur bzhi ba dang zur gsum pa'i/_/rma yi dbyibs las zug
[\[100a.6\]]rngu ni/_/mi mngon rnam par shes par bya/_/de rnams dbyung ba'i thabs gyur gnyis/_/phyir drang ba dang mdun nas drang /_/rtse nas drang dang rtsa nas drang /_/de las bzlog pas dbyung bar bya/_/dbyung sla gang na yod dral te/_/de nas thad kar drang bar bya/_/mtshon ni brang dang mtshan
[\[100a.7\]]khung dang /_/brla drung rtsib logs zug pa dang /_/mdun drang rtse mo mngon gcad bya/_/kha zheng che drang mi bya dang /_/zug rngur ma gyur mde'u dang /_/mi mngon gnod med pa mi dbyung /_/de nas lag pas zin gyur na/_/lag pa gnyis kyis drang bar bya/_/snang gzhan seng ge chu srin
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dang /_/bar gyi karta ti mchus drang /_/mi mngon rma yi dbyibs las ni/_/gal te dbyung bar nus gyur pa/_/kang ka bring ka khrung khrung dang /_/bya rog sha ra bye'i mchus drang /_/pags stsogs la gnas skam pas drang /_/khong stong nang nas nya mgos dbyung /_/sbu
[\[100b.2\]]gur gnas pa 'dam bu 'dras/_/lhag ma gzhan gyis ci rigs drang /_/yang na dang po mtshon gyis dral/_/de nas rma yi khrag bsal ba/_/byas la mar gyis dugs bya zhing /_/bcings te spyod pa bsten par bya/_/rtsa dang chu bar mtshon lus pa/_/thur mas bskyod
[\[100b.3\]]de dbyung bar bya/_/snying gar gnas pa'i zug rngu ni/_/chu grang gtor bas sngangs byas la/_/gnas gzhan phyin cing 'phags gyur na/_/ci rigs par ni dbyung bar bya/_/rma yi sgo nas dbyung dka' ba/_/gzhan dag la yang de bzhin sbyar/_/rus par zug pa rkang
[\[100b.4\]]pa ni/_/gnyis kyis mnan la drang bar bya/_/de ltar ma nus stobs che ba'i/_/g.yog gis dam du bzung ste dbyung /_/'on kyang ma nus mde'u'i rtsa/_/bkug la gzhu rgyud dam btags la/_/rta srab kyi ni kha lcags mthar/_/ma yengs pa yis dam btags te/_/
[\[100b.5\]]yan lag lnga pa legs bsdams nas/_/rta ni lcag gis gzhus nas su/_/brdeg cing mgo bo bteg nas ni/_/shugs kyis ji bzhin brtod nas ni/_/de ltar zug rngu dbyung ba'am/_/yang na shing gi yal gar gdags/_/mde'u rtsa phra bar srad bu dag_/btags te zug
[\[100b.6\]]rngu dbyung bar bya/_/rma skrangs mde'u rtsa mi mngon na/_/skrangs pa lags par btsir nas dbyung /_/dong bu tho bas brdungs pa yis/_/mtho zhing snang bar gyur na dbyung /_/lam ma yin par 'byung ba gang /_/de nyid kyis ni rmar dbyung bya/_/mde'u zur bcum ste dbyung ba'am/_/dong
[\[100b.7\]]bu kha yis dbyung bar bya/_/rna ba med cing rma kha dbye/_/drang 'dug khab long bstan pas dbyung /_/zhu ba'i gnas su zug rngu ni/_/bkru sman nyid kyis dbyung bar bya/_/rlung gnod dugs dang nu zho dang /_/khrag dang chus gnod gzhibs pas bsal/_/gre ba'i nang zhugs
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]zug rngu la/_/skud pa gre bar gzhug bya ste/_/pad+ma'i rtsa bar skud pas gdags/_/pad rtsa zug rngu lhan cig drang /_/lcags sreg mig chur bcug pa yi/_/lcags thur brtan por byas nas ni/_/rgya skyegs can nam rgya skyegs med/_/rgya skyegs kyis
[\[101a.2\]]bsgos zug rngu dbyung /_/skra shad 'dzings pa 'thungs pa dang /_/gsher bas tsher ma zug pa gdon/_/'phral du srad bu thogs pa yis/_/slon par bya'o des cig shos/_/kha snar drang bar ma nus na/_/gzhan du thur du mid par bya/_/zas kyis brnangs pa'i zug rngu ni/_
[\[101a.3\]]chu btung phrag par brdegs pas gzhug_/mig gi rma yi zug rngu phra/_/dar ram bal lam chu yis bsal/_/mi ni chus gang kha sbubs te/_/sprugs pa'am brkyang la btsir slon pa'am/_/thal khung brkos te mi yi ni/_/ske yi bar du nub par gzhug/_/rna ba chus
[\[101a.4\]]gang lag pa yis/_/mnyes la til mar rgyun blugs la/_/rna ba thur du bstan nas ni/_/gdab pa'am yang na brngub bar bya/_/rna ba'i nang du 'bu zhugs na/_/rna ba tsha chus bkang ba'am/_/tsha chu dro 'jam nyid kyis dgang /_/shi nas 'bu ro dbyung thabs bya/_/rgya skyegs
[\[101a.5\]]can dang gser dngul stsogs/_/'byung khungs las byung yun rings gnas/_/mtshon ni phal cher lus kyi me/_/drod kyis 'ju bar byed pa yin/_/sa dang 'od ma shing rwa rus/_/so dang skra dang rdo ba'ang 'ju/_/rwa dang 'od tshal lcags ta la/_/shing tshal zug rngu ring
[\[101a.6\]]pos kyang /_/phal cher de dag tshos 'gyur la/_/khrag dang sha yis tshos par byed/_/zug rngu sha yi gting du zug/_/phyogs de tsha ba'am med gyur na/_/de nas de ni snang bya'i phyir/_/mnye dugs sbyangs dang sha dbri blta/_/sman rnon bcings dang zas skom sbyin/_/mtshon
[\[101a.7\]]gyis btab cing gtsags pa yis/_/smin par byas nas rma dbral dang /_/btsal dang bye bas zug rngu dbyung /_/zug rngu'i gnas dang cha spyad kyi/_/tshul ni mang pos legs brtags te/_/blo ldan thabs ni de dang des/_/shes par byas la zug rngu dbyung /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gtar ga gdab pa'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rma ni phal cher dang por ni/_/skrangs dang smin las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bas de nyid gso bya ste/_/de bsil byugs blugs
[\[101b.2\]]khrag dbyung dang /_/legs par sbyangs pa la sogs pas/_/smin par gyur las 'bad de bsrung /_/thor bu ma smin skrangs drod chung /_/mdog 'dra sra zhing brtan par gnas/_/smin tshe mdog ni 'gyur ba dang /_/dmar zhing rkyal bu'i dbyibs ltar 'dug_/gas pa lta bu'i
[\[101b.3\]]nad bcas dang /_/yan lag snyom zhing glal bcas dang /_/lus grugs 'khrugs tsha yig 'chus/_/rims 'debs skom dad gnyid med dang /_/mar 'khyags bzhag na 'ju ba dang /_/rma gtar reg na mi bzod do/_/smin gyur na ba'i shugs chung zhing /_/rnyid cing skya
[\[101b.4\]]la gnyer ma 'du/_/mtha' ma 'jum zhing dbus su mtho/_/g.ya' dang skrang ba la sogs chung /_/rkyal pa yi ni chu lta bur/_/reg na rnag ni phan tshun rgyu/_/rlung min min mkhris min tsha/_/med de bad kan med mi skrang /_/khrag med dmar bar mi 'gyur te/_/de bas nad
[\[101b.5\]]khrag dang bcas smin/_/smin pa thal drags khong stong dang /_/nad kyis zos pas pags pa srab/_/gnyer ma 'jum zhing mdog gnag la/_/ba spu rnams ni 'byi bar 'gyur/_/bad kan shas che'i skrang pa ni/_/smin pa gting ring khrag gis gang /_/de bas smin rtags
[\[101b.6\]]gsal ma yin/_/skrang pa gang du bsil 'gyur zhing /_/pags mdog mi 'gyur nad tshabs chung /_/rdo ltar reg na sra ba ni/_/mkhas pas the tshom med par de/_/khrag gi smin pa zhes bshad bya/_/snying stobs nyam chung byis pa dang /_/thor bu smin pa'i tshabs che'am/_/gnad
[\[101b.7\]]dang rus tshigs la sogs par/_/'byung ba ma gtogs gzhan dag 'dral/_/ma smin brtol na rtsa rgyus la/_/gnod cing khrag ni mang du 'byung /_/nad tshabs rab 'phel rma gyes pa'am/_/rma 'byung thor bu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rnag ni nang du gnas gyur pa/_/'phel
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]bas rtsa rgyus sha dang ni/_/khrag rnams myur du sreg byed de/_/rtswa skam la ni me dang mtshungs/_/gang zhig ma smin brtol ba dang /_/gang zhig smin kyang btang snyoms 'jog_/khyad par mi shes de dag ni/_/sme sha can 'drar shes par bya/_/ma brtol
[\[102a.2\]]ba yi dang po ni/_/kha zas phan pa sbyin par bya/_/tshor ba mi bzad bzod 'gyur bas/_/chang 'thung ba la chang blud bya/_/zas zos pas ni mi brgyal zhing /_/nang du mtshon btab tshor mi 'gyur/_/rum du bu shi rde'u chags pa dang /_/kha nad dmu rdzing can ma gtogs/_/
[\[102a.3\]]de nas yo byad kun bsags te/_/nad pa shar du kha bstan la/_/sman pa mngon phyogs bsdams nas ni/_/gnad stsogs ma gtogs gtsags bus gdab/_/sha shugs rjes mthun shin tu rno/_/gtsags bu rnag phyin bar du gdab/_/de ni cig car gdab bar
[\[102a.4\]]bya/_/smin pa chen po yod kyang ni/_/rma zheng sor gnyis dral bya'am/_/sor gnyis pa yi zab sor gsum/_/mdzub mo chu ba spu dag gis/_/gnas phyogs ji bzhin brtag pa'am/_/rma 'tshol gyis ni legs btsal zhing /_/kun
[\[102a.5\]]tu legs par brtag par bya/_/gang nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang du mtho ba shes byas la/_/de dang der ni rma btod de/_/legs phye phug ni med par bya/_/chu dang zheng du ci nas kyang /_/nad ni gnas par mi 'gyur bya/_/sman pa dpa' brtan las la myur/_/mtshon rno mi rtul mi 'dar la/_/kun
[\[102a.6\]]tu rmongs par ma gyur pa/_/gtsags bus 'debs pa'i las la bsngags/_/gyen du bcad rtsa 'phral smin rtsa/_/rnyil dang ske rtsa lto sbos dang /_/mchan khung dang ni mig sbubs mchu/_/mkhur tshos brla drung chu so rtsa'o/_/gzhan dag gyen du bcad na ni/_/rtsa dang chu ba'ang
[\[102a.7\]]ma rungs 'gyur/_/gtsags bus btab nas nad pa ni/_/tshig snyan chu ni bsil ba yis/_/dbugs phyung nas ni de 'og rma/_/sor mos kun nas btsir ba dang /_/bska ba'i chu yis legs bkrus shing /_/sman chur bcug pa'i gos kyis phyi/_/gu gul yungs kar a
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]ru ra/_/shing kun ka ra rgyam tsha dang /_/shu dag nim pa'i lo ma ni/_/mar dang sbyar bas bdug par bya/_/til gyi lde gu mar sbrang rtsi/_/rang gi sman ni ji lta bas/_/byugs shing de nas rma tshangs gzhug_/de nyid kyis ni de g.yogs la/_/mar dang phye sprus bskus
[\[102b.2\]]pa dang /_/de'i 'og kog tse stug po ni/_/gzhag ste shin tu ma yengs pas/_/gos kyis legs par bcing byas te/_/glo dang g.yas dang g.yon dag gam/_/steng dang 'og tu ma song bya/_/rma tshangs kog tse dkris mar bcas/_/phra zhing sra la gtsang ba la/_/spos kyis
[\[102b.3\]]bdugs shing 'jam la mnyen/_/kham khum med cing rma la phan/_/bcings nas de'i 'og tu de/_/gnod pa bzlog phyir bsrung bar bya/_/de rnams la ni gtor ma sbyin/_/lak+Sh+mi gu ha a ti gu ha/_/spang spos pra ma tsa ri ni/_/tsha tra a ti tsha tra dang /_/dur ba shu dag nyungs
[\[102b.4\]]kar dag_/rtag tu de yi spyi bor btags/_/de nas snum gyi cho gar bshad/_/nyin re'i kun spyod bshad pa bstan/_/nyin par gnyid log rma g.ya' zhing /_/kha dmar na skrangs rnag 'khyims 'gyur/_/bud med dran nam reg pa'am/_/mthong bas khu ba byung
[\[102b.5\]]'gyur na/_/ma phrad na'ang 'khrig pa las/_/byung ba'i skyon ni thob par 'gyur/_/kha zas dag ni gang goms las/_/nas dang gro dang drug cu pa/_/sran chung mung+ga du ba ri/_/ni shan nA ga dzi ban+ti/_/la phug gzhon nu brta ka/_/rgya sne'u dan+du li ya ka/_/ka ra be+e la
[\[102b.6\]]karko ta/_/ka du ga pal pa to la/_/rgyam tsha se 'bru skyu ru ra/_/chu bskol ba ni bsgrangs pa dang /_/'bras rnying chang dang snum nyung zad/_/zos rjes su chu tshan btung ba dang /_/skam sa'i sha ni zos gyur na/_/rma ni myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/dus su ran par bza' ba dang /_/
[\[102b.7\]]phan pa zos na bde 'ju 'gyur/_/ma zhu ba yi rlung la stsogs/_/ldang zhing nad ni stobs can 'gyur/_/de las skrangs dang rnags pa dang /_/tsha dang sbos par 'gyur ba yin/_/'bru gsar til dang ma sha dang /_/chang dang rlan can las byung sha_/'o ma bu ram shing
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]las gyur/_/skyur dang lan tshwa tsha ba dang /_/gzhan gang 'khru ba gcod byed dang /_/tsha dang bsil dang lci ba yang /_/'bru sa ra la sogs sde tshan 'di/_/rma dang lan pa'i nad kun skyed/_/chang ni rno ba tsha rtsub 'gyur/_/rma la myur du gnod par
[\[103a.2\]]byed/_/ba la uR+shi ras g.yab cing /_/'di ni bskyod par mi bya la/_/drag shul mi gzug 'phrug mi bya/_/bskyod pa'i tshe na bag bya'o/_/mdza' dang bram ze rgan stsogs kyi/_/gtam ni yid la dga' ba nyan/_/nad las thar ba'i re bcas pas/_/rma ni myur du 'tsho
[\[103a.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/nyin gsum lon tshe rma yi tshas/_/slar yang bkrus sogs las rnams ni/_/snga ma bzhin bya de bzhin du/_/nyin zhag gnyis par mi bya'o/_/tshabs cher na zhing mi 'byar la/_/rma ni yun ring zhig na 'tsho/_/rma tshangs sam ni lde gus glan/_/snum ches rtsub
[\[103a.4\]]ches dam pa dang /_/lhod drags gzhag nyes mi bya ste/_/snum ches rma ni rid par 'gyur/_/rtsub ches sha 'chad shin tu na/_/gas shing khrag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dam dang klod drags gzhag nyes pas/_/rma yi kha ni 'drud par 'gyur/_/rma ni rnag bcas skrangs shing
[\[103a.5\]]mtho/_/rgyu bcas rnag phugs 'chas pa dag_/rma tshangs 'jam po nang gnas pas/_/rma yi skyon ni dag par byed/_/skrangs pa ha cang ma smin brtol/_/smin zhing rnags par 'gyur ba spyad/_/phan pa'i sman dang zas sbyin dkri/_/shin tu rmar mi gnod pas gso/_/
[\[103a.6\]]snad pa'i rma ni gsar du byung /_/ral zhing kha bye 'phral du btsem/_/rmen bu chen po bkas pa dang /_/rna shal bu ga chad pa'ang btsem/_/mgo dang mig phugs sna dang mchu/_/mkhur tshos rna pa dpung pa brla/_/mgul pa phrag pa rlig pa dpyi/_/pho mtshan gzhang dang lto ba
[\[103a.7\]]stsogs/_/phugs ring ba yi gnas rnams dang /_/sha che mi 'gul ma yin dang /_/chu so mchan khung la stsogs dang /_/sha chung mgul pa'i rma dag dang /_/dbugs dbyung zug rngu yod pa dang /_/thal sman dug mes tshig mi btsem/_/btsem pa rus dum khrag skam
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]dang /_/rtsa dang spu rnams bsal nas ni/_/sha chad dum bu 'phyang ba dang /_/rang gi gnas su glan pa dang /_/rus tshigs bcug cing khrag gzags la/_/skud pa shing shun rgyus pas btsem/_/srubs ni nye ba'am ring mi bya/_/blang ba che ba'am chung mi bya/_/de nas spro
[\[103b.2\]]bsring byas nas mthar/_/rma ni sbrang rtsi mar sbyar dang /_/skyer pa zar ma'i dud pa dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang sa la ki/_/seng phrom mngar dang snum bcas pas/_/bskus la bcing stsogs sngon bzhin bya/_/rma kha khrag ni med 'gyur gang /_/de ni cung zad 'brud bya ste/_/rma
[\[103b.3\]]'byor byed pa khrag yin pas/_/phyung ste legs par drub par bya/_/de la bcings pa yul la stsogs/_/brtags nas nges par sbyar bar bya/_/bal gos pags pa dar gsum dro/_/zar ma'i ras ni bsil ba yin/_/dro grang ran pa shing bal 'dab/_/ras bal rgyus pa shing
[\[103b.4\]]shun yin/_/zangs lcags zha nye ro nye yis/_/bad kan tshil ches rma la glan/_/chag thur shing byang pags pa dang /_/shing shun smyig tshal stsogs pas bcings/_/dbyibs ni rang min rjes mthun pa'i/_/bcing ba bco lnga rnam bya ste/_/shubs dang bkra shis lhod par
[\[103b.5\]]bcing /_/mthar chags bcing dang zlum por bcing /_/mda' lcags khri dang dam bcing dang /_/sgye'u bla re lkog shal dang /_/'ur mthil zung glan zlum pa dang /_/yan lag lnga pa zhes bya sbyar/_/de las gang zhig gang legs sbyor/_/de ni de ru legs par sbyar/_/
[\[103b.6\]]brla dang mjug tsos mchan khung dang /_/chu so spyi bor dam du bcing /_/lag ngar gdong dang rna ba dang /_/rgyab dang rtsib logs mgul pa lto/_/pho mtshan rlig pa ran par bcing /_/mig dang tshigs su lhod par bcing /_/lhod bcings rma ni bad kan dang /_/rlung shas che
[\[103b.7\]]la ran par bcing /_/ran zhing gnas su dam du bcing /_/dam zhing shin tu dam du bcing /_/dgun dang de bzhin dpyid kyi tshe/_/zhag ni gsum gsum dag nas dgrol/_/khrag mkhris shas che'i rma dag ni/_/dam bcing gnas su ran par bcing /_/ran bcing
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]gnas su lhod par bcing /_/lhod bcing gnas su bcing mi bya/_/de gnyis so ga ston gyi tshe/_/snga dro phyi dro dgrol bar bya/_/ma bcings sha sbrang sbrang bu dang /_/lhags pa ser bu stsogs pas gnod/_/rma red 'gyur zhing der snum dang /_/sman ni
[\[104a.2\]]yun ring gnas mi 'gyur/_/sbyang ba'am 'tsho bar dka' ba dang /_/'tshob kyang mdog ni mi sdug 'gyur/_/bcings na chag bcing phyi mar 'gyur/_/'phres sam 'bur gyur dral gyur tam/_/rtsa dang rgyus pa chad gyur kyang /_/rma ni myur du bde bar 'tsho/_/ldang
[\[104a.3\]]dang nyal ba la sogs pa'i/_/spyod lam kun la gnod pa med/_/rma kha skyes mtho mi mnyam dang /_/sra zhing rab na 'tsho ba dka'/_/'jam zhing mnyam la na ba med/_/rma ni myur du dag cing 'tshob/_/rma ni yun ring sha chung dang /_/rtsub pas 'byor par ma gyur na/_/
[\[104a.4\]]nad gzhi dus tshigs ji bzhin du/_/sman dang lo mas dgab par bya/_/ma rnying gzhon zhing bu ga med/_/kun nas legs par khebs pa dang /_/phyis shing mi rtsub lo ma ni/_/'o ma can shing stag pa dang /_/ardzu na dang ka dam+ba'i/_/lo ma yis ni g.yogs par
[\[104a.5\]]bya/_/mdze dang me yis tshig pa dang /_/'bus zos gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/byi ba sbrul gyi dug dang ni/_/thal sman rno dang dug gis pho/_/rma ni bcing bar mi bya zhing /_/sha 'drul gzhang khar mi bzad rnags/_/'drul zhing tsha dang na bcas par/_/skrangs skams
[\[104a.6\]]med bal mi bcing ngo /_/rma gang legs par ma bsrungs par/_/sbrang ma srin bu 'jug byed de/_/de yis zos pas na ba dang /_/skrang dang rnag khrag 'dzag par byed/_/der ni bkru dang dag par ni/_/bye'u rug la sogs sde tshan sbyar/_/sap+ta par+Ni ka rany+dza/_/arka dang
[\[104a.7\]]ni nim pa dang /_/ra tsha dang ni shing tsha rnams/_/ba gcin dang ni btags pa yi/_/lde gu de la bsku ba dang /_/thal sman chu ni blugs pas phan/_/yang na sha rlon gyis g.yogs la/_/de ni myur du dbyung bar bya/_/'di ni nang na skyon bcas pas/_/myur du
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]'tshob bar mi bya ste/_/de ni gnod pa'ang chung ngus kyang /_/slar zhing 'grams par 'gyur ba yin/_/'tshob par gyur kyang ma zhu dang /_/drag shul bud med bsten stsogs spang /_/zla ba drug gam bdun gyi bar/_/cho ga 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/_/gnas
[\[104b.2\]]skabs de dang der ni byung gyur tshe/_/nad gzhi la stsogs stobs kyis rjes 'brangs te/_/phyi ma nas bshad rgya cher legs brtags la/_/thabs ni de dang de yis 'bad de gso/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//
[\[104b.3\]]de nas thal sman rnon po dang me btsa' gdab pa'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/gtsags spyad lcags spyad rjes 'dra ba/_/mang po kun las thal sman mchog_/dka' ba rnams su'ang bcad pa'am/_/dbug pa la stsogs byed par 'gyur/_/gtsags bus gdab par
[\[104b.4\]]dka' ba la'ang /_/de yis bsgrub par rung ba dang /_/shin tu gso dka'i nad rnams la/_/gang zhig btung du'ang rung ba yin/_/de ni gzhang 'brum me drod nyams/_/rde'u 'gags sbyar dug skran stsogs btung /_/sme ba sha bkra sna 'thor dang /_/phyi rol gzhang 'brum tshor
[\[104b.5\]]med mdze/_/thor bu 'brum phran mtshan bar rdol/_/rma log stsogs la byug par bya/_/khrag mkhris rlung can nad stobs chung /_/rims dang tshad 'khru snying klad nad/_/skya rbab yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/rab rib can la slon khrus btang /_/lus kun khyab pa'i 'or nad dang /_/
[\[104b.6\]]'jigs dang sbrum ma zla mtshan 'dzag_/pho mtshan mo mtshan skrangs pa dang /_/byis pa rgan po zas ma zhu/_/rtsa bo che dang rus tshigs gnad/_/rus pa gzhon nu chu ba rtsa/_/lto bsrubs mgul pa lte ba dang /_/sha srab phyogs dang rlig pa dang /_/pho mtshan bu ga sen mo
[\[104b.7\]]phrag_/mig mchu ma gtogs mig nad rnams/_/tsha grang char dang yul rmus tshe/_/gnyi ga'ang gtang bar mi bya'o/_/mu ka ka nag sha mya ka_/chu shing pa ri ba tra ka_/a shwa ka r+Na 'dzam bu'i shing /_/pa la sha dang a po ta/_/en+d+ra br-ik+Sha arga dang /_/nag+ha ma la
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]muk+ti ka_/sring shing a pa marga dang /_/ka ka dza ka tsi tra ka/_/ag+ni man+ta til bca' sga/_/rlon shing rtsa ba la stsogs bcas/_/dum bur yongs su gtubs pa dang /_/ko sha ta ka rnam bzhi dang /_/nas kyi sog ma gram rnams/_/rlung med gnas su
[\[105a.2\]]bsags nas de/_/rdo leb steng du so sor gzhag_/mu ka ka yi phung po dang /_rdo thal rdo ni bcug par bya/_/de nas til gyi sdong bus bsreg_/tshig nas me ni shi ba dang /_/rdo thal thal ba logs shig dbye/_/thal ba gzhan dag bre gang ste/_/mu ka'i
[\[105a.3\]]thal lhag blangs nas ni/_/so sor phye ste chu dang gcin/_/srang stong dag dang bsres nas bzhu/_/tshags ni bzang pos de btsags la/_/ji srid 'byar bag dmar zhing dngas/_/rno bar gyur pa'i bar du ni/_/thal ba'i dngas ma de blangs la/_/lcags snod bzang por
[\[105a.4\]]bskol zhing dkrugs/_/de nas 'tshod par byed pa der/_/rdo thal bsregs rdo'i dum bu dang /_/nya phyis k+Shi ra pa ka dang /_/dung gi lte ba lcags snod gzhug_/me mdog can du lan mang bya/_/thal sman cha ni phul gang dang /_/me bsad de nyid dang btags la/_/lde gu der
[\[105a.5\]]ni gzhug par bya/_/khyim bya rma bya bya rgod dang /_/kang+ka phug ron rtug pa dang /_/bya dang rkang bzhi'i mkhris pa dang /_/ba bla ldong ros lan tshwa rnams/_/zhib btags bcug bya de nas ni/_/gzar bus de yang kun tu dkrugs/_/gang tshe lbu bar bcas par khol/_/chu
[\[105a.6\]]bur sbom ska lde gu 'dra/_/de tshe phab la grangs pa dang /_/lcags snod bcug ste nas nang gzhug_/'di ni thal sman 'bring po yin/_/'jam po ma btags phar bcug la/_/gsur la slar ni gdon par bya/_/rnon por snga ma bzhin bcug la/_/lang+ka ling+ka dan+ti dang /_/shu
[\[105a.7\]]dag pong nga tsi tra ka_/_swa rtsi ka dang khron bu dang /_/shing kun ka rany+dza'i lo ma/_/ta la'i lo ma kha ru tsha'i/_/phye bcug zhag bdun de gzhag bya/_/rnon po de ni rlung bad kan/_/tshil skyes thor bu tshogs la btang /_/'di nyid nad tshabs 'bring la 'bring /_/'jam po khrag
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]mkhris gzhang 'brum la'o/_/mthu bskyed phyir ni 'o ma chu/_/thal sman chu ni slar yang gzhug_/shin tu rno min 'jam dang mnyen/_/'byar bag sna rno dkar ba dang /_/rtse can bde bar 'jil ba dang /_/mi 'dzag byugs na nad mi che/_/thal sman yon tan bcu dang ldan/_/
[\[105b.2\]]gtsags bu me btsa'i las kyang byed/_/dkrugs pas gzhibs pa lta bu dang /_/lus ni btsir ba lta bu dang /_/nad kyi rjes 'gro snyegs pas na/_/rtsa ba nas ni 'byin par byed/_/las byas nad dang bral nas kyang /_/rang nyid bar zhi bar 'gyur/_/thal sman gyis
[\[105b.3\]]ni gso ba'i nad/_/mtshon bcad brud pa'am gtar ga bya/_/thal sman thur ma gos kyis ni/_/dkris pa bsgos te glan nas su/_/grangs brgya'i bar du bsdad nas phyi/_/de la gzhang 'brum bskus gos kyis/_/g.yogs te lag pas dgab par bya/_/mig mchu'i
[\[105b.4\]]nad la mig mchu bzlog_/mig 'bras nag po ras bal gyis/_/bkab ste legs par byug par bya/_/thal sman pad lo tsam srab bsku/_/sna yi bu ga'i thor bu ni/_/nyi ma la bltas 'dug pa la/_/sna rtse legs par btag nas ni/_/grangs ni lnga bcu'i bar du
[\[105b.5\]]gzhag_/rna ba'i thor bu la de bzhin/_/thal sman bskus pa'i 'og tu ni/_/phyis la legs nyes rtogs bya ste/_/legs tshig mar dang sbrang rtsi bsku/_/'o ma rang skyur zho ga chus/_/dbal bsad de nas mar bcas pa'i/_/mngar dang bsil bas byug par bya/_/
[\[105b.6\]]bza' btung bad kan bskyed pa dang /_/bsrul pa'i phyir ni sbyin par bya/_/gal te rtsa ba brtan gyur pas/_/thal sman gyis bsregs mi 'drul na/_/'u su skyur snyigs shing mngar dang /_/til gyi lde gus de tshe bsku/_/til gyi lde gu shing mngar bcas/_/mar gyis
[\[105b.7\]]bskus na rma 'tshob byed/_/smin pa 'dzam bu ltar kun gnag_/legs tshos de las go bzlog pa/_/dmar zhing na la g.ya' stsogs byed/_/bsregs nyes yin te de slar bsreg_/bsregs drags khrag ni 'dzag pa dang /_/brgyal zhing tsha dang rims stsogs 'gyur/_/
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gzhang khar bsregs drags khyad par du/_/'gags pa'am shas cher 'byung bar 'gyur/_/khu ba zad par 'gyur ba'am/_/gzhang kha 'byung bas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/snar drags sna yi mtshul bar ni/_/nyams pa'am yang na yo ba'am/_/yul
[\[106a.2\]]ni 'dzin mi nus par 'gyur/_/rna ba stsogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/'dir ni mchog tu skyur ba blugs/_/shing mngar mar dang til btags byug_/rlung dang mkhris pa sel ba dang /_/bsil pa'i spyod pa thams cad phan/_/skyur ba'i reg pa bsil bas na/_/thal
[\[106a.3\]]sman de dang 'dres gyur na/_/de yis myur du mngar 'gyur bas/_/skyur bas tsha ba shin tu 'jil/_/me btsa' thal sman las mchog ste/_/des bsregs pas ni slar mi 'byung /_/sman dang thal sman mtshon spyad kyis/_/ma grub par yang grub byed yin/_/pags pa sha dang
[\[106a.4\]]rtsa rgyus dang /_/tshigs dang rus stsogs de la gdab/_/sme ba mdze nad glad nad dang /_/mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na stsogs la/_/pags bsregs ras bal ba lang so/_/me shel mda' smyug stsogs me gdab/_/gzhang 'brum rmen bu mtshan bar rdol/_/bu ga rma
[\[106a.5\]]longs la stsogs la/_/sha bsreg spra tshil mar bsregs dang /_/bu ram 'dzam bu'i chu yis bsreg_/pags pa 'jar dang khrag ma chod/_/thig le gnag stsogs pags nad na/_/de dag nyid kyi rtsa bsreg go/_/bsreg min thal sman bkag pa dang /_/nang na mtshon
[\[106a.6\]]lus rma chen 'byung /_/khrag zags pa dang lto dral ba'o/_/legs bsreg mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku/_/snum dang bsil bas byug par bya/_/legs pa'i mtshan ma khrag mi dbyung /_/sgra can chu bur phre'u 'byung /_/ta la'i 'bras smin thi ba 'dra/_/na ba chung zhing 'tshob pa
[\[106a.7\]]sla/_/bag med pas bsregs thams cad dang /_/bsregs nyes bsregs ni drags pa dang /_/ma tshos mtshan nyid dang bcas bzhi/_/ma tshos pags mdog mi sdug tsha/_/chu bur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bsregs nyes chu bur che rab tsha/_/bsregs drags pas ni sha
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]'phyang dang /_/pags pa 'khums shing rab tu tsha/_/dud pa 'khyims pa lta bu dang /_/rtsa stsogs 'khums shing skom dang brgyal/_/rma yi gting zab 'chi bar 'gyur/_/mtshos pa ni me phrad cing /_/tsha ba'i sman ni gtang bar bya/_/khrag ska shin tu na bar 'gyur/_
[\[106b.2\]]zags par gyur na nad tshabs chung /_/bsregs nyes bsil dang dro ba'i sman/_/dang por btang na de 'og bsil/_/bsregs legs na ni cu gang dang /_/p+lag sha tsan+dan btsag yug snam/_/sle tres bcas pa mngar bcas bsku/_/de 'og mkhris me dbal
[\[106b.3\]]ltar spyad/_/bsregs drags mkhris pa me dbal gyi/_/cho ga thams cad myur du spyad/_/snum gyis shin tu bsregs drags pa/_/der ni rtsub pa'i cho ga'ang bya/_/snying po gsang ba lta bu ni/_/gnas 'dir rdzogs par byas pa yin/_/'dir don phra ba mdor
[\[106b.4\]]bshad kyi/_/rgya cher kun tu bstan pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu tham pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mdo'i gnas te gnas dang po rdzogs so//_//de nas lus kyi
[\[106b.5\]]rum du zhugs pa'i gnas dang po bshad par bya'o/_/de yang sngon gyi drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la stsogs pas 'di skad bshad do/_/khu khrag skyon med par sems can/_/rang las nyon mongs kyis bskul nas/_/tshogs pas mngal chags 'gyur te/_/gtsub
[\[106b.6\]]shing las ni me 'byung mtshungs/_/sa bon bdag nyid 'byung ba che/_/phra mo sems kyi rjes 'gro dang /_/ma yi kha zas dngas ma las/_/rim gyis mngal du rnam par 'phel/_/ji ltar nyi ma'i zer gyi me/_/me shel dang ni phrad gyur pa'i/_/shing la 'gro bar mi snang ste/_/sems
[\[106b.7\]]can mngal gnas de dang 'dra/_/rgyu yi rjes su 'gro bas na/_/'bras bu de dang skal mnyam nyid/_/sems can skye gnas sna tshogs 'dzin/_/zangs ma la stsogs bzhu dang mtshungs/_/de bas khu ba mang ba las/_/phal cher skyes par skye 'gyur la/_/zla mtshan mang bas
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]bud med de/_/de gnyis mnyam las ma ning 'gyur/_/khu khrag rlung gis mang du phye/_/ji lta ba las mtshe mar 'gyur/_/skye gnas mi mthun gzugs mi sdug_/gnod pa'i dri mas skye bar 'gyur/_/bud med zla ba re re'i khrag_/dngas ma las byung
[\[107a.2\]]zhag gsum 'dzag_/lo ni bcu gnyis yan chad nas/_/lnga bcu'i bar 'dzag de nas zad/_/bud med lo ni bcu drug lon/_/skyes pa nyi shu lon dang 'dus/_/mngal gnas lam dang khu ba khrag_/rlung dang sems ni dag gyur pa'i/_/pu ni stobs dang ldan pa skye/_/de
[\[107a.3\]]las lo ni ma tshang ba'i/_/nad can tshe thung skal ngan pa'i/_/bu chags pa'am chags mi 'gyur/_/rlung stsogs rul dang mdud pa can/_/dri ma skyon dang ldan bshad pa'i/_/khu khrag sa bon byed mi nus/_/rang gi mtshan mas skyon byung bshad/_/khrag gis rul zhing bad
[\[107a.4\]]kan dang /_/rlung gis mdud pa can 'drar 'gyur/_/khrag dang mkhris pas rnag 'dra la/_/rlung dang mkhris pas zad par 'gyur/_/'di dag gso dka' nyes gsum ldan/_/bshang gci 'dra ba gsor mi rung /_/rlung la sogs pas gnod gyur pa/_/rang gi sman gyis
[\[107a.5\]]gso bar bya/_/rul la da ta ka'i me tog_/seng ldeng se 'bru ardzu na/_/mar dang bskol ba blud pa'am/_/a sa na stsogs bskol ba blud/_/khu khrag mdud 'dra pa la sha'i/_/thal ba sru sru'i rtsa bas phan/_/rnag 'dra pa ru sha ka dang /_/n+ya gro d+ha stsogs bskol
[\[107a.6\]]ba blud/_/khu ba zad la ro tsa'i dpyad/_/bshang 'dra slon khrus shing kun dang /_/pu shel tsi tra ka bskol blud/_/zla mtshan mdud 'dra pa tha dang /_/tsha gsum dug mo nyung bskol blud/_/zla mtshan rul dang rnag 'dra la/_/tsan+dan blud bya phyis bshad pa'i/_/gsang ba'i
[\[107a.7\]]nad gsor bshad kun dang /_/'jam rtsir bcas pa gang yin bya/_/khu ba dkar zhing lci ba dang /_/dmar dang bska dang mang ba dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi til mar 'dra/_/mngal du legs chags zla mtshan yang /_/rgya skyegs khu ba ri bong khrag_/'dra zhing bkrus na dag 'gyur
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]bzang /_/khu khrag skyon med nad med cing /_/phan tshun du ni chags pa dang /_/ro tsa'i snum gyis brtas pa dang /_/sbyang ba byas shing 'jam rtsi btang /_/mchog tu skyes pa 'o ma mar/_/mngar ba'i sman gyis brta bar bya/_/bud med til mar sha dag ni/_/mkhris pa
[\[107b.2\]]skyed pa nye bar spyad/_/bud med nyam chung bzhin ras dang /_/nu ma rked pa 'gul ba dang /_/mig dang dku g.yo skyes pa 'dod/_/zla mtshan ldan par shes par bya/_/dper na nyi ma nub pa na/_/pad+ma'i kha ni zum par 'gyur/_/de bzhin zla mtshan dus 'das pa'i/_/
[\[107b.3\]]mngal ni khu ba len mi 'gyur/_/zla ba gcig tu bsags pa'i khrag_/rtsa chen gnyis las dus su ni/_/cung zad gnag cing dri bral ba/_/rlung gis mngal gyi sgo ru 'byin/_/de nas zla mtshan mthong nyid nas/_/zhag gsum bar du sems dge bsam/_/rgyan dang
[\[107b.4\]]khrus ni spang ba dang /_/ku sha'i stan la nyal bar bya/_/nas thug 'o mar btsos nyung zad/_/blud cing lto sbyang nyams smad bya/_/lo ma'am rdza skyogs legs par ni/_/bza' zhing 'khrig pa spang bar bya/_/de nas zhag ni bzhi pa la/_/khrus byas gos phreng dkar zhing
[\[107b.5\]]gtsang /_/pha dang 'dra ba'i bu 'dod cing /_/mdun du khyo ni blta bar bya/_/zla mtshan zhag ni bcu gnyis dus/_/de las dang po'i zhag gsum dang /_/bcu gcig pa smad tshes zung la/_/bur 'gyur gzhan du bu mor 'gyur/_/de nas bu phyir slob dpon gyis/_/cho ga cho
[\[107b.6\]]ga bzhin byas la/_/dmangs rigs phyag 'tshal la brtson pas/_/sngags kyis bya ba med par bya/_/de ltar 'dod spyod don ldan zhing /_/yid la 'dod pa'i bu skyed 'gyur/_/bu 'dod bza' bran dben par ni/_/'dod spyad bya zhes dam pa smra/_/gzhan du rigs
[\[107b.7\]]bzang las kyang ni/_/bu ngan rigs sreg me 'drar 'gyur/_/ji lta ba yi bu 'dod pa/_/de yi tshal du de yis spyad/_/yul de'i skye bo'i spyod pa dang /_/de yi yo byad la bsam bya/_/las mthar skyes pas zhun mar dang /_/'o ma 'bras chan bcas pa bza'/_/skar
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]mkhan lung gis mal khrir ni/_/skyes pa dang po rkang g.yas kyis/_/'dzeg bya bud med g.yon gyis 'dzeg_/de yi g.yas logs ngag tu nyal/_/til mar mon sran gre'u sbyar bza'/_/der ni sngags kyi tshig brjod bya/_/a hi ra si/_/a
[\[108a.2\]]yu ra si/_sarba taHpra tiSh+Tha si d+ha twa d+ha tu/_/bi d+ha ba twa/_ba d+ha du/_brah+ma brtsa sa b+ha ba zhes bya'o/_/tshangs pa phur bu khyab 'jug dang /_/nyi zla tha skar bu gnyis dang /_/legs ldan mdza' bo chu lha rnams/_/bdag la dpa' ba'i bu stsol cig_/de nas phan tshun spro
[\[108a.3\]]bskyed de/_/dga' dang bcas pas gnas par bya/_/bud med der sems gan rkyal gnas/_/yan lag legs par gnas 'dug bya/_/de ltar nyes pa rang gnas 'dug_/sa bon legs par 'dzin par 'gyur/_/'phral du mngal chags mtshan ma ni/_/mngal
[\[108a.4\]]du sa bon 'dzin pa dang /_/'dod ngoms lci dang g.yo ba dang /_khrag dang khu ba rjes 'dres dang /_/snying 'phar ba dang snyom pa dang /_/skom dang rmya dang ba spu ldang /_/zla ba dang po mig gsal zhag_/bdun nas nur nur po ru 'gyur/_/'dir ni mngal gyi bu skyes
[\[108a.5\]]pa/_/gsal bar ma gyur gong du bya/_/skyes bu byed pa 'di stobs ldan/_/las kyang zil gyis gnon par nus/_/skar ma rgyal skyes bu yi gzugs/_/gser ram dngul lam lcags las byas/_/me mdog 'gyur bsregs 'o mar bcug_/de ni snyim gang blud
[\[108a.6\]]par bya/_/yang na go ra dan+da dang /_/a pa marga dzi ba ka_/zangs rtsi ba dang sher+ya ka_/gcig gam gnyis sam gsum zhig gam/_/thams cad chu la btab pa ni/_/skar ma rgyal la bab tshe blud/_/bri ha ti ni dkar po'i rtsa/_/'o mar btab pa rang nyid kyis/_/
[\[108a.7\]]bu 'dod sna khung g.yas par blugs/_/bu mo 'dod na g.yon par blugs/_/lag sma na'i rtsa 'o mar sbyar/_/bu skyed gnas pa rab ster byed/_/de bzhin n+ya gro'i myu gu brgyad/_/sbyar ba sna 'am kha nas btung /_/'tsho byed kyi ni sman sde rnams/_/phyi dang nang nas nye bar
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]sbyar/_/mngal 'dzin yid 'ong phan pa yi/_/khyo dang 'khor gyis bsnyen bkur bya/_/mar gsar zhun mar 'o ma rnams/_/rtag tu de la blud par bya/_/nyal po drags dang rtsol drags dang /_/khur dang gos ni lci ba dang /_/nyin nyal nub mo gnyid mi log_/
[\[108b.2\]]stan srab tsog pur 'dug pa dang /_/mya ngan khro dang 'jigs dang skyo/_/shugs dang sred pa dgag pa dang /_smyung ba lam 'gro rno dang tsha/_/lci dang bshang 'gags zan za dang /_/gos dmar gyon dang g.yang sa dang /_/khron lta sha za chang 'thungs dang /_/gan rkyal
[\[108b.3\]]nyal dang bud med dang /_/mi 'dod gang yin de kun spang /_/de bzhin gtar ga gdab slon khrus/_/mas gtong zla brgyad bar mi bya/_/'di dag gis ni mngal 'jig pa'am/_/dku skams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rlung ni skyed par byed pas mngal/_/sgur po 'on
[\[108b.4\]]long mi thung 'gyur/_/mkhris pa can gyis spyi ther ser/_/bad kan sha bkra skya rbab 'gyur/_/nad gzhan 'jam zhing bde ba dang /_/rnon po ma yin sman gyis gso/_/nur nur po las zla gnyis bar/_/gor gor mer mer nar nar po/_/de las pho mo ma ning
[\[108b.5\]]rim/_/de nas gsal 'gyur mtshan ma ni/_/rid cing dku ni lci ba dang /_/brgyal skyugs yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/glal dang mchil mang snyom bag dang /_/spu yi phreng ba gsal ba dang /_/skyur la dga' zhing nu ma rgyas/_/nu zhor bcas shing rtse mo gnag_/
[\[108b.6\]]rkang pa skrangs shing kha zas tsha/_/sred pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/_/'di yi snying ni ma las skyes/_/ma yi snying yang de dang ni/_/'brel pas de phyir sbrum ma ni/_/sred pa dgag par mi bya'o/_/de la gnod par 'gyur ba'ang /_/phan dang bsres te cung zad sbyin/_/sred
[\[108b.7\]]pa bkag na mngal gyi bu/_/mi sdug pa'am 'jig par 'gyur/_/zla ba gsum par de yi lus/_/mgo bo dpyi gnyis dpung pa gnyis/_/yan lag lnga ni gsal dod 'gyur/_/yan lag phra mo rnams kyang 'byung /_/mgo bo sogs dang cha mnyam du/_/bde dang
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]sdug bsngal shes pa 'byung /_/mngal gnas lte ba ma yi ni/_/snying gi rtsa dang 'brel pa'i phyir/_/de yis de ni 'phel 'gyur te/_/zhing gi yur ba dag dang mtshungs/_/bzhi par yan lag gsal dod 'gyur/_/lnga par sems ni gsal bar
[\[109a.2\]]'gyur/_/drug par chu ba rtsa dang spu/_/sen mo pags pa mdog stobs 'gyur/_/bdun par dngos po thams cad kyis/_/yan lag kun ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/mngal gnas nad kyis nyer gzir na/_/de tshe snying dang 'brel pa'i phyir/_/g.ya' dang tsha bar byed
[\[109a.3\]]pa dang /_/pags gas rma phran 'byung bar 'gyur/_/der ni mar sar rgya shug chu/_/mngar ba'i sman sde bskol ba phan/_/lan tshwa nyung zhing snum bag can/_/yang zhing mngar ba'i kha zas bza'/_/tsan+dan pu shel rtsi'i lde gus/_/brang dang nu ma lto la bsku/_/'bras
[\[109a.4\]]bu gsum pa'am e ne ya/_/sha bkra ri bong khrag sbyar bsku/_/ka ra bI ra'i lo ma dang /_/til mar bskol bas bskus te mnye/_/pa to la dang nim pa btsod/_/bye'u rug gis kyang bsku bar bya/_/skyer pa shing mngar chu yis ni/_/bkru dang bsku ba bsten par bya/_/
[\[109a.5\]]zla ba brgyad par ma dang bu/_/thang re rim gyis gzi mdangs 'pho/_/de yis de gnyis zhum dgar 'gyur/_/byis mdangs ma la mi gnas pas/_/de tshe btsas na mi 'tsho la/_/bud med the tshom bcas skabs 'gyur/_/'dir ni'o ma can blud cing /_/mngar ba'i
[\[109a.6\]]sman dang bskol ba yi/_/mar gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bya zhing /_/phyis rnying pa dag bya ba'i phyir/_/la phug skam dang rgya shug skyur/_/bska ba dang ni bskol ba bsngags/_/sha ta put+pa'i lde gu ni/_/rgyam tsha til mar 'jam rtsi gtang /_/de tshe zhag gcig 'das pa
[\[109a.7\]]na'ang /_/dus su btsas yin de phan chad/_/rlung gis dkur ni bkag gyur na/_/lo yi bar du gnod pa skyed/_/zla dgu lon na snum bcas pa'i/_/'bras chan sha khu blud pa bsngags/_/snum mang nas thug sbyin pa'am/_/sngar bshad pa yi 'jam rtsi gtang /_/de
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]nyid la bcug ras bal ni/_/mtshan mar rtag tu gzhug par bya/_/rlung 'joms lo ma bskol ba'i chu/_/bsgrangs pas nyin re bkrus pa phan/_/zla dgu phan chad lus la ni/_/snum med par ni mi gzhag go/_/nu zho g.yas pa sngar byung zhing /_/g.yas logs la
[\[109b.2\]]ni brten pa dang /_/'dri tshig skyes pa'i ming can smra/_/dga' zhing rmi lam skyes pa mthong /_/dku ni g.yas pa mtho ba dang /_/mngal yang kun nas zlum pa dag/_/bu skye gzhan du bu mor 'gyur/_/gang yang skyes pa phrad 'dod dang /_/glu gar rol mo la dga' dang /_/
[\[109b.3\]]dri dang phreng chags bu mor skye/_/de 'dres pas ni ma ning 'gyur/_/dku yi dbus ni mtho ba yin/_/mtshe ma logs gnyis mtho bas na/_/lte ba dma' bar 'dug pa yin/_/dgu pa'i dang po nas brtsams te/_/sa phyogs shis shing yo byad ni/_/phun tshogs ldan
[\[109b.4\]]par dge ba'i zhag_/de ni btsas khyim zhugs par bya'o/_/der ni bud med btsa' myong bas/_/bskor te btsa' ba'i dus bar bsdad/_/deng ngam sang ni bu btsas rtags/_/snyom zhing dku dang mig lhod dub/_/smad du lci zhing yi ga 'chus/_/mchil ma mang zhing
[\[109b.5\]]gcin mang 'byung /_/brla dang rked pa lto dang rgyab/_/snying dang chu so brla rtsa na/_/mtshan bye na zhing zug pa dang /_/'gul zhing 'dzag par 'gyur ba yin/_/rang dbang med gyur rjes su ni/_/de 'og mngal gyi chu 'dzag 'gyur/_/de nas mngal nas las byung rtsom/_/
[\[109b.6\]]bkra shis bsrung ba'i cho ga byas/_/lag par 'bras bu skyes ming gzhag_/legs bskus chu ni dron mo blugs/_/mar dang bcas pa'i thug pa blud/_/de 'og sa la mal bcas 'dug/_/brla gnyis bkug ste gan rkyal gnas/_/yan lag yang nas yang du bsku/_/
[\[109b.7\]]lte ba man chad mnye bya zhing /_/glal dang 'chag pa byed du gzhug_/de ltas mngal gnas thur du 'byung /_/de rtags snying ga las 'phos nas/_/mngal gnas lto bar zhugs nas ni/_/chu so'i steng na gnas par 'gyur/_/de nas dbang med nad ldang ste/_/myur du khri la
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]gzhag par bya/_/de 'og mngal gnas legs btsir nas/_/de yi mtshan ni dbye bar bya/_/dang por dal gyis btsir bya zhing /_/btsa' khar drag tu btsir bar bya/_/de nas bu skye'i sgra dang ni/_/chu dang rlung gis dga' ba skyed/_/btsa' ba'i nad kyis
[\[110a.2\]]gzir ba yi/_/sreg bral 'dra ba slar gso bya/_/mngal du thogs na sbrul nag po'i/_/pags pas mo mtshan bdug par bya/_/bya r+Nu'i me tog rtsa ba'am/_/lcam pa'am yang na byi sha l+ya/_/rkang pa'am lag par gdags par bya/_/sha ma dbyung ba'i phyir yang ni/_/de dag
[\[110a.3\]]nyid bya de nas bteg_/dpung pa gnyis nas bzung ste sbrug_/rting pas mjug to rdeg pa dang /_/rkub tshos dam du btsir par bya/_/skra yis lkog ma rkan reg bya/_/snu ha'i 'o ma spyi por blugs/_/stag pa ku ba lang+ka li/_/sbrul lpags ru rta yungs kar rnams/_/re
[\[110a.4\]]re 'am gnyis sam ma lus pas/_/mo mtshan byug pa'am bdag par bya/_/ru rta'am bal bu'i lde gu ni/_/chang dngas dang ni blug par bya/_/ku lang+tha 'am bal ba dza/_/chang rnyings dag la btab ste blud/_/shu ti nyungs kar zi ra dang /_/shi kru tig sna kru drug tres/_/shing
[\[110a.5\]]kun ru rta po son cha/_/'o ma ba gcin yungs mar dang /_/bskol ba bshang ba'i sgo'am ni/_/mo mtshan nas ni 'jam rtsi btang /_/shu ti shu dag ru rta dang /_/yungs kar pi pi ling lde gu/_/snum dang lan tshwar bcas pa yi/_/mas gtong sha ma myur du 'byin/_/der
[\[110a.6\]]thogs rgyu ni rlung yin te/_/de bcom sha ma myur du 'byung /_/yang na lag bkrus sor mo bregs/_/mkhas pa yis ni drangs te dbyung /_/sha ma byung na mo mtshan dang /_/yan lag til mar gyis byugs mnye/_/mngal nad gzer ni chu so mgo_/lto ba gzer la thal sman
[\[110a.7\]]ni/_/rnon po zhib tu btags pa dag_/mar ram chu tshan sbyar ba blud/_/'u su bskol chu bu ram dang /_/tsha gsum dri bzangs gsum btab blud/_/de nas byes pa'i nyer spyod kyis/_/byis pa ma mas skyong du gzhug_/bu btsas bkres yod til mar dang /_/mar las tshad
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]chen blud bya ba/_/tsha ba lnga phye ran btab sbyin/_/de 'og bu ram chu dron nam/_/rlung 'joms sman bskol chu blud de/_/des ni rlung nad ldang mi 'gyur/_/khrag ngan dag kyang dag par byed/_/rim 'di zhag ni gnyis gsum bya/_/snum mi 'phrod la cho ga 'di/_/snum
[\[110b.2\]]med par ni bsten par bya/_/'thungs nas lto ba til mar dang /_/mar bskus nas ni gos kyis dkri/_/zhu nas khrus byas thug pa ni/_/sngar bshad sman dang bskol ba blud/_/zhag gsum phan chad bi da ri/_/la stsogs sman sde'i khu bar bskol/_/nas thug phan
[\[110b.3\]]zhing snum mang ba'am/_/goms pa'i dbang las 'o thug blud/_/zhag bdun phan chad de la ni/_/rim gyis brta ba'i cho ga phan/_/zhag ni bcu gnyis ma lon par/_/sha ni sbyin par mi bya'o/_/mngal du 'phel dang btsas pa'i nad/_/gsher dang khrag 'dzag btsir ba
[\[110b.4\]]yis/_/nad de gso dka' yin pa'i phyir/_/btsas tshe 'bad de rim gro bya/_/de ltar zla ba phyed dang gnyis/_/kha zas bsdams stsogs dang bral nas/_/btsas pa'i ming dang bral ba'am/_/zla mtshan byung bar gyur bar du'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa
[\[110b.5\]]las/_/lus kyi gnas kyi le'u dang po'o//_//de nas lus kyi rum du zhugs pa'i nad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o/_/sbrum mas spang bar bya ba dag_/bsten pa'am nad kyi dbang las ni/_/zla mtshan byung ba'am gzer zhing na/_/phyi nang snum dang bsil thabs bya/_
[\[110b.6\]]uR+shi pad+ma tsan+dan dang /_/'o ma can shing shun pa yi/_/lde gur mar ni bsku ba dang /_/ras bal sbangs pa bshang sgo dang /_/mo mtshan gnyis su them bur gzhug/_/lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar gyis ni/_/bsku ba'am bud med de yi lus/_/uR+shi ra stsogs chu nang gzhug/_
[\[110b.7\]]kha ra sbrang rtsi ku mu ta/_/pad+ma ut+pal ge sar ni/_/'o ma'i mar sbyar ka she ru/_/sh-ing+ga ta ka sbyin bar bya/_/gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang ni/_/chu skyes rnams kyi rtsa ba dang /_/u du m+ba' ra gzhon nu dang /_/ldan pa'i 'o ma skom du blud/_/sA lu'i rtsa ba ka ko la/_/ba la gnyis
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dang shing mngar dang /_/bu ram shing dang bskol ba yi/_/'o ma sA lu rtsa snar chan/_/sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa ni/_/skam sa'i sha khu ldan par bza'/_/bkru sman ma gtogs khrag mkhris kyi/_/gso dpyad bshad pa thams cad bya/_/
[\[111a.2\]]zla gsum ma tshang bar du ni/_/khrag dgag phyir ni 'bad par bya/_/be'u snabs ldan pa'ang dgag par bya/_/der ni bsil pan rtsub pa dang /_/smyung dang gla sgang uR+shir/_/sle tres 'u su a ral/_/byi tsher dang ni parba ta/_/tsan+dan ba la bong nga dkar/_/bskol
[\[111a.3\]]ba'i chu ni blud par bya/_/rtsa 'bru las g.yos zas sbyin dang /_/mung+ga sogs khus be+e'u snabs ni/_/bsal la snum stsogs sngon bzhin gtang /_/mngal ni rnam par 'jig gyur na/_/mngal nang dag par bya phyir dang /_/nad kyis gzir ba mi dran phyir/_/chang
[\[111a.4\]]rno ci nus btung bar bya/_/de nas rtsa ba lnga po ni/_/chung ngu'i thug pa rtsub de blud/_/chang mi 'thungs la thug pa ni/_/tsha ba lnga dang bskol ba dang /_/bil ba la sogs lnga dang bskol/_/til dang rtsa 'bru chan sbyin bya/_/zla ba dang mnyam nyin zhag rim/_/mngal
[\[111a.5\]]'jig pa la thug stsogs sbyin/_/yang zhing snum dang lan tshwa med/_/drod bskyed ldan la phan pa yin/_/nad dang lus zungs ljan ljin ni/_/skam phyir cho ga 'di bya'o/_/de phan chad zas snum 'jam rtsi/_/stobs skyed drod skyed 'tsho byed sbyin/_/snying por ldan
[\[111a.6\]]pas cher skyes la/_/mo mtshan nas ni khrag 'dzag pas/_/mngal du skye bar mi nus la/_/lto na 'gul dang bcas par gnas/_/de ni so na gnas shes bya/_/des ni lto ba rgyas mi 'gyur/_/mya ngan smyung dang rtsub sogs sam/_/yang na mngal nas khrag 'dzag pas/_/
[\[111a.7\]]mngal du skye bar mi nus la/_/rlung 'khrug skam zhing bskams gyur pa'i/_/mngal de klu yi lto zhes bya/_/'dir ni lto ba rgyas gyur yang /_/'grib cing yun rings lon na 'phar/_/de gnyis brta dang rlung 'joms sman/_/mngar ba dag dang bskol ba yi/_/mar
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]dang 'o ma tshim sbyin zhing /_/skyes ma thag pa'i sha sbyin bya/_/de gnyis kyis ni tshim bya'i phyir/_/khyogs dang bzhon par bskyon te bskul/_/sngon po zhes bya mi 'gul la/_/khra dang ba lang nya sha dang /_/sgra sgrogs bya dang rma bya yi/_/sha khu mar ni mang po dang /_/mon
[\[111b.2\]]sran gre'u dag dang ni/_/la phug dag gi khu ba blud/_/bil ba gzhon nu ma sha til/_/phye dang 'o ma sbyar ba blud/_/tshil bcas sha dang sbrang chang sbyin/_/rked pa bsku ba bsten par bya/_/de ni rtag tu dga' ba skyed/_/de 'dras mngal ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/rgyas
[\[111b.3\]]pa gzhan du lo tshang nas/_/dka' bas btsas pa'am skye mi 'gyur/_/sbrum ma rtug pa 'gags gyur na/_/snum mam mthun pa'i 'jam rtsi yis/_/myur ba kho nar gso bar bya/_/gzhan du sbrum ma bu btsas 'chi/_/mngal du nang rab bsags pas sam/_/
[\[111b.4\]]mi mthun pa'am gnod gzhan gyis/_/nang du shi na lto grang zhing /_/rengs dang sbo dang nad tshabs che/_/mngal mi 'gul dang mgo 'khor skom/_/dbugs 'byin dka' zhing dub pa dang /_/dga' ba med cing mi 'gyur dang /_/dbang med nad ni mang po 'byung /_/de
[\[111b.5\]]la chu dron blugs pa dang /_/bu ram spang ma lan tshwar bcas/_/btags pas mo mtshan bsku ba dang /_/shal ma li dang zar ma ya/_/khu ba mar dang lde gur byas/_/nang du yang dang yang du gzhug/_/sngags dang sha ma 'byin sbyor bya/_/gal te bu shi ma byung na/_/
[\[111b.6\]]de nas sman pas rgyal po la/_/zhu la de 'bad myur du dbyung /_/shal ma li yi thang chu mar/_/bcas pas lag pa mo mtshan bsku/_/lag pas dbyung nus de nyid kyi/_/lus ni legs par mi gnas na/_/gcus shing bsgyur dang bzlog pa dang /_/btsir dang 'degs
[\[111b.7\]]gzhag la stsogs kyis/_/lugs dang mthun par drangs nas ni/_/mngal gyi sgor ni drang por drang /_/gang zhig rkang lag mgo bo ni/_/yon por mngal du gnas gyur dang /_/rkang pa gcig ni mtshan du 'byung /_/gnyis pa bshang sgor chud yon po/_/de ni 'gags pa
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]zhes bya ste/_/mtshon gyis bcad par 'os pa yin/_/las der dkyil 'khor sor gdub can/_/gtsags bu gnyis ni bsngags pa yin/_/'phel gtsags rtse mo rno bas ni/_/mngal du gtang bar mi bya'o/_/dang por mgo bo'i thod pa ni/_/phye la rnam par dbyung
[\[112a.2\]]bar bya/_/de nas mchan khung brang kos ko/_/rkan gyi phyogs ni gang rung bar/_/gtang de mngal gyi lcags kyu ni/_/brtan po dag gis mkhas pas drang /_/mgo bo ma phye mig sbubs dang /_/mkhur tshos nas kyang drang bya zhing /_/phrag pa thogs na dpung par bcad/_/lto ba rlung gis
[\[112a.3\]]sbos gyur pa/_/nang grol dbral tam rgyu ma ni/_/phyi rol du ni bton te dbyung /_/rked par thogs na de bzhin du/_/de yi rus tshigs dbye bar bya/_/rlung gi dbang gis yan lag gang /_/mngal du thogs pa de dang de/_/dum bur gtubs la legs phyung ste/_/'bad de bud med
[\[112a.4\]]bsrung bar bya/_/rlung ni rnam par 'khrugs gyur pas/_/mngal gyi gnas skabs sna tshogs byed/_/de phyir de ni mkhas pa yis/_/gnas skabs dag ni bltas te spyad/_/ma dang lhan cig 'chi 'gyur bas/_/gson po mngal du gcad mi bya/_/'chi bar 'gyur ba dag la ni/_/
[\[112a.5\]]yud tsam btang snyoms gzhag mi bya/_/mo mtshan 'gags dang nyams pa dang /_/gzer nad dbugs kyis nyam thag dang /_/sgregs pa mnam dang lus grang ba'i/_/mngal du bu shi bud med spang /_/de nas sha ma thon na/_/sman pas sngon bzhin dbyung bar bya/_/de ltar zug
[\[112a.6\]]rngu phyung nas ni/_/chu dron gyis ni bkru bar bya/_/lus la snum gyis byugs pa dang /_/mtshan du ras bal snum can gzhug_/des ni mo mtshan 'jam 'gyur zhing /_/de yis gzer ba zhi bar 'gyur/_/la la phud dang bong ba dkar/_/ra sna shing kun sug smel dang /_/tsha ba lnga yi phye ma
[\[112a.7\]]snum/_/sbyar ba'am lde gu chu bskol blud/_/de bzhin nad rnams 'dzag pa dang /_/tshor ba zhi phyir zhag gsum ni/_/pu tse shel dang bong nga dkar/_/ba sha ka yi shun pa dang /_/shing kun te dzo ba ti rnams/_/btags pa'i phye ma'am bskol ba blud/_/de nas zhag bdun bar du ni/_/
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]snum nyid nye bar btung bar bya/_/dgongs ka chang ni rnying pa dang /_/de bzhin legs sbyar chang btung bya/_/shiR+sha ka ku bar bskol sbangs/_/ras bal mo mtshan nang du gzhug_/bla brnan gzhan dag gang byung ba/_/de la rang gis gso bas gso/_/rlung 'joms sman ni 'o mar
[\[112b.2\]]bskol/_/zhag bcu'i bar du bza' ba phan/_/zhag bcu'i bar du sha khu btung /_/de phan chad ni yang zhing phan //_/nyung ngu bza' zhing snum bsku dugs/_/ba la'i til mar la sogs bsten/_/zla ba bzhi lon phan chad de/_/de ni rim gyis ci bder spyad/_/ba le'i rtsa ba'i khu ba
[\[112b.3\]]ni/_/cha drug 'o ma de mnyam dang /_/nas dang rgya shug ku lang+tha/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i cha gcig dang /_/bskol ba'i cha ni char byas pa'i/_/til mar cha ni bcu bzhi dang /_/med gnyis dang thang shing bcod/_/ra mnye ba gnyis tsan+dan dang /_/thal tres ru rta dzi ba ka_/rgya spos
[\[112b.4\]]rgyam tsha zangs rtsi ba/_/gla sgang rdo dreg shu dag dang /_/pur+Na rna ba a ka ru/_/a shwa gan+d+ha nye shing dang /_/k+Shi ra ku shu shing mngar dang /_/ba la ras shu ti dang /_/pa r+Ni gnyis dang sug smel dang /_/shing tsha gan+d+ha b+har dra rnams/_/zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu dang /_/til mar me chung la
[\[112b.5\]]bskol ba/_/rlung nad thams cad sel ba'i mchog_/bu btsas byis pa rus pa gnad/_/snad dang skem la bsngags pa yin/_/rims skran gdon dang smyo byed dang /_/gcin nad rgyu ma skyes pa sel/_/thang la 'bar gyis mngal gyi ni/_/nad rnams sel ba'i mchog tu bshad/_/ma ni
[\[112b.6\]]shi tshe chu sor ni/_/mngal gnas gal te dkur 'phar na/_/de ni skye ba'i dus yin pas/_/dbral te byis pa myur du dbyung /_/shi ri ka yi sa bon dang /_/pa ya s+ya dang thang shing bzhi/_/til nag sru sru'i rtsa ba dang /_/btsod dang nye'u shing zhes bya bzhi/_/bri sha dang ni pa ya s+ya/_
[\[112b.7\]]ut+pal thal tres pri yang ku/_/byi tsher thal tres ra sna dang /_/pad+ma tsa ri shing mngar dang /_/bri ha te gnyis tang pal dang /_/'o shing myu gu shun pa dmar/_kr-iSh+Na pa r+Ni ba la dang /_/shi kru gze ma sle tres dang /_/shring ga sta rga rgun pad rtsa/_/shing mngar kha ra ka she ru/_/tshigs
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]bcad phyed kyis rdzogs bshad pa'i/_/bdun pa 'di dag 'o mar sbyar/_/zla ba bdun la rim bzhin du/_/mngal 'dzag pa la gtang bar bya/_/ka bid ta dang bil ba dang /_/bri ha ti dang bu ram dang /_/kaN+Da ka ri pa to la'i/_/rtsa ba bskol bar byas pa dang /_/de
[\[113a.2\]]bzhin 'o ma sha rnams ni/_/zla ba brgyad pa'i tshe na'ang btang /_/dgu par thal tres er Na dang /_/pa ya s+ya mngar gtang /_/zla ba bcu par pa ya s+ya/_/'o ma dang ni bskol ba blud/_/yang na shing mngar dong gra dang /_/thang shing 'o mar sbyar ba sbyin/_/bud med mngal du rlung
[\[113a.3\]]gis khrag bsgongs te/_/gnas pa de ni mngal chags cha 'dra bas/_/bu chags yin zhes mi mkhas pa dag smra/_/sman kha rno dros khrag ni 'ba' zhig zags/_/blun pos mngal gnas 'byung pos zos zhes zer/_/mdangs 'phrog yin phyir de lus mngon sum du/_/'phrog
[\[113a.4\]]par mi snang ba 'am 'byung po ni/_/gzhung 'dor ma ni btang snyoms 'jog mi byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lus kyi yan lag gi bye brag bstan pa bshad par bya'o/_/mdor na yan lag rnam drug
[\[113a.5\]]ste/_/mgo dang khog pa dpung pa gnyis/_/brla gnyis yin te de'i nying lag/_/mig snying lag pa rkang pa stsogs/_/sgra dang reg bya gzugs ro dri/_/go rims bzhin du nam mkha' rlung /_/me chu sa yi yon tan yin/_/yon tan re res phyi ma skyed/_/de la mkha' las lus
[\[113a.6\]]bu ga/_/rna ba sgra dang khong stong nyid/_/rlung las reg pa lpags dbugs 'byin/_/me las mig dang gzugs 'ju nyid/_/chu las lce dang ro dang gsher/_/sa las sna dri rus pa yin/_/'dir ni ma las skyes 'jam khrag/_/sha dang rkang dang gzhang kha stsogs/_/pha skyes brtan dang khu
[\[113a.7\]]chu dang /_/rtsa bo che rus skra stsogs yin/_/sems las sems byung dbang po rnams/_/skye gnas sna tshogs rnams kyang 'byung /_/goms pa las byung nad med tshe/_/le lo med stobs gzi mdangs yin/_/dngas ma las byung lus skyed dang /_/gnas dang 'phel dang mi brkam nyid/_/
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]snying stobs can gtsang yod par lta/_/chos dkar la dga' blo gros ldan/_/rdul can mang du smra ba dang /_/nga rgyal tshul 'chos khro phrag dog_/mun pa 'jigs dang mi shes dang /_/gnyid dang le lo skyo ba'o/_/de ltar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin lus/_/de la khrag skyes lpags rim bdun/_/
[\[113b.2\]]'o ma las ni spris ma bzhin/_/smin pa'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lus zungs gnas ni nang gsher gyi/_/rang gi drod kyis smin pas na/_/bad kan rgyus pa shams g.yogs/_/char bshad shing gi snying po 'dra/_/bdun po de dag gnas bdun te/_/dang por khrag yin gzhan rim
[\[113b.3\]]bzhin/_/bad kan ma zhu mkhris zhu ba/_/rlung dang gcin gyi gnas su bshad/_/bud med mngal gnas brgyad pa ste/_/mkhris pa zhu ba'i gnas par gnas/_/'di la nang grol yan lag gnas/_/snying glo mchin mkhris mcher mkhal ma/_/pho ba grod pa rgyu ma dang /_/gnye
[\[113b.4\]]ma long ka lgang pa'o/_/srog gi gnas ni rnam bcu ste/_/mgo dang lce yi rtsa ba dang /_/lkog ma khrag dang snying lte ba/_/chu so khu chu dngas dang gzhang /_/lus la rtsa dra chu ba che/_/re re bcu drug yod par bshad/_/pir 'dra drug dang srubs 'dra bdun/_/pho mtshan lce dang mgo la
[\[113b.5\]]brten/_/de dag gtsags bus gdab mi rung /_/sha yi thag pa rnam pa bzhi/_/rus pa'i tshogs 'dus bcu bzhi yod/_/mtshams ni dgu phrag gnyis yod la/_/so dang sen mor bcas pa yi/_/rus pa sum brgya drug cu yin/_/thang la 'bar ni sum brgyar 'dod/_/tshigs
[\[113b.6\]]ni nyis brgya rtsa bcur 'dod/_/rgyun shes bus ni tshigs kyi grangs/_/nyis stong dag ni yod par 'dod/_/rgyus pa dgu brgya skyes pa la/_/sha ni spar tshad lnga brgya yod/_/bud med kyi ni nu ma dang /_/mo mtshan la gnas nyi shu lhag_/rtsa chen rtsa ba snying la gnas/_/de dag kun
[\[113b.7\]]gyis lus kun khyab/_/dngas ma'i bdag nyid mdangs su 'gyur/_/de ni phra ba kun dang 'brel/_/rtsa ba sbom zhing rtse rab phra/_/lo ma'i rtsa ltar gyes pa yin/_/gyes pa de las rtsa phran ni/_/bdun brgya dag tu gyur pa yin/_/de la yan lag re re zhing /_/brgyad brgyad der ni gnas
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]pa yin/_/de la dbug par mi bya ba/_/rtsa yi dra ba 'dzin zhes bya/_/nang na gnas pa gsum po yin/_/rked par bcu drug phrag gnyis te/_/de las brla rtsar gnyis gnyis dang /_/rked pa'i gnad rnams gnyis gnyis te/_/de brgyad gtsags bus
[\[114a.2\]]gdab mi bya/_/rtsib logs gnyis la rtsa bcu drug_/de las gyen 'gro zhes bya spang /_/rgyab tu rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi/_/sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na/_/de las gnyis gnyis gyen 'gro ba/_/mtshon gyis gdab par mi bya'o/_/rgyab bzhin lto na
[\[114a.3\]]gnas rtsa de/_/pho mtshan steng na gnas pa dang /_/sbu yi phreng ba'i ngos gnyis rtsa/_/gnyis gnyis mtshon gyis mi gdab bo/_/brang la gnas pa bzhi bcu las/_/bcu bzhi dbug par mi bya ste/_/nu ma jing de yi rtsa ba dang /_/snying ga dag ni so sor gnyis/_/gnod bral gnad ni gnyis po dang /_/mi gsal
[\[114a.4\]]zhes bya gnyis kyi gnyis/_/mgrin pa ltag pa 'dra ba las/_/sngon po mjing pa ltag pa dang /_/'gal pa dang ni ma mo brgyad/_/bcu drug yongs su spang bar bya/_/'gram pa bcu drug de las gnyis/_/mtshams ni 'brel par byed pa spang /_/lce yang 'gram pa dang
[\[114a.5\]]'dra ste/_/'og gi ro tshor byed gnyis dang /_/tshig 'byin byed pa gnyis po spang /_/sna yi rtsa ni nyi shu bzhi/_/de las dri tshor byed gnyis dang /_/rkan du 'gro ba'i rtsa gnyis spang /_/mig gnyis kyi ni lnga bcu drug/_/'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las byed pa/_/gnyis
[\[114a.6\]]gnyis dang ni mig 'gram gnyis/_/drug po de dag spang bar bya/_/mig dang snar gnas 'phral ba la/_/brten pa'i rtsa ni drug cu las/_/bzhag pa gcig dang gtsug gi gnyis/_/skra mtshams gnas pa'i rtsa bzhi ste/_/bdun po de dag mtshon gdab spang /_/rna bar
[\[114a.7\]]bcu drug de las 'dir/_/sgra thos byed pa'i rtsa gnyis spang /_/de nyid las ni mur 'gram gyi/_/mtshams su 'gro ba gnyis po spang /_/spyi bor bcu gnyis de las ni/_/gyen 'gro skra mtshams bdag po las/_/so so'i re re spang bar bya/_/de ltar yan lag re re'i rtsa'i/_/dbye ba
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]dbug min shes phyir bshad/_/de las lus la dbug mi rung /_/ma lus dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod/_/dog dang rtsa mdud shin tu phra/_/yo dang tshigs la gnas mi dbug_/rtsa ni bdun brgya de rnams las/_/bzhi char khrag ni so sor rgyu/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad
[\[114b.2\]]kan khrag_/nad med khrag ni de ltar gnas/_/de ni lus la phan 'dogs te/_/gzhan du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur/_/de la gnag dang dmar dang phra/_/skad cig re re gang zhing stongs/_/mgul pa rlung gi khrag rtsa yin/_/reg na tsha zhing myur du rgyu/_/mdog sngo ser
[\[114b.3\]]por 'dug pa ni/_/mkhris pa'i khrag rtsa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/dkar snum brtan grang bad kan rtsa/_/'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin/_/mi mngon mnyam gnas snum pa dang /_/mdog dmar khrag rtsa nad med yin/_/rtsa bo che ni nyi shu bzhi/_/lte ba la ni brten pa
[\[114b.4\]]yin/_/de rnams kyis bskor lte ba ni/_/'khor lo'i lte ba rtsibs bskor mtshungs/_/des ni steng 'og thad ka ru/_/lus 'di rjes su 'dzin pa yin/_/bu ga sna dang rna ba gnyis/_/mig gnyis kha rkub pho mtshan gyi'o/_/bud med nu ma gnyis khrag sgo/_/gsum gyis
[\[114b.5\]]lhag par gyur pa yin/_/nang gi srog gi gnas gyur pa'i/_/bu ga bcu gsum yod par bshad/_/srog dang lus zungs dri ma chu/_/zas rgyu mi mthun bsten pa yin/_/de la gnod pas nad skyed la/_/skyon med dag pas bde bar byed/_/rang gi lus zungs mdog mnyam
[\[114b.6\]]zhing /_/zlum dang sbom dang phra ba yin/_/bu ga'i dbyibs ni ring po ste/_/lo ma'i rtsa 'phros lta bu yin/_/zas dang spyod lam dag gis gang /_/nad kyi mthu dang mnyam gyur dang /_/gang yang lus zungs mi mnyam ste/_/bu ga'i rgyun la gnod byed yin/_/
[\[114b.7\]]mang du 'byung ngam 'gags pa'am/_/rtsa ni mdud pa chags pa'am/_/lam gzhan dag tu 'gro ba ni/_/bu ga'i rgyu 'khrugs mtshan nyid yin/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba phra mo las/_/ring du rgyu bar byed pa ltar/_/gang gis dngas ma nyer 'phel ba'i/_/lus kyi sgo ni
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]bu ga yin/_/bu ga rnams ni brtol 'gyur na/_/'dar myos lto sbos lkugs dang rims/_/sla dang gzer dang bshang gci 'gags/_/yang na 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de bas sman pas bu ga brtol/_/re thag bcad de gso bar bya/_/'phral
[\[115a.2\]]du rma byung cho ga yis/_/'bad de zug rngu dbyung bar bya/_/zas 'ju byed pa mkhris pa ni/_/'ju byed yin zhes sngar bshad do/_/nad dang lus zungs dri ma yi/_/drod yin zhes ni rgyun shes zer/_/de ni zas kyi gnas yin zhing /_/'dzin cing 'dzin byed ces bshad
[\[115a.3\]]do/_/de nyid thang la 'bar gzhung gis/_/mkhris pa 'dzin pa'i cha ru bshad/_/tshe dang nad med brtson gzi mdangs/_/lus zungs me drod stobs 'phel byed/_/zhu ba'i gnas kyi sgor 'jug gang /_/zas kyi lam gyi sgo gtan yin/_/de ni stobs ldan zos pa rnams/_/
[\[115a.4\]]zhu nas zur du 'dren par byed/_/stobs zhan gyur na kha zas ni/_/ma smin nyid du 'byung bar byed/_/'dzin byed stobs ni me drod de/_/de yang 'dzin byed stobs can yin/_/de bas me drod nyams gyur na/_/'dzin byed nad ni skyed par byed/_/zas gang lus kyi lus zungs
[\[115a.5\]]mdangs/_/stobs dang kha dog stsogs rgyas byed/_/de rgyu kha zas me drod ni/_/mi 'ju dngas ma stsogs mi 'gyur/_/zas ni dus su zos gyur pa/_/lto bar srog gi rlung gis drangs/_/skom gyis gong por rnam par phye/_/snum gyis mnyen par byas pa yin/_/me mnyam
[\[115a.6\]]gnas kyis bus nas ni/_/ma zhu'i gnas na gnas smin byed/_/phyi yi snod gnas 'bras chu ltar/_/lto ba'i me yis 'ju bar byed/_/dang por ro drug zas kyang ni/_/mngar ba nyid du gyur nas ni/_/sbu ba can gyur bad kan 'gyur/_/zhu ba'i gnas nas 'pho ba na/_/rnam
[\[115a.7\]]par tsha bas skyur nyid 'gyur/_/mkhris gyur 'phos pa'i rjes la ni/_/me drod kyis skams zhu ba dang /_/kha zhing gong bur gyur rlung skyed/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/nam mkha' bcas pa'i drod lnga pos/_/rang rang yon tan zas lnga po/_/sa stsogs kyis smin de 'og tu/_/
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]de dag rang rang ji bzhin rgyas/_/smin 'byung yon tan tha dad yin/_/sa ru gtogs pas sa nyid dang /_/lhag mas lus gtogs lhag ma rgyas/_/zas de zhu ba'i tshigs ma dang /_/dngas ma zhes bya gnyis su 'gyur/_/de las zas kyi tshigs ma sla/_/gcin 'gyur ska ba bshad
[\[115b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/dngas mas lus zungs rang rang gi/_/me drod kyis smin rnam bdun 'gyur/_/dngas ma las khrag de las sha/_/sha las tshil te de las rus/_/rus rkang de las khu ba yin/_/khu ba las na ming la gnas 'gyur/_/lus zungs tshigs ma rim bzhin du/_/bad
[\[115b.3\]]mkhris bu ga'i dri ma dang /_/rdul dang sen mo ba spu dang /_/mi lpags bshang snum dngas ma yin/_/de ltar lus zungs smin pa las/_/dngas ma tshigs ma gnyis su 'gyur/_/lus zungs snum ni gcig la gcig/_/phan tshun nye bar bsten pa yin/_/zas 'ju dngas ma
[\[115b.4\]]stsogs rim gyis/_/khu chur gyur pa la la ni/_/nyin zhag gcig 'dod gzhan dag ni/_/zhag drug kha cig zla gcig 'dod/_/lus kyi zungs ni zas kyi rgyun/_/'khor lo lta bur yongs su 'khor/_/ro tsa stsogs pa'i mthu yis ni/_/'phral du khu ba la stsogs skyed/_/
[\[115b.5\]]phal cher sman gzhan nyin zhag ni/_/gcig gis las rnams byed pa yin/_/khyab byed kyis dngas lus zungs rnams/_/'thor bar byed pa'i las kyis ni/_/cig car rgyun mi 'chad kun tu/_/lus la rtag tu rnam par 'thor/_/gtor tshe bu ga'i skyon gyis ni/_/dngas ma gang du
[\[115b.6\]]chags 'gyur te/_/der ni gnod pa skyed byed de/_/mkha' la sprin chags char 'bab mtshungs/_/nad kyang ma snyoms gyur pa las/_/phyogs gcig 'dus na ldang bar 'gyur/_/de ltar 'byung ba lus zungs me'i/_/las ni yongs su bshad pa yin/_/zas ni dus su zos
[\[115b.7\]]gyur pa/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/dngas ma lus zungs rang rang gis/_/smin byed kun la zas 'ju ba'i/_/me ni lhag pa yin par 'dod/_/de ni rtsa ba de 'phel 'phel/_/zad gyur zad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/de bas rigs pas cho ga bzhin/_/zas skom rigs
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]shing phan pa yin/_/de 'bad pas bsrungs gnas gyur na/_/tshe dang stobs ni gnas par 'gyur/_/mnyam gnas rang gnas 'dug na mnyam/_/mnyam lam gzhan 'gro drod mi snyoms/_/mkhris pa shas che rno bar 'gyur/_/bad kan gyis
[\[116a.2\]]gnod me drod chung /_/me drod mnyam dang mi mnyam rno/_/chung dang de ltar rnam bzhi yin/_/gang zhig zas ni legs zos pa/_/legs par 'ju 'di mnyam pa yin/_/legs par ma zos myur 'ju ba'am/_/legs zos ring zhing 'ju mi mnyam/_/zas ni legs par ma
[\[116a.3\]]zos kyang /_/myur 'ju me drod rnon po yin/_/zas ni legs par zos gyur kyang /_/ring nas 'ju zhing kha skam dang /_/sbo dang rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang /_/lci ba me drod chung ba yin/_/me drod nyams na 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/skyon med na ni yun ring 'tsho/_/ma snyoms
[\[116a.4\]]nad ni skye 'gyur bas/_/de phyir me drod gtso bo yin/_/lus stobs lhan cig skyes pa dang /_/dus skyes rigs pa las byung gsum/_/de la lus sems las byung ba/_/rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i stobs/_/na tshong dus tshigs las byung ba/_/dus skyes yin te
[\[116a.5\]]rigs pa las/_/byung ba spyod lam zas kyis bskyed/_/de bzhin gzi bskyed sbyor las 'byung /_/yul phyogs shing ring chu nyung la/_/skams nad nyung skyed byed yin/_/rlan can de las bzlog pa yin/_/cha snyoms thun mong yin par bshad/_/rkang dang tshil dang zhag dang gcin/_/
[\[116a.6\]]mkhris pa bad kan phyis khrag_/dngas ma chu rnams lus gnas pa'i/_/snyim pa re res skyed par byed/_/mdangs dang klad rgyas khu chu ni/_/re re'ang rang gi khyor gang yin/_/bud med nu zho snyim do dang /_/zla mtshan snyim pa bzhi yod do/_/lus zungs mnyam gnas tshad 'di yin/_/
[\[116a.7\]]de las 'phel dang zad shes bya/_/khu chu khrag dang sbrum ma'i zas/_/spyod lam mngal gnas dus tshigs las/_/gang zhig nyes pa lhag gyur des/_/rang bzhin rnam pa bdun du bshad/_/khyab dang myur bar byed phyir dang /_/stobs ldan ba dang gzhan ldang byad/_/rang dbang
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]can dang nad mang phyir/_/nad las phal cher rlung stobs can/_/de nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i mi rnams ni/_/nad kyi bdag nyid rdul can skra bshor pags pags/_/grang lhags mi bzod brtan dran blo gros spyod mdza' sred/_/blta dang 'gro ba g.yo zhing smra ba shin tu mang /_/bad
[\[116b.2\]]kan nor nyung tshe thung gnyid srab dang /_/gcom chung tshig thogs g.yo zhing skad 'dzer dang /_/chad lta mang du za zhing sgeg dang bcas/_/glu dang dgod dang rngon las 'thab la dga'/_/mngar skyur kha dang tsha ba'i ro goms sred/_/lus skem dbyibs ring 'gro tshe sbra dang bcas/_/mi
[\[116b.3\]]brtan dbang po mi thul dam pa min/_/bud med mi chags bu mang skye mi 'gyur/_/de yi mig ni rtsub cing rdul gyis gang /_/zlum zhing mi mdzes 'chi ba lta bu dang /_/phye gdangs gnyid log lta bur snang ba yin/_/de ni shing dang ri 'dzeg mkha' 'phur rmi/_/skal ngan ser sna che zhing
[\[116b.4\]]khengs pa dang /_/rku zhing byin snying rtsa rings bcas pa dang /_/khyi dang wa dang rnga mo bya rgod khra/_/byi ba'i mtshan nyid ldan mi rlung can yin/_/mkhris pa me 'dra me las byung yin phyir/_/mkhris pa rgyas pa skom dang bkres shas che/_/mdog ser lus tsha rkang lag gdong yang dmar/_/
[\[116b.5\]]skra ser spu nyung dpa' zhing nga rgyal che/_/phreng ba byug pa rgyan la lhag par dga'/_/spyod bzang gtsang sbra che zhing mnyes gshin la/_/'byor dang rtul phod blo gros stobs dang ldan/_/'jig rten dgra bo'ang skyabs 'ongs skyob par byed/_/
[\[116b.6\]]yid gzhungs tshigs kyi mtshams dang sha ni rab tu lhod/_/bud med mi dga' khu ba dang ni 'dod pa chung /_/gnyer ma'i tshogs dang skra dkar mig sngo'i gnas gyur la/_/zas ni mngar dang bska dang kha bsil za bar dga'/_/than pa mi bzod rngul zhing dring la/_/bshang gci bza'
[\[116b.7\]]btung khro dang phrag dog mang /_/rmi lam dong ka pa la sha'i me tog_/glog 'gyu phyogs tshig skar mda' nyi me mthong /_/'di yi lus phra mig ser g.yo ba dang /_/rdzi ma srab cing nyung zhing grang la dga'/_/khro dang chang dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/_/mig ni myur bar dmar por
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]'gyur ba yin/_/tshe ni ran cing stobs ni 'bring ba dang /_/mkhas shing sdug bsngal dag la sran chung 'gyur/_/stag dang dred dang spre'u byi la dang /_/gnod sbyin rang bzhin ldan pa mkhris can yin/_/bad kan bsil bas bad kan can bsil zhing /_/
[\[117a.2\]]rus tshigs mi mngon snum zhing sha rus 'brel/_/bkres skom nyon mongs sdug bsngal than pa bzod/_/blo ldan snying stobs che zhing dam bca' brtan/_/pri yang ku dang dUr ba 'dam bu'i mdog/_/tshon dang gi'u wang pad+ma gser mdog can/_/lag ngar ring zhing drang ni yangs la rgyas/_/
[\[117a.3\]]'phral ba'i dbyes che skra ni mthug cing gnag/_/lus 'jam snyoms shing yan lag mdzes pa dang /_/mdangs che khu bcud bu tsha g.yog 'khor mang /_/chos ldan tshig rtsub nam yang smra mi byed/_/dgra la zhe sdang 'dam rings khon 'dzin byed/_/glang po'i mchog dregs bcas pa lta
[\[117a.4\]]bur 'gro/_/rgya mtsho 'brug dang rdza rnga seng ge yi/_/sgra ldan dran dang brtson 'grus dul bar ldan/_/byis pa'i tshe na'ang ngu dang skom shas chung /_/zas ni kha bska cha dang dro zhing rtsub/_/nyung ngu zos kyang de ni stobs dang ldan/_/mig gi mtha' dmar snum zhing dkyus ring yangs/_/
