[\[117a.5\]]dkar nag rab gsal rdzi ma snyoms dang ldan/_/smra dang khro dang bza' btung spyod pa nyung /_/tshe ring nor mang ring lta tshig 'jam smra/_/dad cing blo zab lta che bzod dang ldan/_/rang bzhin bzang zhing gnyid che las mtha' ring /_/byas gzo drang mkhas skal bzang ngo tshar ldan/_/
[\[117a.6\]]bla ma la gus mdza' bshes dag la brten/_/rmi lam pad+ma bya yi phreng bar bcas/_/chu yi gnas dang sprin yang mthong ba yin/_/tshangs pa drag po dbang po chu lha dang /_/nam mkha' lding dang ngang pa glang po mchog/_/de bzhin seng ge dang ni khyu mchog dang /_/bad kan can ni
[\[117a.7\]]rang bzhin 'drar shes bya/_/rang bzhin gnyis dang kun las byung /_/gnyis gnyis kun gyi yon tan bskyed/_/gtsang sbra yod par smra stsogs kyi/_/yon tan gyis ni de ldan bshad/_/na tshod bcu drug par byis pa/_/de las lus zungs dbang po gzi/_/'phel
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]'gyur bdun cu'i bar bar ma/_/zad pa phan chad rgan po yin/_/rang rang khru ni phyed dang bzhi/_/lus ni tshe ring bde ba'i snod/_/spu med gnag dang shin tu sbom/_/ring po nyid ni mi mthun bcas/_/smad pa brgyad dang rang nyid ldan/_/gang yin de ni de snod min/_/skra ni
[\[117b.2\]]rab tu 'jam pa dang /_/phra zhing rtsa ba ma 'dres brtan/_/dpral ba mtho zhing mur 'gram 'phyar/_/zla ba kham pa 'ang ba bzang /_/rna brgyab phyogs rgya che mdzes/_/rna shal che zhing sha yis rgyas/_/mig ni dkar nag 'byes pa dang /_/rdzi ma stug cing snyoms pa bzang /_/
[\[117b.3\]]sna yi rtse mo dbugs cher 'byung /_/sha rgyas drang zhing snyoms pa bzang /_/mchu ni dmar zhing ma 'phyangs ba/_/'gram pa yangs shing mi 'bur bzang /_/kha che so yi tshigs dam la/_/snum zhing dkar la 'jam zhing snyoms/_/lce ni dmar zhing yangs la srab/_/ko sko
[\[117b.4\]]che zhing sha yis rgyas/_/mgrin pa thung zhing sha rgyas zlum/_/phrag pa mthong zhing sha yis rgyas/_/lto ba zlum zhing lte ba ni/_/zab cing mtho la g.yas su 'khyil/_/rkang pa lag pa legs gnas shing /_/sen mo 'jam zhing mtho la dmar/_/snum zhing kun dmar sha
[\[117b.5\]]rgyas pa/_/sor mo ring zlum bu ga med/_/rgyab zhing che zhing sgal tshigs nub/_/tshigs mtshams mi mngon dam pa dang /_/tshigs gsang mtho zhing brtan pa dang /_/mdog snum kha dog brtan par gnas/_/rang bzhin gyis 'byung snying stobs brtan/_/phongs
[\[117b.6\]]pa'i tshe na'ang zhum pa med/_/mngal nas brtsams te nad med pa/_/gong nas gong du zhing bzang la/_/shes dang ye shes rgya cher ni/_/'phel zhing rim gyis dge bar 'gyur/_/de ltar yon tan kun ldan pa'i/_/lus ni ston brgya'i bar dag tu/_/tshe dang dbang phyug
[\[117b.7\]]'dod pa yi/_/dngos po thams cad rab tu gnas/_/bags pa khrag stsogs snying stobs par/_/brgyad po phyi ma bzhin du mchog/_/stobs dang tshad dang shes pa'i phyir/_/lus can rnams kyi snying por bshad/_/snying po kun dang ldan pa yi/_/mchog tu bkur bar
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]bya bar 'gyur/_/rtsom pa kun la'ang re bcas dang /_/bzod ldan blo bzang brtan par 'gyur/_/dregs dang zhum pa med par ni/_/bde dang sdug bsngal bsten gyur ba/_/snying stobs can yin rdul can khengs/_/mun pa can ni de ltar min/_/
[\[118a.2\]]sbyin dang tshul khrims snying brtse bden/_/tshangs par spyod dang byas pa gzo/_/byams ldan bcud kyis len bsten pa/_/tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba'i sde'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/lus kyi gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o//_//de nas lus
[\[118a.3\]]kyi gnad kyi bye brag bshad par bya'o/_/gnad ni brgya las bdun lhag pa/_/de las bcu gcig brla dang ni/_/de bzhin lag ngar gnyis so sor/_/lto ba la gsum brang la dgu/_/rgyab la bcu bzhi nam tshong ni/_/yan chad sum cu rtsa bdun yod/_/rkang pa'i mthil
[\[118a.4\]]nas gung mo yi/_/thad ka na ni mthil 'phrog pa'i/_/gnad yod ces ni rnam bshad de/_/de phug gnad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/_/mtheb sor dbus na rgya tshigs te/_/de phug bskyod pa'i gnad kyis 'chi/_/de gong sor gnyis shes par bya/_/rkang pa 'khar zhing 'dar
[\[118a.5\]]bar byed/_/long mo'i tshigs 'og pir mgo ste/_/de bcad skrang dang nad skyed byed/_/byin pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bar/_/long mo gnad rengs bem por byed/_/byin pa'i nang na nya zhes pa/_/khrag zad pa yis 'chi bar byed/_/byin pa brla mtshams pus mo ste/_/de phug
[\[118a.6\]]gson yang 'theng por 'gyur/_/pus gong sor gsum par gnyan gong /_/de phug brla rengs skrang bar byed/_/brla nang brla dbang zhes bya ba/_/de phug khrag zags brla bskam 'gyur/_/brla rtsa mig dmar zhes bya ba/_/khrag zad pas ni gzhogs phyed
[\[118a.7\]]'joms/_/brla rtsa rlig pa'i bar gyi gnad/_/ljon shing zhes bya ma ning byed/_/de dag brla'i'o dpung de bzhin/_/mkhrig ma 'di ni long mor mtshungs/_/gru mo byin 'dra de gnyis phug/_/zha bo ljon shing 'dra ba ni/_/mchan khung nang na mchan khung 'dzin/_/
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]de phug zha bo nyid du 'gyur/_/long ka'i gnad ni gzhang zhes bya/_/de phug gzhang rlung gis 'phral gsod/_/lgang ba gzhu ltar yo ba yi/_/chu so'i gnad ni sha khrag nyung /_/dbus na kha cig thur du lta/_/rked pa'i dbus gnas srog 'phral 'joms/_/rde'u 'byin
[\[118b.2\]]rma bug gnas ma gtogs/_/de yang ngos gnyis phug ste 'dra/_/gcin 'dzag gnas dang gcig tu phug/_/rma ni 'tsho bar shin tu dka'/_/lus kyi zhu dang ma zhu'i gnas/_/dbus na lte ba rtsa kun gyi/_/rten yin de yang 'phral gsod byed/_/ma zhu ba yi gnas sgor
[\[118b.3\]]gyur/_/'dod chags stsogs gnas snying zhes bya/_/brang dang nu ma lto dbus gnas/_/nu mjing nu ma'i rtsa zhes bya/_/steng 'og sor gnyis nu ma'i gnad/_/de phug bad kan khrag gis ni/_/rim bzhin lto 'gengs 'jig par byed/_/rengs bral brang gi ngos gnyis na/_/
[\[118b.4\]]rtsa sbubs gnyis po rlung rgyu ba/_/de phug khong pa khrag gis gang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde bas 'chi/_/rgyab kyi sgal tshigs brang gi bar/_/de gnyis kyi ni ngos gnyis na/_/phrag pa gnyis kyi 'og na ni/_/mi gsal zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/_/de gnyis phug pas
[\[118b.5\]]khong pa ni/_/khrag khengs rnag ste 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis na/_/rked pa'i cha gnyis gnas pa dang /_/rkub tshos ltag gnas sgal tshigs brten/_/rked pa can dang gzhon nur bshad/_/de snad khrag zad skya rbab dang /_/gzugs nyams pas ni
[\[118b.6\]]'chi bar 'gyur/_/rgyab kyi sgal tshigs ngos gnyis kyi/_/rked pa'i mtshams ni gang yin pa/_/ro smad kyi ni rgyab phyogs na/_/khung bu zhes bya'i gnad gnyis yod/_/de snad bskyod pa nyams pa dang /_/ro smad tshor ba med par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rtsib logs gnyis
[\[118b.7\]]dang 'brel/_/sta zur rtse mo gnyis steng gi/_/gnas ni g.yogs par gyur pa dang /_/ro smad gzhon nu'i rus par gnas/_/de snad ro smad skrangs pa dang /_/nyam chung 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/_/rtsib logs gnyis kyi nang dang 'brel/_/rked pa'i ngos gnyis dbus na gnas/_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]thad ka dang ni gyen gnas pa/_/rtsib logs mtshams te de phug na/_/khong pa khrag gis gang ba dang /_/lus dang bral ba nyid du 'gyur/_/nu ma gnyis kyi thad ka'i cha/_/rgyab kyi sgal tshigs la brten pa/_/rtsa chen zhes bya de phug na/_/khrag
[\[119a.2\]]zad nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/dpung mgo gnyis dang 'brel pa yi/_/sgal tshigs kyi ni ngos gnyis/_/phrag pa gnyis kyi sog pa ste/_/de snad bskams shing tshor bral 'gyur/_/mgrin pa gnyis kyi ngos gnyis rtsa/_/dpung mgo dang ni mgrin pa'i bar/_/
[\[119a.3\]]brag pa brag pa la brten gnad/_/de phug lag ngar bya ba nyams/_/srol gong gi ni ngos gnyis na/_/'gram pa la ni brten pa'i rtsa/_/bzhi ste de la sngon po gnyis/_/gnyis pa'ang mjing pa'i gnad du bshad/_/de phug skad 'gags mi sdug dang /_/lce yis ro ni
[\[119a.4\]]mi tshor 'gyur/_/lkog ma'i sbubs kyi ngos gnyis nas/_/lce dang snar ni 'gro ba'i rtsa/_/so sor bzhi bzhi yod ma mo/_/de bcad 'phral du srog 'joms so/_/mgo bo ske mtshams ltag pa ste/_/de phug mgo bo ldem por 'gyur/_/rna ba gnyis 'og lcong ba na/_/
[\[119a.5\]]rna rtsa zhes bya'o na bar 'gyur/_/sna yi bu ga gnyis dang ni/_/sna yi lam 'gro mgrin nang gnas/_/sbrul mgo zhes bya de bcad na/_/dri mi tshor bar byed par 'gyur/_/mig gnyis kyi ni phyi rol mtshams/_/smin ma skyes pa'i mtha' yi 'og/_/mig zur
[\[119a.6\]]smin steng dma' bar gnas/_/'khyil pa phug pas long bar 'gyur/_/rna mchan 'phral ba'i mtha' na ni/_/mur 'gram zhes bya dbral 'chi byed/_/mur 'gram gnyis steng skra mtshams na/_/gdeg pa zhes bya bzhag bya yang /_/smin mtshams bar gnas
[\[119a.7\]]gsum char la'ang /_/zug rngu dag ni ma phyung zhing /_/smin nas rang nyid byung na 'tsho/_/phyung na 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur/_/lce mig sna dang rna ba yi/_/bu ga bzhi ni 'dus pa dag/_/rkan dang sgo ru kha bzhi ste/_/bu ga'i gnad ni de rnams kyi/_/gnad ni sum
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]mdo ris zhes bya/_/de bcad srog ni 'phral du 'dor/_/thod pa yi ni mtshams lnga po/_/thad ka gyen 'gro mtshams kyi mtha'/_/de snad pas ni mgo 'khor dang /_/smyo zhing dran pa nyams te 'chi/_/spyi bo'i steng na gtsug 'khyil pa'i/_/rtsa dang ldan sbubs 'dus pa na/_/spu
[\[119b.2\]]'khyil bdag po zhes bya ba'i/_/gnad kyis srog ni 'jig par byed/_/gang du mnan na shin tu 'gul/_/rab na de gnad yin zhes bya/_/sha rgyus rus pa rtsa chen dang /_/rtsa dang tshigs ni 'dus pa ru/_/gnad ces bya ste des na der/_/srog ni lhag par gnas pa yin/_
[\[119b.3\]]mang du rnam par bstan mod kyi/_/gnad ni rnam pa drug tu bstan/_/srog gi gnas su thun mong bas/_/gnad ni gcig tu'ang gnas pa yin/_/shar gtogs bcu ste byin lag nywa/_/mthil 'phrog nu mjing nu rtsa'o/_/rus pa'i gnad brgyad mur 'gram dang /_/rked pa
[\[119b.4\]]can dang gzhon nu dang /_/ro smad dang ni sog pa'o/_/rgyus pa'i gnad ni nyi shu gsum/_/gnyan gong zhes bya pir dang ni/_/pir mgo mig zur rgya tshigs dang /_/phrag pa gzhag dang chu so yi/_/rtsa chen gnad ni rnam dgu ste/_/gzhang dang rengs bral rna rtsa dang /_/sum
[\[119b.5\]]mdo ris zhes bshad pa'o/_/rtsa la gnas gnad sum cu bdun/_/rtsa chen gnyis dang ma mo sngo/_/'gram pa mchan khung 'dzin sprul mgo/_/ljon shing snying dang lte ba dang /_/rtsib logs mtshams dang nu ma'i 'og/_/mi gsal gzhag dang brla dbang dang /_/dmar po zhes bya
[\[119b.6\]]bzhi po'o/_/tshigs la nyi shu 'khyil pa dang /_/mkhrig ma gnyis dang khung bu dang /_/mtshams mtha' gru mo long mo dang /_/ltag pa pus mo bdag po'o/_/gzhan dag gzhang sha'i gnad ces zer/_/mchan khung 'dzin dang ljon shing ni/_/rgyus pa la brten rna rtsa dang /_/
[\[119b.7\]]sum mdor si dang rengs bral dang /_/mig 'gram rtsa yi gnad yin gyi/_/rtsa chen gnas par de ma bshad/_/sha yi gnad bcad khrag rgyun 'dzag/_/sha bkrus 'drar 'gyur sla ba dang /_/skya zhing dbang po nyams pa dang /_/myur du 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur/_/rus
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]gnas gnad bcad rkang bcas na/_/sla dang bar bar chad cing 'dzag/_/rgyus pa'i gnad bcad na zhing 'khrug/_/brkyang bskum mi shes gnod par 'gyur/_/'gro dang stan gnas nus pa chung /_/dbang po nyams pa'am 'chi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[120a.2\]]rtsa chen gnad bcad lbu ba dang /_/sgra bcas 'byung zhing dran nyams 'gyur/_/rtsa yi gnad bcad khrag ska zhing /_/rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'byung /_/de zad mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/_/skom rmongs skyigs bus 'debs bas 'chi/_/lus ni gra ma lta bus khyab/_/'tshob
[\[120a.3\]]kyang sgur po'am 'theng por 'gyur/_/tshigs gnad stobs dang spyod pa nyams/_/lus skem tshigs ni skrang bar 'gyur/_/lte ba mur 'gram bdag po gzhang /_/snying dang chu so sum mdo ris/_/ma mo brgyad dang bcu dgu po/_/'phral du srog ni gcod par byed/_/de rnams
[\[120a.4\]]'phral du mi 'chi yang /_/zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'chi/_/rengs bral mthil 'phrog rtsib logs mtshams/_/rked pa can gzhon mtshams kyi mtha'/_/nu rtsa dbang po chu so'i gnad/_/rgyab tshigs mi gsal rtsa chen dang /_/ro smad nu mjing sum cu gsum/_/zla ba'am
[\[120a.5\]]zla phyed son nas ni/_/dus gzhan du ni 'chi bar byed/_/brdeg dang gzhag pa zhes bya gsum/_/der ni zug rngu byung gyur na/_/rlung gis sha dang tshil dang rkang /_/glad rgyas rnams ni skems par byed/_/mtshon phyung lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/'byung zhing srog ni 'joms par
[\[120a.6\]]'gyur/_/sbrul mgo mig zur rna rtsa dang /_/sngon po 'gram gnas ltag pa'i gnad/_/phrag pa'am phrag stsogs 'khyil pa dang /_/ljon shing brla dbang khung bu dang /_/mig dmar pus mo'i gnad dang bcas/_/mtshan 'dzin pir 'dra gru mo'i gnad/_/de ltar
[\[120a.7\]]gnad ni bzhi bcu bzhis/_/rkang lag 'jas par byed 'gyur ba'am/_/gal te tshabs cher snad gyur na/_/des ni srog kyang 'joms par byed/_/pir mgo 'dra dang long mo dang /_/mkhrig ma'i gnad brgyad nad tshabs skyed/_/de las ljon shing mchan khung 'dzin/_/
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]brla dang pir mgo lta bu ste/_/bcu gnyis sor gcig tshad yin no/_/mkhrig ma dang ni long mo dang /_/nu ma'i rtsa ba sor gnyis tshad/_/pus mo gru mo sor gsum tshad/_/gzhang dang chu so lte ba snying /_/sngon po mtshams mtha' ma mo dang /_/pir 'dra sum mdo ris 'gram pa/_/
[\[120b.2\]]gnad ni nyi shu dgu yi tshad/_/rang gi lag mthil tshad yin no/_/lhag ma gnad ni lnga bcu drug_/sor phyed kyi ni tshad du 'dod/_/gzhan dag gnad de til 'bru ste/_/'bras tsam gyi ni tshad du 'dod/_/rtsa bzhir bshad pa gang yin pa/_/lus kun brtas par byed pa rnams/_/de ni
[\[120b.3\]]gnad la gnas pa yin/_/des na de phug khrag drag 'byung /_/lus zungs rnams ni zad pa'i phyir/_/rlung 'phel nad ni mi bzang 'debs/_/rlung gis mkhris pa rgyas par byed/_/mkhris pa rgyas par gyur pas na/_/skom dang mgo 'khor skam dang myos/_/lus rngul
[\[120b.4\]]tshigs dbye lus lhod dang /_/de ni gshin rje'i dbang du 'gro/_/gnad gcod na ni myur ba ru/_/lus kyi tshigs ni chod 'gyur te/_/tshigs kyi phyogs su bcad pas na/_/rtsa ni 'khums par byed pa yin/_/de la srog chags rnams kyi srog/_/khrag gnas na ni gnas pa
[\[120b.5\]]yin/_/de bas gnad min legs phog na/_/nges par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'ga' zhig sman pa'i yon tan dang /_/phyogs gcig tu ni phog pa yis/_/'tsho bar gyur kyang de yi ni/_/dbang po mtshang nyid du 'gyur/_/de bas 'bad de gnad du ni/_/thal sman me
[\[120b.6\]]btsa' la sogs spang /_/gnad du phog na chung dus kyang /_/phal cher shin tu gnod pa yin/_/de bzhin gnad la brten pa'i nad/_/rab tu 'bad pas gso bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/lus kyi gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[120b.7\]]de nas lus kyi 'gyur ba'i bye brag shes par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/ji ltar 'bras bu me tog dang /_/me yi du ba char gyi sprin/_/phyis 'byung mtshan ma yin pa ltar/_/de bzhin 'chi ltas las nges 'chi/_/'chi ltas med na mi 'chil/_/'chi ltas snang na
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]'tsho mi 'gyur/_/'chi ltas 'chi ltas mi shes pa/_/mi mkhas 'chi ltas med min shes/_/la la rten dang brten pa po'i/_/khyad par gyis de gnyis su 'dod/_/nad kyi tshul ni mang po las/_/'chi ltas tshul du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nad zhin ni
[\[121a.2\]]zhi 'gyur la/_/brtan par gnas na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gzugs dang dbang po skad dang mdog_/gzugs brnyan bya ba sogs pa dang /_/dngos po dag ni gzhan la yang /_/tha mal pa las rgyu med par/_/gzhan du gyur gang mdor gang ni/_/'chi ltas yin par de shes bya/_/
[\[121a.3\]]skra dang ba spu ma bskus par/_/snum gyis bskus ltar gang snang dang /_/gang zhig mig ni rab g.yo dang /_/mi 'gyur phyir 'byung khung bur zhugs/_/yo dang bgrad dang 'jums pa dang /_/bcum zhing smin ma smad pa dang /_/'khrul dang mthong ba nyams pa dang /_/sre mo'i mig
[\[121a.4\]]ltar lta ba dang /_/thi ba 'dra dang mgal me 'dra/_/mchi ma 'dzag cing rdzi ma 'khrugs/_/sna ni shin tu gdangs pa dang /_/zhom dang 'brum phran gyis khyab dang /_/skrang dang gos dang rnyid pa dang /_/gang gi ma mchu 'phyangs pa dang /_/yam chu gyen la brdzes pa dang /_/
[\[121a.5\]]gnyi ga 'dzam bu smin 'drar snang /_/so gnag gseg mar bcas pa dang /_/dmar zhing so zho nag nog can/_/glo bur du ni 'byung ba dang /_/lce ni yo dang rtag tu 'byin/_/skrang dang skam dang lci dang gnag_/gos dang rtsub dang tshor ba med/_/mjing pas mgo ni mi thig
[\[121a.6\]]dang /_/rang gi ltag rgyab khur ltar lci/_/'gram pas khan gnas pa yi/_/kha zas bldad par mi nus pa/_/gang zhig rgyu med par yan lag_/shin tu lci ba'am shin tu yang /_/dug dang snad pa med par ni/_/bu ga rnams las khrag 'byung dang /_/gang zhig pho mtshan
[\[121a.7\]]nub pa dang /_/rlig pa rab tu 'phyangs pa'am/_/de las go log gyur ba rnams/_/thams cad 'chi bdag dbang gyur yin/_/gang gi rtsa ris sngon med par/_/zla ba tshes pa lta bu ni/_/'phral ba'am chu so'i steng na gnas/_/de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/_/lus can
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]gang gi lus la chu/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur ni/_/rgyal tshe chu ni mi chags pa/_/de ni zla ba drug na 'chi/_/spyi bo du ba'am snum bcas snang /_/de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi/_/spyi bo'am smin mtshams gsar du ni/_/mtshams bye ba'am gtsug 'khyil snang /_/nad med zhag
[\[121b.2\]]ni drug gis 'chi/_/nad pa zhag gsum na 'chi 'gyur/_/lce gnag kha ni mnam pa dang /_/mig g.yas phugs su bros ba'am/_/bya ni mgo la babs pa dag_/gang yin de ni yongs su spang /_/gang zhig khrus byas byugs pa dang /_/lus kun gsher bar gnas bzhin du/_/
[\[121b.3\]]snying ga shin tu myur bar bskams/_/de ni zla phyed las mi 'tsho/_/glo bur du ni lus kun mdog_/cig car tha mal pa las nyams/_/de bzhin nad ni sogs pa dang /_/rtsub dang snum 'gyur 'chi ba yin/_/gong gi sor mo drangs pa dang /_/sgra mi 'byung ba de mi 'tsho/_/de bzhin
[\[121b.4\]]lud pa sbrid stsogs la/_/gang zhig sngon med sgra byung ba'am/_/dbugs 'byin thung ba'am ring ba'am/_/dri mnam pa'am dri zhim 'gyur/_/lus ni khrus byas ma byas rung /_/mi ma yin pa'i dri 'byung ba'am/_/gos rma dri ma byung na yang /_/de ni lo gcig nas 'chi 'gyur/_/
[\[121b.5\]]gang zhig shig dang sbrang ma stsogs/_/dri zhim pas ni 'du ba'am/_/dri nga bas ni spong 'gyur na/_/de ni lo gcig las mi 'tsho/_/gang zhig rtag tu lus tshal/_/grang ba nyid du snang ba dang /_/bsil ba shin tu tsha bar snang /_/rgyu med par ni rngul dang rengs/_/gang
[\[121b.6\]]zhig grang ba'i chu bur 'byung /_/lus grang ba las tsha ba skyes/_/grang gdungs than pa la mi dga'/_/de ni gshin rjes dbang 'gyur yin/_/gang gi snying ga dro gyur la/_/lto ba shin tu grang gyur cing /_/bshang ba 'khru zhing skom dad che/_/de ni ro dang 'dra ba yin/_/
[\[121b.7\]]bshang dang gci ba mchil snabs sam/_/kha chu chu nang nub gyur pa'am/_/mchil ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/_/gang yin pa de zla gcig 'chi//_sa ni nam mkhar mthong ba dang /_/nam mkha' sar ni mthong gyur dang /_/gzugs med gzugs can lta bu dang /_/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]gzugs can gzugs med ltar gnas mthong /_/de bzhin 'od can 'od med mthong /_/dkar po gnag dang pa med/_/mig nad med par zla ba ni/_/gzugs mngar ri med mthong dang /_/gnyid ma log par dri za srin/_/yi dwags
[\[122a.2\]]gzhan yang de 'dra ba'i/_/gzugs mi sdug pa mthong 'gyur ba/_/gang yin de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sme bdun dang ni nyer gnas pa'i/_/skar ma sgrib med ma mthong dang /_/dgu tshigs gung tshugs ma mthong ba/_/de ni lo gcig mi 'tsho'o/_/'brug sgra chu bo'i sgra dang ni/_/gling
[\[122a.3\]]bu pi wang rnga yi sgra/_/sgra gzhan med kyang thos pa'am/_/yod pa thos par ma gyur dang /_/rna ba'i bu ga bkab pa yis/_/'ur 'ur po yi sgra mi thos/_/de bzhin dri dang ro dang reg_/gang zhig log par shes pa dang /_/yang na yong ye mi tshor dang /_/me mar shi ba'i dri mi tshor/_/cho ga
[\[122a.4\]]bzhin byas nad skyed la/_/cho ga log pas bde gnas dang /_/gang gi lus ni rdul g.yogs 'dra/_/lus la snad ba mi chor dang /_/dka' thub drag dang cho ga ni/_/sngon 'gro'i rnal 'byor med pa ru/_/dbang po las 'das shes pa skyed/_/de rnams 'chi bar shes par bya_/
[\[122a.5\]]skad 'gags dman zhing mi gsal dang /_/gang zhig skad ni 'dzer gyur dang /_/smra 'dod pa ni 'phral du ni/_/brjed 'gyur de ni mi 'tsho'o/_/skad gsang shin tu nyam chung 'gyur/_/mdog dang stobs ni nyams pa dang /_/rgyu med par ni nad 'phel bar/_/snang ba dag kyang
[\[122a.6\]]'chi bar bshad/_/skad gdangs nyams par gyur pa dang /_/bdag nyid 'chi bar smra ba dang /_/de 'dra'i sgra ni thos pa dag_/ring du yongs su spang bar bya/_/lus dbyibs dang ni tshad dang ni/_/mdog gam gzi mdangs gang dag gis/_/gzugs brnyan 'gyur ba rmi lam du/_/
[\[122a.7\]]mthong na'ang de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma me long chu stsogs la/_/gang zhig dbyibs dang tshad dang ni/_/lus kyi rnam pa snang gyur pa/_/gzugs brnyan zhes ni de la bshad/_/mdog dang gzi mdangs la brten gang /_/lus gtogs gzugs brnyan lta bu yin/_/gang
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]gi gzugs brnyan bcad pa dang /_/gyes dang lhag dang 'khrugs pa dang /_/mgo med mgo gnyis yon po dang /_/mi sdug gzhan du gyur par snang /_/mtshan nyid las byung ma yin na/_/de ni tshe zad yin zhes bya/_/gang gi mig gi rgyal mor ni/_/gzugs brnyan
[\[122b.2\]]snang bar ma gyur dang /_/nam mkha' la stsogs lnga po yi/_/gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs lnga/_/nam mkha' dngas shing sngo ba dang /_/snum bcas mdog dang bcas pa yin/_/rlung las rdul can dmar dang gnag_/thal mdog rtsub cing mdog nyams yin/_/me yi
[\[122b.3\]]dmar zhing dang bar snang /_/mdangs ldan/_/blta na sdug pa yin/_/chu skyes baiDUr+ya 'drar snang /_/dag cing rab snum bde ba yin/_/sa yi brtan snum dag pa dang /_/mthug cing dkar dang sngo bsangs yin/_/rlung ni 'chi sdug bsngal skyed/_/gzhan dag bde ba skyed pa
[\[122b.4\]]yin/_/me yis thams cad mdog can te/_/de ni rnam pa bdun du bshad/_dmar dang ser dang dkar nag po/_/ljang dang skya dang nag po'o/_/de rnams la ni gang gsal 'gyur//_snum dang dri ma med de dag_/dri ma can dang rtsub pa dang /_/zhum pa sdug bsngal
[\[122b.5\]]skyed pa yin/_/mdangs kyis mdog ni zil gyis gnon/_/'od ni kha dog gsal byed yin/_/mdangs kyis nye bar snang ba yin/_/'di ni ring nas snang ba yin/_/'ga' zhig mdangs dang kha dog gi_/mtshan ma'i khyad par med min te/_/mi rnams mtshan ma bzang
[\[122b.6\]]ngan 'byung /_/dus su mdangs la brtan pa yin/_/gang zhig rkang pa 'drud pa dang /_/phrag pa yo bas 'gro ba dang /_/gang zhig phan zas mang zos kyang /_/rtag tu stobs ni nyams 'gyur na/_/gang zhig nyung zos bshang gci mang /_/mang zos bshang gci nyung ba dang /_/
[\[122b.7\]]nyung zos bad kan gyis nyen zhing /_/dbugs rings 'byin zhing sa la 'gre/_/gang zhig dbugs rings phyung nas ni/_/thung du rngubs te shugs 'byin dang /_/thung du dbugs 'byin bsnun pa ltar/_shin tu 'dar bar byed pa yang /_/gang zhig lag ngar bskums nas ni/_
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]mgo bo dka' bas 'debs pa dang /_/gang zhig 'phral ba las rdul 'dzag_/tshigs mtshams lhod par gyur pa dang /_/nyams che ba 'am nyam chung gyur pa gang /_/ldang ba'i tshe na mi dran 'gyur/_/gang zhig gan rkyal nyal nas ni/_/rkang
[\[123a.2\]]pa rnam par bskyod pa dang /_/rtsig pa mal stan la sogs pa/_/gang zhig rtag tu snyes pa dang /_/rgyu med par dgod myongs tshul gyis/_/mchu la ldags par byed pa dang /_/ya mchu ldags par byed pa dang /_/sgra bcas par yang gang byed dang /_/lus mdog nag po
[\[123a.3\]]ser po dang /_/dmar po'i gzugs brnyan snang ba dang /_/sman pa sman dang kha zas dang /_/bla ma mdza' bshes la sdang gang /_/'di dag thams cad gshin rje yi/_/dbang gyur yin par shes par bya/_/gang zhig drod chung sems g.yengs dang /_/rtag tu mdangs ngan
[\[123a.4\]]yid mi bde/_/gang zhig gtor ma bya rog la/_/byin yang za bar mi byed dang /_/gang zhig rgyu med yid gzhungs dang /_/mdzes shing lus rgyas dpal thob pa'am/_/de las nyams par gyur pa dag_/de ni gshin rje'i khyim du 'jug_/tha mal par ram nad pa yis/_/
[\[123a.5\]]gang zhig yon tan skyon rang bzhin/_/snga las gzhan du 'gyur par snang /_/de ni zla drug las mi 'tsho/_/dad dang tshul khrims dran dang sbyin/_/blo gros stobs ni rgyu med par/_/'di drug las ni ldog gyur pa/_/zla ba drug nas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/'gro dang
[\[123a.6\]]tshig ni smyo ba 'dra/_/'dar rmongs zla ba gcig nas 'chi/_/skra phyi ba na tshor ba med/_/zhag drug nas ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig lkog nad med pa ru/_/mid par kha zas mi chud dang /_/bran g.yog log par byed gyur pa/_/de ni 'chi ba dang 'drar
[\[123a.7\]]bshad/_/gang zhig rtag tu gnyid log pa'am/_/gnyid med de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/mchi mas gdong ni khebs pa dang /_/rkang pa shin tu rngul ba dang /_/mig ni mi sdug par snang ba/_/gshin rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sngon chad dga' ba'i dngos la gang /_/
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]dga' mi 'gyur ba de mi 'tsho/_/gang zhig 'phral du 'gyur ba yin/_/mtshan nyid thams cad snang ba dang /_/'phral du ldog par 'gyur ba dag_/de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/_/rims ni stobs dang ldan pa dang /_/gting du zhen zhing yun ring dang /_bla bcas
[\[123b.2\]]mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/_/rid cing skrangs dang me drod nyams/_/tshig mi gsal zhing thogs pa dang /_/mig dmar snying ni gzer ba dang /_/snga dro lud pa skam po 'byung /_/phyi dro de las gzhan du 'gyur/_/bad kan lud par bcas pa dang /_/stobs
[\[123b.3\]]dang sha ni zad na 'chi/_/khrag dang mkhris pa shin tu dmar/_/yang na gnag pa'am tshon can nam/_/dmar dang ser dang ljang mdog tu/_/khrag gi gzugs ni rab tu snang /_/ba spu'i bu ga nas 'dzag dang /_/lkog ma snying gar gos pa dang /_/gos la ma chags dri
[\[123b.4\]]ngal/_/shugs byung shin tu mang du 'byung /_/rgad po skya rbab rims thabs skyugs/_/lud pa skrang dang tshad 'khru gsod/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rims skyugs//_/skom dang tshad 'khru 'or nad dang /_/gcong can sbos dang rtsib logs gzer/_/khrag skyug phrag pa
[\[123b.5\]]tshan 'chi/_/skyug pa shugs dang ldan pa dang /_/bshang gci dri yod tshon can dang /_/lud pa bshang nag khrag dang bcas/_/dbugs mi bde yun ring na 'chi/_/skom dad nad gzhan gyis nyam smad/_/lce 'byung dran pa stor na 'chi/_/chang nad shin tu grang bas
[\[123b.6\]]nyen/_/sha zad til mar gdong bskus 'dra/_/gzhang 'brum rkang lag lte ba dang /_/bshang sgo rlig pa'i kha skrangs dang /_/snying ga rtsib logs yan lag na/_/slon bro gzhang rnams rims kyis nyen/_/chad 'khru mcher ba'i dum bu dang /_/sha bkrus pa'am snum
[\[123b.7\]]nag dang /_/til mar 'o ma mar 'dra yang /_/zho dang rkang zhag chang snying dang /_/glad pa gnag tsha 'dra ba dang /_/sha brdungs chu dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/rab dmar gnag dang snum pa dang /_/rnag 'dra sla ska rnag dang bcas/_/lus zungs sna tshogs 'byung ba dang /_/bshang ba
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]med pa'am che ba 'am/_/'byar bag sbrang ma lta bu'am/_/ri mo can dang tshon can dang /_/gzhang gi gnyer ma phyir 'byung dang /_/sgra can rus tshigs gzer ba dang /_/bshang sgo bye zhing stobs zad dang /_/zas ni nyams 'byung ba dang /_/skom bcas
[\[124a.2\]]rims dang skyug pa dang /_/lus tsha lto sbos rgyun 'khrus 'chi/_/rde'u 'gags rlig pa skrangs pa dang /_/gcin 'gags nad kyis nyam thag gsod/_/gcin snyi skom dang tsha 'brum bcas/_/sha rul tshad pas 'khru ba 'chi/_/thor nad dang ni snying ga rgyab/_/nu ma phrag pa spyi bor
[\[124a.3\]]byung /_/tshigs dang rkang pa lag par gnas/_/gcin sri nad can stobs chung dang /_/sha rnams thams cad 'drul ba dang /_/skom dang tsha myos rims btab 'chi/_/me dbal gnad ni 'gags pa dang /_/skyigs bu mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/_/skran ni rgya cher kun nas zlum/_/
[\[124a.4\]]sra zhing rus sbal ltar mtho dang /_/rtsa mngon rims btab skyugs pa dang /_/skyigs bu sbos shing zug gzer bcas_/lud pa che ma pa snying 'phar dang /_/tshang 'khru skrang dang dbugs mi bde/_/dmu rdzing bshang gci 'gags pa dang /_/dbugs mi bde skrang skyigs bu dang /_/
[\[124a.5\]]rims dang mgo 'khor brgyal slon 'khru/_/nyam chung mi ni gsod 'gyur zhing /_/mig skrang ba dang mchan khung dang /_/pags pa rul zhing srab pa dang /_/bkru sman gyis bkrus lto sbos zhing /_/yang dang yang du 'phel ba 'chi/_/skya rbab skrang dang bcas pa dang /_/mig dang
[\[124a.6\]]sen mo ser por snang /_/snyoms tsha yi ga 'chus dang slon/_/brgyal dang lto sbos tshad 'khru 'chi/_/skrangs nad bla brnan sna tshogs ldan/_/skyes pa rkang gnyis dang por skrangs/_/bud med mgo nas skrangs na 'chi/_/gnyi ga'ang mtshan dang mchan khung skrangs/_/
[\[124a.7\]]ri mor bcas 'dzag skyugs pa dang /_/rims dang tshad 'khru dbugs mi bde/_/skrangs pa'i tha mar rims tshad 'khru/_/de gnyis gnyis zad mthar skrangs dang /_/lus can nyam chung gyur pa dag/_/skrangs par gyur na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig skrangs pa rkang par
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]gnas/_/byin pa'i nywar ni phyin pa dang /_/dpyi yi bar du gnod gyur pa/_/de ni sman pas spang bar bya/_/gang gi gdong lag rkang pa ni/_/lhag par skams par gyur pa'am/_/lus ma gtogs 'di shas cher skrangs/_/de ni zla ba gcig na 'chi/_/me dbal lud pa kha dog
[\[124b.2\]]nyams/_/rims brgyal yan lag bcag snyam sems/_/mgo 'khor kha skams snying ga na/_/lus snyom tshad pas 'khru ldan spang /_/mdze ni yan lag 'drul ba dang /_/mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/drod nyams srin bu rnams kyis gtses/_/skom
[\[124b.3\]]dang tshad pas 'khru ldan 'chi/_/rlung nad pags pas tshor med byed/_/lus 'dar skrang dang nad kyis gzir/_/dreg nad rmongs shing brgyal ba dang /_/myos dang gnyid che rims mgo rengs/_/yi ga 'chus dang dbugs mi bde/_/'khums shing chu bur rul pa 'dra/_/
[\[124b.4\]]mgo nad yid 'chus dbugs mi bde/_/rmongs bag la 'khru zhing skom mgo 'khor/_/skad 'gags lus zungs me drod zad/_/lus nyam chung nad kun gsod byed/_/rlung gi nad dang brjed byed dang /_/mdze nad khrag dang dmu rdzing gcong /_/skran can gcin nad ldan pa
[\[124b.5\]]yis/_/sha zad nad tshabs chung yang sdang /_/sha dang stobs ni shin tu zad/_/nad 'phel yi ga 'chus pa dag_/nad pa gang la snang 'gyur te/_/zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi/_/rlung nad gtun 'dra la 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/mi zad snying ga gnas pa dag_/skom
[\[124b.6\]]dad kyis ni yongs gdungs pa/_/'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/_/rlung nad nywa ni lhod byed cing /_/sna ni yon por 'chus byed pa/_/gang gi 'gram pa zad par snang /_/'phral du srog ni 'phrog pa yin/_/rlung nad lte ba gzhang bar song /_/yang na brla dbrag gnyis
[\[124b.7\]]na gnas/_/stobs ldan rlung ni nyam chung ba'i/_/gzhang dang snying gar gnas byed pa'am/_/dri ma chu so'i ltag lte ba/_/bkag te nad ni skyed pa dang /_/chu sor gzer bar byed 'gyur la/_/skom dad 'khru bar byed pa dang /_/chu so bshang sgor gnas nas ni/_/rlung ni
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]dbugs mi bde skyed dang /_/rtsib ma'i rtse mo 'degs byed cing /_/snying gar rlung ni brten pa dang /_/mig bgrad 'gyur ba med byed pa/_/'phral du srog ni 'phrog par byed/_/'phral du rims dang tsha bas btab/_/skom dad brgyal dang stobs
[\[125a.2\]]zad dang /_/tshigs mtshams bral bar gyur pa rnams/_/nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/nang par gang gi gdong las ni/_/rngul nas shas cher 'dzag 'gyur zhing /_/khar chags rims kyis gdungs pa rnams/_/de yang 'tsho bar dka' ba yin/_/gang gi lus la 'brum
[\[125a.3\]]phran ni/_/byi ru'i mdog 'dra snang gyur pa/_/byung nas myur du mi snang gyur/_/de ni ring por mi thogs 'chi/_/'brum pa sran chung bshus 'dra zhing /_/de bzhin byi ru'i mdog 'dra ba/_/nang du kha blta tshad 'brum 'dra/_/'brum bus lus ni 'jig byed yin/_/mig
[\[125a.4\]]ser gdong ser rgyas pa dang /_/mur 'gram gnyis kyi sha zad pa/_/skrag cing lus ni tsha bdag_/gang yin de ni spang bar bya/_/rgyu med phrugs pa dag las rma/_/'phel zhing mched par byed pa dang /_/rlung skyed gang yin na ba med/_/mkhris pa las gyur tsha ba med/_/
[\[125a.5\]]bad kan las gyur rnag med dang /_/gang zhig nad skyed zug gzer med/_/phye mas khyab dang rnying par snang /_/gang du glo bur dag tu ni/_/rgyal mtshan mdung la sogs gzugs snang /_/rma de thams cad spangs bar bya/_/mtshan par rdol na bshang gcig rlung /_/'byung zhing
[\[125a.6\]]srin bus gtses pa dang /_/pus mo phan tshun 'byer ba dang /_/rkang pa bteg nas ltung gyur dang /_/yang dang yang du kha bsgyur ba'i/_/nad pa de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/so yis sen mo'i rtse gcod cing /_/sen mos skra'am rtsa gcod dang /_/sa la shing bus 'dri
[\[125a.7\]]ba dang /_/bong pas bong ba rdeg pa dang /_/spu ldang gcin ni bska ba dang /_/lud pa bskams shing rims kyis 'debs/_/skad cig dgod cing spyugs glu len/_/ma la la rkang bas rdeg pa dang /_/skad cig re res bu gsol/_/nad pa gang yin de mi 'tsho/_/
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]gdong la sme ba ngo khabs dang /_/mdzer skyes so sen thig le chags/_/lto la sna tshogs rtsa snang ba/_/glo bur byung ba de mi 'tsho/_/gyen du dbugs rtseg drod yal zhing /_/brla dbrag gnyis su gzer gyis nyen/_/dpal dang rnam par bral gyur pa/_/blo dang ldan pas yongs su
[\[125b.2\]]spang /_/gang gi nad ni 'phel 'gyur dang /_/rang bzhin yongs su nyams pa ni/_/gang la 'phral du 'byung gyur pa/_/de ni mod la 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sman pas nad pa gang zhig la/_/sman gyi bya ba byas gyur pa/_/'bad kyang sos par ma gyur na/_/de yi srog ni rnyed par dka'/_/
[\[125b.3\]]mkhas shing mang du grub pa dang /_/cho ga bzhin du byin gyur yang /_/sman gyi bya ba ma grub gang /_/de la gso ba'i thabs med do/_/gang gis sman ni sbyor ba'i tshe/_/rgyu med par ni phyin ci log/_/mdog dang ro stsogs logs gyur na/_/nad med yin yang de mi 'tsho/_/gang
[\[125b.4\]]gi gnas su shing bcas med/_/rlung med kyang ni shi 'gyur dang /_nad pa gang gi khyim du ni/_/snod ni shin tu mang po dag_/chag gam lhung bar gyur pa na/_/de yi srog ni rnyed par dga'/_/mi gang nyam chung gyur ba yang /_/glo bur sos par snang 'gyur ba/_/de yi srog kyang ma
[\[125b.5\]]nges pa/_/yin par rgyun shes bus bshad do/_/nye du mdza' bo rnams kyis ni/_/dris kyang mnyan par mi bya la/_/sman pas smra bar mi bya zhing /_/de yi gso ba'ang khas mi blang /_/gshin rje'i pho nya sha za stsogs/_/gzhan gyis nye bar bsten pa gang /_/sman gyis stobs ni
[\[125b.6\]]'joms pas na/_/de phyir de ni yongs su spangs/_/tshe yi rig byed 'bras bu kun/_/tshe shes pa la gnas pa yin/_/de bas 'chi ltas gnas pa kun/_/sman pas 'bad de shes par bya/_/tshe dang bsod nams gnyi ga zad/_/de gnyis zad par ma gyur yang /_/yang ba ni
[\[125b.7\]]ma spangs pas/_/srog chags rnams ni 'chi bar bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_lus kyi gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o//_//de nas lus kyi gnas kyi pho nya la stsogs pa bshad par bya'o/_/ya mtshan can dang dge sbyong dang /_/rigs mthun
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]las ni 'grub par bshad/_/de las go bzlog pho nya ni/_/las ni 'grub min rtags su bshad/_/dman dang 'jigs rengs sngangs pa dang /_/rtsub dang bkra mi shis smra dang /_/mtshon cha dbyug thogs mgo reg dang /_/ma ning smar ral pa can/_/
[\[126a.2\]]bkra mi shis pa'i ming dang ldan/_/sdig las bud med dri ma can/_/mang po nad pa mi sdug dang /_/phreng ba byug pa dmar pos brgyan/_/til mar 'dam bskus gos rnying dang /_/mdog ngan rlan can gos gcig gon/_/bong bu rnga mo ma he zhon/_/shing dang bong ba nyed pa dang /_/ring nas
[\[126a.3\]]'bod pa'i pho nya 'ongs/_/sman pas yongs su spangs bar bya/_/bkra mi shis pa sems dang smra/_/gcer bu gcod dang 'jig pa dang /_/mtshun gtor me la bsreg pa dang /_/'chi ba rnams la ster ba dang /_/sar nyal skra bshig skud pa dang /_/ngu dang ma bsdams gnas
[\[126a.4\]]skabs su/_/sman pa gnas tshe pho nya 'ongs/_/mi ni 'chi bar ston pa yin/_/nad dang mtshan nyid mtshungs ba yi/_/yul lam dus su sman pa gnas/_/bang chen 'bod du 'ongs mthong na/_/nad pa de ni gso mi bya/_/lte ba kha dang sna reg dang /_/skra dang spu dang sen mo so/_/
[\[126a.5\]]mtshan rgyab nu ma mgrin pa dang /_/lto dang srin lag dag dang ni/_/ras bal phub ma zha nye rtsa/_/rus pa gtun brdung phyags ma rdo/_/zhabs ma gos kyis mtha' ma dang /_/thal ba sol ba kha tshar sogs/_/gzhan yang thog gi zhags pa
[\[126a.6\]]thogs/_/pho nya de 'dra sngon du mthong /_/'chi ba dag tu ston pa yin/_/de bzhin mtshan phyed nyi ma'i gung /_/thun mtshams dang ni dus tshigs dang /_/tshes drug tshes bzhi tshes dgu dang /_/sgra gcan mjug rings 'char dus stsogs/_/bra nye smin drug skag chu stod/_/gre
[\[126a.7\]]dang khrums stod snrubs dang ni/_/gong du pho nya nad pa yi/_/mtshan nyid la ni brten pa'i tshig_/mi dge smra dang mi shis mthong /_/der ni sman pa 'gro mi bya/_/dbang bo ma tshang mi ro'am/_/mi rus kyis ni brgyan pa'am/_/chad dang tshig dang nyams chag dang /_/de yi tshig tu
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]smra ba'am/_/ro ni tsha dang drag pa'am/_/dri ni shas cher rul pa'am/_/reg bya rgya cher mi bzad dang /_/gang yang de 'dra gzhan dag ni/_/de kun mdun du smra ba'am/_/yang na de skad smra ba'i tshe/_/pho nya 'ongs par mthong na ni/_/nad pa de ni gso mi bya/_/kyi hud kyi hud cho
[\[126b.2\]]nges 'debs/_/'od dod mod mo 'gyel sbrid sgra/_/gos dang gdugs dang lham 'jig dang /_/sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ba dang /_/shing chen rgyal mtshan gang ba'i snod/_/chu nang nub par mthong ba dag_/gsod stsogs yid du mi 'ong smra/_/thal ba phyag dar gyis gtor dang /_phyi la
[\[126b.3\]]sram dang sbrul dang ni/_/spre'us lam ni bcad pa dang /_/'bar ba'i phyogs su ri dgas bya/_/gdug pa sgra ni sgrogs pa dang /_/'bru gnag bu ram dar ba dang /_/lan tshwa chang rnying pags pa dang /_/yungs kar zhag dang 'bru mar dang /_/rtswa dang 'dam bu bud shing dang /_/ma ning mi srun sme
[\[126b.4\]]sha can/_/rgya dag dang ni rnyi rnams dang /_/slon dang bshang ba gtong ba dang /_/rnag dang mtshan ma ngan pa mthong /_/snying po med dang 'khrig pa spyod/_/ras bal stsogs dang dgra bo mthong /_/mal stan dang ni khyogs la stsogs/_/kha sbub tu ni gnas par mthong /_/nad pa
[\[126b.5\]]dag dang gzhan dag dang /_/snod stsogs ngan mthong mi shes so/_/skyes pa'i ming can bya g.yon na/_/bud med ming can g.yas 'dug bzang /_/bya dang ri dwags g.yas skor bzang /_/khyi dang wa ni de lta min/_/ri dwags rnams ni zung min shis/_/tsa sha bya rgod khany+dza ri/_/ne+e'u
[\[126b.6\]]le dang rma bya rnams/_/mthong ba rtag tu shis pa yin/_/'ug pa byi la sbrul mthong ba/_/rnam pa kun tu shis ma yin/_/go da dang ni ri bong sbrul/_/dza ba ka ni ming thos dge/_/mthong dang sgra sgrogs de lta min/_/dred dang spre'u de las bzlog_/'phral ba'i phyogs su 'ja'
[\[126b.7\]]tshon mthong /_/mi shis rgyab tu mthong na shis/_/me yis gang ba'i snod dag ni/_/chag dang khong stong gnas pa dang /_/nad pa 'chi 'gyur khyim du ni/_/sman pa 'jug par byed pa'i tshe/_/zho stsogs bkra shis 'og nas bshad/_/gang ba'i snod phyir byung mthong dang /_/pho nya la
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]stsogs mi shis mthong /_/de lta'i nad pa spang bar bya/_/de las gzhan par snying rje'i rgyud/_/dag pas 'bad de gso bar bya/_/zho 'bru bu ram shing dang khre/_/sbrang rtsi zhun mar pri yang ku/_/nas thug dngul rdo bum pa dang /_/dril bu mar me chu skyes
[\[127a.2\]]dang /_/dUr pa nya dang sha rlon dang /_/'bras yos 'bras bu kha zas dang /_/bum pa rin po che yis gang /_/bu mo gzhon dang shing rta dang /_/mi ni mgo 'phang mtho ba dang /_/lha rnams dang ni rgyal po dang /_/gos dkar gon dang me tog dkar/_/khyim dang rnga yab rta dkar mthong /_/dam
[\[127a.3\]]pa bram ze gtsug tor dung /_/rta babs dang ni g.yung drung dang /_/sa ni brkos par gyur pa dang /_/me ni rab tu 'bar ba dang /_/bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang /_/mi yis shing rta legs gang dang /_/ba ni be'u dang bcas pa dang /_/rgod ma bud med btsas dang /_/shang shang te'u sha bkra
[\[127a.4\]]dang /_/ngang pa khu byug rma bya dang /_/sar sa ni sgra snyan sgrogs/_/de bzhin phyugs gcig btags pa dang /_/gdu bu me long yungs kar dang /_/gi wang rnams ni mthong ba dang /_/byug pa dri zhim gyis byugs dang /_/khu ba dkar zhing mngar ba dang /_/khyu mchog de bzhin ba lang rnams/_/rjes su
[\[127a.5\]]mthun pa'i sgra sgrogs dang /_/ri dwags bya dang mi rnams ni/_/yid 'ong sgra snyan smra ba yi/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan bsgreng /_/mngon par stod par byed pa dang /_/rdza rnga dung dang rnga bo che/_/sgra dang bkra shis sgra sgrogs pa/_/bram ze rig byed 'don pa dang /_/bde ba'i rlung ni rjes
[\[127a.6\]]mthun rgyu/_/lam dang khyim du 'jug tshe yod/_/nad sos mtshan nyid yin shes bya/_/de ltar pho nya dge bshad nas/_/de 'og rmi lam bshad bya ste/_/rmi lam shi ba'i mi rnams dang /_/lhan cig chang 'thungs khyis drangs gang /_/mi de rim gyis gzugs can gyi/_/'chi
[\[127a.7\]]bdag gis ni myur khyer 'gyur/_/lus dang gos dang phreng ba dmar/_/bud med rgod pas drangs rmis gang /_/de ni khrag mkhris dag gis 'chi/_/ma he rta phag bong bu dang /_/rnga mo zhon te lho phyogs 'gro/_/de ni gcong chen nad kyis 'chi/_/lcug ma tsher can 'od ma'am/_/ta la
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]snying gar skyes pa rmi/_/gang yin de ni skran gyis 'chi/_/gang zhig me ni mi 'bar la/_/sbyin sreg byed cing mar gyis bskus/_/gcer bur 'dug dang pad+ma ni/_/snying gar byung rmis mdze yis 'chi/_/gang zhig sme sha can lhan cig/_/snum mang 'thungs par rmi bde/_/gcin nad
[\[127b.2\]]kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/_/srin po lhan cig gar byed cing /_/chu la bying rmi smyo byed 'dzin/_/ra ro gar byed shi ba yi/_/mis khyer rmi ba brjed byed 'dzin/_/bong bu rnga mo byi la spre'u/_/seng+ge stag dang khwa dag dang /_/wa 'am mi ro la zhon rmis/_/de ni 'chi bdag khar song yin/_/
[\[127b.3\]]snum khur sha khu li zos rmis/_/sad nas de 'dra slon 'gyur ba/_/gang yin de ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/nyi zla gzas zin rmis mig na/_/nyi ma zla ba lhung ba yi/_/rmi lam mthong na long bar 'gyur/_/spyi bor 'od ma'i lcug stsogs skyes/_/de bzhin bya rog tshang 'cha' dang /_/
[\[127b.4\]]mgo bo chad par rmis pa dang /_/khwa dang bya rog sogs kyis bskor/_/de bzhin yi dwags sha za mo/_/byad ma sme sha can gyis bskor/_/'od ma'i tshal dang tsher ma dang /_/rtswa yi tshang tshing nang du tshud/_/g.yang sar lhung dang dur khrod nyal/_/phyag dar thal ba'i nang du lhung /_/
[\[127b.5\]]chu dang 'dam la stsogs par nub/_/chu rgyun gyis ni myur du khyer/_/glu gar dang ni rol mo dang /_/gos dang phreng ba dmar po 'chang /_/lus 'phel na tshod rgas pa dang /_/bag ma len zhing kha spu 'dreg_/zas btsos snum za chang 'thung dang /_/skyugs dang 'khru ba rmi ba dang /_/
[\[127b.6\]]lcags dang gser dag rnyed pa dang /_/btsong dang rtsod las pham pa dang /_/mchil lham gnyis ni stor ba dang /_/rkang pags lhung ba rmi ba dang /_/shin tu dga' dang rab khros ba'i/_/shi ba'i gnyen gyis spyos pa dang /_/mar me gza' dang skar ma dang /_/so mig lha'i gzugs
[\[127b.7\]]rnams ni/_/lhung ba'am 'jig pa rmis pa'am/_/ri bo ral par 'gyur pa dang /_/nags tshal 'bar ba'i nang dang ni/_/sdig can khyim du 'jug pa dang /_/ro bsregs pa dang mun par zhugs/_/ma yi mngal du zhugs pa dang /_/brag dang khang pa sar lhung dang /_/de bzhin nya
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]yis mid pa dang /_/chos gos gon pa'i mi srun dang /_/gcer bu dbyug pa thogs pa dang /_/mig dmar kha dog gnag pa ni/_/mthong na nam yang shis yin/_/bud med sdig can gdong gnag dang /_/skra dang sen mo nu ma ring /_/gos dang
[\[128a.2\]]phreng ba dmar po thogs/_/rmis pa dus mtshan yin par 'dod/_/nad ni stobs dang ldan pa yis/_/yid 'jug bu ga bkag pa'i phyir/_/mi bzad rmi lam mthong 'gyur te/_/nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur pa yin/_/nad med the tshom bcas gyur zhing /_/'ga' zhig thar bar
[\[128a.3\]]'gyur pa yin/_/mthong dang thos dang nyams myong dang /_/gsol ba btab dang brtags pa dang /_/'byung bar 'gyur dang nad las byung /_/rmi lam rnam pa bdun du bshad/_/de las dang po'i lnga po dang /_/rang gi rang bzhin nyin mo brjed/_/shin tu ring thung 'bras bu med/_/
[\[128a.4\]]cha 'dres pa yi rang bzhin can/_/mtshan stong rmi lam 'bras bu ring /_/mthong ba chung ngu byed pa yin/_/nang par mthong dang gnyid ma log/_/mi mthun gtam gyis bar mchod/_/de yi nyin par 'bras chen 'gyur/_/sbyin dang sbyin sreg la stsogs kyis/_/rmi lam 'bras bu
[\[128a.5\]]chung bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmi lam ngan mthong nas/_/slar yang gnas skabs de nyid du/_/rmi lam bzang po mthong gyur na/_/'bras bu bzang po nyid thob 'gyur/_/lha dang bram ze khyu mchog dang /_/ba lang rgyal po mdza' bshes gson/_/skyes bu dam pa grags ldan dang /_/
[\[128a.6\]]me 'bar ba dang dngas pa'i mtsho/_/bu mo khye'u ser ba dang /_/gos dkar gon zhing mdangs dang ldan/_/skyes bu za dang lus 'bar dang /_/khrag gis lus kun byugs pa dag/_/gang gis mthong bar gyur ba dang /_/gdugs dang sha rlon me long dug/_/sna ma dkar pos
[\[128a.7\]]gos pa dang /_/mi gtsang gis byugs 'bras bu rnyed/_/ri bo khang bzangs 'bras bcas shing /_/'dzeg dang seng ge glang chen mi/_/rta dang ba lang dag la zhon/_/chu bo mtsho bran rgya mtsho rgal/_/shar dang byang du 'gro ba dang /_/bgrod min 'gro dang shi ba dang /_/nyam nga
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]las thar lha rnams dang /_/pha mas mngon par bstod pa dang /_/ngu dang ltung las ldang ba dang /_/dgra bo pham par byas pa dag_/gang rmis tshe ring nad med dang /_/nor mang po ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/de bzhin nad pa'i g.yog 'khor ni/_/bkra shis cho ga phun sum tshogs/_/
[\[128b.2\]]dad ldan rjes su mthun pa dang /_/nor mang bsdus par gyur pa dang /_/snying stobs mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing /_/sman pa bram ze stsogs la gus/_/gso dpyad rnams la skyo ba med/_/de ni nad med 'gyur mtshan nyid/_/rtag tu shis pa sdud pa dang /_/bkra mi shis pa rnam par spang /_/
[\[128b.3\]]'di dag de nyid mthong ba yi/_/drang srong rnams kyis shis par bshad/_/de ltar 'di ni skye dang 'chi/_/mtshan nyid gang phyir bshad pas na/_/de phyir lus kyi gnas yin pas/_/'di ni lus kyi gnas su bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_lus kyi gnas
[\[128b.4\]]kyi le'u drug pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_lus kyi gnas te gnas gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//de nas nad thams cad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la stsogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces bshad do/_/
[\[128b.5\]]nad dang sdig pa rims gnod byed/_/'gyur byed sdug bsngal ma zhu'i skyon/_/zad byed 'tsho dka' mkhun gnod skyed/_/ming gi rnam grangs sgras bshad do/_/nad gzhi sngar byung tshul dang ni/_/de bzhin tshul phyed goms byed dang /_/dkyel gyur shes par byed pa ste/_/nad ni
[\[128b.6\]]rnam pa lngar shes bya/_/gzhi dang rgyu dang skye mched dang /_/rkyen dang slong bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/rnam grangs kyis ni nad gzhi bshad/_/gang gis sngar byung tshul shes pas/_/nad ni 'byung bar 'dod gyur la/_/bye brag phyed par ma gyur ba/_/nad kyi tshul ni ji bzhin par/_/
[\[128b.7\]]chung phyir mtshan nyid mi gsal ba'o/_/de nyid gsal ba nyid gyur pa/_/tshul phyed pa zhes bya bar bshad/_/dbyibs dang gsal mngon rtags dang ni/_/mtshan nyid mtshan ma rnams yin no/_/rgyu dang nad dang mi mthun zhing /_/mi mthun pa yi don byed pa'i/_/sman dang zas
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]dang spyod lam rnams/_/nyer bar bsgyur pas bde 'gyur ba/_/nyams brtas byed par shes bya ste/_/de ni goms pa zhes byar bshad/_/de las bzlog pa'i ma goms nad/_/mi 'phrod nad ces bya ba'o/_/gang gis nad ni dkyil gyur pas/_/ji bzhin
[\[129a.2\]]rjes su 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/nad rnams rdzogs shing mngon gyur pa/_/skyes shing 'ongs pa dkyel gyur yin/_/de ni grangs brtag gtso bo dang /_/stobs dang dus kyis phye ba yin/_/grangs ni ji ltar 'di nyid las/_/rim ni brgyad du bshad pa yin/_/nad rnams spyir ni bsdus pa las/_/
[\[129a.3\]]cha shas dbye ba brtag pa yin/_/rang dbang gzhan dbang gnyis las ni/_/nad rnams gtso bor bshad pa yin/_/rgyu stsogs ma lus phyogs gcig las/_/stobs ni che chung shes par bya/_/nyin mtshan dus dang zas zos chas/_/nyes pa ji bzhin nad kyi dus/_/de ltar nad
[\[129a.4\]]gzhi'i don bshad nas/_/de ni rgyas par bshad par bya/_/nad rnams kun gyi nad gzhi ni/_/nad ni 'khrugs par gyur pa yin/_/de ni gnod 'gyur sna tshogs pa/_/bsten pas ldang bar 'gyur bar bshad/_/gsum po'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum/_/gnod 'gyur sngar ni bshad pa yin/_/
[\[129a.5\]]kha dang tsha dang bska chung zad/_/rtsub dang bcud med sra ba dang /_/bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang /_/mtshan mo mi nyal skad cher smra/_/sbyangs pa'i sbyor drags mya ngan 'jigs/_/sems las drag shul bud med drags/_/so ga nyin mtshan zas zhu'i rjes/_/rlung gi nad ni ldang bar 'gyur/_/
[\[129a.6\]]mkhris pa tsha dang skyur dang rna/_/lan tshwa bro dang lus tsha dang /_/ston ka nyin phyed mtshan phyed dang /_/tsha ba'i dus su ldang bar 'gyur/_/mngar skyur lan tshwa snum pa dang /_/lci dang bad kan skyed bsil dang /_/'dug dang bde dang gnyid ma zhu/_/nyin par gnyid log brtas drags dang /_/slon
[\[129a.7\]]stsogs sbyor ba nyes pa dang /_/zos ma thag dang dpyid kyi dus/_/snga dro mtshan stod bad kan ldang /_/'dres pa las ni ldan pa yin/_/thams cad bsten pas 'dus par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gzhan yang 'dren mar zos/_/ma zhu ma snyoms mi 'phrod dang /_/lhag par zos pa la stsogs
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]dang /_/chang dang btung ba nyes pa dang /_/tshod ma skam dang la phug rjen/_/til tshigs sa zhag so ba'i chang /_/sha rul sha skam sha rid rnams/_/de dang de yis nyes gsum skyed/_/de bzhin kha zas sbos pa dang /_/dus tshigs log pa bdun gyi rlung /_/gdon zhugs dug dang
[\[129b.2\]]dbyig dug zos/_/be'u snabs nad 'khrugs ri rtsar gnas/_/btsas skar la ni gza' zhugs dang /_/log par sbyor ba sna tshogs dang /_/sdig pa'i las la brten pa dang /_/bud med bu btsas log par byung /_/gso ba log par byas las ldang /_/de ltar so so'i nad ldang bas/_/
[\[129b.3\]]nad kyi gnas su 'gro byed pa/_/rtsa sbubs rnams su phyin pa dang /_/nad rnams lus la myur du skyed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o//_//de nas rims nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/rims ni nad bdag sdig can
[\[129b.4\]]dang /_/'chi bdag mdangs za 'chi byed yi/_/khros pas myur ba'i mchod sbyin brlag/_/drag po dpral ba'i mig las byung /_/skye dang 'chi tshe rmongs byed pa/_/mi 'phrod sna tshogs bsten las byung /_/mi bzad ming ni sna tshogs pas/_/skye gnas du ma rnams la gnas/_/
[\[129b.5\]]de ni nad rnams so sor 'dres/_/'dus dang glo bur las brgyad 'gyur/_/de la nad rnams rang rang ni/_/rgyu las 'khrugs te ldang ba yis/_/ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs gyur pa/_/lhan cig gnas nas rtsa sgo bkag/_/zhu ba'i gnas nas me drod ni/_/phyi rol du ni 'byin par byed/_/
[\[129b.6\]]de dang lhan cig mngon khyab nas/_/lus kun tsha bar byed pa yin/_/yan lag shin tu tsha byed pas/_/rims ni de yis skyed par byed/_/rtsa sgo bkag pas de 'og tu/_/rdul ni mang du mi 'byung ngo /_/de yi sngon tshul sgyid zhan dang /_/nyams mi dga' zhing lus lci la/_/
[\[129b.7\]]ro mi tshor zhing yi ga 'chus/_/glal 'byung mig 'khrugs mchi mar bcas/_/yan lag na zhing 'ju stobs chung /_/nyam chung gnyid ni che ba dang /_/sbu ldang bya rmyang byed 'dod dang /_/byin pa'i nywa na lus snyom dang /_/phan par bstan pa mi bzod khro/_/skyur dang tsha dang drod
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]la sred/_/kha zas mngar ba la mi dga'/_/byis pa la sdang skom dad che/_/sgra me grang lhags rlung dang chu/_/grib ma nyin mtshan rgyu med par/_/dga' dang mi dga' dag tu byed/_/de rjes rims ni gsal bar 'gyur/_/rims thebs 'byang nye'i tshe nad tshabs/_/
[\[130a.2\]]chung zhing tshab mi snyoms la/_/yan lag de dang der 'pho zhing /_/na bde dang der g.yo 'gyur/_/rkang pa be+ems po rengs pa dang /_/byin snying na zhing ngal ba dang /_/tshigs rnams bye ba lta bur sems/_/brla dang rked pa na ba dang /_/rgyab ni brdungs pa ltar sems dang /_/lto ba btsir ba snyam
[\[130a.3\]]sems dang /_/rus pa bcad pa snyam pa dang /_/rtsib ma lhag par na ba dang /_/snying ni btsir snyam sems shing zug/_/brang du btsugs pa lta bur gzer/_/phrag pa brdungs snyam dpung pa ni/_/bcom snyam sems shing sgrog dus na/_/'gram pas kha zas bldad mi nus/_/glal 'byung rna ba
[\[130a.4\]]sgra dang bcas/_/mur 'gram zug cing mgo bo na/_/lce yis ro ni mi tshor ram/_/yang na kha bska bro bar 'gyur/_/dri ma rnams ni sri ba dang /_/lpags mig kha dang sen mo dang /_/bshang sogs rtsub cing dmar ba dang /_/mchil mang yi ga 'chus sred chung /_/zas mi 'ju zhing rdul mi
[\[130a.5\]]'byung /_/gnyid yar mchu dang gre bskam/_/skom dad che zhing lud pa skam/_/lud pa lu zhing skyugs pa skam/_/sems zhum lus kyi ba spu ldang /_/pags pa so dag brtse ba dang /_/rkang lag 'dar zhing sbrid pa thogs/_/mgo 'khor tshig ni bla ba dang /_/drod bag la dga' bya rmyang
[\[130a.6\]]byed/_rlung gi rims su shes par bya/_/lus kun cig car khyab pa dang /_/bla zhing kha'i ro kha ba dang /_/bsil 'dod kha snar thor bu 'byung /_/mgo 'khor brgyal myos snying mi dga'/_/bshang sla mkhris pa slon pa dang /_/mchil ma khrag bcas sgregs pa skyur/_/thor bu dmar
[\[130a.7\]]po 'byung ba dang /_/pags pa la stsogs ser rtsa sngo/_/rdul 'byung dbugs ni mnam pa dang /_/skom dad rab che mkhris pa'i rims/_/lhag par yi ga 'chus shing rmongs/_/bu ga 'gags shing rims shugs dal/_/mchil mang kha nang mngar ba bro/_/dang ga lci zhing
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]dbugs mi bde/_/cham btab snying na skyug pa 'byung /_/lud pa lus rengs lpags stsogs skya/_/yan lag thor bu grang mo 'byung /_/snyom zhing lus 'dar bad kan rims/_/rang gi dus su thams cad ni/_/'byung zhing 'phel ba nyid 'gyur ba/_/nad gzhir bshad pa'i mi mthun
[\[130b.2\]]bsten/_/bsgyur bas bde bar byed pa yin/_/rang rang mtshan ma 'dres pa ni/_/ldan pa'i rims yin gzhan yang ni/_/mgon brgyal slon lus tsha rmongs bag 'gyur/_/gre ba kha skam mi dga' rus tshigs na/_/gnyid mid mgo 'khor spu ldang skom dad che/_/kha glal tshig mang rlung
[\[130b.3\]]mkhris 'dres pa'i rims/_/tsha med yi ga 'chus shing klad tshigs na/_/cham pa lud pa dbugs mi bde bshang sri/_/khong bsil rmongs bag rab rib mgo 'khor rmya/_/bad kan rlung 'dres rims kyi mtshan ma yin/_/lus rdul rengs dang tsha bsil sor mi gnas/_/skom dad
[\[130b.4\]]lud pa bad kan mkhris bag 'byung /_/rmongs bag rmya dang kha bro khar dri chags/_/bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa'i rims kyi rtags/_/kun nas 'byung ba rtags kun ldan/_/'dir yang thang ri tsha ba ldang /_/de bzhin grang dang nyin mo ni/_/gnyid che mtshan mo gnyid med byung ba'am/_/
[\[130b.5\]]rtag par gnyid 'ong pa'am yang na yar/_/rdul cher 'byung ba'am rdul mi 'byung /_/glu dang gar dang dgod stsogs pa/_/spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug cing /_/mig dmar mchi ma 'dzag dang bcas/_/zhum zhing rdzi ma 'khrugs par snang /_/byin snying rtsib logs na ba dang /_/
[\[130b.6\]]mgo bo rus tshigs na mgo 'khor/_/rna ba sgra dang nad dang bcas/_/mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems/_/lce rtsub kun nas bsregs ltar snang /_/lus lci tshigs ni 'bye snyam sems/_/mchil mar khrag mkhris bad kan 'byung /_/mgo bo g.yo zhing skom dad che/_/
[\[130b.7\]]thor bu 'brum phran mtha' 'khor la/_/dmar zhing gnag pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/snying na bshang gci sri ba'am/_/yang na nyung ba'am rab mang 'byung /_/kha nang snum zhing nyams stobs chung /_/gcom chung 'gyur zhing bla ba dang /_/nad smin dka' zhing rmugs pa dang /_/rgyun tu
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]gre ba 'dzer ba ni/_/'dus pa'i rims te mngon rmugs byed/_/de ni mdangs 'phrog ces kyang bshad/_/nad kyis bkag cing me drod nyams/_/mtshan ma thams cad rdzogs gyur pa/_/gsor mi rung te de las gzhan/_/gso dka' 'am dbang po ma tshang 'gyur/_/
[\[131a.2\]]gzhan yang 'dus pa las byung ba/_/gang du mkhris pa logs shig gnas/_/pags pa'am nang grol tsha ba dag_/'debs pa'am tsha ba snga phyis 'byung /_/de bzhin bad kan rlung grang ba/_/de gnyid tsha snga gso dka' yin/_/grang snga der ni mkhris pa yis/_/bad kan gsher ba skam pa dang /_/
[\[131a.3\]]grang bzhi byes kha sgyur brgyal/_/myos dang skom dad skye bar 'gyur/_/tsha ba snga ma de rjes la/_/rmugs slon mchil mang khod snyom 'gyur/_/glo bur drag shul las byung dang /_/mngon zin byad byas dmod byung bzhi/_/de la smas bcad mes tshig stsogs/_/ngal ba drag shul las byung yin/_/
[\[131a.4\]]de ni phal cher rlung nad kyis/_/khrag ni gnod cing 'khrugs byas pas/_/na bcas mdog nyams skrang dang bcas/_/zug gzer bcas pa'i rims skyed 'gyur/_/gdon zhugs sman gyi dri dang dug_/khros 'jigs mya ngan gdon las 'byung /_/mngon par zin las byung rims yin/_/
[\[131a.5\]]'dir gdon rgyu med dgod cing ngu /_/sman gyi dri bskyed brgyal ba dang /_/sbid pa glad nad skrangs par 'gyur/_/dug las brgyal dang tshad par 'khru/_/mdog nag lus tsha snying nad 'byung /_/khros pas lus 'dar glad nad 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'jigs las bla bar 'gyur/_/'dod
[\[131a.6\]]las mgo 'khor yid 'chus tsha/_/ngo tsha gnyid blo brtan nyams 'gyur/_/gdon la sogs pa 'dus pa'i rims/_/'jig tshogs gsum ni rlung gi rims/_/khro las mkhris pa ldang bar 'gyur/_/dmod pa byad byas las byung gang /_/'dus pa'i rims ni mi bzad pa/_/de ni
[\[131a.7\]]shin tu bzod dkar bshad/_/de la byad byas sngags kyis ni/_/sbyin sreg byas pa bzhin du byas/_/thog mar sems 'bab de 'og lus/_/de nas thor bu mgo 'khor skom/_/tsha bcas brgyal bas zin gyur ba'i/_/rims ni nyin re bzhin du 'phel/_/de ltar rims ni brgyad du bcas/_/
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]de dag mdor na rnam gnyis te/_/lus dang sems kyi rims dang ni/_/grang dang tsha dang phyi nang gnas/_/rang bzhin dang ni gyur ba dang /_/gsor rung gsor mi rung ba dang /_/smin dang ma smin zhes bya'o/_/lus rims thog mar lus tsha byed/_/sems kyi dang por snying tsha 'gyur/_/
[\[131b.2\]]rlung dang bad kan cig car ni/_/'byung tshe grang ba'i rims su 'gyur/_/mkhris pa dang ldan tsha ba ste/_/'dres pas 'dres pa'o nang gnas pa/_/rims nad dkyel ni bskyed 'gyur nas/_/nang na na zhing bshang gci sri/_/phyi rol rims ni tsha ba dang /_/phyi rol gnas pa gso bar sla/_/
[\[131b.3\]]dbyar dang ston dang dpyid dus su/_/rlung stsogs rim 'byung rang bzhin rims/_/gzhan du gyur pa de gso dka'/_/phal cher rlung ni rang bzhin rims/_/yin yang gso bar dka' ba yin/_/dbyar dus rlung nad ldang 'gyur na/_/mkhris pa bad kan ldan rims 'gyur/_/ston ka mkhris bas nad
[\[131b.4\]]slong ste/_/bad kan de yi grogs byed 'gyur/_/der ni smyung ba byas gyur kyang /_/gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/bad kan dpyid ldang de yang ni/_/de rjes rlung dang mkhris pa 'byung /_/nyams stobs che zhing nad tshabs chung /_/bla brnan med rims gso bar sla/_/rnam kun 'gyur bzhes
[\[131b.5\]]bya bar/_/gsor mi rung ba sngar bshad do/_/rims kyi nad tshabs che zhing tsha/_/khong rmya nyam chung gcin mang dang /_/bshang sri kha zas mi 'ju la/_/bkres chung ma smin rims mtshan nyid/_/rims shugs stobs che skom dad che/_/bla zhing mgo 'khor dbugs mi bde/_/bshang gci
[\[131b.6\]]bder 'byung nad bskyod pa/_/smin par 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma yin/_/ma smin go bzlog mtshan nyid dang /_/zhag bdun smyung byas las smin bshad/_/rims ni nad kyi dus dang ni/_/stobs chung che las rnam lngar bshad/_/phal cher 'dus par gyur ba yi/_/rims su mang du
[\[131b.7\]]'gyur bar bshad/_/rgyun dang rtag pa nyin gcig pa/_/nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi ba'o/_/lus zungs bshang gci rgyu ba yi/_/bu gnad kyis khyab byas pas/_/lus kun tsha bar gyur nas ni/_/gnod bya stsogs dang mnyam par 'phel/_/stobs che lus lci rkang lag rengs/_/khyad par du ni
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]dngas mar gnas/_/gnyen pos bcos dka' bzod par dka'/_/rgyun gyi rims su 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi drod kyis dri ma dang /_/lus zungs myur du zad par byed/_/de 'og rnam kun lus zungs stsogs/_/dag pa'am ma dag rims kyis ni/_/rlung dang mkhris
[\[132a.2\]]pa bad kan zhag_/bdun nam bcu'am bcu gnyis gnas/_/phal cher mtshams las mi 'da' bar/_/'tsho ba'am 'chi ba dag tu byed/_/de skad me bzhin 'jug gis bshad/_/ljang sngon gyis ni bshad pa'i gzhung /_/bdun pa nyis bldab gyur ba yin/_/de bzhin dgu dang bcu gcig
[\[132a.3\]]bldab/_/'di ni nad gzhi gsum gyis tshigs/_/'tsho dang 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/rims dus dag dang ma dag las/_/yun rings dus su gnas pa yin/_/nad rtse zhil ba nyam chung dang /_/kha zas mi 'phrod stsogs bsten pas/_/nad dkyel chung yang gnod bya stsogs/_/brten te
[\[132a.4\]]stobs che nyid gyur las/_/gnyen por bcas shing 'phel 'bri gnas/_/mi bzad pa ni nyid du 'gyur/_/de rnams kyis ni nad kyi stobs/_/rang gi dus su rims stobs skyed/_/slar yang de dag bcos thabs kyis/_/stobs che chung las ldog par byed/_/nad zad rims ni phrar gyur
[\[132a.5\]]pa/_/bcud la sogs pa nyid la thim/_/thim pas lus rid sha mdog nyams/_/rmongs bag la sogs de yis skyed/_/nye zhing kha ni bye ba'i phyir/_/dngas ma rgyu ba'i rtsa sgo las/_/lus kun myur du khyab pa ni/_/nad kyis skye bar byed pa yin/_/des na rgyun tu rtag rims 'gyur/_/
[\[132a.6\]]de las bzlog pa tshul mi 'dra/_/mi snyoms rtsol ba mi mnyam pa/_/bya ba'i dus min mnyam yun ring /_/de ni nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang /_/gzhan dag nyin re lan re yin/_/phal cher nad ni khrag la brten/_/rtag pa'i rims ni byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[132a.7\]]de yang nyin mtshan lan gnyis ldang /_/nyin gcig nyin re lan re ldang /_/de ni sha yi rtsa la brten/_/gsum pa tshil gyi rtsa la gnas/_/mkhris pa rlung gnyis spyi nas 'dzin/_/bad kan mkhris gyur sum mdo na/_/rlung dang bad kan rgyab nas 'dzin/_/de ni zhag gcig gis chod yin/_/nyin bzhi pa'i rims
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]nad tshil dang /_/rkang dang rus pa'i nang na gnas/_/gzhan dag tshil nyid la gnas zer/_/de yi nus pa bstan pa ni/_/bad kan gyis ni byin gnyis na/_/rlung gis glad pa na bar byed/_/rus rkang gnyis kar zhugs pa yin/_/nyin bzhi pa ni go bzlog pa'o/_/nyin gsum pas ni nyin gnyis na/_/nyin cig na bar mi byed do/_/nad rnams kyi ni stobs
[\[132b.2\]]che chung /_/zas dang spyod pa las 'byung zhing /_/de bzhin rims rnams 'byung ba ni/_/yid dang las las skye bar 'gyur/_/nad kyis lus zungs dkrugs gyur pa/_/nad sos nyi tshe zhu bar 'gyur/_/de tshe nad ba dbugs drag rdul/_/mkhun zhing slon byed 'gre ba dang /_/lus 'dar tshig mang tshab dang /_/lus grang bzhin mdog nyams pa
[\[132b.3\]]dang /_/dran stor rims kyi shugs kyis gzir/_/khros pa'i tshul gyis lta ba dang /_/bshang ba nad dang sgrar bcas pa/_/sla ba shugs drag 'byung ba yin/_/lus ni yang zhing rmya dang rmongs bag tsha ba med/_/kha na thor bu 'byung dang dbang po brtas shing bde/_/yid ni sor gnas rdul sbrid bder 'byung yi ga 'byed/_/mgo bo g.ya' ba rims
[\[132b.4\]]nad 'byang ba'i mtshan ma yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas khrag dang mkhris pa dang lud pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/rab dro rab rno tsha dang skyur/_/lan tshwa la sogs tsha ba dang /_/khre rgod ut+pa la yi zas/_/de bcas shin tu bsten drags dang /_/mkhris pa can gyi mkhris nad ni/_/gsher dang khrag rgyas nad
[\[132b.5\]]du 'gyur/_/de ni phan tshun 'dres gyur bas/_/lus kun khyab par byed par 'gyur/_/mkhris pa khrag las gyur pa dang /_/'dres dang gnod bya las dang gcig/_/mdog dang dri ni rjes mthun pas/_/khrag gi ming du bstan pa yin/_/de ni khrag gnas
[\[132b.6\]]mchin pa dang /_/mcher pa las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mgo bo lci zhing yi ga 'chus/_/bsil 'dod sgregs pa dud can skyur/_/skyug cing skyugs mdog btsog par snang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde mgo 'khor/_/khong snyom khrag dmar nya dri bro/_/kha dri mi zhim skad 'gags la/_/mig la stsogs pa'i kha dog ni/_/
[\[132b.7\]]dmar dang ljang dang ser por snang /_/rmi lam du yang kha dog de/_/'dir ni mthong bar 'gyur ba yin/_/stod du sna mig rna ba kha/_/smad du bshang sgo pho mo'i mtshan/_/ba spu'i bu ga kun las kyang /_/khrag rab rgyas pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/stod kyi bad kan yin gso sla/_/de ni bkru sman btang bas gso/_/sman mang yod cing
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]mkhris pa yi/_/sman gyi mchog ni bkru sman yin/_/zla la yod pa'i bad kan yang /_/der ni de yis sbyangs byas 'gyur/_/de la sman ni mngar dang bska/_/bad kan dag la phan pa la/_/gang gtogs ngang gis bad kan sel/_/kha dang bska ba smos ci dgos/_/thur du 'byung ba'i rlung yin phyir/_/de ni skyug sman btang
[\[133a.2\]]bas gso/_/mkhris pa'i sman ni nyung ba yin/_/skyug sman mkhris pa'i sman mchog yin/_/zla la yod pa'i rlung nad kyang /_/de ni de yis zhi mi 'gyur/_/de la ro ni mngar bskol ba/_/'ba' zhig phan par 'gyur ba yin/_/bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa'i nad/_/gnyi gar 'byung ba gso dka' ste/_/bzlog pa'i thabs ni med phyir dang /_
[\[133a.3\]]sman yang yod pa ma yin no/_/'di las bzlog par bya ba'i thabs/_/sbyang ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/_/sbyangs pas bzlog par bya ba dang /_/sman pas khrag mkhris gso ba yin/_/mkhris pa nye bar zhi ba yang /_/'di las yong ye yod ma yin/_/'dres par gyur ba'i nad la ni/_/thams cad sel ba'i zhi bya phan/_/de la nad dang rjes
[\[133a.4\]]mthun pa'i/_/gtar ga btab ste brtag par bya/_/bla brnan byung bar gyur pa dag_/'gyur bar shes las rtogs par bya/_/de la lud pa myur gnod byed/_/de phyir de nyid bshad par bya/_/lud pa rlung mkhris bad kan dang /_/glo rdol glo gcong la lngar bshad/_/thams cad ma gsos zad byed 'gyur/_/phyi ma bzhin du stobs chen yin/_/de
[\[133a.5\]]rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rtags/_/gre ba g.ya' zhing yi ga 'chus/_/gre nang gra mas gang snyam sems/_/de la thur rgyu'i rlung gnod 'gyur/_/stod du song ste brang du phyin/_/de tshe mgul ba'i nad du zhen/_/mgo ba'i rtsa rnams bkang nas ni/_/de nas yan lag 'degs pa ltar/_/g.yengs byed mig rdol tsam du na/_/rgyab brang
[\[133a.6\]]rtsib logs na zhing zug_/kha ru 'byung zhing rgyu ba ni/_/lud pa snod chag 'dra'i sgra 'byung /_/nad gzhi'i dbye bas nad kyang ni/_/tha dang shugs dang bcas pa yin/_/nad gang sgra ni mi snyoms pa'i/_/de las lud pa 'byung ba yin/_/rlung nad skyes pa rlung 'khrugs pa/_/brang dang gre ba skam zhing /_/snying brang rtsib logs klad pa
[\[133a.7\]]gzer/_/rmongs bag khong 'khrugs skad 'gags shing /_/lud pa skam po 'byung byed cing /_/na ba'i shugs drag sgra cher 'byung /_/lus kun brtse bcas bad kan skam/_/'thon par dka' zhing nyung ngu 'byung /_/mkhris pas mig dang bad kan ser/_/kha nang kha zhing rims mgo 'khor/_/khrag mkhris slon zhing skom
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]dad che/_/skad 'gags dud 'dra skyur ba dang /_/lud pa'i shugs kyi rgyun 'byung ba/_/skar mda' 'phro ba lta bur snang /_/bad kan las brang nad tshabs chung /_/mgo lci snying ga gang snyam sems/_/gre bar bskus 'dra snyom par byed/_/cham 'debs zas skyug yi ga 'chus/_/spu rtse lud pa skam pa dang /_/snum zhing dkar ba 'byung bar
[\[133b.2\]]'gyur/_/stobs 'gyed la sogs drag shul rnams/_/mi nus bzhin byas de dang des/_/rlung gis brang nang glo dral la/_/mkhris pa rjes 'brangs dkyel gyur pa/_/'khrugs te lud pa lu bar byed/_/de ni bad kan khrag bcas dang /_/ser zhing gnag la skam pa dang /_/ril ril por mnam mang du 'byung /_/'byung tshe gre ba na ba dang /_/
[\[133b.3\]]brang ni dral ba snyam du sems/_/khab ni rnon pos phug snyam sems/_/gzer gyis 'debs par byed pa dang /_/tshigs 'bye rims dang dbugs mi bde/_/skad 'gags lus 'dar skom dad che/_/phug ron lta bur mkhun 'byin to/_/rtsib logs gzer 'gyur de nas ni/_/rim gyis stobs dang me drod dang /_/nus pa nyams ni 'bri bar
[\[133b.4\]]'gyur/_/zad byed kyis gcin khrag dang bcas/_/rgyab dang rkang pa na bar 'gyur/_/gtso bo rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis/_/lus zungs zad byed nad rgyal bo/_/glo gcong gi ni gnas byed cing /_/lud pa lu zhing bad kan 'byung /_/rnag 'dra mnam zhing ser ba dang /_/rul zhing rtsa sngo dmar ba dang /_/rtsib logs bton pa ltar sems shing /_/snying ni
[\[133b.5\]]ltung bsnyam du byed/_/rgyu med dro dang grang ba 'dod/_/zas mang za zhing nyams stobs zad/_/bzhin ni snum zhing dang bar snang /_/mig ni mdang ldan pa lta sdug 'gyur/_/de nas de las zad byed 'gyur/_/thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de ltar glo rdol las byung lud/_/nyam chung lus ni 'jig byed de/_/stobs ldan gso ba brtsam du rung /_/
[\[133b.6\]]glo gcong las byung de dang 'dra/_/de gnyis gsar byung mgon ldan 'grub/_/nad gzhi tha dad gsum gsor rung /_/gnyis 'dres kun kyang rgan po ni/_/na tshod zad btab 'tsho btsam/_/lud pa yal bar bor ba las/_/dbugs mi bde dang zad byed slon/_/skad 'gags la sogs nad 'byung 'gyur/_/de phyir de ni myur du gso/_/yan
[\[133b.7\]]lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o//_//de nas dbugs mi bde ba dang skyigs bus btab pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/lud pa 'phel ba'am sngar nad gzhi/_/'khrugs las dbugs mi bde 'byung 'gyur/_/ma zhu tshad 'khru slon dug 'thungs/_/skya rbab rims btab las kyang 'byung /_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]phran tshegs mun can chad pa dang /_/chen po gyen 'byung rnam pa lnga/_/bad kan gyis ni rgyu lam bkag_/rlung ni sna tshogs khyab par gnas/_/srog dang zas skom rgyu ba'i lam/_/sbu gu nad kyis bkag pas na/_/ma zhu'i gnas nas 'byung ba'i dbugs/_/brang gnas dbugs mi bde bar byed/_/de yi sngon
[\[134a.2\]]tshul snying rtsib logs/_/gzer zhing srog rlung mi mthun rgyu/_/spos dang mur 'gram na ba yin/_/des ni drag shul 'grangs drags pas/_/bskyod pa'i rngam pa phran tshegs 'gyur/_/de ni rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur/_/rlung gis rtsa sbubs logs rgyu byed/_/bad kan slongs par gyur nas ni/_/klad pa mgul ba'i nang song ste/_/brang dang
[\[134a.3\]]rtsib logs na bar byed/_/lud pa ngar sgra 'dzer mi dran/_/cham pa mi bzad yi ga 'chus/_/mi bzad shugs ni skyed byed cing /_/dbugs mi bde bde'i shugs kyis/_/srog la gnod 'gyur lud pa'i mthar/_/skad cig bde bar byed pa yin/_/nyal tshe shin tu mi bde la/_/'dug na cung zad bde bar 'gyur/_/mig gdangs
[\[134a.4\]]'phral ba'i phyogs nas ni/_/rngul 'dzag shin tu na bas nyen/_/kha skam dbugs ni bstud mar 'byung /_/dro ba 'dod cing 'dar dang bcas/_/char 'bab grang dang ser bus phog_/bad kan bskyed pas rnam par 'phel/_/mun can de ni 'tsho bya tsam/_/nyams ldan gsar du btab gso sla/_/rims dang brgyal
[\[134a.5\]]las byung gang ba'i/_/sman gyis zhi ste rab mun can/_/dbugs 'chad dbugs 'byin rgyun chad pa'i/_/gnad gcod nad kyis gzir bar byed/_/rngul bcas brgyal dang spos dang bcas/_/lgang pa tsha zhing gcin 'gags byed/_/mig mi sdug cing thur du lta/_/mig gcig dmar zhing dran pa stor/_/kha skam smre zhing skad
[\[134a.6\]]gdangs dma'/_/gzim dngas nyams shing sems bral ba'o/_/chen por ro cher 'byung zhing /_/sgra che sdur pa drag pa dang /_/bskyod pa bzhin du 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/khyu mchog rgyags pa'i nga ro 'dra/_/shes dang rnam shes rab nyams shing /_/mig 'khrul bzhin ni 'gyur ba dang /_/ro stod zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_/bshang
[\[134a.7\]]gci 'gags shing skad gsang nyams/_/mgul skam yang dang yang mi dran/_/rna ba mur 'gram klad pa na/_/gyen 'byung dbugs ni ring du 'byin/_/slar ni thur du rngub mi nus/_/bad kan gyis kha rtsa sgo 'gags/_/rlung ni 'khrugs pas gzir 'gyur ba/_/gyen du blta zhing 'khrul byed pas/_/mig ni kun tu lta byed pa/_/gnad rnams
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]'chad par byed bzhin du/_/skad 'gags smre sngags 'don par byed/_/'di dag ma tshang gsor rung la/_/tshang na nges par srog 'phrog byed/_/dbugs mi bde rgyu sngon tshul dang /_/grangs dang rang bzhin rten gcig yin/_/skyigs bu thas byung phran tshegs dang /_/zung dang chen por 'byung ba dang /_/
[\[134b.2\]]za bdag dang rnam pa lnga/_/de la rlung gis ring zos dang /_/rtsub tsha sra dang ma goms pa'i/_/zas dang skom gyis btsir gyur pa'i/_/rlung gis skyigs bu nad med dang /_/sgra mi grag cing sbrid 'byung ste/_/gang zhig goms pa'i zas skom gyis/_/zhi 'gyur
[\[134b.3\]]skyigs bu zas byung yin/_/drag shul gyis rlung cung zad be skyod/_/skyigs bu phra mo 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nam tshong rtsa ba nas 'byung byed/_/de ni shul ngal 'jam pa yin/_/rtsol ba drag po 'phel 'gyur la/_/zas zos tsam gyis dal bar 'gyur/_/
[\[134b.4\]]zung 'byung tshigs ni ring bal/_/gang zhig zas las 'byung 'gyur ba/_/'ju bar nye ba'i tshe na 'dabs/_/zas zhu zin nas 'phel 'gyur ba'o/_/mgo dang mgul pa 'dar byed cing /_/sbo dang shin tu skom dad skyed/_/bla dang slon dang tshad par 'khru/_/mig
[\[134b.5\]]gdangs glal ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skyigs bu zung 'byung shugs drag la/_/zhu dang bcas par de shes bya/_/skyigs bu chen po 'byung ba'i tshul/_/smin ma mur 'gram gnyis rengs shing /_/mi gnas ma chi 'dzag har bar lta/_/lus rengs tshig ni thogs
[\[134b.6\]]byed cing /_/dran dang 'du shes 'khrul par byed/_/mid pa'am sbubs ni 'gags byed cing /_/gnad kyi tshogs ni skyod par byed/_/rgyab sgu lus ni khong skem byed/_/rtsa ba che zhing sgra che la/_/nad tshabs che zhing stobs cher 'byung /_/zhu ba'i gnas sam lte 'og
[\[134b.7\]]nas/_/snga ma 'dra bar gang zhig 'byung /_/de 'dra'i tshul ni bstud mar 'byung /_/glal dang rkang lag bya rmyang byed/_/brag ca zab 'byung zab mo'o/_/de rnams las ni dang po yi/_/gnyis po gso bar bya ba yin/_/tha ma gnyis dang zung 'byung ba/_/mtshan nyid
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]kun rdzogs shugs drag spang /_/'di dag thams cad yun rings bsags/_/rgad po bud med kyis dub dang /_/nad kyis nyam chung zas bcad pa/_/glo rdol nad can spang bar bya/_/nad kun gyis 'chi byed mod kyi/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde [(]bltar[,]ltar[)]/_/
[\[135a.2\]]nad gzhan myur du gsod mi byed/_/'di dag 'chi tshe nges 'byung 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o//_//de nas glo gcong chen po zad byed kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/nad ni du ma rjes 'brang zhing /_/nad mang sngon du
[\[135a.3\]]'gro 'gyur la/_/rgyal po zad byed skem byed dang /_/nad kyi rgyal po zhes kyang bshad/_/rgyu skar rnams dang bram ze yi/_/rgyal po'i gcong du sngon gyur cing /_/gang yang nad kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/de phyir gnod pa'i rgyal por bshad/_/lus dang sman ni zad byed cing /_/
[\[135a.4\]]zad las 'byung bas zad byed yin/_/drangs stsogs skems pas skem byed yin/_/de rnams de las gsal pas rgyal/_/drag shul bsten dang shugs bkag dang /_/khu chu drangs ma snum zad dang /_/zas skom cho ga dang bral bsten/_/bzhi po 'di dag de yi rgyu/_/
[\[135a.5\]]de yis rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_/bad kan bslangs nas thams cad du/_/lus kyi tshigs kun la zhugs te/_/de yis rtsa sgo la gnod cing /_/bu ga'i sgo ni bkag pa'am/_/yang na shin tu kha bye 'gyur/_/stod smad thad kar gnas nas ni/_/rang gi nad ni ji bzhin
[\[135a.6\]]skyed/_/de 'byung 'gyur ba'i sngon tshul ni/_/cham 'debs sbrid pa shin tu mang /_/mchil ma kha nas ro mngar bro/_/lus dang me drod nyam chung byed/_/gzhong snod zas skom la sogs ni/_/gtsang yang mi gtsang nyid du mthong /_/phal cher zas dang skom stsogs la/_
[\[135a.7\]]sbrang ma sku dang rtsa stsogs 'bab/_/snying 'phar slon bro yi ga 'chus/_/kha zas zos kyang nyams stobs zad/_/lag par lta zhing rkang gdong skrang /_/mig ni shin tu dkar por snang /_/lag ngar dag ni 'jal bar 'dod/_/lus la 'jigs su rung bar mthong /_/bud med
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]chang dang sha la dga'/_/smod dang klad pa 'gebs par byed/_/skra dang sen mo shin tu 'phel/_/rmi lam du ni phye ma leb/_/rtsangs pa sdig sbrul gcan gzan spre'u/_/bya rnams kyis ni gtses par mthong /_/skra rus phub ma thal stsogs kyi/_/phung po la ni
[\[135b.2\]]'dzegs pa dang /_/yul dang grong ni stong pa dang /_/chu klung skams par rmi lam mthong /_/skar mda' ri bo ltung ba dang /_/ljon shing rnams ni 'bar ba rmi/_/stod du gnas na cham pas 'debs/_/lud pa lu zhing dbugs mi bde/_/phrag pa spyi bo na ba dang /_/skad 'gags yi ga 'chus par
[\[135b.3\]]'gyur/_/smad gnas bshang sla rtug skem byed/_/nang grol nang gnas slon par byed/_/thad kar gnas pas rtsib logs zug_/tshigs la gnas na rims su 'gyur/_/de ltar nad tshul bcu gcig ni/_/gcong chen ldan las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de rnams kyi ni bla brnan dag_/skad
[\[135b.4\]]'gags brang du na ba dang /_/kha glal lus grugs mchil snabs mang /_/drod nyams kha mnam yin shes bya/_/de la rlung gyur klad pa dang /_/rtsib logs zug sha yan lag na/_/skad 'gags mgul pa subs par 'gyur/_/mkhris rgyas rkang lag phrag pa tsha/_/
[\[135b.5\]]tshad 'khru khrag tu slon pa dang /_/kha mnam rims 'debs myos par 'gyur/_/bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus/_/slon lud lus dang yan lag lci/_/mchil snabs mang zhing cham pas 'debs/_/dbugs mi bde skad 'gags drod nyams/_/nad kyi me drod nyam chung
[\[135b.6\]]bas/_/'byar bcas bad kan rgyas gyur nas/_/rtsa sbubs sgo ni 'gags pa dang /_/lus zungs drod ni chung 'gyur bas/_/dngas ma rang gi gnas su ni/_/ma zhu bla brnan de dang de/_/skyed cing sha stsogs mi 'gyur la/_/khrag ni gyen du 'byung bar byed/_/khong pa nyid du zas
[\[135b.7\]]'du bas/_/dngas mar 'gyur bar mi byed cing /_/phal cher dri ma nyid 'gyur gyi/_/lus zungs 'phel bar mi byed do/_/dngas ma khrag tu mi 'gyur na/_/shar 'gyur ba lta smos ci dgos/_/zad byed can ni bshang 'phel ba/_/'ba' zhig gis ni gnas par byed/_/mtshan
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]ma chung yang nyam chung zhing /_/nad kyis sman gyi stobs mi bzod/_/spang bya de las gzhan pa ni/_/thams cad ldan yang gso bar bya/_/nad ni sna re 'dus pa dang /_/zad byed tshil las gyur pa drug/_/skad 'gags kyi ni dbye ba yin/_/de las
[\[136a.2\]]rlung g.yo nyam chung rtsub/_/gre ba gra mas gang snyam byed/_/de la snum dro 'o ma phan/_/mkhris pa las gyur rkan lkog tsha/_/skam zhing smra bar mi nus 'gyur/_/bad kan mgul ba byugs snyam byed/_/skad kyi gsang dma' ngar ngar 'dzer/_/thogs bcas
[\[136a.3\]]'gyur ro thams cad kyi/_/mtshan ma thams cad ldan pa yin/_/zad byed las ni drud snyam byed/_/du bas bdugs ltar shin tu na/_/tshil gyur bad kan bdag gnyid can/_/tshig gi brda sprod mi nus 'gyur/_/'dir ni 'dus dang tha mar spang /_/yi ga 'chus pa'i nad
[\[136a.4\]]rnams ni/_/lce snying gnas pa so so dang /_/'dus pa dang ni yid kyi ni/_/gdung ba las gyur lnga pa yin/_/kha ni bska dang kha mngar bro/_/rlung stsogs gsum dang rim bzhin sbyar/_/kun las gyur pa ro bro med/_/mya ngan khro stsogs nad ji bzhin/_/slon bro nad gzhi
[\[136a.5\]]sna re kun/_/mi sdug yul las byung lnga pa/_/'di dag stod du rgyu ba'i rlung /_/'khrugs pas nad ni thams cad phul/_/de rnams bslangs na kha tsha bro/_/mchil mang yi ga 'chus sngon byung /_/rlung gyur lte ba rgyab tu zug_/rtsib logs na zhing zas slon nas/_/
[\[136a.6\]]cung zad 'byung zhing chad pa dang /_/ro bska lbu ba can du skyugs/_/sgregs pa'i sgra bcas mdog gnag la/_/sla zhing 'byung dka' sgra dang bcas/_/lud pa kha skam glad snying na/_/skad 'gags pa dang khong snyom bcas/_/mkhris gyur thal chu 'dra ba la/_/dung kha
[\[136a.7\]]ljang sngon mdog ser skyug_/khrag bcas ro skyur tsha zhing bro/_/skom dad brgyal tsha brdungs bcas yin/_/bad kan las byung snum bska bsil/_/nal nal bor 'dug dra ba ris/_/ro mngar lan tshwa bro tshabs che/_/chags shing ba spu brtse bar byed/_/gdong
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]skrang kha nang mngar ba bro/_/snyom zhing snying na lud pa can/_/gsum char las byung rtags kun ldan/_/'chi ltas las bshad gang de spang /_/rul dang mi gtsang btsog pa dang /_/skyugs bro mthong dang thos stsogs kyis/_/yid gdung snying la phog gyur slon/_/
[\[136b.2\]]mi sdug yul las byung ba yin/_/yid mi bde skom srin be'u snabs/_/rlung stsogs nyid la gnas par brtag_/gzer dang 'phar dang snying na ba/_/bye brag tu ni srin bu'i nad/_/srin bu'i snying nad mtshan ma las/_/de ni shes par bya ba yin/_/snying nad nad
[\[136b.3\]]ni re re 'dus/_/srin bu las gyur rnam lngar bshad/_/rlung gis shin tu zug cing na/_/gas dang bshags pa snyam du sems/_/bcom snyam sems shing skam la rengs/_/snying ga stong snyam zag par byed/_/rgyu med zhum zhing mi dga' la/_/'jigs
[\[136b.4\]]shing dgra ni mi bzod cing /_/'phar zhing 'gre la gcus snyam byed/_/rmongs bag dbugs thung gnyid chung 'gyur/_/mkhris gyur snyom dang mgo 'khor brgyal/_/tsha rngul snying ga skyur lus snyom/_/mkhris pa skyur ba slon par byed/_/dud pa khar song ser rims
[\[136b.5\]]'debs/_/bad kan las byung snying ga rengs/_/khong na rdo bcug lta bur lci/_/drod nyams mchil mang lud pa lu/_/gnyid che snyom rims yi ga 'chus/_/nyes gsum mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/_/srin bus mig ni gnag pa dang /_/mun par
[\[136b.6\]]zhugs snyom byed snying 'phar/_/lus skam g.ya' zhing bad kan 'dzag_/'di ni rtag tu sog le yis/_/snying la 'drud pa lta bur sems/_/mi bzad nad des myur gsod pas/_/de ni rings par gso bar bya/_/skom dang rlung mkhris bad kan dang /_/'dus
[\[136b.7\]]pa dngas ma zad pa dang /_/nad 'dres pa las drug tu 'gyur/_/de ltar gyur pa thams cad la/_/rlung mkhris gnyis ni rgyu yin te/_/de 'khrugs lus zungs bsil ba ni/_/skams nas ldang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/lus kun 'dar zhing mgo 'khor tsha/_/skom dang khong tsha rmongs par byed/_/
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]lce drung mgul pa glo ba dang /_/skom dad skom 'thungs rgyu ba'i rtsa/_/skom pas skom dad skye bar 'gyur/_/de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid/_/kha skam skom gyis mi ngoms dang /_/zas la mi dga' skad 'gags dang /_/gre ba lce mchu rtsub mor 'gyur/_/lce 'byin byed cing khong snyom
[\[137a.2\]]la/_/bla zhing sems ni myos pa dang /_/de bzhin skom gdung nad du 'gyur/_/lus skams rmya zhing 'on pa dang /_/rmongs bag mgo 'khor snying nad de/_/'di lta bu yi nad rnams ni/_/skom pas gdungs las skye bar 'gyur/_/rlung 'gyur khong rmya nyam chung la/_/mur 'gram zug cing klad pa 'khor/_/sna lces dri
[\[137a.3\]]dang ro mi tshor/_/'on zhing gnyid med nyams stobs zad/_/chu grang 'thungs na skom 'phel 'gyur/_/mkhris pa kha nang ro khyab rgyal/_/mngar por mthong zhing rtag par ni/_/kha skam khong tsha dbugs mnam pa'o/_/bad kan ldang bas skom rgyu'i rtsa/_/bkag pas rlung ni 'khrugs gyur nas/_/de tshe de yis bad kan
[\[137a.4\]]ni/_/'dam bzhin de yis skem par byed/_/mgul pa gra mas gang snyam sems/_/gnyid che kha nang mngar bar bro/_/lto ba mgo bo tshor ba chung /_/rmongs bag slon gyur yig 'chus/_/lus skam kha zas mi 'ju'o/_/kun las gyur pa rtags kun ldan/_/be'u snabs las gyur kha zas ni/_/mid dka' rlung mkhris las
[\[137a.5\]]gyur yin/_/tsha bas ngal bas 'phral du na/_/chu grang bsten gyur skom dad che/_/khong par tsha ba bsdus pa yis/_/skom dad de ni mkhris skyes yin/_/gang yang chang drags me drod rno/_/snum zos skyes pa'ang mkhris 'byung yin/_/snum zhing skyur dang lan tshwa'i bag_/zos pas bad kan las skyes 'gyur/_/zad byed las
[\[137a.6\]]ni skom dad 'gyur/_/dngas ma zad dang mtshan nyid 'dra/_/khong skam gcin nad rims nad stsogs/_/yun rings nad ni rims skom nad/_/gang zhig skom dang mi bzang skyes/_/de ni 'dres las 'byung bar bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u lnga pa'o/_/
[\[137a.7\]]de nas chang nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/rno dang drod che rtsub phra skyur/_/nyal po 'dod myur byed dang yang /_/gsal dang dang bar byed par bshad/_/mdangs ni 'di las go bzlog yin/_/dug kyang rno stsogs yin mod kyis/_/sems la gnod par byed pa yin/_/nus pas 'chi bar byed pas na/_/dug
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]ni lhag par mthu che'o/_/chang ni rno stsogs yon tan gyi/_/mdangs kyi yon tan rtul la stsogs/_/bcu po bcu yis 'khrugs byas nas/_/sems ni sgyur bar byed pa yin/_/ra ro dang po gnyis pa yis/_/bag med pa yi gnas la gnas/_/rnam rtog ngan bcom rmongs pa rnams/_/
[\[137b.2\]]bde ba yin snyam sems par 'gyur/_/'bring dang chen po bar gyi tshe/_/rngul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can/_/glang chen lcags kyu med pa ltar/_/rmongs pas mi bya ci yang med/_/'di ni kha nam tho'i gnas/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i gzhi/_/'di gcig ngan 'gror
[\[137b.3\]]'gro ba'i lam/_/mang po ston par byed pa yin/_/ra ro gsum pa'i tshe na ni/_/sems med par ni ro ltar nyal/_/nyes pa'i bdag nyid shi ba las/_/shin tu ma rungs gnas skabs 'thob/_/chos dang chos min bde dang sdug_/don dang don min phan dang gnod/_/gang la chags
[\[137b.4\]]pa mi shes pa/_/de la mkhas pas ji ltar bsten/_/chang las myos 'jigs mya ngan dang /_/khro dang srog dang bral ba nas/_/smyo byed myos dang brgyal bar bcas/_/brjed byed bcas pa kun song nad/_/gang du dran pa nyams gcig yod/_/der ni mi dge thams cad 'byung /_/
