[\[137b.5\]]mi 'phrod zas ni zos pas kyang /_/nad dam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/chang ni sde tshan gsum blo ldan/_/ngo tsha stsogs kyang 'jig par byed/_/nyams stobs ldan dang zas zos dang /_/zas cher za dang snum bag za/_/snying stobs lang tshor ldan pa dang /_/rtag tu chang 'thungs de'i rigs skyes/_/
[\[137b.6\]]tshil dang bad kan shas che la/_/rlung dang mkhris pa shas chung dang /_/me drod che zhing brtan pa rnams/_/shas cher ra ror mi 'gyur ro/_/de las bzlog pa chang dad can/_/khros dang chang rtsub skyur shas che/_/ma zhur bcas dang mnga' 'thung pa/_/gang yin shas cher ra ror 'gyur/_/rlung
[\[137b.7\]]mkhris bad kan kun las byung /_/chang nad rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/kun kyang kun las skyes mod kyi/_/shas che ba las ming du btags/_/de rnams kyi ni spyi mtshan nyid/_/rmongs dang snying ni na ba dang /_/'khru zhing rtag tu skom dad che/_/tsha grang rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]mgo bo rtsib rus na dang 'dar/_/gnad 'jig ltag pa na ba dang /_/brla rengs rab rib khyer ba dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde gnyid med/_/rngul cher 'byung zhing bshang ba 'gags/_/skang zhing sems ni 'khrul pa dang /_/bla zhing slon par byed pa dang /_/
[\[138a.2\]]mgo 'khor rmi lam ngan mthong ba'o/_/rlung gyur khyad par gnyid mi 'ong /_/dbugs mi bde zhing klad na 'dar/_/rmi lam du ni 'phyan zhing 'phur/_/gshin po rnams dang gtam smra rmi/_/mkhris pas lus tsha skad 'gags dang /_/rmongs bag tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor/_/
[\[138a.3\]]lus mdog ljang dang ser ba dang /_/mig dang mkhur tshos dmar bar 'gyur/_/bad kan gyis slon snying na dang /_/gnyid che grang 'dar yan lag lci/_/kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/chang spangs pa las 'phral du ni/_/mang du 'thungs sam ma goms
[\[138a.4\]]'thungs/_/de las 'joms dang lus skam nad/_/rlung las sdug bsngal ldan pa 'byung /_/nyam chung ba la mchog tu 'byung /_/'joms pas bad kan mchil ma mang /_/lkog ma skams shing gnyid rab che/_/sgra drag mi bzod glong bag 'gyur/_/lud skam yan lag
[\[138a.5\]]mgo rab na/_/snying nad mgul nad rmongs bag dang /_/lud pa skom dad slon rims 'debs/_/gang zhig chang rnams spangs pas ni/_/dbang po thul zhing brtags te byed/_/nam yang de la lus sems kyi/_/skyon rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rdul dang mun pa mi 'phrod
[\[138a.6\]]zas/_/mchog tu bsten las nad gsum 'byung /_/dngas ma khrag dang sems rgyu ba'i/_/rtsa sbubs bkag pa las byung ba/_/myos dang brgyal dang kun song nad/_/phyi ma bzhin du stobs rab che/_/'dir myos nad sna re re kun/_/khrag chang dug rnams las kyang 'byung /_/
[\[138a.7\]]rlung las gtam la chags pa dang /_/mang smra nyung smra spyod pa 'khrul/_/lus ni rtsub gnag dmar ba yi/_/myos pa rlung las skyes pa yin/_/mkhris pa las khro dmar ba dang /_/ser por snang zhing rtsod la dga'/_/bad kan tshig nyung 'brel smra skya/_/sems
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]las che zhing le lo che/_/'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/khrag las mig dang yan lag rengs/_/mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pa yin/_/chang gis yan lag skad bskyod 'gyur/_/dug gis 'dar zhing gnyid rab che/_/de ni kun las myos tshabs che/_/
[\[138b.2\]]khrag stsogs pa yis rlung stsogs pa'i/_/mtshan nyid lhag par shes par bya/_/brgyal ba rlung gi bdag nyid can/_/nam mkha' dmar sngo gnag par ni/_/mthong zhing mun par zhugs snyam sems/_/myur du sangs par byed pa dang /_/snying na 'dar zhing
[\[138b.3\]]mgo 'khor la/_/skem zhing bzhin mdog dmar nag 'gyur/_/mkhris pas dmar ba'am ser por ni/_/nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/_/sangs nas rdul dang bcas pa dang /_/tsha skom gdungs pas nyen pa dang /_/'khru zhing kha dog ser
[\[138b.4\]]dang dmar/_/mig dmar ser bar snang bar 'gyur/_/bad kan gyis ni sprin lta bur/_/nam mkha' mthong zhing mun 'thibs byed/_/rings nas sangs par 'gyur ba dang /_/snying na bcas pas mchil ma mang /_/pags pa rlon pas g.yogs pa bzhin/_/yan
[\[138b.5\]]lag lci zhing tshor ba chung /_/nyes pa gsum gyi mtshan kun ldan/_/brjed byed gnyis pa lta bu ste/_/myur du 'gyel zhing brgyal 'gyur la/_/'jigs rung spyod pa med pa yin/_/lus can myos dang brgyal ba yis/_/nad la shugs yod gyur kyang ni/_/
[\[138b.6\]]rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/kun zhugs sman med par mi zhi/_/nad ni shin tu stobs che la/_/'dus pa las gyur kun zhugs pa/_/srog gi gnas la brten pa yis/_/lus dang ngag yid spyod pa 'phrog_/de yis skyes bu ro dang ni/_/shing dang
[\[138b.7\]]rtsig pa 'dra bar byed/_/rings par gso bar ma byas na/_/myur du 'chi bar byed pa yin/_/mtsho zab chu srin mang po can/_/chu 'jing 'jug ngogs med par ni/_/kun zhugs pa ni nub byed la/_/mi ni myur du gdon par bya/_/rigs pas brten dang bral
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]ba'i chang 'thungs pas/_/myos dregs khro dang bral ba'i rang bzhin can/_/rang gi dgra bos yongs su 'khyud 'gyur zhing /_/rigs dang mi rigs mnyam par byed par 'gyur/_/stobs dang dus dang yul dang goms pa dang /_/rang bzhin grogs
[\[139a.2\]]dang na tshod nad rnams ni/_/legs brtags de dang rjes mthun gang zhig 'thung /_/de ni bdud rtsi 'thungs dang mtshungs pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhang 'brum gyi nad gzhi
[\[139a.3\]]bshad par bya'o/_/dgra ltar srog chags rnams kyi tshe/_/gzhang 'brum 'byung bas gsod byed pas/_/de phyir bshang ba'i lam 'gegs pas/_/gzhang 'brum zhes ni bshad pa yin/_/nad kyis lpags tshil sha rnams ni/_/gnod byas dbyibs ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/
[\[139a.4\]]sha yi myu gu gzhang stsogs su/_/skyes de gzhang 'brum yin par bshad/_/lhan cig skyes dang phyis 'byung dang /_/skam dang khrag tu 'dzag pa yi/_/dbye bas mdor na rnam gnyis yin/_/gzhang ni rgyu ma sbom por brten/_/sor ni phyed dang lnga yod do/_/
[\[139a.5\]]gnyer gsum sor ni phyed dang gnyis/_/rim pa de yi nang ma ni/_/phyir 'phul bar ma sel ba yin/_/de yi phyi rol 'dzum pa yin/_/de yi phyi rol sor gcig kha/_/nas ni phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad/_/de phan chad ni spu skye 'gyur/_/de la lhan cig skyes
[\[139a.6\]]pa'i rgyu/_/gnyer ma'i sa bon gnod 'gyur nyid/_/gzhang 'brum sa bon gnod pa yang /_/pha mas mi 'phrod zos pa dang /_/sngon las de gnyis dang 'dus pa/_/'khrugs pa las gyur de dag ni/_/gsor mi rung ba nyid du bshad/_/rigs 'byung nad kun de
[\[139a.7\]]dang 'dra/_/lhan cig skyes pa khyad par du/_/rtsub cing brta bar dka' ba dang /_/nang du kha bltas dkar ba dang /_/bla brnan mi bzod can gso dka'/_/cig shos drug ste nad tha dad/_/'dres dang 'dus pa khrag las 'byung /_/rlung dang bad kan gnyis las
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]skam/_/khrag dang mkhris pa las rlan can/_/nad rnams ldang rgyu sngar bshad pa/_/'khrugs pa de yis khong pa yi/_/me drod nyams shing bshang ba 'phel/_/gzhan yang nyal bo rab drags dang /_/gzhon pas khong dkrugs stan dag ni/_/ma snyoms sra dang tsog
[\[139b.2\]]pur 'dug_/'jam rtsi'i gce'u sa dang ni/_/rdo dang gos kyis drud pa dang /_/shin tu grang ba'i chus bkrus dang /_/rtag tu 'khru bar byed pa dang /_/bshang dang gci dang 'phyen gyi shugs/_/bkag dang nan gyis btsir ba dang /_/rims dang skran dang tshad par 'khru/_/
[\[139b.3\]]'or nad skya rbab be snabs kyis/_/skems byas gnod par 'gyur ba yi/_/spyod pa bsten las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bud med zla grangs ma tshang 'phyil/_/zla ba rdzogs pas gzir las 'byung /_/de 'dra dag dang gzhan yang rlung /_/thur sel 'khrugs pas dri ma ni/_/
[\[139b.4\]]gzhang gi gnyer mar de gzhag pas/_/de ni mi mngon gyur pas gnas/_/gzhang 'brum 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi sngon tshul me drod nyams/_/brla ni rengs shing na ba dang /_/byin pa'i nywa na mgo 'khor zhing /_/yan lag na zhing mig gnyis skrang /_/
[\[139b.5\]]bshang ba 'khru ba'am yang ni sri/_/rlung chen nang nas 'khyil ba dang /_/phal cher lte ba'i 'og nas rgyu/_/nad bcas bcad pa lta bur sems/_/dka' bar 'byung zhing sgra can 'byung /_/rgyu ma krul krul zer zhing spos/_/skem zhing sgregs pa mang du
[\[139b.6\]]'byung /_/gcin mang bshang nyung yi ga 'chus/_/sgregs pa dud 'drar skyur ba 'byung /_/mgo dang brang dang rgyab tu gzer/_/snyom zhing kha dog nyams pa dang /_/glong bag dbang po nyam chung la/_/khro zhing bsnyen bkur dka' ba dang /_/ma zhu skem nad
[\[139b.7\]]skya rbab dang /_/dmu rdzing rnams la som nyi skyes/_/gzhang 'brum skye bar gyur ba la/_/'di dag nyid ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de yis 'og gi lam bkag pas/_/thur du sel ba'i rlang log ste/_/lus dang dbang po kun gnas pa'i/_/rlung gzhan
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]thams cad 'khrug par byed/_/de bzhin bshang gci mkhris pa dang /_/bad kan lus zungs rten bcas pa/_/'khrugs shing me drod nyams par byed/_/de nas gzhang 'brum nad can la/_/phal cher thams cad nyer 'byung ba/_/skem
[\[140a.2\]]zhing mchog tu bskyod mi nus/_/stobs zad khong rmya bzhin mdangs nyams/_/lus lhod snying po med 'gyur zhing /_/'bus zos pa yi shing 'dra la/_/bla brnan ma lus dag gis 'debs/_/ji skad bshad pa'i gnad gzir zhing /_/lud pa skam dang skad
[\[140a.3\]]'gags dang /_/kha ro mi tshor cham 'debs sbo/_/sgyid sgyur rka lag na zhing slon/_/sbrid pa skrang dang rims nad dang /_/khu ba zad cing rab rib slon/_/rde'u chags nad kyis gzir ba dang /_/skad 'gags zhum la sems khong chud/_/mchil ma mang 'dor
[\[140a.4\]]yi ga 'chus/_/rus tshigs kun dang snying lte ba/_/gzhang dang sna rtsa gzir dang bcas/_/gzhang nang 'bru ni ma smin btsos/_/khu ba lta bu'i sbyin bag 'dzag_/rtug skam sbyin pa'am sla bar 'gyur/_/smin dang ma smin bar bar 'khru/_/skya zhing ser dang
[\[140a.5\]]sngon po yi/_/khrag ni sbyin bag 'khru bar 'gyur/_/gzhang 'brum rlung shas che las gyur/_/skam zhing tseg tseg tsha ba dang /_/rnyid cing dmar nag rengs pa dang /_/mi snyoms rtsub cing sra ba dang /_/phan tshun mi 'dra yo ba dang /_/rtse mo rno zhing gas pa dang /_/
[\[140a.6\]]bim pa rgya shug kha rdzu ra/_/ras bal sa bon dang 'dra zhing /_/la la ka tam me tog 'dra/_/la la yungs kar lta bur skyes/_/mgo dang phrag pa rtsib logs brla/_/chu so dag tu lhag par na/_/sbrid pa sgregs pa bshang ba sri/_/snying 'phar yi ga 'chus pa skyed/_/
[\[140a.7\]]lud dbugs mi bde me drod nyams/_/rna ba sgra bcas mgo 'khor byed/_/des nyes rtug skam nyung ngu ni/_/sgra bcas ska sla 'dren ma dang /_/na zhing lbu ba 'byar bag can/_/rtug skam tshul gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/pags pa sen mo bshang gci dang /_/mig dang
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]gdong ni gnag par 'gyur/_/skran dang mcher pa dmu rdzing dang /_/gtun 'dra de nyid las 'byung 'gyur/_/mkhris shas che las rtse mo ni/_/sngo zhing dmar ser dkar bar snang /_/phra zhing dri mnam khrag sla 'dzag_/srab cing 'jam la lhod pa yin/_/mcher pa'i dum bu
[\[140b.2\]]ne tso'i lce/_/srin bu pad pa'i mchu 'drar snang /_/tsha zhing gnag la rims dang rngul/_/skom dad yi ga 'chus rmongs skyed/_/bshang dro sla zhing sngo la tsha/_/ser zhing dmar bar 'khru bar 'gyur/_/nas rul nang 'dra pags pa dang /_/sen stsogs sngo ser ljang bar 'gyur/_/
[\[140b.3\]]bad kan shas che rtsa ba sbom/_/mthug cing nad kyi shugs dal dkar/_/skrang zhing rgyas la snum pa dang /_/'greng zhing snum la lci zhing brtan/_/'byar bag tshor ba chung zhing 'jam/_/g.ya' zhing reg na dga' bar byed/_/ka ri ra ba na sa yi/_/rus pa ba yi nu sor 'dra/_/
[\[140b.4\]]chu sor zug cing sbo gzhang na/_/lte ba lgang pa bcad snyam sems/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde snying na/_/mchil mang cham 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/gcin sri mgo bo tshor ba med/_/grang ba'i rims ni skyed par byed/_/kha chu 'dzag cing me drod nyams/_/slon zhing ma
[\[140b.5\]]zhu'i nad kun skyed/_/bshang ba tshil 'dra bad kan mang /_/'khru dang bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'dzag par mi byed rdol mi byed/_/pags pa la sogs snum zhing dkar/_/'dres las mtshan nyid 'dres pa yin/_/'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/khrag
[\[140b.6\]]shas che las gzhang 'brum ni/_/mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba la/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi myu gu 'dra/_/byi ru 'ol ma se mdog 'dra/_/shin tu tsha bro na ba dang /_/bshang ba shugs kyis rab btsir las/_/'phral du khrag ni 'byung ba dang /_/de nyid shin tu 'dzag par 'gyur/_/sbal
[\[140b.7\]]pa 'dra zhing khrag zad las/_/byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen 'gyur/_/mdog stobs spro ba nyams pa dang /_/mdangs 'phrog dbang po zhan par 'gyur/_/mung+ga ko dra ba'i phye ma/_/tsa na ka ri ra stsogs pa/_/rtsub dang bshang ba sri bas rlung /_/rang gnas 'khrugs pa stobs
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]ldan pas/_/thur du rgyu ba'i bu ga ni/_/bkag ste smad du rab skams nas/_/bshang ba gci ba 'phyen rnams ni/_/'gags pas nad ni mi bzad skyed/_/de yis khong pa rgyab rtsib logs/_/snying gar nad ni shin tu skyed/_/lto spos gsus pa na ba dang /_/snying
[\[141a.2\]]gcus rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/_/chu sor shin tu zug pa dang /_/mkhur bar skrang pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rlung ni gyen du song gyur na/_/de las slon rims yi ga 'chus/_/snying nad be'u snabs ma zhu dang /_/gcin sri bshang ba 'khru ba dang /_/'on dang rab rib dbugs mi bde/_/
[\[141a.3\]]mgo na lud pa cham pas 'debs/_/yid kyis 'gyur ba skom dang khrag_/mkhris pa skran dang dmu rdzing stsogs/_/rlung gi nad gtogs de dang de/_/shin tu mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gzhang 'brum gyen du 'khyil 'gyur ba/_/'di ni mchog tu gnod byed yin/_/rlung shas che ba'i
[\[141a.4\]]khong par ni/_/de med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lhan cig skyes dang nad gsum ldan/_/phugs ma'i gnyer mar gang gnas pa/_/de dag gsor mi rung ba yin/_/me drod stobs che stsogs kyis 'tsho/_/'dres las gyur dang gnyer ma ni/_/bar mar gnas pa gang yin
[\[141a.5\]]pa/_/lo gcig yan chad lon gyur pa/_/de dag gso dka' yin par bshad/_/phyi rol gnyer mar byung ba dang /_/nad gcig shas che las byung dang /_/skyes nas ring po ma lon gang /_/gzhang 'brum de ni gso ba sla/_/pho mtshan stsogs kyi 'og nas ni/_/rang rang skabs
[\[141a.6\]]bshad lte bar skyes/_/rta bla ba yi kha 'dra zhing /_/'byung bag can la 'jam pa yin/_/khyab byed kyis ni bad kan bsdus/_/pags pa'i phyi rol thor bur byed/_/mdzer pa 'dra zhing rtsub par gnas/_/pags pa'i mdzer pa yin par shes/_/rlung gis zug cing rtsub par 'gyur/_/
[\[141a.7\]]mkhris pas gnag la dmar rtsar 'gyur/_/bad kan gyis de snum nyid dang /_/rmen bu'i mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/blo dang ldan pas myur bar ni/_/'bad de gzhang 'brum gso bar byed/_/de yis gzhang ni myur 'gags nas/_/dmu rdzing nad ni skye bar 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o//_//de nas tshad pas 'khru ba dang pho ba'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/nad gzhi sna re kun dang ni/_/'jigs dang mya ngan las gyur pa'i/_/tshad pas 'khru ba rnam drug yin/_/de ni chu 'thungs drags pa dang /_/
[\[141b.2\]]sha rid sha skam ma goms pa'i/_/til gyi khu ba ma smin 'bru/_/chang rtsub kha zas tshod ma zin/_/gzhang 'brum snum bag drags pa dang /_/'bu dang shugs ni bkag las 'byung /_/de 'dras rlung ni 'khrugs pa yis/_/chu khams thur du bskyod gyur la/_/de nyid kyis ni me drod
[\[141b.3\]]nyams/_/de 'og khong pa khyab nas ni/_/bshang ba sla ba nyid du byed/_/de ltar tshad 'khru 'byung bar bshad/_/de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma ni/_/bshang lam snying ga lto bar zug_/lus snyom bshang ba sri ba dang /_/sbo zhing kha zas mi 'ju ba'o/_/de las rlung gyur bshang chur
[\[141b.4\]]bcas/_/nyung zhig 'byung zhing gzer sgra bcas/_/'gag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_/rtsub sla dbu bar bcas pa 'am/_/gong bu yang dang yang du 'byung /_/de bzhin bu ram tshig pa 'dra/_/sbyin bag bcas shing bcad snyam sems/_/kha skam gzhang ni snad pa dang /_/spu
[\[141b.5\]]langs pa dang 'khru ba yin/_/mkhris pas ser zhing gnag pa dang /_/sngo zhing du ba'i mdog 'dra la/_/khrag bcas shin tu dri mnam pa/_/skom dad brgyal tsha rdul dang bcas/_/gzer bcas gzhang kha tsha dang bcas/_/gzhang khar thor bu 'byung ba yin/_/bad kan las gyur
[\[141b.6\]]ska ba dang /_/'byar bag dkar zhing nal nal po/_/snum zhing be'u snabs bad kan bcas/_/rgyun du 'khru zhing lci la mnam/_/ska zhing nad rjes 'brang ba dang /_/gnyid che khong snyom yi ga 'chus/_/nyung zad nyung zad 'khru dang bcas/_/ba spu brtse zhing glong bcas dang /_/chu
[\[141b.7\]]so lto ba gzhang kha lci/_/bshang yang bshang ba ma btang snyam/_/kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/'jigs pas sems ni 'khrugs gyur pa/_/rlung gis mkhris bcas bshang ba ni/_/sla byed de nas 'khru ba ni/_/tsha zhing sla la 'phyo ba dang /_/mtshan ma rlung mkhris
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]las byung 'dra/_/mya ngan las byung de dang 'dra/_/mdor na tshad 'khru rnam gnyis te/_/ma zhur bcas dang ma zhu med/_/khrag bcas khrag med de las ni/_/dang po bshang gci chur 'bying 'gyur/_/dri mnam lto ni sbo ba dang /_/mkhregs shing mchil snabs shin tu
[\[142a.2\]]mang /_/smin pa de las bzlog pa yin/_/bad kan smin pa'ang chu nang 'bying /_/gang zhig tshad 'khru 'bad pa ni/_/med des pho ba'i nad du 'gyur/_/me drod nyams par byed pa yi/_/zas bsten pa yis me drod nyams/_/gang zhig zhu nas bshang ba ni/_/be+e'u snabs bcas
[\[142a.3\]]dang be'u snabs med/_/'khru ba de ni tshad 'khru ste/_/rang bzhin gyis ni myur gsod byed/_/ma zhu kha zas ma zhu dang /_/zhu ba smin pa'ang mi 'khru 'gyur/_/rgyu med yang dang yang sri ba'am/_/rgyu med yang yang sla bar 'byung /_/pho bar ma zhu stsogs shing 'khru/_/yun ring
[\[142a.4\]]na bar byed pa yin/_/de ni nad sna re re 'dus/_/las byung rnam pa bzhi yin no/_/de yi sngon tshul snyom pa dang /_/ring nas 'ju zhing skyur bag 'byung /_/mchil mang kha yis ro mi tshor/_/rmya snyom skom zhing yi ga 'chus/_/lto sbo slon ni bro ba dang /_/rna ba rgyu
[\[142a.5\]]ma sgra dang bcas/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid skem pa dang /_/du ba mun dang rims kyis 'debs/_/brgyal zhing mgo na bshang ba 'gags/_/rkang pa lag pa skrangs par 'gyur/_/de la rlung la rkan bskams zhing /_/rab rib rna bar sgra 'byung dang /_/rtsib logs brla
[\[142a.6\]]dang chu sor na/_/bshang ba yang dang yang du 'byung /_/yang yang sbo zhing gsud pa dang /_/ro rnams kun la brkam pa dang /_/bkres skom rgyu ma bcad snyam sems/_/zas zhu nas ni sbo ba dang /_/zas zos nas ni bde bar 'gyur/_/rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum/_/
[\[142a.7\]]mcher pa skya rbab 'byung bar dogs/_/bshang ba 'byung dka' ska slar 'byung /_/de yang be+e snabs sgra can 'byung /_/gzhang na lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/mkhris pa sngo zhing ser ba dang /_/ser po sla bag 'khru bar 'gyur/_/mnam zhing sgregs sgyur snying lkog tsha/_/
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]yi ga 'chus shing skom dad che/_/bad kan las gyur 'ju dka' zhing /_/zas slon yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/khar chags mchil ma mang ba dang /_/lud pa snying nad cham pas 'debs/_/snying ga mer mer por sems shing /_/lto ba tshor ba chung zhing lci/_/sgregs pa dri mnam
[\[142b.2\]]mngar 'byung snyom/_/bud med mi dga' me drod chung /_/be+e'u snabs bad kan 'dres par 'khru/_/bshang ba lci bar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rid pa min yang nyams stobs chung /_/kun skyes mtshan nyid 'dren mar ldan/_/ma snyoms la sogs me drod gsum/_/yan lag
[\[142b.3\]]char phye gang bshad pa/_/de yang pho ba'i nad du 'gyur/_/snyoms pa bde gnas rgyu yin no/_/rlung nad rde'u nad mdze nad dang /_/gcin snyi dmu rdzing mtshan bar rdol/_/gzhang 'brum pho nad ces bya brgyad/_/nad chen gso bar dka' ba yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
[\[142b.4\]]po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gcin 'gags pa'i nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/lgang pa lgang pa'i mgo pho mtshan/_/rked pa rlig pa gzhang kha ni/_/gzhang kha'i rus par brten gyur zhing /_/gcig tu 'brel ba yin par
[\[142b.5\]]bshad/_/lgang pa kha ni thur bltas kyang /_/gcin 'dzag pa yi rtsa sgo nas/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag pa yis/_/ngos gnyis nas ni phre'us 'gengs/_/zhugs pa gang yin de yis ni/_/gcin 'gags pa dang gcin snyi ba'i/_/gso dka' gnad la brten
[\[142b.6\]]pa'i nad/_/nyi shu skyed par byed pa yin/_/lgang pa chu so pho mtshan na/_/cung zad yang dang yang du 'byung /_/sri ba rlung las gyur ba yin/_/mkhris pa las gyur ser tsha na/_/mdog dmar bad kan las gyur pa/_/lgang pa pho mtshan lci zhing skrangs/_/'byar bag ngal
[\[142b.7\]]gyis 'byung zhing thogs/_/nad kun las byung mtshan kun ldan/_/gang tshe rlung gis lgang pa'i kha/_/bkag pa de tshe gcin mkhris pa/_/bad kan khu chur bcas pa ni/_/rim gyis bskams par byas pa las/_/mi bzad rde'u chags 'gyur te/_/ba lang mkhris par gi
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]wang ltar/_/thams cad bad kan la brten 'gyur/_/'di yi sngon tshul mtshan nyid ni/_/lgang pa sbo zhing de yi ni/_/nye 'khor kun du rab tu na/_/gcin yang lhag par dbre bro zhing /_/gcin 'gags rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/spyi yi mtshan
[\[143a.2\]]nyid lte ba dang /_/lgang mgo lgang pa'i srubs na zhing /_/de yis gcin 'byung sgo bkag pas/_/gcin gyi rgyun ni 'chad cing 'byung /_/de byung zin nas bde bar byed/_/sla zhing ba lang tshil 'dra la/_/de bskyod pa yis khrag tu 'gyur/_/drag shul spyod pas rab tu na/_/
[\[143a.3\]]de la rlung gyur shin tu na/_/so 'thams sdom zhing lus 'dar la/_/pho mtshan nyed cing lte ba 'tshir/_/rgyun du na zhing 'khun par byed/_/bshang ba 'phyen dang bcas par 'byung /_/gcin gyi thigs pa yang yang 'ong /_/rde'u gnag cing rtsub pa dang /_/chu sor tsher
[\[143a.4\]]mas gang snyam byed/_/mkhris pas lgang pa tsha ba dang /_/btsos pa snyam byed rab tu dro/_/go bye'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra la/_/rde'u mdog dmar zhing ser la gnag_/bad kan gyis bsil lci ba dang /_/lgang pa'i nang du zug cing na/_/rde'u che zhing 'jam pa la/_/
[\[143a.5\]]sbrang rtsi'i mdog gam yang na dkar/_/'di dag byis pa rnams la ni/_/phal cher 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gnas dang sha ni chung ba'i phyir/_/bzung dang dbyung ba bde ba yin/_/mi chen khu ba las byung rde'u/_/khu ba bkag las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnas
[\[143a.6\]]las 'phos pa phyir ma byung /_/rlig bar gnas pa rlung gis ni/_/bskams nas nye bar bsdus gyur pa/_/de ni khu ba rde'u chags yin/_/lgang par gcin ni sri byed cing /_/tsha zhing skrang bar byed pa yin/_/de ni skyes ma thag tu ni/_/khu ba zhu ste sla bar
[\[143a.7\]]'gyur/_/phyogs der mnan na zhu bar byed/_/rde'u gseg ma lta bur gnas/_/rlung gis phye mar bshig gyur pa/_/de 'dir tshul bzhin 'byung zhes bya/_/gcin dang lhan cig phyir 'byung 'gyur/_/lugs bzhin mi 'byung rde'ur chags/_/gcin ni bkag par
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]byas gyur pas/_/rlung gis lgang ba'i kha bkag nas/_/gcin 'gags na zhing g.ya' bar 'gyur/_/lan 'ga' rang gnas las spangs nas/_/lgang pa rgyas te kha che zhing /_/mngal 'dra sbom zhing log par 'dug_/der ni na zhing tsha bar byed/_/'phar zhing
[\[143b.2\]]gcus pa snyam du sems/_/thigs pa tsam du 'dzag pa dang /_/lgang btsir rgyun ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa gnyis po 'di dag ni/_/rlung gi lgang pa'i nad ces bya/_/gso dka' gnyis pa rlung gi yin/_/mthu chen shin tu gso dka' yin/_/bshang lam de
[\[143b.3\]]ni ldang pa yi/_/bar na rlung ni brten gyur pa/_/gtun 'dra sra zhing mtho ba dang /_/mi 'gyur gnas byed mdud pa can/_/rlung nad gtun 'dra de sbos bcas/_/bshang gci 'phyen ni 'gags byed yin/_/log rgyu 'khyil bar byed pa yi/_/rlung gis chu
[\[143b.4\]]sor mi bzad gzer/_/gcin las zhugs te 'khyil byed cing /_/rengs byed lci zhing gcus snyam byed/_/gcin ni nyung shas nyung shas 'byung /_/yang na bshang gci gtong tshe 'byung /_/'di ni rlung nad 'khyil ba yin/_/gcin ni yun rings bkag gyur
[\[143b.5\]]pa/_/sri zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/_/gcin thon nas ni nad tshabs 'bri/_/gcin bkag pa yis gnod gyur pa/_/gang tshe rlung gis bzlog gyur pa/_/lte ba'i 'og nas lte ba'i bar/_/gcin gyis gang 'gyur de yi tshe/_/rab tu na zhing sbos pa dang /_/zas mi 'ju
[\[143b.6\]]zhing dri ma 'gags/_/de ni ltor gcin 'gags zhes bya/_/gcin 'byung bu ga 'chus pa'am/_/rlung gis bkag nas gcin nyung 'byung /_/lgang pa mtshan sbubs nor bu ni/_/gnas nas de 'og rim gyis 'dzag/_/nad bcas pa'am nad med pa/_/gcin ni chad dang
[\[143b.7\]]bcas par 'byung /_/lhag ma lus te mtshan lci yin/_/lgang pa'i kha nang zlum zhing sra/_/cung zhig 'phral du 'byung 'gyur na/_/gcin stsogs rde'u lta bu ni/_/gcin gyi mdud par de bshad do/_/gcin snyoms pa las nyal po byas/_/rlung gis khu ba bskyod gyur pa/_/
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gnas las bskyod cing gcin btang tshe/_/sngon nam phyi nas thal chu dang /_/mdog 'dra byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/khu ba 'dres par de bshad do/_/rtsub cing skem la rlung gis ni/_/gang tshe rtug skam nad gyur pa/_/gcin 'byung bu gar song nas
[\[144a.2\]]ni/_/bshang ba dang 'dres de yi tshe/_/gcin ni bshang ba'i dri can 'byung /_/bshang ba 'gags par de bshad do/_/mkhris pa drag shul kha zas ni/_/rno tsha nyi tshan la sogs kyis/_/'phel zhing rlung ni zhugs gyur pa/_/lgang pa'i nye 'khor tsha zhing na/_/
[\[144a.3\]]gcin ni ser por 'gyur ba 'am/_/yang na khrag bcas khrag nyid 'byung /_/tsha zhing sril yang yang 'byung /_/de ni tsha rlung zhes byar bshad/_/rtsub cing lus ni rmya ba yi/_/lgang par gnas pa'i mkhris pa rlung /_/gcin zad tsha dang na bar bcas/_/bskyed pa de yang
[\[144a.4\]]de skad bshad/_/bad kan mkhris pa gnyi ga la/_/rlung gis bskyod par gyur na ni/_/de tshe gcin sri ser ba dang /_/dmar zhing dkar la ska ba 'byung /_/de ni tsha bcas gi wang ngam/_/dung gi phye ma'i mdog 'dra 'am/_/yang na skam zhing mdog kun ldan/_/de ni
[\[144a.5\]]gcin nyams nad du bshad/_/de ltar gcin 'gags las byung ba'i/_/mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad nas ni/_/de 'og gcin snyi las byung ba'i/_/nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o//_//de nas gcin
[\[144a.6\]]snyi ba za khu'i nad dmigs bshad par bya'o/_/gcin snyi'i nad ni nyi shu ste/_/de las bad kan las gyur bcu/_/mkhris pa las drug rlung gyur bzhi/_/de rnams tshil gcin bad kan skyed/_/zas dang skom gyi tshul las ni/_/phal cher de dag 'byung bar byed/_/mngar
[\[144a.7\]]dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang /_/lci zhing 'byil la bsil ba dang /_/'bru mar chang dang gsher ba'i sha//dar ba bu ram bu ram shing /_/gnas gcig stan gcig la rtag gnas/_/mal stan cho gar mi ldan la/_/brten nas gcin snyi'i nad skyed byed/_/bad kan 'khrugs
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]las lgang pa'i gcin/_/snyi 'gyur lus gsher rdul tshil dang /_/sha glongs lgang par brten cing snyi/_/mkhris pas khrag kyang zad byas nas/_/bad kan stsogs zad gcin gnas bskyed/_/rlung 'khrugs pa dang de zad las/_/lus zungs lgang par 'khus
[\[144b.2\]]te bskyed/_/de byung gso bya 'tsho tsam dang /_/spang bya gcin nad rnam gsum 'gyur/_/mdor na mi mthun bya ba dang /_/nad dmigs chen po nyid kyis 'byung /_/de rnams kyi ni spyi'i mtshan nyid/_/gcin ni rnyog ma can du 'byung /_/gnod dang gnod bya khyad med
[\[144b.3\]]kyang /_/de dus khyad par nyid dang ni/_/gcin gyi mdog stsogs dbye ba yis/_/gcin snyi'i dbye ba brtag par bya/_/dang zhing mang la dkar zhing bsil/_/dri nga med cing chu 'dra ba/_/gcin snyi chu yi za khu yin/_/cung zad rnyog can sbyin bag can/_/bu ram
[\[144b.4\]]shing khu lta bur mngar/_/za khu bu ram shing khu yin/_/zhag lon na ni ska bar 'gyur/_/za khu gar po zhes bya'o/_/steng na dngas ma 'og na ska/_/chang 'dra chang gi za khu yin/_/ba sbu ldang zhing 'bras btags 'dra/_/dkar zhing mang 'byung 'bras phye 'dra/_/
[\[144b.5\]]khu chu 'dra ba'am khu ba 'dres/_/khu ba 'dra ba'i za khu yin/_/gcin ni bye tshigs dri ma can/_/bye ma'i za khu zhes bya'o/_/gcin snyi mang du 'byung zhing bsil/_/mngar ba de bsil za khu yin/_/dal gyis nyung zad nyung zad 'byung /_/bags kyis 'byung ba'i za
[\[144b.6\]]khu yin/_/kha chu 'dra ba'i nal nal po/_/'byil bag kha chu'i za khu yin/_/dri ro kha dog reg bya ni/_/nas tshig 'khus 'dra nas tshig can/_/za khu sngon po kha dog sngo/_/za khu nag po snag tsha 'dra/_/gcin snyi tsha zhing mdog ser ba/_/de ni skyer pa 'dra ba yin/_/
[\[144b.7\]]mnam zhing btsod kyi khu ba 'dra/_/btsod kyi za khu zhes bya'o/_/dri nga tsha zhing lan tshwar bcas/_/khrag 'dra khrag gi za khu yin/_/zhag gi za khu zhag dang 'dres/_/zhag nyid gcin du 'byung ba yin/_/rkang 'dres pa'am rkang nyid ni/_/yang dang yang 'byung rkang za khu/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]glang chen myos ltar rgyun du ni/_/gcin shugs dal bar 'byung 'gyur la/_/chu ser bcas shing rnyog bcas 'byung /_/glang chen za khu zhes bya'o/_/sbrang rtsi'i za khu sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/de ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/_/lus zungs zad pas
[\[145a.2\]]rlung 'khrugs pa'am/_/nad kyis rtsa sbubs bkag ste 'byung /_/nad kyis bkag pa'i mtshan ma dag_/de ni rgyu med par 'byung zhing /_/skad cig zad stong gang 'gyur ba/_/gso bar dka' ba nyid du 'gyur/_/thams cad dus su ma bcos na/_/sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i
[\[145a.3\]]za khur 'gyur/_/gang zhig thams cad mngar 'gyur bas/_/phal cher sbrang rtsi'i za khu yin/_/sbrang rtsi'i za khu zhes bya kun/_/mngar ba las ni bshad pa yin/_/zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chus/_/slon lud gnyid che cham pas 'debs/_/bad kan las
[\[145a.4\]]byung za khu la/_/bla brnan de dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_/pho mtshan lgang par zug pa dang /_/rlig 'bras bye zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/tsha skyur skom dad brgyal dang 'khru/_/mkhris pa las gyur bla brnan yin/_/rlung las skyes pa'i snying 'phar zhing /_/lus
[\[145a.5\]]'dar snying na zas la brkam/_/gzer zhing gnyid med skem pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'byung /_/kham phor rus sbal 'dra ba can/_/sgu bo me dbal phra mo dang /_/sran chung 'dra dang nyungs kar 'dra/_/bu bcas 'byung dang pi da ri/_/khong 'bras
[\[145a.6\]]zhes bya'i 'bras 'brum bcu/_/gcin nad ma bcos pa las 'byung /_/tshigs dang gnad dang sha che ba'i/_/srog gi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/_mtha' ma mtho zhing dbus ma dma'/_/gnag cing rnag dang nad btsas la/_/dbyibs dang tshad ni kham phor 'dra/_/
[\[145a.7\]]thor bu kham phor zhes bya'o/_/nang du zug cing na byed la/_/nye 'khor dag tu cher mched cing /_/'jam zhing rus sbal rgyab 'dra ba'i/_/'bras nad rus sbal can zhes bya/_/sra zhing rtsa yi dra ba can/_/snum zhing 'dzag la khyon che ba/_/na zhing nang zug bu ga
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]ni/_/phra mor ldan pa dra ba can/_/nang du zug cing na la rnags/_/rgyab bam lto ba dag tu ni/_thor bu chen po kha dog gnag/_/sku bor 'dug pas sgu bor bshad/_/skyes ma thag tu pags pa tsha/_/shin tu na byed me dbal te/_/dmar zhing gnag la
[\[145b.2\]]gas pa dang /_/tsha zhing rmugs byed me dbal phra/_/sran chung 'dra ba'i tshad dang dbyibs/_/mnyam pas sran chung can yin no/_/tshad dang dbyibs ni nyungs kar 'dra/_/myur du smin zhing nad tshabs che/_/yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis/_/yongs
[\[145b.3\]]su bskor bas chu bur can/_/bu bcas che zhing mang ba la/_/rab phra'i 'brum bus khyab gyur pa'o/_/ldum bu bi da ri ltar ldum/_/sra ba bi da ri zhes bya/_/khong 'bras gzhan du bshad pa yin/_/de la dang po'i 'bras nad gsum/_/bu bcas dang
[\[145b.4\]]ni bi da ri/_/tshil chen las byung brnag dka' yin/_/gzhan dag mkhris pa shas che zhing /_/tshil chung las byung brnag nus 'gyur/_/de rnams nad shas ji ltar che'i/_/gcin snyi ba yi dbang las 'byung /_/'di dag za khu med par ni/_/gnod
[\[145b.5\]]gyur tshil las 'byung 'gyur te/_/ji srid dngos po mi snang ba/_/de srid shes par mi 'gyur ro/_/kha dog ljang ba'am dmar ba'i gcin/_/za khu'i sngon tshul med pa yis/_/gcin 'byung gang de za khu min/_/de ni khrag mkhris yin zhes bya/_/lus rdul
[\[145b.6\]]yan lag mnan zhing lhod pa dang /_/stan dang mal dang gnyid kyi bde la chags/_/snying mig rna ba kha lce byugs snyam byed/_/lus sbom skra dang sen mo ring ba dang /_/bsil bag la dga' gre ba rkan bskams shing /_/kha nang ro mngar rkang mthil lag
[\[145b.7\]]mthil tsha/_/gang du gcis par grog ma 'du 'gyur ba/_/gcin nad za khu'i tshogs ni phyis 'byung tshul/_/za khu sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'dra 'byil ba dang /_/sbrang rtsi'i ro 'dra ba la gnyis su rtog_/lus brtas bad kan can gyi za khu'am/_/nyes pa zad pas
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]rlung gi bdag can yin/_/sngon tshul bcas pa'i bad mkhris za khu dang /_/gang yang rim gyis rlung nad za khur 'gyur/_/mkhris pa las gyur gang yin gso bar dka'/_/gal te tshil nad chung gyur gso sla/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
[\[146a.2\]]po bsdus pa las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o//_//de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs dang skran gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/kha zas khengs bu rab tsha dang /_/rtsub dang skam dang tsha 'gyur zos/_/nyal ba'i spyod pa mi bde bas/_/khrag nad
[\[146a.3\]]skyed 'gyur de dang des/_/pags pa sha tshil rus pa dang /_/khrag dang chu ba chu ba che/_/phyi dang nang du skrangs gyur pa/_/rtsa ba che zhing nad tshabs che/_/zlum po'am 'jong bar gnas pa gang /_/khong 'bras de ni rnam pa drug_/nad dmigs sna re 'dus pa dang /_/khrag
[\[146a.4\]]dang smas pa las byung ba'o/_/'dir phyi'i yan lag de dang der/_/rab na mdud pa 'dra la mtho/_/nang gi shin tu mi bzad cing /_/gting ring skran ltar sra ba yin/_/grog mkhar lta bur mtho ba dang /_/me dang mtshon ltar myur gsod byed/_/lte ba chu so
[\[146a.5\]]mchin mcher pa/_/glo dang snying lto brla rtsa dang /_/mkhal ma gnyis sam gzhang du'ang 'byung /_/de la rlung gyur nad tshabs drag_/dmar nag ring zhig lon nas ni/_/'byung zhing smin pa dbyibs mi snyoms/_/ran zhing mgo 'khor spos ba dang /_/g.yo
[\[146a.6\]]zhing 'pho la sgra dang bcas/_/mkhris gyur zangs ltar dmar rtsa gnag_/skom dad tsha rims rmongs bag skyed/_/ldang zhing smin pa myur ba yin/_/bad kan las skya g.ya' dang bcas/_/slon zhing bsil la sla ba dang /_/glal zhing lci la yi ga 'chus/_/'byung
[\[146a.7\]]zhing smin pa yun ring thogs/_/'dus pa las gyur 'dren ma yin/_/'dir ni phyi nang gnyis mtshan nyid/_/don gyi dbang las shes par bya/_/'brum bu nag pos khebs shing gnag_/rab tsha na zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/mkhris pa'i rtags ldan phyi 'am
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]nang /_/khrag gyur bud med nyid la 'byung /_/mtshon la stsogs pas smas pa yis/_/rma byung mi 'phrod bsten pa las/_/rma kha'i tsha ba rlung gis phul/_/khrag bcas mkhris pa 'byung bar byed/_/khong 'bras bla brnan nad mang zhing /_/khrag mkhris mtshan
[\[146b.2\]]nyid can dag byed/_/bla brnan de yi dbye ba yang /_/gnas kyi dbye ba las bshad do/_/lte bar byung na skyigs bu ste/_/chu sor gcin 'gags rnag tu 'gyur/_/mcher pa dbugs mi bde mchin par/_/dbugs 'byung 'gag skom mgo 'khor
[\[146b.3\]]'gyur/_/glo bar byung na lkog nad 'gyur/_/snying byung yan lag kun gzir snyam/_/rab rmongs mun sros snyam du byed/_/snying 'phar na bar 'gyur ba yin/_/lto ba rtsib logs phrag pa'i bar/_/na zhing lto sbos 'byung bar 'gyur/_/chu so mdoms bar
[\[146b.4\]]byung brla na/_/mkhal mar byung na rked pa rgyab/_/rtsib logs su ni na bar 'gyur/_/gzhang du rlung ni thur 'byung 'gags/_/zhu dang ma zhu phyed nyid zhu/_/de dag 'or nad lta bur bshad/_/lte ba yan chad smin khar 'dzag/_/lte ba man chad gzhang du 'dzag//
[\[146b.5\]]lte bar gnas pa gnyi gar 'dzag_/khong 'bras kyi ni nad dmigs rnams/_/'dzag las rma ltar shes par bya/_/de las 'dus pa las gyur dang /_/snying dang lte ba chu sor gnas/_/phyi 'am nang du bye ba 'am/_/smin te kha nas 'dzag pa ni/_/nyam
[\[146b.6\]]chung bla brnan ldan pa spang /_/de bzhin bud med bu btsas pa'am/_/sbrum ma'am nu zho yod pa dang /_/nu zho med pa'i nu ma yi/_/rtsa sgo kha byer phyin gyur nas/_/phyi yi khong 'bras mtshan nyid can/_/skrang zhing srab 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bu mo rnams kyi nu
[\[146b.7\]]rtsa'i sgo/_/phra bas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rlung ni rgyu lam 'gags pas 'khrugs/_/skrang dang gzer ni skyed cing rgyu/_/chu so rlig par phyin pa dang /_/rlig par rgyu ba'i rtsa dag ni/_/btsir nas rlig pa pags pa dag/_/'phel zhing rlig rlugs nyid du phyed/_/rang
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]khrag gcin tshil rgyu ma las/_/rlig rlugs de ni rnam bdun 'gyur/_/rgyu ma gcin skyes pa'am rlung /_/rgyu ma'i dbye ba 'ba' zhig gzhan/_/rlung gyur rkyal pa gang 'dra zhing /_/reg na rtsub cing rgyu med na/_/mkhris gyur u dum+bA ra yi/_/'bras
[\[147a.2\]]bu smin 'dra tsha dro 'drul/_/bad kan las bsil lci zhing snum/_/g.ya' zhing sra la nad tshabs chung /_/khrag gyur gnag cing 'brum bus khyab/_/mkhris pa'i rlig rlugs mtshan nyid ldan/_/tshil gyur rlig rlugs bad kan 'dra/_/'jam zhing ta la'i 'bras bur
[\[147a.3\]]mtshungs/_/gcin gnag pa la brten pa rnams/_/gcin las 'bang bar de 'gyur te/_/rkyal pa chu yis gang bltar/_/g.yo 'gyur nad dang bcas shing 'jam/_/gcin 'gags pa dang rlig pa yi/_/'og tu skrang par byed par 'gyur/_/rlung 'khrugs pa yi
[\[147a.4\]]zas dang ni/_/chu grang la ni rkyal ba dang /_/shugs bkag bcir dang khur dang lam/_/yan lag log par 'chus pa dang /_/rlung 'khrugs pa ni gzhan gyis kyang /_/gang tsho rgyu ma phra mo'i cha/_/rlung gis log par phul 'gyur te/_/rang gi gnas nas
[\[147a.5\]]thur du bskyod/_/chu so'i tshigs su phyin pa dang /_/de cha mdud pa ltar glo 'gyur/_/yal bar bor na rlig pa cher skye zhing /_/spo shing na la rengs par rlung gis byed/_/rab tu gzir zhing nang na sgra dang bcas/_/gang bar byed cing bcug kyang slar 'byung byed/_/
[\[147a.6\]]rgyu rlugs 'di ni gso dka' ste/_/rlung gi rlig rlugs 'dra ba yin/_/rtsub cing gnag la dmar pa'i rtsa/_/phra mo'i dra bas khebs pa yin/_/skran brgyad nad ni so so dang /_/'dres dang 'dus pa las gyur dang /_/zla mtshan gyi ni nyes pa yis/_/brgyad pa bud med
[\[147a.7\]]rnams la 'byung /_/rims dang slon dang tshad 'khru stsogs/_/skyug sman stsogs dang las rnams kyis/_/skem gyur rlung skyes zas za dang /_/bkres te tu grang 'thungs gyur pa'am/_/skem 'thungs rjes la gang zhig ni/_/rkyal dang mchong ba la sogs pa/_/
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bsten pas lus ni dkrugs byas dang /_/slon mi bro yang skyugs pa dang /_/rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba yi/_/shugs bkag pa 'am btsir pa'am/_/snum ma dang dugs ni ma bsten par/_/sbyang ba'i las ni byas pa dang /_/sbyangs zin myur du tsha ba dang /_/bad
[\[147b.2\]]kan skyed pa'i zas skom spyad/_/rlung rgyas pa yi nad rnams ni/_/so so'am 'dres pa'am 'khrugs gyur pa'am/_/kun nas khrag dang bcas 'khrugs pas/_/sbubs can la ni brten gyur nas/_/steng 'og lam ni bkag nas su/_/gzer sngon 'gro zhing reg
[\[147b.3\]]tu rung /_/shin tu mtho zhing mdud pa'i gzugs/_/skran ni skyed par 'gyur ba yin/_/skem pas bad kan mkhris bshang ba'i/_/rgyun srang 'gags par gyur pa yis/_/rlung ni khong par gnas bcas pa/_/rtsub pas sra bar gyur pa yin/_/rang
[\[147b.4\]]gnas ldang 'gyur rang dbang can/_/gzhan gnas la brten gzhan dbang can/_/gong por gyur pas gzugs med kyang /_/gzugs can ltar gnas skran zhes bya/_/chu so lte ba snying ga dang /_/rtsib logs la ni gnas pa yin/_/rlung las mjing pa
[\[147b.5\]]klad pa gzer/_/rims 'debs mcher na rgyu ma khrug_/bshang sri khab kyis gtsags snyam na/_/dbugs 'byin yang dang yang mi phyin/_/lus rengs kha ni skam pa dang /_/skem zhing me drod mi snyoms la/_/pags stsogs gnag cing rtsub pa dang /_/
[\[147b.6\]]rlung skran g.yo ba yin pa'i phyir/_/dbyibs ni brtag par mi mngon zhing /_/gnas 'phel 'bri dang na ba dang /_/grog mas khyab pa lta bur ni/_/skran ni 'gul zhing zug pa yin/_/mkhris las tsha zhing sgregs skyur brgyal/_/'khru zhing lus rngul skom rims
[\[147b.7\]]'debs/_/pags pa la sogs ser por snang /_/skran ni reg par mi bzod dang /_/tsha zhing 'bar la dro ba dang /_/rang gi gnas ni sreg snyam byed/_/bad kan slon bag yi ga 'chus/_/me drod nyams shing grang rims 'debs/_/chom pa khong snyom dang ga lci/_/
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]lud pa lu zhing pags stsogs dkar/_/skran phugs ring zhing sra ba dang /_/lci zhing rang gnas brten nad chung /_/phal cher rang gnas 'dug pa dang /_/rang gi dus su nad skyed byed/_/gnyis las byung ba'i skran gsum po/_/mtshan nyid
[\[148a.2\]]'dren mar ldan pa yin/_/kun skyes mi bzad na zhing tsha/_/myur smin sra mtho de gso dka'/_/khrag gi skran ni gang yin pa/_/de ni bud med nyid la 'byung /_/zla mtshan dus sam bu gsar btsas/_/yang na mngal gyi nad can gyis/_/bud med rlung skyed bsten
[\[148a.3\]]gyur pas/_/rlung ni 'khrugs par gyur pa las/_/zla re 'byung bar byed pa yis/_/zla mtshan mngal du bkag pas ni/_/de ni mngal chags 'drar snang zhing /_/mtshan ma gsal bar ston byed de/_/snying 'phar nu 'dzag yid mi bde/_/skem pa la stsogs tshul
[\[148a.4\]]du snang /_/de nas rim gyis rlung 'dres dang /_/mkhris pa yi ni rgyu yis na/_/rlung dang mkhris pa las byung ba'i/_/skran ni khrag de skyed byed yin/_/na zhing sra la tsha zhing 'khru/_/skom dad rims stsogs bla brnan 'byung /_/nad kyi khrag la brten pas na/_/mngal
[\[148a.5\]]gnas dag tu lhag par gzer/_/mngal nas dri nga 'dzag pa dang /_/na zhing 'phar la zug par byed/_/mngal chags 'dra yang yan lag med/_/'on kyang skran ni 'gul gzer ldan/_/de nyid der ni gong por gnas/_/lan 'ga' 'gul bar byed pa yin/_/
[\[148a.6\]]'di ni ltor 'phel mi byed kyi/_/skran nyid 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/rang gi nad gzhi la brten pas/_/des der skran nad thams cad skyed/_/yun rings nas ni smin 'gyur ba'am/_/yang na ma smin khong 'bras kyang /_/nad khrag la ni brten pa'i phyir/_/shin tu myur
[\[148a.7\]]bar smin par 'gyur/_/de phyir myur du tsha 'gyur bas/_/khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/_/nang gnas skran ni chu so dang /_/lto ba mchin pa snying na zhing /_/me drod mdog nyams nyams stobs 'bri/_/shugs ni 'gag par 'gyur ba yin/_/phyi rol de las
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]bzlog pa ste/_/khong pa'i yan lag nad tshabs chung /_/phyogs de'i mdog ni nyams pa dang /_/phyi rol du ni mthong zhing 'phags/_/lto sbo lhag par mi bzad na/_/rgyu ma'i sgra bcas mi bzad na/_/sbo bcas lto ba na ba dang /_/rlung gi nad kyis steng 'og
[\[148b.2\]]bkag_/de ni hen gyi zhes byar bshad/_/sra zhing gtun 'dra mdud pa can/_/gtun 'dra gyen du mtho bar gnas/_/hen gyi mtshan ldan gtun bu ni/_/'phred gnas de dang tshul 'dra yin/_/zhu ba'i gnas nas gzhang pho mtshan/_/rlung ni mi bzad na zhing rgyu/_/
[\[148b.3\]]thur du zug pa yin par bshad/_/de las bzlog pa gyen du zug pa'o/_/sgregs pa mang zhing bshang ba 'gags pa dang /_/'grangs za mi nus rgyu ma sgra dang bcas/_/sbo zhing hen langs kha zas 'ju mi nus/_/skran ni nyer 'byung mtshan ma yin par bshad/_/yan
[\[148b.4\]]lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas dmu rdzing gi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/nad kun me drod nyams las skye/_/lhag par dmu rdzing nad skye zhing /_/ma zhu dri ma can gyi zas/_/dri ma stsogs
[\[148b.5\]]las skye bar 'gyur/_/nad kyis chu ni rgyu ba'i rtsa/_/steng dang 'og tu bkag nas ni/_/srog dang thur sel la gnod de/_/pags pa sha yi bar gnas nad/_/lto ba bkang ste dmu rdzing skyed/_/de yang rnam pa brgyad 'gyur te/_/nad gzhi tha dad 'dus mcher pa/_/dri
[\[148b.6\]]ma 'gags dang rgyu rdol dang /_/des gzir rkan dang mchu bskams shing /_/rkang pa lag pa gsus pa skrang /_/spyod pa kha zas nyams stobs 'bri/_/skem zhing gsus pa cher skyes la/_/mi ni yi dgas gzugs can 'gyur/_/de ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan ma dag_/
[\[148b.7\]]bkres pa med cing zas kun ni/_/ring nas tsha zhing skyur bcas 'ju/_/'ju dang mi 'ju mi shes la/_/'grangs par za yang mi nus shing /_/stobs ni rtag tu zad par 'gyur/_/cung zad bskyod kyang dbugs mi bde/_/bshang ba 'phel zhing 'gags par byed/_/
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]rkang pa gnyis su cung zad skrang /_/chu sor na zhing zas yang ba/_/cung zad zos kyang gsus pa rgyas/_/rtsa rgyas lto ba'i gnyer ma 'jig_/dmu rdzing nad ni thams cad la/_/snyom zhing nyam chung 'gyur ba dang /_/dri ma sri zhing me drod chung /_/
[\[149a.2\]]tsha zhing skrang la gsus pa sbo/_/mjug tu chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/thams cad chu med par du smug_/skrang med khur ltar lci ma yin/_/rtsa dra'i skar khung ris kyis khebs/_/rtag tu sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer/_/rlung gis lte ba rgyu mar zhugs/_/shugs skyed na ni 'jig
[\[149a.3\]]par 'gyur/_/snying ga lte ba rked pa dang /_/gzhang dang chu son bar byed/_/rlung ni sgra dang bcas par rgyu/_/bshang ba 'gag cing gci ba nyung /_/me drod chung min skam pa min/_/khar ni ro bro med pa yin/_/de la rlung gi dmu rdzing ni/_/rkang lag rlig
[\[149a.4\]]pa lto ba skrang /_/lto ba rtsib logs [(]rkad [,]rked [)]rgyab na/_/tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du sems/_/lud pa skams shing yan lag snyom/_/ro smad lci zhing bshang gci 'gag_/pags pa la stsogs gnag la smug_/glo bur du ni 'phel zhing 'bri/_/
[\[149a.5\]]gsus par zug cing na ba dang /_/rtsa bran nag pos khyab cing rgyas/_/brdabs na rkyal pa dbugs kyis ni/_/gang ba lta bu'i sgra dang ldan/_/'dir rlung nad dang sgrar bcas pas/_/thams cad du ni rgyu bar byed/_/mkhris pa'i dmu rdzing rims 'debs rgyas/_/
[\[149a.6\]]lus tsha skom dang kha ro kha/_/mgo 'khor tshad 'khru pags pa stsogs/_/ser zhing gsus pa'i mdog rtsa sngo/_/rtsa ni dmar ser dag gis khyab/_/rdul dang tsha bar bcas pas sreg_/dad 'byung reg na 'jam pa dang /_/myur du smin zhing nyer gdung
[\[149a.7\]]'gyur/_/bad kan dmu rdzing lhu tshigs na/_/tshor ba med cing skrangs la lci/_/gnyid che slon zhing yi ga 'chus/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde pags stsogs/_/sra zhing lto ba mkhrang la snum/_/rtsa yi ri mos khyab cing che/_/ring nas 'phel zhing sra ba dang /_/
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]reg na grang zhing gsus pa lci/_/nad gsum 'khrugs pa de dang de/_/bud med kyis byin dri ma rdul/_/dbyig dug dug stsogs kyis gnod 'gyur/_/khrag bcas dri ma bsags pa ni/_/ltor song gnod pa skyed byed de/_/kha skom mgo 'khor brgyal bcas pa'i/_/
[\[149b.2\]]rtags gsum ldan pa'i dmu rdzing skyed/_/myur du smin zhing mi bzad na/_/de ni grang dang rlung dang char/_/phrad pas shin tu gnod par 'gyur/_/mang du zos pas bskyod pa dang /_/bzhon pa drag tu 'gro ba dang /_/las lam nyal po drags pas dub/_/skyug sman drags
[\[149b.3\]]dang nad kyis skem/_/g.yon logs gnas pa'i mcher pa ni/_/gnas las 'phos te 'phel ba dang /_/yang na dngas ma stsogs pas khrag_/rgyas byas de ni 'phel gyur dang /_/de nas gtun bu bzhin rab sra/_/de nas rus sbal rgyab 'dra bar/_/rim gyis
[\[149b.4\]]'phel bar 'gyur nas ni/_/lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde skom dad/_/kha yis ro ni mi tshor zhing /_/lci zhing na la rims kyis 'debs/_/sha mdog skya zhing mi sdug la/_/brgyal zhing slon par byed pa dang /_/tsha zhing myos dang
[\[149b.5\]]ldan par 'gyur/_/rtsa mdog dmar ba'am mi sdug pa'am/_/sngo zhing ser la ri mor bcas/_/de la rim gyis nad rnams ni/_/bshang 'gags nad dang lto sbos dang /_/rmongs bag skom tsha rims kyis 'debs/_/lus lci lto sra yi ga 'chus/_/mcher pa lta
[\[149b.6\]]bur mchin g.yas logs/_/gnas 'phos dmu rdzing skyed ces bya/_/bya sgro spu dang bcas pa'i zas/_/zos pas bshang lam gnas 'gags te/_/gzhang 'brum dang ni rtug skam dang /_/rgyu mar chags pa'i zas kyis kyang /_/thur du sel ba'i rlung 'khrugs
[\[149b.7\]]te/_/bshang bas bad mkhris bkag nas ni/_/lto bar dmu rdzing chags par byed/_/des ni tsha skom rims sbrid 'byung /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde brla na/_/klad snying lte ba gzhang kha na/_/dri ma 'gags slon yi ga 'chus/_/lto bar rlung ni 'khyims par byed/_/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]brtan zhing rtsa ni sngo la smug_/rtsa ris snang ba'am mi snang 'gyur/_/phal cher lte ba'i 'og tu ni/_/ba lang mjug 'dra 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rus stsogs zug rngur bcas pa'i zas/_/zos sam shin tu drag zos pa/_/rgyu ma rdol lam gas
[\[150a.2\]]gyur nas/_/bu ga de nas ma zhu bar/_/phyir 'dzag bshang lam las 'byung zhing /_/bshang bcas nyung shas nyung shas ni/_/sha rul lta bur mnam pa ni/_/sbyin bag dmar ser 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lhag ma yis ni lto ba 'gengs/_/dmu rdzing mi bzad skye
[\[150a.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/de ni lte ba man chad rgyas/_/chus gang lta bur myur du 'gyur/_/nad kyi tshul ni shas cher ldan/_/dbugs mi bde skom mgo 'khor khyab/_/rgyu rdol dmu rdzing zhes bshad de/_/gzhan dag rgyu ma 'dzag ces zer/_/snum 'thungs la sogs byas nas
[\[150a.4\]]ni/_/'phral du chu grang 'thungs pa'am/_/me drod bri ba'am ha cang ni/_/skom pas chu 'thung drags pa'am/_/rlung dang bad kan 'khrugs chur 'dres/_/chu yi lam ni bkag gyur pas/_/de nyid gnas der 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de 'og dmu rdzing gyur pa
[\[150a.5\]]yin/_/de nas dmu rdzing de las ni/_/skom dad rkub tu chu 'dzag bcas/_/dbugs mi bde lud yi ga 'chus/_/sna tshogs mdog ldan rtsa yis khyab/_/rkyal pa chus gang reg pa 'dra/_/bskyod na sgra grag lus 'dar la/_/dmu rdzing chen pos cha zhing
[\[150a.6\]]snum/_/brtan zhing de ni lte ba zlum/_/thams cad yal bar bor na ni/_/nad ni rang gnas las 'phos te/_/smin pas sla zhing zag 'gyur ba/_/tshigs dang rtsa sgo las kyang 'dzag_/phyi yi rtsa sgo nas rngul 'byung /_/'gags nas thad kar 'khyil zhing
[\[150a.7\]]gnas/_/chu de nyid ni 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/sbyin bag gyur na de tshe ni/_/lto ba lci zhing sra la zlum/_/brdabs na sgra ni mi 'byung zhing /_/mdog 'jam rtsa ris mi snang la/_/lto ba dang ni rgyab tu 'gro/_/de rjes chu yi dmu rdzing skye/_/lto ba 'phel zhing
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]de las lhag_/rtsa nub gyur pa'i dmu chu ni/_/dmu rdzing bshad pa'i mtshan nyid ldan/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan mcher/_/'dus pa'i chu yi dmu rdzing rnams/_/phyi ma bzhin du gso ba dka'/_/gzhan dag phal cher zla phyed gsod/_/thams cad
[\[150b.2\]]chur gyur 'chi ltas le'u/_/las bshad bla brnan ldan pa'ang gsod/_/skyes nas dmu rdzing gyur pa dag_/phal cher gso bar dka' bar bshad/_/stobs ldan chur ni ma gyur zhing /_/gsar du byung ba 'bad pas gso/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus
[\[150b.3\]]pa las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas skya rbab dang 'or nad dang me dbal gyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/ji skad bshad pa'i nad 'khrugs pas/_/mkhris pa lhag par ldang 'gyur la/_/de la rlung ni stobs che bas/_/snying
[\[150b.4\]]la gnas pa'i mkhris pa ni/_/gtor te rtsa chen bcu'i nang bkram/_/lus kun la ni khyab gyur pas/_/bad kan pags pa sha khrag la/_/gnod byas bar du gnas nas ni/_/sha dang pags pa de dag las/_/pags mdog tha dad dkar ba dang /_/ser
[\[150b.5\]]zhing ljang sngon byed par 'gyur/_/de las skya ba'i shas che bas/_/de phyir skya rbab nad ces bshad/_/nad des lus ni lci ba dang /_/lus zungs rnams ni lhod pa dang /_/mdangs kyi yon tan zad gyur zhing /_/de las khrag dang tshil chung ste/_/snying po med
[\[150b.6\]]cing dbang po lhong /_/yan lag brdungs pa snyam byed cing /_/snying ni zag pa snyam du sems/_/mig phugs skrang zhing nyams la na/_/mchil mang skad gsang dma' ba dang /_/zas mi 'dod cing grang mi bzod/_/spu 'byi me drod nyams pa dang /_/ro smad
[\[150b.7\]]'bying zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/dbugs mi bde zhing rna sgra 'bod/_/mgo 'khor ngal bar byed pa yin/_/de ni nad gzhi tha dad 'dus/_/sa zhag zos las rnam lnga 'gyur/_/'di yi sngon tshul snying 'phar zhing /_/pags pa rtsub par gyur pa dang /_/yi
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]ga 'chus shing gcin mdog ser/_/rngul med khong pa'i me drod chung /_/lus rmya ngal bar byed pa yin/_/de la rlung gyur lus na zug_/rtsa sen mig dang bshang gci rnams/_/mdog nag rtsub la 'dar ba dang /_/skrang sbo kha yis ro mi tshor/_/
[\[151a.2\]]rtug skam rtsib logs klad pa na/_/mkhris las rtsa dang sen mo stsogs/_/ljang sngon rims 'debs mun 'thibs byed/_/skom dang rngul brgyal bsil ba 'dod/_/lus mnam kha nang kha ba dang /_/'khru zhing sgregs pa skyur la tsha/_/bad kan rtsa stsogs dkar
[\[151a.3\]]ba dang /_/glongs shing kha nang lan tshwa bro/_/ba spu ldang zhing skad 'gags la/_/lud pa lu zhing slon par byed/_/'dus gyur mtshan ma 'dres brnag dka'/_/sa zhag bska bas rlung skyed la/_/tsha bro mkhris pa mngar bad kan/_/dngas ma la sogs gnod
[\[151a.4\]]'gyur zhing /_/rtsub pas zas zos rtsub gyur nas/_/zhu bas rtsa sbubs 'gags byas te/_/snga ma bzhin du skya rbab skyed/_/de nas lte ba rkang pa dang /_/kha dang pho mtshan skrang par byed/_/bshang ba srin bu dang bcas 'khru/_/bad kan khrag dang bcas pa 'byung /_/
[\[151a.5\]]gang zhig skya rbab nad kyis btab/_/de yis mkhris skyed zas zos pas/_/khong pa yan lag gnas mkhris gnas/_/bshang khrag bsregs te mig ser skyed/_/des ni mig dang pags pa gdong /_/bshang gci sen mo kha dog ser/_/lus tsha skom dang
[\[151a.6\]]zas mi 'ju/_/sbal 'dra dbang po nyam chung 'gyur/_/de ni mkhris pa'i shas chen/_/skya rbab nad med par de 'byung /_/yal bar bor na cher skrangs te/_/gso dka' mig ser 'or thabs yin/_/ha li sa ni ljang nag ser/_/rlung mkhris mgo 'khor skom
[\[151a.7\]]dad che/_/bud med la dga' rims chung 'debs/_/khong rmya me drod nyams stobs 'bri/_/ha li sa ka khrag ngan 'gyur/_/chu ser can zhes bya ba yin/_/de rnams kyi ni bla brnan sngar/_/'or nad gtso bo yin par bshad/_/de phyir de nyid bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]rlung 'khrugs gyur pas bad kan dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pa phyi rol rtsar/_/'phros byas de yang rgyun srang 'gags/_/pags pa sha la gnas gyur te/_/'or nad mthong zhing skrang par byed/_/de bas thams cad 'dus gyur bshad/_/rgyu rnams
[\[151b.2\]]kyi ni bye brag las/_/gzugs dbye dgu yi bdag nyid can/_/nad gzhi tha dad gnyis dang kun/_/snad dang dug gis phog las 'byung /_/yang na rang dang glo bur gnyis/_/yan lag kun skrang phyogs gcig gnyis/_/khyab dang mtho dang mdud pa
[\[151b.3\]]yi/_/dbyibs kyi dbye bas gsum du 'dod/_/'or nad kyi ni spyi yi rgyu/_/nad las skyes pa khyad par nyid/_/nad las smyung stsogs kyis nyam chung /_/myur du lhag par zos las 'byung /_/de nas gzhan yang lci ba dang /_/skyur dang snum bsil lan
[\[151b.4\]]tshwa dang /_/thal sman rnon po tsha ba dang /_/mya ngan chu gnyid drags dang yar/_/sa zos sha lci sha skam dang /_/ma zhu ngal dang bud med drags/_/rkang gis lam du 'gro ba 'am/_/bzhon pas drag tu bskyod 'gyur yin/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad
[\[151b.5\]]'khru/_/gzhang 'brum lto ba'i nad dang ni/_/mngal nas khrag zag rims kyis btab/_/gsud dang chu ser slon nyes dang /_/sbrum ma dang ni me dbal gyi/_/nad dang skya rbab dag gis btab/_/gzhan yang log par gsos gyur pa'i/_/nad
[\[151b.6\]]de brang du gnas na ni/_/stod skrang chu sor gnas smad skrang /_/dbus na gnas pa rab tu skrang /_/yan lag kun khyab thams cad skrang /_/nying lag la brten de skrang byed/_/de yi sngon tshul rtsa rnams tsha/_/yan lag snyom par byed pa yin/_/rlung
[\[151b.7\]]las skrang pa 'pho zhang rtsub/_/spu rtsub smug cing gnag pa dang /_/pags 'khums 'dar brtse reg nan/_/na zhing zug pa be+em bem po/_/myur bar ldang zhing myur du zhi/_/skrangs pa mnan na dma' bar 'gyur/_/snum dang dro pas mnyes na zhi/_/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]mtshan mo chung zhing nyin mo che/_/pags pa yungs kar lde gu yis/_/bskus ltar tsha ba tsag tsag byed/_/mkhris pa rtsa ser dmar la gnag_/spu ni dmar ser gyur pa dang /_/myur du ldang dang zhi mi 'gyur/_/dang por dbus
[\[152a.2\]]su byung dang srab/_/skom bcas tsha zhing rims 'debs rngul/_/mnam zhing 'drul la snum mgo 'khor/_/bsil bar 'dod cing thur du 'khru/_/dri mnam reg na mi bzod 'jam/_/bad kan g.ya' spu pags pa dkar/_/mkhrang zhing bsil la lci ba
[\[152a.3\]]dang /_/snum zhing 'jam la brten zhing 'thas/_/gnyid che slon zhing me drod nyams/_/mnan na mi 'bying ldang dka' zhing /_/zhi dka' mtshan mo skrangs tshabs che/_/'od ma gtsags bu stsogs dral yang /_/khrag mi 'byung bar spyin bag 'dzag_/dro dang
[\[152a.4\]]reg pa la mngon dga'/_/gnyis 'byung gsum po rang ji bzhin/_/rgyu dang mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/_/'dus pa kun gyi bdag nyid can/_/mtshon las stsogs pas nad gyur zhing /_/bcad dam dbral lam smas la stsogs/_/kha ba me
[\[152a.5\]]dang rgya mtsho'i rlung /_/bse rtsi ka pi ka chu yi/_/khu ba gra ma stsogs reg pas/_/skrang pa mched par 'gyur ba yin/_/shin tu tsha zhing dmar bar snang /_/phal cher mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/dug skyes srog chags dug can ni/_/
[\[152a.6\]]lus la sod dang gcin gyis phog_/srog chags dug med pa yi yang /_/so dang mche ba sen mos zug_/gcin rtug khu bas smos pa dang /_/dri ma can gyi gos kyis reg_/dug shing rlung la rag pa dang /_dbyig dug phye mas reg las byung /_/
[\[152a.7\]]mnyen zhing g.yo la 'phyang ba dang /_/myur gsod tsha zhing na bar byed/_/'or nad gsar byung bla brnan med/_/gso sla gso dka' sngar bshad zin/_/me dpal nad dang snad pa'i bar/_/gnod pa 'or nad mtshungs pa yin/_/de ni phyi nang gnyi ga ste/_/
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]gsum na gnas pa yin par bshad/_/phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka'/_/de la nad ni ji bzhin du/_/'khrugs pa'i rgyu yis ldang gyur la/_/khyad par du ni tsha ba yis/_/lus la myur du mched par byed/_/de yang nang gnas nang du mched/_/phyir
[\[152b.2\]]gnas phyir mched gnyi gar gnas/_/gnyi gar mched par byed pa yin/_/de la nang na gnas pa ni/_/gnad rnams tsha gdung myos par byed/_/bu ga rnams la gnod pa dang /_/skom dad rab che gcin nad stsogs/_/mi snyoms par ni 'byung ba
[\[152b.3\]]dang /_/me drod myur nyams las shes bya/_/phyi rol de las bzlog pa yin/_/de la rlung gyur me dbal ni/_/rlung gi rims dang nad thabs 'dra/_/skrang zhing 'gul la zug pa dang /_/yan lag snyom zhing ba spu brtse/_/mkhris gyur
[\[152b.4\]]myur du mched cing 'gro/_/mkhris rims rtags ldan shin tu dmar/_/bad kan las g.ya' reg na 'jam/_/bad kan las byung rims 'dar na/_/me dbal stsogs kun yal bar bor/_/rang gi nad tshul bsags gyur na/_/de ni smin rdol rang
[\[152b.5\]]rang gi/_/me dbal rma yi mtshan nyid 'dzin/_/rlung mkhris la ni rims 'debs slon/_/brgyal zhing tshad 'khru skom mgo 'khor/_/rus tshigs chag snyam me drod nyams/_/mun zhugs snyam sems yi ga 'chus/_/yan lag thams cad me
[\[152b.6\]]mdag ni/_/'bar pas khyab pa lta bur tsha/_/phyogs ni gang dang gang du mched/_/khyab pas yan lag de dang de/_/me mdag zhi ba ltar gnag pa'am/_/sngo ba'am dmar bas khyab byed la/_/mes bsregs lta bur chu bur 'byung /_/myur du mched cing
[\[152b.7\]]khyab par byed/_/gnad kyi rjes 'jug me dbal ni/_/de nas stobs rab skyes pa'i rlung /_/yan lag na zhing dran pa stor/_/gnyid yar dbugs kyi rngam pa drag_/skyigs bus 'debs shing 'di lta bu'i/_/gnas skabs des ni thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]sa dang mal khri stan stsogs la/_/gang du 'ang bde ba mi 'thob cing /_/'gre zhing sdug bsngal myong ba dang /_/lus sems ngal las byung ba yis/_/gnyid kyi rmongs bag sad dga' ba/_/de ni me 'dra'i me dpal yin/_/bad kan gyis ni
[\[153a.2\]]bkag pa'i rlung /_/bad kan de rdol mang du phye/_/khrag 'phel ba yis khrag brtol te/_/pags pa chu bshal gnas/_/gnod byas thor bu phra zhing rim/_/zlum zhing sbom la sra ba yi/_/mdzer pa'i phreng ba chags byed cing /_/mdog dmar rab na rims kyis 'debs/_/
[\[153a.3\]]lud pa dbugs mi bde tshad 'khru/_/kha skam skyigs bu slon mgo 'khor/_/rmongs bag mdog nyams brgyal dang lus/_/yan lag na zhing me drod nyams/_/de ltar mdzer pa'i me dbal ni/_/bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur yin/_/bad kan mkhris las rims
[\[153a.4\]]'debs rengs/_/gnyid che slon bag klad pa na/_/yan lag na zhing bya rmyang 'dod/_/bla zhing mgo 'khor yi ga 'chus/_/rtsub cing drod nyams rus chag snyam/_/skom zhing dbang po mi gsal lci/_/be snabs 'khru zhing dang ga 'khyil/_/de ni rtsa sbubs rnams su 'gro/_/
[\[153a.5\]]phal cher ma zhu gnas na zhugs/_/phyogs gcig tu ni rab min/_/thor bu ser po dmar po dang /_/dkar pos phyogs kun gang bar byed/_/nor bu ltar snang gnag cing snum/_/dri ma can la skrang zhing lci/_/rnag pa'i zabs che rab tu tsha/_/reg na 'jig cing rnag pa dang /_/
[\[153a.6\]]'dam ltar sha ni zhig gyur cing /_/rtsa rgyus gsal bar snang ba yin/_/mi yi ro ltar mnam me dpal/_/de ni 'dam 'dra zhes byar bshad/_/kun skyes mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/lus zungs kun la rab khyab byed/_/phyi yi rgyu yi smas las 'khrugs/_/khrag
[\[153a.7\]]bcas mkhris pa skyed byed de/_/me dpal du ni rlung gis byed/_/rgya sran ku lang+tha 'dra ba'i/_/'brum bus khyab skrang rims 'debs na/_/shin tu tsha la dmar zhing sngo/_/nad dmigs tha dad las gyur gsum/_/gnyis gyur bla brnan med gso sla/_/rma dang 'dus pa las
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'byung dang /_/thams cad gnad ni khyab pa dang /_/rtsa dang chu ba sha 'drul dang /_/mi ro'i dri 'dra rul gso dka'/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas mdze nad dang sha bkra dang gzi gu dang srin bu'i
[\[153b.2\]]nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/kha zas spyod lam log pa dang /_/khyad par du ni mi 'phrod bsten/_/dam pa smod dang srog gcod dang /_/gzhan gyi nor 'phrog stsogs bsten dang /_/sdig pa'i las ni 'phral byas dang /_/sngon chad byas pas nad bslangs nas/_/rtsa la thad kar gram
[\[153b.3\]]nas ni/_/sha dang pags pa chu ser khrag/_/gnod byas sla bar gyur nas ni/_/de nas phyir ni 'byung 'gyur te/_/pags pa'i mdog ni mi sdug byed/_/mi bzad de ni mdze ru bshad/_/gang phyir dus las yal bar bor/_/de ni lus kun ma rungs 'gyur/_/lus zungs
[\[153b.4\]]la zhugs nang du khyab/_/thams cad 'drul bar byed par 'gyur/_/rngul bcas rul zhing mnam pa dang /_/srin bu phra mo mi bzad skyed/_/spu lpags chu ba rtsa chen dang /_/rus pa snyi ba rim bzhin za/_/de bas sha bkra phyi rol te/_/mdze las gzhan ni yin par bshad/_/
[\[153b.5\]]nad gzhi tha dad 'dres pa dang /_/'dus gyur mdze nad rnam pa bdun/_/kun kyang nyes gsum las byung yang /_/de las lhag pa las ming 'dogs/_/rlung gi mdze ni thod pa 'dra/_/mkhris gyur u dum+bA ra ste/_/bad kan las gyur zlum glang shu/_/rlung mkhris
[\[153b.6\]]las skyes ri sh+ya'i lce/_/bad rlung las byung pags pa gcig/_/'brum phran dang ni sha bkra dang /_/'bras byer chu ser zhig po'o/_/bad kan mkhris pa las byung ba/_/shu ba rma kha brgya pa dang /_/pad+ma dkar po 'brum bur bcas/_/g.yan pa pags
[\[153b.7\]]pa myags pa'o/_/'dus pa las gyur 'ol ma se/_/dang po'i gsum dang shu ba dang /_/'ol ma se dang pad+ma dkar/_/ri sh+ya'i lce zhes bya ba ste/_/'di bdun mdze nad chen po yin/_/mdze nad sngar byung mtshan ma ni/_/shin tu 'jam pa'am reg na
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]rtsub/_/rngul 'byung mi 'byung mdog mi sdug_/lus tsha g.ya' zhing pags tshor med/_/thor bu phra'u mtho ba dang /_/rma ni lhag par gzer ba dang /_/myur du 'byung zhing ring du gnas/_/'tshobs pa dag kyang rtsub par 'gyur/_/
[\[154a.2\]]rgyu chung gis kyang nad cher ldang /_/ba sbu brtse zhing khrag mdog gnag_/thod pa lta bu gnag cing smug_/rtsub sra tshor ba chung la srab/_/khyab cing mtha' ma mi mnyam la/_/ba spu langs pas khyab par byed/_/shin tu zug cing g.ya' ba chung /_/
[\[154a.3\]]myur du khyab byed thod pa 'dra/_/u dum+bA ra smin pa ltar/_/pags spu smug rtsa dkar bas khyab/_/shas cher mthug dang shas cher 'drul/_/tsha ba'i nad dang khrag shas cher/_/myur du smin cing 'drul bar byed/_/'bu can u dum+bA ra yin/_/
[\[154a.4\]]brtan zhing 'thas la lci zhing 'jam/_/dkar dmar myur du mi mched la/_/phan tshun 'dab 'brel shu ba slon/_/g.ya' zhing rnag che 'bus gang la/_/mtha' ma 'jam zhing ser por snang /_/gor gor por gnas zlum po yin/_/g.ya' zhing phra tsag
[\[154a.5\]]gnag pa dang /_/chu ser mang ba glang shu yin/_/rtsub cing srab la mtha' ma dmar/_/nang na gnag cing mtho ba dang /_/zug cing tsha la na zhing rnags/_/'brum bu rtsub pos khyab pa dang /_/ri sh+ya'i lce ni dbyibs 'dra pa/_/'bu mang ri sh+ya'i
[\[154a.6\]]lce 'drar bshad/_/glang po'i lpags 'dra reg rtsub lpags/_/gcig pur bshad la gzhi che ba/_/rngul mi 'byung zhing nya lpags 'dra/_/'brum bu phra mo thug thug po/_/reg na rtsub dang ldan pa dang /_/g.ya' zhing sra la gnag pa yin/_/sha bkra
[\[154a.7\]]nang rtsub phyi rol 'jam/_/phrugs na glog pa 'byung ba dang /_/reg na 'jam zhing srab pa la/_/ku ba'i me tog ltar dmar dkar/_/phal cher ro stod dag tu 'byung /_/rmen bu dmar po g.ya' dang ldan/_/khyab par byed pa'i 'bras zhes bya/_/
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]rkang pa lag pa gas pa dang /_/mi bzad na zhing g.ya' tshabs chung /_/rkang lag zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/thor bu dmar pos khyab pa dang /_/ring du mched cing dUr ba 'dra/_/pags pa zar ma'i me tog 'dra/_/g.ya' zhing brtan par gnas pa dang /_/
[\[154b.2\]]zlum por byung ba shu ba yin/_/rtsa ba sbom zhing tsha bcas na/_/dmar zhing smug la rma kha mang /_/rnag cing 'bu mang kha brgya pa/_/phal cher kun tu skye ba yin/_/mtha' ma dmar zhing dbus na dkar/_/g.ya' tsha na dang bcas pa dang /_/
[\[154b.3\]]mtho zhing ri mo brtan pas khyab/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar rgyas shing /_/stug cing chu ser khrag mang la/_/phal cher myur rdol pad dkar yin/_/pags pa srab pa'i 'brum bu dkar/_/dmar bas gang ba 'brum bu yin/_/g.ya' ba'i nad ni g.ya'
[\[154b.4\]]ba dang /_/'drul zhing lhag par na ba dang /_/'brum pa phra nag mang po ni/_/phal cher rkub lag gru mor 'byung /_/thor bu bcas shing reg mi bzod/_/g.ya' zhing dro tsha na dang bcas/_/dmar la pags pa myags pa yin/_/'ol ma se ni rab
[\[154b.5\]]tsha na/_/stod ni dmar zhing gnag pa ste/_/'ol ma se yi 'bras bu 'dra/_/mdze yi mtshan ma kun dang ldan/_/de bas kha dog du mar 'gyur/_/mdze nad nad gzhi shas che ba/_/nad dbye shes las bshad pa yi/_/mtshan ma las kyis
[\[154b.6\]]bstan pa yi/_/nad kun rgyas pa las byung dang /_/gang yang 'chi ltas las bshad dang /_/rus rkang khu chu la gnas spang /_/tshil la gnas pa 'tsho ba tsam/_/mkhris 'dres sha khrag gnas gso dka'/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur dang /_/
[\[154b.7\]]pags gnas nad gcig gyur gso sla/_/de la pags par gnas pa'i mdze/_/zug cing rtsub la mdog mi sdug_/khrag gnas rngul 'byung gnyid che skrang /_/sha la gnas pa rkang pa dang /_/lag par 'brum bu 'byung ba dang /_/tshigs gnas lhag par tshigs 'drul skem/_/rkang pa 'jas
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]'gyur tshil gnas pa/_/yan lag zhig par byed par 'gyur/_/rus pa rkang gnas sna zhom zhing /_/mig dmar skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/rma la 'bu zhugs khu bar gnas/_/bu dang chung mar bcas la 'byung /_/khrag stsogs
[\[155a.2\]]la ni rim bzhin du/_/mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gzi gu mdze dang gcig las 'byung /_/de ni sha bkra chu dang ni/_/yongs su 'dzag pa zhes byar bshad/_/nad gzhi gsum la brten zhing 'byung /_/rlung las rtsub cing smug pa yin/_/
[\[155a.3\]]mkhris gyur pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dmar/_/tsha zhing ba spu 'byi bar byed/_/bad kan las skya stug cing lci/_/g.ya' bcas rim bzhin khrag dang ni/_/sha dang tshil la brten par bshad/_/'di dag mdog ni gnyi ga yin/_/de ni phyi ma bzhin gso dka'/_/spu
[\[155a.4\]]dkar ma yin srab pa dang /_/phan tshun ma 'dres gsar du byung /_/mes ma bsregs pa gso bar sla/_/de las gzhan pa gso dka' yin/_/mdoms dang lag mthil mchur byung ba/_/gsar du byung yang gso bar dka'/_/nad rnams phal cher zas dang ni/_/
[\[155a.5\]]mal gcig reg stsogs la brten las/_/thams cad 'go ste mig nad dang /_/mdze nad lhag par 'gos pa yin/_/sha bkra gzi gu'i nad bshad nas/_/da ni srin bu'i nad bshad bya/_/phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis/_/srin bu rnam pa gnyis su bshad/_/phyi
[\[155a.6\]]yi dri mas bad kan khrag_/bshang skyes dbye bas rnam bzhi yin/_/ming las rnam pa nyi shur 'gyur/_/de la phyi yi khrag las byung /_/tshad dbyibs mdog ni til 'bru 'dra/_/skra dang gos la brten pa yin/_/phra zhing rkang pa mang la ming /_/shig dang sro
[\[155a.7\]]ma zhes bya'o/_/gnyi gas thor bu 'brum bu dang /_/g.yan pa dag ni skyed par 'gyur/_/nang gi mdze dang rgyu gcig ste/_/de las bad kan las mang skye/_/zas mngar bu ram 'o ma dang /_/tsha dang 'bras sar chan la dga'/_/mi gtsang byung bcas bshang
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]lam nas/_/lo ma 'dab ma la stsogs dga'/_/bad kan ma zhu'i gnas su 'byung /_/skyes nas kun du 'gro ba yin/_/la la 'breng ba 'dra ba yin/_/la la srin bu khol ma 'dra/_/kha cig myu gu 'bus pa 'dra/_/phra zhing ring la chung ba
[\[155b.2\]]dang /_/dkar zhing dmar bar snang ba yin/_/de yi ming ni rnam bdun te/_/rgyu ma zad dang lto nang 'khyil/_/snying za ya mtshan chen po dang /_/mi mngon rgyu dang 'jag ma 'dra/_/dri zhim zhes bya de rnams ni/_/snying 'phar kha chu 'dzag pa dang /_/
[\[155b.3\]]zas mi 'ju zhing yi ga 'chas/_/brgyal zhing mi dran rims 'debs slon/_/skom zhing sbrid pa cham pas 'debs/_/khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa nang nas/_/khrag las byung ba'i srin bu phra/_/zlum zhing rkang med zangs ltar dmar/_/phra zhing la lar bltar
[\[155b.4\]]mi snang /_/skra rtsa za zhing sbu 'byi byed/_/sbu gling u dum+bA ra 'dra/_/zhags pa bcas dang thong ka ste/_/drug po de dag mdze las gcig_/zhu ba'i gnas su mi gtsang skyes/_/'phel nas thur du rgyu bar byed/_/de ni cher 'phel gyur pa na/_/
[\[155b.5\]]gang tshe ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs/_/de tshe sgregs pa dbugs 'byung ba/_/phyi sa lta bur mnam par 'gyur/_/zlum zhing lus phra sbom po dang /_/smug dang ser dang dkar dang gnag_/srin bu de ming rnam lnga ste/_/kham gyi zas dang dal gyis 'gro/_/
[\[155b.6\]]myong bar byed dang brkam pa dang /_/lus la gnod byed ces bya'o/_/des 'khru gzer dang rtug skam byed/_/skem zhing mdog ni skya ba dang /_/ba spu ldang zhing me drod nyams/_/lci g.ya' gzhang ni phyir 'byung byed/_/
[\[155b.7\]]yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas rlung nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/rlung ni phan dang gnod byed la/_/'di ni sna tshogs rgyu gcig pu/_/khyad par du ni lus kyi ni/_/
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]nad dang nad med rgyu gcig pu/_/de ni kun byed kun bdag nyid/_/sna tshogs gzugs can skye dgu'i bdag/_/'byin byed 'dzin byed khyab 'jug gtso/_/sdud byed 'chi bdag gshin rjer 'gyur/_/de bas de ldang mi 'gyur
[\[156a.2\]]bar/_/rtag tu 'bad pa nyid du gyis/_/de yis tha mal gzhan gyur las/_/nad kyi bye brag shes par bshad/_/bsdus dang rgyas pa de'i ming gnas/_/rgyu ba'i lam ni re re lnga/_/nad tshul shes par bshad pa yin/_/'dir ni
[\[156a.3\]]nad kyi rnam gyur ba/_/de yi dbye ba nad gzhi dang /_/mtshan nyid bcas pa nyid du bshad/_/grangs med kyang ni brgyad cu yi/_/grangs su sngar ni bshad pa yin/_/lus zungs zad byed bsten drags pas/_/rlung ni 'khrugs par byed 'gyur
[\[156a.4\]]te/_/sbu gu stong par rgyu gyur pa/_/de nyid shin tu 'gengs bar byed/_/nad gzhan gyis ni gang ba der/_/khebs pas mthu can nyid du 'gyur/_/de la zhu ba'i gnas su zhugs/_/gzer dang rgyu ma sgra bcas sbo/_/bshang 'gags rde'u nad
[\[156a.5\]]gzhang 'brum skye/_/rgyab dang rked pa mjug mdor na/_/ro smad kyi ni phyogs de ru/_/mi bzad gnod pa de de skyed/_/ma zhu'i gnas zhugs skom dad slon/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde gsud nad/_/lkog ma 'gags shing sgregs mang na/_/
[\[156a.6\]]lte ba yan chad skyed par byed/_/rna ba stsogs zhugs dbang por gnod/_/pags zhugs gas shing rtsub par byed/_/khrag zhugs gnyid stug mi bzad na/_/tsha zhing dmar la mdog mi sdug_/thor 'byung kha zas sra bar gnas/_/yi ga 'chus
[\[156a.7\]]skom mgo 'khor na/_/sha tshil la gnas rmen bu dang /_/rab tu zug cing lus rtsub la/_/lus lci rab na rengs pa dang /_/khu tshur dbyig pas phog snyam byed/_/rus gnas brla dang rus tshigs na/_/mi bzad gzer zhing nyams stobs zad/_/rkang
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]gnas rus pa khong stong zhing /_/gnyid med rtag tu na ba yin/_/khu bar gnas pa myur 'byung la/_/'gags pa'am mdog 'gyur nyid du 'gyur/_/mngal gyi khu bar gnas de bzhin/_/rtsa rnams stong zhing sbo bar 'gyur/_/chu bar gnas
[\[156b.2\]]pa gzugs 'jas dang /_/sgur dang da rgan nad du 'gyur/_/tshigs la gnas pa'i rlung skrang pa/_/rkyal ba rlung gis gang reg 'dra/_/brkyang dang bskum par byed pa yis/_/bskyod pa na dang bcas par 'gyur/_/yan lag kun la brten pa ni/_/
[\[156b.3\]]zug chag snyam sems 'gul ba dang /_/rengs dang tshor ba med pa dang /_/tshigs 'khums 'dar bar byed par 'gyur/_/gang tshe rtsa chen kun la gnas/_/yang dang yang du 'khrugs gyur pa/_/de tshe yan lag la 'jug pas/_/nad ni
[\[156b.4\]]lus la 'jug ces bya/_/ro smad du ni 'gag pa'i rlung /_/gyen du song ste snying gar gnas/_/snying ga'i sbu gur zhugs nas ni/_/mgo bo yan lag bcas par zug_/lus ni kun du zhugs gyur na/_/de ni gzhu ltar sgu bor byed/_/dbugs
[\[156b.5\]]'byin dka' zhing mig rengs har/_/lhod cing 'dzums par byed 'gyur la/_/de nas phug ron lta bur 'khun/_/dran pa med de gzhan dbang can/_/de nyid a ba ta nar bshad/_/rlung gis snying ni btang gyur na/_/skad cig tsam du bde la
[\[156b.6\]]reg_/slar zhugs na ni na bar byed/_/de ni mngal 'jig las byung dang /_/khrag ni lhag par 'dzag gyur dang /_/snad pa dag las byung gyur pa/_/shin tu gso bar dka' bar 'gyur/_/mjing pa rengs pa'i rlung zhugs shing /_/gang tshe
[\[156b.7\]]rtsa chen la gnas pa/_/lus kun khyab par gyur pa na/_/de tshe nam tshong 'gugs par byed/_/lus ni gzhu ltar nang du gug_/mig rengs shugs ni 'byin par byed/_/glal 'byung so ni 'cha' ba dang /_/bad kan skyugs par byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]rtsib logs zug cing tshig mi 'thon/_/'gram pa rgyab dang mgo bo na/_/'di ni nang du gug ces bya/_/phyi yi de dang 'dra ba la/_/lus ni phyir dgyed byed pa dang /_/mgo bo rgyab tu 'dren byed cing /_/de la brang ni shin tu 'bur/_/gnya' ba bcom pa ltar na zhing /_/so dang kha ni
[\[157a.2\]]mdog mi sdug_/rngul zhing lus ni lhod par byed/_/phyir dgyed gzhu rengs zhes bya zhing /_/de la shugs drag ces kyang bshad/_/gnad la gnas pa'i rmar zhugs te/_/rlung gis bskyod par gyur pa dang /_/rkang pa nas ni mgo bo'i bar/_/lus la nad kyis khyab byed pa/_/skam
[\[157a.3\]]zhing lus ni skya gyur pa/_/rma yi da rgan de spang bya/_/lus la 'jug pa'i rlung kun ni/_/shugs dang bral nas bde bar 'gyur/_/lce ni brud drags skam zos gnod/_/'gram pa'i rtsa bar gnas rlung 'khrugs/_/'gram pa gnyis ni bskyod byas nas/_/kha ni gdangs par byed pa'am/_/yang
[\[157a.4\]]na 'dzums par byed par 'gyur/_/'gram pa nyams par byed pa des/_/za dang smra ba dka' bar 'gyur/_/smra bar byed pa'i rtsa gnas rlung /_/lce ni ldibs par byed 'gyur zhing /_/lce ldibs des ni bza' btung dang /_/smra ba la sogs mi nus 'gyur/_/mgo bos khur ni khyer pa
[\[157a.5\]]dang /_/dgod drags mang du smra ba dang /_/sngangs dang gcus te sbrid pa gtong /_/gzhu sra 'dren par byed pa dang /_/sngas ni mi mnyam la nyal dang /_/sra ba 'cha' bar byed pa dang /_/rlung skyed pa ni de dang des/_/rlung 'phel ro stod la zhugs nas/_/gdong gi gzhogs
[\[157a.6\]]phyed yon por byed/_/smra ba dgod dang lta ba'ang yo/_/de nas de yi mgo 'gul zhing /_/tshig mi phyin la mig rengs shing /_/so 'gul skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/sgra mi thos shing sbrid pa thogs/_/dri mi tshor zhing dran nyams rmongs/_/gnyid log pa na dngang bar
[\[157a.7\]]'gyur/_/mchil ma g.yon du 'dor ba dang /_/mig gcig 'dzums par 'gyur pa dang /_/nam tshong yan chad mi bzad na/_/gzhogs phyed dag gam ro smad na/_/la las de gzhogs phyed nad bshad/_/gzhan dag phyogs gcig gug ces zer/_/rlung ni khrag la
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]brten gyur te/_/spyi bo 'dzin pa'i rtsar zhugs pa/_/rtsub cing nad bcas mdog gnag byed/_/rtsa 'dzin de ni gsor mi rung /_/rlung gis de la gzhogs phyed bzung /_/rtsa dang rgyus pa bskams byas nas/_/gzhogs phyed gang yang rung la gnod/_/tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod
[\[157b.2\]]par byed/_/de yis lus phyed thams cad ni/_/las sbyor mi nus tshor ba med/_/de ni phyogs gcig nad ces zer/_/gzhan dag phyogs gcig bskams par 'chad/_/lus kun rlung nad de dang 'dra/_/yan lag kun la brten pa yin/_/rlung nad nyi tshes gzhogs byed bskams/_/
[\[157b.3\]]shin tu gse dka' yin par bshad/_/gzhan dang 'dres pa'ang gso dka' yin/_/zad byed rgyu can spang bar bya/_/ma zhu bad kan ldan pa yis/_/rgyun srang bkag ste lus rengs pas/_/brkyang bskum kun las nyams 'gyur ba/_/shing 'dra shing ltar rengs pa yin/_/
[\[157b.4\]]phrag pa'i rtsa bar zhugs pa'i rlung /_/der gnas rtsa ni 'khums byas te/_/dpung pa bskyod par mi nus byed/_/dpung pa 'jas pa'i rlung nad yin/_/gang zhig lag mthil sor mor 'brel/_/chu ba rgyab tu 'khums byed cing /_/lag ngar bya ba nyams byed pa/_/rlung de bi sha tse ru
[\[157b.5\]]bshad/_/gang tshe rlung ni rked par gnas/_/brla yi chu ba'i nang du zhugs/_/de tshe mi de 'theng por 'gyur/_/brla gnyis la zhugs 'phye bor 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'gro bar rtsom pa na/_/lus 'dar 'theng po ltar 'gro ba/_/tshigs kyi sbrel mtshams lhod gyur pa/_/de ni sran ma'i 'theng por bshad/_/kha zas dro grang
[\[157b.6\]]skam rlon 'dres/_/lci dang snum ches bsten pa dang /_/zhu dang ma zhu mi bdes bskyod/_/nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log pas/_/ma zhu shin tu stsogs 'gyur te/_/gal te brla nang zhugs 'gyur na/_/bad kan tshil dang rlung bcas pa/_/nad gzhan zil gyis mnan nas ni/_/brla rus nang du gang byas te/_/bad kan
[\[157b.7\]]gyis te rengs gyur la/_/de tshe de yis brla rengs byed/_/'degs mi nus grang tshor ba med/_/gzhan gyi yin snyam sems shing lci/_/mi bzad par ni 'gro ba nyams/_/sems khong chud cing yan lag na/_/snyom slon rims 'debs yi ga 'chus/_/rkang pa sgyid zhan 'degs pa dka'/_/bem be+em por 'dug ldan pa
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]yin/_/de ni bla rengs nad ces bshad/_/gzhan dag phyug po'i rlung zhes zer/_/rlung dang khrag las skyes pa'i skrang /_/pus mo'i steng byung nad tshabs che/_/ce spyang mgo ltar sbom gyur pa/_/ce spyang mgo 'dra yin zhes bya/_/rkang pa na zhing mi mnyam
[\[158a.2\]]'dor/_/ngal ba las ni gang che rlung /_/long mor gnas te nad skyed pa/_/de ni rlung nad tsher mar bshad/_/rting ba sor mor 'brel pa yi/_/chu bar rlung gis gnod gyur gang /_/brla nas 'jug par byed pa de/_/gzugs 'khums zhes ni bya bar bshad/_/bi sha tsi
[\[158a.3\]]dang gzugs 'khums bshad/_/mi bzad na ba kha lir bshad/_/gang gi rkang pa brtsi 'gyur zhing /_/bem bem por ni gyur pa dag_/bad kan rlung 'khrugs las gyur pa/_/rkang pa brtse bar de bshad do/_/mkhris pa khrag dang bcas pa'i rlung /_/rkang pa gnyis su tsha
[\[158a.4\]]byed cing /_/khyad par du ni 'gro tshe tsha/_/de ni rkang tsha zhes byar bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcwa lnga pa'o//_//de nas dreg nad kyi nad gzhi bshad par bya'o/_/khrag ni 'khrugs par byed pa'i zas/_/tsha ba dang
[\[158a.5\]]ni mi 'phrod pa/_/bsten dang sbyor ba log pa dang /_/nyin nyal mtshan gnyid ma log dang /_/nyal po drags dang skyid par gnas/_/'chags pa'i spyod pa ma bsten dang /_/snad dang sbyang ba ma byas bas/_/mi yi khrag ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing /_/rlung skyed zos pas rlung nad ni/_/
[\[158a.6\]]'phel bas 'khrugs te lam gzhan zhugs/_/de bzhin khrag kyang lam 'gags la/_/dang por gnod par 'gyur ba yin/_/de ni phyug po'i rlung nad dang /_/'theng nad stobs 'jig rlung khrag 'dres/_/ming du de ni rnam par bshad/_/de yang dang por rkang par rgyu/_/mchog tu bzhon
[\[158a.7\]]sogs mchongs las byung /_/de yi 'byung 'gyur mtshan nyid ni/_/mdze ni 'byung 'gyur mtshan mar mtshungs/_/de bzhin lus nyams yan lag lhod/_/pus mo byin pa brla rked pa/_/lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs rnams su/_/g.ya' zhing 'gul dang na ba dang /_/chag snyam
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]sems shing tshor med lci/_/yang dang yang du ldang ba dang /_/slar yang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rkang pa gnyis kyi rtsa bar gnas/_/lan 'ga' lag pa dag tu gnas/_/byi ba'i dug ni ldang ba ltar/_/lus kun la ni khyab par 'gyur/_/thog mar pags pa khrag
[\[158b.2\]]la gnas/_/byung ba rtogs par bla zhes bya/_/de nas rim gyis lus zungs kun/_/khyab ste rtogs par dka' zhes bya/_/rtogs sla pags g.ya' la sogs ldan/_/zangs ltar dmar dang sngo ba dang /_/bya rmyang bcas shing rab dro tsha/_/rtogs dka' sngar
[\[158b.3\]]bas lhag par na/_/skrang zhing mkhrang la tshos par byed/_/gzhang dang tshigs dang rus pa rkang /_/bcad snyam sems shing nang du rgyu/_/shugs dang ldan tshe sgur po dang /_/zha bo 'theng por byed 'gyur la/_/lus ni kun du rgyu ba yin/_/de la rlung shas che gyur na/_/
[\[158b.4\]]gzer 'gul zug pa'i shas che zhing /_/skrang ba rtsub cing gnag pa dang /_/sngo zhing 'phel zhing 'bri bar 'gyur/_/rtsa chen sor mo'i tshigs rnams ni/_/'khums shing lus bcum bzhin du na/_/grang la mi dga' reg na bde/_/rengs shing 'dar la tshor ba med/_/khrag shas che
[\[158b.5\]]skrang rab tu zug_/dmar zhing tsha ba tseg tseg byed/_/snum dang rtsub bas zhi mi 'gyur/_/g.ya' dang 'drul bar ldan pa yin/_/mkhris gyur tsha zhing rmongs bag dang /_/rngul zhing brgyal myos skom dad che/_/reg mi bzod cing na la dmar/_/skrang zhing smin la shin tu
[\[158b.6\]]bro/_/bad kan gyis 'gul mi shes lci/_/tshor med snum zhing grang ba dang /_/g.ya' zhing cung zad na ba yin/_/'dres pa'i mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin/_/nad gcig las byung gsar gso sla/_/nad gnyis las byung 'tsho ba tsam/_/'dus pa las byung chu ser 'dzag_/rengs
[\[158b.7\]]dang thor bu 'byang ba spang /_/rlung ni yan lag tshigs gnas pa/_/khrag gi lam la myur gnod byed/_/de gnyis phan tshun 'dres gyur pa'i/_/nad kyis srog ni 'phrog par byed/_/lnga yi bdag nyid can rlung las/_/srog rtsub drag shul smyung ba dang /_/'grangs drags
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]snad dang lam gyis dub/_/shugs bkag nan gyis brtsir ba yis/_/'khrugs nas mig la sogs pa la/_/nye bar gnod pa skyed byed cing /_/cham pa nyam thag skom lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde sogs nad ma bskyed/_/stod rgyu sbrid pa sgregs pa dang /_/
[\[159a.2\]]skyugs pa gnyid ni bkag pa dang /_/khur lci 'degs dang drag tu ngu /_/dgod drags sogs kyis nad 'khrugs te/_/mgul pa 'gags shing sems nyams la/_/cham 'debs slon zhing yi ga 'chus/_/mgul par lba ba sogs skyed cing /_/nam 'tshong yan chad brten
[\[159a.3\]]nad skyed/_/khyab byed 'gro dang 'dug drags dang /_/rtsed mo drags dang mi bzod spyod/_/kha zas mi mthun rtsub 'jigs dga'/_/yi mug sogs kyis 'khrugs par 'gyur/_/khu ba stobs dang spro ba nyams/_/skrang dang sems g.yengs rims kyis 'debs/_/yan lag kun la zug pa dang /_/
[\[159a.4\]]spu brtse yan lag tshor ba med/_/mdze dang med dbal gzhan yang ni/_/lus kun khyab pa'i nad skyed 'gyur/_/mnyam gnas 'du ba ma snyoms dang /_/grang dang 'dren ma'i zas zos dang /_/dus min gnyid log mtshan mo ni/_/gnyid ma log la sogs kyis 'khrugs/_/gzer
[\[159a.5\]]dang skran dang pho nad sogs/_/zhu dang ma zhur gnas nad skyed/_/thur sel zas ni rtsub dang lci/_/shugs bkag pa dang mi srun bzhon/_/khyogs dang bzhon dang stan gnas dang /_/'gro ba bsten ni drags pa yis/_/'khrugs nas gso bar dka' ba'i nad/_/zhu ba'i gnas la
[\[159a.6\]]brten pa skyed/_/gcin dang khu chu'i nad gzhang 'brum/_/gzhang 'byung la sogs mang po skyed/_/rlung kun ma zhur ldan pa ni/_/snyom dang 'gul mi shes khong lci/_/snum dang sgyid zhan yi ga 'chus/_/grang skran me drod nyams byed cing /_/tsha dang rtsub pa mngon 'dod
[\[159a.7\]]cing /_/de zos bde 'gyur las shes bya/_/ma zhu ba dang mi ldan pa/_/snyom sogs go ni bzlog pa yin/_/de nas rlung gis 'dres pa yi/_/dbye ba mang por shes par bya/_/mkhris pas 'dres rtags tsha ba dang /_/skom gzer mgo 'khor mun 'thibs byed/_/tsha dro skyur dang
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]lan tshwa bro/_/tsha zhing grang ba 'dod pa yin/_/bsil zhing khong lci gzer ba dang /_/tsha ba sogs zos smyung ba dang /_/rtsol dang rtsub pas lhag par bde/_/drod 'dod bad kan ldan pa yin/_/khrag bcas tsha zhing na dang bcas/_/pags pa'i sha nad shin tu zug_/skrang pa
[\[159b.2\]]mdog dmar 'gyur ba dang /_/thig le dmar po 'byung ba yin/_/sha dang 'dres pa mkhrang ba dang /_/mdog 'gyur 'brum bu phra mo 'byung /_/spu brtse lus la grog ma ni/_/rgyu ba snyam du sems par 'gyur/_/tshil dang 'dres pa gso dka' dang /_/g.yo zhing snum la
[\[159b.3\]]'jam grang bar/_/lus la skrang zhing yi ga 'chus/_/de ni phyug po'i rlung nad yin/_/rus pa dang ldan reg na tsha/_/btsir na mngon par dga' ba dang /_/khab kyis rab tu gtsags snyam byed/_/yan lag na zhing zug pa yin/_/rkang dang ldan la lus sgu zhing /_/glal
