[\[159b.4\]]mang dkris pa snyam du sems/_/rab tu na la lag gnyis kyis/_/btsir na bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/khu ba dang 'dris drag tu 'byung /_/yang na mi 'byung 'bras bu med/_/zas 'dres khong par ma zhu na/_/zhu nas nad de bde bar 'gyur/_/gcin dang rlung 'dres lgang pa sbo/_/
[\[159b.5\]]gcin ni 'gags par byed par 'gyur/_/bshang 'dres thur du 'byung ba 'gag_/rang gi gnas su yongs su gcod/_/snum zos myur du 'ju bar 'gyur/_/zas zos lto ni sbos pa dang /_/zas kyis bshang ba phul nas ni/_/na zhing skom po rnyog can 'byung /_/rlung ni
[\[159b.6\]]lus zungs kun dang 'dres/_/brla dang chu so rgyab tu na/_/rlung ni log song mi bde zhing /_/snying ni rab tu na bar byed/_/srog dang mkhris pa 'dres gyur 'khrugs/_/mgo 'khor brgyal dang lus tsha 'gyur/_/legs par ma zhu slon par byed/_/stod rgyu mgo 'khor sogs
[\[159b.7\]]pa dang /_/nang du tsha zhing stobs zad 'gyur/_/khyab byed rmongs bag lus kun ni/_/tsha zhing ngal la lus spyod 'gags/_/lus tsha nad dang bcas pa yin/_/mnyam gnas drod kyis gnod rdul che/_/mi dga' skom dang tsha bcas 'gyur/_/thur du sel bas dri ma ni/_/kha
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]dog ser por 'byung ba dang /_/zla mtshan cher 'phel mo mtshan dang /_/pho mtshan rkub tu tsha bar 'gyur/_/srog ni bad kan 'dres gyur pa/_/lus lhod skom dang yi ga 'chus/_/mchil mang sgregs pa sbrid mang slon/_/dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub thogs
[\[160a.2\]]pa yin/_/stod rgyu lus ni lci ba dang /_/tshig thogs skad 'gags yi ga 'chus/_/stobs dang kha dog nyams par byed/_/khyab byed rus tshigs rengs pa dang /_/yan lag thams cad lci ba dang /_/'gros ni shin tu 'khyor ba yin/_/mnyam gnas yan lag grang
[\[160a.3\]]byed cing /_/rngul mi 'byung zhing drod chung 'gyur/_/thur sel bshang dang gci ba ni/_/bad kan bcas par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de ltar rlung ni gzhan 'brel ba/_/nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin zhes bya/_/de bzhin srog la sogs pa'i rlung /_/phan tshun rim bzhin 'dres gyur pa/_/
[\[160a.4\]]kun kyang 'khrugs par gyur pa de/_/nyi shur 'gyur ba yin zhes bya/_/srog dang stod rgyu lhan cig 'khrugs/_/dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub dka' ba dang /_/cham 'debs mgo bo na bar byed/_/snying na kha ni skam par 'gyur/_/stod rgyu'i rlung ni srog dang 'dres/_/mdog dang
[\[160a.5\]]gzi mdangs stobs zad byed/_/phyogs 'dis 'gres pa lhag ma rnams/_/sman pas nye bar sbyar par bya/_/rlung ni gnas dang 'phel dang 'bri/_/las rnams legs par brtag par bya'o/_/srog la sogs pa lnga po ni/_/'khrugs pas phan tshun 'dres pa yin/_/mkhris
[\[160a.6\]]pa la sogs bcu gnyis dang /_/'dres par 'gyur te 'dren ma yin/_/mkhris pa sogs las 'dres de bzhin/_/'dren ma rnam pa du ma yin/_/rab dang rab mchog brtags pa yis/_/'dres pa grangs med 'gyur ba yin/_/de ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_/rim gyis
[\[160a.7\]]bde bar 'gyur ba las/_/rtogs dka' yin te yang yang brtag_/ma yengs pas ni shes par bya/_/khyad par srog ni 'tsho ba yin/_/stod du rgyu ba stobs zhes brjod/_/de gnyis gnod par gyur pa las/_/tshe dang stobs ni zad par 'gyur/_/rlung ni 'dres pa
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]ma shes pa'am/_/shes kyang lo gcig lon pa ni/_/'bad kyang gso dka' yin pa'am/_/gso ba'i thabs ni med pa yin/_/'dres nad yal bar bor na ni/_/khong 'bras mcher pa snying nad dang /_/skran dang me drod nyams la sogs/_/bla brnan de las 'byung bar
[\[160b.2\]]'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/nad gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_nad gzhi'i gnas te gnas gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas rims nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[160b.3\]]rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces bshad do/_/gang phyir ma zhu gnas ma zhu/_/rgyun srang bkag ste me drod nyams/_/rim gyis nyes pa skyed byed pas/_/sngon tshul byung dang rims sogs la'ang /_/de phyir smyung ba bya dgos la/_/stobs
[\[160b.4\]]ni 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/_/stobs ni nad med pa yi gnas/_/bya ba'i rims ni nad med don/_/smyung byas nad ni nyam smad cing /_/me drod skyed dang khong yang 'gyur/_/bde zhing bkres skom yi ga 'bye/_/zas 'ju stobs dang mdangs skyed 'gyur/_/de la phal cher bad
[\[160b.5\]]kan nad/_/bslangs dang g.yos par gyur pa dang /_/dang gar 'khyil bcas mchil ma mang /_/zas la mi dga' lud pa gsung /_/zos ma thag tu rims 'debs pa/_/khyad par du ni ma zhur 'gyur/_/skyug sman btang 'os skyug sman bsngags/_/de las gzhan du byas na
[\[160b.6\]]ni/_/dbugs mi bde dang tshad 'khru rmongs/_/snying nad mi bzad rims kyis 'debs/_/po son pi pi ling bcas pa/_/dug mo nyung ngam shing mngar ni/_/chu dron sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/_/yang na rgyam tshar ldan pa blud/_/kar ka ta 'am pa to la/_/nim pa sba'i lo ma'i
[\[160b.7\]]chu'am/_/'bras yos kyi ni skyo ma'am/_/bu ram shing khu'am chang sbyar btung /_/nyams stobs dus kyi dbye shes pas/_/cho ga'i gnas las bshad pa yi/_/skyug sman dag ni rab tu btang /_/skyug sman gyi ni sbyor ba dag_/byas par gyur tam ma byas kyang /_/rims
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]nad can la rnam sbyang bya/_/nad ni bskyod par gyur pa dang /_/smin dang zhi bar bya phyir bya/_/thal bas g.yogs pa'i me bzhin du/_/ma zhus khebs zas 'ju mi 'gyur/_/de bas nyes pa smin bya'i phyir/_/rims dang ldan la smyung ba bya/_/rlung dang
[\[161a.2\]]bad kan rims skom dang /_/chu tshan nyung shas nyung shas btung /_/des ni bad kan zhu gyur nas/_/skom dad myur du sel bar byed/_/me drod skyed cing bu ga'i rgyun/_/'jam par byas nas sbyong bar byed/_/zhen pa'i rlung mkhris rngul dang ni/_/bshang gci bde bar 'byin
[\[161a.3\]]par byed/_/gnyid rmongs yi ga 'chus pa sel/_/srog ni 'dzin par byed pa yin/_/chu grang de las bzlog pa ste/_/nad kyi tshogs ni [(]'phal [,]'phel[)]byed yin/_/chu tshan yon tan de 'dra yang /_/gcig tu mkhris pas ldan rims dang /_/mkhris shas che dang phyogs gcig
[\[161a.4\]]tsha/_/kun tsha rmongs bag tshad par 'khru/_/chang dub las byung so ga dang /_/gcong skems khrag mkhris can mi blud/_/de la gla sgang tsan+dan dang /_/bca' sga par pa ta dang ni/_/pu shel tsi dang ba le ka_/_bskol chu bsgrangs blud rims skom sel/_/mkhris pa med par tsha mi
[\[161a.5\]]'byung /_/tsha ba med par rims yod min/_/de bas mkhris pa la gnod spang /_/mkhris shas che bas lhag par spang /_/khrus dang bsku dang byug pa dang /_smyung ba lhag ma'ang spang bar bya/_/ma zhu gzer 'joms sman lta bur/_/ma zhu rims ni mi bzad la/_/sman btung mi
[\[161a.6\]]bya de yis ni/_/lhag par ma zhu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lto ba ma zhus khyab pa la/_/'o ma sbrul la blud dang mtshungs/_/rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid der/_/lkog nad cham pa dbugs mi bde/_/byin pa tshigs rus gzer gyur la/_/rngul 'byung ba ni rab bsngags te/_/rngul
[\[161a.7\]]dang bshang gci 'phyen bder 'byung /_/me drod skyed cing zas 'ju byed/_/snum 'thung cho gar bshad pa ni/_/rnam pa kun du spyad par bya/_/smyang dang dugs bya dus dang ni/_/nas thug tig ta'i khu ba rnams/_/dri ma rnams ni smin byed pa/_/rim mam gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyin/_/
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]rlung nad nyi tshe zad byed dang /_/glo bur ba dang rims rnying la/_/smyung ba mi bya de la ni/_/nyams mi smad pa'i zhi bya phan/_/de la ma zhu'i rims ldan tshul/_/nyams smad mi byar shes par bya/_/gso ba'i thabs ni gnyis shes las/_/brtags te smyung ba bya ba yin/_/smyung
[\[161b.2\]]byas mtshan mar ldan pa ni/_/de la thug sla la sogs blud/_/rang gis sman dang ji bzhin bskol/_/dang por thug sla la sogs sbyin/_/zhag drug bar du'am gang tshe rims/_/rtse zhil gyur pa'i bar du sbyin/_/de yis shing gis me bzhin du/_/de yi me drod 'phel
[\[161b.3\]]bar byed/_/dang po 'bras yos thug 'ju sla/_/bca' sga pi pi ling dang bcas/_/'u su rgya mtshar bcas pa sbyin/_/skyur 'dod se'u 'bru bcas ba btung /_/'khru ba'am mkhris pa mang ba la/_/sbrang rtsi bca' sga btab bsgrangs blud/_/chu so rtsib logs glad pa gzer/_/gze
[\[161b.4\]]ma bya kri bskol ba blud/_/rims 'khrur kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_/bal bil ba bca' sga dang /_/ut+pal 'u su bskol rims 'khrur/_/thug skyur smin dang drod bskyed yin/_/skyigs bu lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/gzer can rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/_/bad kan gyis nyen nas thug ni/_/rtsa
[\[161b.5\]]ba chen po lnga pa sbyin/_/rtug pa 'gags la nad bcas pa/_/pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra/_/btab pa'i nas thug mar dang brngos/_/dri ma nad ni bde 'byung byed/_/lto bar rtug 'gags nad bcas la/_/dbyi mo pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/rgun 'brum dong ga skyu ru ra/_/khong pa bcad pa snyam
[\[161b.6\]]byed la/_/rgya shugad trig sa la bar/_/kr-iSh+Na paNi bil ba blud/_/rngul med gnyid med skom pas nyen/_/khar dong gra skyu ru ra'o/_/rgya shug khar rgun 'brum dang /_/thal tres gla sgang tsan+dan ni/_/skom dang slon dang bcas pa blud/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa rims 'joms yin/_/
[\[161b.7\]]de dag thug pa'i sman yin te/_/sha khu yu sha sogs pa'ang sbyar/_/chang las byung dang chang rgyun bsten/_/bad kan mkhris pa'i gnas zhugs nas/_/de gnyis shas che'am so ga'am/_/skom dang slon dang tshad pas nyen/_/khrag ni stod du 'byung ba ste/_/de la thug pa mi blud kyi/_/
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]'bras phye'i skyo ma rims 'joms pa'i/_/'bras bu'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang /_/khar dkar bcas blud par bya/_/de nas skyo ma zhu nas ni/_/bkres na nas thug 'bras brngos pa'i/_/'bras chan dag ni bza' bya zhing /_/sha khu sla ba'i khu ba 'am/_/mung+ga 'ur
[\[162a.2\]]pa'i khu bcas bza'/_/de ltar zhag drug 'di bzlas te/_/nyams stobs nad ni bsrung bar bya/_/de nas smyung ba la sogs pas/_/smin pa'i nad ni lhag ma rnams/_/smin pa'am yang na zhi bya'i phyir/_/sman khu'i sbyor ba'i bya ba bsngags/_/mkhris la mchog tu kha ba
[\[162a.3\]]ste/_/bad kan la ni tsha ba blud/_/bad kan mkhris pa sel byed kyang /_/bska ba bsngags pa ma yin te/_/rims gsar dri ma 'gags byed pas/_/bska bas mi bzad rims skyed cing /_/dang ga 'khyil dang yi ga 'chus/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde yang skyed/_/
[\[162a.4\]]la la zhag bdun nas sman gtong /_/gzhan dag zhag ni bcu lon nas/_/kha cig zas yang zos nas gtong /_/ma zhu shas che la mi gtang /_/gang phyir mi bzad rims nyen la/_/nad kyi shugs ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/ma smin pa la sman gyis ni/_/rims ni slar 'phel byed pa
[\[162a.5\]]'am/_/nad ni shin tu sogs pa yis/_/snyom dang rmongs bag skyed par byed/_/gang tshe rims rtse zhil lus yang /_/dri ma la sogs g.yos gyur ba/_/rims btab yun ring ma lon yang /_/de tshe sman ni sbyin par bya/_/gla sgang par pa tar bcas pa'am/_/bca' sga'am
[\[162a.6\]]yang na byi tsher ba/_/bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i khu ba blud/_/pa ta pu shel pa la ka_/blud pa'am de bzhin du nim pa/_/sle tres gla sgang do gra rnams/_/'di ni ci rigs par blud bya/_/nan smin byed pa'i sman khu ba/_/rims dang skom dad yi ga 'chus/_/khas ro mi tshor ma zhu
[\[162a.7\]]'joms/_/dug mo nyung dang pa to la'i/_/lo ma dang ni pu tse shel/_/pa tol gla sgang thal tres dang /_/pa ta dang ni pu tse shel/_/pa tol nim pa 'bras bu gsum/_/rgun 'brum gla sgang dug mo nyung /_/kir tig ta sle tres dang /_/bca' sga dang ni tsan+dan dkar/_/sle tres gla sgang skyu ru
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]sbrang /_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs byas pa/_/lnga po 'di dag rtag rims sogs/_/lnga po zhi bar byed par 'dod/_/rlung gi rims la byi tsher ba/_/bca' sga sle tres gla sgang phan/_/yang na pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/sle tres dang ni bca' sga'am/_/rtsa ba lnga ba chung ngu phan/_/
[\[162b.2\]]mkhris rims gla sgang dug mo nyung /_/pu tse shel ni sbrang rtsir bcas/_/de bzhin gla sgang par pa ta/_/byi tsher rtsa mkhris bcas pa phan/_/bad kan dug mo nyung sogs sde/_/yang na ba sha ka gla sgang /_/bca' sga byi tsher bskol ba phan/_/pi pi ling rtsa a ru ra/_/dong ga gla
[\[162b.3\]]sgang pu tse shel/_/bad kan rlung 'dres bshang 'gags pas/_/na ba smin zhing drod skyed byed/_/rlung mkhris las gyur rims la ni/_/rgun 'brum shing mngar ma du ka_/seng phrom tang pal thal tres dang /_/gla sgang skyu ru ba la ke_/_pad+ma ge sar shug pa dang /_/pad rtsa tsan+dan
[\[162b.4\]]uR+shir/_/ba ru sha ka ut+pal sngo/_/rgun sogs skyo ma'am bskol bsgrangs pa/_/me tog dzA ti'i dris bsgos te/_/kha ra 'bras yos sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/rlung mkhris rims ni 'joms byed cing /_/chang nad slon brgyal tsha mgo 'khor/_/ngal dang stod kyi khrag mkhris nad/_/skom
[\[162b.5\]]dang mig ser dag kyang sel/_/pu tse shel btags snod sar pa/_/gtsang mdag tu bskol nas ni/_/btsir ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar/_/khu ba des ni rims tshad sel/_/bad kan rlung 'dres shu dag dang /_/pu tse shel dang pa ta dang /_/dong ga dug mo nyung bskol phan/_/yang
[\[162b.6\]]na sle tres bskol ba yi/_/khu bar pi pi ling gi ni/_/phye ma btab ste 'thungs na phan/_/bya kri bca' sga sle tres bskol/_/pi pi ling gi phye mar bcas/_/bad kan rlung rims dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa cham pa gzer 'joms byed/_/gla sgang 'u su a ru ra/_/bca' sga
[\[162b.7\]]skra lo pu ti ka_/shu dgag bra kad phal/_/thang shing shing kun sbrang rtsir bcas/_/rlung dang bad rims mchil ma mang /_/lto dang snying ga rtsib logs na/_/lkog nad kha ni skrangs pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rnams sel/_/dong ga sogs te sbrang rtsir bcas/_/bad kan mkhris
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]'gyur rims 'joms so/_/de bzhin pu tse shel dang ni/_/ba sha ka dang pu shel tse/_/kyi lce ba dang 'bras bu gsum/_/sle tres dang ni pa to la/_/bong nga dkar po nim pa dang /_/mur ba byi tsher ba yang phan/_/'dus pa'i rims la bya kri dang /_/
[\[163a.2\]]thang shing skyer pa gla sgang dang /_/pa to lo ma nim pa'i shun/_/'bras gsum pu tse shel yang phan/_/rlung dang bad kan shas che'i rims/_/lud dbugs mi bde rtsib logs zug_/dong gra puSh+kar mU la dang /_/sle tres kaN+Da ka ri phan/_/rgun 'brum ma du ka'i me tog_/ba ru
[\[163a.3\]]sha ka kyi lce ba/_/pu shel tse dang pu tse shel/_/'bras bu gsum dang tang pal bcas/_/bskol te bsgrangs par gyur pa yi/_/khu ba de ni des 'thungs na/_/rims ni thams cad sel bar byed/_/dzA ti gla sgang skyu ru ra/_/byi tsher ba bskol de 'drar phan/_/bshang 'gags
[\[163a.4\]]rgun 'brum pu tse shel/_/kyi lce bu ram 'bras bu gsum/_/sman zhu nas ni thug pa sogs/_/spyad bya bad kan can gyis min/_/bad kan gyis brlan lus la ni/_/rngul la char bab 'phel ba ltar/_/thug pa yis ni bad kan skyed/_/de phyir thog ma nyid du yang /_/yu sha
[\[163a.5\]]rgya sran tsa na ka_/sran ma sogs byas yang ba dang /_/rtsub cing ro kha ldan yid 'ong /_/yi ga 'byed byed g.yos legs sbyin/_/sA lu rtsa snar sogs 'bru rnying /_/drug cu pa yang rims la phan/_/bad kan shas cher de bzhin nas/_/phub ma med byas chag tshe'i chan/_/nad dang
[\[163a.6\]]lus zungs sogs stobs las/_/rims sel sman khur btsos 'bras chan/_/lan gnyis lan gsum btsags nas ni/_/ci rigs par ni sbyin par bya/_/mung+ga sogs dang ku lang+tha'i/_/yu sha yang bas rims nad 'joms/_/tshod ma ka ra be la dang /_/kar ko
[\[163a.7\]]ta dang la phug gzhon/_/par pa ta dang ba sha ka_/nim pa'i me tog pa to la'i/_/'bras bu dang ni lo ma las/_/legs par g.yos pa'i tshod ma bsngags/_/shin tu yang ba'i sha dang ni/_/skam sa'i srog chags sha khu ni/_/kaN+Da ka ri pa ru sha/_/ag+ni man+tha rgun 'brum
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]dang /_/skyu ru ra dang se 'bru dang /_/pi pi ling dang bca' sga dang /_/'u su zir rgyam tshar bcas/_/phal cher khar sbrang rtsi cher/_/ldan pa'i g.yos byas ma byas pa/_/mi skyur dar ba bskol ba dang /_/yi gar 'ong zhing sla ba dang /_/legs par bskol ba'i tshod ma phan/_/
[\[163b.2\]]de ni btung ba'i phyir yang sbyin/_/chu bskol bsgrangs par gyur pa dang /_/goms par gyur pa'i dbang las ni/_/chang yang blud par bya ba yin/_/rims dang bcas pa'am rims bral la/_/dgongs ka kha zas yang ba sbyin/_/de tshe bad kan me drod 'phel/_/khong pa'i
[\[163b.3\]]me drod stobs dang ldan/_/yang na yul goms dbang las ni/_/ci rigs su yang sbyin par bya/_/me drod chung la sngar zos na/_/zas ma zhu bar gzir bar 'gyur/_/sman bskol khu ba phan zas kyis/_/zhag bcu'i bar du smyung ba bya/_/bad kan bri nas rlung mkhris
[\[163b.4\]]ni/_/shas che'i rims la zhun mar sbyin/_/nad smin pa la bdud rtsi yin/_/gzhan du de ni dug dang mtshungs/_/zhag bcu 'das par gyur kyang ni/_/rims gyis bla brnan 'phel bar byed/_/de la smyung ba la sogs rims/_/bad kan zad kyi bar du bya/_/lus dang lus
[\[163b.5\]]zungs stobs zhan pas/_/rims rnying du yang 'gyur ba yin/_/me drod rtsub pas rims skyed byed/_/me drod rtsub par gyur pa la/_/skyugs sman dugs dang dus dang chu/_/bskol dang kha zas spangs pa yis/_/rlung gi khams ni grogs gyur pas/_/gang zhig stobs
[\[163b.6\]]chen gyur pa la/_/de yi zhi byed zhun mar te/_/khang pa 'bar la chu blugs mtshungs/_/rlung mkhris sel ba'i mchog tu ni/_/sbyor ba'i dbang las gyur pas na/_/de phyir rang gi sman dang ni/_/ji bzhin bskol ba de la sbyin/_/rims dro mi mthun pas sel la/_/
[\[163b.7\]]bsil bas mkhris pa'ang sel bar byed/_/snum pas rlung sel bad kan mar/_/mtshungs kyang sbyor dang g.yos pas sel/_/sngar gyi sman khu mar bcas pa/_/thams cad nad dmigs ji bzhin gtang /_/'bras bu gsum dang nim pa'i shun/_/shing mngar bri ha ti
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]gnyis dang /_/sran chung 'o mar bcas bskol la/_/mar ldan rims dang lud pa 'joms/_/pi pi ling dang tig ta dug mo nyung /_/kaN+Da ka ri pu tse shel thal tres/_/ta ma la ka skyu ru ra bil ba/_/gla sgang tsan+dan kyi lce pu shel tse/_/
[\[164a.2\]]rgun 'brum bong nga sa la par+Ni dang /_/bskol ba'i mar gyis rims kyi nad dang ni/_/me drod mi snyoms ha li sa ka dang /_/yi ga 'chus dang mi bzad tsha ba dang /_/snyom pa'i nad dang rtsib logs na ba dang /_/mgo nad slon ni myur du 'joms par byed/_/dur byid ma gtogs
[\[164a.3\]]seng phrom sogs bskol mar/_/rlung las gyur pa'i rims la bsngags pa yin/_/mkhris pa'i rims la pu tse shel dug mar/_/kyi lce bar bskol sman mar gang yin phan/_/bye dang ga dang dbyi mong kha ru tsha/_/pa ta tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka_/lce myang tsha dang nas tshig 'khus
[\[164a.4\]]thal ba/_/'di rnams cha ni srang rer byas pa dang /_/mar dang 'o ma cha ni mnyam byas pa/_/bre gang bskol bas bad kan rims rnying 'joms/_/sle tres khu ba lde gu dang /_/ba sha ka dang 'bras bu gsum/_/rgun 'brum dang ni ba la dang /_/bskol ba'i sman mar rims
[\[164a.5\]]nad 'joms/_/mar zhu nas ni sha 'jam khu/_/kha zas bcas pa bza' bar bya/_/des ni stobs rab skyed byed cing /_/nad ni shin tu zad byed yin/_/ka ra be+e la sogs khu dang /_/mung+ga bad kan mkhris 'joms pas/_/phal cher rlung shas che rims la/_/gzer
[\[164a.6\]]dang bshang ba 'gags pa ni/_/skyed cing rims ni 'phel bar byed/_/de phyir de ni bsngags ma yin/_/gal te de ltar byas kyang ni/_/rims ni zhi bar ma gyur na/_/sbyang 'os la ni sbyang bar bya/_/de la skyugs sman sngar bshad pa/_/ma zhu bar ni gnas nad la/_/
[\[164a.7\]]stobs can stobs ni bsrungs te btang /_/smin zhing nad ni lhod gyur pa'am/_/chang dang dug las byung rims la/_/sha ma dur byed 'bras bu gsum/_/pi pi ling dang ge sar dang /_/yang na tsha ba gsum sogs sman/_/kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/_/rgun 'brum skyu
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]ru ra'i khu ba/_/a ru ra ni rgun chur bcas/_/dong ga'o mar bcas pa'am/_/rgun chu dang ni bcas pa blud/_/'bras bu gsum mam kyi lce ba/_/'o ma rims dang ldan pas btung /_/bkru sman btang ba'i skabs su yang /_/thug sla la sogs rim bzhin
[\[164b.2\]]blud/_/rim gyis di ma glongs g.yos tshe/_/de la rtag tu dgag mi bya/_/nad ni khong par gnas snyeg nas/_/smin kyang gnod pa skyed par byed/_/shin tu tshabs cher byung gyur na/_/smin nas gcad par bya ba yin/_/ma smin bkag pa'i nyes pa ni/_/nad bcos
[\[164b.3\]]thabs su bshad pa yin/_/gang zhig rmongs pas ma smin pa'i/_/rims la nad 'byin sman gtong ba/_/de ni sbrul nag gnyid log la/_/lag pa'i rtse mos reg dang mtshungs/_/rims zad pa la slon sman dang /_/bkru sman phan pa ma yin te/_/de la 'o ma dag gi
[\[164b.4\]]ni/_/mas gtong bas ni nad bsal bya/_/'o ma la goms bad kan zad/_/lus tsha skom dad gnyis yod na/_/rlung dang mkhris pas nyen pa ni/_/tshad par 'khru yang 'o ma pan/_/de lus smyung bas gdungs pa dag_/mes tshig pa yi nags la ni/_/char chu
[\[164b.5\]]'bab pas skyed pa ltar/_/rims ni myur du sel bar byed/_/de bas 'o ma sbyar te bskol/_/dro ba'am bsgrangs pa bzhos ma thag_/dus kyi dbye ba shes te sbyin/_/de las gzhan du rims can gsod/_/'o ma bca' sga 'bra gor bcas/_/rgun 'brum kha ra mar
[\[164b.6\]]ldan par/_/bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi btab/_/skom dad lus tsha rims 'joms byed/_/de bzhin pa la rgun shing mngar/_/tsan+dan thal tres pi pi ling /_/'o ma'i bzhi 'gyur chu bskol ba'am/_/pi pi ling dang bskol ba ni/_/rims kyis btab
[\[164b.7\]]pas 'thungs na ni/_/klad gzer lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/rtsib logs gzer rims rnying las thar/_/rtsa ba lnga bskol de dang 'dra/_/e raN+Da rtsa bskol ba'am/_/bil ba gzhon nu dang bskol ba'am/_/bzhos ma thag gi 'o ma 'thungs/_/rlung gi rims kyis phyi sa
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]'gags/_/khrag bcas sbyin bag tshad 'khru dang /_/skom dad gzer bcas 'khru las thar/_/bca' sga ba la bya kri dang /_/gze ma bu ram 'o mar btsos/_/bskol 'thungs skrangs bshang gcin dang 'phyen/_/'gags dang rims dang lud pa
[\[165a.2\]]'joms/_/bri Sh+tsi bal bil ba dang /_/bar sha b+hu dang bskol ba yis/_/rims kyi skrangs nad sel ba yin/_/shing sha pa yi snying po dang /_/'o ma dag tu bskol ba ni/_/rims ni myur du 'joms byed yin/_/nad smin zhu ba'i gnad song la/_/mas gtong drag pos me
[\[165a.3\]]stobs skyed/_/rims bral sems dga' yi ga 'byed/_/myur du skyed par byed pa yin/_/bkru sman mkhris pa'am bad mkhris 'dres/_/mkhris pa'i gnas su zhugs pa sel/_/'jam rtsis nad ni sum char dag_/zhu ba'i nad la brten pa sel/_/'o mas bad
[\[165a.4\]]kan mkhris pa dag_/mjug to rgyab dang rked pa na/_/me drod che la rtug 'gags pa/_/'jam rtsi mas gtong sbyar bar bya/_/nim pa pa to la'i lo ma/_/pu tse shel dang dong ga dang /_/s+thi ra ba la po son cha/_/gze ma pu shel ba la ka_/'o ma'am chur ni bskol ba dag_/
[\[165a.5\]]'o ma lhag ma lus pa la/_/gla sgang shing mngar po son cha/_/pi pi ling dang dug mo nyung /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa yi/_/'jam rtsi btang na rims 'joms so/_/par+Ni bzhi dang shing mngar dang /_/po son cha dang pu shel tse/_/dong ga rnams ni bskol ba ru/_/shing
[\[165a.6\]]mngar sha ta puSh+pa dang /_/pri yang+ku dang po son cha/_/gla sgang lde gur byas pa la/_/bu ram mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/'jam rtsis rims ni sel byed yin/_/dzi ban+ti dang po son cha/_/me da shing mngar pi pi ling /_/shu dag d+d+hi ra sna dang /_/bal dang ni bil ba
[\[165a.7\]]dang /_/shu ti dang ni nye shing rnams/_/mar dang til mar 'o ma dang /_/chu dang btags te lhan cig bskol/_/snum ni nad dang rjes mthun pa'i/_/'jam rtsi rims la gtang bar bya/_/gang yang cho ga grub pa las/_/rims sel bar ni bshad pa yi/_/'jam
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]rtsi dag kyang gtang bar bya/_/sna yi bkru sman rims rnying la/_/btang na yi ga 'byed byed cing /_/mgo ni lci zhing bad kan che/_/sel zhing dbang po gsal byed la/_/snum gyi sna sman mgo stong snyam/_/lus tsha mkhris pa sel byed yin/_/dud brngub mkhur
[\[165b.2\]]bkang mkhur ba sbo/_/nad dmigs ji bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/cham pa khas ro mi tshor dang /_/mgo nad lkog nad sel byed yin/_/yi ga 'chus la kha lung gi/_/ge sar mar dang rgya ma tshar bcas/_/yang na rgun 'brum skyu ru ra/_/kha ra'i lde gu mkhur bar bcad/_/rims
[\[165b.3\]]rnying pags pa la brten la/_/reg na ji ltar bde 'gyur ba'i/_/sman bsil dro ba la sbyar ba'i/_/bsku byug chu blugs la sogs bya/_/mig sman dud pa'i sbyor ba'ang bya/_/glo bur byung la de de bzhin/_/tshal lan stong bkrus pa yi/_/mar gyis bsku ba spyad par bya/_/
[\[165b.4\]]mdo gnas las bshad sman gyi sde/_/mngar dang skyur dang bska ba dang /_/drur ba la sogs rlung mkhris 'joms/_/skyug sman la sogs sde tshan bshad/_/nus pa bsil zhing reg na grang /_/bskol dang lde gur byas pa dang /_/til mar 'o mar bcas bskol ba/_/
[\[165b.5\]]bskus na 'phral du tsha rims sel/_/mgo dang lus kyang de nyid ni/_/cung zad rtsing bar btags pas bsku/_/de bskol chu ni blugs pa dang /_/lus 'bying la yang sbyar bar bya/_/skyur rtsabs chu dang 'o ma tsha/_/mar la sogs pa'ang de bzhin sbyar/_/bil rkang kha lung a mra
[\[165b.6\]]dang /_/se'u 'bru seng phrom bid ri/_/rgya shug lo ma las byung ba'am/_/lung tang gi ni dbu ba yis/_/lus bskus tsha na rmongs bag dang /_/slon dang skom dad zhi bar byed/_/gang zhig nad gso'i thabs su bshad/_/mkhris pa sel ba'i rim pa ste/_/bsten par
[\[165b.7\]]byas na myur du ni/_/tsha dang bcas pa'i rims sel 'gyur/_/nus pa dro zhing reg na dro/_/rgya spos gur gum a ka ru/_/ru rta rdo dreg sto ne ya/_/sa ra la dang thang shing dang /_/chu srin sen mo ra sna dang /_/gu gul shu dag lca ba dang /_/sug smel gnyis dang tsa rong dang /_/
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]tsan+dan sib dang byi'u rug pa/_/shi kru spang spos bya ma ka_/yungs kar rtsa ba bcu pa dang /_/sle tres er N+Da gnyis dang /_/ba ru ra dang ro hi sha_/ta ma la yi lo ma dang /_/pu ti ka dang sa la ki_/'u su a za mo ta dang /_/shu ti ma sha ku
[\[166a.2\]]lang+tha/_/tsi tra ka dang pra ki r+ya/_na ku la ni rnam gnyis dang /_/gzhan yang de 'dra'i bsil ba'i sman/_/bskol dang lde gur byas nas ni/_/chang dang skyur rtsabs la sogs sbyar/_/til mar bskol ba grang rims sbyar/_/de dro 'jam gyis bsku ba dang /_/zhib tu btags
[\[166a.3\]]pas byug par bya/_/cung zad dro bas blugs pa dang /_/lus 'bying bar yang bya ba yin/_/tshwa dang ba gcin zho ga chu/_/'ba' zhig gis kyang de bzhin bya/_/dong ga la sogs sde yis kyang /_/btung dang bsku dang byug par bya/_/bdug pa a ka ru las byung /_/'og nas
[\[166a.4\]]bshad pa'i rims la sbyar/_/dugs ni mes byas mes ma byas/_/dugs kyi sman dang kha zas bsten/_/khang sbrum sa phug tu nyal zhing /_/la ba dre'u rngog re'u snam bgo/_/du ba med pa'i mdag mas gang /_/zhugs shing dag ni bsten pa dang /_/chang ni tsha ba gsum
[\[166a.5\]]bcas/_/dang /_/dar ba rgya sran ku lang+tha/_/'bru dang ko tra ba dag kyang /_/'dar ba'i rims can de la sbyin/_/grang ba'i rims nad can de la/_/chung ma nu ma rgyas pa dang /_/rgyan gyis brgyan te bzhag pa dang /_/lang tshos rgyags shing chang gis myos/_/bud med kyis de 'khyud par bya/_/
[\[166a.6\]]grang dang bral bar shes nas ni/_/de nas de slar bsal bar bya/_/nad gcig 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_/'grib pa'am ldang bar gyur pa'am/_/mnyam gnas nad ni bad kan gyi/_/gnas kyi rim pas bsal bar bya/_/'dus pa'i rims kyi mtha' mar ni/_/gang
[\[166a.7\]]gi rna pa'i rtsa ba ru/_/mi bzad skrang pa byung gyur na/_/'ga' zhig thar par 'gyur ba yin/_/de ni gtar gas dbyung ba dang /_/zhun mar blud pas myur bsal te/_/bad mkhris sel ba'i sman bsku dang /_/sna sman mkhur ba bkang bas gso/_/gang gi rims ni bsil drod
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]dang /_/snum rtsub sogs kyis zhi mi 'gyur/_/yan lag zhen pa de rims bzhin/_/lag ngar las khrag myur du dbyung /_/cho ga 'di ni mi bzad pa'i/_/rims la'ang nad dmigs ji bzhin bya/_/rlung sogs rim gyis cha phye la/_/phyis bshad gang yin dag kyang
[\[166b.2\]]bya/_/pa to la dang pu tse shel/_/gla sgang shing mngar a rur/_/gnyis sam gsum mam lnga bskol ba/_/mi bzad rims ni 'joms byed yin/_/'bras bu gsum dang a rur/_/sle tres pi pi ling so sor/_/cho ga de dang sbyar ba'am/_/go bye bu ram bcas
[\[166b.3\]]pa sbyin/_/rims kyis thebs pa'i nyin zhag la/_/nyams smad pa'am nyams brta bya/_/nang par til mar sgog skya bcas/_/bza' 'am yang na mar rnying ngam/_/de bzhin zho dang 'o ma sbyin/_/zhun mar srang drug pa dang ni/_/dge ba chen po'am ba'i rnam lnga/_/
[\[166b.4\]]tig ta'ang dugs dang bskol te sbyin/_/'bras bu gsum dang rgya shug dang /_//ag+ni man+tha bskol ba ru/_/zho dang bskol ba'i mar dag tu/_/seng phrom shun lpags lde gu btab/_/mi bzad rims ni 'joms pa'i mchog_/'bru chang dang ni chang rnying rno/_/rma bya
[\[166b.5\]]gong mo sreg khyim bya/_/rlan can sha ni drod skyed pa/_/zas bcas dag ni ci 'dod par/_/bsten la de bzhin gnyid log pa'am/_/yang na slar ni skyug tu gzhug/_/yang na zhun mar tshad chen po/_/blud de slar yang skyug tu gzhug_/a dza gan+d+ha ni li ni/_/dur byid
[\[166b.6\]]dang ni pu tse shel/_/rims kyis 'debs tshe snum dang dugs/_/legs par byas te blud par bya/_/ldong ros rgyam tsha pi pi ling /_/til mar dang sbyar mig sman gzhug/_/shing kun stag tshil cha mnyam bya/_/rgyam tshar bcas pa'i sna sman bya/_/de bzhin mar rnying seng ge'i
[\[166b.7\]]tshil/_/rgyam tsha dag dang sbyar te gtang /_/pa la ka sa nim pa'i lo/_/shu dag ru rta a ru ra/_/yungs kar nas bcas mar sbyar ba'i/_/bdug pa'am byi la'i rtug pas bdug/_/gu gul shu dag bya ma ka/_/sardza ra sa nim pa dang /_/arka dang ni a ru ra/_/thang
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]shing bcas pa'i spos sbyar ba/_/'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i/_/bdug pa yin te rims kun sel/_/spos bdug sna sman gtang bya ba/_/sems kyis bsgyur bar gang bshad dang /_/'phags pa la brten sman gyis ni/_/rims nad
[\[167a.2\]]thams cad sel bar byed/_/mchog tu phal cher mi bzad rims/_/de ni glo bur 'ong rjes 'brel/_/mi bzad rims zhir ma gyur na/_/rang gi gtar ga ji bzhin gdab/_/dngas ma la gnas thams cad la/_/skyug sman gtang dang smyung ba bya/_/khrag
[\[167a.3\]]la gnas pa sman chu blugs/_/bsku dang byug dang gtar ga bya/_/shar gnas bkru sman rnon po bya/_/tshil gnas tshil ni dbri bar bya/_/rus par gnas la rlung zhi ba'i/_/bsku dang dugs dang mnye ba bya/_/rims der rlung nad zhi bya dang /_/khyad par du ni 'jam rtsi bya/_/
[\[167a.4\]]ma 'dres rlung dang me dbal dang /_'brum bus gnod 'gyur rims la ni/_/zhun mar blud cing tsan+dan byug_/sman chu blugs shing sha khu sbyin/_/rang gi dpyad ni ji skad bshad/_/gtar ga la sogs dag gis gso/_/gdon byung 'byung po'i rig par bshad/_/
[\[167a.5\]]gtor ma sngags la sogs pas gso/_/sman dri las byung mkhris pa ni/_/zhi bya dug skyes dug gis gso/_/'dod don ji ltar yid 'thad dang /_/nad ni ji ltar zhi 'gyur ba/_/phan dang mi phan la mkhas pas/_/khros sogs las byung rims bsal bya/_/khros byung 'dod pas zhi bar 'gyur/_/
[\[167a.6\]]'dod byung khros pas zhi bar 'gyur/_/mya ngan 'jigs byung de gnyis kyis/_/'jigs dang mya ngan byung cig shos/_/dmod pa mngon spyod sngags las byung /_/'phags pa'i don la brten pas zhi/_/rims de thog mar ma 'dres la/_/de 'og dri mas khyab par byed/_/de bas nad dang rjes mthun
[\[167a.7\]]par/_/de la kha zas la sogs sbyar/_/rlung stsogs rgyu la ma brten par/_/rims ni rjes 'brel gnas mi byed/_/rims kyi dus dran byung de la/_/yid 'phrog yul gyis brjed par bya/_/snying rjes brlan zhing sems dag pa/_/rims kun 'joms par byed pa yin/_/
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]nyams stobs rdzogs par 'gyur gyi bar/_/rtsol dang khrus dang nyal po dang /_/zas lci ma goms tsha byed dang /_/gang gzhan rims skyed byed pa spangs/_/rims bral gyur kyang 'phral du ni/_/zas kun bsten par mi bya ste/_/rims ni myur du ldog byed nas/_/
[\[167b.2\]]nyam chung mi ni myur gsod byed/_/gang phyir myur du gsod 'gyur bas/_/de phyir de ni khyad par du/_/gnas skabs de dang de dag tu/_/sman dpyad de dang de dag bya/_/sman dang nor bu sngags dang bcas pa dang /_/dam pa bla ma bram ze dkon mchog mchod/_/
[\[167b.3\]]yid ni dga' bar byed pa'i yul bsten pas/_/khyab 'jug gis byas ma rungs rims kyang 'joms/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'o//_//de nas khrag mkhris gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[167b.4\]]khrag mkhris bde ba'i dus su 'byung /_/stobs ldan stod 'byung shugs dal la/_/nyes gcig las byung gsar du btab/_/bla brnan med pa gso bar bya/_/khrag gang nad gzhi gnyis la skyes/_/zhi zhing zhi zhing slar ldang dang /_/lam nas lam gzhan 'gro ba
[\[167b.5\]]gang /_/thur du 'byung ba gso ba tsam/_/shas cher 'byung zhing me drod nyams/_/nyes gsum lam gnyis las byung spang /_/nad gzhi zas dang gnas dang ni/_/nad kyi grogs dang stobs dag dang /_/yul dang dus kyi gnas skabs sogs/_/shes bya dang por smyung
[\[167b.6\]]ba'am brta/_/de bzhin sbyang dang zhi bya bas/_/khrag dang mkhris pa gso bar bya/_/brta ba las byung stobs ldan pa/_/nad gzhi mang po las byung ba/_/gyen 'byung bkru sman gtong bas gso/_/thur 'byung skyug sman gyis gso rjo/_/smyung ba brta bya la ltos bya/_/stod
[\[167b.7\]]du 'byung ba kha ba dang /_/bska ba'i sman khu smyung ba dang /_/yan lag drug sman bca' sga med/_/'thungs na zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/thur du 'byung ba'i khrag mkhris la/_/sman khu mngar bas brta bar bya/_/stong 'byung dang por skyo ma blud/_/smad 'byung dang
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]por thug pa blud/_/stobs ldan za nus ma dag khrag_/byung yang mi dgag ga des nad skyed/_/de ni gzhan du me lta bur/_/myur gsod byed pas gcad par bya/_/dur byid pri yang chu bskol dang /_/lde gu kha rar bcas pa dag/_/cho ga bzhin
[\[168a.2\]]du de la ni/_/zho gnyis tsam du bldag par bya/_/dur byid pri yang 'bras bu gsum/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi pi pi ling /_/sbrus pa 'dus byung stod du byung /_/khrag rims 'or nad sel byed yin/_/de bzhin dur byid kha rar mnyam/_/pi pi ling ni bzhi char bcas/_/
[\[168a.3\]]skyug sman phyir ni po son cha/_/kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas skyo ma'am/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi po son cha/_/chur bcas pa'am shing mngar chu/_/'o ma'am bu ram shing khu blud/_/sbyangs pa'i rjes la cho ga ni/_/thug sla la sogs ji bzhin du/_/blud cing stobs ni bsrung bar bya/_/skyo ma
[\[168a.4\]]rims skabs bshad rgun sogs/_/yang na mkhris 'joms 'bras bur sbyar/_/sbrang rtsi 'bra go rgun 'brum dang /_/pa ru sha ka ka ra'i chu/_/snying po lnga yi skyom ni/_/'bras yos phye ni mar bcas sbyin/_/me drod chung zhing skyur la dga'/_/se 'bru skyu ru ra skyur ba/_/pad+ma
[\[168a.5\]]ut+pal ge sar dang /_/kriSh+Na pa r+Ni pri yad+ku/_/pu shel tse dang seng phrom dkar/_/bca' sga dang ni tsan+dan dmar/_/byi tsher da ta ka'i me tog/_/ba la ka dang bil ba'i rkang /_/tshigs bcad phyed bshad thug pa blud/_/rtsa mkhris gla sgang pu shel tse/_/sran chung kr-iSh+Na
[\[168a.6\]]pa r+Nir sbyar/_/mung+ga gan+d+ha bi da ri/_/ha re Nu ka bal mar/_/tshig rkang gcig gis bshad pa blud/_/nus pa bsil ba de rnams ni/_/skam sa'i srog chags sha dag dang /_/chur ni so sor bskol ba yi/_/khu bar nas thug sbyar ba bsgrangs/_/khar sbrang rtsir
[\[168a.7\]]sbyar ba blud/_/de bzhin du ni sha khu dang /_/cung zad skyur dang skyur min pa/_/mar brngos khar bcas pa sbyin/_/zas kyi tshul ni shes pa ru/_/yang dang bsil bar gang bshad pa'i/_/gra ma gang bu can 'bru dang /_/tshod ma khrag la bsngags pa yin/_/sngar bshad
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]pa yi chu dag gam/_/rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol te/_/bsgrangs pa'am sbrang rtsi'i chu'am ni/_/'bras bu mnyes pa'i chu blud bya/_/bshang 'gags rgya sne'u ri bong sha/_/rlung shas che la sreg pa'i sha/_/u dum bA ra'i khu ba ni/_/bskol ba blud na bsngags pa yin/_/
[\[168b.2\]]de bzhin blag sha rma bya'i sha/_/n+ya gro d+ha dang khyim bya'i sha/_/khrag mkhris kyi ni nad gzhi ni/_/gang ci'ang rung ba de spang bya/_/ba sha ka'i khu pri yang ku/_/sa nag dang ni skyer khaN+Da/_/seng phrom dang ni sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/'thungs na khrag dang mkhris pa 'joms/_/
[\[168b.3\]]yang na ba sha ka yi ni/_/khu ba kha ra sbrang rtsi dang /_/bcas par 'thungs pa de bzhin te/_/ba sha ka ni 'ba' zhig dang /_/bskol bas khrag ni myur sel te/_/de ni 'di yi sman mchog yin/_/pa to la dang ma la ti/_/nim pa shug pa tsan+dan gnyis/_/seng
[\[168b.4\]]phrom ba sha tan tu li/_/sa nag ma da yan ti ka_/nye shing dang ni thal tres dang /_/ra mnye ba gnyis shing mngar rnams/_/bskol ba gsum po kha ra dang /_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas khrag mkhris 'joms/_/rgya skyegs shing kun bskol ba ni/_/legs bsgrangs
[\[168b.5\]]ka ra btab pa phan/_/yang na sbrang rtsi mar bcas pa'am/_/lci ba rta sbangs btsir khu 'thung /_/khrag nad mdud pa can 'drar 'byung /_/phug ron rtug pa sbrang rtsi phan/_/khrag ni shas cher byung gyur na/_/skom sa'i srog chags khrag dang ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am ra yi ni/_/
[\[168b.6\]]mchin pa mkhris bcas rlon pa bza'/_/tsan+dan gla sgang pu shel tse/_/'bras yos mung+ga pi pi ling /_/nas ni ba la'i chur sbangs pa/_/khu ba khrag mkhris sel byed yin/_/tsan+dan pad+ma pu shel tse/_/khu bar bong pa bsregs bcug la/_/rab bsgrangs kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/_/khrag
[\[168b.7\]]ni shas cher 'byung ba sel/_/bu ram shing ni chu mang sbangs/_/rdza bum gsar par de bzhag nas/_/mtshan mo phyi rol dben par gzhag_/nang par chu ni btsags nas su/_/sbrang rtsi btab nas pad+ma ni/_/kha phye'i phreng rgyan chu de 'dra/_/gang yang
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]mkhris pa'i rims skabs bshad/_/sman khu de yang blud par bya/_/sman khu sna tshogs 'di yis ni/_/me drod skyed pas bad kan zad/_/gal te khrag mkhris ma zhi na/_/de la rlung shas cher phan pa'i/_/ra yi 'o ma bskol ba
[\[169a.2\]]blud/_/de bzhin ba yi 'o ma ni/_/lnga 'gyur chu bskol gdus pa blud/_/rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang /_/sbrang rtsi kha ra bskol ba'ang rung /_/rgun 'brum bca' sga dzi ba ka/_/ba la gze ma zangs rtsi ba/_/re re 'o mar bskol ba'am/_/'o ma khar mar
[\[169a.3\]]bskol phan/_/gze ma nye'u shing bskol ba'am/_/de bzhin 'dab bzhi 'o mar bskol/_/khrag ni nad bcas myur du sel/_/mchog tu mtshan nas 'byung la phan/_/rkub las byung la khyad par du/_/mo tsa ra sa blud na phan/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi myu
[\[169a.4\]]gu'am/_/'dab ma gzhon pa'am bca' sga dang /_/uR+shi ra dang ut+pal phan/_/khrag gi tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum gyi/_/gso ba dag kyang 'dir sbyar bya/_/sman khu 'o ma 'thungs nas ni/_/bza' ba'ang 'o ma nyid dang bza'/_/sman khu'i sbyor ba 'di
[\[169a.5\]]dag nyid/_/bskol ba'i mar ni blud bar bya/_/ba sha ka rtsa rtser bcas brdungs/_/chu ni brgyad 'gyur nang du ni/_/bskol te brgyad cha lus gyur pa/_/de dang mar ni btso bar bya/_/de yi me tog nang bcug bsgrangs/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas khrag mkhris dang /_/mkhris
[\[169a.6\]]skran rims dang dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa snying nad mig ser dang /_/rab rib mgo 'khor me dbal dang /_/skad 'gags pa ni 'joms par byed/_/pa la sha yi myu gu'i khur/_/de bcug mar ni bskol ba dag/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas khrag nad sel/_/kyi lce ba yang
[\[169a.7\]]de bzhin no/_/khrag ni spyi bag bad kan bcas/_/mdud par chags nad mgul bar byung /_/ut+pal sdong bu bsregs thal ba/_/zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas pa bldag/_/pad+ma ut+pal ge sar dang /_/pri yang ku dang ma du ka/_/re re'i sbyor ba de bzhin bya/_/khrag ni bshang
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]ba'i lam las ni/_/'byung bar byed la khyad par du/_/'jam rtsi btang ba bsngags pa yin/_/sna nas nad can khrag byung na/_/sna sman btang zhing blugs par bya/_/sngar bshad sman khu'i sbyor ba dang /_/'o ma bu ram shing khu blugs/_/'o ma sogs chu kha rar bcas/_/yang na chu ni 'ba'
[\[169b.2\]]zhig phan/_/se 'bru'i me tog khu ba 'am/_/a mra'i rus pa dUr ba phan/_/bsil sman sde tshan gtogs pa dag/_/bsku dang byug la sogs las sbyar/_/mkhris pa'i rims sel bshad pa gang /_/phyi nang las btung sman de dang /_/glo rdol bar ni gang phan
[\[169b.3\]]pa/_/de yang khrag dang mkhris par phan/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lud pa gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/lud pa ma 'dres rlung las byung /_/dang por snum gyis gso
[\[169b.4\]]bya zhing /_/sha khu thug pa yu sha sogs/_/rlung 'joms sman bskol snum pa dang /_/dud bdugs lde gu bsku dang dugs/_/chu blugs lus bcing dag gis gso/_/bshang rlung 'gags la 'jam rtsis gso/_/mkhris bcas zhun mar 'o ma ni/_/zas kyi
[\[169b.5\]]sngon btang bad kan bcas/_/snum bcas bkru sman btang bas gso/_/sle tres ka N+Ta ka ri gnyis/_/re re srang sum cu'i khu bar/_/mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol/_/rlung gi lud sel me drod skyed/_/k+Sha ra ra sna shu dag dang /_/shing kun pa ta shing
[\[169b.6\]]mngar dang /_/'u su zho gnyis mar bre gang /_/tsha ba lnga dang bcas pa dang /_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar bskol/_/'thungs rjes thug pa blud gyur na/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde bcas snying /_/rtsib logs pho ba'i skran nad sel/_/ra sna nye'u shing rtsa ba bcu/_/
[\[169b.7\]]srang ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/_/rgya sran rgya shug nas dag ni/_/ra sha srang ni lnga bcu dang /_/chu srang lnga brgya bcu gnyis bskol/_/de dang mar ni bre bzhi bskol/_/'o ma mar mnyam dzi ban+ti/_/la sogs srang char byas te brtag/_/rlung gi nad la blud
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]pa dang /_/snar btang 'jam rtsi'i mas gtong sbyar/_/lud pa rnam lnga mgo 'dar dang /_/mo mtshan chu son ba dang /_/lud kun lus ni phyogs gcig nad/_/mchin bcas stod kyi rlung nad sel/_/bi da ri sogs sde tshan bskol/_/lde gu
[\[170a.2\]]mar bskol lud pa 'joms/_/shing mngar a shwa ka'i sa bon/_/byi dang ga dang skyer khaN+Da/_/shug pa kha ru tsha mar bskol/_/yang na de phye mar dang sbrus/_/lde gu byin la ra yi ni/_/'o ma blud na lud pa sel/_/dong gar sna byi dang ga/_/shing kun rgyam tsha pi pi ling /_/
[\[170a.3\]]bar gyi k+Sha ra de'i phye ma'am/_/mar dang ran tsam blud gyur na/_/rlung gyur bad kan bcas lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde dang skyigs bu dang /_/me drod chung ba sel bar byed/_/byi tsher ba dang bca' sga dang /_/zur ba rgun 'brum kha ra dkar/_/kar ka ta yi sring gi ni/_/til mar dang ni lde
[\[170a.4\]]gur sbyar/_/rlung las gyur pa'i lud pa sel/_/byi tshar gla sgang pi pi ling /_/bar gyi zur pa kar ka ti/_/bu ram rnying dang til mar dang /_/lde gur byas pa bldag par bya/_/bca' sga pi pi ling de bzhin/_/kar ka ta sring de bzhin no/_/chu dron dag dang pi pi ling /_/lce myang tsha dang bcas pa blud/_/
[\[170a.5\]]bca' sga ka ra zho ga chu'am/_/pi pi ling phye zhor btab blud/_/rgya shug tshi gu chang ngam zho/_/zho ga chu dang sbyar ba blud/_/yang na pi pi ling lde gu/_/mar brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa'ang phan/_/lud pa cham bcas dud pa ni/_/snum bcas cho gas bdug pa dang /_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde dud brngub/_/
[\[170a.6\]]'o ma sha khu bcas pa bza'/_/grong chu rlan can srog chags sha_/sA lu nas gro drug cu pa'am/_/ma sha ang ma kub ta yi/_/yu sha dag dang zos na phan/_/la la phud dang pi pi ling /_/byil rkang dong gtsi tra ka_/ra sna zir pa la sha/_/kr-iSh+Na par+Ni zur pa dang /_/ma nu bskol
[\[170a.7\]]bar snum skyur dang /_/lan tshwar bcas thug rlung gyur blud/_/rked pa lto snying rtsib logs na/_/dbugs mi bde dang skyigs bu sel/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar ni/_/tsha ba lnga dang bu ram bcas/_/til dang bcas pa'i thug pa blud/_/yang na 'o thug rgyam tshar bcas/_/nya dang khyim
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]bya phag rgod sha_/mar dang rgyam tshar bcas pa'ang phan/_/tshod ma rgya sne'u pa ya si/_/ni shan na ga lud pa 'joms/_/ka N+Da ka ri'i lo 'bras dang /_/la phug gzhon nu skam po'ang phan/_/til mar sogs snum 'o ma dang /_/bu ram bu ram shing khu'i zas/_/zho ga chu zho rang skyur
[\[170b.2\]]chang /_/'bras bu skyur chu blud pa phan/_/mkhris pa'i lud pa bad kan bcas/_/zhun mar gyis ni skyug sman phan/_/de bzhin po son cha tang pal/_/ma du ka ni bskol chus sam/_/shing mngar po son cha'i lde gu/_/bi da bu ram shing khur sbyar/_/mkhris lud bad kan shas chung la/_/
[\[170b.3\]]dur byid mngar ba'i sman sbyar gtang /_/bad kan shas cher kha ba'i sman/_/skyug sman phyir ni gtang bar bya/_/nad sbyangs nas ni thug pa sogs/_/bsil dang mngar dang snum pa spyad/_/bad kan shas cher kha ba dang /_/rtsub pa dang sbyar grang thug blud/_/mkhris gyur kha ra skyu ru ra/_/rgun
[\[170b.4\]]'brum ut+pal tsan+dan dkar/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin/_/bad kan bcas lan le sham/_/gla sgang dang ni bcas pa sbyin/_/rlung can la ni mar bcas phan/_/rgun 'brum lnga bcu pi pi ling /_/sum cu kha ra srang gcig sbyar/_/sbrang rtsi'am ba yi lci ba'am/_/be'u
[\[170b.5\]]gzhon lci khur lde gur sbyar/_/shing tsha sug smel tsha ba gsum/_/rgun 'brum pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/ma nu 'bras yos gla sgang dang /_/zur pa dkar dang ra sna dang /_/skyu ru ra dang ba ru ra/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi zhun mar sbyar/_/lde gus snying nad lud pa sel/_/mngar ba'i sman dang srog chags
[\[170b.6\]]ni/_/skam sa'i sha dang nas dang ni/_/khre dang khre rgod mung+ga sogs/_/yu sha dang ni tshod ma dang /_/kha ba tshad ldan sbyar lde gu/_/kha ba dang ni sbrang rtsir bcas/_/bad kan shas che'i nad la phan/_/bad kan shas chung s+'a lu dang /_/drug cu pa'i chan sha khu phan/_/btung bar
[\[170b.7\]]kha ra'am rgun chu'am/_/bu ram shing khu'am 'o ma blud/_/mkhris pa'i lud par ra mnye ba/_/bri ha ti gnyis med gnyis/_/ba tsa ka dang li dong gra/_/sha khu dang ni 'o ma'am/_/thug pa'am yu shar sbyar te blud/_/rgun 'brum dang ni pi pi ling /_/rtsa yi rtsa ba lngar bshad dang /_/chur
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]bskol ba yi khu ba dang /_/de dang 'o ma bskol te bsgrangs/_/sbrang rtsi khar ra bcas pa blud/_/yang na de yis thug pa bskol/_/legs bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa sbyin/_/zur pa dang ni ba le ka_/kha ra bca' sga bri ha ti/_/btags pa'i khu ba ras kyis btsags/_/
[\[171a.2\]]mar dang bsres te blud par bya/_/kha ra dang ni dzi ba ka_/mung+ga ma sha par+Ni dang /_/byi tsher ba ni lde gur sbyar/_/mar dang 'o ma brgyad 'gyur bskol/_/de btung bza' dang bldag pa dang /_/sbyar bas mkhris pa'i lud pa sel/_/'di dag phye ma'i lde gu 'am/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/_/
[\[171a.3\]]bad kan lud can gyis dang por/_/thang shing bsregs nas gzags pa'i snum/_/ba sha ka dang nas tshig 'khus/_/thal ba'i phye ma btab pa btang /_/snum bcas bkru sman gyis steng dang /_/'og dang spyi bor ci rigs par/_/nyams stobs ldan bkru sman rno gtang /_/thug pa sogs kyang 'di la
[\[171a.4\]]blud/_/nas dang mung+ga rgya sran zas/_/rtsub dron le sham gyis tsha/_/ka sa marda brda ka_/bya kri ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/pi pi ling dang bcas pa sbyin/_/skam sa khung gnas sha khu snum/_/til dang yungs kar bil ba'i snum/_/sbyar ba'i thug pa sbyin par bya/_/skom na rtsa ba bcu bskol chu/_/chu tshan chang
[\[171a.5\]]mang sbrang chu blud/_/dong ga ma nu'i rtsa ba dang /_/pa tol yi rtsa bar bcas/_/nub gcig chur sbangs sbrang rtsi btab/_/zas dus gsum mam nang par blud/_/pi pi ling dang de rtsa ba/_/bca' sga dang ni ba ru ra/_/rma bya khyim bya'i mjug sgro ni/_/snag tshar byas dang nas tshig thal/_/bi sha gla sgang pi
[\[171a.6\]]pi ling /_/dur byid sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ste/_/tshigs bcad phyed kyis rdzogs lde gu/_/gsum po bad kan lud pa sel/_/sbrang rtsi na le sham sbyar bldag_/a ka ru sbrang rtsi nyid kyis/_/kaN+Da ka ri brta ka_/bring ga ra dza'i khu ba dang /_/ka sa marda rta spangs btsir/_/khu ba bye ru gnas po'i khu/_/sbrang
[\[171a.7\]]rtsi so sor sbyar ba ldag_/thang shing zur par sna dang /_/byi tsher kar ka ta sring gi_/gla sgang bca' sga pi pi ling /_/kha ra a ru skyu ru ra/_/'bras yos kha ra dkar po dang /_/skyu ru ra yi pags pa rnams/_/sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar lde gu/_/gsum po rlung 'dres bad kan sel/_/se'u 'bru srang gnyis
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]bu ram ni/_/srang brgyad tsha ba gsum srang res/_/skad snyan drod skyed yi ga 'byed/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde cham sel/_/bu ram ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/na le sham dang pi pi ling /_/se'u 'bru rim gyis srang gnyis dang /_/zho re srang phyed du sbyar/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/
[\[171b.2\]]rims kyi skabs bshad a ru ra/_/sogs dang kar ka ta sring gi_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/_/yang na dur byid la la phud/_/gla sgang ma nu bi shal/_/pi pi ling bcas pa gcin nam/_/chur bskol ba gcin lud pa sel/_/pi pi ling ni til mar brngos/_/lde gu
[\[171b.3\]]zho gnyis kha rar bcas/_/rgya sran bskol ba'i khu bar sbyar/_/blud na bad kan lud pa 'joms/_/rtsa ba bcu khu bre bzhi dang /_/mar bre gang dang ma nu dang /_/zur pa bil ba bye'u rug pa/_/shing kun tsha gsum zho gnyis bskol/_/blud pa'i rjes la thug pa btung /_/de kun
[\[171b.4\]]bad kan rlung nad 'joms/_/nir gun thi lo bskol ba'i khu/_/mar bskol lud pa 'joms byed yin/_/byi dang ga yi khu ba'i nang /_/tsha ba gsum bcug mar bskol phan/_/ba spru ba gnyis byi'u rug pa/_/ka sa mar da sle tres dang /_/pa to la dang bri ha ti/_/pha nid dza
[\[171b.5\]]ga'i khu ba ni/_/'o ma mar dang bcas pa la/_/tsha ba gsum dang legs bskol 'thungs/_/lud pa'i rims drag zad byed dang /_/gzhang 'brum nad kyi 'jigs pa med/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /_/'bras bu lo mar bcas pa yin/_/khu ba bre bzhi'i tshad la ni/_/mar bre gang
[\[171b.6\]]dang ba la dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang byi dang ga_/shu dag dang ni se'u 'bru dang /_/kha ru tsha dang nas tshig thal/_/pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_/skyu ru ra dang ma nu dang /_/bri shi ba dang bri ha ti/_/a ru ra dang yab ti/_/kru trug tres dang rgun 'brum dang /_/dbyi mong byi tsher bar sha bu/_/
[\[171b.7\]]star bu karka ta sring gi/_/ta ma la gi ga bra'i rtsa/_/ra sna gze ma'i lde gu dang /_/bskol ba'i mar des lud kun dang /_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde la'ang phan/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i sman mar 'di/_/bad kan nad ni sel byed yin/_/bya kri srang brgyad brdungs chu srang /_/nyis
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]stong bzhi bcu brgyad nang bskol/_/btsags par tsha ba gsum ra sna/_/sle tres kru trug phye ma dang /_/ka rka ta sring ga bra'i rtsa/_/gla sgang pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/byi tsher ba rnams srang phyed phyed/_/zhun mar srang ni bcu drug dang /_/kar dkar po srang bzhi bcu/_/
[\[172a.2\]]slar yang de ni bskol bya ba/_/gzar bu la chags bsgrangs nas ni/_/pi pi ling dang smig rkang dang /_/sbrang rtsi rnying pa dag las ni/_/srang ni brgyad brgyad gzhug par bya/_/lde gu 'dis ni snying nad skran/_/gzhang 'brum lud dbugs mi bde sel/_/bad kan zhi bdud pa
[\[172a.3\]]brngub/_/shas cher sbyangs pa'i dud pa brngub/_/ldong ros ba bla shing mngar dang /_/spang spos gla sgang i gu da'i/_/shun lpags du ba lud 'joms pa'i/_/chogs dud pa brngubs nas ni/_/mchil mang mthar ni bu ram bcas/_/'o ma 'thungs pa'i dud rngubs des/_/rlung
[\[172a.4\]]dang bad kan shas che ba'i/_/lud pa rnying pa'ang myur sel/_/bad kan lud pa mun zhugs snyam/_/gal te mkhris pa rjes 'brel la/_/der ni gnas skabs ji bzhin du/_/mkhris pa'i lud gso'i sbyor ba bya/_/rlung ni bad kan 'brel pa la/_/bad kan
[\[172a.5\]]bsal ba'i bya ba bya/_/mkhris pa dang 'brel rlung bad kan/_/lud par mkhris pa bsal bar bya/_/rlung dang bad kan bdag nyid skam/_/gsher la snum dang rtsub chos bya/_/lud pa bad kan las gyur ba/_/mkhris par bcas pa kha bas gso/_/glo nad
[\[172a.6\]]'grams la 'phral du ni/_/rgya skyegs sbrang rtsi'i 'o ma blud/_/zhu nas s+'a lu'i 'bras chan ni/_/'o ma kha rar bcas pa bza'/_/rtsib logs chu son bcas te/_/mkhris drod shas chung chang sbyar btung /_/bshang 'khru gla sgang bong nga dkar/_/ba ta dug mo
[\[172a.7\]]nyung bcas btung /_/rgya skyegs zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan ka ra dkar/_/smig rkang kha ra mnyam 'o mar/_/bskol ba me drod che la blud/_/bu ram shing dang pad+ma'i tshigs/_/pad+ma ge sar tsan+dan dmar/_/'o mar bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas/_/
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]glo 'grams 'byor bar bya phyir blud/_/nas rjen phye ni 'o ma ru/_/btsos te mar dang sbyar ba'am/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi 'o ma phye'i/_/skyom rims tshad ldan la blud/_/lud pa can la sman mngar dang /_/bskol ba'i zhun mar blud par bya/_/yang na bu ram chu bskol bsgrangs/_/sbrang rtsi
[\[172b.2\]]na le sham btab blud/_/yang na skyu ru ra'i phye ma/_/'o mar bskol ba mar btab blud/_/yang na bcud kyis len cho gas/_/pi pi ling yang sbyin par bya/_/lud pa rus tshigs gzer ba la/_/rgun 'brum shing mngar ma du ka_/smig rkang ba la pi pi ling /_/zhun mar sbrang rtsir
[\[172b.3\]]bcas pa sbyin/_/dri sna gsum ni zho re dang /_/pi pi ling srang phyed kha ra/_/rgun 'brum 'bra go ma du ka_/srang re zhib tu btags nas ni/_/sbrang rtsis ri lur byas pa yis/_/ro tsa byed cing khrag mkhris dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde slon bro/_/brgyal myos skyigs bu mgo 'khor dang /_/
[\[172b.4\]]glo rdol skad ni 'gags pa dang /_/mchil ma lus skem rlung 'khyil dang /_/mchil mar khrag 'byung rtsib logs na/_/snying nad skom dang rims nad 'joms/_/bar sha bu dang kha ra dkar/_/s+'a lu rtsa snar btags pa'i phye/_/rgun chu 'o ma mar du bskol/_/mchil ma khrag tu 'byung la blud/_/shing
[\[172b.5\]]mngar dang ni ma du ka_/tan du li ya 'or btsos phan/_/khrag ni gang tshe drag tu 'byung /_/de bcos pa yi sman bsten bya/_/rlung 'khyil pa la ra tshil ni/_/chang brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa sbyin/_/skems shing nyam chung glo 'grams dang /_/gnyid chung me drod che ba la/_/'o ma bskol ba'i spris mar
[\[172b.6\]]chags/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi mar bcas sbyin/_/ka ra dkar dang nas dang gro/_/'tsho byed zangs rtsi sbrang rtsir bcas/_/yang na 'o mar bskol te blud/_/glo 'grams nyam chung rid la sbyin/_/sha za'i sha yi khu ba ni/_/mar dang brngos pa'i pi pi ling /_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa de la blud/_/sha dang khrag ni
[\[172b.7\]]'phel byed yin/_/u dum+bA ra n+ya gro d+ha/_/a shwat+tha dang blag sha dang /_/s+'a la'i shing dang pri yang ku/_/ta la'i rtse mo 'dzam bu'i shun/_/pi pi ling dang shug par bcas/_/a shwa ka nar bcas pa ni/_/'o mar bskol ba las byung ba'i/_/mar dang 'bras chan bza' ba ni/_/glo
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]'grams khu ba nyams stobs dang /_/dbang po'i nus pa zad la sbyin/_/rlung mkhris kyis nyon yan lag zhig_/na la mar des bskus pa bsngags/_/rlung nad kyis ni nyen pa la/_/rlung 'joms sman bskol til mar bsku/_/'tsho byed sde tshan zhun mar ni/_/snying dang
[\[173a.2\]]rtsib logs na la blud/_/yang na rlung nad 'joms pa dang /_/khrag mkhris sel ba gang yin bya/_/shing mngar nA ga pa la gnyis/_/'o ma dang mnyam mar bskol bar/_/pa ya s+ye dang pi pi ling /_/smig rkang lde gu bskol bas ni/_/glo 'grams pa yi nad la phan/_/'tsho byed
[\[173a.3\]]sde tshan bca' sga dang /_/nye'u shing ba dang ra mnye ba/_/ba spu ba gnyis pa la dang /_/ga bra'i rtsa ba kha sral phre'u/_/ri di zur pa ka ma la/_/shring ga da ka ka ya s+ya/_/rtsa ba lnga ni chung ngu dang /_/rgun 'brum star ga'i 'bras bu sogs/_/mngar shing snum la stobs skyed pa/_/zho ni
[\[173a.4\]]gnyis gnyis btags lde gu/_/de nang zhun mar bre gang bskol/_/'o ma ra sha skyu ru ra/_/bi da ri dang bu ram shing /_/khu bar sha'i khu bar bcas/_/bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/_/bre phyed khar srang lnga bcu/_/na le sham dang sug smel dang /_/shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_/na
[\[173a.5\]]ga ge sar srang phyed phyed/_/phye mar btags te bcug nas ni/_/'ju stobs rjes mthun tshad du blud/_/'di ni bdud rtsi'i sman mar te/_/mi rnams kyi ni bdud rtsi yin/_/bdud rtsi 'di ni zos nas su/_/'o ma sha khu ldan zos na/_/khu chu nyams dang glo 'grams dang /_/nyams stobs
[\[173a.6\]]zad pa'i gso ba yin/_/bud med la gdu lus skem dang /_/mdog skad nyams la gtang bar bya/_/lud pa dang ni skyigs bu rims/_/dbugs mi bde dang lus cha dang /_/skom dad khrag mkhris sel byed cing /_/bu skyed byed cing slon dang brgyal/_/mngal nad gcin nad 'joms byed
[\[173a.7\]]yin/_/gze ma btsod dang pu shel tse/_/ba la tang pal bu ti ka/_/kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dUr ba'i rtsa/_/thal tres stir pa la sha_/de rnams srang re bskol ba yi/_/'o ma sman khu'i bzhi 'gyur la/_/kha sral phre'u dzi baN+Ti/_/me da gnyis dang zangs rtsi ba/_/dzi ba ka dang nye'u shing dang /_/ri di
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]rgun 'brum sha kha ra/_/sra ba dang ni pad+ma'i rtsa/_/mar ni bre gang bskol ba yis/_/rlung mkhris snying 'dzag gzer nad sel/_/gcin sri ba dang gcin snyi ba/_/gzhang 'brum lud pa lus skem dang /_/zad byed rims ni sel byed cing /_/gzhu 'dren bud med chang dang
[\[173b.2\]]lam/_/khur dub stobs dang sha zad skyed/_/shing mngar srang brgyad rgun 'brum ni/_/bre gang bskol bar mar btsos la/_/pi pi ling srang brgyad lde gu/_/bre gang bskol ba bsgrangs nas ni/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi re re zhing /_/srang brgyad dang ni bsres pa la/_/nas phye
[\[173b.3\]]mnyam sbyor zos pa yis/_/de ni glo 'grams zad byed dang /_/khrag gi skran la phan pa yin/_/skyu ru ra dang bi da ri/_/bu ram shing khu 'tsho byed kyi/_/sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba mar/_/ba dang ra yi 'o ma las/_/bre ni re re btso bar bya/_/bskol btsags khar sbrang rtsi ni/_/
[\[173b.4\]]bre re der ni gzhug par bya/_/de ni zad byed brjed byed dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pa lud pa dang /_/lus skem pa ni sel byed cing /_/rgas sra tshe ni ring ba dang /_/sha dang khu chu stobs skyed byed/_/mkhris pa shas ches mar bldag bya/_/rlung shas che bas btung bar bya/_/
[\[173b.5\]]bldags pas mkhris pa zhi byed kyis/_/nyung bas rlung ni 'joms mi nus/_/'thungs na rlung ni gnon byed cing /_/me drod nang du sdud par byed/_/skems shing lus kyi sha zad pas/_/sman mar bshad pa 'di dag nyid/_/smig rkang 'bras yos pi pi ling /_/phye ma lde
[\[173b.6\]]gur byas la sbyin/_/zhun mar bu ram sbrang rtsi'i cha/_/bcug ste byin la 'o ma blud/_/ro tsa brtson dang lus rgyas stobs/_/'di yis myur du skyed par 'gyur/_/bum sha shun lpags sa bon bsal/_/srang brgyad rlangs par btsos nas ni/_/zhun mar bre gang nang gzhug dkrugs/_/
[\[173b.7\]]sbrang rtsi'i mdog 'drar gyur pa dang /_/hwags ni srang brgyad pi pi ling /_/bca' sga zir srang gnyis dang /_/dri sna gsum dang 'u su dang /_/na le sham ni re re zhing /_/srang ni phyed phyed tshad bcug la/_/phab ste bsgrangs par gyur pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi mar gyi phyed bcug la/_/
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]gzar bus dkrugs te bzhag gyur pa/_/lud pa skyigs bu yi ga 'chus/_/dbugs mi bde dang khrag mkhris dang /_/glo 'grams zad byed 'joms par byed/_/glo 'grams pa ni 'byor byed cing /_/blo dang dran pa stobs rab skyed/_/ku sman da yi bcud
[\[174a.2\]]kyis len/_/yid du 'ong ba dam pa 'di/_/tha skar bu gnyis kyis bshad yin/_/nA ga pa la'i rtsa ba ni/_/zho gcig sogs kyis bskyed srang gcig_/'o mar bcas pa zla gcig btung /_/'o ma spyad cing zas mi bza'/_/sbyor 'dis tshe ni 'phel byed cing /_/stobs
[\[174a.3\]]skyed kha dog bzang byed mchog_/man du ka par+Ni shing mngar/_/bca' sga'i sbyor ba'ang 'di yin no/_/nA ga pa la srang brgya ni/_/chu srang lnga brgya rtsa bcu gnyis/_/nang du bskol te bzhi cha lus/_/sman khu de dang cha mnyam pa'i/_/'o ma mar dang bskol bar bya/_/ba la a ti
[\[174a.4\]]ba la dang /_/shing mngar pur+Na rna ba dang /_/stag tsher ba dang tang pal dang /_/pi la ya dang kha sral phre'u/_/a shwa gan+d+ha kha ra dkar/_/nye shing med rnam gnyis dang /_/gze ma ram nye ba gnyis dang /_/pa ya s+ya dang zi ra gnyis/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba sdong bu dang /_/'bra go sring ga ta ka dang /_/ke she ru ka
[\[174a.5\]]srang phyed phyed/_/nA ga pa la'i sman mar 'dis/_/khrag mkhris glo rdol zad byed dang /_/skom dad mgo 'khor sel byed cing /_/stobs ni skyed par byed pa'i mchog_/mdog sdug mdangs bzang tshe 'phel zhing /_/skra dkar gnyer ma 'jig par byed/_/zla ba drug gi bar bsten
[\[174a.6\]]na/_/rgan po'ang gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur/_/cho ga 'dis ni drod skyed cing /_/me drod bri ba skyed 'ju byed/_/gcong chen bshad pa'ang glo rdol bsngags/_/'khru na gcod par byed par phan/_/rtsa ba bcu pa kha sral phre'u/_/shang ka put+pa zur pa dang /_/pa la ha sti pi pi ling /_/a pa
[\[174a.7\]]marga kru trug tres/_/ga bra pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/ma nu srang ni gnyis gnyis dang /_/nas srang drug cu rtsa bzhi dag_/a ru ra ni srang brgya dag_/chu srang drug brgya bzhi bcus bskol/_/nas chos pa dang sman khu de/_/btsags la a ru ra brgya der/_/bu ram srang brgya bcug la bskol/_/mar dang til
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]mar pi pi ling /_/phye ma srang ni brgyad po dag/_/bskol te bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsir gzhug_/rtag tu a ru ra gnyis bcas/_/lde gu bcud len 'di zos na/_/'dis ni skra dkar gnyer ma med/_/tshe ring mdog stobs 'phel bar byed/_/lud lnga zad byed dbugs mi bde/_/
[\[174b.2\]]skyigs bur bcas pa'i mi bzad rims/_/gcin snyi ba yi nad dang ni/_/gzhang 'brum skran dang snying nad dang /_/cham pa yi ga 'chus pa sel/_/bcud kyis len mchog dpal yon can/_/'di ni drang srong r-i Shis bshad/_/rtsa ba bcu pa ba la dang /_/mur ba ser po rnam
[\[174b.3\]]gnyis dang /_/pi pi ling ni rnam gnyis dang /_/pa tha a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/a pa marga kha sral phre'u/_/sle tres dan ti bong nga dkar/_/bil ba gzhon nu dur byid dang /_/tsi tra ka rtsa lo mar bcas/_/pa ya s+ya dang dug mo nyung /_/spang spos bi za ka'i snying po/_/me tog bcas
[\[174b.4\]]dang rkang mar dang /_/go bye byi dang ga ta dang /_/nye'u shing bu ti ka rany+dza/_/dong ga so ma ra dza dang /_/sa ha ra dza shi kru dang /_/nim pa'i shun lpags bu ram shing /_/phra mo'i khu ba srang re dang /_/a ru ra stong chig brgya dang /_/nas srang nyis brgya lnga bcu drug/_/chu ni brgyad 'gyur nang du
[\[174b.5\]]bskol/_/nas tshos pa dang phog nas ni/_/btsags nas a ru ra bcas der/_/bu ram rnying pa srang brgyad gzhug_/til mar zhun mar skyu ru'i khu/_/bre re bcug nas de rjes yang /_/me chung la ni btsos nas su/_/gzar bur chags nas thab las dbab/_/bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi bre do
[\[174b.6\]]dang /_/pi pi ling ni phul gang gzhug_/dri sna gsum ni phyer btags pa/_/srang gsum bcug nas de 'og tu/_/rdza snod rnying bcug 'bru nang du/_/bcug ste zla ba gcig gzhag bya/_/de nas snga ma bzhin du bza'/_/gnas 'jog gis bshad bcud len 'di/_/sngon las yon tan lhag par che/_/
[\[174b.7\]]nad med kyis bza' dgag pa med/_/dus kun du yang bsngags pa yin/_/rgyam tsha bca' sga srang re dang /_/kha ru tsha ni srang gnyis dang /_/da trig se'u 'bru ardza ka_/de dag srang ni bzhi bzhi dang /_/na le sham gcig go snyod gnyis/_/'u su'i 'bras bu srang bzhi dang /_/tshad 'di las ni
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]phye mar byas/_/zas dang skom la btab ste sbyin/_/des ni yi ga 'byed pa dang /_/me drod skyed cing nyams stobs skyed/_/rtsib logs na dang dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa lu ba'i nad sel byed/_/'u su zho gnyis go snyod dang /_/la la phud la zho bzhi
[\[175a.2\]]bzhi/_/se 'bru dang ni da trig dag/_/de yi nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur bya/_/kha ru tsha ni srang gcig dang /_/bca' sga zho gnyis bil ba'i rkang /_/srang lnga dang ni sbyar ba la/_/kha ra srang ni bcu drug gzhug_/ro drug pa 'di bza' ba dang /_/btung ba snga ma bzhin du sbyin/_/
[\[175a.3\]]gcong chen las bshad cho ga gang /_/gnas skabs ji bzhin glo rdol phan/_/glo rdol nad ni byang gyur nas/_/bad kan skyes nas mgo bo brang /_/na ba'i lud pa can gang yin/_/de la dud pa 'di brngub bya/_/me da gnyis dang ba la gnyis/_/shing mngar gso ma'i shun
[\[175a.4\]]lpags ni/_/lde gur byas la reng bur ni/_/byas te dud pa brngub par bya/_/de rjes 'tsho byed sman mar btung /_/ldong ros dang ni ba la sha_/a za gan+d+ha cu gang dang /_/dong gra las kyang de bzhin bya/_/de rjes kha ra bu ram dang /_/bu ram shang khu btung bar blud/_/ldong ros dang
[\[175a.5\]]ni n+ya gro d+ha'i/_/myu gu rlon pa cha snyoms btags/_/zhun mar dang sbyar dud pa brngub/_/de 'og sreg pa'i sha khu btung /_/glo rdol las byung blud pa la/_/thog mar stobs dang me drod skyed/_/nad gzhi mngal snum bcas pa'i/_/bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/_/dong ga dang ni dur
[\[175a.6\]]byid gnyis/_/rgun 'bru'i chu dang sbyar ba dang /_/seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_/bi da ri yi khu bar sbyar/_/zhun mar la btsos ci rigs sbyin/_/lus zad pa la sbyar bar bya/_/mkhris pa bad kan lus zungs rnams/_/zad pa'i zad byad lung pa can/_/mar dang karka ta sring gi/_/
[\[175a.7\]]'o ma ba la gnyis bskol blud/_/bi da ri 'am ka tam pa/_/ta la'i 'bras bu bskol ba yi/_/mar dang 'o ma gcin nad ni/_/mdog 'gyur bre bar byed la blud/_/pho mtshan rkub dang chu so dang /_/brla dbrag mjug to skrang zhing na/_/mar gyi nying khu yang ba 'am/_/
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]til mar bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang /_/skam sa'i srog chags sha dang ni/_/byi'u sogs dang ni khung na gnas/_/de bzhin mthu rtsal gyis zas tshol/_/sha za'i sha yang rim bzhin sbyin/_/dro bas bad kan 'jig byed la/_/rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag byed cing /_/dngas ma
[\[175b.2\]]legs par rgyu byed bas/_/lus ni rgyas par byed par 'gyur/_/dbyi mo bar gyi 'bras bu gsum/_/rtsa ba bcu dang tsi tra ka_/rgya sran pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/pa ta rgya shug nas chur bskol/_/li dong gra dang byi tsher ba/_/zur pa ma nu pi pi ling /_/karka ta yi sring gi
[\[175b.3\]]btags/_/mnyam pa'i zhun mar dag dang bskol/_/bskol ba'i mar 'di k+Shar gnyis/_/lan tshwa lnga ni btags te gzhug_/de las ran par 'thungs na ni/_/zad byed lud pas nyen pa sel/_/ka sa mar da a ru ra/_/gla sgang pa ta kad pa la/_/
[\[175b.4\]]dong gra pi pi ling tang pal/_/pu tse shel tshad zho gnyis gnyis/_/mar ni bre gang 'o ma dang /_/rgun chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol/_/zad byed rims dang mchin pa'i nad/_/lud pa kun sel dge ba yin/_/kaN+Da ka ri ba sha ka_/sle tres rtsa ba 'bras bu
[\[175b.5\]]dang /_/myu gu lo mar bcas pa rnams/_/bskol ba'i khu ba mar du btsos/_/lud pa'i rims kyis btab pa dang /_/yi ga 'chus pa'i nad rnams sel/_/se 'bru'i khu ba nyis 'gyur ram/_/tsha gsum ldan par bskol ba'ang phan/_/ya
[\[175b.6\]]bak+Sha ra mar dang sbyar/_/zas zos pa yi 'og tu blud/_/pi pi ling dang bu ram bskol/_/ra yi 'o ma mar bcas phan/_/'di ni me drod sbyar phyir te/_/zad byed lus can gyis mar btung /_/nad kyis 'gags pa'i mid pa brang /_/rtsa sbubs rnams ni dag par byed/_/nas ni bre
[\[175b.7\]]gang btsos pa ru/_/rnam par rgyal ba nyi shu btso/_/tshos nas de phyung mnyes nas der/_/bu ram rnying pa srang drug dang /_/pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang /_/ldong ros zho gnyis skyer khaN+Da/_/zho gcig tshad ni bcug nas ni/_/slar yang bskol ba'i lde gu des/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde sel byed/_/
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]reg 'jam sgro rtsa bsregs nas ni/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar/_/yang na rma bya'i rkang pa bsregs/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/_/lde gu zos na lud pa dang /_/dbugs mi bde ba sel bar byed/_/e raN+Da yi thal ba ni/_/til mar tsha gsum
[\[176a.2\]]bu ram bcas/_/lde gu'am bye'u rug e raN+Da'i/_/lo ma'i thal ba de bzhin bya/_/tsha ba gsum gyi phye ma ni/_/bu ram rnying pa mar sbyar phan/_/shug pa tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum/_/byi dang ga dang thang shing dang /_/ba la ra sna'i phye ma kun/_/de dang mnyam pa'i kha rar sbyar/_/
[\[176a.3\]]yang na sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar/_/lde gu lud pa sel byed mchog_/de bzhin na le sham gyi phye/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas/_/a ru ra dang bca' sga ni/_/bu ram dang ni bcas pa yi/_/ri lu khar ni bzhag gyur na/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde kun sel/_/yang na ba
[\[176a.4\]]ru ra 'ba' zhig_/lud pa sel bar byed pa yin/_/seng phrom a mra kha ra dang /_/bcas pa'i lde gu mar dang brngos/_/thug pa zan dron nang du btab/_/slon bro skom dang lud pa dang /_/ma zhu tshad 'khru sel bar byed/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i khu bar bskol/_/mung+ga'i khu bar
[\[176a.5\]]legs g.yos pa/_/skyu ru ra ser se'u 'brur bcas/_/lud pa kun gyi sman gyur yin/_/rlung 'joms sman bskol 'o ma'am/_/mchu yis zas tshol khron rko dang /_/khung na gnas pa'i sha khu ni/_/zad byed lud pa can la sbyin/_/glo rdol gyis dud brngubs la gang /_/btung bar bcas pa
[\[176a.6\]]bsten pa yang /_/zad byed lud par de gtang bya/_/gang yang gcong chen skabs su bshad/_/stobs skyed me drod skyed pa dang /_/rtsa rgyun sbyong bar byed pa'i sman/_/rnam grangs zad byed lud can la/_/stobs skyed thams cad
[\[176a.7\]]bsngags pa yin/_/gang phyir 'dus pa las byung ba'i/_/zad byed lud pa mi bzad pas/_/de phyir nad stobs ji bzhin du/_/'dus pa'i nad la phan pas gso/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o//_//
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]de nas skyigs bu dang dbugs mi bde ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/gang phyir skyigs bu dbugs mi bde/_/rgyu sogs mtshungs pas de yi phyir/_/gso ba'ang gcig ste des nyen la/_/thog mar dugs kyi nyer dpyad bya/_/snum dang lan tshwa til mar byug_/
[\[176b.2\]]de yis bad kan bu gar 'gags/_/shin tu zhen pa zhu nas ni/_/khong par gnas pa legs par 'byin/_/bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen gyur cing /_/rlung ni lugs dang mthun par rgyu/_/'jam zhing rlan gyur zas snum dang /_/rlan can shar bcas sbyin pa 'am/_/yang na zho yi
[\[176b.3\]]spris ma sbyin/_/de nas de la rlon 'jam btang /_/mchog tu lud pa rnying nad dang /_/skad 'gags pa la skyug sman sbyin/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi pi pi ling /_/sbyar ba'am rlung la phan pa gtang /_/bad kan gyis ni gnod byas pa/_/gsal na bde ba thob 'gyur la/_/bu ga
[\[176b.4\]]rnam par dag gyur nas/_/rlung ni gnod pa med par rgyu/_/lto sbos rtug 'gags mun 'thibs byed/_/ma du lung ga star bu dang /_/shid+kun pi lu kha ru tsha/_/ldan zas byin na bde bar 'byung /_/rgyam tshar bcas pa'i 'bras bu skyur/_/cung zad dro ba'i bkru sman gtang /_/'di
[\[176b.5\]]dag bad kan gyis lam bkag_/srog gi rlung ni 'khrugs las byung /_/de bas de lam bsal bya'i phyir/_/steng dang 'og tu sbyang byas phan/_/ji ltar 'bag par gyur pa'i chu/_/shin tu 'khyil zhing 'phel ba ltar/_/de bzhin rlung ni 'khyil gyur pa'i/_/de lam legs par
[\[176b.6\]]sbyang bar bya/_/sbyang ba byas kyang ma dag pa'i/_/zhen pa'i dri ma du bas bsal/_/yung ba'i lo ma e raN+Da'i/_/rtsa ba rgya skyegs ldong ros dang /_/thang shing ba la spang spos bcas/_/btags te reng bu nyid du bya/_/de ni mar bskus dud pa rngub/_/yang na mar sbrus nas
[\[176b.7\]]bsregs rngub/_/spra tshil sra rtsi pog dag gam/_/a ka ru bzang mar sbyar rngub/_/de bzhin tsan+dan glang rwa 'am/_/spu 'am rgyus pa'i dud pa rngub/_/btsod dang go dku rang ga_/dge ba lpags mgar yi'am/_/yang na gu gul ldong ros sam/_/yang na sA la'i thang
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]chu nyid/_/mo rtsa gu gul a ga ru/_/shug pa mar dang bcas dud rngub/_/dugs byar mi rung btang snyoms gzhag_/brang dang mid pa zhom pa la/_/bshol du med na 'jam dugs bya/_/kha ra dkar po'i 'o mas sam/_/dro 'jam tsam kyis dugs
[\[177a.2\]]bya zhing /_/dkri dang ldan par bya ba'i dugs/_/dugs kyi le'ur bshad dugs bya/_/ma zhur de gso'i cho ga spyad/_/sbyor drags rlung shas cher gyur na/_/rlung nad bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya/_/sha khu snum sogs rab tsha sbyin/_/bsku ba dag gis zhi bar bya/_/bad kan ma slong
[\[177a.3\]]dugs mi bya/_/nyam chung ba la sbyang byas pas/_/rlung gi gnas rnyed gnas rnams ni/_/skam par byas nas srog 'phrog byed/_/de bas sman khu snum dang ni/_/lde gu stsogs kyis de zhir bya/_/skem zhing glo rdol tshad 'khru dang /_/khrag mkhris tsha ba las byung ba'i/_/
[\[177a.4\]]skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba la/_/mngar snum bsil stsogs dag gis gso/_/ku lang+tha dang rtsa ba bcu/_/bskol ba'i skam sa'i sha khu phan/_/shi kru par ta ka dang ni/_/ka sa mar da ba sha ka_/la phug lo ma'i khu ba dang /_/nim pa'i myu gu las byung dang /_/kha lung
[\[177a.5\]]bri ha ti khu phan/_/kaN+Da ka ri byi tsher ba/_/bil ba'i rkang dang gze ma dang /_/sle tres kar ka ta sring gi_/tsi tra ka dang ku lang+tha/_/chur bskol ba yi yu sha bya/_/yang na ra sna rtsa chung lnga/_/mung+ga tsi tra kar bcas blud/_/tsi tra go snyod kha ru tsha/_/kar kata sring thug pa phan/_/
[\[177a.6\]]yang na rtsa ba bcu sbyar ba'i/_/thug pa blud na lud pa dang /_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde nad sel/_/rtsa ba bcu par sna dang /_/zur pa ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_/bil ba gnyis dang ma nu dang /_/kar ka ta sring pi pi ling /_/lca ba sle tres bca' sga ni/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud zhu
[\[177a.7\]]nas/_/de nyid dang btsos thug pa blud/_/sA lu drug cu pa dang gro/_/nas dang mung+ga rgya sran zos/_/lud pa snying nad rtsib logs zug_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/yang na arga'i myu gu yi/_/'o ma dang sbrus nas kyi zan/_/sbrang rtsi dang bcas rtsa bcu sogs/_/
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]bskol ba'i khu bar sbyar ba blud/_/zas ni k+Sha ra shing kun mar/_/kha ru tsha dang se'u sbyar za/_/ma nu zur pa tsha ba gsum/_/star bu ba lung sbyar ba sbyin/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde skom dang /_/rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba'am/_/yang na thang shing bskol khu'am/_/chang gi
[\[177b.2\]]dngas ma blud par bya/_/pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba/_/ma ru ra dang byi dang ga/tsi tra ka rnams lde gur sbyar/_/mar snod bskus te bskams pa ru/_/snod du dar ba zla gcig gzhag_/de 'bungs me yi drod skyed cing /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/ba ta mur pa thang
[\[177b.3\]]shing dang /_/sa ra la dang chang dngas ma/_/nub gcig bzhag ste lan tshwa btab/_/de las khyer gang blud par bya/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba bca' sga'i phye'am/_/ya bak+Sha ra na le sham/_/bcas phye chu tshan blugs pa ban/_/ba spri ka ni bskol ba'i chu/_/btags pa lde gur byas bsres
[\[177b.4\]]blud/_/sab ta par+Ni'i khu ba'am/_/shri sha yi ni me tog ni/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/bad kan mkhris pa 'dres gyur pa'i/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/cu gang pi pi ling dang ni/_/'bras dang bca' sga mar dag las/_/khu ba mkhris pa las gyur
[\[177b.5\]]sal/_/rlung dang ldan la reg 'jam sha_/ri bong sha dang pi pi ling /_/mar dang sha spya ka yi khrag_/lcam pa'i khu ba tsha ba gsum/_/mar dang 'o mar sbyar ba dang /_/'bras chan zos la 'o ma blud/_/rlung mkhris 'dres pa las gyur sel/_/ra yi 'o ma bzhi 'gyur
[\[177b.6\]]gyis/_/chu bskol bu ram dong gra btab/_/pi pi ling rtsa shing mngar dang /_/bu ram lca brta sbangs khu/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar zos gyur na/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/rta dang glang po ba lang phag_/rnga mong bong bu lug dang ra/_/gang yang rung ba'i rtug btsir
[\[177b.7\]]khu/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bldags na phan/_/bad kan shas cher btung ba blud/_/rkang bzhi pa yi lpags rus spu/_/rmig pa bsregs la snag tshar byas/_/ya shwa gan+d+ha'i lde gu ni/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bad kan shas/_/che ba'i dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/zur pa ma
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]nu skyu ru ra'am/_/ma nu pi pi ling bcas phan/_/yug snam pi pi ling bcas pa'am/_/ka pid ta yi khu ba'am/_/bil ba'i rkang khu skyu ru ra/_/pi pi ling dang rgyam tshar bcas/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi a ru ra'am/_/tsha ba gnyis dang kha ru tsha/_/rgya shug
[\[178a.2\]]'bras yos sbrang rtsi dang /_/rgun 'bru pi pi ling dong gra/_/bu ram rgun 'bru yung ra sna/_/pi pi ling dang na le sham/_/til mar dang ni sbyar ba phan/_/lde gu sman gyi phye ma yang /_/sha khu chu dron tsha stsogs btung /_/dzi ban ti dang gla sgang dang /_/bye'u rug pa dang shing tsha dang /_/
[\[178a.3\]]sug smel gnyis dang ma nu dang /_/lca ba ta ma ma li ka_/a ru ra dang ga bra'i rtsa/_/dong ga dang ni ba la ka_/zur pa kar ka ta sring gi_/nA ga ge sar pi pi ling /_/tsa rong ci rigs sbyar nas ni/_/phye ma nyis 'gyur kha rar bcas/_/rtsib logs nad rims lud pa sel/_/
[\[178a.4\]]skyigs bu dbugs mi bde 'joms mchog_/dong ga bu ram cha mnyam pa/_/bza' ba'am sna nas btang sman bya/_/yang na sgag skya'am kun dong ngam/_/gri dza na yi rtsa bas bya/_/tsan+dan gyi ni khu ba dang /_/bud med nu zho snar blugs bya/_/sbrang ma'i rtug pa nu zhor sbyar/_/rgya skyegs khu ba
[\[178a.5\]]dang sbyar blugs/_/rgyam tsha zhun mar dang bcas pa/_/nu zho mar dang bskol ba'am/_/mngar ba'i sman dang lde gur byas/_/de btung ba'am sna nas gtad/_/kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas pa ni/_/grang dro res kyis blugs pa'am/_/de bzhin 'o ma bskol ba ni/_/sman gyi phye ma mar sbyar
[\[178a.6\]]blugs/_/pi pi ling dang kha ru tsha/_/ya bak+Sha ra sle tres dang /_/shing kun tso ra bye'u rug pa/_/mar dang zhog chur sbyar zhing /_/rtsa bcu'i khu bar bskol ba blud/_/yang na 'tsho byed bskol ba'i khu/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud par bya/_/te dzo ba ti a ru ra/_/pi pi ling
[\[178a.7\]]dang pu tse shel/_/ru rta ma nu bu ti ka_/tsitra ka dang pa la sha//zur pa lan tshwa rnam gnyis dang /_/dzi ban ti dang bil ba'i rkang /_/shu dag bal bu'i lo ma rnams/_/de dag zho ni gnyis gnyis bskol/_/shing kun zho phyed mar bre gang /_/bskol ba de ni 'thungs gyur na/_/
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]rkang lag la ni zhen pa'i rlung /_/gzhang 'brum dang ni pho ba'i nad/_/skyigs bu snying nad rtsib logs zug_/myur du sel bar byed pa yin/_/zhun mar cha phyed bcas pa yi/_/ya bak+Sha rgyam tsha sbyin/_/thang la 'bar gyi'am dug gi mar/_/zho can ha pu sha'i mar blud/_/chu
[\[178b.2\]]grang glo bur blugs pa dang /_/sngangs dang sprugs dang 'jigs pa dang /_/dga' dang phrag dog dbugs bsdams dang /_/gnod pa'i 'bu yi sos btab dang /_/gang yang bad kan rlung 'joms sman/_/dro zhing rlung ni bde rgyu bsten/_/gang yang phal cher rlung gi nad/_/
[\[178b.3\]]lhag par 'joms par byed pas spyad/_/thams cad la ni brta byas pas/_/tshabs chung gso bar sla ba yin/_/lhag par nyams smad pa yis ni/_/zhi ba'i thabs su 'gyur ma yin/_/de bas zhi ba brta ba'i thabs/_/mang po de la spyad par bya/_/lud pa dbugs
[\[178b.4\]]mi bde gcong slon/_/skyigs bu'i sman ni phan tshun 'dre/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gcong chen po gso ba'i thabs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/stobs ldan nad ni mang gyur la/_/
[\[178b.5\]]snum chos dugs byas sbyang ba ni/_/snum med ma yin nyam smod min/_/steng 'og gi ni sbyang bar bya/_/'o ma po son chang bcas pa'am/_/sha khu mngar dang ldan pa'am/_/zhun mar btab pa'i nas thug ni/_/skyug sman bskol bas slon du gzhug_/sham dur byid dong
[\[178b.6\]]grar bcas/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/bcas pa'i 'o ma 'am skyo ma'am/_/rgun 'bru tang pa la bi da ri/_/yang na sha khur ldan pa yi/_/bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/_/lto sbyang pa la brta ba dang /_/drod skyed cho ga spyad par bya/_/zas skom yi gar 'ong ba dang /_/
[\[178b.7\]]rlung 'joms byed cing yang ba sbyin/_/s+'a lu drug cu pa dang gro/_/nas dang mung+ga lo gcig lon/_/ra yi 'o ma mar dang sha/_/sha za'i sha ni zad byed 'joms/_/bya rog 'ug pa spyang ki gzig_/ba lang rta dang ne le sbrul/_/bya rgod rnga mo bong bu khra'i/_/sha ni sgyu yis byin na phan/_/
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]shes na de las smod pas na/_/slon zhing mdangs dang stobs mi 'gyur/_/bad mkhris ri dwags la sogs sha_/rlung la mthu rtsal gzan tshol sha_/tsho khur sbyar zhing phan pa dang /_/sha khu sogs la'ang sbyar bar bya/_/yungs mar dag dang brngos pa'am/_/
[\[179a.2\]]yang na ci rigs mar dang brngos/_/khu bar ldan zhing mnyen la snum/_/spod la sogs dang legs g.yos sbyin/_/de bzhin la phug rgya sran las/_/g.yos pa'i yu shar sbyar bar bya/_/pi pi ling bcas nas dang bcas/_/rgya sran bcas shing dong grar bcas/_/se'u 'bru skyu
[\[179a.3\]]ru ra dang bcas/_/ra sha'i khu ba snum bcas blud/_/des ni cham pa la sogs pa/_/gnod pa drug ni sel bar 'gyur/_/mkhris pa sogs las khyad par du/_/chang rnying rtsa sbubs sbyong byed pa/_/ngoms pa nyid du blud par bya/_/rgun chang chang rnying chang dngas blud/_/rtsa ba chung ngu
[\[179a.4\]]lngar bskol ba'am/_/tam la ka chur bskol ba'am/_/par+Ni bzhi dang bskol ba'am/_/'u su bca' sga bskol ba blud/_/de dang kha zas gtsang ba dag_/'bad pas btsos pa rjes mthun yin/_/rtsa ba bcu dang 'o ma 'am/_/sha khu'i nang du btso bar bya/_/ba la btab pa'i
[\[179a.5\]]mar sbyar ba'am/_/sha za'i sha khur btsos pa sbyin/_/'o ma bcu 'gyur dag dang ni/_/mar bskol sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan/_/dzi ban ti dang shing mngar dang /_/rgun 'bru dug mo nyung 'bras bu/_/ma nu zur pa pi pi ling /_/bya kri gze ma ba la dang /_/ta ma la ki ut+pal
[\[179a.6\]]sngo/_/kyi lce ba dang byi tsher ba/_/lde gur byas dang mar bskol ba/_/gcong chen sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/'bra go rgun 'brum ma du ka_/pa ru sha dang pi pi ling /_/mar dang bskol bas skad 'gags dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rims 'joms/_/rtsa bcu 'o mar
[\[179a.7\]]bskol ba las/_/byung ba'i mar gsar gang yin de/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/skad 'gags sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/mgo brang rtsib logs gzer 'joms shing /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rims sel/_/rtsa ba lnga ba lngar bskol ba'i/_/'o ma las
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]byung mar gang yin/_/rtsa ba lnga pa lnga yi ni/_/khu ba 'o ma'i bzhi 'gyur la/_/bskol ba yi ni mar 'di yis/_/zang byed kyi ni stobs bdun 'joms/_/ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba lnga/_/srang drug dang ni btsos pa'i mar/_/bre gang 'o ma cha mnyam byas/_/de yis bu ga dag
[\[179b.2\]]byed cing /_/skran dang dmu rdzing mcher pa dang /_/pho nad skya rbab cham pa dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams/_/skrang dang stod kyi rlung nad 'joms/_/ra sna ba la gze ma dang /_/ti ra ba ra sha khu'i chur/_/dzi ban ti dang pi pi ling /_/'o bcas gcong chen
[\[179b.3\]]'joms pa'i mchog_/a shwa gan+d+ha 'o mar bskol/_/las byung mar 'o kha rar bcas/_/spyi yi sha ni srang brgya dag_/chu bre sum cu gnyis na bskol/_/de yi brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/'tsho byed bcu ni srang re gzhug_/zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/_/sha yi sman mar 'di
[\[179b.4\]]blud pa'am/_/sha khu dang sbyar ci rigs sbyin/_/rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde skad 'gags/_/skem zhing rtsib logs zug pa 'joms/_/sug smel ti mus 'bras gsum/_/sa nag tsha ba gsum tsi tra/_/sa ra nim pa seng ldeng dang /_/
[\[179b.5\]]sA la'i 'bras bu las byung dang /_/go bye dang ni byi dang ga_/srang ni brgyad brgyad tshad du byas/_/chu ni bcu drug 'gyur byas par/_/bcu drug char gnas bar du bskol/_/slar yang de dang mar bre gang /_/bskol ba 'dir ni cu gang ni/_/srang drug khar srang sum cu bcug_/
[\[179b.6\]]sbrang rtsi srang ni drug cu gzhug_/dri sna gsum ni srang re gzhug_/gzar bus dkrugs te lde gur byas/_/snga dro zos la 'o ma btung /_/bcud len bsdams pa med pa yin/_/yid gzhungs mig rno tshe ring la/_/drod skyed skran dang gcong chen nad/_/skya rbab dang ni mtshan bar rdol/_/
[\[179b.7\]]myur du 'joms par byed pa yin/_/gang yang zhun mar bu ram bcas/_/glo rdol la bshad zang byed sbyar/_/shing tsha sug smel pi pi ling /_/cu gang kha ra rim nyis 'gyur/_/phye mar byas bza' 'am sbrang rtsi dang /_/mar dang sbyar te lde gur zos/_/skad 'gags lud pa
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]dbugs mi bde/_/zad byed rtsib logs bad kan 'joms/_/'di yi skad 'gags la khyad par/_/sna sman dud pa rngub stsogs bya/_/de la'ang rlung las gyur pa la/_/kas mar da brda ka_/bring+ga ra dza'i khu ba mar/_/bskol ba'am arda ga la bskol/_/dro 'jam zos rjes la blud na/_/
[\[180a.2\]]yud pa lu dang skad 'gags sel/_/rgya shug lo ma'i lde gu ni/_/mar brngos rgyam tshar bcas pa'am/_/shing mngar dang ni pi pi ling /_/byi dang ga dang rgun 'brum dang /_/ha nas par+Ni'i rtsa ba rnams/_/til mar bskol ba snar blugs bya/_/'bras chan mar dang bu ram bcas/_/
[\[180a.3\]]zos na de rjes chu tshan btung /_/'o thug snum can blud pa dang /_/snum gyi dugs kyi cho ga bya/_/mkhris pa las gyur 'o ma'i shing /_/lde gu bskol ba'i zhun mar ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas te de rjes ni/_/'o ma bskol te bsgrangs pa blud/_/shing mngar ma du ka 'o thug_/zhun
[\[180a.4\]]mar bcas pa blud pa'am/_/ba la dri bzang bi da ri/_/shing mngar k+Shi ta bi da ri/_/rgyam tshar bcas pa bskol ba'i mar/_/skad 'gags sna sman bla med yin/_/pra puN+Da rI ka shing mngar/_/pi pi ling dang bri ha ti/_/ba la 'o ma mar bskol te/_/skad 'gags pa yi sna sman
[\[180a.5\]]mchog_/mngar ba'i sde tshan phye ma ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu sbyin/_/bad kan las gyur tsha ba dang /_/zas rtsub ba gcin blud par bya/_/kad pha la dang skyu ru ra/_/tsha gsum til mar sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/ya bak+Sha ra tsha ba gsum/_/kru trug tres dang dbyi mong dang /_/a ru ra dang
[\[180a.6\]]sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/nas thug til mar zhun mar dang /_/pi pi ling dang skyu rur sbyar/_/bca' sga dang ni pi pi ling /_/bza' ba'am skyug sman rnon po bsten/_/sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsir bsres/_/mngar ba'i sman dang lhan cig bskol/_/'o ma 'thung bas skang gsang ni/_/chen
