[\[180a.7\]]por smras pa'i 'gags nad sel/_/yi ga 'chus la sna tshogs zas/_/phan pa'i sman dang sbyar ba sbyin/_/phyi dang nang ni sbyang ba dang /_/sems dga' yid dang mthun sman sbyin/_/dus gnyis su ni so shing dag_/bca' zhing kha ni sbyang bya zhing /_/bska bas kha ni bkru ba dang /_/
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]rjes su mthun pa'i dud pa rngub/_/da lis kyi ni ri lu dang /_/kha ra ga bur bcas pa sbyin/_/'bras khu zla ba'i zer ltar dkar/_/bza' ba yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog_/de las rlung 'gyur yi ga 'chus/_/ha re Nu dang pi pi ling /_/byi dang ga dang ra sna dang /_/rgyam tsha dang ni dong
[\[180b.2\]]gra dang /_/sug smel ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_/nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_/shing kun bcas pa mar ram ni/_/chang gi dngas mar sbyar te btung /_/shu ngag chus ni slon du gzhug_/mkhris gyur bu ram chus slon gzhug_/kha ra dang ni zhun mar ram/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir
[\[180b.3\]]bcas pa sbyin/_/bad kan nim pa'i chus slon gzhug_/la la phud dang dong gra'i chu/_/sbrang rtsi'am chang rnying rno sbyar ba/_/bu ram sbrang rtsi chang bcas blud/_/ha re Nu sogs phye ma ni/_/sngar bshad chu tshan sbyar ba blud/_/sug smel dang ni shing tsha dang /_/nA ga pus pa na le sham/_/
[\[180b.4\]]pi pi ling dang bca' sga rnams/_/rim bzhin cha res bskyed phye ma/_/kha ra dag dang mnyam sbyar bas/_/mchil mang yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/snying dang rtsib logs na lud pa/_/dbugs mi bde dang mgul nad 'joms/_/la la phud dang da trig dang /_/star bu bca' sga se'u 'bru
[\[180b.5\]]dang /_/rgya shug zho ni gnyis gnyis byas/_/kha ra srang bzhi 'u su dang /_/go snyod shing tsha kha ru tsha/_/zho re pi pi ling 'bru brgya/_/na le sham ni nyis brgya dag_/phyer btags yi ga 'byed pa'i mchog_/yid 'ong phyis 'gags pa dang /_/lud pa snying ga rtsib logs na/_/mcher
[\[180b.6\]]pa gzhang 'brum pho nad sel/_/bal bu'i lo man le sham/_/dong gra dang ni pi pi ling /_/go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/_/shing tsha sug smel dang po'i phyed/_/pi pi ling gi brgyad 'gyur gyi/_/kha rar sbyar ba'i phye ma de/_/drod skyed yi ga 'byed pa dang /_/lud pa lu dang
[\[180b.7\]]dbugs mi bde/_/yi ga 'chus dang slon bro dang /_/mcher pa snying nad rtsib logs zug_/skya rbab tshad 'khru rims nad 'joms/_/rlung 'khyil ba ni bde rgyu byed/_/sug smel shing tsha pu shel tse/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis byas pa dang /_/nA ga ge sar srang phyed dang /_/gan+d+ha
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]b+ha dra srang phyed gzhug_/phye btags bu ram rnying pa ni/_/srang ni nyi shu lnga ni bskol/_/sbrus te zho gnyis tshad ri lu/_/byas pa'i yon tan de dang mnyam/_/arga sle tres k+Sha ra'i chur/_/nas dang nub gcig spangs nas ni/_/chu dang zan ni sbrus nas su/_/
[\[181a.2\]]byin te nyams stobs ldan slon gzhug_/de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha_/bsregs pa kha dang tsha sbyar sbyin/_/zas ni skam zhing rab yang dang /_/tsa na ka sogs khu ba blud/_/bad kan gyis rab mchil ma mang /_/rlung gis mchil mang skyed par byed/_/de ni bad kan mchil
[\[181a.3\]]mar bshad/_/snum dang dro bas de bsal bya/_/rims 'di cham pa dag dang ni/_/slon pa'i nad la'ang sbyar bar bya/_/mchog tu cham par bsku ba dang /_/snum dang dugs kyi cho ga bstan/_/mgo dang lkog ma rtsib logs su/_/'bras khur snum bcas dugs bya zhing /_/
[\[181a.4\]]lan tshwa skyur dang kha dang tsha/_/sha khu snum dang bcas pa sbyin/_/mgo bo snying ga rtsib logs gzer/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/chu dang rlan can gnas pa'i sha_/legs sbyar dkri ba'i dugs bya zhing /_/de nas snum bzhi'i sbyor ba bsngags/_/nad gzhi
[\[181a.5\]]'dres bar gyur pa la/_/rgya spos shing mngar shu ti dang /_/tsan+dan mar gyi lde gus byug_/pa la ra sna til mar dang /_/shing mngar ut+pal mar de bzhin/_/ba spru ba dang shi kru dang /_/ba la ra mnye bid ri/_/sna sman dud pa rngub pa dang /_/zas zos 'og tu snum bsten zhing /_/
[\[181a.6\]]til mar gyis ni bsku ba dang /_/de bzhin 'jam rtsi'i las rab bsngags/_/yang na rngabs rwa la sogs pas/_/nad dmigs ji bzhin nad khrag dbyung /_/shug pa tsan+dan pu shel tse/_/mar bcas lde gus bsku ba'am/_/dUr ba shing mngar btsod dang ni/_/nA ga ge sar mar sbyar
[\[181a.7\]]bsku/_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol til mar/_/lan brgya bkrus pa'i mar gyis ni/_/bsku ba'am 'o ma shing mngar chus/_/blugs par gyur pa'ang bsngags pa yin/_/phal cher me drod nyams pa'i phyir/_/ma zhu be snabs bcas 'khru na/_/de la pho ba'i tshad 'khru ba'i/_/skabs su
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bshad pa'i sman bsten phan/_/zad byed ldan pa'i bshang ba ni/_/rnam pa kun tu bsrung bya ste/_/de yi lus zungs kun zad pas/_/de stobs bshad pa'i stobs kyis gnas/_/rig pas sha rnams kho na sbyin/_/skom du rgun chang blud par bya/_/shugs ni bkag par gyur pa yis/_/
[\[181b.2\]]gcong chen gyis ni glags mi rnyed/_/chang dang chang dngas rgun chang dang /_/chang rnying bu ram sbrang chang dang /_/ci rigs par ni blud pa dang /_/sha ni sbyin pa nyid du bya/_/bu ga'i rgyun 'gags dag phyir dang /_/stobs dang mdangs ni rgyas bya'i phyir/_/snum dang 'o ma chus gang
[\[181b.3\]]ba'i/_/snod du lus ni 'bying bar bya/_/phyung nas bsres pa'i snum gyis ni/_/bsku zhing lag pas bde bar mnye/_/bde bar 'dug par gyur pa la/_/dal gyis lde gus dril bar bya/_/dzi ban ti dang dUr ba dang /_/btsod dang a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/a pa marga ba spru ba/_/
[\[181b.4\]]ag ni man ti shing mngar dang /_/ba la yungs kar bid ri/_/ru rta 'bras dang zar ma dang /_/mon sran gre'u gnyis til dang phabs/_/thams cad gcig tu btags nas ni/_/nas kyi phye ni sum 'gyur dang /_/zho dang sbrang rtsi lhan cig sbyar/_/'di dag gis ni dril phyis
[\[181b.5\]]bya/_/sha rgyas mdog bzang stobs skyed byed/_/yungs kar ser po'i lde gu dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan dang sbyar ba/_/khrus kyi sman gyis khrus bya zhing /_/dus tshigs bde ba'i chus khrus bya/_/dri dang phreng ba sogs pas brgyan/_/bkra mi shis pa 'jigs pa bstan/_/mdza'
[\[181b.6\]]bshes blta zhing glu dang ni/_/rol mo mnyan zhing dga' ston bya/_/'jam rtsi 'o ma zhun mar dang /_/sha dang chang bsten tshul la gnas/_/lha la brten pa'i cho ga dang /_/mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_gso ba'i gnas
[\[181b.7\]]kyi le'u lnga pa'o//_//de nas slon pa'i nad dang snying nad dang skom dad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/slon nad phal cher ma zhu ba'i/_/gnas 'khrugs las byung de yi phyir/_/rlung ma gtogs la dang por ni/_/smyung byas skyug sman gtang ba phan/_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]stobs ldan rgyun tu slon gyur cing /_/nad mang 'gyur la gtang bar bya/_/de 'og rim gyis bkru sman ni/_/yid 'ong chang rgun chu sogs sam/_/'o mas btang gyur de mod la/_/gyen 'byung nad ni thur du 'byung /_/zhi ba'i sman ni rtsub pa ste/_/nyam chung ba yang de
[\[182a.2\]]nyid bya/_/zas ni skam zhing yi gar 'ong /_/goms shing yang ba bsngags pa yin/_/de bzhin smyung ba yu sha dang /_/sha khu 'ba' cha skam pa la/_/tshod ma lde gu bza' ba dang /_/btung ba dri bzangs pa na ka_/ro drug zas skom sna tshogs dang /_/'bras bu 'khrus dang mnye ba
[\[182a.3\]]dang /_/dri zhim 'bras bu me tog skyes/_/zas dang skom la spyod pa dang /_/zos ma thag tu 'phral du ni/_/chu grang gis ni gdong bkru bya/_/rlung las gyur pa'i slon pa'i nad/_/rgyam tsha mar bcas dro ba'am/_/tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum sbyar bas/_/lud pa dang ni snying 'dzag
[\[182a.4\]]dang /_/bcas pa sel bar byed pa yin/_/se 'bru'i khu ba bca' sga dang /_/'u su zho dang mar bskol ba'am/_/chu dang 'o ma cha mnyam pa/_/khron gyi zas tshol sha khu ni/_/'bras skyur rgyam tsha mar shas che/_/kha zas snum po bca' sga dang /_/zho dang se 'brur sbyar ba'am/_/
[\[182a.5\]]rgyam tshar bcas pa dro 'jam phan/_/'dir ni bkru sman lan tshwa dang /_/snum dang dro bar bcas pa phan/_/mkhris pa las byung bkru sman phyir/_/rgun 'brum bu ram shing khu dang /_/dur bying sbyar ba'i bkru sman btab/_/zhun mar seng phrom sbyar ba gtang /_/'phel te bad kan gnas
[\[182a.6\]]khyab pa'i/_/mkhris par mngar dang khab yis/_/gyen du drangs la dag gyur nas/_/'bras yos khar bcas pa las/_/skyo ma'am nas thug blud par bya/_/sA lu drug cug ba yi chan/_/skam sa'i sha khu mung+ga'i khu/_/so phag bsregs te chu nang gsur/_/shin tu bsgrangs
[\[182a.7\]]pa'i chu blud pa'am/_/mung+ga 'u su pu shel tse/_/pi pi ling dang nub gcig sbangs/_/yang na rgun chu bu ram shing /_/sle tres chu mang 'o ma blud/_/'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma dang /_/u shir n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/_/bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/_/btab ste blugs na
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]slon pa dang /_/rims dang tshad 'khru brgyal ba dang /_/skom dad che ba mi bzad sel/_/skyu ru ra'i khu tsan+dan bcas/_/mung+ga ba la'i chu blud phan/_/rgya shug tshi gu khar dkar/_/'bras yos spra tshil pi pi ling /_/dngul rdo sbrang rtsi'am a ru ra/_/rgun 'bru'am rgya shug dang
[\[182b.2\]]sbyar phan/_/bad kan las gyur nim pa dang /_/pi pi ling dang po son cha/_/yungs kar chu dron gyis slon bya/_/nyam chung ba la smyung ba bya/_/dong gal stsogs khu ba bskol/_/bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/_/nas kyi skyo ma slon 'joms pa'i/_/sman mang dang ni
[\[182b.3\]]sbyar ba blud/_/bad kan 'joms zas yi gar 'ong /_/btung ba zin thig bu srin/_/ldong ros dang ni pi pi ling /_/na le sham ni skyur rtsi che/_/ka pid ta yi khu ba dang /_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas slon nad sel/_/ka pid ta dang tsha ba gsum/_/phyi tshor sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin/_/
[\[182b.4\]]mthun pa'i spyod pa byas pa yis/_/mi sdug yul mthong las byung sel/_/srin bu las byung srin bu yi/_/sman du bshad pa rnams kyis gso/_/lhag ma nad dmigs ji bzhin du/_/de zhi 'gyur ba'i dpyad kyis gso/_/slon pa'i skabs su rlung gi nad rnams ni/_/lus zungs zad pas
[\[182b.5\]]nges par ldang gyur te/_/de bas 'dir ni skyug sman sbyor drags pa'i/_/skabs bshad bcad dang brta ba'i cho ga bya/_/bu ram zhun mar sha khu dge ba che/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'tsho byed sman mar dang /_/'o thug dang ni phan pa'i lde gu yis/_/rgyun du slon pa zhi ba nyid du bya/_/snying nad rlung gyur
[\[182b.6\]]til mar ni/_/skyur rtsab dang ba zho ga chu/_/ldan pa tsha can dro 'jam blud/_/des ni lto sbos skran yang 'joms/_/til mar lan tshwar bcas dang skyur/_/ba gcin bskol ba'ang de dang mtshungs/_/bil ba ra sna rgya shug nas/_/thang shing dang ni ba spu ba/_/rgya sran rtsa ba lnga pa
[\[182b.7\]]rnams/_/bskol ba'i chu der til mar ni/_/bskol ba de ni snar btang dang /_/btung dang 'jam rtsir gtang bar bya/_/bca' sga rgyam tsha byi'u rug pa/_/sle tres shing kun ma nu dang /_/a ru ra dang mar bskol ba/_/snying nad rtsib logs gzer skran 'joms/_/kha ru tsha ni srang
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]gnyis dang /_/a ru ra ni lnga bcu dang /_/zhun mar bre gang bskol rtsib logs/_/snying nad skran dbugs mi bde sel/_/se 'bru bca' sga kha ru tsha/_/shing kun star bu phye mar sbyar/_/rlung nad gzhan dbang can snying nad/_/dbugs mi bde ba sel
[\[183a.2\]]mchog yin/_/ma nu zur pa bca' sga dang /_/skyur rtsi che rtsa a ru ra'i/_/lde gu ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/mngar skyur lan tshwa ldan pa 'thungs/_/bcad snyam sems pa'i gzer 'joms byed/_/rgyam tshal la phud k+Sha ra/_/shu dag go snyod bca' sga dang /_/thang shing sgyur rtsi chen
[\[183a.3\]]po dang /_/zur pa ma nu pa la sha_/bskol khu 'jam 'thungs yon tan mtshungs/_/tsha lnga zur pa a ru ra/_/bu ram ma nu skyur rtsi che/_/chang btags lde gu mar til mar/_/brngos te rgyam tshar ldan 'thungs na/_/snying nad rtsib logs mo mtshan zug_/skran dang dmu rdzing
[\[183a.4\]]nad rnam sel/_/'di la snum gyi dugs phan zhing /_/sman mar gyi ni sbyor ba phan/_/skom la rtsa ba chung ngu lnga'am/_/bca' sga dang ni bskol ba'i chu'am/_/chang gi dngas ma zho ga chu/_/'bras bu'i rang skyur blud par bya/_/bya rmyang rengs gzer ma zhur bcas/_/
[\[183a.5\]]snying la rlung gis gnod gyur la/_/bya ba 'di bya snying 'dzag cing /_/'phar dang gcin snyi bcas pa la/_/sreg pa khrung khrung rma bya dang /_/dgo ba khyim bya snum mang phan/_/snying nad can la ba la'i mar/_/yang na skyid de ba'i mar blud/_/shing mngar lan brgyar btsos pa'am/_/
[\[183a.6\]]de bzhin snum chen mchog tu phan/_/ra sna 'tsho byed dzi ba ni ti/_/ba la bya kri ba spru ba/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba tir dang /_/shu dag tsha ba gsum dang ni/_/snum chen zhes bya bskol bar bya/_/zho ni bzhi cha de bzhin skyur/_/ji snyed pa las sbyar ba bsten/_/tshim byed brtas byed
[\[183a.7\]]stobs skyed cing /_/rlung gi snying nad 'joms pa yin/_/snying nad drod che 'phar ba dang /_/rlung las gyur ba'i snying nad la/_/'o ma zho dang bu ram mar/_/chu dang rlan can sha ngag phan/_/'di ma gtogs pa'i snying gi nad/_/bzhi po dag la spang bar bya/_/rlung can
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]rengs dang be+e'u snabs can/_/tshor med lhag ma rnams la'ang spang /_/bad kan 'dres gyur de la ni/_/rtsub drod bshad pa'i bya ba bya/_/mkhris gyur rgun chu bu ram chu/_/kha ru sbrang rtsi pa ru shar/_/ldan pa'i bkru sman yid 'ong bas/_/sbyangs la mkhris sel rim pa bya/_/glo
[\[183b.2\]]rdol rims kyi mkhris skabs bshad/_/phyi nang gi ni sbyang ba bya/_/pu shel tse dang shing mngar btags/_/kha rar bcas pa'i chu blud bya/_/ra sna khar rgun 'brum dang /_/'tsho byed ut+pal zangs rtsi ba/_/ba la 'bra go ra mnye ba/_/me da gnyis dang ma he'u mar/_/'o mar
[\[183b.3\]]bcas pa bskol ba ni/_/mkhris gyur snying nad sel byed yin/_/shing mngar ba spru puN+Da rI/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba ka she ru/_/bca' sga ba lar bcas de dang /_/'o mar bcas dang bca' sgar bskol/_/bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi btab pa dang /_/mngar ba'i sde tshan bsdus pa'ang
[\[183b.4\]]bsngags/_/til mar shing mngar bcas bskol zhing /_/sbrang rtsi btab pa'i 'jam rtsi'ang phan/_/bad kan las gyur dugs byas la/_/nim pa shu dag chu yis slon/_/rgya sran khu ba rgyam tsho'i chu/_/chang rno blud cing nas zan sbyin/_/shu dag shing kun lan tshwa gnyis/_/dong
[\[183b.5\]]gra sug smel la la phud/_/nas tshig 'khus thal pi pi ling /_/phye ma dro 'jam chu blud pa'am/_/'bras bu'i chu'am rang skyur ram/_/rgya sran ba gcin chang rnying blud/_/ma nu bca' sga a ru ra/_/zur pa ra sna pi pi ling /_/shu dag bskol te blud pa'am/_/de bzhin
[\[183b.6\]]bca' sga a ru ra/_/bong nga dkar po yung ba dang /_/kad pa la ni bskol ba'am/_/ro hi ta ka a shwad tha/_/seng ldeng u dum bA ra dang /_/ardzu na dang pa la sha_/n+ya gro d+ha bskol tsha ba gsum/_/dur byid phye mar bcas lde gu/_/zos te chu tshan rjes 'thungs na/_/bad kan
[\[183b.7\]]snying nad sel byed yin/_/bad kan skran skabs bshad mar dang /_/k+Sha ra sna tshogs blud par bya/_/yang na brag zhun bcud len dang /_/tshangs pa'i bcud len skyu ru ra'i/_/lde gu'am ri byis bshad pa'am/_/bdud rtsi'i mar ni 'di sbyar bya/_/gang zhig zan zos gzer gyis
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]'debs/_/zas zhu gyur nas zhi gyur pa/_/de la ru rta byi dang ga_/lan tshwa gnyis dang seng phrom dang /_/thang shing bong dkar por bcas/_/phye ma chu bskol dro sbyar blud/_/gang zhig zhu nas cher gzer ba/_/de la snum gyi bkru sman ni/_/'bras bu dang
[\[184a.2\]]ni de bzhin du/_/rtsa ba'i bkru sman sbyin par bya/_/phal cher rlung ni lam 'gags pa/_/ma zhu'i gnas su 'khru bar 'gyur/_/de la smyung dang smin pa dang /_/sbyang bas bde bar rgyu bar bya/_/'bu 'joms pa yi sman kun gyis/_/'bu yi snying nad gso bar bya/_/skom dad
[\[184a.3\]]rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms/_/cho ga phal cher bsngags pa yin/_/kun la phyi nang bsil ba dang /_/de bzhin zhi dang sbyang bar bya/_/char chu grang mo sbrang rtsir bcas/_/sa chu'i yon tan de ldan bsngags/_/bong ba rdza skyogs bye ma'am/_/gshag ma bsreg bcug dngas
[\[184a.4\]]mar bcas/_/bskol te kha rar bcas pa'am/_/dUr ba la stsogs rtsa ba lnga/_/bskol te kha ra btab pa'am/_/'bras yos phyer sbyar skyo ma'ang bsngags/_/nas rjen chag tshe sbrang rtsi dang /_/kha ra btab pa grang mo'ang phan/_/de bzhin nas thug sA lu dang /_/ko tra pa ni rnying
[\[184a.5\]]pa ni/_/'o ma bsil zhing nus bsil ba'i/_/sman dang bskol ba'i kha zas ni/_/nad pa chu grang gis bkrus nas/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi sbyin pa bsngags/_/skam sa'i sha khu lan tshwa skyur/_/med cing mar dang brngos pa yang /_/de bzhin mung+ga stsogs khu ba/_/'tsho byed sde tshan khu
[\[184a.6\]]bar bcas/_/sna sman 'o ma mar bsil sman/_/bskol ba'am bu ram shing khu phan/_/skom sel mkhur ba bkang nas ni/_/mdog nas las bshad byas pa'ang phan/_/tsha rims bshad pa'i lde gu sogs/_/rtsol ba chung zhing sems dga' dang /_/chu bo mtsho ni chen po stsogs/_/
[\[184a.7\]]dran pa dang ni mthong ba phan/_/skom dad rlung las gyur pa las/_/zho ni bu ram bcas pa bsngags/_/sha khus nyams brtas bid ri/_/stsogs te bskol nas bsgrangs pa phan/_/mkhris gyur u dum bA ra smin/_/khu bar kha ra btab pa phan/_/yang na de bskol bsgrangs
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]pa'am/_/sha ri bstsogs sde tshan chu/_/sde tshan de 'dra bskol khu ba/_/bsgrangs ba kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/_/mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang /_/'o ma can shing bskol de bzhin/_/bi dza bur rgun 'brum dang /_/lcang ma n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma/_/ku sha 'jag ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/shing
[\[184b.2\]]mngar chu ni bskol ba'ang phan/_/rims la phan sman rgun 'brum stsogs/_/snying po lnga yi chu blud phan/_/bad kan las gyur nim pa ni/_/chu mchog bskol bas slon du gzhug_/bil ba 'u su tsha ba lnga/_/'jag ma kru trug tres bskol blud/_/yang na skyer ba chu bskol la/_/
[\[184b.3\]]kha ra sbrang rtsi btab pa blud/_/mung+ga'i khu ba pa to la/_/nim pa'i lo ma tsha gsum bcas/_/nas zan mkhur bkang rnon po dang /_/sna sman lde gu rnon po'ang bsten/_/nyes kun ma zhu des 'joms pas/_/de bzhin slon gyi bya ba'ang bsngags/_/go bye shu dag cha ba gsum/_/
[\[184b.4\]]'bras bu skyur pa'am chu tshan nam/_/zho ga chu dang btung ba bsngags/_/zas kyi nyes 'byung dus shes pas/_/thug sla'am skyo ma bsil ba blud/_/ngal bas skom la sha khu'am/_/skyo ma kha rar bcas pa blud/_/tsha bas bskol la kha rar bcas/_/nas dang rgya shug
[\[184b.5\]]phye skyo blud/_/lus kun til gyi lde gu dang /_/rang skyur bcas pas bsku bar bya/_/chu bsil khrus las skom gyur chang /_/chur bsres pa'am bur chu blud/_/chang ni chu phyed bcas pa blud/_/lan tshwa skyur dang bcas khrus bya/_/snum bcas me drod rab rno la/_/rang
[\[184b.6\]]bzhin bsil ba'i chu blud bya/_/snum ma zhu la chu tshan blud/_/zhu las skom la thug pa blud/_/zas snum zos pas skom dad 'gyur/_/kha ba dang mnyam bu ram chu/_/bu ram sogs zas zos la skom/_/chu dron blud la de slon bya/_/gcong chen las byung gcong la
[\[184b.7\]]phan/_/thams cad nyams ni brta ba phan/_/skem zhing nyam chung khong rtsub la/_/sha khu'am ra yi 'o ma blud/_/stod rgyu'i rlung la 'o ma dang /_/zad byed lud pa'i sman bskol blud/_/nad rkyen las gyur 'u su ni/_/'bras bskol kha ra sbrang rtsir bcas/_/nad dmigs la ni
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]bltas nas ni/_/btung ba'i bya ba kun kyang bsngags/_/skom zhing sngar gyi nad kyis gzir/_/chu dang 'phrad par ma gyur na/_/'chi ba'am yun ring ba yi nad/_/rnyed par 'gyur bas de yi phyir/_/goms pa'i zas skom sman gyis ni/_/de yi skom dad
[\[185a.2\]]myur bsal bya/_/de bsal nad ni gzhan dag kyang /_/gso ba nyid du nus pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o//_//de nas chang nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/nyes pa gang zhig shas cher mthong /_/
[\[185a.3\]]de ni dang por gso bar bya/_/yang na chang nad nad gzhi mtshungs/_/bad kan gnas kyi rim pas gso/_/mkhris pa rlung gi mthar thug par/_/chang nad phal cher 'byung ba yin/_/dman dang log pa drag 'thungs las/_/nad ni gang zhig skyes gyur pa/_/de nyid cha mnyam
[\[185a.4\]]'thungs pa yis/_/chang nyid kyis ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/chang dang dug ni mtshungs pa las/_/dug ni rno stsogs yon tan gyi/_/nus pa shin tu che bas na/_/dug gzhan la ni ltos pa yin/_/rno tshe lhag par 'thungs pa dang /_/tsha zhing skyur ba dag gis ni/_/chang gis zas
[\[185a.5\]]kyi ro bsrul zhing /_/'ju nyer ba tsha bro gang yin/_/myos dang skom rmongs nang du tsha/_/rims dang mgo 'khor skyed par byed/_/chang gis bslangs pa'i nad kyis ni/_/rlung rgyu'i bu ga bkag gyur pas/_/mgo dang rus pa tshigs rnams su/_/mi bzad par ni skyed par byed/_/
[\[185a.6\]]sbyor ba rjes mthun gyur pa yi/_/chang nyid kyis ni de sel 'gyur/_/chang nad ma zhu zhu gyur na/_/zas 'dod lus ni yang bar 'gyur/_/ba tsha ro ni skyur dang phrad/_/mngar ba nyid du myur du 'gyur/_/nad ni 'ju bar byed nus pas/_/skyur ba kun las chang mchog yin/_/sngar
[\[185a.7\]]bshad rno dang dro stsogs dang /_/de bzhin drod skyed stsogs yon tan/_/de nyid goms pa'i dbang gis ni/_/'di yis lus zungs mnyam byed mchog_/zhag bdun nam zhig zhag brgyad par/_/chang nad sman gyi sbyor ba bya/_/dus 'di tsam gyis lam log par/_/gnas pa'i
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]chang nad zhi bar 'gyur/_/sman ni byas gyur nas chad nad/_/de phan chang ni rjes 'brel pa'i/_/nad gang yin pa de la sman/_/nad dmigs ji bzhin sbyin par bya/_/de la rlung shas che ba la/_/sgyur rtsi chen pod trig dang /_/rgya shug se 'bru go snyod dang /_/la la phud dang
[\[185b.2\]]ha pu sha_/zi ra tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum/_/sge'u gsher phye chang sbyar ba blud/_/sreg sha ldum rngad bcas pa dang /_/snum dang ldan pa'i zas sbyin no/_/snum zhing dro skyur lan tshwar bcas/_/sha tshon khu ba blud pa'am/_/a mra a mra ta ka gtubs/_/g.yos sbyar ba yi
[\[185b.3\]]drug pa'am/_/gro dang ma sha las byas pa/_/rnying zhing yi gar 'ong ba dang /_/sge gsher bcas ba'i khu ba ni/_/tsha dang sha sogs nang bcug pa'am/_/chang ni dri zhim bsil ba dang /_/legs langs dngas shing tshar bcas phan/_/se 'bru'am rtsa ba chung lnga bskol/_/
[\[185b.4\]]bca' sga 'u su bskol ba'am/_/zhog chu'am tsha chu'am/_/rang skyur dngas ma blud par bya/_/lus bsku dril dang bkru ba dang /_/gos ni dro zhing mthug pa dang /_/a ka ru yi dud pas bdug_/gur gum a ka ru yis byug_/chung ma nu ma ro smad mdzes/_/lang tshor
[\[185b.5\]]ldan zhing yan lag dro/_/dga' bas 'khyud par byed pa dang /_/bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa'ang phan/_/mkhris pa shas cher chu mang ba'i/_/sbrang rtsi khar dang ldan pa'i/_/se 'bru 'bra go'i khu ba dang /_/b+ha bya rgun 'brum pa ru sha'i/_/khu bsgrangs phye dang khar rar bcas/_/
[\[185b.6\]]btung ba'ang de 'dra blud par bya/_/yang na mngar ba'i sde tshan bskol/_/khu ba chang bsres sbrang rtsi btab/_/sA lu drug cu pa'i tshan dang /_/ri bong gong sreg gtsod kyi sha_/tsa na mung+ga skyu ru ra/_/se 'bru pa to la g.yos sbyin/_/bad kan mkhris 'dres las gyur pa/_/tsha dang
[\[185b.7\]]skom dang ldan pa yi/_/chang ngam chu grang bu ram shing /_/khu ba'am rgun chu mang blud la/_/slon gzhug 'dres pa'i nad la ni/_/skyo ma la sogs rim pas phan/_/de yis me drod 'bar gyur pas/_/zas dang nyes lhag smin par byed/_/lud pa mchil ma khrag bcas 'byung /_/
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]rtsib logs nu mar gzer ba dang /_/tsha dang bcas pa'i skom dad dang /_/snying dang brang ni na ba la/_/sle tres ga dur bskol ba'am/_/yang na pa to la bskol khu/_/bca' sgar bcas pa blud bya zhing /_/gong ma sreg gi sha sbyin bya/_/mkhris pa rlung ni rgyas gyur pas/_/
[\[186a.2\]]shin tu shas cher skom gyur na/_/rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed pa'i/_/rgun chu bsgrangs pa blud par bya/_/zhu nas ra sha'i khu ba ni/_/mngar dang skyur ba'i sman sbyar sbyin/_/skom na chu mang bsres pa yi/_/chang blud ra ror mi 'gyur bsrung /_/gla sgang se 'bru 'bras yos chu'am/_/yang
[\[186a.3\]]na 'dab ma bzhi bskol ba'am/_/ut+pal pa to la sogs sam/_/rang bzhin gyis ni bsil ba blud/_/chang mang 'thungs pas chu yi khams/_/'bri zhing me shas rgyas par 'gyur/_/gre ba rkan mchu skam 'gyur zhing /_/lce ni 'byin cing gcong byed la/_/mtshan mo rlung gis
[\[186a.4\]]bsil byas pa'i/_/chu ni yog tshad blud par bya/_/rgya shug se 'bru da trig dang /_/tsug tral chu ba'i khu ba/_/skyur ba lnga yis khar bskus na/_/'phral du skom dad sel bar byed/_/chang 'thungs drod ni khrag mkhris dang /_/'dres pas pags pa khyab gyur pas/_/
[\[186a.5\]]mi bzad tsha ba skyed byed de/_/der ni rab bsil cho ga bya/_/ma zhu sha khus tshim byas la/_/ro hi ni las gtar ga gdab/_/slon dang smyung ba dag gis kyang /_/bad kan shas cher skug sman dang /_/smyung ba bca' sga sti ra dang /_/kaN+Da ka ri ba la ka_/gang yang rung ba'i
[\[186a.6\]]chu blud bsal/_/ma zhu med cing bkres dus su/_/sbrang rtsi mang po blud par bya/_/sha kha ra dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/chang rnying dag gam rgun chang ngam/_/rtsub pa'i skyo mar sbyar ba ni/_/dong gral la phud bcas blud/_/nas dang gro zan nyung shas la/_/rgya sran yu sha nyung
[\[186a.7\]]zad bcas/_/chu tshan kha dang tsha bar bcas/_/mar ni nyung zad bcas pa sbyin/_/la phug skam por sha'i khu/_/skam sa'i srog chags sha khu ni/_/star bud trig pa to la/_/tsha ba gsum dang se 'brur sbyar/_/bca' sga na le sham mang btab/_/rjen rngad
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]gtubs pa dang ldan zhing /_/skyur rtsi chen po'i khu bas skyur/_/brngos shing khu ba med pa dang /_/ka ra mar dang ka ri ra/_/la sogs yi ga 'byed pa dang /_/lan tshwa brgyad po legs bro dang /_/gtubs shing be reg ltar btsos pa/_/me drod tshod las sha sbyin zhing /_/sbrang
[\[186b.2\]]chang nad med gyur pa blud/_/kha ra dang ni kha ru tsha/_/go snyod da trig star bu dang /_/shing tsha sug smel na le sham/_/cha phyed yan lag brgyad par bshad/_/phal cher bad kan chang nad sel/_/bu ga'i rgyun sbyong drod skyed byed/_/rtsub dang dro bas mnye zhing dril/_/khrus dang kha
[\[186b.3\]]zas smyung byas dang /_/'dod bcas bud med lhan cig gnas/_/mtshan nyid ma log rig pas bsten/_/phal cher bad kan las byung ba'i/_/chang nad myur du zhi bar byed/_/nad gzhi so so'i shas che las/_/las rnams gang dag bstan pa 'di/_/'di ni 'dus pa las gyur
[\[186b.4\]]pa/_/lhag ma bcu la'ang sbyar bar bya/_/shing tsha nA ga put+pa dang /_/pi pi ling dang na le sham/_/go snyod pa ru sha ka dang /_/'u su sug smel ma du ka_/thang shing kar dkar dang bcas/_/ka pid ta yi khu ba btab/_/ga pur dri yis bsgos gyur pa/_/btung ba shin
[\[186b.5\]]tu yid 'ong ba/_/chang nad kun la blud gyur na/_/yi ga 'byed cing me drod skyed/_/chang gis yid ni ma dkrugs shing /_/lus la gnod pa mi byed par/_/chang nad mi skyed de yi phyir/_/sems dgar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bya/_/chang nad la ni sbyang ba dang /_/zhi ba'i las ni
[\[186b.6\]]byas gyur kyang /_/gal te ma zhi bad kan zad/_/nyam chung yang ba nyid gyur na/_/rlung dang mkhris pa shas che zhing /_/chang nad kyis zad 'o ma blud/_/so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi/_/shing las char pa bab dang mtshungs/_/chang gis zad par byas pa'i mdangs/_/'o
[\[186b.7\]]mas myur du brtas byed de/_/mdangs dang yon tan kun mtshungs la/_/chang las go ni bzlog pa yin/_/'o mas nad ni bcom gyur cing /_/stobs skyes nas ni 'o ma yi/_/cho ga chang yang bzlog byas te/_/rim gyis nyung zad nyung zad spyad/_/ci nas 'joms dang skams
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]gyur pa'i/_/bla brnan 'byung bar mi 'gyur bya/_/de gnyis la ni 'o ma mar/_/'jam rtsi btang bas brta ba bsngags/_/bsku dang dril phyis khrus dang ni/_/bza' btung rlung ni sel ba phan/_/rig par chang 'thung gang gis ni/_/nad ni 'byung bar
[\[187a.2\]]'gyur ma yin/_/de la rlung nad la phan chang /_/phal cher zan chang bu ram chang /_/mkhris pa rgun chang chu dang bcas/_/bad kan chang rnying sbrang rgun chang /_/bad kan can gyis dang por btung /_/mkhris pa can gyis zos rjes btung /_/rlung can gyis ni bar du btung /_/
[\[187a.3\]]nad gzhi mnyam pas ci dgar btung /_/myos dang brgyal la phal cher ni/_/rlung dang mkhris pa sel las bsngags/_/thams cad la yang khyad par du/_/mkhris pa shas cher shes par bya/_/bsku byug bsil dang nor bu dang /_/chus gtor rlung yab kyis g.yab
[\[187a.4\]]byed/_/kha ra rgun 'brum bu ram shing /_/'bra go tang pal khu ba dang /_/mngar ba'i sde bskol 'o ma khu/_/yu sha se 'brur bcas pa blud/_/sA lu rtsa snar drug cu pa/_/nas dang 'tsho byed sman mar dang /_/dge ba chen po tig ta che/_/srang drug 'o ma tsi trar bcas/_/pi pi
[\[187a.5\]]ling dang brag zhun ni/_/bcud kyis len gyi cho ga sbyin/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum mar dang /_/sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa sbyin/_/shugs drag pa la kha dang sna/_/bkag par gyur pa phan pa yin/_/yang na bud med nu zho ni/_/blud pa'am sna nas gtang bar bya/_/pad+ma'i
[\[187a.6\]]rtsa sdong pi pi ling /_/a ru ra 'am gla sgang ngam/_/byi tsher sbrang rtsir sbyar ba sbyin/_/rgya shug tshi gu na le sham/_/nA ga ge sar pu shel tse/_/chu grang dang ni sbyar ba blud/_/skyu ru ra yi khu ba'am/_/a ru ra mar bskol ba'ang phan/_/ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba dag_/nad
[\[187a.7\]]gzhi'i shas ni ji bzhin sbyar/_/las ni rnam lnga bya ba dang /_/gtar gas khrag ni dbyung ba dang /_/snying stobs che zhing shes dang ldan/_/yul la chags pa med pa phan/_/myos pa shin tu 'phel gyur dang /_/brgyal bar gyur pa dag la ni/_/kun tu zhugs pa'i sman rnon
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]dang /_/dug las byung ba dug sman gtang /_/kun tu zhugs la rab rno ba'i/_/sna sman dang ni mig sman dang /_/dud pas bud dang khab kyis ni/_/sen mo'i bar du gzugs par bya/_/skra 'bal bsregs dang sos btab dang /_/sdig pa sha sbrang gtses pa dang /_/mkhur bar tsha
[\[187b.2\]]dang skyur ba gzhug_/kha sral phre'u bdar bar bya/_/'du shes rnyed cing ldang gyur nas/_/sgog skya'i khu ba blud par bya/_/tsha ba gsum ni lan tshwar bcas/_/bi dza pu ra'i ge sar sbyin/_/bu ga'i rgyun srang dag bya'i phyir/_/zas yang tsha dro rno ba sbyin/_/brjed pa dran phyir ngo
[\[187b.3\]]mtshar dang /_/yid 'ong lta dang thos pa dang /_/glu dang rol mo snyan pa yi/_/sgra snyan rtsol ba byed du gzhug_/slon sman bkru sman btang dus rngub/_/khrag ni dbyung bar bya ba dag_/rgyun mi chad pa spyad par bya/_/sems stor ba yi rgyu las ni/_/slar ldang 'brel pa'i
[\[187b.4\]]'jigs pa yis/_/de ni legs par bsrung bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bdun pa'o//_//de nas gzhang 'brum gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/thun mong dus su sprin med par/_/gzhang 'brum
[\[187b.5\]]can rab nyam chung min/_/lto sbyangs kha zas yang la nyung /_/rjes su mthun pa zos pa la/_/gtsang byas bde legs 'gyur bar byas/_/bshang dang gci bsal gnod pa med/_/khri'am spang leb mi gzhan gyi/_/pang par legs brten gnas nas ni/_/gan rkyal
[\[187b.6\]]'dug cing ro stod smad/_/drang 'dug nyi mar rkub bstan la/_/rked pa'i phyogs ni bstod par bya/_/de nas brla dang gnya' bar ni/_/bcings pa'i gos kyis bsdams nas su/_/gzung ste drang por 'dug pa la/_/nad g.yog gis ni bzung nas su/_/rkub ni zhun
[\[187b.7\]]mar dag gis bsku/_/de nas mar gyis bskus pa yi/_/cha spyad drang por de gzhug bya/_/rkub nas phyogs par rim gyis gzhug_/de nas 'byung 'gyur mthong ba dang /_/cha spyad chud par shes gyur nas/_/gzhang 'brum thur ma gos gsher bas/_/sman pas legs
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]par btsir nas ni/_/ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/_/rlan can thal sman bsreg cig shos/_/thal sman rnon po'i me yis bsreg_/stobs ldan mche ba bcad de bsreg_/de nas cha spyad phyung nas ni/_/nad pa'i rkub dang ro smad bsku/_/snum gyi
[\[188a.2\]]nang du 'bying bar bya/_/de ltar zhag ni bdun bdun zhing /_/re re nye bar bcos par bya/_/de nas rlung med khang par ni/_/bzhag la spyod pa bsten par bya/_/gzhang 'brum mang la dang por g.yas/_/de nas g.yon bsal de 'og rgyab/_/gzhang 'brum mang po bsregs
[\[188a.3\]]legs na/_/rlung ni bde bar rgyu byed cing /_/kha zas 'dod cing me drod skyed/_/bder gnas stobs dang kha dog skyed/_/chu sog zer gyis btab pa la/_/ba spru ba dang ru rta dang /_/gan+d+ha mung+ga a ka ru/_/sha tapuSh+pa thang shing rnams/_/zhib tu btags la lde gu yis/_/lte ba man
[\[188a.4\]]chad bsku bar bya/_/bshang dang gci 'gags gyur pa la/_/a lam bu sa ba ru na/_/ba spru gzem e raN+Da/_/a za gan+d+ha mu ra rnams/_/bskol ba dro 'jam byas pa yis/_/blugs dang 'bying ba'i sbyor ba bya/_/yang na 'o ma snum bcas pa/_/rlung sel sman bskol til
[\[188a.5\]]mar sbyar/_/zas ni bshang ba sla byed cing /_/snum dang rlung 'joms drod skyed sbyin/_/de nas bsreg pa mi bya zhing /_/bad kan rlung skyes phyir byung ba/_/'gags shing g.ya' la na zhing skrang /_/gzhang 'brum bsku ba byas nas ni/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba tsi tra ka_/thal sman
[\[188a.6\]]ru rta bskol ba yi/_/til mar blugs pa'am sbrul byil/_/rnga mo phag rgod zhag gis byug_/de rjes rlan dugs kyis dugs bya/_/yang na gsher dugs spyad par bya/_/yang na zan ni til mar dang /_/zhun mar snum can gyis dugs bya/_/ra sna ha gu sha dag dang /_/
[\[188a.7\]]shi kru'i lo ma'i gong pos bya/_/arga'i rtsa ba shal ma li'i/_/lo ma mi skra sbrul lpags dang /_/byi la'i pags pa mar sbyar ba'i/_/dud bdugs gzhang 'brum dag la phan/_/a shwa gan+d+ha bri ha ti/_/byi'u rug pi pi ling mar sbyar/_/ku ba kha bo'i sa bon dang /_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]yal ga 'jam por rang skyur dang /_/lde gu grib mar skams pa yi/_/reng bu rkub bcug gzhang 'brum 'jig_/ku ba kha bo'i yal ga rtsa/_/thal sman bcas pa'i lde gu ni/_/'ol ma se dang su ra na/_/bum sha yi ni sa bon las/_/reng bur byas pa de dang 'dra/_/
[\[188b.2\]]su d+hA k+Shi ra yung lde gu/_/khyim bya'i rtug pa pi pi ling /_/yung dang 'ol ma se dag ni/_/ba gcin btags pa de dang 'dra/_/snu ha'i 'o mar btags shu dag_/ta ma la rus pri yang ku/_/rnam rgyal kar ka ta sring gi/_/ru rta spangs ma go bye dang /_/shi kru la
[\[188b.3\]]phug sa bon dang /_/nim pa ka ra bI ra'i lo/_/pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_/bil rtsa shing kun bcas pa'am/_/ru rta shri sha'i sa bon dang /_/rgyam tsha bu ram pi pi ling /_/arga snu ha'i 'o ma dang /_/'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu bsku/_/arga'i 'o ma snu ha'i sdong /_/
[\[188b.4\]]ku ba kha bo'i 'dab ma dang /_/ka rany+dza dang ra thug gcin/_/lde gus gzhang 'brum sel mchog yin/_/'jam rtsi'i sman ni pi pi ling /_/la sogs lde gu'ang bsngags pa yin/_/sman 'di nyid kyis til mar ni/_/bsku ba'i don du bskol bar bya/_/dud pas bdug
[\[188b.5\]]dang lde gu ni/_/bskus pas gzhang 'brum dag gi khrag_/sogs pa 'dzag par byed 'gyur te/_/de nas bde ba nyid du 'gyur/_/skrang zhing 'dzag par ma gyur dang /_/sra ba las ni khrag dbyung ste/_/bad pa gtsags bu khab kyi ni/_/pir gyis yang dang yang khrag dbyung /_/bsil
[\[188b.6\]]drod snum dang rtsub pa yis/_/nad ni zhi bar ma gyur na/_/de phyir sman pas nad khrag nyid/_/dbyung ba la ni 'bad par bya/_/'o ma tsi tra ka'i rtsa phye/_/btab pa las byung dar ba dang /_/blud cing de nyid kyi zas ni/_/byin na gzhang 'brum sel bar 'gyur/_/ka pi da ri'i rtsa ba'i phye/_/
[\[188b.7\]]dar ba gsar pa btab pa blud/_/zhu nas phan pa'i zas byin na/_/gzhang 'brum nad las thar bar 'gyur/_/gzhang skrang gzer bcas me drod 'bri/_/skran nad la ni phan pa'i sman/_/shing kun la sogs blud pa'am/_/bu ram a rur sbyar ba/_/byin la de rjes dar ba blud/_/
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]yang na a ru byi dang ga_/dug mo nyung shun tsi tra ka_/dar ba dang sbyar blud pa'am/_/dug mo nyung dang pi pi ling /_/tsi tra ka dang su ra na/_/cha res bskyed pa chu dron blud/_/yang na tsha gsum lan tshwa gsum/_/shing kun star bu bcas chu blud/_/bil ba ka pid
[\[189a.2\]]thar bcas pa'am/_/bca' sga kha ru tsha ba bcas pa'am/_/go bye la la phud bcas pa'i/_/skyo ma de la blud par bya/_/yang na shing kun spa ma'i 'bras/_/tsi tra ka dang dar ba sbyar/_/pi lu'i 'bras bu dar bar bcas/_/zla ba gcig gi bar du sbyin/_/zas kyi sngon nyid re re
[\[189a.3\]]zhing /_/ci 'dod par ni blud par bya/_/shin tu me drod chung ba la/_/dar ba kho na blud par bya/_/nyams stobs dus dang gnas shes pa'i/_/sman pa yis ni dar ba dag_/zhag bdun nam ni zhag bcu'am/_/zla ba zla gcig bar du blud/_/yang na phyi dro 'bras yos kyi/_/
[\[189a.4\]]phye dang dar ba'i lde gu sbyin/_/dar ba zhu nas dar ba ni/_/thug pa rgyam tshar bcas pa blud/_/de rjes dar bar g.yos pa'i zan/_/snum can byin la dar ba blud/_/yu sha'am sha khu dar ba can/_/sA lu'i 'bras chen ran par bza'/_/rtsub dang mar phyed phyung ba dang /_/gang
[\[189a.5\]]las mar ni ma phyung ba/_/dar ba nad dang me drod kyi/_/stobs las de ni rnam gsum sbyar/_/dar bas legs bcom gyur pa yis/_/gzhang 'brum slar ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de blugs gyur na rtsa yi ni/_/tshogs kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtsa sbubs dar bas dag
[\[189a.6\]]byas pas/_/lus zungs dngas mar gyur pa gang /_/de ni nyams dga' mdog dang stobs/_/mchog tu rgyas par byed par 'gyur/_/rlung dang bad kan dag gi nad/_/brgya phrag dar ba rnying pas 'joms/_/gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod pa yis/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i lde gus bsku/_/
[\[189a.7\]]snod du dar ba gsar pa ni/_/nub gcig gzhag ste blud par bya/_/'u su zi ra go snyod dang /_/pi pi ling gnyis ha pu sha_/shu ti pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/la la phud dang tsi tra ka_/ya ba na gi'i phye ma dang /_/dar ba sbyar ba mar gyi snod/_/bzhag par gyur pa de las skyur/_/kha ba
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]dang ni rab skyur min/_/skyur dang kha ba bro bar ni/_/ldang ba'i dar rnying ci 'dod blud/_/drod skyed mdog bzang yi ga 'byed/_/rlung dang bad kan sel byed cing /_/gzhang skrang na bas nyam thag pa/_/'joms shing stobs ni 'phel byed yin/_/kru trug tres kyi rtsa ba'i shu/_/
[\[189b.2\]]btags pa'i lde gus bum pa bsku/_/der ni 'o ma dang ba gzhag_/smin pa'i gzhang 'brum sel byed blud/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba a ru ra/_/sle tres tsha ba lnga dag la'ang /_/cho ga 'di nyid sbyar bar bya/_/pa ta ha ti pi pi ling /_/shu ti tsha ba lnga g.yer ma/_/zi ra 'u su bil ba'i
[\[189b.3\]]rkang /_/phye mar btags te sbyar bar bya/_/'bras bu skyur po mar til mar/_/yu sha sha khu thug stsogs bya/_/sman 'di nyid dang chu dang mar/_/bskol ba'ang drod skyed byed pa yin/_/rim 'di bshang bslab yin/_/rtug pa 'gags pa bshang bya ste/_/snum stsogs
[\[189b.4\]]zan dang ldan pa yi/_/chang dngas lan tshwa btab pa blud/_/yang na dar ba bu ram chang /_/chang skyur chang dngas lan tshwar sbyar/_/zas mngar mar dang til mar gyis/_/brngos pa'i ka rany+dza'i lo ma/_/steng du phye btab byin gyur na/_/rlung gis rtug pa 'gags pa sel/_/bca'
[\[189b.5\]]sga bu ram bcas pa'am/_/ba ta bu ram mar lan tshwa/_/ba gcin la spangs a ru ra/_/bu ram bcas pa sbyin pa'ang rung /_/a ru ra ni nyis brgya gcin/_/bre bcu drug tu gcin du'i bar/_/bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa dag_/gnyis gnyis zos nas bad kan gyis/_/
[\[189b.6\]]gzhang 'brum mdze dang 'or nad dang /_/skran dang dmu rdzing gcin snyi 'bu/_/rmen bu shu bas khyab tsho ches/_/skya rbab rlung 'khyil 'joms par byed/_/a za sring gi rtsa ba yi/_/lde gu ra gcin sbyar 'thung zhing /_/bu ram bar ta ka zos na/_/gzhang 'brum myur du 'jig par
[\[189b.7\]]'gyur/_/dur byid 'bras bu gsum khur sbyar/_/yang na dar ba a ru ra'am/_/pi pi ling bcas a ru ra/_/mar dang brngos pa'i bu ram bcas/_/yang na dur byid dan dar bcas/_/zos na bde bar 'byung bar byed/_/gzhang na gnas pa'i nad bsal na/_/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]gzhang 'brum zad par byed par 'gyur/_/se 'bru'i khu ba zir dang /_/bca' sga bu ram la la phud/_/pa ta dang sbyar dar ba ni/_/rlung gis rtug 'gags sel byed yin/_/rgyun chang yang na bu ram chang /_/bca' sga kru trug tres dang bcas/_/
[\[190a.2\]]yang na chang ni pa ta dang /_/spa 'bras kha ru tsha bcas blud/_/pi pi ling ni bcu bcus bskyed/_/til ni srang phyed btab gyur na/_/'o ma bcas 'thungs lus stobs dang /_/me drod skyed par byed pa yin/_/byi tsher ba dang bil ba dang /_/la la phud dang dong gra rnams/_/
[\[190a.3\]]re re dang sbyar pa tas kyang /_/gzhang 'brum nad ni sel bar byad/_/chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang /_/a ru ra shun bre phyed dang /_/skyu ru ra ni bre gang dang /_/ka pid ta ni srang bcu dang /_/pi sha la ni srang lnga dang /_/seng phrom shing tsha na le sham/_/pi pi ling dang byi dang ga_/
[\[190a.4\]]srang ni gnyis gnyis tshad byas bskol/_/bzhi cha lus btsags bu ram ni/_/srang ni nyis brgya bcug nas ni/_/da ta ki ni bre gang gzhug_/mar gyi snod du bcug nas ni/_/zla phyed nas ni chang rnying 'thungs/_/me drod skyed cing gzhang 'brum dang /_/pho nad skya rbab mdze dmu
[\[190a.5\]]rdzing /_/dbyig dug rims skran mchin nad dang /_/snying nad skran dang gcong chen dang /_/slon dang srin bu'i nad rnams 'joms/_/chu bu bcu drug nang dan ti/_/rtsa bcu 'bras gsum tsi tra ka_/srang re bskol ba bzhi cha lus/_/bu ram srang brgyad gzhug par bya/_/thams
[\[190a.6\]]cad snga ma dang 'dra las/_/rjes mthun cig shos sel bar byed/_/chu bre bcu drug nang dag tu/_/byi tshor ba ni bre gang dang /_/dan ti pa ta tsi tra ka_/rnam rgyal dong gra ba sha ka_/skyu ru ra ni khyor re bskol/_/bzhi cha lus pa de'i nang du/_/ka ra dkar po srang brgyad gzhug_/
[\[190a.7\]]gzhan dag snga ma bzhin du sbyar/_/rdza ma'i snod kyang pri yang ku/_/pi pi ling dang dbyi mo dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi'i lde gus bsku/_/bde bar 'byung phyir zas kyi sngar/_/'bras bu skyur bcas mar blud pa'am/_/dbyi mo kru trug tras bskol mar/_/nas tshig
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]'khus thal bu ram bcas/_/pi pi ling gi rtsa bar bskol/_/bu ram dong gra nas tshag 'khus/_/pi pi ling rtsa pi pi ling /_/se 'bru 'u su dag dang mar/_/bzhi 'gyur zho dang bskol bas ni/_/'phyen dang bshang gci 'gags pa sel/_/ba la sha yi thal ba'i chu/_/
[\[190b.2\]]sum 'gyur dang ni mar du bskol/_/dug mo nyung sogs phye ma btab/_/drod skyed gzhang 'brum 'joms pa'i mchog_/tsha ba lnga dang ya ru ra/_/ya bak+Sha ra la la phud/_/lce myang tsha dang kha ru tsha/_/pa ta 'u su na le sham/_/bil bzho dang bcas pa'i mar/_/bskol
[\[190b.3\]]ba des ni chu so gzhang /_/'khru zhing gzhang ni nyams pa dang /_/gcin sri 'dzag pa sel bar byed/_/pa ta 'u su la la phud/_/tsha ba lnga dang gze ma dang /_/bil bzho dang tsang gi ri/_/khu ba mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bskol/_/lto sbos gcin ni sri ba dang /_/rtag tu 'khru
[\[190b.4\]]dang gzhang 'brum dang /_/gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad rnams dang /_/bad kan rlung ni 'joms par byed/_/rma bya sreg pa 'ur bya yi/_/sha khu skyur po legs sbyar ba/_/khyim bya 'am bye'u'i sha khu/_/'phyen dang phyi sa 'gags la blud/_/rgya sne'u dur byid tsi tra ka_/dan ti
[\[190b.5\]]pa ti am+li ka_/la sogs lo ma gzhan yang ni/_/bad kan rlung 'joms tshod ma ni/_/yang zhing bshang ba sla bar byed/_/shing kun mar dang til mar brngos/_/zho yi spris mar bskol ba dang /_/'u su dang ni tsha ba lnga/_/btags pa'i phye dang se 'bru'i bcud/_/'u su'i
[\[190b.6\]]'dab ma gzhon nu dang /_/sge'u gsher gshags par gyur pa dang /_/spos zhim legs bdug dri zhim byas/_/zir na le sham dang bcas/_/kha ru tsha ni shas cher bro/_/rlung shas cher rtsub drod chung la/_/sA lu tsa snar 'bras chan ni/_/ba lang go ta rnga mo ra'i/_/sha khu tshod ltar
[\[190b.7\]]g.yos pa dang /_/mchog tu sha za rnams kyi sha_/rtug skam can la sbyin par bya/_/chang dang bur chang ka ra'i chu/_/rgun chang dar ba rtsab mo dang /_/chang rnying dang ni zho ga chu/_/yang na chu nyung bskol ba'am/_/'u su bca' sga bskol ba'am/_/kaN+Da ka ri bskol ba blud/_/
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]zas kyi thog ma'am bar dag tu/_/rlung gi rtug skam sel ba sbyin/_/rlung mkhris bad kan rtug skam rnams/_/bde bar 'byung zhing dri ma sbyang /_/gzhang khar gzhang 'brum zhi 'gyur zhing /_/me drod skyed par byed pa yin/_/rtug skam gyis ni gzir ba dang /_/
[\[191a.2\]]gang yang shin tu khong rtsub dang /_/rlung 'khyil gzer gyis nyen pa gang /_/de la 'jam rtsi bya ba bsngags/_/pi pi ling dang po son cha/_/bil ba shu ti shing mngar dang /_/shu dag ru rta kru trug tres/_/zur pa ma nu thang shing rnams/_/btags te til mar la btso
[\[191a.3\]]zhing /_/'o ma til mar nyis 'gyur gzhug_/gzhang 'brum rlung gis 'khyil ba la/_/'jam rtsi de ni mchog tu bsngags/_/gzhang 'byung ba dang gzer ba dang /_/gcin sri 'khrog cing 'khru ba dang /_/brla rked rgyab na nyam chung dang /_/lto sbos chu sor brten pa
[\[191a.4\]]dang /_/be snabs 'khru dang gzhang skrang dang /_/rlung gis rtug ba 'gags pa dang /_/gang zhig mang du 'byung 'dod pa/_/de dag 'jam rtsis sel bar byed/_/yang na mas gtong bkru sman drag_/rtsa ba lnga pa 'o mar bcas/_/ba gcin til mar lan tshwa dang /_/son
[\[191a.5\]]cha la sogs lde gu gtang /_/de nas gzhang 'brum khrag 'dzag pa/_/rlung ngam bad kan dang 'brel ba/_/btags nas de la snum pa dang /_/rtsub dang bsil ba sbyar bar bya/_/de la rlung dang rjes 'brel ba/_/bshang ba gnag cing sra la rtsub/_/rlung ni thur du 'byung mi
[\[191a.6\]]byed/_/rked pa brla dang gzhang kha gzer/_/rtsub pa'i rgyur ni gyur pa yin/_/bad kan rjes 'brel bshang ba sla/_/skya zhing ser la lci zhing snum/_/spyi bag gzhang kha tshor ba chung /_/rgyu ni snum lci yin zhes bya/_/rang khrag mtshan nyid las kyang brtags/_/nad khrag
[\[191a.7\]]bsal bar bya ba dang /_/nyams stobs ji bzhin smyung ba bya/_/ji srid nad khrag nag po byung /_/de srid khrag 'dzag gcad mi bya/_/nad ni smin par bya phyir dang /_/me drod bskyed par bya phyir dang /_/khrag ni gcad par bya ba'i phyir/_/de phan chad ni kha ba blud/_/gang zhig nad
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]kyis stobs zad pa/_/khrag ni rlung gi shes che la/_/btung dang bsku dang 'jam rtsi ru/_/rig pas snum ni sbyar bar bya/_/gang zhig mkhris pa rgyas pa'i khrag_/tsha ba'i dus su 'byung gyur pa/_/de ni gcig tu gcad bya yi/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur min/_/bad kan bcas
[\[191b.2\]]khrag bca' sga dang /_/dug mo nyung shun bskol ba blud/_/yang na rtsa mkhris bca' sga dang /_/byi tsher tsan+dan dmar po'am/_/skyer pa'i shun pa pu shel tse/_/nim pa'am se 'bru'i shun bskol blud/_/dug mo nyung shun 'bras bu dang /_/bong nga sbrang rtsi skyer khaN+Da 'am/_/
[\[191b.3\]]yang na a pa marga yi/_/lde gu 'bras kyi chu sbyar blud/_/dug mo nyung gi shun pa rlon/_/srang brgyad char chu nang du bskol/_/shun lpags khu ba btsags pa ru/_/btsod dang mo tsa pri yang+ku'i/_/khu ba srang re dag dang ni/_/dug mo nyung gi phye ma bcug_/de nas gzar bur
[\[191b.4\]]chags pa yi/_/lde gu bskol ba sbyin bya zhing /_/thug pa thug sla'i'o thug gam/_/ra 'am ba yi'o ma'am/_/me stobs ji bzhin blud par bya/_/lde gu 'dis ni khrag gi ni/_/tshad 'khru gzhang 'brum sel byed cing /_/khrag mkhris nad ni stobs ldan pa/_/
[\[191b.5\]]steng ngam 'og nas 'byung ba sel/_/dug mo nyung shun srang brgyad cu/_/bre bcu drug bskol brgyad cha blud/_/de ni cha gsum skyer khaN+Da/_/seng phrom gnyis dang mon cha ra/_/se 'bru gzhon nu'i shun lpags dang /_/bil ba gzhon nu gla sgang dang /_/btsod dang da ta ka'i
[\[191b.6\]]'bras bu/_/srang ni re re btags pa yi/_/lde gur byas pa gzhug par bya/_/dug mo nyung shun srang bcu dang /_/zhun mar srang ni nyi shu dang /_/bu ram srang ni sum cu gzhug_/bskol la gzar bur chags pa dang /_/'bru nang zla phyed bcug ste bldag_/gzhang
[\[191b.7\]]'brum kun dang pho ba'i nad/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/seng phrom mo tsa ra sa til/_/btsod dang tsan+dan ut+pal/_/ra yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud/_/de nyid dang ni 'bas chen sbyin/_/shing mngar shun pa byi tsher ba/_/'o ma dUr ba pa ya s+ya/_/khar sbrang rtsir
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]bcas chu'am/_/ra yi 'o ma sbyar ba btung /_/seng phrom btsod dang pu shel tse/_/sha ma li shun dug mo nyung /_/tsan+dan shing mngar pu shel tse/_/nA ga ge sar 'bras chur blud/_/la la phud dang dug mo nyung /_/pa ta bca' sga skyer khaN+Da'i/_/
[\[192a.2\]]phye ma gzer dang bcas la phan/_/khrag ni drag tu 'byung ba la/_/kaN+Da ka ri pa ya s+ya/_/gnyis dang bskol ba'i zhun mar bsngags/_/yang na seng phrom da ta ki/_/dug mo nyung shun 'bras bu dang /_/ut+pal pad+ma ge sar mar/_/ya bak+Sha ra se 'bru'i bcud/_/kha
[\[192a.3\]]ra pad+ma ge sar dang /_/mar sar bcas pa til sbyar ba'am/_/mar sar sbyar bas khrag las ni/_/gyur pa'i gzhang 'brum sel bar byed/_/ra yi mar sar 'o ma dang /_/skam sa'i srog chags sha khrag dang /_/rgya sne'i khu bar bcas sha khu/_/cung zad skyur dang skyur med pa/_/
[\[192a.4\]]sA lu tsa snar zho yi spri/_/drug cu pa dang chang sar dang /_/chang gi dngas ma sar pa ni/_/khrag las gyur pa'i sman mchog yin/_/thug pa yu sha sha khu sogs/_/yang na kun dong 'ba' zhig gis/_/khrag rgyas gyur pa sel byed de/_/rlung las gyur pa'ang sbyar bar bya/_/
[\[192a.5\]]phal cher rlung shas che gzhang 'brum/_/khrag 'dzag drags las 'byung 'gyur bas/_/de bas lhag par de la ni/_/de bsal ba la 'bad par bya/_/khrag mkhris shas che bad kan dang /_/rlung shas che bar mthong gyur na/_/de zhi bya phyir rnam kun du/_/bsil ba'i cho ga spyad
[\[192a.6\]]par bya/_/gal te des kyang ma zhi na/_/de tshe snum dang dro bas brta/_/sha khu dro 'jam zhun mar ni/_/thog ma nyid du sbyar bar bya/_/de la til mar mar dang ni/_/'o ma dro 'jam blud pa'ang bsngags/_/byi tsher ku sha 'jag ma'i rtswa/_/shal ma li yi me tog dang /_/
[\[192a.7\]]u dum bA ra n+ya gro d+ha/_/a shwad+tha yi myu gu srang /_/gnyis gnyis chu bre gsum dang ni/_/'o ma bre gang nang du bskol/_/'o ma lus nas tshigs ma btsags/_/khu ba der ni mon cha ra/_/btsod dang tsan+dan ut+pal/_/ut+pal pad+ma'i ge sar dang /_/dug mo nyung gi sa bon
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]te/_/'di rnams btags pa'i lde gu bsres/_/'di ni spyi bag 'jam rtsir grags/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas/_/mkhregs dang gzhang ni 'byung ba dang /_/khrag 'dzag rims ni 'joms par byed/_/shing mngar pra puN+Da rI ka_/de bzhin mon char la sogs/_/nyis
[\[192b.2\]]'gyur gyi ni 'o ma bskol/_/snum gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya/_/shing mngar ut+pal seng phrom btsod/_/bil ba tsan+dan ba le ka_/dbyi mo gla sgang bong nga dkar/_/ba ta ya bak+Sha ra mchog_/skyer pa shing tsha tsi tra ka_/dong ga spang spos thang shing
[\[192b.3\]]dang /_/tsang gi ri yi khu ba mar/_/bskol ba des ni nyes gsum 'joms/_/gzhang 'brum tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad/_/skya rbab rims dang yi ga 'chus/_/gcin sri gzhang ni nyams pa dang /_/chu so sbo dang mkhregs pa dang /_/be snabs 'khru dang gzhang 'brum sel/_/
[\[192b.4\]]de blud sman gyi dam pa yin/_/rim gyis mngar zhing skyur ba dang /_/grang dro la sogs rtag tu ni/_/me drod stobs las ltos te gtang /_/gzhang 'brum nad las rgyal bar 'gyur/_/rtug skam gyis nyen til mar ni/_/grang ba'i rims la phan pas bsku/_/rlan dugs
[\[192b.5\]]snum can gyis dugs bya/_/de nas reng bu gzhug bya ste/_/sha ma dur byid dan da dang /_/ni li ni 'bras pi pi ling /_/po son cha lan tshwa nyes 'gyur/_/phyer btags bu ram ba gcin sbyar/_/mar bskus ring bu mthe bong tsam/_/bcug na rtug skam bde 'byung
[\[192b.6\]]byed/_/pi pi ling dang po son cha/_/khyim gyi dung pa nyungs kar bcas/_/'di dag nyid kyi phye ma ni/_/rkub nas gce 'us 'bud bar bya/_/de don med na rab rno snum/_/mas gtong bas ni btsir te gtang /_/des ni gzhang rtsa drang por byed/_/bshang gci 'phyen ni bde bar
[\[192b.7\]]'byung /_/slar yang 'gags na rlung 'joms pa'i/_/bkru sman snum can gtang bya zhing /_/'jam rtsi dag ni gtang bar bya/_/rtsub pas rlung ni rtug skam 'gyur/_/lan tshwa gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/'bras bu gsum dang dan ti dang /_/bse shing 'bras bu tsi
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]tra ka_/phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsis sbrus/_/rdza skyogs kha sbyar 'jim pas byugs/_/du ba nang 'khyims bsreg par bya/_/thal ba dge ba can zhes bya/_/mar dang lhan cig blud pa'am/_/'bras chan snum can dang sbyar zos/_/rtug skam 'gags
[\[193a.2\]]dang gzhang 'brum skran/_/skya rbab dmu rdzing bde gcin sri/_/snying nad 'or nad pho ba'i nad/_/gcin snyi mchin pa gzer dang smro/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/_/gzhang 'brum la ni gang zhig bshad/_/de bzhin rtug skam dag la sbyar/_/ka rany+dza shun srang ni nyis
[\[193a.3\]]brgya bcu/_/bre bcu drug bskol bzhi cha lus pa der/_/bu ram srang ni brgyad cu tsha ba gsum/_/srang brgyad zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma gzhug_/'di dag zla gcig bzhag ste langs gyur nas/_/tsha byas mchog tu drod skyed zas 'ju ba'i/_/nus skyed rlung bder rgyu byas gzhang
[\[193a.4\]]'brum dang /_/mcher nad skran dang dmu rdzing sel bar byed/_/pu ti ka rany+dza ni srang brgyad dang /_/tsi tra kaN+Da ka ri srang nyis brgya/_/chu bre bzhi bcu brgyad bskol bzhi cha lus/_/btsags te bsgrangs par bu ram srang brgyad gzhug/_/dri sna gsum dang tsha gsum se 'bru dang /_/pi pi
[\[193a.5\]]ling gi rtsa ba sru sru'i rtsa/_/gu gul ma nu 'u su dbyi mong dang /_/spa ma'i 'bras bu sge gsher star bu ni/_/srang re zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma bskol/_/bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi srang ni nyi shu gzhug_/sge gsher skyur rtsi chen po rgun 'brum rlon/_/bu ram shing gi khu ba btsir ba
[\[193a.6\]]bcas/_/mar gyi snod bcug zla gcig bzhag ste langs/_/skyur gyur 'di ni gzhang 'brum sog le ste/_/me drod skyed par byed pa'i mchog yin la/_/skya rbab dbyig drug dmu rdzing skran mcher pa/_/lto sbos rde'u chags gcin sri 'joms par byed/_/pi lu'i khu ba ras
[\[193a.7\]]btsags bre bcu drug_/mar gyi snod kyi nang du bcug nas ni/_/da ta ki dang rgun 'bru 'bra go dang /_/skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu srang gnyis gnyis/_/pa ta bong nga dkar po byi tsher ba/_/star bu tsha ba gsum dang shing tsha dang /_/sug smel 'u su spra ki ka ko la/_/li shi pi pi ling rtsa byi
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]dang ga_/kru trug tres srang re re bu ram ni/_/srang brgyad rlung med gnas su zla phyed gzhag_/des ni gzhang 'brum skran bcas zhi byed cing /_/me yi stobs ni myur du skyed par byed/_/yang na rtsa ba bcu pa dur byid dang /_/pa ta ar ka gnyis dang bong nga dkar/_/kad pa la
[\[193b.2\]]rnams re re srang bcu bcu/_/snga ma bzhin du bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/_/chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol nas ni/_/bzhi cha lus par bu ram srang brgya dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang dbyi mong a ru ra/_/srang lnga tsi tra ka ni srang gnyis dang /_/ya bak+Sha ra srang gnyis bcug ste
[\[193b.3\]]bskol/_/gzar bur chags pa'i bu ram lde gu yis/_/skran dang mcher nang gzhang 'brum mdze nad dang /_/gcin nad me drod nyams pa 'joms par byed/_/tsi tra ka yi rtsa ba srang lnga bcu/_/chu srang bcu drug bskol la brgyad cha lus/_/der ni bu ram rnying pa srang brgya
[\[193b.4\]]gzhug_/slar bskol ska bar gyur pa de nang du/_/tsha ba gsum dang shu ti a ru ra/_/ru rta gla sgang shing tsha byi dang ga_/tsi tra ka dang sug smel phyer btags bsres/_/des ni gzhang 'brum mdze dang skran dang ni/_/mcher pa dmu rdzing nad ni 'joms byed cing /_/rtag tu
[\[193b.5\]]bsten na me drod skyed par byed/_/tsha ba gsum dang til dang 'bras bu gsum/_/byi dang ga dang go bye tsi tra ka_/bu ram ri lur byas bsten gzhang 'brum dang /_/pags pa'i nad ni sel bar byed pa yin/_/sor na yi rtsa ba kha sbyar bcug_/'jim pas bskus te cho ga bzhin
[\[193b.6\]]bsregs pa/_/lan tshwa til mar bcas pa zos gyur na/_/gzhang 'brum sel bar byed pa'i dam pa yin/_/na le sham dang pi pi ling dong gra/_/kru trug tres ni cha re bskyed pa dang /_/tsi tra bzhi 'gyur su ra na dang sbyar/_/bu ram ri lus gzhang 'brum gcod par byed/_/so
[\[193b.7\]]ra na yi bcu drug phyer btags shing /_/tsi tra ka ni de yi cha phyed bya/_/bca' sga cha gnyis na le sham cha gcig_/bu ram ri lur byas pas gzhang 'brum sel/_/a ru ra dang dong gra pi pi ling /_/ka rany+dza dang tsi tra byi dang ga/_/ka ra mnyam phye rgod ma'i kha lta bu/_/zas lci mang du
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]zos kyang 'ju bar byed/_/dug mo nyung laM ga li pi pi ling /_/tsi tra ka dang a ba marga yi/_/sa bon rtsa mkhris rgyam tsha bu ram rnams/_/ri lur byas pas gzhang 'brum sel bar byed/_/gal te gzhang 'brum gzhig par 'dod na ni/_/rgyam tsha tsi tra ka
[\[194a.2\]]dang dug mo nyung /_/tsi li bil ba nim par bcas pa dag_/btags pa'i phye ma dar bar bcas pa btung /_/gzhang 'brum skam la ba la ta ka ste/_/gsher la dug mo nyung shun sman mchog yin/_/kun la dus kun du ni dar rnying mchog_/stobs skyed byed cing nad rnams
[\[194a.3\]]'joms pa yin/_/rtug pa 'gags pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_/rlung sel me drod skyed par byed pa yi/_/bza' dang btung ba gang yin de bsten bya/_/de las go zlog pa ni spang bar bya/_/gzhang 'brum tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad rnams ni/_/phal cher phan tshun rgyur gyur
[\[194a.4\]]yin pas na/_/me drod chung na skye'i che na min/_/de bas de la mchog tu me drod bsrung /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o//_//de nas 'khru ba gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/'khru ba phal cher
[\[194a.5\]]ma zhu ba'i/_/gnas rten me drod nyams pa la/_/'byung bas de'i phyir rlung gyur la'ang /_/dang po smyung ba byas pa phan/_/gzer dbo bad kan gyis nyam thag_/'khru ba can ni slon du gzhug_/nad ni gang zhig sogs pa dag_/ma smin zas dang 'dres gyur na/_/'khru ba dag
[\[194a.6\]]ni 'byung gyur te/_/shin tu slongs te 'byung gyur dang /_/rang nyid 'khru byed de la ni/_/btang snyoms gzhag pa de nyid sman/_/ma zhu 'khrul dang por ni/_/gcod pa'i sman ni gtang mi bya/_/gal te 'gags byed lto sbo lci/_/gzer dang tshor ba chung gyur la/_/a
[\[194a.7\]]ru btang na nad 'khyil ba/_/'byin pas srog ni ster byed yin/_/nad tshabs 'bring la khyad par du/_/bu ti ka dang pi pi ling /_/bca' sga shu dag a ru ra/_/'u su legs par bskol ba blud/_/yang na bil ba 'u su dang /_/gla sgang dong gra ba le ka_/pa tha shu dag kha ru tsha/_/
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]dong ga byi dang a ru ra/_/bca' sga gla sgang bong nga dkar/_/bil ba shing kun dug mo nyung /_/nad gzhi chung ba'i tshad 'khrul/_/smyung ba byas pa bsngags pa yin/_/yang na shu dag bong nga dkar/_/gla sgang par pa ta bskol pa 'am/_/ba le ka dang dong gra ni/_/bskol
[\[194b.2\]]ba'i chu dag blud par bya/_/bkres shing nyam chung zas dus su/_/kha zas yang ba rig pas sbyin/_/des de'i kha zas yi gar 'ong /_/me drod lus stobs skyed par byed/_/dar ba'am rang skyur dag gam ni/_/nas thug dag gi skyo ma'am/_/chang ngam rgun chang dag gi ni/_/
[\[194b.3\]]btung ba gang 'os nyer spyad bya/_/kha zas byin pa'i 'og tu ni/_/bil ba gzhon nu zur ba dkar/_/'u su shing kun nga trig se'u/_/zi ra spa 'bras pa la sha_/la la phud dang kha ru tsha/_/rgyam tsha rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/_/tsha ba lnga dang pa tha ste/_/smin gcod drod ni skyed par byed/_/
[\[194b.4\]]bad kan mkhris pa'i shas che la/_/sa la par+Ni ba la dang /_/bil ba kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_/se 'bru bskol ba'i thug pa phan/_/pi pi ling rtsa a ru ra/_/thug pas rlung ni bder rgyu byed/_/nad gzhi mang la 'gags pa dang /_/me drod che bar gang zhig 'khru/_/pi pi ling dang 'bras
[\[194b.5\]]bu gsum/_/byi dang ga bskol bkru sman gtang /_/sbyangs byas nas ni thug pa dag_/rlung 'joms me drod skyed pa blud/_/gang zhig ma zhu smin gyur dang /_/me drod skyes nas 'khru 'gyur zhing /_/'byar bag lbum can nad bcas pa/_/sri shing yang dang yang du ni/_/yang
[\[194b.6\]]yang 'khru zhing bshang chung ba'am/_/bshang ba ma 'dres mkhregs bcas la/_/zho dang 'o ma mar til mar/_/bca' sga bu ram bcas pa blud/_/yang na rgya shug 'bras bu spangs/_/bu ram til mar ldan pa sbyin/_/bshang bsri la phan tshod ma/_/sdum mang de bzhin sha khu
[\[194b.7\]]dang /_/zho dang se 'bru g.yos pa dang /_/sA lu'i 'bras chen ma sha til/_/mung+ga legs par g.yos pa'i zas/_/de ni bkres par gyur tshe sbyin/_/zur ba'i rtsa ba ka pi ta/_/pa ta swa ti ka'i tshod ma/_/shu sha la la phud dang ni/_/kar ka ru dang sring gi ni/_/yang na
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]tsir bi ta yang rung /_/u po ta ka dzi ban ti/_/ba gu rtse dang rgya sne'u dang /_/lcam pa'am yang na e raN dang /_/lo ni ka yi khu ba dang /_/rus sbal bye'u lo ba ka_/rma bya sreg pa khyim bya yi/_/sha khu dang yang sbyin par bya/_/bil ba gla sgang ba ru ra/_/bca'
[\[195a.2\]]sga da ta ka'i me tog_/dar ba bskol ba'i nas thug gam/_/zho dang sbyar bas 'khru ba sel/_/ka pid ta dang ka tsu ra/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba yu ti dang /_/n+ya gro d+ha dang rdo dreg dang /_/se 'bru so mar bal dang /_/shal ma li yi lo ma phan/_/bil ba gzhon nu'i lde gu dang /_/til btags lde gu'ang de dang mnyam/_/
[\[195a.3\]]zho yi spris skyur snum bcas dang /_/sbyar dug mkhregs pa 'joms par byed/_/'u su zi ra na le sham/_/da trig zur pa kha ru tsha/_/se 'bru pa ta da ta ki/_/'bras gsum cha lnga ka pi/_/nas tshig 'khus thal la la phud/_/a mra 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu'i rkang /_/bil ba
[\[195a.4\]]drug 'gyur lde gur btags/_/zho dang bu ram mung+ga'i khu/_/til mar mar dang g.yos pa dag_/gzhan gyis mi thub sbyar thug 'di/_/drod skyed smin byed 'khru ba gcod/_/yi ga 'byed cing mkhregs pa sel/_/rgya shug bil ba gzhon nu yi/_/lde gu 'bras dang nas dang
[\[195a.5\]]ni/_/mud ga ma sha til rnams dang /_/'bru yi yu shar rnam par btags/_/bshang ba zad cing kha skam la/_/zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba dang /_/mar dang til mar lhan cig brngos/_/'bras chan de dang sbyar ba ni/_/bshang zad kha ni skam la sbyin/_/yang na zho spris snum
[\[195a.6\]]gnyis brngos/_/bu ram bca' sgar bcas pa sbyin/_/yang na chang ni snum gnyis brngos/_/tshod ma'i don du sbyin pa'am/_/'bras bu skyur po snum gnyis brngos/_/sgog pa las byas yu sha'am/_/snum gnyis dang brngos phye zan ni/_/tsha ba gsum gyi phye btab sbyin/_/
[\[195a.7\]]de bzhin ma sha legs bcos pa/_/mar gyi snying po blud pa'am/_/ra thug lug thug dag gi sha_/btsos te btsags pa'i khu ba dang /_/se 'bru'i khu ba'i chu dang ni/_/'u su dong gra snum bcas bskol/_/sA lu rtsa snar bcas pa ni/_/za zhing de nyid 'thungs pa/_
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]yis/_/rtug pa zad pa las byung ba'i/_/nad las myur du thar bar 'gyur/_/bu ram til mar bil ba gzhon/_/pi pi ling dang bca' sga yi/_/lde gus rlung gis gnod gyur pa'i/_/gzer thabs mkhregs dang bcas pa sel/_/seng phrom shun lpags da ta ka'i/_/
[\[195b.2\]]me tog rgya shug 'dab ma rnams/_/zho spris sbrang rtsi ka pi ta'i/_/khu bar sbyar ba blud na phan/_/rlung gis rtug 'gags shas cher ni/_/na zhing mkhregs par byed pa dang /_/be snabs khrag bcas skom gdungs la/_/'o ma tshim par blud na phan/_/til mar mar gyi steng du ni/_/
[\[195b.3\]]bzhos ma thag pa'i 'o ma blud/_/yang na a raN+Da yi rtsa'am/_/bil ba gzhon nu bskol ba blud/_/gla sgang nyi shu 'o ma yi/_/sum 'gyur gyi ni chu bskol ba/_/'khru ba gzer bcas sel bar byed/_/pi pi ling dang na le sham/_/zhib du btags pa'i phye dang sbyin/_/
[\[195b.4\]]des ni yun ring gnas pa yi/_/mkhregs pa sel bar byed par 'gyur/_/ma zhu med cing gzer gyis nyen/_/smyung ba la sogs pas nyams smad/_/khong rtsub me drod brtags nas ni/_/mar ni thal sman rno bcas sbyin/_/yang na rtsa ba bcu bskol chu/_/zho dang chang gi dngas mar
[\[195b.5\]]bskol/_/lce myang tsha dang tsha ba lnga/_/til mar 'phral du nad 'joms byed/_/bca' sga srang drug pi pi ling /_/mU la kru trug tres rgyam tsha/_/srang gnyis til mar bre gang dang /_/zho dang bskol ba'i til mar ni/_/'khru ba'i nad ni sel byed yin/_/sha dang 'o ma
[\[195b.6\]]mar phyogs gcig_/btung dang 'jam rtsi bsku ba ru/_/til mar 'ba' zhig phyogs gcig sbyar/_/bshang mkhregs gzer ni 'joms byed yin/_/de ni rlung sel mchog yin la/_/rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs gzer mi 'byung /_/khams gzhan 'joms pas
[\[195b.7\]]'bar gyur pa/_/rlung ni rang gnas brten khyab byed/_/me drod chung la til mar ni/_/sbyar bas bde bar byed pa'i mchog_/til mar bcas pa rlung gnas su/_/mkhregs pa gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/dri ma zad cing nad gzhan rang gi ni/_/gnas las 'phos pas rlung ni stobs
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]che ba/_/khong pa gzer zhing mkhregs par byed pa la/_/phyi nang til mar ma btang su zhig 'tsho/_/gzhang na 'byung bar gyur pa la/_/'o mar bskol ba'i mar rgya shug_/skyur po tsang gi ri'i khu ba/_/zho dang dong grar btags pa blud/_/sgyur ba de nyid bcug pa dang /_/
[\[196a.2\]]'u su na le sham zir/_/kha ru tsha dang tsha ba lnga/_/se 'bru dag dang sbyar ba ni/_/zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu phan/_/rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba yi/_/zur ba shu ti ru rta'am/_/shu dag tsi tra ka bskol ba'i/_/snum gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya/_/mkhregs dang gzhang ni 'byung ba dang /_/gcin
[\[196a.3\]]sri rked pa na ba dang /_/mngar dang skyur bar bskol ba yi/_/mar ram til mar 'jam rtsi gtang /_/gzhang 'byung gzhug pa dka' ba la/_/bsku zhing dugs ni 'jam byas gzhug_/dbus su phug pa'i pags pa ni/_/'ur mthil 'ching bdag kyang bya/_/rtsa ba lnga ni chen
[\[196a.4\]]po yi/_/khu ba dang ni 'o mar bskol/_/byi ba rgyu ma bton pas kyang /_/rlung 'joms lde gu lta bur bya/_/til mar bskol gzhang 'byung ba la/_/btung dang bsku bas de gso bya/_/mkhris pa ma zhu rno dang dro/_/spangs la sngon bzhin smyung ba bya/_/skom bcas yan lag drug
[\[196a.5\]]pa'i chu/_/rtswa mkhris thal tres bcas pa blud/_/bkres na kha zas thug pa sogs/_/bri ha ti sogs nye'u shing pa/_/ba la rnam gnyis par+Ni gnyis/_/bskol ba drod skyed byed pa phan/_/blud kyang rjes su 'brel gyur na/_/dug mo nyung shun 'bras bu dang /_/bong nga dkar po
[\[196a.6\]]bcas btags phye/_/sbrang rtsi bsres pa 'bras chu blud/_/ba tha dug mo nyung shun 'bras/_/skyer pa pi pi ling rtsa'am/_/bong nga bil ba dug mo nyung /_/gla sgang ba le ka bskol ba'am/_/yang na bong nga dkar mur ba/_/skyer pa dbul rdo dug mo nyung /_/bong nga bca' sga dug mo nyung /_/gla
[\[196a.7\]]sgang kad pal sbrang rtsir bcas/_/dug mo nyung gi sa bon ni/_/srang gcig bskol ba'i khu ba blud/_/gang zhig sha khu bcas sbyar za/_/mkhris bcas lto ba'i nad sel 'gyur/_/de bzhin gla sgang bskol ba'i khu/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud pas phan/_/shal ma li yi 'dab ma'i rtsa/_/bskol ba'i
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]khu ba bsgrangs pa'am/_/rtsa mkhris gla sgang dug mo nyung /_/skyer khaN+Da dang bcas pa'am/_/yang na skyer pa ba le ka_/bil ba'i rkang dang byi tsher ba/_/til dang seng phrom mon cha ra/_/btsod dang pad+ma ut+pal/_/dong gra da ta ka'i me tog_/se 'bru'i shun pa ut+pal bcas/_/
[\[196b.2\]]tshigs bcad phyed kyis bshad sbyor ba/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'bras chu blud/_/skyer pa seng phrom dug mo nyung /_/sug smel bskol bas smin 'khru sel/_/seng phrom dang ni a brta/_/pri yang ku sogs sde tshan dang /_/bskol ba so sor blud de bzhin/_/pu tse shel dang shing
[\[196b.3\]]mngar dang /_/se 'bru'i myu gu pri yang ku/_/zho dang 'u su'i 'bras bur bcas/_/thug pa lde gus sbyar dugs bya/_/de bzhin bil ba ka pid tha/_/a mra 'dam bu'i rkang las sbyar/_/smin pa'i khu bar ra'i 'o ma/_/mchog tu phan te des kyang ni/_/stobs ldan nad gzhi che ba'i
[\[196b.4\]]phyir/_/ma zhin ni bkru sman gtang /_/rim gyis bshad pa khrag dag tu/_/gang zhig 'khru bar gyur pa la'ang /_/pa la sha yi 'bras bu yi/_/khu ba dang sbyar 'o ma blud/_/de nas 'o ma dro 'jam tsam/_/nyams stobs ji bzhin blud par bya/_/des ni dri ma bsal bas na/_/
[\[196b.5\]]lto yi nad ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/kyi lce ba yi sbyang ba yang /_/pa la sha ltar sbyor ba bya/_/thug sogs rim pa byas kyang ni/_/gal te gzer ni ma zhi na/_/nyes bsal de la me drod stobs/_/las dpags 'jam rtsi myur du gtang /_/sha ta puSh+pa nye shing dang /_/bil ba dang ni shing
[\[196b.6\]]mngar dag_/mar 'o til mar bzhi char bcas/_/bskol ba 'jam rtsi'i sman mar yin/_/des ni tsha 'khru ma zhi na/_/spyi bag 'jam rtsi mchog tu phan/_/shal ma li yi lo ma rlon/_/ku sha rlon pas dkris nas ni/_/sa nag lde gu bskus nas su/_/lci ba skam po'i me nang
[\[196b.7\]]bsregs/_/'jim pa lus pa de bkog ste/_/gong po de las srang gcig tsam/_/'o ma bre gang nang du mnye/_/btsags la dngas mar rgya spos dang /_/shing mngar sbrang rtsi lde gu mar/_/til mar ldan pas 'jam rtsi bya/_/khrus byas 'o ma 'bras chan sbyin/_/yang na skam sa'i sha khu sbyin/_/
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]mkhris pa'i tshad 'khru rims dang 'or nad skran/_/rlung nad khrag dang pho ba'i nad sel zhing /_/'di dag bkru sman mas gtong drag po yi/_/sbyor byas drag tu 'byung ba'ang myur zhi byed/_/dug mo nyung ni bu ram phran/_/ltar bskol dug mo nyung sogs sde/_/a
[\[197a.2\]]brta sogs sbrang rtsir bcas/_/lde gus 'khru ba thams cad sel/_/smin cing nad med me drod che/_/khrag dang bcas pa ring nas 'khru/_/sna tshogs mdog tu 'khru 'gyur ba/_/sman thum btsos pa sbyar bar bya/_/kad pha la yi shun lde gu/_/bil ba'i lo mas dkris
[\[197a.3\]]nas ni/_/'jim pas bskus te me nang bsregs/_/khu ba btsir la bsgrangs pa ni/_/sbrang rtsi'am kha rar bcas pa ru/_/'khru ba can la ci rigs blud/_/de bzhin 'o ma can shing kun/_/de yi myu gu las kyang bya/_/'khri shing shun pa mar dang bcas/_/bskol ba'i
[\[197a.4\]]rlangs pas btsos pa ni/_/sbrang rtsi bcas pa tsha 'khru ba/_/stobs can drag tu 'byung ba'ang sel/_/mkhris pa'i 'khru ba can gyis ni/_/mkhris pa skyed byed gang bsten pa/_/de yis mkhris pa 'khrugs gyur nas/_/khrag gi tshad 'khru skom dad rims/_/'debs shing
[\[197a.5\]]gzhang kha mi bzad 'drul/_/pad+ma ut+pal sa mang ga_/mon cha ras bskol ba yi/_/ra yi 'o ma de la phan/_/thal tres shing mngar seng phrom mam/_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs myu gu dang /_/sbrang rtsi kha rar bcas pa ni/_/btung ba'am gzhang khar blugs pas phan/_/de bzhin sha
[\[197a.6\]]khu sogs skyon med/_/mar bcas bsgrangs pa'i zas skom phan/_/tang pal 'bras bu'i khu ba ni/_/cung zad skyur zhing ka rar bcas/_/ra yi 'o ma chu phyed dang /_/ut+pal dong gra ba le ka_/_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni khu bar bcas/_/thug pas khrag gi tshad 'khru sel/_/zas kyi sngon du mar
[\[197a.7\]]sar ni/_/sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar ba bldag_/khrag 'khru tshabs che la ra'am/_/ri dgas khrag gi mar brngos sbyin/_/'o ma dang bza' 'o ma btung /_/'o ma bsrubs mar zhag gsum bsten/_/yang na gong ma sreg gi ni/_/sha khu dang zos nad med 'gyur/_/nye shing btags pa
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]'o ma dang /_/lhan cig blud cing 'o mar bza'/_/yang na de dang bskol ba yi/_/mar gyis tshad 'khru myur du sel/_/rgya skyegs bca' sga pi pi ling /_/skyer pa'i shun pa pu tse shel/_/dug mo nyung dang bcas bskol mar/_/thug sla thug pa dang sbyar bas/_/nad gzhi gsum las
[\[197b.2\]]byung ba yi/_/mi zad 'khru ba'ang myur du sel/_/sa nag dung dang shing mngar dang /_/sbrang rtsir khrag 'bras chu blud/_/khrag gis 'khru ba sel bar byed/_/pri yang ku dang sbrang rtsi'ang phan/_/til nag btags pa'i lde gu dang /_/sha khar ni cha lnga ni/_/ra yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud/_/
[\[197b.3\]]'phral du khrag tu 'khru ba sel/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi tsan+dan bcas/_/'bras kyi chu dang blud na ni/_/khong tsha skom dang gcin nad dang /_/khrag tu 'khru las thar bar 'gyur/_/gzhang kha tsha zhing 'drul ba la/_/bsil ba'i sman gyis blugs shing bsku/_/gang tshe yang dang yang du
[\[197b.4\]]'khru/_/khrag nyung gzer dang bcas par 'khru/_/rlung gis gags ni byas gyur pas/_/skabs 'byung ba'am mi 'byung byed/_/de tshe de la spyi bag ni/_/'jam rtsi sngar bshad gtang bar bya/_/kar bu dar shing sha pa/_/la sogs lo ma cham chom brdungs/_/nas dang bskol ba'i
[\[197b.5\]]khu ba de/_/mar dang 'o ma bcas par bskol/_/spyi bag 'jam rtsi btang na ni/_/be+e snabs 'khru dang gzhang 'byung dang /_/mkhregs pa'i nad rnams sel byed cing /_/skem po stobs ni skyed par byed/_/stag tsher ba dang bskol ba yi/_/mar gyi 'jam rtsi gtang bar
[\[197b.6\]]bya/_/dang por bshang ba khrag 'dres 'byung /_/yang na phyis ni 'khru gyur pa/_/de la nye shing bskol ba'i mar/_/lde gu'i don du sbyar bar bya/_/kha ra cha phyed dang sbyar la/_/sbrang rtsi bzhi cha bcug pa yi/_/mar sar phan pa'i zas zos na/_/nad de myur du sel bar 'gyur/_/
[\[197b.7\]]u dum wA ra n+ya gro d+ha/_/a shwad+tha yi myu gu ni/_/brdungs te zhag gcig chu nang sbangs/_/mnyes te btsags par mar bskol la/_/kha ra de yi phyed btab cing /_/sbrang rtsi bzhi cha btab ste blud/_/gang zhig khrag ni thur du'am/_/gyen du 'byung bar byed la sbyin/_/bad kan
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]'khru ba rlung bshad pa'i/_/ma zhu smin bya mchog tu bya/_/rjes su 'brel pa de la ni/_/bil ba gzhon nu gla sgang dang /_/a ru ra dang bca' sga bskol/_/smin cing me drod skyed pa blud/_/shu dag dong gra byi dang ga_/bu ti ka dang thang shing dang /_/pi pi ling
[\[198a.2\]]gnyis kru trug tres/_/pi pi ling gi rtsa ba'am/_/pa ta tsi tra dug mo nyung /_/shu dag pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/pu tse shel dang a ru ra/_/bskol ba'am yang na btags pa sbyin/_/bad kan tshad par 'khru sman blud/_/kha ru tsha dang tsha ba gsum/_/shu dag shing kun bong nga
[\[198a.3\]]dkar/_/a ru ra yi chu tshan bcas/_/bad kan 'khru bas nyen la blud/_/ka pid ta yi rkang dang ni/_/tsha gsum sbrang rtsi sha kha ra'am/_/kad pha la dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/lto yi nad ni sel byed yin/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/tsi tra ka dang dar bar bcas/_/bil ba
[\[198a.4\]]gzhon nu byin na yang /_/'khru ba'i nad ni sel bar byed/_/pa ta gla sgang mon cha ra/_/bil ba dong gra da ta ka'am/_/bu ram dar bar bcas pa yis/_/'khru ba shin tu gso dka' 'ang sel/_/pi pi ling rtsal la phud/_/dri bzang bzhi dang dong gra dang /_/na le sham
[\[198a.5\]]dang kru trug tres/_/'u su zi ra ba le ka_/kha ru tsha rnams cha mnyam dang /_/da trig dang ni da ta ki_/bil ba dang ni pi pi ling /_/se 'bru dang ni la la phud/_/sum 'gyur ka ra drug 'gyur dang /_/ka pid ta ni brgyad 'gyur byas/_/phye mas tshad 'khru pho ba'i nad/_/zad byed skran
[\[198a.6\]]dang lkog ma'i nad/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde drod nyams/_/gzhang 'brum cham pa yi ga 'chus sel/_/smig rkang dang ni dri sna bzhi/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis la la phud/_/'u su zi ra zho bzhi bzhi/_/pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/_/srang ni re re se 'bru dang /_/kha ra srang brgyad
[\[198a.7\]]gcig sbyar 'di/_/phye ma se 'bru brgyad pa yin/_/yon tan gong ma dag dang 'dra/_/kha zas rlung gis 'khru bar bshad/_/sbyar thug la sogs ci rigs sbyin/_/na le sham dang byi dang ga_/ka pid ta dang dong grar bcas/_/tsang gi ri dang rgya shug skyur/_/sbyar thug bad kan 'khru
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]ba sel/_/bad kan zad la sngar bshad pa'i/_/rgya skyegs la sogs srang drug pa/_/nas thug dang ni bsres pa yi/_/mar ni rnying pa sbyin par bya/_/rlung dang bad kan gyis bkag pa/_/bad kan shas cher 'khru ba'am/_/gzer zhing mkhregs par byed pa la/_/spyi bag
[\[198b.2\]]'jam rtsi bsngags pa yin/_/shu dag bil ba pi pi ling /_/ru rta shu ti rgyam tshar bcas/_/bil ba'i mar ram til mar ni/_/shu dag sogs dang bskol ba gtang /_/bad kan rlung gis shas cher gzer/_/cung zad dro ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang /_/bad kan zad cing yun ring
[\[198b.3\]]du/_/'khru zhing nyam chung gyur pa na/_/rlung ni nges par stobs che ba/_/rang gi gnas na brten de skye/_/de stobs che bas 'phral gsod byed/_/de phyir de ni myur du gso/_/rlung gi rjes la mkhris pa ste/_/mkhris pa'i rjes la bad kan ni/_/gso ba'am gsum las dang
[\[198b.4\]]po ni/_/gang zhig shas cher gyur pa gso/_/'jigs dang mya ngan dag las kyang /_/myur du 'khrugs pas de phyir der/_/rlung bsal ba yi gso ba dang /_/dbugs dbyung ba dang dga' bar bya/_/gang zhig gcin med phyi sa dang /_/'phyen ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_/
[\[198b.5\]]me drod che zhing lto ba yang /_/de yi khong nad zhi ba yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas las le'u dgu pa'o//_//de nas pho ba'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/pho ba la ni brten pa'i nad/_/ma zhu ba ltar gso bar
[\[198b.6\]]bya/_/'khru bar bshad pa'i cho ga yis/_/de yi ma zhu smin par bya/_/zas kyi dus su nad dug sogs/_/tsha ba lnga sogs ldan pa dang /_/tsha bro yang ba'i kha zas dang /_/gzhan yang drod skyed sbyor ba sbyin/_/ma zhur thug pa bong nga dkar/_/bca' sga skyur dang bcas pa sbyin/_/
[\[198b.7\]]btung bar 'khru ba las bshad pa'i/_/chu dang dar ba chang sogs blud/_/pho ba'i nad la dar ba ni/_/drod skyed 'khru gcod yang bas na/_/phan te zhu rjes mngar ba'i phyir/_/mkhris pa skyed par mi byed do/_/bska zhing dro la sbyong byed dang /_/rtsub cing bad kan la yang phan/_/
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]mngar skyur kha bas rlung la phan/_/bsrubs ma thag tu tsha mi skyed/_/skyur ba bzhi po bre gang dang /_/tsha ba gsum ni srang gsum dang /_/rgya tsha srang bzhi kha ra ni/_/srang brgyad phye mar byas pa ni/_/tshod ma sran tshod btung ba sogs/_/btung ngo drug sogs la yang
[\[199a.2\]]gdab/_/ma zhu lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/yi ga 'chus dang skran mchin pa/_/pho ba snying nad skya rbab 'joms/_/dong gra gla sgang bong nga dkar/_/bskol ba ma zhu sel byed blud/_/de yi lde gu chu tshan nam/_/bca' sga'am a ru ra bcas blud/_/shu dag la sogs rgyam
[\[199a.3\]]tshar bcas/_/yang na chang dang sbyar ba blud/_/bshang ba ma smin 'khru bcas la/_/se 'bru'i chu dang bcas pa yi/_/bil ba dong gra tsi tra ka_/kha ru tsha ni btab pa sbyin/_/bad kan rlung gyur be snabs can/_/khong pa gzer la dug mo nyung /_/shing kun
[\[199a.4\]]bong nga kha ru tsha/_/shu dag a ru ra chu dron/_/skyugs pa'i rjes la gzer zhing bsgongs/_/a ru ra dang kha ru tsha/_/zi ra na le sham bcas phye/_/chu dron dang ni bcas pa blud/_/dong gra pa ta pi pi ling /_/thal tres bri ha ti gnyis dang /_/dug mo nyung dang tsi tra ka_/tsha ba rnam lnga thal sman gnyis/_/
[\[199a.5\]]phyer btags chang zho de'i dngas ma/_/chu dron rang skyur dag la blud/_/des ni me drod 'phel byed cing /_/khong pa'i rlung ni sel mchog yin/_/lan tshwa lnga dang thal sman gnyis/_/tsha ba lnga dang na le sham/_/la la phud dang shing kun las/_/skyur rtsi chen po'am se 'bru
[\[199a.6\]]'am/_/rgya shug khu bas ri lu byas/_/smin dang drod skyed byed mchog yin/_/bal bu'i lo ma dbyi mo dang /_/pi pi ling ni srang re dang /_/pi pi ling dang de rtsa srang /_/gnyis gnyis bca' sga srang gsum dang /_/dri sna gsum dang pu shel tse/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis phyir zhib
[\[199a.7\]]btags/_/bu ram sum 'gyur dag gis ni/_/ri lu byas pa rtag tu bza'/_/de rjes yu sha sha khu dang /_/chang rnying 'o ma zho ga chu/_/thug pa blud na rlung dang ni/_/bad kan las gyur slon bro dang /_/pho ba rtsib logs snying ga na/_/rims dang 'or nad skya rbab dang /_/skran
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]dang chang nad gzhang 'brum dang /_/cham pa mchil ma dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa rnams ni 'joms par byed/_/bshang ba 'gags la de nyid ni/_/bca' sga'i gong du a ru ra/_/bcug ste de la sbyin par bya/_/mkhris gyur slon bro la sogs la/_/kha ra bzhi 'gyur bcas pa ni/_/
[\[199b.2\]]bskol ba las ni ri lur byas/_/yang na bu ram kha rar bcas/_/me dang 'phrad par gyur pa las/_/de ni mchog tu yang bar 'gyur/_/de nas 'di ni ma zhu smin/_/rlung las gyur pa'i pho nad la/_/drod skyed sman dang bcas pa dang /_/mar ni nyung zad nyung zad blud/_/me drod chung
[\[199b.3\]]zhing skyes gyur nas/_/bshang gci rlung ni 'gags gyur na/_/zhag ni gnyis gsum snum btang dugs/_/bsku byas mas gtong drag po bya/_/de nas e raN+Da yi mar/_/seng phrom gyi ni mar dang ni/_/thal sman dag gis rlung zhi nas/_/g.yos pa'i nad la bkru sman gtang /_/sbyangs
[\[199b.4\]]nas khong pa rtsub gyur te/_/bshang ba 'gags la 'jam rtsi ni/_/drod skyed skyur zhing rlung 'joms pa'i/_/sman btsos til mar de la gtang /_/de ltar bkru sman drag bkru sman/_/'jam rtsi cho ga bzhin byas la/_/kha zas yang ba dang ldan pa'i/_/zhun mar slar yang bsten par bya/_/
[\[199b.5\]]rtsa ba lnga dang tsha ba gsum/_/a ru ra dang lce myang tsha/_/ra sna pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/thal sman rnam gnyis zi ra dang /_/byi dang ga dang zur pa mar/_/tsha dang skyur rtsi chen po yi/_/khu ba dang ni sge'u gsher dang /_/la phug skam po rgya shug skyur/_/se 'bru tsug kri ka'i khu ba/_/dar bzho
[\[199b.6\]]dang chang dngas dang /_/rtsab mo dngas ma rtsab mo dang /_/skyur rtsabs dang ni de bskol ba/_/me drod skyed pa'i dam pa yin/_/gzer dang skran dang dmu rdzing dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang /_/rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/_/yang na skyur rtsi chen po yi/_/khu bar
[\[199b.7\]]bskol ba'i mar blud bya/_/'di yi til mar bskol ba yis/_/bsku byug byas na rlung sel to/_/rlung dang bad kan ma 'dres zhu'am/_/bad kan rlung shas che ba la/_/sman ni 'di dag nyid kyi phye/_/chu dron sbyar ba blud par bya/_/mkhris pas me drod nyams gyur pa/_/bkru
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]sman dag gam slon sman gtang /_/kha dang yang dang 'khru gcod dang /_/tsha mi skyed pas drod bskyed bya/_/phye ma snum dang kha ba yis/_/me drod nye bar bskyed par bya/_/pa to la dang kyi lce ba/_/nim pa pu tse shel rtsa mkhris/_/par pa ta dang dug mo nyung /_/
[\[200a.2\]]shun lpags 'bras bu mur ba dang /_/shi kru mngar po'i 'bras bu dang /_/shu dag skyer pa'i shun lpags dang /_/shug pa dang ni pu shel tse/_/tsan+dan gla sgang la la phud/_/sa nag bong nga tsha ba gsum/_/shing tsha sug smel thang shing dang /_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra'i phye ma ni/_/sbrang
[\[200a.3\]]rtsi'i lde gur byas bza' ba'am/_/chang ngam chu dang sbyar 'thungs na/_/snying nad skya rbab pho ba'i nad/_/skran gzer rims nad yi ga 'chus/_/mig ser 'dus pa'i nad dang ni/_/kha yi nad rnams 'joms par byed/_/rtsa mkhris gla sgang pu tse shel/_/tsha ba gsum dang dug
[\[200a.4\]]mo nyung /_/tsi tra ka ni cha gnyis dang /_/dug mo nyung gi shun lpags ni/_/bcu drug cha sbyar zhib tu btags/_/de ni bu ram chu grang blud/_/pho ba'i nad dang skran sel zhing /_/mig ser skya rbab rims kyi nad/_/yi ga 'chus dang 'khru ba 'joms/_/dong gra bong nga gla sgang dang /_/
[\[200a.5\]]pa ta bil ba skyer khaN+Da/_/dug mo nyung gis po na dang /_/tig ta da ta ka'i me tog_/phye mar btags la sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/'bras bkrus chu dang blud na ni/_/mkhris pa las gyur pho ba'i nad/_/mkhregs 'khrugs gzhang 'brum gzhang kha na/_/khrag tu 'khru ba dag la'ang phan/_/tsan+dan
[\[200a.6\]]shug pa pu shel tse/_/pa ta mur ba bla ba dang /_/shu dag thal tres dbyi mo dang /_/lo ma bdun pa ba sha ka_/pa to la dang n+ya gro d+ha/_/u dum wA ra a shwat+tha/_/be+eg sha ka pi ta na dang /_/pu tse shel dang li ga dur/_/nim pa srang ni gnyis gnyis la/_/chu bra bcu drug bskol ba der/_/
[\[200a.7\]]ki ra tig ta dug mo nyung /_/ram nye ut+pal pi pi ling /_/bskol ba de 'thungs mkhris pa yi/_/pho ba'i nad la blud par bya/_/mdzer bshad tig ta'i mar yang blud/_/bad kan las gyur pho ba'i nad/_/slon sman rnon pos slon byas nas/_/tsha skyur lan tshwa thal sman gyis/_/rim
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]gyis me drod skyed par byed/_/tsha ba lnga dang a ru ra/_/'u su pa ta pa la sha//skyur rtse chen po'i myu gu dang /_/bskol ba'i thug pa la sogs blud/_/ma du ka yi me tog bre/_/bcu drug bye dang ga de'i phyed/_/tsi tra ka ni de phyed dang /_/bse shing 'bras bu bre bzhi dang /_/btsod srang
[\[200b.2\]]brgyad de 'di dag ni/_/chu bre sum cu rtsa gnyis bskol/_/chu bye bcu drug lus bsgrangs par/_/sbrang rtsi bye do gzhug pa dang /_/sug smel pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/a kar tsan+dan lde gu byug_/bum par zla ba gcig gzhag ste/_/langs nas mnan chang blud gyur na/_/'di yis pho ba'i
[\[200b.3\]]drod skyed cing /_/nyams brtas khrag mkhris sel bar byed/_/skems dang mdze dang sha bkra dang /_/gci snyi ba yi nad rnams 'joms/_/ma du ka yi me tog ni/_/khu ba bskol ba phyed du ba/_/bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi bzhi cha btab/_/snga ma bzhin du byas pa'i chang /_/phan pa'i
[\[200b.4\]]zas dang bcas bsten na/_/pho ba'i nad ni thams cad sel/_/de bzhin rgun 'bru bu ram shing /_/'bra go'i khu ba mnan pa blud/_/shing kun shu dag pu tse shel/_/bong nga pa ta dug mo nyung /_/gze ma tsha ba lnga po zho/_/gnyis gnyis lan tshwa lnga srang re/_/mar dang til mar
[\[200b.5\]]phul do do/_/zho bre gnyis dang bsres nas ni/_/me ni chung ngu la btsos ste/_/rnying zhing khu ba thim pa dang /_/de nas du ba 'khyims par bsreg_/btags te mar dang bsres pa dag_/de las zho gnyis 'thungs nas ni/_/zhu nas kha zas mngar zos nas/_/des ni bad kan rlung nad ni/_/kun
[\[200b.6\]]dang dug dang dbyig dug 'joms/_/rtswa mkhris dang ni pu tse shel/_/pa to nim pa par pa ta/_/bsregs la ma he'i gcin dang ni/_/'thungs na me drod skyed byed yin/_/shu dag ru rta ser po gnyis/_/tsi tra ka dang pu tse shel/_/gla sgang ra yi gcin dang ni/_/bskol ba me drod skyed
