[\[200b.7\]]byed yin/_/su ta'i sdong bu srang bzhi dang /_/lan tshwa gsum las srang re dang /_/par ta ka ni phul gang dang /_/arka srang brgyad tsi tra ka_/srang gnyis bsregs la par ta ka'i/_/khu bas ri lu byas nas ni/_/zas rjes zos na zos pa'i zas/_/myur du lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]gzhang 'brum gsung dang cham pa dang /_/snying nad des ni zhi bar byed/_/kha lud zur pa ra sna dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang a ru ra/_/nas tshig 'khus thal swardzi ka'i/_/thal sman lan tshwa lnga po rnams/_/phyer btags dro 'jam chu dang blud/_/mdog stobs me drod 'phel
[\[201a.2\]]byed yin/_/bad kan las gyur pho ba'i nad/_/rlung bcas de la mar dang bskol/_/thang la 'bar dang srang drug pa/_/de bzhin go bye'i sman mar blud/_/kha ru tsha dang tsha nag dang /_/bul tog dang ni swardzi ka_/nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_/kaN+Da ka ri sab ta la/_/tsi tra ka ni gcig
[\[201a.3\]]tu bsreg_/lan bdun bar du gzags pa yi/_/thal khu bre do mar bre bzhi/_/bskol la me drod bskyed phyir blud/_/'dus pa las ni lnga po dang /_/'di dag nyams stobs ji bzhin bya/_/bad kan mchil mang drod chung la/_/kha rtsub me drod skyed par sbyar/_/bad kan las byung
[\[201a.4\]]skems pa la/_/snum dang rtsub pa res kyis bsten/_/nyam chung rid pa'i lus la ni/_/me drod skyed pa snum ldan sbyin/_/mkhris pa shas che'i drod nyams la/_/kha dang mngar ba ldan pa sbyin/_/rlung shas che la snum skyur dang /_/lan tshwar ldan pa bsngags pa yin/_/rid pa me
[\[201a.5\]]drod skyed pa la/_/snum nyid mchog tu shes par bya/_/snum shas che bar gyur pa la/_/rab lci'i zas kyang sbyin mi bya/_/gang zhig drod chung bad kan zad/_/bshang ba smin kyang sla ba la/_/de la sman rnor bcas pa yi/_/mar ni nyung zad blud par bya/_/de yis me dang mnyam gnas
[\[201a.6\]]rlung /_/rang gnas bkug ste rang gi ni/_/las la sbyor bas drod skyed byed/_/de ni me drod skyed byed yin/_/gang zhig bshang ba sra ba yis/_/dka' bas 'byin par byed pa dag_/de la lan tshwa bcas pa'i mar/_/zas ni sla bar byed pa sbyin/_/rtsub pas me drod chung la mar/_/
[\[201a.7\]]yang na til mar drod skyed blud/_/snum mang 'thungs pas drod nyams la/_/thal sman phye ma chang rnying sbyar/_/rtug 'gags pa la mas gtong ba'i/_/drag po dang ni 'jam rtsi bya/_/nad tshab che bas me drod nyams/_/sbyang byas zas kyi cho ga spyad/_/nad byang me drod chung ba la/_/
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]zhun mar 'ba' zhig drod skyed byed/_/lam dang smyung bas nyam chung la/_/nas thug mar dang sbyar ba'am/_/zas bcas blud na stobs skyed cing /_/drod skyed brta bar byed pa yin/_/yun rings nyal po spyad pa dang /_/mi ni nyam chung skam gyur la/_/mthu rtsal can gyis zas tshol
[\[201b.2\]]ba/_/sha za'i sha khu skyur sbyar sbyin/_/yang zhing dri tsha sbyong byed pa/_/de yis me drod myur du skyed/_/sha yis skyed pa'i sha yin phyir/_/stobs ni mchog tu skyed par byed/_/snum dang mnan chang chang rnying dang /_/sman khu phye ma 'phrod pa zos/_/lus la legs par sbyar ba yis/_/
[\[201b.3\]]stobs dang me drod 'phel bar byed/_/dper na me ni shing sra bas/_/sbar ba yun ring gnas par byed/_/de bzhin khong par gnas pa'i me/_/snum dang bcas pas brtan par gnas/_/ji ltar me ni shing med pa'am/_/me chung shing ni drags pa ltar/_/lus me zas ni ma
[\[201b.4\]]zos pa/_/zas drags gyur pas 'bar mi byed/_/gang tshe bad kan zad mkhris pa/_/rang gi gnas su rlung zhugs na/_/me drod 'phel zhing rab rgyas 'gyur/_/de tshe me ni rlung bcas pas/_/zas smin byas nas lus zungs kyang /_/zad cing mdangs 'thor byed pas gsod/_/
[\[201b.5\]]zas zos nas ni bde 'gyur la/_/zhu nas mun zhugs snyam sems 'gyur/_/skom dad tsha brgyal dbugs mi bde/_/la sogs me drod drags las 'byung /_/zas lci snum sla rtul ba dang /_/grang dang 'ju dka' me drod 'bri/_/'bar ba'i me la chu blugs ltar/_/me drod
[\[201b.6\]]shas cha de zhi bya/_/de nas kha zas ma zhu la'ang /_/yang dang yang du zas sbyin bya/_/bud shing med pa'i skabs rnyed ltar/_/ji gnas 'dir gnas mi 'gyur bya/_/kri sa ra dang 'o thug snum/_/snum khur bu ram g.yos pa dang /_/rlan can chu yi srog chags ni/_/tsho ba yi ni sha sbyin
[\[201b.7\]]no/_/mchog tu nya ni 'jam po dang /_/mi 'gul chu la gnas pa sbyin/_/lug sha tshon po dag kyang ni/_/zos na me drod drags pa sal/_/'o ma sbrang rtsi bcas ba'am/_/mar dang sbyar ba skom tshe blud/_/gro yi phye ni 'o ma dang /_/mar ni mang por bcas pa blud/_/rlan can
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]srog chags sha khu dang /_/til mar ma gtogs snum can blud/_/sha ma dur byid dang bskol ba'i/_/'o ma'i bkru sman blud par bya/_/mkhris pa sel ba'i kha zas dang /_/'o thug lan mang sbyin par bya/_/gang zhig lce zhing chil skyed dang /_/bad kan skyed pa'i
[\[202a.2\]]kha zas rnams/_/thams cad me drod drags la phan/_/zos nas nyin par nyal bar bya/_/zas ni me drod kyis 'ju byed/_/zas med nas ni nad zad byed/_/lus zungs zad par byed par 'gyur/_/lus zungs zad nas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zas 'di dag ni rang bzhin gyis mi mthun/_/
[\[202a.3\]]'di ni sbyor dang g.yos kyis mi 'phrod pa/_/de la sogs pa me shes ci dga' bar/_/spyod de me drod stobs las gyur pa yin/_/de bas 'bad pa kun gyis me drod bsrung /_/de nyams na ni mi yi srog nyes nyams/_/nyes pas khyab na nad kyi tshogs kyis 'debs/_/me drod mnyam na
[\[202a.4\]]nad med tshe ring 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o//_//de nas gcin 'gags pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i gcin sri la/_/rlung 'joms til mar gyis lus bsku/_/lte ba man chad
[\[202a.5\]]dugs bya zhing /_/rlan dugs lus ni spying ba'ang bya/_/rtsa ba bcu pa e raN+Da/_/ba la nas dang nye shing pa/_/ba spru ba dang ku lang+tha/_/rgya shug dang ni ba ru ra/_/sru sru'i rtsa ba bri shi ba/_/til mar zhun mar phag dang dred/_/zhag bskol lan tshwa bcas pa ni/_/'thungs na gzer
[\[202a.6\]]'joms mchog yin no/_/sman 'di dag ni snum pa yi/_/'bras bur bcas shing skyur ba dang /_/snum dang ldan par zas skom dang /_/gong po dkri ba'i dugs dpyad bya/_/kha ru tsha mang btab pa'i chang /_/'thungs na gcin gyi nad sel byed/_/mkhris gyur bsku dang
[\[202a.7\]]blugs pa dang /_/lus bcing bas ni bsil bar bya/_/nye shing gze ma bi da ri/_/rgun 'bru rtsa yi rtsa ba lnga/_/bskol ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang /_/kha rab btab pa blud par bya/_/ba sha ka dang ga gon dang /_/rgyal mo ga gon le brgan rtsi'i/_/sa bon gur gum rgun chu dang /_/'thungs
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]na gcin 'gags nad sel byed/_/shing mngar er ba ru'i sa bon/_/skyer pa 'bras kyi chu dang blud/_/rgun 'bru'i lde gu chur sbyar ba'am/_/rgun 'bru chur ni sbangs pa blud/_/bad kan las gyur dugs byas la/_/skyug sman bza' ba rno dro sbyin/_/nas yos thal sman rno ba dang /_/dar
[\[202b.2\]]ba bcas pa sbyin par bya/_/sug smel chang dang sbyar ba'am/_/skyu ru ra yi khu ba blud/_/bzhad rus gze ma sug smel dang /_/tsha gsum sbrang rtsi gcin bcas blud/_/yang na kaN+Da ka ri'i khu/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud par bya/_/shi ti ba ra'i sa bon ni/_/zhib btags dar bar sbyar ba
[\[202b.3\]]blud/_/ba da sap+ta par+Ni dang /_/sle tres dong gra dug mo nyung /_/ke'u ka dang sug smel dang /_/ka rany+dza bskol sbrang rtsir bcas/_/des sbyar thug pa'am byi ru yi/_/phye ma 'bras kyi chu dang blud/_/pa ta li yi thal ba'i chu/_/lan bdun btsags pa til mar bcas/_/nas tshig
[\[202b.4\]]'khus thal pa ta li/_/pa ri pa tra til thal chu/_/shing tsha sug smel na le sham/_/chang dang sbyar ba blud par bya/_/'di dag re re'i lde gur sbyar/_/bu ram so yis bcad cing bza'/_/'dus pa'i bdag nyid can kun la/_/'di dag gnas skabs ji bzhin phan/_/rde'u
[\[202b.5\]]chags ring po ma lon dang /_/rlung gi lgang nad sogs la'ang sbyar/_/rde'u chags nad ni mi bzad de/_/'chi bdag dang ni 'dra bar 'dod/_/gzhon pa'i tshe na sman gyis gso/_/'phel nas 'dral bar 'os pa yin/_/de yi sngon 'byung tshul la ni/_/snum 'chos la sogs rim
[\[202b.6\]]pas bsngags/_/sru sru'i rtsa ba spra tog dang /_/a sman da ka ba si ra/_/nye shing lcam pa pu tse shel/_/a ti pa la ba lu ka_/spangs ma br-ik+Sha da ni dang /_/sha ka'i 'bras bu bya kri gnyis/_/gud tha gze ma ku lang+tha/_/nas dang rgya shug pa ra Na/_/ka ta ka yi 'bras bu
[\[202b.7\]]dang /_/u sha ka stsogs phye ma btab/_/'di dag khu ba mar bskol blud/_/rlung gyur rde'u 'jig par byed/_/e raN+Da dang bri ha ti/_/kaN+Da ka ri gze ma dang /_/bu ram shing phran rtsa ba yi/_/lde gu zho dang sbyar te blud/_/rde'u chags pa sel byed yin/_/ku
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]sha 'jag ma 'dam bu dang /_/ku ta nye'u shing ig ga tha/_/sru sru'i rtsa ba 'jag zlum dang /_/bi da ri dang ba ra hi/_/'bras kyi rtsa ba gze ma dang /_/ba lu ka dang pa ta li/_/btul dang bla bar bcas/_/ba spru ba dang sri sha ka_/de rnams bskol khu mar dang bskol/_/
[\[203a.2\]]ga gon sa bon la sogs dang /_/ut+pal yis bon dang /_/shing mngar dang ni brag zhun phye/_/de dag mkhris gyur rde chags sel/_/ba ra Na sogs rlung 'joms te/_/sug smel ha re Nu ka'i sde/_/gu gul ru rta na le sham/_/tsi tra ka dang bye'u rug pa/_/de dag lde gur byas pa gzhug_/
[\[203a.3\]]u sha ka yi sde tshan bcug_/mar bskol ba yis bad kan las/_/gyur pa'i rde'u myur du 'joms/_/rang rang sman ni 'di nyid kyis/_/thal sman 'o ma thug stsogs sbyar/_/pi tsu ka dang ang go la/_/ka ta ka la sha ka dang /_/ut+pa la yi 'bras bu rnams/_/bu ram bcas pa'i chu
[\[203a.4\]]dron blud/_/rde phran 'jig par byed pa'i mchog_/khrung khrung rnga mo bong bu'i rus/_/gze ma ta la pa tri ka_/a za mo dang ka dam pa'i/_/rtsa ba dang ni bca' sga ni/_/chang ngam chu dron bcas pa blud/_/rde phran chags pa 'jig par byed/_/ma ri tsi ka'i sa bon gyi/_/phye ma sbrang rtsir sbyar ba
[\[203a.5\]]dang /_/lug gi 'o ma zhag bdun ni/_/blud na rde'u ni 'jig par byed/_/shi kru'i rtsa ba bskol ba ni/_/dro 'jam 'thungs pas rde nad 'joms/_/til dang a pa marga dang /_/chu shing dang ni pa la sha_/nas tshig 'khus thal lug gcin blud/_/phye ma rde'u chags pa sel/_/yang
[\[203a.6\]]na lcam pa'i rtsa ba ni/_/gcig tu chang la sogs pa blud/_/yang na de bskol 'o ma blud/_/nad kyis nyen pa sel ba byed/_/a ru ra yi rus pa btsos/_/yang na ba spru ba btsos blud/_/yang na 'o ma can zas bza'/_/yang na bar hi shi ka yi/_/rtsa ba 'bras bur bcas pa blud/_/
[\[203a.7\]]gcin 'gags lhag ma rnams la ni/_/'di yi gso ba lhag ma'ang sbyar/_/bri ha ti sogs sde tshan bskol/_/gze ma nyis 'gyur gzhug par bya/_/chu 'am 'o ma zhun mar dang /_/blud na gcin gyi nad kun sel/_/thang shing gla sgang mur ba dang /_/shing mngar dang ni a ru ra/_/chang ngam
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]'o ma chur sbyar ba/_/gcin gyi nad ni kun la blud/_/byi tsher ba bskol khu ba'am/_/ardzu na bskol khu ba ni/_/rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum btab la/_/chu tshan dro 'jam sbyar ba blud/_/kaN+Da ka ri gze ma bskol/_/yang na nas thug bur phran bcas/_/bi da ra sogs bskol ba'am/_/
[\[203b.2\]]khyim bya'i sha yi khu ba blud/_/bi da ri la sogs pa dang /_/bskol ba'i brag zhun sbyin pa'am/_/yang na chang ni nad med blud/_/rta'am shing rtar bskyod nas ni/_/mgyogs par 'gro bas bskyod gyur na/_/rde'u de ni g.yo bar 'gyur/_/bi da ri la sogs pa yi/_/sde tshan rnam
[\[203b.3\]]pa kun tu sbyar/_/bkru sman don du seng phram mar/_/'jam rtsi'i las kyang bsten par bya/_/mchog tu 'jam rtsi gong ma bya/_/khu chu'i rde'u chags de yi ni/_/gcin lam sbyangs la stobs che ba'i/_/khu chu'i gnas ni sbyang ba'i phyir/_/skyes pa khu ba 'phel byed pa'i/_/sha
[\[203b.4\]]dang khyim bya'i sha yis 'grangs/_/'dod pa bdo bas bud med ni/_/dga' ba skyed la nyal po bya/_/gso ba 'di yis bcos kyang ni/_/ma zhi na ni sman pa yis/_/mtshon ni legs par brtag byas te/_/gso ba ma bgyi nges par 'chi/_/bgyis na 'ang dogs par bcas
[\[203b.5\]]pa las/_de ltar rgyal po la zhus nas/_/las la byang ba'i sman pa ni/_/mang po dang ni dpyad par bya/_/de nas nad par snum bskus shing /_/sbyangs shing cung zad nyams smad pa'i/_/lus ni snum bsku dugs bya zhing /_/zan ma zos shing bkra shis byas/_/pus mor sleb
[\[203b.6\]]pa'i spang leb la/_/'dug pa mi yi pad par brten/_/ro stod gan rkyal bzhag nas ni/_/gos kyis dkris pa'i steng du gzhag_/de nas de yi sgyid khung dag_/bkug nas ras kyis dam pa ru/_/rten gyi mi dang bcas par ni/_/bcings te dbugs ni phyung nas su/_/lte ba
[\[203b.7\]]man chad bskus nas ni/_/de yi g.yon rol phyogs su ni/_/mnyes la khu tshur gyis mnan cing /_/'og tu 'byin pa'i bar du btsir/_/de nas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang /_/gung mo'i sen mo zegs nas ni/_/til mar bskus te rkub tu ni/_/srubs mtshams bar du gzhug
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]par bya/_/rde'u lte ba'i gnyer ma nas/_/pho mtshan gzhang bar phyin par bya/_/de nas chu so'i gnas su ni/_/gnyer ma med cing dbyung sla ba/_/sor mo gnyis kyis btsir nas ni/_/mdud pa lta bur mtho bar bya/_/srubs mtshams nas gang ma gtogs
[\[204a.2\]]par/_/gtsags bus legs par dral nas ni/_/rde'u'i tshad du dbral byas la/_/ci nas chag grugs med par ni/_/cha spyad rtse mo gug pa yis/_/ma lus par ni dbyung bar bya/_/bud med chu so ngos su gnas/_/de ni mngal gnas pa la brten/_/mtho bar gyur nas spyad
[\[204a.3\]]kyis/_/legs pa kho nar dbral bar bya/_/gzhan du byas na de yis ni/_/rma nas gcin ni 'dzag par 'gyur//skyes pa'i rma ni dbral nyes na/_/gcin 'dzag pa dang gcig tu 'gyur/_/chu so dbral ba'i rde'u rgyu/_/gcig las grub kyi gnyis las min/_/zug rngu chung las
[\[204a.4\]]chu dron gyi/_/nang du de ni spying bar bya/_/de ltar khrag gis gang mi 'gyur/_/gang la mtshan las 'o ma can/_/shing gi khu ba btsir bar bya/_/de nas gcin ni dag bya'i phyir/_/bu ram grangs pa sbyin pa dang /_/rma la mar dang sbrang rtsi bsku/_/dus gnyis nas thug mar
[\[204a.5\]]bcas pa'i/_/dro 'jam gcin skyed zhag gsum blud/_/bu ram mang po 'o ma dang /_/'bras chan nyung ba zhag bcu sbyin/_/de nas 'bras bu skyur ba dang /_/skam sa'i srog chags sha khu sbyin/_/'o ma can shing khu ba yis/_/rma ni bkrus nas btsod dang ni/_/shing mngar pra
[\[204a.6\]]puN+Da ra'i ka_/seng phrom dkar pos bsku bar bya/_/rma bskus sman ni 'di dag nyid/_/skyer bcas til mar bskol te bskus/_/'di yis rma zhag bcu dugs bya/_/gcin gyi lam ni zhag bdun na/_/rang gi lam nas ma byung na/_/rde'u'i rma ni me yis bsregs/_/rang gi lam
[\[204a.7\]]nas byung gyur nas/_/phal cher mas gtong mngar bas gso/_/rma de 'tshobs kyang lo gcig bar/_/ri bo glang po rta dang ni/_/shing la 'dzeg par mi bya ste/_/shing rtar mi zhon nyal po spang /_/chu la rkyal bar mi bya'o/_/khu chu gcin rgyu lgang pa dang /_/rlig sbubs mtshams
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]srubs gzhang rtsa dang /_/pho mtshan mo mtshan rtse mo ni/_/brgyad por mtshon ni gdab mi bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gcin snyi ba za khu'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/za khu can ni stobs
[\[204b.2\]]ldan la/_/dang po skyug sman bkru sman ni/_/snum can nyungs kar a ri ha/_/ba ru ra dang ka rany+dza'i/_/snum dang gze ma til mar bskol/_/rang sman ji bzhin bskol ba yi/_/snum bcas skyug sman bkru sman gtang /_/gla sgang thang shing dong gra bcug_/bye'u rug pa sogs khu ba
[\[204b.3\]]yi/_/'jam rtsi de nas gtang bar bya/_/mkhris pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs pas/_/sbyangs nas sha khus brta bar bya/_/gcin nad dang ni skran dang ni/_/skem zhing nyams ni smad pa 'byung /_/de bas rjes 'brel bsrung ba'i phyir/_/zhi bar bya ba gtang bar bya/_/sbyang ba ma byas
[\[204b.4\]]la de nyid/_/gcin nad can ni kun la blud/_/skyer pa skyu ru ra bskol khu/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa nad par blud/_/skyer pa thang shing 'bras bu gsum/_/gla sgang chu bskol blud pa'ang phan/_/tsi tra skyer pa 'bras bu gsum/_/dug mo nyung ni sbrang rtsi bcas/_/yang na sle
[\[204b.5\]]tres skyu ru ra/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i khu ba'ang phan/_/seng phrom gla sgang kad pa la dang a ru ra/_/pa tha byi tsher byi dang ga dang ardzun/_/seng ldeng skyer pa byi dang ga dang dar ba bskol/_/khu ba gsum po sbrang rtsir bcas pas bad kan sel/_/mkhris gyur pu shel seng phrom
[\[204b.6\]]tsan+dan ardzu na/_/nim pa pa to la dang sle tre+es skyu ru ra/_/seng phrom ba le ka dang skyer pa da ta ka'i/_/gsum po de dag bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/_/'di dag ji bzhin zas skom dang /_/nas dang gro dang sbyar ba dang /_/rlung shas che ba'i gcin snyi la/_/snum dang sbyar
[\[204b.7\]]te sbyin par bya/_/lci ba rta rtug las byung ba'am/_/'od ma las ni skyes pa dag_/khur ba zan dron chag tshe stsogs/_/nas las byas pa'i zan kyang phan/_/rtsa 'bru mung+ga la sogs dang /_/'bras rnying drug cu pa rnying phan/_/nyungs kar til btsir las byung ba'am/_/sbyar thug
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]skyur dang bcas pa'am/_/ka pid ta dang tin tu ka_/'dzam bu de sbyar btung ba dang /_/tshod ma kha bo sbrang rtsi dang /_/'bras bu gsum zan bza' ba skam/_/skam sa'i sha ni bsregs pa dang /_/skam pa'am lcags dang g.yos pa dang /_/rgun chang chang rnying
[\[205a.2\]]mnan chang rnying /_/rgun chu bskol ba las byung blud/_/a sa na sogs bskol ba'i chu/_/'jag ma bskol chu sbrang rtsi'i chu/_/'bras bu gsum la mtshan mo sbangs/_/nyin par skams la de nas ni/_/legs par btags pa'i phye dag dang /_/bu ram sbrang rtsir bcas
[\[205a.3\]]pa blud/_/sa la lo ma bdun pa dang /_/kam bi l+ya dang ba ru ra/_/bri sha ka dang ka pid ta/_/ro hi ni yi me tog ni/_/phyer btags sbrang rtsir bcas sbyin nam/_/skyu ru ra yi khu ba blud/_/bad kan mkhris pa'i gcin nad sel/_/gzem skyer pa seng phrom dang /_/shu dag
[\[205a.4\]]kad phal ardzu na/_/shug pa lung thang asman ta/_/tsan+dan dang ni a ka ru/_/la la phud dang pa to la/_/ga dur bong nga go bye btsod/_/bad kan rlung la til mar bcas/_/mkhris par mar de 'dren mar btsos/_/rtsa ba bcu pa zi ra dkar/_/dan ti thang shing ba spru
[\[205a.5\]]gnyis/_/snu ha arga'i rtsa ba dang /_/bu ga dam pa a ru ra/_/go bye ka rany+dza'i rtsa ba/_/ba ra Na yi rtsa ba dang /_/pi pi ling rtsa ma nu'i rtsa/_/re re srang ni bcu bcu dang /_/nas dang rgya shug rgya sran las/_/bre gsum chu ni brgyad 'gyur dang /_/bskol la bzhi cha
[\[205a.6\]]lus pa dang /_/de dang pi pi ling gnyis dang /_/dbyi mo lcang ma ro hi sha_/dur byid byi dang kam+bi l+ya/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba bca' sga dang /_/mar bre gang dang bskol ba yis/_/gcin snyi'i nad ni de nyid dang /_/'brum phran dug dang skya rbab dang /_/khong 'bras skran dang gzhang 'brum
[\[205a.7\]]dang /_/'or nad skem dang dbyig dug dang /_/dmu rdzing lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/slon dang tshil ches mcher pa'i nad/_/dreg mdze smyo byed brjed byed 'joms/_/mar 'di thang la 'bar gyi yin/_/seng phrom mur ba byi dang ga_/zur pa rgya spos ga bra'i rtsa/_/chu srin sen mo
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]dug mo nyung /_/gla ba ru rta pri yang ku/_/gla gor zho sha tsi tra ka_/bong nga bil sha la gnyis dang /_/dri bzang bzhi dang rtsa mkhris dang /_/pu tse shel dang la la phud/_/pa ta puSh+kar mU la dang /_/pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_/dbyi mo dang ni 'bras bu gsum/_/zho ni gnyis
[\[205b.2\]]gnyis chu bre ni/_/bcu drug la bskol bzhi cha lus/_/btsags te bsgrangs pa'i nang du ni/_/sbrang rtsi bre do bcug nas ni/_/zla phyed legs par gzhag pa yi/_/seng phrom mnan chang gcin snyi dang /_/gzhang 'brum mdze dang yi ga 'chus/_/srin bu skya rbab pho ba'i nad/_/tshil
[\[205b.3\]]byed pa yi nad sel byed/_/a sa na la sogs pa'i sde/_/sna re srang ni nyi shu dag_/chu bre nyis brgya lnga bcu drug_/bskol la bzhi cha lus pa dang /_/bu ram srang ni nyis brgya dang /_/sbrang rtsi bre do gzhug pa dang /_/dug mo nyung sogs lde gu ni/_/srang re'i tshad ni bcug pa ste/_/sbrang
[\[205b.4\]]rtsi pi pi ling gi phya/_/mar gyis bskus pa'i snod dag ni/_/rgya skyegs bskus par bcug nas ni/_/nas kyi nang du bcug nas su/_/lcags ni rno la srab pa dag_/seng ldeng gi ni me mdag bsregs/_/ji srid lcags ni zad pa'i bar/_/mang du der ni gzhag par bya/_/lcags
[\[205b.5\]]las byas pa'i chang mnan blud/_/sngon pas yon tan lhag pa yin/_/rtsub pa dril phyis dam du bsdams/_/drag shul mtshan mo gnyid mi log_/tshil dang bad kan 'joms byed gang /_/de ni phyi nang las btang phan/_/brag zhun srang brgya snying po'i chu/_/sbangs pa'i snying po chu
[\[205b.6\]]dang ni/_/legs par blud cing sA lu dang /_/skam sa'i sha khu bcas pa bza'/_/bla brnan shin tu mang ba yi/_/gcin snyi'i nad ni kun kyang 'joms/_/'bras phreng thor bu rmen bu dang /_/tshil ches mdze dang mtshan bar rdol/_/srin nad rkang bam 'or nad sel/_/'di ni
[\[205b.7\]]bcud kyis len mchog yin/_/lam du dugs dang lham dag ni/_/med par drang srong tshul du ni/_/dpag tshad brgya yi bar du 'gro/_/chu yi gnas ni brko ba'am/_/ba gcin lci ba bsten pa'am/_/ba lang dang ni lhan cig 'khyams/_/skem pa'i gcin nad can dag
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]gi/_/zas dang sman tshil mi bskyed pas/_/kham phor la sogs 'bras nad ni/_/ma smin skrang pa'i nad ltar gso/_/sman pa la ni rma ltar gso/_/de yi sngon byung tshul nyid la/_/'o ma can shing bskol chu dang /_/ra thug gcin ni blud pa bsngags/_/gcin
[\[206a.2\]]snyi'i nad can lto sra bas/_/phal cher bkru sman rnon po gtang /_/sug smel sogs kyi til mar sbyar/_/rma 'tshob pa yi cho ga bya/_/dong gra la sogs sde tshan ni/_/btags pa'i lde gus dril bar bya/_/a sa na sogs bskol chu blud/_/dug mo nyung sogs zas skom sbyar/_/
[\[206a.3\]]pa ta thal tres tsi tra ka_/sha rang ga pA kan ta ri/_/sap+ta par+Ni dug mo nyung /_/kad pha la dang dong ga'i phye/_/sbrang rtsis lde gu byas pa'am/_/lcags dgu pa yang de bzhin sbyin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[206a.4\]]de nas khong 'bras dang rgyu rlugs kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/khong 'bras ma smin thams cad la/_/'or nang lta bur gso ba dang /_/rgyun tu khrag ni byung bar bya/_/smin pa la ni rma ltar gso/_/rlung shas che la rtsa ba lnga/_/bskol bas rma ni bkru ba dang /_/thang shing sogs sde shing mngar dang /_/til sbyar rgyam tshas
[\[206a.5\]]rma bsku bya/_/bkru sman dang ni ldan pa yi/_/dur byid kyis ni rnam sbyangs shing /_/bi da ri yi sde bskol ba'i/_/dur byid kyis ni rma 'byor bya/_/mkhris gyur 'o ma can chus bkru/_/sle tres shing mngar til gyis bsku/_/btsod dang rgya shug pu shel tse/_/pa ya s+ya dang ser po gnyis/_/
[\[206a.6\]]'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar dang /_/'o mar bcas pas rma 'byor bya/_/yang na n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/_/myu gu shun pa 'bras bu bsku/_/bad kan las gyur dong ga'i chus/_/bkru zhing phye dang ser po gnyis/_/dur byid dang ni til gyis bsku/_/yang na rgya sran dan ti yi/_/sham
[\[206a.7\]]dur byid tsi tra ka_/seng phrom rgyam tshab gcin bcas/_/til mar gyis ni rma 'tshob bya/_/khrag dang glo bur las gyur pa/_/mkhris pa'i khong 'bras lta bur gso/_/ma smin nad du byung ba la/_/ba ra Na sogs sde bskol bar/_/u sha ka yi sde tshan btab/_/snga dro khong 'bras can
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]la blud/_/bkru sman bcas par bskol ba'i mar/_/de gnyis dang ni ldan par blud/_/ni ru ha dang snum 'jam rtsi/_/de dag gnyis la sbyar bar bya/_/bza' dang btung dang bsku ba la/_/sbrang rtsi na le sham dkar sbyar/_/nad dmigs ji bzhin blud na ni/_/khong 'bras
[\[206b.2\]]ma smin 'joms par byed/_/kyi lce nim pa 'bras bu gsum/_/shing mngar pu tse shel cha mnyam/_/dur byid pa to la'i rtsa ba/_/re re cha ni bzhi par bya/_/sran chung spun pa med srang brgyad/_/de bskol mar dang bcas pa blud/_/khong 'bras skran dang me dpal dang /_/
[\[206b.3\]]lus tsha rmongs bag myos rims 'debs/_/skom dang brgyal slon snying nad dang /_/khrag mkhris mig ser mdze nad 'joms/_/kyi lce ba ni phul gang dag_/brgyad 'gyur chu ru bskol nas ni/_/de yi khu ba phul gang dang /_/skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang /_/'o ma mar ni phul re
[\[206b.4\]]dang /_/tig ta byi tsher kra yin ti/_/gla sgang ram nye ta ma la/_/tsan+dan ut+pal dzi ban ti/_/gcig tu bsdus te bskol ba yi/_/mar de yon tan snga mar mtshungs/_/rgun 'bru 'bra go ma du ka_/bi da ri dang nye shing bcas/_/pa ru sha ka 'bras bu gsum/_/de btsos khu
[\[206b.5\]]ba mar bskol la/_/'o ma bu ram shing ku dang /_/skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang /_/a ru ra yi lde gur bcas/_/bskol te bsgrangs pa de nang du/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi bzhi char btab/_/yon tan snga ma 'drar shes bya/_/nad dmigs ji bzhin rngabs rwa sogs/_/yang na gtar gas
[\[206b.6\]]khrag dbyung bya/_/khong 'bras smin par gyur pa la/_/khong par gnas pa phyir 'bur bar/_/shes nas de ni bcing bar bya/_/gzer ba der gnas gong bur 'dug_/de ngos btsir bas tshor ba chung /_/tsha ba la sogs chung gyur na/_/smin pa yin pas khong 'bras ni/_/
[\[206b.7\]]brtol te rma ltar gso bar bya/_/nang gi char gnas khong 'bras ni/_/smin pa'i mtshan ma'ang 'di nyid yin/_/smin nas bu ga rnags gyur te/_/de ni steng ma 'og tu dbyung /_/rang nyid rdol ba'i nad de ni/_/zas phan byin zhing btang snyoms gzhag_/zhag bcu'am bcu
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]gnyis bar du ni/_/sman pas bla brnan las bsrung bya/_/rnag ni legs par mi 'dzag na/_/ba ra Na sogs chu dron nam/_/shi kru sbrang rtsi blud pa'am/_/de dang sbyar ba'i nas thug blud/_/rgya shug rgya sran nas kyi ni/_/yu sha dang ni bza' ba bsngags/_/zhag bcu yan
[\[207a.2\]]chad kyi lce ba/_/mar ram seng phrom dag gis ni/_/nyams stobs ji bzhin sbyang bar bya/_/sbyangs nas tag ta sbrang rtsi blud/_/'di la kun kyang skran lta bur/_/nad thabs ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/khong 'bras kun dang gnas skabs dang /_/thams cad du ni gu gul gtang /_/
[\[207a.3\]]de bzhin brag zhun rang rang gi/_/sbyor bar bcas te khu ba blud/_/'bad de smin pa las bsrung bya/_/smin na shin tu gso dka' yin/_/gzhan yang myur du tsha byed pas/_/khong 'bras zhes ni de la bshad/_/gal te gcin snyi las gyur na/_/gcin snyi ba yi gso ba bya/_/nu
[\[207a.4\]]mar byung la 'di ltar ni/_/mi bcing thams cad rma ltar gso/_/dbral tshe nu zho 'dzag pa dang /_/nu sor nag por mi gnod bsrung /_/ma smin gnas skabs thams cad du/_/de yi nu zho btsir zhing bzho/_/rgyu rlugs rlung shas che ba la/_/dur byid snum can gyis sbyangs shing /_/a
[\[207a.5\]]mra'i 'bras bu seng phrom mar/_/e raN+Da dang skyid de ba'i/_/mar dang sman mar 'dren mar sbyin/_/de nas rlung 'joms sman khu snum/_/lde gu mas gtong drag po bya/_/sha khu bcas pa'i zas sbyin zhing /_/shing mngar snum bskol 'jam rtsi gtang /_/rlung 'joms dugs dang
[\[207a.6\]]bsku mnye bya/_/smin nas dral la rma ltar gso/_/rgyu rlugs khrag mkhris las gyur pa/_/smin dang ma smin ji bzhin du/_/rma dang skrangs pa'i gso ba bya/_/rgyun tu khrag kyang dbyung bar bya/_/bad kan las gyur skyer pa yi/_/phye ma gcin sbyar ba blud/_/'di la mnyed
[\[207a.7\]]bya ma gtogs par/_/bad kan rmen bu'i gso ba bya/_/smin nas dbral te dzA ti yi/_/me tog go bye ang ko la/_/lo ma bdun pa pa to la/_/nim pa yung ba byi dang ga_/dug mo nyung dang til mar bskol/_/rma sbyang phyir ni blud pa bsngags/_/tshil las gyur la bye'u rug sogs/_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]ba gcin sbyar te btags pa'am/_/mgo bo'i bkru sman dag gis bya/_/rlig pa'i srubs mtshams ma gtogs par/_/'phel gtsags kyis ni dbral nas ni/_/tshil ni legs par dbyung bar bya/_/rma ni sbrang rtsi nag tshur dang /_/rgyam tsha nges par bskus nas btsems/_/
[\[207b.2\]]de la tshil ni sbyang ba'i phyir/_/sdong ros sug smel su ma na/_/go bye pi pi ling mU la/_/til mar ngag ni bsku bar bya/_/rma ni 'byor bar gyur gyi bar/_/snum dang dugs kyang bsten par bya/_/gcin byung snum gyis dugs bya zhing /_/ras ma phra mos dkri bar bya/_/
[\[207b.3\]]srubs mtshams 'og tu dmu rdzing bzhin/_/legs par dbral te gzag par bya/_/rma bkab bcing dang 'byor par bya/_/rgyu ma byung bar gyur pa dag_/rlig par phyin par ma gyur la/_/rlung gi rgyu rlugs bzhin du gso/_/ba sbu ba ni srang brgya dang /_/rtsa ba bcu pa eraN+Da/_/
[\[207b.4\]]a shwa gan+d+h+ya nye shing dang /_/pa ya s+ya dang dUr ba gnyis/_/'dam bu ku sha bu ram gnyis/_/a ha ga lar bcas pa ni/_/re re srang ni bcu bcur byas/_/chu bre brgya rtsa nyi shu brgyad/_/bskol ba brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/der ni bu ram srang sum cu/_/e raN+Da yi mar bre
[\[207b.5\]]do/_/'o ma mar ni bre do do/_/pi pi ling dang de rtsa ba/_/shing mngar rgun 'bru lce myang tsha/_/la la phud dang dong gra gzhug_/de btsos skyid de ba zhes bya/_/gzhon sha can gyi bcud len yin/_/rlung dang than pa lam du 'gro/_/bzhon stsogs bsrung ba bsdams mi dgos/_/skyid
[\[207b.6\]]de ba dang phyug po dang /_/bde ba bsten dang bud med dang /_/bud med rgan mo'i khyo dang ni/_/dpal skyed rtsod pa zlog byed cing /_/dus kun du ni brten gyur na/_/mdog mdangs sha ni rgyas byed cing /_/rgyu rlugs khong 'bras skran gzhang 'brum/_/pho mtshan mo mtshan
[\[207b.7\]]rlung gis nyen/_/'or nad dmu rdzing mchin pa dang /_/rtug skam nad ni sel byed mchog_/snum gyi bkru sman 'jam rtsi yis/_/gal te rgyu rlugs ma zhi na/_/dang po 'jam rtsi btang nas ni/_/de nas chu sor gnas pa ni/_/zla ba kham pa'i kha 'dra bas/_/rlung lam dgag phyir
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]bsreg par bya/_/mthe bong steng gi rgyus pa ni/_/ser zhing snal ma 'dra ba gang /_/khab kyis bteg ste thad ka ru/_/gang na nad yod bcad de bsreg/_/gzhan dag de las logs gzhan nam/_/srin lag sor mo bsreg ces zer/_/kha cig 'di ni bad kan rlung /_/las gyur
[\[208a.2\]]skran mcher la bya zer/_/bi sha tse nad gang na yod/_/mthe'u chung srin lag dag la bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas skran gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rlung gyur skran ni mi bzad na/_/phyis
[\[208a.3\]]'phyen ni 'gags gyur na/_/rtsub dang grang byung rlung nad la/_/phan pa'i til mar dag gis gso/_/zas skom 'jam rtsi sbyar ba dang /_/bsku byug snum 'tshos dugs dpyad bya/_/sbo dang zug dang rengs pa dang /_/'gags pa la ni mchog tu bya/_/snum 'chos dugs ni
[\[208a.4\]]byas pa yis/_/bu ga'i rgyun srang mnyen byed la/_/rlung shas che ba gzhom bya zhing /_/phyis sri ba sel skran 'joms/_/lte ba yan chad skyes pa yi/_/skran la mchog tu snum blud phan/_/zhu ba'i gnas brtan 'jam rtsi bya/_/lto bar gnas la gnyi ga bya/_/rlung can skran ni
[\[208a.5\]]drod che la/_/phyis rlung ni 'gags gyur la/_/bza' btung nyams brtas byed pa dang /_/snum dang dro ba sbyin par bya/_/rlung gyur skran la bad kan dang /_/mkhris pa srung zhing ni ru ha/_/'jam rtsi bcas pa'i sbyor ba ni/_/yang dang yang du bya ba yin/_/'jam rtsi mchog tu
[\[208a.6\]]skran 'joms par/_/shes bya de ni rlung gi nad/_/dang por rang gi gnas su bcom/_/'phral du skran ni sel bar byed/_/de bas skran la rgyun du ni/_/mas gtong drag po 'jam rtsi bcas/_/btang bar gyur pas rlung bad kan/_/mkhris pa'i bdag nyid can rnams sel/_/
[\[208a.7\]]shing kun dang ni tsha ba gsum/_/rtsabs ru tsha dang kha ru tsha/_/se 'bru ma nu go snyod dang /_/zi ra 'u su la la phud/_/star bu ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/zur pa shu dag tsi tra ka_/a za gan+d+ha sug smel dang /_/bye rug pa ni zho dang bcas/_/mar bskol rlung gi skran sel zhing /_/gzer dang
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]lto sbos 'joms par byed/_/spa ma'i 'bras bu tsha ba gsum/_/zi ra go snyod tsha ba lnga/_/a za mo dang lce myang tsha/_/zho dang 'o ma mar dang ni/_/se 'brul phug/_/rgya shug gi/_/khu ba bskol bas rlung gi ni/_/skran dang dmu rdzing lto sbos dang /_/rtsib logs snying dang lto ba gzer/_/
[\[208b.2\]]mngal nad gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang /_/rims nad yi ga 'chus pa 'joms/_/rtsa ba bcu pa su sha bi/_/pa la sha ka ma nu dang /_/ba sbu ba gnyis e raN+Da/_/ra sna a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/ga bra'i rtsa ba zur pa dkar/_/sle tres gan+d+ha pa lag
[\[208b.3\]]srang ni gnyis gnyis tshad byas dang /_/nyi shu rtsa brgyad nang du bskol/_/nas dang rgya shug rgya sran dang /_/ma sha bre re lhan cig tu/_/chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/_/khu ba der zho bre bzhi dang /_/mar bre gang dang slar bskol la/_/se 'bru amra ta ka dang /_/kha lung khu ba bre
[\[208b.4\]]rer bcas/_/de bzhin rtsab mo skyur rtsabs tsha/_/g.yer ma shu dag ga bra'i rtsa/_/ra sna pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/tsi traka dang 'u su dang /_/ya ba na ga la la phud/_/star bu zi ra nag po dang /_/go snyod zi ra spa ma'i 'bras/_/ka ra pi ba zangs rtsi ba/_/u sha ka dang dur byid dang /_/
[\[208b.5\]]dan da mur ba byi dang ga_/se 'bru hasti pi pi ling /_/gze ma spang spos sru sru'i rtsa/_/ga gon rgyal mo ga gon gyi/_/sa bon shu ti thal sman gnyis/_/bye'u rug pa thal tres dang /_/ni li na la'i 'bras bu dang /_/lan tshwa gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/bcas pa'i zho yi sman mar
[\[208b.6\]]des/_/sngar bshad nang ni gso dka' dang /_/brjed byed smyo byed gcin sri dang /_/rlung nad gzhang 'brum myur du 'joms/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/'u su dbyi mong byi dang ga_/tsi tra ka ni lde gur byas/_/'o ma mar bskol rlung skran 'joms/_/sgog skya'i rtsa ba
[\[208b.7\]]srang brgya dang /_/rtsa ba chen po srang lnga lnga/_/chu srang stong dang de bskol la/_/bzhi cha lus par phyed se 'bru'i/_/khu ba chang dang 'bras khu skyur/_/zho rnams de yi phyed phyed dang /_/tshab gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/shing kun dbyi mo la la phud/_/dbyi mong star bu lce myang tsha/_/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]thang shing srang ni phyed phyed dang /_/mar ni bre gang bcas par bskol/_/rlung las gyur pa'i skran kun 'joms/_/gcong chen skabs su bshad pa yi/_/srang drug pa yi mar yang blud/_/'o ma'i skyin pa chang dngas sam/_/se 'bru zho spris sbyar ba'i mar/_/
[\[209a.2\]]rlung las gyur pa'i skran sel to/_/rlung gi skran la bad kan 'phel/_/dro 'jam yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/snying rgal khong lci snyom gyur pa/_/de la skyug sman gtang bar bya/_/gzer dang lto sbos bshang sri la/_/gnas shes byas nas snum bcas pa'i/_/sman mar sman gyi phye ma
[\[209a.3\]]dang /_/khu ba ri lung byas pa yi/_/rgya shug se 'bru chu dron dang /_/dar ba chang dang skyur rtsabs dang /_/chang dngas bcas pa nang par blud/_/yang na phye ma la sogs pa/_/thug pa sla bor byas pa ni/_/nang par yang na zas sngon blud/_/phye ma kha lung khu ba dang /_/lan mang
[\[209a.4\]]bgrungs par gyur pa yi/_/las ni byed par nus gyur pa'i/_/ri lus rlung dang bad kan 'joms/_/shing kun shu dag a ru ra/_/a zag gan+d+ha se 'bru dang /_/'u su pa ta ti mu sa/_/ma nu zur pa dkar po dang /_/spa ma'i 'bras bu ci ta ka_/thal sman gnyis dang lan tshwa
[\[209a.5\]]gnyis/_/tsha ba gsum dang zir dang /_/dbyi mo da trig star bu'i phyes/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i/_/snying ga rtsib logs chu so dang /_/mjug to mngal dang chu sor gzer/_/bad kan rlung las gyur pa'i nad/_/gso dka' skran dang 'phyen dang ni/_/gcin dang phyi sa
[\[209a.6\]]'gags pa dang /_/lkog ma 'gags shing snying nad dang /_/skya rbab yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/mcher pa gzhang 'brum skyigs bu dang /_/rgyu rlugs lto sbos me drod nyams/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba sel/_/rgyam tsha dang ni la la phud/_/a za mo dang pi pi ling /_/dong gra rim
[\[209a.7\]]bzhin cha res bskyed/_/thams cad dang ni cha mnyam pa'i/_/a ru ra bsres phye ma 'di/_/me ni mngon sum nyid yin no/_/tsha ba gsum dang ti mu sa/_/rgyam tsha dang ni zi ra gnyis/_/cha mnyam shing kun brgyad cha'i phyir/_/mar bsres kham gyi dang por zos/_/me drod drag po skyed
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]byed cing /_/rlung gi skran ni 'joms par byed/_/shing kun shu dag kha ru tsha/_/dong gra dang ni la la phud/_/rnam rgyal ma nu ru rta dang /_/dur byid dan da'i rtsa bar bcas/_/cha res bskyed pa'i phye ma 'di/_/chu dron sbyar 'thungs lto ba'i nad/_/skran dang dmu rdzing la sogs pa/_/seng
[\[209b.2\]]ges ri dwags tshogs rnams ni/_/mthu rtsal gyis ni zil non ltar/_/nad rnams 'joms par byed pa yin/_/lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling /_/a za mo dang a ru ra'i/_/phye ma chu dron sbyar blud na/_/skran can bad rlung las gyur tshogs/_/lcags mdas lus phug bzhin du 'joms/_/
[\[209b.3\]]ka rany+dza yi lo ma dang /_/in tra ba ru Na dbyi mo/_/kru trug tres dang bca' sga dang /_/pi pi ling dang na le sham/_/ma lus rim bkod rgyam tshas bkab/_/bsregs la btags te zho dang ni/_/zho ga chu sbyar blud pa dag_/skran dang dmu rdzing 'or nad dang /_/skya rbab gzhang
[\[209b.4\]]'brum nad rnams sel/_/shing kun sum 'gyur rgyam tsha dang /_/de las e raN+Da yi mar/_/sum 'gyur de las sgog skya yi/_/khu ba sum 'gyur sbyar ba dag_/blud na skran dang dmu rdzing dang /_/rgyu rlugs gzer gyi nad rnams 'joms/_/kha lung khu ba shing kun dang /_/se 'bru
[\[209b.5\]]rgyam tsha kha ru tsha/_/chang gi dngas mar sbyar blud na/_/rlung las gyur pa'i skran nad sel/_/bca' sga zho gnyis bu ram zho/_/bzhi dang til nag bkrus srang gcig_/gcig tu phye mar btags byin zhing /_/'o ma dro 'jam rjes blud na/_/rlung gi snying nad skran gzhang 'brum/_/
[\[209b.6\]]mngal gzer rtug pa 'gags pa sel/_/rlung gyur skran la e raN+Da'i/_/mar ni chang dang sbyar ba blud/_/bad rlung 'dres la'ang de nyid blud/_/mkhris pa 'dres la 'o ma bcas/_/gal te mkhris pa 'phel 'gyur te/_/tsha gyur rlung gi skran can la/_/mthun pa rjes su 'byin
[\[209b.7\]]byed pa/_/snum bcas bkru sman gtang bar bya/_/des kyang tsha ba ma bri na/_/de la gtar ga gdab par bya/_/sgog skya bshus pa skam po ni/_/srang bzhi chu dang 'o ma ni/_/brgyad 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol/_/'o ma ma lus par blud na/_/rlung gyur skran dang rtug 'gags
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]dang /_/rlung nad gzugs 'khums mi bzad rims/_/snying nad khong 'bras zad byed rnams/_/'o ma de yis myur du 'joms/_/til mar chang dang ba gcin dang /_/rang skyur ya bak+Sha rar bcas/_/blud na skran dang dmu rdzing dang /_/lto sbos cig car
[\[210a.2\]]'joms par byed/_/tsitra pi pi ling spru la/_/bca' sga shing kun eraN+Da/_/rgyam tsha kha ru tsha bcas pa/_/bskol ba blud na gzer ba dang /_/lto sbos rtug 'gags sel mchog yin/_/ma nu e raN+Da'i rtsa ba/_/nas dang byi tsher ba sha ka_/chu dang bskol te blud na ni/_/lto
[\[210a.3\]]nad sbos dang gzer 'joms byed/_/ma nu e raN+Da 'jag ma'i/_/rtsa ba thang shing bca' sga rnams/_/chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba blud/_/khong pa phrag pa rgyab gzer 'joms/_/brag zhun dang ni pa ya s+ya/_/rtsa ba chen po lnga bskol ba/_/rlung gyur skran nad can la blud/_/
[\[210a.4\]]rtug skam nad la nas kyi ni/_/chag tshe snum dang ldan pa sbyin/_/pi pi ling ngam la phug gi_/khu ba dang ni sbyar ba sbyin/_/nas kyi zan dron 'o mar bcas/_/rlung gi rtug 'gags nad la sbyin/_/yang na mon sran gre'u'i chan/_/snum mang lan tshwar ldan pa sbyin/_/dur byid
[\[210a.5\]]dan ti ni li ni/_/a ru ra dang kam pi l+ya/_/nas tshig 'khus thal kha ru tsha/_/dong gra mar dang bcas pa ni/_/dri mar bcas la bkru sman gtang /_/ni li ni dang 'bras bu gsum/_/ra sna pa la pu tse shel/_/kaN+Da ka ri byi dang ga_/srang re chu bre bzhi nang bskol/_/khu ba
[\[210a.6\]]brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/mar bre gang dang zho bre gang /_/su d+ha k+Shi ra srang gcig bskol/_/de las mar bre re re na/_/nas thug thug sla sbyar te blud/_/zhu zhing legs par 'khrus nas ni/_/sha khu bza' ba sbyin par bya/_/ni li ni yi sman mar 'dis/_/skran mdze dmu rdzing ngo
[\[210a.7\]]khabs dang /_/'or nad skya rbab rims nad dang /_/sha bkra mdzer ba smyo byed 'joms/_/khyim bya rma bya gong ma sreg_/khrung khrung bye'u'i sha khu dang /_/sA lu'i 'bras chan chang dang mar/_/rlung gi skran ni sel ba yin/_/nyung zhing snum la sla zhing dro/_/kha zas rlung skran can gyis
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bza'/_/btung bar chang gi dngas ma'am/_/'u su bskol ba'i chu tshan blud/_/mkhris gyur skran ni snum dro las/_/byung ba de la rgun 'bru dang /_/a rur bskol bu ram bcas/_/kam pi l+ya dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/cho ga'am khrag mkhris gsor bshad pa'i/_/bkru sman blud de
[\[210b.2\]]'khrus pa phan/_/rtsub dro las byung skran la ni/_/tig ta'am ba sha ka bskol ba'i/_/mar ni blud par byas pa'am/_/rtswa yi rtsa ba lnga pa 'am/_/'tsho byed sde tshan bshad pa dang /_/mar bskol blud na mchog tu phan/_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde tshan rnams/_/'tsho byed sde tshan 'o
[\[210b.3\]]ma phan/_/de yang bshol du med gyur par/_/sman pas bkru sman dang bskol ba'i/_/mar ram 'o ma dag gi ni/_/bkru sman nye bar gtang bar bya/_/skyu ru ra dang bu ram shing /_/khu ba mar ni bre gang dang /_/a ru ra ni zhi cha bcug_/bskol ba'i mar blud mkhris skran
[\[210b.4\]]sel/_/yang na mkhris pa'i khong 'bras gsor/_/bshad pa'i seng phrom sman mar blud/_/rgun 'bru shing mngar pa ya s+ya/_/shug pa tsan+dan sbrang rtsi rnams/_/'bras bkrus chu dang blud na ni/_/mkhris pa'i skran ni sel bar 'gyur/_/kyi lce ba ni srang gnyis dang /_/
[\[210b.5\]]chu bre do ni bskol nas su/_/brgyad cha lus pa btsags pa ni/_/dro 'jam 'o ma cha mnyam blud/_/yang na de steng 'o tshan ni/_/me drod ji bzhin blud par bya/_/de yis nad ni bsal bas na/_/mkhris pa can gyi skran zhir 'gyur/_/tsha la mar grang bsku ba'am/_/bsil
[\[210b.6\]]ba'i sman mar bcas pa bsku/_/chu skyes lo mas reg bya zhing /_/snod chus gang la reg pa phan/_/gzer dang me drod bri 'gyur zhing /_/tsha ba'i dang po tshul can gyis/_/mkhris pa'i skran la khyad par du/_/khrag ni lan mang dbyung ba phan/_/rtsa ba chad skran mi tsha
[\[210b.7\]]zhing /_/nye bar zad par 'gyur ba dang /_/khrag ni skyur bar mi 'gyur la/_/khrag las gyur pa'i nad kyang mang /_/gnyid cing nad ni bsal bal/_/skam sar skyes pa'i sha khus brta/_/brtas na nyes pa lhag lus la/_/slar yang mar ni bsten par bya/_/khrag dang
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]mkhris pa [(]'phal [,]'phel[)]gyur pas/_/skran ni smin par phyogs pa la/_/gso ba'i bya ba ma rnyed cing /_/mkhris pa'i khong 'bras ltar gso bya/_/sA lu ba dang ra'i 'o ma/_/pa tol skam sa'i sha mar dang /_/pa ru sha ka skyu ru ra/_/rgun 'bru 'bra go se 'bru dang /_/
[\[211a.2\]]kha rar bcas pa'i kha zas bza'/_/btung ba ba la bri ha ti/_/la sogs bskol ba blud par bya/_/bad kan las gyur dang po ni/_/slon bya de mi bzod smyung bya/_/kha dro tsha ba'i thug stsogs kyi/_/rim par de 'og me drod skyed/_/shing kun la sogs thal sman dang /_/shing kun star bu nyis 'gyur gtang /_/
[\[211a.3\]]gal te 'bur ram gting ring gyur/_/tshor ba chung zhing sra la brtan/_/lto sbos la sogs ldan pa'i skran/_/dugs byas nas ni snyi bar bya/_/bad kan las gyur skran can gyis/_/mar tsha thal sman bcas chu blud/_/nas tshig
[\[211a.4\]]'khus thal tsha ba gsum/_/rgyam tsha shing kun kha ru tsha/_/se 'bru rtsa ba bcu bskol mar/_/bad kan las gyur skran myur 'joms/_/bse shing 'bras bu srang gnyis dang /_/rtsa ba chung ngu lnga srang re/_/chu bre bzhi yi nang du bskol/_/bzhi cha lus pa de dang ni/_/mnyam
[\[211a.5\]]pa'i 'o ma mnyam pa'i mar/_/byi dang ga dang shing kun dang /_/nas tshig 'khus thal lce myang tsha/_/kaN+Da ka ri rtsabs ru tsha/_/zur pa ra sna shing mngar dang /_/pi pi ling dang dong gra rnams/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis bcas par bskol/_/go bye yi ni sman mar ni/_/bad kan
[\[211a.6\]]skran ni sel ba'i mchog_/mchin pa mcher pa'i nad dang ni/_/skya rbab dang ni pho ba'i nad/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba 'joms/_/de nas skran can de yi lus/_/ma lus par ni dugs byas la/_/skran kun la ni thog ma nyid/_/snum chos dugs ni byas gyur na/_/
[\[211a.7\]]gso ba gang zhig byas pa des/_/grub kyi rtsub chos kyis mi 'grub/_/snum zhing dugs kyis brlan lus kyi/_/skran ni snyi bar gyur pa dang /_/ji ltar bshad pa'i bum pa ni/_/bzhag pas bkang nas de bsal bya/_/de nas ras nang chud byas te/_/tshad shes pa yi
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]skran dbral bya/_/shing gcad ra rmig me long rnams/_/ji snyed pa yis legs par bcing /_/des skran gcig pu dbyi bya zhing /_/snying dang rgyu mar reg mi bya/_/til dang zar ma'i sa bon dang /_/nyungs kar e raN+Da yis byug_/bad kan skran ni lcags kyi snod/_/dro
[\[211b.2\]]'jam tsam gyis dugs bya'o/_/de ltar gnas las bskyod nas ni/_/bad kan skran la snum bcas pa'i/_/bkru sman dang ni 'jam rtsi dag_/rtsa ba bcu pa ldan par sbyang /_/pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra/_/rgun 'bru sha ma dur byid sogs/_/srang re dang ni bskol ba
[\[211b.3\]]la/_/e raN+Da yi zhun mar ni/_/bre re 'o ma drug 'gyur dang /_/lhan cig bskol bar gyur ba 'di/_/'dres pa'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_/skran can 'khru bar byed pa'i mchog_/rgyu rlugs khong 'bras gzer ba ni/_/rlung gi nad la bdud rtsi yin/_/yang na ni li ni sman mar/_/
[\[211b.4\]]srang gnyis tshad du blud pa'am/_/de bzhin skyid de ba'i sman mar/_/dmu rdzing skabs bshad mar yang phan/_/dan da tsi tra a ru ra/_/srang ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga/_/chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/_/brgyad cha lus btsags a ru ra/_/bcas pa bu ram dan dar mnyam/_/bcug
[\[211b.5\]]la til mar dur byid phye/_/srang bzhi bca' sga pi pi ling /_/zho gnyis bskol bsgrangs lde gu de/_/sbrang rtsi til mar cha mnyam pa/_/dri sna bzhi bzhi srang re gzhug_/de las a ru gcig dang /_/lde gu srang gcig bcas zos na/_/bde bar nad ni bre gang 'khru/_/
[\[211b.6\]]skran dang snying nad gzhang 'brum dang /_/glo nad lto sbos sbyar ba'i dug_/mdze dang dmu rdzing nad slong dang /_/yi ga 'chus dang mcher pa'i nad/_/skya rbab mig ser 'joms par byed/_/'di ni dan da tsi tra ka_/a ru ra yi lde gu yin/_/su d+ha k+Shi ra'i rlan dang ni/_/dur byid
[\[211b.7\]]dang ni legs bsres te/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi zho gnyis bcas/_/lde gus legs par 'khru bar 'gyur/_/ru rta dur byid a ru ra/_/dan da gu gul nas tshig 'khus/_/ba gcin bcas blud yang na ni/_/gu gul nyi tshe ba gcin blud/_/cho ga grub pa las bshad pa'i/_/
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bkru sman drag po skran 'joms gtang /_/rtsa ba zug cing lhun che la/_/sra zhing lci la tshor ba med/_/gting ring ma smin pa yi skran/_/thal sman dang ni chang rnying dang /_/me yi las kyis bsal bar bya/_/bad kan shas che thal sman ni/_/gzhang 'brum
[\[212a.2\]]rde'u pho ba'i nad/_/gso ba'i skabs bshad gtang bya zhing /_/zhag gcig zhag gnyis kyis chod pa/_/yang na zhag gsum ngal sos la/_/lus kyi nyams stobs nad dag ni/_/'phel 'bri'i las la brtson par bya/_/thang shing dur byid dan dang /_/pu tse shel dang
[\[212a.3\]]tsha ba lnga/_/swa rdzi ka thal nas tshig 'khus/_/pa ta dang ni 'bras bu gsum/_/ru rta ba sar su gan+d+ha/_/zi ra nag po srang phyed phyed/_/lan tshwa lnga ni srang re dag_/btags pa'i phye ma til mar dang /_/zhag dang zho dang mar dang sbrus/_/rdza mar dub ma shor bsregs/_/
[\[212a.4\]]rdza ma me yi mdog 'gyur de'i/_/thal ba blangs pa 'o ma mar/_/dar ba chang sogs sbyar te blud/_/skran dang rtug 'gags rgyu rlugs dang /_/gzhang 'brum dmu rdzing pho ba'i nad/_/srin nad brjed byed smyo byed gdon/_/mngal nad khu chu las gyur rde'u/_/byi la sbrul gyi
[\[212a.5\]]dug rnams kyang /_/thal ba'i sman 'dis sel bar byed/_/bad kan las gyur skran la snum/_/sha khu 'o ma mar bsten la/_/thal sman btang na skran dag ni/_/gnas nas dum bu dum bu ru/_/bcad nas thur du 'byin par byed/_/me drod chung zhing yi ga 'chus/_/chang
[\[212a.6\]]goms snum can za ba la/_/rgyun srang dag phyir mnan chad dang /_/chang rnying skyon med blud par bya/_/sA lu drug cu pa rnying pa/_/rgya sran skam sa'i srog chags sha_/tsi tra pu ri ka rany+dza/_/a ti man da la la phud/_/ba ri na yi myu gu dang /_/shi kru bil ba gzhon nu
[\[212a.7\]]dang /_/la phug gzhon nu skam po dang /_/kha lung shing kun star bu dang /_/se 'bru nas tshig 'khus thal ba/_/tsha ba gsum dang ngar ba dang /_/mar dang til mar kha zas sbyin/_/btung bar chang gi dngas ma dang /_/skyur rtsabs dar bzhog chu/_/bid la la phud phye ma/_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]rtsa ba la bskol khu ba'am/_/rgun chang rnying pa blud par bya/_/pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba/_/go snyod rgyam tsha kru trug tres/_/chang gi snyigs mar bsres pa yis/_/skran ni myur du sel bar byed/_/slon dang smyung ba dugs dang ni/_/sman mar blud dang bkru sman dang /_/'jam
[\[212b.2\]]rtsi thal sman mnan chang dang /_/chang rnying ri lu phan zas kyis/_/bad kan skran can gting zug pas/_/gal te zhi bar ma gyur na/_/de la khrag dbyung tha mar ni/_/mde'u lcags sogs kyis bsreg par bya/_/de nas skran ni mthar thug par/_/sman pas gos kyis dkris
[\[212b.3\]]nas ni/_/lte ba chu so rgyu ma snying /_/spu yi phreng ni ma gtogs par/_/shin tu gting thug ma yin par/_/mde'u bsregs pa'am yang na ni/_/gzong bu'i lcags ni bsregs pa'am/_/tin du ka yi shing gis bsreg_/de nas bsil bas me dbal ni/_/zhi nas rma
[\[212b.4\]]ltar gso bar bya/_/ma zhu rjes 'brel smyung byas nas/_/thug pa sogs kyis me drod bskyed/_/rang rang rim dang 'brel pa las/_/'dren ma'i gso bas gso bar bya/_/btsas pa'i dus ni 'das gyur pa'i/_/bud med la skran khrag skyes 'byung /_/de la lus snum
[\[212b.5\]]dugs byas par/_/snum gyi bkru sman gtang bar bya/_/til bskol mar dang bu ram dang /_/tsha gsum ga bra'i rtsa ba'i phye/_/khrag las gyur pa'i skran dang ni/_/bud med zla mtshan med la blud/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba pi pi ling /_/thang shing ka rany+dza'i shun pa/_/pi pi ling gi rtsa
[\[212b.6\]]ba yi/_/phye ma til bskol chur sbyar ba/_/blud na khrag skran nad sel byed/_/pa la sha yi thal ba ni/_/bre brgyad til mar mar bre brgyad/_/bskol te tshad bzhin blud na ni/_/skran ni snyi bar byed pa yin/_/gal te snyi bar ma gyur na/_/mngal gyi bkru sman gtang bar
[\[212b.7\]]bya/_/til gyi lde gu thal sman bcas/_/yang na su d+ha k+shi rar sbyar/_/yang na de gnyis dang bsres pa'i/_/nya ni kha bo gtang bar bya/_/phag rgod nya yi mkhris pa yis/_/bsgos pa'i ras ma gzhug par bya/_/yang na bu ram thal sman gnyis/_/phabs sbyar mngal ni sbyang phyir
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gtang /_/khrag mkhris sel ba'i thal sman ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin/_/sgog skya'i chang ni rnon po dang /_/nya yang de la sbyin par bya/_/rtsa ba bcu pa thal sman dang /_/'o ma ba gcin mas gtad bya/_/des kyang khrag 'dzag ma gyur na/_/skran
[\[213a.2\]]'jig byed pa'i sbyor ba phan/_/byung nas mar dang til mar bsku/_/bcad pa dag ni mi bya zhing /_/sha khu 'bras chan bza' ba dang /_/btung ba chang ni sar pa blud/_/khrag ni shas cher byung gyur na/_/khrag mkhris sel ba'i gso ba bya/_/rlung gi nad kyis nyen gyur na/_/rlung gi gso
[\[213a.3\]]ba kun kyang bya/_/ltor spos sogs dang rtug skam la/_/rlung bsal gsol ba ji bzhin bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dmu rdzing gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/nad ni shas cher stsogs pa dang /_/bu ga'i rgyun
[\[213a.4\]]srang 'gags pa la/_/dmu rdzing 'byung bas de yi phyir/_/rtag tu bkru sman gtang bar bya/_/yang na zla ba gcig gam gnyis/_/e raN+Da'i mar ba gcin bcas/_/'o mar bcas pa'am ba gcin nam/_/ma he'i gcin ni blud bya zhing /_/ba yi 'o ma blud par bya/_/lto sbos tsha
[\[213a.5\]]bas nyam thag cing /_/skom dang brgyal bas non pa la/_/rnga mo'i 'o ma blud par bya/_/rtsub cing rlung shas che ba yi/_/nad ni sbyong bar 'dod pa yis/_/snum chos dang ni sman mar dag_/dmu rdzing 'joms pa sbyar bar bya/_/srang drug rtsa ba bcu pa'i chu/_/zho ga chu ni bre brgyad
[\[213a.6\]]bskol/_/dong gra srang gsum mar dang ni/_/til mar bre ni re re dang /_/zho ga chu ni bre bzhi dag_/bskol ba 'di ni blud gyur na/_/dmu rdzing thams cad 'joms par byed/_/rlung dang bad kan las byung ba'i/_/skran la'ang mchog tu phan pa yin/_/bzhi 'gyur chu dang nyis 'gyur
[\[213a.7\]]gcin/_/kru trug tres srang gcig lde gu/_/bre gang mar bskol thal sman bcas/_/dmu rdzing can la blud par bya/_/nas dang rgya shug rgya sran dang /_/rtsa ba lnga ni bskol ba'i chu/_/chang dang rang skyur bcas pa dang /_/mar bskol ba yang blud par bya/_/snum 'di snum
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bcas nyams stobs ni/_/skye zhing rlung nad zhi gyur nas/_/nad ni gnas nas bskyod pa dang /_/cho ga grub bshad bkru sman gtang /_/pa to la'i rtsa 'bras bu gsum/_/skyer pa byi dang ga zho re/_/kam pi la dang ni li ni/_/tsi tra ka zho gnyis gsum bzhi/_/phyer btags
[\[213b.2\]]ba gcin sbyar ba blud/_/'khrus nas thug pa sha khu ni/_/skam sar gnas pa'i sha khu sbyin/_/de nas zhag drug 'o ma dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang bskol ba ni/_/yang dang yang du blud byas na/_/'di yis dmu rdzing thams cad ni/_/dmu chur gyur kyang 'joms par byed/_/bi sha
[\[213b.3\]]la dang shang khi ni/_/dan da seng phrom shun shu dag_/rgya shug phre'u rgun 'bru dang /_/rgya shug sbom chu bu ram chang /_/ba gcin dang ni sbyar te blud/_/la la phud dang spa ma'i 'bras/_/'u su shu ti zir nag_/pi pi ling rtsa ka ra bI/_/a za mo dang zur ba dkar/_/shu dag
[\[213b.4\]]zi ra tsi tra ka_/tsha ba gsum dang khron bu dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang thal sman gnyis/_/ma nu ru rta lan tshwa lnga/_/byi dang ga rnams cha mnyam dang /_/dan da cha gsum de bzhin du/_/dur byid bi shal nyis 'gyur/_/sa dal ni bzhi 'gyur te/_/phye ma 'di ni sred med du/_/
[\[213b.5\]]zhes bya nad kyi tshogs 'joms byed/_/'di bsten nad ni mi gnas te/_/khyab 'jug gis bcom lha min mtshungs/_/dmu rdzing nad la dar ba blud/_/skran can rgya shug chu sbyar blud/_/rlung gis lto sbos chang sbyar gtang /_/rlung nad nyid la chang dngas sbyar/_/phyis 'gags
[\[213b.6\]]la zhog chu/_/gzhang 'brum can la'ang zhog chus/_/bcad snyam sems la da trig chus/_/ma zhu ba la chu dron las/_/mtshan bar rdol dang skya rbab dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde skad 'gags/_/snying dang pho ba'i nad dang ni/_/mdze dang me drod nyams dang rims/_/mche
[\[213b.7\]]ba'i dug dang rtsa ba'i dug_/dbyig dug sbyar ba'i dug bcas la/_/ci rigs par ni phye ma 'di/_/khong pa snum dang ldan pa la/_/blud nas 'khru ru gzhug par bya/_/spa ma'i 'bras bu bya snu dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang ni li ni/_/pu tse shel dang kyi lce ba/_/dur byid shu dgas ta
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]la/_/rgyam tsha dang ni kha ru tsha/_/pi pi ling ni phye mar btags/_/se 'bru'i khu ba'am 'bras bu ni/_/gsum gyi khu ba'am sha khu'am/_/ba gcin dro 'jam chu las blud/_/'dis ni skran nad thams cad dang /_/mcher pa dmu rdzing thams
[\[214a.2\]]cad dang /_/sha bkra mdze nad ma zhu dang /_/drod nyams me drod ma snyoms dang /_/gzhang 'brum skya rbab mig ser dang /_/rkang lag zha ba'i nad dang ni/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan rnams/_/bkru sman btang bas myur du sel/_/ni li ni dang tsha ba gsum/_/lcang
[\[214a.3\]]ma ya bak+Sha ra dang /_/lan tshwa dang kru trug tres/_/phye ma zhun mar blud na ni/_/dmu rdzing skran gyi nad rnams sel/_/sbyang byas nyam chung bar bar du/_/rnga mo ba'am ra yi ni/_/'o ma sngon bzhin blud par bya/_/bshol du med pa'i nad la ni/_/bkru sman phyir
[\[214a.4\]]ni snum bcas gtang /_/mchog tu nyam chung gyur la sbyin/_/a ru ra yi phye ma ni/_/bre gang mar ni bre bzhi dang /_/me la bzhus nas gzar bu yis/_/dkrugs nas nas kyi sbun pa'i nang /_/zla gcig bzhag nas de rjes la/_/phyung ste legs par bzhus nas ni/_/
[\[214a.5\]]a ru ra bskol khu ba dang /_/zho ni skyur po bcas pa bskol/_/de 'thungs dmu rdzing skran lto sbos/_/gtun 'dra'i rlung nad khong 'bras dang /_/mdze dang smyo byed brjed byed rnams/_/nye bar 'joms par byed pa yin/_/shrI khaN+Da ba'i 'o ma/_/bskol te bsgrangs nas
[\[214a.6\]]gzar bus dkrugs/_/las byung mar ni snu ha yi/_/'o mar bcas bskol snga mar mtshungs/_/'o ma bre ni bcu drug dang /_/su d+ha k+Shi ra bre phyed bcas/_/zhor gyur bsrubs pa las gyur mar/_/dur byid bskol ba'ang yon tan de'o/_/mar ni bre gang dag dang ni/_/
[\[214a.7\]]'o ma brgyad 'gyur nang du ni/_/snu ha'i 'o ma srang gcig dang /_/dur byid srang drug bskol de bzhin/_/'di blud 'og tu thug pa dang /_/sha khu mngar po'am 'o ma blud/_/ma zhu 'khrus par gyur pa dang /_/bca' sga bskol ba'i chu dron blud/_/de nas thug pa de 'og ni/_/
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]ku lang+tha yi yu sha blud/_/de ltar khong rtsub zhag gsum blud/_/slar yang thug sogs rim par blud/_/rim pa 'di dag nyid kyis ni/_/zhun mar yang dang yang du blud/_/mar ni bskol bar gyur pa 'di/_/sman pa las la byang ba yis/_/skran rnams dang ni dbyig
[\[214b.2\]]dug dang /_/dmu rdzing bsal phyir blud par bya/_/yang na pi lu lde gur bskol/_/lto sbos sel bar blud par bya/_/seng phrom ni li ni mar ram/_/'dres pa'i sman mar blud par bya/_/nad bsal nas ni rim gyis zas/_/sA lu'i 'bras chan yang zhing nyung /_/byin
[\[214b.3\]]la dmu rdzing can gyi ni/_/nad kyi lhag ma dag bya'i phyir/_/a ru ra ni rdog ma stong /_/ba gcin dang sbyar 'o ma blud/_/yang na pi pi ling rdog stong /_/su d+ha k+Shi rar legs bsres pa'am/_/pi pi ling ni bskyed sbyin pa'am/_/'o mar 'thung zhing brag zhun bza'/_/de bzhin
[\[214b.4\]]gu gul 'o ma dang /_/cha mnyam sge'u gsher khu ba sbyin/_/yang na thang shing tsi tra ka'i/_/lde gu 'o mar sbyar ba blud/_/zla gcig ha ti pi pi ling /_/bca' sga 'o mar bcas pa blud/_/dan da tsi tra byi dang ga_/dbyi mo tsha ba gsum lde gu/_/zho gnyis 'o ma sbyar blud na/_/
[\[214b.5\]]dmu rdzing 'phel ba sel bar byed/_/yang na su d+ha k+Shir mar/_/bcas pa'i kha zas zla gcig sbyin/_/su d+hA k+Shi ra la sbangs ba'i/_/pi pi ling dang khur ba sbyin/_/gal te rtsib logs gzer zhing rengs/_/snying brgal rlung gi nad ldang na/_/de la til mar bil ba
[\[214b.6\]]dang /_/thal sman dang ni ldan par sbyin/_/tun tu ka dang ba la dang /_/ba la sha 'am til sdong dang /_/a pa marga ka ta li/_/ag+ni man+thI thal ba rnams/_/so sor gzags pa bskol ba blud/_/bad kan rlung ngam mkhris pa'am/_/de gnyis rlung dang 'dres gyur pa/_/
[\[214b.7\]]stobs ldan rang gi sman bcas pa/_/e raN+Da yi til mar phan/_/thang shing arga pa la sha_/ha ti pi pi ling shi kru/_/a shwa kar+Na ba gcin bcas/_/lde gu lto ba'i phyi rim byug_/bri shi kali shu dag dang /_/bca' sga rtsa ba lnga pa dang /_/'u su ru rta ba spru gnyis/_/bskol
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ba ba gcin bcas pa blugs/_/'khrus shing lto ba zhum 'gyur ba'i/_/sa ra na la sogs dugs bya/_/gos kyis legs par dkri bar bya/_/de ltar rlung gis spos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig legs par 'khrus gyur pa/_/slar yang sbos gyur de la ni/_/
[\[215a.2\]]snum bcas skyur dang lan tshwa gnyis/_/bkru sman mas gtong drag por bya/_/rlung gis rengs dang bcas gyur pas/_/gang zhig lto sbos gyur pa'i mi/_/de la thal sman rnon po ni/_/ba gcin bcas pa mas gtong bya/_/de ltar dmu rdzing spyi yi ni/_/gso ba grags
[\[215a.3\]]par bshad pa yin/_/de nas rlung gyur dmu rdzing can/_/bi da ri sogs mar bskol blud/_/de nas snum gyis zhen byas shing /_/yan lag dugs bya bkru sman gtang /_/'di la seng phrom mar ram ni/_/'dres pa'i sman mar lan mang blud/_/thug stsogs rim pa
[\[215a.4\]]byas nas ni/_/stobs bskyed phyir ni 'o ma blud/_/nyams stobs rnyed nas rim gyis ni/_/'o ma de ni spang bar bya/_/yu sha sha khu skyur dang ni/_/lan tshwar bcas pas me drod bskyed/_/rtug 'gags gyur nas slar snum dang /_/dugs bya de 'og mas gtong bya/_/
[\[215a.5\]]rtsub cing mas gtong sman bcas pa'i/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i mas gtong sbyar/_/g.yo zhing tshigs rus la 'jug pa/_/rtsub cing 'phyen dang phyis 'gags/_/me drod che la til mar dang /_/e raN+Da'i mar rlung 'joms pa'i/_/sman dang bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang /_/khrus
[\[215a.6\]]mi bya la 'o ma mar/_/sha khu la sogs zhi byed gtang /_/mkhris pa las gyur stobs che la/_/mngar dang sbyar ba'i snum chos bya/_/sha ma dur byid 'bras bu gsum/_/bskol ba'i khu ba'i bkru sman gtang /_/de 'og n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol/_/khu bar kha ra sbrang
[\[215a.7\]]rtsi mar/_/ldan pa ni ru yang phan/_/de bskol snum gyi 'jam rtsi gtang /_/nyam chung dang po 'jam rtsi gtang /_/'o ma mas gtong ges sbyang bya/_/me stobs bskyed cing snum chos bya/_/'o ma dur byid lde gu'am/_/e raN+Da dang bskol ba'am/_/sad la dang kyi
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]lce ba'am/_/dong ga bskol ba dag gis bya/_/bad kan bcas la ba gcin bcas/_/rlung can tig ta mar bcas pa'i/_/yang dang yang du bkru sman gtang /_/'di dag 'o mar bcas bza' ba'am/_/bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud/_/dmu rdzing can la 'o thug ni/_/
[\[215b.2\]]sbyin zhing nye bar bsku bar bya/_/slar yang 'o ma 'jam rtsi dang /_/bkru sman yang dang yang du gtang /_/rim pas nges par gnas byas te/_/ma yengs mkhris gyur dmu rdzing bsal/_/bad kan las gyur snum chos bya/_/dug mo nyung sogs mar bskol gtang /_/nyams
[\[215b.3\]]stobs ldan pas dugs byas te/_/su d+ha k+Shi ra'i bkru sman gtang /_/thug sogs rim dang thal sman tsha/_/ldan pas bad kan sel ba sbyin/_/ba gcin tsha gsum til mar bcas/_/mas gtong drag po bya ba'ang phan/_/mung+ga ka sogs lde gu dang /_/snum gyi 'jam rtsi de
[\[215b.4\]]nas gtang /_/kha zas 'o ma tsha ba gsum/_/yang na rgya sran khu ba sbyin/_/bad kan 'thas shing lto ba skrang /_/rmongs bag snying 'phar yi ga 'chus/_/me drod chung ba chang goms na/_/chang snying nas tshig 'khus thal blud/_/shing kun dang ni pi pi ling /_/'bras bu gsum
[\[215b.5\]]dang thang shing dang /_/ser po rnam gnyis go bye dang /_/na le sham dkar pu tse shel/_/seng phrom shu dag bca' sga dang /_/bong nga gla sgang ru rta dang /_/sa ra na dang lan tshwa dang /_/btags pa zho dang snum bzhi sbyar/_/du ba ma shor bar bsregs la/_/thal ba de las zho gnyis
[\[215b.6\]]dang /_/chang dang chu dron zhog chu/_/chang rnying mnan chang sbyar ba blud/_/skran dang dmu rdzing gtun 'dra'i nad/_/rtsig pa 'dra dang gsud dang skran/_/snying nad mcher pa gzhang 'brum dang /_/rtug 'gags nad rnams 'joms par byed/_/bad kan dmu rdzing nyam chung la/_/
[\[215b.7\]]chang rnying dang ni bag cin dang /_/lcags phye dang sbyar btung ba dang /_/thal sman til mar bcas pa blud/_/nyungs kar phabs dang la phug gi/_/sa bon btab pa'i lde gu yis/_/bsku zhing dmu rdzing dugs bya ba/_/'di la rgyun du sbyang bar bya/_/'dus pa las gyur dmu
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]rdzing ni/_/me drod nyams stobs ma zad la/_/nad shas che ltar re thag chad/_/gso ba'i sbyor ba 'di bya'o/_/dan da tra pan ti'i 'bras bu/_/btsir ba'i mar ni blud pa bsngags/_/dmu rdzing gsos kyang ma 'chos dang /_/mchog tu nyes gsum
[\[216a.2\]]las gyur la/_/de yi nye du dris nas ni/_/ka ka da ni 'ol ma se/_/ka ra bI ra'i rtsa ba dag_/btags pa'i lde gu chang sbyar blud/_/yang na bza' btung nang du ni/_/dug kyang rim pas sbyin par bya/_/gang du sbrul ni khros gyur nas/_/shing tog la ni dug bsgos pa/_/
[\[216a.3\]]de yis 'di yi nad tshogs ni/_/brtan zhing zhen pa lam log zhugs/_/bshig ste phyir ni 'byin par byed/_/dug gis myur du 'jig par byed/_/de bzhin nad med 'gyur ba'am/_/'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/nad bsal nad de chu grang gis/_/khrus byas 'o ma'am
[\[216a.4\]]thug pa blud/_/dur byid kyi ni tshod ma'am/_/rgya sne'u mar ti ka par+Ni/_/ka la sha ka sne'u yi/_/khu ba dang ni bskol ba la/_/skyur dang lan tshwa snum med cing /_/shin tu tshos pa'am ma tshos min/_/zas med zla ba gcig sbyin la/_/de nas skom na khu ba blud/_/de ltar
[\[216a.5\]]zla ba gcig gi bar/_/tshod mas nad ni bsal gyur nas/_/nyam chung ba la brtas byed pa/_/rnga mo'i 'o ma blud par bya/_/mcher pa'i dmu rdzing nad gzhi ni/_/ji bzhin snum chos dugs bya ste/_/zho dang 'bras chan bcas byin la/_/lag pa g.yon nas gtar ga gdab/_/
[\[216a.6\]]nyam stobs rnyed nas slar yang ni/_/snum blud nas ni sbyang bar bya/_/rgya mtsho'i nya phyis thal sman dang /_/'o ma sbyar ba blud par bya/_/pu ti ka rany+dza'i thal ba/_/skyur khu kha ru tsha dang ni/_/pi pi ling gi phye btab ba blud/_/shi kru bskol ba pi pi ling /_/rgyam tsha tsi tra ka btab blud/_/
[\[216a.7\]]shing kun stsogs phye thal sman dang /_/mar sbyar me drod ji bzhin sbyin/_/dong gra ngan pa pi pi ling /_/cha mnyam a ru ra nyis 'gyur/_/kha ru tsha ni cha phyed bcas/_/phye ma chu dron sbyar ba blud/_/byi dang ga dang kru trug tres/_/phye dang rgyam tsha shu dag rnams/_/kham skyogs
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]nang bsregs 'o mar bcas/_/blud na skran dang mcher nad 'joms/_/rgya shug lo ma til mar bsres pa dag_/legs par mnyes shing bsregs te de 'og tu/_/gtun bus btsir la de 'og 'o ma blud/_/mcher pa dmu rdzing tshogs ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/ro hita yi lcug
[\[216b.2\]]ma gtubs/_/dum bu a ru ra bcas chu'am/_/ba gcin nang du zhag bdun ni/_/sbangs la de ni blud gyur na/_/mig ser mcher pa skran gzhang 'brum/_/srin nad gcin snyid mu rdzing 'joms/_/ro hi ta ka'i shun lpags ni/_/srang ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshad/_/rgya shug bre
[\[216b.3\]]dor bcas pa ni/_/bskol ba'i khu ba byas nas ni/_/tsha ba lnga ni sring re dang /_/de dag kun dang mnyam pa yi/_/ro hi ta ka'i shun lpags phye/_/mar bre gang dang btsos nas ni/_/'di blud pa yis myur du ni/_/mcher pa rab tu 'phel ba sel/_/chu shing til gyi sdong po
[\[216b.4\]]dang /_bu ram shing bsregs thal ba ni/_/til mar bskol ba blud gyur na/_/bad rlung las gyur mcher nad 'joms/_/ma zhi skran gyi cho ga ltar/_/rlung dang bad kan shas che la/_/mcher nad spyi bag ma gyur la/_/me yi las ni spyad par bya/_/mkhris gyur 'tsho byed sna
[\[216b.5\]]bcu dang /_/mar dang 'o ma 'jam rtsi gtang /_/khrag dbyung sbyang ba bya ba dang /_/'o ma blud par gyur pa'ang bsngags/_/mchin pa mcher pa la ltar gso/_/gtar ga lag pa g.yas nas bya/_/rgyu ma 'gags gyur dugs byas la/_/ba gcin sman ni rno bcas pa'i/_/
[\[216b.6\]]til mar lan tshwa bcas pa yi/_/ni ru ha ni 'jam rtsir bya/_phyis sla 'gyur kha zas dang /_/bkru sman rnon po 'di la gtang /_/rtug 'gags bsal ba'i gso ba ni/_/rlung 'joms byed pa gang yin bya/_/rgyu ma rdol ba'i dmu rdzing la/_/dugs ma gtogs
[\[216b.7\]]pa'i gso ba kun/_/bad kan dmu rdzing lta bur bya/_/sogs pa bzhin du chu gzags shing /_/sman pas de ltar 'tsho tsam bya/_/dmu chu la ni chu yi ni/_/nyes sel sman ni dang po ni/_/sman rno ba gcin ldan pa dang /_/sna tshogs thal sman ldan par sbyin/_/drod
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]skyed bad kan 'joms pa yi/_/zas kyis de ni gso bar bya/_/ra yi ril ma'i thal ba'i chu/_/ba gcin bcas gzags me bskol ba/_/ska bar gyur pa de nang du/_/pi pi ling dang de'i rtsa ba/_/bca' sga dur byid lan tshwa lnga/_/dan da khron bu
[\[217a.2\]]'bras bu gsum/_/shu dag karka ta sring gi/_/ya bak+Sha ra pa ta la/_/swa rdzi kaSha zhes bya ba/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btags phye gzhug_/rgya shug tsam gyi ri lu bya/_/de nas skyur rtsabs dang sbyar la/_/blud na ma zhu 'or nad dang /_/dmu chu'i nad ni 'phel ba sel/_/de
[\[217a.3\]]ltar sman gyis ma thub na/_/rgyu 'gags la sogs dmu rdzing gsum/_/gnyen gyi rgyal po la zhus te/_/mtshon gyi las ni spyad par bya/_/rgyu 'gags rdol ba'i dmu rdzing la/_/snum zhen dugs byas lte ba'i 'og_/g.yon logs su ni sor bzhi yi/_/lto ba'i phyogs
[\[217a.4\]]su bzhag nas ni/_/sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad dbral la/_/de nas rgyu ma phyung nas ni/_/btags te spu dang dri ma dang /_/'byar bag rdo ba la sogs bsal/_/brtol ba zug rngu phyung nas ni/_/rnam par bsal la gzags par bya/_/bu ga dbral la 'char gzhug cing /_/
[\[217a.5\]]zin nas de yi lus kyi ni/_/mgo bo rnam par gcad par bya/_/de rjes mar dang sbrang rtsi yis/_/bskus nas rgyu ma legs par gzhug_/de 'og phyi'i ngos nas rma btsem/_/de nas sa nag shing mngar gyi/_/lde gus legs par bsku bar bya/_/de 'og rlung med gnas
[\[217a.6\]]su ni/_/bzhag la 'o mas gsos pa dang /_/snum gyi snod nas bcing bar bya/_/chu bcas dmu rdzing til mar ni/_/rlung 'joms bskol bas bskus nas ni/_/chu dron blugs pas dugs bya zhing /_/lto ba ras kyis dkris nas ni/_/rgyu 'gags rdol par bshang
[\[217a.7\]]nas su/_/sor gcig tsam ni dbug par bya/_/der ni gce'u bcug nas ni/_/de la chu phyed gzags par bya/_/de nas gce'u phyung nas ni/_/til dang rgyam tsha'i lde gu yis/_/rma bskus nas ni bkag nas su/_/ras kyis lto ba dkri bar bya/_/zhag gsum yang na
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]zhag bzhi zhing /_/zhag ni bcu drug bar gyis bya/_/de ni bar bar dub bsti zhing /_/chu ni nyung zad nyung zad dbyung /_/lto ni lhod par gyur pa na/_/shin tu dam du dkri bar bya/_/chu ni gzags pa smyung byas la/_/thug pa lan tshwa snum med blud/_/zla drug bar du 'o mas
[\[217b.2\]]gso/_/zla gsum thug pa 'o thug blud/_/zla gsum bar du'o thug gam/_/'bras bu skyur bcas sha khu ni/_/lan tshwa snum ni nyung ba blud/_/khre dang ci tse rnying po sbyin/_/de ltar lo gcig 'bad pa yis/_/chu yi dmu rdzing legs par gso/_/spang ba rnams ni bsdams pa
[\[217b.3\]]dang /_/brtan par bya zhing skom med bya/_/gang phyir dmu rdzing thams cad ni/_/nad sogs pa las byung bas na/_/de phyir rlung sogs bsal ba yi/_/gso ba kun la bsngags pa yin/_/nad kyis lto ba gang 'gyur pas/_/me drod 'bri bar gyur pa yin/_/de bas
[\[217b.4\]]nang na drod skyed pa'i/_/rtsa ba lnga bcas nyung ba dang /_/lan tshwa snum dang kha ba nyung /_/'ju sla'i kha zas sbyin par bya/_/ba gcin dang ni sbangs pa yi/_/drug cu pa yi 'bras dag las/_/thug pa 'o thug btsos nas ni/_/ci 'dod par ni sbyin par bya/_/dmu rdzing skyon
[\[217b.5\]]ni sbyang ba'i phyir/_/de rjes bu ram shing khu blud/_/de ni rlung mkhris bad kan rnams/_/rang rang gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/shin tu tsha ba'i chu lan tshwa/_/rtsub cing bshang sri grang zhing lci/_/bu ram til g.yos tshod ma dang /_/chu 'thung lus ni 'khru ba dang /_/rtsol
[\[217b.6\]]drags lam dub nyin mo gnyid/_/bzhon pas 'gro ba spang bar bya/_/shin tu ska sla min zhing mngar/_/dar ba skom du blud pa bsngags/_/rlung la rgyam tsha pi pi ling /_/mkhris par kar tsha ba gsum/_/bad kan las gyur la la phud/_/rgyam tsha zi ra sbrang rtsi dang /_/tsha ba
[\[217b.7\]]gsum dang ldan pa sbyin/_/'dus pa las gyur sbrang rtsi dang /_/shu dag til mar bca' sga dang /_/shu ti ru rta lce myang tsha/_/mcher pa rgyun 'gags dmu rdzing la/_/tsha ba gsum dang la la phud/_/rgyam tsha go snyod spa 'bras bcas/_/rgyu rdol sbrang rtsi pi pi ling /_/tsha ba
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]gsum dang ldan pa blud/_/chu yi dmu rdzing can la ni/_/tsha ba gsum bcas blud na phan/_/rlung dang bad kan gyis gzir zhing /_/lus lci lto sbos yi ga 'chus/_/tshad 'khru me drod nyams pa la/_/dar ba bdud rtsi lta bu yin/_/sbyor ba kun
[\[218a.2\]]gyi rjes la ni/_/'o ma nye bar sbyar bya ste/_/lus zungs thams cad brtan byed cing /_/stobs bskyed nad ni lhag lus sel/_/sman gyis nyams smad gyur lus la/_/'o ma bdud rtsi lta bu yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_gso ba'i gnas kyi
[\[218a.3\]]le'u bco lnga pa'o//_//de nas skya rbab kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/skya rbab nad la dang por ni/_/dge ba chen po'i sman mar ram/_/ba yi lnga dang tig ta che'am/_/dong ga sogs bskol sman mar blud/_/se'u 'bru phul gang 'u su phyed/_/
[\[218a.4\]]tsi tra ka dang bca' sga las/_/srang re pi pi ling srang phyed/_/lde gur byas pa mar srang ni/_/nyi shu chu bre bzhi nang bskol/_/skya rbab snying nad gzhang 'brum skran/_/mcher rlung bad kan gyis nyen sel/_/drod skyed lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/sel zhing dbugs 'khyil
[\[218a.5\]]bder 'byung byed/_/bu btsas dka' dang mo gsham la/_/'di ni mchog tu bsngags pa yin/_/snum byas skyug sman rnon po gtang /_/slar yang snum bcas bkru sman ni/_/'o ma gcin sbyar btang ba'am/_/mkhur bkang lan mang byas pas sbyang /_/dan da'i 'bras
[\[218a.6\]]bu'i khu ba dro/_/tang pal yang na rgun 'bru ni/_/srang brgyad zhag gcig spangs mnyes pa/_/de 'thungs skya rbab nad sel to/_/a ru ra btags ba gcin sbyar/_/yang na de bskol 'bras bu gsum/_/khron bu ma sha dur byid dang /_/thang shing bca' sga'i lde gu ni/_/ba
[\[218a.7\]]gcin srang brgyad sbyar ba'am/_/ba gcig lhan cig bskol ba blud/_/de dag nyid ni mar bskol ba/_/blud na'ang nad ni sel bar byed/_/yang na lcags phye ba gcin nam/_/'o ma zhag bdun bzhag pa blud/_/zhu nas kha zas 'o ma'am/_/sha khu mngar po sbyin par bya/_/
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]stod smad sbyangs nas a ru ra/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu sbyin/_/bi sha la dang pu tse shel/_/gla sgang ru rta thang shing dang /_/dug mo nyung ni zho gnyis gnyis/_/mur ba srang phyed bong nga ni/_/zho gcig de yi phyer btags chu/_/dro 'jam sbyar blud sbrang rtsi sbyin/_/skya rbab rims
[\[218b.2\]]dang khong tsha dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde skran sbos/_/yi ga 'chus dang ma zhu rlung /_/khrag mkhris des ni sel bar byed/_/sle tres dang ni ba sha ka_/'bras bu gsum dang pu tse shel/_/tig ta nim pa rtsa mkhris rnams/_/bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/_/btab
[\[218b.3\]]pa blud na skya rbab dang /_/mig ser khrag mkhris 'joms par byed/_/tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka_/'bras bu gsum dang byi dang ga_/ga dur dang mnyam lcags kyi phye/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi dar ba'am/_/chu dron 'o mar sbyar blud na/_/mig ser skya rbab snying nad dang /_/mdze
[\[218b.4\]]dang gzhang 'brum nad rnams sel/_/dong gra lcags phye til dang ni/_/bu ram cha mnyam pa yi tshad/_/pi pi ling ni nyis 'gyur gzhug_/ri lu skya rbab can la sbyin/_/ta bya skyer pa'i shun pa dang /_/dbyi mong pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/thang shing rtsa ba gsum stsogs dgu/_/
[\[218b.5\]]phye mar btags pa nyis 'gyur gyi/_/man du ra'i phye dngul rdo 'dra/_/de dag gi ni brgyad 'gyur gyi/_/ba gcin nang du so sor bskol/_/ri lur bya bar bzod pa dang /_/gcig tu bsres te ri lur bya/_/'di ni ma du ra'i ri lu/_/de zos dar ba 'thungs na ni/_/skya rbab can
[\[218b.6\]]la srog ster ro/_/mdze dang ma zhu 'or nad dang /_/brla rengs yi ga 'chus pa dang /_/gzhang 'brum mig ser gcin snyi dang /_/mtsher pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed/_/ta bya brag zhun rdul lcags kyi/_/dri ma sna re srang lnga lnga/_/tsi tra ka dang 'bras bu gsum/_/tsha ba
[\[218b.7\]]gsum dang bye dang ba/_/srang re kha ra srang brgyad sbyar/_/phye ma sbrang rtsis sbrus pa yis/_/skya rbab dug dang lud pa lu/_/gcong chen mi bzad rims dang ni/_/mdze dang ma zhu gcin sri dang /_/skran dbugs mi bde yi ga 'chus/_/khyad par du ni brjed byed dang /_/mig ser
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]gzhang 'brum nad rnams 'joms/_/dug mo nyung dang 'bras bu gsum/_/nim pa gla sgang pa to la/_/dong gra bskol ba'i khu bar ni/_/brag zhun srang brgyad zhag bcur ram/_/nyi shu'am sum cu'i bar du sbangs/_/ka ra dkar po de mnyam dang /_/
[\[219a.2\]]smig rkang dang ni pi pi ling /_/kar ka ta sring skyu ru ra/_/srang re'i tshad du byas pa dang /_/kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa 'bras bu/_/srang gcig tshad du byas pa dang /_/dri sna gsum ni zho gnyis gnyis/_/sbrang rtsi srang gsum byas pa dang /_/ri lu zho gnyis tshad byas zos/_/se
[\[219a.3\]]'bru'i khu ba 'o ma dang /_/bya yi sha khu chu dron dang /_/a sa ba dang chang rnying dang /_/de ni zos rjes blud pa'am/_/zas sngon zas kyi rjes blud na/_/skya rbab mdze dang rims mcher pa/_/mgo 'khor gzhang 'brum mtshan bar rdol/_/rnag dang snying nad khu ba'i nad/_/
[\[219a.4\]]gcin nad drod nyams sel byed cing /_/skem dang sbyar dug dmu rdzing dang /_/lud pa khrag mkhris gsar pa dang /_/'or nad skran dang lkog ma'i nad/_/rgyu rlugs mgo 'khor bcas pa yi/_/nad kun sel zhing dge ba yin/_/rgun 'bru pi pi ling bre re/_/khar srang
[\[219a.5\]]ni lnga bcu dang /_/shing mngar bca' sga smig rkang dag_/srang ni gnyis gnyis phye mar byas/_/skyu ru ra khu bre bcu drug_/nang gzhug lde gu bzhin du bskal/_/bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi bre gang gzhug_/de las zho gnyis tshad zos na/_/gzugs 'khums skya rbab nad
[\[219a.6\]]dang ni/_/mig ser gyi ni nad 'joms so/_/rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu'i chu/_/rgun 'bru skyu ru ra'i khu ba/_/bza' dang btung bar sbyar ba ni/_/skya rbab mig ser nad sel to/_/de ltar skya rbab nad la ni/_/spyi yi sman ni bstan pa yin/_/mkhas pas nad dmigs so so
[\[219a.7\]]yi/_/stobs dbang las kyang sbyar bar bya/_/rlung gyur phal cher snum chos bya/_/mkhris par kha dang bsil ba gtang /_/bad kan las gyur rtsub tsha dro/_/'dus par 'dren mar sbyar bar bya/_/sa zos las gyur sbyang ba ni/_/rnon pos lus las bsal bar
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]bya/_/de 'og lto sbyang stobs bskyed phyir/_/de la zhun mar sbyin par bya/_/tsha ba gsum dang bil ba dang /_/ser po gnyis dang 'bras bu gsum/_/ba spru ba gnyis gla sgang dang /_/lcags phye ba ta byi dang ga_/thang shing breSh+tsi ka li dang /_/ga bra'i rtsa ba 'o ma
[\[219b.2\]]mar/_/bskol ba 'thungs na sa zhag zos/_/las gyur nad ni thams cad sel/_/de bzhin nA ga ge sar dang /_/shing mngar ku sha pi pi ling /_/'o mar bskol ba blud na phan/_/de la sred par gyur na ni/_/byi dang ga dang pa ta dang /_/nim pa bskol ba'i
[\[219b.3\]]khu ba'am/_/mur ba dang bsres sa zhag dag_/sred pa dgag phyir sbyin par bya/_/sa zhag bye brag tha dad nad/_/rjes su mthun pa'i sman sbyin bya/_/mig ser la ni mkhris 'joms sman/_/skya rbab gnod pa med pa sbyin/_/a ru ra ni brgya'i khu bar/_/a ru
[\[219b.4\]]ra rdog lnga bcu'i phyed/_/mar ni bre gang nang du bskol/_/skran dang mig ser skya rbab 'joms/_/dong ga bur shing khu ba'am/_/bi da ri dang skyu ru ra'i/_/khu ba tsha ba gsum bcas la/_/srang gcig blud na mig ser 'joms/_/dan+da bu ram nyis 'gyur gyi/_/
[\[219b.5\]]lde gu chu srang sbyar ba blud/_/dur byid phye ma sbrang rtsir bcas/_/'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba blud/_/'bras bu gsum mam sle tres sam/_/skyer pa'am nim pa'i khu ba dag_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba nang re ni/_/mig ser gyis ni nyen la blud/_/skyer pa yug snam skyu ru ra/_/
[\[219b.6\]]mig ser sel ba'i mig sman yin/_/mig ser can gang dri ma ni/_/til btags lta bur byung gyur na/_/bad kan lam bkag de la ni/_/bad kan mkhris pa sel bas gso/_/rtsub grang lci dang mngar ba dang /_/drag shul rlung ni 'gags pa yis/_/rlung dang
[\[219b.7\]]bad kan gcig gyur pa/_/mkhris pa phyir 'byin de yi tshe/_/mig dang pags pa ser ba dang /_/phyis skya bar gyur pa dang /_/bshang 'gags rgyu ma 'khrugs pa dang /_/snying ga lci ba nyid 'gyur la/_/mkhris pa'i yan lag la brten pa/_/rid cing drod chung rtsib
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]logs gzer/_/skyigs bu lud pa yi ga 'chus/_/rims 'debs rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de la rma bya'am khyim bya dang /_/sreg pa'i sha khu'am la phug ni/_/skam sa'i khu ba'am rgya sran khu/_/rtsub kha skyur bar sbyar ba sbyin/_/rab tsha skyur
[\[220a.2\]]dang rno ba dang /_/lan tshwa shin tu dro ba'ang bsngags/_/kha lung khu ba tsha ba gsum/_/sbyar ba'i lde gu'ang sbyin par bya/_/des ni mkhris pa rang gnas su/_/'jug cing bshang mdog tha mal 'gyur/_/rgyu ma 'khrugs sogs bla brnan bcas/_/rlung yang rab tu zhi bar
[\[220a.3\]]'gyur/_/'di yis bla brnan zhi nas ni/_/mig ser gso ba'i cho ga bya/_/mig ser khong du zhen pa na/_/brag zhun ba gcin dang sbyar ba/_/gser gyi dri ma'am ta bya ni/_/ba gcin sbyar ba zla gcig blud/_/ha lis ka sle tres khu/_/'o ma ma he'i mar bskol ba'i/_/
[\[220a.4\]]skyu ru ra yi khu ba dang /_/dur byid sbyar ba'i bkru sman blud/_/'khrus nas kha zas mngar bag ni/_/rlung 'joms mkhris pa 'joms pa sbyin/_/sngar bshad rgun 'bru lde gu dang /_/mngar ba'i sman mar zhun mar sbyin/_/'o ma mas gtong sman dang ni/_/'jam rtsir
[\[220a.5\]]bcas pa bsten par bya/_/me drod bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/_/rgun chang chang rnying sbyin bya zhing /_/lud pa'i skabs bshad a ru ra'i/_/shing mngar ra dar ba pi pi ling /_/'o mar bcas pas nad dmigs dang /_/me drod ji bzhin sbyin par bya/_/mkhas pas 'or nad skabs
[\[220a.6\]]bshad pa'i/_/gso ba skya rbab la yang sbyar/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas 'or nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/'or nad yan lag kun zhugs shing /_/nad skyes ma smin la dang por/_/
[\[220a.7\]]smyung byas kha zas yang ba bza'/_/bong nga thang shing byi dang ga_/dug mo nyung dang na le sham/_/bskol ba'i chu dron blud par bya/_/yang na a ru ra bca' sga/_/thang shing ba spru bskol ba'am/_/lcags phye dgu par bcas pa blud/_/'or nad shas cher a ru ra/_/ba
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]gcin bcas pa sbyang phyir blud/_/'bras bu gsum bskol pu tse shel/_/dur byid lcags phye tsha gsum bcas/_/yang na de bzhin gu gul lam/_/brag zhun dang ni sbyar ba blud/_/me drod chung zhing ma smin la/_/lci zhing rtug 'gags yang na 'khru/_/tsha ba gsum dang
[\[220b.2\]]rtsab ru tsha/_/sbrang rtsi dar bar sbyar ba'am/_/a ru ra dang bu ram bcas/_/bu ram bca' sgar sbyar ba'am/_/zos rjes dar ba blud par bya/_/sge'u gsher bu ram cha mnyam pa/_/srang phyed tshad kyis bskyed nas ni/_/che tshad srang lnga'i bar du ni/_/zla gcig za zhing
[\[220b.3\]]yu sha dang /_/'o ma sha khu bcas zos na/_/'or nad dmu rdzing skran gzhang 'brum/_/gcin dang dbugs mi bde cham pa/_/sgyid snyom ma zhu mig ser dang /_/lus skem gdon gyi nad rnams dang /_/lud pa bad kan sbyor 'dis sel/_/sge'u gsher dong gra lde gu'i
[\[220b.4\]]khu ba dang /_/'o ma dag dang mar ni bskol blud na/_/'or nad sbrid pa dmu rdzing me drod nyams/_/nad kyis zil non na yang nad med 'gyur/_/ma zhu med cing phyi sa 'gags/_/'or nad kyis gzir tsha ba gsum/_/dur byid dan da kru trug tres/_/bskol ba'i 'o
[\[220b.5\]]ma blud par bya/_/ma he'am yang na ba gcin nam/_/'o ma btung zhing de dang bza'/_/zhag bdun yang na zla gcig par/_/rnga mo'i 'o ma blud pas gso/_/ti mu sa dang nas tshig thal/_/la la phud dang tsha ba lnga/_/na le sham dang se 'bru dang /_/pa ta 'u su star
[\[220b.6\]]bu dang /_/bil ba gzhon nu zho gnyis gnyis/_/chu bre bzhi bskol mar bre gang /_/bskol ba blud na 'or nad dang /_/gzhang 'brum skran dang za khu 'joms/_/zho dang tsi tra ka bsres las/_/byung ba'i mar ni dar bar bcas/_/tsi tra ka btab bskol ba ni/_/
[\[220b.7\]]yon tan gong ma mtshungs pa yin/_/thang la 'bar dang tig ta che/_/dge ba'am a ru ra'i sman mar/_/dus shes pa yis sbyin par bya/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba ni/_/bre bzhir a ru ra brgya bskol/_/der ni bu ram srang brgya gzhug_/tsha ba gsum dang dri sna
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]gsum/_/nas tshig 'khus thal cung zad btab/_/bsgrangs nas sbrang rtsi bre phyed gzhug_/de byin nas ni 'or nad dang /_/rims skran gcin nad lus skem pa/_/ma zhu khrag mkhris rlung dang ni/_/sgregs skyur kha dog mi sdug dang /_/gcin
[\[221a.2\]]nad rlung gi khu chu'i nad/_/dbugs mi bde dang yi ga 'chus/_/mcher pa'i nad dang sbyar ba'i dug_/dmu rdzing gi ni nad rnams sel/_/nas dang sA lu 'bras rnying zas/_/rtsa ba bcu ba'i chu dang bskol/_/lan tshwa nyung zhing snum shas chung /_/byin na 'or nad sel bar
[\[221a.3\]]byed/_/rgya sran mung+ga'i khu ba ni/_/thal sman rtsa ba gsum dang ldan/_/de bzhin skam sa'i sha rus sbal/_/skyin gor byi dur sha khu sbyin/_/btung ba dar ba gsar pa dang /_/chang ni sman dang bcas pa blud/_/zi ra zur pa dzi ban ti/_/ma nu tsi tra ka ra dang /_/ya
[\[221a.4\]]bak+Sha ra bil ba'i rkang /_/da trig zho re'i tshad du byas/_/mar dang til mar nang du brngos/_/byin na 'or nad skran gzhang 'brum/_/tshang 'khru dang ni snying gi nad/_/me drod chung dang gcin nad sel/_/tsha ba lnga dang sbyar ba yi/_/thug pa'ang yon tan de dang 'dra/_/rdo dreg
[\[221a.5\]]ru rta ston ne ya/_/ha re Nu ka a ru ra/_/shri be ta ka shug pa dang /_/chu srin sder mo pri yang ku/_/pri ka thang shing spang spos dang /_/pi pi ling dang dbyi mo dang /_/ku nan na ta bya ma ka_/ma li ka dang dri sna bzhi/_/bal bu'i lo ma gla sgang dang /_/gan+d+ha pa la sha la ni/_/
[\[221a.6\]]bsku ba'i til mar dag dang ni/_/khrus kyi chu dang lde gu bya/_/nim pa arga ba spru ba/_/nag tam la'i chus khrus bya/_/yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs pa la/_/ka ra bIr ba spu ba/_/ki shu ka dang pi la sha_/'bras bu gsum dang seng phrom dang /_/na li ka dang thang shing dang /_/
[\[221a.7\]]spang spos ko sha ta ki dang /_/bong nga ta la'i lo ma dang /_/dza yan ti dang 'ol ma se/_/ka ka dang ni sa le shing /_/pri sha kar+Ni byi mo dang /_/ri ti bri ti glang po'i sna/_/lde gu dro 'jam bskus pas phan/_/de nas rlung gyur 'or nad la/_/zla phyed bar du dur byid dam/_/
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]yang na e raN+Da mar blud/_/rlung gi rtug 'gags la de nyid/_/zas kyi sngon du 'o ma 'am/_/sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i/_/sman gyi dugs dang bsku ba bya/_/phyogs gcig skrangs la kha lud dang /_/ag+ni man+tha spang spos dang /_/bca' sga thang shing lde gu bsku/_/
