[\[221b.2\]]mkhris gyur tig ta'i sman mar dang /_/n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol ba blud/_/skom dad che dang rmongs bag tsha/_/'o ma bsku byug bsil ba bya/_/pa to la rtsa kyi lce ba/_/shing mngar thang shing pu tse shel/_/skyer pa tsan+dan a ru ra/_/da na lcang ma bi la sha_/pi pi ling dang
[\[221b.3\]]mar bskol blud/_/khong tsha mgo 'khor skom dad che/_/'dus pa'i nad dang me dbal skrang /_/lus tsha rims dang bcas pa sel/_/bad kan las gyur dong gra sogs/_/til mar dang ni bskol ba blud/_/rgyun srang 'gags shing me drod nyams/_/rmongs bag yi ga
[\[221b.4\]]'chus pa la/_/thal sman chang rnying mnan chang dang /_/ba gcin dar bar bcas pa blud/_/pi pi ling dang 'ba' cha rnying /_/shi kru'i shun pa zur pa dang /_/ba gcin lde gu dro 'jam sbyar/_/bsku dang dril ba'i las la sbyar/_/ru rta ag+ni man+tha dang /_/rgya sran dong
[\[221b.5\]]ga tsi tra ka_/ba gcin chu bskol bas khrus bya/_/tsa rong a ka ru yis byug_/na ga ba ra sa ral/_/a za sring gi am pa ta/_/a za gan+d+ha zhes bya dang /_/a shwa gan+d+ha'i lde gu ni/_/yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs la phan/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin yan lag ni/_/nye
[\[221b.6\]]ba'i phyogs nas gtar ga bya/_/'dres pa'i nad la nad gzhi ni/_/shas che'i dbang du gso ba bya/_/go snyod pa ta gla sgang dang /_/kaN+Da ka ri tsha ba lnga/_/skyer pa chu dron sbyar blud pa/_/rtsa mkhris bca' sga chu dron blud/_/nad gzhi gsum gyi 'or nad ni/_/yun rings
[\[221b.7\]]lon zhing tshabs chen sel/_/sle tres dang ni a ru ra/_/thang shing gu gul ba spru ba/_/ba gcin sbyar blud dmu rdzing dang /_/mdze dang skya rbab srin bu'i nad/_/gcin nad bad kan za khu dang /_/rlung ni stod du 'byams pa sel/_/de ltar rang rang nad kyi dbang byas bshad/_/
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]snad pa las byung ba la khrag dbyung zhing /_/bsil sman mar khu byugs shing blugs par bya/_/dug skyes skrang la dug sel sbyor ba bya/_/grong dang rlan can chur gnas sha rid rlon/_/tshod skam til gyi zas dang bu ram can/_/phyer btags
[\[222a.2\]]zas dang zho dang lan tshwa dang /_/kha zas rul bag chang skyur yos sha skam/_/'dres pa'i zas dang lci dang ma goms za/_/tsha ba bskyed dang nyin par gnyid log dang /_/mtshan mo gnyid ma log dang nyal po rnams/_/'or nad can gyis de dag thams cad spang /_/
[\[222a.3\]]yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas me dbal gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/med bal nad la thog ma nyid/_/smyung ba dang ni rtsub chos dang /_/khrag dbyung skyug sman bkru sman gtang /_/
[\[222a.4\]]snum chos spyad par mi bya'o/_/po son cha dang dug mo nyung /_/shing mngar bcas pa'am pa to la/_/nim pa'i lo ma pi pi ling /_/skyug sman btang na me dbal 'joms/_/kyi lce ba yi khu ba'am/_/rgun 'bru 'bras bu gsum yang rung /_/dur byid phye ma
[\[222a.5\]]btab pa'am/_/'o ma mar sbyar bkru sman ni/_/khong ni zhen pa'i nad la ni/_/khyad par du ni sbyang ba gtang /_/sbyang min nad tshabs chung ba la/_/zhi sman tsan+dan ut+pal gtang /_/gla sgang nim pa pa to la/_/pa to la sogs nyid dag gam/_/thal tres gla sgang skyu
[\[222a.6\]]ru ra/_/pu shel tse ni chu bskol blud/_/me dbal skom dad can la ni/_/byi tsher ba dang par ba ta/_/sle tres bca' sga bskol ba ni/_/khu ba bsgrangs par blud par bya/_/skyer pa sran chung pu tse shel/_/pa to la dang 'bras bu gsum/_/nim pa shing mngar gyi lce ba/_/
[\[222a.7\]]bskol ba mar dang bcas pa blud/_/yan lag nad zhugs nad khrag nyid/_/thog ma nyid du khrag dbyung bya/_/pags pa sha dang rgyus pa 'drul/_/khrag rul ba las byung ba yin/_/smin zhing bad kan zad pa dang /_/rlung dang mkhris pa shas che la/_/tig ta tig ta
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]chen po'i mar/_/kyi lce ba bskol mar phan no/_/khrag dbyung khong pa dag gyur nas/_/nad ni sha lpags la gnas na/_/phyi rol na[+]sa ni byug stsogs kyis/_/'phral du me dbal zhi bar 'gyur/_/rlung gyur shu ti gla sgang dang /_/'o ma 'u su pa ra hi/_/a ta ka la
[\[222b.2\]]pi pi ling /_/thang shing sha kru ru rta yi/_/lde gu byug pa byas na phan/_/mkhris pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs sde/_/de bzhin pad+ma ut+pal sogs/_/n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa gzhon nu dang /_/chu shing nang gi lo mar bcas/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba lde gu dang /_/lan brgya bkrus pa'i mar
[\[222b.3\]]gyis byug_/pad+ma can gyi 'dam bsil ba'am/_/mu tig btags par gyur pa la/_/dung ngam byu ru nya phyis sam/_/yug snam mar dang bcas pa byug_/bad kan las gyur 'bras bu gsum/_/shug pa btsod dang pu tse shel/_/ka ra bI ra 'dam bu'i rtsa/_/a
[\[222b.4\]]nan ta yi lde gu bsku/_/da ba lo ma bdun pa dang /_/seng ldeng thang shing bkru sman dang /_/gla sgang dong grar bcas pa'am/_/ba ra Na stsogs lde gu bsku/_/dong ga yi ni lo ma dang /_/sle sman ta ka'i shun lpags dang /_/in+d+ra ba ru na'i lo ma/_/shri sha 'ol ma se me tog//
[\[222b.5\]]chu blugs rma bsku sman mar dang /_/lde gu'i phye ma ji bzhin du/_/sman ni 'di dag nyid kyis bya/_/rlung rgyas mar ni shas cher bya/_/bad kan gnas shes ma smin la/_/dro dang rtsub pa shas cher sbyar/_/de bzhin mkhris pa'i gnas zhugs la/_/khrag
[\[222b.6\]]mkhris lan mar ldan bya/_/shin tu bsil zhing srab pa dang /_/gos srab nang du bzhag pa ni/_/nus pa chung ba yang dang yang /_/gzhan dang gzhan ni sbyar bar bya/_/'dres pa'i nad la las 'di ni/_/'dren mar bya ba bsngags pa yin/_/me ltar tsha lan brgyar
[\[222b.7\]]ni/_/bkrus pa'i mar gsar 'ba' zhig phan/_/mar gyi nying khu blugs pa'am/_/shing mngar bskol ba'i chu grang ngam/_/ut+pal pad+ma kha ra'i chu/_/'o ma bu ram shing khu blugs/_/btung ba bsku dang blugs pa dang /_/tig ta chen po'i sman mar phan/_/rmen
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]bu khrag mkhris sel ba yi/_/gso ba ci rigs legs byas la/_/rlung dang bad kan 'joms par byed/_/glan dang dkri ba la sogs phan/_/rmen bu me dbal gzer bcas la/_/til mar rtsa ba bcu dang bskol/_/ba gcin dron mo
[\[223a.2\]]chu dron blugs/_/yang na shi kru'i lde gu 'am/_/nag ta ma la'i shun pa'am/_/la phug skam po ba ru ra'i/_/lde gu dro 'jam bsku pa phan/_/dan da shing tsha tsi tra ka_/arka snu ha'i 'o ma dang /_/bu ram go bye rus nag mtshur/_/lde gus rdo yang 'bigs
[\[223a.3\]]byed na/_/bad kan las gyur rmen bu'i nad/_/phyi rol gnas pa smos ci dgos/_/yun ring gnas pa'i rmen bu la/_/la phug rgya sran ku lang+tha'i/_/khu ba thal sman se 'brur bcas/_/gro yi zan dang nas kyi zan/_/rgun chang sbrang rtsi bu ram chang /_/kha ra
[\[223a.4\]]chang gi dngas mar bcas/_/kha lud khu bar bcas pa dang /_/'bras bu gsum gyi sbyor lde gu/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/thang shing dang ni sle tres dang /_/brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang /_/gla sgang go bye'i sbyor ba'am/_/sbrang rtsi yi ni sbyor ba dang /_/mgo
[\[223a.5\]]bkru sman dud rngub pa dang /_/sngar bshad skran ni bshig pa dang /_/lcags gser lan tshwa bsregs pa dang /_/rdo bas btsir bar bya ba yin/_/sman 'di yis ni 'jig par byed/_/sbyor ba sna tshogs de dag ni/_/byas kyang zhi bar ma gyur cing /_/shin tu sra bar gnas
[\[223a.6\]]gyur la/_/nad stobs che bar gyur pa ni/_/de 'og 'di la thal sman nam/_/lde gu 'am gser gyis bsregs na phan/_/smin par byed pa brnags byas la/_/dbral nas de nas dbyung bar bya/_/'di la khrag ni brnag 'dod pa/_/yang dang yang du gdon par bya/_/
[\[223a.7\]]khrag bsal 'og tu slar yang ni/_/rlung dang bad kan sel sman gtang /_/tsha zhing smin pas brnags gyur la/_/phyi nang rma ltar gso bar bya/_/skyer pa srin sman kam bi l+ya/_/bskol ba'i til mar rma la phan/_/bad kan mkhris pa shas che la/_/dUr ba'i
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]khu ba mar bskol phan/_/gso ba'i nad kun phyogs dang steng /_/khrag byung ba ni phyogs gcig yin/_/me dbal de ni khrag mkhris dang /_/ma 'dres pa las byung mi 'gyur/_/'di yi rten ni khrag nyid yin/_/de bas khrag ni mang du dbri/_/nad gzhi mang po me
[\[223b.2\]]dbal la/_/bkru sman ma gyur mar mi sbyin/_/de yis nad ni sra gyur pas/_/pags pa khrag dang sha 'tshed byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcwa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas mdze nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par
[\[223b.3\]]bya'o/_/mdze nad kun la thog ma nyid/_/snum blud pas ni gso bar bya/_/de la rlung shas che ba la/_/rtsa ba bcu pa sle tres dang /_/sha rang ka ta e raN+Da/_/mi sha sring gi mar ram ni/_/til mar bskol te blud pa phan/_/nim pa pa to pu tse shel/_/skyer pa pha
[\[223b.4\]]ta byi tsher pa/_/par pa ta dang kyi lce ba/_/srang re chu bre brgyad kyi ni/_/nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/gla sgang rtsa mkhris kyi lce ba/_/dug mo nyung dang pi pi ling /_/tsan+dan zho ni gnyis gnyis dang /_/zhun mar srang ni bcu gnyis bskol/_/tig ta'i sman mar
[\[223b.5\]]de 'thungs na/_/mkhris pa mdze dang me dbal dang /_/'brum phran lus tsha skom dad che/_/mgo 'khor g.yan pa skya rbab 'bras/_/rma 'grams 'bras kyi phreng ba dang /_/thor bu khong 'bras skran dang ni/_/zad byed smyo byed myos pa dang /_/snying nad rab rib ngo
[\[223b.6\]]khabs dang /_/sha bkra mig ser pho ba'i nad/_/mtshan par rdol dang brjed byed dang /_/dmu rdzing zla mtshan mi chod dang /_/sbyar dug gzhang 'brum khrag mkhris sel/_/gzhan yang mkhris pa las gyur nad/_/shin tu gso dka' rnams la phan/_/lo ma
[\[223b.7\]]bdun pa par pa ta/_/dong ga shu dag pu tse shel/_/shug pa pa ta 'bras bu gsum/_/ser po gnyis dang thal tres gnyis/_/nim pa tsan+dan pi pi ling /_/shing mngar sle tres bi sha la/_/dug mo nyung dang pu shel tse/_/rtsa mkhris mur ba ba sha ka_/nye'u
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]shing pu sha pa to la/_/gla sgang byi tsher kyi lce ba/_/skyu ru ra khu nyis 'gyur dang /_/de rnams mar gyi brgyad 'gyur chu/_/bskol ba tig ta chen po ste/_/yon tan yang ni sngar bas lhag_/bad kan las gyur nim pa dang /_/lo ma bdun pa tsi tra ka_/
[\[224a.2\]]ru rta dong gra tsha ba gsum/_/sa la pi la ya'i mar blud/_/kun la go bye'i mar ram ni/_/yungs kar dUr ba ra'i mar blud/_/byi dang ga dang a ru ra/_/go bye'i lde gu mar bskol blud/_/dong ga'i rtsa ba dag dang mar/_/lan brgya'i bar bskol mar
[\[224a.3\]]yang blud/_/seng ldeng bskol ba'i chu bsten na/_/mdze nad myur du sel bar byed/_/'di dag nyid kyis ci rigs par/_/snum chos bsku ba byas pa'ang phan/_/snum gyis zhen la me dbal ni/_/skabs su bshad pa'i sman sbyar gtang /_/dpral ba lag pa
[\[224a.4\]]rkang pa las/_/'di la gtar ga'ang gdab par bya/_/mdze nad tshabs chung zhal zhal gdab/_/rwa sogs kyis kyang khrag dbyung bya/_/mdze nad 'joms pa'i snum gyis ni/_/'di la bar bar brta bar bya/_/khrag phyung bkru sman gyis sbyang bya/_/lto stong gyur pa
[\[224a.5\]]mdze can la/_/ci nas rlung gis 'di yi ni/_/lus mi 'jig pa de ltar bya/_/nim pa sle tres ba sha ka_/'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/_/kaN+Da ka ri ka rany+dza/_/lde gu chu dang mar bskol ba/_/sman mar rdo rje can zhes bya/_/des ni me dbal mig ser
[\[224a.6\]]rims/_/khrag nad lud pa mdze nad 'joms/_/'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/dur byid kaN+Da ka ri gnyis/_/dan da dong ga pu tse shel/_/shu dag bong nga tsi tra ka_/pa tar bcas pa zho gnyis gnyis/_/snu ha'i 'o ma srang gcig dang /_/bre gang mar
[\[224a.7\]]bskol lto sra ba'i/_/snum chos bkru sman dag tu sbyar/_/mdze dang sha bkra mdzer pa dang /_/rgyu rlugs rde'u 'gags skran 'joms byed/_/'di ni rdo rje chen por bshad/_/dan da bre bzhi chu bre ni/_/bcu drug bskol te de mar bskol/_/ko sha ta ki srang gcig
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]gdab/_/de blud steng 'og sbyong byed yin/_/a bar da ka srang brgyad cu/_/bre bcu drug bskol brgyad cha lus/_/khu ba de ni de'i rtsa ba/_/mar ni bre gang bskol bar bya/_/blud na de bzhin zhag gcig gis/_/bar du chod de legs zhu nas/_/khre rgod rang skyur bskol
[\[224b.2\]]ba blud/_/mdze nad sha bkra 'bras kyi phreng /_/sel zhing bu mang dran 'dzin 'gyur/_/nI li ti ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi/_/dzA ti'i khu ba mar bcas pa'am/_/seng ldeng a sa na'i chur bcas/_/dbang po bsdams brtan mdze nad 'joms/_/sA lu nas dang gro dang ni/_/ci tse
[\[224b.3\]]khre dang mung+ga dang /_/sran chung dang ni tu ka ri'i/_/tshod ma kha bo skam sa'i sha_/'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/_/seng ldeng nim pa go bye sbyar/_/chang ni sman dang sbyar ba'am/_/dar ba so ma ra dzar bcas/_/bza' dang btung ba mdze la phan/_/skyur tsha lan tshwa can
[\[224b.4\]]rnams gnod/_/zho dang 'o ma rlan can sha_/bu ram ma sha til mar spang /_/pa to la'i rtsa 'bras bu gsum/_/bi sha la ni re re ni/_/cha gsum gyis dbri zho phyed gsum/_/kyi lce ba dang pu tse shel/_/zho phyed dong gra bzhi char bcas/_/de ltar srang gcig brdungs pa
[\[224b.5\]]dag_/bskol ba'i chu ni 'thungs gyur na/_/nad kyi tshogs ni sbyong bar byed/_/sman de zhu nas skam sa yi/_/ri dwags bya yi sha khu dang /_/'bras rnying chan dang sbyar ba bza'/_/sbyor 'di zhag drug bsten na ni/_/mdze nad kun dang skrangs pa'i nad/_/pho ba'i nad
[\[224b.6\]]dang gcin sri dang /_/gzugs 'khums gso dka'i nad rnams dang /_/snying nad chu sor gzer rims sel/_/byi dang ga yi snying po dang /_/a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/srang re dan da srang gsum dang /_/bu ram srang ni bcu gnyis dag_/ri lur byas 'di byin gyur na/_/
[\[224b.7\]]mdze dang sha bkra dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum dang /_/gcin nad mcher pa rmen bu'i nad/_/thor bu srin nad skran rnams 'joms/_/grub pa'i sbyor 'di gnod sbyin ni/_/nor bu bzang pos dge slong zhig_/srog 'dor nyid la bshad ces grags/_/
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]tig ta nim pa 'bras bu gsum/_/shug pa bong nga pi pi ling /_/mur ba dang ni pa to la/_/ser po rnam gnyis pu tse shel/_/shu dag in+d+ra ba ru ni/_/dug mo nyung bcas cha mnyam pa/_/dan da dur byid bram sha mi/_/phyi ma bzhin du nyis
[\[225a.2\]]'gyur bcas/_/phye ma sbrang rtsi mar sbyar zos/_/mdze dang za gu tshor ba chung /_/sel ba'i sman gyi mchog yin no/_/'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling /_/byi dang ga dang sbrang rtsi ni/_/til mar mar sbyar lde gu'am/_/ka ka u dum bA ra dang /_/nim pa gla sgang byi
[\[225a.3\]]dang ga_/tsha ba gsum gyi lde gu ni/_/dug mo nyung gi khu bar bcas/_/blud na lpags nad thams cad 'joms/_/dug mo nyung dang tsi tra ka_/nim pa thang shing seng ldeng dang /_/lo ma bdun pa a sa na/_/khu bskol mar dang a ru ra/_/sbrang rtsi ldan zos mdze
[\[225a.4\]]nad 'joms/_/seng ldeng nim pa sle tres dang /_/pa to la dang byi tsher bskol/_/seng ldeng la sogs lnga pa ste/_/khyab 'jug gis ni lha min bzhin/_/mdze nad 'phral du 'joms par byed/_/skyer pa nim pa seng ldeng gi/_/shun lpags bskol bas mdze
[\[225a.5\]]nad sel/_/skyer pa nim pa 'bras bu gsum/_/pa tol rtsa pu tse shel/_/shu dag btsod ni bskol ba yis/_/dam chos la brten 'khor ba ltar/_/khrag mkhris las gyur mdze nad gcod/_/sman 'di nyid dang ba yi mar/_/bskol bas rlung gyur mdze nad
[\[225a.6\]]rnams/_/mchog tu sel bar byed pa yin/_/seng ldeng nim pa skyer pa dang /_/sle tres thang shing sna rer bskol/_/pa tha skyer pa tsi tra ka_/dan da dug nyung pu tse shel/_/ba gcin yang na chu dron bcas/_/zla ba gcig blud mdze nang dang /_/gzhang 'brum za khu skrang
[\[225a.7\]]nad dang /_/skya rbab ma zhu srin nad 'joms/_/rgya skyegs dan ti 'bras bu gsum/_/mur ba pa tra tsi tra ka_/a pa marga byi dang ga_/lo ma bdun pa tsha ba gsum/_/btsod dang skyer pa ma sha ka_/nim pa thang shing rtsa ba lnga/_/gnyis po phye ma ba gcin sbyar/_/zla ba
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]gcig 'thungs phan zas bza'/_/mdze yi nad kun 'joms par byed/_/skyer pa pi pi ling dong gra/_/byi dang ga dang ba to ri/_/tsi tra ka dang bya rnams/_/go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/_/ba gcin sbyar ba'am ri lu ni/_/byin na mi bzad mdze yang 'joms/_/
[\[225b.2\]]tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/til dang go bye'i phye ma ni/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar/_/ri lu byas pa cha bdun pas/_/mdze yi nad rnams 'joms byed cing /_/bcud kyis len dang ro tsar 'gyur/_/so ma ra dza tsi tra ka_/skyer pa du ba ra'i rus pa/_/
[\[225b.3\]]go bye srin sman 'bras bu gsum/_/bsten na mdze nad ma lus 'joms/_/so ma ra dza byi dang ga_/go bye tsi tra ba ra hi/_/a ru ra dang lang ga li/_/til nag po dang pi pi ling /_/bu ram dang ni ri lur bya/_/mdze yi nad rnams 'joms par byed/_/so ma ra dza pi pi
[\[225b.4\]]ling /_/de yi rtsa ba byi dang ga'i/_/snying po lcags rkyag skyu ru ra/_/til mar lde gu mdze nad 'joms/_/a ru ra dang go bye til/_/bu ram ri lus mdze nad 'joms/_/so ma ra dza byi dang ga_/bu ram ri lu byas pa'ang phan/_/seng ldeng brag zhun byi dang ga_/sbrang rtsi
[\[225b.5\]]mar dang ldan za zhing /_/phan dang ran par zos na ni/_/'brum phran sha bkra shu ba 'joms/_/kha ra lcags phye byi dang ga_/tsi tra ka dang skyu ru ra/_/pi pi ling gi lde gu yis/_/mdze nad shin tu gso dka' 'joms/_/gla sgang tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum/_/rtsa ba
[\[225b.6\]]lnga gnyis thang shing btsod/_/nim pa shing tsha lo ma bdun/_/shing tsha tsi tra ka dang ni/_/mur ba bi sha li'i phye ma/_/nas phye dgu cha sbrang rtsi ni/_/cha gcig sbyar ba 'di rtag tu/_/'thungs na mdze nad 'joms byed cing /_/'or nad skya rbab sha bkra can/_/pho nad gzhang
[\[225b.7\]]'brum rgyu rlugs dang /_/mtshan bar rdol dang 'brum phran dang /_/g.yan pa shu ba'i nad rnams 'joms/_/tu pa ra yi rus pa'am/_/ga bya so ma ra dza dang /_/tsi tra ka'i rtsa brag zhun rnams/_/bcud len cho ga ltar bstan phan/_/de ltar nad bsal nang gi ni/_/nad
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]sbyangs nad ni phyi rol gyi/_/pags par gnas na sman blugs phan/_/nad kyi dri ma ma dag pa/_/sman rnon byugs na mdze nad ni/_/bslangs pas slar ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gting zug sra zhing kor kor po'i/_/mdze la dugs bya snyi ba dang /_/
[\[226a.2\]]'bur bar gyur nas mtshon gyis ni/_/zhal zhal btab cing byug par bya/_/gang zhig pags pa kun nyams shing /_/mtshon gyis btab tu mi rung ba/_/de la khrag ni phyung nas su/_/thal sman rnon po bsku bar bya/_/mdze nad rab sra rtsub pa dang /_/tshor ba med
[\[226a.3\]]brtan yun ring lon/_/sngags bcas dug khu blud par bya/_/dug gi sman ni rjes su sbyar/_/mdze nad rengs zhing tshor ba med/_rdul mi 'byung zhing g.ya' ba la/_/lci skam rgya mtsho'i lbu ba'am/_/mtshon gyis bzhar la lde gu byug_/gla sgang dong gra 'bras bu
[\[226a.4\]]gsum/_/po son cha dang ka rany+dza/_/lo ma bdun pa dug mo nyung /_/ru rta skyer pa pri yang ku/_/nyungs kar sbyor bas lus bkru zhing /_/lde gus slon sman bkru sman dang /_/bzhar zhing lus ni bskus gyur na/_/pags pa'i nad dang mdze nad dang /_/skrang dang skya rbab
[\[226a.5\]]mdze nad 'joms/_/ka ra bI ra nim pa dang /_/dug mo nyung dang dong gra dang /_/tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba gcin bskol/_/bskus na mdze nad 'joms par byed/_/ka ra bI ra kar rtsa ba/_/dug mo nyung dang ka rany+dza'i/_/'bras bu skyer pa'i shun lpags ni/_/so man yi myu gu
[\[226a.6\]]bcas/_/bskus na mdze 'joms grub pa yin/_/shri sha'i shun lpags ras bal gyi/_/me tog dong ga'i lo ma dang /_/mon sne'u dme ru bzhi po ni/_/btags pa'i lde gus mdze nad 'joms/_/nim pa ser po rnam gnyis dang /_/bye'u rug pa dang pa to la/_/
[\[226a.7\]]ru rta a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/thang shing shi kru nyungs kar dang /_/g.yer ma 'u su gla ba dang /_/tsa rong cha mnyam phye mar byas/_/dar bar sbyar ba'i til mar gyis/_/bskus pa'am lus byugs dril gyur na/_/mdze nad g.yan pa zlum por bcas/_/'brum phran skrangs
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]pa'i nad rnams sel/_/gla sgang dngul rdo dang ni skyer pa dang /_/nag tshur kam bi l+ya dang ru rta dang /_/seng phrom mu zi pog dkar byi dang ga_/ldong ros ba bla ka ra bI ra'i shun/_/phye mar byas pa'i til mar gyis bskus pa'i/_/steng du phye ma'i don du 'di blugs na/_/
[\[226b.2\]]shu ba g.yan pa 'brum bu phra mo dang /_/rkang shu la sogs 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar snu ha'i shing dum btags/_/lde gu me ma mur btsos te/_/'dod chags shugs kyis ngo tsha bzhin/_/bskus na glang shu 'jig par byed/_/ldong ros ba bla na le
[\[226b.3\]]sham til mar/_/arga'i lo ma'i lde gus mdze 'joms byed/_/de bzhin tsi tra marda ka rany+dza/_/ru rta sbyar ba ba gcin btags pa'ang phan/_/gu gul yungs kar na le sham/_/nag tshur dang ni byi dang ga_/shri be+e sha ga sra rtsi pog_/ba bla ldong ros mu zi dang /_/
[\[226b.4\]]ru rta dang ni kam bi l+ya/_/ser po gnyis dang bcas pa ni/_/'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsres/_/'di ni mtshon gyis bzhar te bskus/_/nyi mar bsregs na mdze nad sel/_/ta la'i lo ma na le sham/_/ru rta ldong ros nag tshur bcas/_/zangs kyi snod
[\[226b.5\]]dang til mar dang /_/zhag bdun legs par spangs pa des/_/zhag bdun bsku zhing nyi mar bsreg_/sha bkra 'joms par byed pa yin/_/sha bkra sar pa zla ba gcig_/bsten zhing sbyang ba byas na sel/_/a pa marga'i thal ba'i chu/_/lan bdun legs
[\[226b.6\]]par gzags pa ru/_/pri yang ku yi mar bskol bas/_/bskus na sha bkra sel bar byed/_/ka ka dzang gi rtsa ba dang /_/ras bal sa bon 'dab ma dang /_/la phug sa bon dar bar sbyar/_/mig dmar gza' la bskus na ni/_/sha bkra sel ba grub pa yin/_/
[\[226b.7\]]dzi ban ti dang skyer pa btsod/_/kam bi l+ya dang spangs ma ni/_/'o ma mar dang til mar bskol/_/sra rtsi bog dang sbra tshil ni/_/btab pa bskus na de yis ni/_/rkang lag zhig pa sel bar byed/_/pags pa gcig pa'i mdze dang ni/_/'brum phran 'bras ni ber ba
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]yi/_/mdze nad 'jig par byed pa yin/_/lo ma bdun pa rtsa ba dang /_/shi ri sha yi shun lpags dang /_/ka ra bI ra arka dang /_/su ma na dang tsi tra ka_/thal tres nim pa'i shun lpags dang /_/ka rany+dza dang yungs kar dang /_/tsi tra mar dang 'bras
[\[227a.2\]]bu gsum/_/byi dang ga dang tsha ba gsum/_/ser po gnyis dang til mar dang /_/ba gcin bcas par bskol bas ni/_/pags pa'i nad dang rma 'grams dang /_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i/_/mje yi nad ni sel byed de/_/'di ni rdo rje dang 'dra bas/_/
[\[227a.3\]]rdo rje can zhes bya ba yin/_/e raN+Da dang dngul rdo dang /_/gla sgang nim pa ka dang ni/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba kam bi l+ya/_/byi dang ga dang nir gun thi/_/go bye in+d+ra ba ru ni/_/thang shing khron bu gu gul dang /_/ldong ros shri sha pi ti dang /_/lan tshwa tang pal bca' sga rnams/_/
[\[227a.4\]]cha mnyam snu ha'i 'o ma dang /_/arga'i til mar lan cig bskol/_/lde gu rdo rje chen po ste/_/rdo rje can pas yon tan lhag_/sha bkra dang ni gzhang 'brum dang /_/'bras kyi phreng ba 'joms par byed/_/ru rta ka ra bI ra dang /_/bring gar dza arga dang /_/shu dag shing
[\[227a.5\]]mngar rgyam tsha gcin/_/til mar bskol ba dug bcug pa/_/bskus pas mdze nad sel ba'i mchog_/spra tshil li khri gu gul dang /_/spangs ma dngul rdo yungs mar bskol/_/g.yan pa glang shu myur du sel/_/rgya skyegs tsi tra mar da dang /_/shri pi ta dang tsha
[\[227a.6\]]ba gsum/_/ru rta yungs kar la phug gi/_/sa bon ser po rnam gnyis kyi/_/lde gu dar bar sbyar bskus na/_/shu ba thams cad sel bar byed/_/tsi tra ka dang shi kru'am/_/sle tres thang shing a pa mar/_/seng ldeng d+ha ba'i lde gu'am/_/dur byid dan da pra
[\[227a.7\]]ban ti/_/rgya skyegs dngul rdo sug smel lam/_/pur+Na rna ba'i lde gu ste/_/tshig rkang drug bshad lde gu drug_/zho ga chu dang sbyar ba yis/_/bskus na bad kan rlung las ni/_/gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar byed/_/ba li ka dang ma nu dang /_/a kar nA ga ge sar dang /_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]gan+t+ra b+ha dra gla ba dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni pu shel tse/_/cha res bskyed pa'i lde gu yis/_/bad mkhris mdze nad sel bar 'gyur/_/tig ta'i sman mar brgya bkrus mar/_/bskus na mdze yi cha ba sel/_/til mar tsan+dan shing mngar dang /_/stag tsher ba dang ut+pal/_/
[\[227b.2\]]bcas par bskus na'ang phan pa yin/_/rnags shing yan lag 'drul ba dang /_/lus tsha 'brum bu phra mo 'byung /_/pags pa myags dang bcas pa la/_/bsil ba'i sman chus blugs shing byug_/gtar ga bkru sman btang ba dang /_/tig ta'i sman mar byin
[\[227b.3\]]na phan/_/seng ldeng nim pa ba sha ka_/dug mo nyung dang 'bras bu gsum/_/byi dang ga dang sle tres dang /_/pa to la dang ba gcin sbyar/_/phyi dang nang nas btang gyur na/_/srin pu las gyur mdze nad 'joms/_/rlung shas che la thog mar ni/_/mar btang bad
[\[227b.4\]]kan shas che la/_/skyug sman mkhris pa las gyur na/_/gtar ga btab cing bkru sman gtang /_/nang sbyangs khrag ni byung ba dang /_/gnas ni dag par gyur pa la/_/bsku ba gang zhig byas gyur pa/_/de ni mod la med par 'gyur/_/nad gzhi bsal zhing khrag ni phyung ba dang /_/
[\[227b.5\]]phyi dang nang nas zhi ba'i gso ba bya/_/sman mar dang ni dus su byin gyur na/_/mdze yi nad ni gso sla nyid du 'gyur/_/mdze can nad ni lan mang sbyangs gyur pa/_/de yi srog srub lan mang 'bad byas te/_/nad ni lhag par phyung bas nyam chung bas/_/
[\[227b.6\]]rlung ldang myur du gsod par byed par 'gyur/_/zla ba phyed cing skyug sman gtang ba dang /_/zla ba re re nas ni bkru sman gtang /_/mgo bo sbyang ba zhag ni gsum gsum nas/_/zla ba drug drug nas ni gtar ga bya/_/gang zhig slon dang 'khru bar dka' 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[227b.7\]]mdze can nad shas che bas khyab gyur pa/_/de ni nges par gso dka' nyid gyur pas/_/de bas nad ni ma lus dbyung bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u bcu dgu pa'o//_//de nas sha bkra dang srin bu'i nad
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/gang zhig mdze nad pas kyang 'jigs 'gyur zhing /_/myur du gso dka' nyid du 'gyur bas na/_/khang pa 'bar bar gyur pa lta bur ni/_/sha bkra'i nad zhi ba la 'bad par bya/_/khyad par du ni dang por lus la ni/_/
[\[228a.2\]]sbyang bar bya ba nye bar sbyar bar bya/_/sha bkra la ni so ma ra dza'i khu/_/bu ram chang ngam sha khu bkru sman ni/_/snu ha'i 'o mar sbyar ba blud par bya/_/de 'thungs nas ni lus bskus nyams stobs dag_/ci yod pa las nyin mtshan bsten par bya/_/skom dad skyes na zhag gsum
[\[228a.3\]]thug pa blud/_/sha bkra'i lus la chu bur byung gyur na/_/de ni tsher ma dag gis brtol bar bya/_/chu bur gzags par byas nas nang re bzhin/_/so ma ra dza dang ni a sa na/_/pri yang ku dang shu ti chur bskol blud/_/rgya skyegs shing thal bu ram phran sbyar ba'i/_/chu ni nyams
[\[228a.4\]]stobs ci yod pa la blud/_/phal gu skyu ru ra shun dug nyung shing /_/khu ba so ma ra dzar bcas pa blud/_/dro bar 'dug nas chu bur byung ba la/_/lan tshwa med zas dar bar bcas pa sbyin/_/ba gcin tsi tra ka dang tsha ba gsum/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba mar gyi snod du gzhag_/
[\[228a.5\]]zla phyed lon nas sha bkra can la blud/_/'di la mdze nad gso ba'i cho ga bya/_/yang na bring ga ra dza lcags snod bcug_/til mar nang du brngos pa sbyin bya zhing /_/a sa na yi sa bon 'o mar bskol/_/de rjes blud na sha bkra 'joms par byed/_/dong ga arga pu ti ka
[\[228a.6\]]rany+dza/_/snu ha dzA ti'i lo ma ba gcin btags/_/lde gus bskus na sha bkra gzhang 'brum dang /_/shu ba g.yan pa rma 'grams sel bar byed/_/glang chen gzig gi lpags bsregs til mar dang /_/sbyar ba bskus na sha bkra sel mchog yin/_/sbur ba dri ngan dong
[\[228a.7\]]ga'i 'o ma dang /_/sbyar te bskus pa gcig pus sha bkra sel/_/chu bur bskyed phyir go bye cham chom brdungs/_/nub mo ba gcin la sbangs nyin grib bskam du/_/de ltar lan gsum byas te zhib tu btags/_/snu ha'i 'o mar sbyar bskus sha bkra 'joms/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]sbrul nag bsregs pa las byung snag tsha ni/_/ba ru ra yi mar dang sbyar te bsku/_/de bzhin rma bya'i mkhris pa bsregs pa'am/_/ba li ka bsregs rma bya'i mkhris bsregs phan/_/so ma ra dza'i sa bon phul gang dang /_/ba bla cha bzhi dag ni bsres nas su/_/ba yi
[\[228b.2\]]gcin dang sbyar te btags bskus na/_/sha bkra lpags mdog 'dra bar byed pa'i mchog_/glang chen rtug pa legs bsres thal ba ni/_/glang chen gcin dang bsres te gzags gyur pa/_/bre bcu drug tshad so ma ra dza yi/_/sa bon bcu chas btab bskol sbyin bag
[\[228b.3\]]gyur/_/mang du bdar ba de yis bskus na ni/_/sha bkra'i nad ni rnam par 'joms 'gyur zhing /_/mdze yi nad dang sme ba nag po'am/_/sha lhag skyes pa'i rma ni sbyong bar byed/_/go bye tsi tra ka dang snu ha dang /_/arka'i rtsa ba dang ni 'ol ma se/_/de bzhin tsha ba gsum dang
[\[228b.4\]]dung dang ni/_/spangs ma ru rtar bcas dang lan tshwa lngar/_/thal ba gnyis dang lang ga li btags phye/_/snu ha arka'i 'o mar bskol nas ni/_/ska bar gyur pa lcags snod nang du gzhag_/de ni thur mas bskus na mdze nad dang /_/sha bkra sme ba nag por gyur pa dang /_/
[\[228b.5\]]mdzer pa gzhang 'brum pags pa'i rmen bu sel/_/sbyang byas gtar ga btab pa dang /_/rtsub chos phye zan zos gyur pa'i/_/sdig pa zad par gyur pa yi/_/'ga' zhig gis ni sha bkra 'byung /_/khong pa'i srin yod snum dugs byas/_/bu ram 'o ma nya sogs
[\[228b.6\]]kyis/_/bad kan srin bu bslangs nas ni/_/nub mo de ni bde bar gnas/_/bye'u rug stsogs sdeb gcin dang /_/chu phyed bcas pa bskol nas ni/_/khu ba de nang pi pi ling /_/po son cha dang byi dang ga_/til mar swardzi k+Sha rar bcas/_/mas gtong bas ni gtang bar
[\[228b.7\]]bya/_/de nyid de la de nyid dam/_/dur byid lde gu po son cha/_/pi pi ling ni khu bar bsres/_/bkru sman de la brud par bya/_/de ltar steng 'og sbyang byas nas/_/tsha ba lnga ldan thugs stsogs blud/_/tsha dang kha dang bska ba yi/_/sman ni bskol chus blugs par bya/_/dus
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]su byi dang ga'i til mar/_/'jam rtsi de la gtang bar bya/_/mgo bo'i sin bu mgo nad ni/_/gso bar bshad pa'i rim par bya/_/tsha dang kha ba shas che zhing /_/snum nyung kha zas sbyin par bya/_/byi dang ga dang pi pi ling /_/pi pi ling rtsa na le
[\[229a.2\]]sham/_/na le sham ni dkar po dang /_/swardzi ka ni thal bar bcas/_/nas thug dar bar btsos pa blud/_/gi ri gar ni shri sha ka_/pa ri pa tra ke pu ka_/pa la sha 'bras pa tu ra/_/su ti ka ni so sor bskol/_/khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/_/bye rug pa sogs sbrang
[\[229a.3\]]rtsir sbyar/_/rta sbangs phye ma byi dang ga_/bskol ba'i nang sbangs mang du bza'/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu'am/_/'bras bu gsum khur sbangs pa sbyin/_/mgo bo'i srin bu'i nad la ni/_/de yi phye ma bud par bya/_/mu sha kar+Na'i 'dab ma ni/_/zhib tu btags pa
[\[229a.4\]]'bras phyer bcas/_/btsos pa'i khu ba sbyin par bya/_/de yi rjes la rang skyur ram/_/dar ba sla ba tsha ba lnga/_/lan tshwar bcas pa blud par bya/_/nim pa a pa marga dang /_/nir gun thi lo 'ang de bzhin bya/_/byi dang ga yi phye ma dang /_/bgres pa'i 'bras phye'i
[\[229a.5\]]khur ba sbyin/_/go bye'i mar ni rnying pa la/_/byi dang ga ni shun pa bsal/_/cha phyed bcug ste nyi mar gzhag_/btung ba 'jam rtsi sbyar bar bya/_/thang shing shri beSh+Ta yi snum/_/so sor de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/bshang bar skyes la lhag par yang /_/bkru sman dang ni
[\[229a.6\]]'jam rtsi gtang /_/bad kan las gyur mgo bo'i nad/_/bkru sman slon dang zhi sman gtang /_/khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu la/_/gso ba mdze yi tshul du bya/_/spu 'byi byed la gso ba ni/_/'khor ling skra 'byi cho ga bya/_/'o ma sha dang mar dang bu ram dang /_/zho dang
[\[229a.7\]]'dab ma can gyi tshod ma dang /_/mdor na mngar dang skyur ba'i khu ba rnams/_/srin bu gzhom par 'dod pas yongs su spang /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas rlung nad gso ba bshad
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]par bya'o/_/ma 'dres rlung las dang por ni/_/mar dang rkang dang tshil dang ni/_/til mar blud cing snum gyi ni/_/sbyor bas legs par gso bar bya/_/de nas snum zhen ngal bso ste/_/'o mas slar yang snum chos bya/_/rlan can grong dang chu la gnas/_/sha khu snum dang
[\[229b.2\]]ldan pa gtang /_/'o thug kri sar skyur dang bcas/_/lan tshwar ldan blud 'jam rtsi gtang /_/sna sman skyo byas kha zas ni/_/snum byas sbyin cing dugs byas la/_/legs bskus snum dang ldan pa la/_/gseg ma la sogs dugs bya'o/_/snum gyis zhen byas dugs
[\[229b.3\]]byas pas/_/g.yo zhing rengs dang gzer bcas pa/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gugs pa ni/_/bde blag nyid du nus par 'gyur/_/ji ltar shing skam dag kyang ni/_/snum bskus bsros par gyur na ni/_/las su bya bar rung gyur na/_/srog chags lus ni smos ci
[\[229b.4\]]dgos/_/spu brtse gzer na snyoms pa dang /_/lus skem rengs pa'i nad la stsogs/_/dugs byas myur du zhi 'gyur zhing /_/mnyen pa nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/_/snum btang bas ni lus zungs rnams/_/bskam pa myur du rgyas par byed/_/nyams stobs me drod
[\[229b.5\]]'phel 'gyur zhing /_/de yi srog kyang ring nas byed/_/lan mang snum dang dugs kyi ni/_/cho ga legs par sbyar bar bya/_/de ltar snum gyis mnyen byas ltor/_/rlung gi nad ni gnas mi 'gyur/_/gal te nad gzhan bcos pa'i phyir/_/las 'di zhi bar ma gyur
[\[229b.6\]]na/_/'jam zhing snum dang ldan pa yi/_/snum gyis de ni sbyang bar bya/_/zhun mar seng phrom btsos pa dang /_/sap+ta la dang bskol ba'am/_/'o ma e raN+Da yi mar/_/bskol ba nad sel dge ba blud/_/snum skyur dro dang lan tshwa sogs/_/zas kyi dri ma tshogs
[\[229b.7\]]gyur nas/_/bu ga 'gags te rlung bkag pas/_/de phyir de ni bde rgyu bya/_/nyam chung bkru sman byar 'os pa/_/de la drod skyed smin byed pa'i/_/kha zas sbyin pa'am de bcas pa'i/_/mas gtong bkru sman sbyar bar bya/_/sbyang zhing me drod bskyed gyur nas/_/slar
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]yang snum dang dugs byas phan/_/ma zhu'i gnas su zhugs pa'i rlung /_/slon byas zas rim byin nas ni/_/ba ra Na sogs drug pa'am/_/shu dag stsogs chu dro sbyar blud/_/me drod bskyed nas de'i 'og tu/_/rlung can gcig pu'i gso ba bya/_/
[\[230a.2\]]lto ba'i phyogs zhugs bil ba ni/_/gzhon dang nya shas g.yos byas sbyin/_/lte ba'i 'og zhugs 'jam rtsi gtang /_/zas kyi sngon du snum btang phan/_/khong par zhugs la thal sman sogs/_/phye ma drod skyed smin byed phan/_/snying gnas sa la par+Ni dag_/'o ma dang ni
[\[230a.3\]]bskol ba phan/_/mgo bor gnas la mgo snum bsku/_/sna sman dud rngub snum can dang /_/rna ba sogs la brta byas phan/_/pags par gnas la bsku byug dugs/_/rlung med gnas su gnas pa dang /_/kha zas yi ga 'byed pa phan/_/khrag gnas bsil sman bsku
[\[230a.4\]]ba dang /_/bkru sman khrag ni dbyung ba phan/_/sha tshil brten pa bkru sman dang /_/mas gtong drag dang zhi bya'i sman/_/rus pa rkang la gnas pa la/_/phyi dang nang nas snum gyis gso/_/khu chur gnas la sems dga' dang /_/kha zas stobs skyed ro tsa phan/_/khu ba rgyu
[\[230a.5\]]ba 'gags gyur na/_/bkru sman btang bas gso bar bya/_/'khrus shing zas rim bsten gyur nas/_/sngar bshad pa yi gso ba bya/_/rlung las mngal chags bskams gyur dang /_/byis pa skems par gyur pa la/_/kar tang pa la shing mngar rnams/_/'o ma
[\[230a.6\]]sbyar bskol blud pa phan/_/rgyus pa tshigs dang rtsar zhugs la/_/snum tsha dkri ba'i dugs byas phan/_/yan lag 'khums lam sha dang /_/rgyam tsha til mar bskol bas bsku/_/khrag gzags drags la yan lag ni/_/tshor ba med la khyim dud pa/_/rgyam tsha
[\[230a.7\]]til mar sbyar bas bsku/_/dkri ba'i dugs ni sbyar bar bya/_/gzhan dbang can gyis gzir gyur cing /_/mig 'gyur mi shes 'dar ba med/_/pho mtshan mi ldang rngul mi 'byung /_/phyi rol rtsol ba med 'gyur la/_/khri yi bcings pas ma non pa/_/de la myur du gso
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]dpyad bya/_/der ni thog mar snum zhen bya/_/dugs byas sna sman rnon pos ni/_/bu ga sbyang phyir btang ba dang /_/bi da ra yi sde bskol dang /_/zho dang 'o ma sha khu dang /_/mar bskol ba yi dngas ma blud/_des ni rlung nad tshabs che ba'am/_/'phral du khyab par mi 'gyur
[\[230b.2\]]ro/_/rgya sran nas dang rgya shug stsogs/_/thang shing la sogs sde tshan ni/_/rlan can sha ni bskol ba dang /_/skyur dang 'o ma dag dang ni/_/mngar ba'i sde tshan btab pa yi/_/snum chen dag ni bskol ba yis/_/blugs dang bsku dang lus spyi dang /_/btung dang sna
[\[230b.3\]]sman 'jam rtsir bya/_/snum dang dugs ni legs sbyar ba/_/de dang des ni rlung nad 'joms/_/nad shugs bar ma dag la ni/_/bad kan sel zhing rno ba yi/_/spyi bo'i bkru sman lan mang gtang /_/bud cing gtang bar bya ba yis/_/dbugs rgyu'i gnas ni dag gyur
[\[230b.4\]]nas/_/des ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/kha ru tsha dang a ru ra/_/tsha ba gsum bskol rlung chen sel/_/seng phrom srang brgyad 'bras bu gsum/_/bre gang rtsa ba chen po lnga/_/e raN+Da dang bri ha ti/_/dur byid srang re chu bre ni/_/bcu drug nang du bskol nas su/_/bzhi cha lus pa
[\[230b.5\]]de dang ni/_/mar bre gang dang chu bre bzhi/_/nas tshig 'khus thal srang gsum bskol/_/de bsten rlung nad ma rungs pa/_/yan lag phyogs gcig kun la zhugs/_/mngal gyi nad dang rgyu rlugs dang /_/skran dang dmu rdzing 'joms par byed/_/ra mnye ba dang a shwa ka'ang /_/
[\[230b.6\]]cho ga seng phrom lta bur bya/_/gso ba 'di ni gzhan dbang can/_/rlung nad ma 'dres pa la bya/_/nad gzhi 'dren mar 'dren mas bya/_/bad kan bcas pa'i gzhan dbang can/_/snying ga rtsib logs na ba la/_/g.yer ma shing kun a ru ra/_/ma nu dang ni lan tshwa
[\[230b.7\]]gsum/_/nas bskol khu ba sbyar ba blud/_/shing kun bca' sga rtsal ru tsha/_/se 'bru star bu bcas pa blud/_/bad kan rlung ni 'dres pa la/_/snying nad gso ba'i skabs bshad phan/_/da rgan phyir dgye nang gug gnyis/_/klad pa gzhogs phyed na ltar gso/_/til
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]mar gyis bkang snod du bsnyal/_/'dir ni nang gug rab gso dka'/_/so dang bzhin gyi mdog nyams shing /_/yan lag lhod cing dran pa nyams/_/rab tu rngul ba'i gzhung rengs yin/_/de ni zhag bcu las mi 'tsho/_/de las gzhan shugs
[\[231a.2\]]sman gyur 'tsho/_/lus sgu ba dang 'on glen dang /_/[(]'thing [,]'theng [)]dang zha bo gzhogs phyed nyams/_/'phye bo'am dbang po ma tshang 'gyur/_/'gram pa nyams pa 'gram pa snum/_/dugs byas nas ni rang gnas gzhug_/kha gdangs pa la kos ko ni/_/bteg la mkhas pas
[\[231a.3\]]gzhug par bya/_/'tham par gyur pa lhag ma la/_/phyogs gcig gug pa lta bur gso/_/lce ldibs gnas skabs ji bzhin du/_/rlung nad kyi ni gso ba bya/_/glad pa gzhogs phyed na ba la/_/sna sman spyi bo'i til mar dang /_/mig dang rna ba dgang bar bya/_/skrangs
[\[231a.4\]]par skyug sman gtang bar bya/_/tsha zhing dmar bcas gtar ga gdab/_/gzhogs phyed skams la snum chos dang /_/snum dang ldan pa'i bkru sman gtang /_/dpung pa 'jas la sna sman dang /_/zas kyi rjes la snum sbyin bya/_/brla rengs pa la snum chos dang /_/sbyang
[\[231a.5\]]byas phan pa ma yin te/_/bad kan ma zhu tshil mang bas/_/de phyir de la rtsub chos kyi/_/zad par bya bas gso bar bya/_/nas dang khre dang khre rgod sbyin/_/tshod ma lan tshwa med pa ni/_/til mar cung zad chur bskol ba'am/_/skam sa'i sha ni mar med dang /_/sbrang rtsi chu
[\[231a.6\]]dang chang rnying sbyin/_/phyug po'i rlung la dug mo nyung /_/yung ba'i sde tshan shu dag sogs/_/bskol ba rgyam tshar bcas pa'am/_/ba ra Na sogs phye sbyar blud/_/yang na dbyi mo 'bras bu gsum/_/pu tse shel dang pi pi ling /_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin/_/yang
[\[231a.7\]]na dbyi mo a ru ra/_/tsi tra ka dang thang shing dang /_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin/_/gu gul brag zhun a ru ra/_/ba gcin dang ni sbyar ba blud/_/gla sgang tsi tra tsha ba gsum/_/'bras bu gsum dang byi dang ga_/gu gul cha mnyam phye ma sbyin/_/chil dang bad
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]kan ma zhu las/_/gyur pa'i nad ni thams cad sel/_/de ltar bad kan shas che zhing /_/tshil bcas rlung ni nad sel byed/_/thal sman ba gcin sbyar dugs dang /_/blugs dang lus la dril ba'ang bya/_/nyungs kar ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu/_/ba gcin sbyar bas bsku
[\[231b.2\]]bar bya/_/arka ag+ni man+tha dang /_/nim pa'i rtsa ba thang shing dang /_/bong pa dang ni grog mkhar sa/_/yungs kar sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku/_/bad kan zad phyir drag shul ni/_/bzod na de la brten par bya/_/thang la mchong dang ci nus kyis/_/nyal po dag kyang
[\[231b.3\]]yongs su bsten/_/chu mi g.yo dang lteng ka dang /_/chu rgyun bzlog pas chu bo rgal/_/'dir ni tshil dang bad kan dag_/zad nas snum la sogs pa gtang /_/gnas dang lus zungs sogs brtags la/_/lhag ma rnams kyang gso bar bya/_/sa ha ra dza thang shing dang /_/
[\[231b.4\]]dong gra bskol ba til mar sbyar/_/rlung gis lus gzir la blud na/_/ci 'dod thogs pa med 'gro nus/_/ra sna dong gra tsi tra ka_/zur pa ma nu pi pi ling /_/btags pa'i phye ma mar bskol ba/_/rlung nad sel bar byed pa'i mchog_/nim pa sle tres ba sha ka_/kaN+Da
[\[231b.5\]]ka ri pa to la/_/srang ni bcu bcu'i tshad byas la/_/chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/_/khu ba brgyad cha lus pa der/_/mar ni bre gang blugs te bskol/_/pa ta thang shing byi dang ga_/dong gra ha ti pi pi ling /_/skyer pa shu ti dbyi mo dang /_/te dzo ba ti na le sham/_/ru rta dang
[\[231b.6\]]ni dug mo nyung /_/thal sman rnam pa gnyis po dang /_/ti mu sa dang kru trug tres/_/bse shing 'bras bu pu tse shel/_/shu dag pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/btsod dang bong nga la la phud/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis tshad byas pa/_/gu gul sbyar ba srang lnga dang /_/lde gu btab ste bskol
[\[231b.7\]]ba'i mar/_/blud na rlung tshad tshabs che ba/_/rus tshigs rkang la zhen pa'ang 'joms/_/mdze nad de 'dra'ang sel bar byed/_/bu ga'i rma dang lba ba dang /_/mtshan par rdol dang 'bras kyi phreng /_/nam tshong yan chad nad kun dang /_/skran dang gzhang 'brum za khu dang /_/
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]gcong chen dbugs mi bde ba dang /_/yi ga 'chus dang cham pa dang /_/lud pa 'or nad snying nad dang /_/skya rbab myos dang khong 'bras dang /_/rlung dang khrag gi nad rnams 'joms/_/bil ba gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang /_/mar gyi nying khu bskol nas ni/_/de
[\[232a.2\]]la srang ni gcig gam phyed/_/sna sman byas mgo'i rlung nad sel/_/de bzhin chu srin nag khra dang /_/nya dang rus sbal 'ug pa'i chil/_/bskol ba ma 'dres rlung la ni/_/khyad par du ni gtang bar bya/_/til gyi tshigs ma rnying pa dang /_/rtsa ba lnga pa so sor bskol/_/gcig
[\[232a.3\]]tu bsres pa til mar ni/_/'o ma brgyad cha'i nang du bskol/_/blud na rlung dang bad kan dang /_/'dres pa'i nad ni thams cad 'joms/_/pra sa ra ni srang brgyad bskol/_/til mar 'o ma bre re dang /_/med gnyis dang sha puSh+pa/_/btsod dang ru rta ra sna dang /_/tsan+dan dmar po
[\[232a.4\]]dzi ba ka_/_ra sna ra mnye ba gnyis dang /_/thang shing btags pa'i lde gu dang /_/bskol blud rlung nad thams cad sel/_/sa ha ra dza'i rtsa ba yal gar bcas/_/srang brgya rtsa ba bcu ni de dang mnyam/_/nye'u shing srang ni lnga bcu chu bre drug cu ni/_/rtsa bzhi'i nang bskol bzhi cha lus
[\[232a.5\]]pa der/_/chu srin sder mo ru rta pu shel tse/_/tsan+dan sug smel pri ka pri yang ku/_/na li ka dang rdo dreg ba le ka_/spang spos thang shing btsod dang a ru ra/_/tsa rong shu ti rgya spos du ru ka_/srang re cha mnyam 'o mar bcas pa ni/_/til mar bre bzhi lhan cig bskol ba blud/_/
[\[232a.6\]]rlung nad gso dka' dag kyang 'joms par byed/_/lus 'dar lus la rlung 'jug lus rengs dang /_/lus bskams pa yis shin tu gzir la sogs/_/skran dang smyo byed cham pa mngal nad 'joms/_/sa ha ra dza srang brgya yi/_/khu bar til mar bre bzhi bskol/_/de
[\[232a.7\]]rtsa lde gu srang bcu dang /_/'o ma bzhi 'gyur bcug ste bskol/_/yang na rgya spos shu dag dang /_/stir ru rta shu dag dang /_/sug smel rdo dreg spang spos dang /_/shu ti tsan+dan dmar po gzhug_/bskol ba der ni kha ra'i phye/_/srang ni bco brgyad gzhug par bya/_/til mar sman
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]mar yin par bshad/_/des ni rlung nad ma lus dang /_/rlung nad 'khyil dang smyo byed dang /_/skran dang rlig rlugs la sogs sel/_/ba la srang brgya sle tres ni/_/bzhi cha ra sna brgyad cha ni/_/chu bre bzhi brgya'i nang du bskol/_/khu ba brgyad cha lus pa dang /_/zho dang zho ga chu
[\[232b.2\]]bu ram/_/shing khu tsha dang til mar rnams/_/bre ni bzhi bzhi bskol nas ni/_/ra yi 'o ma cha phyed dang /_/zur pa skyer pa sa ra la/_/sug smel btsod dang a ka ru/_/tsan+dan a ti pa la dang /_/shug pa gla sgang mung+ga'i lo/_/ha re Nu ka shing mngar dang /_/bya gri nA ga bye'u
[\[232b.3\]]rug pa/_/zangs rtsi ba dang dzi ba ka_/gla rtsi lce pog pa la sha_/dzA ti sho ka na li ka_/gur gum rdo dreg bi ka dang /_/dzA ti pa la kad pa la/_/ba li ka dang shing tsha dang /_/kun du ru dang ga pur dang /_/shri pa sa da du ru ka_/li shi chu srin sen mo dang /_/ru rta spang spos ka
[\[232b.4\]]ko la/_/pri yang ku dang sto ne ya/_/rgya spos shu dag bya ma ka_/ma du nA ga gla ba dang /_/nA ga ge sar srang re dang /_/bskol te btsags par gyur pa ru/_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra'i lde gu ni/_/cho ga bzhin du bcug pa des/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde dang rims/_/brgyal dang slon skran
[\[232b.5\]]zad byed dang /_/glo 'grams mcher nad skem pa dang /_/brjed byed bkra mi shis pa sel/_/ba li til mar bzang po 'di/_/rlung gi nad ni 'joms byed yin/_/btung ba sna sman bsku dang 'jam rtsi ni/_/snum gyi sbyor ba dus su legs bsten na/_/des ni ma rungs
[\[232b.6\]]rlung nad myur zhi ste/_/bud med mo gsham bu yi snod byed 'gyur/_/gang tshe bad kan mkhris pa ni/_/zhu ba'i gnas 'dug snum dugs kyis/_/zhu nas mkhris pa snang gyur pa/_/de la 'jam rtsis bsal bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/gso
[\[232b.7\]]ba'i gnas las le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas dreg nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/dreg nad can ni snum chos bya/_/rlung bsrungs nad gzhi nyams stobs las/_/dpag ste khrag ni cung zad tsam/_/lan mang du ni dbyung bar bya/_/dmar gzer na zhing tsha
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ba la/_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo /_/g.ya' zhing na la tsag tsag tsha/_/shas cher tsha la rngabs rus dbyung /_/gnas nas gnas su 'pho ba la/_/gtar ga'am zhal zhal gyis khrag dbyung /_/lus zhum pa dang khong rtsub cing /_/rlung shas
[\[233a.2\]]cha la khrag mid byung /_/khrag zad pa la rlung gis ni/_/skrangs pa gting zab rings pa dang /_/'dar zhing rtsa rgyus na dang zhum/_/rlung nad gzhan yang skyed par byed/_/snum chos byas rjes bkru sman ni/_/snum dang ldan pas 'khru ru gzhug_/rlung shas che ba'i dreg nad
[\[233a.3\]]la/_/mar ni rnying pa blud par bya/_/ra mnye ba dang sra ba ni/_/pa ya s+ya dang dzi ba ka_/zangs rtsi ba dang cha snyoms te/_/'o ma mar bskol dreg nad 'joms/_/rgun 'bru ma du ka bskol ba'i/_/khu ba khar mar bcas pa'am/_/de bzhin sle tres khu bar ni/_/'o ma bskol
[\[233a.4\]]ba blud par bya/_/til mar 'o ma kha rar bcas/_/legs par bsres pa blud par bya/_/ba la nye shing ra snang dang /_/pi lu rtsa ba bcu par bcas/_/dur byid sti ra e raN+Da/_/bskol ba'i 'o mas rlung dreg sel/_/ba gcin 'o ma bzhos ma thag_/bcas pa'ang nad
[\[233a.5\]]ni bde 'byung byed/_/mkhris par nye shing pu tse shel/_/pa to la rtsa'i 'bras bu gsum/_/sle tres dang ni sman mngar kha/_/'o ma'ang mar dang bskol ba blud/_/nad gzhi shas che'i bkru sman phyir/_/e raN+Da'i mar 'o mar sbyar/_/sbyor ba ji bzhin blud par bya/_/
[\[233a.6\]]zhu nas 'o ma 'bras chan sbyin/_/a ru ra ni mar brngos pa/_/khu ba blud par bya ba'am/_/dur byid phye ma rgun chu'am/_/'o ma sbyar ba blud par bya/_/yang na de yi nad gzhi ni/_/'jam rtsi 'o ma mar bcas sbyar/_/rlung dang khrag nad gso ba la/_/'jam rtsi las lhag
[\[233a.7\]]gang yang med/_/mchog tu gzhang dang rtsib logs brla/_/tshigs nad dmu rdzing nyam thag sel/_/bad kan shas che gla sgang dang /_/rgun 'bru skyer pa bskol ba'am/_/'bras bu gsum bskol sbrang rtsir bcas/_/yang na sle tres ci rigs blud/_/ji ltar 'cham par snam
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]blud de/_/slon byas nas ni rtsub chos bya/_/'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra shing tsha dang /_/cu gang shu dag tsi tra ka_/pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ga_/spang spos ba sha ka'i shun phrags/_/ri sti dbyi mo lang ga ling /_/cha mnyam lde gur byas pa la/_/nang
[\[233b.2\]]par lcags snod bskus te gzhag_/nyi ma phyed dus de zos na/_/nad gzhi kun gyur dreg nad ni/_/gzer dang ldan la mchog tu phan/_/ko ki lak+Sha bskol ba'i khu/_/blud cing de yi tshod ma zos/_/snying rje goms pa'i skyes bu ltar/_/dreg nad sel bar byed pa yin/_/
[\[233b.3\]]rtsa ba lnga'am skyu ru ra'i/_/khu ba li li ta yi zhag_/'khrig pa spong zhing 'thungs na ni/_/dreg 'theng shin tu gting zug sel/_/de ltar nang gi bstan nas ni/_/de 'og phyi rol gso ba bshad/_/rang skyur bre bzhir til mar dang /_/sra rtsi pog ni bzhi char bskol/_/chu
[\[233b.4\]]nang gzar bus mang du dkrugs/_/rims tsha nad gzir sel mchog yin/_/til mar btsod dang spra tshil dang /_/sra rtsi pog dang thal tres bcas/_/til mar skabs lus bskus na/_/dreg nad sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/rtsa ba bcu dang 'o ma bskol/_/yang na lde gu
[\[233b.5\]]chu dron sbyar/_/blugs na rlung shas che ba yi/_/gzer nad 'phral du sel byed yin/_/lus 'jug rengs dang gzer gyis nyen/_/snum bzhi po ni mngar ba'i sman/_/dro 'jam sbyar ba blugs par bya/_/tsha bar gyur la grang mo blugs/_/de bzhin ra lug pa yi ni/_/'o ma
[\[233b.6\]]til mar sbyar ba'am/_/'tsho byed sde tshan bskol ba'am/_/rtsa ba chung ngu lnga bskol blugs/_/rgun chu bu ram shing khu chang /_/rang skyur zho dang zho ga chu/_/'bras bkrus chu dang sbrang rtsi'i chu/_/ka ra'i chu ni blud pa'ang phan/_/bud med gzugs sdug snyan par smra/_/lag
[\[233b.7\]]pa nu ma tsan+da bskus/_/reg na bsil zhing bde ba yis/_/tsha dang na dang rmya ba sel/_/mdog dmar tsha dang na bcas la/_/khrag phyung nas ni lde gus bsku/_/stag tsher pa dang shing mngar btsong /_/skyer ba tsan+dan ka ra dkar/_/e raN+Da yi sa bon phye/_/sran chung shug
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]pa pu shel tse/_/lde gus tsha na shu ba mched/_/na zhing mdog dmar skrangs pa sel/_/kri sa ra ni rlung 'joms sman/_/snum bcas bskol ba'am mung+ga dang /_/'o thug nyungs kar til tshigs ma/_/glan zhing dkris pas gzer 'joms byed/_/chur
[\[234a.2\]]gnas rlan can mthu rtsal gyis/_/zas tshol sha btags g.yos legs pa/_/'tsho byed sman dang snum bcas pas/_/glan zhing dkri ba byas gyur na/_/sra zhing gzer la na ba dang /_/skrangs dang yan lag na ba 'joms/_/'tsho byed sman dang bskol ba yi/_/'o ma zhag
[\[234a.3\]]gis bskus na'ang phan/_/sa ha ra dza'i rtsa ba dang /_/dzi ban ti mar ra'i 'o ma/_/lde gu bskus pa'am de bzhin du/_/til btags brngos pa 'o mar sbyar/_/zar ma 'o mar sbyar ba'am/_/e raN+Da yi 'bras bu ni/_/'o ma dag dang sbyar ba'am/_/shu ti'i 'o mar
[\[234a.4\]]sbyar ba yis/_/rlung shas che ba'i gzer 'joms byed/_/ba gcin thal sman chang dang bskol/_/mar gyis bskus na'ang de la phan/_/bad kan shas che rgun tsha dang /_/bskol ba'i mar bsku blugs pa phan/_/shu dag ru rta khyim dud pa/_/shu ti ser po rnam gnyis kyi/_/
[\[234a.5\]]lde gus bskus na dreg nad ni/_/rlung dang bad kan shas che sel/_/de bzhin shi kru'i sa bon ni/_/'bras kyi khu ba'i rang skyur ni/_/yud tsam btags nas skyur gyur pa/_/blugs na bad rlung shas che sel/_/rtogs par sla la byug dang bsku/_/blugs dang
[\[234a.6\]]lus ni bcing bas gso/_/rtogs dka' mas gtong drag po dang /_/bkru sman snum ni blud pas gso/_/bad rlung shas cher dro 'jam sbyar/_/de la byugs stsogs grang mo yis/_/lus tsha na zhing g.ya' zhing skangs/_/sra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_/khrag
[\[234a.7\]]mkhris shas che'i dreg nad la/_/byug pa la sogs bsil bas bya/_/dro bas tsha zhing na la dmar/_/rdul 'byung gas par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/shing mngar srang brgya bskol ba yi/_/khu ba bzhi cha lus pa ru/_/til mar bre bzhi 'o ma mnyam/_/ti ra mur ba
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]ta ma la/_/nye'u shing a gar pa ya s+ya/_/tsan+dan has ba ti dang /_/spang spos sle tres me da gnyis/_/ra mnye ba gnyis shu ti dang /_/shug pa rnam gnyis dzi ban ti/_/dzi ba ka dang bi sha ba/_/shing tsha gan+da b+ha dra dang /_/chu srin sin mo ba le ka_/btsod dang pra puN+Da ri ka_/_shi ri
[\[234b.2\]]ba dang bi la sha_/ku tan na ta srang re yi/_/lde gur bcas pa bskol bar bya/_/sbyor ba bzhi pos dreg nad kyi/_/mkhris pa'i rtsa ba rims nad sel/_/ba la'i khu ba lde gu dang /_/til mar 'o ma cha mnyam bskol/_/lan brgya'i bar du bskol ba de/_/dreg nad rlung can sel
[\[234b.3\]]bar byed/_/bcud kyis len gyi dam pa ste/_/dbang po gsal bar byed pa yin/_/tshe ring lus 'phel skad snyan dang /_/khu chu khrag gi nad sel byed/_/rgyu ba'i lam 'gags 'khrugs gyur pas/_/tshil lam bad kan shin tu ni/_/'phel bar gyur pa'i rlung nad la/_/
[\[234b.4\]]snum rtas dang por phan pa yin/_/der ni phyug po'i rlung nad kyi/_/gso bya dreg nad gso bar bya/_/khrag ni dngas par byed pa yi/_/snum dang sman gyi sbyor ba bya/_/srog stsogs rlung ni cig car 'khrugs/_/ji skad bstan dang nad gzhi bzhin/_/ji ltar nye bar sman rnams ni/_/
[\[234b.5\]]nang tshul ji bzhin sbyin par bya/_/ma zhu bcas la dugs dang smyung /_/smin bya rtsub sman byug pa dang /_/rlung stsogs kyis ni ma zhu bsal/_/byas la ma 'dres rlung gso bya/_/skem dang bya rmyang yan lag 'khums/_/rengs dang 'dar bu tshor ba med/_/'gram nyams kha yo
[\[234b.6\]]'theng po dang /_/zha bo dreg nad kyis 'theng dang /_/tshigs 'khrul gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_/tshigs dang rkang rus la zhugs nad/_/'di dag gnas ni gting rings pas/_/de bas 'di dag gsar btab dang /_/bla brnan med cing nyams stobs ldan/_/'bad na 'tsho yi
[\[234b.7\]]gzhan du min/_/mkhris 'dres rlung la grang dro yi/_/gso ba'i rim gyis mang du bya/_/'tsho byed sde dang bskol ba yi/_/sman mar dag kyang blud par bya/_/skam sa'i sha dang sA lu nas/_/bkru sman 'o mar bcas 'jam gtang /_/rtsa ba lnga dang ba lar bskol/_/'o ma mas
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gtong sbyor ba bya/_/sman mar bskol ba'i til mar gyi/_/'jam rtsi dus su gtang bar bya/_/shing mngar ba la til mar dang /_/mar dang 'o ma bskol ba blugs/_/rtsa ba lnga yi khu ba'am/_/chu ni grang mo nyid blugs bya/_/bad kan bcas la
[\[235a.2\]]nas kyi zan/_/skam sa'i ri dwags bya yi sha_/dugs dang mas gtong bkru sman no/_/slon sman bkru sman bcas pa gtang /_/mar rnying til mar nyungs kar las/_/byung ba'i mar ni blud par bya/_/bad kan mkhris pa 'dres pa las/_/dang po mkhris pa gso bar bya/_/
[\[235a.3\]]khrag dang 'des pa dreg nad kyi/_/gso ba ji skad bshad par bya/_/dugs bsku sha khu 'o ma dang /_/snum dang bcas pas sha bkra sel/_/phyug po'i rlung la gcin snyi dang /_/tshil dang rlung 'joms sman gyis gso/_/rus pa rkang gnas snum chen gyis/_/khu chur
[\[235a.4\]]gnas la sngar bshad pa'i/_/zas dang 'dres la 'ju byed dang /_/drod skyed skyug sman yang ba gtang /_/gcin 'dres gcin ni 'phel ba dang /_/dugs dang 'jam rtsi gong mas gso/_/bshang 'dres e raN+Da'i mar dang /_/'jam rtsi snum ni 'khru byed phan/_/lus
[\[235a.5\]]zungs kun zhugs rlung nad la/_/bad kan mkhris par mi gnod dang /_/gang yang rlung ni bder rgyu ba'i/_/sman de rlung nad de la gtang /_/'khru bar mi byed snum pa dang /_/rtsa rgyun sbyong bar byed pa dang /_/mas gtong bas ni mngar ba dang /_/snum gyi 'jam rtsis gso
[\[235a.6\]]bar bya/_/nyams stobs ci yod brtags nas ni/_/bkru sman 'jam po gtang bar bya/_/bcud kyis len ni thams cad kyi/_/sbyor ba dag kyang bsngags pa yin/_/mchog tu brag zhun sbyor ba dang /_/de bzhin gu gul nyi tshe 'am/_/kha ra srang stong chig brgyar
[\[235a.7\]]bcas/_/pa wa sangs bshad lde gu'ang phan/_/thur sel 'dres la drod bskyed dang /_/'khru gcod rlung ni bder rgyu byed/_/gcin gyi gnas ni sbyong byed pa'i/_/sman rnams de la gtang bar bya/_/de ltar srog la sogs pa yi/_/'dres pa'i gso ba mdor bshad
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]yin/_/sman pas de gso rgyas par ni/_/blo yis brtags te ci rigs bya/_/stod du rgyu ba'i spyi bor bsdu/_/thur sel de las bzlog par bya/_/me dang mnyam gnas mnyam par bya/_/khyab byed gsum du sbyar bar bya/_/bzhi bo bas kyang srog bsrung ste/_/der gnas
[\[235b.2\]]na ni lus gnas 'gyur/_/de ltar rlung ni lam gzhan zhugs/_/rang rang gi ni gnas su gzhag_/khrag mkhris 'dres pa ma gtogs par/_/'dres pa'i nad ni thams cad la/_/bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bzhin/_/sgog skya bsten na sel bar byed/_/mkhris par
[\[235b.3\]]'dres la mkhris sel bas/_/rlung ni bde bar rgyu bar bya/_/khrag dang 'dres la de nyid dang /_/'theng pa'i nad bshad sman bya'o/_/khrag mkhris rlung ni sel ba yi/_/bcud kyis len ni sna tshogs sbyar/_/nad gzhi ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/_/gso ba de ltar yang
[\[235b.4\]]dag bshad/_/nyam thag 'phral du sel ba 'di/_/tshe yi rig byed gnas 'bras bu/_/gso ba phan pa gnod sel dang /_/sbyor ba sman dang rtsi dang ni/_/zhi bar byed dang sngags bya ste/_/de dag sman ming rnam grangs yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa
[\[235b.5\]]las/_gso ba'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_gso ba'i gnas te gnas bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//de nas skyug sman gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs
[\[235b.6\]]pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de/_skyug sman mchog ni po son cha/_/dur byid rtsa ba bkru sman mchog_/gzhan dag nad kyi dbang las ni/_/khyad par du ni gyur pa yin/_/po son cha de mdog skya zhing /_/shin tu sngo ba'ang ma yin pa/_/nyin zhag tshes
[\[235b.7\]]grangs shis pa la/_/sos ka dpyid kyi mtshams su btu/_/phyis nas 'jag ma'i snod du ni/_/bcug ste bcings la ba lang gi/_/lci bas snod du byugs nas ni/_/'bru yi nang du gzhag par bya/_/'jag mas dkris pas 'jam pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi lta bu dri zhim la/_/
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]zhag brgyad 'das par gyur pa dang /_/phyung ste de nyid nyi mar bskam/_/de 'og legs par bskams pa dang /_/nang gi 'bras bu phyung nas ni/_/zho dang zho ga chu mar gyi/_/lde gur mnyes la slar yang bskam/_/de nas legs par sbas te gzhag_/
[\[236a.2\]]dgos pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya/_/de nas de la tshad tsam du/_/blangs nas cham chom brdungs nas ni/_/shing mngar go bye bi da ra'am/_/bim ba lcang ma sle sman ta/_/bum ti a pa marga dang /_/arga gang yang rung ba ni/_/bskol ba'i chu yi nang du ni/_/nub gcig
[\[236a.3\]]legs par spang bar bya'o/_/de nas sman gyi khu ba de/_/mnyes shing btsags la nang par ni/_/mdo nas bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/legs par blud nas skyug tu gzhug_/bad kan las byung rims tsham pa/_/skran dang khong 'bras rnams la ni/_/ji srid mkhris
[\[236a.4\]]pa snang gi bar/_/khyad par du yang skyug tu gzhug_/po son cha yi 'bras bu ni/_/phye ma bskol ba'i khu bar ni/_/'bras bu gsum phye cha gsum btab/_/ko bi dar stsogs khur bcas/_/blud na rims dang dmu rdzing dang /_/rmen bu 'bras dang 'brum chen dang /_/
[\[236a.5\]]gtun 'dra'i rlung nad sel bar byed/_/mkhris pa bad kan gnas zhugs la/_/dzi mu ta sogs khu ba blud/_/snying tsha khrag mkhris dag la na/_/de 'bras 'o mar bskol ba yi/_/'o thug bcas pa blud par bya/_/bad kan las gyur slon bro dang /_/cham pa mun
[\[236a.6\]]'thibs byed pa la/_/de bskol 'o ma las byung ba'i/_/zho yi spris ma'am zho blud bya/_/po son cha sogs lde gu dang /_/bskol ba'i 'o ma las byung ba'i/_/mar sar bad kan gyis drod nyams/_/lus skam pa la skyug sman bya/_/po son cha yi khu ba ni/_/bsre
[\[236a.7\]]zhing cho gas btsags nas ni/_/gzar bur chags pa'i bar du bskol/_/byin la de bas skyug tu gzhug_/lde gu de'am de'i khu ba/_/bza' dang btung bar sbyar te gtang /_/po son cha yi 'bras bu'i khu/_/dug mo nyung sogs sde tshan btab/_/nim pa arka gang yang
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]rung /_/bskol ba'i khu bar bcas pa ni/_/blud na nyams brtas las byung nad/_/gting zug kun kyang sel bar byed/_/po son cha yi me tog ni/_/zhib btags phreng bsgos bsnams nas ni/_/thug pa sha khu sogs ngoms blud/_/skyid de ba ni bder slon gzhug_/
[\[236b.2\]]po son cha med me tog dang /_/'bras bu gzhon nu de bzhin sbyar/_/dzi mu ta sogs de dang 'dra/_/dzi mu ta ni khyad par du/_/rims dang lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/skyigs bu la sogs nad la gtang /_/'di yi me tog 'o mar btsos/_/'bras bu smin pa 'o thug
[\[236b.3\]]bcas/_/spu bcas 'o ma'i spris mar sbyar/_/sbu med zho yi spris mar sbyar/_/skya ba'am sngor gyur 'o mar bcug_/zho ni skyur por gyur pa'am/_/mnan pa'i chang gi dngas mar ni/_/mnyes te zhu bar gyur pa blud/_/bad kan lud pa yi ga 'chus/_/skya rbab gcong
[\[236b.4\]]chen nad la gtang /_/ku ba ko sha ta ki yang /_/sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di nyid bya/_/smin zhing bskams par gyur pa yi/_/dzi mu ta yi 'bras bu dag_/phye ma srang phyed 'o mar bsres/_/rlung mkhris nad kyis nyen la blud/_/dzi mu ta 'bras gnyis sam gsum/_/brdungs pa
[\[236b.5\]]de yi khu ba ni/_/dong ga la sogs dgu pa ni/_/gang yang rung ba la sbangs te/_/mnyes la bcags par gyur pa dag_/bad kan mkhris rims can la blud/_/dzi mu ta yi phye ma'am/_/lde gu chu grang sbyar ba dag_/mkhris rims can blud bad kan dang /_/rlung 'dres
[\[236b.6\]]rims la chu dron sbyar/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde dang dug_/slon rims bad kan gyis nyen dang /_/mun 'thibs byed pa'i nad ldan la/_/ku ba kha bo'i skyug sman bsngags/_/de ni me tog 'bras bu med/_/myu gu gzhon nu 'o mar btsos/_/bad kan mkhris pa las
[\[236b.7\]]gyur rims/_/mkhris pa shas cher gyur la blud/_/'bras bu smin pa'i nang gi ni/_/'bras bu phyung ste 'o ma bcug_/zhor gyur lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/blud de slon du gzhug par bya/_/'bras bu'i nang na zho ga chu/_/mdze dug skya rbab nyid la blud/_/de dang dar ba
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bskol ba ni/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa blud/_/yang na de yi sa bon ni/_/ra yi 'o mar bcas pa dag_/dug skran dmu rdzing rmen bu dang /_/'bras dang rkang bam nad la blud/_/bad kan las gyur lud pa rims/_/lkog ma'i nad dang ma zhu la/_/
[\[237a.2\]]ku ba kha bo'i khu ba ni/_/phye dang sbyar ba'i skyo ma blud/_/skran dang rims rnying bying ba la/_/lde gu sha khur sbyar blud na/_/legs pa kho nar slon gyur zhing /_/nyam chung bar yang 'gyur ma yin/_/ku ba kha bo'i me tog dang /_/'bras bu phye mas bsgos pa yis/_/me tog phreng
[\[237a.3\]]ba mnam pa ni/_/skyid de ba yi skyug sman yin/_/skran lud dmu rdzing lkog ma'i nad/_/bad kan gnas la brten pa'i rlung /_/bad kan kha dang mgrin par gnas/_/bad kan 'phel bar gyur pa dag_/brtan zhing dkyel ni skyes pa la/_/ko sha ta ka'i skyug sman bsngags/_/
[\[237a.4\]]'tsho byed nye'u shing zangs rtsi ba/_/kha sral phre'u ram nye gnyis/_/shra ba dang ni me da dang /_/ma hA me da ma du li/_/'di dag re re'i phye ma dang /_/ko sha ta ka'i phye mar bcas/_/sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar ba ni/_/lud pa snying ni tsha la bsngags/_/de rjes chu dron blud pa ni/_/bad kan
[\[237a.5\]]mkhris tsha ldan la bsngags/_/'u su g.yer ma'i khu ba dang /_/de yi khu bas dug 'joms so/_/bim pa ka sa marda 'am/_/ba sbu ba yi khu bar ni/_/ra dza go sha ta ka yi/_/rdog ma gcig gam gnyis mnyes pa'i/_/dngas ma snying gi nad la blud/_/de bskol 'o ma
[\[237a.6\]]las byung mar/_/po son cha stsogs bskol ba blud/_/ko sha ta sogs kha dang tsha/_/mdze dang skya rbab mcher pa'i nad/_/'or nad skran nad sbyar dug sogs/_/gting zug pa la bsngags pa yin/_/po son cha sogs drug so sor/_/bskol ba dang ni rlan can sha_/
[\[237a.7\]]ko sha ta ka cha mnyam bskol/_/khu ba rgyam tshar bcas pa blud/_/po son cha sogs pi pi ling /_/cha mnyam ko sha ta kar sbyar/_/yang na ko sha ta ka yi/_/khu ba bu ram shing khu blud/_/dug mo nyung ni skyid de ba/_/bad kan mkhris pa khrag bcas dang /_/rims dang shu
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]ba snying nad dang /_/dreg nad kyis 'theng mdze la bsngags/_/dug mo nyung gi sa bon de/_/nyungs kar ram ni ma du ki/_/bskol ba'i khu ba'am rgyam tsha'i chu/_/yang na kri sa ra ldan blud/_/de yi sa bon arka yi/_/'o mar zhag bdun sbangs pa ni/_/po son cha dang dzi mu ta/_/
[\[237b.2\]]ku ba kha bo dzi ban ti/_/dzi ba ka ni bskol ba yi/_/khu ba gang yang rung ba blud/_/skyug sman gyi ni gtso bo yi/_/cho ga phyogs tsam bshad pa yin/_/blo dang ldan pa tshul 'di yis/_/gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_
[\[237b.3\]]cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bkru sman bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/dur byid bska zhing mngar la rtsub/_/zhu rjes tsha bar gyur pa yin/_/bad kan mkhris pa zhi byed de/_/rtsub pas rlung ni 'khrugs par byed/_/de 'dir sman
[\[237b.4\]]gyi sbyor ba yis/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sel/_/cho ga'i khyad par la brten nas/_/nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin/_/dur byid rnam pa gnyis su bshad/_/de rtsa dmar nag dkar ba yis/_/rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yin/_/de las tri byi ta mchog tu
[\[237b.5\]]bshad/_/nyes pa med cing bde bar 'khru/_/brgyal rmongs byed cing lkog ma ni/_/rtsub cing gnod par byed pa dang /_/rno zhing myur du 'khru byed pa/_/lto sra nad gzhi shas che dang /_/sdug bsngal gyis nyen nad pa la/_/sha ma dur bying bsngags pa yin/_/de ni zabs
[\[237b.6\]]su zug cing 'jam/_/thad kar 'phros pa ma yin pa/_/btus la snying po bor nas ni/_/shun pa skams te sba bar bya/_/de nas de'i 'og de'i phye ma/_/rgyam tsha dong ga cung zad btab/_/rlung nad la ni skyur las blud/_/mkhris par sbrang rtsi kha ra mar/_/'o ma rgun 'bru
[\[237b.7\]]bu ram shing /_/khu ba tang pa la mngar ba yi/_/sman de'i 'bras bu gsum gyi ni/_/khu bar bcas pa blud par bya/_/bad kan nad la pi lu yi/_/khu ba ba gcin chang skyung rtsabs/_/tsha ba lnga sogs phye ma ni/_/bad kan 'joms dang ci rigs sbyar/_/dur byid lde gu khu ba
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]dang /_/bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs khar/_/sbrang rtsi dri bzang gsum dang bcas/_/lde gu yid 'ong bkru sman yin/_/a dza gan+d+ha smig rkang dang /_/ka ra dur byid bi da ri/_/phyer btags sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/lde gu byin na 'dus pa dang /_/rims
[\[238a.2\]]dang lus rengs tsha ba dang /_/skom dad kyis gzer legs par 'khru/_/bu ram shing ni tshal par bkas/_/nang ngos dur byid lde gus bsku/_/gcig tu sbyar te phur ma yis/_/btso ba'i tshul byas de bza' bya/_/shing tsha sug smel mnyam ni li/_/de mnyam dur byid
[\[238a.3\]]sha ka ra/_/phye ma sbrang rtsi rgun chu dang /_/phye dang skyo mar sbyar te blud/_/rlung mkhris bad kan las gyur dang /_/me drod chung ba'i nad dang ni/_/skyid de ba yi mi rnams la/_/gnod pa med pa'i bkru sman yin/_/byi dang ga yi snying po dang /_/'bras bu gsum zhes
[\[238a.4\]]bya ba dang /_/ya bak+Sha ra pi pi ling /_/dur byid kun gyi cha phyed byas/_/sbrang rtsi mar ram bu ram gyis/_/lde gur byas pa byin na ni/_/skran dang mcher pa dmu rdzing dang /_/gzugs 'khums lud pa yi ga 'chus/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur nad/_/mang po gzhan
[\[238a.5\]]dag sbyong bar byed/_/pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ga_/'bras bu gsum dang 'u su dang /_/tsi tra ka dang na le sham/_/pi pi ling dang dug mo nyung /_/zi ra ha ste pi pi ling /_/ti mu sa dang lan tshwa lnga/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis phye mar byas/_/dur byid dang ni til mar gnyis/_/
[\[238a.6\]]srang ni brgyad brgyad char bsres dang /_/skyu ru ra'i khu bre gsum dang /_/bu ram srang ni lnga bcu me/_/chur bskol de las ran tsam ni/_/zos na mdze dang gzhang 'brum dang /_/mig ser za khu skran dang ni/_/dmu rdzing mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_/pho ba'i nad dang skya rbab
[\[238a.7\]]rnams/_/'joms shing cho ga bsrung mi dgos/_/bu skyed par yang de yis byed/_/bu ram dge ba can zhes bya/_/dus kun du ni 'phrod pa yin/_/tsha ba gsum dang dri sna gsum/_/gla sgang dang ni byi dang ga_/skyu ru ra ni de thams cad/_/mnyam pa'i dur byid
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]kha ra dang /_/sbrang rtsi'i ri lu byas zos na/_/gcin sri rims dang slon bro dang /_/lud pa sha skem mgo 'khor dang /_/zad byed lus tsha skya rbab dang /_/me drod chung dang dug nad sbyong /_/dur byid dug mo nyung sa bon/_/bi pi ling dang bca' sga rnams/_/sbrang rtsi rgun
[\[238b.2\]]'bru chur sbyar ba/_/dbyar gyi dus kyi bkru sman yin/_/dur byid gla sgang byi tsher ba/_/kha ra tsan+dan ba le ka_/shing mngar pa ta la'i phye ma/_/rgun chu dang sbyar ston gyi yin/_/dur byid pa ta kru trug tres/_/zir shu dag sa ra la/_/khron bu'i phye ma chu dron sbyar/_/
[\[238b.3\]]dgun gyi dus su blud par bya/_/dur byid kha ra cha mnyam pa/_/so ga'i dus kyi bkru sman yin/_/dur byid spa 'bras kyi lce ba/_/pa ta la dang pu tse shel/_/khron bu legs par btags nas ni/_/ba gcin nang du zhag gsum sbangs/_/'di ni dus kun sbyor ba ste/_/
[\[238b.4\]]snum zhen dri ma nad rnams 'byin/_/sha ma dur byid byi tsher ba/_/gla sgang hasti pi pi ling /_/dug mo nyung dang ni li ni/_/'bras bu gsum dang pu tse shel/_/phye ma sha khu'am mar ram ni/_/chu dron dang sbyar thams cad du/_/khong rtsub la yang gtang bar bya/_/rims
[\[238b.5\]]dang snying nad dreg nad dang /_/rtug skam la sogs nad rnams la/_/dong ga'i bkru sman lhag par ni/_/'jam mngar bsil ba phan pa yin/_/byis pa rgan po glo rdol dang /_/skyid de ba yi mi rnams la/_/'jam zhing skyon ni med pa'i phyir/_/mchog tu dong ga'i
[\[238b.6\]]bkru sman gtang /_/'bras bu'i dus su legs smin pa'i/_/de yi 'bras bu btus nas ni/_/de ni yon tan ldan gyur pa/_/khur gcig bye ma'i nang du gzhug_/zhag bdun lon nas phyung nas ni/_/nyi ma la ni bskam par bya/_/de nas rkang ni phyung nas su/_/snod ni gtsang
[\[238b.7\]]mar gzhag par bya/_/byis pa lo bzhi lon pa nas/_/lo ni bcu gnyis lon pa'i bar/_/lus tsha rtug 'gags kyis gzir la/_/rgun chur sbyar te blud par bya/_/dong ga'i rkang ni mnyes pa dang /_/bskol ba'i chu ni grang mo blud/_/yang na chang dngas zho ga chu/_/skyu
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ru ra yi khu ba'am/_/rang skyur dag dang bcas pa'am/_/dur byid lde gur sbyar ba sbyin/_/dan da'i khu bar de yi rkang /_/bu ram rnying pa bcug nas ni/_/zla ba gcig gam zla phyed bar/_/mnan pa'i chang ni blud par bya/_/seng phrom rtsa ba'i shun pa ni/_/
[\[239a.2\]]nang gi shun lpags bor nas ni/_/bskams te phye mar byas nas ni/_/de la cha gnyis bskol te gzags/_/seng phrom cha ni gsum pa sbangs/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba dang /_/cha de slar yang sbang bar bya/_/slar yang bskams te phye mar bya/_/de las zho gnyis ba gcin
[\[239a.3\]]nam/_/chang gi dngas ma'am zho ga chu/_/rgya shug skyu ru ra'i khu ba/_/gang yang rung dang sbyar te blud/_/seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_/lde gur byas dang khar dang /_/mar dang bskol ba'i lde gu de/_/bkru sman gyi ni dam pa yin/_/shrI khaN+Das nad kyi tshogs/_/
[\[239a.4\]]shas cher sogs pa'ang 'jig par byed/_/myur du 'khru zhing drags pas na/_/lto snyi nyam chung byis pa dang /_/rgan po nad pa yun ring la/_/de ni gtang bar mi bya'o/_/skran dang dmu rdzing sbyang ba'i dug_/pags nad gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/skya rbab skran dang dug
[\[239a.5\]]gis phog_/nad kyis sems 'khrugs gyur la gtad/_/de ni tsher ma rnon po ni/_/mang pos khyab par gyur pa mchog_/lo gnyis pa'am lo gsum pa/_/khyad par du ni dgun gyi mthar/_/de ni mtshon gyis rnam bcad la/_/de las 'o ma blang bar bya/_/bil ba la sogs
[\[239a.6\]]rtsa ba lnga/_/bri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang /_/bskol ba'i khu ba dang mnyam pa'i/_/su ti'i 'o ma dang bsres la/_/de 'og me yi mdag mar bskam/_/ri lur byas pa zho ga chu'am/_/chang ngam ba gcin la sogs blud/_/dur byid sogs dgu 'bras bu gsum/_/khron bu
[\[239a.7\]]sab tal dang bcas/_/su ta'i 'o mas zhag bdun sbangs/_/sha khu'am mar dang sbyar te blud/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/dur byid dan da tsi tra ka_/de bzhin bu ram chus sbyar blud/_/shang gi ni yi 'bras bu ni/_/phub ma med cing ma skams btu/_/de
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]bzhin sap+ta la'i rtsa ba/_/de dag rnon po 'khru byed yin/_/bad kan dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug_/skran sogs nad la gtang bar bya/_/de gnyis ri lu zho gnyis tsam/_/chang dang rgyam tshwa sbyar ba ni/_/bad rlung las gyur snying nad dang /_/de bzhin skran gyi nad la gtang /_/dan da
[\[239b.2\]]dra ban ti'i rtsa ba/_/glang po'i so ltar brtan zhing sbom/_/dmar zhing gnag la rno zhing dro/_/myur du 'khru bar byed pa yin/_/lci zhing rlung nad 'khru byed cing /_/mkhris pa bad kan 'ju bar byed/_/de ni sbrang rtsi pi pi ling /_/lde gus bskus la 'jag ma dang /_/'jim
[\[239b.3\]]pas bskus te mer bsreg cing /_/nyi ma cung zad dro bskams pas/_/de yi rno ba bsal bar bya/_/de ni chang dngas zho ga chu/_/dar ba mnan chang pi lu yi/_/khu ba gang yang rung sbyar blud/_/nyam chung skran dang gcin snyi dang /_/dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug rnams sbyong /_/
[\[239b.4\]]ba lang ri dwags ra sha yi/_/khu bar sbyar bas skya rbab dang /_/lto srin mtshan par rdol nad sel/_/de bskol khu ba lde gu dag_/rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bskol/_/mar gyis me dpal khong 'bras dang /_/'brum phran mchan khung tsha ba sel/_/til mar bcas pas skran za khu/_/
[\[239b.5\]]gzhang 'brum rtug 'gags bad rlung sel/_/snum chen sbyar bas khu chu bshang /_/'phyen 'gags rlung gi nad rnams sbyong /_/dur byid la sogs dgu po ni/_/bkru sman gyi ni rab mchog yin/_/a ru ra yang dur byid kyi/_/cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya/_/de nas dus
[\[239b.6\]]su de'i phye ma/_/rgyam tsha dong gra cung zad gdab/_/rlung nad la ni skyur bas blud/_/bu ram srang brgyad a ru ra/_/nyi shu dan da tsi tra ka_/srang re pi pi ling dur byid/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis lhan cig sbyar/_/ri lu bcu byas zhag bcu bar/_/ri lu re re zos rjes la/_/chu
[\[239b.7\]]dron blud cing cho ga 'dis/_/de dag thams cad zos gyur na/_/kun zos bsrung ba mi dgos par/_/'dis ni thams cad sel bar byed/_/mchog tu skya rbab pho ba'i nad/_/pags nad zlum po gzhang 'brum dang /_/g.yan pa'i nad rnams sel ba yin/_/chung ngu'am
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]don ni chen po dang /_/chen po las ni nyung zad dag_/'dre dang dbye ba byas pa dang /_/dus dang sbyor ba ldan par byed/_/shing tsha nA ga ge sar dang /_/a mra ta ka se 'bru dang /_/sug smel kha ra sbrang rtsi dang /_/kha lung chang sogs de dang de/_/yi
[\[240a.2\]]rang rjes su 'thun pa yi/_/rigs pas bkru sman gtang bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi nyes pa grub par bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/skyug
[\[240a.3\]]sman lto ni snyi ba'am/_/ltogs pa'am bad kan shas chung ba'am/_/shin tu rno ba'am grang ba'ang chung /_/ma zhu ba'ang nyam chung la/_/blud na nad 'byung re ba nyams/_/de tshe thur byung nad slong 'gyur/_/de la slar yang snum chos bya/_/sngar gyi skyon bral skyug sman
[\[240a.4\]]gtang /_/bkru sman ma zhu bad kan dang /_/ldan pa'am shin tu rno ches pa/_/dro ba'am lan tshwa shas ches pa/_/yi gar mi 'ong mangs pa yis/_/gyen du brgal bar gyur pa dag_/sngar bshad nyes pa de la ni/_/grub pa'i sbyor ba de bzhin bya/_/de yang snod du
[\[240a.5\]]ma chags na/_/gsum po de la blud mi bya/_/gzhan du goms pa'ang zhib pa yi/_/sman ni gnod pa med pa gtang /_/snum chos dugs ni ma byas la/_/sman ni rnying zhing rtsub pa yis/_/nad bslangs phyin par ma nus pas/_/mgo 'khor skrangs dang skyigs bu
[\[240a.6\]]dang /_/mun par mthong dang skom dad che/_/byin snying na zhing lus g.ya' dang /_/bla dang kha dog mi sdug pa'i/_/nad ni skyed par byed pa yin/_/snum chos dugs byas sman nyung zhing /_/me drod che bas zhu gyur pa'am/_/grang bas rengs ba'am ma zhu bas/_/nad
[\[240a.7\]]bslangs nas ni ma phyin pas/_/nad ni de dag nyid bskyad cing /_/de nyid sbyor nyes thams cad yin/_/de la til mar rgyam tshas bsku/_/gshag ma rdo yi dugs bya zhing /_/mas gtong drag byas skam sa'i sha_/kha zas byin la 'jam rtsi ni/_/po son cha dang pi
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pi ling /_/thang shing til mar bskol ba gtang /_/rlung 'joms rlung gi snum chos bya/_/slar yang bkru sman rnon pos sbyang /_/nad gzhi che zhing khong rtsub la/_/me drod chung dang sman chung ba/_/rtug skam bcas pas bslangs pa dang /_/nad kyis lam ni 'gags
[\[240b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/mi bzad sbo dang lte ba dang /_/rgyab dang rtsib logs mgo bo na/_/phyi sa gcin 'gags dbugs mi bde/_/mi bzad pa ni skyed par byed/_/bsku dang dugs dang ring bu sogs/_/mas gtong drag po 'jam rtsi bya/_/rtug skam sel ba'i gso dpyad
[\[240b.3\]]las/_/thams cad sbo ba dag la phan/_/rtsa ba lnga pa nas tshig 'khus/_/shu dag pu ti ka rany+dza/_/rgyam tsha nas thug legs sbyar bas/_/gzer nad rtug skam lto sbos 'joms/_/thal sman se 'bru pi pi ling /_/shing kun bca' sga star bu dang /_/rgyam
[\[240b.4\]]tshar bcas pa'i chang ngam ni/_/mar ram chu dron sbyar ba blud/_/mkhregs shing yongs su 'dzag pa dang /_/na zhing bcad snyam sems pa sel/_/sman 'thungs gyur pa'i shugs bkag na/_/rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni/_/'khrugs te snying gi phyogs song na/_/
[\[240b.5\]]snying nad mi bzad skyed par byed/_/skyigs bu lud pa rtsib logs na/_/rmya zhing mig 'gul kha chu 'dzag_/dran pa nyams shing lce 'cha' la/_/so ni krig krig 'cha' bar byed/_/de la sman pa ma rmongs pas/_/mkhris pas nyen la mngar ba dang /_/bad kan gyis
[\[240b.6\]]nyen kha ba yi/_/skyug sman dag ni myur du gtang /_/de nas de la smin byed pa'i/_/nad kyi lhag ma smin par bya/_/de yi me drod lus kyi stobs/_/rim gyis mngon par 'phel bar byed/_/shas cher slon gyur rlung gis ni/_/gang gi snying ni gzer gyur pa/_/de la snum
[\[240b.7\]]gyur lan tshwa sbyin/_/mkhris pa bad kan de las gzhan/_/sman ni 'thungs par gyur nas shugs/_/bkag par gyur pa'am bad kan gyis/_/'gags pa'am shin tu sbyangs gyur pa'i/_/lus la rlung ni 'jug 'gyur bas/_/rengs dang 'dar dang zug pa dang /_/
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]lus snyom dkris snyam sems shing zug_/de la rlung ni 'joms pa yi/_/snum chos dugs stsogs thams cad bsngags/_/sman thun che la rno ba ni/_/bkres nyen lto snyi la blud na/_/bad kan mkhris pa bshang ba ni/_/bsal nas lus zungs
[\[241a.2\]]'dzag par byed/_/de la sbyor drags mngar ba yi/_/sman gyis lhag ma slon du gzhug_/skyug sman drags la bkru sman gtang /_/'khrus drags skyug sman 'jam po gtang /_/de la chu grang blud pa dang /_/ro smad bcings pas gcad par bya/_/stang zil tsan+dan pu
[\[241a.3\]]shel tse/_/ra khrag kha ra'i chu dang ni/_/'bras yos phye ma'i skyo ma ni/_/sbyor drags sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/slon sman sbyor ba drags pa la/_/chu grang dag ni blugs par bya/_/rgun 'bru la sogs khu ba mar/_/sbrang rtsi kha ra'i skyo ma blud/_/sgregs pa bcas par shin
[\[241a.4\]]tu skyug_/mur ba 'u su gla sgang dang /_/stang zil ma du ka'i phye ma/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu sbyin/_/slon mthar lce ni 'khums pa la/_/snum dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang /_/ldan pas mkhur ba bkang ba dang /_/yid 'ong yu sha sha khu phan/_/de yi mdun du mi gzhan
[\[241a.5\]]ni/_/'bras bu skyur ba za ru gzhug_/lce phyir byung la til dang ni/_/rgun 'bru'i lde gu bskus nas gzhug_/tshig bkug rlung gi nad la ni/_/mar dang sha dang g.yos pa yi/_/nas thug sla ba sbyin bya zhing /_/snum dang dugs kyi sbyor ba bya/_/sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa
[\[241a.6\]]yis/_/srog ces bya ba'i khrag phyung na/_/gang phyir de ni srog 'phrog pas/_/srog len par ni yin par bshad/_/khrag de dang ni zas bcas pa/_/khyi'am bya rog la byin la/_/zos na srog ces brjod par bya/_/ma zos mkhris pa yin par bshad/_/yang na
[\[241a.7\]]ras dkar la bsgos te/_/bskams la chu dron gyis bkrus la/_/bkrus kyang dag par ma gyur na/_/mkhris pa'o dag na khrag yin no/_/skom dang brgyal dang myos pas nyen/_/de la srog ni myur bsrung phyir/_/khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba yin/_/gso ba 'tsho
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ba'i bar du bya/_/ri dgas ba glang ma he ra/_/gson pa'i khrag ni phyung ma thag_/srog ni 'byor par byed pa blud/_/des ni myur du srog tu 'gyur/_/de nyid 'jag ma dang mnyes pa'i/_/khrag ni 'jam rtsir gtang bar bya/_/dur byid tang pal shing mngar dang /_/dUr ba pu
[\[241b.2\]]shel tse 'o ma/_/bskol ba mar gyi snying po dang /_/stang zil dang ni bcas pa yi/_/'jam rtsi grang mo gtang bar bya/_/spyi bag 'jam rtsi rab grang ba'am/_/mar gyi snying po 'jam rtsi gtang /_/gzhang phyir byung la sman khu yis/_/'khru ba gcad la gzhug par bya/_/
[\[241b.3\]]dran pa stor la rig byed tshig_/gling bu glu dbyangs nyan du gzhug_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'o//_//de nas sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/ba la sle tres ra sna 'bras bu gsum/_/
[\[241b.4\]]rtsa ba lnga pa rnam gnyis srang re'i tshad/_/po son cha brgyad ra sha srang lnga bcu/_/chu nang bskol te bzhi cha lus gyur pa/_/btsags pa la la phud dang po son cha/_/bil ba ru rta sha ta puSh+pa dang /_/shu dag gla sgang pi pi ling rnams kyi/_/lde gu bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/til
[\[241b.5\]]mar rgyam tsha dag dang ldan gyur pa/_/dro 'jam cho ga bzhin du btang gyur pa/_/mas gtong mchog ste nad kun 'joms pa yin/_/nad med la phan tshe ring nyams brtas byed/_/'jam rtsi gong du lde gu ma smos pa/_/der ni kun la 'di nyid gzhug par bya/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu
[\[241b.6\]]ba skyur dang ni/_/ra sha bcas pa snga ma btags pa dang /_/snum chen gsum ldan mas gtong mchog yin te/_/rlung gi nad kun rab tu 'joms par bshad/_/pa la pa tol rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/_/kyi lce ba dang e raN+Da dang nas/_/bskol ba'i khu ba bre gang ra sha'i khu/_/
[\[241b.7\]]de'i phyed bcug la bskol te bre gang lus/_/pri yang ku dang gla sgang pi pi ling /_/lde gur byas shing til mar zhun mar dang /_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan gyur pa'i/_/'jam rtsi btang na me drod 'phel ba dang /_/nyams stobs skyed cing sha ni rgyas pa dang /_/mig gi gsal
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]stobs 'phral du skyed par byed/_/e raN+Da'i rtsa srang gsum pa la sha_/srang gsum rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang /_/ra sna ba la sle tres ba spru ba/_/a shwa gan+d+ha dong ga thang shing rnams/_/po son cha brgyad chu bre brgyad du bskol/_/brgyad cha lus par gyur
[\[242a.2\]]pa de nang du/_/shu dag shu ti ba sha'i 'bras bu dang /_/pri yang ku dang shing mngar pi pi ling /_/dug mo nyung gi sa bon gla sgang dang /_/skyer pa'i khaN+Dar bcas pa zhib btags pa/_/zho gnyis tshad kyi rgyam tshar bcas pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi til mar ba gcin dang sbyar ba'i/_/
[\[242a.3\]]mas gtong skyug byed me drod skyed pa dang /_/rkang pa byin pa brla dang mjug to dang /_/lto ba snying dang pho mtshan na ba dang /_/lus lci rlung dang bshang gci 'gags dang skran/_/rde'u chags rgyu rlugs gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/_/bad kan rlung nad de dang de dag 'joms/_/shing
[\[242a.4\]]mngar seng phrom tsan+dan a ru ra/_/tsan+dan ut+pal ba yi 'o mar bskol/_/'tsho byed kha ra mar dang bcas pa yi/_/'jam rtsis mkhris pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed/_/ra sna ba sha ka btsos byi tsher ba/_/ba la rtsa ba chung lnga rtswa yi lnga/_/thal tres tsan+dan shug pa rnam gnyis
[\[242a.5\]]dang /_/shing mngar seng phrom srang ni phyed phyed dang /_/chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba de nyid ni/_/'o ma bre bzhi bskol te chu du'i bar/_/ji ban ti dang me da rnam gnyis dang /_/nye shing ram nye ba gnyis bi da ri/_/ka she ru dang kha ra dkar po dang /_/dzi ba ka dang pad+ma ge sar
[\[242a.6\]]dang /_/stag tsher ut+pa la dang pad+ma dkar/_/seng phrom kha sral phre'u shing mngar dang /_/nA ga ge sar muny+dza ta ka dang /_/tsan+dan rnam gnyis btags pa mar dang ni/_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan byas pa/_/bsgrangs pa'i ni ru ha ni gtang bar bya/_/slar phyung skam sa'i
[\[242a.7\]]sha khu'am 'o ma dang /_/'bras chan byin la lus la chu blugs bya/_/lus tsha tshad 'khru mngal nad khrag mkhris dang /_/snying nad skya rbab mi bzad rims dang ni/_/skran bcas gcin 'gags mig ser la sogs pa/_/mkhris pa las gyur nad ni thams cad 'joms/_/
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]ko sha ta ka dong ga thang shing dang /_/mur ba gze ma arga dug mo nyung /_/pa ta rgya sran bri ha ti chur bskol/_/khu ba srang ni nyi shu lus pa dang /_/der ni nyungs kar sug smel po son cha/_/ru rta zhon gnyis gnyis tshad dang ni/_/sbrang rtsi po son cha yi mar dang ni/_/thal sman
[\[242b.2\]]nyungs mar srang ni gnyis gnyis bcas/_/mas gtong me drod chung dang yi ga 'chus/_/bad kan las gyur nad ni kun la phan/_/de nas ni ru ha de ni/_/snum 'jam skyid de ba dang ni/_/las kyis lus snyom gyur pa'i sman/_/srang ni gnyis gnyis so sor bshad/_/'o ma
[\[242b.3\]]las ni srang bzhir bya/_/sbrang rtsi til mar mar khyor re/_/gzar bus dkrugs pa mas gtong bas/_/rlung nad 'jam stobs kha dog skyed/_/til mar chang dang sbrang rtsi mar/_/khyor ni re re'i tshad du byas/_/bil ba la sogs rtsa ba ni/_/khyor gnyis rgya sran khu ba ni/_/
