[\[242b.4\]]khyor do bcas pas rlung nad sel/_/pa to la dang nim pa dang /_/lo ma bdun pa pu ti ka_/ra sna'i khu ba srang gnyis gnyis/_/mar srang gnyis dang nyungs kar kyi/_/lde gur bcas pa kha ba lnga/_/bad kan mang dang srin nad dang /_/mdze dang za khu'i nad rnams
[\[242b.5\]]'joms/_/til mar ba gcin zho ga chu/_/skyur rtsabs khyor ni re re dag_/yungs kar btags pa'i lde gur sbyar/_/rtug 'gags lto sbos sel byed yin/_/pa yas s+ye dang bu ram shing /_/sA la par+Ni bi da ri/_/ra sna khyor re pi pi ling /_/lde gu sbrang rtsi mar sbyar
[\[242b.6\]]ba'i/_/mas gtong khu ba 'phel bar byed/_/de nas grub pa'i 'jam rtsi ni/_/nyes pa med cing 'bras bu che/_/stobs skyed lus 'phel bde bar byed/_/kun du sbyar bya bshad par bya/_/sbrang rtsi til mar cha mnyam pa/_/rgyam tsha zho gnyis shu ti bzhi/_/e raN+Da yi
[\[242b.7\]]rtsa ba bskol/_/mas gtong sbrang rtsi til mar can/_/bcud kyis len te gcin snyi dang /_/gzhang 'brum srin bu skran nad dang /_/rgyu ma rlugs pa'i nad rnams sel/_/'di ni shing mngar phye mar bcas/_/mig la phan zhing khrag mkhris sel/_/gla sgang lde gu sbrang rtsi dang /_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]til mar sha khu mar bcas pa/_/'tsho bar byed pa zhes bya ste/_/gzhang gi nad dang brla nad dang /_/chu so dang ni rmig pa dang /_/pho mtshan zug pa'i nad rnams sel/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang zhag dang ni/_/til mar khyor ni re re'i tshad/_/rgyam tsha zho gcig
[\[243a.2\]]spa ma yi/_/'bras bu srang phyed bcas pa dag_/de yang 'tsho ba yin par bshad/_/e raN+Da'i rtsa bskol ba yi/_/khu ba shu dag pi pi ling /_/po son cha yi phye mar bcas/_/sbrang rtsi til mar rgyam tshar bcas/_/'di ni shing rta can zhes bya/_/de bskol shu dag shu ti
[\[243a.3\]]dang /_/shing kun rgyam tsha thang shing dang /_/ra sna sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/_/'jam rtsi nad sel zhes bya dge_/rtsa ba lnga yi khu ba dang /_/pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang /_/shing mngar sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/_/til mar grub pa'i 'jam rtsir bshad/_/rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum/_/
[\[243a.4\]]po son cha ni bil bar bskol/_/ba gcin dang ni de btags shing /_/pa ta gla sgang dug mo nyung /_/lan tshwa po son cha til mar/_/thal sman lan tshwar bcas pa ni/_/rigs pa'i 'jam rtsi bad kan nad/_/skya rbab gsud pa'i nad rnams dang /_/khu ba rlung ni 'gags pa dang /_/
[\[243a.5\]]rlung 'khrugs pa la bsngags pa yin/_/gla sgang pa ta e raN+Da/_/sle tres ba la ba spru ba/_/ra sna btsod dang dong ga dang /_/pu shel tse dang kyi lce ba/_/ba ru ra dang pu tse shel/_/rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu rnams/_/srang re po son cha rdog brgyad/_/de ni chu bre bzhi nang bskol/_/
[\[243a.6\]]bzhi cha lus pa btsags nas ni/_/'o ma bre do dang bsres la/_/'o ma lus pa slar yang bskol/_/skam sa'i sha khu bzhi cha dang /_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha shing mngar dang /_/shu ti dur byid pi pi ling /_/dug mo nyung dang skyer khaN+Da/_/btags pa dang ni bsres pa yi/_/'jam rtsi
[\[243a.7\]]dro 'jam btang na ni/_/sha dang me drod lus kyi stobs/_/khu ba 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/dreg nad rmongs bag gcin snyi dang /_/gzhang 'brum skran dang bshang gci 'gags/_/mi bzad rims dang me dbal dang /_/rgyu rlugs lto sbos 'khrug cing 'khru/_/chu so rked
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pa brla dku na/_/gnye'u rengs rna ba mgo bo'i nad/_/zla mtshan nad dang smyo byed dang /_/'or nad lud pa rde'u chags dang /_/gcin 'khyil ba yi nad rnams 'joms/_/dbang po nyams shing zhum pa dang /_/mig la phan zhing bu skyed byed/_/'tsho byed rgyal po bcud len yin/_/
[\[243b.2\]]ri dwags phra mo mgo chung ba/_/rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i chu/_/spa ma'i 'bras bu shu ti dang /_/gla sgang lde gu snum chen bcas/_/mas gtong rlung ni sel ba'i mchog_/shin tu ro tsar byed pa yin/_/rma bya'i gshog pa mkhris pa dang /_/rgyu ma rkang pa mchu rtug pa/_/
[\[243b.3\]]por ba'i sha ni 'ba' zhig dang /_/rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu ni/_/srang re dang ni ldan gyur pa/_/chu dang 'o mar bskol nas ni/_/'o ma lus par sbrang rtsi mar/_/bcas dang de bzhin bi da ri/_/shing mngar shu ti pi pi ling /_/po son cha yi lde gur bsres/_/rgyam tsha cung zad
[\[243b.4\]]btab pa yi/_/'jam rtsi stobs 'phel ro tsa'i mchog_/gong ma sreg la sogs pa yang /_/cho ga 'di ni so sor bya/_/khron gyis gzas tshol thams cad dang /_/mthu rtsal mchu yis zas tshol ba/_/chu la gnas pa'ang de bzhin te/_/nya la 'o ma spang bar bya/_/sram dang ne+e'u
[\[243b.5\]]le byi la dang /_/reg 'jam byi ba rnams kyi sha_/re re srang bcu rtsa ba lnga/_/'o ma'i nang du bskol nas ni/_/'o ma der ni po son cha/_/pi pi ling dang lan tshwa gnyis/_/kha ra til mar sbrang rtsi mar/_/'jam rtsi btang na bcud len mchog_/rtsol bas dkrugs glo
[\[243b.6\]]'grams pa dang /_/dbang po nyams dang gzi mdangs stobs/_/khu chu bshang gci 'gags pa dang /_/dreg nad kyis 'theng nad rnams dang /_/rta dang glang po shing rtas g.yeng /_/rkang lag chag grugs gyur pa la/_/slar ni bde bar 'tsho byed cing /_/ro tsa byed pa'i mchog
[\[243b.7\]]yin no/_/kha sral bu ram shing phran las/_/g.yos su byas pa'i 'o thug blud/_/snum zhing bsdams pa mi dgos pa'i/_/grub pa'i sman ni sbyar bar bya/_/nad 'joms srung dang bcas pa yi/_/snum gyi 'jam rtsi bshad bya ste/_/rtsa ba bcu pa ba la dang /_/ra sna a shwa
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]gan+d+ha dang /_/ba spru ba dang e raN dang /_/sle tres ga bra'i rtsa ba dang /_/ba sha ka dang bu ti ka_/sa ha ra dza nye shing ba/_/ka ka na se srang re dang /_/nas dang ma sha zar ma dang /_/rgya shug rgya sran khyor re'i tshad/_/chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhir bskol/_/de las
[\[244a.2\]]bre ni bcu drug lus/_/'tsho byed sde ni srang re bcug_/til mar bre ni bzhi dang bskol/_/'di ni 'jam rtsir btang gyur na/_/rlung nad thams cad sel bar byed/_/de bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha_/'tsho byed sde dang bcas par bskol/_/shu ti nas dang bil ba skyur/_/
[\[244a.3\]]til mar bskol bas rlung nad sel/_/rgyam tsha mdog dmar gyur gyi bar/_/mer bsregs mar gsur rlung nad 'joms/_/dzi ban ti dang po son cha/_/me da rnam gnyis sra ba ni/_/shing mngar ba la shu ti dang /_/zangs rtsi ba dang pi pi ling /_/ka ka ni sa nye shing ba/_/
[\[244a.4\]]kha sral k+Shi ra ka ka ri/_/zur pa karka ta sring gi_/shu dag btags pa'i lde gu dang /_/til mar mar dang 'o ma ni/_/bzhi 'gyur gyi ni nang du bskol/_/'jam rtsi nyams brtas rlung nad 'joms/_/stobs dang khu ba me drod 'phel/_/khrag dang khu ba'i nad sel byed/_/bu skyed
[\[244a.5\]]par yang byed pa yin/_/rgyam tsha ru rta po son cha/_/shu ti lcang ma shu dag dang /_/ba le ka dang shing mngar dang /_/ga bra'i rtsa ba kad pha la/_/thang shing dong gra ma nu dang /_/me da dpyi mo tsi tra ka_/zur pa bong dbyi dang ga_/sha ma dur byid ha re Nu/_/sti ra bil ba ni li ni/_/
[\[244a.6\]]ti mu sa dang pi pi ling /_/dan da ra sna cha mnyam pa/_/e raN+Da yi mar ram ni/_/til mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi yis/_/bad kan nad 'joms rgyu rlugs dang /_/rtug skam skran dang gzhang 'brum dang /_/mcher pa'i nad dang gcin snyi dang /_/rlung 'khyil ba dang lto sbos dang /_/
[\[244a.7\]]rde chags nad ni myur du sel/_/yang na bil ba la sogs pa'i/_/rtsa ba lnga pa til mar bskol/_/yang na bad kan sel sman sbyar/_/til mar dang btang bad kan 'joms/_/yang na po son cha brgyad 'gyur/_/skyur bskol 'jam rtsis bad kan sel/_/'jam rtsi 'jam pas
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]rmongs gyur la/_/rnon po nye bar sbyang bar bya/_/rno bas gnod la snum pa dang /_/mngar zhing bsil ba 'jam pa gtang /_/rnon po ba gcin pi lu dang /_/tsi tra ka dang lan tshwa dang /_/thal sman dang ni nyungs kar rnams/_/dus la bab par gtang bar bya/_/'o ma mar
[\[244b.2\]]stsogs 'jam po yis/_/nyams stobs dus dang nad gzhi rang bzhin dag_/rnam par phye ste 'jam rtsi gtang bya ba/_/rang rang gi ni sman gyi sde tshan gyis/_/rang rang gi ni nang rnams bsal bar bya/_/tsha bas nyam thag la bsil ba/_/bsil bas nyen la dro 'jam sbyar/_/
[\[244b.3\]]de dang 'tsham pa'i sman ldan par/_/'jam rtsi brtags te gtang bar bya/_/sbyang bar bya ba'i nad rnams la/_/rtas byed 'jam rtsi mi gtang zhing /_/mi gang mdze gcin nad kyis nyen/_/tshil rgyas nad la gtang mi bya/_/nyam chung glo 'grams pa dang brgyal ba dang /_/lus skem
[\[244b.4\]]rid dang sbyangs pa'i lus can dang /_/gang yang dri mas tshe 'di gzung 'gyur la/_/sbyong bar byed pa'i mas gtong gtang mi bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas sman mas gtong ba'i cho gas nad
[\[244b.5\]]phyin te sos par bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/snum chos dugs ni ma byas dang /_/lto lci ba la sman grang snum/_/tsha nyung sman tshad chung ba'am/_/sman ni ska ba btang gyur na/_/de yis nad ni bslangs gyur dang /_/stobs chung ba yi nad ma phyin/_/sbyor ba nyes pa skyed
[\[244b.6\]]'gyur zhing /_/'phyen dang phyi sa gcin sri dang /_/lte ba chu so na zhing tsha/_/dang gar chags shing gzhang skrangs dang /_/g.yan pa'i thor bu mdog mi sdug_/mi dga' me drod chung bar 'gyur/_/tshad 'khru'i nyes pa bar ma la/_/sngar bshad sman gyi khu ba gnyis/_/de
[\[244b.7\]]las gcig ni dro ba yi/_/btung ba blugs pa bsngags pa yin/_/po son cha yi reng bu'i dugs/_/dus shes pa yis bkru sman gtang /_/bil ba'i rtsa ba dur byid dang /_/thang shing nas dang rgya shug dang /_/rgya sran chang dang ba gcin bcas/_/mas gtong 'gags pa
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]sel bar byed/_/nad gzhi shas che lus rtsub dang /_/lto sra nus pa chung btang na/_/mas gtong nad gzhi bslangs nas ni/_/rlung gi lam ni 'gag par byed/_/rlung ni lam log zhugs pa des/_/lto sbos nad rnams gzir bar byed/_/gzhang
[\[245a.2\]]dang lto ba tsha ba dang /_/rlig pa chu so na byed cing /_/snying gar 'gags pas gzer ba dang /_/phan tshun du ni 'gro bar byed/_/de la lus bsku dugs byas pa'i/_/lus la reng bu gzhug par bya/_/bil ba stsogs sam bi lu dang /_/nyungs kar ba gcin bcas mas ga
[\[245a.3\]]tong /_/tsi tra thang shing til mar ni/_/bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya/_/shugs ni bkag par gyur pa'am/_/btsir drags par ni byas pa'am/_/lan tshwa snum shas chung la tsha/_/sman chung ba yis mas gtong ba/_/'jam pas rlung gis gyen du 'phul/_/
[\[245a.4\]]kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de yis brgyal dang snying nad dang /_/skom dang tsha ba la sogs 'byung /_/brgyal ba'i nad ni mthong gyur na/_/de yi gdod la chu grang gtor/_/ngal bsos bar du g.yab pa dang /_/dbugs rngub 'byung ba byed du gzhug_/kha sbubs
[\[245a.5\]]bzhag ste rgyab rtsib logs/_/lto ba lag pa dron pos mnye/_/skra nas bteg ste sprugs pa dang /_/sbrul dang mche ba can 'jigs bstan/_/mtshon dang thog bab rgyal po'i mis/_/skrag bcas mas gtong thur du 'byung /_/lag pa gos kyis mgul par bsdam/_/
[\[245a.6\]]ci nas 'chi bar mi 'gyur bya/_/srog dang gyen rgyu rlung bkag pas/_/thur sel shin tu bder rgyu ba/_/grub pa yis ni mas gtong ba/_/myur du 'dren par byed pa yin/_/ru rta gla gor zho sha yi/_/lde gu skyur rtsabs sbyar te blud/_/dro dang rno dang 'khru ba yis/_/mas
[\[245a.7\]]gtong lugs bzhin 'byung bar byed/_/dur byid a ru ra ba gcin/_/sbyar blud lugs bzhin 'byung bar byed/_/zhu ba'i gnas 'dug dugs byas la/_/rtsa ba bcu pa rgya shug nas/_/rgya sran pa gcin bskol ba yi/_/mas gtong drag po sbyar bar bya/_/sle tres
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]smyug ma'i lo ma dang /_/pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa/_/'o ma zur pa thang shing dang /_/puti ka ni ba gcin bskol/_/til mar bu ram rgyam tshar bcas/_/bkru sman lde gur bcas pa gtang /_/mas gtong brang na gnas pa la/_/bil ba la sogs lnga bskol gtang /_/mgor
[\[245b.2\]]gnas snar blugs dud pa rngub/_/nyungs kar lde gus mgo bo bsku/_/mas gtong drod ches rno skyur drags/_/ska ches dugs ni drags pa dang /_/nad gzhi chung zhing lto snyi la/_/yang dang yang du gtong ba yi/_/sbyor ba drags pa nyes 'gyur bas/_/lto ba'i nad ni skyed
[\[245b.3\]]par byed/_/de la bkru sman drag sbyar bas/_/gso dang mtshungs pa nyid du bya/_/mas gtong thal sman skyur rno dro/_/lan tshwa can nam mkhris can la/_/gzhang tsha 'brud cing gnod pa dang /_/yongs su 'dzag par byed par 'gyur/_/khrag ni btsos pa lta bur 'byung /_/mkhris
[\[245b.4\]]pa'ang mdog mang 'byung bar byed/_/lan mang shugs drag 'byung ba dang /_/yang dang yang du brgyal bar 'gyur/_/de la khrag mkhris 'khru ba sel/_/gso ba rab tu bsngags pa yin/_/tsha ba sogs la dur byid kyi/_/lde gu rgun chur sbyar ba blud/_/de yis bshang rlung
[\[245b.5\]]mkhris pa ni/_/bsal nas tsha ba la sogs 'joms/_/dag gyur nas thug grang mo ni/_/khar dang ni bcas pa blud/_/'khru ba drags par gyur pa yi/_/bshang ba zad la kha zas ni/_/ma sha'i khu ba zan dron sbyin/_/zho dang chang ni blud par bya/_/de ltar grub pa'i
[\[245b.6\]]mas gtong nyes/_/bshad nas snum gyi mas gtong bshad/_/rlung can grang zhing chung ba dang /_/mkhris pa rab tsha bad kan 'jam/_/'grangs ches pa la lci ba dang /_/bshang ba stsogs la stobs chung gtang /_/de ni snum rlung 'dres gyur zhing /_/zil gyis mnan pas 'byung mi
[\[245b.7\]]'gyur/_/rengs dang brla na sbos pa dang /_/rims dang gzer dang yan lag na/_/rtsib logs na dang 'dar ba ni/_/snum rlung 'dres la 'byung zhes bya/_/de snum lan tshwa dro dang skyur/_/ra sna bi da dro yi mar/_/rang skyur chang dang rgya shug dang /_/rgya sran nas dang bskol
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ba'am/_/rtsa ba lnga pa ba gcin bcas/_/mas gtong drag pos legs bsal bya/_/de dag nyid kyi til mar dang /_/dgongs kar zan zos 'jam rtsi gtang /_/skom dang lus tsha rmongs bag dmar/_/mdog nyams rims 'debs mun par mthong /_/
[\[246a.2\]]mkhris pa dang 'dres yin zhes bya/_/kha mngar mas gtong byas te sbyangs/_/lus snyom sgyid zhan rims drag 'debs/_/cham pa lus lci yi ga 'chus/_/brgyal bcas na bas bad kan dang /_/'jam rtsi snum ni 'dres shes bya/_/de la bska dang kha dang tsha/_/chang dang
[\[246a.3\]]ba gcin la bskol ba/_/po son cha dang til mar dang /_/skyur bcas mas gtong ba yis bsal/_/slon dang brgyal dang yi ga 'chus/_/snyom gzer gnyid che yan lag na/_/ma zhu'i mtshan mar lus tshar bcas/_/de ni 'grangs ches 'dres shes bya/_/de la tsha dang lan
[\[246a.4\]]tshwa'i phye/_/bskol ba'i smin byed sman dang ni/_/bkru sman 'jam po gtang ba dang /_/ma zhu la phan thams cad phan/_/gcin rtug 'phyen ni 'gags pas nyen/_/lus lci lto sbos snying ga na/_/snum dang bshang 'dres yin zhes bya/_/de la snum dugs ring bur
[\[246a.5\]]bcas/_/dur byid bil ba sogs bskol la/_/mas gtong drag dang 'jam rtsi gtang /_/rtug pa 'gags pa sel bas kyang /_/cho ga bzhin du legs par bsal/_/rtog pa'am gzhang ni skrang pa'am/_/thug pa legs par 'thungs pa yis/_/rkub tu snum
[\[246a.6\]]ni btang gyur pa/_/sdod pa med par shugs kyis rgyu/_/de nas ro stod mgrin pa dang /_/stod kyi bu ga dag tu'ang 'byung /_/de la dur byid rgya shug nas/_/rgya sran ba gcin bskol ba dang /_/de dang bskol ba'i til mar ni/_/mas gtong 'jam rtsir bcas pa gtang /_/lkog
[\[246a.7\]]mar byang ba dgag par bya/_/lkog ma bsdams shing skyug sman dang /_/slon bro sel ba'i gso bas kyang /_/bzlog pa dag ni de la bya/_/snum tshos ma gyur mi gtang ste/_/des ni gzhang khar chags 'gyur zhing /_/de las nad bcas rmongs bag dang /_/g.ya' dang skrang
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]pa skyed par byed/_/de la mas gtong rnon po dang /_/arka'i lor bskol til mar gtang /_/dbugs ma phyung bar bcing pa'am/_/ma lus par ni btang ba yis/_/rlung zhugs nas ni 'khrug byed cing /_/gzer dang na ba skyed par byed/_/de la gzhang kha bsku dugs bya/_/
[\[246b.2\]]rlung 'joms pa yi kha zas gtang /_/myur du bcug cing phyung ba'am/_/glo bur du ni bteg pa yis/_/rked pa gzhang dang brla byin pa/_/chu so rengs shing na bar 'gyur/_/de la rlung 'joms kha zas dang /_/dugs bsku 'jam rtsir bcas pa phan/_/btsir ba'i tshe na bar du
[\[246b.3\]]grol/_/rlung gis gzhang la gnod gyur nas/_/brang dang mgo bo gzer zhing na/_/brla yi nad ni skyed par byed/_/de la bil ba la sogs dang /_/po son cha dang dur byid sogs/_/ba gcin dang ni sbyar ba gtang /_/btsir drags pa yis khong par ni/_/mi 'dug lkog ma
[\[246b.4\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_/de la mas gtong bkru sman dang /_/mgul pa bsdam sogs las rnams bya/_/bkru sman sogs pas dag byas nas/_/lus dang nyams stobs me drod chung /_/sgo nga gzhon nu'am til mar ni/_/snod ni gang ba ji bzhin du/_/gnod par gyur pa
[\[246b.5\]]thams cad las/_/sman pas 'bad de bsrung bar bya/_/kha zas mngar dang yid 'ong sbyin/_/de 'og skyur dang lan tshwar bcas/_/de nas mngar dang kha ba sbyin/_/de 'og bska dang tsha ba sbyin/_/ro ni snum dang rtsub pa dang /_/phan tshun gnyen por gyur pa bzhin/_/rim pa nye bar
[\[246b.6\]]sbyar ba yi/_/rim pa de ni rnal du dbab/_/kun bzod nyams stobs brtan pa ni/_/rnal mar gyur pa yin zhes bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas sman gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/sa phyogs
[\[246b.7\]]skam zhing cha mnyam pa'i/_/gzhi mnyam gtsang zhing sa gzhi bzang /_/dur khrod shing chen lha gnas dang /_/g.yang sa grog ma can ma gtogs/_/'jam zhing chu ni g.yas na 'bab/_/'jag ma dUr ba dang ldan pa/_/thong lcags kyis ni ma snad pa/_/ljon shing grib mas ma
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]phog pa/_/kha dog bcud la sogs dang ldan/_/sman skyes pa ni bsngags pa yin/_/'bus ma zos shing mes ma tshig_/'byung ba sogs kyis gnod ma gyur/_/nyi grib chu la sogs ma nyen/_/ji bzhin dus su bsten gyur pa/_/rtsa ba che zhing gting du zug_/
[\[247a.2\]]byang gi phyogs su bsten pa bzang /_/de nas dge ba la spyod cing /_/dad ldan gtsang sbra smyung ba byas/_/sman ni legs par gnas pa btu/_/'o mar bcas pa dus su sbyar/_/bu ram mar dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/pi pi ling dang byi dang ga_/'bru rnams ma gtogs 'o ma med/_/
[\[247a.3\]]lo gcig 'das par ma gyur sbyar/_/'o ma ba ni yar ma yi/_/gcin dang lci ba skon med yin/_/na tshod stobs ldan lus zungs dang /_/rwa 'dzugs rmig pa la sogs bzang /_/lan tshwa ma gtogs ro lnga'o/_/sman khu yi ni skye gnas yin/_/sman khu lde gu bskol dang grangs/_/
[\[247a.4\]]phan dang zhes ni bya ba ste/_/sman ni rnam pa lnga ru brtags/_/snga ma bzhin du mthu stobs che/_/'phral du btus te brdungs nas ni/_/tshags la btsir te btsags pa gang /_/de ni khu ba zhes bshad do/_/lde gu gsher gyis sbrus btags pa'o/_/de bskol ba ni bskol ba yin/_/
[\[247a.5\]]bsgrangs pa mtshan mo gzhag pa yin/_/khaN+Da 'phral du sbyar btsags pa/_/de dag gi ni tshad brtag pa/_/nad stsogs stobs las sbyar bar bya/_/de yang drang srong gis bshad pa/_/tshad kyi nges pa yod min gyi/_/nad dang lto tshad nyams dang ni/_/dus dang yul ni rnam
[\[247a.6\]]brtags te/_/de ltar sman ni gtang bar bya/_/sman gyi khu ba srang bzhi ni/_/'bring tshad tsam du bshad pa yin/_/lde gu zho gnyis dag dang bsres/_/de ni chu srang gsum gyi tshad/_/bskol ba'i sman ni srang gcig bya/_/bre phyed chu bskol bzhi cha lus/_/bsgrangs pa srang
[\[247a.7\]]gcig srang drug ni/_/de las gzhan pas srang bzhi yin/_/sman mar bskol tshad ma smos par/_/lde gu snum dang gsher rdzas ni/_/bzhi 'gyur du ni skyed de sbyar/_/shau na ka yis bshad pa ni/_/snum bskol chu ni 'ba' zhig dang /_/khu ba bskol pa rim bzhin du/_/
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]lde gu'i cha ni bzhi dang drug_/brgyad ni rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/lde gu sor mor ma 'byar dang /_/snum ni mer bcug sgra med dang /_/gang tshe kha dog sogs phun tshogs/_/de tshe der ni myur du dbab/_/mar ni lbu ba dngas ma dang /_/til mar lbu ba byung ba dang /_/lde gu nal
[\[247b.2\]]nal por 'gyur zhing /_/chu nang 'bying zhing gyes mi 'gyur/_/tshos pa'i tshad ni rnam gsum ste/_/'jam tshos 'byar bag 'byar la rtsub/_/'jam tshos tshig ma lde gu 'dra/_/'byar bag sbrang rtsi lta bu yin/_/cung zad tshig cing mdog gnag par/_/snang 'gyur de ni tha
[\[247b.3\]]ma yin/_/de las 'das par don mi byed/_/mtshos me drod nyams par byed/_/'jam tshos snar btang rtsub pas bsku/_/btung dang 'jam rtsi 'byar bag bya/_/sha na kar sha lag mthil dang /_/spar gang phul bre a da ka_/dro na ba ha rim bzhin du/_/bzhi 'gyur yin
[\[247b.4\]]par shes par bya/_/rlon pa nyis 'gyur sbyar bya zhing /_/gsher pa phul gang stsogs de bzhin/_/btags te sbrus nas gsher med pa'i/_/snum bskol ba la chu gzhug bya/_/gang du tshad ni ma bshad pa/_/der ni cha mnyam sbyar bar bya/_/sha na gnyis la ba da ka_/de
[\[247b.5\]]gnyis kar sha go la dang /_/ba ru ra dang drang 'khru med/_/a k+Sha bi tsu su par+Na/_/lag mthil kham tshad byi la'i sder/_/tin du ka dang lag pa'i tshad/_/sgra gzhan don ni gcig pa yin/_/shu ti brgyad pa pi tsu yin/_/srang gcig bil ba pra kun dza/_/sbar gang a mra bzhi
[\[247b.6\]]po yin/_/gcig gi ming gi rnam grangs yin/_/srang gnyis khyor gang de gnyis la/_/snyim gang de gnyis ma ni ka_/a da ka dang snod ka nas/_/dro na kum pa bum chen yin/_/tu la srang ni brgya yin te/_/de nyi shu la khur du bshad/_/gangs can 'bigs byed ri yis ni/_/
[\[247b.7\]]sa gzhi phal cher khyab pa yin/_/de las dang por bsil zhing phan/_/'bigs byed sman ni me'i rang bzhin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u drug pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_cho ga grub pa'i
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]gnas te gnas lnga pa lus gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so//_//de nas byis pa gso ba'i cho ga'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bshad de/_byis pa btsas ma thag phru ma/_/
[\[248a.2\]]bsal te rgyam tsha mar bskus sbyang /_/de 'og btsas pas sdug bsngal la/_/ba la'i til mar blugs par bya/_/de yi rna ba'i drung du ni/_/rdo gnyis brdungs par spyad par bya/_/de nas de yi rna ba ni/_/g.yas par sngags 'di brjod par bya/_/yan lag yan lag las byung
[\[248a.3\]]khyod/_/snying las mngon par bskyed pa yin/_/bdag nyid bu zhes bya ba khyod/_/lo brgyar yang dag 'tsho 'gyur zhing /_/lo brgya thub cing ston brgya 'tsho/_/tshe ring por ni thob gyur cig_/rgyu skar phyogs dang mtshan mo dang /_/nyin mos khyod ni bsrung bar shog_/bde bar gyur na
[\[248a.4\]]lte ba ni/_/sor bzhi'i 'og tu srad bus bcing /_/de yi 'og tu bcad nas ni/_/lte ba la ni brtod de bzhag_/de 'og lte bar ru rta yi/_/til mar gyis ni bsku bar bya/_/'o ma can shing bskol chu'am/_/dri zhim bcud ldan chu dag ni/_/gser ram dngul ni bsregs pa
[\[248a.5\]]yis/_/bsros pa'i dro 'jam chu yis bkru/_/de nas mdzub mo g.yas pa ni/_/dkris pas rkan ni bteg nas kyang /_/mgo bor ras bal snum can g.yogs/_/blo dang tshe dang stobs bskyed phyir/_/shu dag pra ma bi sha li/_/shang kha puSh+pa'i lde gu ni/_/mar dang sbrang
[\[248a.6\]]rtsir bcas pa dag_/sngags btab ha re Nu tsam sbyin/_/gser dang shu dag mu men dang /_/ma nu a ru ra'i phye ma/_/gser dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma/_/sbrang rtsi mar bcas lde gu sbyin/_/de nas mngal chu rgyam tsha ni/_/mar dang bcas pa skyug tu gzhug_/skye dgu'i bdag po cho ga
[\[248a.7\]]yis/_/btsas pa'i cho ga byed du gzhug_/snying la gnas pa'i rtsa rnams ni/_/btsas nas kha ni dbye ba'i phyir/_/nyi ma gsum mam bzhi pa la/_/bud med kyi ni nu zho 'byung /_/de bas nyin zhag dang po la/_/dus gsum du ni sbrang rtsi mar/_/byi tsher ba dang sbyar ba la/_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]sngags kyis btab ste byis par byin/_/gnyis pa dang ni gsum pa la/_/lak+Sh+mi dang bskol mar blud bya/_/de nas dang po'i nu zho ni/_/bkag pa de la mar sar ni/_/zho gnyis tsam gyi tshad sbyin zhing /_/nu zho dus gnyis blud par bya/_/ma nyid kyi ni nu zho blud/_/de yis lus
[\[248b.2\]]ni 'phel byed yin/_/de med ma ma shin tu byams/_/skyon med 'khrig pa spangs pa dang /_/rigs dang rang bzhin de dang mnyam/_/nad med na tshod dar la bab/_/bu ma shi shing brkam chags med/_/gnyis kyi 'o ma blud par bya/_/de gnyis zas dang spyod lam ni/_/phan
[\[248b.3\]]pas 'bad de gso bar bya/_/mya ngan khro dang smyung ba dang /_/lus dub nu zho nyams pa'i rgyu/_/bu ram chang ma gtogs chang dang /_/rlan can sha khu 'o ma dang /_/'o ma can sman mya ngan stsogs/_/go bzlog nu zho'i rgyun yin no/_/mi mthun zas ni zos pa dang /_/ltogs
[\[248b.4\]]dang sems ni nyams pa dang /_/lus zungs gnod bcas sbrum ma yi/_/'o ma byis pa'i nad skyed byed/_/nu zho med na ra'am ba'i/_/'o ma bri ha ti sogs rtsa'am/_/stir gnyis bskol kha rar bcas/_/yon tan de ldan blud par bya/_/drug pa'i mtshan mo khyad par du/_/
[\[248b.5\]]bsrung dang gtor ma'i bya ba bya/_/de yi gnyen gyis mel tshe bya/_/shin tu dga' ba nyid kyang bya/_/zhag bcu rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_/rang rig 'tsham pa'i cho ga ni/_/byed du gzhug cing btsas ma bslang /_/lus la ldong ros ba bla dang /_/gi waM tsan+dan a kar btags/_/
[\[248b.6\]]rgyu skar lha 'am nye du las/_/dras pa'i yi ge mnyam pa yi/_/ming ni byis pa la gdags bya/_/de nas rang bzhin dbye las bshad/_/gzugs kyi tshe ni yongs su brtag_/mkhas pas byis pa'i mal stan ni/_/byang ngam shar du mgo bstan la/_/sngas dang gos ni
[\[248b.7\]]gtsang zhing bkrus/_/'jam zhing gnyer ma med pa yi/_/gos la gdon ni 'joms byed pa'i/_/sman gyi dud pas bdug par bya/_/bya rog bsad pa snum gsum dang /_/bcas pa'i dud pas bdug par bsngags/_/bse ru la sogs gson po yi/_/rwar btags
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]nor bu bzang po spu/_/bram+hi 'tsho byed in+p+ri sogs/_/sman ni bzang po gdags par bya/_/mchog tu rtag par shu ngag ni/_/lag gnyis mgul dang spyi bor gdags/_/des ni tshe dang yid gzhungs dran/_/bde ba skyed byed gdon las bsrung /_/zla
[\[249a.2\]]ba bdun nam brgyad pa na/_/nad med nyin zhag shis pa la/_/ma ma'i pang du spro bsrings la/_/dgun gyi dus su rna ba dbug_/khye'u'i dang po g.yas pa dbug_/bu mo'i g.yon pa dbug par bya/_/sman pas khab ni g.yas pas gzung /_/g.yon pas rna shal bzung nas ni/_/
[\[249a.3\]]rna ba'i khyon gyi dbus las ni/_/mkhur tshos kyi ni phyogs dag tu/_/pags pa dag ni phug nas su/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba ru/_/mi 'gyur brtan por bzung nas ni/_/rgya skyegs kyi ni khu bas bsku/_/dbus su rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i/_/bu ga drang por cig car dbug/_
[\[249a.4\]]de nas rtsa ni g.yas pa'i phyir/_/steng 'og ngos gnyis gtang mi bya/_/nag po gnad 'dra dmar po ste/_/rtsa de phug na dmar zhing na/_/skrang zhing tsha la sra ba dang /_/gnye'u rengs gzhan dbang can nad skyed/_/de rnams nad gzhi ji bzhin du/_/gso ba dag ni myur du bya/_/gnad
[\[249a.5\]]du phug na khrag med cing /_/nad dang dmar sogs 'byung mi 'gyur/_/khab rjes skud pa snum can ni/_/rjes su gzhug pa nyid du byas/_/til mar rlon pas bsku ba dang /_/rgya cher de ni bskyed par bya/_/rna shal phug nas phan zas byin/_/de 'og sdong bu sbom po gzhug_/
[\[249a.6\]]zhag gsum bzhag nas rma 'tshobs nas/_/rim gyis de ni bskyed par bya/_/de nas de yi so skyes nas/_/nu zho 'thung las rim gyis bzlog_/sngar bshad 'o ma sbyin bya zhing /_/kha zas yang dang rtas byed byin/_/nu zho spangs nas bi ya la'i/_/rkang dang shing mngar 'bras
[\[249a.7\]]yos dang /_/ka ra dkar po la du sbyin/_/bil ba gzhon nu sug smel dang /_/kha ra 'bras yos drod skyed sbyin/_/'khru gcod da ta ka'i me tog_/kha ra 'bras yos skyo ma sbyin/_/gnod pa skyed par mi byed pa'i/_/sman gyis de yi nad bsal bya/_/shin tu drags
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]nad ma gtogs gzhan/_/rno sman bkru sman kun tu spangs/_/tshul min skrag par mi bya ste/_/skrag na gdon ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/gos kyi rlung dang gzhan reg dang /_/'gom pa la ni de bsrung bya/_/bram+hi nyungs kar shu dag dang /_/rgyam tsha ru rta sha ri ba/_/pi pi ling bcas
[\[249b.2\]]bskol ba yi/_/sman mar dran dang yid gzhungs skyed/_/tshe 'phel gdon ni mi bzad 'joms/_/'byung po smyo byed zlog par byed/_/so ma ra dza shu dag dang /_/sbal pa nye shing sle tres dang /_/shang ka puSh+pa bram+hi dang /_/pra ma so ma srang re ni/_/lde gu brgyad cha mar bre
[\[249b.3\]]gang /_/'o ma bzhi 'gyur nang du ni/_/bskol ba de blud dpal yon dang /_/tshe blo yid gzhungs dran pa skyed/_/ra yi 'o ma a ru ra/_/tsha ba gsum dang pa ta dang /_/shi kru shu dag lce myang tsha/_/bskol ba'i sman mar dbyangs can de/_/tshig dang blo gros dran pa dang /_/
[\[249b.4\]]ngag gsal me drod skyed par byed/_/shu dag sle tres a ru ra/_/nye shing ba dang shang gi ni/_/a pa marga bskol ba yi/_/sman mar yon tan snga mar mtshungs/_/shu dag dkar po ru rta gser/_/arga'i puSh+pa gser dang bcas/_/lcags rkyags dang ni dung dang gser/_/
[\[249b.5\]]ka rany+dza dang shu dag gser/_/rkang pa re res bshad pa bzhi/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas lde gu/_/lo gcig byin na lus dang blo/_/kha dog nyams stobs skyed par byed/_/shu dag shing mngar lce myang tsha/_/dong gra shu ti a ru ra/_/ru rta zur pa pi pi ling /_/mar bcas
[\[249b.6\]]lde gu dag dag byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_gnas kyi phyi ma'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas byis pa'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/'o ma zas dang gnyi gas 'tsho/_/byis pa rnam pa gsum du bshad/_/de dag gnod
[\[249b.7\]]med las bder 'gyur/_/gnod pa las ni nad rnams 'byung /_/gang zhig chu dang gcig tu 'dres/_/nyes pa yod pa ma yin te/_/'o ma de ni skyon med yin/_/rlung gis gnod gyur chu steng 'phyo/_/bska zhing rtsub la lbu ba can/_/de yis bshang gci sri bar byed/_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]mkhris las gnod gyur dro skyur tsha/_/ri mo ser snang des tsha skyed/_/bad kan gyis ska lan tshwar bcas/_/sbyin bag can la chu nang 'bying /_/ldan pa'i mtshan ma 'dren ma ste/_/'das pa'i mtshan ma gsum dang ldan/_/rang gi mtshan ma ci 'dra
[\[250a.2\]]las/_/de 'thungs pas ni nad skyed 'gyur/_/byis pa rtag tu mi bzad par/_/ngu ba la ni nad shes bya/_/de ni phyogs gang shas cher 'dzin/_/gang du reg par mi bzod pa/_/de na nad yod shes par bya/_/mgo nad mig 'byed las shes bya/_/snying nad lce mchu sos
[\[250a.3\]]gnon dang /_/dbugs dang khu tshur bsdams shes bya/_/khong nad bshang gci sri dang slon/_/nu ma sos 'debs rgyu ma 'khrug_/lto sbo rgyab ni 'gugs dgye dang /_/lto 'gugs pas kyang shes par bya/_/chu so mtshan nad bshang gci sri/_/skrag cing phyogs lta las shes
[\[250a.4\]]bya/_/de nas ma ma nad gzhi dang /_/skyon ni ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/de la nu zho rlung can la/_/rtsa ba bcu bskol zhag gsum blud/_/yang na ru rta tsi tra ka_/pa ta shu dag pu tse shel/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba la la phud/_/thang shing dang ni sa ra la/_/bri sh+tsi ka ni pi pi ling /_/
[\[250a.5\]]na le sham ni bskol ba blud/_/de nas rlung nad 'joms pa yi/_/sman mar gang yang rung ba blud/_/de rjes chang gi dwangs ma blud/_/snum 'gyur bkru sman 'jam po gtang /_/de 'og 'jam rtsi'i las bya zhing /_/dugs sogs rlung nad 'joms pa bya/_/bil ba ra sna ti
[\[250a.6\]]mu sa/_/thang shing sa ra la bcas phye/_/mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu'am/_/de bskol kha ra dkar btab sbyin/_/mkhris pas gnod la sle tras dang /_/nye shing nim pa pa to la/_/tsan+dan sha ri ba bskol ba/_/ma ma dang ni byis par blud/_/yang na gla sgang 'bras bu gsum/_/
[\[250a.7\]]rtsa mkhris pu tse shel blud bya/_/thal tres la sogs shug pa sogs/_/pa to la sogs sde bskol blud/_/sman ni 'di bskol mar dang ni/_/mkhris pa sel ba'i bkru sman dang /_/bsil sman gyis bsku byug sogs bya/_/bad kan can gyi bdag nyid la/_/shing mngar
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]rgyam tsha bcas pa'am/_/rgyam tsha shing mngar pi pi ling /_/mar sbyar byis pa la blud bya/_/de nas po son cha'i me tog_/btags pa sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/_/lde gus nu ma byis pa'i mchu/_/bskus pa byin pa der slon gzhug_/ma ma rnon pos slon du gzhug_/de nas shag
[\[250b.2\]]sogs rim pas spyad/_/gla skang la sogs bskol ba blud/_/de bzhin go snyod rgya spos dang /_/thang shing dug mo nyung bskol blud/_/yang na gla sgang bong nga dkar/_/shu dag tsha ba lnga bskol blud/_/nu zho nyes gsum dri ma can/_/dri mnam 'khru zhing du dang 'dra/_/ma bre gang
[\[250b.3\]]shing sla la rgyun bar chad/_/lbu ba can du 'khru bar 'gyur/_/bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung /_/na zhing gcin ser dkar zhing ska/_/rims nad skom dad yi ga 'chus/_/sgregs pa skam po 'byung zhing glal/_/lus na yan lag rkyong ba dang /_/mkhun zhing 'dar la
[\[250b.4\]]mgo 'khor dang /_/sna mig kha ni shu ba sogs/_/nad ni gzhan dag de las 'byung /_/'o ma'i be+e snabs zhes bshad de/_/gnod pa'i nad ni mi bzad yin/_/de la ma ma byis pa la/_/slon sman btang bas myur du gso/_/thug sogs rim par bshad pa ni/_/shu dag
[\[250b.5\]]la sogs sde tshan rnams/_/skyer pa stsogs pa'ang bong nga dkar/_/ba ta dang ni pi pi ling /_/gla sgang pu tse shel bskol blud/_/pa tha bca' sga pu tse shel/_/sle tres rtsa mkhris sha ri ba/_/thang shing gla sgang mur ba dang /_/dug mo nyung bcas bskol ba blud/_/nu zho'i nyes
[\[250b.6\]]pa sel ba'i mchog_/rjes 'brel nad la ji bzhin du/_/dus shes pa yis gso bar bya/_/so 'byung ba dag nad rnams ni/_/thams cad kyi yang rgyu yin no/_/mchog tu rims dang 'khru ba dang /_/lud pa slon dang mgo nad dang /_/bang mig 'dzag pa'i nad dang ni/_/shu ba
[\[250b.7\]]rnams ni skyed par byed/_/byi la'i sgal tshigs bye ba dang /_/rma bya'i gtsug ni 'byung ba dang /_/byis pa'i so ni skye ba na/_/mi na ba ni cung zad med/_/de la nad ni ji bzhin dang /_/nad stobs ji bzhin 'jigs ji bzhin/_/yul dang dus stsogs rnam phye ste/_/sman gyi
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]sbyor bas gso bar bya/_/gnod dang gnod bya de nyid dang /_/rims sogs nad kyang de nyid 'byung /_/de bas sman ni de nyid de/_/gzhon sha can dang lus chung phyir/_/zas kun sten par mi byed pas/_/'di yi tshad ni chung ngu sbyin/_/mar dang 'o ma la
[\[251a.2\]]brten pas/_/byis pa rtag par khong snum yin/_/de bas 'phral du skyug sman ni/_/'jam po blo dang ldan pas blud/_/'o ma 'o ma zas bsten la/_/nu zho ngoms par byas pas slon/_/zas za ba la mar bcas pa'i/_/thug pa sla bar blud par bya/_/bkru sman gyis gso
[\[251a.3\]]mas gtong dang /_/tshad chung tshad phran dag gis bya/_/bkru sman la sogs ji skad bshad/_/ma ma nyid la gtang bar bya/_/mur ba rgya shug tsha ba gsum/_/'bras bu gsum dang 'dzam bu'i shun/_/thang shing pa ta nyungs kar bcas/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu sbyin/_/nu zho'i
[\[251a.4\]]nyes pa sel mchog yin/_/pi pi ling ngam skyu ru ra/_/da ta ka yi me tog gi_/phye ma sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/_/lde gus rnyil ni byug par bya/_/'ur bya sreg pa'i sha skam gyi/_/phye ma sbrang rtsis sbrus pa yis/_/byis pa'i so yi myu gu ni/_/myur du skyed par byed pa yin/_/shu dag bri ha
[\[251a.5\]]ti gnyis dang /_/pa ta gla sgang pu tse shel/_/bong nga mngar ba'i sman sde dag_/bskol ba'i mar gyis so skyed grub/_/skyer pa thang shing sa ral/_/bri ha ti gnyis nye shing ba/_/kr-iSh+Na par+Ni shri ya se/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu ni/_/pho ba'i me drod skyed pa'i mchog_/rlung ni bde bar
[\[251a.6\]]rgyu bar byed/_/'khru ba'i rims dang dbugs mi bde/_/mig ser skya rbab lung pa 'joms/_/byis pa'i nad ni thams cad la/_/phan zhing mdog dang nyams stobs skyed/_/btsod dang seng phrom da ta ki_/ku ta nan ta ba la gnyis/_/sa ha che chung gnyis dang ni/_/mung+ga bil ba gzhon
[\[251a.7\]]nu gnyis/_/ras bal sa bon bcas pa dag_/chu bskol ba dang mar dang ni/_/thal sman zho ga chur bskol bas/_/so skyes las byung sna tshogs nad/_/'di yis myur du 'joms byed de/_/'od srungs rgad pos bshad pa yin/_/byis pa'i so skyes nad la ni/_/sngags kyis
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]mngon par gdab mi bya/_/so skyes pa yi nad gang yin/_/gso bas rang nyid nyer zhir 'gyur/_/nyin par gnyid drags chu grang dang /_/nu zho bad kan can bsten pas/_/byis pa'i dngas ma rgyu ba yi/_/rtsa rgyun bad kan gyis bkag pa'i/_/yi ga 'chus dang cham pa dang /_/
[\[251b.2\]]de nas byis pa lus skams shing /_/mdog snum mig ni dkar bar 'gyur/_/rgyam tsha tsha gsum sha rang ga_/ba ta ko ri ka tam pa/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar skams dang /_/yi ga 'chus pa sogs la gtang /_/pu tse shel dang a sho ka_/tsha ba lnga bcas
[\[251b.3\]]phye ma pan/_/da ta ki dang skyu ru ra/_/rgya shug phye ma mar bcas phan/_/sA la par+Ni shu dag dang /_/bri ha ti gnyis ram nye ba/_/pi pi ling dang rgya spos dang /_/lcang ma ut+pal ba spru ba/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba gla sgang rnams/_/srang re yi ni tshad byas nas/_/mar ni bre gang bcas bskol ba/_/
[\[251b.4\]]rtsa rgyun sbyong ba'i dam pa yin/_/a shwa gan+d+ha bye'u rug pa/_/bri ha ti dang pi pi ling /_/bskol ba'ang yon tan de dang 'dra/_/shing mngar seng phrom pi pi ling /_/shug pa tsan+dan ut+pa la/_/bal bu'i lo ma sha ri ba/_/bskol ba'i mar gyis skems pa yi/_/nad ni 'joms par
[\[251b.5\]]byed pa yin/_/shring gi ma du lung ga dang /_/ga bra'i rtsa ba pi pi ling /_/thang shing a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/ra mnye ba gnyis ra sna dang /_/zangs rtsi ba dang dzi ba ka_/ma sha mung+ga par+Ni dang /_/byi dang ga ni lde gur bcas/_/ri bong mgo bskol khu ba dang /_/bskol ba'i mar ni blud gyur
[\[251b.6\]]na/_/lus skems rgyas par byed pa'i mchog_/shu dag sle tres ka yas+tha/_/spang spos tsa rong ra thug gcin/_/chang bskol til mar bskus pa phan/_/rgya skyegs khu ba cha mnyam dang /_/til mar bre gang zho ga chu/_/bzhi 'gyur a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/skyer pa thang shing ru rta dang /_/
[\[251b.7\]]ha re Nu ka ba li ka_/tsan+dan mur ba pu tse shel/_/ra sna nye shing shing mngar mnyam/_/bskol ba'i til mar rgya skyegs sogs/_/zhes bya bskus na phan par 'gyur/_/stobs skyed rims dang zad byed dang /_/smyo byed brjed byed dbugs mi bde/_/rlung gi nad rnams sel bar
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]byed/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po 'joms/_/sbrum ma la yang bsngags pa yin/_/bong nga kar ka ta sring gi/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/lde gu byis pa la sbyin pa/_/bong nga dkar po gcig po yis/_/lde gus lud pa rims slon bro/_/
[\[252a.2\]]bla brnan gyi ni nad sel byed/_/nu zho 'thung zhing slon pa la/_/de la zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang /_/kaN+Da ka ri bri ha ti/_/'bras bu'i khu ba tsha ba lnga/_/sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya/_/pi pi ling dang lan tshwa lnga/_/ba ri bar byi dang ga_/de bzhin lde gur sbyar ba sbyin/_/de bzhin tsha ba
[\[252a.3\]]gsum reg 'jam/_/sha ri da ta rma bya sram/_/ji snyed pags pa spu bsregs la/_/snag tsha sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phan/_/seng ldeng bal bu ardzun/_/ru rta pan ta na yi khu/_/'o ma mar dang bcas bskol bas/_/slon bro nye bar sel bar byed/_/gang gi so dang bcas skyes dang /_/
[\[252a.4\]]gang gi dang por ya so skyes/_/bkra mi shis pa de la ni/_/zhi ba bya zhing bram ze la/_/yon dang bcas par sbyin par bya/_/de bzhin skem byed mchod par bya/_/bad kan 'khrugs pas rkan gyi shar/_/rkan gyi 'dzer pa zhes bya ste/_/des na rkan gyi phyogs kyi ni/_/spyi bo dma' ba
[\[252a.5\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_/rkan lhung nu zho 'gras pa dang /_/ska ba 'thung zhing bshang ba sla/_/skom dang kha g.ya' mig na zhing /_/gnya' ba 'degs dka' slon par 'gyur/_/de la rkan 'degs nas tshig 'khus/_/thal ba sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bsku/_/yang na bca' sga pi pi ling /_/
[\[252a.6\]]ba lang gcin khu rgyam tsha bsku/_/dong gra skyer pa shing tsha yi/_/lde gu n+ya go d+ha'i lo mar/_/gtums la ba lang lci bas byug_/de rjes me mar myur du bsreg_/khu bas rkan dang kha bsku zhing /_/mig tu yang ni blugs par bya/_/ru rta shu dag a ru ra/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu
[\[252a.7\]]ni/_/nu zhor bcas pa byis pa blud/_/rkan gyi 'dzer pa las thar 'gyur/_/dri mas gos sam rdul ba las/_/gzhang khar bad kan khrag las 'byung /_/rma ni nang dmar g.ya' ba dang /_/bla brnan mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/la las ma mo'i nyes par bshad/_/gzhan
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]dag lus srul pos byas zer/_/rgyab kyi thor bu gzhang sdebs zer/_/la las de ming med ces bshad/_/de la ma ma bad mkhris dag_/sel ba'i sman gyis nu zho sbyar/_/tsan+dan dkar chu bsil ba dang /_/ldan pa'i skom ni nang nas blud/_/de dang skyer pa'i khaN+Da ni/_/
[\[252b.2\]]sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i rma bsku bya/_/rgya shug 'bras bu gsum blag sha'i/_/shun pa bskol ba'i chu blugs bya/_/nag chur gi wang spangs ma dang /_/dngul rdo ba bla ldong ros ni/_/skyur dang btags pas bsku bya zhing /_/yang na shing mngar skyer khaN dang /_/dung ni zhib
[\[252b.3\]]tu btags pa'am/_/dung gi lte ba sha ri ba'am/_/a sa na yi shun pa ni/_/phye ma btags pa gdab par bya/_/dmar zhing g.ya' ba'i shas che la/_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/_/gzhang sdebs nad la mkhris pa yi/_/rma la phan pa thams cad bsngags/_/
[\[252b.4\]]pa ta gla sgang ser po gnyis/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba byi dong ga_/pur+Na rna ba bil bar bcas/_/brish+tsi ka li tsha ba gsum/_/mar bcas bskol ba tshad tsam bldags/_/sa zos nad las thar bar 'gyur/_/nad ni gang gi sman gang yin/_/de yis nu ma bskus nas ni/_/
[\[252b.5\]]yud tsam 'dug la de rjes bkru/_/blud na nad ni de des sel/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_gnas phyi ma'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byis pa'i gdon gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/sngon gyi skem byed bsrung ba'i phyir/_/
[\[252b.6\]]gdon ni skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga/_/bud med kyi ni gzugs can bdun/_/lha chen po yi sprul pa yin/_/skem byed sa ga lug thug gdong /_/khyi gdong yi dwags zhes bya dang /_/bya gdon srul mo grang ba yi/_/srul mo long ma lus srul po/_/de bzhin bzhin gyi
[\[252b.7\]]rgyan can ma/_/nam gru nam gru skem ma'o/_/de rnams kyis ni bzung ba'i tshul/_/rtag tu ngu dang rims kyis 'debs/_/spyi'i tshul skrag dang glal ba dang /_/smin ma 'degs shing rmya ba dang /_/lbu ba slon zhing gyen du blta/_/ma mchu sos 'debs gnyid yar dang /_/ngu
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]zhing mkhun la nu zho la/_/mi dga' skad ni 'gyur ba dang /_/glo bur du ni sen mo yis/_/rang gi ma ma'i yan lag 'brad/_/de la skem byed kyis zin rtags/_/mig gcig mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /_/yang dang yang du mgo bo rdegs/_/
[\[253a.2\]]phyogs gcig nyams shing lus rengs la/_/rdul bcas skye ba rengs pa dang /_/so 'cha' nu zho la mi dga'/_/sngangs shing ngu la skad gsang nyams/_/kha yo kha chu skyugs pa dang /_/mi bzad par ni gyen du blta/_/tshil khrag dri bro yid mi dga'/_/
[\[253a.3\]]bshang ba khu tshur la bcang zhing /_/mkhur tshos mig dang smin ma gcig_/g.yo zhing mig ni gnyi ga dmar/_/des ni yan lag nyes nyams pa'am/_/'chi ba kho nar byed par 'gyur/_/skem byed brjed byed mtshan ma ni/_/dran pa nyams shing yang
[\[253a.4\]]dang yang /_/skra 'bal rke ba 'gugs pa dang /_/rnam par 'dud cing glal bzhin du/_/bshang dang gci ba 'byin par byed/_/lbu bar skyug cing gyen du lta/_/rkang lag smin mas gar yang byed/_/nu ma rang lce so yis 'debs/_/kun tu g.yo zhing
[\[253a.5\]]gnyid yang rims/_/khrag ni rnag gi dri bro ba'o/_/lug thug gdon gyi rtags kyi nang /_/sbo zhing rkang pa lag pa dag_/'dar zhing lbu ba skyugs pa dang /_/skom dad che 'khru chang pa sdom/_/skad gsang dma' zhing mdog mi sdug_/mkhun cing slon par byed
[\[253a.6\]]pa dang /_/lud pa skyigs bus 'debs gnyid yar/_/so yis mchu gnon yan lag sdud/_/rengs shing lug thug dri bro la/_/gyen du lta zhing dgod pa dang /_/bar du 'gugs shing rims kyis 'debs/_/brgyal zhing mig gcig skrangs pa yan/_/
[\[253a.7\]]khyi yi gdong gi rtags gyur pa/_/'dar zhing ba spu ldang ba dang /_/rngul zhing mig ni 'dzums pa dang /_/rgyab tu gug cing lce dang so/_/mchu dang rkan sgra 'byin zhing skyugs/_/bshang ba'i dri 'byung khyi skad 'byin/_/yi dwags kyi ni gdon gyi rtags/_/ba spu ldang
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]zhing yang yang sdang /_/glo bur du zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/'khru zhing slon byed lud pa lu/_/glal skom mi ro'i dri dang ldan/_/lus ni bskyod cing g.yo ba dang /_/skem zhing rengs la mdog mi sdug_/khu tshur sdom shing mchi ma 'dzag_/bya gdon
[\[253b.2\]]lus lhod 'khru bar byed/_/lce rkan lkog mar rma 'byung zhing /_/thor bur na zhing tsha la gnag_/tshigs dag tu ni yang yang 'byung /_/mtshan mo skye la nyin mo 'bri/_/kha'am bshang sgo 'gags pa dang /_/'jigs shing bya yi dri dang ldan/_/
[\[253b.3\]]rims kyis 'debs par byed pa yin/_/srul mo'i slon zhing 'dar ba dang /_/lus snyom mtshan mo gnyid yar dang /_/skyigs bu lto sbos 'khru ba dang /_/skom zhing gcin ni sri ba dang /_/lus lhod ba spu gshor ba dang /_/kha ltar dri ni mnam
[\[253b.4\]]pa yin/_/grang ba'i srul mo 'dar ba dang /_/ngu zhing zur gyis blta ba dang /_/skom zhing 'khru la rgyu ma 'khrog_/zhag ltar dri ni mnam pa dang /_/yan lag logs gcig grang ba dang /_/cig shos dro ba nyid yin no/_/srul mo long ma'i slon
[\[253b.5\]]pa dang /_/rims dang lud pa gnyid chung dang /_/bshang ba sla zhing mdog mi sdug_/dri nga bskus pas myur du skam/_/mthong ba nyams shing mig na g.ya'/_/mig skrangs glo bar gyur pa dang /_/skyigs bu mi dgod nu zho 'gras/_/mdog mi
[\[253b.6\]]sdug cing nga ro rtsub/_/mdog nyams nya yi dri dang ldan/_/yang na dri ni skyur bcas yin/_/bzhin rgyan can gyis rkang pa dang /_/lag pa gdong ni mdzes pa dang /_/rtsa ni nag por snang ba yis/_/lto ba khyab cing rims kyis 'debs/_/yi ga 'chus
[\[253b.7\]]shing yan lag na/_/ba gcin lta bu'i dri 'byung 'gyur/_/nam gru gnag cing sngo ba dang /_/mig dang rna ba sna med cing /_/mig 'gul skyigs bu lud pa lu/_/kha ni yo zhing dmar ba dang /_/lug thug drir ldan rims 'debs skem/_/
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]bshang ba sngo zhing sla ba yin/_/nam gru skem mos lus kun ni/_/rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /_/skra 'byi zas la mi dga' dang /_/skad gsang zhum zhing mdog mi sdug_/bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs dang /_/lto
[\[254a.2\]]bar rtsa yi mdud pa chags/_/ngu zhing bya rgod dri ldan la/_/yun ring na bar byed pa yin/_/lto ba rmen bu zlum po 'byung /_/bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung /_/lce yi dbus ni dma' ba dang /_/rkan ni gnag 'gyur de spang bya/_/kha zas
[\[254a.3\]]mang du zos kyang ni/_/byis ba gang zhig lus skem byed/_/skom pas nyen cing mig nyams pa/_/de ni nam gru skem mos gsod/_/'tshe ba la dga' mchod par 'dod/_/gdon rnams 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no/_/de la 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/_/byin
[\[254a.4\]]tshe sna nas 'dzag pa dang /_/lce nyams mig ni gting du 'bros/_/'degs byed mig ni mchi mar bcas/_/nyam chung tshig ni dman pa dang /_/dri nga ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skem zhing rang gi bshang dang gci/_/lag pas nyed cing smod mi byed/_/
[\[254a.5\]]lag pas bteg ste 'bad pa yis/_/bdag dang de bzhin gzhan la rdeg_/mtshon dang shing stsogs kyis rdeg cing /_/'bar ba'i me la 'jug par byed/_/chu nang 'bying zhing khron par ltung /_/gzhan yang de 'drar byed bar 'gyur/_/skom dad che
[\[254a.6\]]zhing tsha bas rnag_/slon par byed par 'gyur ba dang /_/bu ga kun nas khrag 'dzag cing /_/'chi ltas byung ba de spang bya/_/dga' ba 'dod pas gzir gyur pa/_/dben par bud med 'dod smra dga'/_/dri dang me tog phreng rgyan dga'/_/mgu
[\[254a.7\]]zhing zhi ba gso ba dka'/_/lces ni kha la nyug pa dang /_/mchu rkan gre ba skams pa dang /_/dogs pas lta zhing ngu ba dang /_/sems khong chud cing zhum pa dang /_/zas 'dod ltogs par gyur kyang ni/_/byin na za bar mi 'dod la/_/gtor ma
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]'dod pas zin pa ste/_/de ni gso sla yin par bshad/_/gsod 'dod pa la grub pa yi/_/sngags bzlas sbyin sreg byas pas gzhom/_/cig shos la ni ci 'dod par/_/dga' dang gtor ma sogs sbyin pas/_/de nas gso rung gdon la ni/_/byis pa
[\[254b.2\]]khang pa dben par bzhag_/zhag gsum chag chag phyag dar byas/_/rtag tu me ni gzhag pa yi/_/bu ti'i me tog bsil ma dang /_/'dab ma sa bon nyungs kar gtor/_/gdon 'joms til mar sbar ba yi/_/mar mes gdon ni 'joms par byed/_/
[\[254b.3\]]nad g.yog nyal po chang dang sha_/yongs su spangs par gyur pa yi/_/mar ni rnying pas bskus nas ni/_/ba la nim pa star ka ri/_/dong gra thang shing ka tang ga_/'dzam bu dang ni ta ma la/_/ka tri na dang lcam pa dang /_/a ba marga ma ta li/_/ma du shi
[\[254b.4\]]kru zhes bya dang /_/ka ka dza ka shwe ta che/_/bil rkang 'o ma can gyi shing /_/ka dam ba bcas ka rany+dza/_/chu ni dro 'jam dag gis bkru/_/stag dang gzig dang seng ge sbrul/_/dom gyi pags pa mar dang bcas/_/bdugs pas khrus byas 'og tu bdug_/pu ti
[\[254b.5\]]nyungs kar sha raM ga_/shu dag go bye la la phud/_/ru rta mar sbyar bdug pas ni/_/gdon kun las ni thar byed yin/_/yungs kar nim pa'i lo ma dang /_/shu dag ka ra bI ra'i rtsa/_/dro ba mar sbyar bdug pas ni/_/gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed/_/ba
[\[254b.6\]]lang rwa dang rus pa spu/_/pags pa byi la'i rtug pa dang /_/nim pa'i lo ma pu tse shel/_/mar dang bri ha ti gnyis dang /_/ras bal sa bon po son cha/_/nas dang ra spu thang shing dang /_/nyungs kar rma bya'i sgro dang pog_/skra dang phub ma pha bang dang /_/rdza
[\[254b.7\]]mar ra thug gcin dang sbangs/_/zhib btags pa yi bdugs pas ni/_/'byung po'i gdon ni thams cad dang /_/mi bzad rims nad 'joms par byed/_/byi tsher a mra'i tshi gu dang /_/rgya spos mngar sde na le sham/_/kr-iSh+Na par+N-i gla sgang rnams/_/lde
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]gur byas pa mar dang ni/_/'o ma rtsa ba bcu bskol khur/_/bcas bskol de ni gdon 'joms mchog_/ra sna aM shu ma ti gnyis/_/ba la rtsa ba chen po lnga/_/gla sgang btags te mar dang bskol/_/tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka_/
[\[255a.2\]]thal tres pa tra byi dang ga_/shing mngar shing kun pa ya s+ya/_/thang shing pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/dug mo nyung dang bcas pa yi/_/lde gu mar dang bskol bas ni/_/rtag tu byis pa la phan zhing /_/nad dang gnod pa thams cad 'joms/_/me drod stobs
[\[255a.3\]]dang kha dog skyed/_/sha ri ba dang mu ra dang /_/bram+hi shu dag shang khi ni/_/nyungs kar a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/bye'u rug pa bcas mar bskol/_/de ni btung dang bsku ba yis/_/gdon rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/_/mar gad 'byung po'i
[\[255a.4\]]rigs pa ru/_/'og nas bshad pa dag dang ni/_/de bzhin gtor ma sbyin sreg dang /_/khrus ni sngags rgyud shes pas sbyar/_/pu ti ka rany+dza'i shun pa/_/bar pa ra yi rtsa ba dang /_/ku ba kha bo bi sha la/_/ka tra ka dang bil ba dang /_/ka pi ta
[\[255a.5\]]bskol des mtshan mo/_/byis pa bkrus na shis pa yin/_/gdon dang bral yang bla brnan nad/_/rjes su 'brel pa thams cad la/_/byis pa'i nad gsor bshad pa yi/_/sman gyis ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus
[\[255a.6\]]pa las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_byis pa gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so//_//de nas 'byung po'i gdon gyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/shes
[\[255a.7\]]dang rnam shes tshig dang ni/_/spyod dang snying stobs rang bzhin dag_/gang gi rang bzhin 'gyur bar snang /_/de la 'byung po'i gdon yod bshad/_/'byung po'i gzugs dang rang bzhin dang /_/smra dang 'gro sogs spyod pa dang /_/gang zhig
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]'dre bar byed pa rnams/_/de la de ni zhugs par bshad/_/de ni lha dang lha min stsogs/_/dbye ba rnam pa bco brgyad bshad/_/de 'dzin rgyu ni 'phral gtam ni/_/sngon chad shes rab 'chal ba yi/_/blo yis nyes pa byas gyur nas/_/de yi chags pa stsogs
[\[255b.2\]]bskyed nas/_/brtul zhugs spyod dang chos lugs nyams/_/mchod 'os rnams ni brnyas pa dang /_/gzhung lugs nyams pa de dag ni/_/sdig dang bdag ni gsod byed ni/_/gdon ni glags skabs tshol byed pas/_/lha la sogs pa'ang rjes gnod
[\[255b.3\]]byed/_/glags ni sdig la sogs pa dang /_/mi dge'i las ni smin pa dang /_/gcig pur khang stong gnas pa'am/_/dur khrod sogs par mtshan mo gnas/_/gcer bur rgyu ba'am bla ma smod/_/'khrig pa tshul min spyod pa dang /_/gtsang sbra med par
[\[255b.4\]]lha mchod dang /_/mi gtsang gzhan dang 'dres pa dang /_/sbyin sreg sngags gtor mchod sbyin rnams/_/phyin ci log tu byed pa dang /_/mdor na nyin re sogs spyod par/_/spyod pa brten pa las 'das pa'o/_/lha yi gdon gyis yar ngo yi/_/tshes
[\[255b.5\]]gcig bcu gsum dag la 'dzin/_/lha min gdon ni yar ngo yi/_/bcu gsum mar ngo bcu gnyis la/_/dri za'i gdon ni bcu bzhi dang /_/bcu gnyis dag la'ang 'dzin par byed/_/klu gdon tshes lnga la 'dzin byed/_/gnod sbyin gdon ni yar ngo yi/_/tshes
[\[255b.6\]]bdun bcu gcig dag la 'dzin/_/tshangs pa srin pos yar ngo yi/_/tshes brgyad bco lnga dag la 'dzin/_/srin po sha za sogs mar ngo'i/_/tshes gcig tshes dgu bcu gcig la/_/mtshun lha gnam stong tshes bcu dang /_/brgyad dang dgu pa dag
[\[255b.7\]]la 'dzin/_/rgan pa la sogs gzhan dag ni/_/phal cher dus de'i thun mtshams la'o/_/lha yi gdon gyis dbang byas pa/_/gdong ni pad+ma kha bye 'dra/_/lta stangs zhi zhing khro ba med/_/tshig nyung dul dang bshang gci nyung /_/kha zas la ni 'dod pa med/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]lha dang bram ze 'byung ba dka'/_/gtsang zhing saMskr-i ta'i skad smra/_/yun ring nas ni mig 'dzums shing /_/lus dri zhim zhing mchog ster byed/_/gos phreng dkar po chu bo dang /_/ri mtho khang pa mtho la dga'/_/gnyid med tshugs pa med pa yin/_/
[\[256a.2\]]lha min gdon gyis zin pa ni/_/yon por blta zhing rang bzhin ngan/_/lha dang bla ma bram ze dang /_/'jigs med khengs shing dpa' ba dang /_/khro zhing rtsol ba che ba dang /_/nga ni drag po khyab 'jug dang /_/skem byed brgya byin yin zhes bshad/_/sha dang chang la dga'
[\[256a.3\]]zhes bya/_/dri za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/rang spyod la dga' lus dri zhim/_/snying dga' glu dang gar yang byed/_/khrus dang skyed mos tshal la dga'/_/gos phreng byug pa dmar la sred/_/sgeg dang rtsed mo la dga'o/_/klu yi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/
[\[256a.4\]]mig dmar khro zhing mi 'gyur lta/_/yon por 'gro zhing blta ba dang /_/nyin mtshan dbugs rgod lce las ni/_/kha chu 'dzag cing kha 'gram lhag_/bu ram 'o ma khrus la dga'/_/kha sbub tu ni nyal bar byed/_/gdugs mthong na ni 'jigs pa yin/_/gnod
[\[256a.5\]]sbyin gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/mig dmar bgrad cing skrag la 'gul/_/lus ni dri zhim gzi mdangs ldan/_/gtam dang glu dang khrus dang ni/_/phreng ba byug pa la dga' zhing /_/nya yi sha sred dga' ba dang /_/dga' mgu stobs chen nad med la/_/lag rtse
[\[256a.6\]]bskyod cing su zhig la/_/ci zhig sbyin zhes smra bar byed/_/gsang tshig smra zhing sman pa dang /_/bram ze la ni brnyas par byed/_/khro ba chung zhing mgyogs 'gro ba'o/_/tshangs pa srin pos zin pa'i rtags/_/dgod cing gar la dga' ba dang /_/spyod pa gtum zhing glags
[\[256a.7\]]skabs tshol/_/gshe zhing myur du 'gro ba dang /_/sman pa bram ze lha la sdang /_/rang la shing dang mtshon sogs brdeg_/kye zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/bstan bcos rig byed 'dod pa yin/_/srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/khro gnyer bcas shing khro bar
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]lta/_/rta bas bag tu ni byed pa dang /_/rdeg cing rab tu rgyug pa dang /_/ngu zhing gdong ni 'jigs rung ston/_/zas ma zos kyang stobs dang ldan/_/gnyid med mtshan mo rgyu ba dang /_/ngo tsha gtsang sbra med cing dpa'/_/gdug cing tshig rtsub
[\[256b.2\]]smra ba dang /_/khro zhing phreng ba dmar po dang /_/bud med sha chang khrag la dga'/_/sha'am khrag ni mthong ba na/_/mchu ni ldag par byed pa dang /_/zas za'i tshe na dgod pa yin/_/sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/sems ni bde
[\[256b.3\]]bar mi gnas shing /_/yongs su rgyug par byed pa dang /_/mi gtsang la dga' glu gar dang /_/dgod dang chang dang sha rlon dga'/_/spyos na gdong ni zhum pa dang /_/rgyu med par ni ngu ba dang /_/bdag nyid sen mos 'brud pa dang /_/
[\[256b.4\]]khong rtsub lus nyams skad gsang dma'/_/sdug bsngal ba ni brda sprod cing /_/'brel dang mi 'brel tshig mang smra/_/dran pa nyams shing gnas stong dga'/_/mi brtan gcer bu dri ma can/_/srang bar 'khyams shing gos gyon zhing /_/rtswa
[\[256b.5\]]yi phreng ba rgyun tu thogs/_/shing 'dzeg rta la zhon par byed/_/de bzhin phyag dar phung por 'dzeg_/mang du za bar byed pa yin/_/yi dgas gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/spyod tshul dri ni yi dgas 'dra/_/sngar zhing zas la mi dga' dang /_/
[\[256b.6\]]rtsa gcod byed pa zhes kyang bya/_/grul bum gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/tshig mang smra zhing kha gdong gnag_/dal gyis 'gro bar byed pa dang /_/rlig pa skrang zhing 'phyang ba yin/_/mi ni byang stems zin pa'i rtags/_/shing rdo bong ba stsogs thogs
[\[256b.7\]]shing /_/tshal pa gyon te 'gro ba dang /_/gcer bur rgyug cing 'jigs bag tu/_/lta la rtswa yis rgyan du byed/_/dur khrod gnas ni stong pa dang /_/srang bar shing gcig brten pa dang /_/til zas chang dang sha la ni/_/rtag tu mig ni tshags pa
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]dang /_/tshig rtsub de ni smra ba yin/_/g.yengs byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags/_/chu 'dod zas ni mi slong dang /_/sngangs shing mig ni dmar ba dang /_/tshig rtsub smra bar shes par bya/_/ro langs gdon gyis zin pa'i
[\[257a.2\]]rtags/_/dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing /_/tshig bden smra la yongs su 'dar/_/gnyid che bar ni shes par bya/_/yi dgas mtshun lha'i gdon gyi rtags/_/mig mi gsal zhing bzhin ras zhum/_/rkan ni skam par byed pa dang /_/mig
[\[257a.3\]]dang rdzi ma bskyod pa dang /_/gnyid che me drod chung ba dang /_/g.yon phyogs nas ni gos gyon zhing /_/sha dang bu ram til la dga'/_/tshig 'khrul pa ni yin zhes bya/_/bla ma drang srong rgan dang grub/_/dmod pa sems kyi rjes mthun pa/_/
[\[257a.4\]]spyod lam kha zas rang bzhin las/_/ci 'dra gdon ni de yin bshad/_/gzhon nu'i tshogs kyi rjes 'brang zhing /_/gcer bu skra ni gyen du brdzes/_/yid mi bde zhing dus tshigs ni/_/yun ring gyur pa'i gdon de spang /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i
[\[257a.5\]]snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas gdon gso pa bshad par bya'o/_/'byung po'i 'tshe ba mi 'dod dang /_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang /_/brtul zhugs tshul khrims mnyam
[\[257a.6\]]'jog dang /_/sbyin shes brtse la sogs pas bsal/_/shing kun ba bla tsha ba gsum/_/gla rtsi sgog skya arka'i rtsa/_/spang spos a za lo mi dang /_/la ba 'bam po ku ku ti/_/shu dag gan+d+ha pri yang ku/_/sar pa gan+d+ha til mar ni/_/
[\[257a.7\]]ka ka an da ra mnye ba/_/snu ha ka ka ta shring gi/_/sle tres ma hA na ba li/_/yungs kar dang ni lig bu mig_/gdon 'joms sman ni gzhan dag dang /_/bong bu rta dang khyi lug dang /_/rnga mo go da dred dang ni/_/sre mo reg 'jam byi la gung /_/ba
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]lang seng ge stag dang ni/_/rgya mtsho yi ni srog chags kyi/_/pags pa mkhris pa sen mo so/_/sde tshan 'di dang mar rnying ngam/_/til mar dang ni bskol ba dag_/btung dang snar ni blugs pa dang /_/bsku ba'i don du sbyar bya zhing /_/'di dag phye
[\[257b.2\]]mas bdug par bya/_/'di yi ri lu byas nas ni/_/mig sman sna sman bya ba dang /_/'di yi lde gus byugs pa dang /_/bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya/_/sbyor ba 'di yis smyo byed dang /_/brjed byed bcas pa'i gdon zhi byed/_/nyungs
[\[257b.3\]]kar ha ti pi pi ling /_pi pi ling rtsa che ba gsum/_/skyu ru ra dang go da dang /_/sre mo byi la rtsa sha yi/_/mkhris pa dang btags sna sman dang /_/bsku byug byugs sogs byas gdon 'joms/_/nyungs kar shu dag shing kun dang /_/pri yang
[\[257b.4\]]ku dang ser po gnyis/_/gi ri kar+Ni dkar nag gnyis/_/'bras bu gsum dang shwe ta dang /_/nim pa'i lo ma ka rany+dza/_/shri sha gnyis dang sa bon dang /_/thang shing dang ni tsha ba gsum/_/mar dang ba gcin de bzhi 'gyur/_/bskol ba
[\[257b.5\]]don grub ces bya ste/_/btung dang snar blugs las sbyar na/_/gdon ni thams cad myur 'joms byed/_/mchog tu lha min gdon sel byed/_/brjed byed dug dang bkra mi shis/_/smyo byed gshed byed rims rnams 'joms/_/sman de nyid ni
[\[257b.6\]]ra thug gi/_/gcin dang sbyar te blud pa dang /_/snar blugs mig sman byugs pa dang /_/khrus dang dril ba la sbyar ba/_/sngar bshad yon tan de 'dra zhing /_/rgyal po'i sgor yang don grub byed/_/nyungs kar shu dag tsha ba gsum/_/a
[\[257b.7\]]shwa gan+d+ha ser po gnyis/_/shing kun kun dong rtsa ba dang /_/karany+dza yi sa bon dang /_/shri sha yi me tog dang /_/ka bid tha yi 'bras bu dang /_/rgyam tsha ru rta rgya spos dang /_/gi ri kar+Ni dkar po dang /_/so na ka yi rtsa bar gnas/_/ra
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]gcin dag dang legs bsgos shing /_/ba lang mkhris pa bu ram dang /_/ri lu byas pa'i sbyor ba de/_/mig bskus snar blugs bsku byas na/_/smyo byed rma ni red pa dang /_/mtshan mo mi mthong mun 'thibs byed/_/bgegs dang
[\[258a.2\]]lus chur nub pas brgyal/_/dug bskus mda' yis phog pa dang /_/gdug pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel/_/ras bal sa bon rma bya'i sgro/_/me tog sman ma bri ha ti/_/shing tsha spang spos po son cha/_/byi la'i rtug pa phub ma dang /_/shu dag mi
[\[258a.3\]]skra sbrul lpags dang /_/glang po'i so dang glang gi rwa/_/shing kun dang ni na le sham/_/tsha mnyam bdugs par byas pa yis/_/skem byed smyo byed sha za'i rigs/_/srin po lha yi gdon 'joms mchog_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra tsha ba gsum/_/gur kum
[\[258a.4\]]pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/kaN+Da ka ri skyer pa dang /_/thang shing dang ni yungs kar gnyis/_/ba li ka dang dug mo nyung /_/tsan+dan dkar po rgyam tsha dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang pu shel tse/_/shu dag spangs ma pu tse shel/_/tsan+dan dkar po ba la dang /_/
[\[258a.5\]]shing mngar sug smel ldong ros dang /_/shug pa rgya spos shri pa sa/_/ma du ka yi snying po dang /_/bong nga gnyis po pri yang ku/_/dbyi mo ru rta skyer khaN dang /_/cha mnyam zhib btags lde gu dang /_/mar rnying gcin kun cha mnyam bskol/_/gdon
[\[258a.6\]]khus 'debs shes bya bar brjod/_/de blud gdon 'joms mchog yin no/_/rgya spos shing mngar ka rany+dza/_/rgya skyegs da ta pa to la/_/shu dag shing kun pa ta la/_/nyungs kar kaN+Da ka ri dang /_/ser po gnyis dang pu tse shel/_/rgya shug gan+d+ha
[\[258a.7\]]pri yang ku/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/thang shing sle tres byi dang ga_/ko sha ta ki ka kan ta/_/shi kru nim pa dug mo nyung /_/shri shi'i me tog sa bon dang /_/gla sgang ru rta dan da dang /_/gi ri kar+Ni tsi tra ka_/bil ba cha mnyam
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]lde gur byas/_/mar rnying can gyi sde tshan bcas/_/bskol de yun ring bzhag pa de/_/khus 'debs chen po zhes bshad do/_/rim pa kun gyis sbyar na ni/_/gdon rnams kun dang smyo byed dang /_/mdze dang rims ni myur du 'joms/_/gdon
[\[258b.2\]]ni nyi ma gang gang la/_/'dzin pa'i nyi ma de dang der/_/mchog tu sbyin sreg gtor ma sogs/_/sman pas rab tu 'bad de bya/_/khrus dang gos dang sha dang tshil/_/chang dang mar dang bu ram stsogs/_/gang zhig gang la sred gyur pa/_/de tshe
[\[258b.3\]]de ni de la sbyin/_/rin chen dri dang phreng ba dang /_/sa bon mar dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/zas kun kun la sbyin bya ste/_/'di ni spyi yi cho ga'o/_/lha dang bla ma drang srong rgan/_/grub pa lha yi gnas su sbyin/_/de yang lha yi gdon la ni/_/byang gi phyogs
[\[258b.4\]]su gtor ma sbyin/_/lha min gdon la ci 'dod par/_/mtshams kyi gnas su nub tu sbyin/_/dri za'i gdon la ba lang ngam/_/gos dang rgyan bcas gtor ma sbyin/_/mtshun lha klu gdon 'bab chu'i 'gram/_/klu la shar lho mtshams su sbyin/_/
[\[258b.5\]]gnod sbyin rang gi gnas sam ni/_/chu gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas su sbyin/_/srin por lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/_/tshang tshing 'jigs su rung bar sbyin/_/srin po lho yi phyogs su sbyin/_/tshangs pa'i srin por shar du sbyin/_/sha za la ni khang stong
[\[258b.6\]]du/_/nub phyogs su ni gnas te sbyin/_/phreng ba gtsang zhing dkar po dang /_/dri dang 'o thug 'bras chan dang /_/zho dang gdugs ni dkar po dag_/lha rnams kyi ni gtor mar 'dod/_/shing kun nyungs kar shu dag dang /_/tsha ba gsum ni srang
[\[258b.7\]]phyed phyed/_/mar bre gang dang ba yi gcin/_/bzhi 'gyur dang ni lhan cig bskol/_/de btung snar blugs bskus pa yis/_/lha yi gdon las thar bar byed/_/shu dag shing kun sgog skya rnams/_/ra gcin sbyar ba snar blugs dang /_/mig
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bskus lha yi gdon las thar/_/lha min gtor ma 'bras bu ni/_/mang po dag dang pu shel tse/_/klu yi gdon la dzA ti dang /_/'bras yos bu ram snum khur dang /_/'bras chan bu ram bcas pa dang /_/zas mchog 'o ma
[\[259a.2\]]sbrang rtsi dang /_/sa nag nA ga ge sar dang /_/shu dag pad+ma pu shel tse/_/ut+pal pad+ma dmar po yi/_/'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/_/seng phrom lo ma dkar po dang /_/rgya sbos nA ga ge sar dang /_/nyungs kar chu grang la btags pas/_/
[\[259a.3\]]snar blugs mig tu bskus pa'ang phan/_/gnod sbyin gdon la 'o ma zho/_/mar dang 'bras chan bsres pa dang /_/gu gul pad+ma thang shing dang /_/pu shel tse dang gos dang gser/_/dbyig ni gtor mar sbyin par bya/_/mar dang 'o ma ba gcin ni/_/cha mnyam
[\[259a.4\]]bskol ba btung ba dang /_/snar blugs lus la bskus na phan/_/a ru ra dang ser po gnyis/_/sgog skya shu dag na le sham/_/nim pa'i lo mar gcin btags/_/lde gus sna sman mig sman bya/_/tshangs pa srin po'i gtor ma ni/_/nas bre bzhi ni btsos
[\[259a.5\]]pa yis/_/chu bre bcu drug til btags bsres/_/gdugs dang gos dang byug pa sbyin/_/seng ldeng srang ni nyi shu dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/shing kun shu dag shu ti dang /_/nyungs kar nim pa'i lo mar bcas/_/sgog skya srang ni phyed phyed
[\[259a.6\]]dang /_/zhun mar phul ni bdun dag dang /_/ba gcin sum 'gyur bskol ba de/_/btung dang snar blugs bskus na phan/_/srin po'i gdon la til phye dang /_/me tog dkar po 'bras chan bsres/_/sha btsos rjen pa nim pa la/_/khrag dang bcas pa'i
[\[259a.7\]]gtor ma sbyin/_/nag ta ma la shri sha yi/_/shun lpags me tog 'bras bu dang /_/de bzhin pa ta la nag po/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba tsha ba gsum/_/shing kun nyungs kar dug mo nyung /_/sgog skya skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu/_/ra gcin dang ni sbyar ba'i sman/_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]snar blugs mig tu byugs na'ang phan/_/'di dag nyid dang mar gyis ni/_/bzhi 'gyur ba gcin bskol ba ni/_/btung dang snar blugs bskus pa yis/_/srin po'i gdon ni zlog par byed/_/sha za la ni bu ram chang /_/til tshig til gyi phye ma
[\[259b.2\]]zho/_/la phug lan tshwa phye zan mar/_/'byung po 'bras chan gtor ma sbyin/_/ser po rnam gnyis rgyam tsha btsod/_/shu ti dong gra pri yang ku/_/shing kun sgog skya tsha ba gsum/_/'bras bu gsum dang pa ta li/_/shu dag gi ri kar+Ni dkar/_/shi ri
[\[259b.3\]]sha yi me tog dmar/_/ba gcin bzhi cha bcas par bskol/_/btung dang bsku ba byas na phan/_/yang na de nyid ra gcin btags/_/mig bskus snar ni blugs pa phan/_/lha dang drang srong mtshun lha dang /_/dri za'i gdon la sna sman stsogs/_/rnon
[\[259b.4\]]po btang bar mi bya zhing /_/'di la zhun mar btung la sogs/_/sman ni 'jam po spyad par bya/_/sha za ma gtogs thams cad la/_/mi mthun sbyin par mi bya ste/_/mthu stobs che ba de khros nas/_/nad pa sman pa bcas gsod byed/_/'phags
[\[259b.5\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/mgon po phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/_/nad kun gso bar mdzad pa yi/_/sngags bzlas na ni nad kun sel/_/de bzhin smyo byed brjed byed dang /_/gzhan yang sems 'khrul byed pa 'joms/_/rig sngags
[\[259b.6\]]rgyal mo rma bya che/_/gtsang byas de la rtag tu bsgrags/_/'byung po'i bdag po lha chen dang /_/de yi 'khor gyi tshogs mchod cing /_/de yi sngags grub bzlas na yang /_/gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed/_/gang yang 'og nas bshad pa yi/_/
[\[259b.7\]]le'u gnyis las smos pa dang /_/gang 'dir bshad pa de dag kun/_/phan tshun sbyor ba byas na phan/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas smyo byed gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]smyo byed nad gzhi re re dang /_/'dus stsogs dug las gyur pa drug_/smyo byed ces bya lus dang ni/_/sems kyi nad lam log pa ru/_/zhugs pas smyos par gyur pa yin/_/bza' btung gnod pa dag dang ni/_/snying dang ma goms dri mar bcas/_/
[\[260a.2\]]mang nyung ma snyoms bsten pa dang /_/yid zhum snying stobs chung ba dang /_/nad kyi shugs kyis dkrugs pa dang /_/rid cing spyod pa ma snyoms dang /_/mchod 'os mchod par mi byed dang /_/sems las kyis ni sems nyams dang /_/dug dang nye ba'i dug las gyur/_/'di yis
[\[260a.3\]]snying stobs zhan pa yi/_/snying gi nad la gnod byas te/_/blo ni dri ma can byas te/_/yid rgyu ba yi lam bkag nas/_/smyo byed dag ni skyed par byed/_/de yis blo dang rnam shes dang /_/dran pa 'khrul zhing lus kyi ni/_/bde dang sdug bsngal las nyams te/_/shing rta
[\[260a.4\]]kha lo sgyur ba ni/_/med pa lta bur rtsom pa ni/_/kun kyang bsam pa med par spyod/_/de la rlung gyur lus sbeg cing /_/rgyu med ngu zhing tshig rtsub smra/_/dgod dang 'dzum dang gar byed dang /_/glu len rol mo byed pa dang /_/lus bskyod pheg ni rdob pa dang /_/gling bu
[\[260a.5\]]pi wang la sogs kyi/_/sgra yi lad mo yang yang zlos/_/rgyun du kha nas lbu ba 'dzag_/phan tshun rgyug cing mang du smra/_/rgyan min pas ni rgyan du byed/_/bzhon pa min pas 'gro ba rtsom/_/kha zas la ni gdu bar byed/_/de rnyed na ni mi 'dod byed/_/mig zlum mig ni
[\[260a.6\]]dmar ba dang /_/kha zas zhu nas nad ldang 'gyur/_/mkhris las spyo zhing khro ba dang /_/khu tshur bong ba rdeg cing rgyug_/grib ma chu ni grang mo 'dod/_/gcer bur 'dug cing lus mdog ser/_/med par me ni 'bar ba dang /_/skar ma mar me mthong ba'o/_/bad kan slon
[\[260a.7\]]zhing yi ga 'chus/_/kha zas rtsol dang smra ba nyung /_/bud med 'dod cing dben la dga'/_/kha chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang /_/'jigs rung gtsang sbra la mi dga'/_/gnyid che gdong ni skrangs pa dang /_/nub mo shes cher smyo ba dang /_/zos ma thag tu ldang ba yin/_/
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]'dus pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma ni/_/kun ldan de yi bdag nyid can/_/smyo byed mi bzad par shes bya/_/de ni sman pas yongs su spang /_/nor dang chung ma la sogs bral/_/brnag dka' ba las sems gdung bas/_/smyo zhing zhum la yang yang brgyal/_/
[\[260b.2\]]kyi hud kyi hud smre sngags 'don/_/glo bur du ni ngu zhing brgyal/_/de yi yon tan mang du sems/_/mya ngan gyis gdungs sems khong chud/_/gnyid yar rnam par 'khyams pa yin/_/dug gis gdong ni sngo ba dang /_/gzi nyams dbang po stobs chung ba/_/
[\[260b.3\]]shugs kyi bar du'ang 'khrul bar byed/_/mig dmar de ni spang bar bya/_/de nas rlung gyur smyo byed la/_/dang po snum gyi btung ba blud/_/lam 'gags gyur la dang por ni/_/snum bcas sbyang ba 'jam po bya/_/bad kan mkhris gyur dang po ni/_/snum dang
[\[260b.4\]]dugs bya skyug sman dang /_/bkru sman mas gtong byas pa dang /_/mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang bya/_/de ltar lus ni dag byas na/_/yid ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/de lta na yang rjes 'brangs na/_/sna sman mig sman rnon po gtang /_/sems dga'
[\[260b.5\]]dbugs 'byung skrag pa dang /_/'jigs dang rdeg dang sdigs mo byed/_/lus dris byugs dang bsku ba dang /_/dud rngub sman mar blud pa dag_/sbyar te de ni dga' 'gyur na/_/yid ni tha mal pa la sbyar/_/shing kun dang ni rtsab ru tsha/_/tsha ba gsum ni srang
[\[260b.6\]]gnyis gnyis/_/mar bre bzhi ni ba gcin bcas/_/bskol bas smyo byed 'byung po dang /_/brjed byed gdon ni sel mchog yin/_/bram+hi'i bskol khu bre do dang /_/mar bre gang dang tsha ba gsum/_/sh+ya ma dur byid bim pa dang /_/shang ka puSh+pa dong ga dang /_/sap+ta la
[\[260b.7\]]dang byi dang ga_/zho ni gnyis gnyis lde gu bskol/_/pram+ti'i sman mar zhes bshad de/_/mar ni srang res bskyed de btang /_/che tshad srang bzhi'i mar pos na/_/smyo byed brjed byed mdze yi nad/_/sel zhing mo gsham bu skyed byed/_/skad snyan tshig gsal dran pa dang /_/
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]yid gzhungs dpal ni skyed par byed/_/'bras bu gsum dang byi dang ga_/pa tra e la thang shing dang /_/e la ba lu ka dang ni/_/thal tres rnam gnyis ser po gnyis/_/s+thi ra rnam gnyis pri yang ku/_/rgya spos ru rta bri ha ti/_/nA
[\[261a.2\]]ga ge sar dong ga btsod/_/se'u 'bru bal bu'i lo ma dang /_/dzA ti kha 'bus byi dang ga/_/dan da shu dag ut+pa la/_/tsan+dan dkar po zho gnyis ni/_/zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/_/dge ba'i sman mar zhes bshad 'dis/_/'byung po'i gdon dang
[\[261a.3\]]smyo byed dang /_/brjed byed lud pa sdig can 'joms/_/skya rbab g.yan pa skem dang dug_/rmongs bag gcin snyi dbyig dug rims/_/khu ba med pa'am bu med pa'am/_/dran pa gdon gyis brlabs pa dang /_/yid gzhungs med cing tshig 'khrul dang /_/dran
[\[261a.4\]]nyams me drod chung la phan/_/stobs skyed bkra shis tshe ring zhing /_/mdangs skye skal ldan lus rgyas che/_/bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/'di la thal tres rnam gnyis sogs/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig chu dang bskol/_/de yi khu ba mar dang ba/_/lan cig
[\[261a.5\]]skyes 'o bzhi 'gyur dang /_/med rnam gnyis ra mnye ba/_/bung tshang rdo dang kha sral phre'u/_/bu ram shing dang par+Ni gnyis/_/bskol ba yi ni sman mar 'di/_/dge ba chen po zhes bya ste/_/brtas byed 'dus pa'i nad 'joms shing /_/snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag_/
[\[261a.6\]]spang spos bu ta ke shi dang /_/chu rtsa shu dag kha sral pre'u/_/kyi lce ba dang ram nye ba/_/tsa rong dza ya pu tse shel/_/sle tres tsa tra pa ra ha/_/a ti tsa ta sa ta la/_/ma hA pu ru sha dan dang /_/na gu li gnyis skyu ru ra/_/bri ka la ka dam pa/_/sA la par+Ni bcas
[\[261a.7\]]bskol mar/_/sha za chen po'i mar zhes bya/_/des ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims dang /_/smyo byed brjed byed gdon 'joms shing /_/blo dang yid gzhungs dran pa skyed/_/byis pa rnams kyi lus 'phel byed/_/bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra ba yin/_/bram+hi in+d+ra byi dang ka_/shing kun
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]spang sbos mur ba dang /_/ra sna sgog skya bong nga dkar/_/shu dag bye'u rug bi sha la/_/nA ga dan ti byi tsher ba/_/dzo ti sma ti tsha ba gsum/_/a ru ra dang sa nag rnams/_/glang po'i gcin btags ri lur byas/_/grib bskams snar blugs mig bsku zhing /_/
[\[261b.2\]]lus bskus spos bdugs smyo byed sel/_/nyungs kar dang ni sbyar ba yi/_/sna sman rnam pa sna tshogs phan/_/nyungs mar gyis ni lus bsku dang /_/nyungs kar phye ma snar bud bya/_/mdo gnas bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/dung rnon shing kun bcas pa phan/_/
[\[261b.3\]]wa dang reg 'jam 'ug pa dang /_/byi ba ra thug dza ti ka'i/_/gcin dang rtug pa spu dang ni/_/pags pa mkhris pa sen mo dang /_/spos bdugs mig sman lus bsku dang /_/byugs dang blugs pa bshad par bya/_/bad kan rlung gyur la phal cher/_/
[\[261b.4\]]khyi dang ba lang nya sha ni/_/rul ba'i bdug pas bdug par bya/_/mkhris gyur la ni tig ta'i mar/_/'tsho byed snum ni gnyis kyi mar/_/bza' dang btung ba bsil ba dang /_/mngar ba dang ni yang ba bsngags/_/ji skad bshad pa'i gtar ga gdab/_/
[\[261b.5\]]yang na sha tshon gyis 'grangs bya/_/de 'og rlung med gnas bsnyal nas/_/sems myos pa las thar bar 'gyur/_/khron pa'i chu ni nyung bar gzhug_/ltogs pa nyid du byas te bskams/_/de la chos dang nor ldan pa'i/_/gtam snyan mdza' bos sems
[\[261b.6\]]dga' bya/_/yang na sdug dang bral ba'am/_/rmad du byung ba bstan pa'am/_/bcings la yungs mar gyis bskus te/_/nyi tshan la ni gan rkyal gzhag_/kha sral phre'u'am lcags tsha'am/_/til mar chu tshan gyis reg bya/_/yang na lcag gis
[\[261b.7\]]gzhus nas ni/_/bcings te g.yang sar skyur bar bya/_/yang na rdo dang mtshon med pa'i/_/mun khang mi ni med par gzhug_/mche ba ston pa'i sbrul dang ni/_/glang dang seng ge glang po ches/_/de ni skrag tu gzhug pa'am/_/yang na rgyal po'i skyes bu
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]yis/_/dam du bcings te phyir phyung nas/_/rgyal po'i bka' yis bsdigs pa dang /_/'di bsad bya zhes skrag tu gzhug_/lus kyi sdug bsngal 'jigs pa bas/_/srog gi 'jigs par rab 'jigs pas/_/de phyir kun tu 'khrul
[\[262a.2\]]pa'i yid/_/nye bar zhi ba nyid du 'gyur/_/grub pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/_/nad dmigs dus sogs ltos te bya/_/sdug dang nor dang bral ba las/_/gang gi yid la gnod gyur pa/_/de la de 'dra rnyed gyur pa'i/_/spro bsring dbugs dbyung ba yis gso/_/
[\[262a.3\]]'dod dang mya ngan 'jigs pa dang /_/khro dang 'jigs pa chang las gyur/_/gnyis dag gis ni gcig la gcig_/de dag nyid kyis zhi bar bya/_/bshad pa'i mtshan ma las lhag pa/_/gdon dang rjes 'brel yin zhes bya/_/gal te smyo byed gdon
[\[262a.4\]]las gyur/_/gdon gsor bshad pa'i sman sbyar bya/_/til btags phye ma nas dang zan/_/snum zhing mngar ba'i kha zas dang /_/'bras ni khrag tu sbrus pa dang /_/sha ni btses pa rjen pa dang /_/'bru chang sbyar chang mnan pa'i chang /_/a ti mug+ti'i me tog
[\[262a.5\]]dang /_/dzA ti sa ha ra dza yi/_/me tog bcas pa'i gtor ma ni/_/lam gyi bzhi mdo ba lang lhas/_/chu bo 'dus pa dag tu sbyin/_/gang zhig sha dang chang spangs shing /_/phan la brtson zhing gtsang sbra che/_/snying stobs can la lhan cig skyes/_/glo
[\[262a.6\]]bur smyo byed 'byung mi 'gyur/_/dbang po'i don ni gsal ba dang /_/de bzhin blo dang yid gsal ba/_/lus zungs tha mal par gnas pa/_/smyo byed dang bral mtshan ma yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste
[\[262a.7\]]drug pa'o//_//de nas brjed byed gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/brjed byed dran pa nyams pa ste/_/de ni snying stobs blo 'khrul dang /_/sems las mya ngan 'jigs sogs kyis/_/gnod gyur sems las byung ba yin/_/lus sems gtogs pa'i nad kyis ni/_/
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]smyo byed bzhin du 'khrug 'gyur bas/_/snying stobs nyams zhing snying dang ni/_/'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs khyab/_/mun par zhugs snyam sems shing rmongs/_/'jigs su rung ba'i bya ba byed/_/so 'cha' lbu ba skyug pa dang /_/lag pa rkang pa g.yob pa dang /_/gzugs
[\[262b.2\]]med par yang mthong ba dang /_/'khrul zhing sa la 'gyel ba dang /_/smin ma mi g.yo nad shugs dang /_/bral nas sad par gyur pa dang /_/de ni dus gzhan dag tu yang /_/de bzhin du ni spyod pa yin/_/rlung la sogs dang 'dus pa yi/_/dbye bas brjed byed rnam
[\[262b.3\]]pa bzhi/_/de ni skye bar gyur pa'i tshul/_/snying 'dar khong stong mgo 'khor la/_/mun par mthong zhing sems khong chud/_/smin ma mi sdug mig 'gyur dang /_/sgra mi thos shing rngul 'byung la/_/kha chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang /_/mi 'ju yi ga 'chus shing brgyal/_/
[\[262b.4\]]lto sbos nyams stobs zad pa dang /_/gnyid med skom zhing yan lag na/_/rmi lam glu len gar byed dang /_/til mar chang ni 'thung ba dang /_/de nyid gcin du 'byung ba rmi/_/de la rlung gyur brla 'gul zhing /_/yang dang yang du 'gyel ba dang /_/yang dang yang du dran pa
[\[262b.5\]]stor/_/'du shes rnyed nas mi gsal du/_/mig 'bur yang yang dbugs 'byin zhing /_/lbu bar skyug cing 'dar ba dang /_/so 'cha' mgo ni rdebs pa dang /_/rlung gis gre ba rgyas par byed/_/yan lag kun du rdebs pa dang /_/sor mo mi snyoms 'gugs pa
[\[262b.6\]]dang /_/mig dang pags pa sen mo ni/_/gnag cing rtsub mor snang ba dang /_/gzugs ni mi brtan rtsub pa dang /_/mi sdug bzhin ras ngan pa yin/_/mkhris pa las gyur brjed byed ni/_/dran pa yang yang nyams pa dang /_/mig mdog pags pa lbu ba ser/_/
[\[262b.7\]]sa la rdeg par byed pa dang /_/'jigs rung 'bar zhing khro ba yi/_/gzugs mthong skom dad che ba yin/_/bad kan las gyur ring nas 'dzin/_/yung ring nyid nas sad par byed/_/g.yo 'gul nyung zhing kha chu mang /_/kha mig pags pa sen mo dkar/_/gzugs
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]rnams dkar por mthong ba yin/_/mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa spang /_/de nas blo sems dran pa dang /_/snying ga'i sbubs ni sad byed pa'i/_/slon sman la sogs las rnams ni/_/rnon po yis ni sbyang bar bya/_/rlung gyur 'jam rtsi mang du bya/_/
[\[263a.2\]]mkhris gyur phal cher bkru sman gtang /_/bad kan phal cher skyug sman ni/_/btang bas brjed byed gso bar bya/_/rnam pa kun tu legs dag cing /_/legs par spro ni bsring ba la/_/brjed byed las ni thar bya'i phyir/_/zhi bar bya ba'i sbyor bar nyon/_/
[\[263a.3\]]ba lci khu ba 'o ma dang /_/zho dang gcin dang mar bskol ba/_/brjed byed rims dang smyo byed dang /_/mig ser sel bar byed pa blud/_/rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum/_/dug mo nyung shun ser po gnyis/_/a pa marga lo ma bdun/_/ni li ni dang pu tse shel/_/dong ga puSh+kar
[\[263a.4\]]mU la dang /_/phal gu'i rtsa ba byi tsher srang /_/gnyis gnyis chu bre bcu drug nang /_/bskol ba la ni bzhi cha lus/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba du ba ri/_/pa ta dan da dur byid dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang ro hi She/_/mur ba rtsa mkhris bu di kha/_/ha ti pi pi ling dang ni/_/ma du yan te thal
[\[263a.5\]]tres gnyis/_/lcang ma dang ni tsi tra ka_/zho ni gnyis gnyis mar bre gang /_/de bzhin snga ma'i gsher rdzas bskol/_/'di ni ba yi rnam lnga che/_/brjed byed rims dang dmu rdzing dang /_/mtshan par rdol ba sel mchog yin/_/'or nad gzhang 'brum mig ser dang /_/skya rbab skran dang lud
[\[263a.6\]]pa dang /_/gdon rnams 'joms par byed pa yin/_/bram+hi shu dag ru rta dang /_/shang ka puSh+pa mar rnying bcas/_/bskol ba'i mar ni yid gzhungs byed/_/smyo byed bkra mi shis pa dang /_/brjed byed sdig pa 'joms par byed/_/'tsho byed sde tshan srang re dang /_/til mar zhun
[\[263a.7\]]mar bre re bsres/_/'o ma bre ni bcu drug bskol/_/'thungs na brjed byed las thar byed/_/'o ma bu ram shing khu ba/_/bre bzhi dang ni tang pal gyi/_/khu ba brgyad 'gyur dag dang ni/_/'tsho byed sde tshan zho gnyis gnyis/_/zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol blud/_/des
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ni rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i/_/brjed byed myur du sel bar byed/_/de bzhin 'jag ma'i bid ri/_/ku sha bu ram shing 'o ma/_/bskol ba 'thungs pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/ku sman ta yi khu ba mar/_/bco brgyad 'gyur dang shing mngar gyi/_/lde gur bcas pa
[\[263b.2\]]bskol bas ni/_/brjed byed sel bar byed pa dang /_/blo dang tshig gsal skad snyan byed/_/ba ni ser skya'i mkhris pa yi/_/sna sman btang yang mchog tu phan/_/khyi dang wa dang byi la dang /_/seng ge sogs kyi mkhris pa bsngags/_/go da sre mo glang po
[\[263b.3\]]che/_/ba lang dred dang pri sha ta'i/_/mkhris pa til mar bskol ba dag_/lus bsku snar ni blugs na'ang phan/_/'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/nas tshig 'khus thal ko nyon tshe/_/pha ni dza ka sra rtsi pog_/a pa marga ka rany+dza'i/_/sa bon til mar ra
[\[263b.4\]]gcin dang /_/bcas pa bskol ba snar blugs pa'am/_/phye ma sna nas bus pa'ang phan/_/sre mo 'ug pa spre'u dang /_/bya rgod khyi rta bya rog sbrul/_/chu dang sgro dang rtug pa yi/_/dud pas 'di la bdug par bya/_/til mar sgog skya bcas pa'am/_/
[\[263b.5\]]'o ma nye'u shing bsten yang phan/_/bram+hi 'am ru rta'i khu ba'am/_/shu dag sbrang rtsir ldan pa'ang phan/_/nad gzhi mnyam du 'khrugs pa las/_/lus dang sems la brten 'gyur nad/_/skyes par gyur pa gang yin de/_/brjed byed gnad ni chen por
[\[263b.6\]]gnas/_/de bas gso dka' 'di la ni/_/bcud kyis len gyis gso bar bya/_/des nyen me dang chu la sogs/_/ya nga ba las rtag tu bsrung /_/thar pa na ni yid 'khrul bas/_/khyed kyis 'di ltar byas so zhes/_/mi brjod yul ni
[\[263b.7\]]yid 'ong bas/_/nyams pa'i sems ni brta bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_'byung po'i gdon gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so//_//
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]de nas mig mchu'i nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o/_/nad kun nad gzhi las bshad pa'i/_/gnod pas nad ni 'khrugs pa dang /_/mchog tu mig la gnod pa dang /_/phal cher mkhris pa skyed pa yis/_/rtsa las gyen du rgyus nas ni/_/
[\[264a.2\]]mig gi yan lag mig mchu grwa/_/dkar nag mthong byed rgyal mo'am/_/mig kun la gnas nad skyed byed/_/de la rlung ni mig mchu yi/_/rtsa la zhugs par gyur pa dag_/nyal nas ldang tshe mig mchu ni/_/har bag na dang bcas par byed/_/mig ni rdul gyis
[\[264a.3\]]gang snyam sems/_/'dzums par dka' zhing mchi ma 'dzag_/mnyes na bde ba snyam du byed/_/de ni 'dzums dka' yin zhes bshad/_/rlung gis mig mchu bskyod nas ni/_/yang dang yang du 'byed cing 'dzums/_/'di ni 'dzums pa zhes bshad do/_/gra mtshams
[\[264a.4\]]lhod cing tshor ba med/_/rtag tu 'dzums shing mig nyams pa/_/gang yin de ni rlung gnod yin/_/mkhris pas mig mchu'i mtha' mar ni/_/'brum bu ku mu ta yi ni/_/sa bon 'dra slar gang gyur pa/_/'brum phran ku mu ta zhes bya/_/tsha zhing 'drul la nad dang bcas/_/
[\[264a.5\]]dmar zhing reg na mi bzod pa/_/mkhris pas mig mchur skyes pa de/_/mkhris pas skyes pa yin zhes bshad/_/mkhris pa rdzi ma'i nang gnas shing /_/g.ya' zhing tsha bar byed pa dang /_/de rjes rdzi ma 'byi ba ste/_/rdzi ma 'byi ba zhes bshad do/_/bad kan las gyur mig
