[\[264a.6\]]mchu'i nad/_/'brum phran dkar po yungs kar 'dra/_/mthug skrangs g.ya' na mig rdul khebs/_/spyi bag can 'dzag po dag kyang /_/har bag 'drul ba rdu mas khebs/_/bad kan gyis bslangs mig mchu'i nad/_/bad kan las gyur rmen bu dkar/_/na zhing smin ma med
[\[264a.7\]]g.ya' sra/_/rgya shug tsam mam de las ni/_/cung zad chung ba chags pa yin/_/khrag las 'brum phran dmar ba dang /_/de mtshungs 'brum phran gyis khyab pa/_/brtsegs pa zhes bya des skyed dmar/_/reg mi bzod pa mig mchu slongs/_/mig mchu'i nang du sha lhag
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]ni/_/sra zhing snum la tsha zhing na/_/mdog dmar de ni khrag 'dzag cing /_/bcad bzhin 'phel byed mig 'brum yin/_/mig mchu'i mtha' 'am dbus su ni/_/g.ya' zhing tshal na bcas brtan/_/mung+ga tsam gyi khrag 'brum dmar/_/'brum phran mig nad ces bya'o/_/
[\[264b.2\]]nad kyis mig mchu'i phyi rol skrangs/_/nang du bu ga phra mos khyab/_/'dzag bcas nang na chu yod de/_/pad+ma'i rtsa 'dra pad rtsa yin/_/nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs pas/_/mig mchu'i nad ni ldang ba dang /_/rgyu med par ni gnyid 'gyur gang /_/de ni mig mchu
[\[264b.3\]]'khrugs zhes bya/_/nad kyis mig mchu dri ma khrag_/skrangs rnags na bcas mig mchu sngo/_/g.ya' zhing skrangs la dmar ba dang /_/mig mchu 'byar ba 'byar zhes bya/_/mig mchu'i nad ni sra zhing rtsub/_/'brum phran bye ma 'dra zhes bya/_/gnag cing 'dam 'dra
[\[264b.4\]]'dam bu'o/_/mdog 'dra sha ni mang pos rgyas/_/na shas che ba zhes bya'o/_/byis pa so skyes tshe na 'byung /_/des ni byis pa'i mig skrang zhing /_/mig dmar lta bar mi nus la/_/mig mchu gzer zhing spyi bag 'dzag_/rna ba sna dang mig nyed byed/_/gang yin de ni sgra ngan
[\[264b.5\]]yin/_/rdzi 'gags rdzi ma 'dus shing zhum/_/mig mchu'ang de 'drar gyur pa dang /_/rtsub cing nang du kha bltas la/_/spu gzhan yang ni tsher ma ltar/_/rtse mo rnon po skyes gyur cing /_/des bdar mig ni skrangs pa dang /_/tsha zhing rlung la sogs mi bzod/_/bton na cung
[\[264b.6\]]zad bde bar byed/_/mig phugs grwa mtshams phyi rol du/_/thor bu sra zhing mtho ba dang /_/dmar zhing mchi ma rnag khrag 'dzag_/yang yang rgyas pa slon pa yin/_/nad gzhi gsum dang khrag las ni/_/mig mchu'i nang na sha'i dum bu/_/rmen bu sra la nad med la/_/
[\[264b.7\]]phyi rol mi mnyam g.yo mdzer pa/_/de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhi po/_/mig mchu la gnas nad yin no/_/de la dang por sman gyis gso/_/de 'og gnyis dang 'brum bu spang /_/rdzi ma 'gags pa gsor rung tsam/_/lhag ma mtshon gyis gso bar bya/_/de dag las kyang rdzi
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ma 'phyi/_/gtsags par bya la mig mdzer gcad/_/chags dang pad rtsa ku mu ta/_/brtsegs dang 'brum phran slon pa 'dral/_/mig mchu'i sha sngo bye ma 'dra/_/'byar dang bskyed bya zhes pa bzhi/_/'dam chas shas cher byas pa dang /_/sgra ngan
[\[265a.2\]]bcas pa mtshon gyis bzhar/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u brgyad pa'o//_//de nas mig mchu'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/'dzums pa dka' la mar rnying ni/_/rgun 'bru'i lde gu chur bskol bar/_/kha ra btab
[\[265a.3\]]dang sna sman dang /_/dud pa mig sman snum can gtang /_/ku mu ta la zhal zhal btab/_/de steng rgyam tsha gdab par bya/_/shing mngar dang ni skyu ru ra/_/pa to la bskol chu blugs bya/_/rlung med gnas la g.yog mkhas kyis/_/sbyang byas gan rkyal nyal ba la/_/
[\[265a.4\]]mig mchu bzlog ste dro 'jam chur/_/bsros pa'i gos kyis dugs byas la/_/gos kyis legs par dkris nas ni/_/g.yon pa'i mtheb mdzub kyis bzung zhing /_/'gul zhing 'gyur ba med par ni/_/de nas mig mchu kun tu ni/_/dkyil 'khor lta bu'i mtshon gyis
[\[265a.5\]]ni/_/'phred du gdab cing mtshan ma byas/_/de nyid kyis sam lo rtsub bam/_/she pa li yi lo ma'am/_/yang na rgya mtsho'i lbu bas brud/_/khrag ni ras bal ye'us phyi/_/khrag bcas legs par brud shes nas/_/rang rang sman ni sbrang rtsi dang /_/bcas pa
[\[265a.6\]]de la bsku bar bya/_/de 'og chu dron gyis bkrus la/_/mar gyis blugs par bya ba dang /_/rna ba'i steng dang 'og gi bar/_/nas kyi zan dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/mar dang bcas pas dkri bar bya/_/zhag ni gnyis pa la dgrol te/_/ji lta bar ni sman blugs shing /_/bzhi
[\[265a.7\]]par sna sman la sogs bya/_/zhag ni lnga pa dag la dgrol/_/mnyam zhing sen mo ltar dmar la/_/skrangs g.ya' drud sogs nad med pa/_/mig mchu sbyar legs yin zhes bya/_/de las bzlog pa slar bzhar bya/_/bzhar drags pas ni na ba dang /_/rdzi ma 'byi zhing mig
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]mchu 'gyur/_/de la snum dang dugs la sogs/_/rlung la phan pa'i sbyor ba bsngags/_/mar sar gyis ni bsku bya zhing /_/seng phrom dkar po mar sar gyis/_/legs par bsku ba byas nas ni/_/e raN+Da yi rtsa ba yi/_/lde gus byugs te phur mas btso/_/tshos
[\[265b.2\]]pa bkrus te bskams nas ni/_/btags pa thum po byas nas ni/_/ra 'am bud med 'o mar ni/_/mnyes pa mig tu blugs par bya/_/de nyid sA lu thug po che'i/_/lde gu bskus te de ltar byas/_/zho dang zho ga chus spangs pa/_/mig ni bzhar drags gyur la blugs/_/
[\[265b.3\]]yang na zho ga chu nyi tshe/_/blugs shing skam sa'i sha khu sbyin/_/'brum phran sra zhing mtho ba ni/_/'bras kyi rtse mos brtol bar bya/_/de rjes btsir te cho ga ni/_/lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bya/_/zhal zhal gdab dang 'dral ba la/_/rim 'dis mig mchu'i nad kun sbyar/_/
[\[265b.4\]]khrag mkhris las gyur mngar ba yi/_/sde tshan dang bskol mar gyis gso/_/snum gyur nas ni gtar ga gdab/_/dur byid bkru sman btang ba mchog_/bzhar zhing khrag ni phyung nas kyang /_/shing mngar bskol ba'i chus bkru zhing /_/tsan+dan dkar po 'o mar bskol/_/
[\[265b.5\]]mig mchu la ni blugs pa phan/_/rdzi ma 'byi la khab kyis ni/_/ba spu'i bu ga gtsags pa'am/_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo /_/yang na 'o ma'am bu ram shing /_/khu bas slon bya mngar bsil sman/_/bskol ba'i mar ni gtang bar bya/_/nag tshur dkar po'i phye
[\[265b.6\]]ma ni/_/bye'u rug pa'i khu bar bsres/_/zangs kyi snod du bcug pa ste/_/rdzi ma 'byi ba'i mig sman mchog_/mig mchu'i sha brud bca' sga dang /_/rgyam tsha'i phye ma gdab par bya/_/chu dron gyis bkrus seng ldeng dang /_/na le sham dkar tu pa ri/_/chu bskol ba'am ser po
[\[265b.7\]]gnyis/_/shing mngar dang ni 'bras bu gsum/_/khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas pa blugs/_/bad kan las gyur zhal zhal byas/_/nag tshur rgyam tsha pi pi ling /_/ldong ros stang zil zhib btags la/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku bar bya/_/skyug sman mig sman sna sman ni/_/bad
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]kan sel ba thams cad phan/_/chags pa la yang 'di dag bya/_/ma zhi me btsa' gdab par bya/_/sgra ngan la ni seng ldeng dang /_/nim pa'i lo ma 'bras bu gsum/_/mar dang sbyar ba'am pi pi ling /_/shing mngar rgyam tsha bskol ba ni/_/ma mas
[\[266a.2\]]blud de slon du gzhug_/rgun 'brum dang ni a ru ra/_/pi pi ling bskol ba kru sman sbyin/_/ser po rnam gnyis pi pi ling /_/gla sgang lde gus nu ma bsku/_/nyungs kar mar bcas dud pas bdug_/sbyang ba byas nas pa to la/_/gla sgang dang ni rgun 'brum dang /_/sle tres
[\[266a.3\]]'bras bu gsum bskol blud/_/byis pa'i mig mchu brud pa'am/_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/_/a sman ta ka skyu ru ra/_/'dzam bu'i lo ma bskol ba blugs/_/byis pa 'o ma mar bsten pas/_/phal cher bad kan nad 'byung bas/_/de bas dang por skyug sman nyid/_/
[\[266a.4\]]nad kun la ni bsngags pa yin/_/lce myang tsha dang pi pi ling /_/a pa marga'i 'bras bu mar/_/'o ma shu dag sbrang rtsir bcas/_/po son cha ni shing mngar bcas/_/'o ma kha zas 'o ma dang /_/zas la brten pa'i byis pa la/_/rim bzhin blud pas nad kun ni/_/sbyang par bya phyir
[\[266a.5\]]slon sman gtang /_/mchog tu sgra ngan nad la phan/_/sap+ta la yi khu ba mar/_/bskol ba gnyis ka sbyong byed sbyin/_/seng phrom shing mngar ser po gnyis/_/nim pa'i lo ma pu tse shel/_/zangs kyi phye mar bcas reng bu/_/sgra ngan gyi ni nad la phan/_/yang na lcags kyi
[\[266a.6\]]phye ma bsregs/_/'o ma sbrang rtsi mar bcas phan/_/sug smel sgog skya ka ta ka_/pha ni dza ka na le sham/_/dung bcas chu dang bdar ba dang /_/kad pha la bcas ri lu'ang phan/_/rdzi ma'i 'gags nad 'phel ba la/_/sbyang ba byas par gyur pa ni/_/smin ma'i 'og gi cha gnyis dang /_/
[\[266a.7\]]rdzi ma'i cha gcig bar bar ni/_/nas kyi tshad tsam nas kyi dbyibs/_/'phred du dbral la ras rlon pas/_/de yi khrag ni bsal nas ni/_/khrag ni chung bar gyur pa dang /_/bar mtshams mung+ga tsam bzhag la/_/khab ni yon pos btsem par bya/_/dpral ba ras kyis bcings nas
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ni/_/de bzhin skud pas btsem par bya/_/shin tu dam dang lhod min par/_/der ni legs par btsem par bya/_/de nas sbrang rtsi'i mar gyis byug_/'di la bcing bar mi bya'o/_/na na n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/_/khu ba 'o mar bcas pa blugs/_/zhag lnga pa la skud pa ni/_/
[\[266b.2\]]bsal te yug snam phye ma ni/_/rma la legs par gdab par bya/_/sna sman mig sman rnon po gtang /_/zhag bcu'i mthar yang ma sos na/_/mig mchur brten gnyer bzlog ste bsreg_/rdzi ma'i lhag ma tsher zungs kyis/_/phyung la de yi gnas dag ni/_/me yi mdog 'dra'i
[\[266b.3\]]khab rtses bsreg_/phyi rol rlon pa bsregs pa dang /_/thor bu bcad par gyur pa la/_/me 'am thal sman rnon pos bsreg_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u dgu pa'o//_//de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag gi
[\[266b.4\]]nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o/_/rlung 'khrugs pas ni chu rgyu ba'i/_/rtsar song nas ni chu 'dra ba'i/_/mchi ma mig mchu mig phugs kyi/_/mtshams nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur/_/des ni nad med rtsa dmar la/_/skrangs 'gyur de ni chu 'dzag yin/_/bad kan las gyur
[\[266b.5\]]spyi bag mang /_/dkar ba bad kan 'dzag pa yin/_/bad kan gyis skrangs rtse mo rno/_/lan tshwa'i chu bur 'dra ba 'byung /_/rtsa ba che zhing g.yo la snum/_/mdog 'dra 'jam zhing spyi bag can/_/che zhing smin dka' g.ya' dang bcas/_/gzer med bcings pa lta bu yin/_/khrag
[\[266b.6\]]las mchi ma khrag 'dzag dmar/_/shas cher dro ba khrag 'dzag yin/_/mig mchu gra mtshams dkar po ru/_/'brum phran tsha zhing gzer dang bcas/_/dmar zhing mung+ga 'dra lags/_/khrag 'dzag de ni tshigs can yin/_/rnag 'dzag dri ma khrag dang bcas/_/mig phugs kyi
[\[266b.7\]]ni gra mtshams nas/_/yang dang yang du rnag 'dzag cing /_/sha lpags 'drul bas mchi mar bcas/_/rnag sla 'dzag pa rma phra zhing /_/skrangs shing g.yo ba che ba dang /_/mig phugs mtshams skrangs rnag 'dzag cing /_/nad bcas rnag gi chu ser 'dzag_/mig phugs kyi
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]ni mtshams nang na/_/skrangs zug tsha bcas chu ser nad/_/mig zur ram ni mig phugs su/_/g.ya' zhing rdzi ma'i bu ga nas/_/rnag 'dzag srin dang rmen bu 'byung /_/na bcas srin gyi rmen bu can/_/bcings pa lta bu'i srin rmen bu/_/rnag gi chu
[\[267a.2\]]ser tshigs can dag_/mtshon gyis gso bya lhag ma lnga/_/'dzag pa chu ser bcas pa spangs/_/mkhris pas dkar po'i thig le ni/_/nag pa'am sngo ba'am ser po skyed/_/gur gum me long dri mas gos/_/ltar snang na dang tsha ba med/_/'khru zhing skom dad rims dang bcas/_/
[\[267a.3\]]nad gzhi nya phyis can zhes bya/_/bad kan las dkar sha lhag dkar/_/ring nas 'phel ba mig mdzer dkar/_/nad med pa la skrangs pa dang /_/mdog dkar lhun chen 'jam pa dang /_/lci snum chu yi thigs pa 'dra/_/bad kan mdud pa zhes byar bshad/_/thig le
[\[267a.4\]]'bras phye ltar dkar ba/_/mtho ba 'bras phye 'dra zhes bshad/_/dkar po'i ri mo dmar pos khyab/_/tsha zhing na dang bcas pa dang /_/skrangs shing mchi mas gos pa med/_/khrag gyur rtsa yi nges par bshad/_/rtsa'i nyes yal bar bor na ni/_/dmar ris de nyid 'phel bar
[\[267a.5\]]'gyur/_/khrag bcas rtsa ni brtse bar byed/_/de yis mig gis blta mi nus/_/rtsa yi dra bas g.yogs shing stug_/mtho ba rtsa yi dra ba yin/_/khrag gis mig mdzer 'jam zhing mnyam/_/pad+ma 'dra ba sha lhag yin/_/nad med ri bong khrag ltar dmar/_/thig le ling
[\[267a.6\]]thog dmar po yin/_/'jam shing nad med myur du 'phel/_/dkar por khyab byed dmar nag ni/_/khyab pa'i mdzer pa zhes bya'o/_/dri ma khrag bcas rtsa'i mdzer pa/_/rtsa rgyus dang 'dra rtsa mdzer yin/_/khrag skam gong bu ltar gnag cing /_/sha ni che zhing rgyas pa gang /_/de ni
[\[267a.7\]]sha lhag mdzer pa yin/_/tsha zhing reg na rtsub pa dang /_/rtsas g.yogs mig 'bras nag dang nye/_/'brum phran nyungs kar lta bus rtsa/_/nya phyis rtsa brtse rtsa'i nyes pa/_/'bras phye 'dus pa'i ling tog dmar/_/drug po sman gyis gso bar bya/_/lhag ma bdun po mtshon
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]gyis gso/_/de yang sar pa sman gyis gso/_/mdzer pa bshad pa lnga po gang /_/rgyus pa dang ni rtsas g.yogs pa/_/nag por phyin zhing pags gas 'dra/_/mthon po gcad par bya ba yin/_/mthong byed steng du phyin pa spang /_/nag po'am mthong byed la mkhris pas/_/
[\[267b.2\]]pags pa brtol te ling tog ni/_/zug dmar mchi mar bcas pa skyed/_/de yis mig 'bras dkyil 'khor rnag_/'dzam bu smin pa 'drar snang zhing /_/dma' ba rma yi ling tog ste/_/de ni gso dka' rim gnyis dag_/brtol ba gso ba tsam yin no/_/der ni zug pa la
[\[267b.3\]]sogs mang /_/nag po khab kyis phug snyam byed/_/rim pa gsum ni brtol ba dang /_/rma yis khyab pa gsor mi rung /_/bad kan las gyur dung ltar dkar/_/shas cher mi na gso sla dkar/_/dmar zhing mchi ma spyi bag 'dzag_/'brum phran dmar zhing shin tu na/_/
[\[267b.4\]]ra yi ril ma 'dra zhing 'bur/_/khrag skyes ra ril 'dra ba spang /_/nad khrag bcas pas rtsa'i ling tog_/de yis mig 'bras nag po khebs/_/na zhing tsha la dmar ba yi/_/rtsa yis kun tu rgyas gyur la/_/rgyu med mchi ma grang dro dang /_/ska sla 'dzag pa de spang bya/_/nad gzhi
[\[267b.5\]]khrag las mthong bcas rnag_/'bras bu dkar por sgyur byed de/_/sprin dkar gyis ni g.yogs 'dra zhing /_/nim pa ba ni bkas pa 'dra/_/shin tu mi bzad na zhing dmar/_/tsha zhing skrangs pas gzir ba dag_/smin pas nyen pa'i ling tog ste/_/mi bzad na ba spang bar
[\[267b.6\]]bya/_/gang gis mtshan ma nyams pa'am/_/nang sngo ba'am dmar bcas pas/_/shin tu 'bur ba'am gting ring pa 'am/_/mchi mar bcas shing rtsa'i rmas khyab/_/rnying pa'am mtho dma' can dag gam/_/dbus chang ling tog spang bar bya/_/nag po'i nad ni gsor rung dang /_/
[\[267b.7\]]mi rung dbye ba rnam lnga yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu pa'o//_//de nas mig zur dang mig gi 'bras bu dkar po dang nag po'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/mig nad bcings pa sman pa yis/_/dugs byas
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]rtse mo 'bras 'dras dbug_/rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra bas bzhar/_/de 'og rgyam tsha pi pi ling /_/sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/de nas snga ma bzhin du bcings/_/pa to la'i lo skyu ru ra/_/bskol ba'i sman khu thigs pas blugs/_/tshigs can
[\[268a.2\]]lcags kyu'i cha spyad kyis/_/phyi yi mtshams kyi tsha gsum gzung /_/'phel gtsags kyis ni phyed gcad bya/_/gzhan du mchi ma rgyu la gnod/_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tshas bskus nas ni/_/mig mdzer lta bur gso bar bya/_/chu ser rnag 'dzag gtar ga gdab/_/de nas de ni
[\[268a.3\]]bcing bar bya/_/mig rnags cho gar bshad pa yi/_/las kun cho ga ji bzhin bya/_/rgyam tsha sge'u gsher nag tshur dang /_/lcags dang zangs ni zhib btags pa'i/_/phye ma'i mig sman btang ba'am/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i khu ba blugs/_/srin gyi rmen bu lci ba yis/_/dugs
[\[268a.4\]]byas brtol te phyi bar bya/_/nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/nya phyis mkhris mchi 'dzag ltar gso/_/bad kan 'dud pa 'bras phye gnyis/_/gtar ga ma gtogs bad kan gyi/_/mchi ma 'dzag pa bzhin du gso/_/tsha ba gsum dang
[\[268a.5\]]kad pha la/_/ba lung khu ba'i mig sman gtang /_/rgyam tsha dzA ti kha 'bus pa/_/thang shing bca' sga btags pa'i phye/_/chang gi dngas mas ri lur byas/_/mig sman skrangs dang g.ya' ba sel/_/rtsa nyes rtsa brtse ling tog dmar/_/rtsa dra khrag 'dzag lta bur gso/_/rtsa yi
[\[268a.6\]]nyes la khyad par du/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman bsku/_/rtsa brtse ba la sbrang rtsi dang /_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da zhib btags bsku/_/ling tog dmar po zho ga chu/_/sbrang rtsi kha ra'i thigs pa blugs/_/shel dang gur gum shing mngar dung /_/sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gtang /_/
[\[268a.7\]]yang na sbrang rtsi dung sbyar ba'am/_/kha ra rgya mtsho'i lbu ba phan/_/mdzer par bshad pa rnam lnga las/_/dud pa lta bu'i rnyog can dang /_/gang yang dmar zhing zho 'dra ba/_/de sman ling tog bzhin du bya/_/cig shos gan rkyal bzhag dugs byas/_/kha lung dang ni rgyam tsha dag_/sbyar
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ba'i mig sman bskus nas ni/_/mig btsums nas ni mnye bar bya/_/de ltar mig ni 'khrugs bcas pa/_/sha lhag skyes pa bskyod nas ni/_/mgo bo mi 'gyur dam du gzung /_/mig mchu mchog tu mi 'gul bya/_/mig zur du ni blta bzhin du/_/mig phug mtshams
[\[268b.2\]]nas mdzer pa mtho/_/gang du gnyer ma 'dus gyur pa/_/der ni lcags kyus dam bzung ba'am/_/ha cang mi che mu tsi tra'am/_/khab bam skud pas blangs nas ni/_/kun nas dkyil 'khor 'dra bas 'dral/_/de nas bton te dral nas kyang /_/mig phug mtshams
[\[268b.3\]]su bsnyen nas ni/_/cha bzhi lus par gcad bya ste/_/mig phug rtsa dang mchi ma ni/_/'dzag pa'i rtsa la mi gnod bsrung /_/mig phug zur bcad mchi ma 'dzag_/mig gi rtsa sbubs rma can 'gyur/_/mig 'gram mdzer pa cher skyes la/_/mig phug zur du bltas te bya/_/
[\[268b.4\]]legs par bcad de tsha ba gsum/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa bsku/_/zhun mar dron mo blugs pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar bskus te bcings/_/de nas zhag gsum la sogs nas/_/bkrol nas ka rany+dza'i sa bon/_/'o ma bskol ba de bzhin blugs/_/ser po rnam
[\[268b.5\]]gnyis pa to la/_/shing mngar dang ni rgya skyegs shing /_/ka rany+dza yi me tog ni/_/kha 'bus sbrang rtsir bcas bskol blugs/_/zhag bdun nas ni de dgrol bya/_/legs par bcad na nad med 'gyur/_/bcad drags mchod las nad 'gyur/_/sman khu blugs dang mig sman sogs/_/
[\[268b.6\]]phyi ba dang ni brta bas gso/_/kha ra ldong ros e li ya/_/rgyam tsha bca' sga zho re dang /_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da srang phyed dang /_/sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis/_/bad kan las gyur rab rib dang /_/chu ser gyis gang ling tog dang /_/mig mdzer bcas pa'i sha lhag sel/_/'bras bu
[\[268b.7\]]gsum ni gang rung ba'i/_/shun pa chur btags lde gur byas/_/kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bsregs/_/de nas tshig nas phye mar btags/_/sman ni lhag ma'i khu ba yis/_/so sor legs par bsgos nas ni/_/snag tsha de bskams slar yang btags/_/rgyam tsha nyis 'gyur bcas
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pa yi/_/mig sman gsum po de dag ni/_/phyi ba'i mchog tu mu khyud 'chad/_/rtsa yi dras g.yogs rtsa gang zhig_/sra bas phyi ba'i sman dag gis/_/ma zhi 'brum phran de la ni/_/mig mdzer cho ga bzhin du gso/_/ling tog nad gzhi'i dbang las ni/_/snum
[\[269a.2\]]rtsub 'bras bu gsum sbyin zhing /_/tig ta chen po'i sman mar sbyin/_/gtar ga bkru sman khu ba yi/_/thigs pa blugs pa la sogs bya/_/snad pa'i ling tog dur byid chu/_/lan gsum bskol ba'i mar blud bya/_/de 'og gtar ga'am pad pa yis/_/mig las khrag ni dbyung bar
[\[269a.3\]]bya/_/ut+pal rgun 'brum ra mnye ba/_/shing mngar bi da ri bskol ba/_/kha ra ra yi 'o ma 'am/_/chu bskol thigs pa blugs par bya/_/mig dmar mchi ma nad zhi nas/_/de rjes phyi ba'i mig sman phan/_/dzA ti kha 'bus rgya skyegs dang /_/yug snam tsan+dan ri lur byas/_/khrag
[\[269a.4\]]dang mkhris pa dngas byed cing /_/snad pa las gyur ling tog sel/_/phag dang rnga mo glang po che/_/ba lang ra rta bong bu'i so/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba mu tig dang /_/na le sham ni bzhi par sbyar/_/so yi ri lus snad pa yi/_/ling tog gis khyab sel bar byed/_/ta ma'i lo ma ba lang
[\[269a.5\]]so/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba bong bu'i rus/_/zangs ma dung gcin ri lur byas/_/ling tog thams cad sel bar byed/_/rin chen so dang rwa dang ni/_/khams dang sug smel tsha ba gsum/_/sgog skya ka rany+dza'i sa bon/_/rma la phan pa'i sman rnams ni/_/rma bcas rma med gting zug
[\[269a.6\]]dang /_/pags gnas ling tog 'joms sman yin/_/sna sman snum blud sha khu ni/_/blud pas dma' ba bstod par bya/_/nad med ling tog dma' ba ni/_/phur ma btsos dang brta bas bstod/_/ling tog dkar po skyes pa dang /_/shing mngar thal tres seng phrom chu/_/blugs
[\[269a.7\]]pas seng phrom gtums pa ni/_/chu dron la spangs thigs pa blugs/_/shing mngar bri ha ti'i rtsa ba/_/rgyam tsha dong gra zangs ma ni/_/skyu ru ra'i 'bras chu dang btags/_/lde gu zangs ma'i snod la bsku/_/nas mar skyu ru ra'i lo ma/_/dud pas de 'og mang du bdugs/_/de nas ri
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]lur bya ba ni/_/de ni chu dang sbrang rtsir btags/_/mthon ka chen po zhes bya ste/_/ling tog dkar po sel mchog yin/_/ling tog brtan zhing mthug pa la/_/khrag ni lan mang dbyung bar bya/_/mgo dang lus kyi bkru sman gtang /_/phur ma btsos pa'ang lan mang gtang /_/pi pi
[\[269b.2\]]ling dang na le sham/_/rgyam tsha shri sha'i 'bras bu'am/_/'bras bu gsum bskol rgyam tshar bcas/_/blud pas gnas las bstod par bya/_/dung dang rgya shug ka ta ka_/rgun 'brum shing mngar sbrang rtsi dang /_/mur so yi dri ma yi/_/shri sha yi ni me tog bcas/_/tshigs
[\[269b.3\]]bcad phyed kyis bshad pa 'di/_/mig sman sbyor ba gtang bar bya/_/skyu ru pa ni dza'i khu bar/_/lang ka li yi thal ba ni/_/nub gcig spangs te bskams pa'i phye/_/ling tog bskyod pa'i mig sman yin/_/mung+ga spun pa med btags pa/_/dung dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang phan/_/
[\[269b.4\]]sbrang rtsi ma du ka'i snying po'am/_/ba ru ra rkang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/ba lang rta bong rnga mo'i so/_/dung dang rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang /_/ardzu ne'i chus ri lur byas/_/bskyod pa'i ling tog 'jig par byed/_/bstod pa'am zug rngur bcas pa yi/_/ling tog spu la sogs pas phyi/_/
[\[269b.5\]]rtsa yi ling tog mthong gnod med/_/snad pa'i ling tog lta bur gso/_/shing mngar stag tsher ra mnye ba/_/bri ha ti dang a ka ru/_/skyer pa'i mig sman ra'i 'o ma/_/btags pa'i lde gu nas dang mar/_/bcas pa'i dud pas bdug par bya/_/skyu ru ra yi lo ma dang /_/ri lur byas
[\[269b.6\]]pa mig sman mchog_/ma sos ra yi ril ma 'dra/_/mdzer pa lta bur mtshon gyis gso/_/ra'i ril gsor ni mi rung dang /_/ling tog de 'dra de bzhin gzhan/_/nad ma zhi na snum blud cing /_/gtar ga gdab pa la sogs bya/_/smad byas de ni bsal byas shing /_/dkar zhing
[\[269b.7\]]mtho ba gso bar bya/_/rgya star go bye lung thang dang /_/ta la smyig ma ka ri ra/_/bsres pa'i thal chu btsags pa dang /_/rnga mo'i rus pa'i phye ma bsre/_/mig sman ling tog gso dka' dang /_/mdog mi sdug pa 'joms par byed/_/gso sla la yang 'di nyid ni/_/bsten
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]pas sel bar nus pa yin/_/ra yi ril ma ngos gnyis nas/_/khab kyis phug ste chu gzags nas/_/mthe bos mnyam du btsir nas ni/_/rma yi nang ni sha phye dang /_/tshil ni rlon pas bkang nas ni/_/dkri zhing dkri zhing dgang bar bya/_/zhag bdun nas ni rma
[\[270a.2\]]'byor nas/_/mig 'bras nag po mnyam brtan la/_/mig sman snum can gtang bya zhing /_/mar dang 'o ma'i sna sman blugs/_/de lta na yang rgyas gyur na/_/dbug dang bcad sogs bya ba byas/_/bcad drags pa yis mig nang du/_/zhugs par mi 'gyur ci rigs bya/_/ling tog
[\[270a.3\]]la ni rtag par rang gi sman/_/bskol ba'i mar blud sna sman bsten pa dang /_/ci nas mthong ba nyams par mi 'gyur bar/_/mig sman rnon po rtag tu bsten par bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas
[\[270a.4\]]mthong bar byed pa'i mig nad kyi nad dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o/_/nad ni rtsa yi nang zhugs pa/_/rim pa dang por gnas nas ni/_/gzugs ni mi gsal mthong 'gyur zhing /_/rgyu med par yang gsal bar mthong /_/rim pa gnyis par phyin pa na/_/med pa dag
[\[270a.5\]]kyang mthong 'gyur zhing /_/yod cing nye bar bsgribs na mthong /_/ring nas phra ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/nye dang ring bar gnas pa'i gzugs/_/phyin ci log tu shes par 'gyur/_/nad kyis zlum po'i dbyibs 'dra par/_/zlum po nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/_/mthong byed dbus gnas
[\[270a.6\]]gcig gnyis mthong /_/mang du gnas na du ma mthong /_/mthong byed nang du zhugs pa ni/_/che chung go ni bzlog par mthong /_/'og tu gnas pas nye mi mthong /_/steng du gnas pas ring mi mthong /_/ngos la gnas pas g.yas g.yon min/_/nad 'di rab rib ces byar bshad/_/
[\[270a.7\]]nad ni rim pa gsum par brten/_/sngon po nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/de yis steng mthong 'og mi mthong /_/gos srab kyis g.yogs ltar mthong zhing /_/kha dog ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang /_/rim gyis mthong ba nyams par 'gyur/_/de lta na yang yal bar dor/_/rim pa bzhi par
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]phyin nas ni/_/mthong byed mtshan mo nyams byed cing /_/mig gi rgyal mo khebs par byed/_/de la rlung gyur rab rib ni/_/long long por ni mthong ba dang /_/g.yo zhing rnyog can rtsa dmar snang /_/chad 'ga' gsal bar mthong ba dang /_/dra ba skra shad sbrang bu dang /_/'od mthong de ni
[\[270b.2\]]yal bar bor/_/sngon por gyur la mig dmar la/_/bzhin la sna ni med par mthong /_/zla ba med sogs du mar mthong /_/yon po'ang drang por mthong bar 'gyur/_/sngon po 'phel na mthong byed ni/_/rdul gyis khebs pa lta bur mthong /_/gsal zhing dmar ba'am rgya che ba'am/_/
[\[270b.3\]]phra ba'am mthong ba nyams par 'gyur/_/de ni mthong ba nyams pa yin/_/rlung gis mig gi rtsa 'khums 'gyur/_/mthong byed gting du zhugs pa dag_/'di ni gting ring zhes byar bshad/_/mkhris gyur rab rib glog dang ni/_/srin bu me khyer me sgron 'od/_/rma bya
[\[270b.4\]]sreg pa'i sgro dang 'dra/_/phal cher sngon por mthong bar 'gyur/_/mthong byed mig ni 'khar g.ya' 'dra/_/de lta bu ni mthong ba dang /_/nyi zla 'khyims dang me dang ni/_/smig rgyu 'ja' tshon mthong bar 'gyur/_/bung ba ltar sngo mthong ba med/_/'bras bu snum pa mthong nyams yin/_/mkhris pa mig
[\[270b.5\]]ni chung zhes bshad/_/chung mthong de ni thung ngu yin/_/ser zhing dngos po ser por mthong /_/mkhris pas tshig par gyur zhes bya/_/bad kan rab rib phal cher ni/_/snum zhing dkar bar mthong ba dang /_/dung dang zla ba kun+da dang /_/kun+da'i me tog lta bus khyab/_/sngon po 'od med nyi
[\[270b.6\]]zla dang /_/sgron mes khyab pa lta bur mthong /_/mig 'bras dkar por snang bar 'gyur/_/bad kan mthong nyams des mngon khyab/_/snum zhing mthong ba nyams 'gyur la/_/chu yi thigs pa pad+ma yi/_/'dab ma'i steng na gnas ltar g.yo/_/dro na zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_/grang
[\[270b.7\]]bas yongs su khyab par byed/_/zla ba me tog kun+da dung /_/shel ltar snang zhing dkar ba yin/_/khrag gi rab rib dmar ba dang /_/mun par gyur pa mthong ba yin/_/sngon po dmar ba gnag par ni/_/mig gis de ltar mthong ba yin/_/mtshan ma nyams pa de 'drar mthong /_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]'od med mthong ba nyams pa yin/_/ldan pa 'am ni 'dus pa yi/_/rab rib la sogs mtshan ma ni/_/'dren ma yin par shes par bya/_/glo bur du ni rab rib dag_/gsal dang mi gsal 'khrugs par byed/_/lhag ma dag gis mthong byed ni/_/dmar zhing
[\[271a.2\]]sna tshogs dag tu snang /_/gang gis mthong byed nad kyis khyab/_/sre mo'i mig 'drar snang bar 'gyur/_/de ni nyin mthong mtshan mo min/_/ne+e'u le long ba zhes de bshad/_/nyi ma nub par gyur pa na/_/'od mi snang tshe rengs 'gyur zhing /_/mthong byed nyams par byed pa ni/_/nad kyi long
[\[271a.3\]]ba gnyis pa yin/_/nyi ma'i zer gyis phog pa na/_/mthong ba'i lam nas dri ma ni/_/zhu zhing med par gyur nas ni/_/nyin mo gsal bar mthong bar byed/_/tsha bas gdungs te mod la ni/_/chu grang nang du zhugs gyur na/_/nad gzhi gsum dang khrag 'khrugs te/_/drod ni gyen 'gro
[\[271a.4\]]de nas mig_/tsha zhing na dkar dri ma can/_/nyin mo long long por mthong zhing /_/mtshan mo long bar gyur pa dag_/de ni dro bas tshig ces bya/_/shas cher skyur zos nad dang ni/_/khrag dang bcas pas mig khyab 'gyur/_/'drul zhing g.yo la dri ma can/_/de ni skyur gyis tshig
[\[271a.5\]]ces bya/_/mya ngan rims dang mgo nad kyis/_/rlung sogs gdungs par gyur pa las/_/rlung sogs 'khrugs shing dud 'thul mthong /_/de ni dud pa can zhes bya/_/snying stobs chung bas glo bur du/_/ngo mtshar can gyi gzugs mthong ba'am/_/nyi ma 'od can sogs mthong
[\[271a.6\]]nas/_/mig la brten pa'i rlung la sogs/_/gzi brjid nyams pas mig gi ni/_/mthong ba nyams par byed par 'gyur/_/bai DUr+ya'i mdog mkhrang bag dang /_/rang bzhin gnas ltar nad med 'gyur/_/'di ni phrad pa las byung ba'i/_/mtshan ma nyams pa zhes byar bshad/_/
[\[271a.7\]]'di las bad kan ma gtogs mtshan/_/nyams dang thung ngu gting zhen spang /_/mig sngon drug dang ne+e'u le'i/_/long ba 'tsho tsam lhag ma ni/_/bcu gnyis po ni gso bar bya/_/de ltar mig nad nyi shu ni/_/rtsa bdun dag tu bstan pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas rab rib gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/rab rib sngon po nyid 'gyur zhing /_/sngon po ma bcos long bar 'gyur/_/de bas mig nad la rab rib/_/mi bzad myur du gso bar bya/_/'tsho byed srang brgya chu pre
[\[271b.2\]]ni/_/bcu drug nang bskol bzhi cha lus/_/khu ba 'o ma bre do dang /_/mar ni bre gang lhan cig btso/_/stag tsher ba dang ra mnye ba/_/seng phrom rgyam tsha pi pi ling /_/shu ti shing mngar rgun 'brum dang /_/thang shing kha ra 'bras bu gsum/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btab bskol te/_/
[\[271b.3\]]mtshan 'thungs rab rib sel mchog yin/_/rgun 'brum btsod dang tsan+dan dkar/_/ra mnye ba gnyis dzi ba ka_/kha ra nye'u shing me da dang /_/shing mngar ut+pal puN+Da rI/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis mar rnying ni/_/bre gang 'o ma de mnyam bskol/_/de yis mig sngon rab rib dang /_/mar
[\[271b.4\]]gyis mgo nad rab rib 'joms/_/nim pa skyer pa pa to la/_/pu tse shel dang pu shel tsi/_/'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka_/byi tshe rab dang kyi lce ba/_/par pa ta ni srang re yin/_/skyu ru ra ni bre gang dang /_/chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/_/bre bzhi lus par gla sgang dang /_/rtsa mkhris
[\[271b.5\]]shing mngar dug mo nyung /_/ba lu ka dang tsan+dan dang /_/pi pi ling srang phyed phyed dang /_/mar bre gang dang bcas bskol ba/_/des ni rna mig sna nad dang /_/khong 'bras rims dang mdzer pa dang /_/'brum phran shu ba mdze nad sel/_/mchog tu ling tog rab rib dang /_/mtshan long dro bas
[\[271b.6\]]tshig pa 'joms/_/'bras bu gsum ni srang brgyad dag_/chu bre bzhi bskol bzhi cha lus/_/'o ma de dang cha mnyam dang /_/'bras bu gsum gyi lde gu ni/_/srang gcig zhun mar bre phyed bskol/_/kha ra'am sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/_/'bras bu gsum gyi khu bar bcas/_/'thungs
[\[271b.7\]]na rab rib thams cad 'joms/_/shing mngar ra mnye ba gnyis dang /_/kaN+Da kA ri pi pi ling /_/a ru ra dang ut+pa la/_/kha ra rgun 'brum srang rer bcas/_/ra yi 'o ma mar bre re/_/'bras bu gsum dang ba sha ka_/_bring ga ra dza'i khu bar bskol/_/'di ni 'bras bu gsum chen mo'i/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]mar de mig nad kun sel mchog_/'bras bu gsum dang mar ram ni/_/'bras bu gsum dang shing mngar bcas/_/sbrang rtsi yis ni sbrus gyur pa/_/mtshan mo zos par gyur na ni/_/zla gcig phan pa'i zas bsten zhing /_/skyu ru ra yi chu 'thungs na/_/mkha'
[\[272a.2\]]lding lta bu'i mig thob ces/_/drang srong mu khyud kyis bshad do/_/ta bya shing mngar lcags dang gser/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi mar rnying dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang ci 'dod sbyar/_/bsten pas rab rib 'joms mchog yin/_/yang na 'bras bu gsum bskol mar/_/rab rib can gyis bsten
[\[272a.3\]]bya'am/_/snum khur phye'am sran tshod ni/_/'bras bu gsum gyi phye bcas pa'am/_/'o thug 'bras bu gsum bcas pa/_/bsgrangs te kha ra sbrang rtsi btab/_/zas ma zos pa'am nang par ni/_/rgun 'brum kha ra sbrang rtsi dang /_/a ru ra ni so sor bza'/_/rtag tu rab rib can
[\[272a.4\]]gyis bsten/_/lig bu mig cha drug cu bzhi/_/zangs dang dngul dang gser gyi cha/_/re re gcig tu sbyar ba ni/_/kong bu kha sbyar nang du gzhug_/'dres par gyur gyi bar du bud/_/de nas de yi ro drug gi/_/tshogs kyi khu ba lan bdun dang /_/so sor de la blugs par bya/_/mu tig dung
[\[272a.5\]]dang be+e DUr+ya/_/tsha ba gsum dang de nas bsre/_/phye ma'i mig sman de gtang bya/_/rab rib thams cad sel byed yin/_/rgun 'brum pad+ma'i rtsa ba yi/_/khu ba 'o ma chang dang zhag_/char pa de bzhin lig bu mig_/bskol zhing bsku ba byas nas ni/_/phye ma de ni dung dang gzhug_/mthong
[\[272a.6\]]ba gsal byed mig sman yin/_/mig nad thams cad la bsngags zhes/_/lus 'phags rgyal pos bshad pa yin/_/spangs ma srang gnyis rgya shug gi/_/sol bar bsregs la ra yi ni/_/'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi yi/_/nang du lan ni bdun bdun bcug_/ta bya dang ni na le sham/_/
[\[272a.7\]]lig bu mig dang pu tse shel/_/spang spos rgyam tsha a ru ra/_/seng phrom ldong ros pi pi ling /_/sug smel rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang /_/stang zil zho ni gnyis gnyis dang /_/shing mngar srang gcig bcas pa ni/_/kong bu kha sbyar nang bsregs btags/_/mig sngon mtshan mo long
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]bar bcas/_/dmar ris de bsten pa yis 'joms/_/phye mas mchog tu rab rib nad/_/nyi mas mun pa lta bur sel/_/spang spos dri bzang gsum dang lcags/_/gur gum ut+pal sngon po dang /_/kha ra spangs ma a ru ra/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba 'ching bu dkar/_/na le sham dang
[\[272b.2\]]pi pi ling /_/stang zil shing mngar dung dang bcas/_/tha skar zla ba'i tshe na ni/_/phye ma mig gnyis la bskus na/_/mig mdzer rab rib dmar ris dang /_/g.ya' dang mig sngon sogs zhi byed/_/na le sham dang rgyam tsha ni/_/cha re pi pi ling dang ni/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba cha gnyis dang /_/
[\[272b.3\]]skyer pa'i kha N+Da cha dgu ni/_/nag pa la bab tshe na btags/_/mig bskus bad kan rab rib 'joms/_/spangs ma bsregs te lan mang du/_/ba gcin ra thug khu ba dang /_/skyur rtsabs bud med nu zho dang /_/dug gi khu ba sbrang rtsi mar/_/bcug par gyur pa gang yin pa/_/phye mar byas des
[\[272b.4\]]mi yi mig_/mkha' lding mig ltar gsal bar 'gyur/_/bring ga ra dza 'bras bu gsum/_/dug dang shing mngar khu ba dang /_/mar dang ra yi 'o mar ni/_/zha nye lan ni bdun bdun du/_/bsregs shing bsregs shing btsos pa yi/_/mig sman thur mar byas pa de/_/mig sman bskol
[\[272b.5\]]ba 'am ma bskol ba'am/_/byugs na rab rib mig mdzer nad/_/chu ser 'dzag dang 'byar bag can/_/g.ya' dang tshor ba med pa dang /_/ri mo dmar por snang ba 'joms/_/dngul chu ro nye cha mnyam bya/_/de gnyis stang zil mnyam byas la/_/ga pur cung zad btab pa yi/_/mig
[\[272b.6\]]sman rab rib sel mchog yin/_/bya rgod dus su shi ba'i mgo bo ni/_/nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra gang yin de/_/ba lang lci bas bsregs thal lig bu mig_/cha mnyam btags par gyur pa'i phye ma yi/_/sbyor 'dis mig gi gsal stobs bya rgod lta bur byed/_/sbrul nag mgor ni
[\[272b.7\]]lig pu mig_/mar bcas dud pa ma shor bsregs/_/spang spos gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_/lhan cig btags pas mig 'bras ni/_/rdol yang mig ni srung bar byed/_/sbrul nag shi ba'i ro dang ni/_/sdig pa shi ba'i ro bzhi ni/_/'o ma'i bum par zhag nyi shu/_/rtsa gcig bcug
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ste bsrul la bsrub/_/de las mar sar gang byung bas/_/khyim bya gsos te de yi ni/_/rtug pas mig ni bskus gyur na/_/long bas kyang ni legs par mthong /_/sbrul nag po yi zhag dang dug_/stang zil ka ta ka'i 'bras bu/_/khu bar byas pa'i sbyor ba
[\[273a.2\]]yis/_/long ba'ang myur du mthong bar byed/_/na le sham ni rdog ma bcu/_/drub mar cang ni srang phyed dang /_/spangs ma srang gcig shing mngar ni/_/zho gnyis 'o ma'i nang du sbangs/_/du ba ma shor bsregs mig sman/_/khu ba mnyam med ces bya ste/_/rab rib 'joms pa'i
[\[273a.3\]]mchog yin no/_/ba ru ra yi tshi gu na le sham/_/skyu ru ra dang spangs ma shing mngar ni/_/chu thag byas pa'i ri lu grib mar bskams/_/rab rib myur du 'joms par byed pa yin/_/na le sham dang skyu ru ra/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba spangs ma dang /_/dngul rdo dang ni drub mar bcas/_/go
[\[273a.4\]]rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/_/drub mar cha ni drug pa ste/_/sbyor 'dis rab rib ling tog mdzer/_/gnag dang mig sngon g.ya' ba sel/_/rin chen dngul dang shel dang gser/_/lig bu mig dang zangs dang lcags/_/tsan+dan dmar po yug snam dmar/_/phye ma'i mig
[\[273a.5\]]sman nad kun sel/_/til mar ba ru ra yi mar/_/bring ga ra dza a sa na'i/_/khu ba lcags kyi snod du bskol/_/snar blugs mig ni gsal stobs skyed/_/nad kyi tshul las de la lan mang du/_/snum blud gtar ga bkru sman sna sman dang /_/mig sman mgo bo'i bkru sman mas gtong
[\[273a.6\]]dang /_/nyams brtas byugs dang blugs pas ci rigs gso/_/'di ni spyi yi gso ba yin/_/da ni re re'i mnyan par gyis/_/de la rlung gyur rab rib la/_/rtsa ba bcu bskol khu ba mar/_/'o ma bzhi 'gyur 'bras bu gsum/_/lde gu bskol ba blud par bya/_/de 'og 'bras bu gsum
[\[273a.7\]]dang ni/_/rtsa ba lnga'i khu 'o ma dang /_/e raN+Da yi til mar bcas/_/bkru sman nye bar gtang bar bya/_/dzi ban ti yi yal gar bcas/_/srang brgya chu bre bcu drug bskol/_/brgyad cha lus pa de nang du/_/til mar 'o ma bre re dang /_/ba la gsum dang dzi ban ti/_/nye'u shing rtsa ba srang
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]re dang /_/shing mngar srang ni bzhi dang bcas/_/lcags kyi snod du bskol bar bya/_/lcags snod nyid du zla gcig gzhag_/sna sman nam tshod yan chad kyi/_/rlung nad mkhris pa'i nad 'joms shing /_/mchog tu mig la gnas pa sel/_/skra gdong gnya' ba phrag nad
[\[273b.2\]]sel/_/rgyas shing gzi mdangs mdzes par byed/_/e raN+Da dkar rtsa ba dang /_/thang shing bri ha ti'i 'bras bu/_/shu dag rgya spos tsi tra dang /_/bil ba'i rtsa ba til mar dang /_/'o mar bcas bskol snar blugs na/_/nam tshong yan chad rlung dang ni/_/bad kan gyi ni nad kun sel/_/
[\[273b.3\]]stag dang phag dang bya rgod dang /_/sbrul dang khyim bya'i tshil dang ni/_/shing mngar so sor sbyar te bskol/_/mig sman bskus par bsngags pa yin/_/de rjes mig sman lig bu mig_/sha khu 'o ma mar rim bzhin/_/snga ma bzhin du blugs na ni/_/rab rib 'joms byed
[\[273b.4\]]mchog yin no/_/de ltar byas kyang ma zhi na/_/de 'og brta ba'i cho ga spyad/_/shu ti ru rta spang spos dang /_/shing mngar ram nye ba gnyis dang /_/stag tsher ba dang sa ra la/_/pi pi ling dang thang shing ni/_/mar gyi brgyad 'gyur 'o mar bskol/_/mig brta ba yi mchog yin no/_/ri
[\[273b.5\]]dag e ne ya'i tshil ni/_/'o mar bskol te gzar bus dkrugs/_/de yi dngas ma shing mngar dang /_/tsan+dan pu shel tse de bzhin/_/shwa bid reg 'jam go da dang /_/khyim bya sreg pa rma bya'i tshil/_/re re zhing ni cho ga dag_/'di dag gis ni brta bar bya/_/gsal bar bya dang
[\[273b.6\]]snum dang ni/_/sman phur btsos pa'i thigs pa'ang blugs/_/'dir ni rlung 'gyur cham pa bzhin/_/ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsi bya/_/mkhris pa las gyur rab rib la/_/'tsho byed 'bras bu gsum dang ni/_/bskol ba'i mar ni blud bya zhing /_/snum gyis zhen par gtar ga gdab/_/
[\[273b.7\]]kha ra dur byid sug smel phye/_/sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang /_/rab bsil sman chu blugs byug sogs/_/gdong dang mig dang spyi bor bya/_/thal tres shug pa pu shel tsi/_/mu tig seng phrom tsan+dan dkar/_/ri lu'i mig sman bskus na phan/_/de bzhin gan+d+ha b+ha dra
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]dang /_/nA ga puSh+pa ut+pa la/_/ga pur shing mngar yug snam phan/_/skyer khaN+Da dang sbangs ma dang /_/karka ta yi sring gi dang /_/skyu ru ra yi 'bras bu shel/_/ga pur cha ni lnga lnga dang /_/cha gsum cha re sbyar ba yin/_/mig sman rab rib 'joms par
[\[274a.2\]]byed/_/'tsho byed kha ra ut+pa la/_/'o ma mar bskol sna sman gtang /_/bad kan las gyur sle tres dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling /_/mar bskol snum blud gtar ga gdab/_/de rjes dan+da dur byid bskol/_/gla gor zho sha a ru ra/_/bca' sga pi pi ling phye
[\[274a.3\]]gdab/_/bkru sman dag ni gtang bar bya/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu bar ni/_/ba le ka dang ser po gnyis/_/thang shing pi pi ling 'o ma/_/til mar bskol ba'i sna sman gtang /_/dung dang gla rtsi pri yang ku/_/rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/dri med ri lus mig gsal byed/_/
[\[274a.4\]]lcags nag phye ma tsha ba gsum/_/rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum mig sman/_/ri lu nag pos mig gsal byed/_/ri bong bong bu seng ge glang /_/rnga mo'i so dang dpral ba'i rus/_/ba lang dkar spun le sham/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba tsan+dan dung /_/nu zho ra yi 'o mar btags/_/ri lus
[\[274a.5\]]rab rib ling tog sel/_/khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso/_/bsil chos bya zhing gtar ga gdab/_/rgun 'brum spang spos seng phrom dang /_/shing mngar tsan+dan spangs ma dung /_/pad+ma shug pa ut+pal/_/ra yi 'o mas ri lur byas/_/khrag gyur rab rib myur du sel/_/
[\[274a.6\]]ldan pa 'dus pa las gyur pa/_/nad gzhi cha ni ji bzhin gso/_/ma du ka dang byi dang ga_/na le sham dang sgron shing dang /_/'o ma til mar bskol ba'am/_/btags pa'i sna sman gdong bsku bya/_/rgya spos ut+pal a nan+ta/_/shing mngar su ni shan kai_/til mar bskol
[\[274a.7\]]ba'i sna sman dang /_/mgo bsku 'jam rtsi bya ba bsngags/_/pu shel tsi bskol khu ba'i nang /_/rgyam tsha pi pi ling phye gdab/_/de btsags slar yang mar bcas par/_/bskol la ska gyur bsgrangs nas ni/_/sbrang rtsi bcug pa'i mig sman ni/_/'dus pa las gyur rab rib sel/_/
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]nub mo rgyu ba'i sems can gyi/_/rus pa rkang gis gang ba dang /_/lig bu mig dang bcas pa ni/_/'bab chu'i nang du zla gcig gam/_/zhag ni nyi shu'i bar du gzhag_/de nas phyung ste skams nas ni/_/lug ru yi ni me tog dang /_/shing mngar bcas pa'i phye mar byas/_/
[\[274b.2\]]mig bskus 'dus pa las gyur pa'i/_/rab rib sel bar byed mchog yin/_/mig sngo gso ba'ang 'di nyid las/_/gtar ga gdab par mi bya ste/_/nad des long bar gyur pa yin/_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/_/bu ram rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dang /_/pi pi ling dang na le
[\[274b.3\]]sham/_/gur gum sbrang rtsi lig bu mig_/spris g.yogs 'tsho ba tsam mig sman/_/'dus gyur ne+e'u le lta bur long /_/rab rib skabs bshad cho gar sbyar/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi ba lang gi_/lci ba'i khu ba skyer khaN+Da/_/yug snam bal bu'i phye mar sbyar/_/mig
[\[274b.4\]]sman mtshan me long la phan/_/na le sham ni zho dang sbyar/_/mtshan mo mi mthong mig sman mchog_/ut+pal yug snam ka rany+dza/_/pad+ma ge sar ba lang gi_/lci ba'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i/_/ri lus mtshan mo long ba sel/_/ha re Nu ka pi pi ling /_/rgyam tsha dang ni lig
[\[274b.5\]]bu mig_/ra gcin ri lur byas pa phan/_/pri yang ku dang tsha ba gsum/_/ldong ros ba bla 'bras bu gsum/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba ra'i 'o ma/_/ri lu byas pa'i mig sman gyis/_/mtshan mo long ba'i mig nad sel/_/mcher pa'i nang du pi pi ling /_/bcug ste ma tshos bar
[\[274b.6\]]btsos la/_/de bskams sbrang rtsir btags pa ni/_/mtshan mo mi mthong mig sman mchog_/ma he'i mchin pa mcher pa dang /_/til mar mar ni lhan cig bza'/_/'tsho byed sna bcu lo ma ni/_/mar dang lhan cig bskol ba bza'/_/a ti mug ta e raN+Da/_/nye'u shing
[\[274b.7\]]lang ga li'i lo ma/_/mar dang brngos pa bza' bar bya/_/dro na puSh+pa mar dang brngos/_/bza' dang btung bar sbyar ba'ang phan/_/dud 'thul mkhris pa skyur bro bas/_/tshig la mar ni rnying pa dag_/snum gyur bsil ba'i bkru sman gtang /_/bsil sman gyis ni kun tu byug_/ba
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]lang lci khu 'o ma mar/_/bskol ba yi ni mig sman nam/_/bal bu'i lo ma yug snam bskal/_/phye ma btab pa'i mig sman phan/_/med seng phrom a nan+ta/_/skyer pa btsod dang shing mngar ni/_/mar gyi brgyad 'gyur 'o ma bskol/_/til mar bskol
[\[275a.2\]]ba'i sna sman phan/_/'o ma mar sar gyis brta bya/_/des ma zhin gtar ga gdab/_/sems las nad dang mya ngan 'jigs/_/zas rtsub tsog tsog por 'dug dang /_/skyug sman bkru sman sna sman dang /_/sman thigs blugs sogs nyes pa dang /_/kha zas phyed zhu slon pa dang /_/bkres
[\[275a.3\]]skom la sogs brnags pa dang /_/mig nad ma bcos yun ring las/_/rab rib nad ldan brta bar bya/_/de la nad gzhi sogs brtags te/_/rang gi sman ni ji bzhin sbyar/_/nyi ma gzas zin me 'od glog la sogs/_/bltas pas mig ni nyams par gyur pa dag_/
[\[275a.4\]]de la bsil sman sogs kyis brta bya zhing /_/de bzhin gser bdar mar gyi mig sman gtang /_/mi yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/_/rtag tu mig bsrung ba la 'bad par bya/_/nyin dang mtshan mo 'dra bar gyur pa yi/_/mi la nor yod gyur kyang don med yin/_/'bras bu gsum
[\[275a.5\]]bsten gtar ga spyang bya dang /_/sems dga' mig sman sna sman bcas bsten na/_/bya sha za zhing rkang pa'i rim gro dang /_/zhun mar btung bas rtag tu mig bsrung bya/_/kha zas mi 'phrod za ba rtag tu spang /_/rab phra 'tsher dang g.yo ba mi lta zhes/_/skyes bu'i mig ni mchog
[\[275a.6\]]tu bsrung ba'i thabs/_/drang srong chen po mu khyud 'dzin gyis bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas mthong ba nyams pa gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur spris g.yogs pa/_/
[\[275a.7\]]rba klong la sogs bla brnan ni/_/drug po med par gyur pa dang /_/legs smin mthong ba med pa dbye/_/de smin ma gyur mi snyoms la/_/zho ga chu 'dra srab pa ni/_/thur ma yis ni drangs gyur kyang /_/slar yang gyen du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nad ni mi bzad skyed byed cing /_/mthong
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]byed slar yang 'gebs par byed/_/de ni zas bcas bla brnan bcas/_/bad kan can gyis myur du skyed/_/bad kan gyis ni mthong nyams pa/_/bad kan dkar bas dkar ba yin/_/de ni nad gzhan gyis zil gnon/_/kun tu sngo ba'i nad du 'gyur/_/de la rlung gyur mig
[\[275b.2\]]g.yo zhing /_/rba klong g.yo zhing dmar skyar 'dug_/gseg ma arga'i 'o ma ni/_/thig phran khyab 'dra mthug pa yin/_/gra ma lta bu'i mig 'bras ni/_/'bras kyi gra ma 'bras khyab yin/_/gra ma bcad pa gra ma tshig_/bcad pa ltar snang na ba yin/_/rma sgro rma bya'i mjug sgro
[\[275b.3\]]'dra/_/khar ba'i mdog tu snang ba yin/_/gdugs 'dra kha dog sna tshogs pa/_/spris g.yogs gdugs can zhes bya'o/_/gtar ga mi bya cham pa dang /_/lud pa can ni dbye mi bya/_/ma zhu sngar ma skyugs pa dang /_/rna mig mgo gzer can mi dbye/_/de nas thun mong dus
[\[275b.4\]]su ni/_/sbyang byas zas zos pa la ni/_/sa phyogs gsal bar snga dro ni/_/sman pa pus mnyam khri la 'dug_/nad pa 'dug cing bsdam byas la/_/kha yi dbugs kyis dugs bya zhing /_/mthe bos mig ni mnyes byas nas/_/nad ni g.yos par mthong ba dang /_/mi 'gul bar
[\[275b.5\]]ni mgo nas bzung /_/rang gi sna la blta bzhin du/_/nag po sor phyed ma gtogs shing /_/mig 'gram bzhi cha dor ba ru/_/mdzub mo gung mo mtheb mo yis/_/mig thur dam du bzung nas ni/_/rang grub bu gnas 'phred du/_/gzugs shing gyen mnye drang por byas/_/
[\[275b.6\]]mig g.yon lag pa g.yas pas dbug_/mig g.yas lag pa g.yon pas dbug_/legs par phug na sgra 'byung 'gyur/_/nad med chu ni nyung zhing 'byung /_/de rjes nad pa spro bsrings la/_/mig tu nu zho blugs par bya/_/de nas thur ma'i rtse mo yis/_/gnod pa med par
[\[275b.7\]]dal gyis ni/_/mig gi 'bras bu dbyi byas la/_/sna nas dal gyis phul bar bya/_/mig na gnas pa'i bad kan ni/_/sna nas brngubs pas bsal bar bya/_/nad mi 'gul ba'am 'gyur na ni/_/mig gi phyi rol nas dugs bya/_/de nas gzugs ni mthong gyur nas/_/thur
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]ma rim gyis dbyung bar bya/_/mar la sbangs pa'i ras bal gzhug_/mig dkris nas ni de 'og tu/_/de las logs ni cig shos dbab/_/gnyis ka phye na gan rkyal bzhag_/rlung med mal du mgo bo dang /_/rkang bsku phan pa'i zas bsten bya/_/
[\[276a.2\]]sbrid pa lud pa sgregs pa dang /_/mchil ma 'dor dang chu 'thung dang /_/thur du gtong ba khrus byed dang /_/so shing 'cha' bar byed pa dag_/zhag bdun bar du spang bya zhing /_/snum 'thung cho ga bzhin du bsdam/_/chu dron gyis ni nyer spyod/_/ci nus smyung bya na gyur na/_/mar khu dro
[\[276a.3\]]'jam blugs par bya/_/nas chan sla ba'am thug pa ska/_/tsha gsum skyu ru ra mar sbyin/_/zhag gsum nas ni de bkrol la/_/rlung 'joms pa yi sman gyi ni/_/khu ba mig tu blugs par bya/_/zhag bdun nas ni mig de nyid/_/rnam pa kun tu dgrol bar bya/_/ji srid mi
[\[276a.4\]]gsal brtan gyur pa/_/bsdams la 'bad de gnas par bya/_/gzugs ni phra dang 'tshor ba dag_/mod la blta bar mi bya'o/_/dbug nyes mi mthun zos pa las/_/skrang dang na dang dmar la sogs/_/mig nad gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nad tshul de bzhin de gso bya/_/nad
[\[276a.5\]]dang dmar bzhi bya'i phyir/_/dUr ba nas dang yug snam dang /_/thal tres mar dang ldan pa yi/_/lde gus gdong ni bsku bar bya/_/de bzhin til dang yungs kar bcas/_/kha lung khu bas sbrus pa'ang phan/_/thal tres lo ma pa ya s+ya/_/btsod dang shing mngar ra yi ni/_/'o
[\[276a.6\]]mar sbyar ba'i lde gu ni/_/dro 'jam bde bar byed mchog yin/_/seng phrom rgyam tsha rgun 'bru dang /_/shing mngar ra yi 'o mar bskol/_/thigs pa mig tu blugs pa ni/_/na dang dmar ba 'joms par byed/_/shing mngar ru rta ut+pal/_/rgun 'bru rgya skyegs kha rar bcas/_/rlung
[\[276a.7\]]'joms sman bskol 'o ma ni/_/mar gyi bzhi 'gyur bskol ba dang /_/shug pa la sogs lde gus btab/_/las kun la ni bsngags pa yin/_/des ma zhi na snum chos dang /_/dugs byas gtar ga gdab par bya/_/gdung ba'i gso ba dag kyang bya/_/dbug 'drub mig sman 'jam
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]po bsku/_/tu pa ri'i rtsa na le sham/_/ba bla skyer pa'i khaN+Da bsku/_/mig phyed bu ram ri lu ni/_/char pa'i chu dang bdar ba gtang /_/dzA ti da ba shi ri sha//karka ta sring gi me tog_/mu tig 'bras bu bai DUr+ya/_/ra yi 'o mar btags pa ni/_/zangs ma'i snod la sla bar bsku/_/zhag bdun
[\[276b.2\]]nas bskol slar yang ni/_/'o ma dang btags lde gur byas/_/ri lu grib ma la bskams pa/_/mig bskus phye ba mthong ba ni/_/gsal zhing stobs ni skyed par byed/_/byi ru ldong ros lig bu mig_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba na le sham/_/sna nas btang ba'i sman sbyar na/_/bshad
[\[276b.3\]]pa'i yon tan mtshungs par bstan/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas mig nad thams cad kyi nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o/_/rlung gis mig nad mchi ma 'dzag_/sna rgyas cung zad skrangs
[\[276b.4\]]pa dang /_/mur 'gram dpral mig smin ma kha/_/na zhing zug la 'phar ba dang /_/rngu ma skam zhing mchi ma grang /_/sla nyung na ba ldang dub can/_/'byed dang 'dzums par dka' ba dang /_/srin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems/_/mig ni bus pa lta bur snang /_/zug rngu phra mos khyab snyam
[\[276b.5\]]byed/_/snum dang dro bas nyer zhir 'gyur/_/mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/_/de ma bcos na gdung bar 'gyur/_/rna ba sgra 'byung mgo 'khor dang /_/dpral ba mig dang smin ma sogs/_/gtsub shing gis ni gtsubs snyam byed/_/de yang bag med yal bar bor/_/gdung bas
[\[276b.6\]]bcom gyur nad de yis/_/sna tshogs tshul ni 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/mig mthong nyams byed rma 'byung 'gyur/_/mur 'gram kha dang mjing pa las/_/rlung ni gzhan du 'jug 'gyur zhing /_/mi bzad na la gnag pa dang /_/dmar zhing skrangs la mig mi sdug_/zhum zhing kun nas
[\[276b.7\]]mchi ma 'dzag_/de ni rlung gis gzhan gyur yin/_/de bzhin mig ni yon po dang /_/chung ba rlung gis phyin ci log_/mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan ma ni/_/tsha grang du ba 'byung snyam sems/_/mig chu'i phyi rol gnag pa dang /_/nang na rnag 'drul mchi ma tsha/_/ser zhing mig dmar
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]ser por mthong /_/rma la lan tshwas btab snyam sems/_/me mdag gtor ba 'dra ba dang /_/mcher pa'i gong bu lta bur snang /_/mig nad gdung bar gyur pa yin/_/bad kan las gyur mchi 'dzag ni/_/tshor ba med skrangs rab tu g.ya'/_/gsher zhing snum la
[\[277a.2\]]shas cher dkar/_/mig gdung spyi bag 'dzag pa yin/_/gdung ba des ni nag po dma'/_/'bras bu dkar po mtho ba dang /_/cham pas thebs shing sna rgyas la/_/mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam byed/_/khrag gyur dmar ris mig tu dmar/_/mig 'bras dkar po dmar ba dang /_/
[\[277a.3\]]khrag 'dzag dmar po mthong ba dang /_/mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan nyid yin/_/gdung ba mig ni mtha' dmar zhing /_/phyung ba dang ni mtshungs par na/_/me tog ban du ka ltar dmar/_/shin tu na zhing reg mi bzod/_/lung tang khrag tu nub pa 'dra/_/gnag cing me ltar snang ba
[\[277a.4\]]yin/_/gdung ba rang gi ji bzhin du/_/thams cad 'dzag pa las lhag na/_/mur 'gram so dang mkhur tshos dang /_/mgo bo lhag par na bar byed/_/rlung mkhris shas cher drud snyam sems/_/zug cing na la phul snyam sems/_/shin tu rtsub cing mig mchu mig_/'dzums
[\[277a.5\]]dang 'byed par dka' ba dang /_/na zhing skams par gyur pa dang /_/grang 'dod smin zhing skam dang bcas/_/mig skam smin pa zhes bya'o/_/nad gzhi gsum ni khrag bcas la/_/skrang 'gyur de ni rab skrangs shing /_/na dang tsha dang 'dzag dang bcas/_/u dum bA ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/_/
[\[277a.6\]]mig 'bras dkar por 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mchi ma grang zhing dro ba dang /_/spyi bag ska sla res kyis 'byung /_/skrangs chung cung zad skrang zhes bya/_/de bzhin mtshan nyid gzhan gyis smin/_/mig smin pas nyen skrang ba yi/_/rtsom che mchi ma rnyog can 'dzag_/bad kan gyis bsgos
[\[277a.7\]]mig 'bras ni/_/dkar po dmar zhing 'drul ba dang /_/tsha zhing mthong ba nyams pa dang /_/nad ni mal na mi gnas yin/_khrag mkhris shas che'i nad kyis ni//_zas kyi dngas ma skyur por 'gyur/_/mig gi rtsar ni song nas ni/_/mig ni dmar por byed par 'gyur/_/skrang tsha
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]smin zhing mchi ma 'dzag_/shin tu lang long por mthong na/_/skyur gyis bskyed pa'i nad ces bya/_/de ltar kun gtogs nad bcu drug_/de la gdung bas bcom pa ni/_/mig smin bcas pa spang bar bya/_/rlung gyur zhag lngas mig la gnod par byed/_/bad kan las gyur gdung
[\[277b.2\]]bas zhag bdun gyis/_/de bzhin khrag gyur zhag gsum gyis 'joms byed/_/mkhris gyur 'phral du log spyod kyis gnod byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'o//_//de nas mig nad thams cad gso ba
[\[277b.3\]]bshad par bya'o/_/mchi 'dzag sngar byung tshul nyid la/_/mkhur bkang sna sman rnon po gtang /_/rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs nad gzhan la/_/smyung ba dag kyang bya ba yin/_/tsha dang dmar dang gos pa dang /_/skrang sogs zhi phyir kun la ni/_/sug smel gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_/na le
[\[277b.4\]]sham dang btsag yug snam/_/lde gur byas pas bsku bar bya/_/rlung gyur rgyam tsha skyer khaN+Da/_/shing mngar rgya spos tsan+dan nam/_/rgyam tsha dong gra skyer khaN+Da/_/mar gyi nying khu bdar ba'am/_/yang na seng phrom sbyar ba gtang /_/khrag mkhris gyur la spang spos dang /_/shug pa
[\[277b.5\]]shing mngar ra mnye ba/_/bad kan las gyur pri yang+ku/_/ldong ros sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/_/'dus pa las gyur kun gyis bsku/_/na le sham ni dkar po cha gcig dang /_/ldong ros cha bzhi seng phrom cha bcu drug_/zhib tu btags te ras gtsang phur mas gtums/_/nad ldang
[\[277b.6\]]mod la mig tu gdab par bya/_/rgya sran nag po ba lci ra'i ril khu/_/legs btsos sen mos shun pa bshus gyur pa/_/de yis mtshan mo lan cig bskus pa yis/_/mig nad 'khrugs pa myur du zhi bar byed/_/shu ti shing mngar spangs ma a ru ra/_/zhib btags ras kyi thum po lhod
[\[277b.7\]]par bcing /_/zangs kyi snod du skyur rtsabs nang du bcug_/mig tu bzhag na mig nad sna tshogs sel/_/skyer pa srang gcig chu bre phyed du yang /_/khu ba brgyad cha lus par sbrang rtsi btab/_/de bzhin mig tu bskus par gyur na ni/_/nad gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'i mig nad sel/_/
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas/_/mig tu blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_/bad kan 'dus pa las gyur mig nad rnams/_/mig nad mang po dag kyang myur du sel/_/e raN+Da ni gzhon nu'i lo ma dang /_/rtsa ba brdungs te ra yi 'o mar bskol/_/blugs
[\[278a.2\]]sam zan dron mig tu glan pa yis/_/rlung gyur mchi 'dzag nad ni mod la 'joms/_/rlung gyur ba la bil ba stsogs/_/bskol ba'i sman thigs blugs pa'am/_/e raN+Da'i rtsa bri ha ti/_/ma du shi kru dro 'jam blugs/_/sha rang gaSh+Ta ba la ka_/rgya spos u dum wA ra'i shun/_/chu dang
[\[278a.3\]]'o ma bcas bskol ba'i/_/thigs blugs gzer ni sel mchog yin/_/btsong dang skyer pa rgya skyegs dang /_/rgun 'brum ut+pal shing mngar gnyis/_/bskol te bsgrangs par khar gdab/_/mig blugs khrag mkhris mig nad sel/_/shing mngar ka she ru'i phye ma/_/ras ma 'jam
[\[278a.4\]]pos lhod par bcing /_/char chu'i nang du sbangs pa ni/_/khrag mkhris las gyur mchi 'dzag sel/_/shing mngar skyer pa stag tsher ba/_/thum po nu zho kha rar bcas/_/ra yi 'o mar sbangs pa blugs/_/tsha na mdog dmar mchi 'dzag sel/_/seng phrom dkar po shing mngar bcas/_/mar
[\[278a.5\]]brngos legs par btags pa ni/_/ras la gtums te nu zhor mnye/_/khrag mkhris snad pa'i mig nad sel/_/dong gra nim pa 'bras bu gsum/_/seng phrom ba sha ka'i khu ba/_/dro 'jam blugs pas bad kan sel/_/'dus par 'di dag bsres pas phan/_/rlung la mar
[\[278a.6\]]ni rnying pa dang /_/mkhris par kha rar bcas pa dang /_/bad kan la ni tsha ba gsum/_/bskol dang thal sman bcas pa blud/_/de 'og khrag kyang dbyung ba dang /_/de nas snum gyur bkru sman gtang /_/dro bas tsha ste gzer ba la/_/skam sa'i srog chags sha btags pas/_/
[\[278a.7\]]mgo dang gdong bsku tsha ba la/_/'o ma mar bcas grang mos bsku/_/rab rib gso ba'i cho ga yang /_/brtags te ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/_/gdung ba la sogs rnams la phan/_/gdung ba yong ye ma zhi na/_/smin ma'i steng du me btsa' gdab/_/
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]ba zho snum med kyis dngul snod/_/byugs te sngon por gyur pa dang /_/skams nas zho ga chu ri lur/_/byas pas rlung gyur mig nad 'joms/_/dzA ti'i me tog kha 'bus dung /_/shing mngar ba la 'bras bu gsum/_/char chu dang btags ri lur byas/_/khrag mkhris las
[\[278b.2\]]gyur mig nad sel/_/rgyam tsha 'bras bu tsha ba gsum/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba dung snying po/_/e la ba lu sra rtsi pog_/ri lus bad kan mig nad sel/_/shing mngar pra puN+Da rI ka_/skyer pa srang ni brgyad brgyad dag_/chu bre bcu drug nang bskol btsags/_/slar bskol ska bar
[\[278b.3\]]gyur pa ni/_/ra gan dud pa srang bcu dang /_/na le sham phye zho gnyis gzhug_/de la ri lu'am phye mar byas/_/bskus na mchi 'dzag thams cad dang /_/dmar na drud pa byed snyam 'joms/_/'phral du mig ni gsal bar byed/_/sbyor 'di phyug bdag ces bya ste/_/sman
[\[278b.4\]]pa rnams kyi gsang ba mchog_/mig smin skam pa mar blud cing /_/'tsho byed kyi ni sman mar ni/_/blud cing mig ni brta bya dang /_/til mar chung ngu'i sna sman gtang /_/'di la 'o ma rgyam tshar bcas/_/dro 'jam thigs pa blugs pa'ang phan/_/bca' sga bud med nu zhor
[\[278b.5\]]btags/_/mar sbyar mig tu bskus na'ang phan/_/yang na rlan can sha yi zhag_/dong gra rgyam tsha cung zad btab/_/skra ni mar bskus me long gis/_/mnyes te kham phor kha sbyar bcug_/bsregs te lcags snod mar dang bcas/_/snag tsha de ni mig sman mchog_/skrang
[\[278b.6\]]bcas cung zad skrangs pa la/_/snum chos byas te gtar ga gdab/_/snum byas rgun 'brum a ru ra/_/dur byid mar bcas bkru sman gtang /_/seng phrom dkar po mar la brngos/_/phye mar byas te ras la gtums/_/chu dron la mnyes thigs pa blugs/_/gzer 'joms
[\[278b.7\]]pa yi mchog yin no/_/skyer pa pra puN+Da rI ka_/bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs pas phan/_/mchi 'dzag na zhing drud snyam byed/_/sbyar sman 'di dag gtang bar bya/_/lcags kyi snod du zangs ma ba gcin sbyar/_/mar bdug mig bskus gzer ni 'joms par byed/_/
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]zangs ma'i snod du ba zho'i spris ma bdar/_/rgyam tsha pi pi ling dang bcas pa mchog_/zangs ma'i snod du nu zho dung bdar la/_/dong ga'i lo ma mar bcas dud pas bdug_/sbyar sman zhes bya mig tu bskus na ni/_/drud snyam byed sogs mi bzad nad myur
[\[279a.2\]]sel/_/u dum wA ra'i 'bras bu ni/_/lcags snod nang du nu zho bdar/_/sha ma'i lo ma mar dud bdug_/mchi 'dzag gzer dmar drud pa 'joms/_/shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba ni/_/zangs ma gnyis kyi bar du bdar/_/mar dud bdugs pas skrangs pa dang /_/g.ya' dang mchi
[\[279a.3\]]'dzag nad rnams 'joms/_/til gyi chu dang khar ba ni/_/kham phor bdar te nim pa yi/_/'o ma mar bskol dud pas bdug_/gzer ram mchi 'dzag drud snyam sel/_/sbyar sman gyis ni mig bskus te/_/sman shugs zug gzer dang bral nas/_/bud med nu zho'i thigs
[\[279a.4\]]pa blugs/_/lan gsum phan chad de mi bsku/_/bal bu'i lo ma pi pi ling /_/rgya spos lcags phye stang zil dang /_/dzA ti kha 'bus nag tshur dang /_/rgyam tsha ba gcin btags pa yi/_/lde gus zangs kyi snod bskus la/_/zhag bdun bzhag ste ba gcin dang /_/btags
[\[279a.5\]]te ri lur byas nas ni/_/de 'og grib ma la bskams te/_/bud med nu zho dang bdar bsku/_/drud snyam byed dang mchi ma 'dzag_/skrang dang g.ya' ba sel bar byed/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i shun pa dang /_/shing mngar zangs ma'i phye ma ni/_/ra yi 'o mas lde gur byas/_/sha mi
[\[279a.6\]]skyu ru ra'i lo ma/_/mar gyis bskus pa'i dud pas bdug_/bskus na skrangs dang gzer nad sel/_/skyur gyis bskyed la mkhris pa yi/_/mchi ma 'dzag pa'i cho gas gso/_/bad kan khrag mkhris kyis bskyed dang /_/'dus pas bskyed dang sgra ngan dang /_/rdzi ma 'gags dang
[\[279a.7\]]mig smin skam/_/rnag gi chu ser pad+ma'i rtsa/_/mig mchu'i sha dang skyur skyed cung /_/mchi 'dzag gdung ba rlung ma gtogs/_/bcwa brgyad po dag chag par bshad/_/yun ring du ni na ba yin/_/'di dag gso ba so so yi/_/le'u'i nang du bshad pa yin/_/de'i 'og mig tshag
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]spyi yi bshad/_/de nas mig tshag nad pa ni/_/snum chos slon ni byas nas kyang /_/gtar ga gdab ste khrag dbyung bya/_/bkru sman btang zhing mig chu ni/_/dag par gyur gyi bar du bzhar/_/spangs ma srang gcig na le sham/_/dkar po srang ni nyi shu dang /_/skyur rtsabs srang ni
[\[279b.2\]]sum cu dag_/btags te zangs ma'i snod du gzhug_/lo mang lon pa'i mig tshag pa'am/_/chu ser 'dzag sogs zhi bar byed/_/gos dang tsha dang mchi ma 'dzag_/g.ya' skrangs de blugs pa yis sel/_/bye'u rug ka rany+dza'i sa bon/_/dzA ti'i me tog kha 'bus pa/_/
[\[279b.3\]]brdungs te bskol la btsags nas ni/_/khu bar byas pa de dang ni/_/stang zil dang sbyar mig sman ni/_/mig tshag g.ya' dang chu ser 'dzag_/g.ya' zhing 'drul ba sel mchog yin/_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da sra rtsi pog_/ra gan dud pa ldong ros dang /_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba
[\[279b.4\]]rgyam tsha dang /_/na le sham dang btsag yug snam/_/sbrang rtsi btags pa'i mig sman ni/_/mig tshag 'drul g.ya' sel bar byed/_/rgya spos a ru ra'i khu bar/_/dngul rdo btags pas mig tshag sel/_/thang shing snum dang bcas pa ni/_/ra gcin nang du sbangs pa'ang
[\[279b.5\]]phan/_/rgyam tsha 'bras gsum pi pi ling /_/dung gi snying po pu tse shel/_/zangs ma'i phye ma bcas ri lu/_/mig tshag ling tog sel bar byed/_/yang na nag tshur phye ma ni/_/bye'u rug pa'i khu bar sbangs/_/zangs ma'i snod du zhag bcu bzhag_/de yis mig tshag chu ser 'dzag_/
[\[279b.6\]]rdzi ma 'byi ba sel bar byed/_/ldong ros dang ni skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang /_/de mnyam zangs ma'i phye ma zhib tu btags/_/phye ma mig sman thur ma gcig gis kyang /_/rdzi ma bskyed cing mig tshag 'dis sel byed/_/rgya skyegs bring ga skyer pa ni rgun+thi/_/khu bar ras kyi dum bu lan
[\[279b.7\]]bdun sbangs/_/sdong bu mar me de bus las byung ba'i/_/snag tsha mig tshag sel bar byed mchog yin/_/mig mchu mang du zhal zhal bya/_/de bzhin gtar ga bya ba dang /_/bkru sman yang yang bya ba ni/_/mig tshag can gyi nad pas bsten/_/rnag gi chu 'dzag ma zhi'i mthar/_/thur
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ma phra mos bsreg par bya/_/de ltar mig nad dgu bcu bzhi/_/nad gzhi mtshan nyid gso ba dag_/phan tshun 'dres pa med par ni/_/ma lus par ni bshad pa yin/_/skyes bu nad med pa yis kyang /_/nas dang gro rnying drug cu pa/_/sA lu khre rgod rnyid pa
[\[280a.2\]]dang /_/mung+ga la sogs bad mkhris 'joms/_/zhun mar mang du btab pa dang /_/tshod ma de 'dra skam sa yi/_/sha dang se 'bru kha ra dkar/_/bsten zhing char chu btung ba dang /_/gdugs bcang lham ni bgo ba dang /_/cho ga bzhin du nad sbyang ba/_/rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya/_/
[\[280a.3\]]shugs bkag pa dang ma zhur za/_/phyed zhu za dang rtug 'gags za/_/tsha dang phyi sa 'gags byed pa'i/_/zas dang spyod lam sman kun spang /_/rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus na rtsa sbom po/_/gnyis gnas de yis mig ni nang du khyab/_/de bskus byug dang dril ba la sogs
[\[280a.4\]]pa/_/rkang par byas na mig tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/dri ma tsha dang snad pa la sogs pas/_/de gnod gyur na mig la gnod par 'gyur/_/de bas mig la phan 'dod lham dang ni/_/bsku dang dril dang byug pa sogs bsten bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi
[\[280a.5\]]ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas rna ba'i nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/cham pas btab dang chu la rtse/_/rna ba brud pas rlung 'khrugs shing /_/sgra yi log pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/ldang ba'i rgyu gzhan gyis 'khrugs nas/_/rna ba'i rtsar ni rlung zhugs te/_/rna ba'i bu gar
[\[280a.6\]]shugs drag gzer/_/gzhogs phyed na zhing rengs pa dang /_/grang ba dag ni mi 'phrod cing /_/ring nas rnags shing smin nas kyang /_/chu ser cung zad 'dzag par byed/_/rgyu med rna ba stong snyam sems/_/zhum dang rgyas pa snyam du byed/_/mkhris gyur tsha bcas na zhing gzer/_/
[\[280a.7\]]grang 'dod skrang zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/myur du smin zhing smin nas kyang /_/chu ser ser por 'dzag par byed/_/chu ser des ni gang gang du/_/reg pa de dang der rnags 'gyur/_/bad kan las gyur mgo 'gram pa/_/mgrin pa lci zhing nad shugs dal/_/g.ya' zhing
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]grang la dro ba 'dod/_/smin nas rnag dkar ska ba 'dzag_/snad la sogs pas gnod gyur pa/_/rna ba gzer bar byed par 'gyur/_/khrag dang mkhris pa ltar na dang /_/mtshan nyid cung zad lhag pa yin/_/nad gzhi 'dus pas gzer ba dang /_/skrangs bcas rims 'debs mi bzad
[\[280b.2\]]na/_/res kyis grang dang dro ba 'dod/_/'on pa lta bu nyid du 'gyur/_/smin nas rnag ni dkar dang nag_/dmar dang ska ba 'dzag par 'gyur/_/sgra thos rtsar ni rlung zhugs pa/_/rgyu med par ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/sgra ni yang dang yang du thos/_/de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bya/_/rlung ni bad kan
[\[280b.3\]]dang 'dres pa'i/_/rna sgra yal bar bor na ni/_/skad gsang mthon por smras pa thos/_/rim gyis 'on pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rlung gis bad kan bskams gyur pas/_/de la rna bar gos gyur na/_/na zhing lci la 'gags gyur pa/_/de ni rna ba 'gags zhes bshad/_/bad kan
[\[280b.4\]]las ni rna ba g.ya'/_/skrang sra de yi ming gis bshad/_/mkhris pas bad kan tshig gyur pa/_/nad bcas pa'am nad med kyang /_/rnag ska 'dzag cing mang du 'drul/_/rna ba rnag can byed par 'gyur/_/rlung sogs pa yis rna ba'i sha_/khrag la gnod gyur 'drul bar za/_/
[\[280b.5\]]srin bus bskyod cing mi bzad na/_/rna nad srin bu can zhes bya/_/rna ba phug pa'i rma las byung /_/rma ni snga ma'i mtshan nyid can/_/khong 'bras 'gyur ba'am gzhan du'ang 'gyur/_/thor bu 'brum bu skrangs las 'byung /_/de las rna ba rnags pa dang /_/'on par byed pas gnod par
[\[280b.6\]]'gyur/_/mngal du rlung gis rna ba'i sha_/zhum 'gyur 'khums pa zhes bya'o/_/mngal du sha mdzer sra na med/_/pi pi ling 'dra mang po'ang gcig_/nad med pi pi ling zhes bya/_/'dus pa las gyur gas pa ni/_/mdog 'dra na zhing sra ba dang /_/skrang 'gyur de ni ma gsos
[\[280b.7\]]na/_/smin nas nyungs mar lta bur ni/_/'dzag cing 'tsho ba dka' bar 'gyur/_/rma 'tsho bas kyang nges par ni/_/rna ba'i sha ni zhum par 'gyur/_/rtsa la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni/_/rna shal skam pa de ming can/_/rna shal pi wang rgyud ltar pra/_/sra ba rgyud can zhes bya'o/_/
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]gzhon sha can ni yun ring du/_/btang snyoms bor nas 'phral du bskyed/_/rna shal skrangs shing nad bcas la/_/dmar zhing 'byar bar gyur pa ni/_/de ni rlung gis 'byar zhes bya/_/gnod 'gyur rgyan lci khur sogs kyis/_/khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs
[\[281a.2\]]gyur pas/_/dmar zhing tshan smin pa dang /_/skrang dang 'brum bu 'brum phran dang /_/dmar zhing tshal rnags pa yin/_/rlung dang bad kan gyis rna shal/_/skrang zhing nad med sra ba dang /_/brtan zhing mdog 'dra g.ya' ba dang /_/de ni mnye ba zhes byar bshad/_/phug nyes rna ba brgyangs
[\[281a.3\]]pa las/_/g.ya' bcas tsha grang smin zhing na/_/'dus pa las gyur skrangs ba de/_/sdug bsngal 'phel byed ces bya'o/_/bad kan khrag gyur srin bu phra/_/g.ya' zhing gnag la rnag bcas pa/_/srin bu phra mos bldags zhes bya/_/de ma gsos na rna shal za/_/de las
[\[281a.4\]]'dus gyur pi pi ling /_/gzer can gas 'khums gsor mi rung /_/rgyud can gcig pu 'tsho ba tsam/_/lhag ma rnams ni gso bar bya/_/de ltar rna ba'i nad kyi ni/_/dbye ba nyi shu rtsa lngar bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u
[\[281a.5\]]bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas rna ba'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i rna nad la/_sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i/_/sman bskol mar ni mtshan mo blud/_/rna ba dugs byas de rjes la/_/a shwat+tha dang e raN+Da/_/bil ba arka'i lo ma
[\[281a.6\]]dang /_/til mar rgyam tshar bcas pa dang /_/phur ma btso ba byas pa yi/_/khu ba dro 'jam tsam mam ni/_/la phug gu gul rna ba dgang /_/rlung 'joms sde tshan skyur rnams dang /_/gcin gyi nang du snum chen ni/_/bskol ba de ni rna ba'i nad/_/mi bzad pa yang myur du sel/_/rtsa ba chen
[\[281a.7\]]po lnga yi shing /_/gang yang rung ba gse mas dkri/_/til mar gyis bskus 'bar ba'i rtse/_/snum 'dzag 'phral du nad sel byed/_/de bzhin thang shing ru rta dang /_/sgron shing las kyang de bzhin bya/_/rlung nad cham pa la bshad pa'i/_/gso bas 'dir yang phan pa yin/_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]mgo bo bkru dang chu grang btung /_/nyin mo'ang yongs su spang bar bya/_/mkhris gyur kha ra dkar por bcas/_/mar gyis snum byas bkru sman gtang /_/rgun 'brum shing mngar nu zho bskol/_/rna ba bkang ba'ang bsngags pa yin/_/shing mngar tsan+dan dUr ba dkar/_/pu shel
[\[281b.2\]]tse dang ra mnye ba/_/seng phrom pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/pad+ma'i sdong bu dzi ba ka//btsod dang thal tres bskol ba dang /_/shing mngar khu ba bre gang dang /_/'o ma bre do bcas pa dag_/til mar phul gang bskol ba dang /_/'di yis rnar blugs rna dgang bsku/_/yang na sbrang rtsi nyi tshes dgang /_/
[\[281b.3\]]gzer dang tsha dang na ba sel/_/shing mdang la sogs mar dang bcas/_/rna ba kun tu byugs na'ang phan/_/bad kan las gyur pi pi ling /_/mar bskol snum gyur skyug tu gzhug_/bad kan sel ba'i sna sman dang /_/mkhur bkang dugs dang dud pa brngub/_/sgog skya sge'u
[\[281b.4\]]gsher shi kru dang /_/la phug chu shing mu rang ga_/bskol ba'i khu ba dam pa ni/_/dro 'jam rna bar blugs na'ang phan/_/arka'i myu gu skyur khur btags/_/til mar rgyam tshar bcas pa gang /_/snu ha'i shing bu brus par ni/_/bcug la arka'i lo mas g.yogs/_/phur
[\[281b.5\]]ma btsos pa'i tshul du bsreg_/de yi khu ba gzer 'joms mchog_/ma du lung ga'am ka pid ta'i/_/khu bas bkang ba byas na'ang phan/_/yang na tshas bkang de rjes la/_/rgya mtsho'i lbu ba'i phye mas gdab/_/ra lug gcin dang 'od ma'i shun/_/til mar bskol bas
[\[281b.6\]]bkang na phan/_/yang na nyungs mar shing kun dang /_/e raN dong gra bskol ba blugs/_/khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso/_/gtar ga myur du gdab par bya/_/smin zhing rna ba khrag 'dzag la/_/dud pa mkhur bkang sna sman sbyar/_/sbu gu'i cho ga dag dang ni/_/rma red cho ga
[\[281b.7\]]gang yin bya/_/gos par ye'us dus gnyis su/_/rna ba phyi zhing dag par bya/_/gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang /_/sbrang rtsi yis kyang dgang bar bya/_/bye'u rug khu ba bskol ba dang /_/bu ram khu bas bskol ba yi/_/ras bal ye'u rab phras byug_/de yi phye ma gdab
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]par bya/_/gzer dang rnags dang lci ba la/_/cho ga 'dis ni bzlog par bya/_/pri yang+ku dang am pash+tha/_/shing mngar dang ni da ta ki_/ut+pa la yi lo ma dang /_/btsod dang seng phrom rgya skyegs dang /_/ka pid ta yi khu ba dang /_/til mar bskol te de blugs
[\[282a.2\]]na/_/rnag 'dzag pa ni myur 'chad byed/_/sgra bcas 'on pa dag la ni/_/rlung gi gzer 'joms sman gtang bya/_/bad kan las gyur bad kan ni/_/slon sman sogs kyis dang bor bsal/_/e raN+Da dang shi kru dang /_/la phug gzhon nu'i lo ma dang /_/khu ba til mar bzhi
[\[282a.3\]]'gyur dang /_/lo ma brgyad 'gyur bcas pa dang /_/shing mngar ram nye ba'i lde gu/_/bcas par bskol ba rnar blugs dang /_/bsku dang rna ba bkang ba yis/_/sgra bcas 'on dang gzer ba 'joms/_/shing kun bong nga dkar po dang /_/shu ti skyer shun sa rdzi ka_/til mar
[\[282a.4\]]tsha dang bcas bskol bas/_/bkang na gzer dang chu ser 'dzag_/sgra bcas 'on pa sel bar byed/_/rna ba sgra dang bcas pa la/_/nyungs mar gyis ni bkang na phan/_/la phug skam pa'i dum bu yi/_/thal ba shing kun bca' sga dang /_/shu ti ru rta shu dag dang /_/thang shing shi kru
[\[282a.5\]]skyer khaN+Da/_/ya bak+Sha ra rtsabs ru tsha/_/rgyam tsha rngul tsha sardzi ka_/stag pa'i tsher ma kha ru tsha/_/gla sgang rgun tsha bzhi 'gyur dang /_/kha lung khu ba de dang 'dra/_/chu shing khu ba mnyam bskol ba'i/_/til mar bkang bas rna ba'i nad/_/g.ya' dang sgra bcas 'on pa dang /_/rnag
[\[282a.6\]]'dzag gzer zhing srin bu can/_/shin tu gso dka' thal sman gyi/_/til mar gyis ni myur du 'joms/_/kha dang so yi nad la'ang phan/_/de nas tshor ba med pa la/_/nye ba la ni gtar ga gdab/_/skrang zhing rnags la thos pa ni/_/mi gsal gyur la skyug sman btang /_/byis
[\[282a.7\]]pa rgan dang yun ring du/_/lon pa'i 'on pa spang bar bya/_/sgra bcas rnags par gyur pa la/_/snum dang dugs byas dag par bya/_/rna ba sbyangs nas de rjes la/_/rna ba sbyangs pa'i til mar dag_/kha lung khu ba rgyam tsha dang /_/tsha dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang blugs/_/dag byas
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]rtsub par gyur na ni/_/mar gyi nying khus dgang bar bya/_/rim 'di rna spabs gang la'ang bya/_/g.ya' dang skrang la rna sman sogs/_/bad kan sel bar byed pa phan/_/skrang la tshwa dang dro bas byug_/rna ba rnag 'dzag 'bu can la/_/rna ba chu 'dzag gso bar bya/_/mchog tu rna
[\[282b.2\]]nad srin can la/_/nyungs mar dron po blugs par bya/_/rna ba'i 'bras la khong 'bras kyi/_/gso ba dang ni skyug sman gtang /_/snad pa'i khong 'bras gso ba ni/_/mkhris gyur rna gzer gso bar bya/_/'brum pa thor bu sna ltar bya/_/rna ba gas pa ma smin la/_/rna ba'i khong 'bras
[\[282b.3\]]ltar gso zhing /_/nad gzhi ji bzhin las kyang bya/_/rna shal skam la rlung gzer ltar/_/rna sman bsku ba la sogs bya/_/dugs bya snyi bar gyur pa na/_/rna shal til mar bskus shing mnye/_/shing mngar pi la ya'i sa bon/_/a shwa gan+d+ha nas bcas bsku/_/de nas
[\[282b.4\]]rgyas byed snum gyis ni/_/bsku ba rtag tu bsten par bya/_/nye shing a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/e raN+Da dang pa ya s+ya/_/dzi ba ka dang 'o mar bcas/_/til mar bskol bas bsku ba ni/_/rna shal rgyas byed mchog yin no/_/'tsho byed sde tshan lde gu dang /_/rlan can sha ni bskol ba
[\[282b.5\]]dag_/rna shal 'phel zhing rgyas byed yin/_/rna shal rab zad bcad pas ni/_/lhag ma sbyar la gso zhing bskyed/_/de bzhin rgyud 'dra 'tsho tsam bya/_/'byor ba la yang cho ga 'di/_/gnod gyur bsil sman bsku ba dang /_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/_/'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma
[\[282b.6\]]dang /_/ba la shing mngar seng phrom til/_/btsod dang ut+pal ka dam pa/_/thal tres til mar bcas pa dang /_/skyur rtsa bas bcas par bskol ba 'di/_/til mar bsku bar bya ba dang /_/me dbal skabs bshad mar gyis bsku/_/mnye ba go ta karka ta/_/zhag dang bcas pa'i
[\[282b.7\]]til mar dang /_/ta la'i lo ma arka dang /_/a shwa gan+d+ha bye'u rug pa/_/so ma ra dza 'bras bu dang /_/rgyam tsha lang ka lir bcas bskol/_/til mar bsku bar bya ba dang /_/rna sman rnon po gtang bar bya/_/dbug nyes pa la a sman ta/_/'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma ni/_/bskol ba'i
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]khu ba blugs par bya/_/rna shal til mar gyis bsku zhing /_/shing mngar btsod dang stag tsher ba/_/yung ba'i phye ma zhib po gdab/_/rgya skyegs byi dang ga bskol ba'i/_/til mar gyis ni bskus na phan/_/srin bus zos la ba'i lci bas/_/
[\[283a.2\]]lan mang du ni dugs byas la/_/byi dang ga yi snying po ni/_/lug gi gcin sbyar lde gus bsku/_/dug mo nyung dang ing gu dang /_/e raN+Da yi sa bon dang /_/dong ga'i shun pa lde gus bsku/_/yang na de dag nim pa yi/_/lo ma na le sham dang bcas/_/sbrang rtsi'i lde gus rma la
[\[283a.3\]]bsku/_/rna ba chad la sbyang byas te/_/skyon med khrag dang de 'tsham pa'i/_/bcing ba dag gis sbyar bar bya/_/sbyar nas 'phral bcad sbyang bar bya/_/de nas skra mthar mdud byas te/_/rna shal bcad dang zhal zhal bya/_/bcad pa dang ni bsrung bar bya/_/mtshams ni mnyam
[\[283a.4\]]par sbyar bya zhing /_/mthon dman med pa nyid du bya/_/zhun mar dang ni sbrang rtsis byug_/ras bal gyis ni glan pa dang /_/skud pas dam lhod ran par bcing /_/rma yi khrag ni bcad pa yi/_/sman gyi phye mas gdab bya zhing /_/spyod pa de la bsten par bya/_/zhag bdun
[\[283a.5\]]nas ni ma btses pa'i/_/til mar bskus la ras bal dgrol/_/legs 'byor spu skyes pa dang /_/mtshams 'byor mnyam zhing brtan pa dang /_/tshad ldan nad ni med pa dang /_/rim gyis rna ba skyed par byed/_/nya lcibs kha sral phre'u dang /_/pri ha ti 'bras ser po gnyis/_/
[\[283a.6\]]ba la ha ti pi pi ling /_/a shwa gan+d+ha nyungs kar ser/_/ko sha ta ka'i rtsa ba dang /_/ka ra bI ra ru shig_/lo ma bdun pa bil ba la/_/sa nag sbrang ma'i gnas dang ni/_/bye'u chu skyes srin bu'i sha_/de bzhin seng phrom sdong bu rnams/_/'di dag lde gu til mar bcas/_/ma he'i
[\[283a.7\]]mar dang glang po rta'i/_/gcin dang bcas par bskol ba ni/_/bskus na rna ba 'phel byed mchog_/de nas na tshod ldan pa yi/_/sbyang ba byas nas rna chad gso/_/sna dang mnyam pa'i sha lpags ni/_/mkhur tshos las ni bcad nas kyang /_/rna dang nye ba'i sha lpags ni/_/srab mo
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]nyid du bzhar bar bya/_/de nas ras bal bcas pa yi/_/khab kyis mkhur ba btsem par bya/_/sna bcad mtshon gyis bzhar nas ni/_/mkhur tshos las bcad pags pa yis/_/sna ni lags mor btsem par bya/_/kha yi dbugs ni dbyung ba'i phyir/_/snar ni sbu gu can
[\[283b.2\]]gzhug bya/_/de rjes til mar slon par bsku/_/rma ni sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku/_/khrag bcad pa yi sman gzhan yang /_/zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas gdab/_/de nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku/_/bcings la spyod pa bstan par bya/_/de nas gnas skabs shes byas nas/_/
[\[283b.3\]]rma gsar gso ba'i cho ga bya/_/rma 'byor sna yi nye 'khor gyi/_/sha lhag legs par gcad par bya/_/de nas shin tu zhib tu btsem/_/dma' ba dag kyang bskyed par bya/_/bcad ma thag la ci rigs par/_/bzhag ste cho ga 'di nyid bya/_/mchu bcad pa la sbu gu dag_/ma gtogs
[\[283b.4\]]sna sbyar bzhin du bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco brgyad pa'o//_//de nas sna nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/ba mo rlung dang rdul dang ni/_/smra drags gnyid log gnyid yar drags/_/sngas ni mtho dang
[\[283b.5\]]dma' drags dang /_/chu gzhan 'thungs par gyur pa dang /_/chu mang 'thungs dang nyal po dang /_/skyugs dang mchi ma bkag pa yis/_/rlung shas che ba'i nad 'khrugs nas/_/sna ni sra ba nyid 'gyur zhing /_/cham pa skyed par byed pa yin/_/'phel na zad pa skyed par byed/_/de la rlung
[\[283b.6\]]gyur cham pa ni/_/kha skam sbrid pa drag tu 'byung /_/sna 'gags zug cing na ba dang /_/mur 'gram so dang klad pa dang /_/smin ma nas ni sna rtse'i bar/_/srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems/_/skad 'gags ring nas smin pa dang /_/mchil snabs grang bar 'dzag pa yin/_/mkhris gyur
[\[283b.7\]]skom dad rims kyis 'debs/_/mgo 'khor sna nang 'brum pa 'byung /_/sna rtse gnag cing dro la rtsub/_/mchil snabs dmar ser 'dzag pa yin/_/bad kan lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/slon zhing lus lci yi ga 'chus/_/kha mngar bro zhing g.ya' ba dang /_/mchil snabs snum
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]dkar ska ba 'dzag_/'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/rgyu med 'phel dang 'grib par byed/_/nad khrag sna yi rtsar zhugs nas/_/cham pas 'debs par byed 'gyur ba/_/brang na tshor ba med pa dang /_/mig dmar dbugs kyi dri mi zhim/_/mig dang rna ba
[\[284a.2\]]sna g.ya' zhing /_/'di ni mkhris gyur mtshan nyid ldan/_/cham pa thams cad ma gsos na/_/gnod pa mi bzad skyed byed 'gyur/_/ji skad bshad pa'i bla brnan ni/_/'phel bas dbang po kun gnod byed/_/me drod nyams nyes dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa brang dang rtsib logs zug_/
[\[284a.3\]]glo bur du ni shas cher 'khrugs/_/kha dri nga zhing skam par byed/_/sna nang 'drul zhing skam pa dang /_/yang yang sna 'gags dag par byed/_/snabs ni rnag 'dra dkar zhing dmar/_/dud pa can ni 'dzag par 'gyur/_/'di la srin bu snum zhing ring /_/dkar zhing phra ba 'byung bar
[\[284a.4\]]bshad/_/de smin mtshan ma lus yang zhing /_/sbrid pa zhi bar gyur pa dang /_/snabs ni sbyin zhing ser ba dang /_/dri dang ro ni tshor ba yin/_/snar ni rnon po brngubs pa dang /_/nyi 'od skud pa rtsa sogs dang /_/rlung 'khrugs byed pa gzhan gyis kyang /_/sna yi mtshul par zhugs gyur
[\[284a.5\]]pas/_/bskyod de rlung ni 'khrugs gyur pa/_/sum mdor zhugs 'gyur 'gags nas ni/_/ldog nas mi bzad sbrid pa ni/_/snabs 'dzag bcas par skyed par byed/_/sna yi bu ga skam byed cing /_/rlung gis bad kan skyed par byed/_/sna nang gra mas gang snyam sems/_/dbugs
[\[284a.6\]]'byung dka' bar gyur pa de/_/sna skams pa zhes bya bar bshad/_/sna rgyas pa ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/sna ni bkag pa 'drar sems shing /_/rlung gis 'gag par byed par 'gyur/_/dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub 'gags pa las/_/bu ga gdangs pa lta bu yin/_/mkhris pas sna
[\[284a.7\]]khung rnags gyur pa/_/sha lpags tsha zhing gzer dang bcas/_/de ni sna yi shu bar bshad/_/bad kan las gyur chu ser ni/_/chu 'dra rgyun du 'dzag pa dang /_/mchog tu mtshan 'dzag de ming can/_/bad kan 'phel bas sna khung du/_/bu ga 'gags shing cham pa skyed/_/dbugs
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]ni ngar ngar por 'byin zhing /_/cham pa las kyang nad tshabs che/_/sna las lug ltar rnag 'dzag cing /_/rgyun du sbyin bag ser po dang /_/smin ma'i rnag ni 'dzag 'gyur zhing /_/de yi sna ni snabs bcas yin/_/khrag gi sna ni tshig snyam sems/_/phyi dang nang du reg mi bzod/_/du
[\[284b.2\]]ba lta bu'i dbugs 'byin pa/_/bsregs 'dra de ni 'bar ba yin/_/rkan gyi phugs su nad 'khrugs pas/_/rlung ni kha dang sna nas 'byung /_/mchil snabs dri nga 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ni sna nad rul pa yin/_/'dus pa'am snad pa las gyur pa'i/_/rnag dang khrag ni sna nas 'dzag_/
[\[284b.3\]]mgo bo tsha zhing na byed pa/_/de ni rnag khrag can zhes bshad/_/rlung gis mkhris pa bad kan dag_/sna ni skams par gyur pa las/_/bad kan skams te gong por gyur/_/de ni bsgongs pa zhes bya'o/_/'brum bu thor bu nad gzhi yi/_/mtshan nyid ci 'dra dag las dbye/_/kun
[\[284b.4\]]las dbugs 'byung dka' ba dang /_/rgyun du chu 'dzag sbrid pa 'byung /_/sna 'gags lta bur smra ba dang /_/sna nas rnag 'dzag klad pa na/_/de ltar rnam pa bco brgyad las/_/cham pa ma rungs 'tsho ba tsam/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u
[\[284b.5\]]bcu dgu ba'o//_//de nas sna nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/sna nad kun las dang por ni/_/rlung med khang par 'dug nas ni/_/snum chos dugs dang skyug sman dang /_/dud pa brngub dang mkhur bkang bsten/_/gos ni lci zhing dro ba bgo_/mgo bo shin tu mthug pas dkri/_
[\[284b.6\]]kha zas yang skyur lan tshwa snum/_/dro ba dang ni bska ba bza'/_/bu ram 'o ma skam sa'i sha_/lan tshwa tsha ba gsum shas che/_/nas dang gro ni mang po dang /_/zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba bsten/_/la phug gzhon nu'i khu ba dang /_/ku lang+tha yi khu ba'ang bsngags/_/rtsa bcu'i khu ba dro 'jam
[\[284b.7\]]mam/_/chang snying dngas ma blud par bya/_/tsa rong ag+ni man+tha dang /_/shu dag zi ra go snyod snom/_/bal bu'i lo ma tsha ba gsum/_/dbyi mo da trig star bu dang /_/zir tsi tra srang gnyis gnyis/_/shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha da dang /_/sug smel zho ni gnyis gnyis dang /_/bu ram rnying pa srang
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]lnga bcu/_/bskol te ri lur byas pa ni/_/zos na cham pa dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa lu ba 'joms byed cing /_/skad snyan yi ga 'byed mchog yin/_/shu ti'i shun pa ba la dang /_/so na ka dang e raN+Da/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba dong grar bcas/_/zhag mar spra tshil
