[\[285a.2\]]dud pa brngub/_/yang na phye dang mar dang bcas/_/kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bcug_/bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya/_/khrus dang mya ngan khro ba dang /_/shas cher gnyid log chu grang spang /_/rlung gyur cham pa rlung 'joms pa'i/_/sman ni bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_/lan tshwa lnga ni bskol
[\[285a.3\]]ba'am/_/bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud/_/dugs dang sna sman la sogs bya/_/gzhogs byed nar bshad gso ba'ang bya/_/khrag mkhris las gyur thug pa ni/_/mar sar mngar ba'i sman bskol blud/_/sman chu blugs shing byug pa dang /_/nus bsil grang mo dag gis
[\[285a.4\]]bya/_/da ba'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum/_/shi ri par+Ni pri yad+ku/_/shing mngar seng phrom til mar gyi/_/bcu 'gyur 'o ma skyer bar bcas/_/bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya/_/bad kan las gyur smyung ba dang /_/yungs kar lde gus mgo bsku'am/_/thal sman bcas pa'i
[\[285a.5\]]mar blud de/_/slon gzhug rgyam tsha tsha ba gsum/_/byi dong ga dang dug mo nyung /_/zi ra ra gcin sbyar ba yi/_/sna sman dag ni gtong bar bya/_/'dus gyur tsha dang rno sbyar ba'i/_/mar gyi sna sman blugs pas gso/_/gcong chen srin gso'i rim gyis ni/_/cham pa ma rung 'tsho tsam
[\[285a.6\]]bya/_/tsha ba gsum dang e raN+Da/_/thang shing ru rta byi dong ga_/bong nga dkar po ing gu dang /_/dur byid par ta ka'i sa bon/_/nyungs kar nye'u 'phral rus pa dang /_/ag+hi man+d+ra'i me tog dang /_/pi lu shi kru'i sa bon dang /_/rta sbangs khu ba gcin dang ni/_/glang po'i gcin dang gcig tu
[\[285a.7\]]sbyar/_/zar ma'i skud dkris reng bu yi/_/dud pa kha dang sna nas brngub/_/smin dang sbrid pa 'byung zhes pa/_/sna sman rnon po bud pas phan/_/bca' sga ru rta pi pi ling /_/rgun 'brum byi dong ga'i lde gu/_/mar ram til mar bcas bskol ba'i/_/sna sman sbrid pa rnags pa sel/_/
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]sna skams pa la ba la'i mar/_/btung sogs sha khur sbyar ba bza'/_/snum gyi dud pa dugs kyis gso/_/sna rgyas la yang cho ga 'di'o/_/sna rnags 'bar la mkhris 'joms sman/_/chu 'dzag sna sman sogs rnos bya/_/rnags can la ni bad kan gyi/_/gso ba dang ni 'dra bar
[\[285b.2\]]bya/_/rgya skyegs dang ni karany+dza/_/na le sham dang byi dang ga_/shing kun bu ram pi pi ling /_/lug thug gcin sbyar sna sman ni/_/slon byas 'og tu gtang bar bya/_/shi kru dan+da bri ha ti/_/tsha ba gsum dang lce myang tsha/_/bye'u rug pha dang byi dang ga/_/til mar bskol ba'i sna sman yang /_/
[\[285b.3\]]btang na mchog tu phan pa yi/_/rnag dang khrag can sar pa ni/_/khrag gi cham pa lta bur gso/_/shin tu 'phel la rma 'khyims ltar/_/'brum bu rmen bu tsha ba la/_/dan ti dur byid lce myang tsha/_/ldong ros dang ni bi pi ling /_/tsi tra ka yi lde gu ni/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/_/
[\[285b.4\]]reng bu snar ni gzhug par bya/_/shi kru la sogs sna sman yang /_/rnag can gso ba'i skabs su bshad/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'o//_//de nas kha nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/nya dang ma
[\[285b.5\]]he phag gi ni/_/sha dang la phug rjen pa dang /_/ma sha'i sran tshod 'o ma zho/_/cha dang bu ram shing kun dang /_/'brum phran kha sbubs nyal bsten dang /_/so shing gis snad goms pa spong /_/dud ba mkhur bkang skyugs pa dang /_/gtar ga dbug ni nyes pa yi/_/bad kan
[\[285b.6\]]shas che'i nad 'khrugs pas/_/kha yi nang gi nad skyed 'gyur/_/de la rlung gis mchu gas 'gyur/_/mchu ral ba yi nad ces bshad/_/rlung gis mchu la gnod gyur pa/_/mchu sra nad tshabs che ba yin/_/mchu gas rdol bar 'gyur ba dang /_/gnag cing rtsub pa mchu 'khrugs
[\[285b.7\]]yin/_/mkhris pa tsha ba mi bzod ser/_/'brum phran nyungs kar 'dra bas khyab/_/myur smin mang du rnags pa yin/_/bad kan las gyur grang ba yis/_/mi bzod lci zhing skrang ba dang /_/'brum phran dkar pos khyab pa yin/_/'dus gyur sna tshogs par snang zhing /_/dri nga'i spyi bag
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'dzag pa dang /_/glo bur shas cher skrang zhing zhum/_/na dang min rnag mi snyoms/_/khrag las gyur pa khrag 'dzag cing /_/khrag gi mdog dang 'dra ba dang /_/'di la 'bra go lta bu yi/_/khrag zad chu bur 'byung ba yin/_/sha gyur sha yi gong po 'dra/_/
[\[286a.2\]]rim gyis srin bu skye zhing 'gul/_/tshil gyur g.ya' zhing 'drul ba dang /_/skrang 'jam til mar lta bur 'dzag_/snad pa las gyur gas pa dang /_/yang dang yang du 'bye 'gyur la/_/slar yang 'drub par 'gyur ba dang /_/mchu ni g.ya' bar byed pa yin/_/rlung dang bad kan 'dres
[\[286a.3\]]pa las/_/chu yi chu bur lta bur 'byung /_/mkhur ba'i 'bras 'byed skrang zhing brtan/_/mkhur ba tsha zhing rims dang bcas/_/rlung gyur so nad dro la sred/_/grang bas reg na lhag par na/_/gzer zhing bcag pa snyam du sems/_/grang bas zhig pa de bshad do/_/rlung dang chu
[\[286a.4\]]yis so brtse pa/_/grang dang skyur ba mi bzod par/_/skyur ba zos pa nyid kyis 'gyur/_/nad bcas 'gul bar byed pa yin/_/so gas so ni zegs pa dang /_/na zhing zug la g.yo ba yin/_/so 'gul so ni g.yo ba dang /_/za ba'i tshe na lhag par na/_/so sto so ni mi
[\[286a.5\]]sdug par/_/so rnams skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/so lhag so ni skyes pa ste/_/de ni 'phel ba zhes kyang bshad/_/skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na ni/_/na zhing skyes nas de zhi byed/_/ma bkrus so yi dri ma'am/_/bad kan rlung gis skams pa las/_/dri nga brtan gyur so dreg yin/_/
[\[286a.6\]]de ni yal bar bor ba las/_/so ni dum bur zegs gyur pa/_/grugs shing so ni gogs pa yin/_/khrag dang mkhris pa rlung gis so/_/sngon por gyur pa so sngon yin/_/nad kyi rlung ni shas cher 'gyur/_/rtsa bar bcas pa'i so la brtan/_/so dbus skams te stong par byas/_
[\[286a.7\]]so ni zas kyi dri mas gang /_/rul bas srin bu phra mo ni/_/skye bar 'gyur te de 'og tu/_/rgyu med brnag dka' ldang dub can/_/sbom che gnag la shas cher na/_/bcad pa 'drar snang rnag khrag 'dzag_/de ni so srin can zhes bya/_/bad kan dang ni khrag gis rnyil/_/rnags
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]shing rul bar 'gyur ba dang /_/mnyen la zags shing gnag pa de/_/grang bas nyen pa yin par bshad/_/khrag mkhris rnags pa las byung ba/_/rnyil ni tsha bar byed pa dang /_/khrag gis skrangs pa mtho ba dang /_/g.ya' zhing khrag ni 'dzag pa dang /_/khrag chad nas ni rgyas
[\[286b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/so na 'gul zhing nad tshabs chung /_/kha dri mnam gyur nyer bdar yin/_/so ni gnyis sam gsum thad kar/_/bad kan las gyur rgya shug tsam/_/skrangs pa sra zhing mi bzad na/_/myur du smin pa so 'bur yin/_/rnyil ni nad bcas khrag gis ni/_/phyi dang nang
[\[286b.3\]]du skrang zhing lci/_/na zhing tsha la gas pa las/_/rnag khrag 'dzag so'i khong 'bras yin/_/so rtsar khrag mkhris las gyur nad/_/skrang zhing nad dang bcas pa dang /_/kha chu 'dzag cing rnyil 'drul ba/_/khong stong gi ni nad ces bya/_/'dus pa las gyur rims dang bcas/_/
[\[286b.4\]]rnag dang bcas pa'i khrag 'dzag la/_/so yi sprel mtshams zhig pa ni/_/khong stong chen po zhes bshad do/_/bad kan gyis ni so yi mthar/_/sha mdzer ltar skrang 'gram pa dang /_/rna ba na byed spyod lam nyams/_/de ni sha lhag ces byar bshad/_/rnyil ni bdar bar 'gyur pa
[\[286b.5\]]las/_/nad tshabs chen por 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/gang zhig so ni 'gul gyur pa/_/de ni snad pa las byung yin/_/rnyil la brten par byed pa'i nad/_/gsor rung yal bar bor ba gang /_/nang du de ni nad 'dzag pas/_/des ni rgyun lam phra ba skyed/_/de ni yang yang rnag 'dzag
[\[286b.6\]]cing /_/pags pa sha dang rus pa 'bigs/_/de yang rang rang mtshan nyid ni/_/ji skad bshad pas lngar shes bya/_/lce ni sha kha'i lo ltar rtsub/_/tshor ba med gas rlung gnod yin/_/mkhris pas tsha zhing nad bcas 'gyur/_/mdzer pa dmar pos khyab pa yin/_/bad kan las
[\[286b.7\]]gyur shal ma li'i/_/tsher mas khyab gyur lci zhing mthug_/bad kan mkhris pas 'og tu skrang /_/mtho zhing gyong bar byed pa dang /_/smin na nya yi dri 'dra la/_/sha 'drul chu ser can zhes bya/_/lce rtsa'i 'og dang 'brel pa ni/_/skrang zhing lce yi rtse mo 'dra/_/mdzer pa byung zhing
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]kha chu 'dzag_/lce ni rengs shing rtsub pa dang /_/g.ya' dang nad bcas tshig mi thon/_/za bar mi nus lce lhag yin/_/de dang 'dra bar lce steng na/_/gnas pa'i nye ba'i lce zhes bya/_/rlung 'khrugs pa ni rkan gyi shar/_/'brum phran sra zhing nad bcas
[\[287a.2\]]'gyur/_/mang zhing mthug la 'dzag par bcas/_/rkan gyi 'brum phran zhes de bshad/_/bad kan khrag gis rkan phugs su/_/nya yi lgang pa 'dra zhing 'jam/_/'phyang zhing skrangs la spyi bag can/_/kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed/_/lkog 'gags skom dang lud pa dang /_/
[\[287a.3\]]slon byed lkog ma'i sha lhag yin/_/rkan gyi dbus su nad med sha//_'dus pa rkan 'dus zhes bya'o/_/rkan gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dra/_/khrag las skyes pa chu bur yin/_/bad kan 'khrugs pas ring nas 'phel/_/nad med rus sbal 'dra zhes bya/_/bad kan tshil gyis rgya sran
[\[287a.4\]]'dra/_/nad med brtan pa 'bur ba yin/_/mkhris pas rnags pa smin zhes bya/_/rnag 'dzag nad dkyel che ba yin/_/rlung mkhris las gyur tsha nyon mongs/_/rkan skam de yi ming can yin/_/lce dang 'brel ba lkog ma'i nad/_/sha yi myu gu myur 'phel zhing /_/mi bzad
[\[287a.5\]]lam ni 'gog byed pa/_/myur gsod byed pa gag pa yin/_/de ni rlung gyur lkog ma kha/_/skam byed 'gram pa rna nad skyed/_/mkhris pas rims skom rmongs bag can/_/lkog 'gags dud pas bdugs snyam sems/_/myur smin myur du 'phel ba dang /_/dmar zhing reg na mi
[\[287a.6\]]bzod byed/_/bad kan gyis dkar 'byar bag can/_/khrag gyur 'brum bus khyab pa dang /_/me mdag 'dra zhing rna nad skyed/_/mkhris pa las gyur mtshan nyid mtshungs/_/'dus gyur rnag phugs gting ring zhing /_/mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa yin/_/bad kan shas cher skrangs pa
[\[287a.7\]]dang /_/rmen bu rgya shug 'dra zhing mtho/_/gra ma tsher mas gar snyam byed/_/lam 'gag byed pa rtsa ba yin/_/zlum zhing mtho la tsha ba dang /_/lkog ma'i ngos gnas 'dus pa yin/_/'gram pa'i mtshams nas mgul pa'i nad/_/ras bal sa bon lta bur zlum/_/spyi bag nad tshabs
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]chung bar skrang /_/sra ba mchu rtse can zhes bya/_/phyi dang nang du mi bzad skrang /_/lkog ma'i lam gyi gtan pa 'dra/_/mgo lci snum dang kha chu 'dzag_/rims skyed lkog mchu 'dzings pa yin/_/skrangs pa shas cher mi na zhing /_/chu zheng de 'dra gdu bu yin/_/nad kyi lkog ma
[\[287b.2\]]sha mdzer ni/_/gcig gam mang skyes nad tshabs chung /_/dbugs 'byin dka' zhing zas mid dka'/_/rtsa ba che ba lkog ma'i mtshon/_/sha yi mdzer pa mang pos khyab/_/rab skam tsha la mgo bo na/_/mdung ltar shin tu nad skyed byed/_/mdzer pas khyab pas mdung 'dra yin/_/
[\[287b.3\]]lkog ma kun ni myur khyab cing /_/myur skye myur smin shas cher na/_/rul ba'i rnag 'dra 'dzag gyur pa/_/skrangs pa lkog ma'i khong 'bras pa yin/_/lce yi mtha' ma lkog ma sogs/_/skrang zhing smin pa med pa'i nad/_/brtan pa khrag gis skyed byed pa/_/nad med lkog ma'i rmen bu yin/_/
[\[287b.4\]]rlung dang bad kan tshil gyis ni/_/lkog ma'i phyi rol lba ba skyes/_/de ni 'phel bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/rlig pa ltar 'phyang na ba med/_/de ni rlung gyur dmar ba'am gnag_/na zug rtsa ris nag por bcas/_/'phel bas lkog ma kha skam zhing /_/lce yis ro mi tshor
[\[287b.5\]]bar byed/_/bad kan las lci reg na grang /_/brtan zhing skya la g.ya' dang bcas/_/'phel na rkan dang lkog mar chags/_/kha ni mngar ba bro bar byed/_/tshil gyur bad kan lta bur na/_/de ni 'phel 'bri lus 'dar byed/_/'phel bar byed pa'i tshe na ni/_/lkog mar sgra bcas skad
[\[287b.6\]]gsang nyams/_/bad kan gyis ni rlung rgyun bkag_/lkog skam skad gsang nyams pa dang /_/dka' bas dbugs 'byin mon zhugs snyam/_/rlung las skad nyams gang yin 'gyur/_/rlung ni kun tu 'gro byed pas/_/kha nang rma ni 'pho bar byed/_/dmar la rtsub pa skyed byed cing /_/
[\[287b.7\]]lce yis grang ba me bzod lci/_/gas shing tsher mas khyab 'drar snang /_/kha mnam gdangs par dka' ba ni/_kha yi shu ba zhes byar bshad/_/bad kan gzhang 'brum skran sogs kyis/_/'og tu gnod par byas pa'i rlung /_/gyen 'byung kha
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ni dri mi zhim/_/de ni steng gi rkub ces bya/_/mkhris gyur kha shu kha rnag cing /_/tsha na kha ni tsha bro la/_/rma la lan tshwas byugs snyam sems/_/khrag las gyur pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/bad kan las gyur kha mngar bro/_/g.ya' zhing rma ni 'byil bag can/_/
[\[288a.2\]]mkhur tshos nang du brten nas ni/_/'brum bu gnag cing skya ba 'byung /_/de ni mnye zhing bcad pa dang /_/bskyod na 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/nad ni khrag bcas gyur kha shu/_/kha shu nad ni khrag bcas 'gyur/_/'dus pa mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/de nyid so shing la sogs
[\[288a.3\]]la/_/mi dga' kha dri mi zhim 'gyur/_/mchu dang mkhur tshos so rtsa dang /_/lce dang rkan dang mgul pa dang /_/kha dang thams cad dag gi ni/_/nad ni bdun cu rtsa dgu yin/_/bcu gcig gcig dang bcu dang ni/_/bcu gsum de bzhin drug dang brgyad/_/bcu gnyis bco brgyad
[\[288a.4\]]dag dang ni/_/de dag go rims bzhin du sbyar/_/so sto sha dang khrag gyur mchu/_/chu bur chu ni med pa dang /_/rkan gyi rus sbal 'brum phran dang /_/ming khong stong stong che chung 'dzings/_/skad nyams so sngon steng gi rkub/_/mdung 'dra gdu bu chu ser can/_/'dus gyur mid pa mchu
[\[288a.5\]]nad dang /_/khrag dang 'dus gyur gag pa dang /_/so gogs so ni chag pa dang /_/smin pa'i nye ba'i lce dang ni/_/lkog ma'i lba ba skad nyams dang /_/dbugs mi thon pa lo gcig lon/_/so brtse gsang ba 'tsho ba tsam/_/lhag ma mtshon dang sman gyis gso/_/yan lag brgyad
[\[288a.6\]]pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//de nas kha nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/mchu ral ba yi mtha' brud de/_/btsems la rma ltar gso bar bya/_/shing mngar seng phrom kra ku ni/_/thal tres ut+pal shra pa ni/_/mon sne'u
[\[288a.7\]]dme ru pa to la/_/til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya/_/rlung 'joms mngar ba'i sde tshan dang /_/bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang /_/rlung gyur mchu nad sra rtsi phog_/spra tshil gu gul thang shing na/_/snum chen bskol ba'i ras bal dag_/sbangs pa'i ye'us glan par bya/_/shing
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]mngar phye mar bcas pa dang /_/de nyid kyis ni bsku bar bya/_/e raN+Da yi lo ma ni/_/'o mar bskol bas sbubs dugs bya/_/mchu ral skabs bshad sna sman dang /_/mgo bo brta ba dag kyang bya/_/mkhris pas snad pa'i mchu nad la/_/srin bu pad pas khrag
[\[288b.2\]]dbyung bya/_/seng phrom sbrang rtsi sra rtsi pog_/shing mngar bcas pa'i phye ma gdab/_/sle tres shing mngar rma shing dang /_/bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na'ang phan/_/mkhris pa'i khong 'bras ltar yang gso/_/khrag las gyur pa sar pa la/_/de dag nyid kyis gso bar
[\[288b.3\]]bya/_/bad kan las gyur mchu nad la/_/pa to'i thal ba tsha ba gsum/_/sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar bas bsku/_/gtar ga byas nas phye ma gdab/_/bad kan 'joms par byed pa yin/_/dud brngub sna sman mkhur bkang bya/_/tshil gyur dugs byas dbral nas ni/_/me yis nges
[\[288b.4\]]par bsreg par bya/_/pri yang ku dang 'bras bu gsum/_/seng phrom sbrang rtsir sbyar bas sku/_/chu yi chu bur brtol nas sbyang /_/sman rnon sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya/_/gting ring ba'am rab 'phel la/_/thang sman dag gam me btsas gso/_/mkhur ba'i chu ser smin skabs su/_/
[\[288b.5\]]skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya/_/so grang ba la dugs byas la/_/so rtsa brud de til mar bsregs/_/gla sgang rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi dang /_/se'u 'bru'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum/_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da 'dam bu'i rkang /_/bca' sga sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/'o ma can bskol mkhur ba
[\[288b.6\]]bkang /_/e raN+Da'i mar sna sman gtang /_/so brtse de bzhin bye ba la/_/rlung 'joms gso ba thams cad bya/_/til dang shing mngar sbrang rtsi ni/_/'o mar bskol ba'i mkhur bkang bcang /_/so 'gul ba la rtsa ba bcu'i/_/khu ba mar bskol mkhur ba bkang /_/sbangs ma
[\[288b.7\]]seng phrom pi pi ling /_/'bras bu gsum dang rma shing dang /_/rgyam tsha yis ni bdar bar bya/_/snum bag gis ni sna sman dang /_/mkhur bkang gnas skabs ji bzhin bsten/_/so lhag skyes la thal sman gyis/_/bskus te gogs par gyur pa dang /_/srin can so ltar phyung nas
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]ni/_/de tshe de dang 'dra bar gso/_/khrag ni chod par ma gyur na/_/bsregs la rma ltar gso bar bya/_/so dreg chags la so rtsal/_/gnod pa med par bsal bar bya/_/thal sman sbrang rtsir bcas pas ni/_/de yi 'og tu bsku bar bya/_/so gogs pa la'ang 'di nyid dang /_/so
[\[289a.2\]]brtser bshad pa'i gso ba bya/_/srin can so ni mi 'gul la/_/dugs byas nas ni khrag dbyung bya/_/snum gyis bsku zhing mkhur bkang dang /_/sna sman kha zas rlung 'joms sbyin/_/khong stong bu ram spra tshil gyis/_/gang ba'i thur mas
[\[289a.3\]]bsreg par bya/_/lo ma bdun pa arka yi/_/lo mas bkang na srin gzer 'joms/_/shing kun nag chur kad pa la/_/sardzi ka dang byi dang ga_/ru rta'i phye ma ras la gtums/_/sor glan zug gzer myur du 'joms/_/yang na 'di nyid bskol ba yi/_/til mar mkhur
[\[289a.4\]]bar dgang bar bya/_/yang na bri ha ti rnam gnyis/_/bu ga dam pa e raN+Da/_/bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang /_/de ltar gso ba mang po yis/_/nad ni zhi bar ma gyur na/_/skam pa phra mo dag gis sam/_/so dbyung ba yi cha spyad kyis/_/dang po rtsa ba nas bslangs te/_/gtan nas
[\[289a.5\]]de ni dbyung bar bya/_/til mar shing mngar phyer bcas pa'am/_/sbrang rtsis de 'og mkhur bkang bya/_/de 'og shing mngar bid ri/_/srid ka dang ka she ru/_/til mar bcu 'gyur 'o ma dang /_/bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya/_/rid cing nyam chung rgan po dang /_/rlung nad kyis nyen so mi dbyung /_/
[\[289a.6\]]ya so dbyung bar mi bya ste/_/de ni bla brnan mang po skyed/_/de yang 'byin na snum pa dang /_/mngar dang bsil ba'i rim pas gso/_/grang bas nyen la khrag dbyung zhing /_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas bsku bar bya/_/gla sgang ardzu na'i shun pa/_/pri yang ku dang skyer khaN+Da/_/bca' sga sgrang rtsir sbyar ba
[\[289a.7\]]bsku/_/de bskol bas ni mkhur bkang dang /_/mngar sman til mar bskol snar blugs/_/rnyil ni nye bar bdar ba la/_/chu tshan mkhur bkang bas dugs bya/_/dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'am sha kha yi/_/lo mas mang du brud par bya/_/rgya skyegs rma shing pri yang ku/_/rgyam tsha ru rta btsag
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]yug snam/_/na le sham dang bca' sga dang /_/shing mngar skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang /_/mar gyi snying po sbrang rtsi dang /_/sbyar ba de 'og bsku bar bya/_/mar khu'am til mar mkhur spo ba/_/dro 'jam de yi rjes la bya/_/mngar ba'i sde dang bskol ba'i mar/_/mkhur bkang sna sman
[\[289b.2\]]byas na phan/_/so 'bur ba la dugs byas la/_/bcad dang dbug dang brud par bya/_/shing mngar bca' sgas rdzi ka_/rgyam tsha'i phye ma bsku bar bya/_/so yi khong 'bras tsha dro rno/_/rtsub pa'i mkhur bkang bsku bar bya/_/pu tse shel dang ba spru ba/_/ru rta nas tshig 'khus phyir
[\[289b.3\]]bdar/_/bsil sman gyis ni smin mi gzhug_/smin nas dral la gting ring bsreg_/khong stong bcad de brud nas ni/_/gla sgang seng phrom 'bras bu gsum/_/shu ti rma shing skyer khaN+Da/_/rgya skyegs shing mngar kad phal/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/de nyid khu bas
[\[289b.4\]]mkhur ba bkang /_/shing mngar seng phro ma dUr ba dkar/_/thal tres tsan+dan na a ga ru/_/ka ra dkar po btsag yug snam/_/pad+ma dkar po stag tsher ba/_/bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang /_/sha lhag skyes pa bcad nas ni/_/shu dag te dzo ba ti dang /_/pa ta nas tshig
[\[289b.5\]]'khus thal ba/_/sardzi ka dang sbrang rtsis bsku/_/'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/_/nim pa bskol bas mkhur ba bkang /_/snad pa las byung nad la ni/_/dkyil 'khor rtse mo 'dra bas sbyangs/_/de nas thal sman sna sman gtang /_/mkhur bkang la sogs bsil sman gtang /_/lus
[\[289b.6\]]kyi gong 'og nas sbyang bya/_/de 'og mgo bo'i bkru sman bya/_/so yi rtsa ni sos nas kyang /_/phyung ste nad dang ldan pa yi/_/bu ram spra tshil bkang bas bsreg_/dzA ti seng ldeng spra tshil dang /_/gze ma bskol ba'i khu bas bkru/_/'o ma can shing chus mkhur bkang /_/de bskol til
[\[289b.7\]]mar sna sman gtang /_/rlung gyur lce ni rtsub pa la/_/rlung gi mchu nad gso bar bya/_/mkhris pa las gyur lce nad la/_/bzhar te khrag ni dbyung bar bya/_/bsku dang mkhur ba bkang ba dang /_/sna sman mngar ba dag kyang bya/_/de bzhin bad kan las gyur la/_/nyungs kar tsha ba gsum la
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]sogs/_/sman ni rnon pos gso bar bya/_/lce las chu ser 'dzag pa gsar/_/mtshon mi reg par de bzhin gso/_/lce lhag skyes pa lce bteg ste/_/lcags kyus lce lhag drangs nas ni/_/rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra bas bcad/_/rno dang dro bas bdar
[\[290a.2\]]sogs bya/_/nye ba'i lce la khrag gzags te/_/nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal bas bdar/_/sha lhag skyes la bad kan 'joms/_/sna sman mkhur bkang bdar bar bya/_/ga gon sa bon lta bur ni/_/'phel zhing rtsa ni mi mngon dang /_/rtse mos lce yi rtsa ba slebs/_/lcags
[\[290a.3\]]kyu yis ni bzung nas kyang /_/rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yis/_/rtse mo rtsa ba ran par gcad/_/bcad drags khrag zags 'chi bar byed/_/bcad chung nad ni 'phel bar byed/_/bong nga ba ta na le sham/_/shu dag ru rta pa ri la/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa yis/_/bcad pa dag ni bdar
[\[290a.4\]]bar bya/_/pa ri be la kun ta ta'o/_/pu tse shel dang bong da dkar/_/ba ta nim pa ra sna dang /_/shu dag chu yis mkhur bkang bya/_/'dus dang so 'bur rus sbal 'dra/_/de bzhin bzhar te gso bar bya/_/rkan rnags ma smin pa la ni/_/nag tshur sbrang rtsi skyer khaN+Da/_/bsku bar
[\[290a.5\]]bya'o bsil dang mngar/_/sman bskol khu bas mkhur bkang bya/_/smin nas na ya'i gzhi ltar dras/_/dro dang rno bas bsku bar bya/_/ba sha ka dang pa to la/_/nim pa la sogs rno ba yi/_/sman gyi khu bas mkhur ba dgang /_/rkan skam skom dad gdung med pa/_/zas zos rjes la
[\[290a.6\]]zhun mar ni/_/bca' sga bi pi ling bskol blud/_/skyur bas mkhur ba spo ba bcang /_/skam sa'i sha khu snum pa dang /_/zhun mar 'o ma'i sna sman gtang /_/lkog ma'i nad la gtar ga gdab/_/sna sman la sogs rnon po bya/_/skyer pa'i shun pa skyer khaN+Da/_/dug mo nyung bskol khu
[\[290a.7\]]ba blud/_/a ru ra yi khu ba ni/_/sbrang rtsir ldan pa sbyin par bya/_/'bras bu gsum dang cha ba gsum/_/nas tshig 'khus thal skyer pa dang /_/tsi tra ka dang skyer khaN+Da/_/pa ta te dzo ba ti dang /_/nim pa tsha dang ra gcin bskol/_/mkhur ba spo dang ri lu dang /_/phye ma gdab pa dag kyang
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]bya/_/lcang ma gi ri kar+Ni dang /_/gla sgang thang shing bca' sga dang /_/shu dag dan da mur ba yi/_/lde gu dro bskus skrangs nad sel/_/de nas phyi nang dugs byas te/_/sor gdub cha spyad dag gis sam/_/rgyam tsha ldan pa'i sen mo yis/_/rlung gyur gag pa bzhar bar bya/_/rtsa ba lnga
[\[290b.2\]]bskol mkhur bkang dang /_/til mar mkhur sbo sna sman gtang /_/mkhris pa las gyur gtar ga gdab/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi pri yang ku/_/seng phrom rma shing bcas pa bdar/_/de bskol khu ba mkhur bar bcang /_/rgun 'brum pa ru sha ka bskol/_/mkhur ba bkang ba'ang phan pa yin/_/
[\[290b.3\]]khrag las gyur pa'ang de bzhin du/_/gtar ga gdab ste gso bar bya/_/bad kan las gyur khang pa yi/_/dud pa tsha ba'i sman bcas gdab/_/a pa marga'i 'bras bu dang /_/gi ri kar+Ni byi dang ga_/rgyam tsha tsan+dan til mar bskol/_/sna sman mkhur bkang bya ba bsngags/_/de
[\[290b.4\]]bzhin 'dus dang rtsa ba dang /_/mchu rtse lkog ma'i mtshon la'ang bya/_/khong 'bras khrag gzags 'bras bu gsum/_/gi wang yug snam skyer khaN+Da/_/seng phrom rgyam tsha rma shing dang /_/pi pi ling bsku mkhur bkang bya/_/rlung las gyur pa'i wa ba la/_/dugs byas nas ni khrag
[\[290b.5\]]dbyung zhing /_/til dang zar ma leb rgan rtsi/_/pi la ya dang btsod 'bras kyis/_/rma 'drub nas bskus dkri bar bya/_/shi kru seng phrom tar ka ri/_/tang pa la ha ti pi pi ling /_/ba spu pa dang a ru ra/_/arka'i rtsa ba po son cha/_/e kai Shi kar bcas pa ni/_/chang ngam rang sgyur
[\[290b.6\]]btags pas bsku/_/lde gus yang dang yang du bsku/_/sle tres nim pa dug mo nyung /_/han sa ba ti ba la gnyis/_/thang shing dang ni pi pi ling /_/bskol ba'i til mar blud par bya/_/bad kan la yang 'di dag ni/_/bya zhing lhag par dugs bsku bya/_/a za gan+d+ha bong nga dkar/_/
[\[290b.7\]]a za shing gi bi sha l+ya/_/ku ba kha bo 'ol ma se/_/shi ri sha dang rgya skyegs shing /_/thal chu'i lde gus bsku bar bya/_/thal ba drag po gcin bskol btsags/_/khre rgod za zhing btung bar bya/_/dug mo nyung sogs lan tshwa lnga/_/til mar lhan cig bskol ba blud/_/bad kan 'joms
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]pa'i dud pa dang /_/slon sman sna sman la sogs bsten/_/tshil gyur ba la gtar ga gdab/_/bad kan 'joms pa'i cho ga bsten/_/'di la a sa la sogs pa'i/_/khu ba gcin ni snga dro blud/_/des ma zhin thams cad ni/_/smin byas rma ltar gso bar
[\[291a.2\]]bya/_/kha shu la ni 'bras bu gsum/_/ba ta rgun 'brum dzA ti yi/_/'o mar bskol ba'i sbrang rtsir bcas/_/kha ni bsku zhing bcang bar bya/_/yang na zin thig la sogs spe/_/bza' zhing bsten pa nyid du bya/_/rlung gi kha shur pi pi ling /_/rgyam tsha sug smel phye ma gdab/_/yang
[\[291a.3\]]na rlung 'joms sman bskol ba'i/_/til mar sna sman mkhur bkang phan/_/khrag mkhris gyur la khrag mkhris 'joms/_/bad kan las gyur de 'joms bsten/_/'brum phran sra zhing brtan pa la/_/sha kha'i lo ma sogs kyis bzhar/_/'dus pa las gyur gso ba ni/_/nad
[\[291a.4\]]gzhi ji bzhin shas cher bya/_/chu bur gsar zhing ma 'phel ba/_/bcad las rdzi ka'i thal ba/_/bca' sga sbrang rtsi gdab par bya/_/de bskol mkhur ba bkang bar bya/_/sle tres nim pa'i lde gu ni/_/sbrang rtsi til mar bcas pa'ang rung /_/nas zan za zhing til mar rnos/_/sna
[\[291a.5\]]sman dang ni bsku byug bya/_/kha dri nga la slon sman dang /_/dud pa sna sman rnon po gtang /_/btsod dang seng phrom da ta ki_/shug pa bri yang ku yi chus/_/kha yi nang ni bkru ba dang /_/phye mas kha ni dag par bya/_/grang nyen nye bar bdar bshad pa'i/_/sna sman la sogs bsten par bya/_/
[\[291a.6\]]'bras bu gsum dang rtsa mkhris tsi tra ka_/shing mngar nyungs kar gla sgang tshab gsum/_/ya bak+Sha ra ser po rnam gnyis dang /_/da trig tsan+dan lcang ma star bu dang /_/a shwat+tha dang 'dzam bu'i myu gu dang /_/da nan dza ya ka ra bI ra'i shun/_/seng ldeng snying po bskol te ska bar gyur/_/de yi
[\[291a.7\]]phye ma btab ste ri lu bya/_/de ni kha nang rtag tu bzhag gyur na/_/mchu dang rkan sogs nad ni mi bzad 'joms/_/mchog tu kha skams pa dang gag pa dang /_/ro mi tshor sel lus 'phags bdag pos bshad/_/seng ldeng srang brgya chu bre bcu drug bskol/_/khu ba de dang tsan+dan a ga ru/_/
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]gur gum pa la ba ri pe la dang /_/thang shing seng phrom rgun 'brum pu shel tsi/_/btsod dang tso tsa shug pa byi dang ga_/pri ka rgya spos kad pa la chu srin sder/_/sug smel d+he ma ka dang rma shing bcas/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis til mar bre gang bskol/_/de ni btung dang sna sman mkhur bkang
[\[291b.2\]]bya/_/kha yi nad kun 'joms byed bya rgod ltar/_/mig gsal rna ba phag 'drar gsang bar byed/_/tsa kra mar da skyer pa seng phrom gyi/_/lde gu gdong la byugs par gyur na ni/_/do khabs sme ba dri ma la sogs sel/_/zla ba lta bu'i mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/sa ha ra dza srang stong chu
[\[291b.3\]]bre ni/_/bcu drug nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/seng ldeng 'dzam bu shing mngar e raN+Da/_/a mra a ti ma ra ut+pal sngo/_/zhib btags til mar bre gang nang du bskol/_/de ni kha yi nang du bcangs gyur na/_/kha yi nad kun 'joms shing khyad par du/_/so yi phreng ba 'gul
[\[291b.4\]]ba brtan par byed/_/seng ldeng snying po srang ni nyis brgya dang /_/a ri me da sa ni srang brgya dag_/chu bre drug cu bzhi bskol bzhi cha lus/_/btsags te slar yang ska ba'i bar du bskol/_/de nang dbyi mo rma shing ba le ka_/tsan+dan rnam gnyis seng phrom stag tsher ba/_/shing mngar rgya
[\[291b.5\]]skyegs a dza ri rnam gnyis/_/da ta ki dang kat+pa la'i 'bras bu/_/ser po rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni/_/dri sna bzhi dang gla sgang a ru ra/_/btsod dang spang spos n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/_/shug pa btsod dang e la ba lu ka_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btab ste bsgrangs pa ru/_/dzA ti
[\[291b.6\]]pa tra dzA ti phal dang /_/li shi a ko la dang ka ko la/_/srang reg pur srang bzhi gzhug par bya/_/de las ri lu byas la rtag tu ni/_/khar bzhag na ni kha nad thams cad sel/_/bskol dang reng bu'i sman ni go bzlog pa/_/btags pa 'di yi til mar bskol bar bya/_/kha nad kun sel
[\[291b.7\]]bar ni de bshad do/_/so brtan byed pa'i mchog kyang 'di nyid yin/_/ri lu 'di ni seng ldeng sbyar til mar/_/a ri me da sa dang bskol ba dag_/nyin re bsten par byed na nad med pa'ang /_/so ni nges par brtan par byed pa yin/_/rgun 'brum sle tres dzA ti'i myu gu dang /_/skyer pa byi
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]tsher 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'di ni mkhur bar bcangs/_/kha yi nad du gtogs pa thams cad sel/_/skyer pa ba ta ru rta gla sgang btsod/_/yung ba seng phrom te dzo ba ti dang /_/pu tse shel gyi phye ma sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/bskus na
[\[292a.2\]]rnyil nad nyam thag g.ya' ba dang /_/rnag dang 'dzag pa'i nad rnams 'joms par byed/_/khyim gyi dud pa tha skyer khaN+Da/_/tsha ba gsum dang nas tshig 'khus thal ba/_/tsi tar ka dang lcags phye 'bras bu gsum/_/te dzo ba ti sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ni/_/nag po khar bcangs so dang mgul
[\[292a.3\]]nad sel/_/skyer pa'i shun pa ldong ros lce myang tsha/_/ba bla nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'i phye/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phye ma ser po can/_/khar bzhag so dang mgul ba'i nad rnams sel/_/ba gcin a ru ra bskol thim gyur pa/_/shu ti ru rta ba le ka'i phye zos/_/nang gi kha nad
[\[292a.4\]]phra mo yan chad ni/_/rgyal por brten na gnod pas mi tshugs bzhin/_/nang du bzhag na nad rnams sel bar byed/_/lo ma bdun pa gla sgang bu shel tse/_/a ru ra dang tig ta pa to la/_/shing mngar dong gra tsan+dan pu shel tse/_/bskol ba 'thungs na kha yi shu ba 'joms/_/pa to la
[\[292a.5\]]dang bca' sga 'bras bu gsum/_/bi sha l+ya dang tig ta kyi lce ba/_/sle tres bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas blud dam/_/khar bzhag kha yi nad kun ma lus 'joms/_/skyer pa bskol ba'i khu ba ni/_/ska gyur yug snam btsag dang bcas/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa kha nang bzhag_/shu ba rma
[\[292a.6\]]'khyims sel bar byed/_/nim pa shing mngar pa to la/_/ba sha ka dang dzA ti dang /_/seng ldeng a ri med sa/_/'bras bu gsum po re re la'ang /_/de bzhin du ni gtang bar bya/_/seng ldeng lcags phye 'bras bu gsum/_/ma ta yan ti a rdzu na/_/a ti ma ra bskol ba ni/_/mkhur bcad
[\[292a.7\]]kha nad so nad sel/_/kha dang so rtsa mgul nad phal cher ni/_/bad kan khrag las mang du 'byung ba yin/_/de bas nad de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_/nad khrag lan mang du ni dbyung bar bya/_/mgo dang lus kyi skyug sman bkru sman dang /_/kha dang tsha dang mkhur bkang bcang bar bya/_/de bzhin
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bad kan khrag ni sel ba yi/_/gso ba'i nad ni phal cher bsngags pa yin/_/nas dang rtsa 'bru phub ma med byas la/_/thal sman mang du spangs shing snum med bza'/_/khu ba bstan pa la sogs gang gzhan ni/_/bad kan sel bar byed pa phan pa yin/_/srog ni rlung gi lam
[\[292b.2\]]la gnas pas na/_/bag med pa yis 'gag par 'gyur ba yin/_/de bas lkog ma'i nad kyi gso ba ni/_/shin tu myur bar bya ba kho na yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de nas mgo bo'i nad
[\[292b.3\]]kyi dmigs shes par bya ba bshad par bya'o/_/du ba nyi tshan kha ba dang /_/chu dang rtse dang gnyid drags dang /_/gnyid yar rdul dang mdun gyi rlang /_/mchi ma bkag dang dus drags dang /_/chu 'thungs chang 'thungs drags pa dang /_/srin bus shugs ni bkag pa dang /_/sngas dang
[\[292b.4\]]bsku byug dril phyis la/_/mi dga' rgyun du thur du blta/_/ma goms dri dang zas gnod zos/_/mang du smras pas mgo bo yi/_/nang du nad ni skyed par byed/_/de la rlung ni 'khrugs pa las/_/mur 'gram gnyis su shin tu zug_/'gram so phug pa snyam du sems/_/smin ma'i
[\[292b.5\]]mtshams dang dpral ba ni/_/ltung ba snyam sems rab tu na/_/rna bar sgra yis gnod par byed/_/mig ni phyung ba snyam du sems/_/mgo bo 'khor ba lta bur sems/_/tshigs rnams bye ba snyam du byed/_/rtsa yi dra ba shin tu 'phar/_/mjing pa 'gram pa 'byar snyam byed/_/gsal ba
[\[292b.6\]]mthong bar mi bzod cing /_/sna chu 'dzag cing glo bur du/_/na ba dang ni nad gzhi byed/_/mnye zhing snum bskus dugs byas dang /_/bcings pas bde bar 'gyur ba yin/_/mgo bo tsha ba'i nad ces bya/_/klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba ni/_/gzhogs phyed nad ces bya bar bshad/_/zla
[\[292b.7\]]gcig zla phyed nas ldang de/_/rang nyid zhi bar 'gyur pa yin/_/shas cher 'phel na mig dang ni/_/rna ba dag kyang ma rung byed/_/mkhris gyur mgo bo tsha ba dang /_/dud pas bdugs snyam sems rims 'debs/_/rdul zhing mig tsha brgyal ba dang /_/mtshan mo grang bas rtse 'jil 'gyur/_/
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]bad kan las gyur yi ga 'chus/_/mgo lci tshor ba med cing grang /_/rtsa mi 'phar zhing sgyid snyom la/_/nyin mo nad chung mtshan mo ldang /_/rmya zhing mig ni skrangs pa dang /_/rna ba g.ya' zhing slon pa yin/_/khrag gyur mkhris pa las cher na/_/'dus gyur mtshan
[\[293a.2\]]nyid kun dang ldan/_/'dren ma'i zas kyis spyi bo yi/_/khrag dang sha ni 'drul byas pas/_/'dus pa'i nad ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing /_/mgo bo'i srin bu skye bar 'gyur/_/des ni mgo bo'i khrag 'thung zhing /_/sems ni 'khrul par byed pa yi/_/mi bzad nad ni skyed par byed/_/lud
[\[293a.3\]]pa rims dang nyams stobs zad/_/mgo bo rtsub skrangs dbug snyam na/_/tsha zhing mgo 'gul rnags pa dang /_/thod pa rkan dang mgo bor ni/_/g.ya' zhing skem la tshor ba med/_/snabs kyi mdog ni dmar ba la/_/rna ba sgra bcas srin skyes nad/_/rlung shas che bas mgo 'dar
[\[293a.4\]]zhing /_/de yi ming can nad skyed byed/_/mkhris shas che ba'i rlung sogs kyis/_/mur 'gram skrang zhing khrag bcas la/_/mi bzad tsha zhing nal dmar/_/glal zhing rims 'debs skom mgo 'khor/_/kha nang kha bro gdong ser zhing /_/myur du gsod byed mur 'gram can/_/zhag gsum
[\[293a.5\]]nas ni srog 'joms shing /_/myur du gso na 'tsho ba yin/_/rlung mkhris rjes 'brel mur 'gram mig_/smin ma dpral ba na ba dang /_/'phar bar byed pa skyed par byed/_/nyi ma 'char bar gyur pa nas/_/nyi ma phyed kyi bar du 'phel/_/de phan chad ni bde bar 'gyur/_/ltogs na de ni lhag par na/_/
[\[293a.6\]]grang dang dro la nges pa med/_/de ni nyi ma 'khor zhes bya/_/de ltar mgo bor gtogs pa'i nad/_/rnam pa bcur ni bshad pa yin/_/gzhan yang thod pa la brten nad/_/dgu po mgo bo bzhin bshad bya/_/klad pa rlung ni 'khrugs gyur pa/_/nang na gnas pa'ang nad skyed byed/_/mdog gnag nad chung
[\[293a.7\]]skrangs pa yin/_/de ni nye ba'i mgo zhes bya/_/'brum phran thor bu khong 'bras ni/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin brjod par bya/_/thod par ljan ljin mang po dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pa'i 'bu las ni/_khre dang nyungs kar lta bur 'byung /_/'brum phran srin gyi nad skyed 'gyur/_/rlung dang mkhris pa
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]'khrugs pa las/_/pags ba rtsub cing gas pa dang /_/g.ya' zhing skra 'byi tshor ba med/_/gyur pa mi bzad yin zhes bya/_/mkhris ba rlung dang 'dres pa ni/_/ba spu'i nang du zhugs gyur pa/_/skra ni 'byi bar byed pa yin/_/de nas bad kan khrag bcas pas/_/ba spu'i bu ga 'gag byed de/_/
[\[293b.2\]]de yis gzhan dag mi 'byung ba/_/'khor ling skra 'byi zhes bya ste/_/gzhan dag skra 'byi zhes byar 'dod/_/spyi cer skye ba'ang de bzhin du/_/skra 'byi de la rim gyis 'byung /_/de ni rlung gyur mes tshig 'dra/_/mkhris gyur rlan can rtsa yis khyab/_/bad kan pags pa'i mdog dkar mthug_/
[\[293b.3\]]pags pa rang gi ji bzhin snang /_/'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/sen mo'i mdog 'dra gsor mi rung /_/mes bsregs lta bur spu med gang /_/tsha bcas de yang gsor mi rung /_/mya ngan khro dang ngal las byung /_/lus kyi drod ni mgor zhugs pas/_/nad des skra ni btsos nas
[\[293b.4\]]ni/_/de la skra dkar skye bar 'gyur/_/de ni rlung gyur yid tsam gnag_/sra zhing rtsub la chu mdog can/_/mkhris pa tsha zhing mdog ser yin/_/bad kan las gyur snum zhing 'phel/_/sbom zhing mdog ni dkar ba yin/_/'dus gyur mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/_/mgo bo'i nad las
[\[293b.5\]]byung ba gzhan/_/mdog ngan reg na mi bzod yin/_/'dus pa las ni gyur pa yi/_/spyi cer skra dkar gsor mi rung /_/lus kyi 'gyur ba las byung ba/_/bcud kyis len gyis gso bar bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//
[\[293b.6\]]de nas mgo bo'i nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i mgo nad la/_/rlung nad gso ba'i cho ga bshad/_/'di ni mtshan mo zhun mar blud/_/de rjes 'o ma dron mo blud/_/ma sha rgya sran mung+ga 'ang rung /_/mar dang ldan pa de bzhin sbyin/_/til mar til gyi lde gu ni/_/'o ma
[\[293b.7\]]dang ni lhan cig blud/_/glan dang bcing ba'i dugs dag ni/_/sha dang 'u su las byas phan/_/rlung 'joms rtsa ba bcu la sogs/_/bskol ba'i 'o ma snum can blud/_/sna sman dud brngub snum can dang /_/mgo dang rna ba brta bar bya/_/ba ra Na sogs sde tshan brdungs/_/'o ma chu phyed bskol
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]ba yi/_/'o ma lus pa de bsgrangs la/_/bsrubs te snying po blangs nas ni/_/de nas mngar ba'i sde tshan bskol/_/mar gyi sna sman blugs pa bsngags/_/'dir ni 'o ma'i sde tshan bskol/_/mar dang kha rar bcas pa blugs/_/ras bal sa bon shing tsha
[\[294a.2\]]dang /_/gla sgang dzA ti kha 'bus pa/_/chu dron btags pa'i sna sman ni/_/mgo bo'i nad kun 'joms byed yin/_/khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa/_/kha ra gur gum mar bskol gtang /_/ru rta rgya spos ut+pa la/_/tsan+dan mar sbyar mgo bskus phan/_/rlung shas che la 'jigs yod
[\[294a.3\]]pas/_/gtar ga 'di la mi bya'o/_/des ma zhi na bad rlung la/_/me btsa' ji skad bshad pa bya/_/gzhogs phyed na la'ang de bzhin te/_/nad dang 'brel pa'i gso ba bya/_/shi ri sha yi sa bon dang /_/a pa marga'i rtsa ba dang /_/kha ru tsha bcas sna sman gtang /_/yang na sa la par+Ni
[\[294a.4\]]'am/_/tsa kra marda gang yang rung /_/skyur ku dang sbyar lde gus bsku/_/nyi ma ltar 'khor de yi tshe/_/gtar gas khrag ni dbyung bar bya/_/mkhris pa las gyur mgo nad la/_/snum chos byas nas gtar ga gdab/_/mgo dang gdong byugs sman chu blugs/_/slon khrus mas gtong
[\[294a.5\]]bsil bar bya/_/'tsho byed dang bskol 'o ma dang /_/mar ni sna sman btung ba blugs/_/khrag las gyur pa 'ang 'di nyid bya/_/mur 'gram can la gtar ga spang /_/bad kan mgo nad mar snying dang /_/snum chos byas la tsha bas slon/_/dugs dang byug pa sna sman sogs/_/rtsub dro
[\[294a.6\]]rno ba'i sman gyis gso/_/'dir ni smyung ba'ang bsngags pa yin/_/'dus pa las ni 'dren mar gso/_/srin gyur sna sman khrag blugs te/_/de yis 'bu ni brgyal bar 'gyur/_/khrag gi dri yis ra ro nas/_/kha dang sna nas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas sna sman dud brngub rnos/_/de
[\[294a.7\]]ni nye bar dbyung bar bya/_/nyungs kar nim pa ing gu dang /_/pi lu'i mar dang sbyar ba yi/_/byi dang ga dang sa rdzi ka_/dan+da shing kun ba gcin bskol/_/sna sman so sor gtang bar bya/_/byi dang ga ni ra gcin dang /_/sbyar ba'i sna sman 'bu 'joms mchog_/nya rul bcas pa'i sna
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]sman dang /_/dud pa dag kyang brngub par bya/_/srin bus khrag ni 'thungs pa'i phyir/_/'di la khrag ni dbyung mi bya/_/mgo 'dar rlung gi mgo nad kyi/_/gso ba me btsa' ma gtogs bya/_/nye ba'i mgo nad skyes pa yi/_/rjes dang skyes ma thag la ni/_/rlung nad kyi ni gso ba bya/_/
[\[294b.2\]]smin nas khong 'bras gso las bya/_/'brum phran 'brum bu khong 'bras la/_/smin dang ma smin ji bzhin bya/_/srin las srin bu pad pa yis/_/gtar ga byas te nim pa'i chu/_/blugs shing rta spangs khu ba ni/_/lan tshwa shas cher btab pas bsku/_/nim pa pa to la'i lo ma/_/yungs
[\[294b.3\]]mar bcas pa zhib btags bsku/_/ba gcin 'ba' cha rnying par sbyar/_/khyim bya'i rtug pa dag gis bsku/_/gyo mor ru rta brngos pa dang /_/til gyi phye mar bcas pa yis/_/glog pa bskus na g.ya' ba'am/_/chu 'dzag tsha ba sel bar byed/_/ma la dzi dang tsi tra ka/_/ka ra bI ra ka rany+dza/_/
[\[294b.4\]]til mar spu gris bregs pa yi/_/rjes bskus 'khor ling 'byi ba sel/_/des ma zhin mgo bo yi/_/sbyang bya slon sman sogs pa bya/_/mi bzad pa la dang por ni/_/dpral ba'i rtsa la gtar ga bya/_/mgo bo'i bkru sman sna sman gtang /_/shing mngar pi la ya'i sa bon/_/ru rta ma
[\[294b.5\]]sha nyungs kar bcas/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gus bsku/_/rgya skyegs dong ga'i lo ma dang /_/tsakra marda skyu ru ra/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bskus kyang phan/_/khre rgod rtsa bsregs thal ba ni/_/chu dang sbyar bas bskus na phan/_/'khor ling skra 'byi'i nad la ni/_/nye bar gtar ga
[\[294b.6\]]gdab pa dang /_/zhal zhal byas te na le sham/_/ldong ros spangs ma nag tshur bsku/_/yang na 'ba' cha'i thang shing ngam/_/'ol ma se yi 'bras bu'i rtsa/_/yang na lang ka li'i rtsa ba'am/_/ka ra bI ra'i khu ba 'am/_/kaN+Da kA ri'i khu ba ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas bsku ba
[\[294b.7\]]'am/_/d+ha du spyor yi lo ma 'am/_/bse shing 'bras bu'i khu bas bsku/_/til gyi me tog gze ma dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/_/glang po'i so bsregs til mar bsres/_/'khor ling 'byi ba'i sman mchog yin/_/skra dkar skye la lug gi rwa'i/_/snag tshas de
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]bzhin bsku bar bya/_/ji srid skra ni skyes kyi bar/_/chu blugs pa ni spang bar bya/_/spyi cer skra dkar gnyer ma mang /_/skra ser skyes la sbyang byas nas/_/sna sman gtong dang mgo bkrus la/_/byug pa rnams kyis gso bar bya/_/bri ha ti sogs til
[\[295a.2\]]mar bskol/_/'tsho byed bskol ba'i sna sman blugs/_/nim pa'i mar gyis zla ba gcig_/sna sman btang ste 'o ma blud/_/shri sha e raN+Da dang rams/_/bring ga rA dza'i khu bar sbangs/_/se'u lu til dang ba ru ra/_/pri yang ka ka ti'i sa bon/_/cha mnyam lcags la bskol nas ni/_/
[\[295a.3\]]nyi ma'i 'od la skams nas ni/_/mar 'dzag pa yi sna sman gtang /_/'o ma 'thungs pas skra dkar sel/_/sa ha ra dza bye'u rug pa/_/bring ga ra dza'i khu ba ni/_/bre gang til mar phul gang dang /_/shing mngar srang gcig btab ste bskol/_/a sa na'am rdo snod dam/_/lug gi
[\[295a.4\]]rwa yi nang du gzhug_/ka ra bI ra pa ya s+ya/_/'o ma dang ni zhib btags pa/_/skra dkar phyung ba'i rjes bskus shing /_/sbangs na skra dkar sel bar byed/_/bi la ya dang shing mngar dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan til nag dang /_/sa nag 'o ma'i lde gu yis/_/gdong bskus gnyer ma
[\[295a.5\]]spu ser sel/_/til dang pad+ma ge sar dang /_/shing mngar sbrang rtsi skyu ru ra/_/lde gu 'di yis mgo bskus na/_/skra 'phel gnag par 'gyur ba yin/_/spang spos ru rta til nag dang /_/thal tres ut+pal sngon po dang /_/'o mar btags te sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/skra ni 'phel bar byed
[\[295a.6\]]pa'i mchog_/lcags phye bring ga ra dza dang /_/'bras bu gsum dang sa nag po/_/bu ram shing khur zla gcig gzhug_/skra dkar rtsad nas skyur bar byed/_/ma sha khre rgod skyur rtsabs dang /_/nas thug lcags phye tsha mang btab/_/zhag gsum bzhag ste btags pa yis/_/bya dkar
[\[295a.7\]]yang ni nag por byed/_/shing mngar tsan+dan stag tsher ba/_/pi pi ling dang ut+pal dang /_/skyu ru ra khu til mar bskol/_/sna sman bsku ba byas gyur na/_/skra dkar dang ni klad pa yi/_/nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin/_/nye'u shing dzi ban+ti'i khu ba/_/'o ma mar dang til mar dang /_/
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]'tsho byed bskol ba'i sna sman gyis/_/nam tshong yan chad nad kun sel/_/rma bya'i sgro mkhris rgyu ma dang /_/rkang pa rtug pa chu bor ba'i/_/sha dang ba la rtsa ba bcu/_/ra sna shing mngar srang gsum gsum/_/chu bskol khu ba mar bre gang /_/'o ma bre gang bcas bskol ba/_/mngar
[\[295b.2\]]ba'i sman sde'i lde gu btab/_/de btung mas gtong bsku ba dang /_/sna sman dag tu bsten pa yis/_/nam tshong yan chad nad kun sel/_/sman 'di dag gi lde gu dang /_/dzi ban+ti dang 'bras bu gsum/_/med rgun 'brum dbyi mo dang /_/pa ru sha ka sa mang ga_/
[\[295b.3\]]ga pra'i rtsa ba tang pa la dang /_/karka ta sring kha sral phre'u/_/'bro go pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/pad+ma'i sdong po kha rdzun/_/shing mngar nye'u shing dzi ba ka/_/bi da ri dang bu ram shing /_/thal tres rnam gnyis bri ha ti/_/mur ba gze ma zangs rtsi ba/_/sring ga ta dang ka she ru/_/ra sna s+thi ra lca ba dang /_/sug
[\[295b.4\]]smel zur ba ma nu dang /_/ba spru ba dang cu gang dang /_/ra mnye ba dang byi tsher ba/_/ma du ka dang star ga dang /_/a bi shu ka muny+dza ka_/zho ni gnyis gnyis phyir btags dang /_/mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni/_/bzhi 'gyur dag dang bskol ba'i mar/_/'di ni rma bya chen mo ste/_/rma bya las ni yon tan
[\[295b.5\]]lhag_/lus zungs dbang po nyams skad 'gags/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde nyen 'joms/_/zla mtshan khu ba'i skyon la'ang phan/_/mo gsham la yang bu skyed byed/_/byi ba khyim bya dang pa dang /_/ri bong dang yang de bzhin sbyar/_/nam tshod yan chad gtogs pa'i nad/_/nyis brgya
[\[295b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gcig yin/_/de dag phan tshun ma 'dres par/_/rgya cher rab tu bshad pa yin/_/drang srong rnams kyis skyes bu'i mgo/_/rtsa ba 'og ni yal gar bshad/_/de phyir rtsa ba la gnod pa'i/_/nad ni myur du gso bar bya/_/gang la dbang po kun rten zhing /_/gang la srog ni
[\[295b.7\]]gnas byed pas/_/des na yan lag dam pa yi/_/srung ba la ni 'bad par bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/stod gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so//_//
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]de nas rma gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/rma ni lhan cig skyes glo bur/_/red dang ma red dbye ba gnyis/_/lus kyi nad gzhis skyed lhan cig_/phyi rol rgyus byung glo bur ba'o/_/nad dang 'dres pa red pa yin/_/de med dag pa ma red yin/_/rma red kha rgyas zhum
[\[296a.2\]]pa dang /_/shin tu sra ba'am shin tu snyi/_/shin tu mtho 'am shin tu dma'/_/shin tu grang ngam shin tu tsha/_/dmar zhing skya'am gnag pa nyid/_/rnag ni dri mnam yongs su 'dzag_/sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul ba dang /_/g.yos shing mched la rab tu na/_/g.yo zhing tsha la skrang
[\[296a.3\]]ba dang /_/g.ya' ba la sogs bla brnan bcas/_/yun ring du ni 'tsho ba dka'/_/rma red mtshan mar shes par bya/_/de ni khrag bcas nad bco lnga/_/de la rlung las gyur ba'i rma/_/gnag cing smug dmar thal mdog dang /_/thi ba'i rus pa lta bur snang /_/zho ga chu'am 'bras bkrus
[\[296a.4\]]chu/_/'dra ba'i chu sla nyung ngu 'dzag_/sha zad shas cher na zhing zug_/rtsub cing tsheg tsheg tsha ba yin/_/mkhris gyur myur rnags ser ba dang /_/sngo zhing ser skya'am kham par 'dug_/gcin dang thal chu rgya skyegs khu/_/til mar 'dra chu mang du 'dzag_/rma la thal sman btab
[\[296a.5\]]ltar na/_/dmar zhing tsha la rnags pa yin/_/bad kan las gyur mdog skya g.ya'/_/chu ni ska ba mang du 'dzag_/rma kha sbom zhing na ba dang /_/rtsa rgyus kyis khyab nad tshabs chung /_/khrag gyur byi ru'i mdog ltar dmar/_/khrag dang bcas pa'i rnag 'dzag cing /_/rta bres kyi ni dri ltar
[\[296a.6\]]bro/_/mkhris pa'i mtshan ma dag dang ldan/_/gnyis sam gsum mam thams cad las/_/gyur pa'i mtshan ma 'dren ma yin/_/lce yi mdog 'dra 'jam zhing mnyen/_/rma kha smug cing 'brum phran can/_/mnyam pa dbus ma cung zad mtho/_/bla brnan med rma dag pa yin/_/pags
[\[296a.7\]]pa sha dang rtsa rgyus dang /_/tshigs dang rus pa nang grol gnad/_/brgyad po der ni rma gnas pa/_/phyi ma bzhin du gso bar dka'/_/gso sla snying stobs me drod sha/_/na tshod nyams stobs ldan pa'i rma/_/zlum zhing dkyus ring rim gsum pa/_/zur bzhi pa ni gang yin dang /_/de bzhin
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]dpyi rkub pho mtshan mchu/_/rgyab dang kha nang mkhur tshos byung /_/gso dka' mig dang so dang ni/_/sna dang mig zur lte ba dang /_/srubs mtshams lto ba rna ba dang /_/rtsib logs mchan khung nu mar byung /_/lbu ba rnag 'dzag rlung 'byung zhing /_/zug rngur bcas shing stong nas 'dzag_/mtshan
[\[296b.2\]]bar rdol zhing kha nang bltas/_/de bzhin rked pa'i rus par gnas/_/mdze can dug gis phog pa dang /_/lus skem gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/rma steng rma ni byung ba gang /_/rma de gso bar dka' ba yin/_/me dbal rims dang tshad par 'khru/_/lud pa lu dang skom dad che/_/gnyid
[\[296b.3\]]med pa dang dbugs mi bde/_/me drod chung bar gyur pa yi/_/rma ni 'tsho ba par mi 'gyur ro/_/mgo bo'i thod pa chag gyur cing /_/klad rgyas mtshan ma snang de bzhin/_/chu ba rul zhing rtsa chad dang /_/rma phugs ring dang srin bus zos/_/rus pa chag dang zug rngur bcas/_/dug
[\[296b.4\]]bcas pa dang ma rtogs dang /_/bcing ba nyes dang snum ches dang /_/rtsub pas spu sogs bdar ba dang /_/bskyod dang khong pa ma dag dang /_/'grangs drags nyams smad drags pa dang /_/chang 'thungs nyin par gnyid log dang /_/nyal po la brten mtshan gnyid yar/_/rma
[\[296b.5\]]ni log par gsos pa dag_/gsos kyang 'drub par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig nang ni thi pa'i mdog_/'dra zhing rnags pa med pa dang /_/brtan zhing 'brum bu rnyid bcas pa/_/'tsho bar 'gyur bar de bshad do/_/de nas 'dir skrang gnas skabs su/_/gang la nye ba de las sbyang /_/
[\[296b.6\]]sbyangs pas skrangs par gyur pa dang /_/rma ni myur du 'tshob par 'gyur/_/skrangs pa'i skabs su rgyun du ni/_/nye bar spyod pa bsil bas gso/_/de yis nad med chu lta bur/_/mod la zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rma skrang sra bar gyur pa dang /_/nad bcas mdog ni mi sdug dang /_/dug
[\[296b.7\]]can la ni khyad par du/_/pad pa sogs shes khrag dbyung ngo /_/nad khrag bral nas mod la ni/_/skrang dang mdog dmar nad zhir 'gyur/_/khrag dbyung nas ni cung zad lus/_/reg na nus pa rab bsil ba/_/shin tu zhib par de nyid btags/_/bu ram shing khu 'o mas sbrus/_/lan brgyar
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]bskus pa'i mar dang bcas/_/gzhan ma skam par yang dang yang /_/rjes su mthun par bskus na phan/_/byugs dang blugs pa de bzhin bya/_/u dum bA ra n+ya gro dang /_/blag sha lcang ma a shwad+tha'i/_/shun pa mar dang bcas bskus na/_/skrangs pas
[\[297a.2\]]sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/rlung shas che zhing mkhrang ba dang /_/sra zhing nad tshabs che ba dang /_/khrag 'dzag pa dang rma skrang ba/_/'di lta bu yi rma la ni/_/rlan can sha btags la dugs bya/_/zar ma til ni brngos pa dang /_/'o mas dbal ni bsad pa dag_/de btags bskus na tsha
[\[297a.3\]]na sel/_/rma skrangs brtan zhing nad tshabs chung /_/bad kan rlung 'joms snum bsku zhing /_/de yi rjes la 'od ma yi/_/sbu gus rim gyis dugs bya'o/_/zhu bar bya phyir lag mthil lam/_/mthe bo yis ni mnye bar bya/_/nas dang gro dang mon sran sde'u/_/btsos te btags pa'i
[\[297a.4\]]lde gus bsku/_/gal te de yis ma zhum na/_/de nas de ni dkri bar bya/_/ma smin pa ni zhi 'gyur la/_/smin na rnags pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rgya shug til dang zar ma dang /_/rgyam tsha phabs dang ru rta'i phye/_/zho skyur zan dron gyis glan zhing /_/dugs byas nas ni dkri bar bya/_/legs smin
[\[297a.5\]]skrangs pa phyogs gcig 'dus/_/btsir bas nye bar btsir gyur pa/_/dral bar 'os la dral bya zhing /_/shin tu 'jam por gyur pa'ang dral/_/gu gul zar ma ba lang so/_/khron bu phug ron rtug pa dang /_/thal sman 'phrod dang thal sman de/_/smin pa'i sman gyis brtol bar bya/_/nang na
[\[297a.6\]]rnag 'byung sgo phra zhing /_/mtho bar gyur dang gnad la gnas/_/snum med btsir ba'i sman gyis ni/_/kun nas rab tu btsir bar bya/_/bsku ba bskams na btsir ba yi/_/las la btang snyoms nyid du bya/_/de yi rma sgor mi bsku ste/_/de 'dras nad ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/sran ma nas
[\[297a.7\]]dang gro dang ni/_/ma sha shu dag bra bo dang /_/sman ni spyi bag can dag gis/_/pags pa'i rtsa ba rab tu bsdams/_/gcin snyi mdze yi rma dang ni/_/shas cher red pa'i rma dag la/_/dong ga bye'u rug pa sogs kyis/_/lan ni bdun bdun bkru sogs bya/_/ma dag nim pa pa to
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]la'i/_/lo ma bskol bas bkru bar bya/_/rma dag pa la n+ya gro d+ha/_/la sogs shun lpags bskol bas bkru/_/shing mngar til dang pa to la/_/dur byid dan da ser po gnyis/_/nim pa'i lo ma rgya mtshar bcas/_/lde gus bskus na rma sbyong byed/_/rma ni kha phrag nad mtshams
[\[297b.2\]]gnas/_/da rgyam tsha lang ka li/_/dud byid sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/_/reng bur byas pas rma sbyang bya/_/rlung gis gnod cing khrag bcas shing /_/mi bzad na la nas dang gro/_/spra tshil shri ba kra ka dang /_/thang shing mar bcas dud pas bdug/_/khrag mkhris dag gi shas che la/_/
[\[297b.3\]]shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyis bsku/_/skam zhing sha nyung gting ring rma/_/sha skyed pa yi sman bya ste/_/shug pa n+ya gro d+ha sogs dang /_/ba la a shwa gan+d+ha til/_/bskus te sha ni bskyed par bya/_/sha za'i sha ni cho ga bzhin/_/g.yos su byas te sbyin par bya/_/sems dga' ba dang
[\[297b.4\]]sha za yi/_/sha zos na ni sha 'phel 'gyur/_/sha snyi 'bur bar gyur pa la/_/dzA ti'i me tog nag tshur dang /_/ldong ros ba bla gu gul dang /_/tsi tra ka sogs lde gus bsku/_/sha 'bur bar ni sra ba dang /_/g.ya' zhing ring nas 'tsho ba dang /_/rma ni na zhing sbyang dka' la/_/thal sman
[\[297b.5\]]las kyis sbyang bar bya/_/rde'u dbyung rma ni gcin 'dzag dang /_/gang gzhan khrag ni 'byung ba dang /_/gang zhig bcad nas sbyar ba dang /_ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga yis/_/gso bar byed bzhin mi 'grub na/_/de ni me yi las kyis gso/_/skyon med rma la rma 'byor ba'i/_/sman dang sha
[\[297b.6\]]skyed gang yin sbyar/_/a shwa gan+d+ha seng phrom dang /_/shing mngar btsod dang kad pha la/_/da ta ki yi me tog gi_/phye ma rma 'tshob byed pa'i mchog_/rnag dang sha ni med pa dang /_/sha yi gnas su ma 'drubs par/_/til dang shing mngar bcas pa yi/_/lde gus rma ni 'tshob par bya/_/
[\[297b.7\]]snum dro mngar dang kha ba dang /_/bska bas thams cad sel bar byed/_/nim pa'i lo ma sbrang rtsir bcas/_/bskus pas rma sbyor mchog yin no/_/snga ma gnyis dang zhun mar sbyar/_/myur du rma 'tshob byed pa yin/_/til 'drar nas kyi lde gu ni/_/de dang 'dra bar la la 'dod/_/
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]khrag mkhris dug dang glo bur dang /_/gting ring tsha dang bcas pa'i rma/_/'o ma rma 'byor sman dang ni/_/bskol ba'i mar gyis rma 'tshob bya/_/bad kan rlung gyur rma 'byor sman/_/til mar bcas pas rma 'tshob 'gyur/_/nag tshur seng phrom a ru ra/_/li khri
[\[298a.2\]]dngul rdo sra rtsi pog_/spangs ma po son cha'i phye ma/_/til mar bcas pa rma 'tshob mchog_/mnyam zhing sha ni brtan pa dang /_/pags par gnas la phye ma phan/_/u dum wA ra a shwat+tha/_/'dzam bu seng phrom kad pha la/_/ka ku seng phrom phye mas gdab/_/pags pa myur du
[\[298a.3\]]skyed par byed/_/rgya skyegs ldong ros btsod dang ni/_/ba la dang ni ser po gnyis/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar lde gu yis/_/bskus na pags pa dag byed mchog_/skyer pa a mra'i rus pa dang /_/nA ga ge sar bri yang ku/_/tsan+dan ser po dngul chu rnams/_/lde gu ba lang lci khu dang /_/sbyar ba
[\[298a.4\]]bskus par gyur na ni/_/pags pa mdog 'drar byed mchog yin/_/ba so dud pa ma shor bsregs/_/skyer khan+Da dang til mar sbyar/_/bskus na spu ni skyed par byed/_/de bzhin rkang bzhi'i sen mo spu/_/rus pa pags pa rwa rmig bsregs/_/snag tsha til mar dang sbyar bas/_/bskus
[\[298a.5\]]na spu ni skyed par byed/_/smin ma la ni cha spyad kyi/_/las bshad phan dang gnod pa bsten/_/rlung gyur rma la rtsa ba lnga/_/gnyis dang rlung 'joms sde tshan phan/_/mkhris gyur shug pa n+ya gro dang /_/sde tshan gnyis dang mkhris 'joms gtong /_/bad kan las gyur dong ga'i sde/_/bad
[\[298a.6\]]kan 'joms par byed pa gtang /_/'dren ma las gyur 'dren mar byas/_/'di dag gis bkru byugs pa dang /_/sman mar til mar sman khu dang /_/phye ma ril bu bdun po ni/_/rma la ci rigs sbyar bar bya/_/dzA ti nim pa pa to la'i lo ma/_/skyer pa yung ba thal tres pu tse shel/_/
[\[298a.7\]]spra tshil spangs ma shing mngar a ru ra/_/ka rany+dza yi sa bon btsod dang btsos/_/mar bskol 'dis ni rma kha chung ba dang /_/nad la brten zhing rnag ni 'dzag pa dang /_/rma yi phugs ring nad bcas phugs ring ba'i/_/rma ni dag cing 'tshob par byed pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]po bsdus pa las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga ba'o//_//de nas 'phral du byung ba'i rma'i gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/rma gang snad pas 'phral du ni/_/byung gyur glo bur rma zhes bya/_/de ni mtha' yas kyang yan lag_/gnas pa rnam pa brgyad du bshad/_/bshus
[\[298b.2\]]dang bcad dang rnam par bcad/_/rab tu 'phyang dang lhung ba dang /_/phug dang gshags dang grugs pa'o/_/de la bshus pa chu ser ram/_/khrag ni nyung zad 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/pags pa chos pas tsha 'gyur yin/_/de las tshos gyur bcad pa yin/_/de las chos pa rnam bcad yin/_/
[\[298b.3\]]rab 'phyang rus par lhag ma lus/_/lhung ba lus las phogs pa yin/_/zug rngu phra mo 'bigs pas phug_/khong pa ma gtogs bsnun pa yin/_/snga ma las gzhan gshags pa yin/_/khrag dang rkang ni 'dres gyur pa/_/mtshon gyis drag tu bsnun pa yis/_/rus bcas rgya cher
[\[298b.4\]]snad grugs pa/_/de la 'phral du byung ba'i rma/_/zug gzer shin tu che ba la/_/shing mngar mar dang bskol ba'am/_/ba la'i til mar dro 'jam blugs/_/snad pa'i tsha ba zhi bya'i phyir/_/bsku ba la sogs snum pa dang /_/bsil dang mngar ba'i sman gyis ni/_/de yi mdo la blugs
[\[298b.5\]]par bya/_/'phral gyi rma ni rgya che la/_/sbyar ba'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang /_/mar gyis mchog tu bsku bya zhing /_/mkhris 'joms bsil ba'i gso ba bya/_/nad kyi rtsom pa che ba la/_/steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya/_/smyung ba bya zhing 'bras chan sbyin/_/rgyun du gtar ga gdab par bya/_/
[\[298b.6\]]bshus dang grugs pa 'di nyid de/_/cho ga 'di nyid lhag par sbyar/_/de gnyis khrag ni nyung shas 'dzag_/smin pa'ang myur ba nyid du 'gyur/_/phal cher rma ni shas cher 'byung /_/gzhan las khrag ni 'byung gyur la/_/de yis khrag ni zad gyur pas/_/rlung 'khrugs nad ni skyed pa las/_/
[\[298b.7\]]rlung 'joms sman dang bskol ba yi/_/snum blugs pa dang sman chu blugs/_/dugs dang bsku dang dkri ba dang /_/snum gyi 'jam rtsi rnams kyang bya/_/de ltar zhag bdun par bshad pa'i/_/'phral gyi rma byung cho ga bshad/_/zhag bdun nas ni shugs zad nas/_/sngar bshad pa yi cho gas
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]spyad/_/'dir ni phal cher spyi'i cho ga_/re re'i gso ba bshad bya ste/_/shus la na ba myur bsal phyir/_/rma la phan pa'i phye mas gdab/_/bcad pa rma sel lde gus bsku/_/rnam par bcad dang rab 'phyang la/_/cho ga bzhin du btsem pa dang /_/bcing ba dang ni
[\[299a.2\]]btsir bar bya/_/mig bcang ba ni gsor mi rung /_/ma zhar phyir ni 'phyang ba la/_/rang gi gnas su legs gzhag cing /_/rtsam 'chol bar byas nas ni/_/pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs nas ni/_/lag pas dal gyis mnan par bya/_/de nas shing mngar dzi ba ka/_/zangs rtsi ba dang ut+pa
[\[299a.3\]]la/_/mar dang 'o ma bcas bskol ba'i/_/sman thigs blugs dang sna sman dang /_/brta ba'i cho ga dag kyang bya/_/mig nad thams cad sel mchog yin/_/mig phugs zhugs la mgul pa bsdam/_/slon dang lud pa sbrid pa 'byung /_/yang na dbugs 'byung dbugs brngub bsdam/_/
[\[299a.4\]]rma byung mig gi gso ba bya/_/rna ba bogs pa btsems nas ni/_/bu ga til mar dag gis dgang /_/ltag pa'i sum mdo chod gyur te/_/rlung ni 'byung bar gyur pa la'ang /_/mnyam du bzhag ste bar mtshams ni/_/med par btsems te bcing bar bya/_/de la ra yi mar sar gyis/_/
[\[299a.5\]]blugs pa dag ni rab tu bsngags/_/gan rkyal bzhag ste kha zas sbyin/_/legs par spyod lam bsdams te nyal/_/yan lag thad kar gnas pa yi/_/rma byung yan lag legs gzhag ste/_/btsems la dkri zhing bcing bya zhing /_/gos ni mthug pos bcing bar bya/_/pags
[\[299a.6\]]pa'i 'ur mthil bcing bas ni/_/phrag pa'i rma la bcing bar bya/_/rlig pa 'phyang la rkang par ni/_/sbu gus chu ni gtor nas kyang /_/rlig pa bcug ste ras bal dang /_/bcas pa'i khab kyis btsem par bya/_/'ur mthil bcing bar byas pa la/_/rked pa nas ni srad bus gdags/_/
[\[299a.7\]]der ni rma ni 'dul gyur pas/_/snum dang dugs kyi las mi bya/_/pri yang ku dang a ga ru/_/sug smel dzA ti par pa ta/_/tsan+dan ldong ros skyer pa dang /_/sle tres dang ni spangs ma dang /_/til mar bskol bas rma 'tshob byed/_/yan lag ma las chad pa la/_/til mar bskol bas
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]bsregs nas ni/_/sgye'u bcing bas bcing bar bya/_/de nas rma ltar gso bar bya/_/phug pa zug rngu phyung bas gso/_/grugs dang chag grugs gso bar bya/_/mgo bo'i zug rngu dbyung ba la/_/skra yi ye'u gzhug par bya/_/gzhan du klad rgyas 'dzag pa yis/_/rlung 'khrugs
[\[299b.2\]]de ni gsod par 'gyur/_/rma 'tshob nas ni rim gyis ni/_/skra ni dal gyis dbyung bar bya/_/klad rgyas 'dzag la srog chags ni/_/gzhan gyi klad pa sbyin par bya/_/gzhan las zug rngu phyung nas ni/_/rma der ring bu snum can gzhug_/phugs ring kha ni chung ba dang /_/rma gang rnag
[\[299b.3\]]dang khrag 'dzag la/_/'khor los btsir ba'i til mar blugs/_/de ni sbu gu chung ngus gtang /_/khong pa brtol te khrag gis gang /_/brgyal zhing snying ga rtsib logs na/_/rims 'debs lus tsha lto spo skom/_/zas la mngon par mi dga' zhing /_/bshang ba gcin dang 'phyen
[\[299b.4\]]'gags la/_/mig dmar rngul 'byung dbugs mi bde/_/kha nang khrag gi dri bro zhing /_/lus kyang dri mi zhim par 'gyur/_/ma zhu'i gnas na gnas pa'i khrag_/khrag tu yang ni skyug par byed/_/shin tu shas cher lto spo zhing /_/gzer nad kyis kyang gnod par byed/_/zhu ba'i gnas na gnas
[\[299b.5\]]pa'i khrag_/gzer bcas lus ni lci bar byed/_/lto ba man chad grang ba dang /_/bu ga las kyang khrag 'byung 'gyur/_/gnas ni zhig par ma gyur kyang /_/khrag ni 'dzag par gyur pa yis/_/bu ga las ni 'gengs byed de/_/lgang pa'i ngos nas 'gengs dang 'dra/_/khrag nad
[\[299b.6\]]yod pa de la ni/_/rkang lag kha dang dbugs grang zhing /_/mig dmar gdong ni skya pa dang /_/lto sbo ba ni spang bar bya/_/ma zhur gnas la skyug sman gtang /_/zhu ba'i gnas la gnas pa la/_/bkru sman dang ni ni ru ha/_/snum med dro bas sbyang bar bya/_/nas dang rgya shug rgya sran gyi/_/
[\[299b.7\]]khu ba snum ni med pa dang /_/nas thug kha zas bza' ba dang /_/lce myang tsha dang ldan pa sbyin/_/khrag ni mang du 'dzag pa dang /_/khong pa snad la khrag blud bya/_/rgyu ma 'byar dang chad par nyen/_/khong pa snad pa gnyis su bshad/_/dang por brgyal sogs chung ba yin/_/gnyis pa shas
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]cher gnod par byed/_/rgyu ma 'byar ba the tshom bcas/_/rgyu ma chad pa 'tsho mi 'gyur/_/gang gi bshang dang gcin dang 'phyen/_/rang gi lam las byung gyur la/_/bla brnan med par rdol gyur kyang /_/'tsho bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/ma rdol rgyu ma byung ba ni/_/
[\[300a.2\]]gzhug par bya zhing gzhan du min/_/grog ma'i mgo bo bcad nas ni/_/de yang gzhug ces pa la smra/_/rdul dang khrag dang rtsa yis gos/_/'o mas legs par bkrus nas ni/_/sen mo bregs te mar gyis bskus/_/rim gyis legs par gzhug par bya/_/skam po 'o mas
[\[300a.3\]]spangs nas ni/_/mar sar mang po bsku bar bya/_/sor mos mgul pa mnye ba dang /_/chu yis kyang ni gtor bar bya/_/de ltar rgyu ma nang zhugs nas/_/de yi tshe na btsir bar bya/_/rma kha chung dang sbom pa yis/_/rgyu ma khong par ma chud na/_/de yi tshad tsam lto ba ni/_/dbral te
[\[300a.4\]]nang du gzhug par bya/_/gnas su legs par 'dug gyur nas/_/de rjes rgyu ma'i rma btsem bya/_/gnas su legs par ma bzhag na/_/de ni 'khrugs pas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de rjes ras kyis dkris nas ni/_/mar gyis bsku zhing blugs par bya/_/de nas ngan da til mar dang /_/
[\[300a.5\]]sbyar ba'i 'o ma dro 'jam blud/_/des ni bshang ba snyi ba dang /_/rlung ni bde bar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ji skad bshad pa'i spyod pa bsrung /_/lo gcig bar du 'bad par bya/_/lto las tshil ni byung gyur na/_/thal ba'am ni sa dag gam/_/ro bska ba yi rtsa ba dag_/zhib tu btags pas
[\[300a.6\]]btab nas ni/_/de nas srad bus dam du bcing /_/sman pa mkhas pas gcad par bya/_/mtshon rnon me la bsregs pa yis/_/lan cig kho na gcad par bya/_/gzhan du byas nas gcod pa'i tshe/_/na zhing sbo 'am 'chi bar 'gyur/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas rma bcings la/_/kha zas zhu
[\[300a.7\]]nas 'o ma mar/_/dan te rgya skyegs gze ma dang /_/shing mngar kha ra bskol ba blud/_/shing mngar bcas pa sngar gyi ni/_/cho gas na dang tsha ba sel/_/tshil gyi rmen bur bshad pa yi/_/til mar bskus na'ang phan pa yin/_/bal bu'i lo ma shug pa dang /_/spang spos ha re Nu ka
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]dang /_/a ga ru dang tsan+dan dang /_/pad+ma'i sa bon ser po gnyis/_/u shi ra dang shing mngar bcas/_/bskol ba 'phral gyi rma la ni/_/'tsho bar byed pa'i dam par bshad/_/mtshon gyis bsnun pas mi mngon pa/_/g.yang sa mthon po nas lhung ba/_/rlung mkhris 'joms sman
[\[300b.2\]]'drangs pa dang /_/mnye dang bsku dang sbyang ba bya/_/lus tshigs bye dang mnyes pa dang /_/gnad du bsnun pas nyen pa la/_/snod chen til mar gyis bkang bar/_/gzhug cing sha khu sbyin par bya/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa drug
[\[300b.3\]]pa'o//_//de nas chag grugs gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/lhung dang snad sogs kyis rus tshigs/_/tshigs dang tshigs min chag gyur gnyis/_/tshigs byung gyur na brkyang dang bskum/_/nus pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gzhan dag shin tu skrangs pa dang /_/
[\[300b.4\]]gnas skabs kun tu rab tu na/_/bskyod pa chung ngu'ang mi nus shing /_/btsir na sgra dang bcas pa yin/_/de ltar chag grugs mdor bsdus pa'i/_/mtshan nyid yin te de dbye ba/_/chag pa'i dbye bas du mar 'gyur/_/de dag kun gyi gso ba ni/_/ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du ni/_/de bzhin de
[\[300b.5\]]ni nye bar bstan/_/mang du phra mor chag pa dang /_/reg na sgra ni 'khrol ba dang /_/gang du rus pa chag pa yi/_/bar du rus pa phra mo zhugs/_/yang na snad pas chag pa las/_/cung zad lus par gyur pa dang /_/gang yang bteg pa'i tshe na ni/_/rma ltar rkang du nub pa dang /_/nus zhan
[\[300b.6\]]sbig par gyur pa dang /_/rlung can nyung zad spang bar bya/_/dpyi yi rus mig chag pa dang /_/gang yang tshigs bye lhung pa dang /_/ro smad zhib tu grugs pa'am/_/chag par gyur pa gang yin dang /_/thod pa'i mtshams ni ma 'byor ba'am/_/de bzhin dpral ba phye mar gyur/_/gang yang mur
[\[300b.7\]]'gram chag pa dang /_/ltag pa nu ma'i par chad spang /_/rus pa legs par chag gyur kyang /_/bzhag nyes bcings ni nyes pa dang /_/gang zhig bskyod pas gnod gyur pa/_/de yang spang bar bya ba yin/_/gdod nas rus pa'i tshigs dag ni/_/nyes par skyes gyur de yang spang /_/
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]rus pa gzhon nu gug pa dang /_/sbu ba can chag par gyur pa dang /_/thod pa gyes par gyur pa dang /_/gzhan yang mang du gas pa rnams/_/de nas dma' ba bstod par bya/_/mthon po mnan par bya ba yin/_/nung du nub pa drang bar bya/_/'og tu song ba steng du drang /_/
[\[301a.2\]]'degs dang mnan dang smad pa dang /_/pags pa bsdus te bcing ba dang /_/de ltar bzhag pa'i thabs kyis ni/_/lus su gtogs pa'i tshigs thams cad/_/g.yo ba'am mi g.yo gang yang rung /_/legs par bzhag ste mi 'gyur bya/_/ras ma mar ni mang bas dkri/_/
[\[301a.3\]]u dum bA ra ka dam pa/_/ardzu na dang a shwat+tha/_/sardza dang ni pa la sha_/'od ma las byung shun zheng che/_/'jam pas legs par 'jar ba dang /_/rten dang bcas shing mi 'gyur ba'i/_/shun pa'am dum bu dag dang ni/_/'jag mas legs par dkri bya zhing /_/ras kyis steng du
[\[301a.4\]]glan par bya/_/bcing ba lhod par gyur pa yis/_/mtshams sbyor brtan por mi 'gyur ro/_/dam pos shin tu na zhing tsha/_/rnag dang skrangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sos ka'i dus su zhag gsum/_/dgun gyi dus su bdun nas dgrol/_/thun mong dus su zhag lnga nas/_/yang
[\[301a.5\]]na chag pa'i dbang las dgrol/_/de nas n+ya gro d+ha sogs pa'i/_/khu ba bsil ba'i chu blugs bya/_/de ni nang bcas rtsa ba lnga/_/'o ma bskol ba blugs par bya/_/mkhas pas til mar 'khor los btsir/_/rlung 'joms sran dang bcas pa ni/_/dro 'jam tsam ni bsku bar bya/_/dus
[\[301a.6\]]dang yul gyi dbye bas bya/_/khu ba shin tu grang mo ni/_/rgyun du blugs shing lde gus bsku/_/ba gsar 'o ma mar dang bcas/_/mngar ba'i sman dang bskol ba dag_/rgya skyegs khu bar bcas pa ni/_/chag grugs can la nang re blud/_/chag grugs rma dang bcas pa ni/_/rma la shing
[\[301a.7\]]mngar mar shas che/_/lde gu bskus pa'am yang na ni/_/lhag ma chag grugs lta bur gso/_/rma yi sha ni 'phyang ba la/_/sbrang rtsi mar gyis bskus nas ni/_/sman pas rma ni kha sbyar nas/_/bcing ba dag kyang legs par bya/_/de ni mnyam zhing legs bzhag nas/_/pri yang ku dang kad
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]pa la/_/seng phrom btsod dang da ta ki_/phye mas legs par bdar bya'am/_/seng phrom da ta ki'i phye ma/_/btab na myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/de ltar chag grugs gso ba yin/_/lus zungs brtan la dgun gyi tshe/_/sha chen nad gzhi chung ba'i rma/_/gso sla gzhan ni gso bar
[\[301b.2\]]dka'/_/na tshod dang po bar ma mtha'/_/zla gcig gnyis dang gsum rim gyis/_/cho ga ji skad bshad bsten na/_/rma 'byor brtan par 'gyur ba yin/_/rked pa rje ngar brla chag na/_/spang leb la ni nyal na phan/_/de bzhin bsdams phyir phur pa lnga/_/byas nas nye bar brtod
[\[301b.3\]]bya ste/_/rje dar ngos gnyis la gnyis gnyis/_/rkang mthil drang po gcig bzhag brtod/_/sta zur ram ni sgal tshigs sam/_/gdong dang de bzhin phrag pa rus/_/tshigs byung chag grugs byung gyur na/_/cho ga 'di bzhin spyad par bya/_/tshigs ni byung nas yun ring la/_/snum bsku
[\[301b.4\]]dugs kyis mnyen byas te/_/'di bshad thabs dang rang gi blos/_/rang gi gnas su legs par gzhug_/tshigs min chag ste 'drubs pa dang /_/bcings nyes pa yis gsos pa la/_/brdungs te chag grugs bsrang bar bya/_/de nas chag grugs bzhin du gso/_/chag
[\[301b.5\]]nas ci nas ma rnags pa/_/de ltar sman pas 'bad par bya/_/sha dang rtsa rgyus 'drul na ni/_/tshigs ni 'drubs par mi 'gyur ro/_/chag grugs can la rlung nad kyi/_/skabs bshad snum ni sbyar bar bya/_/stobs bskyed sbyor ba bzhi po dang /_/'jam rtsi'i las kyang bsten par
[\[301b.6\]]bya/_/sA lu'i chan ngang sha khu mar/_/'o ma rgyas byed bsil ba bsten/_/chag grugs can la rus pa'i mtshams/_/'byor byed tshad tsam sbyin par bya/_/de ni mtshams sbyor byed pas na/_/rmya bar byed pa bsngags pa yin/_/lan tshwa tsha dang thal sman dang /_/snum dang nyal po nyi
[\[301b.7\]]tshan dang /_/rtsol ba bsten par mi bya zhing /_/chag grugs zas rtsub bsten mi bya/_/til nag phub ma med pa ras sra'i nang du gtums/_/chu yi nang du zhag bdun nye bar spangs gyur cing /_/'di ni bteg ste nyin re legs par bskams nas ni/_/de bzhin 'o ma chu dang shing mngar
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]nang du bskol/_/slar yang 'o mar snga ma bzhin du spangs te bskams/_/phub ma med cing rdul med zhib tu btags nas ni/_/spang spos ba la ka dang btsod dang chu srin sen/_/shu ti ku tan nad ru rta ba la gsum/_/tsan+dan gur gum dang ni thal tres a ga ru/_/
[\[302a.2\]]sgron shing sra rtsi pog dang thang shing shug pa'i sde/_/de yi phye ma dri zhim 'o ma lhan cig btags/_/dri yi sman ni ma lus 'o mar bskol ba btsir/_/rdo dreg ra sna aM shu ma ti dang /_/ka she ru dang gan+d+ha bri yang ku/_/rgya spos gan+d+ha b+ha dra seng phrom dang /_/pa ya s+ya dang mur ba 'o
[\[302a.3\]]mar bcas/_/spang spos sogs dang til mar de bskol ba/_/dri yi til mar mchog 'dis rus pa dag_/brtan zhing myur du zhi bar byed mchog yin/_/rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur nad kyis khyab/_/sbyor ba sna tshogs bsten pas sel ba yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus
[\[302a.4\]]pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas mtshan bar rdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/glang po rta la zhon te 'gro/_/gnas dang mal sar tsog pur 'dug_/gzhang 'brum nad kyi rgyur bshad dang /_/gzhan la'ang brten par gyur pa
[\[302a.5\]]dang /_/mi dge smin par gyur pa dang /_/'phral du dam pa la smad pas/_/phal cher 'brum phran dang por 'byung /_/rkub kyi phyi'am nang du ni/_/rma ni sor tshad gnyis sam gcig_/sha khrag gnod par gyur las 'byung /_/chu sor gcin gyi gnas nye bar/_/byung bas 'dzag pa'i
[\[302a.6\]]rang bzhin can/_/de ni mtshan par rdol zhes bya/_/kun kyang ma gsos 'drul byed cing /_/mo mtshan chu so gzhang gi bar/_/shas cher 'jig par byed pa dang /_/bshang gci 'phyen dang khu chu ni/_/bu ga'i nang nas rim gyis 'byung /_/nad gzhi re re ldan pa 'dus/_/glo bur ba dang
[\[302a.7\]]brgyad du bshang /_/ma smin 'brum bu zhes byar bshad/_/smin pa mtshan bar rdol yin no/_/rtsa ba mi mngon nad tshabs che/_/shas cher g.yos shing rma 'khyims 'khrugs/_/mtshan bar rdol 'gyur shes par bya/_/de las gzhan du de mi byed/_/de las rlung gyur 'brum bu ni/_/
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]dmar zhing gnag la na ba dang /_/zug cing 'phar bar byed pa yin/_/mkhris gyur rnga mo'i mgrin ltar ring /_/dmar zhing srab la shas cher tsha/_/thal mdog dud pa 'thul bcas yin/_/bad kan las gyur brtan zhing snum/_/rtsa ba che zhing mdog skya g.ya'/_/rlung mkhris las
[\[302b.2\]]gyur mdog gnag cing /_/dmar zhing tsha la mi bzod na/_/bad rlung las gyur cung zad gnag_/smin par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid can/_/'dus gyur rkang pa'i mthe bo 'dra/_/nad ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/gzer dang skam dad yi ga 'chus/_/rims dang slon sogs
[\[302b.3\]]kyis gnod byed/_/yal bar bor la smin pa dang /_/rma nyid du ni 'gyur ba yin/_/de la rlung gyur 'brum bu ni/_/kha phra mang pos khyab byed de/_/ko tshags bzhin du kha mang zhing /_/rim 'phel chu ser sla ba dang /_/lbu ba can ni rgyun du 'dzag_/ko tshags kha brgya pa zhes
[\[302b.4\]]bya/_/mkhris pa las gyur rnga mo'i mgrin/_/bad kan las gyur spyi bag ni/_/mang 'dzag yongs su 'dzag ces bya/_/rlung mkhris las gyur bshang sgor ni/_/yongs su mched pa kun khyab cing /_/der ni ra ba'i 'obs kyis ni/_/bskor ba lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rlung
[\[302b.5\]]dang bad kan las gyur grang /_/gzhan du drang por song 'gas byed/_/bad mkhris las gyur sngar bshad pa'i/_/gzhang 'brum la brten de ldang zhing /_/de las gzhang 'brum rtsa bar g.ya'/_/skrang dang tsha ba la sogs skyed/_/de ni myur smin rdol gyur na/_/gzhang 'brum rtsa ba rnag
[\[302b.6\]]can yin/_/rgyun mi chad par 'dzag byed de/_/gzhang 'brum 'di ni mtshan bar rdol/_/'dus pa las gyur dung 'dra ba/_/dung ni 'khyil pa'i dbyibs dang 'dra/_/'di yis gzhang ni zhig byed cing /_/mi bzad lam ni zhig par byed/_/gang tshe sha la brkam pa yis/_/rus pa'i
[\[302b.7\]]dum bu zos gyur pas/_/thad kar song bas lam log zhugs/_/rdol zhing snad par byed pa yin/_/de tshags pas rnags pa dang /_/sha ni 'drul bar byed pa yin/_/der ni srin bu skye 'gyur zhing /_/gzhang ni kun tu za bar byed/_/ring por mi thogs des 'jig byed/_/de
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]ni lam log rma skyes yin/_/de las na tsha g.ya' la sogs/_/rma gso ba las shes par bya/_/de las drug po gso dka' yin/_/'dus gyur rma skyes spang bar bya/_/sel ba'i gnyer mar phyin pa dang /_/srubs mtshams la ni brten
[\[303a.2\]]pa'ang spang /_/de nas 'brum bu'i tshe nyid ni/_/'di ni 'bad de gso bar bya/_/sbyang dang gtar ga chu blugs sogs/_/ci nas smin par mi 'gyur bar/_/'di ni 'bad de gso bar bya/_/smin nas slar yang snum chos dang /_/dugs byas nas ni lus spying bya/_/gzhang 'brum
[\[303a.3\]]lta bur bsdams nas ni/_/gting ring legs par brtag bya zhing /_/rtsa ba'am ni rtse mo'am/_/phyi bltas nang du bltas pa brtags/_/de la nang bltas btsal nas ni/_/gtsags bus legs par gcad par bya/_/phyir bltas ma lus par bcad la/_/thal sman dag gis gso bar
[\[303a.4\]]bya/_/de nas thal sman btab pa'am/_/yang na sman pas me btsa' gdab/_/rnga mo'i mgrin la thal sman bsku/_/ko tshags kha brgya sbubs gcig pa/_/bcug nas legs par gcad par bya/_/de 'drubs nas ni lhag ma'ang gcad/_/gzhan du gzhang ni zhig nas 'chi/_/'obs ltar khyab
[\[303a.5\]]pa'ang de bzhin du/_/thal sman pa gcin sbu gus gso/_/gzhang 'brum mtshan bar rdol la sngar/_/gzhang 'brum la ni sman phye gdab/_/rma skyes pa la re thag bcad/_/zug rngu dbyung ba'i cho ga bzhin/_/zug rngu phyung ste srin 'joms pa'i/_/bza' dang byug pa sbyar bar bya/_/glan dugs
[\[303a.6\]]sbu gu can la sogs/_/snum chos legs sbyar nad la phan/_/ko tshags 'dra dang thams cad la/_/ba lang dogs dang kun tu bzang /_/gshol phyed pa dang gshol gyis bya/_/brtags te nye bar sbyar bar bya/_/ngos su 'debs par byed pa'i mtshon/_/ba lang ngogs zhes bya bar bshad/_/kun
[\[303a.7\]]tu gtong ba kun tu bzang /_/ngos la gcod pa gshol phyed pa/_/ngos gnyis su ni gshol gyis bcad/_/'dzag pa'i lam ni ma lus pa/_/thams cad me yis bsreg par bya/_/slar yang 'di lta'i gnod mi bskyed/_/sman pas de yi bar bar du/_/de yi lto sbyang la 'bad bya/_/byi la'i rus
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]pa 'bras bu gsum/_/khu ba lde gur byas pas bsku/_/dzo ti sma ti ma la yu/_/sle sman ta ka bi sha l+ya/_/dur byid pa ti ba tra ka_/ka ra bI ra sra rtsi pog_/shu dag su d+ha k+Shir dang /_/arka'i lo ma til mar bskol/_/mtshan bar rdol la bskus na ni/_/'di ni phan byed mchog tu bshad/_/
[\[303b.2\]]shing mngar seng phrom pi pi ling /_/sug smel ha re Nu ka dang /_/ser po gnyis dang pri yang+ku/_/rgyam tsha thal tres shug pa dang /_/pad+ma'i snying po da ta ki_/spra tshil ru rta sra rtsi pog_/kha lung 'o mar bcas pa dang /_/til mar lhan cig bskol ba yis/_/bskus na 'brum bu mdze dang rma/_/
[\[303b.3\]]gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra ba 'joms/_/byi dang ka snying 'bras bu gsum/_/pi pi ling rtsa pi pi ling /_/sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar ba yi/_/lde gu zos na srin bu'i nad/_/mtshan bar rdol dang mdze nad dang /_/gcin snyi ba dang smas pa dang /_/rma 'khyims 'tsho bar byed pa yin/_/sle tres sug smel
[\[303b.4\]]byi dang ka_/dug mo nyung dang ba ru ra/_/skyu ru ra dang a ru ra/_/gu gul rim gyis cha res bskyed/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba 'di zos na/_/'brum bu sbom dang mtshan bar rdol/_/nad ni sel bar byed pa yin/_/pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka_/byi dang ga dang dug mo nyung /_/cha mnyam phyed kyi 'bras bu gsum/_/
[\[303b.5\]]kun dang cha mnyam gu gul dang /_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu yis/_/nad ni thams cad 'joms par byed/_/gu gul srang lda pi pi ling /_/'bras bu gsum ni srang re dang /_/shing tsha sug smel zho gnyis gnyis/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu ni/_/zos na mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_/mdze dang
[\[303b.6\]]skran nad 'joms par byed/_/de nyid dang ni bca' sga'i phye/_/legs par bsres par gyur pa dang /_/rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bsres/_/mchog tu rlung gi nad sel byed/_/seng ldeng snying po 'bras bu gsum gyi phye/_/a sa na bskol khu ba dang bsres dang /_/cha mnyam gu gul sbrang rtsi lde gur
[\[303b.7\]]byas/_/mdze 'brum gcin snyi mtshan bar rdol nad sel/_/'di ni mtshan bar rdol gso'i bye brag bshad/_/sman gyi mtshan nyid lhag ma gang yin pa/_/rma yi dbang byas yongs su bsten pa dang /_/gso thabs dgos pa legs par brtags te sbyar/_/rta zhon stobs 'gyed shugs ni/_
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]'gegs pa dang /_/chang 'thungs nyal po ma zhum goms dang /_/drag shul las ni sna tshogs rma 'drubs na/_/lo gcig bar ram de las lhag pa spang /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de
[\[304a.2\]]nas rmen bu dang thor bu dang rkang bam dang 'bras kyi phreng ba'i nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/nad ni bad kan shas che ba/_/khrag dang sha dang tshil la brten/_/zlum zhing mtho bar skrangs pa de/_/mdud pa 'dra bas rmen bur bshad/_/de ni nad gzhi khrag sha tshil/_/rus rtsa rma las gyur
[\[304a.3\]]pa dgu/_/de la rlung gyur rgya che zhing /_/zug cing bye ba snyam sems na/_/gnas nas gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho/_/rgyu med par ni 'phel zhing 'bri/_/'jam zhing lgang pa lta bur rgyas/_/brtol na khrag ni sla ba 'dzag_/mkhris gyur tsha zhing mdog ser la/_/dmar zhing myur du smin
[\[304a.4\]]pa yin/_/brtol na khrag ni dron mo 'dzag_/bad kan las gyur nad med sra/_/reg na grang zhing dkar la g.ya'/_/smin na rnag ni ska ba 'dzag_/nad 'khrugs khrag las gyur rmen bu/_/srin bu dang ni bcas par 'gyur/_/sha dang rtsa la gnas pa yi/_/rmen bu tshor ba chung ba dang /_/
[\[304a.5\]]mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin/_/sha che'i gnod gyur sha las ni/_/sha skyed zas la rmen bu 'byung /_/snum zhing che la sra ba dang /_/rtsa yis khyab cing bad kan 'dra/_/tshil skyed pa yis tshil 'phel ba/_/sha 'am pags par phyin gyur pa/_/rlung gi rmen bu shin tu snum/_/'jam
[\[304a.6\]]dang brtan par byed pa yin/_/bad kan dang ni mtshan nyid mtshungs/_/lus 'phel 'bri ba mtshungs pa yin/_/de brtol tshil mthug dmar ba dang /_/dkar dang gnag pa 'dzag par 'gyur/_/rus pa chag dang snad pa las/_/mtho dang dma' bar gyur pa de/_/rus pa'i rmen bu zhes
[\[304a.7\]]bya'o/_/rkang gis song ba'am drag shul gyis/_/dub par gyur nas chu brgal bas/_/rlung gis rtsa grang khrag bcas pa/_/rlung gis btsir te 'khums nas ni/_/yon por byas te bskams pa dang /_/mi 'phar nad byung rmen bu chags/_/de ni rtsa yi rmen bur bshad/_/rma ni ma 'drubs
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]'drubs ma thag_/ro ni thams cad zos gyur pa'am/_/rlon pa dkris pa med pa'am/_/yang na lus ni snad gyur pas/_/rlung ni nad khrag ma phyung ba/_/ma sbyangs rma ni bsrubs pa las/_/tsha zhing g.ya' dang bcas gyur pa/_/rma yi rmen bur de bshad do/_/gsor rung nad
[\[304b.2\]]gzhi khrag tshil gyur/_/sra zhing 'gyur dang sbom pa dang /_/gnad dang mgul pa stor gnas yin/_/mdud pa cher chags thor bu ste/_/rmen bu de yi mtshan nyid can/_/nad gzhi la sogs gyur drug yin/_/phal cher bad kan tshil rgyas yin/_/brtan pas smin par mi 'gyur
[\[304b.3\]]ro/_/rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag nad kyis/_/'khums pa'i rjes la gnod 'gyur zhing /_/smin pa de tshe rgyas par 'gyur/_/sha yi gong po bcas par 'gyur/_/sha yi myu gus khyab gyur zhing /_/skyes pa de las nad khrag ni/_/rgyun mi 'chad par mang du 'dzag_/de ni khrag gi thor bu
[\[304b.4\]]yin/_/de las sha khrag las gyur spang /_/bzhi po gzhan dag gso bar bya/_/dang por chu sor gnas pa'am/_/ro smad la brten bad kan rgyas/_/sha khrag nad kyi rkang par ni/_/dus su skrang bar byed 'gyur zhing /_/rim gyis stug po nyid du 'gyur/_/de ni rkang bam zhes bya'o/_/
[\[304b.5\]]rlung gyur gas shing gnag pa dang /_/rgyu med na zhing rtsub cing na/_/mkhris pa las gyur ser ba dang /_/tsha dang rims kyis 'debs pa yin/_/bad kan snum lci nad tshabs chung /_/sha yi mdzer pa chen pos khyab/_/de ni mang du 'dzag pa dang /_/lo gcig 'das pa spang bar bya/_/kha cig
[\[304b.6\]]lag pa sna dang mchu/_/rna ba rkang pa ltar 'byung gzer/_/rkang bam skyes par gyur pa de/_/rlan can gnas su mi bzad skye/_/nad ni tshil mgrin mjing pa mig_/mchan khung chu sor gnas pa dag_/mdog 'dra sra zhing snum pa dang /_/bar ta skyu ru ra 'dra dang /_/gting zug 'bras ni
[\[304b.7\]]cher 'byung ba/_/ring zhig lon na smin par byed/_/de las kha cig nad med smin/_/kha cig 'dzag dang g.ya' ba yin/_/kha cig skam zhing kha cig skye/_/yun ring du ni gnas par byed/_/drur ba bzhin du 'bri zhing 'phel/_/'brum chen 'bras phreng zhes bya'o/_/de ni rims bcas
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]skyugs pa dang /_/chom lud rtsib logs zug pa yang /_/rma la mi 'phrod bsten pa yis/_/skrang dang smin pa khyad par med/_/sha sogs nang du rnag zhugs 'gyur/_/ring du 'gro bar byed pa yin/_/de ni ring du 'gro bas 'gro/_/sbubs ltar 'dzag
[\[305a.2\]]pa sbu gu yin/_/drang po sbu gu gcig yin te/_/de nyid sna tshogs 'gro bas 'gro/_/de ni nad gzhi re re 'dus/_/zug rngu'i rgyus 'byung lngar 'gyur ro/_/rlung gyur nad bcas rma sgo sra/_/mdog mi sdug cing lbu ba 'dzag_/nub mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin/_/mkhris gyur skom tsha
[\[305a.3\]]rims kyis 'debs/_/ser bro rnag ni dri mnam 'dzag_/nyin par lhag par 'dzag pa yin/_/bad kan ska zhing spyi bag 'dzag_/g.ya' zhing sra bar gyur pa dang /_/mtshan mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin/_/'dus gyur mtshan ma kun ldan spang /_/nang na gnas pa'i zug rngu ma phyung
[\[305a.4\]]zhing /_/sbu gu skyed par byed pa gang yin de/_/lbu ba can la sla zhing dro ba dang /_/khrag bcas rnag ni nad bcas rtag tu 'byung /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//de nas rmen bu la sogs pa'i nad gso ba
