[\[305a.5\]]bshad par bya'o/_/rmen bu ma smin pa la ni/_/rang rang skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso/_/kaN+Da ka ri bri ha ti/_/tsi tra ka dang pi pi ling /_/bskol ba'i mar gyis lus sbyang bar/_/'dod pa dag gis snum chos bya/_/sbyang byas sman rnon lde gus bsku/_/rmen bu lan mang dugs byas te/_/
[\[305a.6\]]yang dang yang du mnye bar bya/_/'di ni mchog tu rlung la bya/_/khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'ang /_/gtar ga bsil ba'i sbyor kun bya/_/bad kan las gyur rlung ltar gso/_/'on kyang smin na de bcad de/_/khrag yod pa ni mes bsreg bya/_/ma lus par bcad lus gyur na/_/
[\[305a.7\]]slar yang 'phel bar byed par 'gyur/_/sha yi rma las gyur rmen bu/_/de bzhin 'tsho ba tsam du bya/_/tshil las gyur pa'ang 'di nyid dang /_/til dang 'o ma'i lde gus bsku/_/ras ni nyis rim dag gis dkri/_/tog lcags la sogs bsregs pas bsro/_/yang na mtshon gyis
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]dbral nas ni/_/tshil phyung nas ni legs par bsregs/_/rtsa yi thor bu sar pa la/_/sa ha tsa ra'i til mar blud/_/rlung 'joms sman gyis dkri dugs bya/_/'jam rtsi dang ni gtar ga bya/_/thor bu rmen bu lta bur ni/_/rang gi ji bzhin byas rab phan/_/rkang bam rlung gyur 'phel
[\[305b.2\]]ba la/_/snum zhing dugs bcas dkri ba dang /_/long mo'i sor gnyis gong du ni/_/gtar ga gdab par bya ba dang /_/e raN+Da'i mar 'o ma dang /_/ba gcin sbyar ba zla gcig blud/_/zhu nas 'bru rnying bca' sga dang /_/'o ma dang sbyar kha zas sbyin/_/de bzhin dur byid 'o ma blud/_/des ma
[\[305b.3\]]zhin mes bsreg bya/_/mkhris gyur long mo'i 'og tu ni/_/khrag dbyung mkhris pa sel kun sbyar/_/bad kan las gyur mthe bo las/_/khrag gtar nas kyi kha zas ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i sman khu blud/_/'phel ba'i tshe na pi pi ling /_/a ru ra ni bsten par bya/_/yungs kar bri
[\[305b.4\]]ha ti gnyis kyi/_/rtsa ba'i lde gus byug par bya/_/yang na 'u su'i lde gus byug_/'bras kyi phreng ba steng 'og nas/_/sbyang zhing dan da tra ban ti/_/dur byid ko sha ta ki dang /_/de ba ta la'i mar bskol blud/_/bad kan tshil ni 'joms pa yi/_/dud pas mkhur bkang sna sman btang /_/gtar
[\[305b.5\]]gas khrag ni dbyung ba dang /_/skyer pa'i khaN+Das gcin yang blud/_/rmen bu ma smin pa la ni/_/rgyam tsha bca' sga na gu li/_/bsku zhing sra bar rgyam tsha yi/_/thum bus dugs byas mnye bar bya/_/sha mi la phug shi kru yi/_/sa bon nas dang yungs kar bcas/_/dar ba skyur po btags
[\[305b.6\]]bskus na/_/rmen bu'i mdud pa zhi bar byed/_/smin par 'phrigs na khrag dbyung zhing /_/bad kan mkhris pa sel bas gso/_/ma smin pa ni phyung nas kyang /_/thal sman me btsas gso bar bya/_/dzo tiSh+ma ti lang ga li/_/shu ka na sa'i 'bras bu dang /_/ka ka tig ta kar ko Ti/_/de
[\[305b.7\]]bta la'i sa bon dang /_/bi sha l+ya dang ni rgun ti/_/ko sha ta ki pa ta rnams/_/srang ni phyed dang dug zho gnyis/_/ka rany+dza'i mar bre gang dang /_/ni rgun ti yi khu ba ni/_/bre bzhi bskol bar gyur pa 'di'i/_/btung dang bsku byug snar btang na/_/'bras kyi phreng ba gsor mi rung /_/yun ring
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]lon zhing rnag 'dzag sel/_/long ka li yi sdong bu yi/_/lde gu til mar de bzhi 'gyur/_/nir gun ti yi khu bar bskol/_/sna sman sogs btang 'bras phreng sel/_/tsan+dan thang shing na le sham/_/dur byid gla sgang ser po gnyis/_/srang re dug ni srang phyed
[\[306a.2\]]dang /_/ba gcin sbyar te zhib tu btags/_/bram+b+hi'i khu ba arga yi/_/'o ma ba lang lci khur bcas/_/yungs mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/_/btung ba la sogs par bsten na/_/mdze dang rma ni 'khyims pa dang /_/'bras kyi phreng ba myur du sel/_/shu dag rgya skyegs a ru ra/_/pu
[\[306a.3\]]tse shel dang tsan+dan dang /_/til mar bskol ba blud na ni/_/'bras phreng rtsa bar bcas pa sel/_/sha ra pung ka'i rtsa ba ni/_/'bras kyi chu dang btags gyur pa/_/sna sman bsku bas 'brum bu dang /_/dug srin 'bras kyi phreng ba 'joms/_/ut+tam ka ra'i rtsa ba dang /_/bi lu'i lo ma
[\[306a.4\]]seng phrom dang /_/sa ha tsa ra a ru ra/_/shing mngar shu ti tsi tra ka/_/thang shing til mar 'o ma mnyam/_/sna sman bsku byug byas pa'ang phan/_/ba lang ra lug rta rmig bsregs/_/nyungs mar sbyar te bsku ba'am/_/sbrul nag bya rog rang nyid shi_/ing gu dang ni sbyar ba bsku/_/de
[\[306a.5\]]ltar ma zhi nad kyi ni/_/logs gzhan byin pa la gnas pa'i/_/chu so'i steng ngam 'og nas ni/_/tshil phyung nas ni mes bsreg bya/_/gyen du 'greng ba'i rkang pa gzhal/_/de yi tshad kyi rting pa ru/_/de las rmen bu dbyung bya zhes/_/drang srong mu khyud kyis bshad do/_/rting pa nas bzung
[\[306a.6\]]sor ni bcu gnyis na/_/dbang po'i chu so yod spang nad kyi ni/_/g.yon du dbral te nya sgong 'dra dbus nas/_/dra ba drang zhes legs thos kyis bshad do/_/mi yi long mo rna ba'i bar du gzhal/_/de yis brgyad pa rting pa'i cha bgos te/_/byin snying gnad kyi drang thad ma gtogs dpral/_/
[\[306a.7\]]tshil ni dbyung bar bya zhes gzhan dag 'chad/_/rlung gyur sbu gur dugs byas la/_/dbral te a pa marga yi/_/sbu gus til dang rgyam tshar bcas/_/btags pa'i lde gus legs par bsku/_/mkhris pa las gyur til dang btsod/_/nA ga dan ti ser po gnyis/_/bad kan las gyur rgyam
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]tsha til/_/dan da nim pa lan tshwas bsku/_/zug rngu las byung dbral te dbyung /_/til dang mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku/_/mtshon dbral mi rung chu tshod kyis/_/legs par btsal te nang du dbug_/thal sman la spangs skud pa yis/_/rma tshol kha ni shas cher dral/_/rma red kha ni
[\[306b.2\]]dog pa dang /_/phugs ring la yang sbyar bar bya/_/reng bu gang dang til mar gang /_/de ni rma 'khyims la yang bsngags/_/e raN+Da'i 'bras lde gus bsku/_/sbu gu'i rma sbyor byed mchog yin/_/rgya shug 'bras bu shun pa dang /_/lan tshwa rgya skyegs bcas pa dang /_/gla
[\[306b.3\]]gor zho sha'i lo ma dang /_/pri yang ku dang nu zho dang /_/arka snu hi'i 'o mar sbyar/_/reng bus rma 'khyims myur 'tsho bar byed/_/rgyam tsha'i tsha dang rtsabs ru tsha/_/lce myang tsha ni legs par bsregs/_/gla gor zho sha khyim dud pa/_/a mra ta ka seng ldeng gi_/lo ma dzi na skyer pa gnyis/_/lde
[\[306b.4\]]gus bsku ba sogs bsten na/_/skyabs med mi brtan skyes bu yi/_/'byor pa bzhin du 'grib par byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu pa'o//_//de nas nad phra mo'i dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/bad rlung
[\[306b.5\]]las gyur 'brum phran ni/_/snum zhing mdog 'dra mdud pa can/_/nad med mung+ga 'dra ba ni/_/byis pa las skyes ra'i 'gram pa/_/de gnyis las byung shar gnas mthug_/nas 'dra nas zhes bya ba yin/_/'bras byer zlum po rtse mo med/_/rnag nyung rtag mtho 'bras byer yin/_/
[\[306b.6\]]rmen bu lnga 'am drug 'byung zhing /_/rus sbal ltar mtho rus sbal yin/_/rna ba'i steng ngam kun tu ni/_/'brum phran sra zhing mi bzad na/_/ut+pal rtsa 'dra pa nas/_/skrang shing cung zad na la brtan/_/'gam pa'i mtshams su de gnyis las/_/'byung ba rdo yi bong bu yin/_/
[\[306b.7\]]shal ma li yi tsher ma 'dra/_/'brum phran nad bcas mthug po ni/_/nang na tshil yod lang tsho la/_/byung ba bzhin ni ma rung byed/_/bad kan rlung gyur pad+ma yi/_/tsher ma 'dra bas khyab gyur cing /_/dkar zhing nad ni med pa dag_/pad+ma'i tsher ma can zhes bya/_/mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]zlum/_/u dum bA ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/_/shas cher tsha zhing rims 'debs byed/_/gas pa kha bye zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi nang dang gdong la ni/_/tsha zhing nad dang rims skyed cing /_/sran chung tsam la de'i mdog can/_/'brum phran mthug po srin chung
[\[307a.2\]]zhing /_/de bas 'brum bu nad tshabs che/_/sdug bsngal byed pa 'brum bu yin/_/rlung mkhris las gyur 'brum bu'i nang /_/pad+ma'i snying po lta bu yi/_/'brum phran gyis ni phug pa yin/_/de dag nyid skyed bong bu yin/_/zlum zhing rgya che mtho ba dang /_/mdog dmar 'brum phran dag
[\[307a.3\]]gis khyab/_/phal cher rlung las mchan khung du/_/nye bar skyes pa mchan khung 'brum/_/mkhris pa las gyur 'brum phran ni/_/phra zhing mthug pa 'bras yos 'dra/_/de 'dra'i chen po cig byung ba/_/dri can zhes ni grags pa yin/_/tsha ba'i rdul gyis lus gdungs la/_/'brum
[\[307a.4\]]phran nad bcas stug po ni/_/dbyibs dang chad mdog skye tshe 'dra/_/de ni ske tshe zhes bya'o/_/mkhris pa shas che'i nad kyis ni/_/me dbal lta bur dal gyis mched/_/skrang zhing snum la srab cing dmar/_/rim skyed dra ba'i bong bu yin/_/mkhris pa shas che'i 'brum bu ni/_/rim skyed sha la
[\[307a.5\]]gnod byed pa/_/mchan khung phyogs byung me'i mdog can/_/'dra ba de ni me skyed yin/_/zhag lnga'am ni zhag bdun na/_/zla ba phyed nas srog 'phrog byed/_/nad gzhi gsum skyes 'brum bu zlum/_/nam tshong yan chad skyes sa skor/_/mchan khung chu sor bi da ri'i/_/rtsa ba ltar sra bi da ri/_/tshil
[\[307a.6\]]dang bad rlung las gyur pa'i/_/rmen bu rtsa rgyus sha la gnas/_/brtol na mar zhag sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/'dzag gyur de la rlung shas che/_/sha skam rmen bur byas nas ni/_/gseg ma lta bur skyed par byed/_/khrag ni dri mnam rangs pa dang /_/kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba yi/_/
[\[307a.7\]]nad kyis de la khrag 'dzag pa/_/de ni 'brum bu gseg ma can/_/lag pa rkang mthil tshigs dang ni/_/nam tshong yan chad grog mo yi/_/mgo ltar rim gyis rmen bu ni/_/phra mo mang pos khyab byed la/_/na zhing tsha la g.ya' zhing 'drul/_/kun tu skyes te grog mo'i mgo_/
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]rkang mthil gshags mas brud pa'am/_/tsher ma sogs kyis snad pa yi/_/'brum bu bur pa ltar mtho ba/_/skyes te mdzer pa 'dra zhes bya/_/shugs bkag pa yis rlung dag ni/_/gzhang dang rkang pa la gnas pa/_/phyi dang nang du rgyu byed pa/_/lam rgyu de las bshang ba ni/_/dka'
[\[307b.2\]]bas 'byung bar byed pa'i nad/_/gzhang 'gags pa zhes bya bar 'dod/_/rlung mkhris kyis ni sen mo yi/_/nang gi sha smin nad skyed pa/_/ma snad nad dang tshim pa dang /_/nye ba'i sen mo zhes bya'o/_/snad pas gnag cing rtsub pa dang /_/sra ba sen mo ngan zhes bya/_/'dam ni gnod byed la reg
[\[307b.3\]]las/_/nang na g.ya' zhing rnag bcas pa/_/sor mo'i 'bras 'byer zhes bya'o/_/pags pa til 'dra gnag pa la/_/nad med byung gyur rme ba ste/_/de nyid 'bur ba mdzer pa yin/_/mdzer pa las kyang chen por gyur/_/dkar nag pags pa'i mdzer pa yin/_/de 'dra'i 'brum bu skyes pa ni/_/dmar po rgya skyegs nor bu yin/_/
[\[307b.4\]]dkar ba'am gnag par lhan cig skyes/_/zlum pa'am mtshan ma zhes bya'o/_/mya ngan khro dang rlung mkhris sogs/_/'khrugs te gdong ni srab 'gyur zhing /_/thig le nag po ngo shig can/_/gdong las gzhan 'byung khabs zhes bya/_/rlung gyur ngo shig rtsub par snang /_/reg na rtsub
[\[307b.5\]]cing gnag pa yin/_/mkhris gyur mtha' ma cung zad sngo/_/bad kan las gyur mtha' dkar g.ya'/_/khrag gyur mtha' ma zangs mdog can/_/skam zhing tsha ba tsag tsag byed/_/rlung gis bad kan bslangs gyur pa/_/pags par phyin te bskams gyur nas/_/de las pags
[\[307b.6\]]pa skya 'gyur zhing /_/rim gyis tshor ba med 'gyur la/_/g.ya' ba chung zhing 'drul ba med/_/bem po de ni tshor med yin/_/skyug sman nyes dang ma zhu dang /_/bad mkhris lus la gnas bslangs pas/_/rab g.ya' zlum po gor gor po/_/dmar po mang du 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/rjes 'brel
[\[307b.7\]]ldan pa zlum por bshad/_/de ltar nad ni phra mo yi/_/dbye ba sum cu drug tu bstan/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gcig pa'o//_//de nas nad phra mo'i gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/ra yi 'gram pa ma smin pa/_/srin
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]bu pad pas khrag dbyung ngo /_/nas 'dra dugs ni byas nas su/_/thang shing ru rta ldong ros dang /_/ba bla'i lde gu bskus te bzhu/_/rdo yi bong bu'ang de ltar gso/_/smin pa ra 'gram rma ltar gso/_/bzhin gnod seng phrom 'u su dang /_/shu dag btags
[\[308a.2\]]pa'i lde gu'am/_/n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma'am/_/rgya star lo ma tsha sbyar bsku/_/des ma zhi na skyug sman dang /_/sna sman dpral bar gtar ga gdab/_/pad+ma'i tsher ma nim pa yi/_/khu ba'am nim pa mar bskol bar/_/sbrang rtsi dang ni bcas pa blud/_/nim pa dong gar sbyar bas byug_/
[\[308a.3\]]kha bye sogs nas dra bong bar/_/sa skor bcas pa mkhris pa yi/_/me dbal lta bur gso bar bya/_/me skyed pa ni spang bar bya/_/dra ba'i bong bu smyung ba dang /_/gtar ga gdab dang rtsub chos dang /_/lus kyi sbyang ba skyu ru ra'i/_/sbyor ba'i bsil sman byugs pas gso/_/bid
[\[308a.4\]]ril khrag gtar zhing /_/bad kan rman bu lta bur gso/_/gseg ma lta bu'i 'brum phran la/_/tshil gyi rmen bu lta bur gso/_/grog ma'i mgo 'dra bu ga mang /_/cher skyed skrang zhing gnad la gnas/_/rkang pa lag par byung ba spang /_/cig shos la ni khrag byung la/_/rgyam tsha dong
[\[308a.5\]]ga sle tres dang /_/ci tse rgya sran rtsa ba dang /_/da nad til btags nas phyes bsku/_/smin pa la ni nad can sha_/thams cad legs par sbyang bar bya/_/mtshon gyis bcad la de rjes la/_/thal sman yang na me yis bsreg_/mdzer pa 'dra la gtsags bu yis/_/ma lus bcad la
[\[308a.6\]]snum gyis bsreg_/gzhang 'gags pa la nor bu ni/_/'gags pa lta bur gso bar bya/_/nye ba'i sen mo sbyangs pa yis/_/tsha ba bsal te mtshon gyis gso/_/sen mo ngan la'ang de bzhin bya/_/rkang pa'i chu ser dag la'ang /_/'bras bu skyur po nag tshur bcas/_/til
[\[308a.7\]]dang gi wang nim pa yi/_/lo ma'i lde gus bsku bar bya/_/sme ba mdzer par bcas pa ni/_/me shel thal sman dag gis bsreg_/yang na me btsa' gdab par bya/_/de bzhin bags mdzer rgya skyegs nor/_/mtshon gyis bcad de de bzhin gso/_/mtshan ma can sogs
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]gsum po la/_/nye ba'i phyogs la gtar ga gdab/_/'o ma can shing myu gu shun/_/'o mar btags pas bsku bar bya/_/ngo shig ardzu na'i shun pa'am/_/btsod dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/_/lde gu'am rta dkar rmig pa ni/_/bsregs pa'i snag tsha mar sbyar bsku/_/tsan+dan
[\[308b.2\]]dmar po btsod dang ni/_/ru rta seng phrom pri yad+ku/_/sran chung n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/_/lde gus ngo shig sel byed cing /_/bzhin mdangs gsal bar byed pa yin/_/zir gnyis dang til nag dang /_/yungs kar 'o mar bcas pa ni/_/btags pa'i lde gus gdong bskus na/_/ngo shig
[\[308b.3\]]sel zhing zla 'drar byed/_/sran chung phub ma med brngos pa/_/'o ma sbrang rtsi mar btags bsku/_/tsher ma rno ba'i shal ma li'i/_/'o mar btags pas bskus na phan/_/rgya shug tshi gu bu ram bcas/_/sbrang rtsi ri bong khrag sbyar bsku/_/ru rta kha lung khu ba yi/_/nang sbangs sbrang rtsir
[\[308b.4\]]bcas pa'am/_/rkang mar rtsa ba ra'i 'o ma/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu'ang phan/_/rkang mar rtsa ba lang rus/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pas bsku/_/'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma dang /_/ser po rnam gnyis zho ga chu/_/bu ram sar pa sbyar ba'am/_/tin du ka yi lo ma yi/_/khu bar
[\[308b.5\]]btags pa yang mdog gsal byed/_/ut+pal sngo dang ru rta dang /_/tsan+dan ser po pri yang ku/_/rgya shug tshi gu'i lde gu yis/_/gdong ni bskus zhing dril gyur na/_/pad+ma'i mdog dang 'dra bar byed/_/sman ni 'di dag btags pa dang /_/shing mngar dang bcas bskol snum ni/_/nad
[\[308b.6\]]gzhi ji bzhin ma lus la/_/btung dang bsku ba la sogs bya/_/nas dang seng phrom sra rtsi pog_/spra tshil sbrang rtsi pu tse shel/_/mar dang bu ram ba gcin ni/_/gzar bur chags kyi bar du bskol/_/de bskus pa yis sme ba dang /_/ngo shig mdzer pa myur sel byed/_/gdong ni pad+ma
[\[308b.7\]]'drar byed cing /_/rkang pa pad+ma'i 'dab 'dar byed/_/gur gum shing mngar pu shel tse/_/tsan+dan ser dang rgya skyegs dang /_/tsan+dan dkar dang n+ya gro d+ha'i/_/rkang pa gzhon nu shug pa dang /_/de bzhin pad+ma ge sar dang /_/ut+pal sngon po btsod dang bcas/_/srang re chu bre bzhi nang du/_/bskol
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]te bzhi cha lus ba ru/_/rgya skyegs btsod dang le brgan rtsi/_/shing mngar gur gum zho gnyis gnyis/_/phye ma til mar srang brgyad dang /_/de yi nyis 'gyur 'o ma bskol/_/de ni sna sman tshul bsten na/_/sme ba ngo shig skra dkar dang /_/gnyer ma gdong gi
[\[309a.2\]]dri ma sel/_/gdong gi sha rgyas mdog gsal byed/_/btsod dang seng phrom sha ba ri/_/rgya skyegs ldong ros du pa ri/_/gur gum ru rta ser po gnyis/_/gi wang tsan+dan rnam gnyis dang /_/n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma dang /_/dngul chu rma shing tsan+dan ser/_/d+ha du ra yi shun pa yi/_/sa bon pad+ma ge
[\[309a.3\]]sar dang /_/spra tshil spangs ma shug pa sogs/_/zhag dang 'o ma rkang dang mar/_/'o ma can shing 'o ma ni/_/bskol ba'i mar ni bskus gyur na/_/ngo shig gnyer ma sogs 'joms shing /_/bzhin ni pad+ma'i mdangs 'drar 'gyur/_/bring ga ra dza'i khu bar ni/_/'o ma chu bskol sna
[\[309a.4\]]sman bsngags/_/pags pa tshor med la rlung gi_/gso ba dang ni me btsa' bya/_/pags nad zlum por bad mkhris bshad/_/mdze nad sel ba thams cad phan/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o//_//de
[\[309a.5\]]nas gsang ba'i nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/bud med nyal po spangs pa las/_/mod la bsten par gyur pa'am/_/nad dang bcas shing dogs pa las/_/dri ma can nam zla mtshan nam/_/skye gnas gzhan dang mi 'dod dang /_/bgrod min gsar du btsas pa dang /_/
[\[309a.6\]]dga' ba'i mthar ni dug can sogs/_/chus reg pa'am ma bkrus dang /_/bskyed pa'i bsam pas sman rnon po'i/_/lde gu la sogs bskus pa dang /_/khu tshur so dang sen mo dang /_/gra ma dug can gyis reg dang /_/shugs dgag pa dang yun ring du/_/reg pa rtsub pas bdar ba
[\[309a.7\]]'am/_/nad gzhi 'khrugs pas gsang bar zhugs/_/sos 'dzin lta bu la sogs nad/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sos 'dzin lta bu 'dir lnga ste/_/nad gzhi re re khrag las gyur/_/'dus pa'i nad las gyur pa'o/_/de la rlung gyur pho mtshan skrangs/_/nad mang
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]rtag ldang pags 'gas pa'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur skrang rims 'debs/_/u dum+WA ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/_/bad kan gyis mkhrang snum pa dang /_/g.ya' zhing skrangs la lci ba yin/_/khrag gyur 'brum bu nag po 'byung /_/khrag 'dzag rims kyis 'debs par byed/_/'dus gyur
[\[309b.2\]]mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/rlig 'bras gnyis kyang skrang bar byed/_/mi bzad na zhing lhung pa dang /_/gas shing srin bu skye ba yin/_/de las khrag gyur 'tsho ba tsam/_/'dus pa las gyur 'chi bar byed/_/nad 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan gnas/_/sha khrag las ni pho mtshan
[\[309b.3\]]gyi/_/phyi'am yang na nang du ni/_/mdzer pa g.ya' bar byed pa 'byung /_/khrag ni spyi bag 'dzag par byed/_/mo mtshan de 'dra gdugs ltar 'dug_/de ni 'brum nad ma gsos na/_/pho mo'i khu khrag nyams byed gsod/_/pho mtshan gyi ni phyi'am nang /_/bad kan khrag gyur 'brum phran ni/_/
[\[309b.4\]]tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra/_/stug po'i yungs kar zhes byar bshad/_/bad kan khrag gyur 'brum bu ni/_/ring zhing mang por gyur pa la/_/dbus nas gas pa gang yin pa/_/de ni nges par 'joms shes bya/_/na zhing ba sbu brtse bar byed/_/khrag mkhris las ni 'dzam bu
[\[309b.5\]]yi/_/rus pa ltar 'dug khong stong can/_/'bras byer gcin snyi 'drar shes bya/_/khrag mkhris las gyur 'brum phran ni/_/ma sha mang+ga 'dra mchog yin/_/pad+ma'i steng du ge sar bzhin/_/'brum bu 'brum phran gyis khyab pa/_/de ni pad+ma can zhes bya/_/lag pa gnyis kyis rab
[\[309b.6\]]mnyes pa/_/de ni mnyes pa'i 'brum bur gyur/_/mtshan ni mnyes par gyur pa las/_/rlung 'khrugs gyur pa mnyes pa yin/_/mi mnyam sra zhing yon por ni/_/rlung 'khrugs gyur pa gtun shing yin/_/rlung gis mnyes pa la sogs pa'i/_/nad 'khrugs mtshan gyi pags
[\[309b.7\]]pa ni/_/ldog cing tsha la nad bcas shing /_/la lar shu ba dag tu 'gyur/_/'dus shing mdud pa chags pa ni/_/de yi nor bu thur du 'phyang /_/pags pa ldog pa'i nad ces bya/_/bad kan bcas las g.ya' zhing sra/_/rma 'tshob dka' zhing pags pa gas/_/gas pa'i nad
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]ces bya bar bshad/_/rlung gis pags pa gnod 'gyur zhing /_/nor bu 'byar zhing gcin 'gag 'gyur/_/de las rgyun phra nad med 'byung /_/nor bu'i kha ni 'gags gyur pas/_/de ni nor bu'i nad ces bya/_/bad kan las gyur mtshan gyi nad/_/gra
[\[310a.2\]]mas gang snyam mdud pa'i nad/_/gra mas gnod pa'i khrag gi nad/_/tshor ba nyams pa de ming can/_/rlung dang khrag mkhris las gyur pa/_/bu ga'i rtse mo phra ba yis/_/mtshan gyi nang ni kun tu khyab/_/de ni kha brgya pa zhes bya/_/khrag mkhris las gyur pags pa rnams/_/tsha zhing
[\[310a.3\]]rims bcas pags pa smin/_/'dus pa las gyur sha rnams ni/_/thams cad ngan pas smin pa yin/_/'brum bu gnag cing dmar ba yi/_/'brum bu dag gis gnod 'gyur shing /_/pho mtshan shin tu na ba gang /_/de ni khrag gi 'brum bu yin/_/sha yi mdzer pa sngar
[\[310a.4\]]bshad do/_/khong 'bras nad gzhi gsum las skyes/_/'dus pas mtshan ni rnags gyur cing /_/sha ni nag por gyur pa dang /_/kun nas zhig par byed pa gang /_/de ni til nag ces brjod bshad/_/sha las gyur pa'i 'brum bu rnags/_/khong 'bras til nag ces bya ba/_/
[\[310a.5\]]bzhi po 'di dag spang bar bya/_/lhag ma rnams ni myur du gso/_/kha zas gnod pa zos pa dang /_/mal stan mi bder nyal ba dang /_/nyal po bsten ni drags pa dang /_/nang na nad khrag sman gnod dang /_/sa bon nyes pa rnam smin las/_/mngal gyi nad ni
[\[310a.6\]]nyi shur 'gyur/_/rlung gis mngal la gnod gyur pas/_/na zug yangs shing tshor ba med/_/grog mas khyab pa snyam du sems/_/sra zhing rtsub pa sgra dang bcas/_/zla mtshan sla zhing wu ba can/_/nyung zhing gnag pa 'dzag par byed/_/chu so rtsib logs lhod pa dang /_/na zhing rim gyis
[\[310a.7\]]skran bskyed la/_/rang rang nyes pa de dang de/_/de ni rlung can yin zhes bshad/_/de nyid shas cher spyad na skrang /_/bcas pa nyal po drags zhes bya/_/shin tu gzhon la 'khrig pa spyad/_/rgyab dang chu so byin par ni/_/na zhing mngal la gnod byed pa/_/de ni spyad sngas pa zhes bya/_/
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]shugs 'khyil ba yi mngal du ni/_/rlung gis gnod par gyur pa las/_/zla mtshan lbu ba can 'byung ba/_/'khyil ba lta bur snang gyur pa/_/nad 'di 'khyil pa can zhes bya/_/gang tshe rlung ni rtsub pos bu/_/skye zhing skye zhing gsod byed pa/_/skyes nas gsod pa zhes
[\[310b.2\]]byar bshad/_/'grangs drags mi mnyam gnas par ni/_/'dod pa spyad pas rlung 'khrugs shing /_/gzhan gyis gnod par gyur pa las/_/mtshan gyi bu ga sha rus la/_/gnod gyur mngal ni yon bor 'gyur/_/na gyur nang du kha bltas yin/_/kha zas rlung can bsten pa yis/_/
[\[310b.3\]]zla mtshan rlung gis gnod gyur zhing /_/bud med mo mtshan zhum gyur par/_/byed pa de ni khabs mig yin/_/dus su shugs bkag rlung 'phel bas/_/bshang dang gci ba 'gag byed cing /_/mo mtshan skam par byed pa dang /_/shas cher na ba mngal skams yin/_/zhag drug
[\[310b.4\]]gam ni zhag bdun nas/_/rlung gis mngal gnas khu ba 'byin/_/nad bcas pa'am nad med pa/_/de ni khu ba slon zhes bya/_/bud med mngal dang sa bon gyi/_/nyes pa rlung gis gnod gyur zhing /_/'khrig par mi dga' nu ma med/_/ma ning yin te gsor mi rung /_/mngal gyi nang
[\[310b.5\]]du rlung gis ni/_/gnod gyur mo mtshan khong khar gnas/_/bye ba'am lhod par gyur pa dang /_/rlung can bzhin du na gyur pa/_/sha ni mtho bar gyur pa ste/_/mo mtshan che nad tshabs che bya/_/mkhris pa mngal na gnas pa yi/_/nang gi nad gzhis gnod gyur pa/_/tsha ba'am rnag
[\[310b.6\]]par byed 'gyur zhing /_/dri mnam rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_/shin tu tsha zhing ro ltar mnam/_/zla mtshan sngo nag ser por 'dzag_/nad de mkhris pa can zhes bya/_/zla mtshan cher 'dzag khrag can yin/_/bad kan skyed par byed pa yis/_/mo mtshan gnod gyur na ba med/_/grang
[\[310b.7\]]zhing dkar la g.ya' ba dang /_/spyin bag tu ni 'dzag par byed/_/nad de bad kan las gyur yin/_/rlung mkhris 'khrugs pas zla mtshan zad/_/tsha zhing lus skems mdog mi sdug_/de ni khrag zad pa zhes bya/_/mkhris pa shas che nyal po bsten/_/sgrid pa sbregs pa bkag pa
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]las/_/mkhris par bcas pa'i rlung gis ni/_/mngal du gnod pa skyed par 'gyur/_/skrang zhing nyam thag reg mi bzod/_/zla mtshan sngo dang ser por 'byung /_/pho ba'i lto ni lci ba dang /_/'khru zhing yi ga 'chus par byed/_/chu so brla ni na zhing zug_/
[\[311a.2\]]rims skyed yongs rgyas nad ces bya/_/rlung dang bad kan nad kyis khyab/_/mngal nas skye zhing spyi bag 'dzag_/nye bar 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/_/srin bu skyes shing g.ya' bas 'dod pa las/_/rab gdungs de ni rnam par g.yeng zhes bya/_/dus min spyod par gyur pas rlung /_/bad
[\[311a.3\]]kan khrag dang 'dres gyur te/_/zla mtshan lam ni 'gag byed de/_/mngal du lte ba skyed par byed/_/de ni pad+ma'i snying po yin/_/nad gzhi gsum ni mo mtshan gyi/_/mngal nas rang rang gnod pa skyed/_/'dus pa las gyur nyes pa yin/_/de ltar bud med mngal nad kyis/_/
[\[311a.4\]]khu ba 'dzin par mi byed de/_/des na mngal du bu mi chags/_/mi bzad nad kyang skye 'gyur zhing /_/khrag 'byung gzhang 'brum skran la sogs/_/rlung sogs nad ni kun skyed byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu gsum pa'o//_//
[\[311a.5\]]de nas gsang ba'i gnas kyi nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/sos 'dzin 'dra ba gsar byung la/_/pho mtshan dbus na gtar ga gdab/_/bsil ba'i gso bas sbyang bar bya/_/khyad par du ni bkru sman gtang /_/smin na til gyi lde gu ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa bsku/_/
[\[311a.6\]]'dzam bu a mra klu shing dang /_/nim pa kam po dza'i myu gu/_/rgya shug bil ba sa li ka_/rgya skyegs til ni sha yi shun/_/'o ma can gyi shing gi shun/_/'bras bu gsum ni chur bskol ba'i/_/khu ba des ni bkru ba dang /_/de bskol til mar gyis rma 'tshob/_/spangs ma seng
[\[311a.7\]]phrom btsag yug snam/_/sug smel ldong ros ba bla dang /_/nag tshur rgya skyegs skyer khaN+Da/_/rgyam tsha ha re Nu ka yi/_/phye ma sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/_/sos 'dzin lta bu'i rma 'tshob byed/_/kham phor sbyar bar 'bras bu gsum/_/bsregs pa mar bcas rma 'tshob byed/_/'di ni spyi
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]yi gso ba yin/_/re re skrang pa lta bur gso/_/sman pas ci nas rnags par ni/_/mi 'gyur de ltar 'bad par bya/_/rnags na rgyus pa rtsa dang sha/_/zhig pas pho mtshan ma rungs 'gyur/_/'brum pa bcad dang bsregs pa yi/_/gso ba so sa 'dzin lta bur bya/_/brud nas yungs
[\[311b.2\]]kar phye zhib dang /_/bskol sman phye mas gdab par bya/_/til mar de nyid kyis bsku zhing /_/rma 'tsho ba pa yi gso ba bya/_/mnye gso ba ni 'di nyid bya/_/de dag gnyi gar gtar ga gdab/_/khong stong la ni gtar ga bya/_/rnags la rma ni dag par bya/_/tin du ka dang 'bras bu gsum/_/
[\[311b.3\]]seng phrom lde gu til mar bsku/_/'bras byer la ni gtar ga gdab/_/gso ba'i rim pa 'di nyid bya/_/mchog ces bya ba'i 'brum bu ni/_/brtol te lcags kyus blangs te bcad/_/lde gu phye ma sman khu ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas gso bar bya/_/mnye dang pad+ma can la ni/_/mkhris
[\[311b.4\]]pa'i me dbal gso bar bya/_/pags smin tshor ba med pa la'ang /_/pho mo'i gso ba 'di nyid bya/_/mnye la dugs ni bya ba dang /_/ba la'i sman mar dro 'jam blugs/_/mngar ba'i sman sbyar dkri dugs bya/_/gtun shing 'dra la gtar ga gdab/_/bad kan rmen bu lta bur gso/_/
[\[311b.5\]]pags pa ldog la mar gyis bsku/_/sa lba la sogs snum gyur pas/_/zhag gsum mam ni zhag lnga ru/_/dkri ba'i las ni spyad par bya/_/dugs bya de yi 'og tu ni/_/snum gyur pags pa drang bar bya/_/nor bu rim gyis btsir nas ni/_/chud nas nye bar dkri bar bya/_/nor bu yang yang snum chos bya/_/
[\[311b.6\]]kha zas snum can sbyin pa'ang phan/_/gas pa la yang cho ga yi/_/rim pa ji bzhin byas pa'ang phan/_/'gags pa sbu gu kha gnyis pa/_/rgya skyegs kyis ni dkris pa la/_/snum bskus bu gar bcug nas ni/_/rlung 'joms snum ni blugs par bya/_/sbu gu zhag ni
[\[311b.7\]]gsum gsum nas/_/legs par bskyed de spang bar bya/_/sbu gu'i sbyor bas ma grub na/_/mkhas pas mdoms kyi srubs can ni/_/bor te mtshon gyis dral nas kyang /_/de 'og rma gsar cho ga bya/_/rmen bur sbu gu'i dugs byas la/_/
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]snum zhing dro bas dkri bar bya/_/kha brgya pa ni bzhar nas kyang /_/bska ba sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/_/khrag gi 'brum bu khrag gi ni/_/khong 'bras bzhin du gso bar bya/_/kun la rma yi gso ba ni/_/gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/mngal gyi
[\[312a.2\]]nad la mang du ni/_/snum chos dugs dang mas gtong sogs/_/rlung 'joms pa yi gso ba bsngags/_/rlung las gyur la mchog tu sbyar/_/bud med kyi ni mngal gyi nad/_/rlung ma gtogs par 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de bas rlung ni bsal byas la/_/nad gzhan gyis ni gso sman
[\[312a.3\]]bya/_/ba la'i til mar blud bya zhing /_/'dren ma skye de'i 'o ma blud/_/snum chos dugs ni byas te mngal/_/nyes par gnas pa mnyam du gzhag_/yon po lag pas drang por bsrang /_/zhum pa slar ni bskyed par bya/_/byung ba slar ni gzhug bya zhing /_/gyes pa yongs su bzlog
[\[312a.4\]]par bya/_/mngal ni gnas nas g.yos gyur pa/_/bud med zug rngur gyur par 'dod/_/bud med la ni slon sman sogs/_/'jam po yongs su sbyar bar bya/_/rnam pa kun tu dag gyur nas/_/'jam rtsi bsku byug sman khu blugs/_/byugs dang ye'u gzhug la sogs/_/gso
[\[312a.5\]]ba'i las ni lhag ma spyad/_/rgun 'brum tang pal 'bras bu gsum/_/ka sa mar da ser po gnyis/_/sle tres nye'u shing sher+ya ka_/shu ka na sa ba spru ba/_/pa ru sha ka zho gnyis gnyis/_/mar ni bre gang bcas par bskol/_/de blud mngal gyi rlung nad dang /_/bu skyed
[\[312a.6\]]byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/zi ra go snyod pi pi ling /_/shu dag rgyam tsha ba sha ka_/nas tshig 'khus thal ti mus/_/tsi tra ka dang kha rar bcas/_/btags te chang gi dngas mar sbyar/_/mar brngos de ni byin gyur na/_/mngal nad rtsib logs snying nad dang /_/skrangs dang gzhang
[\[312a.7\]]'brum sel bar byed/_/kha lung khu ba ka sha'i rtsa ba/_/zi ra nag po go snyod dang /_/sen rtsi rgyam tsha'i phye ma ni/_/chang dang sbyar te blud par bya/_/ra sna gze ma ba sha ka_/bskol ba gzer 'joms mchog yin no/_/sle tres dan dang 'bras bu gsum/_/bskol ba'i khu ba'ang
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]blugs par bya/_/rgya spos kaN+Da ka ri dang /_/ru rta rgyam tsha thang shing rnams/_/bskol ba'i khu ba til mar bskol/_/sbangs pa'i ye'us mngal nad sel/_/mngal nad mkhris pa las gyur pa/_/chu blugs bsku byug ye'u yis/_/gso ba bsil zhing mkhris 'joms pa/_/snum
[\[312b.2\]]chos don du mar gyis bya/_/nye'u shing rtsa ba srang bzhi brgya/_/brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba dang /_/'o ma de mnyam mar bre ni/_/bzhi yi nang du bskol bar bya/_/'tsho byed sde tshan nye'u shing dang /_/pa ru sha ka rgun 'brum dang /_/pi la ya dang ba la gnyis/_/shing mngar zho ni gnyis
[\[312b.3\]]gnyis phye/_/bskol te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi dang /_/pi pi ling ni srang brgyad brgyad/_/ka ra dkar po srang bcu gzhug_/de las srang ni phyed phyed sbyin/_/mngal khrag khu ba'i nad sel zhing /_/ro tsa bu skyed byed mchog yin/_/glo rdol zang byed khrag mkhris dang /_/lud pa dbugs
[\[312b.4\]]mi bde ba dang /_/mig ser rlung dang khrag dang ni/_/me dbal dang ni snying nad dang /_/brjed byed kyis nyen da rgan dang /_/myos byed skem byed 'joms par byed/_/de bzhin 'o ma zhun mar dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan bskol ba ni/_/bu skyed mkhris pa las gyur pa'i/_/mngal nad sel
[\[312b.5\]]ba'i dam pa yin/_/ba la bre ni sum cu gnyis/_/bskol ba'i til mar mar bre bzhi/_/'o ma bzhi 'gyur pi pi ling /_/ka ka ma si ka ra dkar/_/dzi ban ti dang ram nye ba/_/s+thi ra nye shing zi ra gnyis/_/mon sran gre'u pa ya s+ya/_/ma sha par+Ni sra ba ni/_/pi lu'i lo ma lhan
[\[312b.6\]]cig bskol/_/blud na rlung mkhris las gyur pa'i/_/mngal nad sel zhing bu skyed byed/_/khrag gi mngal nad khrag mdog las/_/rjes su 'brel ba brtags nas kyang /_/nad gzhi bsags pa'i tshul las ni/_/khrag bcad pa yi sman gtang bya/_/shing mngar sbrang rtsi chu shing rtsa/_/
[\[312b.7\]]ta la'i sa bon skyer pa'i rtsa/_/pri yang ku dang 'bras drus chu/_/sbyar ba blud na khrag 'dzag pa/_/mdog skya dmar po sel bar byed/_/pa tha 'dzam bu a mra yi/_/tshi gu dang ni brag zhun dang /_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da aM baSh+Ta/_/btsod dang shal ma li'i thang chu/_/dug mo nyung gi shun
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]lpags dang /_/gur gum bil ba bong nga dkar/_/seng phrom gla sgang btsag yug snam/_/shing mngar tsan+dan dmar po dang /_/kad pa la dang tsa ma ka_/ka Tang ka dang dug mo nyung /_/byi tsher ba dang da ta ki/_/ma du ka dang stang zil ni/_/skar ma rgyal la
[\[313a.2\]]bab pa na/_/btus shing btags te sbrang rtsi dang /_/'bras kyi chur sbyar blud na ni/_/gzhang 'brum tshad par 'khru ba dang /_/gang yang khrag tu 'khru ba dang /_/gang yang srin bu'i nad rnams dang /_/byis pa'i nad gang yin pa 'joms/_/mngal gyi nad dang zla mtshan nad/_/gnag cing
[\[313a.3\]]dkar dang dmar ba sel/_/phye ma rgyal gyi rjes 'gro ba/_/phan zhes rgyun shes bu yis bshad/_/bad kan las gyur mngal nad la/_/rtsub dang dro ba'i sman kun sbyar/_/skyu ru'i lo ma da ta ki_/shing mngar ut+pal lig bu mig_/'dzam bu a mra'i tshi gu dang /_/seng phrom sa nag kang
[\[313a.4\]]pa la/_/se'u 'bru shing tsha tin du ka_/u dum bA ra bil ba gzhon/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye/_/ra gcin 'o ma nyis 'gyur dang /_/til mar bre gang bskol bar bya/_/de bsku ba dang 'jam rtsi dang /_/ras bal ye'us gzhug par bya/_/skrang zhing phyir log mtho zhing
[\[313a.5\]]sra/_/de bzhin spyi bag 'dzag pa dang /_/phyir 'bur nang du zhum pa dang /_/'brum bu gzer dang bcas la phan/_/nas zan a ru sbyar chang dang /_/bu ram chang dang til mar bsten/_/pi pi ling dang lcags phye dang /_/a rur sbyor sbrang rtsi phan/_/nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum/_/a
[\[313a.6\]]mra 'dzam bu'i tshi gu bcas/_/da ta ka'i phye sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/spyi bag 'dzag pa dag par byed/_/rgya skyegs 'dzam bu da ta ki_/so ma ra dza la mang gi/_/sra rtsi pog gi phye ma yis/_/dri mi zhim dang spyi bag 'dzag_/rnags shing sra ba sel bar byed/_/dong ga la sogs sde tshan ni/_/
[\[313a.7\]]bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya/_/sra zhing rtsub par gyur pa la/_/mnyen pa'i cho ga bya ba dang /_/sha brdungs pa yis glan pa dang /_/kri sa ra dang 'o thug gzhung /_/dri ngar til mar dri zhim pa'am/_/lde gu dri zhim bsku ba'am/_/dri bzangs kun gyi phye ma'am/_/rul ba'i dri ni sel byed
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]gzhug_/bad kan can la phal cher sman/_/tsha ba ba gcin mas gtong phan/_/mkhris pa shing mngar 'o mar bcas/_/rlung gyur skyur bcas til mar phan/_/'dus pa las gyur nad la ni/_/thun mong gis ni gso ba phan/_/de ltar mngal ni dag gyur na/_/sa bon skyon med tha mal
[\[313b.2\]]bar/_/rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na/_/bud med la ni bu chags 'gyur/_/skyes pa yi ni dbang po yang /_/las rnam lnga yis dag bya zhing /_/mdog las nad gzhi brtags nas ni/_/nad bcas de 'joms sman gyis gso/_/ru rta rgya spos shu dag bcod/_/'bras bu gsum dang kar dkar/_/
[\[313b.3\]]shing mngar me da ser po gnyis/_/la la phud dang pu tse shel/_/shing mngar ram nye pa ya s+ya/_/a shwa gan+d+ha nye'u shing pa/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye/_/mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni/_/bzhi 'gyur bcas pa bskol bar bya/_/blud na mngal dang khu ba yi/_/nyes pa thams
[\[313b.4\]]cad sel byed cing /_/tshe ring lus ni rgyas byed la/_/yid gzhungs pa dang bkra shis dang /_/bu skyed par ni byed mchog yin/_/'bras bu'i sman mar zhes byar bshad/_/zla mtshan rgyu tshe 'thungs gyur na/_/bu ni 'chi bar byed pa yang /_/'tsho zhing sbrum ma rnams la bsngags/_/'di ni
[\[313b.5\]]mchog tu byis pa yi/_/lus rgyas gdon 'joms byed pa yin/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mtshon spyad kyis gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so//_//
[\[313b.6\]]de nas dug nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/sngon ni lha dang lha ma yin/_/bdud rtsi 'dod pas bsrubs pa na/_/bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon rol du/_/skyes bu shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/mche ba bzhi pa gzi brjid 'bar/_/skra ser mig ni me 'bar ba/_/de mthong 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyur/_/
[\[313b.7\]]des na 'di ni dug ces bya/_/tshangs pas hUM zhes brjod pa dang /_/bslu ba'i bdag nyid can spangs te/_/gzugs de rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/_/gzugs la de ni zhugs par gyur/_/brtan dug nus pa mi bzad par/_/sdong bu la ni gnas pa gang /_/ka la ku ta dbang po'i bu/_/btsan dug ha la ha
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]la sogs/_/rgyu ba'i dug ni mi bzad gyur/_/sprul dang phag dang mche ba can/_/rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/_/bcos ma ma yin dug tu bshad/_/bcos ma sna tshogs sman la ni/_/sbyar ba sbyar ba'i dug ces bya/_/de ni sbyor ba'i dbang las ni/_/shin tu ring
[\[314a.2\]]nas gsod pa'am/_/skrang dang skya rbab dmu rdzing dang /_/smyo byed gzhang 'brum la sogs bskyed/_/rno dro rtsub cing dang ba dang /_/khyab cing myur gsod yang ba dang /_/'dar zhing bra la ro mi gsal/_/'ju bar mi byed pa yin no/_/rno sogs yon tan dang ldan pas/_/de ni mdangs las go
[\[314a.3\]]bzlog yin/_/mi ni rlung mkhris shas che ba/_/srog ni 'phral du 'phrog par byed/_/dug gis lus su phyin pa dang /_/dang por khrag la gnod par byed/_/bad kan mkhris pa rlung rjes la/_/nad gzhi grogs dang lhan cig 'byung /_/de nas snying la gnas nas ni/_/lus la gnod
[\[314a.4\]]par byed par 'gyur/_/mi rgyu'i dug ni btang gyur na/_/lce gnag lus ni rengs pa dang /_/brgyal dang slon dang sdang dang ngal/_/gnas skabs dang por 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gnyis par 'dar zhing rngul ba dang /_/tsha zhing lkog ma na ba dang /_/dug gis ma zhu'i gnas phyin na/_/snying ni
[\[314a.5\]]na bar byed par 'gyur/_/gsum par rkan ni bskams pa dang /_/ma zhu'i gnas su shin tu gzer/_/de'i mig nyam chung ser ba dang /_/skrang ba nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_/zhu ba'i gnas phyin zug pa dang /_/skyigs bu lud pa rgyu ma 'khrug_/dug gi shugs ni bzhi pa la/_/mgo bo lhag
[\[314a.6\]]par lci bar 'gyur/_/lnga par mchil snabs 'dzag pa dang /_/lhu tshigs na ba 'byung 'gyur la/_/mdog mi sdug cing nad kun 'khrug_/zhu ba'i gnas kyi 'og tu na/_/drug par 'du shes nyams pa dang /_/shin tu 'khrul bar byed par 'gyur/_/bdun par phrag gong sgal tshigs dang /_/
[\[314a.7\]]dpyi tshigs bye na 'chi 'gyur yin/_/dug gi shugs ni dang po la/_/slon zhing chu grang dag gis gtor/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/_/dug gi sman ni myur du blud/_/gnyis par skyug sman bkru sman gtang /_/snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud/_/gsum par dug gi sman blud cing /_/de
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]bzhin mig sman sna sman gtang /_/bzhi par snum dang bcas pa yi/_/dug gi sman ni btang na phan/_/lnga par shing mngar khu ba dang /_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud na phan/_/drug par 'khru ba lta bur gso/_/bdun par sna sman dud pa dang /_/spyi bor rgya gram byas nas ni/_/sha'am khrag ni gzhug
[\[314b.2\]]par bya/_/ko sha ta ki lang ga li/_/pa tha lcam pa a ru ra/_/sA lu sle tres shi ri sha_/gi ri kar ni yung ba dang /_/ha yang sbrang rtsi ba spru ba/_/bri ha ti gnyis tsha ba gsum/_/sha ri ba dang ba la ste/_/'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_/bskol ba'i nas thug bsgrangs par ni/_/sbrang
[\[314b.3\]]rtsi mar dang bcas pa gzhug_/gnas skabs gzhan la dug 'joms pa'i/_/sman dang gso ba thams cad bya/_/shing mngar tsan+dan ma du ka_/pad+ma ge sar de bzhin bya/_/dngul rdo rgya spos ru rta dang /_/ba bla ldong ros pri yang ku/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bu su hang /_/nA ga puSh+pa ge sar
[\[314b.4\]]bcas/_/shing mngar spang spos ha re Nu/_/gi wang mon sne'u rme ru dang /_/shi ri beSh+Ta sra rtsi pog_/shu ti gur gum ba la dang /_/bal bu ta ma la'i lo ma/_/stag pa dang ni pu shel tse/_/ser po gnyis ni sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/bu mo khrus dang smyung ba byas/_/gos dkar bgos pa byas nas ni/_/
[\[314b.5\]]dge sbyong bram ze mchod byas te/_/dug sman mchog ni sbyar bar bya/_/de tshe sman pas sngags 'dis ni/_/bdag nyid bsngags te brjod par bya/_/skyes bu seng ger phyag 'tshal lo/_/sred med bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar khyab 'jug g.yul ngor ni/_/gzhan gyis pham par ma mthong ste/_/
[\[314b.6\]]bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis kyang /_/bdag la dug med grub par shog_/na mo be+e DUr+ya ma de/_/hu Tu hu Tu rak+Sha maM/_sarba bi She b+h+yaHgau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_matang gi swA hA/_/'thag pa'i sngags gnyis pa ni/_/ha ri mA ye swa hA/_/ba ha mA ye swA hA/_/ma lus dug dang ro langs dang /_/gdon gyi las dang sdig pa
[\[314b.7\]]dang /_/gsod byed nad dang mu ge dang /_/'thab par 'dod dang 'jigs pa la/_/sman btung sna sman mig sman bsku/_/gdu bu la sogs la sbyar bya/_/'di ni zla shar zhes bya ste/_/zhi dang bde legs byed mchog yin/_/dug rnying dug sel sman gyis zil mnan pa/_/nags me rlung dang nyi tshan
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]gyis bskams pa'am/_/rang bzhin gyis ni yon tan mi ldan pas/_/nyams pa'i dug ces bya ba'i dug tu 'gyur/_/'di ni nus pa chung bas mi rtogs te/_/bad kan dang 'dres lo ni mang por gnas/_/des nyen gyur pa mdog ngan 'khru bar byed/_/nad khrag skom dad yi ga 'chus
[\[315a.2\]]pas nyen/_/brgyal zhing slon la rnam rmongs skad 'dzer dang /_/dug gis dmu rdzing mtshan mas gnod par 'gyur/_/ma zhu'i gnas brten bad kan rlung nad skyed/_/zhu ba'i gnas brten mkhris dang rlung nad skyed/_/mi yi yan lag zhig cing skra 'byibs/_/ji ltar bya ni spu btogs lta bur byed/_/dngas ma'am khrag la
[\[315a.3\]]gnas par byed na ni/_/lus zungs las byung nad ni sna tshogs skyed/_/mdun gyi rlung dang ma zhu grang /_/yul dmus gnod zas nyin par nyal/_/lus zungs gnod par byas pa na/_/de bas gnod pa'i dug ces bshad/_/gnod pa'i dug nyen dugs byas la/_/steng dang 'og nas
[\[315a.4\]]sbyang bar bya/_/gnod pa'i dug ni sel ba'i sman/_/sbrang rtsi sbyar te lde gu sbyin/_/pi pi ling dang bya ma ka_/spang spos seng phrom sug smel dang /_/ku tan na ta sardzi ka_/ru rta shing mngar tsan+dan dang /_/yug snam btsag dang sbyar ba'i sman/_/gnod pa'i dug sel zhes bya ste/_/
[\[315a.5\]]gzhan yang zlog par byed pa yin/_/dug mdas phog par gyur pa dag_/yang dang yang du mun 'thibs byed/_/mdog ni mi sdug gyur pa dang /_/myur du yid 'byung sdug bsngal 'thob/_/'dis ni srin bus khyab pa ltar/_/lus tsha tsag tsag por 'gyur ro/_/gdong mo rgyab dang
[\[315a.6\]]phrag pa mgo_/lhu tshigs rnams su na bar byed/_/khrag ni nad can gnag pa 'dzag_/skom dang brgyal tsha rims kyis 'debs/_/mig ni gnag cing slon pa dang /_/btud mar lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/rma dmar mtha' mar ser ba dang /_/dbus ni gnag cing shin tu na/_/'phral
[\[315a.7\]]du skrangs shing rnags pa dang /_/sha yang nag por gyur nas ni/_/gnag cing shin tu 'drul bar byed/_/spyi bag can du 'dzag par byed/_/gnad du phog par ma gyur pa/_/myur du snying la phan byed bya/_/zug rngu phyung la lcags bsregs pas/_/rma ni legs par bsreg par
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]bya/_/yang na mu ka ka dang ni/_/gi ri kar+Ni dkar po dang /_/kad pa la yi shun pa dang /_/btsod dang shir sha bya rgod sen/_/bsregs pa'i thal bas bsku bar bya/_/shu ka na sa bong nga dkar/_/kaN+Da ka ri'i rtsa bas bsku/_/dug 'thung sos btab gso ba dag_/ci rigs par ni de la
[\[315b.2\]]bya/_/rma yi sha ni rnags pa la/_/mkhris pa'i me dbal lta bur gso/_/bde phyir khyo la bud med dang /_/rgyal po la ni dgras bslab ste/_/zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres pa/_/nye 'khor skye bor ster bar 'gyur/_/sna tshogs lus kyi dri mar bcas/_/mi mthun sman dang thal ba
[\[315b.3\]]dang /_/nus pa chung bar gyur pa'i dug_/sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ma yin/_/des nyen mdog skya rid pa dang /_/me drod nyams shing lud pa dang /_/dbugs mi bde dang rims kyis nyen/_/rlung ni mi mthun rgyu ba dang /_/gnyid che yid ni zhum par byed/_/gcin snyi lto ba mchin pa dang /_/mcher
[\[315b.4\]]pa na zhing skad gsang dma'/_/nyam chung sgyid ni zhan pa dang /_/skrangs shing rtag tu sbo ba dang /_/rkang pa lag pa skam zhing zad/_/rmi lam du ni ce spyang dang /_/byi la sbrul dang ne+e'u le dang /_/spre'u mthong zhing phal cher ni/_/nags tshal mtsho ni skams par mthong /_/bdag nyid nag
[\[315b.5\]]por mthong 'gyur zhing /_/ser po nag por mthong bar byed/_/mig sna rna ba med pa dang /_/de yi dbang po nyams par mthong /_/'di dang gzhan yang gnod pa yi/_/bla brnan mi bzad mang pos gtses/_/'ga' zhig 'phral du ma gsos na/_/sbyar dug gis nyen 'chi bar 'gyur/_/dbyig
[\[315b.6\]]dug slon byas kha zas ni/_/de la phan pa'i bza' btung sbyin/_/sbyangs nas gser ni bsten bya zhing /_/mdo nas bstan pa bzhin du bya/_/gser dang zangs kyi phye ma ni/_/sbrang rtsi kha ra dkar po sbyar/_/lde gus dug ni mi bzad dang /_/dbyig dug thams cad sel bar byed/_/mur ba sle tres
[\[315b.7\]]pi pi ling /_/rgya spos dbyi mo pa to la/_/gla sgang shu dag tsi tra ka_/byi dang ka ni dar ba dang /_/chu dron zho ga chur sbyar ba/_/skyur khu dang sbyar blud na ni/_/dbyig dug gi bcom me drod sbyong /_/zur ba ma nu phug ron gyi/_/sha bskol khu ba bsgrangs pa ni/_/dbyig dug skom dang lud pa na/_/
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]skyigs bu dbugs mi bde rims sel/_/dug gi rang bzhin dus dang zas/_/nad gzhi lus zungs tshogs 'dus pa/_/dug gi nyam nga zhes bshad de/_/bkres skom nyam ni chung ba dang /_/khro dang mya ngan 'jigs dang ngal/_/ma zhu ba dang 'khru ba dang /_/mkhris
[\[316a.2\]]pa rlung ni 'phel ba dang /_/til gyi me tog 'bras bu snum/_/sa yi rlangs pa 'brug sgra dang /_/gling bu pi wang rol mo yi/_/sgra dang mdun gyi ser bu dang /_/ut+pal dri dang myos pa yis/_/dug gi nyam nga 'phel bar byed/_/dbyar ni char gi dus yin pas/_/bu ram lta bur rlan can 'gyur/_/
[\[316a.3\]]lus la khyab byed dbyar 'das nas/_/ri byi 'char bas de med byed/_/de bas sprin bral dus su ni/_/nus pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/_/de ltar rang bzhin goms pa dang /_/gnas dus shugs stobs che chung ba/_/brtags te mkhas pas shes byas la/_/de rjes gso ba'i las spyad
[\[316a.4\]]bya/_/bad kan can ni slon dang dro/_/rtsub dang rno ba'i sman bsku zhing /_/bska dang kha dang tsha ba yis/_/zas kyi dug ni bsal bar bya/_/mkhris can bkru sman sman chu blugs/_/shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku zhing /_/bska dang kha dang mngar ba dang /_/mar bcas kha zas sbyin
[\[316a.5\]]pas gso/_/rlung gi bdag nyid can mngar dang /_/skyur dang lan tshwa mar bcas pa'i/_/bza' ba mar bcas bsku byug dang /_/de bzhin sha ni bza' bas gso/_/bkru sman bsku byug kha zas sman/_/mar med bsngags pa ma yin no/_/dug kun gnas skabs thams cad du/_/dug
[\[316a.6\]]'joms mar dang 'dra ba yi/_/sman ni gzhan dag yod min te/_/mchog tu rlung shas che la phan/_/bad kan gnas zhugs gso bar sla/_/mkhris pa'i gnas brten 'bad pas gso/_/rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug_/shin tu gso dka' gsor mi rung /_/yan lag brgyad
[\[316a.7\]]pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa lnga'o//_//de nas sbrul gyis zin pa gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/mdor nas yi steng na sbrul/_/gsum ste gdengs ka can lus 'khyil/_/khra bo yin te de yi ni/_/dbye ba mtha' yas gyur
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]pa dag_/skye gnas dbye bas rgyas par ni/_/dgos pa med phyir ma bshad do/_/mchog tu rtsub dang tsha ba dang /_/skyur dro mngar bsil dag las ni/_/gdengs ka can la sogs pa'i dug_/rim gyis rlung sogs 'khrug par byed/_/gzhon dang rgan po bar ma dang /_/dbyar dang
[\[316b.2\]]dgun dang sos kar ni/_/'di dag dug ni 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/gzhan dag dus tshigs rnams su 'gyur/_/'khor lo gshol dang g.yung drung gdugs/_/lcags kyu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yin/_/gdengs ka can ni myur 'gro ba/_/thams cad gdengs ka can zhes bya/_/lus
[\[316b.3\]]'khyil sna tshogs pa yi ni/_/zlum por 'dug pa lus 'khyil zhing /_/ring zhing 'gros ni bul ba yin/_/ri mo sna tshogs ldan pa dang /_/snum zhing kha dog sna tshogs pas/_/chu zheng bris 'gyur khra bo yin/_/go d+ha'i bu ni go d+ha can/_/dug ni gdengs ka can mnyam la/_/rkang bzhi
[\[316b.4\]]po yi sbrul gzhan ni/_/'di dag nyid ni 'dres pa las/_/'dren ma'i mtshan nyid can te des/_/'dus pa'i nad ni ldang bar byed/_/zas kyi don dang 'jigs pa dang /_/rkang pas reg las dug rab 'khrugs/_/rkang gi rgyu dang 'dres pa dang /_/lha dang drang srong gshin rjes bskul/_/sbrul gyis
[\[316b.5\]]zin par gang bshad pa/_/phyi ma bzhin du dug shas che/_/'jug pa'i rgyu ni shes byas nas/_/gso ba ji bzhin bya ba yin/_/phal pa sdig can ngang tshul bas/_/lam bkag nas ni gnas pa yin/_/gang du kha chu gsher ba tsam/_/lus la snang bar byed 'gyur zhing /_/mche ba'i rma ni
[\[316b.6\]]mi mngon gang /_/de ni mchus gnod byed ces bya/_/mche ba gcig las rjes gnyis mngon/_/khrag med gyur pa bldags zhes bya/_/mche ba'i rjes ni khrag bcas gnyis/_/rnam par bcad pa'o de gsum ni/_/sha bcad shin tu phug pa dang /_/khrag dbyung so yis zin zhes bya/_/mche
[\[316b.7\]]ba'i rjes ni bzhi snang ba/_/de bzhin sos 'dzin btsir bar bshad/_/de las dang po dug med gnyis/_/phyi ma gnyis po gsor mi rung /_/sbrul gyi dug ni khrag dag la/_/ma brten lus la gnod mi byed/_/khrag ni cung zad la brten yang /_/til mar thigs pa bzhin du mched/_/sngar ma
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]sbrul gyis reg pa las/_/'jig pas rlung ni 'khrug par byed/_/lan 'ga' skrang bar byed pa de/_/sbrul gyis lus ni bcom zhes bya/_/bgrod dka' mun par zug gyur pa/_/la la rtog pas zin pa dang /_/dug gi shugs dang slon dang rims/_/brgyal
[\[317a.2\]]ba'am tsha ba skye ba'am/_/na zhing rmongs bag 'khru bar 'gyur/_/de ni rtog pa'i dug ces bya/_/dug bcas nad kyis zug pa dang /_/skrang dang g.ya' dang rims bcas pa/_/la la tsha zhing rmen bur 'gyur/_/de las bzlog pa dug med yin/_/gdengs ka can shugs dang po la/_/nad
[\[317a.3\]]khrag nag por 'dzag par 'gyur/_/mig dang gdong sogs gnag pa dang /_/srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems/_/shugs gnyis par ni rmen bu skye/_/gsum par mgo ni lci bar 'gyur/_/bzhi par mig 'byed dka' ba dang /_/so sa btab rnags shing mchil ma slon/_/lnga par tshigs
[\[317a.4\]]'bye snyam sems dang /_/rgyud gzhan tshigs ni 'jig pa dang /_/lus tsha skyigs bu 'byung ba yin/_/drug par snying na lus lci zhing /_/brgyal zhing 'khru la zas mi 'ju/_/bdun par khu ba'i gnas phyin nas/_/phrag gong rgyab dang sgal tshegs dang /_/rked pa zhig pa snyam sems
[\[317a.5\]]zhing /_/spyod lam thams cad las nyams 'gyur/_/de nas lus bskyil bas zin na/_/nad khrag ser por 'gyur ba dang /_/de yi lus ser tsha ba skyed/_/gnyis par skrang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gsum par sos btab rnags pa dang /_/rngul dang skom dang skye bar 'gyur/_/bzhi
[\[317a.6\]]par khong tsha rims kyis 'debs/_/lnga par lus kun khyab par tsha/_/sprul ni khra bos zin gyur na/_/khrag ni skya bor 'gyur ba dang /_/des ni lus mdog skya bor 'gyur/_/gnyis par lus ni lci bar 'gyur/_/gsum par sos btab rnags pa dang /_/mig dang kha sna las 'dzag
[\[317a.7\]]'gyur/_/bzhi par mgo lci gnye'u rengs 'gyur/_/lnga par lus tshigs na ba dang /_/grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs par byed/_/lhag ma gnyis po snga mar mtshungs/_/shugs ni lnga par gso ba dag_/bya yi de las phan chad min/_/chu yis g.yeng dang chags pas zad/_/skrag
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]dang ne+e'u les 'phen pa dang /_/grang lhags nyi tshan rlung dang nad/_/bkres skom dal bas gzir ba dang /_/phyogs gzhan nas ni rings par 'ongs/_/dug spangs pags pa brjes pa dang /_/'jag ma sman dang tsher ma can/_/nags na rgyu ba gang yin dang /_/rig pa la sogs brten
[\[317b.2\]]phyogs gnas/_/sbrul de dug ni chung bar 'dod/_/dur khrod bsti gnas shing gcig sogs/_/tshes lnga dang ni dus tshigs dang /_/tshes brgyad tshes dgu thun mtshams dang /_/nam phyed dang ni nyi ma'i gung /_/bra nye smin drug mchu dang skag_/sa ga chu stod khrums stod dang /_/snubs
[\[317b.3\]]dang bra nye yud tsam la/_/gnad du bzung ba spang bar bya/_/zin pa'i mod la bzhin skya zhing /_/skra ni 'byi bar byed pa dang /_/lce 'khums yang dang yang du brgyal/_/dbugs grang gang yin de mi 'tsho/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde zhing slon/_/lus can zin pa'i mod la ni/_/snying nas
[\[317b.4\]]gzer bar 'gyur ba dang /_/cig car 'byung ba de mi 'tsho/_/'du shes stor zhing lbu bar skyugs/_/rkang pa lag pa bzhin gnag cing /_/sna zhom yan lag zhig pa dang /_/tshigs lhod bshang ba 'khru ba yi/_/dug 'thungs pa dang sprul gyis zin/_/dug can mda' yis phog gyur
[\[317b.5\]]pa/_/tshul ni 'di dag snang gyur na/_/srog zad par ni 'gyur ba yin/_/sna sman rnon po mi tshor zhing /_/rma nas khrag ni mi 'byung la/_/dbyig pas bsnun na rjes mi mngon/_/gshin rje'i thad du 'gro ba yin/_/de las gzhan du sman pa yis/_/'bar ba'i khyim nas 'byung ba bzhin/_/
[\[317b.6\]]lkog mar phyin pa'i srog bsrung zhing /_/dug ni myur du bsal bar bya/_/lus can dug gis zin gyur pa/_/grangs brgya'i bar du gnas nas ni/_/lus zungs khrag sogs la gnod cing /_/lus la khyab par byed pa yin/_/dus 'di'i bar du gdug pa yi/_/mche bas zin pa bcad
[\[317b.7\]]sogs las/_/bya zhing ci nas lus la ni/_/dug gi yal ga ma 'phros bya/_/zin pa'i mod la myur du ni/_/sbrul ni de nyid za ba'am/_/sa 'am bod bar gcod byed na/_/rings pa kho nar sman pa yi/_/mchil mas byug par bya ba'am/_/rna spabs kyis ni so rjes bsku/_/mche bas btab
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]pa'i gong du ni/_/sor bzhir ras ma las byas pa/_/gso ma'am 'od ma la sogs bcing /_/sngags shes pa yis grub sngags bzla/_/chu lon gyis ni chu lta bur/_/bcings pas dug ni 'phros mi 'gyur/_/dug gi bcings sogs nyen pa yi/_/rtsa las rgyu bar
[\[318a.2\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/btsir nas sos btab dbyung bya zhing /_/tshigs dang gnad du ma chud de/_/sa bon nyams pa'i myu gu bzhin/_/dug shugs de ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/lus 'khyil so rjes mkhris bskyed pas/_/de ma gtogs pa gzhan dag ni/_/lcags dang gser la sogs pas sam/_/
[\[318a.3\]]mgal me yis ni myur du bsreg_/me yis thal bar byed 'gyur na/_/ci phyir de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sa dang lci ba sman sogs kyis/_/kha bkang nas ni gzhib par bya/_/chings ma'i nang nas sha che'i phyogs/_/mchog tu zhal zhal bya ba dang /_/yan lag mche bas zin bcas pa/_/
[\[318a.4\]]dug sman gyis ni yang yang bsku/_/tsan+dan pu shel tse ldan pa'i/_/chu yis kyang ni blugs par bya/_/dug gis khyab par gyur pa la/_/gtar ga gdab pa gso mchog ste/_/khrag ni phyung bar gyur pa na/_/ma lus dug ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dug bcas khrag ni dri mi zhim/_/mer bsregs
[\[318a.5\]]sgra ni tseg tseg zer/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin dag gyur pa/_/khrag ni snga ma bzhin zhes bya/_/rtsa ni snang bar ma gyur na/_/rngabs rwa srin bu pad pas gtar/_/khrag phyung ba yi lhag ma ni/_/dug gi drod kyis zhugs gyur pa/_/shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku dang /_/blugs pa yis ni bsal
[\[318a.6\]]bar bya/_/dug gi shugs kyis ma zhu bas/_/brgyal dang myos dang snying 'dzag 'byung /_/de ni bsil sman blugs pa dang /_/rlung yab spu ldang byed pas bsal/_/khrag na sla bar gyur na dug_/'phral du shugs ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/dug gi rno bas snying 'dar byed/_/de bsrung phyir ni zhun mar dang /_/
[\[318a.7\]]mar dang bcas pa'i sbrang rtsi 'am/_/dug sman mar dang sbrus pa blud/_/de yi snying ni 'gag byed pas/_/snying gar bad kan sogs par byed/_/lus lci nad ni bslangs pa dang /_/snying 'phar de ni slon du gzhug_/gsher rdzas skyur rtsabs rgya sran dang /_/til dang chang sogs ma gtogs pa/_/
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]dug sel ba yi slon sman gtang /_/des ni lus la khyab mi 'gyur/_/sbrul dang nyes pa rang bzhin dang /_/gnas dang shugs kyi khyad par ni/_/phra mo yan chad legs brtags la/_/gso ba khyad par can bya'o/_/srin bu ba ri'i rtsa ba dang /_/gi ri kar+Ni dkar po'i chu/_/btung ba gdengs
[\[318b.2\]]ka can bzhin sbyar/_/sna sman ru rta sbrang rtsi gtang /_/sbrul nag gis ni zin pa la/_/khrag gtar nas ni bca' ba dang /_/na go la ni sbyar ba bsku/_/yang na rtsa rnon dug gis bsku/_/btung bar btsod dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/khang pa'i dud pa mar sbyar blud/_/gdengs ka can dang ri mo can/_/mi
[\[318b.3\]]bzad dug gis zin pa la/_/tan du li ya tad pal dang /_/gi ri kar+Ni rnam gnyis dang /_/kha lung khaN+Da se'u 'bru ni/_/btung dang sna sman mig sman bya/_/a shwa gan+d+ha rgun 'brum dang /_/gi ri kar+Ni sa nag dang /_/ha ti pi pi ling dang ni/_/bye'u rug pa'i lo ma dang /_/bil ba se 'bru ka
[\[318b.4\]]pid tha/_/cha ni phyed phyed sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/dug sman yin te khyad par du/_/lus 'khyil sbrul gyi dug la phan/_/lo ma lnga dang 'bras bu gsum/_/shing mngar nA ga puSh+pa dang /_/e la ba lu dzi ba ka_/zangs rtsi ba dang pu shel tse/_/kha ra shug pa ut+pa la/_/sbrang rtsi dang sbyar kha ba can/_/
[\[318b.5\]]zhes bya lus 'khyil dug 'joms so/_/bskus na skrang dang shu ba mched/_/'brum bu rims dang lus lci sel/_/tang pal n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/_/dzi ba ka dang zangs rtsi ba/_/ka ra dkar po shing mngar btsod/_/khu ba lus 'khyil dug la blud/_/'od ma'i shun pa sa bon dang /_/bca'
[\[318b.6\]]sga pa to la'i sa bon/_/shir sha'i sa bon pu tse shel/_/'bras kyi rtsa ba bong nga dkar/_/shu dag ba gcin bcas par btags/_/yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste/_/go nas yi dug 'joms so/_/ru rta bong nga pu tse shel/_/ha re Nu ka khyim dud pa/_/rgya spos sbrang rtsi tsha ba gsum/_/
[\[318b.7\]]sbyar bas ri mo can dug sel/_/'dam bu khra bo 'dras zin na/_/sa brkos 'og tu thun gnyis gzhug_/phyung ste bzhar la mar sar dang /_/'bras dang sa yi lde gus byug_/'bras bu gsum gyi phye btab pa'i/_/mar ni rnying pa blud par bya/_/zhu zhing bkrus nas nas zan ni/_/sran tshod dang ni
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]bcas pa sbyin/_/ka ra bI ra arka yi/_/me tog lang ka li'i rtsa ba/_/pi pi ling dang na le sham/_/pa ta skyur rtsabs lde gur byas/_/'di ni sbrul gzhan gyis zin pa'i/_/sbrul gyi dug kun sel ba yin/_/shir sha'i me tog khu ba dang /_/na le sham
[\[319a.2\]]dkar zhag bdun sbangs//btung dang sna sman byas gyur na/_/sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa sel/_/rgya spos ru rta srang gnyis gnyis/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi srang bzhi bzhi/_/'di blud 'jog pos zin pa yang /_/bde ba skyed par byed pa yin/_/de nas gdengs ka can gyi shugs/_/dang por
[\[319a.3\]]khrag ni dbyung bar bya/_/dug sman sbrang rtsi zhun mar dang /_/bcas pa myur du blud par bya/_/gnyis par slon sman btang nas ni/_/de bzhin dug sman blud par bya/_/gsum par dug sman sbyar bya zhing /_/mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang /_/bzhi bar skyug sman btang nas ni/_/sngar bshad pa yi
[\[319a.4\]]nas thug blud/_/lnga pa drug par bsil sman gyis/_/bsku zhing sman chu yang yang blugs/_/slon sman rnon po gtang bya zhing /_/dug sel nas thug blud par bya/_/bdun par dug sman rnon po yi/_/mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang /_/de nas spyi bor rgya gram du/_/zab mo'i mtshon gyis batra la
[\[319a.5\]]nas ni/_/der ni sha'am khrag gam ni/_/pags pa dag ni gzhug par bya/_/lus 'khyil shugs ni gsum pa la/_/slon sman btang la nas thug blud/_/drug par sman ni rtul po'am/_/shug pa la sogs sde tshan blud/_/khra bo'i shugs ni dang po la/_/zhal zhal zab tu gdang bya
[\[319a.6\]]zhing /_/ku bas khrag ni bton nas ni/_/snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud/_/drug par mig sman rnon po dang /_/sna sman phye ma bud pa gtang /_/ma smas pa yi shugs las ni/_/gdengs ka can skabs bshad ltar gso/_/sbrum ma byis pa rgan po la/_/gtar ga mi gdab 'jam pos
[\[319a.7\]]gso/_/shing tsha ldong ros rgya spos nyung /_/ku sha'i khu ba chu srin sen/_/ta ma la yi ge sar dang /_/'bras bu chu grang sbyar ba blud/_/'di yis dbang po'i rdo rjes ni/_/lha min lta bur dug 'joms byed/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba bye'u rug pa'i me tog_/rgya spos thang shing ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu/_/
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]ser po rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni/_/tsha ba gsum po ra gcin zhib btags la/_/btung dang sna sman mig sman sbyar ba yis/_/sbrul dang lu dbyi ba sdig pa sogs/_/dug dang dbyig dug ma zhu gsud dang rims/_/mi ni gdon gyis zin pa bde bar byed/_/sos btab bsku
[\[319b.2\]]ba la sogs kyis/_/ma lus ston par gyur kyang ni/_/nyams pa'i dug ni ji bzhin dang /_/slar yang shugs ni skye bar byed/_/dug dang bral nas rlung 'khrugs na/_/snum la sogs pas gso bya zhing /_/til mar chang dang rgya sran chu/_/ma gtogs rlung ni sel ba sbyin/_/mkhris
[\[319b.3\]]par mkhris pa'i rims sel ba'i/_/sman khu sman mar 'jam rtsis gso/_/bad kan sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/_/dong ka la sogs sde yis gso/_/sprul gyi rus pas gnod 'gyur dang /_/de bzhin rtog pa'i dug gis nyen/_/ka ra rgun 'brum pa ya s+ya/_/shing mngar kha ra sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/
[\[319b.4\]]sngags kyis btab pa'i chu dang bcas/_/gtor zhing spro bsring dga' bar bya/_/ke ke ru dang mu tig margad dang /_/bai DUr+ya dang rdo rje mthon ka che/_/ras bal sa bon dug gis gnod pa'am/_/kha ba can gyi ri las skyes pa yi/_/so ma ra dza dang ni ba spru ba/_/de bzhin dro na ma hA dro na dang /_/
[\[319b.5\]]sbrul la yod pa'i nor bu ma na si/_/nus pa dang ni ldan par gyur pa yi/_/dug ni dug gzhom bya phyir bcad par bya/_/nub mo'i dus su rgyu che khyad par du/_/gdugs dang khar gsil sgra dang bcas pa bcang /_/de yi grib ma sgra yi skad phyung na/_/sbrul gyi tshogs ni 'byer bar byed par
[\[319b.6\]]'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu drug pa'o//_//de nas srin bu'i dug nad gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/sbrul nyid kyi ni bshang gci dang /_/kha chu sgo nga lus rul skyes/_/nad ni re re 'dus pa dang /_/ldan pa'i
[\[319b.7\]]srin bu'i dug rnam bzhi/_/rlung gi srin bus zin gyur na/_/shas cher na zhing zug par byed/_/me yi srin bus 'dzag pa chung /_/tsha zhing dmar la shu ba mched/_/ba lu'i 'bras bu smin pa'am/_/'bra go'i 'bras bu smin pa 'dra/_/bad kan shas ches nad tshabs chung /_/u dum
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]wA ra smin pa 'dra/_/shas cher 'dzag pa'o 'dus pa yi/_/mtshan nyid thams cad ldan pa dang /_/shugs ni sbrul dang 'dra ba dang /_/skrang ba 'phel zhing khrag dri ma mnam/_/mgo dang mig lci brgyal mgo 'khor/_/dbugs mi bde na spang bar bya/_/kun tu skrang ba lte ba
[\[320a.2\]]can/_/tsha ba g.yo zhing yi ga 'chus/_/sdig pa'i dug ni rno ba ste/_/dang por me ltar sreg par byed/_/steng du myur du mched byed cing /_/mche ba 'og tu 'dug pa yin/_/zin ma thag ni rab na gnag/_/gas pa snyam du sems shing zug_/de ni lci ba sogs rul dang /_/dug gis phog
[\[320a.3\]]sogs rul ba dang /_/sbrul rul pa las skyes pa yi/_/dug tshabs chung dang 'bring dang che/_/tshabs chung ser zhing dkar dang gnag_/rtsub dang phra zhing gzig mdog can/_/spu drang tshigs ni dmar ba dang /_/dmar zhing lto ba dkar ba yin/_/bar ma lto ru tshigs gsum pa/_/rked pa ser
[\[320a.4\]]skya dmar ba yin/_/dug che ser skya phra ba dang /_/ri mo can la khrag 'dra zhing /_/me 'dra tshigs ni gnyis sam gcig_/lto ba dkar zhing dmar ram gnag_/des zin lce ni skrangs pa dang /_/lus rengs rims kyis nyen pa dang /_/bu ga las ni khrag nag slon/_/dbang po'i don ni mi shes
[\[320a.5\]]shing /_/rdul zhing brgyal la kha skom dad/_/rmongs shing nad kyis nyen pa dang /_/sha ni zhig par byed pa ste/_/phal cher srog ni 'dor bar byed/_/mchu sbom pa yi kha yis ni/_/'debs shing gsor rung sdig pa las/_/lhag par na byed lus rengs shing /_/mtshan gyi sbubs ni ldang ba
[\[320a.6\]]dang /_/lus ni rngul bar byed 'gyur zhing /_/sos 'debs chu grang snyam du sems/_/de nyid rnga mo dud ka dang /_/mtshan mo rgyu bas mtshan mo can/_/srin bu rlung mkhris shas che zhing /_/rnga mo byi ba bad kan can/_/rnga mo dud pa zhes bya ba/_/phal cher rlung shas che ba yin/_/nad ni gang dang gang gi
[\[320a.7\]]ni/_/mtshan ma shas che ba las brtags/_/de dang de las gso ba'i sman/_/yon tan mi mthun pa yis gso/_/snying gzer stong rlung gis rengs shing /_/rtsa mi snang zhing rus tshigs na/_/mgo 'khor lus bcings snyam du sems/_/mdog gnag rlung las gyur pa'i dug_/dran nyams
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]dbugs ni tsha bar byed/_/snying tsha kha ni kha bro la/_/sha 'gas skrang par byed pa dang /_/khrag ser ba ni mkhris pa can/_/slon zhing snying na yi ga 'chus/_/kha chu 'dzag cing chom pas 'debs/_/grang bcas kha ni mngar bar bro/_/bad kan shas che'i dug nad yin/_/'ba' chas
[\[320b.2\]]rma ni bsku ba dang /_/rlung sel til mar gyis bsku dang /_/sbu gu ma smin 'bru dugs dang /_/brtas par bya ba'i cho gas phan/_/mkhris pa can la sman chu blugs/_/shin tu grang ba'i lde gus bsku/_/bad kan can la bzhar zhing bcad/_/dugs dang skyug sman btang bas gso/_/srin
[\[320b.3\]]bu rnam pa gsum po la/_/gso ba rnam pa gsum pos phan/_/dugs dang bsku dang sman chu blugs/_/phal cher dro 'jam gtang bar bya/_/gzhan du brgyal dang mche ba yis/_/rnag dang 'drul bar byed ma gtogs/_/mi skra yungs kar ser po dang /_/bu ram rnying pa'i dud pas
[\[320b.4\]]bdug_/dug dang mche ba'i dug kun la/_/mchog tu phan par 'drob skyong 'chang /_/dug sel sman ni thams cad dang /_/sbyang ba'i las kyang bya ba yin/_/srin bu sdig pa mi bzad dug_/'bus zin sbrul gyis zin ltar gso/_/tan du li ya cha mnyam pa'i/_/dur byid dang ni zhun
[\[320b.5\]]mar blud/_/'bu yi dug gis gangs can ltar/_/bskyod par nus pa ma yin no/_/'o ma can shing lde gus bsku/_/sbyangs byas srin bu'i dug sel byed/_/mu tig lde gus bskus na yang /_/skrang dang dug dang tsha ba sel/_/shu dag shing kun byi dang ga_/rgyam tsha ha ti pi pi ling /_/ba tha
[\[320b.6\]]bong nga tsha ba gsum/_/'drob skyong gis ni bshad pa yin/_/yan lag bcu pa'i dug sman ni/_/'drob skyong gis ni bshad pa dag_/blud na srin bu'i dug kyang sel/_/sdig pa'i dug gis 'phral zin la/_/'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsku/_/sa la par+Ni bskol ba yi/_/dro
[\[320b.7\]]'jam yang na gzhan dag blugs/_/rgyam tsha dang ni bcas pa yi/_/zhun mar yang dang yang du blugs/_/yang na skyur rtsabs dro 'jam mam/_/rgyam tsha 'o mar bcas pa blugs/_/mar dang brngos pa'i go snyod dang /_/rgyam tshar bcas pas dkri bar bya/_/mche bas zin pa dugs
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]byas la/_/zhal zhal btab ste 'bras bu gsum/_/ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum/_/shir sha'i me tog bsku bar bya/_/rgyam tsha kha lung ba gcin skyur/_/bye'u rug pa'i rtse mo btags/_/'ba' cha'am lci ba dro 'jam tsam/_/bskus na'ang
[\[321a.2\]]phan par 'gyur ba yin/_/btung ba zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas/_/yang na 'o mar kha ra btab/_/phug ron rtug pa a ru ra/_/rgya spos bca' sga kha lung gi_/khu ba dang sbyar blud pa ni/_/sdig pas zin pa'i sman mchog yin/_/rnga mo'i so ni chu bal bcas/_/sdig pa'i
[\[321a.3\]]dug ni 'joms par byed/_/shing kun ba la kha lung gi_/khu ba dang sbyar lde gu dang /_/mig sman ri lur byas na ni/_/sdig pa'i dug ni sel mchog yin/_/ka rany+dza dang ardzu na/_/gi ri kar+Ni se lu dang /_/shir sha'i me tog dug mo nyung /_/zhog chu dang btags bskus na/_/sdig
[\[321a.4\]]pa'i dug ni sel bar byed/_/gang zhig rmugs shing rngam pa 'thon/_/bla zhing mi bzad na gyur pa/_/de la yung dang a ru ra/_/btsod dang bong nga pi pi ling /_/bil ba gzhon nu na le sham/_/bA ta ka yi khu bar btags/_/lde gus byugs na phan pa yin/_/sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug
[\[321a.5\]]kun la/_/zho dang mar ni blud bya zhing /_/gtar ga gdab cing sna sman dang /_/mig sman gyi ni cho ga bya/_/dro zhing snum dang skyur ba dang /_/rlung 'doms kha zas sbyin par bya/_/dong gra byi ba'i rtug pa dang /_/kha lung khu ba sla ba dang /_/rgyam tsha pu shel tse sbyar ba'i/_/lde gus dang ma'i dug
[\[321a.6\]]myur 'joms/_/sdig pas zin pa'i tha mar ni/_/dug ni shas cher langs gyur par/_/zin pa'i rma la dug gis bsku/_/uts+tshe TiM ka'i gso ba'ang 'di/_/glang po che yi rtug pa'i steng /_/ro hi sha'i rtsa se'u'i chu/_/sde gur byas btags bskus na ni/_/'di ni sbrang ma'i dug
[\[321a.7\]]'joms mchog_/shir sha'i sa bon arga yi/_/'o mas lan gsum bsgos pa ni/_/pi pi ling gi phye mar bsres/_/dug sman 'dis ni srin bu'i dug_/sbrul dang lu dbyi ba yi/_/dug ni sel bar byed pa yin/_/shir sha ka rany+dza yi sa bon dang /_/gur gum ru rta ldong
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]ros bcas pa yi/_/dug sman 'dis ni mtshan rgyu'i sdig pas zin/_/sel bar byed pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs/_/srin bu las ni rab gdug pa/_/ba ni bcu drug yin par bshad/_/gzhan dag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dod/_/kha cig de bas mang bar 'dod/_/nyi ma'i 'od kyi rjes 'brang ba/_/stong phrag
[\[321b.2\]]yod ces gzhan dag 'chad/_/bla brnan gzugs ni mang gyur pa/_/dug can pa ni gcig pur 'dod/_/de yi gzugs dang ming dag ni/_/shin tu 'dres pas shes par dka'/_/gnas kyi nges pa yod min pas/_/de phyir nad las bshad par bya/_/nad gzhi so so'i gso ba dka'/_/'dus pa
[\[321b.3\]]las gyur gsor mi rung /_/des zin mkhris gyur tsha ba dang /_/skom dad chu bur rims kyis 'debs/_/rmongs bag rab tsha dmar ser mdog_/rnags shing rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu 'dra/_/bad kan las gyur sra zhing skya/_/ba ru sha ka'i 'bras bu 'dra/_/gnyid che grang rims lud pa lu/_/shin tu
[\[321b.4\]]g.ya' bar byed pa yin/_/rlung gyur rtsub cing gnag pa dang /_/tshigs na rims kyis 'debs par byed/_/de yi dbye ba nad kyi ni/_/rang gi mtshan nyid las shes bya/_/gsor mi rung ba snying tsha zhing /_/lud pa skyigs bu mgo nad dang /_/'brum phran dkar dang ser dang gnag_/dmar dang
[\[321b.5\]]skya ba las 'byung 'gyur/_/'dar zhing skrangs la tsha ba dang /_/skom dad lang zhing sna 'chus la/_/mchu gnag so ni g.yo ba dang /_/rgyab dang mid pa bcom snyam sems/_/'dzam bu'i 'bras bu smin 'dra ba'i/_/khrag ni mchus bldags rma las 'dzag_/'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun
[\[321b.6\]]ldan zhing /_/ming ni mang por gyur pa yi/_/de dug rnon po bar ma dang /_/dman pa'i dbye ba gsum du 'gyur/_/ma bcos zhag bdun zhag bcu dang /_/zla ba phyed kyi rims kyis gsod/_/ba dang mchu rings thams cad kyang /_/glang shu kor kor por byed cing /_/dkar dang gnag dang dmar dang
[\[321b.7\]]ser/_/gnag pa'am 'jam zhing mtho ba dang /_/dbus su gnag pa'am sngo ba la/_/mtha' ma dra ba lta bus khebs/_/mched cing skrang bar byed pa dang /_/tsha zhing mang du na ba dang /_/rims 'debs myur du rnags shing 'drul/_/rul zhing gas par byed pa dang /_/rnag gis gang du reg gyur
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]pa'i/_/phyogs der yang ni rma skyed byed/_/dbugs dang mche ba bshang gci dang /_/khu chu kha chu sen mo khrag_/brgyad po gnod byed khyad par du/_/dug ni kha la gnas pa yin/_/ba ni lte ba yan chad 'dzin/_/srin bu stod smad kun tu gnod/_/de gnod byas pa'i gos la
[\[322a.2\]]sogs/_/lus la reg na nad skyed byed/_/ba dang srin bu las gyur dug_/nyin phyed bar du tshor mi 'gyur/_/de nas dang po'i nyin zhag la/_/khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems/_/mdog mi gsal zhing g.yo ba dang /_/cung zad g.ya' zhing nad dang ldan/_/gnyis par mtha' ma shin
[\[322a.3\]]tu mtho/_/'brum bu phra mos khyab pa 'dra/_/mdog gsal gyur na dbus dma' zhing /_/g.ya' zhing rmen bu lta bur snang /_/gsum par rims bcas spu ldang zhing /_/'khor ling dmar por snang ba dang /_/kham phor gzugs 'dra phal cher ni/_/ba spu'i bu ga 'dzag par 'gyur/_/nyin zhag
[\[322a.4\]]bzhi par cher skrangs shing /_/mgo 'khor lus tsha dbugs mi bde/_/lnga par dug ldang las gyur pa'i/_/nad ni de dang de dag bskyed/_/drug par gnad du khyab par byed/_/bdun par srog ni 'joms par byed/_/de ltar dug ni rnon po dang /_/bar ma dman pa dbye bar bya/_/de nas nyin zhag nyi shu ni/_/gcig
[\[322a.5\]]na yong ye zhi bar 'gyur/_/de 'og ba yis zin pa ni/_/mtshon gyis rma ni gnod par bya/_/'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs pas bsreg_/mkhris pa las gyur bsreg mi bya/_/rtsub cing spu ni gyes pa dang /_/gnad dang tshigs la sogs la gnas/_/zin nas kun tu khyab gyur pa/_/gcad par mi bya
[\[322a.6\]]bsreg mi bya/_/bsreg pa dug sman rgyam tsha dang /_/sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/de rjes 'o ma can shing bskol/_/sman khu shin tu bsil mo blugs/_/rngabs rwa sogs sam gtar ga yis/_/thams cad la ni khrag dbyung bya/_/de nas bsil sman bsku blugs bya/_/sle sman ta ka a
[\[322a.7\]]shwad+tha/_/ba ru ra dang pri yang ku/_/shug pa ser gnyis sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/ba dang srin bu la sogs pa'i/_/dug 'joms las ni thams cad byed/_/ser po rnam gnyis rma shing btsod/_/pad+ma ge sar rgya spos ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar tsam pa ka_/snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag_/lci khu btsir
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]dang kar dkar/_/a pa marga ldong ros dang /_/ba bla skyer pa bya ma ka_/yug snam sbrang rtse mar de bzhin/_/rgya spos na le sham sug smel/_/ru rta shing mngar sbrang rtsi mar/_/sbyar ba'i sman ni man+da ra/_/rgya spos seng phrom pu tse shel/_/shu dag pa tha sug smel dang /_/gur gum spos dang
[\[322b.2\]]ldang de bzhin/_/nad gzhi mang la dug 'joms pa'i/_/sbyang ba byas pas gso bar bya/_/shing mngar dang ni po son cha/_/ko sha ta ki ang ko la/_/sin du bar 'bras chur sbyar/_/'thungs na bad kan las gyur dug_/myur du slon par byed pa yin/_/shir sha'i lo ma med dang /_/rtsa
[\[322b.3\]]ba 'bras bu ang ko la'i/_/rtsa bar bcas pa'ang de bzhin no/_/'bras bu gsum dang ni li ni/_/dur byid la sogs bkru sman gtang /_/skrang dang tsha sogs zhi gyur na/_/rma yi lte ba dbog par bya/_/ba bla le brgan rtsi'i me tog_/khron bu byi ba'i rtug pa dang /_/dur byid rgyam tsha dan dang
[\[322b.4\]]sbyang /_/lte ba 'byin par byed pa yin/_/de bzhin u ta ma ka ra'i/_/rtsa ba smin pa'i shun bcas pa'i/_/rgyam tsha ru rta pu tse shel/_/dan da pa ya s+ya sbyar ba'am/_/ra dza ko ta ka'i rtsar/_/dar ba'i tshigs ma'ang sbyar bar bya/_/lte ba bcad pa'i dus su ni/_/dug sel ba yis brta bar bya/_/
[\[322b.5\]]snum chos ma lus bya ba ni/_/zhun mar nyid kyis bya ba yin/_/til mar gyis ni rtswa sogs la/_/me mched lta bur dug 'phel byed/_/be kang ka ta ba li ka_/thal tres gla sgang spri ka dang /_/tsan+dan nya lcibs son ka_/ut+pal rgya spos shing mngar dang /_/shing tsha shug pa na gu li/_/po son
[\[322b.6\]]cha'i rkang lhan cig sbyar/_/skyer pa gla sgang sar pak+Shi/_/bca' sga pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka_/ba ru na dang a ka ru/_/bil ba nim pa pa ta li/_/ru rta nA ga ge sar dang /_/se'u lu lhan cig sbyar ba dang /_/bil ba tsan+dan ut+pal/_/rgya spos bca' sga pi pi ling /_/lcam
[\[322b.7\]]pa nim pa ru rta dang /_/chu srin sder mo dzi ban ti/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba pa ta li/_/dzi ban ti dang po son cha/_/shing tsha sbyar ba de dag ni/_/mig sman snar blugs byug pa dang /_/sman chu blugs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/mkhris pa bad kan rlung gyur pa'i/_/lu ta'i dug ni ji snyed pa/_/tshul
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]khrims la gnas ngan 'gro bzhin/_/'di yis dug nad kun 'joms byed/_/seng phrom shug pa pad+ma ge sar dang /_/tsan+dan dmar ser pri yang ku'i me tog_/pad+ma pu shel tse dang pa ya s+ya'i/_/sbyor ba kun gyis ba yi dug kun 'joms/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying
[\[323a.2\]]po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu bdun pa'o//_//de nas byi ba dang a laM ka'i dug gso ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/_/khu chu can dang mi brtan bu/_/rgod dang sgra can pags pa dang /_/rnying pa'i so dang khu byug dang /_/ser skya dang ni nag po dang /_/dmar
[\[323a.3\]]ser khra bo dkar po dang /_/thib skra dkar phyi ba dang /_/phus pa dang ni bra byi ste/_/byi ba'i dbye ba bco brgyad yin/_/gang du 'di yi khu chus phog_/khu bas phog dang reg pa ni/_/lus kyi lus la reg pa der/_/khrag la gnod cing mdog skya la/_/thor bu rmen bu dri mnam dang /_/shu
[\[323a.4\]]ba kor ling yi ga 'chus/_/mgo 'khor skrangs rims rab tu na/_/nyam chung 'dar zhing lhu tshigs na/_/spu ldang dran nyams khrag 'dzag dang /_/yun ring du ni gnas par byed/_/bad kan can gyi byi ba yi/_/phru gu mang reg skom slon 'gyur/_/byi ba 'khrig spyod dug gso dka'/_/yang
[\[323a.5\]]dang yang du ldang bar byed/_/yan lag kun skrangs mdog mi sdug_/rnags shing 'on la rims kyis 'debs/_/mgo lci kha chu khrag 'byung zhing /_/slon pa gso dka'i mtshan nyid yin/_/phus pas zin pa de dri bro/_/lgang pa skrangs shing chu mdog nyams/_/sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i rmen bus
[\[323a.6\]]khyab/_/khye'i dug bad kan shas cher 'khrugs/_/'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa mang gnas/_/gnod cing 'khrug par byed pa dang /_/lus zungs la ni mi bzad gnod/_/kha chu 'dzag dang long dang 'on/_/kun tu rgyug par byed pa dang /_/mjug ma 'gram pa phrag gong lhod/_/mgon gdong ni dud pa
[\[323a.7\]]yin/_/de yi so yis zin na rma/_/tshor ba chung zhing khrag rnag 'dzag_/mgo snying na zhing rims 'debs rengs/_/de rjes skom dang brgyal bar 'gyur/_/'di yis gdug cing mche ba can/_/ce spyang dom dang dred dang gung /_/stag dang spyang ki la sogs pa/_/gzhan dag kyang ni shes par bya/_/
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]g.ya' zhing zug la mdog mi sdug_/tshor ba med gnas rims mgo 'khor/_/tsha zhing dmar lan zhing gnag_/skrang zhing rmen bu skye zug 'khums/_/rma ni 'gags shing 'brum bu 'byung /_/lte ba can du zlum por 'gyur/_/kun tu dug bcas mtshan ma 'di/_/dug med de las
[\[323b.2\]]bzlog pa yin/_/gang gis bzung ba de'i spyod tshul/_/sgra sgrogs rgyu med par de'i gzugs/_/chu dang me long sogs mthong 'chi/_/ma bzung bar yang sgra dang ni/_/mthong bas sdang bar byed pa ni/_/chu yis skrag ces bya ba ste/_/zin pas de yang spang bar bya/_/byi ba'i dug gis zin ma
[\[323b.3\]]thag_/rma ni mde'u bsregs pas bsreg_/yang na me long dag gis bya/_/gzhan du lte bar mi bzod na/_/bsregs nas rma las khrag dbyung zhing /_/zhal zhal byas la shir sha dang /_/yung ba rgya spos gur gum dang /_/sle tres kyi ni lde gus bsku/_/khyim gyi dud pa skyer pa dang /_/
[\[323b.4\]]rgyam tsha dang ni btsod dag gi/_/lde gus byi ba'i dug sel zhing /_/lte ba 'bur ba'ang 'joms par byed/_/de nas skyur bas bkrus nas ni/_/gi ri kar Ni pa lin di/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba sle tres dang /_/chu dang btags pa'i lde gus bsku/_/dug dang skrang sel sman gzhan dang /_/yang na gtar ga
[\[323b.5\]]myur du gdab/_/ni li ni bskol shi ri sha//ang ko la yi khu bas slon/_/ko sha ta ki shir sha dang /_/dzi mu ta ka'i 'bras bu dang /_/po son cha ni phye mar btags/_/zho sbyar blud la dug slon gzhug_/shu dag ru rta po son cha'am/_/dzi ban ti ni ba gcin btags/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin
[\[323b.6\]]blud na/_/dug gi nad ni thams cad sel/_/dur byid ni li ni dang ni/_/'bras bu gsum gyi bkru sman bsngags/_/shir sha'i snying po'i 'bras bu yis/_/mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang phan/_/ba lci'i khu ba tsha ba gsum/_/phye ma zhib btags lde gus phan/_/ba lang lci ba ka pid ta'i/_/phye ma sbrang
[\[323b.7\]]rtsi'i lde gu bza'/_/taN+Du li yi rtsa ba dang /_/bskol ba'i mar ni blud na'ang phan/_/gi ri kar Ni ser po gnyis/_/shing mngar btsod dang sle tras phan/_/thal tres rtsa pa mar bskol ba/_/ka ping ta yi rnam lnga'ang phan/_/sin du ba ra rgya spos dang /_/shi kru bil ba'i rtsa ba dang /_/shu dag gze ma
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]ba spru ba/_/dzi mu ta dang bcas pa ste/_/de rnams khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas/_/blud nas 'bras chan sA lu zho/_/byin na byi ba'i dug nad sel/_/shar pung ga'i phye ma ni/_/dar bar sbyar ba blud pa'ang phan/_/aM ko la yi rtsa ba ni/_/ra thug gcin sbyar lde gus ni/_/btung
[\[324a.2\]]dang bsku ba la sbyar na/_/byi ba'i dug kun sel bar byed/_/ka pid ta yi snying po dang /_/til ka dang til dang ni/_/aM ko la yi rtsa ba ni/_/ba yi 'o ma'am gcin sbyar blud/_/til ka'i gdong yal ga yi/_/ba yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud/_/yang na sher+ya ka'i rtsa ba/_/sbrang rtsi 'bras bu sbyar
[\[324a.3\]]ba blud/_/ku ba kha bo zhag gcig ni/_/chu la sbangs pa'ang blud par bya/_/sin du ba ra'i rtsa ba dang /_/byi ba'i rus pa bong nga dkar/_/rgya spos chur btags sna sman sogs/_/sbyar bas byi ba'i dug sel byed/_/byi ba'i dug ni lhag lus pa/_/sprin mthong bas ni ldang byed pa'am/_/nad ni
[\[324a.4\]]'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/ji lta bar ni 'phel bar byed/_/de la gnas skabs thams cad du/_/gso ba thams cad sbyar bya zhing /_/rang gi gso bar gang bshad dang /_/de bzhin nyams pa'i dug sel sbyor/_/a lang ga yi so yis zin/_/mar bskol ba yis bsreg par bya/_/dug sman
[\[324a.5\]]de dang de bsku zhing /_/mar gyi snying po blud par bya/_/'di la arka'i 'o mar bcas/_/bkru sman dag kyang myur du gtang /_/aM ko la'i rtsa byang phyogs chu/_/srang gsum mar ni srang gcig blud/_/d+ha du ra yi 'bras bu dang /_/gi ri kar Ni ba spru ba/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/_/til btags
[\[324a.6\]]lde gu arka lcags/_/'o ma bu ram bsres byin na/_/sprin sogs rlung gis gtor ba bzhin/_/a laM ka yi dug 'joms byed/_/sngags bcas sman dang rin chen bcas/_/zhi bar byed pa dag kyang sbyar/_/rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis pa'i/_/so 'am sen mos snad gyur pa/_/skrang zhing
[\[324a.7\]]rnags la mdog dmar zhing /_/tshan chu ser 'dzag pa la/_/a shwa kar+Na kad pha la/_/han sa pa ti go ji ha/_/yug snam ser po gnyis kyis bsku/_/so dang sen mo'i dug 'joms byed/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po bsdus pa las/_/mche ba gso ba'i yan lag rdzogs so//_//de nas bcud kyis len gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/tshe ring dran dang yid gzhungs dang /_/nad med gzhon dang lang tsho dang /_/gzugs bzang mdog dang skad gsal dang /_/lus dang dbang
[\[324b.2\]]po'i stobs skyed cing /_/tshig grub ro tsa mdangs ldan pa/_/bcud kyis len gyis 'thob par 'gyur/_/dngas ma la sogs yon tan can/_/thob gnas yin phyir bcud kyis len/_/na tshod dang po'am bar ma'i tshe/_/dbang po thul bas de sbyar te/_/snum chos bya zhing gtar ga gdab/_/
[\[324b.3\]]rnam pa kun tu sbyangs byas gtang /_/ma sbyangs pa yi lus la ni/_/bcud kyis len dang ro tsa ba'i/_/sbyor ba dri ma can gyi ni/_/gos kyi tshon ltar don med 'gyur/_/bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba ni/_/rnam pa gnyis su drang srong 'dod/_/spyil bor 'dug pa gtso bo ste/_/rlung dang than pas nyen
[\[324b.4\]]cig shos/_/khang pa rlung med 'jigs pa med/_/chos ldan yo byad 'byor pa'i grong /_/sa phyogs shis pa'i byang phyogs su/_/khang pa sum rim skar khung chung /_/dud pa nyi tshan sbrul dang rdul/_/bud med glen mas ma bgrod par/_/yo byad sman pa sta gon byas/_/khang pa legs par byi dor
[\[324b.5\]]bya'o/_/de nas tshes grangs bzang khrus byas/_/mchod 'os mchod la 'jug par bya/_/der ni sbyang byas dag gyur nas/_/bde zhing stobs ni skyed pa dang /_/tshangs par spyod dang brtan par ldan/_/dad par ldan zhing dbang po thul/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bde ba dang /_/brtul zhugs chos la
[\[324b.6\]]mchog tu gzhol/_/lha ni rjes su dran par ldan/_/rigs pas gnyid log gnyid mi log_/sman la dga' zhing tshig 'jam pas/_/bcud kyis len ni brtsam par bya/_/de nyid snum chos dugs byas nas/_/a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/rgyam tsha bca' sga pi pi ling /_/shu dag yung ba byi dang ga_/
[\[324b.7\]]bu ram chu dron sbyar ba ni/_/blud na legs par 'khru bar 'gyur/_/de nas lus ni dag 'gyur zhing /_/thug sogs rim par spyad nas kyang /_/zhag gsum mam ni zhag lnga'am/_/zhag bdun bar du zhun mar bcas/_/nas thug dag par gyur gyi bar/_/sbyin zhing bshang rnying dag par bya/_/
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]de ltar lto ni sbyangs byas nas/_/goms par shes pas gang zhig la/_/gang zhig 'tsham pa de kun brtags/_/bcud kyis len ni sbyin par bya/_/a ru ra stong de'i sum 'gyur/_/skyu ru ra dang bcas pa dang /_/rtsa ba lnga bo lnga rnams ni/_/srang ni nyis brgya lnga bcu
[\[325a.2\]]dag_/chu ni bcu 'gyur nang du bskol/_/khu ba bcu cha lus pa ru/_/a ru rnam rgyal skyu ru ra/_/brdungs la rus pa phyung nas ni/_/khu ba de yi nang du ni/_/shing tsha sug smel pi pi ling /_/ga dur skyer pa a ru ra/_/tsan+dan ma du ka par Ni/_/shaM ka puSh+pa ka na ya/_/shu dag gla ba shing mngar
[\[325a.3\]]dang /_/byi dang ga ni phul re'i tshad/_/khar dkar srang stong chig brgya/_/zhun mar bre ni bcu gnyis dang /_/til mar bre ni brgyad bcas pa/_/lde gur gyur gyi bar du bskol/_/phab la bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi ni/_/srang ni sum brgya nyi shu gzhug_/de nas gzar bus dkrugs nas ni/_/mar
[\[325a.4\]]gyi snod du gzhug par bya/_/gang zhig zas gcig la mi gnod/_/de ni 'di yi tshad du bshad/_/zhu ba'i tshe na drug cu pa/_/'o mar bcas pa'i kha zas sbyin/_/bcud kyis len 'di tshangs pas bshad/_/dge zhing dpal yon can yin zhing /_/mkha' la gnas dang byis pa rtse/_/de bzhin
[\[325a.5\]]dka' thub pas bsten byas/_/lus snyom ngal dang skra dkar dang /_/gnyer ma'i skyon ni spang 'gyur zhing /_/yid gzhungs dran dang stobs ldan zhing /_/tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ba yin/_/skyon med a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/stong dang pi pi ling ni stong dang bcas/_/rgya skyegs shing gzhon thal ba'i chu
