[\[386a.2\]]zos na/_des cung zad tsam mi phan pa'i las byed du zad kyi/_nad phyin par mi nus so/_/de lta bas na sman gyi mthu zhes bya ba ni sman gyi ro dang zhu ba'i rjes la sogs pa'i nang na/_sman gyi mthu zhes bya ba ni lci ba dang snum pa dang bsil ba la sogs pa'i nad sel nus pa'i
[\[386a.3\]]mthu yod pa de la/_sngon gyi sman pa chen po dag mthu zhes bya bar 'dod do/_/yang sman pa kha cig na re/_sman gyi stobs zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/_tsha ba dang /_bsil ba yin no zhes zer ro/_/de ji ltar zhe na/_sman gyi rang bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs yin yang /_nyi ma me'i
[\[386a.4\]]rang bzhin yin te tsha ba dang /_zla ba bsil ba yin te/_'di gnyis stobs che bas sman yang tsha ba dang /_bsil bar de ltar gyur to/_/de yang dus bzang po'i tshe/_sems can dar ba'i dus na sman gyi ro kun kyang gsal bar bro/_/'jig rten dmas te rgud pa na ro yang
[\[386a.5\]]gsal por mi bro ba ni/_sems can dang 'dra ste/_'di gnyis las nams kyang 'gyur ba med do/_/de la sman tsha bas ni mgo 'khor/_skom/_rmya la rdul/_tsha/_zas myur du 'ju bar byed pa rnams yin no/_/tsha ba de lta bus rlung dang bad kan gnyis ni zhi bar byed do/_/
[\[386a.6\]]de la yang sman bsil bas ni lus grang /_sim par byed/_'tsho bar byed/_lus brta bar byed/_khrag dang mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad zhi zhing dngas par byed/_tsha'am bsil ba gang yang rung ba de dang de khong pa nang gi drod gnyis su ldan pa las sman zos pa'i ro de yang gzhan du
[\[386a.7\]]'gyur bar byed do/_/sman gyi ro rnams zhu bar gyur pa'i rjes la/_sman gyi stobs kyis las byed pa de ni zhi ba zhes kyang bya/_smin pa zhes kyang bya'o/_/mngar ba bu ram dang 'o ma lta bu'i bag dang /_pi pi ling dang /_sga lta bu tsha ba'i bag dang /_'di rnams zhu ba'i rjes 'dra ste
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]mjug tu mngar ro/_/ro skyur ba rnams zos te zhu ba'i rjes kyang skyur bar 'gyur ro/_/ro kha ba dang /_na le sham lta bu tsha ba dang /_ro bska ba rnams zos pa'i rjes ni phal cher tsha bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na sman gyi ro bro ba zos pa bzhin du 'bras bu zhu ba'i rjes kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/de
[\[386b.2\]]la sman gyi stobs bzang ngan las phan mi phan pa'i dmigs dbye ba ni/_sman la la zos na sman gyi ro phan pa'i las byed de/_dper na kha na li khar mur ba'i ros kha ba'i ro med pa dang 'dra'o/_/sman la la zhu ba'i rjes la phan pa'i las byed pa ni dper na a ru ra lta bu zhu nas 'khru
[\[386b.3\]]ba yin no/_/sman gyi yon tan zhes bya ba ni ltor ma zos par bsnams pa'am reg pa tsam gyis phan pa'i las byed nus pa de ni yon tan zhes bya'o/_/sman zos sam 'thungs na nad sel bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni nus pa zhes bya'o/_/sman gyi mthu zhes bya ba ni rgun 'brum
[\[386b.4\]]dang /_shing mngar gnyis bsil byed nus par 'dra mod kyi/_rgun 'bru ni lhag par 'khru bar byed nus te/_de lta bu la mthu zhes bya'o/_/de bas na sman gang dang gang la bsten pa'i sman gyi ro dang stobs dang zhu ba'i rjes la sogs pas nad sel ba'i las byed do/_/de'i phyir sman
[\[386b.5\]]sna sbyar ba'i nang nas/_gang mthu dang ldan pa des phal zil gyis mnan nas phan pa'i las byed do/_/sman mi 'phrod pa rnams sbyar te btang na/_de ni gang phal che bas sman gang myur zhing mthu chung ba de thub par byed do/_/yang de la sman gyi ro bas ni sman zos pa zhu ba'i stobs
[\[386b.6\]]che'o/_/nus pa bas ni sman gyi mthu'i stobs che'o/_/sman bsil ba yang rung /_tsha yang rung ba'i sman gyi ro'i stobs mnyam ste btang na/_de'i nang na ma bsgyur ma bcos pa rang bzhin gyis tsha ba'am bsil ba'i sman de stobs che'o/_/yang sman gyi ro'i stobs kun mnyam
[\[386b.7\]]kyang de'i nang na stobs lhag par gang che ba de'i mthu che ste/_dper na tsi tra dang dan tig gnyis ro la sogs pa 'dra yang /_/dan ti'i mthu ni lhag par 'khru'o/_/sbrang rtsi dang rgun 'bru yang /_/rgun 'bru 'khru'o/_/mar dang 'o ma gnyis mngar bar 'dra yang 'o ma ni bsil
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]mar ni drod skyed do/_/de bas na sman rnams kyi spyi'i phan par nus pa dang /_mthu'i bye brag de ltar blta'o/_/de yang sman skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyis sman gyi mthu stobs bye brag tha dad par blta'o/_/ji lta zhe na/_gro dang nas gnyis ro mngar la lci
[\[387a.2\]]mod kyi/_gro lhag par snum pas rlung nad sel to/_/nas za ba lta bu ni rlung skyed do/_/'o ma dang nya gnyis bsil bar 'dra mod kyi nya zhu ba'i rjes ni tsha'o/_/dper na sa la gnas par 'dra mod kyi seng ge'i sha ni ro kha'o/_/phag sha ni de lta bu ma yin te tshul 'di ltar blta'o/_/
[\[387a.3\]]sman sna tshogs kyi ro dang stobs dang zhu ba'i rjes dang yon tan dang sman gyi mthu'i bye brag dang /_sman rnams chen po lnga'i rang bzhin du gtogs pa dang /_chen po lnga'i mthus phan pa'i las byed pa dang /_sman gyi bye brag sna tshogs bshad pa'i le'u dgu pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[387a.4\]]de nas yang sman gyi ro tha dad pa rnams chen po lnga'i bye brag las ji ltar skye ba de dag dmigs kyis bstan pa'i le'u bcu pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la sman gyi ro mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa bro ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba dang /_'di drug chen po lnga las
[\[387a.5\]]skye'o/_/de yang ji lta zhe na/_sa dang chu gnyis kyi rgyu las ni ro mngar bar 'gyur ro/_/me dang sa gnyis kyi rgyus ni ro skyur bar 'gyur ro/_/chu dang me gnyis kyi rgyus ni ro tsha bro bar 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' dang rlung gnyis kyi rgyus ni ro kha bar 'gyur ro/_/me dang rlung gnyis kyi
[\[387a.6\]]rgyus ni ro tsha bar 'gyur ro/_/sa dang rlung gnyis kyi rgyus ni ro bska ba bro bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar chen po gnyis gnyis kyi shas che la ro mngar bar bro ba la sogs pa skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la ro mngar bar bro ba ni kha la zhim por bro ba chags te mngar ba myangs na lus
[\[387a.7\]]tshim par byed/_mig dngas par byed de/_chung ngu grog ma la sogs pa ro mngar ba myangs na yang zhim ste/_dga' bar mngon pa yin no/_/me dang sa las gyur pa'i ro skyur bar bro ba ni/_kha'i nang du skyur ches pas so brtse/_spu ldang /_mig dang smin ma rnams 'dzums par
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/chu dang me gnyis kyi shas che ba las ni ro lan tshwa bro ste/_kha'i nang mchil ma 'du/_gre ba dang kha'i nang tsha bar byed do/_/nam mkha' dang rlung gnyis las gyur pa'i ro kha bar bro ba ni ljin bag sel zhing lci la mi zhim zhing gnod pa byed do/_/lce'i chu dang thor lo
[\[387b.2\]]la tsha tsag tsag byed cing /_sna dang mig dang kha chu zag la mkhur ba'i nang tshig pa bzhin du byed pas skyo bar 'gyur ba ni tsha ba'o/_/ro bska ba zhes bya ba ni lce la ro gzhan re zhig bro bar mi tshor la/_gre ba dang rtsa'i sbu gu rnams 'gags par byed pas na ro bska ba'o/_/ro
[\[387b.3\]]rnam pa drug gi tshul ni 'di lta bu yin no/_/de la ro de rnams kyis las kyi bye brag ji ltar blta zhe na/_ro mngar ba'o ma la sogs pa'i las ni dang po btsas pa nas mngar ba'i ro de dang 'phrod pa'i zas yin/_lus kyi srog zungs bdun rnams kyi mthur 'gyur/_stobs rtsal
[\[387b.4\]]skyed/_byis pa chung ngu dang mi rgan po la phan/_glo rdol dang /_khrag 'ong ba dang /_khams bdun zad pa dang /_'di lta bu la phan/_kha bzhin mdog dang /_skra bzang /_mig dang rna ba la sogs pa dbang po gsal/_gzi mdangs bzang bar 'gyur/_lus kyi
[\[387b.5\]]nyams 'tshag skyed/_skad 'gags pa dang /_'dzer ba la phan/_/bud med kyi nu zho skyed/_chag thur dang smras pa'i rma 'byor cing 'tsho/_'ju dka' ste lci/_tshe ring ba la phan/_'tsho bar byed/_khong 'jam zhing snum/_mkhris pa'i nad dang rlung nad dang dug la phan no/_/
[\[387b.6\]]'o ma la sogs pa ha cang drags na tshil skye/_bad kan gyi nad skye bar 'gyur/_/sha skyes te lus sbom por 'ong /_khong pa'i drod bri zhing 'dus pa'i rims kyis thebs/_gcin snyi/_dga' ba 'byung /_lus la rmen bu la sogs pa thor bu'i bag 'byung ngo /_/ro skyur zos
[\[387b.7\]]pa'i las ni khong pa me'i drod 'bar bar byed/_lus snum zhing 'jam/_skyur bag khar zhim/_zas 'ju/_yi ga 'bye/_drod skye ba'i mthur 'gyur/_khu bas kha lag gam lus bkrus na bsil bar 'gyur ro/_/'thungs na tshim par byed/_/zas zos pa zhu zhing
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]myags par byed/_kha zas skyur ba'i bag 'ju sla ste yang bar 'gyur/_/bad kan dang mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas pa'i nad sel/_khong ba rgyu ma'i nang na rlung sgra khru lu lu zer zhing 'khyil bar rgyu/_skyur ba'i bag rtag tu ha cang bsten ches drags na/_lus sha sla ste
[\[388a.2\]]lhod lhod por 'gyur/_mig rab rib za/_mgo 'khor/_lus g.yan par 'gyur/_/kha gdong dang lus brtse/_ser zhing skya rbab tu 'gyur/_me dbal du 'gyur/_lus skrangs/_lus la thor bu 'byung /_skom dad che/_rims nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro/_/tsha ni dngos te
[\[388a.3\]]zug pa lta bu/_rlung ngam bad kan la sogs pa lta bu'i nad kyis khong du phal cher 'khyil ba dang /_bshang gci 'byung du mi rung ba 'di lta bu 'byin par byed/_khong drod du snum pa dang /_drod che bas rngul bar 'gyur/_/rno bar 'gyur/_yi ga 'bye/_mi tshon po tshil che ba tshil 'ju zhing
[\[388a.4\]]skem po grims par byed/_khong 'khru bar byed do/_/lan tshwa rab tu cher zos na khrag nad dang rlung nad du 'gyur/_/skra 'byi zhing dkar por 'gyur/_gnyer ma mang /_skom dad che/_mdze nad dang /_dug nad ldang /_'brum bu'am 'bras nad 'byung /_stobs 'bri bar 'gyur/_ro
[\[388a.5\]]kha ba ni kha bo nyid yid du mi 'ong ste/_zas 'dod pa'i yi ga 'bye/_/lto na srin bu yod pa sel/_/skom dad chung /_dug nad sel/_mdze nad dang /_brgyal ba dang /_rims dang /_slon bro ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_mkhris pa'i nad dang /_bad kan gyi nad 'di lta bu sel te/_kha ba bro
[\[388a.6\]]drags na/_lus la 'drul bag dang /_lus kyi tshil dang /_nang gi lto tshil dang /_rkang dang nang gi bshang gci'i dri ma 'di lta bu kun skam zhing 'ju bar byed/_khong yang /_yid gzhungs/_bsil/_khong rtsub/_bud med kyi nu ma'i nad la phan/_mgul pa 'gags pa
[\[388a.7\]]'byung /_srog zungs bdun zad cing skam/_rlung nad kyis lus 'dar ba dang /_mdze dang /_zas ma zhu bas lto na zug cing sbos pa dang /_lus skrangs pa dang /_'di lta bu'i nad sel/_rma 'dred lus kyi khong na snum yod pa dang /_tshil zad cing 'ju/_lus la 'drul
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]bag yod pa skam par byed/_khong du drod skye/_kha zas 'ju/_zas yi gar mi 'ong ba yi gar 'ong bar byed/_rna ba dang /_mig la sogs pa bu ga dgu dang /_rtsa'i rgyun 'gags pa rnams sgo 'bye bar byed/_bad kan sel bar byed/_tsha ba ha cang cher drag tu zos na skom dad
[\[388b.2\]]che/_khu chu zad/_stobs 'bri/_brgyal ba'i bag tu 'gyur/_rkang lag 'khums par byed/_lus 'dar/_rked pa dang /_rgyab la sogs pa na bar 'gyur ro/_/ro bska ba ni mkhris pa'i nad dang /_bad kan gyi nad sel/_khong lci/_khrag nad 'byang /'byung /_rma 'tsho/_bsil
[\[388b.3\]]'drul bag gam/_tsho ba 'ju zhing skem par byed/_be'u snabs 'khyil zhing thogs par byed/_khong 'khru ba gcod/_khong rtsub/_pags pa'i mdog gsal zhing bzang bar byed do/_/ro bska ba ha cang drag tu zos na bshang gci 'gag_/lto sbos par byed/_snying na/_skom dad
[\[388b.4\]]che/_lus skem par 'gyur/_skyes pa'i mthu rtsal bri ste bud med la mi phod par 'gyur/_rna ba dang mig la sogs pa bu ga dgu dang /_rtsa'i rgyun rnams 'gags par byed/_bshang gci dri ma sri ste mi 'byung ba 'di lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de la ro mngar ba'i grangs su gtogs pa ni
[\[388b.5\]]zhun mar dang /_gser dang /_bu ram dang /_ka ra ka dang /_chu shing gi 'bras bu shing thog tso tsa dang /_shing thog pa ru sha ka dang /_nye'u shing dang /_ra mnye ba dang /_pa nas bum sha dang /_ra dza da na dang /_sman pa la rnam gsum la/_ba la dang /_ma hA ba la dang /_a ti ba
[\[388b.6\]]la dang gsum mo/_/sman me da ba dang /_ma hA me da dang gnyis so/_/'dab ma rnams bzhi ste/_shing sA la'i 'dab ma dang /_kr-iSh+Na par Ni dang /_mud ga par+Ni dang /_ma sha par+Ni'o/_/dzi ban ti zhes bya ba sman 'tsho byed kyi grangs su gtogs pa'i nang na/_dzi ba kar sha b+ha dang /_me tog
[\[388b.7\]]ma d+hu ka dang /_shing mngar dang /_bim pi dang /_bi d+ha ri dang /_shra ba ni rnam gnyis dang /_shir shug kla dang /_bang sha ro tsa na zhes cug hang dang /_shi ri ni dang /_tang pal dang /_sa ha de dang /_'o ma dang /_bu ram shing dang /_gze ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang rgyun 'brum la
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]sogs pa ni mngar ba'i grangs su gtogs so/_/de la ro skyur ba'i grangs su gtogs pa ni/_skyu ru ra dang /_am li ka dang /_ba lung dang /_star bu dang /_bal po se'u dang /_dngul dang /_dar ba dang /_tsha dang /_ku shu dang /_zho dang /_shing long ko
[\[389a.2\]]gi ka'i 'bras bu long gog dang /_a mra ta ka dang /_b+ha bya dang /_ka pid ta dang /_ka ra ma ra ka ra ta ka dang /_'di rnams ni ro skyur ba'i grangs su gtogs so/_/de la lan tshwa'i grangs su gtogs pa ni/_tsha ba'i nang na rgyam tsha dang /_lce myang tsha bzang ngo /_/tsha phal pa ni so'u bar tsa
[\[389a.3\]]la dang /_kha ru tsha dang /_lan tshwa b+hi dang /_rgya mtsho'i tsha dang /_btso tsha dang 'di rnams so/_/yang lan tshwa ro mo ma ka dang /_skom pa'i tsha dang /_ro nye dang /_ya bak+Sha ra nas tshig 'khrus pa'i tsha dang /_'di rnams ni lan tshwar brtsi ba'i grangs su gtogs so/_/ro kha bar brtsi ba'i
[\[389a.4\]]rnams grangs la pa to la dang /_kyi lce ba dang /_bal ka dang /_tsan dan u shi ra dang /_bu nim pa zhes bya ba ci skrigs dang /_shing nim pa dang /_pu tse shel dang /_rgya spos dang /_a ru ra dang /_shing ba tsa ka dang /_nag ta ma la dang /_skyer pa dang /_yung ba dang /_gla sgang
[\[389a.5\]]chen po dang /_mur ba dang /_a ta ru sha ka dang /_po son cha dang /_shing a ba marga dang /_khar ba dang /_lcags dang /_sle tres dang /_du ral ba dang /_rtsa ba chen po lngar brtsi ba rnams dang /_bri ha ti dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_bi sha la dang /_bong nga dang /_shu dag dang /_'di
[\[389a.6\]]rnams ni kha ba'i grangs su gtogs so/_/de la ro tsha ba'i grangs su gtogs pa ni shing kun dang /_na le sham dang /_srin bu gsod pa'i sman byi dang ga dang /_tsha ba rnam pa lnga ni/_li dong gra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_dbyi mo'i lo ma dang /_kru trug
[\[389a.7\]]tres dang lnga/_ku ther zhes kyang bya ba dang /_shang che rjen pa tsha ba rnams dang /_mkhris pa rnams dang /_ba gcin dang /_go bye 'di rnams ni ro tsha ba'i grangs su gtogs so/_/de la ro bska bar brtsi ba ni/_a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_shing shi ri sha dang /_seng ldeng dang /_chang
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]dang /_shing ka dam pa'i 'bras bu dang /_mu tig dang /_byi ru dang /_mig sman la lig bu mig dang /_btsag yug snam dang /_skyer khaN+Da dang /_shing ga bi ta'i khu ba gsar pa dang /_'bra go'i shing dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_pad+ma dang /_ut+pa la'i lo ma dang /_'di rnams
[\[389b.2\]]ni ro bska ba'i grangs su gtogs so/_/'bras dang /_nas dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_gro dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra dang skam sa'i sha ma gtags par mngar ba gzhan ni phal cher bad kan du 'gyur ro/_/ro skyur ba ni phal cher mkhris par 'gyur te/_bal po se'u dang /_
[\[389b.3\]]skyu ru ra ni ma gtogs so/_/lan tshwa ni phal cher mig la gnod do/_/rgyam tsha dang lce myang tsha ma gtogs so/_/ro kha ba dang /_ro tsha ba ni phal cher bud med la nyal mi phod cing rlung nad slong ste/_sle tres dang /_pa to la dang gnyis/_li dong gra dang /_pi pi ling dang /_sgog pa rnams ma gtogs
[\[389b.4\]]so/_/ro bska ba ni phal cher bsil/_bshang gci dri ma 'byung ba dka'/_'khru ba yang gcod de a ru ra ni ma gtogs so/_/ro tsha ba ni skyur ba lan tshwa dang /_'di gsum gyi dro ba'i mthu ni go rims bzhin du che ste/_ro tsha ba las skyur ba'i drod che/_skyur ba bas lan tshwa'i drod
[\[389b.5\]]che'o/_/khab dang bska ba dang mngar ba ni gsum char 'dra ste bsil lo/_/khab dang tsha ba dang /_bska ba gsum ni khong rtsub/_bshang gci dri ma mi 'byung ste sri bar byed do/_/tsha ba dang skyur ba dang mngar bar sbyar na/_khong 'jam zhing snum/_bshang gci dang /_thur du
[\[389b.6\]]dbugs 'byung ba rnams mi thogs par byed do/_/lan tshwa ba bas ni ro bska ba lci'o/_/bska ba bas ni tsha ba yang ngo /_ro skyur ba bas ni tsha ba yang ngo /_/tsha ba bas kyang kha ba ches yang ngo /_/de la ro mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa bro ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_kha ba dang /_
[\[389b.7\]]ro bska ba rnam drug po rnams phan tshun nang sbyar nas/_ro'i bye brag lnga bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro/_/ro de rnams kyang bye brag tu phyed na ni ro'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gsum du 'gyur ro/_/de bas na ro 'di rnams kyang 'ol ci ran tsam du sbyar ba'i bye brag bstan pa yin no/_/de la ro rnam
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]drug gi bye brag so sor sbyar ba ni/_ro bro ba gang ltar sbyor yang rung ste/_ro de dag las re re phri la/_lnga lnga dang phan tshun du sbyar ro/_/phan tshun du sbyor ba de yang ro rnam gnyis su sbyor ba'i thabs dang /_rnam gsum du sbyor ba'i thabs dang /_ro rnam bzhir sbyor ba'i
[\[390a.2\]]thabs dang /_ro rnam lnga la sogs par sbyor bar rig par bya'o/_/de la ro mngar po las rnam gnyis su sbyor ba yang rnam pa lnga ste/_mngar ba dang skyur bar sbyar/_mngar ba dang lan tshwa bro bar sbyar/_mngar ba dang kha bar sbyar/_mngar ba dang tsha bar sbyar/_mngar ba dang bska par sbyar te/_de ltar rnam pa lnga'o/_/skyur ba
[\[390a.3\]]sna gnyis su sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi ste/_skyur dang lan tshwar sbyar/_/skyur dang tsha bar sbyor/_skyur dang kha bar sbyor/_skyur dang ro bska bar sbyor te/_de ltar skyur dang sna gnyis su sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi'o/_/lan tshwa dang rnam gnyis su sbyor ba yang rnam gsum ste/_lan
[\[390a.4\]]tshwa dang ro tsha bar sbyar/_lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyor te/_/de ni sbyor ba sna gsum mo/_/ro tsha ba la sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis te/_tsha ba dang kha bar sbyor/_tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_'di ni sbyor ba sna gnyis so/_/kha ba las sbyor ba ni sna gcig ste/_kha ba dang bska bar sbyor ro/_/de ltar na
[\[390a.5\]]mngar gyi sna lnga dang /_skyur las sna bzhi/_lan tshwa sna gsum/_tsha ba'i sna gnyis/_kha ba'i sna gcig dang 'di rnams spyir bsdoms na/_ro sna bco lnga yod do/_/yang gsum pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ni/_mngar bas sbyor ba sna gsum pa sna bzhir bya ba ni/_mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa
[\[390a.6\]]dang sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang tsha bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang kha bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang ro bska bar sbyor te/_de ltar rnam gsum pa sna bzhi'o/_/yang mngar gyi rnam gsum pa sna gsum ni/_mngar dang lan tshwa dang tsha bar sbyor/_mngar dang lan tshwa dang kha bar
[\[390a.7\]]sbyor/_/mngar dang lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni mngar sna gsum pa'i sna gsum mo/_/yang mngar rnam gsum pa'i sna gnyis ni/_mngar dang tsha ba dang kha bar sbyor/_/mngar dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni mngar rnam gsum pa'i sna
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]gnyis so/_/yang mngar rnam gsum pa'i sna gcig ni mngar dang kha ba bska bar sbyor ba sna gcig pa'o/_/de ltar mngar rnam gsum pa'i sna bzhi pa dang /_sna gsum pa dang /_sna gnyis pa dang /_sna gcig pa ste bsdoms na sna bcu yod do/_/skyur las sbyar ba rnam drug ni
[\[390b.2\]]skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang tsha bar sbyor/_ro skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang kha bar sbyor/_ro skyur ba dang lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni skyur rnam gsum pa'i sna gsum mo/_/skyur rnam gsum gyi sna gnyis ni/_skyur ba dang tsha ba dang kha bar sbyor/_skyur ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar
[\[390b.3\]]sbyor ba 'di ni/_skyur gyi sna gnyis pa zhes bya'o/_/yang skyur ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyor ba 'di ni skyur gyi sna gcig pa'o/_/de ltar na skyur ba las sbyor ba sna gsum dang /_sna gnyis pa dang /_sna gcig pa ste bsdoms na sna drug yod do/_/lan tshwa dang sbyor ba sna gsum
[\[390b.4\]]pa zhes bya ba ni/_lan tshwa dang /_ro tsha ba dang kha bar sbyor/_lan tshwa dang ro tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni lan tshwa'i sbyor ba sna gnyis so/_/yang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyor ba ni lan tshwa'i sbyor ba sna gcig pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar sna gnyis pa dang /_sna gcig pa
[\[390b.5\]]bsdoms na/_lan tshwa'i sna gsum pa zhes bya'o/_/yang ro kha ba'i rnam gsum pa'i sna gcig pa ni/_ro kha ba dang tshwa ba dang bska ba ste/_'di ni ro kha ba'i sna gcig pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar na ro mngar ba'i rnam gsum pa nas ro kha ba'i rnam gsum pa'i sna grangs nyi shu yod do/_/
[\[390b.6\]]yang mngar rnam bzhi bar sbyar ba sna bcu zhes bya ba ni/_mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang tsha bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang kha bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang tsha ba dang tsha bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang kha dang bska bar
[\[390b.7\]]sbyor/_mngar dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang kha bar sbyor/_mngar dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_mngar ba dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_'di ni mngar rnam bzhi pa sna bcu zhes
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]bya'o/_/de la skyur gyi sbyor ba rnam bzhi pa ni/_skyur dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang kha bar sbyor/_skyur dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_skyur dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_skyur dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni skyur rnam bzhi pa'i sna
[\[391a.2\]]bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de la lan tsha'i sna gcig pa zhes bya ba ni/_lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni lan tshwa'i sna gcig pa'o/_/de ltar rnam bzhi pa'i sbyor ba ni sna bco lnga yod do/_/yang mngar rnam lnga pas sna lnga par sbyor ba ni mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa
[\[391a.3\]]dang tsha ba dang kha bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_mngar dang tsha ba dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska bar sbyor/_mngar dang skyur dang tsha ba dang lan tshwa dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni mngar las gzhi
[\[391a.4\]]blangs te rnam lngar sbyar ba lnga pa zhes bya'o/_/skyur las gzhi blangs pa rnam lnga'i sna gcig pa ni/_skyur dang lan tshwa dang kha ba dang bska bar sbyor te/_'di ni skyur gyi sna gcig pa'o/_/yang mngar las gzhi blangs la/_skyur dang lan tshwa dang tsha ba dang kha ba dang bska
[\[391a.5\]]ba dang lnga dang sbyar ba 'di ni lnga dang sbyar ba'i sna gcig pa zhes bya'o/_/ro rnam drug po mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa bro ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_kha ba dang /_bska ba dang /_'di rnam drug po so sor ma bsres pa ni ro rnam drug pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar ro rnam
[\[391a.6\]]lnga pa'i sna lnga dang /_skyur rnam lnga pa'i sna gcig ste drug po 'di ni sna lnga pa drug ces bya'o/_/ro rnam drug so sor ma 'dres pa ni ro sna drug go/_/mngar gyi rnam gnyis pa sna bco lnga dang /_mngar rnam bzhi pa spyir bco lnga dang /_rnam gsum pa sna nyi shu dang ro rnam drug gcig tu
[\[391a.7\]]bsres te sbyar ba sna gcig pa 'di rnams spyir gcig tu bsdoms na ro drug cu rtsa gsum yod do/_/yang ni rnam drug po de dag la so sor dbye zhing bgrang na/_rtsis kyang mi lang ste nad dmigs dang sman gnyis su sbyar zhing /_ro rnam drug po re re la yang ro'i rjes gzhan
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]du bro ba de lta bu las/_ro chen po dang /_'bring dang /_chung ngu rnam gsum du dbye zhing brtag par bya'o/_/ro rnam drug gi phan gnod bshad pa dang /ro bro ba'i sna grangs bshad pa'i le'u bcu pa rdzogs so//_//de nas yang rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la
[\[391b.2\]]sogs pa'i nad kyi tshul shes par bya ba bstan pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa bshad par bya'o/_/nad rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa dang gsum/_dngas ma dang /_khrag dang /_sha dang /_tshil dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_khu chu la sogs pa srog zungs bdun dang /_
[\[391b.3\]]dri ma bshang gci dang /_rdul dang rnam pa 'di bcu ni rtag par lus la gzhi rten byed pa yin no/_/de la yang ji lta zhe na/_mi'i lus kyi bskyod pa dang /_ldang ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rngub pa dang /_lus kyis las su byed pa dang /_shugs mgyogs
[\[391b.4\]]par 'gro ba dang /_khrag dang sha la sogs pa khams bdun po rnams legs par rgyu zhing 'gro ba dang /_mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams gsal bar gnas pa 'di rnams thams cad la phan zhing gnod par ma gyur pa de ni/_lus kyi gzhi rlung la brten pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[391b.5\]]yang kha zas zos pa 'ju ba dang /_lus kyi drod dang /_mthong bar byed pa dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_'ong bar byed pa dang /_bzhin mdog gsal ba 'od yod par snang ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_dpa' snying che ba dang /_lus sha 'jam pa 'di lta bu kun ni
[\[391b.6\]]mkhris pa ma gyur pa'i gzhis lus la phan par gyur pa yin no/_/mi'i lus sra zhing brtan pa dang /_lus snum pa dang /_rus pa'i rigs kyi cog re 'brel bar byed pa dang /_spro ring ba la sogs pa ni bad kan gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhis lus brtan pa yin no/_/de la srog
[\[391b.7\]]zungs bdun pos lus brtan pa'i las kyi tshul ni/_dang por kha zas zos na tshigs ma'i snyigs bye nas bcud dngas mar gyur pa des ni mi'i lus dang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams tshim par byed do/_/lus kyi shas ni lus la g.yogs par byed do/_/tshil
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]gyis ni lus snum par byed do/_/rus pa rnams ni lus mkhrang por brtan par byed do/_/rkang gis ni rus pa'i sbu gu thams cad 'gengs par byed do/_/khu chus ni mngal du bu skyed par byed do/_/de ltar srog zungs bdun po de rnams ni las kyi rim pa
[\[392a.2\]]bstan pa yin no/_/lus kyi dri ma rnam gsum la/_/bshang ba khong na yod pa ni lus brtan pa'i las byed do/_/gcin khong na yod pas ni zas khong du rul ba'i snyigs ma rnams phyir 'byin par byed do/_/lus kyi rdul gyis ni lus nyid kyis lus rul ba dri nga ba rnams 'byin
[\[392a.3\]]pa'i las byed do/_/de ltar rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa dang /_srog zungs bdun dang /_dri ma rnams mnyam zhing rang rang gi gnas nas ma gyur par tha mal bar 'dug pa'i tshe na ni lus la phan te/_lus kyi las de ltar blta'o/_/de la rlung dang bad kan dang /_mkhris pa la
[\[392a.4\]]sogs pa nad dmigs gsum rang gi gnas nas g.yos shing 'gyur na/_mi'i lus la gnod pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/ji lta zhe na/_rlung skyes na lus skem por 'gyur/_lus sha gnag//kha zas dro bag la dga'/_lus 'dar/_lto ba sbo/_bshang ba thur du sri zhing 'byung /_
[\[392a.5\]]stobs 'bri/_mig rtul/_rna ba mi gsang /_gnyid 'bri/_tshig dang smra ba mang bar 'gyur ro/_/mgo 'khor/_lus dmar zhing zhum bag tu 'gyur ba 'di lta bu ni/_rlung nad g.yos pa'i nad dmigs su blta'o/_/de la mkhris pa g.yos pa'i nad dmigs ni/_mig dang
[\[392a.6\]]pags pa'i sha mdog dang /_bshang gci rnams ser por 'gyur/_skom dad che/_lus tsha/_gnyid chung ba 'di lta bu ni mkhris pa'i nad yin no/_/de la bad kan gyi nad ni khong pa'i drod nyams/_/bad kan dang mchil ma mang /_khong snyom/_lus lci/_lus kyi sha
[\[392a.7\]]mdog dkar por 'gyur/_lus lci la lus sha sla zhing khong lhod/_dbugs mi bde/_lud pa lu/_gnyid rab tu che ba 'di lta bu ni bad kan las nad du gyur par blta'o/_/de la srog zungs bdun po la kha zas zos pa'i bcud dngas ma khong na shas che ba las nad du gyur
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]pa'i dmigs ni/_bad kan las nad du gyur pa bshad pa dang 'dra bar blta'o/_/de la khrag lud pa las nad du blta ba ni 'brum chen dang /_mcher pa'i nad dang /_'bras nad dang /_mdze nad dang /_rlung dang /_khrag las gyur pa'i dreg dang /_mkhris pa dang /_skran
[\[392b.2\]]dang /_mig ser dang /_lus kyi yan lag 'degs mi nus shing lhung ste las byed pa'i tshe bskyod mi nus pa dang /_khong pa'i me'i drod nyams pa dang /_snying mi dran par myo myo por byed pa dang /_mig khrag gis rgyas te dmar/_gcin yang dmar po khrag 'dra bar 'byung ba 'di lta
[\[392b.3\]]bu ni khrag las nad du gyur pa'o/_/de la lus kyi sha las nad du gyur pa ni lus sha lhag par che ba dang /_lus la sba ba dang /_rmen bu 'byung /_sha'i mdud pa rma dang /_btsan 'dra bar 'byung /_mkhur tshos lhag par che/_brla dang lto'i sha che/_mgul ba la sogs pa'i
[\[392b.4\]]sha yang lhag par che ste/_mjing pa sbom pa 'di lta bu ni sha lhag par ches pa las nad du gyur par blta'o/_/de la tshil ha cang ches pa las nad du gyur pa'i dmigs ni/_sha ches pa'i nad dang 'dra ste/_de la lhag par cung zad phan tshun bskyod na yang /_dbugs kyi
[\[392b.5\]]rngam pa drag tu 'byung /_rku ba tshos dang nu ma dang gsus pa rnams 'phyang bar gyur pa 'di lta bu ni tshil ches pa'i nad las gyur par blta'o/_/rus pa rags pa'i mi ni rus pa lhag par sbom zhing rags te lhag par cho ga yin no/_/lus la rkang che ba ni mig phan tshun lta ba la
[\[392b.6\]]mig rtsa g.yung zhing lci/_lus dang rkang lag lci/_rus pa'i tshigs kyi mgo rnams sbom/_rus pa'i tshigs kyi tshigs su thor bu chen po gso dka' ba 'byung ba 'di lta bu ni rkang che ba'i nad yin no/_/khu chu mang ba'i mi ni bud med la rab tu gdu/_khu chu nyid la rde'u chags
[\[392b.7\]]pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/bshang ba lhag par na zhing che ba'i nad ni khong sbo/_lto ba'i nang rgyu 'khrul lus lci/_lto ba'i nang na ba 'di lta bu yin no/_/gcin mang ba'i mi ni chu sor zug cing na/_gcin gcis kyang ma gcis pa ltar gcin snyoms par byed do/_/rdul lhag
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]par che ba'i mi ni/_lus kyi rdul rtag par 'byung /_lus kyi dri mi zhim lus la g.yan pa 'byung ba de lta bu'i nad du blta'o/_/gzhan yang phal cher lus kyi dri ma las mig gi rdu ma la sogs pa chags na mig g.yas g.yon lci zhing mi bde bar
[\[393a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa skyes pa las nad du gyur pa'i dmigs ni de ltar bshad pa yin no/_/'o na rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa zad na dmigs ci dang cir 'gyur zhe na/_rlung cung zad skyes te zang na ni lus kyi yan
[\[393a.3\]]lag mi bde/_tshig gcom chung bar smra ba dang /_sems rmongs bag can du gyur pa de'i tshe bad kan yang cher skyes te/_zhib tu ni gong du rlung las nad du gyur pa de las bzlog nas blta bar bya'o/_/yang mkhris pa chung ngu bri ste zad na khong pa'i nang gi drod bri zhing nyams/_
[\[393a.4\]]bzhin gyi mdog dang mdangs kyang nyams te bzhin mdog mi sdug par 'gyur ro/_/yang bad kan bri ste nyams pa las nad du gyur pa'i dmigs ni/_mgo 'khor/_nu 'jing yan chad klad pa man chad kyi bar de dag bad kan gyi gnas yin te/_bad kan 'jam zhing snum zad pas
[\[393a.5\]]bad kan gyis stongs par 'gyur te/_khong rtsub/_snying na/_lus kyi tshigs dang yan lag gi tshigs rnams lhod de 'khrul zhing 'gyur ro/_/khong na zas kyi bcud dngas ma zad na lus khong rtsub/_lus dang drag shul chen po byas na lus khong pa nang gi glo snying la sogs pa
[\[393a.6\]]kun skam/_lus spyir na zhing mi bde/_skad che zhing drag par smra mi nus so/_/skad drag po smra ba mi bzod/_khrag zad pa'i nad dmigs ni zas skyur bag dang /_bsil la sred/_rtsa kun lhod/_lus kyi khong rtsub po/_/lus kyi sha zad pa'i nad dmigs ni/_mkhur tshos
[\[393a.7\]]bri/_mig phug tu bros/_rkang lag gi lhu tshigs kun na'o/_/tshil zad pa'i nad dmigs ni gnyid che/_dbyi dang rked pa'i rus pa sbom bar snang /_mcher pa che bar 'gyur/_lus sha skem por 'gyur ro/_/so dang skra dang sen mo la sogs pa 'byung zhing 'byi/_rkang 'bri
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]zhing zad pa'i nad dmigs ni rkang zad pas/_rkang gi sbu gu'i nang stong /_mgo 'khor/_mig rab rib za'o/_/khu chu zad pa ni bud med dang nyal ba na/_khu ba yun ring du lon nas 'byung ba'am/_yang na khu ba khrag nyid du 'byung /_rlig pa'i 'bras bu gnyis rab tu zug
[\[393b.2\]]cing na/_pho mtshan tshig pa snyam du tsha zhing mi bde'o/_/bshang ba bri zhing zad pa ni/_rgyu ma'i nang kun du rlung sgra can du 'khrul zhing rgyu ba ni/_rgyu ma'i nang du 'khyil zhing 'khor ba snyam byed do/_/lto ba'i nang na phan tshun rlung rgyu la/_rlung de gyen du rgyu zhing song na/_snying ga dang rtsib
[\[393b.3\]]logs su rab tu na zhing zug go/_/gcin bri zhing zad pa'i nad thabs ni gcin zad na gcin 'byung ba dka'/_gcin gyi mdog 'gyur te skya ba'am/_rtsa dmar ba'am/_khrag can nyid du 'byung ba'am/_khrag dang 'dren mar 'byung ba yin no/_/rdul zad pa'i nad
[\[393b.4\]]dmigs ni spu 'byi/_spu kun langs shing 'greng bar 'gyur/_pags pa gas/_bshang gci dang /_rdul dang /_dri ma 'di gsum ni phra bas na brtag dka' ste/_nad glo gcong lta bu zad byed skams pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i tshe/_gdod bshang gci dang rdul zad par
[\[393b.5\]]gyur par shes so/_/dri ma bshang gci rdul la sogs pa rang rang gi gnas na zad de skams pa dang /_zug cing na la rang gi gnas na dri med cing stong pas yang bar 'dug pa 'di lta bu'i tshe ni/_glo gcong la sogs pa'i nad kyi rang bzhin yin par shes par bya'o/_/rlung dang bad
[\[393b.6\]]kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa so so rang rang gi nad dmigs skyes pa dang /_nad de byang ste zad par gyur pa sman pas shes par gyis shig_/de yang mi'i lus la rlung nad lta bu grang zhing rtsub pa med de bde ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa 'dug pa las/_rlung nad du gyur te khong grang zhing
[\[393b.7\]]rtsub pas na ba med pa'i yon tan de nyams shing zad pa'i tshe na rlung nad skyes pa yin no/_/rlung nad khong grang zhing rtsub pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ste/_khong pa drod 'babs la/_lus kyi khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur pa na bde ba'i yon tan skyes pa zhes bya ba ste/_'di gnyis kyi tshul phan
[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]tshun du bzlog ste blta'o/_/yang lus kyi dri ma thur du 'byung ba bshang gci gnyis ran par 'ong ba ni lus la phan no/_/bshang gci gnyis ha cang brtsal ba drags te dper na sman gyis bkrus sam/_tshad pas drag tu 'khru ste nang gi dri ma zad cing stong
[\[394a.2\]]par gyur na/_lus kyi nyams mthu zad de gnod/_lus 'di ni dri ma bshang gcis khong brtan te 'dug pa yin/_lus de'i khong pa nang dri ma rnams kyis brtan te 'dug pa de la/_dri ma kun phyir phyung ste stong par zad par byas na gnod do/_/de'i phyir dri ma khong brtan zhing 'dug
[\[394a.3\]]pa gnod ces bya'o/_/yang rus pa la rlung gnas shing zhen pa lta bu la rus pa la phan pa'i sman byas na/_rus pa la yang phan la rlung nad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rus pa la gnod pa'i sman zos na yang rlung de bzhin skye'o/_/yang na mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang rdul gsum tshul
[\[394a.4\]]gcig ste/_mkhris pa skye ba'i sman byas na khrag nad zhi ba'am/_khrag nad skye ba'am/_rdul byung ba'am/_rdul zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du bad kan byang ba'i sman btang na/_bcud dngas ma dang /_tshil dang /_sha dang /_rkang dang /_khu ba rnams kyang stongs te zad par byed/_
[\[394a.5\]]bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i sman dang kha zas zos na khams 'di lnga yang skye zhing brta'o/_/de bas na rus pa dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang khrag dang bad kan dang bcud sha chil 'di rnams kun phan tshun gcig la gcig brten pa yin no/_/de lta bas na 'di gsum gang yang
[\[394a.6\]]rung ba gcig la phan pa'i zas dang /_sman btang na de la brten nas gzhan la yang phan pa yin no/_/gcig la gnod pa'i zas dang sman btang na/_de la brten pa rnams la yang gnod par 'gyur ba yin yang de la rlung rus pa la gnas shing brten pa lta bur gyur te/_de'i
[\[394a.7\]]dpyad rlung skye bar 'gyur ba'i rtsi sman btang na/_rus pa la gnod kyi de lta bu ni mi rung ngo /_/lus la phan pa'i bad kan dang 'phrod pa kha zas snum zhing bsod pa'i sman byin na/_de lta bu ni phal cher lus brtan te lus la phan no/_/de la yang zas kyi cho ga bzlog ste rlung skye bar
[\[394b\]]
[\[394b.1\]]'gyur ba'i kha zas grang zhing rtsub pa lta bu zos na/_rlung skyes la khong 'jam zhing snum bag zad pas lus la gnod cing nyams par byed de/_de bas na gcig la gnod la phan par 'gyur ba'i dpyad de lta bu ni mi rung ste/_nad gnyis kar mi 'gyur ba'i sman dpyad bya'o/_/
[\[394b.2\]]de la lus ha cang brtas shing bde ba las drags te/_bad kan nam ma zhu ba la sogs par gyur pa lta bu la zas 'bri zhing 'ju sman gyis nad bsal du rung bar smin par bya ba dang /_lus la nad kyis nyams smad de nyams 'tshag zad pa lta bu la brta bar bya ste/_nad rnam pa
[\[394b.3\]]'di gnyis lta bur gyur pa la/_thabs 'di 'dra ba 'di'i dpyad myur du bya'o/_/de la rlung nad kyi bag yod pa lta bu la ni zas smyung zhing dbri ba'am/_smyung bar bya ba 'di mi rung ste ma gtogs so/_/'di lta bu'i bag ma yin pa gzhi mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang rlung las gyur
[\[394b.4\]]pa'i nad kyi tshul ci 'dra ba las/_de'i dpyad bsgyur zhing bzlog thabs kyi bya bar sbyor cig_/yang dmigs kyis phan par bya ba'i dpyad ni/_khrag rgyas pas nad du gyur pa la ni/_gtar ga btab ste khrag dbyung ba dang bkru sman btang na phan no/_/sha ha cang cher skyes pa las
[\[394b.5\]]nad du gyur pa ni gtar ga dang thal sman rnon po dang /_me btsa' btab na phan no/_/tshil ha cang ches te tshon por gyur pa lta bu la/_mi sbom po las skem por bya ba'i dpyad dang /_rus pa zad nas rus pa phra mor gyur pa ni 'o ma btang ba dang /_sman kha bo dang sbyar ba'i zhun
[\[394b.6\]]mar dang /_nyams brta ba'i sman mas gtang bar bya'o/_/lto na bshang ba'i dri ma cher yod pa'i nad la ni rab tu 'khru bar bya ba'i dpyad do/_/khong na bshang ba zad de med pa'i nad la ni/_ra 'am lug gi sha'i nang khrol las g.yos su bya ba dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_
[\[394b.7\]]til dang sbyar ba'i thug pa dang /_rtsang phye dang /_nas dang mon sran gre'u las g.yos su byas pa 'di lta bu byin na khong pa nang gi bshang ba skye zhing mang du 'gyur te phan no/_/gcin mang ches na ni gcin 'bri zhing gso ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/gcin zad cing med na ni gcin snyi zhing
[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]]mang ba'i dpyad bya'o/_/rdul mi 'byung zhing zad pa'i nad la ni lus gsig cing bskyod de rdul dbyung bar bya ba dang /_lus la mar gyis bsku ba dang /_lus byibs shing dugs bya ba dang chang btung bar bya'o/_/yang lus kyi srog zungs bdun po kun
[\[395a.2\]]la lus kyi me'i drod rang rang gi gnas na ran par 'dug pa de lta bu me'i drod snyoms pa ni/_lus kyi srog zungs la bde zhing brta ste phan pa yin no/_/de las lus kyi me'i drod ha cang 'bar ches te che bar gyur na/_lus kyi srog zungs thams cad tshig cing zad par byed de gnod do/_/de
[\[395a.3\]]la dang por zas kyi bcud dngas ma rgyas shing rtag na/_de bzhin srog zungs bdun po gcig nas gcig tu legs par brtas te bde ba yin no/_/de bzhin du dang por zas kyi bcud dngas ma nyams te/_gnod par gyur na srog zungs bdun po gcig nas gcig tu gnod cing
[\[395a.4\]]zad par byed do/_/de lta bas na zas kyi bcud dngas mar gyur te nyams pa des ni/_rlung las mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad gang yang rung ste slong bar byed do/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad g.yos pas srog zungs bdun po rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/srog
[\[395a.5\]]zungs bdun po mi bde ba las bshang gci dri ma rnams gnyis la sogs pa la gnod pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi dri ma'i gnod pa'i nad du 'gyur ro/_/lus kyi dri ma'i nad kyang thur du 'byung ba'i dri ma rnam gnyis kyang mgo la/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mig dang /_kha nas 'byung
[\[395a.6\]]ba'i dri ma gtogs par bdun te 'di dgu dang lus las rdul 'byung ba rnams dri ma so so rang rang gi gnas nas 'byung ba de dag la nad du 'gyur ro/_/de la srog zungs bdun po khu chu la sogs pa yan chad kyi nang na zas zos pa las nang na bcud dngas mar gyur pa de ni de la srog
[\[395a.7\]]zungs bdun po rnams kyi nang na mchog yin no/_/mdangs zhes bya ba snying gi nang na chu'i thigs pa ltar dngas shing gsal bar 'dug mod kyi lus la khyab pa dang /_lus la brtan par gnas pa ni de yin no/_/de ji lta zhe na/_mdangs zhes bya ba snying gi nang na yod pa'i thigs
[\[395b\]]
[\[395b.1\]]pa de zhig ste nges par 'chi'o/_/mdangs de snying gi nang na ni mi yang mi 'chi ste/_mdangs kyi srog zungs brtan na sems can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lus kyang gnas par 'grub bo/_/mdangs de zad cing med par 'gyur ba ni sems bkres pa dang sems la mya ngan dang /_
[\[395b.2\]]dub cing ngal bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa las mdangs de zad cing med par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i mdangs de khong na med de zad par mngon pa'i rtags ni sngon pas snying chang ste/_cis kyang 'jigs shing sdang /_lus rad/_sems zags te yang dang yang sems par byed/_mig
[\[395b.3\]]dang rna ba la sogs pa'i dbang po nyams/_bzhin mdog nyams te bseng bseng po 'od 'od por 'dug_/lus kyi khong rtsub cing khong snyom/_rmya bag tu 'dug la/_snying mi dga' na mdangs zad de med pa yin no/_/'di lta bur gyur pa la gso pa'i thabs ni/_sman dang kha
[\[395b.4\]]zas 'o ma dang bcud la sogs pa btang ngo /_/yang nad dmigs dang sbyar te zas byin pa las/_phan pa'i zas de mi 'dod cing kha zas mi 'phrod pa gzhan 'dod cing slong na/_sman pas de la nad dang zas su mi 'phrod pa ni ma sbyin cig_/nad la zas phan zhing mi 'phrod pa med na ni
[\[395b.5\]]'dod pa byin cig_/yang na nad pa'o cog gi nad dang mi 'phrod pa'i zas lta bu yi gar 'ong zhing phyin ci log tu byed pa yang yod/_la la ni nad la phan pa'i zas 'dod cing /_yi gar 'ong ba mthun pa yang yod de/_de lta bu nad dang kha zas 'phrod dam mi 'phrod/_nad kyi tshul dang
[\[395b.6\]]'phrod dam mi 'phrod pa rtags la kha zas sbyin no/_/yang na mi mkhas mi shis pa kun/_lus la phan zhing brta bar 'gyur ba dang /_nad pas lus la gnod cing zad par byed pa'i dmigs mi rtog mi sems te/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan lta bu'i so so'i nad dkyel skyes nas
[\[395b.7\]]nad kyi mthur gyur na lus la nad kyis rgyas nas lus bde ba'i nyams 'tshag ni bri zhing zad/_nad kyi dkyel ni zhugs pa yin no/_/yang rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad du gyur pa yang med la/_'di gsum nad 'phrod cing snyoms par gyur na/_gsum po rang rang gi
[\[396a\]]
[\[396a.1\]]las nyi tshe byed par zad de/_de bas na rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan 'phrod cing snyoms pa nad med cing lus la phan te bde ba dang /_lus kyi nyams 'tshag brtas par byed pa yin no/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum ma 'phrod cing ma
[\[396a.2\]]snyoms pa'i nad dmigs te gsod par byed pa yin no/_/de lta bas na lus la phan par bya ba'i phyir/_lus la nad kyi gnod pas zad par mi 'gyur ba dang /_phan zhing bde ba lus rtag par 'gyur ba'i cho ga rim gro bya zhing lus bsrung bar bya zhing /_rlung dang mkhris
[\[396a.3\]]pa dang bad kan nang mi 'phrod pa las lus la gnod cing zad par 'gyur ba'i nad dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan nang 'phrod cing snyoms na lus la bde zhing phan no/_/nad med par 'gyur ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so//_//lus
[\[396a.4\]]la bad kan dang mkhris pa dang rlung gang dang gang na gnas pa dang /_rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa las sa'i nad dmigs cir 'gyur ba'i le'u bcu gnyis bshad par bya'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum lus la ji ltar gnas she na/_kha zas zhu ba'i gnas
[\[396a.5\]]long ka dang /_rgyu ma dang /_rked pa dang /_dpyi dang /_brla dang /_rna ba dang /_lus kyi rus pa'o cog dang /_lus kyi dbang po rig pa zhes bya ba 'di dag ni rlung gi gnas yin te/_de rnams kyi nang na yang dmigs kyis rlung gi gnas ni zhu ba'i sa ste/_rgyu zhabs na
[\[396a.6\]]rlung cher gnas so/_/mkhris pa ni zas ma zhu ba'i gnas zhes bya ba lte ba'i thad ka na yod pa pho ba dang rdul dang mthang gi chu ser dang /_khrag dang zas kyi bcud dngas ma dang /_mig dang lus kyi dbang po reg pa dang /_'di rnams kun la mkhris pa gnas so/_/de rnams kyi nang
[\[396a.7\]]na yang dmigs kyis lhag par mkhris pa ni lte ba'i thad ka na gnas so/_/bad kan ni brang dang mgul pa dang /_mgo bo dang /_glo ba dang /_rus pa'i tshigs kun dang /_ma zhu ba'i gnas pho ba'i nang dang /_zas kyi bcud dngas ma dang /_tshil dang /_snabs dang /_lce dang
[\[396b\]]
[\[396b.1\]]'di rnams la bad kan gnas so/_/'di rnams kyi nang na yang bad kan ni lhag par brang dang nam tshod na rtag par gnas so/_/yang de la rlung gi rang bzhin rnam pa lnga ste/_de la srog ces bya ba'i rlung dang /_stod du rgyu ba'i rlung dang /_khyab byed kyi rlung dang /_me dang mnyam du gnas
[\[396b.2\]]pa'i rlung dang /_thur du sel ba'i rlung dang lnga'o/_/rlung 'di lnga la yang gnas dang /_yul dang /_las dang /_rnam pa gsum gsum du shes par bya ste/_de la srog ces bya ba'i rlung gi gnas ni spyi bo na 'dug go/_/rlung de'i yul ni brang dang nam tshong dang gre ba yan man rgyu zhing
[\[396b.3\]]'gro'o/_/las ni glo ba dang /_snying dang /_dbang po dang /_sems rnams brtan pa dang /_mchil ma 'dor ba dang /_sbrid pa 'byung bar byed pa dang /_'bad cing sgrim par gtong ba dang /_kha zas mid pa'i las byed do/_/de la stod du rgyu ba'i rlung zhes bya ba'i gnas ni/_brang dang
[\[396b.4\]]nam tshong na 'dug go de'i yul ni sna dang /_lce dang /_gre ba yan man du rgyu'o/_/de'i las ni tshig tu smra ba 'byung bar byed pa dang /_'bad cing sgrim par byed pa dang /_mdangs bzang ba dang /_stobs yod pa dang /_bzhin mdog dang ldan pa dang /_dran par bya ba'i
[\[396b.5\]]las byed do/_/de la rlung khyab byed ces bya ba'i gnas ni snying la brten cing 'dug go/_/de'i yul ni lus thams cad la khyab par byed cing 'jug go/_/de'i las ni gang rab tu mgyogs pa dang /_phan tshun 'gro bar byed pa dang /_len cing 'degs pa dang /_'jog cing 'dor ba dang /_mig
[\[396b.6\]]'byed pa dang /_'dzums pa la sogs pa'i las byed do/_/yang na lus kyi las su bya ba thams cad ni rlung 'di la phal cher rag lus so/_/de la me dang mnyam du gnas pa'i rlung gi gnas ni pho ba'i me'i drod dang lhan cig gnas so/_/de'i yul ni khong pa'i nang khrol thams cad
[\[396b.7\]]kyi nang na 'gro zhing rgyu'o/_/las ni kha zas nang du len cing zhu bar byed/_dngas snyigs phye ste 'dor bar byed do/_/de la thur du sel ba'i rlung gi gnas ni gzhang gi nang na 'dug go/_/de'i yul ni 'dong mo'i nang na lgang pa dang /_pho mtshan dang /_brla'i nang phan tshun rgyu zhing 'gro'o
[\[397a\]]
[\[397a.1\]]las ni khu chu dang /_zla mtshan 'byung ba dang /_mngal nas byis pa 'byung bar byed pa dang /_bshang gci thur du sel ba'i las byed do/_/yang mkhris pa'i rang bzhin yang rnam pa lnga ste/_'ju byed dang /_dmar sgyur dang /_sgrub byed dang /_mthong
[\[397a.2\]]byed dang /_mdog gsal dang 'di lnga'o/_/'di la mkhris pa 'ju byed ces bya ba ni gnas dang /_gzhan gyi grogs byed cing yul rgyu ba dang /_las byed pa dang rnam pa gsum du blta'o/_/de la yang ji lta zhe na/_mkhris pa yang 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin yin mod kyi/_
[\[397a.3\]]'on kyang de ni me'i yon tan dang lhag par ldan la/_gsher zhing sla ba lta bu'i rang bzhin ma yin te/_zas chos shing zhu bar byed pa'i las byed pas na/_mkhris pa de ni me yin par bshad do/_/mkhris pa de'i gnas ni zas zhu ba gnyis kyi bar na 'dug go/_/de'i las ni
[\[397a.4\]]kha zas tshas shing zhu bar byas te nyams mthu dang ldan par byed/_/zas kyi snying khu'i bcud dang /_tshigs ma bshang gci la sogs pa de dag so sor byed do/_/mkhris pa de zhu ma zhu'i bar na 'dug nas/_mkhris pa lhag ma gzhan dag gi grogs byed cing stod la/_phan 'dogs
[\[397a.5\]]pa de ni yul rgyu zhing phan 'dogs pa yin no/_/dmar sgyur zhes bya ba'i gnas dang /_las rnam pa gnyis su blta ste/_gnas ni ma zhu ba'i san 'dug go/_/las ni zas kyi bcud dngas ma pho bar 'ong ba de mtshon dmar por sgyur ba bzhin dmar por 'gyur bar byed do/_/
[\[397a.6\]]mkhris pa sgrub byed ces bya ba'i gnas ni snying la brten cing gnas so/_/de'i las ni sems dpa'i blo dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_snyems pa'i nga rgyal du sems pa la sogs pas snying la bsams pa'i don mkhris pa de yod dam sgrub pa'i grogs don sgrub ces bya'o/_/mkhris
[\[397a.7\]]pa mthong byed ces bya ba'i gnas ni mig la brten no/_/de'i las ni gzugs rnams mthong bar byed pa yin no/_/mkhris pa mdog gsal byed ces bya ba'i gnas ni mi'i pags pa la brten te gnas so/_/las ni pags pa'i mdog 'jam zhing bzang la mdog gsal bar byed
[\[397b\]]
[\[397b.1\]]do/_/bad kan yang rnam pa lnga ste/_bad kan rten byed dang /_myags byed dang /_myong byed dang /_brtas byed dang /_'byor byed dang lnga'o/_/de la bad kan rten byed kyi gnas ni brang la brten to/_/bad kan de'i phan 'dogs pa'i yul ni/_bad kan de'i stobs kyang rked
[\[397b.2\]]pa la phan par byed do/_/bad kan de'i las ni kha zas zos pa'i mthu dang /_bad kan snying la brten pa chu'i rang bzhin bsil ba des/_snying la sang zhes byed pa des phan par byed do/_/bad kan de la bad kan phal kun kyang brten cing gnas pas na/_de'i phyir bad kan de ni
[\[397b.3\]]rten byed ces bya'o/_/bad kan myags byed kyi gnas ni zas ma zhu ba'i pho ba la brten to/_/de'i las ni zas mang po zos pa kun/_bad kan des bzhu nas 'dag 'dag por myags par byed do/_/bad kan myong byed ces bya ba ni lce la gnas te/_bad kan de lce la 'dug pas
[\[397b.4\]]zas kyi ro ci bro ba des myong bar byed do/_/bad kan brtas byed ces bya ba ni mi'i mgo bo la gnas te/_bad kan de yod pas/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams bad kan des brtas te/_dbang po tshim zhing mthu dang ldan par byed do/_/bad kan
[\[397b.5\]]'byor byed ces bya ba ni rus pa'i tshigs na gnas so/_/de'i las ni rus pa'i tshigs bog re rnams 'brel cing 'byor bar byed pas na 'byor byed ces bya'o/_/de ltar rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams kyis lus khyab par gnas mod kyi/_'on kyang 'di gsum so so'i
[\[397b.6\]]gnas na 'dug cing /_de gsum nad can du ma gyur na/_so so'i las rnams byed cing phan 'dogs par blta'o/_/de la nad dmigs rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gang las 'di gsum gyi nad dkyil du stsogs pa dang /_kha zas gang ma 'phrod de nad dkyil du
[\[397b.7\]]zhugs pa slong zhing ldang ba dang /_zas dang sman gyi cho ga ji lta bus de gsum gyi nad gso zhing zhi bar bya ba'i rim pa bstan pa/_de la kha zas yang ba rtsub cing snum pa bag med pa la sogs pa dron po chen po dang lhan cig tu za ba'i rlung nad du 'gyur ba'i dkyel stsogs pa yin no/_/
[\[398a\]]
[\[398a.1\]]rlung nad kyi dkyil du zhugs par bstsags pa de la kha zas bsil bgrang mo dang ma 'phrod nas rlung nad langs te na par byed do/_/rlung nad de lta bur gyur pa la kha zas snum bag la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dro tsha bar byed pa ni rlung nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[398a.2\]]kha zas ro tsha ba la sogs pa bsil bag dang lhan cig zos pa ni/_mkhris pa'i nad dkyil du stsogs so/_/kha zas dron po chen po dang /_ro tsha ba'i bag zos pas ni mkhris pa'i dkyil zhugs te stsogs shing 'dug pa de/_zas ma 'phrod nas mkhris pa'i nad de ldang zhing na bar byed
[\[398a.3\]]do/_/de la ro legs par bro ba ma yin pa dang /_mngar bag dang /_kha ba dang /_zas bsil bag tu sbyar bas ni mkhris pa'i nad de zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/kha zas snum bag la sogs pa grang mo bsil bag tu zos pas ni bad kan dkyel du stsogs par 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyi nad
[\[398a.4\]]dkyil du zhugs pa de lta bu la kha zas dron po'i bag zas na bad kan gyi nad langs nas na bar byed do/_/bad kan gyi nad de lta bu la kha zas snum med pa rtsub pa la sogs pas nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyi nad dkyel stsogs pa dang /_de gsum
[\[398a.5\]]gyi nad dkyil bsags pa las nad langs pa gnyis kyi khyad par ci 'dra zhe na/_rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum po rang gi gnas na dkyil du stsogs la/_dper rlung nad la sogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu kha zas rtsub po dron po lta bu mi 'dod pa dang /_zas snum yod pa'i bag
[\[398a.6\]]rlung dang mi mthun pa de lta bu la phyin phyogs su 'dod par byed pa de lta bu ni nad rang rang gi gnas na 'dug cing dkyel du bsags pa zhes bya'o/_/nad langs pa zhes bya ba ni nad dkyel du zhugs pa 'di gsum gang yang rung ba'i nad dkyel ni nad langs na rang gi gnas nas
[\[398a.7\]]log par song ba de ni so so rang gi nad kyis thebs pa ni/_nad kyis btab pa'i rtags yin zhes bya'o/_/de la rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyi nad dus gang gi tshe na nad dkyel stsogs nam nad ldang /_ji tsam na nad zhi zhe na/_bshad pa so ga'i dbyar zla ra ba dang /_
[\[398b\]]
[\[398b.1\]]dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo la rlung nad dkyel du stsogs so/_/dbyar ngo dbyar zla tha chungs dang /_ston zla ra ba'i tshe ni rlung nad langs te na'o/_/ston ngo ston zla 'bring po dang /_ston zla tha chungs kyi tshe ni rlung nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyar zla tha chungs dang ston zla ra ba'i tshe ni mkhris pa'i nad
[\[398b.2\]]dkyil du stsogs so/_/ston zla 'bring po dang tha chungs kyi ngo la mkhris pa'i nad langs te na bar 'gyur ro/_/dgun zla ra ba dang dgun zla 'bring po'i ngo la mkhris pa'i nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dgun zla ra ba dang dpyid zla ra ba dang bzhi'i bar du dgun stod dang dgun smad 'dra ste
[\[398b.3\]]bad kan stsogs so/_/dpyid zla 'bring po dang dpyid zla tha chungs la bad kan gyi nad ldang ngo /_/dbyar zla ra ba dang dbyar zla 'bring po la bad kan gyi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de la zas yang zhing rtsub pa dang /_sman kyang yang zhing rtsub pa lta bus rlung stsogs so/_/de la lus kyang khong rtsub cing dro/_
[\[398b.4\]]kha zas kyang rtsub pa dron bag tu zos kyang dbyar zla ra ba dang dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshe dro zhing tsha ba'i dus yin pas rlung mi ldang ngo /_/dbyar zla tha chungs dang ston zla ra ba'i ngo lta bu la char chu rgyas la zas skyur bag de zhu ba'i rjes kyang skyur bar 'gyur/_/sman skyur bag zos kyang rung ste de'i
[\[398b.5\]]mkhris par stsogs ta/_dbyar grang zhing bsil ba'i dus la bab pas mkhris pa'i nad ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dgun stod dang dgun smad gyi zas snum bag bsil ba dang /_chu dang sman bsil bag zos pas ni bad kan dgun thog thag tu sogs te/_de'i tshe dgun gyi dus grang ba
[\[398b.6\]]dang /_kha zas snum po grang bag zos kyang rung /_/des na lus kyang grang la phyogs su 'khrigs pa'i dus la bab pas bad kan stsogs par zad kyi bad kan gyi nad ldang zhing na bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dus tshigs drug gi rang bzhin las rlung nad dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum gyi
[\[398b.7\]]nad stsogs pa dang ldang ba rim par phye ste bstan pa yin no/_/rlung la sogs pa'i nad bsags pa de yang kha zas kyi gnod pa mi 'phrod pa'i bag zos na nad ldang ba'i dus la ma bab kyang rung ste 'phral gyi nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/rlung la sogs pa dkyel du gyur pa yang bsags
[\[399a\]]
[\[399a.1\]]la/_nad ldang ba'i dus la bab tu zin kyang nad du mi 'gyur ba'i zas zos na nad mi ldang ngo /_/gong ma lta bur rlung la sogs pa nad dkyel du bsags pa de las nad langs te nad kyis btab pa ni/_cig car lus kyi mgo rkang kun tu khyab par nad kyis
[\[399a.2\]]'debs par byed do/_/nad de lta bu la thigs te sos par 'gyur ba ni/_chu 'brub pa las khad kyis bri ste skams pa dang 'dra'o/_/de bas na nad kyi tshul rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pas/_lus 'di klong dkrugs nas skams pa 'di la nad kyi tshul ci 'dra ba dang /_nad
[\[399a.3\]]phyin pa'i rgyu rtsi sman dang /_gso ba'i thabs su sbyar zhing bya'o/_/de yang nad tshul du ma re re nas bstan mi nus te de ni 'dor cog thabs kyi nad dmigs ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan du 'dus so/_/dper nyin thog thag bya nam mkha' la 'phur te 'gro ste/_rang gi lus kyi
[\[399a.4\]]grib ma dang 'bral du mi rung ba bzhin no/_/sems can no cog nad rnam pa gsum po chags pa dang rdul dang /_mun pa dang gsum du ldan pa las gyur pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs dang mi 'bral ba de ltar rang gi srog zungs bdun nang ma snyoms te nad du 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang chags pa dang
[\[399a.5\]]rdul dang mun pa dang gsum gyis 'gyur bas/_rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum nang ma 'phrod pa des srog zungs bdun po ma snyoms te 'khrugs na nad du 'gyur ro/_/nad du 'gyur ba de dag gi rgyu yang mdor rnam pa gsum ste/_yul dang dus dang
[\[399a.6\]]las ngan par byed pa dang gsum mo/_/'di gsum po re re la yang chung ngu brten pa dang /_rab tu brten pa dang /_log par brten pa dang gsum du dbye'o/_/'di gsum po re re la yang chung ngu dang /_'bring po dang chen po gsum du phye na dgu dgur ro/_/de ji lta zhe na/_mig gi dbang po'i yul ni
[\[399a.7\]]gzugs snang ba yin te/_yul de la gang bltar yang rung ste/_rang gi yul la mi lta ba'am/_yang na zhib tu legs par mi lta bar cung zad tsam mam/_'ol ji tsam zhig lta ba de lta bu ni/_gzugs mig gis lta ba chung bar sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzugs la mig
[\[399b\]]
[\[399b.1\]]gis ha cang yun ring du lta na de ni rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya ste/_de lta bu yang nad du 'gyur te mi rung ngo /_/yang gzugs chung ches pa la lta'am/_nyi ma lta bu'i lhang lhang po'i 'tsher ches pa la mig tshugs su lta ba'am/_gzugs 'jigs pa la lta'am/_mig gi drung nyid du/_
[\[399b.2\]]gzugs bzhag pa la lta'am/_yang na gzugs ha cang thag ring ches pa la rgyang mar mig tshugs su lta ba'am/_gzugs yid du 'ong ba la lta'am/_gzugs mi sdug pa la mig gis lta ba de lta bu log par lta ba'i rten pa zhes bya ste/_de lta bu yang nad du 'gyur te mi rung ngo /_/
[\[399b.3\]]de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i yul sgra la sogs pa la yang rnam pa gsum gsum du blta ste/_rna ba'i yul sgra chen po drag po la nyan pa dang /_rul pa mnam po la snum pa la sogs pa lta bu yang mi rung ste/_so so'i dbang po yul gyi tshul du sbyar la/_chung ngu dang chen po dang log
[\[399b.4\]]pa dang rnam pa gsum du brten cing sbyor ba las gnod pa'i nad du 'gyur ba'i tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar sbyar ro/_/lo gcig la dus kyang gsum du dbye ste/_dgun zla bzhi/_dpyid zla bzhi/_dbyar zla bzhi ste gsum mo/_/de la dus 'di gsum tshul gyis yang chung ngu dang chen po dang /_
[\[399b.5\]]log pa rnam gsum las/_mi dang srog chags dang /_phyi rol gyi 'bru 'bras dang /_rtsi shing la sogs pa la gnod par 'gyur bar blta ste/_dgun grang ba'i tshe lhags pa ha cang chung ches na yang dus kyi sbyor ba chung zhes bya ste de yang mi bzang ngo /_/yang na lhags pa ha cang ches na
[\[399b.6\]]yang gnod de mi rung ngo /_/dgun gyi tshul la mi 'dra bar 'gyur ba ni dus log pa zhes bya ste/_'di lta bu yang nad dang gnod par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/_/lus dang ngag dang sems kyi las la yang chung ngu dang chen po dang log par sbyor ba gsum gsum du blta'o/_/de la lus kyi
[\[399b.7\]]las chung ngu byed pa ni ci byed kyang cung zad tsam cig byed pa ni chung ngus sbyor ba'o/_/ha cang brtun ngas pa ni cher sbyor ba'o/_/bshang gci la sogs pa ha cang snyoms na lus kyis bsgrims te brnag pa'am/_mi bro bzhin du btsir ba'am/_nyams kyis mi nus bzhin du lus kyis
[\[400a\]]
[\[400a.1\]]las drag shul byed pa dang /_lus dang rkang lag ha cang gcus pa dang /_rdeg 'cha' ba dang /_gom pa 'khyor bzhin 'thub pa 'di ni log pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya ste lus la gnod do/_/ngag gi smra ba yang tshul de dang 'dra ste/_kha nas zas ldad bzhin du
[\[400a.2\]]'bug por smra ba ste/_/'di yang gnod de mi rung ngo /_/yid kyi yang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang 'jigs pa la sogs pa sems pa ni log par sbyor ba'o/_/mi dge ba'i las smin pa'i dngos po srog gcod pa la sogs pa bcu po de dag kyang log pa'i sbyor ba yin te log pa'i sbyor
[\[400a.3\]]ba de lta bu thams cad sngon gyi tshe la byas sam/_tshe 'di la byas kyang rung ste/_de dag gis ni nad du 'gyur ba'i rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan rnams ma snyoms te/_'khrus na lus kyi yan lag dang /_nang khrol dang /_lhu tshigs kyi mtshams kun tu nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'debs
[\[400a.4\]]par byed do/_/de la yan lag gi khrag dang /_sha dang pags pa 'di dag las phyi rol gyi nad rnams 'byung ste/_a ba ci zhes bya ba dang /_lag pa'am/_rkang pa lhung ba bzhin 'gul mi shes pa'i nad dang /_lba ba dang /_rgyab bam brang du 'brum bu sngon po 'byung
[\[400a.5\]]ba'i nad dang /_rmen bu la sogs pa dang /_phyi rol gyi skran dang gzhang kha'i gzhang 'brum dang /_sna'am rna bar thug chen byung ba las khrag tu zad pa dang /_sha dang pags pa'i bar gyi skran dang /_lus skrang ba'i 'or nad la sogs pa 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi yan lag gi nad ces bya'o/_/
[\[400a.6\]]khong pa'i nang khrol gyi nad ni rtsa'i rgyun chen po bcu dang /_ma zhu ba'i gnas pho ba dang /_zhu ba'i sa 'di dag la nang khrol rnams brten te/_nang khrol gyi nad du skyugs pa 'byung ba tshad par 'khru ba/_lud pa lu ba/_dbugs mi bde ba/_dmu rdzing dang /_rims la sogs pa dang /_
[\[400a.7\]]lus skrang pa'i 'or dang /_nang gi gzhang 'brum dang /_khrag tshad dang /_skran dang /_'brum bu gcig pa'i nad dang /_'brum chen dang 'di rnams ni nang gi nad du gtogs so/_/mgo bo dang /_snying dang /_chu so dang /_gnad rnams dang /_rus pa rnams kyi nad ni tshigs kyi nad
[\[400b\]]
[\[400b.1\]]ces bya'o/_/tshigs de rnams 'brel pa'i rtsa dang /_chu ba dang /_chu ba chen po la sogs pa 'di dag ni bar gyi nad kyi lam srang zhes bya'o/_/bar gyi nad kyi lam srang de la nad ni ha cang gso dka' ba dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_mjing pa dang /_kha yon por
[\[400b.2\]]gyur pa'i nad dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_rna ba na ba dang /_sna la sogs pa na ba dang /_tshigs thams cad na ba dang /_rus pa na ba dang /_dpyi na ba dang /_gnod nad la sogs pa 'di rnams ni bar na gnas pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/lus la gnas pa'i rlung gi las sna tshogs
[\[400b.3\]]bstan pa/_rlung gi las ni bshang gci'i dri ma thur du 'byin par byed de/_rlung gis ni lus la khyab par byed/_snang ba snyam du lhang lhang byed pa dang /_res 'ga' rlung khong du zhi na/_gnyid log pa bzhin dub par byed/_lus kyi drod chung /_yan lag gzug pa bzhin du na ba dang /_so
[\[400b.4\]]sor bye ba snyam du byed cing na ba dang /_lus dang yan lag 'byar ba snyam du byed cing na ba dang /_sha rus chag bsnyam du byed pa dang /_rkang lag 'khums pa dang /_'dug langs kyi bskyod pa dang /_so dang sha brtse ba dang /_lus brtas par byed pa dang /_lus dang rkang lag 'dar ba dang /_
[\[400b.5\]]lus rtsub pa dang /_lus kyi sbu gu dod pa dang /_sha skem par byed pa dang /_lus kyi sha 'gul ba dang /_lus bya rmyang byed pa dang /_rlung nad kyis btab ste lus rengs pa dang /_rlung nad du na kha'i nang ro bska bar bro'o/_/rlung che ba'i bzhin mdog ni rtsa gnag gam/_thabs 'di rnams
[\[400b.6\]]lta bur gyur pa ni rlung las gyur par blta'o/_/mi'i lus la mkhris pa'i las kyi 'gyur ba bstan pa/_/lus la mkhris pa rgyas na lus tsha/_/mdog dmar por 'gyur/_lus kyi drod dang zas 'ju bar byed/_lus rdul/_lus phyi nang rul bag tu mnam/_thor bu 'byung zhing rnag khrag
[\[400b.7\]]tu 'dzag_/rma rad cing 'drul/_brgyal zhing myos/_/kha'i nang ro kha ba dang /_skyur bar bro/_bzhin mdog ni ser skyar 'dug la rtsa dmar ba ma yin no/_/bad kan gyi las kyi lus 'gyur ba bstan pa/_lus la bad kan che ba ni las kyi sha mdog snum/_sha mkhrang /_lus
[\[401a\]]
[\[401a.1\]]g.ya'/_khong grang /_lus lci/_lus tshigs thams cad mi 'khrul bar dam por 'brel bar byed/_/lus thams cad sha rgyas par byed/_/bad kan chen sems ni rmongs pag tu byed/_/lus skrangs/_/zas mi 'ju/_gnyid rab tu che/_/lus dang
[\[401a.2\]]bzhin gyi mdog ni dkar ro/_/ro ni mngar dang lan tshwa bro'o/_/las ci byed do cog la 'dam ring ngo /_/de ltar nad do cog thams cad ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi rang bzhin las gyur cing des nad la khyab par blta'o/_/nad pa'i nad bstan pa'i thabs bshad pa/_
[\[401a.3\]]ci na ba brtag pa ni/_bzhin mdog dang /_mig dang /_lce dang /_sen mo la blta ba dang /_rtsa la lag pas myangs te blta ba dang /_nang pa'i thabs dri ba dang /_ji ltar na ba dang /_ji tsam na nad ldang ba dang /_min ba'i snga rol du kha zas ci zos/_/las ci dag byas pa zhib tu
[\[401a.4\]]legs par brtags te shes par byas la/_rtsing po yal bar mi bya'o/_/de lta bas na sman pas nad kyi bye brag dang /_nad tshabs che zhing dam la bab par shes shing mthong nas phyi bshol ma byed cig_/yong ni sman sbyar ba'i thabs dang /_gtang ba dang /_gso ba'i thabs 'di
[\[401a.5\]]rnams kyi las mthong ste lobs par bya ba dang /_lag bsod par bya ba dang /_sman pa la gtam snyan par grags par bya ba 'di rnams kun kyang lan mang du goms na gdod 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dper na nor bu rin po che mching bu lta bu bzang ngan lta ba dpyad kyi yi ges shes par mi
[\[401a.6\]]'gyur gyi/_mthong ba mang ba las lobs te shes pa dang 'dra'o/_/mi'i nad kyang mi tshugs te/_la la ni tshe 'di nyid kyi kha zas mi 'phrod pa las nad du gyur bzhin du nad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi nyes sdig las nad du gyur pa ni/_nad ldang ba'i kha zas mi 'phrod pa lta bu ma zos
[\[401a.7\]]bzhin du nad ldang ngo /_/nad ldang ba'i rgyu dang sngon gyi sdig gnyis ka 'dres pa las nad du 'gyur ba ni/_nad du gyur pa'i rgyu chung ngu las nad tshabs dkyel chen por 'gyur ba'o/_/de la da ltar gyi tshe 'di'i zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa las nad du gyur pa la sogs pa'i thabs ni/_
[\[401b\]]
[\[401b.1\]]nad dang mi mthun pa la bsten na phan te/_dper na snum nang la kha zas snum bag dang drod bag phan pa lta bu/_mkhris pa'i nad la bsil ba dang mngar bag phan pa lta bu/_bad kan la kha zas rtsub pa dang drod bag bsten na nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe snga ma'i nyes sdig gi las
[\[401b.2\]]las byung ba'i nad ni/_/bsod nams dang /_dge ba cher byas te las byang na nad 'tsho'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad gzhi dang /_sngon gyi las gnyis ka las byung ba'i nad ni/_rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad gzhi de nyid dang sdig pa'i las de byang zhing 'tsho'o/_
[\[401b.3\]]nad do cog la rnam pa gnyis te/_rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad lta bu rang gi gnas nyid na nad du gyur pa de ni rang gi gnas kyi nad rang dbang can zhes bya'o/_/rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad lta bu rang rang gi sa ma yin pa/_pha rol po mkhris pa'am/_bad kan gyi gnas su rlung nad
[\[401b.4\]]zhugs par gyur na de ni gzhan gyi gnas su nad zhugs te gzhan la rag lus pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/rang gi gnas dang gzhan gyi gnas de gnyis la yang nad rnam pa gnyis gnyis su shes par bya'o/_/de ji ltar zhe na/_nad gang yang rung ba zhig gis btab pa las/_sngar nad
[\[401b.5\]]gang gi tshul yin par shes pa dang /_nad de las dkyel skyes te/_lan bon gyi gnod pa'i nad ci yin par shes par bya ba dang rnam pa gnyis so/_/nad 'di gnyis ni rang gi gnas rang dbang can dang /_gzhan gyi gnas rang dbang med pa gnyis las/_de ltar nad kyi tshul gnyis
[\[401b.6\]]su shes par bya'o/_/de la rlung nad dang mkhris pa lta bu rang gi gnas nyid nas rang gi gnas nyid du nad langs pa rang dbang zhes bya ba de ni nad kyi tshul mngon te shes par sla ba yin no/_/mkhris pa'am bad kan lta bu'i sar rlung nad zhugs te langs pa de ni/_gzhan gyi nad
[\[401b.7\]]zhugs pa gzhan dbang zhes bya ste/_de ni mkhris pa'am bad kan gang gi sar nad zhugs kyang rung ste/_de la ni mkhris pa'am bad kan ltar gso ba'i cho ga byas na rlung nad de sos par 'gyur ro/_/dri ma bshang gci dang rdul ba la yang nad rang gis dang /_gzhan gyi gnas rnam
[\[402a\]]
[\[402a.1\]]pa gnyis su shes par bya'o/_/rlung nad dam mkhris pa'i nad gang yang rung ba rgyun du na ba las/_kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos sam/_zas ma zhu'am/_srog zungs bdun po nyams te nad du 'gyur ba ni nad glang thabs zhes bya'o/_/'di lta bur nad glang thabs
[\[402a.2\]]su gyur pa la sman pa mig mi g.yeng bar nan tan cher gyis shig_/de la dang po nad kyis btab nas nad kyi tshul ci yin par shes pa dang /_dang por de nyid gsos na nad de las gyur pa'i lan bon gyi nad gyur pa'i nad dang gnyi ga 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te nad dpyad de de ltar byas
[\[402a.3\]]te ma btub na/_lan bon gyi nad gyur pa'i nad tshabs che ste/_lus la gnod pa'i nad ngan pa de gsos la/_thag gi nas nad snga ma ni phyis gsos shig_/lan gyi lan bon dang glang thabs su na ba de lta bu'i nad kyi ming nges pa med de/_nad de lta bu'i ming sman pas mi shes zhes
[\[402a.4\]]ngo tsha nams kyang ma byed par nad kyi tshul dang sbyor te dpyad gyis shig_/rlung nad mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad gang yang rung ba nad langs pa'i nad tshabs kyi dmigs dang /_nad de rlung ngam mkhris pa'i gnas gzhan lta bur 'phos pa las/_nad de sngar dang mi 'dra bar mang por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[402a.5\]]de lta bas na nad bla brnan du gyur pa de la nad nyid rlung ngam mkhris pa'am bad kan gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang yang sbyar/_nad de yang nad rang gi gnas na 'dug gam/_/nad de gnas gzhan du 'phos sam/_/nad de gzhi ci las nad du gyur pa'i bye brag sman pas shes par gyis la sman
[\[402a.6\]]dpyad myur du gyis shig_/nad gso ba de yang srog zungs bdun po ci 'dra ba dang /_yul gyi gnas skabs dang /_nad pa'i nyams stobs dang /_dbyar dgun ci 'dra ba'i dus dang sbyar ba dang /_nad pa'i khong na me'i drod che chung dang /_nad pa rlung ngam mkhris pa'i rang bzhin ci yin pa dang /_nad pa'i na tshod dang /_
[\[402a.7\]]nad pa'i snying stobs che chung dang /_goms pa rab 'bring tha ma'i dbye ba dang /_nad pa'i lus thogs kha zas gang gis bskyed bskyed pa dang /_da ltar kha zas gang ci dang ci 'phrod pa dang /_tshabs che chung dang /_tshul 'di lta bu'i bye brag tha dad pa phra zhing chung ngu yan chad zhib tu brtags la/_nad dang /_
[\[402b\]]
[\[402b.1\]]sman gyi tshul du sbyar zhing nad pa gso bar byed pa de lta bu ni sman dpyad rnams kyang 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/nad pa'i nad dkyel che 'am/_tshabs chung ngam/_skran dang 'brum bu la sogs pa lta bu nad kyi dbyibs sna tshogs kyi tshul ci 'dra ba dang /_nad pa'i phog snya che chung dang /_
[\[402b.2\]]lus che chung dang /_nad pa'i nyams che chung gi tshul yang shes par byas la/_nad kyang rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du gyur par snang yang /_de'i tshe sman pa ma yengs par legs par rtogs shig_/sman pas nad pa lci yang gi drod tshod zin nas gso ba'i dpyad smros shig_/gal te yang
[\[402b.3\]]nad dmigs chung snyam du bsams te/_kha zas mi 'phrod pa zar bcug gam/_kha zas kyi cho ga tshod ma zin na nad tshabs cher 'gyur ro/_/nad dkyel che ba zhig la/_bkru sman nyung ngam/_bkru sman gyi stobs chung na/_/de ni sman thun chung ngur sbyor ba zhes bya ste/_des nad slongs la
[\[402b.4\]]'khyil te nad mi phyin mi 'byung ngo /_/bkru sman gyi thun yang che/_/sman rno ste mthu dang yang dag ldan par btang na de ni sman thun cher sbyor ba zhes bya ste/_des ni nad phyin cing 'khru bar byed do/_/yang bkru sman ha cang rno la drag po thun che ches par btang na de ni log par sbyor ba zhes bya ste/_
[\[402b.5\]]bshang gci'i dri ma thur du 'khrus par ma zad kyi lus kyang ma rung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir sman pas nad gso ba ni rtag tu brtson 'grus bskyed de/_nad pa'i nad dang /_nad pa'i nyams drod kyi tshul ci 'dra ba legs par rab tu brtags te shes par byas la/_nad 'byang zhing 'tsho ba'i
[\[402b.6\]]tshul du 'tsho ba'i dpyad rtag tu gyis shig_/lus la bad kan dang /_mkhris pa dang /_rlung gang dang gang na gnas pa dang /_rlung dang bad kan dang /_mkhris pa la so so'i nad dmigs cir gyur pa bstan pa'i le'u bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i
[\[402b.7\]]nad dang bad kan gyi nad gso thabs bstan pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa bshad par bya'o/_/de la rlung nad du gyur pa la gso ba'i thabs ni/_mar dang /_rkang dang /_tshil dang /_til mar dang bzhi po 'di dag ni snum zhes bya'o/_/'di dag dang yang rlung 'byin pa lums dang /_dugs
[\[403a\]]
[\[403a.1\]]dang /_gtang ba'i dugs dang /_bkru sman 'jam pos bkru ba dang /_lus mnye ba dang /_lag pas rkang lag dang lus la gcu zhing skor ba dang /_zas mngar bag dang /_skyur bag dang /_lan tshwa dang /_drod bag gi kha zas de lta bur sbyar te sbyin pa dang /_thabs
[\[403a.2\]]gzhan yang dngas par bya ba dang /_sman e raN+Da dang /_nye'u shing dang /_gze ma la sogs pa bskol ba'i chus lus bkru zhing chu dron gyi nang du gzhug pa dang /_kha zas snum bag bsod pa zos pa'i 'tshal nan ni 'bras chang dang /_bu ram chang dang /_gro chang bzang ngo /_/rlung nad la
[\[403a.3\]]phan pa'i sman mas gtong ba snum bag dron por sbyar la bde zhing phan par bya ba'i phyir rtag tu gtang ngo /_/kha zas kyi cho ga ni sha tshon po dang /_drod che zhing 'ju ba'i spod sman dang /_snum bag sna du mar sbyar te chos par gdus pa'i khu ba'i bcud de lta bu bza'o/_/rlung nad la ni til mar dang
[\[403a.4\]]sbyar te sman bcos pa mas btang na mchog tu phan no/_/mkhris pa'i nad la ni bkru sman mngar zhing bsil bas bkru'o/_/kha zas ni mngar zhing kha ba dang /_bska ba'i kha zas sman de lta bu bza'o/_/skom ni 'o ma dang mar khu sbyar ba dang /_kha ra'i chu skom du bzang ngo /_/ga pur dang /_tsan
[\[403a.5\]]dan dang /_li shi la sogs pa la bsil zhing dri zhim pa'i spos bzang po dang /_me tog de lta bu bsnam zhing lus la byug pa dang gdags par bya'o/_/mgul do do shal dang /_se mo do dang /_nor bu rnams mgul dang brang la bcang zhing gdags so/_/nyin par ni rtag tu ga pur dang /_tsan
[\[403a.6\]]dan dang /_sman u shir dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags pa'i 'de gus skad cig cing lus la rgyun tu bsku'o/_/mtshan mo ni snga gang zhal zhal dkar por byas la/_/bsil ba'i nang du zla ba'i nyi ngo la 'dug la/_drung du glu snyan pa yid du 'ong ba len du bcug la/_ser bu
[\[403a.7\]]bsil ba'i ngad ldang ba lus la bab par bya zhing /_grogs po bde ba bag phebs pa dang /_nyams rangs su 'dug cing bu la gzhon skad kyis tshig nyams rangs su smra'o/_/bdag gi chung ma yid du 'ong zhing yon tan gyis brgyan pa/_khyo'i yid bzhin du byed pa de lta bus
[\[403b\]]
[\[403b.1\]]rim gro bya zhing /_nyin par tsha ba'i tshe khang pa bsil ba khang pa nyis rim gyi nang na 'dug cing /_chu grang mo bsil ba rgyun 'bab du blugs pa dang /_skyed mos tshal gyi nang na rdzing bu bzang po rgya che ba/_chu bsil ba stegs legs par bcas pa dang /_bye ma'i bsil ba yod pa'i drung du 'dug cing /_
[\[403b.2\]]chu 'gram na pad+mo bzang po 'khrungs pa'i drung na rgya sab kyi bsil khang phub pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu yod pa'i shing gi yal ga mang po thib por chags pa'i gnas bsil ba de lta bu na 'dug cing /_kha zas bsil ba 'o ma dang mar dag bza'o/_/yong ni tsha ba'i nad la mchog tu
[\[403b.3\]]bkru sman bsil bas sbrus pa bza'o/_/bad kan rgyas pa'i nad la ni skyug sman dang bkru sman rnon pos sgyug cing bkru'o/_/kha zas ni rtsub pa chung ba/_/rno ba drod che ba/_/tsha ba dang /_bska ba de lta bu'i zas dang sman sbyin no/_/'tshal nan ni yun ring por gzhag gzhag pa btung /_
[\[403b.4\]]mtshan mo gnyid kyis mi log pa dang /_bud med dang nye bar bya/_lus bcag cing sbyang ba dang /_bsil ba rnam pa sna tshogs bya/_lus la rtsub pos mnye/_sems las bskyed/_bad kan rgyas pa la ni mchog tu skyug sman phan no/_/chu tshan bskol ba tshan po 'thungs na
[\[403b.5\]]bad kan 'bri/_sbrang rtsi dang sman rtsub por sbyar te zos na bad kan dang tshil zad par 'gyur ro/_/zas smyung bar bya ba dang /_dud pas bdug pa dang /_sman btsos pa'i khu ba khar gzhag cing bo ba dang /_thabs 'di lta bu byas na bad kan gyi nad phyin te bde bar 'gyur/_rlung
[\[403b.6\]]nad dang /_mkhris pa'i nad dang /_bad kan gyi nad bsal zhing gso ba'i thabs ni de ltar bstan pa yin no/_/yang rlung nad dang /_bad kan gyi nad du 'dom mam/_mkhris pa dang rlung nad du 'dom mam/_rlung nad bad kan du 'dom yang rung /_nad 'di sna gnyis
[\[403b.7\]]su 'dres pa 'di lta bu dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyi nad 'dres par gyur ba de lta bu la 'dres pa'i nad dang /_'dus pa'i nad so sor tshul bzhin du brtag cing dpyad do/_/dpyid dang sos ka dang ston gyi cho bad kan dang mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad
[\[404a\]]
[\[404a.1\]]langs na/_gso ba'i dpyad bya ba dpyid kyi dus na bad kan gyi nad langs pa'i tshe/_bad kan gyi nad zla la rlung nad kyang g.yos te/_de gnyis lhan cig tu 'byung ba yin mod kyi/_dpyid bad kan gyi nad gsos na rlung nad kyang da'i zla la zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[404a.2\]]sos ka'i tshe tsha ches te phal cher mkhris pa'i nad mang du ldang ste/_de'i zla la rlung nad kyang 'byung mod kyi mkhris pa'i nad gsos na rlung nad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ston ka mkhris pa'i nad ldang ba'i dus la bab ste/_de'i zla la rlung nad kyang langs te/_gnyis ka lhan cig tu 'dom
[\[404a.3\]]mod kyi/_mkhris pa'i nad gsos na/_rlung nad kyang zhar la zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yong ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum gyi nad dang po nad dkyel du stsogs pa nyid kyi tshe na/_bstsal te nad zhi bar byas na bzang ngo /_/gal te sngar de ltar nad sel ma nus yang /_rlung
[\[404a.4\]]dang bad kan dang mkhris pa'i nad gang yang rung ba langs shing g.yos pa'i tshe/_nad nang ma 'dom na so so'i thabs bzhin du gsos shig_/gal te rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang bad kan gyi nad thams cad cig car 'dom zhing na sta mi bde na/_rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i
[\[404a.5\]]nad gang tshabs che ba de ltar gso zhing /_nad tshabs mi che ba lhag ma gzhan la yang mi ldang ba de lta bu'i thabs su gso'o/_/nad bsal zhing gso ba'i thabs ni nad dmigs gang mi bde ba yang gsos shing zhi bar byed la/_nad gzhan yang mi ldang bar bya'o/_/yang la la nad langs
[\[404a.6\]]pa ni dub cing gsos par mi nus la/_nad gsar ldang thabs su slong bar byed pa de lta bu ni dpyad ngan pa mi mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/dpyad mkhas pa ni nad gang mi bde ba de yang gsos par byed la/_nad gzhan ldang ba'i nyen du mi 'gyur bar nus pa de ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung
[\[404a.7\]]nad la gsos par 'gyur ba'i tshul ni las drag shul lta bu byas pa dang /_zas drod che ba lta bu'i bag zos pa dang /_tsha ba'i bag zos pa dang /_gnod par 'gyur ba rnams byas pa/_nad lus kyi khong na yod pa rnams dkyel skyes nas/_lus kyi yan lag dang /_rus pa
[\[404b\]]
[\[404b.1\]]dang /_gnas la sogs pa kun gyi nad du rlung nad la sogs pa 'gro zhing 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bu'i rlung nad la sogs zhugs par gyur nas/_nad dkyel skyes pa yang skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pas rtsa sgo thams cad nas nad bkru ste/_bsal na nad dkyel skyes
[\[404b.2\]]pa de bkrus shing gzags pa dang /_sbyangs shing bsal du rung bar smin par byas pa dang /_'di rnams kyis nad rtse gzhi la zhing nad khong du bsdu bar bya'o/_/rlung rtse bcil te khong na gnas pa de yang rang gtan nas ma phyin cing 'dug na/_nad de ldang bar 'dug pa'i rgyu kha zas mi/_
[\[404b.3\]]'phrod pa dang /_nam ma 'phrad kyi bar du khong na snod cing thogs te/_rlung nad la sogs pa slong ba'i gzhi kha zas mi 'phrod pa dang /_dpyid dang /_dbyar ston dang /_dgun nad la sogs pa nad so so'i ldang ba'i dus kyi stobs dang ldan par gyur na yang nad lang ngo /_/yang na so so'i nad
[\[404b.4\]]ldang ba'i dus su zas mi 'phrod pa cher zos sam/_/de bsten pa'i rkyen gyis dus kyi nad ma yin pa mkhris pa dang bad kan gzhan la sogs pa yang ldang ngo /_/gzhan yang nad ldang ba'i rlung ngam mkhris pa lta bu'i lan bon gyis bad kan gyi nad lta bu yang gcig la gcig brten nas ldang
[\[404b.5\]]ngo /_/de la yang bad kan gyi sar rlung nad zhugs sam/_mkhris pa'i sar rlung nad zhugs sam/_rlung gi sar mkhris pa'am/_/bad kan zhugs kyang rung ste/_nad glang thabs su zhugs pa ni mthu che/_snga na gnas pa'i snying ni stobs chung zhing zhan par 'gyur te mi bde na/_
[\[404b.6\]]de la gso ba'i dpyad ni snga na gnas pa gang yang rung ba de mthu bskyed cing gsos na/_glang thabs su zhugs pa zhar la phyin cing 'byang ngo /_/yang na nad gzhan gyi sar nad glang thabs su zhugs pa de nyid sman dpyad cho ga'i stobs kyis nad bsal te zhi bar byas na/_bad kan
[\[404b.7\]]nam mkhris pa rang gis na gnas pa de ni gso mi dgos par rang 'tsho'o/_/rtsib logs sam/_glo g.yas g.yon nam/_rkang lag g.yas g.yon du nad zhugs par gyur na dkyel che ste/_nad pa yun rings su nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/de gso ba'i cho ga yang 'phral du
[\[405a\]]
[\[405a.1\]]rings thabs su byas na/_lus dang /_khong pa nang gi me'i drod dang nyams mthu la gnod par 'gyur gyis/_rings thabs su ni mi bya'i/_de ni sman dang dpyad kyis rtsib logs g.yas g.yon dang /_yan lag g.yas kyi nad de lus kyi khong du bsdu zhing
[\[405a.2\]]brlan te bde bar zhi bar bya zhing gso'o/_/de ltar na nad kun khong du 'dus pa shes nas/_nad gang du nye bar 'ongs pa bzhin du gyen du slon pa dang /_thur du bkru ba dang /_sman mas gtong bas nad bsal bde lta bus nad 'byang ngo /_/nad pa zhig na ni/_rlung ngam mkhris
[\[405a.3\]]pa'am/_bad kan gyi nad gang yang rung ste/_nad rtse ma gzhil na/_nad tshabs che ste/_nad ma smin pa'i rtags ni/_bu ga dgu nas 'byung ba rnams 'gag_/nyams stobs chung zhing nyams lus lci/_lto ba'i nang na rlung 'khrul zhing 'u ru ru zer/_khong snyom/_kha zas
[\[405a.4\]]mi 'ju/_bad kan dang mchil ma mang /_bshang gci sri zhing 'gag_/kha zas yi gar mi 'ong /_khong rmya ste/_'di ni nad do cog gang gis btab kyang rung ste/_rtse ma gzhi la na/_ma thub pa'i rtags yin no/_/nad thabs 'di lta bu las bzlog na nad rtse zhil te smin pa
[\[405a.5\]]yin no/_/de yang ji lta zhe na/_khong pa'i drod chung /_nyams stobs chung /_khams bdun po la dang po'i khams bcud ces bya ba khong du mi 'ju/_nang khong du drod kyis pho ba'i nad du zhugs te/_de na bcud dngas ma yang ma zhu bar 'dug pas na/_de'i tshe de lta bu ni nad rtse zhil
[\[405a.6\]]te smin pa'i rtags yin no/_/nad tshabs po che zhig gis btab pa'i steng du nad glang thabs gzhan zhig kyang btab ste/_rnam pa gnyis su 'dom ste na ba ni dper ko dra ba zhes bya ba ci tshe las dug tu gyur pa dang 'dra ste/_nad tshabs chen por gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/de lta bur
[\[405a.7\]]nad tshabs chen po dang 'dres shing 'dom pa'i nad kyis btab ste/_rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa 'dres par gyur na/_khams bdun la yang gnod pa'i nad du 'gyur te/_de lta bu ni nad smin pa bsngo zhing tshabs che ba zhes bya'o/_/de lta bu'i nad las nad gzhan yang
[\[405b\]]
[\[405b.1\]]gsar du 'byung ste/_lus thog thag tu nad zhugs te na na/_rtse ma zhil bar du bkru sman dang /_skyug sman lta bu mi btang ngo /_/ji lta zhe na/_nad nang du zhugs te phyir ma phyung ba ni/_dpe shing thog ma smin pa las khu ba mi 'byung ba dang 'dra ste/_de lta bu la sman btang na
[\[405b.2\]]lus ma rung bar 'gyur la/_nad kyang mi phyin no/_/de lta bas na nad bsal du rung bar smin te/_rtse zhil bar bya ba dang /_drod che ba'i bras kyis drod bskyed pa dang /_rlung nad la snum bag gis brta ba dang /_dugs dang lums pa la sogs pas rtse bcil te nad bsal du rung
[\[405b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/nad bsal du rung bar gyur nas nad dmigs dang sbyar la nad gang du nye bar gyur ba las/_gyen du slon pa dang /_thur du bkru ba nad pa'i nyams stobs dang sbyar la/_bkru zhing slon par 'gyur na/_nad 'byung ba la rang gis 'byung du mi snang bar rang gis ma bkag shig_/
[\[405b.4\]]gnas te ma slon ma 'khrus par byas na/_de nyid las nad du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar stod smad du nad 'khrus shing byung nas/_/nad phyin phyin gyi bar du ni/_ci nas kyang 'khru zhing slon la/_nad phyin phyin gyi bar du bsdad do/_/nad phyin par gyur nas gdod phan pa'i kha zas bza'o/_
[\[405b.5\]]yang skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba las/_sman 'khyil te mi 'khru bar gyur na/_nad 'byung bar 'gyur brtse gzhil zhing smin par byed pa'i sman gyis bsal du rung bar byas la/_blon pa'am bkru bas sbyang ngo /_/skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang zhing /_bsal ba'i
[\[405b.6\]]dus ni dbyar zla tha chungs kyi ngo la rlung nad bsal ba'i dus so/_/ston zla tha chungs kyi ngo la mkhris pa'i nad bsal ba'i dus yin no/_/dpyid zla 'bring po la bad kan gyi nad bsal ba'i dus yin te/_nad sbyang zhing bsal ba'i rim pa ni de lta bu'o/_/de la nad dkyel du
[\[405b.7\]]sogs pa'i rim pa ni sos ka'i dus dbyar zla ra ba dang /_dbyar zla 'bring po la tsha ba'i nad mkhris pa ni langs so/_/rlung nad ni khong du stsogs so/_/dbyar gyi dus na dbyar zla tha chungs dang /_ston zla ra ba'i do la rlung nad ni langs so/_/mkhris pa'i nad ni stsogs so/_/
[\[406a\]]
[\[406a.1\]]ston zla 'bring po dang ston zla tha chungs la tsha ba'i nad mkhris pa'i nad ni langs/_grang ba'i rlung nad ni stsogs so/_/dgun stod dang dgun smad ni rlung nad ni langs/_bad kan gyi nad ni sogs so/_/dpyid ni bad kan gyi nad ldang ngo /_/de ltar dus re re la
