[\[406a.2\]]nad stsogs pa dang /_ldang ba'i dmigs dang sbyar te/_de la bad kan gyi nad ni stod du skyug cing drang ngo /_/mkhris pa'i nad ni thur du bkru'o/_/rlung nad ni sman mas gtong zhing bsal lo/_/de lta bas na sos ka rab tu tsha ba'i dus dang /_dbyar zla rlung nad langs pa'i dus dang /_dgun
[\[406a.3\]]grang ba'i tshe/_so so'i nad langs shing bsngo ba'i dus su sman gyis bkru zhing sgyug cing drang ngo /_/de bas na dgun dang dpyid kyi mtshams/_dpyid dang sos ka'i mtshams/_sos ka dang dbyar gyi mtshams/_dbyar ston dang dgun gyi mtshams 'di lta bu so so'i nad ma langs/_
[\[406a.4\]]ma byung ba'i skabs su bkru sman dang skyug sman gyis nad sbyang zhing bsal na rtag tu nad zhi zhing bde ba tha mal par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rtag par mi na bar 'dod na yang thabs 'di ltar gyis shig_/nad kyi dbang du gyur te mi bde ba zhig na yang thabs 'di lta bur bya'o/_/sos
[\[406a.5\]]ka dang dbyar dang dgun gyi so so'i dpyad dang /_cho ga tshul bzhin du nad dmigs rim pa dang sbyor ba gyis shig_/so so'i thabs skabs su skyug sman dang bkru sman la sogs pa btang ba cho ga bya ba'i dus su ma bshol ma yol bar gyis shig_/sman btang zhing bza' ba'i bye brag
[\[406a.6\]]bshad pa rnam pa bcu la/_kha zas ma zos par khye'u sus la sman gtang ba dang /_dro khar sman btang ba'i rjes la zan bza' ba dang /_zan phyed zos nas sman bza' ba dang /_zan zos skom 'thungs zin pa'i rjes la/_sman gyis mnan pa dang /_nang par gyi khye'u sus
[\[406a.7\]]dang /_phyi 'phred kyi zas kyi bar nyi ma'i gung la sman btang ba dang /_zan dang sman spag cing bza' ba dang /_yang dang yang tsheg pur bza' ba dang /_'bras chan nam zan dang sman lhan cig btsos te bza' ba'am/_yang na so sor btsos pa las bsres te bza' ba'am/_sngar
[\[406b\]]
[\[406b.1\]]sman btang la de'i rjes la kha zas yang ba cung zad zos nas sman btang ba dang /_mtshan mo nyal kar sman btung ba dang rnam pa de bcu'o/_/yang sman btang ngo cog kyang nad pa'i nad dmigs dang sbyar la/_sman btang ba'i dus las ma gyur par btang ngo /_/de la nang par khye'u sus
[\[406b.2\]]la kha zas ma zos par sman bza' ba ni/_nad pa pho ba'i drod che la be'u snabs kyang med pho ba'i rtsa sgo rnams kyang ma 'gags la/_nad pa'i nyams stobs dang ldan/_bad kan shas kyis che ba'i mi de lta bu la/_sman khye'u sus la btang na sman gyi mthu rab tu che bar 'gyur ro/_/de
[\[406b.3\]]la dro khar sman btang ba'i rjes la zan bza' ba ni/_rlung nad a pa na thur du sel ba zhes bya ba'i nad kyis btab pa bsal ba dang /_lus kyi nyams stobs bskyed pa dang /_zan phyed za zhing grims par bya ba'i phyir dro khar sman 'thungs pa'i rjes la zan bza' bar bya'o/_/zan
[\[406b.4\]]phyed zos nas sman bza' ba ni rlung nad las mang na me'i drod dang mnyam du gnas pa zhes bya ba las nad du gyur pa de lta bu la/_zan phyed zos nas sman btang la/_mjug kyang zan dang skom gyis mnan to/_/thabs 'di ltar btang na rlung nad de lta bu'i nad dang /_khong pa'i nang
[\[406b.5\]]gi nad rnams dang /_mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad la phan no/_/zas zos skom 'thungs pa'i rjes la sman gyis mnan ces bya ba ni/_rlung khyab byed ces bya ba las nad du gyur te mi bde ba dang /_rlung nad a pan zhes thur du sel bar byed pa'i nad khye'u sus la sman btang bas
[\[406b.6\]]ma phan pa dang /_mtshan mo mi bde ba'i nad ma zhi ba la phan par bya ba dang /_ro stod yan chad la bde zhing stobs mthu bskyed pa dang /_bad kan las nad du gyur pa la zhi bar bya ba dang /_sha 'tshag skye zhing sbom por bya ba 'di lta bu la/_kha zas kyi mjug la sman gyis mnan cing
[\[406b.7\]]bza' ste/_dro kha'i zas kyi mjug dang /_dgongs kyi zan gyi mjug la sman bza' zhing mnan to/_/nang par gyi khye'u sus dang /_phyi 'phred kyi zas kyi bar nyi ma'i gung la sman btang ba zhes bya ba ni drod ches pa las khyab byed ces bya ba'i rlung nad du gyur na/_khye'u sus zos te zhu ba dang /_
[\[407a\]]
[\[407a.1\]]dro khar sman zos la/_sman de zhun phyi 'phred nub par zan bza' bza' ba ni/_mtshan mo'i cho ga yang 'di las lhag par bya ba med de 'dir 'dus so/_/zan kham ra dang /_sman thun re spel zhing bza' ba zhes bya ba ni/_srog ces bya ba'i rlung las nad du gyur pa dang /_pho ba'i
[\[407a.2\]]drod skyed pa dang /_bud med la nyal phod par bya ba dang /_snying na ba dang /_skyugs pa bshad pa 'di lta bu la zan kham re zos shing sman cur nis phye ba'am/_sman 'de gu'am/_sman ril bu thun re dang spel zhing bza'o/_/yang dang yang tsheg bur bza' ba ni zan zos kyang rung /_dbugs mi bde ba
[\[407a.3\]]dang lud pa lu ba dang /_skyigs bus btab pa dang /_skom gyis gdungs pa dang /_dug gis phog pa dang /_skyug bro ba 'di lta bu la sogs pa sman tseg pur yang dang yang bza'o/_/'bras chan nam zan dang sman lhan cig btsos te bza' ba'am/_yang na so sor btsos pa la bsres te bza'
[\[407a.4\]]ba ni/_byis pa chung ngu sman 'thung mi nus pa dang /_sman stobs chung ngus sman 'thungs pa la zhan pa dang /_sman dang kha zas yi gar mi 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang /_lus dang yan lag thams cad na ba la kha zas yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang /_sman du sbyar la lhan cig btsos sam/_so so na btsos
[\[407a.5\]]pa la sbyar te bza'o/_/sngar sman btang la de'i rjes la kha zas yang cung zad zos na/_yang sman bza' ba ni/_skyigs bu dang /_lus 'dar ba dang /_rkang lag 'dar ba dang /_lus stod smad mi bde ba de lta bu'i nad la/_sman sngar 'thungs pa zas yang ba de'i 'og tu zos te/_de'i rjes la sman
[\[407a.6\]]'thungs na phan no/_/mtshan mo nyal khar sman btang ba ni/_mgul pa yan chad stod kyi nad la mtshan mo nyal khar sman btang na phan te/_de la skam mam/_yang na chu 'thungs par ma gyur tam/_zas ma zhu'am/_yang na bkres sam/_lus rgyan/_mtshan mo nyal khar sman btang du mi rung ngo /_/
[\[407a.7\]]rlung nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang bad kan gyi nad gso ba'i thabs bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so//_//de nas yang nad pa'i nyams brta zhing gso ba'i thabs dang /_nad yang bar bya ba'i phyir zas dbri ba dang /_smyung bar bya ba dang rnam pa gnyis kyi le'u bcu bzhi pa bshad par
[\[407b\]]
[\[407b.1\]]bya'o/_/dpyad rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa de la gcig gis lus kyi nyams 'tshag brtas par bya'o/_/rnam pa gnyis pos ni lus nyams 'tshag smad cing shad pri bar bya'o/_/de la nyams 'tshag brtas par bya ba ni sha 'tshag rgyas pa tshon por bya'o/_/nyams 'tshag smad de skem por bya ba
[\[407b.2\]]ni zas dbri zhing bsdam pa smyung ba lta bur byas pas/_lus sha dbri ste khong yang bar bya ba yin no/_/de yang yong ni phal cher lus kyi rang bzhin ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin yin te/_'di rnam par bskyed pa dang dbri ba'o/_/chen po lnga po 'di rnams la dpyad du bya ba/_
[\[407b.3\]]khong snum pa dang /_lus kyi khong rtsub par bya ba'o/_/lus de la yang dugs dang lums bya ba'i cho gas nad kyi rtse gzhil bar bya ba'i dpyad kyang bya'o/_/chen po lnga'i lus la dpyad du bya ba yang rnam pa gnyis te/_lus kyi nad bkru zhing sbyang ba dang /_zhi bar bya'o/_/bkru zhing sbyang ba ni nad
[\[407b.4\]]phyir sel ba ste/_de yang rnam pa lnga'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_sman mas btang ste nad bsal ba dang /_skyug sman btang ba dang /_khong pa'i lus nad bkru ba dang /_mgo bo'i nad rnams sman sna nas btang zhing bsal ba dang /_gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang lnga'o/_/nad zhi bar byed pa ni nad
[\[407b.5\]]sel cing 'khru bar byed pa yang ma yin te/_'phrod cing snyoms te bde ba las gnod par yang mi byed/_/rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa rnams ma snyoms te nad du gyur pa rnams dug zhi nas nang 'phrod cing snyoms par byed pa de la nad zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ste/_de yang rnam pa bdun du blta'o/_/de gang
[\[407b.6\]]zhe na/_drod che ba'i 'ju sman gyis nad bsal du rung ba 'ju bar bya ba dang /_pho ba'i me drod bskyed pa dang /_bru ba tsha bar bya ba dang /_skom par bya ba dang /_lus bsig cing bcag pa dang /_nyi ma tsha ba la 'de ba dang /_tsha ba'i nad la ser bu bsil ba dang sbyar ba 'di dag ni 'phral du nad dub cing zhi bar bya
[\[407b.7\]]ba yin no/_/rlung nad dang /_mkhris pa'i nad gnyis la ni brta ba'i cho ga dang /_dub cing zhi bar bya ba'i dpyad bya'o/_/zas dang sman gyis lus brta bar bya ba ni chang nad kyis btab ste nyam chung ba dang /_bud med kyis dub pa dang /_mya ngan gyis sha zad pa dang /_lus khur gyis rke ba dang /_lam rings kyi rgyun
[\[408a\]]
[\[408a.1\]]gyis chad pa dang /_glo rdol ba dang /_lus skem zhing rid pa dang /_khong na snum med de las rtsub pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rlung gi shas che ba dang /_lto na bu yod de nyam chung ba dang /_bu btsas pa dang /_byis pa chung ngu dang /_mi rgan po sbabs chung ngu 'di lta bu dang /_sos ka tsha ba'i dus 'di lta
[\[408a.2\]]bu la lus brta ba'i cho ga bya'o/_/de la lus brta ba ni sha dang 'o ma dang /_mar dang /_mngar bag dang /_snum bag dang /_li kha ra dkar po dang /_sman mas gtong ba 'di dag gis khong brta zhing nyams 'tshag bskyed la/_yang lus la phan pa mtshan mo mal na gnyid bde bar log par bya/_lus la
[\[408a.3\]]mar gyis byug cing mnyes te/_chu dron pos khrus bya ba dang /_nyams bag tu bde bar 'dug pa dang /_nyams dga' bar bya ba 'di lta bus lus brta'o/_/yang lus kyi sha 'tshag nyams smad cing dbri bar bya ba ni/_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_pho ba'i nang be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang /_zas snum bag
[\[408a.4\]]ha cang zos sam/_lus kyi khong snum ches sam/_rims kyis btab bam/_brla rengs pa'i nad yod dam/_mdzes btab bam/_shu chen mched pa'am/_khong 'bras dang /_mcher pa na ba dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_lkog ma na ba dang /_mig na ba dang /_lus sha bskyed de sbom por 'gyur ba dang /_'di
[\[408a.5\]]lta bu dang /_dgun stod kyi tshe lta bu rtag tu zas bsnams shing kha zas dbri ba dang /_smyung bar bya'o/_/de la sman gyis rtag tu bkru zhing sbyang ba ni lus ha cang sha che zhing spom pa dang /_nyams stobs che ba'i mi dang /_tsha ba mkhris pa rgyas pa'i mi dang /_bad kan rgyas te che ba dang /_pho ba'i nang na be+e'u
[\[408a.6\]]snabs yod pas zas mi 'ju ste mchin pa na ba dang /_rims na ba dang /_rtag tu slon zhing skyug bro ba dang /_tshad pa rab tu 'khru ba'i nad dang /_snying na ba dang /_bshang gci 'gags pa ste 'ong du mi rung ba dang /_lus dang khong lci ba dang /_sgregs pa rtag tu 'ong ba dang /_yi ga 'chus shing dong ga mi
[\[408a.7\]]bde ba la sogs pa la/_bkru sman dang skyug sman drag tu cher btang ngo /_/sman gyis ran par bkru zhing sbyang ba 'bring tsam du btang ba'i dmigs ni/_sha che chung ran tsam gyi mi la ni sngar nad bzhu ba'i sman btang drod bskyed la/_de'i rjes la nad kyi dmigs gong ma ltar mi bde zhing na ba gang
[\[408b\]]
[\[408b.1\]]yang rung ste/_de lta bu'i mi dang /_yang la la sha chung zhing skem la nad dmigs gong ma ltar na ba de rnams la/_bkru zhing sbyang ba'i sman drag dal ran pa 'bring tsam du btang ba dang /_nyam chung zhing rke ba la thun chung zhing 'jam por btang la/_de'i tshe na kha zas bsdam zhing skom thub par bya'o/_/
[\[408b.2\]]yong ni nad pa'i nyams stobs 'bring tsam cig la mi bde na/_de la dpyad bkru sman gyis bkru zhing sbyang mi dgos te/_de lta bu ni lus bsig cing bcag pa dang /_nad dmigs dang sbyar te/_rlung dang ser bu las bsang ba gar legs par bya'o/_/nyams 'tshag 'bring la yang bkru sman
[\[408b.3\]]la sogs pa mi btang na/_nad pa nyam chung ba la bkru sman 'jam po yang btang du mi rung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos so/_/nad pa lus kyi nyams 'tshag smad cing bri ba lta bu nyams 'tshag gso zhing brta bar bya ba'i mi la ni/_zas bsdams pa dang /_smyung ba la sogs pa cung zad tsam byar
[\[408b.4\]]rung ngo /_/spyir gso zhing nyams 'tshag brta ba'i dpyad bya ba dang skyug sman dang bkru sman dang smyung bar byas te/_nyams 'tshag smad par bya ba yang yul dang stobs dang /_dus dang /_mi'i na tshod dang /_nyams 'tshag dang sbyar te/_ha cang nyams 'bri ba dang /_ha cang nyams brta ba yang mi bya'o/_/
[\[408b.5\]]de la lus kyi nyams 'tshag brta ba'i dpyad bya ste/_nyams mthu brtas par 'gyur bar mngon zhing nyams 'tshag brtas/_sha skyes stobs dang ldan par gyur na/_mig dang rna ba la sogs pa dbang po rnams gsal/_bshang gci'i dri ma mi sri bar 'byung /_lus khong yang zhing
[\[408b.6\]]bshor/_kha zas yi gar 'ong na de lta bu nad med par gso zhing cho ga byar rung ngo /_/yang kha zas bsdam zhing dbri ba dang smyung bar byas na/_phan par mngon pa'i rtags ni kha zas phra zhing bsdams sam/_smyung bar byas pa las kha zas zhu ste/_bkres shing skom par 'gyur ba dang /_khong gsud pa'i
[\[408b.7\]]sgregs pa mnam po mi zhim pa med pa tha mal bar 'byung la khong ba'i nang sang sang por gyur la sems kyang gsal/_dang ga dang gre ba yang sang sang por gyur la/_na ba dang mi bde ba yang rtse zhil la/_khong yang zhing ci bya'o cog la sems spro ba yod/_myo myo po snyom pa'i bag med pa de lta bu ni kha zas
[\[409a\]]
[\[409a.1\]]smyung ba byas pas phan par mngon pa yin no/_/nyams 'tshag brta ste sha bskyed pa'i cho ga tshod ma zin te ha cang drags pas sha ha cang cher skyes sam/_kha zas bri zhing smad pa dang /_smyung bar byas pa drags pas ha cang skem por gyur pa 'di gnyis lta bu la sman dpyad kyi cho
[\[409a.2\]]gar bya ba ni/_sha cher skyes pa dang /_kha zas smyung bar byas pa las nad cir gyur pa'i tshul mngon te/_lus sha ha cang che zhing tsho ba las ni nad 'brum bu dang /_gcin snyi ba'i nad dang /_rims nad dang /_dmu rdzing lta bu gsus pa cher skyes pa'i nad dang /_bshang gci 'byung ba'i mtshams
[\[409a.3\]]su mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_rims rmongs bus 'debs pa dang /_gcin sri ba dang pho bar be+e'u snabs chags te zas mi 'ju ba dang /_mdze la sogs pa'i nad mi bzad pa rnams 'byung ngo /_/de la sha che zhing tshon po ni tshil zad par bya ba dang /_rlung dang bad kan
[\[409a.4\]]bsal bar bya ba lta bu'i dpyang thams cad bzang ngo /_/de la mi tshon po skem po grims par bya ba'i kha zas ni/_rgya sran ku lang+tha dang /_dzur na dang /_sha ma ka khre rgod dang /_nas dang /_sran chung mon sran rde'u dang /_'di rnams g.yos su byas pa bzang zhing /_skom du ni sbrang rtsi chu dang sbyar ba
[\[409a.5\]]dang /_zho ga chu dang /_dar ba dang 'di rnams btung ngo /_/yang sman a ri ta'i khu ba skom du bsnan pa btung ngo /_/sems las bskyed pa dang /_skyug sman dang bkru sman btang ba dang /_lus bsig cing bcag pa dang /_mtshan mo gdod mi nyal bar bya'o/_/sman ni a ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra'i 'bras
[\[409a.6\]]bu gsum zhib tu btags la/_sbrang rtsi'i 'de gus sbrus te bza'o/_/yang sman gu ru ce sle tres dang /_a ru ra dang /_gla sgang chen po 'di gsum btags te sbrang rtsi la sbrus pa bza'o/_/yang sman ra tsan dza na zhes bya ba skyer khaN+Da dang /_rtsa ba chen po lnga zhes bya ba sa la par+Ni dang /_kr-iSh+Na par+Ni dang /_
[\[409a.7\]]bri ha ti dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_gze ma dang 'di lnga btang ngo /_/yang gu gul btang ba'i dpyad dang /_sman brag zhun btang ba'i dpyad bya'o/_/sman ag+ni man+tha'i khu ba yang btang na yang sha 'bri'o/_/yang sman byi dang ka dang /_sga dang /_ya bak+Sha ra nas tshig 'khus pa'i tsha dang /_lcags kyi cha tsha phye ma nag po dang /_nas dang /_
[\[409b\]]
[\[409b.1\]]skyu ru ra dang /_'di rnams phye mar byas la/_sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te btang na/_sha che zhing tsho ba'i nad sel cing sha grims par 'ong ngo /_/yang tsha ba rnam pa gsum po bca' sga dang /_pi pi ling dang /_na le sham dang /_ka ti tang dang /_ba ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang gsum dang /_shi kru dang /_byi dang ga dang /_bong nga
[\[409b.2\]]dang /_s+thir dang /_shing kun dang /_lan tshwa nag po dang /_go snyod dang /_la la phud dang /_'u su dang /_kru trug tres dang /_skyer pa dang /_chu rtsi mo dang /_bri ha ti rnam gnyis dang /_snga ma'i 'bras bu dang /_pa tha dang /_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba dang /_chu las skyes pa ke'u ka dang /_'di rnams zhib tu btags
[\[409b.3\]]pa'i phye ma cha snyoms pa dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dang /_til mar gsum mnyam par byas te/_sman 'di rnams las nas phye cha bcu drug gis bskyed de sbyar ba 'di 'thungs na lus sha rab tu che zhing sbom po dang /_lus sha chen po las byung ba'i nad thams cad dang /_nad gzhan yang
[\[409b.4\]]'byang la sha yang grims shing phra bar 'ong /_gzhan yang snying na ba dang /_mig ser dang /_sha bkra dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa lu ba dang /_lkog ma na ba dang 'di rnams sel te phan/_yid rno/_yid gzhungs sems dran pa la phan/_/khong pa'i drod skye/_zas 'ju ba la phan
[\[409b.5\]]no/_/ha cang kha zas bsdam zhing smyung ba bya ba drags pa dang /_sman gyis bkru zhing sbyang ba drags pa na/_lus sha rab tu skem/_mgo 'khor/_lud pa skam por 'ong /_skom dad che/_/kha zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang /_lus kyi khong na tshil dang snum bag zad pa dang /_
[\[409b.6\]]khong pa'i nang gi drod nyams te zad/_gnyid med/_mig rtul/_rna ba mi gsang /_khu chu zad/_gzi dang mdangs nyams te/_zas yi gar 'ong ba mi skyes/_skad 'gag_/chu so zug_/snying na/_klad pa na/_byin pa dang /_brla na/_dku do dang rtsib logs na/_rlung
[\[409b.7\]]nad las gyur pa'i rims nad kyis 'debs/_/smra ba'i tshig mang /_lus kyi stod du rlung nad 'jug skyug bro/_rus pa'i tshigs kun bcag pa snyam byed cing na/_bshang gci dri ma sri ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu ni kha zas bsdams pa dang /_smyung ba dang /_sman gyis bkru zhing sbyangs te/_
[\[410a\]]
[\[410a.1\]]skem por gyur pa las nad de 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/yong ni lus sha brta zhing tshon por bya ba'am/_skem por bya ba yang rung ste/_skem por ni nad dkon la/_sman dpyad sla ste rung ngo /_/tshon po na ba ni sman dpyad byar med de mi rung ngo /_/ha cang tsho ches pa ni
[\[410a.2\]]tshil ches pas khong pa'i me'i drod kyang 'bri/_/rlung nad kyang sel te/_zas mngar bag dang /_zas snum bag bza' zhing bsod pas tshim par byed pa dang /_bde ba nyams bag tu byed pas ni sha skem po las tshon por 'gyur ro/_/de bas na na rga ba dang /_kha zas mi 'phrod
[\[410a.3\]]mi mthun pa bza' bas lus skem zhing rid par gyur pa 'di lta bu la lus sha skyes shing brtas par 'gyur ba'i kha zas skom thams cad dang /_sman btang zhing sems las med pa la rtag tu snying dga' bar 'dug pa dang /_rtag tu skom 'thungs shing nyin par nyal ba ni phag bzhin du
[\[410a.4\]]tshon por 'gyur ro/_/lus brtas shing tshon por bya ba ni sha las lhag pa ni gang yang med do/_/de bas na mi tshon po sha phal gyis snying mi tshim pa dang /_sha 'tshag brta zhing tshon por blta ba dang /_gcan gzan dang /_khra lta bus lus gsos shing bskyed pa'i sha lhag par
[\[410a.5\]]bzang ngo /_/skem por bya ba la sha yang ba phan no/_/nas dang gro ni tshon po dang skem po gnyis ka'i dus su bzang ngo /_/yong ni nad kyi rnam grangs mangs pas bkru sman btang ba la sogs pa dang /_'khru ba gcod pa la sogs pa dpyad mang po du ma yod kyis kyang mdor na nad
[\[410a.6\]]pa gso zhing brtas pa bya ba dang /_kha zas bsdam zhing sha bri bar bya ba dang /_sman gyis bkru zhing bsal ba dang /_zhi bar byas pa gang yang rung dpyad kyi mdo rnam gnyis su 'dus te/_dper na nad kyi rnam grangs brgya nyi shu yod kyis kyang /_nad thams cad
[\[410a.7\]]kyi gzhi ni rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa gsum du 'dus pa dang 'dra'o/_/nad pa brta zhing gso ba'i thabs dang /_nad yang bar bya ba'i phyir zas dbri ba'am smyung bar bya ba dang /_gso ba'i thabs rnam pa gnyis bshad pa'i le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//
